bhagavābuddhas+saṃbuddho'kārasambhavaḥ| -> bhagavābuddhaḥ saṃbuddho'kārasambhavaḥ|

tat+uktam -> tad uktam

tad uktam+bhagavatā--- -> tad uktaṃ bhagavatā---

kuliśapadam+pūrvoktam -> kuliśapadaṃ pūrvoktam

kuliśapadaṃ pūrvoktam+akṣarasukham -> kuliśapadaṃ pūrvoktam akṣarasukham

kuliśapadaṃ pūrvoktam akṣarasukham+yoginām -> kuliśapadaṃ pūrvoktam akṣarasukhaṃ yoginām

kuliśapadaṃ pūrvoktam akṣarasukhaṃ yoginām+iti| -> kuliśapadaṃ pūrvoktam akṣarasukhaṃ yoginām iti|

samājādike+upāyatantre -> samājādika upāyatantre

sarvasmin+tantrarāje -> sarvasmiṃś tantrarāje

sarvasmin+ityādi| -> sarvasminn ityādi|

sādhanāpaṭalas+caturthas -> sādhanāpaṭalaś caturthas

sādhanāpaṭalaś caturthas+|| -> sādhanāpaṭalaś caturthaḥ||

mudrāsiddhyarthahetos+jinavarajanakānāgatam -> mudrāsiddhyarthahetor jinavarajanakānāgatam

mudrāsiddhyarthahetor jinavarajanakānāgatam+kālacakram|| -> mudrāsiddhyarthahetor jinavarajanakānāgataṃ kālacakram||

tasmāt+tam -> tasmāt tam

tasmāt tam+bhedayitvā -> tasmāt taṃ bhedayitvā

gopitam+viśvabhartrā| -> gopitaṃ viśvabhartrā|

bālānām+pācanārtham -> bālānāṃ pācanārtham

bālānāṃ pācanārtham+paramakaruṇayā -> bālānāṃ pācanārthaṃ paramakaruṇayā

kuliśapadam+yoginām -> kuliśapadaṃ yoginām

kuliśapadaṃ yoginām+etat -> kuliśapadaṃ yoginām etat

kuliśapadaṃ yoginām etat+uktam -> kuliśapadaṃ yoginām etad uktam

sarvasmin+tantrarāje -> sarvasmiṃś tantrarāje

idānīm+vajrapadaniyamas -> idānīṃ vajrapadaniyamas

idānīṃ vajrapadaniyamas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ vajrapadaniyama ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

yathāśaktitas+kāryas -> yathāśaktitaḥ kāryas

yathāśaktitaḥ kāryas+iti -> yathāśaktitaḥ kārya iti

vidhis+tathā -> vidhis tathā

vidhis tathā+arghadānakāle -> vidhis tathārghadānakāle

vidhis tathārghadānakāle+api -> vidhis tathārghadānakāle 'pi

dātavyam+arghadānakāle| -> dātavyam arghadānakāle|

saṃghabhojyam+gaṇacakram -> saṃghabhojyaṃ gaṇacakram

saṃghabhojyaṃ gaṇacakram+ca -> saṃghabhojyaṃ gaṇacakraṃ ca

pūrvoktam+arghādikam -> pūrvoktam arghādikam

pūrvoktam arghādikam+dattvā -> pūrvoktam arghādikaṃ dattvā

pūrvoktam arghādikaṃ dattvā+ācāryasya -> pūrvoktam arghādikaṃ dattvācāryasya

paṭapustakapratimādikam+kartavyam -> paṭapustakapratimādikaṃ kartavyam

paṭapustakapratimādikaṃ kartavyam+raudrasaumyakriyayā| -> paṭapustakapratimādikaṃ kartavyaṃ raudrasaumyakriyayā|

paṭapustakapratimālikhanāya+upasthāpayas -> paṭapustakapratimālikhanāyopasthāpayas

paṭapustakapratimālikhanāyopasthāpayas+dharmabhāṇakas -> paṭapustakapratimālikhanāyopasthāpayo dharmabhāṇakas

paṭapustakapratimālikhanāyopasthāpayo dharmabhāṇakas+anveṣaṇīyas -> paṭapustakapratimālikhanāyopasthāpayo dharmabhāṇako 'nveṣaṇīyas

paṭapustakapratimālikhanāyopasthāpayo dharmabhāṇako 'nveṣaṇīyas+tena -> paṭapustakapratimālikhanāyopasthāpayo dharmabhāṇako 'nveṣaṇīyas tena

sambandhas+| -> sambandhaḥ|

vaimalyam+bhavati -> vaimalyaṃ bhavati

vaimalyaṃ bhavati+iti -> vaimalyaṃ bhavatīti

ebhis+dinais -> ebhir dinais

ebhir dinais+bodhicittam -> ebhir dinair bodhicittam

ebhir dinair bodhicittam+akṣaratvam -> ebhir dinair bodhicittam akṣaratvam

ebhir dinair bodhicittam akṣaratvam+prayāti -> ebhir dinair bodhicittam akṣaratvaṃ prayāti

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

kālacakradinais+pañcaviṃśatyadhikaikādaśaśatais -> kālacakradinaiḥ pañcaviṃśatyadhikaikādaśaśatais

kālacakradinaiḥ pañcaviṃśatyadhikaikādaśaśatais+iti -> kālacakradinaiḥ pañcaviṃśatyadhikaikādaśaśatair iti

katipayadivasais+iti -> katipayadivasair iti

tatas+mudrāsaṅgena -> tato mudrāsaṅgena

tasmāt+iti| -> tasmād iti|

sthiram+syāt -> sthiraṃ syāt

sthiraṃ syāt+svacittam| -> sthiraṃ syāt svacittam|

guruniyamavaśāt+yāvat -> guruniyamavaśād yāvat

guruniyamavaśād yāvat+eva -> guruniyamavaśād yāvad eva

varṣārdham+varṣam -> varṣārdhaṃ varṣam

varṣārdhaṃ varṣam+ekam -> varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekam

varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekam+vā -> varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekaṃ vā

śūnyatābimbam+avikalpam -> śūnyatābimbam avikalpam

śūnyatābimbam avikalpam+vā -> śūnyatābimbam avikalpaṃ vā

likhitam+vā -> likhitaṃ vā

evam+rūpādikam -> evaṃ rūpādikam

evaṃ rūpādikam+kalpitam -> evaṃ rūpādikaṃ kalpitam

evaṃ rūpādikaṃ kalpitam+paṭe -> evaṃ rūpādikaṃ kalpitaṃ paṭe

sakalam+avikalam -> sakalam avikalam

sakalam avikalam+dṛśyamānam -> sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānam

sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānam+svacittam -> sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ svacittam

sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ svacittam+rūpamaṇḍalacakrakalpanābhāvāt -> sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ svacittaṃ rūpamaṇḍalacakrakalpanābhāvāt

sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ svacittaṃ rūpamaṇḍalacakrakalpanābhāvāt+iti| -> sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ svacittaṃ rūpamaṇḍalacakrakalpanābhāvād iti|

tattvayogāt+iti -> tattvayogād iti

tattvatas+punar -> tattvataḥ punar

tattvataḥ punar+ākāśe -> tattvataḥ punar ākāśe

svacittam+iti| -> svacittam iti|

paṭe+atattvatas -> paṭe 'tattvatas

paṭe 'tattvatas+bhāvanīyam| -> paṭe 'tattvato bhāvanīyam|

prathamam+api -> prathamam api

maṇḍalam+vā -> maṇḍalaṃ vā

rūpam+iti -> rūpam iti

rūpam iti+ekadevatā -> rūpam ity ekadevatā

bālayoginām+svacittaśaktyā -> bālayogināṃ svacittaśaktyā

rūpam+ityādi| -> rūpam ityādi|

tasmāt+katipayadivasais -> tasmāt katipayadivasais

tasmāt katipayadivasais+akṣaratvam -> tasmāt katipayadivasair akṣaratvam

tasmāt katipayadivasair akṣaratvam+prayāti|| -> tasmāt katipayadivasair akṣaratvaṃ prayāti||

sthiram+syāt -> sthiraṃ syāt

varṣārdham+varṣam -> varṣārdhaṃ varṣam

varṣārdhaṃ varṣam+ekam -> varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekam

varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekam+guruniyamavaśāt -> varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekaṃ guruniyamavaśāt

varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekaṃ guruniyamavaśāt+yāvat -> varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekaṃ guruniyamavaśād yāvat

varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekaṃ guruniyamavaśād yāvat+eva -> varṣārdhaṃ varṣam ekaṃ guruniyamavaśād yāvad eva

tattvayogāt+sakalam -> tattvayogāt sakalam

tattvayogāt sakalam+avikalam -> tattvayogāt sakalam avikalam

tattvayogāt sakalam avikalam+dṛśyamānam -> tattvayogāt sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānam

tattvayogāt sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānam+svacittam| -> tattvayogāt sakalam avikalaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ svacittam|

paṭe+atattvatas -> paṭe 'tattvatas

paṭe 'tattvatas+bhāvanīyam -> paṭe 'tattvato bhāvanīyam

prathamam+api -> prathamam api

maṇḍalam+vā -> maṇḍalaṃ vā

rūpam+vā -> rūpaṃ vā

idānīm+vikalpabhāvanāyās -> idānīṃ vikalpabhāvanāyās

idānīṃ vikalpabhāvanāyās+upāyas -> idānīṃ vikalpabhāvanāyā upāyas

idānīṃ vikalpabhāvanāyā upāyas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ vikalpabhāvanāyā upāya ucyate---

vikalpabhāvanāniyamas+|| -> vikalpabhāvanāniyamaḥ||

niyatākāram+darśanīyam -> niyatākāraṃ darśanīyam

niyatākāraṃ darśanīyam+bālayoginām -> niyatākāraṃ darśanīyaṃ bālayoginām

niyatākāraṃ darśanīyaṃ bālayoginām+mandānām -> niyatākāraṃ darśanīyaṃ bālayogināṃ mandānām

niyatākāraṃ darśanīyaṃ bālayogināṃ mandānām+bhāvanārtham -> niyatākāraṃ darśanīyaṃ bālayogināṃ mandānāṃ bhāvanārtham

niyatākāraṃ darśanīyaṃ bālayogināṃ mandānāṃ bhāvanārtham+iti -> niyatākāraṃ darśanīyaṃ bālayogināṃ mandānāṃ bhāvanārtham iti

buddhabodhisattvānām+maṇḍalacakram -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ maṇḍalacakram

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ maṇḍalacakram+vā -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ maṇḍalacakraṃ vā

evam+pratimā -> evaṃ pratimā

darśanīyam+iti| -> darśanīyam iti|

punar+apratyakṣe -> punar apratyakṣe

punar apratyakṣe+anumānam -> punar apratyakṣe 'numānam

punar apratyakṣe 'numānam+mṛtakatanus -> punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanus

punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanus+iva -> punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur iva

punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur iva+atattvatas -> punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvatas

punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvatas+kalpanam -> punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvataḥ kalpanam

punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvataḥ kalpanam+yat -> punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvataḥ kalpanaṃ yat

punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvataḥ kalpanaṃ yat+citrādau -> punar apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvataḥ kalpanaṃ yac citrādau

tattvabhāvanāniyamas+| -> tattvabhāvanāniyamaḥ|

vaktavyas+iti -> vaktavya iti

evam+vistaras -> evaṃ vistaras

evaṃ vistaras+vakṣyemāṇe -> evaṃ vistaro vakṣyemāṇe

jātyandhās+iti| -> jātyandhā iti|

sattvās+śūnyatādarśanaviṣaye -> sattvāḥ śūnyatādarśanaviṣaye

śūnyatādarśanam+prati| -> śūnyatādarśanaṃ prati|

evam+tathāgatasya -> evaṃ tathāgatasya

samyaksambodhāvadhicittavaśāt+sarvopadhivinirmuktas -> samyaksambodhāvadhicittavaśāt sarvopadhivinirmuktas

samyaksambodhāvadhicittavaśāt sarvopadhivinirmuktas+iti| -> samyaksambodhāvadhicittavaśāt sarvopadhivinirmukta iti|

bodhisattvāvadhivaśatas+| -> bodhisattvāvadhivaśataḥ|

tatas+prajñācakṣuṣā -> tataḥ prajñācakṣuṣā

vītarāgāvadhivaśatas+| -> vītarāgāvadhivaśataḥ|

tatas+buddhacakṣuṣā -> tato buddhacakṣuṣā

paśyati+abhijñāvidhivaśāt| -> paśyaty abhijñāvidhivaśāt|

tatas+divyacakṣuṣā -> tato divyacakṣuṣā

yogī+ādikarmikas -> yogy ādikarmikas

yogy ādikarmikas+viśvam -> yogy ādikarmiko viśvam

yogy ādikarmiko viśvam+paśyati -> yogy ādikarmiko viśvaṃ paśyati

yogy ādikarmiko viśvaṃ paśyati+abhijñābhis -> yogy ādikarmiko viśvaṃ paśyaty abhijñābhis

yogy ādikarmiko viśvaṃ paśyaty abhijñābhis+vinā| -> yogy ādikarmiko viśvaṃ paśyaty abhijñābhir vinā|

prathamam+māṃsacakṣuṣā -> prathamaṃ māṃsacakṣuṣā

māṃsādicakṣurgrāhyam+māyāsvapnasadṛśam -> māṃsādicakṣurgrāhyaṃ māyāsvapnasadṛśam

māṃsādicakṣurgrāhyaṃ māyāsvapnasadṛśam+tribhavam -> māṃsādicakṣurgrāhyaṃ māyāsvapnasadṛśaṃ tribhavam

māṃsādicakṣurgrāhyaṃ māyāsvapnasadṛśaṃ tribhavam+tryadhvani| -> māṃsādicakṣurgrāhyaṃ māyāsvapnasadṛśaṃ tribhavaṃ tryadhvani|

bhavet+tārācakram -> bhavet tārācakram

bhavet tārācakram+iva -> bhavet tārācakram iva

bhavet tārācakram iva+anekasambhogakāyam -> bhavet tārācakram ivānekasambhogakāyam

bhavet tārācakram ivānekasambhogakāyam+iti| -> bhavet tārācakram ivānekasambhogakāyam iti|

tayos+pratyakṣānumānayos -> tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayos

tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayos+yat -> tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat

tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat+pratyakṣam -> tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat pratyakṣam

tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat pratyakṣam+tattvayogāt -> tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogāt

tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogāt+gagane -> tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogād gagane

tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogād gagane+uḍus -> tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogād gagana uḍus

tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogād gagana uḍus+iva -> tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor yat pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogād gagana uḍur iva

bhavet+devatālambanam -> bhaved devatālambanam

bhaved devatālambanam+yat| -> bhaved devatālambanaṃ yat|

yoginām+pratyakṣam -> yogināṃ pratyakṣam

yogināṃ pratyakṣam+ca -> yogināṃ pratyakṣaṃ ca

yogināṃ pratyakṣaṃ ca+anumānam -> yogināṃ pratyakṣaṃ cānumānam

yogināṃ pratyakṣaṃ cānumānam+dvividham -> yogināṃ pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ dvividham

yogināṃ pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ dvividham+api -> yogināṃ pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ dvividham api

sattvānām+āśayavaśena -> sattvānām āśayavaśena

pratyakṣam+ityādi| -> pratyakṣam ityādi|

darśanīyam+hi -> darśanīyaṃ hi

darśanīyaṃ hi+apariṇatadhiyām -> darśanīyaṃ hy apariṇatadhiyām

darśanīyaṃ hy apariṇatadhiyām+yoginām -> darśanīyaṃ hy apariṇatadhiyāṃ yoginām

darśanīyaṃ hy apariṇatadhiyāṃ yoginām+bhāvanārtham|| -> darśanīyaṃ hy apariṇatadhiyāṃ yogināṃ bhāvanārtham||

apratyakṣe+anumānam -> apratyakṣe 'numānam

apratyakṣe 'numānam+mṛtakatanus -> apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanus

apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanus+iva -> apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur iva

apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur iva+atattvatas -> apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvatas

apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvatas+kalpanam -> apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvataḥ kalpanam

apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvataḥ kalpanam+yat -> apratyakṣe 'numānaṃ mṛtakatanur ivātattvataḥ kalpanaṃ yat

gagane+anekasambhogakāyam| -> gagane 'nekasambhogakāyam|

pratyakṣam+tattvayogāt -> pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogāt

pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogāt+uḍis -> pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogād uḍis

pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogād uḍis+iva -> pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogād uḍir iva

bhavet+devatālambanam -> bhaved devatālambanam

bhaved devatālambanam+yat -> bhaved devatālambanaṃ yat

pratyakṣam+ca -> pratyakṣaṃ ca

pratyakṣaṃ ca+anumānam -> pratyakṣaṃ cānumānam

pratyakṣaṃ cānumānam+dvividham -> pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ dvividham

pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ dvividham+api -> pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ dvividham api

devatālambanam+ucyate--- -> devatālambanam ucyate---

idānīm+lokottaralaukikasiddhaye -> idānīṃ lokottaralaukikasiddhaye

kāryavaśāt+iti|| -> kāryavaśād iti||

katipayavṛttāni+abhiṣekapaṭale -> katipayavṛttāny abhiṣekapaṭale

katipayavṛttāny abhiṣekapaṭale+adhyāhāreṇa -> katipayavṛttāny abhiṣekapaṭale 'dhyāhāreṇa

katipayavṛttāny abhiṣekapaṭale 'dhyāhāreṇa+uktāni -> katipayavṛttāny abhiṣekapaṭale 'dhyāhāreṇoktāni

dūtīnām+grāsam -> dūtīnāṃ grāsam

dūtīnāṃ grāsam+agram -> dūtīnāṃ grāsam agram

dūtīnāṃ grāsam agram+itiparyantam -> dūtīnāṃ grāsam agram itiparyantam

dūtīnāṃ grāsam agram itiparyantam+katipayavṛttāni -> dūtīnāṃ grāsam agram itiparyantaṃ katipayavṛttāni

yas+śabdas -> yaḥ śabdas

yaḥ śabdas+hṛtpradeśe -> yaḥ śabdo hṛtpradeśe

yaḥ śabdo hṛtpradeśe+ityādinā -> yaḥ śabdo hṛtpradeśa ityādinā

atas+navatyadhikaśatavṛttāt -> ato navatyadhikaśatavṛttāt

ato navatyadhikaśatavṛttāt+urdhvam -> ato navatyadhikaśatavṛttād urdhvam

ato navatyadhikaśatavṛttād urdhvam+catvāriṃśat -> ato navatyadhikaśatavṛttād urdhvaṃ catvāriṃśat

ato navatyadhikaśatavṛttād urdhvaṃ catvāriṃśat+vṛttāni -> ato navatyadhikaśatavṛttād urdhvaṃ catvāriṃśad vṛttāni

nidrākāle+aṅgavaktrais -> nidrākāle 'ṅgavaktrais

nidrākāle 'ṅgavaktrais+ubhayakulagatais -> nidrākāle 'ṅgavaktrair ubhayakulagatais

nidrākāle 'ṅgavaktrair ubhayakulagatais+arcane -> nidrākāle 'ṅgavaktrair ubhayakulagatair arcane

galahṛdos+nābhiguhye -> galahṛdor nābhiguhye

aṅganyāsam+svavajrais -> aṅganyāsaṃ svavajrais

aṅganyāsaṃ svavajrais+śirasi -> aṅganyāsaṃ svavajraiḥ śirasi

punar+imām -> punar imām

punar imām+dānagāthām -> punar imāṃ dānagāthām

punar imāṃ dānagāthām+śubhārtham| -> punar imāṃ dānagāthāṃ śubhārtham|

bhūtānām+bhuktaśeṣam -> bhūtānāṃ bhuktaśeṣam

bhūtānāṃ bhuktaśeṣam+paṭhati -> bhūtānāṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ paṭhati

bhartṛvajrais+dadāti -> bhartṛvajrair dadāti

dūtīnām+grāsam -> dūtīnāṃ grāsam

dūtīnāṃ grāsam+agram -> dūtīnāṃ grāsam agram

dūtīnāṃ grāsam agram+kṣititalanilaye -> dūtīnāṃ grāsam agraṃ kṣititalanilaye

balim+krodharājāya -> baliṃ krodharājāya

punar+api -> punar api

hārītyās+piṇḍake -> hārītyāḥ piṇḍake

balim+ca -> baliṃ ca

baliṃ ca+ādimadhyāntanāmnā -> baliṃ cādimadhyāntanāmnā

deśagrāmādhipānām+prathamam -> deśagrāmādhipānāṃ prathamam

deśagrāmādhipānāṃ prathamam+iha -> deśagrāmādhipānāṃ prathamam iha

tarpaṇādyam+karoti| -> tarpaṇādyaṃ karoti|

aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyām+pratidinasamaye -> aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ pratidinasamaye

gatam+bhāvayitvā -> gataṃ bhāvayitvā

jñānacakram+tribhavam -> jñānacakraṃ tribhavam

jñānacakraṃ tribhavam+api -> jñānacakraṃ tribhavam api

trikoṇam+dinakarasadṛśam -> trikoṇaṃ dinakarasadṛśam

trikoṇaṃ dinakarasadṛśam+vartulam -> trikoṇaṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ vartulam

trikoṇaṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ vartulam+tasya -> trikoṇaṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ vartulaṃ tasya

tatpātrāt+bindunā -> tatpātrād bindunā

drutaśaśinam+iva -> drutaśaśinam iva

drutaśaśinam iva+ābhāvayitvā -> drutaśaśinam ivābhāvayitvā

madyam+prajvālayitvā -> madyaṃ prajvālayitvā

bodhayet+śodhayitvā -> bodhayec chodhayitvā

kramasthais+prathamam -> kramasthaiḥ prathamam

kramasthaiḥ prathamam+iha -> kramasthaiḥ prathamam iha

svaprajñāliṅgitam+yat -> svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat

svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat+sahajasukhagatam -> svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat sahajasukhagatam

svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat sahajasukhagatam+mokṣadam -> svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat sahajasukhagataṃ mokṣadam

svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat sahajasukhagataṃ mokṣadam+tat -> svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat sahajasukhagataṃ mokṣadaṃ tat

svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat sahajasukhagataṃ mokṣadaṃ tat+svacittam|| -> svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat sahajasukhagataṃ mokṣadaṃ tat svacittam||

samasukhadam+yoginām -> samasukhadaṃ yoginām

samasukhadaṃ yoginām+cittavajram -> samasukhadaṃ yogināṃ cittavajram

bhāvābhāvais+vibhinnam -> bhāvābhāvair vibhinnam

bhāvābhāvair vibhinnam+na -> bhāvābhāvair vibhinnaṃ na

tat+prāṇinām -> tat prāṇinām

tat prāṇinām+mokṣamārgam| -> tat prāṇināṃ mokṣamārgam|

jāgrāyām+sasvabhāvam -> jāgrāyāṃ sasvabhāvam

jāgrāyāṃ sasvabhāvam+prakaṭayati -> jāgrāyāṃ sasvabhāvaṃ prakaṭayati

niḥsvabhāvam+svacittam -> niḥsvabhāvaṃ svacittam

mūrchām+nidrām -> mūrchāṃ nidrām

mūrchāṃ nidrām+praviṣṭam -> mūrchāṃ nidrāṃ praviṣṭam

mūrchāṃ nidrāṃ praviṣṭam+bhavati -> mūrchāṃ nidrāṃ praviṣṭaṃ bhavati

mokṣahetos+|| -> mokṣahetoḥ||

tasmāt+tat -> tasmāt tat

tasmāt tat+bhāvanīyam -> tasmāt tad bhāvanīyam

tasmāt tad bhāvanīyam+pratidinasamaye -> tasmāt tad bhāvanīyaṃ pratidinasamaye

pravaravibhusukham+sarvamudrāprasaṅge -> pravaravibhusukhaṃ sarvamudrāprasaṅge

mudrāsiddhim+dadāti -> mudrāsiddhiṃ dadāti

jinakulāvāhanam+preṣaṇam -> jinakulāvāhanaṃ preṣaṇam

jinakulāvāhanaṃ preṣaṇam+ca| -> jinakulāvāhanaṃ preṣaṇaṃ ca|

homas+mantrapratiṣṭhā -> homo mantrapratiṣṭhā

mahāmaṇḍalāni+āsanāni -> mahāmaṇḍalāny āsanāni

dhyānam+mantrajāpas -> dhyānaṃ mantrajāpas

dhyānaṃ mantrajāpas+karaṇam -> dhyānaṃ mantrajāpaḥ karaṇam

dhyānaṃ mantrajāpaḥ karaṇam+api -> dhyānaṃ mantrajāpaḥ karaṇam api

karoti+auṣadhībhis -> karoty auṣadhībhis

sthānaṃ śūnyam+ca -> sthānaṃ śūnyaṃ ca

na+asti| -> nāsti|

punar idaṃ mantraiddhis+ca -> punar idaṃ mantraiddhiś ca

siddhis+|| -> siddhiḥ||

nṛṇāṃ janmalakṣais+ca -> nṛṇāṃ janmalakṣaiś ca

anyathāne+anyayonau -> anyathāne 'nyayonau

sādhayet+saumyamantrān -> sādhayet saumyamantrān

yoginām+cittabandhas -> yogināṃ cittabandhas

bhogās+| -> bhogāḥ|

kanakavirahitā vādināṃ na+eva -> kanakavirahitā vādināṃ naiva

tu+anavaratamahānandacittena -> tv anavaratamahānandacittena

sekam+śuddhakrameṇa -> sekaṃ śuddhakrameṇa

devīs+samayakulagatās -> devīḥ samayakulagatās

devīḥ samayakulagatās+dhyānajāpais -> devīḥ samayakulagatā dhyānajāpais

devīḥ samayakulagatā dhyānajāpais+saha -> devīḥ samayakulagatā dhyānajāpaiḥ saha

devīḥ samayakulagatā dhyānajāpaiḥ saha+umais -> devīḥ samayakulagatā dhyānajāpaiḥ sahomais

devīḥ samayakulagatā dhyānajāpaiḥ sahomais+| -> devīḥ samayakulagatā dhyānajāpaiḥ sahomaiḥ|

mantrair vīrakrameṇa+api -> mantrair vīrakrameṇāpi

mantrair vīrakrameṇāpi+asuraphaṇisurān -> mantrair vīrakrameṇāpy asuraphaṇisurān

mantrair vīrakrameṇāpy asuraphaṇisurān+sādhayet -> mantrair vīrakrameṇāpy asuraphaṇisuran sādhayet

mantrair vīrakrameṇāpy asuraphaṇisuran sādhayet+raudrabhūmyām -> mantrair vīrakrameṇāpy asuraphaṇisuran sādhayed raudrabhūmyām

kātaras+cāturaṅge| -> kātaraś cāturaṅge|

narās+te|| -> narās te||

kṛtvā+asmin -> kṛtvāsmin

kṛtvāsmin rāgabandhaṃ narakam upagatā mohitās+ye -> kṛtvāsmin rāgabandhaṃ narakam upagatā mohitā ye

śīghram+pramuditamanasas -> śīghraṃ pramuditamanasas

śīghraṃ pramuditamanaso yoginas+janmani -> śīghraṃ pramuditamanaso yogino janmani

śīghraṃ pramuditamanaso yogino janmani+iha -> śīghraṃ pramuditamanaso yogino janmanīha

balam+jñānapūrṇam -> balaṃ jñānapūrṇam

balaṃ jñānapūrṇaṃ hi+anena| -> balaṃ jñānapūrṇaṃ hy anena|

kṣāntivīryam+ca -> kṣāntivīryaṃ ca

dānam+śīlam -> dānaṃ śīlam

dānaṃ śīlaṃ prapūrṇam+jinajanakakule -> dānaṃ śīlaṃ prapūrṇaṃ jinajanakakule

nṛṇām+yāvat -> nṛṇāṃ yāvat

yasmin+sūcyagrabhūmau -> yasmin sūcyagrabhūmau

yasmin sūcyagrabhūmau+aśubhaphalavaśāt -> yasmin sūcyagrabhūmāv aśubhaphalavaśāt

yasmin sūcyagrabhūmāv aśubhaphalavaśāt+nārakās -> yasmin sūcyagrabhūmāv aśubhaphalavaśān nārakās

yasmin sūcyagrabhūmāv aśubhaphalavaśān nārakās+saṃcaranti -> yasmin sūcyagrabhūmāv aśubhaphalavaśān nārakāḥ saṃcaranti

narakam+sas -> narakaṃ sas

narakaṃ sas+aṣṭamam -> narakaṃ so 'ṣṭamam

narakaṃ so 'ṣṭamam+yāvat -> narakaṃ so 'ṣṭamaṃ yāvat

narakaṃ so 'ṣṭamaṃ yāvat+eva| -> narakaṃ so 'ṣṭamaṃ yāvad eva|

śīghraṃ paramabhayakaraṃ māritā vighnanāthais+| -> śīghraṃ paramabhayakaraṃ māritā vighnanāthaiḥ|

prakaṭam+api -> prakaṭam api

ācāryam+nidayati -> ācāryaṃ nidayati

puṇyajñānapūrṇāḥ paramasukhapadam+janmani -> puṇyajñānapūrṇāḥ paramasukhapadaṃ janmani

dātāras+ye -> dātāro ye

bhijyādyaṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ paramasukhakaraṃ yoginām+iṣṭadānam| -> bhijyādyaṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ paramasukhakaraṃ yoginām iṣṭadānam|

sahajasukharatopāsakopāsikās+ca|| -> sahajasukharatopāsakopāsikāś ca||

yoginyo yoginas+vai -> yoginyo yogino vai

mahopāsakopāsikās+ca -> mahopāsakopāsikāś ca

punar+iha -> punar iha

bhikṣuṇyas+bhikṣavas -> bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣavas

bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣavas+ca -> bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣavaś ca

bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣavaś ca+api -> bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣavaś cāpi

punas+śrāvakas -> punaḥ śrāvakas

punaḥ śrāvakas+anuttaras -> punaḥ śrāvako 'nuttaras

punaḥ śrāvako 'nuttaras+ca| -> punaḥ śrāvako 'nuttaraś ca|

dvividhas+iha -> dvividha iha

sas+asmin -> so 'smin

so 'smin+uktas -> so 'sminn uktas

so 'sminn uktas+caturdhā -> so 'sminn uktaś caturdhā

saṃghas+tasmin -> saṃghas tasmin

saṃghas tasmin+sthitas -> saṃghas tasmin sthitas

saṃghas tasmin sthitas+yas -> saṃghas tasmin sthito yas

saṃghas tasmin sthito yas+pramuditahṛdayas -> saṃghas tasmin sthito yaḥ pramuditahṛdayas

saṃghas tasmin sthito yaḥ pramuditahṛdayas+sarvasattvānukampī -> saṃghas tasmin sthito yaḥ pramuditahṛdayaḥ sarvasattvānukampī

dharmas+|| -> dharmaḥ||

ācāryas+buddhas -> ācāryo buddhas

ācāryo buddhas+eva -> ācāryo buddha eva

paramavibhusukham+janmalakṣais -> paramavibhusukhaṃ janmalakṣais

paramavibhusukhaṃ janmalakṣais+dadāti -> paramavibhusukhaṃ janmalakṣair dadāti

saṃghas+kāṣāyadhārī -> saṃghaḥ kāṣāyadhārī

likhitas+pustakas -> likhitaḥ pustakas

likhitaḥ pustakas+dharmas -> likhitaḥ pustako dharmas

likhitaḥ pustako dharmas+eva| -> likhitaḥ pustako dharma eva|

sthitas+iha -> sthita iha

na+ayam -> nāyam

nāyam+buddhas -> nāyaṃ buddhas

nāyaṃ buddhas+vihāre -> nāyaṃ buddho vihāre

saṃgham+śaraṇam -> saṃghaṃ śaraṇam

saṃghaṃ śaraṇam+anugatās -> saṃghaṃ śaraṇam anugatās

saṃghaṃ śaraṇam anugatās+mānuṣās -> saṃghaṃ śaraṇam anugatā mānuṣās

saṃghaṃ śaraṇam anugatā mānuṣās+mokṣahetos -> saṃghaṃ śaraṇam anugatā mānuṣā mokṣahetos

buddham+dharmam -> buddhaṃ dharmam

buddhaṃ dharmam+ca -> buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca

dharmas+|| -> dharmaḥ||

buddhas+ca -> buddhaś ca

saṃghas+bhavati -> saṃgho bhavati

grāsas+yatra -> grāso yatra

grāso yatra+eva -> grāso yatraiva

tiryagāvāsas+eṣa -> tiryagāvāsa eṣa

vihāras+kṣititalanilaye -> vihāraḥ kṣititalanilaye

rujaśamanam+tatra -> rujaśamanaṃ tatra

bhaiṣajyāhāradānam+kila -> bhaiṣajyāhāradānaṃ kila

bhagavān+śrīvihārapratiṣṭhām -> bhagavāñ chrīvihārapratiṣṭhām

vāsagrāsārtham+iṣṭām -> vāsagrāsārtham iṣṭām

vāsagrāsārtham iṣṭām+kathayati -> vāsagrāsārtham iṣṭāṃ kathayati

pāpam+pramāṇam|| -> pāpaṃ pramāṇam||

pramāṇam+narakabhayakaram -> pramāṇaṃ narakabhayakaram

pramāṇaṃ narakabhayakaram+tasya -> pramāṇaṃ narakabhayakaraṃ tasya

pramāṇam+vividhapaśunṛṇām -> pramāṇaṃ vividhapaśunṛṇām

pramāṇaṃ vividhapaśunṛṇām+tasya -> pramāṇaṃ vividhapaśunṛṇāṃ tasya

yajñas+yasya -> yajño yasya

yajñas+pramāṇam| -> yajñaḥ pramāṇam|

pramāṇam+khalu -> pramāṇaṃ khalu

vedas+yasya -> vedo yasya

vedas+pramāṇam -> vedaḥ pramāṇam

pramāṇam+bhavati -> pramāṇaṃ bhavati

varṇas+yasya -> varṇo yasya

prapūrya+akṣarasukhaphaladam -> prapūryākṣarasukhaphaladam

prapūryākṣarasukhaphaladam+saugatānām -> prapūryākṣarasukhaphaladaṃ saugatānām

prapūryākṣarasukhaphaladaṃ saugatānām+parārtham|| -> prapūryākṣarasukhaphaladaṃ saugatānāṃ parārtham||

hīnatvāt+uttamatvāt -> hīnatvād uttamatvāt

hīnatvād uttamatvāt+sakaruṇamuditāsthānayugme -> hīnatvād uttamatvāt sakaruṇamuditāsthānayugme

sūpekṣāsthāne+evam -> sūpekṣāsthāna evam

sūpekṣāsthāna evam+pravarajinakule -> sūpekṣāsthāna evaṃ pravarajinakule

dānam+samasukhaphaladam -> dānaṃ samasukhaphaladam

dānaṃ samasukhaphaladam+tulyasattvaprabhāvāt -> dānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ tulyasattvaprabhāvāt

lābhas+|| -> lābhaḥ||

kim+na -> kiṃ na

kiṃ na+eṣa -> kiṃ naiṣa

devas+jinajanakakule -> devo jinajanakakule

yadi+ajena -> yady ajena

pravaragajapatis+labhyate -> pravaragajapatir labhyate

jātyaśvas+gardabhena -> jātyaśvo gardabhena

nābhis+| -> nābhiḥ|

kāmadānais+amalakulavadhūs -> kāmadānair amalakulavadhūs

kāmadānair amalakulavadhūs+carmakhaṇḍena -> kāmadānair amalakulavadhūś carmakhaṇḍena

tulyam+suramukuṭamaṇis -> tulyaṃ suramukuṭamaṇis

tulyaṃ suramukuṭamaṇis+kācakhaṇḍena -> tulyaṃ suramukuṭamaṇiḥ kācakhaṇḍena

hemam+tāmreṇa -> hemaṃ tāmreṇa

jātam+jinajanakakule -> jātaṃ jinajanakakule

buddhatvam+tena -> buddhatvaṃ tena

tatas+kāmadānam -> tataḥ kāmadānam

tataḥ kāmadānam+pradattam -> tataḥ kāmadānaṃ pradattam

ebhis+buddhatvam -> ebhir buddhatvam

ebhir buddhatvam+iṣṭam -> ebhir buddhatvam iṣṭam

ebhir buddhatvam iṣṭam+na -> ebhir buddhatvam iṣṭaṃ na

śiras+raktamāṃsam -> śiro raktamāṃsam

śiro raktamāṃsam+pradattam| -> śiro raktamāṃsaṃ pradattam|

buddhatvahetos+punar -> buddhatvahetoḥ punar

buddhatvahetoḥ punar+api -> buddhatvahetoḥ punar api

pūrvam+buddhais -> pūrvaṃ buddhais

pūrvaṃ buddhais+dharitrī -> pūrvaṃ buddhair dharitrī

bhaginī+api -> bhaginy api

sarvasmin+kāmadānam -> sarvasmin kāmadānam

sarvasmin kāmadānam+samasukhaphaladam -> sarvasmin kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladam

sarvasmin kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladam+kim -> sarvasmin kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ kim

sarvasmin kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ kim+punas -> sarvasmin kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ kiṃ punas

sarvasmin kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ kiṃ punas+cakrakāle -> sarvasmin kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ kiṃ punaś cakrakāle

bhaiṣajyāhāradānam+sakalarujaharam -> bhaiṣajyāhāradānaṃ sakalarujaharam

bhaiṣajyāhāradānaṃ sakalarujaharam+kṣutpipāsāharam -> bhaiṣajyāhāradānaṃ sakalarujaharaṃ kṣutpipāsāharam

bhaiṣajyāhāradānaṃ sakalarujaharaṃ kṣutpipāsāharam+ca| -> bhaiṣajyāhāradānaṃ sakalarujaharaṃ kṣutpipāsāharaṃ ca|

bhogadam+martyaloke -> bhogadaṃ martyaloke

godānam+bhūmidānam -> godānaṃ bhūmidānam

godānaṃ bhūmidānam+hi -> godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ hi

godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ hi+aparam -> godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ hy aparam

godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ hy aparam+api -> godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ hy aparam api

maraṇam+upagate -> maraṇam upagate

maraṇam upagate+aho -> maraṇam upagate 'ho

maraṇam upagate 'ho+aśubhas -> NO RULE FOUND (o+a)

aśubhas+karmabandhas -> aśubhaḥ karmabandhas

aśubhaḥ karmabandhas+|| -> aśubhaḥ karmabandhaḥ||

kas+tvam -> kas tvam

kas tvam+kā -> kas tvaṃ kā

rāgiṇas+svasvanāryās -> rāgiṇaḥ svasvanāryās

rakṣām+kurvanti -> rakṣāṃ kurvanti

lābhas+| -> lābhaḥ|

bhavet+svāminas -> bhavet svāminas

bhavet svāminas+kim -> bhavet svāminaḥ kim

bhavet svāminaḥ kim+na -> bhavet svāminaḥ kiṃ na

lakṣmīs+ca -> lakṣmīś ca

lakṣmīś ca+aśvaprabhāvāt -> lakṣmīś cāśvaprabhāvāt

lakṣmīś cāśvaprabhāvāt+punar -> lakṣmīś cāśvaprabhāvāt punar

lakṣmīś cāśvaprabhāvāt punar+api -> lakṣmīś cāśvaprabhāvāt punar api

mahāghoṭikāyām+mahāśvas -> mahāghoṭikāyāṃ mahāśvas

na+anyapuṃsas -> nānyapuṃsas

nānyapuṃsas+yadi -> nānyapuṃso yadi

tena+idam -> tenedam

tenedam+kāmadānam -> tenedaṃ kāmadānam

tenedaṃ kāmadānam+samasukhaphaladam -> tenedaṃ kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladam

tenedaṃ kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladam+gopitam -> tenedaṃ kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ gopitam

tenedaṃ kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ gopitam+duṣṭaviprais -> tenedaṃ kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ gopitaṃ duṣṭaviprais

tenedaṃ kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ gopitaṃ duṣṭaviprais+|| -> tenedaṃ kāmadānaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ gopitaṃ duṣṭavipraiḥ||

pitus+pretalokam -> pituḥ pretalokam

pituḥ pretalokam+gatasya -> pituḥ pretalokaṃ gatasya

dattam+bhavati -> dattaṃ bhavati

dānam+putreṇa -> dānaṃ putreṇa

rakṣām+kṛtvā -> rakṣāṃ kṛtvā

narās+te -> narās te

niryogais+vedavākyais -> niryogair vedavākyais

niryogair vedavākyais+samayavirahitas -> niryogair vedavākyaiḥ samayavirahitas

niryogair vedavākyaiḥ samayavirahitas+vañcitās -> niryogair vedavākyaiḥ samayavirahito vañcitās

niryogair vedavākyaiḥ samayavirahito vañcitās+ye -> niryogair vedavākyaiḥ samayavirahito vañcitā ye

bhavet+kṣīradhārābhiṣiktas -> bhavet kṣīradhārābhiṣiktas

bhavet kṣīradhārābhiṣiktas+|| -> bhavet kṣīradhārābhiṣiktaḥ||

aṅgāras+na -> aṅgāro na

aṅgāro na+induvarṇas -> aṅgāro nenduvarṇas

aṅgāro nenduvarṇas+kvacit -> aṅgāro nenduvarṇaḥ kvacit

aṅgāro nenduvarṇaḥ kvacit+iha -> aṅgāro nenduvarṇaḥ kvacid iha

svargahetos+narāṇām -> svargahetor narāṇām

tasmin+pravṛttis -> tasmin pravṛttis

tasmin pravṛttis+kunarakaphaladā -> tasmin pravṛttiḥ kunarakaphaladā

vadhas+deśitas -> vadho deśitas

vadho deśitas+prāṇinām -> vadho deśitaḥ prāṇinām

vadho deśitaḥ prāṇinām+ca| -> vadho deśitaḥ prāṇināṃ ca|

kālāt+jñānapraṇaṣṭais -> kālāj jñānapraṇaṣṭais

kālāj jñānapraṇaṣṭais+munibhis -> kālāj jñānapraṇaṣṭair munibhis

kālāj jñānapraṇaṣṭair munibhis+iha -> kālāj jñānapraṇaṣṭair munibhir iha

yoginām+vai -> yogināṃ vai

guhyam+etat -> guhyam etat

guhyam etat+kathitam -> guhyam etat kathitam

guhyam etat kathitam+api -> guhyam etat kathitam api

tanmadhye+anāhatam -> tanmadhye 'nāhatam

tanmadhye 'nāhatam+yat -> tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yat

tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yat+viṣayavirahitam -> tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yad viṣayavirahitam

tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yad viṣayavirahitam+nirguṇam -> tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yad viṣayavirahitaṃ nirguṇam

tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yad viṣayavirahitaṃ nirguṇam+ca -> tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yad viṣayavirahitaṃ nirguṇaṃ ca

tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yad viṣayavirahitaṃ nirguṇaṃ ca+akṣaram -> tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yad viṣayavirahitaṃ nirguṇaṃ cākṣaram

tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yad viṣayavirahitaṃ nirguṇaṃ cākṣaram+tat|| -> tanmadhye 'nāhataṃ yad viṣayavirahitaṃ nirguṇaṃ cākṣaraṃ tat||

kulānyas+viṣayaguṇagatas -> kulānyo viṣayaguṇagatas

kulānyo viṣayaguṇagatas+arthavarṇas -> kulānyo viṣayaguṇagato 'rthavarṇas

kulānyo viṣayaguṇagato 'rthavarṇas+nādarūpī -> kulānyo viṣayaguṇagato 'rthavarṇo nādarūpī

kaulas+kāye -> kaulaḥ kāye

trināḍyas+guṇās -> trināḍyo guṇās

trināḍyo guṇās+ca| -> trināḍyo guṇāś ca|

trivarṇās+śaśiravihutabhuk -> trivarṇāḥ śaśiravihutabhuk

trivarṇāḥ śaśiravihutabhuk+te -> trivarṇāḥ śaśiravihutabhuk te

oṃkāras+te -> oṃkāras te

manas+prāṇinām -> manaḥ prāṇinām

manaḥ prāṇinām+te -> manaḥ prāṇināṃ te

kāyas+haras -> kāyo haras

kāyo haras+vāk -> kāyo haro vāk

kāyo haro vāk+haris -> kāyo haro vāg gharis

kāyo haro vāg gharis+api -> kāyo haro vāg gharir api

gatam+sarvagānandarūpam|| -> gataṃ sarvagānandarūpam||

mūrdhnas+somāmṛtam -> mūrdhnaḥ somāmṛtam

mūrdhnaḥ somāmṛtam+tat -> mūrdhnaḥ somāmṛtaṃ tat

mūrdhnaḥ somāmṛtaṃ tat+bhagarajasi -> mūrdhnaḥ somāmṛtaṃ tad bhagarajasi

sarudhiram+gojine -> sarudhiraṃ gojine

yat+pānam -> yat pānam

yat pānam+dīkṣitānām -> yat pānaṃ dīkṣitānām

yat pānaṃ dīkṣitānām+bhavati -> yat pānaṃ dīkṣitānāṃ bhavati

nirodhas+| -> nirodhaḥ|

ca+etat -> caitat

caitat+viṣayaviṣayiṇām -> caitad viṣayaviṣayiṇām

caitad viṣayaviṣayiṇām+jñānayoge -> caitad viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ jñānayoge

śuddhā+asi -> śuddhāsi

yat+te -> yat te

tanuviṣayān+indriyam -> tanuviṣayān indriyam

tanuviṣayān indriyam+yajñakāle -> tanuviṣayān indriyaṃ yajñakāle

gokhaḍgāśvebhanāthān+vraja -> gokhaḍgāśvebhanāthān vraja

tena+acyutam -> tenācyutam

tenācyutam+yat -> tenācyutaṃ yat

tenācyutaṃ yat+sahajatanusukham -> tenācyutaṃ yat sahajatanusukham

tenācyutaṃ yat sahajatanusukham+deśitam -> tenācyutaṃ yat sahajatanusukhaṃ deśitam

tenācyutaṃ yat sahajatanusukhaṃ deśitam+mantrayāne|| -> tenācyutaṃ yat sahajatanusukhaṃ deśitaṃ mantrayāne||

yena+akṣararahitanarās -> yenākṣararahitanarās

yenākṣararahitanarās+śūnyatām -> yenākṣararahitanarāḥ śūnyatām

yenākṣararahitanarāḥ śūnyatām+tām -> yenākṣararahitanarāḥ śūnyatāṃ tām

yenākṣararahitanarāḥ śūnyatāṃ tām+gṛhītvā -> yenākṣararahitanarāḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ gṛhītvā

śūnyam+yāsyanti -> śūnyaṃ yāsyanti

bauddhās+| -> bauddhāḥ|

vacanam+deśayiṣyanti -> vacanaṃ deśayiṣyanti

kvacit+iti -> kvacid iti

vijñānam+eva -> vijñānam eva

na+asti -> nāsti

vijñānam+na -> vijñānaṃ na

vijñānaṃ na+aṇurūpam -> vijñānaṃ nāṇurūpam

vijñānaṃ nāṇurūpam+tribhave -> vijñānaṃ nāṇurūpaṃ tribhave

vijñānaṃ nāṇurūpaṃ tribhave+iha -> vijñānaṃ nāṇurūpaṃ tribhava iha

kūṭasthām+jñānatejām -> kūṭasthāṃ jñānatejām

kūṭasthāṃ jñānatejām+bhavakaluṣaharām -> kūṭasthāṃ jñānatejāṃ bhavakaluṣaharām

kūṭasthāṃ jñānatejāṃ bhavakaluṣaharām+kālacakrānuviddhām|| -> kūṭasthāṃ jñānatejāṃ bhavakaluṣaharāṃ kālacakrānuviddhām||

nirlepām+nirvikārām -> nirlepāṃ nirvikārām

nirlepāṃ nirvikārām+khasamahatatamām -> nirlepāṃ nirvikārāṃ khasamahatatamām

nirlepāṃ nirvikārāṃ khasamahatatamām+vyāpinīm -> nirlepāṃ nirvikārāṃ khasamahatatamāṃ vyāpinīm

nirlepāṃ nirvikārāṃ khasamahatatamāṃ vyāpinīm+yogigamyām -> nirlepāṃ nirvikārāṃ khasamahatatamāṃ vyāpinīṃ yogigamyām

samyak+sambodhihetos -> samyak sambodhihetos

samyak sambodhihetos+jinavarajananīm -> samyak sambodhihetor jinavarajananīm

samyak sambodhihetor jinavarajananīm+bhāvayet -> samyak sambodhihetor jinavarajananīṃ bhāvayet

samyak sambodhihetor jinavarajananīṃ bhāvayet+divyamudrām| -> samyak sambodhihetor jinavarajananīṃ bhāvayed divyamudrām|

tyaktvā+imām -> tyaktvemām

tyaktvemām+karmamudrām -> tyaktvemāṃ karmamudrām

tyaktvemāṃ karmamudrām+sakaluṣahṛdayām -> tyaktvemāṃ karmamudrāṃ sakaluṣahṛdayām

tyaktvemāṃ karmamudrāṃ sakaluṣahṛdayām+kalpitām -> tyaktvemāṃ karmamudrāṃ sakaluṣahṛdayāṃ kalpitām

tyaktvemāṃ karmamudrāṃ sakaluṣahṛdayāṃ kalpitām+jñānamudrām -> tyaktvemāṃ karmamudrāṃ sakaluṣahṛdayāṃ kalpitāṃ jñānamudrām

sā+eva|| -> saiva||

jagatas+anekarūpasya -> jagato 'nekarūpasya

cittam+cetas -> cittaṃ cetas

cittaṃ cetas+māyā -> cittaṃ ceto māyā

cittaṃ ceto māyā+āliṅgayati -> cittaṃ ceto māyāliṅgayati

bhāsamānā+ambarasthā -> bhāsamānāmbarasthā

deheṣu+abhinnā -> deheṣv abhinnā

taḍidanalanibhā+anekaraśmīn -> taḍidanalanibhānekaraśmīn

taḍidanalanibhānekaraśmīn+sphurantī| -> taḍidanalanibhānekaraśmin sphurantī|

trailokyam+bhāsayantī -> trailokyaṃ bhāsayantī

rūpavat+darpaṇe -> rūpavad darpaṇe

punar+iyam -> punar iyam

punar iyam+yoginām -> punar iyaṃ yoginām

punar iyaṃ yoginām+viśvamātā|| -> punar iyaṃ yogināṃ viśvamātā||

saviṣayāt+khecaratvam -> saviṣayāt khecaratvam

saviṣayāt khecaratvam+prayāti -> saviṣayāt khecaratvaṃ prayāti

evam+vajraprabhedāt -> evaṃ vajraprabhedāt

evaṃ vajraprabhedāt+manasi -> evaṃ vajraprabhedān manasi

varapuram+vāyuyugme -> varapuraṃ vāyuyugme

uṣṇīṣam+bhedayitvā -> uṣṇīṣaṃ bhedayitvā

prerayet+ūrdhvamārge -> prerayed ūrdhvamārge

āpānam+tatra -> āpānaṃ tatra

sūcivat+bāhyacarmā| -> sūcivad bāhyacarmā|

yāvat+ca -> yāvac ca

yāvac ca+uṣṇīṣarandhram -> yāvac coṣṇīṣarandhram

yāvac coṣṇīṣarandhram+spṛśati -> yāvac coṣṇīṣarandhraṃ spṛśati

mṛdulalitagatis+cālitā -> mṛdulalitagatiś cālitā

cakrāt+cakrāntaram -> cakrāc cakrāntaram

cakrāc cakrāntaram+vai -> cakrāc cakrāntaraṃ vai

daṇḍarūpā+utthitā -> daṇḍarūpotthitā

parapadam+dvādaśāntam -> parapadaṃ dvādaśāntam

parapadaṃ dvādaśāntam+kalāntam -> parapadaṃ dvādaśāntaṃ kalāntam

śaktis+nābhimadyāt -> śaktir nābhimadyāt

śaktir nābhimadyāt+vrajati -> śaktir nābhimadyād vrajati

tu+atha -> tv atha

vṛkṣacchāyām+praviśya -> vṛkṣacchāyāṃ praviśya

ṣaṇmāsābhyāsayogāt+avanigatanidhim -> ṣaṇmāsābhyāsayogād avanigatanidhim

ṣaṇmāsābhyāsayogād avanigatanidhim+darśayet -> ṣaṇmāsābhyāsayogād avanigatanidhiṃ darśayet

ṣaṇmāsābhyāsayogād avanigatanidhiṃ darśayet+bhūmicchidram -> ṣaṇmāsābhyāsayogād avanigatanidhiṃ darśayed bhūmicchidram

dhūmravarṇas+| -> dhūmravarṇaḥ|

paścāt+vyoma -> paścād vyoma

paścād vyoma+abhivīkṣyet -> paścād vyomābhivīkṣyet

paścād vyomābhivīkṣyet+samarasapuruṣas -> paścād vyomābhivīkṣyet samarasapuruṣas

paścād vyomābhivīkṣyet samarasapuruṣas+dṛśyate -> paścād vyomābhivīkṣyet samarasapuruṣo dṛśyate

svacchāyāmātapasthām+aparamukharaves -> svacchāyāmātapasthām aparamukharaves

svacchāyāmātapasthām aparamukharaves+stabdhadṛṣṭyā -> svacchāyāmātapasthām aparamukharaveḥ stabdhadṛṣṭyā

svacchāyāmātapasthām aparamukharaveḥ stabdhadṛṣṭyā+avalokya -> svacchāyāmātapasthām aparamukharaveḥ stabdhadṛṣṭyāvalokya

cāmaratvam+dadāti|| -> cāmaratvaṃ dadāti||

annādyam+kṣutpipāsām -> annādyaṃ kṣutpipāsām

annādyaṃ kṣutpipāsām+apaharati -> annādyaṃ kṣutpipāsām apaharati

samarasam+candrasūryāgnimadhye -> samarasaṃ candrasūryāgnimadhye

kālena+abhyāsayogāt -> kālenābhyāsayogāt

kālenābhyāsayogāt+vrajati -> kālenābhyāsayogād vrajati

vegāt+taḍidanalanibhas -> vegāt taḍidanalanibhas

vegāt taḍidanalanibhas+ghaṭṭitas -> vegāt taḍidanalanibho ghaṭṭitas

vegāt taḍidanalanibho ghaṭṭitas+apānavāyus -> vegāt taḍidanalanibho ghaṭṭito 'pānavāyus

vegāt taḍidanalanibho ghaṭṭito 'pānavāyus+| -> vegāt taḍidanalanibho ghaṭṭito 'pānavāyuḥ|

prāṇena+ākṛṣya -> prāṇenākṛṣya

bāhyavātas+samastas -> bāhyavātaḥ samastas

tu+api -> tv api

svaraparikaritas+muñcamānas -> svaraparikarito muñcamānas

svaraparikarito muñcamānas+amṛtam -> svaraparikarito muñcamāno 'mṛtam

svaraparikarito muñcamāno 'mṛtam+vā|| -> svaraparikarito muñcamāno 'mṛtaṃ vā||

śvetas+bindus -> śveto bindus

śveto bindus+lalāṭe -> śveto bindur lalāṭe

sanniruddhas+viṣam -> sanniruddho viṣam

sanniruddho viṣam+ca -> sanniruddho viṣaṃ ca

saṃtāpam+kṣutpipāsām -> saṃtāpaṃ kṣutpipāsām

saṃtāpaṃ kṣutpipāsām+harati -> saṃtāpaṃ kṣutpipāsāṃ harati

praviṣṭas+| -> praviṣṭaḥ|

ākṛṣṭas+bāhyavātas -> ākṛṣṭo bāhyavātas

ākṛṣṭo bāhyavātas+tadamṛtasahitas -> ākṛṣṭo bāhyavātas tadamṛtasahitas

ākṛṣṭo bāhyavātas tadamṛtasahitas+nābhimadhye -> ākṛṣṭo bāhyavātas tadamṛtasahito nābhimadhye

paryaṅkabandham+vikasitavadanas -> paryaṅkabandhaṃ vikasitavadanas

paryaṅkabandhaṃ vikasitavadanas+anyonyadantam -> paryaṅkabandhaṃ vikasitavadano 'nyonyadantam

paryaṅkabandhaṃ vikasitavadano 'nyonyadantam+spṛśet -> paryaṅkabandhaṃ vikasitavadano 'nyonyadantaṃ spṛśet

paryaṅkabandhaṃ vikasitavadano 'nyonyadantaṃ spṛśet+na -> paryaṅkabandhaṃ vikasitavadano 'nyonyadantaṃ spṛśen na

vibhos+yoginā -> vibhor yoginā

dūrāt+śravaṇam -> dūrāc chravaṇam

dūrāc chravaṇam+api -> dūrāc chravaṇam api

vijñānam+ca -> vijñānaṃ ca

vijñānaṃ ca+eva -> vijñānaṃ caiva

bhavajas+tat -> bhavajas tat

bhavajas tat+tat -> bhavajas tat tat

bhavajas tat tat+eva -> bhavajas tat tad eva

yam+śabdam -> yaṃ śabdam

yaṃ śabdam+jīvaloke -> yaṃ śabdaṃ jīvaloke

samarasam+yojitam -> samarasaṃ yojitam

samarasaṃ yojitam+ca -> samarasaṃ yojitaṃ ca

samarasaṃ yojitaṃ ca+ekabhūtam| -> samarasaṃ yojitaṃ caikabhūtam|

tasmin+cittam -> tasmiṃś cittam

tasmiṃś cittam+narasya -> tasmiṃś cittaṃ narasya

varanṛṇām+śrūyate -> varanṛṇāṃ śrūyate

yas+śabdas -> yaḥ śabdas

yaḥ śabdas+hṛtpradeśe -> yaḥ śabdo hṛtpradeśe

dvitīye+aṣṭau -> dvitīye 'ṣṭau

tatra+ayam -> tatrāyam

tatrāyam+kramas -> tatrāyaṃ kramas

tatrāyaṃ kramas+---prathamaparimaṇḍale -> tatrāyaṃ kramaḥ---prathamaparimaṇḍale

iha+abhiṣekapaṭaloktanyagrodhapatrādike -> ihābhiṣekapaṭaloktanyagrodhapatrādike

vedeṣu+ityādi| -> vedeṣv ityādi|

lāntās+samātrās -> lāntāḥ samātrās

lāntāḥ samātrās+|| -> lāntāḥ samātrāḥ||

sādhyas+tithiguṇitayugeṣu -> sādhyas tithiguṇitayugeṣu

sādhyas tithiguṇitayugeṣu+eva -> sādhyas tithiguṇitayugeṣv eva

triguṇitadaśakās+kādihakṣādvijeṣu -> triguṇitadaśakāḥ kādihakṣādvijeṣu

eyādyās+ṣoḍaśeṣu -> eyādyāḥ ṣoḍaśeṣu

yugam+yādayas -> yugaṃ yādayas

yugaṃ yādayas+aṣṭau -> yugaṃ yādayo 'ṣṭau

prathamam+api -> prathamam api

sādhyas+svadikṣu -> sādhyaḥ svadikṣu

radeṣu+abdhiṣaṭsu -> radeṣv abdhiṣaṭsu

daleṣu+eva -> daleṣv eva

vedeṣu+aṣṭau -> vedeṣv aṣṭau

yantrāṇi+ucyante--- -> yantrāṇy ucyante---

idānīm+śāntyādau -> idānīṃ śāntyādau

likhitāni+iti|| -> likhitānīti||

tena+atra -> tenātra

tatas+ekasaptatyadhikaśatavṛttāt -> tata ekasaptatyadhikaśatavṛttāt

tata ekasaptatyadhikaśatavṛttāt+gāruḍavṛttāni -> tata ekasaptatyadhikaśatavṛttād gāruḍavṛttāni

narais+sādhaniyas -> naraiḥ sādhaniyas

naraiḥ sādhaniyas+khagendras -> naraiḥ sādhaniyaḥ khagendras

naraiḥ sādhaniyaḥ khagendras+|| -> naraiḥ sādhaniyaḥ khagendraḥ||

tasmāt+sattvārthahetos -> tasmāt sattvārthahetos

tasmāt sattvārthahetos+prathamam -> tasmāt sattvārthahetoḥ prathamam

tasmāt sattvārthahetoḥ prathamam+api -> tasmāt sattvārthahetoḥ prathamam api

grahagaṇasakalam+jalpate -> grahagaṇasakalaṃ jalpate

mantrākṛṣṭim+prayānti -> mantrākṛṣṭiṃ prayānti

ḍākinīmātaras+ca| -> ḍākinīmātaraś ca|

bhūtās+yakṣās -> bhūtā yakṣās

bhūtā yakṣās+grahās -> bhūtā yakṣā grahās

bhūtā yakṣā grahās+ca -> bhūtā yakṣā grahāś ca

phaṇīndrās+phaṇipatitanayās -> phaṇīndrāḥ phaṇipatitanayās

phaṇīndrāḥ phaṇipatitanayās+kiṃkaratvam -> phaṇīndrāḥ phaṇipatitanayāḥ kiṃkaratvam

phaṇīndrāḥ phaṇipatitanayāḥ kiṃkaratvam+prayānti -> phaṇīndrāḥ phaṇipatitanayāḥ kiṃkaratvaṃ prayānti

tam+koṭim -> taṃ koṭim

taṃ koṭim+ekam -> taṃ koṭim ekam

taṃ koṭim ekam+phaṇikulasahitam -> taṃ koṭim ekaṃ phaṇikulasahitam

taṃ koṭim ekaṃ phaṇikulasahitam+sādhayet -> taṃ koṭim ekaṃ phaṇikulasahitaṃ sādhayet

taṃ koṭim ekaṃ phaṇikulasahitaṃ sādhayet+pakṣanītham|| -> taṃ koṭim ekaṃ phaṇikulasahitaṃ sādhayet pakṣanītham||

tatas+pakṣināthasya -> tataḥ pakṣināthasya

praṇavam+api -> praṇavam api

pakṣisvāhāntam+ādi -> pakṣisvāhāntam ādi

nāgālaṃkārayuktam+sakalakulavaśāt -> nāgālaṃkārayuktaṃ sakalakulavaśāt

nāgālaṃkārayuktaṃ sakalakulavaśāt+pañcavarṇam -> nāgālaṃkārayuktaṃ sakalakulavaśāt pañcavarṇam

bhāvayet+sūryamūrdhni -> bhāvayet sūryamūrdhni

kṣeṃkāraṃ pakṣinātham+svahṛdayakamale -> kṣeṃkāraṃ pakṣināthaṃ svahṛdayakamale

phaṇiviṣaṃ bhūtarogādikam+ca|| -> phaṇiviṣaṃ bhūtarogādikaṃ ca||

dhyātas+tanmudrayā -> dhyātas tanmudrayā

viśvavarṇas+phaṇikulasahitas -> viśvavarṇaḥ phaṇikulasahitas

viśvavarṇaḥ phaṇikulasahito mudritas+pañcatattvais -> viśvavarṇaḥ phaṇikulasahito mudritaḥ pañcatattvais

tasmāt+vai -> tasmād vai

kaṇṭhāt+raktavarṇas -> kaṇṭhād raktavarṇas

kaṇṭhād raktavarṇas+kaṣaṇaghananibhas -> kaṇṭhād raktavarṇaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibhas

kaṇṭhād raktavarṇaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibhas+bhrūlatām -> kaṇṭhād raktavarṇaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibho bhrūlatām

kaṇṭhād raktavarṇaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibho bhrūlatām+yāvat -> kaṇṭhād raktavarṇaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibho bhrūlatāṃ yāvat

kaṇṭhād raktavarṇaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibho bhrūlatāṃ yāvat+eva| -> kaṇṭhād raktavarṇaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibho bhrūlatāṃ yāvad eva|

nābhisīmnas+himābhas -> nābhisīmno himābhas

pādāt+kaṭyantapītas -> pādāt kaṭyantapītas

pādāt kaṭyantapīto garuḍas+iti -> pādāt kaṭyantapīto garuḍa iti

teṣām+jalaśikhidharaṇīmārutākāśadhātus -> teṣāṃ jalaśikhidharaṇīmārutākāśadhātus

teṣāṃ jalaśikhidharaṇīmārutākāśadhātus+|| -> teṣāṃ jalaśikhidharaṇīmārutākāśadhātuḥ||

janmasthānam+ca -> janmasthānaṃ ca

śūdras+karkoṭakas -> śūdraḥ karkoṭakas

śūdraḥ karkoṭakas+abjas -> śūdraḥ karkoṭako 'bjas

śūdraḥ karkoṭako 'bjas+kaṣaṇaghananibhas -> śūdraḥ karkoṭako 'bjaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibhas

śūdraḥ karkoṭako 'bjaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibhas+ca -> śūdraḥ karkoṭako 'bjaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibhaś ca

śūdraḥ karkoṭako 'bjaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibhaś ca+antyajau -> śūdraḥ karkoṭako 'bjaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibhaś cāntyajau

raktas+vaiśyas -> rakto vaiśyas

rakto vaiśyas+mahābjas -> rakto vaiśyo mahābjas

rakto vaiśyo mahābjas+varakanakanibhas -> rakto vaiśyo mahābjo varakanakanibhas

rakto vaiśyo mahābjo varakanakanibhas+takṣakas -> rakto vaiśyo mahābjo varakanakanibhas takṣakas

rakto vaiśyo mahābjo varakanakanibhas takṣakas+tadvat -> rakto vaiśyo mahābjo varakanakanibhas takṣakas tadvat

rakto vaiśyo mahābjo varakanakanibhas takṣakas tadvat+eva| -> rakto vaiśyo mahābjo varakanakanibhas takṣakas tadvad eva|

nṛpas+vāsukis -> nṛpo vāsukis

nṛpo vāsukis+śaṅkhapālas -> nṛpo vāsukiḥ śaṅkhapālas

vipras+anantas -> vipro 'nantas

vipro 'nantas+himābhas -> vipro 'nanto himābhas

vipro 'nanto himābhas+kulikas -> vipro 'nanto himābhaḥ kulikas

vipro 'nanto himābhaḥ kulikas+iti -> vipro 'nanto himābhaḥ kulika iti

vasuphaṇinām+bhuktibhedāt -> vasuphaṇināṃ bhuktibhedāt

bhogāḥ sūryādivārāt+api -> bhogāḥ sūryādivārād api

khartuḥ khaccidrakheṣuḥ khayugakhavasavas+khādrikhāgnis -> khartuḥ khaccidrakheṣuḥ khayugakhavasavaḥ khādrikhāgnis

khartuḥ khaccidrakheṣuḥ khayugakhavasavaḥ khādrikhāgnis+ca -> khartuḥ khaccidrakheṣuḥ khayugakhavasavaḥ khādrikhāgniś ca

bhavet+saptavāraprabhedāt| -> bhavet saptavāraprabhedāt|

ca+ādibhāge -> cādibhāge

raktas+stobham -> raktaḥ stobham

raktaḥ stobham+praveśam -> raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśam

raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśam+kaṣaṇaghananibhas -> raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhas

raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhas+stambhanam -> raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhaḥ stambhanam

raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhaḥ stambhanam+pītavarṇas -> raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhaḥ stambhanaṃ pītavarṇas

raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhaḥ stambhanaṃ pītavarṇas+| -> raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhaḥ stambhanaṃ pītavarṇaḥ|

nirviṣatvam+prayāti| -> nirviṣatvaṃ prayāti|

stambham+āyāti -> stambham āyāti

daṣṭas+|| -> daṣṭaḥ||

śīghram+sunihatahṛdayas -> śīghraṃ sunihatahṛdayas

śīghraṃ sunihatahṛdayaḥ stobham+āyāti -> śīghraṃ sunihatahṛdayaḥ stobham āyāti

jinākhyām+guḷasusamaśareṇa -> jinākhyāṃ guḷasusamaśareṇa

jinākhyāṃ guḷasusamaśareṇa+āhibījānvitena -> jinākhyāṃ guḷasusamaśareṇāhibījānvitena

rakṣām+kṛtvā -> rakṣāṃ kṛtvā

phaṇinām+sṛṣṭisaṃhārayogais -> phaṇināṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārayogais

phaṇināṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārayogais+| -> phaṇināṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārayogaiḥ|

dīrgham+eva -> dīrgham eva

hrasvabījam+śravaṇagalagatam -> hrasvabījaṃ śravaṇagalagatam

hrasvabījaṃ śravaṇagalagatam+kakṣakukṣorudeśe -> hrasvabījaṃ śravaṇagalagataṃ kakṣakukṣorudeśe

hūṃkṣūṃhyahyādināgās+daśaviṣamasamās -> hūṃkṣūṃhyahyādināgā daśaviṣamasamās

hūṃkṣūṃhyahyādināgā daśaviṣamasamās+hrasvadīrghaprabhedais -> hūṃkṣūṃhyahyādināgā daśaviṣamasamā hrasvadīrghaprabhedais

hūṃkṣūṃhyahyādināgā daśaviṣamasamā hrasvadīrghaprabhedais+|| -> hūṃkṣūṃhyahyādināgā daśaviṣamasamā hrasvadīrghaprabhedaiḥ||

lādyās+hāntās -> lādyā hāntās

lādyā hāntās+krameṇa -> lādyā hāntāḥ krameṇa

lādyā hāntāḥ krameṇa+urujaṭharahṛdaye -> lādyā hāntāḥ krameṇorujaṭharahṛdaye

tathā+aṅguṣṭhakādau -> tathāṅguṣṭhakādau

pṛthvītoyāgnivātās+gaganam -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātā gaganam

pṛthvītoyāgnivātā gaganam+api -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātā gaganam api

sukhakaram+daṣṭakasya -> sukhakaraṃ daṣṭakasya

sukhakaraṃ daṣṭakasya+ātmanas -> sukhakaraṃ daṣṭakasyātmanas

sukhakaraṃ daṣṭakasyātmanas+ca -> sukhakaraṃ daṣṭakasyātmanaś ca

rakṣāvidhānam+bhavati -> rakṣāvidhānaṃ bhavati

manāk+saṃgraham -> manāk saṃgraham

manāk saṃgraham+tatra -> manāk saṃgrahaṃ tatra

śabdas+hṛtpuṇḍarīke -> śabdo hṛtpuṇḍarīke

maraṇam+karṇamūle -> maraṇaṃ karṇamūle

protphullam+netravaktram -> protphullaṃ netravaktram

protphullaṃ netravaktram+kathayati -> protphullaṃ netravaktraṃ kathayati

manujas+daṣṭam -> manujo daṣṭam

manujo daṣṭam+atra -> manujo daṣṭam atra

svāṅgam+hastena -> svāṅgaṃ hastena

yuvatīm+dakṣiṇāgras -> yuvatīṃ dakṣiṇāgras

yuvatīṃ dakṣiṇāgras+naram -> yuvatīṃ dakṣiṇāgro naram

yuvatīṃ dakṣiṇāgro naram+ca -> yuvatīṃ dakṣiṇāgro naraṃ ca

dūtas+vāmāgrapādas -> dūto vāmāgrapādas

dūto vāmāgrapādas+kathayati -> dūto vāmāgrapādaḥ kathayati

sā+aśubhā -> sāśubhā

tatas+mṛtyum -> tato mṛtyum

tato mṛtyum+āpnoti -> tato mṛtyum āpnoti

dūtas+sarpādināma -> dūtaḥ sarpādināma

dūtas+praśnas -> dūtaḥ praśnas

dūtaḥ praśnas+asamas -> dūtaḥ praśno 'samas

dūtaḥ praśno 'samas+yas -> dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yas

dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yas+bahusukhaphaladas -> dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yo bahusukhaphaladas

dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yo bahusukhaphaladas+mṛtyudoktas -> dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yo bahusukhaphalado mṛtyudoktas

dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yo bahusukhaphalado mṛtyudoktas+samas -> dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yo bahusukhaphalado mṛtyudoktaḥ samas

dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yo bahusukhaphalado mṛtyudoktaḥ samas+yas -> dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yo bahusukhaphalado mṛtyudoktaḥ samo yas

dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yo bahusukhaphalado mṛtyudoktaḥ samo yas+| -> dūtaḥ praśno 'samo yo bahusukhaphalado mṛtyudoktaḥ samo yaḥ|

mṛtyum+āpnoti -> mṛtyum āpnoti

gulikādisādhanavidhis+|| -> gulikādisādhanavidhiḥ||

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

khecarās+siddhayas -> khecarāḥ siddhayas

khecarāḥ siddhayas+bhavanti -> khecarāḥ siddhayo bhavanti

khecarāḥ siddhayo bhavanti+iti -> khecarāḥ siddhayo bhavantīti

sādhanam+vinā -> sādhanaṃ vinā

siddharasavat+saptāvartam -> siddharasavat saptāvartam

siddharasavat saptāvartam+milati -> siddharasavat saptāvartaṃ milati

kālacakrājñayā+iti| -> kālacakrājñayeti|

tat+tat -> tat tat

tat tat+kulavidyādharas -> tat tat kulavidyādharas

tat tat kulavidyādharas+bhavati -> tat tat kulavidyādharo bhavati

yat+yat -> yad yat

yad yat+astram -> yad yad astram

yad yad astram+sādhayet -> yad yad astraṃ sādhayet

yad yad astraṃ sādhayet+sa -> yad yad astraṃ sādhayet sa

evam+triśūlaparśvādikāni -> evaṃ triśūlaparśvādikāni

cihnasādhananiyamas+| -> cihnasādhananiyamaḥ|

sarvalohamayam+vajram -> sarvalohamayaṃ vajram

sarvalohamayaṃ vajram+ghaṇṭā -> sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭā

sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭā+api -> sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpi

sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpi+evam -> sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpy evam

sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpy evam+kartikā -> sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpy evaṃ kartikā

sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpy evaṃ kartikā+api -> sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpy evaṃ kartikāpi

sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpy evaṃ kartikāpi+āyāsā -> sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpy evaṃ kartikāpy āyāsā

sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpy evaṃ kartikāpy āyāsā+iti -> sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭāpy evaṃ kartikāpy āyāseti

raupyam+kamalam -> raupyaṃ kamalam

raupyaṃ kamalam+sauvarṇam -> raupyaṃ kamalaṃ sauvarṇam

raupyaṃ kamalaṃ sauvarṇam+cakram% -> raupyaṃ kamalaṃ sauvarṇaṃ cakram%

sphāṭikam+ratnam -> sphāṭikaṃ ratnam

sphāṭikaṃ ratnam+kṛtvā -> sphāṭikaṃ ratnaṃ kṛtvā

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

kālacakram+iti -> kālacakram iti

evam+ratnādiṣu -> evaṃ ratnādiṣu

evaṃ ratnādiṣu+ādau -> evaṃ ratnādiṣv ādau

mantras+--- -> mantraḥ---

susurabhikusumais+tathā -> susurabhikusumais tathā

evam+palalam -> evaṃ palalam

evaṃ palalaṃ gulikāṃ vāñjanam+tasya -> evaṃ palalaṃ gulikāṃ vāñjanaṃ tasya

sthāpayet+iti| -> sthāpayed iti|

tato maṇḍalakarṇikāyāṃ gulikām+vā -> tato maṇḍalakarṇikāyāṃ gulikāṃ vā

tato maṇḍalakarṇikāyāṃ gulikāṃ vāñjanam+vā -> tato maṇḍalakarṇikāyāṃ gulikāṃ vāñjanaṃ vā

manudivase+iti -> manudivasa iti

tatra+ayam -> tatrāyam

tatrāyam+vidhis -> tatrāyaṃ vidhis

tatrāyaṃ vidhis+---kṛṣṇāṣṭamyām -> tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---kṛṣṇāṣṭamyām

tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ niśāyām+atha -> tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ niśāyām atha

grāhyam+uddhṛtya -> grāhyam uddhṛtya

ravis+iva -> ravir iva

yuvatimanoharam+bhavati -> yuvatimanoharaṃ bhavati

tad eva+añjanam -> tad evāñjanam

tad evāñjanam+antardhānam -> tad evāñjanam antardhānam

tad evāñjanam antardhānam+karoti -> tad evāñjanam antardhānaṃ karoti

tad evāñjanam antardhānaṃ karoti+antardhānaviṣaye -> tad evāñjanam antardhānaṃ karoty antardhānaviṣaye

śvāśvādīnām+pittais -> śvāśvādīnāṃ pittais

śvāśvādīnāṃ pittais+añjanam -> śvāśvādīnāṃ pittair añjanam

śvāśvādīnāṃ pittair añjanam+kṛtvā -> śvāśvādīnāṃ pittair añjanaṃ kṛtvā

pittais+ca -> pittaiś ca

tatra+ayam -> tatrāyam

tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddhā+iti -> tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddheti

tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddheti+abhiṣekapaṭaloktānām -> tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddhety abhiṣekapaṭaloktānām

tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddhety abhiṣekapaṭaloktānām+ṣaṭtriṃśatkhecarīṇām -> tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddhety abhiṣekapaṭaloktānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkhecarīṇām

tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddhety abhiṣekapaṭaloktānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkhecarīṇām+pañcaṣaḍdaśāṣṭāṣṭavargas -> tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddhety abhiṣekapaṭaloktānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkhecarīṇāṃ pañcaṣaḍdaśāṣṭāṣṭavargas

tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddhety abhiṣekapaṭaloktānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkhecarīṇāṃ pañcaṣaḍdaśāṣṭāṣṭavargas+| -> tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ---siddhety abhiṣekapaṭaloktānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkhecarīṇāṃ pañcaṣaḍdaśāṣṭāṣṭavargaḥ|

bhagavatas+|| -> bhagavataḥ||

ṣaḍlakṣaṃ daśalakṣam+śatalakṣam -> ṣaḍlakṣaṃ daśalakṣaṃ śatalakṣam

ṣaḍlakṣaṃ daśalakṣaṃ śatalakṣam+iti -> ṣaḍlakṣaṃ daśalakṣaṃ śatalakṣam iti

pratyekas+mantras -> pratyeko mantras

pratyeko mantras+| -> pratyeko mantraḥ|

cittavākkāyabhedais+bhāvyas -> cittavākkāyabhedair bhāvyas

cittavākkāyabhedair bhāvyas+yājyas -> cittavākkāyabhedair bhāvyo yājyas

cittavākkāyabhedair bhāvyo yājyas+jāpyas -> cittavākkāyabhedair bhāvyo yājyo jāpyas

cittavākkāyabhedair bhāvyo yājyo jāpyas+ca -> cittavākkāyabhedair bhāvyo yājyo jāpyaś ca

yoginām+iti| -> yoginām iti|

na+anyathā -> nānyathā

koṭiparyantam+daśalakṣam -> koṭiparyantaṃ daśalakṣam

koṭiparyantaṃ daśalakṣam+homayet -> koṭiparyantaṃ daśalakṣaṃ homayet

koṭiparyantaṃ daśalakṣaṃ homayet+evam -> koṭiparyantaṃ daśalakṣaṃ homayed evam

koṭiparyantaṃ daśalakṣaṃ homayed evam+mantradevatā -> koṭiparyantaṃ daśalakṣaṃ homayed evaṃ mantradevatā

kāyavajrajāpas+| -> kāyavajrajāpaḥ|

iti+āveśanam| -> ity āveśanam|

lakṣajāpas+| -> lakṣajāpaḥ|

jñeyās+| -> jñeyāḥ|

vidhinā+apare -> vidhināpare

vidhināpare+api -> vidhināpare 'pi

tadyathā---prathamam+tāvat -> tadyathā---prathamaṃ tāvat

tadyathā---prathamaṃ tāvat+tārāmantram -> tadyathā---prathamaṃ tāvat tārāmantram

tadyathā---prathamaṃ tāvat tārāmantram+pradarśyate| -> tadyathā---prathamaṃ tāvat tārāmantraṃ pradarśyate|

iti+evam -> ity evam

ity evam+cittākṣaram -> ity evaṃ cittākṣaram

ity evaṃ cittākṣaram+sādhayet -> ity evaṃ cittākṣaraṃ sādhayet

ity evaṃ cittākṣaraṃ sādhayet+pūrvasevām -> ity evaṃ cittākṣaraṃ sādhayet pūrvasevām

ity evaṃ cittākṣaraṃ sādhayet pūrvasevām+kṛtvā| -> ity evaṃ cittākṣaraṃ sādhayet pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā|

budhais+|| -> budhaiḥ||

tat+eva -> tad eva

tasmāt+sarvaprayatnena -> tasmāt sarvaprayatnena

śāstṛṇām+bodhisattvānām -> śāstṛṇāṃ bodhisattvānām

śāstṛṇāṃ bodhisattvānām+devānām -> śāstṛṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ devānām

śāstṛṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ devānām+sādhanam -> śāstṛṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ devānāṃ sādhanam

śāstṛṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ devānāṃ sādhanam+prati| -> śāstṛṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ devānāṃ sādhanaṃ prati|

amaragiris+iva -> amaragirir iva

amaragirir ivākampas+eva -> amaragirir ivākampa eva

amaragirir ivākampa eva+ardharātram -> amaragirir ivākampa evārdharātram

amaragirir ivākampa evārdharātram+yāvat -> amaragirir ivākampa evārdharātraṃ yāvat

evaṃ pūrvoktāt+mātṛdoṣāt -> evaṃ pūrvoktān mātṛdoṣāt

evaṃ pūrvoktān mātṛdoṣāt+maṇḍale -> evaṃ pūrvoktān mātṛdoṣān maṇḍale

tv amaragirir iva+akampas -> tv amaragirir ivākampas

khaḍgahastam uttānakam+trirekhāpariveṣṭitam|| -> khaḍgahastam uttānakaṃ trirekhāpariveṣṭitam||

asikarakamalam+iti -> asikarakamalam iti

dakṣiṇapādam+uttaraśiras -> dakṣiṇapādam uttaraśiras

dakṣiṇapādam uttaraśiras+| -> dakṣiṇapādam uttaraśiraḥ|

pretam+savyapādam -> pretaṃ savyapādam

pretaṃ savyapādam+iti -> pretaṃ savyapādam iti

evam+maṇḍalakuṇḍayos -> evaṃ maṇḍalakuṇḍayos

evaṃ maṇḍalakuṇḍayos+madhye -> evaṃ maṇḍalakuṇḍayor madhye

kuṇḍasya+uttare -> kuṇḍasyottare

tatas+tam -> tatas tam

tatas tam+pretam -> tatas taṃ pretam

tatas taṃ pretam+tasya -> tatas taṃ pretaṃ tasya

tatas taṃ pretaṃ tasya+avasavye -> tatas taṃ pretaṃ tasyāvasavye

tatas taṃ pretaṃ tasyāvasavye+iti -> tatas taṃ pretaṃ tasyāvasavya iti

kṣetrapālādīnām+balim -> kṣetrapālādīnāṃ balim

kṣetrapālādīnāṃ balim+dattvā -> kṣetrapālādīnāṃ baliṃ dattvā

gandhādibhis+iṣṭadevatānām -> gandhādibhir iṣṭadevatānām

gandhādibhir iṣṭadevatānām+pūjām -> gandhādibhir iṣṭadevatānāṃ pūjām

gandhādibhir iṣṭadevatānāṃ pūjām+kṛtvā -> gandhādibhir iṣṭadevatānāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā

pratiṣṭhām+kṛtvā -> pratiṣṭhāṃ kṛtvā

kalaśādikam+saṃsthāpya -> kalaśādikaṃ saṃsthāpya

śmaśānabhūmyām+maṇḍale -> śmaśānabhūmyāṃ maṇḍale

evam+rajomaṇḍale -> evaṃ rajomaṇḍale

triprākārāṇām+rakṣaṇāya -> triprākārāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāya

triprākārāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāya+iti| -> triprākārāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāyeti|

parśus+iti -> parśur iti

vajram+adhas -> vajram adhas

vajram adhas+sumbharājasya -> vajram adhaḥ sumbharājasya

vidikṣu+ūrdhve -> vidikṣūrdhve

vidikṣūrdhve+uṣṇīṣasya -> vidikṣūrdhva uṣṇīṣasya

devīnām+tathā -> devīnāṃ tathā

tathāgatānām+tathā -> tathāgatānāṃ tathā

tadvat+iti| -> tadvad iti|

vajrapāśas+īśe -> vajrapāśa īśe

vajrāṅkuśas+vāyavye -> vajrāṅkuśo vāyavye

yathā+agnau -> yathāgnau

devatīnām+svacihnam -> devatīnāṃ svacihnam

devatīnāṃ svacihnam+iti| -> devatīnāṃ svacihnam iti|

tathā+iti| -> tatheti|

cakram+iti| -> cakram iti|

padmam+paścime -> padmaṃ paścime

ratnam+uttare -> ratnam uttare

khaḍgas+dakṣiṇe -> khaḍgo dakṣiṇe

cihnam+jinānām -> cihnaṃ jinānām

cihnaṃ jinānām+iti -> cihnaṃ jinānām iti

vacanāt+raktavajram| -> vacanād raktavajram|

vajram+iti -> vajram iti

bāṇacihnam+kariṇāyām -> bāṇacihnaṃ kariṇāyām

bāṇacihnaṃ kariṇāyām+athavā -> bāṇacihnaṃ kariṇāyām athavā

garmbhapadmam+raktam -> garmbhapadmaṃ raktam

garmbhapadmaṃ raktam+tat -> garmbhapadmaṃ raktaṃ tat

garmbhapadmaṃ raktaṃ tat+sacihnam -> garmbhapadmaṃ raktaṃ tat sacihnam

garmbhapadmaṃ raktaṃ tat sacihnam+iti -> garmbhapadmaṃ raktaṃ tat sacihnam iti

yat+aruṇarajasā -> yad aruṇarajasā

tatas+trikoṇe -> tatas trikoṇe

tu+asikarakamalam -> tv asikarakamalam

tv asikarakamalam+maṇḍalāt -> tv asikarakamalaṃ maṇḍalāt

tv asikarakamalaṃ maṇḍalāt+savyapādam|| -> tv asikarakamalaṃ maṇḍalāt savyapādam||

pretam+tasya -> pretaṃ tasya

pretaṃ tasya+avasavye -> pretaṃ tasyāvasavye

daivatīnām+svacihnam| -> daivatīnāṃ svacihnam|

cihnam+jinānām -> cihnaṃ jinānām

cihnaṃ jinānām+diśi -> cihnaṃ jinānāṃ diśi

garbhapadmam+sacihnam -> garbhapadmaṃ sacihnam

yat+aruṇarajasā -> yad aruṇarajasā

rakṣām+kṛtvā -> rakṣāṃ kṛtvā

śavasya+ātmaśarīrasya -> śavasyātmaśarīrasya

śavasyātmaśarīrasya+api -> śavasyātmaśarīrasyāpi

ṣaḍaṅganyāsam+kṛtvā -> ṣaḍaṅganyāsaṃ kṛtvā

kavacam+netramantram -> kavacaṃ netramantram

kavacaṃ netramantram+ca -> kavacaṃ netramantraṃ ca

kavacaṃ netramantraṃ ca+iti -> kavacaṃ netramantraṃ ceti

evam+pūrvoktam -> evaṃ pūrvoktam

evaṃ pūrvoktam+hṛdayam -> evaṃ pūrvoktaṃ hṛdayam

evaṃ pūrvoktaṃ hṛdayam+śiras -> evaṃ pūrvoktaṃ hṛdayaṃ śiras

evaṃ pūrvoktaṃ hṛdayaṃ śiras+śikhā -> evaṃ pūrvoktaṃ hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ śikhā

kaṇṭhe+iti| -> kaṇṭha iti|

vajranyāsam+prakṛtyā -> vajranyāsaṃ prakṛtyā

paridhānam+kṛtvā| -> paridhānaṃ kṛtvā|

tatas+gandhais -> tato gandhais

tato gandhais+dhūpais -> tato gandhair dhūpais

tato gandhair dhūpais+pradīpais -> tato gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpais

tato gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpais+bahuvidhacarukais -> tato gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukais

tato gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukais+raktapuṣpais -> tato gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukaī raktapuṣpais

tato gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukaī raktapuṣpais+prapūjya -> tato gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukaī raktapuṣpaiḥ prapūjya

aṣṭakumbhais+vaśyakarmaṇi -> aṣṭakumbhair vaśyakarmaṇi

aṣṭakumbhair vaśyakarmaṇi+yuktais -> NO RULE FOUND (i+y)

yuktais+jayavijayābhyām -> yuktair jayavijayābhyām

yuktair jayavijayābhyām+ca| -> yuktair jayavijayābhyāṃ ca|

snāpayet+tam -> snāpayet tam

snāpayet tam+śavam| -> snāpayet taṃ śavam|

nṛpa+iti -> nṛpeti

nṛpeti+āmantraṇam -> nṛpety āmantraṇam

nṛpety āmantraṇam+citibhuvane -> nṛpety āmantraṇaṃ citibhuvane

caturdaśyām+vā -> caturdaśyāṃ vā

aṣṭamyām+vā -> aṣṭamyāṃ vā

śūras+| -> śūraḥ|

lambitas+taskaras -> lambitas taskaras

lambitas taskaras+vā -> lambitas taskaro vā

yodhas+tathā -> yodhas tathā

patitas+anyas -> patito 'nyas

patito 'nyas+vā -> patito 'nyo vā

śūras+rājaputras -> śūro rājaputras

śūro rājaputras+ekanārācaprahāreṇa -> śūro rājaputra ekanārācaprahāreṇa

śūras+ityādinā| -> śūra ityādinā|

vajranyāsam+prakṛtyā -> vajranyāsaṃ prakṛtyā

gandhais+dhūpais -> gandhair dhūpais

gandhair dhūpais+pradīpais -> gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpais

gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpais+bahuvidhacarukais -> gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukais

gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukais+raktapuṣpais -> gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukaī raktapuṣpais

gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukaī raktapuṣpais+prapūjya -> gandhair dhūpaiḥ pradīpair bahuvidhacarukaī raktapuṣpaiḥ prapūjya

snāpayet+aṣṭakumbhais -> snāpayed aṣṭakumbhais

snāpayed aṣṭakumbhais+| -> snāpayed aṣṭakumbhaiḥ|

aṣṭamyām+bhūtarātrau -> aṣṭamyāṃ bhūtarātrau

lambitas+taskaras -> lambitas taskaras

lambitas taskaras+vā -> lambitas taskaro vā

patitas+iti -> patita iti

śūras+saṃgrāmabhūmau -> śūraḥ saṃgrāmabhūmau

idānīm+khaḍgādisiddhyartham -> idānīṃ khaḍgādisiddhyartham

idānīṃ khaḍgādisiddhyartham+asurendrasādhanam -> idānīṃ khaḍgādisiddhyartham asurendrasādhanam

idānīṃ khaḍgādisiddhyartham asurendrasādhanam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ khaḍgādisiddhyartham asurendrasādhanam ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

vibhos+iti -> vibhor iti

sādhayet+mantrabimbam -> sādhayen mantrabimbam

sādhayen mantrabimbam+ādau -> sādhayen mantrabimbam ādau

kiṃcit+tasmāt -> kiṃcit tasmāt

kiṃcit tasmāt+rājan -> kiṃcit tasmād rājan

kiṃcit tasmād rājan+svacitte -> kiṃcit tasmād rājan svacitte

na+eva -> naiva

tu+asiddhe -> tv asiddhe

dvādaśabhedais+sthitāni| -> dvādaśabhedaiḥ sthitāni|

karmāṇi+aparimitaguṇāni -> karmāṇy aparimitaguṇāni

karmāṇy aparimitaguṇāni+arkabhedais -> karmāṇy aparimitaguṇāny arkabhedais

karmāṇy aparimitaguṇāny arkabhedais+iti -> karmāṇy aparimitaguṇāny arkabhedair iti

sādhanīyam+paścāt -> sādhanīyaṃ paścāt

sādhanīyaṃ paścāt+siddhyanti -> sādhanīyaṃ paścāt siddhyanti

vibhos+yoginā -> vibhor yoginā

evam+śrīmantram -> evaṃ śrīmantram

evaṃ śrīmantram+buddhabimbam -> evaṃ śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbam

evaṃ śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbam+prathamam -> evaṃ śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbaṃ prathamam

evaṃ śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbaṃ prathamam+api -> evaṃ śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbaṃ prathamam api

śūnyatābimbam+pratyakṣam -> śūnyatābimbaṃ pratyakṣam

śūnyatābimbaṃ pratyakṣam+karaṇīyam -> śūnyatābimbaṃ pratyakṣaṃ karaṇīyam

śūnyatābimbaṃ pratyakṣaṃ karaṇīyam+aparadhyānasiddhaye| -> śūnyatābimbaṃ pratyakṣaṃ karaṇīyam aparadhyānasiddhaye|

evam+buddhabimbam -> evaṃ buddhabimbam

evaṃ buddhabimbam+iti -> evaṃ buddhabimbam iti

sādhanīyam+vakṣyamāṇajāpahomavidhinā -> sādhanīyaṃ vakṣyamāṇajāpahomavidhinā

sādhanīyaṃ vakṣyamāṇajāpahomavidhinā+aparamantrasiddhaye| -> sādhanīyaṃ vakṣyamāṇajāpahomavidhināparamantrasiddhaye|

prathamam+sādhanīyam -> prathamaṃ sādhanīyam

prathamaṃ sādhanīyam+śrīmantram -> prathamaṃ sādhanīyaṃ śrīmantram

prathamaṃ sādhanīyaṃ śrīmantram+iti| -> prathamaṃ sādhanīyaṃ śrīmantram iti|

yoginām+karmasiddhaye -> yogināṃ karmasiddhaye

śrīmantram+ityādi| -> śrīmantram ityādi|

sādhayet+mantrabimbam|| -> sādhayen mantrabimbam||

tasmāt+rājan -> tasmād rājan

tasmād rājan+svacitte -> tasmād rājan svacitte

na+eva -> naiva

tu+asiddhe -> tv asiddhe

karmāṇi+āparimitaguṇāni -> karmāṇy āparimitaguṇāni

karmāṇy āparimitaguṇāni+arkabhedais -> karmāṇy āparimitaguṇāny arkabhedais

karmāṇy āparimitaguṇāny arkabhedais+sthitāni| -> karmāṇy āparimitaguṇāny arkabhedaiḥ sthitāni|

paścāt+siddhyanti -> paścāt siddhyanti

vibhos+yoginā -> vibhor yoginā

śrīmantram+buddhabimbam -> śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbam

śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbam+prathamam -> śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbaṃ prathamam

śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbaṃ prathamam+api -> śrīmantraṃ buddhabimbaṃ prathamam api

idānīm+karmasādhanāya -> idānīṃ karmasādhanāya

idānīṃ karmasādhanāya+ādiniyamas -> idānīṃ karmasādhanāyādiniyamas

idānīṃ karmasādhanāyādiniyamas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ karmasādhanāyādiniyama ucyate---

dhyānaniyamas+tiryagbhaṅgāya|| -> dhyānaniyamas tiryagbhaṅgāya||

krodhajam+sukhakaram -> krodhajaṃ sukhakaram

krodhajaṃ sukhakaram+yoginām -> krodhajaṃ sukhakaraṃ yoginām

krodhajaṃ sukhakaraṃ yoginām+bhavati -> krodhajaṃ sukhakaraṃ yogināṃ bhavati

krodhajaṃ sukhakaraṃ yogināṃ bhavati+iti -> krodhajaṃ sukhakaraṃ yogināṃ bhavatīti

hūṃkārabījātmakam+kṣuṃkārabījātmakam -> hūṃkārabījātmakaṃ kṣuṃkārabījātmakam

hūṃkārabījātmakaṃ kṣuṃkārabījātmakam+daityādīnām -> hūṃkārabījātmakaṃ kṣuṃkārabījātmakaṃ daityādīnām

hūṃkārabījātmakaṃ kṣuṃkārabījātmakaṃ daityādīnām+bhaṅgaviṣaye -> hūṃkārabījātmakaṃ kṣuṃkārabījātmakaṃ daityādīnāṃ bhaṅgaviṣaye

krodhajam+daityabhaṅge -> krodhajaṃ daityabhaṅge

krodhajaṃ daityabhaṅge+uṣṇīṣe -> krodhajaṃ daityabhaṅga uṣṇīṣe

lakārabījāt+iti| -> lakārabījād iti|

pītam+nābhau -> pītaṃ nābhau

avanikulavaśāt+iti -> avanikulavaśād iti

khaḍgākhyam+vājiśatros -> khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatros

khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatros+iti -> khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatror iti

vāyubījātmakam+ca -> vāyubījātmakaṃ ca

vāyubījātmakaṃ ca+iti| -> vāyubījātmakaṃ ceti|

kṛtsnam+lalāṭe -> kṛtsnaṃ lalāṭe

aṣṭāṅghrim+iti -> aṣṭāṅghrim iti

aṣṭāṅghrim iti+aṣṭapadam| -> aṣṭāṅghrim ity aṣṭapadam|

toyabījātmakam+tadvat -> toyabījātmakaṃ tadvat

toyabījātmakaṃ tadvat+dhavalam -> toyabījātmakaṃ tadvad dhavalam

toyabījātmakaṃ tadvad dhavalam+bhavati| -> toyabījātmakaṃ tadvad dhavalaṃ bhavati|

evam+tārkṣyam -> evaṃ tārkṣyam

evaṃ tārkṣyam+nāgendrabhaṅge -> evaṃ tārkṣyaṃ nāgendrabhaṅge

gajapates+bhaṅgaviṣaye| -> gajapater bhaṅgaviṣaye|

tat+pañcānanadhyānam -> tat pañcānanadhyānam

tat pañcānanadhyānam+bhavati -> tat pañcānanadhyānaṃ bhavati

rephāt+utpannam -> rephād utpannam

rephād utpannam+pañcānanam -> rephād utpannaṃ pañcānanam

rephād utpannaṃ pañcānanam+bhāvayet| -> rephād utpannaṃ pañcānanaṃ bhāvayet|

kaṇṭhe+agnibījāt -> kaṇṭhe 'gnibījāt

kaṇṭhe 'gnibījāt+iti -> kaṇṭhe 'gnibījād iti

gajapates+bhayam -> gajapater bhayam

gajapater bhayam+bhavati -> gajapater bhayaṃ bhavati

dhyānam+ityādi| -> dhyānam ityādi|

khaḍgākhyam+vājiśatros -> khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatros

khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatros+avanikulavaśāt -> khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatror avanikulavaśāt

khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatror avanikulavaśāt+krodhajam -> khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatror avanikulavaśāt krodhajam

khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatror avanikulavaśāt krodhajam+daityabhaṅge|| -> khaḍgākhyaṃ vājiśatror avanikulavaśāt krodhajaṃ daityabhaṅge||

pralayaghananibham+vāyubījātmakam -> pralayaghananibhaṃ vāyubījātmakam

pralayaghananibhaṃ vāyubījātmakam+syāt -> pralayaghananibhaṃ vāyubījātmakaṃ syāt

aṣṭāṅghrim+khaḍgisiṃhe -> aṣṭāṅghriṃ khaḍgisiṃhe

dhavalam+toyabījātmakam -> dhavalaṃ toyabījātmakam

dhavalaṃ toyabījātmakam+ca| -> dhavalaṃ toyabījātmakaṃ ca|

tārkṣyam+nāgendrabhaṅge -> tārkṣyaṃ nāgendrabhaṅge

gajapates+bhaṅge -> gajapater bhaṅge

gajapater bhaṅge+eva -> gajapater bhaṅga eva

gajapater bhaṅga eva+agnibījāt -> gajapater bhaṅga evāgnibījāt

dhyānam+pañcānanam -> dhyānaṃ pañcānanam

dhyānaṃ pañcānanam+vai -> dhyānaṃ pañcānanaṃ vai

dhyānam+ucyate--- -> dhyānam ucyate---

idānīm+tiryagupadravaśamanāya -> idānīṃ tiryagupadravaśamanāya

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

dhyānena+iti -> dhyāneneti

tena+eva -> tenaiva

caurādyupadrave+adṛśyas -> caurādyupadrave 'dṛśyas

caurādyupadrave 'dṛśyas+bhavati -> caurādyupadrave 'dṛśyo bhavati

uṣṇīṣe+ākāśamaṇḍale -> uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍale

uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍale+ākāśakṛtsnam -> uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnam

uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnam+dravyarahitam -> uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitam

uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitam+bhāvayet -> uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitaṃ bhāvayet

uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitaṃ bhāvayet+tena -> uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitaṃ bhāvayet tena

uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitaṃ bhāvayet tena+ākāśagamanam -> uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitaṃ bhāvayet tenākāśagamanam

uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitaṃ bhāvayet tenākāśagamanam+bhavati -> uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitaṃ bhāvayet tenākāśagamanaṃ bhavati

uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitaṃ bhāvayet tenākāśagamanaṃ bhavati+iti| -> uṣṇīṣa ākāśamaṇḍala ākāśakṛtsnaṃ dravyarahitaṃ bhāvayet tenākāśagamanaṃ bhavatīti|

śūnyakṛtsnam+iti| -> śūnyakṛtsnam iti|

dahanakṣamas+iti| -> dahanakṣama iti|

tena+agnis -> tenāgnis

tenāgnis+śītalas -> tenāgniḥ śītalas

tenāgniḥ śītalas+bhavati -> tenāgniḥ śītalo bhavati

toyamaṇḍalāt+toyabījajanitam -> toyamaṇḍalāt toyabījajanitam

toyamaṇḍalāt toyabījajanitam+toyakṛtsnam -> toyamaṇḍalāt toyabījajanitaṃ toyakṛtsnam

toyamaṇḍalāt toyabījajanitaṃ toyakṛtsnam+niścārya -> toyamaṇḍalāt toyabījajanitaṃ toyakṛtsnaṃ niścārya

toyamaṇḍalāt toyabījajanitaṃ toyakṛtsnaṃ niścārya+agnimūrdhni -> toyamaṇḍalāt toyabījajanitaṃ toyakṛtsnaṃ niścāryāgnimūrdhni

evam+vahnes -> evaṃ vahnes

evaṃ vahnes+nāśārtham -> evaṃ vahner nāśārtham

evaṃ vahner nāśārtham+toyakṛtsnam -> evaṃ vahner nāśārthaṃ toyakṛtsnam

evaṃ vahner nāśārthaṃ toyakṛtsnam+iti| -> evaṃ vahner nāśārthaṃ toyakṛtsnam iti|

evam+bhūmidrāvaṇārtham -> evaṃ bhūmidrāvaṇārtham

evaṃ bhūmidrāvaṇārtham+vahnikṛtsnam -> evaṃ bhūmidrāvaṇārthaṃ vahnikṛtsnam

evaṃ bhūmidrāvaṇārthaṃ vahnikṛtsnam+bhāvanīyam| -> evaṃ bhūmidrāvaṇārthaṃ vahnikṛtsnaṃ bhāvanīyam|

tābhis+jvālābhis -> tābhir jvālābhis

tābhir jvālābhis+mahivalayam -> tābhir jvālābhir mahivalayam

tābhir jvālābhir mahivalayam+dravati -> tābhir jvālābhir mahivalayaṃ dravati

vahnimaṇḍalāt+agnibījapariṇatā -> vahnimaṇḍalād agnibījapariṇatā

vahnikṛtsnam+iti| -> vahnikṛtsnam iti|

vṛṣṭes+vināśārtham -> vṛṣṭer vināśārtham

vṛṣṭer vināśārtham+iti -> vṛṣṭer vināśārtham iti

evam+vāyukṛtsnam -> evaṃ vāyukṛtsnam

evaṃ vāyukṛtsnam+niścārya -> evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ niścārya

evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ niścārya+agnimūrdhni -> evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ niścāryāgnimūrdhni

varṣamāṇā+api -> varṣamāṇāpi

varṣamāṇāpi+iti -> varṣamāṇāpīti

meghavṛṣṭis+praviśati -> meghavṛṣṭiḥ praviśati

pañcadhātvātmakam+kūṭāgāram -> pañcadhātvātmakaṃ kūṭāgāram

pañcadhātvātmakaṃ kūṭāgāram+ātmanas -> pañcadhātvātmakaṃ kūṭāgāram ātmanas

pañcadhātvātmakaṃ kūṭāgāram ātmanas+upari -> pañcadhātvātmakaṃ kūṭāgāram ātmana upari

meghavṛṣṭim+vināśayati| -> meghavṛṣṭiṃ vināśayati|

bhāvayet+tena -> bhāvayet tena

vāyukṛtsnam+meghopari -> vāyukṛtsnaṃ meghopari

vāyumaṇḍalāt+niścārya -> vāyumaṇḍalān niścārya

evam+vāyukṛtsnam -> evaṃ vāyukṛtsnam

evaṃ vāyukṛtsnam+ca -> evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ ca

evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ ca+ativṛṣṭes -> evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ cātivṛṣṭes

evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ cātivṛṣṭes+vināśārtham -> evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ cātivṛṣṭer vināśārtham

evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ cātivṛṣṭer vināśārtham+iti| -> evaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ cātivṛṣṭer vināśārtham iti|

pṛthvīkṛtsnadhyānena+iti| -> pṛthvīkṛtsnadhyāneneti|

setubandhavat+niścārya -> setubandhavan niścārya

pṛthivīmaṇḍalāt+pṛthvīkṛtsnam -> pṛthivīmaṇḍalāt pṛthvīkṛtsnam

pṛthivīmaṇḍalāt pṛthvīkṛtsnam+samudropari -> pṛthivīmaṇḍalāt pṛthvīkṛtsnaṃ samudropari

yoginām+devatā -> yogināṃ devatā

pṛthvī+ityādi| -> pṛthvītyādi|

idānīm+pṛthivyādikṛtsnabhāvanā -> idānīṃ pṛthivyādikṛtsnabhāvanā

idānīṃ pṛthivyādikṛtsnabhāvanā+ucyate -> idānīṃ pṛthivyādikṛtsnabhāvanocyate

ṣaṭkulavaśāt+prāṇasaṃyamāt -> ṣaṭkulavaśāt prāṇasaṃyamāt

ṣaṭkulavaśāt prāṇasaṃyamāt+karmasiddhis -> ṣaṭkulavaśāt prāṇasaṃyamāt karmasiddhis

ṣaṭkulavaśāt prāṇasaṃyamāt karmasiddhis+bhagavatā -> ṣaṭkulavaśāt prāṇasaṃyamāt karmasiddhir bhagavatā

ṣaṭkulavaśāt prāṇasaṃyamāt karmasiddhir bhagavatā+uktā| -> ṣaṭkulavaśāt prāṇasaṃyamāt karmasiddhir bhagavatoktā|

evam+ṣaṭsthāneṣu -> evaṃ ṣaṭsthāneṣu

haritam+akārakulavaśāt -> haritam akārakulavaśāt

haritam akārakulavaśāt+jīvane -> haritam akārakulavaśāj jīvane

jñānamaṇḍale+aṃkārakulavaśāt -> jñānamaṇḍale 'ṃkārakulavaśāt

jñānamaṇḍale 'ṃkārakulavaśāt+māraṇe| -> jñānamaṇḍale 'ṃkārakulavaśān māraṇe|

nīlābham+śūnyabījāt -> nīlābhaṃ śūnyabījāt

nīlābhaṃ śūnyabījāt+guhye -> nīlābhaṃ śūnyabījād guhye

śūnyakṛtsnam+tu -> śūnyakṛtsnaṃ tu

śūnyakṛtsnaṃ tu+adṛśye|| -> śūnyakṛtsnaṃ tv adṛśye||

nāśārtham+toyakṛtsnam -> nāśārthaṃ toyakṛtsnam

nāśārthaṃ toyakṛtsnam+bhavati -> nāśārthaṃ toyakṛtsnaṃ bhavati

mahivalayam+drāvaṇārtham -> mahivalayaṃ drāvaṇārtham

mahivalayaṃ drāvaṇārtham+ca -> mahivalayaṃ drāvaṇārthaṃ ca

nāśārtham+vahnikṛtsnam -> nāśārthaṃ vahnikṛtsnam

nāśārthaṃ vahnikṛtsnam+tu -> nāśārthaṃ vahnikṛtsnaṃ tu

nāśārthaṃ vahnikṛtsnaṃ tu+api -> nāśārthaṃ vahnikṛtsnaṃ tv api

vṛṣṭes+| -> vṛṣṭeḥ|

vāyukṛtsnam+ca -> vāyukṛtsnaṃ ca

pṛthvīkṛtsnam+samantāt -> pṛthvīkṛtsnaṃ samantāt

pṛthvīkṛtsnaṃ samantāt+jalanidhigamane -> pṛthvīkṛtsnaṃ samantāj jalanidhigamane

haritam+māraṇe -> haritaṃ māraṇe

nīlābham+śūnyabījāt -> nīlābhaṃ śūnyabījāt

nīlābhaṃ śūnyabījāt+bhavati -> nīlābhaṃ śūnyabījād bhavati

ḷkārakulavaśāt+iti|| -> ḷkārakulavaśād iti||

pītam+bhūmibījātmakam -> pītaṃ bhūmibījātmakam

pītaṃ bhūmibījātmakam+nābhau -> pītaṃ bhūmibījātmakaṃ nābhau

prāṇasya+ikārakulavaśāt| -> prāṇasyekārakulavaśāt|

kṛṣṇam+vāyubījasvabhāvam -> kṛṣṇaṃ vāyubījasvabhāvam

kṛṣṇaṃ vāyubījasvabhāvam+lalāṭe -> kṛṣṇaṃ vāyubījasvabhāvaṃ lalāṭe

ṛkārakulavaśāt+iti| -> ṛkārakulavaśād iti|

tanudahanam+vahnibījātmakam -> tanudahanaṃ vahnibījātmakam

tanudahanaṃ vahnibījātmakam+kaṇṭhe -> tanudahanaṃ vahnibījātmakaṃ kaṇṭhe

tasyās+dhyānam -> tasyā dhyānam

tasyā dhyānam+śukladhyānam -> tasyā dhyānaṃ śukladhyānam

tasyā dhyānaṃ śukladhyānam+api -> tasyā dhyānaṃ śukladhyānam api

tasyā dhyānaṃ śukladhyānam api+ambubījāt -> tasyā dhyānaṃ śukladhyānam apy ambubījāt

tasyā dhyānaṃ śukladhyānam apy ambubījāt+śāntau -> tasyā dhyānaṃ śukladhyānam apy ambubījāc chāntau

kulavaśāt+ukārakulavaśāt| -> kulavaśād ukārakulavaśāt|

toyabījena+utpannā -> toyabījenotpannā

puṣṭau+iti| -> puṣṭāv iti|

tatas+jhaṭityākāreṇa -> tato jhaṭityākāreṇa

prathamam+tāvat -> prathamaṃ tāvat

prathamaṃ tāvat+ekavīram -> prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram

prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram+ātmānam -> prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram ātmānam

prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram ātmānam+kālacakram -> prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram ātmānaṃ kālacakram

prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram ātmānaṃ kālacakram+bhāvayet -> prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram ātmānaṃ kālacakraṃ bhāvayet

prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram ātmānaṃ kālacakraṃ bhāvayet+caturviṃśatibhujam -> prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram ātmānaṃ kālacakraṃ bhāvayec caturviṃśatibhujam

prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram ātmānaṃ kālacakraṃ bhāvayec caturviṃśatibhujam+śāntyādivaśyādikarmaṇi -> prathamaṃ tāvad ekavīram ātmānaṃ kālacakraṃ bhāvayec caturviṃśatibhujaṃ śāntyādivaśyādikarmaṇi

śāntau+ityādi| -> śāntāv ityādi|

varakanakanibham+bhūmibījātmakam -> varakanakanibhaṃ bhūmibījātmakam

varakanakanibhaṃ bhūmibījātmakam+ca|| -> varakanakanibhaṃ bhūmibījātmakaṃ ca||

pralayaghananibham+vāyubījasvabhāvam -> pralayaghananibhaṃ vāyubījasvabhāvam

tanudahanam+vahnibījātmakam -> tanudahanaṃ vahnibījātmakam

tanudahanaṃ vahnibījātmakam+ca| -> tanudahanaṃ vahnibījātmakaṃ ca|

raktam+tu -> raktaṃ tu

raktaṃ tu+api -> raktaṃ tv api

kulavaśāt+dhyānam -> kulavaśād dhyānam

kulavaśād dhyānam+api -> kulavaśād dhyānam api

kulavaśād dhyānam api+ambubījāt -> kulavaśād dhyānam apy ambubījāt

śuklam+bhavati -> śuklaṃ bhavati

idānīm+śāntau -> idānīṃ śāntau

idānīṃ śāntau+aparam -> idānīṃ śāntāv aparam

idānīṃ śāntāv aparam+dhyānam -> idānīṃ śāntāv aparaṃ dhyānam

idānīṃ śāntāv aparaṃ dhyānam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ śāntāv aparaṃ dhyānam ucyate---

evam+vaśyādinavavṛttāni -> evaṃ vaśyādinavavṛttāni

vṛttadvayam+subodham| -> vṛttadvayaṃ subodham|

taḍidanalanibhām+kartikām -> taḍidanalanibhāṃ kartikām

taḍidanalanibhāṃ kartikām+preṃsvabhāvām -> taḍidanalanibhāṃ kartikāṃ preṃsvabhāvām

taḍidanalanibhāṃ kartikāṃ preṃsvabhāvām+ityādi% -> taḍidanalanibhāṃ kartikāṃ preṃsvabhāvām ityādi%

punar+dhyātvā -> punar dhyātvā

yamapuram+kim -> yamapuraṃ kim

yamapuraṃ kim+punar -> yamapuraṃ kiṃ punar

yamapuraṃ kiṃ punar+garbhajātas -> yamapuraṃ kiṃ punar garbhajātas

yamapuraṃ kiṃ punar garbhajātas+|| -> yamapuraṃ kiṃ punar garbhajātaḥ||

vajrābhis+naṣṭabuddhim -> vajrābhir naṣṭabuddhim

vajrābhir naṣṭabuddhiṃ kṣitijalahutabhugvātajābhis+ca -> vajrābhir naṣṭabuddhiṃ kṣitijalahutabhugvātajābhiś ca

lāsyādibhis+ca|| -> lāsyādibhiś ca||

bhūtābhis+bhīṣyamānam -> bhūtābhir bhīṣyamānam

bhūtābhir bhīṣyamānam+kharanakhanihitam -> bhūtābhir bhīṣyamānaṃ kharanakhanihitam

bhūtābhir bhīṣyamānaṃ kharanakhanihitam+ca -> bhūtābhir bhīṣyamānaṃ kharanakhanihitaṃ ca

bhūtābhir bhīṣyamānaṃ kharanakhanihitaṃ ca+eva -> bhūtābhir bhīṣyamānaṃ kharanakhanihitaṃ caiva

devībhis+bhartsyamānam -> devībhir bhartsyamānam

devībhir bhartsyamānam+salaguḍamuṣalais -> devībhir bhartsyamānaṃ salaguḍamuṣalais

devībhir bhartsyamānaṃ salaguḍamuṣalais+tāḍitam -> devībhir bhartsyamānaṃ salaguḍamuṣalais tāḍitam

devībhir bhartsyamānaṃ salaguḍamuṣalais tāḍitam+krodhajābhis -> devībhir bhartsyamānaṃ salaguḍamuṣalais tāḍitaṃ krodhajābhis

niyatam+veṣṭitam -> niyataṃ veṣṭitam

niyataṃ veṣṭitaṃ nāginībhis+| -> niyataṃ veṣṭitaṃ nāginībhiḥ|

caṇḍābhir vastrahīnaṃ kṛtam+api -> caṇḍābhir vastrahīnaṃ kṛtam api

tena+utpannārkabhāsobhayakaradhanuṣā -> tenotpannārkabhāsobhayakaradhanuṣā

kuvalayakalikābāṇam+eva -> kuvalayakalikābāṇam eva

kuvalayakalikābāṇam eva+ikṣucāpam -> kuvalayakalikābāṇam evekṣucāpam

bhāvanīyam+itiparyantam|| -> bhāvanīyam itiparyantam||

sarvam+paramasukhakaram -> sarvaṃ paramasukhakaram

sarvaṃ paramasukhakaram+yoginā -> sarvaṃ paramasukhakaraṃ yoginā

tasmāt+ityādinā -> tasmād ityādinā

tasmād ityādinā+evam -> tasmād ityādinaivam

tasmād ityādinaivam+sādhyasya -> tasmād ityādinaivaṃ sādhyasya

aparavṛttadvayena+uktam -> aparavṛttadvayenoktam

aparavṛttadvayenoktam+subodham| -> aparavṛttadvayenoktaṃ subodham|

sarvam+paramasukhakaram -> sarvaṃ paramasukhakaram

sarvaṃ paramasukhakaram+yoginā -> sarvaṃ paramasukhakaraṃ yoginā

evam+sādhyasya -> evaṃ sādhyasya

rakṣām+sakalabhuvitale -> rakṣāṃ sakalabhuvitale

caṇḍās+kurvanti -> caṇḍāḥ kurvanti

tu+amarayuvatayas -> tv amarayuvatayas

tv amarayuvatayas+dvādaśa -> tv amarayuvatayo dvādaśa

tv amarayuvatayo dvādaśa+āliṅgayanti| -> tv amarayuvatayo dvādaśāliṅgayanti|

nāginyas+cumbayanti -> nāginyaś cumbayanti

pravaradaśavidhās+krodhajās -> pravaradaśavidhāḥ krodhajās

pravaradaśavidhāḥ krodhajās+pālayanti -> pravaradaśavidhāḥ krodhajāḥ pālayanti

bhūtākhyās+ca -> bhūtākhyāś ca

bhūtākhyāś ca+abhayante -> bhūtākhyāś cābhayante

prakaṭadaśabhis+lāsyādayas -> prakaṭadaśabhir lāsyādayas

prakaṭadaśabhir lāsyādayas+toṣayanti|| -> prakaṭadaśabhir lāsyādayas toṣayanti||

rūpādyās+poṣayanti -> rūpādyāḥ poṣayanti

pravaradaśavidhās+śaktayas -> pravaradaśavidhāḥ śaktayas

pravaradaśavidhāḥ śaktayas+pūjayanti -> pravaradaśavidhāḥ śaktayaḥ pūjayanti

tam+sādhyam -> taṃ sādhyam

taṃ sādhyam+snāpayanti -> taṃ sādhyaṃ snāpayanti

punar+amṛtaghaṭais -> punar amṛtaghaṭais

punar amṛtaghaṭais+locanādyās -> punar amṛtaghaṭair locanādyās

punar amṛtaghaṭair locanādyās+prahṛṣṭās -> punar amṛtaghaṭair locanādyāḥ prahṛṣṭās

punar amṛtaghaṭair locanādyāḥ prahṛṣṭās+| -> punar amṛtaghaṭair locanādyāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ|

bhartus+ca -> bhartuś ca

bhartuś ca+ājñām -> bhartuś cājñām

bhartuś cājñām+pralabdhvā -> bhartuś cājñāṃ pralabdhvā

vibhos+maṇḍale -> vibhor maṇḍale

punar+api -> punar api

tasmāt+sādhyam -> tasmāt sādhyam

tasmāt sādhyam+gṛhītvā -> tasmāt sādhyaṃ gṛhītvā

preṣayet+sādhyaveśmani|| -> preṣayet sādhyaveśmani||

tām+ca -> tāṃ ca

dakṣiṇe+abhayahastā| -> dakṣiṇe 'bhayahastā|

sitajalajakarā+iti -> sitajalajakareti

śvetanāgam+iti -> śvetanāgam iti

śvetanāgam iti+airāvatam -> śvetanāgam ity airāvatam

śvetanāgam ity airāvatam+ārūḍhā| -> śvetanāgam ity airāvatam ārūḍhā|

vakārapariṇatam+śuklam -> vakārapariṇataṃ śuklam

vakārapariṇataṃ śuklam+padmam -> vakārapariṇataṃ śuklaṃ padmam

vakārapariṇataṃ śuklaṃ padmam+tena -> vakārapariṇataṃ śuklaṃ padmaṃ tena

vakārapariṇataṃ śuklaṃ padmaṃ tena+utpannaikavaktrā -> vakārapariṇataṃ śuklaṃ padmaṃ tenotpannaikavaktrā

toyabījātmakābjam+iti -> toyabījātmakābjam iti

candrārkamadhye+ādikādisahite -> candrārkamadhya ādikādisahite

dhyātvā+ityādi| -> dhyātvetyādi|

śvetālaṃkārayuktām+prahasitavadanām -> śvetālaṃkārayuktāṃ prahasitavadanām

śvetālaṃkārayuktāṃ prahasitavadanām+preṣayet -> śvetālaṃkārayuktāṃ prahasitavadanāṃ preṣayet

śvetālaṃkārayuktāṃ prahasitavadanāṃ preṣayet+sādhyaveśma|| -> śvetālaṃkārayuktāṃ prahasitavadanāṃ preṣayet sādhyaveśma||

ārūḍhām+śvetanāgam -> ārūḍhāṃ śvetanāgam

ārūḍhāṃ śvetanāgam+sitajalajakarām -> ārūḍhāṃ śvetanāgaṃ sitajalajakarām

ārūḍhāṃ śvetanāgaṃ sitajalajakarām+ca -> ārūḍhāṃ śvetanāgaṃ sitajalajakarāṃ ca

ārūḍhāṃ śvetanāgaṃ sitajalajakarāṃ ca+abhayām -> ārūḍhāṃ śvetanāgaṃ sitajalajakarāṃ cābhayām

ārūḍhāṃ śvetanāgaṃ sitajalajakarāṃ cābhayām+śvetavastrām -> ārūḍhāṃ śvetanāgaṃ sitajalajakarāṃ cābhayāṃ śvetavastrām

tena+utpannaikavaktrām -> tenotpannaikavaktrām

tenotpannaikavaktrām+yamakarakamalām -> tenotpannaikavaktrāṃ yamakarakamalām

tenotpannaikavaktrāṃ yamakarakamalām+devatīm -> tenotpannaikavaktrāṃ yamakarakamalāṃ devatīm

tenotpannaikavaktrāṃ yamakarakamalāṃ devatīm+candravarṇām| -> tenotpannaikavaktrāṃ yamakarakamalāṃ devatīṃ candravarṇām|

tu+alikalisahite -> tv alikalisahite

devatāsamādhis+ucyate--- -> devatāsamādhir ucyate---

idānīm+devatāyām -> idānīṃ devatāyām

idānīṃ devatāyām+sādhitāyām -> idānīṃ devatāyāṃ sādhitāyām

idānīṃ devatāyāṃ sādhitāyām+satyām -> idānīṃ devatāyāṃ sādhitāyāṃ satyām

idānīṃ devatāyāṃ sādhitāyāṃ satyām+śāntyādikarmakaraṇāya -> idānīṃ devatāyāṃ sādhitāyāṃ satyāṃ śāntyādikarmakaraṇāya

tathā+uktam -> tathoktam

tathoktam+iti|| -> tathoktam iti||

nāyikācihnaniyamas+| -> nāyikācihnaniyamaḥ|

vajram+nāyakasya| -> vajraṃ nāyakasya|

vāyvagnitoyapṛthivīdevatās+iti| -> vāyvagnitoyapṛthivīdevatā iti|

evam+yaralavās -> evaṃ yaralavās

evaṃ yaralavās+api -> evaṃ yaralavā api
