padmahastā+upalahastā -> padmahastopalahastā

kālāgnimaṇḍalam+akṣaram -> kālāgnimaṇḍalam akṣaram

tathoktaṃ ravis+api -> tathoktaṃ ravir api

tathā+eva -> tathaiva

tathā+uktam -> tathoktam

tathoktam+śaśiravikuliśam -> tathoktaṃ śaśiravikuliśam

tathoktaṃ śaśiravikuliśam+ca -> tathoktaṃ śaśiravikuliśaṃ ca

tathoktaṃ śaśiravikuliśaṃ ca+akṣaram -> tathoktaṃ śaśiravikuliśaṃ cākṣaram

tathoktaṃ śaśiravikuliśaṃ cākṣaram+tadvat -> tathoktaṃ śaśiravikuliśaṃ cākṣaraṃ tadvat

devatopāyas+vā -> devatopāyo vā

bījena+utpannā -> bījenotpannā

evaṃ karmaṇaḥ śāntikāder jñānabījam+bhavati| -> evaṃ karmaṇaḥ śāntikāder jñānabījaṃ bhavati|

sattvānāṃ vijñānam+bhavati| -> sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ bhavati|

jñānabījam+ālayavijñānalakṣaṇam -> jñānabījam ālayavijñānalakṣaṇam

jñānabījam ālayavijñānalakṣaṇam+bhavati| -> jñānabījam ālayavijñānalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati|

ādiyuktam+candradravam -> ādiyuktaṃ candradravam

ādiyuktaṃ candradravam+kādiyuktam -> ādiyuktaṃ candradravaṃ kādiyuktam

ādiyuktaṃ candradravaṃ kādiyuktam+sūryarajas -> ādiyuktaṃ candradravaṃ kādiyuktaṃ sūryarajas

ādiyuktaṃ candradravaṃ kādiyuktaṃ sūryarajas+prāṇāpānayuktam| -> ādiyuktaṃ candradravaṃ kādiyuktaṃ sūryarajaḥ prāṇāpānayuktam|

praviṣṭam+candram -> praviṣṭaṃ candram

praviṣṭaṃ candram+samarasam -> praviṣṭaṃ candraṃ samarasam

praviṣṭaṃ candraṃ samarasam+mātṛpadme -> praviṣṭaṃ candraṃ samarasaṃ mātṛpadme

praviṣṭaṃ bodhicittam+samarasam -> praviṣṭaṃ bodhicittaṃ samarasam

praviṣṭaṃ bodhicittaṃ samarasam+raktena -> praviṣṭaṃ bodhicittaṃ samarasaṃ raktena

tasmin+sūrye -> tasmin sūrye

garbhajānāṃ tathā+eva| -> garbhajānāṃ tathaiva|

vakṣyamāṇānām+jananī -> vakṣyamāṇānāṃ jananī

mātṛ+iti -> mātr iti

devyās+padme -> devyāḥ padme

devyāḥ padme+utsṛjet| -> devyāḥ padma utsṛjet|

bodhicittam+ānanditam -> bodhicittam ānanditam

bodhicittam ānanditam+kṣipet -> bodhicittam ānanditaṃ kṣipet

bodhicittam ānanditaṃ kṣipet+tathā -> bodhicittam ānanditaṃ kṣipet tathā

puruṣas+strīkamale -> puruṣaḥ strīkamale

svavajramukhāt+yathā -> svavajramukhād yathā

bodhicittalakṣaṇam+svakuliśavadanāt -> bodhicittalakṣaṇaṃ svakuliśavadanāt

bodhicittalakṣaṇaṃ svakuliśavadanāt+utsṛjet -> bodhicittalakṣaṇaṃ svakuliśavadanād utsṛjet

bodhicittalakṣaṇaṃ svakuliśavadanād utsṛjet+mātṛpadme -> bodhicittalakṣaṇaṃ svakuliśavadanād utsṛjen mātṛpadme

bodhicittalakṣaṇaṃ svakuliśavadanād utsṛjen mātṛpadme+iti -> bodhicittalakṣaṇaṃ svakuliśavadanād utsṛjen mātṛpadma iti

sarvākāram+yat -> sarvākāraṃ yat

sarvākāraṃ yat+tat -> sarvākāraṃ yat tat

sarvākāraṃ yat tat+candradravābham -> sarvākāraṃ yat tac candradravābham

sarvākāraṃ yat tac candradravābham+iti -> sarvākāraṃ yat tac candradravābham iti

sarvam+iti -> sarvam iti

yat+tat -> yat tat

yat tat+avadhūtīdvāreṇa -> yat tad avadhūtīdvāreṇa

yat tad avadhūtīdvāreṇa+uṣṇīṣalalāṭakaṇṭhahṛdayanābhiguhyamārge -> yat tad avadhūtīdvāreṇoṣṇīṣalalāṭakaṇṭhahṛdayanābhiguhyamārge

trividhabhavagatam+vyāpakatvena -> trividhabhavagataṃ vyāpakatvena

tais+vajrāṅkuśais -> tair vajrāṅkuśais

tair vajrāṅkuśais+tribhavākāram -> tair vajrāṅkuśais tribhavākāram

tair vajrāṅkuśais tribhavākāram+svaccham -> tair vajrāṅkuśais tribhavākāraṃ svaccham

tair vajrāṅkuśais tribhavākāraṃ svaccham+jñānacakram -> tair vajrāṅkuśais tribhavākāraṃ svacchaṃ jñānacakram

tair vajrāṅkuśais tribhavākāraṃ svacchaṃ jñānacakram+ākṛṣya -> tair vajrāṅkuśais tribhavākāraṃ svacchaṃ jñānacakram ākṛṣya

tridhātukam+sakalam -> tridhātukaṃ sakalam

tridhātukaṃ sakalam+pūrayitvā -> tridhātukaṃ sakalaṃ pūrayitvā

raśmibhis+vajrāṅkuśākārais -> raśmibhir vajrāṅkuśākārais

raśmibhir vajrāṅkuśākārais+tribhuvanam -> raśmibhir vajrāṅkuśākārais tribhuvanam

raśmibhir vajrāṅkuśākārais tribhuvanam+iti -> raśmibhir vajrāṅkuśākārais tribhuvanam iti

tatas+tasya -> tatas tasya

tatas tasya+aṅkuśasya -> tatas tasyāṅkuśasya

jaḥkārapariṇatam+vajrāṅkuśam -> jaḥkārapariṇataṃ vajrāṅkuśam

jaḥkārapariṇataṃ vajrāṅkuśam+bhāvayet| -> jaḥkārapariṇataṃ vajrāṅkuśaṃ bhāvayet|

tanmadhye+iti -> tanmadhya iti

spharat+iti| -> spharad iti|

vajram+hūṃkārapariṇatam -> vajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇatam

vajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇatam+pañcaśūkam -> vajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ pañcaśūkam

vajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ pañcaśūkam+pralayaghananibham -> vajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ pañcaśūkaṃ pralayaghananibham

vajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ pañcaśūkaṃ pralayaghananibham+kṛṣṇavarṇam -> vajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ pañcaśūkaṃ pralayaghananibhaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇam

vajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ pañcaśūkaṃ pralayaghananibhaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇam+iti -> vajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ pañcaśūkaṃ pralayaghananibhaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇam iti

sthāpayet+mūrdhni -> sthāpayen mūrdhni

tryātmake+adhyātmani -> tryātmake 'dhyātmani

karṇikāyām+śaśiraviśikhini -> karṇikāyāṃ śaśiraviśikhini

karṇikāyāṃ śaśiraviśikhini+iti -> karṇikāyāṃ śaśiraviśikhinīti

kālacakram+pūrvoktam -> kālacakraṃ pūrvoktam

kālacakraṃ pūrvoktam+niṣpādyam -> kālacakraṃ pūrvoktaṃ niṣpādyam

kālacakraṃ pūrvoktaṃ niṣpādyam+tatas -> kālacakraṃ pūrvoktaṃ niṣpādyaṃ tatas

kālacakraṃ pūrvoktaṃ niṣpādyaṃ tatas+tasya -> kālacakraṃ pūrvoktaṃ niṣpādyaṃ tatas tasya

tat+bimbam -> tad bimbam

tad bimbam+bhartus -> tad bimbaṃ bhartus

tad bimbaṃ bhartus+iti| -> tad bimbaṃ bhartur iti|

tat+bimbam -> tad bimbam

tad bimbam+yādṛśam -> tad bimbaṃ yādṛśam

tad bimbaṃ yādṛśam+vikalpayet -> tad bimbaṃ yādṛśaṃ vikalpayet

tad bimbaṃ yādṛśaṃ vikalpayet+tādṛśam -> tad bimbaṃ yādṛśaṃ vikalpayet tādṛśam

tad bimbaṃ yādṛśaṃ vikalpayet tādṛśam+paśyati -> tad bimbaṃ yādṛśaṃ vikalpayet tādṛśaṃ paśyati

bimbam+vispaṣṭam -> bimbaṃ vispaṣṭam

bimbaṃ vispaṣṭam+avadhūtyām -> bimbaṃ vispaṣṭam avadhūtyām

bimbaṃ vispaṣṭam avadhūtyām+prāṇagatam -> bimbaṃ vispaṣṭam avadhūtyāṃ prāṇagatam

bimbaṃ vispaṣṭam avadhūtyāṃ prāṇagatam+paśyati -> bimbaṃ vispaṣṭam avadhūtyāṃ prāṇagataṃ paśyati

bhartus+ityādi| -> bhartur ityādi|

yoginas+devatās -> yogino devatās

yogino devatās+vā|| -> yogino devatā vā||

tena+utpannā -> tenotpannā

kulavaśāt+karmaṇas -> kulavaśāt karmaṇas

kulavaśāt karmaṇas+śāntikādes -> kulavaśāt karmaṇaḥ śāntikādes

jñānabījam+bhavati -> jñānabījaṃ bhavati

samarasam+ca -> samarasaṃ ca

samarasaṃ ca+ādikādiprayuktam| -> samarasaṃ cādikādiprayuktam|

praviṣṭam+bhavati -> praviṣṭaṃ bhavati

tasmin+sūrye -> tasmin sūrye

sarvam+candradravābham -> sarvaṃ candradravābham

sarvaṃ candradravābham+svakuliśavadanāt -> sarvaṃ candradravābhaṃ svakuliśavadanāt

sarvaṃ candradravābhaṃ svakuliśavadanāt+utsṛjet -> sarvaṃ candradravābhaṃ svakuliśavadanād utsṛjet

sarvaṃ candradravābhaṃ svakuliśavadanād utsṛjet+mātṛpadme -> sarvaṃ candradravābhaṃ svakuliśavadanād utsṛjen mātṛpadme

jñānacakram+trividhabhavagatam -> jñānacakraṃ trividhabhavagatam

jñānacakraṃ trividhabhavagatam+vajramārge -> jñānacakraṃ trividhabhavagataṃ vajramārge

tribhuvanasakalam+raśmibhis -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ raśmibhis

tribhuvanasakalaṃ raśmibhis+pūrayitvā -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ raśmibhiḥ pūrayitvā

jas+aṅkuśasya -> jo 'ṅkuśasya

hūṃkāram+jñānajātam -> hūṃkāraṃ jñānajātam

hūṃkāraṃ jñānajātam+pralayaghananibham -> hūṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ pralayaghananibham

hūṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ pralayaghananibham+pañcaśūkam -> hūṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ pralayaghananibhaṃ pañcaśūkam

hūṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ pralayaghananibhaṃ pañcaśūkam+saraśmi| -> hūṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ pralayaghananibhaṃ pañcaśūkaṃ saraśmi|

sthāpayet+mūrdhni -> sthāpayen mūrdhni

bhartus+hṛtpadmamadhye -> bhartur hṛtpadmamadhye

idānīm+śāntyādisādhanāya -> idānīṃ śāntyādisādhanāya

idānīṃ śāntyādisādhanāya+ādibhāvanā -> idānīṃ śāntyādisādhanāyādibhāvanā

idānīṃ śāntyādisādhanāyādibhāvanā+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ śāntyādisādhanāyādibhāvanocyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

prāṇena+asādhitena -> prāṇenāsādhitena

prāṇenāsādhitena+iti -> prāṇenāsādhiteneti

karmasiddhis+asti -> karmasiddhir asti

na+anyathā -> nānyathā

tasmāt+dvau -> tasmād dvau

lokasiddhas+| -> lokasiddhaḥ|

sutas+sarvadā -> sutaḥ sarvadā

vihīnas+na -> vihīno na

dṛṣṭāntas+---mātrā -> dṛṣṭāntaḥ---mātrā

paścāt+uktāni -> paścād uktāni

yatnatas+sādhanīyau| -> yatnataḥ sādhanīyau|

tribhuvanajananī+iti -> tribhuvanajananīti

prāṇavāyumadhyamāyām+praveśitavyas -> prāṇavāyumadhyamāyāṃ praveśitavyas

prāṇavāyumadhyamāyāṃ praveśitavyas+sadā| -> prāṇavāyumadhyamāyāṃ praveśitavyaḥ sadā|

gurūpadeśatas+sādhanīyas -> gurūpadeśataḥ sādhanīyas

gurūpadeśataḥ sādhanīyas+śrīkālacakras -> gurūpadeśataḥ sādhanīyaḥ śrīkālacakras

gurūpadeśataḥ sādhanīyaḥ śrīkālacakras+iti -> gurūpadeśataḥ sādhanīyaḥ śrīkālacakra iti

yatnatas+iti -> yatnata iti

iha+ādau -> ihādau

ādau+ityādi| -> ādāv ityādi|

karmasiddhis+|| -> karmasiddhiḥ||

na+anyathā -> nānyathā

tasmāt+dvau -> tasmād dvau

sutas+sarvadā -> sutaḥ sarvadā

vihīnas+na -> vihīno na

paścāt+karmāṇi -> paścāt karmāṇi

yatnatas+sādhanīyau -> yatnataḥ sādhanīyau

śrīkālacakras+tribhuvanajananī -> śrīkālacakras tribhuvanajananī

idānīm+sarvakarmasādhanānām -> idānīṃ sarvakarmasādhanānām

idānīṃ sarvakarmasādhanānām+ādikāraṇam -> idānīṃ sarvakarmasādhanānām ādikāraṇam

idānīṃ sarvakarmasādhanānām ādikāraṇam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ sarvakarmasādhanānām ādikāraṇam ucyate---

niyamas+sarvakarmasu|| -> niyamaḥ sarvakarmasu||

śukranirgamas+bhavati -> śukranirgamo bhavati

śukranirgamo bhavati+iti -> śukranirgamo bhavatīti

prāṇe+ākṛṣṭe -> prāṇa ākṛṣṭe

kartavyam+yatra -> kartavyaṃ yatra

tat+sādhanam -> tat sādhanam

tat sādhanam+bauddhayoginā -> tat sādhanaṃ bauddhayoginā

punas+pratyujjīvanam -> punaḥ pratyujjīvanam

punaḥ pratyujjīvanam+na -> punaḥ pratyujjīvanaṃ na

punaḥ pratyujjīvanaṃ na+asti -> punaḥ pratyujjīvanaṃ nāsti

māraṇam+karoti -> māraṇaṃ karoti

prāṇān+ākṛṣya -> prāṇān ākṛṣya

jīvanam+bhavati -> jīvanaṃ bhavati

māraṇam+jīvanam -> māraṇaṃ jīvanam

māraṇaṃ jīvanam+ca -> māraṇaṃ jīvanaṃ ca

mātṛbhyām+iti -> mātṛbhyām iti

triśūlanāgahastābhis+mohanam -> triśūlanāgahastābhir mohanam

triśūlanāgahastābhir mohanam+siddhyati -> triśūlanāgahastābhir mohanaṃ siddhyati

triśūlanāgahastābhir mohanaṃ siddhyati+iti| -> triśūlanāgahastābhir mohanaṃ siddhyatīti|

mudgarakīlakahastābhis+kīlanam -> mudgarakīlakahastābhiḥ kīlanam

mudgarakīlakahastābhiḥ kīlanam+siddhyati| -> mudgarakīlakahastābhiḥ kīlanaṃ siddhyati|

maṇḍalapadābhis+cakraparvatahastābhis -> maṇḍalapadābhiś cakraparvatahastābhis

maṇḍalapadābhiś cakraparvatahastābhis+stambhanam -> maṇḍalapadābhiś cakraparvatahastābhiḥ stambhanam

maṇḍalapadābhiś cakraparvatahastābhiḥ stambhanam+siddhyati| -> maṇḍalapadābhiś cakraparvatahastābhiḥ stambhanaṃ siddhyati|

śvānāsyādyaṣṭadevībhis+pītavarṇābhis -> śvānāsyādyaṣṭadevībhiḥ pītavarṇābhis

śvānāsyādyaṣṭadevībhiḥ pītavarṇābhis+nābhau -> śvānāsyādyaṣṭadevībhiḥ pītavarṇābhir nābhau

kīlanam+ca -> kīlanaṃ ca

kīlanaṃ ca+asurībhis -> kīlanaṃ cāsurībhis

kīlanaṃ cāsurībhis+iti| -> kīlanaṃ cāsurībhir iti|

ākṛṣṭādyam+pāśāṅkuśahastābhis -> ākṛṣṭādyaṃ pāśāṅkuśahastābhis

ākṛṣṭādyaṃ pāśāṅkuśahastābhis+siddhyati -> ākṛṣṭādyaṃ pāśāṅkuśahastābhiḥ siddhyati

ākṛṣṭādyaṃ pāśāṅkuśahastābhiḥ siddhyati+iti| -> ākṛṣṭādyaṃ pāśāṅkuśahastābhiḥ siddhyatīti|

viśākhapadābhis+raktavarṇābhis -> viśākhapadābhī raktavarṇābhis

viśākhapadābhī raktavarṇābhis+dhanurbāṇahastābhis -> viśākhapadābhī raktavarṇābhir dhanurbāṇahastābhis

viśākhapadābhī raktavarṇābhir dhanurbāṇahastābhis+vaśyam -> viśākhapadābhī raktavarṇābhir dhanurbāṇahastābhir vaśyam

viśākhapadābhī raktavarṇābhir dhanurbāṇahastābhir vaśyam+siddhyati| -> viśākhapadābhī raktavarṇābhir dhanurbāṇahastābhir vaśyaṃ siddhyati|

carcikādibhis+iṣṭadevībhis -> carcikādibhir iṣṭadevībhis

carcikādibhir iṣṭadevībhis+sūryamaṇḍale -> carcikādibhir iṣṭadevībhiḥ sūryamaṇḍale

vaśyādyam+bhūtajābhis -> vaśyādyaṃ bhūtajābhis

vaśyādyaṃ bhūtajābhis+iti| -> vaśyādyaṃ bhūtajābhir iti|

devībhis+kartikapālahastābhis -> devībhiḥ kartikapālahastābhis

devībhiḥ kartikapālahastābhis+pratyālīḍhābhis -> devībhiḥ kartikapālahastābhiḥ pratyālīḍhābhis

devībhiḥ kartikapālahastābhiḥ pratyālīḍhābhis+khaḍgapāśahastābhis -> devībhiḥ kartikapālahastābhiḥ pratyālīḍhābhiḥ khaḍgapāśahastābhis

devībhiḥ kartikapālahastābhiḥ pratyālīḍhābhiḥ khaḍgapāśahastābhis+iti -> devībhiḥ kartikapālahastābhiḥ pratyālīḍhābhiḥ khaḍgapāśahastābhir iti

khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastais+satarjanyais -> khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastaiḥ satarjanyais

khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastaiḥ satarjanyais+vidveṣādyam -> khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastaiḥ satarjanyair vidveṣādyam

khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastaiḥ satarjanyair vidveṣādyam+kṛṣṇavarṇais -> khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastaiḥ satarjanyair vidveṣādyaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇais

khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastaiḥ satarjanyair vidveṣādyaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇais+krūrais -> khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastaiḥ satarjanyair vidveṣādyaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaiḥ krūrais

khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastaiḥ satarjanyair vidveṣādyaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaiḥ krūrais+iti| -> khaḍgaśṛṅkhalāhastaiḥ satarjanyair vidveṣādyaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaiḥ krūrair iti|

krodhais+ālīḍhapādais -> krodhair ālīḍhapādais

krodhair ālīḍhapādais+vajrapāśahastais -> krodhair ālīḍhapādair vajrapāśahastais

krodhair ālīḍhapādair vajrapāśahastais+māraṇam -> krodhair ālīḍhapādair vajrapāśahastair māraṇam

krodhair ālīḍhapādair vajrapāśahastair māraṇam+siddhyati| -> krodhair ālīḍhapādair vajrapāśahastair māraṇaṃ siddhyati|

krodhabhāryās+hṛdaye -> krodhabhāryā hṛdaye

prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+iti -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād iti

vidveṣoccāṭanam+cakārāt -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ cakārāt

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ cakārāt+māraṇam -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ cakārān māraṇam

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ cakārān māraṇam+viṣasaṃkrāmaṇam -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ cakārān māraṇaṃ viṣasaṃkrāmaṇam

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ cakārān māraṇaṃ viṣasaṃkrāmaṇam+ca| -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ cakārān māraṇaṃ viṣasaṃkrāmaṇaṃ ca|

cakārāt+nirviṣatvam -> cakārān nirviṣatvam

cakārān nirviṣatvam+jvaropaśamanam -> cakārān nirviṣatvaṃ jvaropaśamanam

cakārān nirviṣatvaṃ jvaropaśamanam+ca -> cakārān nirviṣatvaṃ jvaropaśamanaṃ ca

cakārān nirviṣatvaṃ jvaropaśamanaṃ ca+iti| -> cakārān nirviṣatvaṃ jvaropaśamanaṃ ceti|

rājan+iti -> rājann iti

rājann iti+āmantraṇam| -> rājann ity āmantraṇam|

padmāsane+upāyais -> padmāsana upāyais

padmāsana upāyais+sitapadmavaradahastais -> padmāsana upāyaiḥ sitapadmavaradahastais

padmāsana upāyaiḥ sitapadmavaradahastais+prajñābhis -> padmāsana upāyaiḥ sitapadmavaradahastaiḥ prajñābhis

padmāsana upāyaiḥ sitapadmavaradahastaiḥ prajñābhis+sitotpalābhayahastābhis -> padmāsana upāyaiḥ sitapadmavaradahastaiḥ prajñābhiḥ sitotpalābhayahastābhis

padmāsana upāyaiḥ sitapadmavaradahastaiḥ prajñābhiḥ sitotpalābhayahastābhis+śāntis -> padmāsana upāyaiḥ sitapadmavaradahastaiḥ prajñābhiḥ sitotpalābhayahastābhiḥ śāntis

padmāsana upāyaiḥ sitapadmavaradahastaiḥ prajñābhiḥ sitotpalābhayahastābhiḥ śāntis+puṣṭis -> padmāsana upāyaiḥ sitapadmavaradahastaiḥ prajñābhiḥ sitotpalābhayahastābhiḥ śāntiḥ puṣṭis

ebhis+kulais -> ebhiḥ kulais

ebhiḥ kulais+śuklavarṇais -> ebhiḥ kulaiḥ śuklavarṇais

ebhiḥ kulaiḥ śuklavarṇais+bhāvitais -> ebhiḥ kulaiḥ śuklavarṇair bhāvitais

ebhiḥ kulaiḥ śuklavarṇair bhāvitais+pratyekaikais -> ebhiḥ kulaiḥ śuklavarṇair bhāvitaiḥ pratyekaikais

ebhiḥ kulaiḥ śuklavarṇair bhāvitaiḥ pratyekaikais+candramaṇḍale -> ebhiḥ kulaiḥ śuklavarṇair bhāvitaiḥ pratyekaikaiś candramaṇḍale

punar+jāpahomam -> punar jāpahomam

vakṣyamāṇasādhanam+ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnām -> vakṣyamāṇasādhanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnām

vakṣyamāṇasādhanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnām+anyāsām -> vakṣyamāṇasādhanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnām anyāsām

vakṣyamāṇasādhanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnām anyāsām+śmaśānaparyantānām -> vakṣyamāṇasādhanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnām anyāsāṃ śmaśānaparyantānām

vakṣyamāṇasādhanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnām anyāsāṃ śmaśānaparyantānām+bhavati -> vakṣyamāṇasādhanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnām anyāsāṃ śmaśānaparyantānāṃ bhavati

pratyekam+maṇḍale -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale+asmin -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin+ekavīrais -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīrais

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīrais+svajinakulavaśāt -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśāt

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśāt+vairocanādikulavaśāt -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt+karmabhedais -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt karmabhedais

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt karmabhedais+samastais -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt karmabhedaiḥ samastais

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt karmabhedaiḥ samastais+sādhanam -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt karmabhedaiḥ samastaiḥ sādhanam

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt karmabhedaiḥ samastaiḥ sādhanam+bhavati| -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'sminn ekavīraiḥ svajinakulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt karmabhedaiḥ samastaiḥ sādhanaṃ bhavati|

maṇḍale+uktāt -> maṇḍala uktāt

maṇḍala uktāt+yat -> maṇḍala uktād yat

maṇḍala uktād yat+aparam -> maṇḍala uktād yad aparam

maṇḍala uktād yad aparam+devatādaivatīnām -> maṇḍala uktād yad aparaṃ devatādaivatīnām

maṇḍala uktād yad aparaṃ devatādaivatīnām+sādhanam -> maṇḍala uktād yad aparaṃ devatādaivatīnāṃ sādhanam

maṇḍala uktād yad aparaṃ devatādaivatīnāṃ sādhanam+bhavati -> maṇḍala uktād yad aparaṃ devatādaivatīnāṃ sādhanaṃ bhavati

ityādyam+ityādi| -> ityādyam ityādi|

punar+jāpahomam -> punar jāpahomam

punar jāpahomam+svabījais -> punar jāpahomaṃ svabījais

punar jāpahomaṃ svabījais+|| -> punar jāpahomaṃ svabījaiḥ||

ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnām+bhavati -> ṣaṭtriṃśadyoginīnāṃ bhavati

pratyekam+maṇḍale -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale+asmin -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin+svajinakulavaśāt -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin svajinakulavaśāt

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin svajinakulavaśāt+karmabhedais -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin svajinakulavaśāt karmabhedais

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin svajinakulavaśāt karmabhedais+samastais -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin svajinakulavaśāt karmabhedaiḥ samastais

pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin svajinakulavaśāt karmabhedaiḥ samastais+| -> pratyekaṃ maṇḍale 'smin svajinakulavaśāt karmabhedaiḥ samastaiḥ|

sādhanam+daivatīnām -> sādhanaṃ daivatīnām

ityādyam+devatānām -> ityādyaṃ devatānām

ityādyaṃ devatānām+bhavati -> ityādyaṃ devatānāṃ bhavati

idānīm+karmabhedais -> idānīṃ karmabhedais

idānīṃ karmabhedais+devatāsādhanam -> idānīṃ karmabhedair devatāsādhanam

idānīṃ karmabhedair devatāsādhanam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ karmabhedair devatāsādhanam ucyate---

nāgarājasādhananiyamas+|| -> nāgarājasādhananiyamaḥ||

tatas+yathābhirucitakāle -> tato yathābhirucitakāle

evam+krodhendras -> evaṃ krodhendras

evaṃ krodhendras+dhyātas -> evaṃ krodhendro dhyātas

evaṃ krodhendro dhyātas+śmaśānabhūmyām -> evaṃ krodhendro dhyātaḥ śmaśānabhūmyām

evaṃ krodhendro dhyātaḥ śmaśānabhūmyām+māsadinais -> evaṃ krodhendro dhyātaḥ śmaśānabhūmyāṃ māsadinais

evaṃ krodhendro dhyātaḥ śmaśānabhūmyāṃ māsadinais+meghavṛndam -> evaṃ krodhendro dhyātaḥ śmaśānabhūmyāṃ māsadinair meghavṛndam

evaṃ krodhendro dhyātaḥ śmaśānabhūmyāṃ māsadinair meghavṛndam+sādhayet| -> evaṃ krodhendro dhyātaḥ śmaśānabhūmyāṃ māsadinair meghavṛndaṃ sādhayet|

phaṇinas+ghanakulam -> phaṇino ghanakulam

phaṇino ghanakulam+meghavṛndam -> phaṇino ghanakulaṃ meghavṛndam

phaṇino ghanakulaṃ meghavṛndam+udarāt -> phaṇino ghanakulaṃ meghavṛndam udarāt

phaṇino ghanakulaṃ meghavṛndam udarāt+muñcatas -> phaṇino ghanakulaṃ meghavṛndam udarān muñcatas

phaṇino ghanakulaṃ meghavṛndam udarān muñcatas+vai -> phaṇino ghanakulaṃ meghavṛndam udarān muñcato vai

nāgarājās+pañca -> nāgarājāḥ pañca

evam+aṣṭau -> evam aṣṭau

sarvam+iti| -> sarvam iti|

sthitānām+lāṅgūlāgram -> sthitānāṃ lāṅgūlāgram

sthitānāṃ lāṅgūlāgram+ca -> sthitānāṃ lāṅgūlāgraṃ ca

phaṇipatimithunam+padmapatre -> phaṇipatimithunaṃ padmapatre

evam+pādābhyām -> evaṃ pādābhyām

evaṃ pādābhyām+stambhayitvā -> evaṃ pādābhyāṃ stambhayitvā

lāṅgūlāgram+ca -> lāṅgūlāgraṃ ca

pūrvottarāṇām+vijayopari -> pūrvottarāṇāṃ vijayopari

teṣām+lāṅgūlāgram -> teṣāṃ lāṅgūlāgram

teṣāṃ lāṅgūlāgram+pratyekam -> teṣāṃ lāṅgūlāgraṃ pratyekam

teṣāṃ lāṅgūlāgraṃ pratyekam+jayopari -> teṣāṃ lāṅgūlāgraṃ pratyekaṃ jayopari

pātayitvā+aparanāgarājān -> pātayitvāparanāgarājān

pātayitvāparanāgarājān+pātayitvā -> pātayitvāparanāgarājan pātayitvā

mahāmaṇibhis+sphurantau -> mahāmaṇibhiḥ sphurantau

mahāmaṇibhiḥ sphurantau+uttānakau -> mahāmaṇibhiḥ sphurantāv uttānakau

nābhyūrdhvam+puruṣākārau -> nābhyūrdhvaṃ puruṣākārau

nābhyūrdhvaṃ puruṣākārau+adhas -> nābhyūrdhvaṃ puruṣākārāv adhas

nābhyūrdhvaṃ puruṣākārāv adhas+sarpākārau -> nābhyūrdhvaṃ puruṣākārāv adhaḥ sarpākārau

pātayitvā+arkamūrdhni -> pātayitvārkamūrdhni

pātayitvārkamūrdhni+arkamaṇḍale -> pātayitvārkamūrdhny arkamaṇḍale

mahāpadmas+pūrvāgnau -> mahāpadmaḥ pūrvāgnau

takṣakas+vāyavye -> takṣako vāyavye

kulikas+paścime -> kulikaḥ paścime

śaṅkhapālas+uttare -> śaṅkhapāla uttare

śaṅkhapāla uttare+anantas -> śaṅkhapāla uttare 'nantas

śaṅkhapāla uttare 'nantas+īśāne -> śaṅkhapāla uttare 'nanta īśāne

vāsukis+nairṛtye -> vāsukir nairṛtye

padmas+dakṣiṇe -> padmo dakṣiṇe

karkoṭas+agnau -> karkoṭo 'gnau

nāgān+abjāṣṭapatreṣu -> nāgān abjāṣṭapatreṣu

nāgān abjāṣṭapatreṣu+iti -> nāgān abjāṣṭapatreṣv iti

nāgān abjāṣṭapatreṣv iti+abjapūrvapatre -> nāgān abjāṣṭapatreṣv ity abjapūrvapatre

māsadinais+evam -> māsadinair evam

māsadinair evam+itthena -> māsadinair evam itthena

katipayadivasais+iti -> katipayadivasair iti

vajravegas+krodhendras -> vajravegaḥ krodhendras

vajravegaḥ krodhendras+dhyātas -> vajravegaḥ krodhendro dhyātas

vajravegaḥ krodhendro dhyātas+san -> vajravegaḥ krodhendro dhyātaḥ san

vajravegaḥ krodhendro dhyātaḥ san+sādhayet -> vajravegaḥ krodhendro dhyātaḥ san sādhayet

vajravegaḥ krodhendro dhyātaḥ san sādhayet+meghavṛndam| -> vajravegaḥ krodhendro dhyātaḥ san sādhayen meghavṛndam|

sas+eva -> sa eva

nāgān+ityādi| -> nāgān ityādi|

dhyātas+krodhendras -> dhyātaḥ krodhendras

dhyātaḥ krodhendras+evam -> dhyātaḥ krodhendra evam

dhyātaḥ krodhendra evam+katipayadivasais -> dhyātaḥ krodhendra evaṃ katipayadivasais

dhyātaḥ krodhendra evaṃ katipayadivasais+sādhayet -> dhyātaḥ krodhendra evaṃ katipayadivasaiḥ sādhayet

dhyātaḥ krodhendra evaṃ katipayadivasaiḥ sādhayet+meghavṛndam|| -> dhyātaḥ krodhendra evaṃ katipayadivasaiḥ sādhayen meghavṛndam||

sarvam+ghanakulam -> sarvaṃ ghanakulam

sarvaṃ ghanakulam+udarāt -> sarvaṃ ghanakulam udarāt

sarvaṃ ghanakulam udarāt+muñcatas -> sarvaṃ ghanakulam udarān muñcatas

sarvaṃ ghanakulam udarān muñcatas+vai -> sarvaṃ ghanakulam udarān muñcato vai

lāṅgūlāgram+ca -> lāṅgūlāgraṃ ca

phaṇipatimithunam+padmapatre -> phaṇipatimithunaṃ padmapatre

pādābhyām+stambhayitvā -> pādābhyāṃ stambhayitvā

pātayitvā+arkamūrdhni -> pātayitvārkamūrdhni

nāgān+abjāṣṭapatreṣu -> nāgān abjāṣṭapatreṣu

nāgān abjāṣṭapatreṣu+api -> nāgān abjāṣṭapatreṣv api

nāgarājasādhanam+ucyate--- -> nāgarājasādhanam ucyate---

idānīm+meghavarṣāpaṇāya -> idānīṃ meghavarṣāpaṇāya

bhūtādusādhananiyamas+|| -> bhūtādusādhananiyamaḥ||

rākṣasādikas+iti -> rākṣasādika iti

pretas+vā -> preto vā

pātitas+san -> pātitaḥ san

pātitaḥ san+saparivāras -> pātitaḥ san saparivāras

pātitaḥ san saparivāras+siddhim -> pātitaḥ san saparivāraḥ siddhim

pātitaḥ san saparivāraḥ siddhim+gacchati| -> pātitaḥ san saparivāraḥ siddhiṃ gacchati|

bhūtādīnām+yas -> bhūtādīnāṃ yas

bhūtādīnāṃ yas+nāyakas -> bhūtādīnāṃ yo nāyakas

bhūtādīnāṃ yo nāyakas+sa -> bhūtādīnāṃ yo nāyakaḥ sa

dhyāyan+yogī -> dhyāyan yogī

dhyāyan yogī+eva -> dhyāyan yogy eva

dhyāyan yogy eva+ekamāsam -> dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsam

dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsam+citibhuvanagatam -> dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagatam

dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagatam+śmaśānabhūmigatam -> dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ śmaśānabhūmigatam

dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ śmaśānabhūmigatam+sādhayet -> dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ śmaśānabhūmigataṃ sādhayet

dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ śmaśānabhūmigataṃ sādhayet+bhūtavṛndam -> dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ śmaśānabhūmigataṃ sādhayed bhūtavṛndam

dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ śmaśānabhūmigataṃ sādhayed bhūtavṛndam+iti -> dhyāyan yogy evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ śmaśānabhūmigataṃ sādhayed bhūtavṛndam iti

ebhis+mantrapadais -> ebhir mantrapadais

ebhir mantrapadais+jaḥ -> ebhir mantrapadair jaḥ

pādābhyām+bhūtanātham -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham+aparājitapretanātham -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham+ākramitam -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam+atibalāt -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt+saṃsthitālīḍhapādam -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādam

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādam+bhūtādīn -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīn

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīn+trāsayantam -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantam

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantam+gajacarmadhṛtam -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ gajacarmadhṛtam

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ gajacarmadhṛtam+karatarjanībhyām -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ gajacarmadhṛtaṃ karatarjanībhyām

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ gajacarmadhṛtaṃ karatarjanībhyām+asuraphaṇisurān -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ gajacarmadhṛtaṃ karatarjanībhyām asuraphaṇisurān

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ gajacarmadhṛtaṃ karatarjanībhyām asuraphaṇisurān+trāsayantam -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ gajacarmadhṛtaṃ karatarjanībhyām asuraphaṇisurāṃś trāsayantam

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ gajacarmadhṛtaṃ karatarjanībhyām asuraphaṇisurāṃś trāsayantam+iti| -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanātham aparājitapretanātham ākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādaṃ bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ gajacarmadhṛtaṃ karatarjanībhyām asuraphaṇisurāṃś trāsayantam iti|

vajrāṅkuśavajravajrapāśavajravajraghaṇṭhās+yathānukrameṇa -> vajrāṅkuśavajravajrapāśavajravajraghaṇṭhā yathānukrameṇa

viśvavarṇe+ekavīram -> viśvavarṇa ekavīram

viśvavarṇa ekavīram+madhye -> viśvavarṇa ekavīraṃ madhye

sphuradamalakaram+svaccham -> sphuradamalakaraṃ svaccham

sphuradamalakaraṃ svaccham+maṇḍalagṛhe -> sphuradamalakaraṃ svacchaṃ maṇḍalagṛhe

itthaṃbhūtam+viśvābje -> itthaṃbhūtaṃ viśvābje

dhyāyan+eva -> dhyāyann eva

dhyāyann eva+ekamāsam -> dhyāyann evaikamāsam

dhyāyann evaikamāsam+citibhuvanagatam -> dhyāyann evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagatam

dhyāyann evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagatam+sādhayet -> dhyāyann evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ sādhayet

dhyāyann evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ sādhayet+bhūtavṛndam|| -> dhyāyann evaikamāsaṃ citibhuvanagataṃ sādhayed bhūtavṛndam||

bhūtādīn+trāsayantam -> bhūtādīṃś trāsayantam

bhūtādīṃś trāsayantam+hi -> bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ hi

bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ hi+asuraphaṇisurān -> bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ hy asuraphaṇisurān

bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ hy asuraphaṇisurān+jñānasattvaikabhūtam -> bhūtādīṃś trāsayantaṃ hy asuraphaṇisurāñ jñānasattvaikabhūtam

pādābhyām+bhūtanāthākramitam -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanāthākramitam

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanāthākramitam+atibalāt -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanāthākramitam atibalāt

pādābhyāṃ bhūtanāthākramitam atibalāt+saṃsthitālīḍhapādam| -> pādābhyāṃ bhūtanāthākramitam atibalāt saṃsthitālīḍhapādam|

sphuradamalakaram+maṇḍale -> sphuradamalakaraṃ maṇḍale

pañcavarṇais+kapālais -> pañcavarṇaiḥ kapālais

pañcavarṇaiḥ kapālais+|| -> pañcavarṇaiḥ kapālaiḥ||

mūrdhnas+mālānibaddham -> mūrdhno mālānibaddham

mūrdhno mālānibaddham+sakalajinakulais -> mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulais

mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulais+viśuddhais -> mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulair viśuddhais

mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulair viśuddhais+| -> mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulair viśuddhaiḥ|

bhartṛvat+śastrahastam -> bhartṛvac chastrahastam

bhartṛvac chastrahastam+kālacakravat -> bhartṛvac chastrahastaṃ kālacakravat

bhartṛvac chastrahastaṃ kālacakravat+iti| -> bhartṛvac chastrahastaṃ kālacakravad iti|

sarpālam+iti -> sarpālam iti

caturmukham+dvipādam -> caturmukhaṃ dvipādam

caturmukhaṃ dvipādam+piṅgākṣam -> caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣam

caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣam+piṅgakeśam -> caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśam

caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśam+jinapatimukuṭam -> caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭam

caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭam+iti -> caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭam iti

caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭam iti+akṣobhyamukuṭam -> caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭam ity akṣobhyamukuṭam

caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭam ity akṣobhyamukuṭam+tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrākarālam| -> caturmukhaṃ dvipādaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭam ity akṣobhyamukuṭaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrākarālam|

vedavaktram+iti -> vedavaktram iti

ṣaḍviṃśatibhujam+gajacarmapaṭadhāriṇam| -> ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ gajacarmapaṭadhāriṇam|

dvyadhikajinakaram+iti -> dvyadhikajinakaram iti

krodhendram+vajravegam -> krodhendraṃ vajravegam

krodhendraṃ vajravegam+hūṃkāravajraniṣpannam -> krodhendraṃ vajravegaṃ hūṃkāravajraniṣpannam

krodhendraṃ vajravegaṃ hūṃkāravajraniṣpannam+pūrvoktasādhanavidhinā -> krodhendraṃ vajravegaṃ hūṃkāravajraniṣpannaṃ pūrvoktasādhanavidhinā

krodhendram+ityādinā| -> krodhendram ityādinā|

mūrdhnas+mālānibaddham -> mūrdhno mālānibaddham

mūrdhno mālānibaddham+sakalajinakulais -> mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulais

mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulais+pañcavarṇais -> mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulaiḥ pañcavarṇais

mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulaiḥ pañcavarṇais+kapālais -> mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulaiḥ pañcavarṇaiḥ kapālais

mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulaiḥ pañcavarṇaiḥ kapālais+|| -> mūrdhno mālānibaddhaṃ sakalajinakulaiḥ pañcavarṇaiḥ kapālaiḥ||

sarpālam+vyāghracarmapravaranivasanam -> sarpālaṃ vyāghracarmapravaranivasanam

sarpālaṃ vyāghracarmapravaranivasanam+bhartṛvat -> sarpālaṃ vyāghracarmapravaranivasanaṃ bhartṛvat

sarpālaṃ vyāghracarmapravaranivasanaṃ bhartṛvat+śastrahastam -> sarpālaṃ vyāghracarmapravaranivasanaṃ bhartṛvac chastrahastam

piṅgākṣam+piṅgakeśam -> piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśam

piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśam+jinapatimukuṭam -> piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭam

piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭam+tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrākarālam| -> piṅgākṣaṃ piṅgakeśaṃ jinapatimukuṭaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrākarālam|

krodhendram+vāyuvegam -> krodhendraṃ vāyuvegam

krodhendraṃ vāyuvegam+dvyadhikajinakaram -> krodhendraṃ vāyuvegaṃ dvyadhikajinakaram

krodhendraṃ vāyuvegaṃ dvyadhikajinakaram+vedavaktram -> krodhendraṃ vāyuvegaṃ dvyadhikajinakaraṃ vedavaktram

krodhendraṃ vāyuvegaṃ dvyadhikajinakaraṃ vedavaktram+dvipādam -> krodhendraṃ vāyuvegaṃ dvyadhikajinakaraṃ vedavaktraṃ dvipādam

nāyakam+krodharājānām -> nāyakaṃ krodharājānām

nāyakaṃ krodharājānām+nānāsādhanam -> nāyakaṃ krodharājānāṃ nānāsādhanam

nāyakaṃ krodharājānāṃ nānāsādhanam+ucyate|| -> nāyakaṃ krodharājānāṃ nānāsādhanam ucyate||

viśvavajradharam+prabhum| -> viśvavajradharaṃ prabhum|

vajravegam+namaskṛtya -> vajravegaṃ namaskṛtya

nānāsādhanamahoddeśas+| -> nānāsādhanamahoddeśaḥ|

dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām+utpannakramasādhanamahoddeśas -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām utpannakramasādhanamahoddeśas

dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām utpannakramasādhanamahoddeśas+caturthas -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām utpannakramasādhanamahoddeśaś caturthas

dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām utpannakramasādhanamahoddeśaś caturthas+|| -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām utpannakramasādhanamahoddeśaś caturthaḥ||

śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

vaktavyas+iti|| -> vaktavya iti||

vistaras+jñānapaṭale -> vistaro jñānapaṭale

śrīmadādibuddhasādhanam+utpannakrameṇa -> śrīmadādibuddhasādhanam utpannakrameṇa

śrīmadādibuddhasādhanam utpannakrameṇa+uktam| -> śrīmadādibuddhasādhanam utpannakrameṇoktam|

niyamas+iti -> niyama iti

sādhitas+kālacakras -> sādhitaḥ kālacakras

sādhitaḥ kālacakras+samasukham -> sādhitaḥ kālacakraḥ samasukham

sādhitaḥ kālacakraḥ samasukham+dadāti -> sādhitaḥ kālacakraḥ samasukhaṃ dadāti

sādhitaḥ kālacakraḥ samasukhaṃ dadāti+iti -> sādhitaḥ kālacakraḥ samasukhaṃ dadātīti

viṣayapratibhāsas+māyāsvapnapratisenopamas -> viṣayapratibhāso māyāsvapnapratisenopamas

viṣayapratibhāso māyāsvapnapratisenopamas+| -> viṣayapratibhāso māyāsvapnapratisenopamaḥ|

viṣayais+vinā -> viṣayair vinā

madhyas+aviṣayaviṣayas -> madhyo 'viṣayaviṣayas

madhyo 'viṣayaviṣayas+iti| -> madhyo 'viṣayaviṣaya iti|

na+ādyas -> nādyas

nādyas+na -> nādyo na

nādyo na+antas -> nādyo nāntas

nādyo nāntas+na -> nādyo nānto na

śūnyas+ekas -> śūnya ekas

śūnya ekas+vimalas -> śūnya eko vimalas

śūnya eko vimalas+bhūmyādīnām -> śūnya eko vimalo bhūmyādīnām

śūnya eko vimalo bhūmyādīnām+śarīradhātūnām -> śūnya eko vimalo bhūmyādīnāṃ śarīradhātūnām

śūnya eko vimalo bhūmyādīnāṃ śarīradhātūnām+samantāt -> śūnya eko vimalo bhūmyādīnāṃ śarīradhātūnāṃ samantāt

śūnya eko vimalo bhūmyādīnāṃ śarīradhātūnāṃ samantāt+vedhakas -> śūnya eko vimalo bhūmyādīnāṃ śarīradhātūnāṃ samantād vedhakas

śūnya eko vimalo bhūmyādīnāṃ śarīradhātūnāṃ samantād vedhakas+iti| -> śūnya eko vimalo bhūmyādīnāṃ śarīradhātūnāṃ samantād vedhaka iti|

bhedakas+vedhakas -> bhedako vedhakas

bhedako vedhakas+iti -> bhedako vedhaka iti

pāṣāṇādikam+dhātukam -> pāṣāṇādikaṃ dhātukam

pāṣāṇādikaṃ dhātukam+ratnam -> pāṣāṇādikaṃ dhātukaṃ ratnam

pāṣāṇādikaṃ dhātukaṃ ratnam+karoti -> pāṣāṇādikaṃ dhātukaṃ ratnaṃ karoti

iha+amalamaṇis -> ihāmalamaṇis

ihāmalamaṇis+yathā -> ihāmalamaṇir yathā

amalamaṇinibhas+bhedakas -> amalamaṇinibho bhedakas

amalamaṇinibho bhedakas+iti| -> amalamaṇinibho bhedaka iti|

pṛthivyādīnām+dhātūnām| -> pṛthivyādīnāṃ dhātūnām|

bhūmyādīnām+iti -> bhūmyādīnām iti

paramākṣarasukham+dadāti| -> paramākṣarasukhaṃ dadāti|

samasukham+iti -> samasukham iti

vāmadakṣiṇaprāṇarodhāt+dadati -> vāmadakṣiṇaprāṇarodhād dadati

tatas+nāḍikendvarkarodhāt -> tato nāḍikendvarkarodhāt

tato nāḍikendvarkarodhāt+iti -> tato nāḍikendvarkarodhād iti

evam+vibhāvitas -> evaṃ vibhāvitas

evaṃ vibhāvitas+bimbaparyantam| -> evaṃ vibhāvito bimbaparyantam|

sas+ākāśe -> sa ākāśe

yas+prajñāpāramitāyām -> yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām

yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām+yogam -> yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam

yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam+paśyati -> yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaṃ paśyati

śūnyatākṣaradharas+bhagavān -> śūnyatākṣaradharo bhagavān

śūnyatākṣaradharo bhagavān+prajñopāyātmakas -> śūnyatākṣaradharo bhagavan prajñopāyātmakas

śūnyatākṣaradharo bhagavan prajñopāyātmakas+| -> śūnyatākṣaradharo bhagavan prajñopāyātmakaḥ|

buddhavidyādharas+mahān| -> buddhavidyādharo mahān|

viśvamāyādharas+rājā -> viśvamāyādharo rājā

anekavarṇas+anekasaṃsthānas -> anekavarṇo 'nekasaṃsthānas

bahukaracaraṇas+anekakaracaraṇas -> bahukaracaraṇo 'nekakaracaraṇas

bahukaracaraṇo 'nekakaracaraṇas+akenāstradharas -> bahukaracaraṇo 'nekakaracaraṇo 'kenāstradharas

bahukaracaraṇo 'nekakaracaraṇo 'kenāstradharas+| -> bahukaracaraṇo 'nekakaracaraṇo 'kenāstradharaḥ|

catuḥpañcādyanantamukhas+vā -> catuḥpañcādyanantamukho vā

iha+ekavaktras -> ihaikavaktras

ihaikavaktras+vā -> ihaikavaktro vā

ihaikavaktro vā+ādiśabdāt -> ihaikavaktro vādiśabdāt

ihaikavaktro vādiśabdāt+trimukhas -> ihaikavaktro vādiśabdāt trimukhas

ihaikavaktro vādiśabdāt trimukhas+vā -> ihaikavaktro vādiśabdāt trimukho vā

eka+ityādi| -> eketyādi|

madhyas+tu -> madhyas tu

madhyas tu+aviṣayaviṣayas -> madhyas tv aviṣayaviṣayas

madhyas tv aviṣayaviṣayas+sādhitas -> madhyas tv aviṣayaviṣayaḥ sādhitas

madhyas tv aviṣayaviṣayaḥ sādhitas+kālacakras -> madhyas tv aviṣayaviṣayaḥ sādhitaḥ kālacakras

madhyas tv aviṣayaviṣayaḥ sādhitaḥ kālacakras+|| -> madhyas tv aviṣayaviṣayaḥ sādhitaḥ kālacakraḥ||

na+adyas -> nādyas

nādyas+na -> nādyo na

nādyo na+antas -> nādyo nāntas

nādyo nāntas+na -> nādyo nānto na

bhūmyādīnām+samantāt -> bhūmyādīnāṃ samantāt

bhūmyādīnāṃ samantāt+amalamaṇinibhas -> bhūmyādīnāṃ samantād amalamaṇinibhas

bhūmyādīnāṃ samantād amalamaṇinibhas+bhedakas -> bhūmyādīnāṃ samantād amalamaṇinibho bhedakas

bhūmyādīnāṃ samantād amalamaṇinibho bhedakas+śūnyas -> bhūmyādīnāṃ samantād amalamaṇinibho bhedakaḥ śūnyas

bhūmyādīnāṃ samantād amalamaṇinibho bhedakaḥ śūnyas+ekas -> bhūmyādīnāṃ samantād amalamaṇinibho bhedakaḥ śūnya ekas

samasukham+nāḍikendvarkarodhāt| -> samasukhaṃ nāḍikendvarkarodhāt|

prajñopāyātmakas+vai -> prajñopāyātmako vai

ekādyānantavaktras+bahukaracaraṇas -> ekādyānantavaktro bahukaracaraṇas

ekādyānantavaktro bahukaracaraṇas+anekavarṇas -> ekādyānantavaktro bahukaracaraṇo 'nekavarṇas

ekādyānantavaktro bahukaracaraṇo 'nekavarṇas+tamonte -> ekādyānantavaktro bahukaracaraṇo 'nekavarṇas tamonte

idānīm+viśvarūpabhāvanā -> idānīṃ viśvarūpabhāvanā

idānīṃ viśvarūpabhāvanā+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ viśvarūpabhāvanocyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

samasukhaphaladais+akṣarasukhaphaladais -> samasukhaphaladair akṣarasukhaphaladais

samasukhaphaladair akṣarasukhaphaladais+candrasūryapracārais -> samasukhaphaladair akṣarasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracārais

samasukhaphaladair akṣarasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracārais+śvāsaniśvāsarodhais -> samasukhaphaladair akṣarasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracāraiḥ śvāsaniśvāsarodhais

samasukhaphaladair akṣarasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracāraiḥ śvāsaniśvāsarodhais+bhāvanīyas -> samasukhaphaladair akṣarasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracāraiḥ śvāsaniśvāsarodhair bhāvanīyas

samasukhaphaladair akṣarasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracāraiḥ śvāsaniśvāsarodhair bhāvanīyas+iti -> samasukhaphaladair akṣarasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracāraiḥ śvāsaniśvāsarodhair bhāvanīya iti

evam+uktais -> evam uktais

evam uktais+prajñopāyāṅgabhāvais -> evam uktaiḥ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvais

evam uktaiḥ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvais+| -> evam uktaiḥ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ|

bhagavān+iva -> bhagavān iva

bhagavān iva+ābharaṇabhūṣitā -> bhagavān ivābharaṇabhūṣitā

bhagavān ivābharaṇabhūṣitā+iti| -> bhagavān ivābharaṇabhūṣiteti|

pakṣabhedais+dvibhujās -> pakṣabhedair dvibhujās

pakṣabhedair dvibhujās+viśvamātā -> pakṣabhedair dvibhujā viśvamātā

pakṣabhedair dvibhujā viśvamātā+iti| -> pakṣabhedair dvibhujā viśvamāteti|

kāyabhedais+sūryasya -> kāyabhedaiḥ sūryasya

kāyabhedaiḥ sūryasya+ekarāśis -> kāyabhedaiḥ sūryasyaikarāśis

kāyabhedaiḥ sūryasyaikarāśis+| -> kāyabhedaiḥ sūryasyaikarāśiḥ|

tathā+eva -> tathaiva

candrarāśipakṣabhedais+ṣaḍviṃśatibhis -> candrarāśipakṣabhedaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhis

candrarāśipakṣabhedaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhis+ṣaḍviṃśatibhujas -> candrarāśipakṣabhedaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujas

candrarāśipakṣabhedaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujas+jinapatis -> candrarāśipakṣabhedaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujo jinapatis

candrarāśipakṣabhedaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujo jinapatis+bhavati| -> candrarāśipakṣabhedaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujo jinapatir bhavati|

tasmāt+kāyaprabhedais -> tasmāt kāyaprabhedais

tasmāt kāyaprabhedais+iti -> tasmāt kāyaprabhedair iti

śrī+iti -> śrīti

savye+avasavye -> savye 'vasavye

tasmin+karakamale -> tasmin karakamale

yamakarakamalam+hastadvayakamalam| -> yamakarakamalaṃ hastadvayakamalam|

mātus+tatra -> mātus tatra

mātus tatra+ekavaktram -> mātus tatraikavaktram

mātus tatraikavaktram+māsaśuddhyā| -> mātus tatraikavaktraṃ māsaśuddhyā|

sūryas+ekarāśim -> sūrya ekarāśim

sūrya ekarāśim+carati| -> sūrya ekarāśiṃ carati|

māsam+pratitrayodaśarāśīn -> māsaṃ pratitrayodaśarāśīn

māsaṃ pratitrayodaśarāśīn+carati| -> māsaṃ pratitrayodaśarāśīṃś carati|

candras+sūryacārāt -> candraḥ sūryacārāt

candraḥ sūryacārāt+dvādaśādhikyam -> candraḥ sūryacārād dvādaśādhikyam

candraḥ sūryacārād dvādaśādhikyam+ekam -> candraḥ sūryacārād dvādaśādhikyam ekam

candraḥ sūryacārād dvādaśādhikyam ekam+cāram -> candraḥ sūryacārād dvādaśādhikyam ekaṃ cāram

candraḥ sūryacārād dvādaśādhikyam ekaṃ cāram+yāvat -> candraḥ sūryacārād dvādaśādhikyam ekaṃ cāraṃ yāvat

candraḥ sūryacārād dvādaśādhikyam ekaṃ cāraṃ yāvat+carati -> candraḥ sūryacārād dvādaśādhikyam ekaṃ cāraṃ yāvac carati

candras+upāyas -> candra upāyas

candra upāyas+| -> candra upāyaḥ|

sūryas+prajñā -> sūryaḥ prajñā

mātus+ityādi| -> mātur ityādi|

prajñopāyāṅgabhāvais+samasukhaphaladais -> prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samasukhaphaladais

prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samasukhaphaladais+candrasūryapracārais -> prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracārais

prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracārais+|| -> prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samasukhaphaladaiś candrasūryapracāraiḥ||

tathā+evā -> tathaivā

jinapatis+viśvamātā -> jinapatir viśvamātā

tasmāt+kāyaprabhedais -> tasmāt kāyaprabhedais

tasmāt kāyaprabhedais+bhavati -> tasmāt kāyaprabhedair bhavati

gativaśāt+dvādaśādhikyam -> gativaśād dvādaśādhikyam

gativaśād dvādaśādhikyam+ekam| -> gativaśād dvādaśādhikyam ekam|

sūryāt+indus -> sūryād indus

sūryād indus+svacāram -> sūryād induḥ svacāram

sūryād induḥ svacāram+carati -> sūryād induḥ svacāraṃ carati

mātus+trailokavaktram -> mātus trailokavaktram

mātus trailokavaktram+yamakarakamale -> mātus trailokavaktraṃ yamakarakamale

prajñāyās+lakṣaṇam -> prajñāyā lakṣaṇam

prajñāyā lakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> prajñāyā lakṣaṇam ucyate---

idānīm+tasya -> idānīṃ tasya

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

durdāntavaineyārtham+iti -> durdāntavaineyārtham iti

parārtham+iti -> parārtham iti

kālacakravat+praharaṇas -> kālacakravat praharaṇas

kālacakravat praharaṇas+muṇḍakapālamālādharas -> kālacakravat praharaṇo muṇḍakapālamālādharas

kālacakravat praharaṇo muṇḍakapālamālādharas+vyāghracarmanivasanas -> kālacakravat praharaṇo muṇḍakapālamālādharo vyāghracarmanivasanas

kālacakravat praharaṇo muṇḍakapālamālādharo vyāghracarmanivasanas+asthimudrānāgendrabhūṣaṇas -> kālacakravat praharaṇo muṇḍakapālamālādharo vyāghracarmanivasano 'sthimudrānāgendrabhūṣaṇas

kālacakravat praharaṇo muṇḍakapālamālādharo vyāghracarmanivasano 'sthimudrānāgendrabhūṣaṇas+bhāvanīyas -> kālacakravat praharaṇo muṇḍakapālamālādharo vyāghracarmanivasano 'sthimudrānāgendrabhūṣaṇo bhāvanīyas

kālacakravat praharaṇo muṇḍakapālamālādharo vyāghracarmanivasano 'sthimudrānāgendrabhūṣaṇo bhāvanīyas+| -> kālacakravat praharaṇo muṇḍakapālamālādharo vyāghracarmanivasano 'sthimudrānāgendrabhūṣaṇo bhāvanīyaḥ|

ṣaḍviṃśatikaras+| -> ṣaḍviṃśatikaraḥ|

evam+lavamātrāvaraṇais -> evaṃ lavamātrāvaraṇais

evaṃ lavamātrāvaraṇais+dvyadhikajinakaras -> evaṃ lavamātrāvaraṇair dvyadhikajinakaras

evaṃ lavamātrāvaraṇair dvyadhikajinakaras+iti -> evaṃ lavamātrāvaraṇair dvyadhikajinakara iti

patitam+tena -> patitaṃ tena

nirdagdham+yat -> nirdagdhaṃ yat

nirdagdhaṃ yat+tat -> nirdagdhaṃ yat tat

nirdagdhaṃ yat tat+pretam -> nirdagdhaṃ yat tat pretam

nirdagdhaṃ yat tat pretam+tasya -> nirdagdhaṃ yat tat pretaṃ tasya

nirdagdhaṃ yat tat pretaṃ tasya+aṅghritale -> nirdagdhaṃ yat tat pretaṃ tasyāṅghritale

kleśamārakṣayāt+lavamātram -> kleśamārakṣayāl lavamātram

kleśamārakṣayāl lavamātram+kleśāvaraṇam -> kleśamārakṣayāl lavamātraṃ kleśāvaraṇam

kleśamārakṣayāl lavamātraṃ kleśāvaraṇam+na -> kleśamārakṣayāl lavamātraṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ na

kleśāriṣṭāṅghripātī+iti -> kleśāriṣṭāṅghripātīti

mṛtyumārāsyahastas+| -> mṛtyumārāsyahastaḥ|

mṛtyumārakṣayāt+lavamātrāvaraṇam -> mṛtyumārakṣayāl lavamātrāvaraṇam

mṛtyumārakṣayāl lavamātrāvaraṇam+āsyam -> mṛtyumārakṣayāl lavamātrāvaraṇam āsyam

mṛtyumārakṣayāl lavamātrāvaraṇam āsyam+haste -> mṛtyumārakṣayāl lavamātrāvaraṇam āsyaṃ haste

mṛtyumārāsyahastas+iti| -> mṛtyumārāsyahasta iti|

daityendrāsṛkkapālapravarakaratalas+iti| -> daityendrāsṛkkapālapravarakaratala iti|

rudhiram+tat -> rudhiraṃ tat

rudhiraṃ tat+asṛkkapālam -> rudhiraṃ tad asṛkkapālam

rudhiraṃ tad asṛkkapālam+yasya -> rudhiraṃ tad asṛkkapālaṃ yasya

kṣayāt+lavamātram -> kṣayāl lavamātram

kṣayāl lavamātram+kapāle -> kṣayāl lavamātraṃ kapāle

asṛk+iti| -> asṛg iti|

devaputramāras+tasya -> devaputramāras tasya

devaputramāras tasya+avidyāpravṛttis -> devaputramāras tasyāvidyāpravṛttis

devaputramāras tasyāvidyāpravṛttis+iti| -> devaputramāras tasyāvidyāpravṛttir iti|

daityendras+iti -> daityendra iti

śiras+vāmabhāge -> śiro vāmabhāge

skandhamārebham+aṅghriyugmāt -> skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmāt

skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmāt+dhṛtam -> skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmād dhṛtam

skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmād dhṛtam+aṅghriyugmam -> skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmād dhṛtam aṅghriyugmam

skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmād dhṛtam aṅghriyugmam+lambamānam -> skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmād dhṛtam aṅghriyugmaṃ lambamānam

skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmād dhṛtam aṅghriyugmaṃ lambamānam+gajacarmapaṭam -> skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmād dhṛtam aṅghriyugmaṃ lambamānaṃ gajacarmapaṭam

skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmād dhṛtam aṅghriyugmaṃ lambamānaṃ gajacarmapaṭam+iti -> skandhamārebham aṅghriyugmād dhṛtam aṅghriyugmaṃ lambamānaṃ gajacarmapaṭam iti

tat+eva -> tad eva

tad eva+uddhṛtam -> tad evoddhṛtam

tad evoddhṛtam+sakalam -> tad evoddhṛtaṃ sakalam

tad evoddhṛtaṃ sakalam+pāṭayitvā -> tad evoddhṛtaṃ sakalaṃ pāṭayitvā

kṣayāt+lavamātratā -> kṣayāl lavamātratā

skandhamāras+iva -> skandhamāra iva

skandhamāra iva+ibhas -> skandhamāra ivebhas

skandhamāra ivebhas+tasya -> skandhamāra ivebhas tasya

skandhāriṣṭebhas+iti| -> skandhāriṣṭebha iti|

kṛṣṇapītābhyām+savyetarābhyām| -> kṛṣṇapītābhyāṃ savyetarābhyām|

tābhyām+bhujābhyām -> tābhyāṃ bhujābhyām

tābhyāṃ bhujābhyām+maṇikanakanibhāsyām -> tābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ maṇikanakanibhāsyām

tābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ maṇikanakanibhāsyām+iti -> tābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ maṇikanakanibhāsyām iti

atas+pakṣādhikyodbhavau -> ataḥ pakṣādhikyodbhavau

pakṣais+ṣaḍviṃśatibhis -> pakṣaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhis

pakṣaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhis+bhujaviśuddhis -> pakṣaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhir bhujaviśuddhis

pakṣaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhir bhujaviśuddhis+| -> pakṣaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatibhir bhujaviśuddhiḥ|

sahitam+yat -> sahitaṃ yat

sahitaṃ yat+varṣam -> sahitaṃ yad varṣam

sahitaṃ yad varṣam+trayodaśamāsātmakam| -> sahitaṃ yad varṣaṃ trayodaśamāsātmakam|

punar+gajacarmapaṭārdradhāriṇas -> punar gajacarmapaṭārdradhāriṇas

punar gajacarmapaṭārdradhāriṇas+adhikamāsena -> punar gajacarmapaṭārdradhāriṇo 'dhikamāsena

siddhas+| -> siddhaḥ|

caturviṃśatipakṣais+caturviṃśatikaras -> caturviṃśatipakṣaiś caturviṃśatikaras

caturviṃśatipakṣaiś caturviṃśatikaras+vajramālādharas -> caturviṃśatipakṣaiś caturviṃśatikaro vajramālādharas

caturviṃśatipakṣaiś caturviṃśatikaro vajramālādharas+śrīmān -> caturviṃśatipakṣaiś caturviṃśatikaro vajramālādharaḥ śrīmān

caturviṃśatipakṣaiś caturviṃśatikaro vajramālādharaḥ śrīmān+iti -> caturviṃśatipakṣaiś caturviṃśatikaro vajramālādharaḥ śrīmān iti

pakṣa+ityādi| -> pakṣetyādi|

dvyadhikajinakaras+bhāvanīyas -> dvyadhikajinakaro bhāvanīyas

dvyadhikajinakaro bhāvanīyas+parārtham|| -> dvyadhikajinakaro bhāvanīyaḥ parārtham||

daityendrāsṛkkapālapravarakaratalas+mṛtyumārāsyahastas -> daityendrāsṛkkapālapravarakaratalo mṛtyumārāsyahastas

sakalam+pāṭayitvā -> sakalaṃ pāṭayitvā

sakalaṃ pāṭayitvā+aṅghriyugmāt| -> sakalaṃ pāṭayitvāṅghriyugmāt|

skandhāriṣṭebhacarmoddhṛtam+api -> skandhāriṣṭebhacarmoddhṛtam api

pakṣādhikyodbhavābhyām+maṇikanakanibhābhyām -> pakṣādhikyodbhavābhyāṃ maṇikanakanibhābhyām

pakṣādhikyodbhavābhyāṃ maṇikanakanibhābhyām+ca -> pakṣādhikyodbhavābhyāṃ maṇikanakanibhābhyāṃ ca

gajacarmapaṭārdradhṛgbhāvanā+ucyate--- -> gajacarmapaṭārdradhṛgbhāvanocyate---

idānīm+durdāntadamanāya -> idānīṃ durdāntadamanāya

nānāvidhānais+iti -> nānāvidhānair iti

nānāvidhānair iti+arthas -> nānāvidhānair ity arthas

nānāvidhānair ity arthas+|| -> nānāvidhānair ity arthaḥ||

karmabhedais+anekais -> karmabhedair anekais

karmabhedair anekais+iti -> karmabhedair anekair iti

toyādimaṇḍalastham+vajracatuṣṭayam -> toyādimaṇḍalasthaṃ vajracatuṣṭayam

toyādimaṇḍalasthaṃ vajracatuṣṭayam+sādhayet -> toyādimaṇḍalasthaṃ vajracatuṣṭayaṃ sādhayet

toyādimaṇḍalasthaṃ vajracatuṣṭayaṃ sādhayet+tribhuvananilaye -> toyādimaṇḍalasthaṃ vajracatuṣṭayaṃ sādhayet tribhuvananilaye

evam+bhūtānām -> evaṃ bhūtānām

evaṃ bhūtānām+maṇḍalastham -> evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastham

evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastham+iti -> evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastham iti

śāntyādikam+karoti| -> śāntyādikaṃ karoti|

kurute+iti| -> kuruta iti|

dhyātam+japtam -> dhyātaṃ japtam

dhyātaṃ japtam+tathā -> dhyātaṃ japtaṃ tathā

dhyātaṃ japtaṃ tathā+eva -> dhyātaṃ japtaṃ tathaiva

vistāritam+iti| -> vistāritam iti|

na+atra -> nātra

kulam+sādhayet -> kulaṃ sādhayet

kulaṃ sādhayet+vakṣyamāṇam -> kulaṃ sādhayed vakṣyamāṇam

kulaṃ sādhayed vakṣyamāṇam+gāruḍe -> kulaṃ sādhayed vakṣyamāṇaṃ gāruḍe

daityabhujagānām+kulam -> daityabhujagānāṃ kulam

daityabhujagānāṃ kulam+aṣṭavidham -> daityabhujagānāṃ kulam aṣṭavidham

daityabhujagānāṃ kulam aṣṭavidham+tat -> daityabhujagānāṃ kulam aṣṭavidhaṃ tat

daityabhujagānāṃ kulam aṣṭavidhaṃ tat+eva -> daityabhujagānāṃ kulam aṣṭavidhaṃ tad eva

evam+bhūtānām -> evaṃ bhūtānām

evaṃ bhūtānām+maṇḍalasthas -> evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalasthas

evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalasthas+danubhujagakulam -> evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulam

evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulam+sādhayet -> evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayet

evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayet+bhāvitas -> evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayed bhāvitas

evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayed bhāvitas+asau -> evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayed bhāvito 'sau

evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayed bhāvito 'sau+iti| -> evaṃ bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayed bhāvito 'sāv iti|

cittavajranāyakas+iti| -> cittavajranāyaka iti|

vidveṣam+ca -> vidveṣaṃ ca

kṛṣṇas+māraṇam -> kṛṣṇo māraṇam

kṛṣṇo māraṇam+uccāṭanam -> kṛṣṇo māraṇam uccāṭanam

kṛṣṇo māraṇam uccāṭanam+ca -> kṛṣṇo māraṇam uccāṭanaṃ ca

nābhisthas+dhyātas -> nābhistho dhyātas

nābhistho dhyātas+jñānavajranāyakas -> nābhistho dhyāto jñānavajranāyakas

nābhistho dhyāto jñānavajranāyakas+iti| -> nābhistho dhyāto jñānavajranāyaka iti|

pītas+stambhanam -> pītaḥ stambhanam

pītaḥ stambhanam+mohanam -> pītaḥ stambhanaṃ mohanam

pītaḥ stambhanaṃ mohanam+ca -> pītaḥ stambhanaṃ mohanaṃ ca

dhyātas+san| -> dhyātaḥ san|

kaṇṭhasthas+manasi -> kaṇṭhastho manasi

vāgvajranāyakas+sūryamaṇḍale -> vāgvajranāyakaḥ sūryamaṇḍale

rakas+ākṛṣṭim -> raka ākṛṣṭim

raka ākṛṣṭim+vaśyam -> raka ākṛṣṭiṃ vaśyam

raka ākṛṣṭiṃ vaśyam+ca -> raka ākṛṣṭiṃ vaśyaṃ ca

śvetas+śāntim -> śvetaḥ śāntim

śvetaḥ śāntim+puṣṭim -> śvetaḥ śāntiṃ puṣṭim

śvetaḥ śāntiṃ puṣṭim+ca -> śvetaḥ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ ca

lalāṭasthas+| -> lalāṭasthaḥ|

śuklavarṇas+bhāvanīyas -> śuklavarṇo bhāvanīyas

śuklavarṇo bhāvanīyas+candramaṇḍale -> śuklavarṇo bhāvanīyaś candramaṇḍale

kāyavaktranāyakam+kṛtvā -> kāyavaktranāyakaṃ kṛtvā

śāntim+karoti -> śāntiṃ karoti

vaktrādibhedais+śāntyādikam -> vaktrādibhedaiḥ śāntyādikam

vaktrādibhedaiḥ śāntyādikam+bhavati| -> vaktrādibhedaiḥ śāntyādikaṃ bhavati|

pañcātmakas+vā -> pañcātmako vā

prajñopāyātmakas+vā -> prajñopāyātmako vā

kālacakras+bhagavān -> kālacakro bhagavān

kālacakro bhagavān+ekavīras -> kālacakro bhagavān ekavīras

kālacakro bhagavān ekavīras+vā -> kālacakro bhagavān ekavīro vā

śvetas+ityādi| -> śveta ityādi|

sādhayet+karmabhedais -> sādhayet karmabhedais

sādhayet karmabhedais+|| -> sādhayet karmabhedaiḥ||

bhūtānām+maṇḍalastham -> bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastham

bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastham+tribhuvananilaye -> bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalasthaṃ tribhuvananilaye

dhyātam+japtam -> dhyātaṃ japtam

dhyātaṃ japtam+tathā -> dhyātaṃ japtaṃ tathā

dhyātaṃ japtaṃ tathā+eva -> dhyātaṃ japtaṃ tathaiva

moham+kaṣaṇaghananibham -> mohaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibham

mohaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibham+kāraṇoccāṭanam -> mohaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhaṃ kāraṇoccāṭanam

mohaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhaṃ kāraṇoccāṭanam+ca| -> mohaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhaṃ kāraṇoccāṭanaṃ ca|

pītas+stambham -> pītaḥ stambham

pītaḥ stambham+ca -> pītaḥ stambhaṃ ca

raktas+ākṛṣṭivaśyam -> rakta ākṛṣṭivaśyam

puṣṭim+svamanasi -> puṣṭiṃ svamanasi

śvetas+śāntim -> śvetaḥ śāntim

śvetaḥ śāntim+ca -> śvetaḥ śāntiṃ ca

idānīm+śāntyādyartham -> idānīṃ śāntyādyartham

idānīṃ śāntyādyartham+devatābhāvanā -> idānīṃ śāntyādyarthaṃ devatābhāvanā

idānīṃ śāntyādyarthaṃ devatābhāvanā+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ śāntyādyarthaṃ devatābhāvanocyate---

vistāritam+iti|| -> vistāritam iti||

tena+atra -> tenātra

pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatavṛttāt+vṛttacatuṣṭayam -> pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatavṛttād vṛttacatuṣṭayam

pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatavṛttād vṛttacatuṣṭayam+subodham| -> pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatavṛttād vṛttacatuṣṭayaṃ subodham|

bhūtānām+maṇḍalasthas -> bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalasthas

bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalasthas+danubhujagakulam -> bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulam

bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulam+sādhayet -> bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayet

bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayet+bhāvitas -> bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayed bhāvitas

bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayed bhāvitas+asau|| -> bhūtānāṃ maṇḍalastho danubhujagakulaṃ sādhayed bhāvito 'sau||

vaśyam+bhuvananidhanatām -> vaśyaṃ bhuvananidhanatām

vaśyaṃ bhuvananidhanatām+vaktrabhedais -> vaśyaṃ bhuvananidhanatāṃ vaktrabhedais

vaśyaṃ bhuvananidhanatāṃ vaktrabhedais+karoti -> vaśyaṃ bhuvananidhanatāṃ vaktrabhedaiḥ karoti

stambham+śāntim -> stambhaṃ śāntim

stambhaṃ śāntim+ca -> stambhaṃ śāntiṃ ca

katipayadivasais+siddhayas -> katipayadivasaiḥ siddhayas

katipayadivasaiḥ siddhayas+sambhavanti| -> katipayadivasaiḥ siddhayaḥ sambhavanti|

mudrādayas+vai -> mudrādayo vai

tasyās+sattvārtham -> tasyāḥ sattvārtham

tasyāḥ sattvārtham+ṛddhis -> tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhis

tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhis+bhavanidhanam -> tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhir bhavanidhanam

tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhir bhavanidhanam+ajaprāptis -> tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhir bhavanidhanam ajaprāptis

tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhir bhavanidhanam ajaprāptis+anyās -> tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhir bhavanidhanam ajaprāptir anyās

tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhir bhavanidhanam ajaprāptir anyās+catasras -> tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhir bhavanidhanam ajaprāptir anyāś catasras

tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhir bhavanidhanam ajaprāptir anyāś catasras+|| -> tasyāḥ sattvārtham ṛddhir bhavanidhanam ajaprāptir anyāś catasraḥ||

cittam+sahajasukhagatam -> cittaṃ sahajasukhagatam

cittaṃ sahajasukhagatam+sarvagā -> cittaṃ sahajasukhagataṃ sarvagā

dhyānam+prajñā -> dhyānaṃ prajñā

kṣāntis+śabdādyaveśas -> kṣāntiḥ śabdādyaveśas

kṣāntiḥ śabdādyaveśas+hi -> kṣāntiḥ śabdādyaveśo hi

kṣāntiḥ śabdādyaveśo hi+ubhayagativināśas -> kṣāntiḥ śabdādyaveśo hy ubhayagativināśas

kṣāntiḥ śabdādyaveśo hy ubhayagativināśas+anilasya -> kṣāntiḥ śabdādyaveśo hy ubhayagativināśo 'nilasya

kṣāntiḥ śabdādyaveśo hy ubhayagativināśo 'nilasya+eva -> kṣāntiḥ śabdādyaveśo hy ubhayagativināśo 'nilasyaiva

manasas+strīprasaṅgāt -> manasaḥ strīprasaṅgāt

manasaḥ strīprasaṅgāt+ca -> manasaḥ strīprasaṅgāc ca

dānam+tyāgas -> dānaṃ tyāgas

dānaṃ tyāgas+dhanasya -> dānaṃ tyāgo dhanasya

dānaṃ tyāgo dhanasya+acyutis -> dānaṃ tyāgo dhanasyācyutis

dānaṃ tyāgo dhanasyācyutis+api -> dānaṃ tyāgo dhanasyācyutir api

cittapraveśāt+samarasakaraṇam -> cittapraveśāt samarasakaraṇam

cittapraveśāt samarasakaraṇam+maithunam -> cittapraveśāt samarasakaraṇaṃ maithunam

cittapraveśāt samarasakaraṇaṃ maithunam+tat -> cittapraveśāt samarasakaraṇaṃ maithunaṃ tat

cittapraveśāt samarasakaraṇaṃ maithunaṃ tat+na -> cittapraveśāt samarasakaraṇaṃ maithunaṃ tan na

pañcāmṛtānām+svakulabhuvigatais -> pañcāmṛtānāṃ svakulabhuvigatais

pañcāmṛtānāṃ svakulabhuvigatais+devatais -> pañcāmṛtānāṃ svakulabhuvigatair devatais

pañcāmṛtānāṃ svakulabhuvigatair devatais+śuddhikāye -> pañcāmṛtānāṃ svakulabhuvigatair devataiḥ śuddhikāye

gokvādyam+cakṣurādes -> gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādes

gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādes+sphuraṇam -> gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādeḥ sphuraṇam

gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādeḥ sphuraṇam+anudinam -> gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādeḥ sphuraṇam anudinam

gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādeḥ sphuraṇam anudinam+na -> gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādeḥ sphuraṇam anudinaṃ na

gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādeḥ sphuraṇam anudinaṃ na+anyamāṃsam -> gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādeḥ sphuraṇam anudinaṃ nānyamāṃsam

gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādeḥ sphuraṇam anudinaṃ nānyamāṃsam+kadācit| -> gokvādyaṃ cakṣurādeḥ sphuraṇam anudinaṃ nānyamāṃsaṃ kadācit|

dinaniśam+māmakī -> dinaniśaṃ māmakī

bindos+śvetadhārā -> bindoḥ śvetadhārā

kāmas+|| -> kāmaḥ||

prakaṭitaniyatās+kas -> prakaṭitaniyatāḥ kas

prakaṭitaniyatāḥ kas+jinas -> prakaṭitaniyatāḥ ko jinas

prakaṭitaniyatāḥ ko jinas+kas -> prakaṭitaniyatāḥ ko jinaḥ kas

prakaṭitaniyatāḥ ko jinaḥ kas+sa -> prakaṭitaniyatāḥ ko jinaḥ kaḥ sa

tās+manmathasya -> tā manmathasya

dhūmādyās+vajriṇas -> dhūmādyā vajriṇas

dhūmādyā vajriṇas+tās -> dhūmādyā vajriṇas tās

dhūmādyā vajriṇas tās+prakaṭadaśavidhās -> dhūmādyā vajriṇas tāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhās

dhūmādyā vajriṇas tāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhās+prāṇinas -> dhūmādyā vajriṇas tāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhāḥ prāṇinas

dhūmādyā vajriṇas tāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhāḥ prāṇinas+aṅgeṣu -> dhūmādyā vajriṇas tāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhāḥ prāṇino 'ṅgeṣu

dhūmādyā vajriṇas tāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhāḥ prāṇino 'ṅgeṣu+avasthās -> dhūmādyā vajriṇas tāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhāḥ prāṇino 'ṅgeṣv avasthās

manasas+vibhramas -> manaso vibhramas

manaso vibhramas+tīvramūrcchā| -> manaso vibhramas tīvramūrcchā|

kamponmādas+ca -> kamponmādaś ca

jvaras+aṅge -> jvaro 'ṅge

nārīcaryāniyamas+|| -> nārīcaryāniyamaḥ||

niyamas+mūlatantre| -> niyamo mūlatantre|

nāḍīsaṃcāras+iti -> nāḍīsaṃcāra iti

nāḍīsaṃcāra iti+ūrdhvaretasas -> nāḍīsaṃcāra ity ūrdhvaretasas

nāḍīsaṃcāra ity ūrdhvaretasas+gamanam -> nāḍīsaṃcāra ity ūrdhvaretaso gamanam

nāḍīsaṃcāra ity ūrdhvaretaso gamanam+kartavyam -> nāḍīsaṃcāra ity ūrdhvaretaso gamanaṃ kartavyam

nāḍīsaṃcāra ity ūrdhvaretaso gamanaṃ kartavyam+iti -> nāḍīsaṃcāra ity ūrdhvaretaso gamanaṃ kartavyam iti

kas+asau -> ko 'sau

kartavyam+iti| -> kartavyam iti|

tathā+anena -> tathānena

manthānam+brahmacaryam| -> manthānaṃ brahmacaryam|

punas+pañcatathāgatakulanārīṇām -> punaḥ pañcatathāgatakulanārīṇām

punaḥ pañcatathāgatakulanārīṇām+grahaṇam -> punaḥ pañcatathāgatakulanārīṇāṃ grahaṇam

punaḥ pañcatathāgatakulanārīṇāṃ grahaṇam+nārīcaryā -> punaḥ pañcatathāgatakulanārīṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ nārīcaryā

dātrī+iṣṭapradā -> dātrīṣṭapradā

dātrīṣṭapradā+iti -> dātrīṣṭapradeti

sā+iṣṭasiddhis -> seṣṭasiddhis

seṣṭasiddhis+mahāmudrāsiddhis -> seṣṭasiddhir mahāmudrāsiddhis

seṣṭasiddhir mahāmudrāsiddhis+tasyās -> seṣṭasiddhir mahāmudrāsiddhis tasyās

seṣṭasiddhir mahāmudrāsiddhis tasyās+prakarṣeṇa -> seṣṭasiddhir mahāmudrāsiddhis tasyāḥ prakarṣeṇa

guhyādikamaleṣu+adhogamanāt -> guhyādikamaleṣv adhogamanāt

guhyādikamaleṣv adhogamanāt+ūrdhvagamanam -> guhyādikamaleṣv adhogamanād ūrdhvagamanam

guhyādikamaleṣv adhogamanād ūrdhvagamanam+nāma -> guhyādikamaleṣv adhogamanād ūrdhvagamanaṃ nāma

sarvakālam+madhyamāpravāhena -> sarvakālaṃ madhyamāpravāhena

yā+iti| -> yeti|

pratidinasamaye+iṣṭasiddhipradā -> pratidinasamaya iṣṭasiddhipradā

yoginas+vai -> yogino vai

dakṣiṇapādāṅgulīnakhāntam+yāvat -> dakṣiṇapādāṅgulīnakhāntaṃ yāvat

dakṣiṇapādāṅgulīnakhāntaṃ yāvat+amāntam -> dakṣiṇapādāṅgulīnakhāntaṃ yāvad amāntam

dakṣiṇapādāṅgulīnakhāntaṃ yāvad amāntam+bodhicittasya -> dakṣiṇapādāṅgulīnakhāntaṃ yāvad amāntaṃ bodhicittasya

śeṣam+vāmavat -> śeṣaṃ vāmavat

śeṣaṃ vāmavat+vilomena -> śeṣaṃ vāmavad vilomena

punas+kṛṣṇapratipat -> punaḥ kṛṣṇapratipat

punaḥ kṛṣṇapratipat+lalāṭe -> punaḥ kṛṣṇapratipal lalāṭe

pūrṇāntam+uṣṇīṣe -> pūrṇāntam uṣṇīṣe

tatra+āha---prathamas -> tatrāha---prathamas

tatrāha---prathamas+tithis -> tatrāha---prathamas tithis

tatrāha---prathamas tithis+prathamāṅgulīparve -> tatrāha---prathamas tithiḥ prathamāṅgulīparve

pūrvavat+iti| -> pūrvavad iti|

veditavyam+punar -> veditavyaṃ punar

veditavyaṃ punar+aparamāse -> veditavyaṃ punar aparamāse

bodhicittam+pādāṅguṣṭhe -> bodhicittaṃ pādāṅguṣṭhe

evam+kṛṣṇapakṣāvasāne -> evaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣāvasāne

punar+idam -> punar idam

punar idam+kṛṣṇapakṣatithivaśāt -> punar idaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣatithivaśāt

punar idaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣatithivaśāt+yāvat -> punar idaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣatithivaśād yāvat

punar idaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣatithivaśād yāvat+kṛṣṇapakṣāvasānam -> punar idaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣatithivaśād yāvat kṛṣṇapakṣāvasānam

punar idaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣatithivaśād yāvat kṛṣṇapakṣāvasānam+amāntam| -> punar idaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣatithivaśād yāvat kṛṣṇapakṣāvasānam amāntam|

punar+uṣṇīṣāt -> punar uṣṇīṣāt

punar uṣṇīṣāt+dakṣiṇapādāṅgulīṣu -> punar uṣṇīṣād dakṣiṇapādāṅgulīṣu

tithivaśāt+iti| -> tithivaśād iti|

bodhicittam+vrajati -> bodhicittaṃ vrajati

svacittam+iti -> svacittam iti

vāmapādāṅguṣṭhāt+pratipadādivṛddhyā -> vāmapādāṅguṣṭhāt pratipadādivṛddhyā

uṣṇīṣe+aṅguṣṭhaparvāt -> uṣṇīṣe 'ṅguṣṭhaparvāt

uṣṇīṣe 'ṅguṣṭhaparvāt+iti| -> uṣṇīṣe 'ṅguṣṭhaparvād iti|

bāhyadevatānām+balyartham -> bāhyadevatānāṃ balyartham

bāhyadevatānāṃ balyartham+uktam -> bāhyadevatānāṃ balyartham uktam

bāhyadevatānāṃ balyartham uktam+iti| -> bāhyadevatānāṃ balyartham uktam iti|

punas+sekādikāle -> punaḥ sekādikāle

dravam+bindurūpam -> dravaṃ bindurūpam

dravaṃ bindurūpam+pānakam -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakam

dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakam+kuliśamukhena -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhena

dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhena+ūrdhvatas -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvatas

dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvatas+yat -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat

dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat+tat -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat

dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat+sahajānandajanakam -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat sahajānandajanakam

dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat sahajānandajanakam+madyapānam -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat sahajānandajanakaṃ madyapānam

dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat sahajānandajanakaṃ madyapānam+yoginām -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat sahajānandajanakaṃ madyapānaṃ yoginām

dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat sahajānandajanakaṃ madyapānaṃ yoginām+uktam -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat sahajānandajanakaṃ madyapānaṃ yoginām uktam

dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat sahajānandajanakaṃ madyapānaṃ yoginām uktam+iti| -> dravaṃ bindurūpaṃ pānakaṃ kuliśamukhenordhvato yat tat sahajānandajanakaṃ madyapānaṃ yoginām uktam iti|

śaśinas+iti -> śaśina iti

dravam+api -> dravam api

prāṇāyāmānalas+iti -> prāṇāyāmānala iti

prāṇāyāmānala iti+ucyate| -> prāṇāyāmānala ity ucyate|

prāṇāyāmānalena+iti| -> prāṇāyāmānaleneti|

tu+iṣṭasiddhipradā -> tv iṣṭasiddhipradā

yoginas+vai -> yogino vai

punar+idam -> punar idam

punar idam+kṛṣṇapakṣāvasānam -> punar idaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣāvasānam

uṣṇīṣāt+aṅgulīṣu -> uṣṇīṣād aṅgulīṣu

tithivaśāt+pūrṇimānte -> tithivaśāt pūrṇimānte

uṣṇīṣe+aṅguṣṭhaparvāt -> uṣṇīṣe 'ṅguṣṭhaparvāt

uṣṇīṣe 'ṅguṣṭhaparvāt+vrajati -> uṣṇīṣe 'ṅguṣṭhaparvād vrajati

śaśinas+pānakam -> śaśinaḥ pānakam

śaśinaḥ pānakam+madyapānam -> śaśinaḥ pānakaṃ madyapānam

dravam+api -> dravam api

samayabhedas+iti -> samayabheda iti

samayabheda iti+arthas -> samayabheda ity arthas

samayabheda ity arthas+|| -> samayabheda ity arthaḥ||

yathātmasamayinām+virāgas -> yathātmasamayināṃ virāgas

yathātmasamayināṃ virāgas+na -> yathātmasamayināṃ virāgo na

sevā+avirāgāt -> sevāvirāgāt

sevāvirāgāt+iti| -> sevāvirāgād iti|

tasyās+sevā -> tasyāḥ sevā

punas+sekādikāle -> punaḥ sekādikāle

tasyās+sevā -> tasyāḥ sevā

tasyāḥ sevā+avirāgatas -> tasyāḥ sevāvirāgatas

tasyāḥ sevāvirāgatas+akṣarasukhatas -> tasyāḥ sevāvirāgato 'kṣarasukhatas

tasyāḥ sevāvirāgato 'kṣarasukhatas+yoginām| -> tasyāḥ sevāvirāgato 'kṣarasukhato yoginām|

paradārā+iti -> paradāreti

paras+vajrasattvas -> paro vajrasattvas

paro vajrasattvas+saṃsārapāram -> paro vajrasattvaḥ saṃsārapāram

paro vajrasattvaḥ saṃsārapāram+gatas -> paro vajrasattvaḥ saṃsārapāraṃ gatas

paro vajrasattvaḥ saṃsārapāraṃ gatas+tasya -> paro vajrasattvaḥ saṃsārapāraṃ gatas tasya

saṃsārapāram+gatā -> saṃsārapāraṃ gatā

saukhyam+yat -> saukhyaṃ yat

saukhyaṃ yat+śukrabindos -> saukhyaṃ yac chukrabindos

saukhyaṃ yac chukrabindos+aprapātāt -> saukhyaṃ yac chukrabindor aprapātāt

saukhyaṃ yac chukrabindor aprapātāt+bhavati -> saukhyaṃ yac chukrabindor aprapātād bhavati

punas+sattvopakāratas -> punaḥ sattvopakāratas

punaḥ sattvopakāratas+nidhānādikam -> punaḥ sattvopakārato nidhānādikam

punaḥ sattvopakārato nidhānādikam+utpāṭanīyam -> punaḥ sattvopakārato nidhānādikam utpāṭanīyam

punaḥ sattvopakārato nidhānādikam utpāṭanīyam+nidhirakṣakāṇām -> punaḥ sattvopakārato nidhānādikam utpāṭanīyaṃ nidhirakṣakāṇām

punaḥ sattvopakārato nidhānādikam utpāṭanīyaṃ nidhirakṣakāṇām+durgatimocanārtham -> punaḥ sattvopakārato nidhānādikam utpāṭanīyaṃ nidhirakṣakāṇāṃ durgatimocanārtham

punaḥ sattvopakārato nidhānādikam utpāṭanīyaṃ nidhirakṣakāṇāṃ durgatimocanārtham+iti| -> punaḥ sattvopakārato nidhānādikam utpāṭanīyaṃ nidhirakṣakāṇāṃ durgatimocanārtham iti|

dvādaśabhūmīnām+yat -> dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yat

dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yat+grahaṇam -> dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yad grahaṇam

dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yad grahaṇam+yoginas -> dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yad grahaṇaṃ yoginas

dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yad grahaṇaṃ yoginas+tat -> dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yad grahaṇaṃ yoginas tat

dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yad grahaṇaṃ yoginas tat+steyagrahaṇam -> dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yad grahaṇaṃ yoginas tat steyagrahaṇam

dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yad grahaṇaṃ yoginas tat steyagrahaṇam+uktam| -> dvādaśabhūmīnāṃ yad grahaṇaṃ yoginas tat steyagrahaṇam uktam|

visaṃvādakam+vacanam -> visaṃvādakaṃ vacanam

visaṃvādakaṃ vacanam+bauddhayoginām -> visaṃvādakaṃ vacanaṃ bauddhayoginām

visaṃvādakaṃ vacanaṃ bauddhayoginām+iti -> visaṃvādakaṃ vacanaṃ bauddhayoginām iti

punas+sattvānām -> punaḥ sattvānām

punaḥ sattvānām+vañcanāya -> punaḥ sattvānāṃ vañcanāya

vacanam+mṛṣāvādas -> vacanaṃ mṛṣāvādas

vacanaṃ mṛṣāvādas+| -> vacanaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ|

narās+vajradharākārās -> narā vajradharākārās

narā vajradharākārās+yoṣitas -> narā vajradharākārā yoṣitas

narā vajradharākārā yoṣitas+vajrayoṣitas -> narā vajradharākārā yoṣito vajrayoṣitas

narā vajradharākārā yoṣito vajrayoṣitas+|| -> narā vajradharākārā yoṣito vajrayoṣitaḥ||

sukham+dvīndriyajam -> sukhaṃ dvīndriyajam

sukhaṃ dvīndriyajam+tattvam -> sukhaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ tattvam

sukhaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ tattvam+buddhatvaphaladāyakam| -> sukhaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ tattvaṃ buddhatvaphaladāyakam|

vacanam+sattvavaineyārtham| -> vacanaṃ sattvavaineyārtham|

punas+sattvārtham -> punaḥ sattvārtham

punaḥ sattvārtham+prati -> punaḥ sattvārthaṃ prati

tat+eva -> tad eva

tad eva+apratiṣṭhitam -> tad evāpratiṣṭhitam

tad evāpratiṣṭhitam+sarvasattvarutatvāt -> tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvāt

tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvāt+apratiṣṭhitatvāt -> tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvād apratiṣṭhitatvāt

tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvād apratiṣṭhitatvāt+mṛṣāvādas -> tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvād apratiṣṭhitatvān mṛṣāvādas

tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvād apratiṣṭhitatvān mṛṣāvādas+iti -> tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvād apratiṣṭhitatvān mṛṣāvāda iti

tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvād apratiṣṭhitatvān mṛṣāvāda iti+uktas -> tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvād apratiṣṭhitatvān mṛṣāvāda ity uktas

tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvād apratiṣṭhitatvān mṛṣāvāda ity uktas+| -> tad evāpratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvasattvarutatvād apratiṣṭhitatvān mṛṣāvāda ity uktaḥ|

vacanam+sarvarutam -> vacanaṃ sarvarutam

vacanaṃ sarvarutam+yat -> vacanaṃ sarvarutaṃ yat

vacanaṃ sarvarutaṃ yat+sarvasattvānām -> vacanaṃ sarvarutaṃ yat sarvasattvānām

vacanaṃ sarvarutaṃ yat sarvasattvānām+hṛdaye -> vacanaṃ sarvarutaṃ yat sarvasattvānāṃ hṛdaye

yas+śabdas -> yaḥ śabdas

yaḥ śabdas+vaktrahīnas -> yaḥ śabdo vaktrahīnas

yaḥ śabdo vaktrahīnas+iti| -> yaḥ śabdo vaktrahīna iti|

siddhas+| -> siddhaḥ|

durdāntāntakas+bhavati -> durdāntāntako bhavati

durdāntāntako bhavati+iti -> durdāntāntako bhavatīti

evam+durdāntadamakas -> evaṃ durdāntadamakas

evaṃ durdāntadamakas+bhavati| -> evaṃ durdāntadamako bhavati|

praveśanīyas+yoginā -> praveśanīyo yoginā

praveśanīyo yoginā+iti| -> praveśanīyo yogineti|

teṣām+prāṇas -> teṣāṃ prāṇas

teṣāṃ prāṇas+yogabalena -> teṣāṃ prāṇo yogabalena

teṣāṃ prāṇo yogabalena+ākṛṣṭas -> teṣāṃ prāṇo yogabalenākṛṣṭas

teṣāṃ prāṇo yogabalenākṛṣṭas+punas -> teṣāṃ prāṇo yogabalenākṛṣṭaḥ punas

teṣāṃ prāṇo yogabalenākṛṣṭaḥ punas+tasmin -> teṣāṃ prāṇo yogabalenākṛṣṭaḥ punas tasmin

teṣāṃ prāṇo yogabalenākṛṣṭaḥ punas tasmin+eva -> teṣāṃ prāṇo yogabalenākṛṣṭaḥ punas tasminn eva

yas+prāṇātipātas -> yaḥ prāṇātipātas

yaḥ prāṇātipātas+uktas -> yaḥ prāṇātipāta uktas

yaḥ prāṇātipāta uktas+durdāntadamanāya -> yaḥ prāṇātipāta ukto durdāntadamanāya

prāṇātipātas+| -> prāṇātipātaḥ|

prāṇanāśas+uktas -> prāṇanāśa uktas

prāṇanāśa uktas+| -> prāṇanāśa uktaḥ|

tat+svadehe -> tat svadehe

yat+prāṇātipātam -> yat prāṇātipātam

yat prāṇātipātam+dinaniśi -> yat prāṇātipātaṃ dinaniśi

kartavyā+iti| -> kartavyeti|

lokottaraphalahetos+yoginā -> lokottaraphalahetor yoginā

ca+adhyātmikī -> cādhyātmikī

laukikaphalahetos+| -> laukikaphalahetoḥ|

dvitīyā+adhyātmīkī| -> dvitīyādhyātmīkī|

yoginām+yogacaryā -> yogināṃ yogacaryā

yogī+ityādi| -> yogītyādi|

sevā+avirāgāt|| -> sevāvirāgāt||

saukhyam+bindvaprapāte -> saukhyaṃ bindvaprapāte

yat+yoginas -> yad yoginas

yad yoginas+steyam -> yad yoginaḥ steyam

yad yoginaḥ steyam+uktam -> yad yoginaḥ steyam uktam

sarvajñajñānabhūmes+grahaṇam -> sarvajñajñānabhūmer grahaṇam

sarvajñajñānabhūmer grahaṇam+api -> sarvajñajñānabhūmer grahaṇam api

mṛṣāvādas+eva| -> mṛṣāvāda eva|

hṛdaye+asau -> hṛdaye 'sau

yas+śabdas -> yaḥ śabdas

yaḥ śabdas+vaktrahīnas -> yaḥ śabdo vaktrahīnas

yaḥ śabdo vaktrahīnas+prabhavati -> yaḥ śabdo vaktrahīnaḥ prabhavati

prāṇanāśas+sas -> prāṇanāśaḥ sas

prāṇanāśaḥ sas+uktas -> prāṇanāśaḥ sa uktas

prāṇātipātam+dinaniśi -> prāṇātipātaṃ dinaniśi

idānīm+yogacaryā -> idānīṃ yogacaryā

idānīṃ yogacaryā+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ yogacaryocyate---

mañjuśriyā+iti|| -> mañjuśriyeti||

evam+sādhanam -> evaṃ sādhanam

evaṃ sādhanam+kālacakrasya -> evaṃ sādhanaṃ kālacakrasya

evaṃ sādhanaṃ kālacakrasya+utpattikrameṇa -> evaṃ sādhanaṃ kālacakrasyotpattikrameṇa

evaṃ sādhanaṃ kālacakrasyotpattikrameṇa+utpannakrameṇa -> evaṃ sādhanaṃ kālacakrasyotpattikrameṇotpannakrameṇa

evaṃ sādhanaṃ kālacakrasyotpattikrameṇotpannakrameṇa+uktam -> evaṃ sādhanaṃ kālacakrasyotpattikrameṇotpannakrameṇoktam

evaṃ sādhanaṃ kālacakrasyotpattikrameṇotpannakrameṇoktam+bhagavatā -> evaṃ sādhanaṃ kālacakrasyotpattikrameṇotpannakrameṇoktaṃ bhagavatā

tena+ātmānam -> tenātmānam

tenātmānam+prīṇayet| -> tenātmānaṃ prīṇayet|

pañcāmṛtam+pūrvavidhinā -> pañcāmṛtaṃ pūrvavidhinā

tatas+balim -> tato balim

tato balim+dadyāt -> tato baliṃ dadyāt

tato baliṃ dadyāt+trisaṃdhyam -> tato baliṃ dadyāt trisaṃdhyam

tato baliṃ dadyāt trisaṃdhyam+prāguktavidhinā| -> tato baliṃ dadyāt trisaṃdhyaṃ prāguktavidhinā|

evam+visarjanam -> evaṃ visarjanam

evaṃ visarjanam+kṛtvā -> evaṃ visarjanaṃ kṛtvā

śvānāsyādayas+kriyācakreṣu| -> śvānāsyādayaḥ kriyācakreṣu|

nāgās+ca -> nāgāś ca

visarjayet+tān -> visarjayet tān

visarjayet tān+iti| -> visarjayet tān iti|

teṣām+varaṭakeṣu -> teṣāṃ varaṭakeṣu

evam+dvādaśadevās -> evaṃ dvādaśadevās

evaṃ dvādaśadevās+saparivārās -> evaṃ dvādaśadevāḥ saparivārās

evaṃ dvādaśadevāḥ saparivārās+karmacakrāṇi -> evaṃ dvādaśadevāḥ saparivārāḥ karmacakrāṇi

mārīcyādayas+yās -> mārīcyādayo yās

mārīcyādayo yās+tās -> mārīcyādayo yās tās

mārīcyādayo yās tās+visarjayet| -> mārīcyādayo yās tā visarjayet|

dvātriṃśacchūkam+dalasaṃkhyam| -> dvātriṃśacchūkaṃ dalasaṃkhyam|

tatra+api -> tatrāpi

prāguktam+ekaśūkam -> prāguktam ekaśūkam

prāguktam ekaśūkam+samasukhaphaladam -> prāguktam ekaśūkaṃ samasukhaphaladam

prāguktam ekaśūkaṃ samasukhaphaladam+guhyapadmodarastham| -> prāguktam ekaśūkaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ guhyapadmodarastham|

teṣām+garbhe -> teṣāṃ garbhe

tadgarbhe+api -> tadgarbhe 'pi

tadgarbhe 'pi+ekaśūkam -> tadgarbhe 'py ekaśūkam

tadgarbhe 'py ekaśūkam+iti| -> tadgarbhe 'py ekaśūkam iti|

visarjayet+tās -> visarjayet tās

visarjayet tās+iti| -> visarjayet tā iti|

evam+dvāsaptati -> evaṃ dvāsaptati

carcikādayas+bhīmādayas -> carcikādayo bhīmādayas

carcikādayo bhīmādayas+catuḥṣaṣṭimaṇḍalavāhinyas -> carcikādayo bhīmādayaś catuḥṣaṣṭimaṇḍalavāhinyas

carcikādayo bhīmādayaś catuḥṣaṣṭimaṇḍalavāhinyas+catasras -> carcikādayo bhīmādayaś catuḥṣaṣṭimaṇḍalavāhinyaś catasras

carcikādayo bhīmādayaś catuḥṣaṣṭimaṇḍalavāhinyaś catasras+śūnyakulikās -> carcikādayo bhīmādayaś catuḥṣaṣṭimaṇḍalavāhinyaś catasraḥ śūnyakulikās

carcikādayo bhīmādayaś catuḥṣaṣṭimaṇḍalavāhinyaś catasraḥ śūnyakulikās+| -> carcikādayo bhīmādayaś catuḥṣaṣṭimaṇḍalavāhinyaś catasraḥ śūnyakulikāḥ|

sārdham+pañcaṣaṣṭiśūkam -> sārdhaṃ pañcaṣaṣṭiśūkam

sārdhaṃ pañcaṣaṣṭiśūkam+vajram -> sārdhaṃ pañcaṣaṣṭiśūkaṃ vajram

sārdhaṃ pañcaṣaṣṭiśūkaṃ vajram+nirmāṇe -> sārdhaṃ pañcaṣaṣṭiśūkaṃ vajraṃ nirmāṇe

catuḥṣaṣṭiśūkam+madhyaśūkena -> catuḥṣaṣṭiśūkaṃ madhyaśūkena

tasya+api -> tasyāpi

tasyāpi+anyat -> tasyāpy anyat

tasyāpy anyat+dviguṇyam -> tasyāpy anyad dviguṇyam

tasyāpy anyad dviguṇyam+iti -> tasyāpy anyad dviguṇyam iti

dvādaśāyatanacatuḥkrodhadevatās+visarjayet| -> dvādaśāyatanacatuḥkrodhadevatā visarjayet|

sārdham+trayastriṃśacchūkam -> sārdhaṃ trayastriṃśacchūkam

sārdhaṃ trayastriṃśacchūkam+sambhoge -> sārdhaṃ trayastriṃśacchūkaṃ sambhoge

dvātriṃśacchūkam+madhyaśūkena -> dvātriṃśacchūkaṃ madhyaśūkena

ca+anyat -> cānyat

cānyat+dviguṇyam -> cānyad dviguṇyam

cānyad dviguṇyam+iti -> cānyad dviguṇyam iti

skandhadhātudevatās+visarjayet| -> skandhadhātudevatā visarjayet|

sārdham+saptadaśaśūkam -> sārdhaṃ saptadaśaśūkam

sārdhaṃ saptadaśaśūkam+sahaje -> sārdhaṃ saptadaśaśūkaṃ sahaje

dviguṇitam+aparam -> dviguṇitam aparam

dviguṇitam aparam+ṣoḍaśaśūkam -> dviguṇitam aparaṃ ṣoḍaśaśūkam

dviguṇitam aparaṃ ṣoḍaśaśūkam+madhyaśūkena -> dviguṇitam aparaṃ ṣoḍaśaśūkaṃ madhyaśūkena

dhūmādikān+visarjayet| -> dhūmādikān visarjayet|

sārdham+navaśūkam -> sārdhaṃ navaśūkam

sārdhaṃ navaśūkam+vajram -> sārdhaṃ navaśūkaṃ vajram

sārdhaṃ navaśūkaṃ vajram+syāt -> sārdhaṃ navaśūkaṃ vajraṃ syāt

sārdhaṃ navaśūkaṃ vajraṃ syāt+dharmacakre -> sārdhaṃ navaśūkaṃ vajraṃ syād dharmacakre

bāhyaśūkam+dviguṇyam -> bāhyaśūkaṃ dviguṇyam

bāhyaśūkaṃ dviguṇyam+aṣṭaśūkam -> bāhyaśūkaṃ dviguṇyam aṣṭaśūkam

bāhyaśūkaṃ dviguṇyam aṣṭaśūkam+madhyaśūkena -> bāhyaśūkaṃ dviguṇyam aṣṭaśūkaṃ madhyaśūkena

mahāsukhacakram+visarjayet| -> mahāsukhacakraṃ visarjayet|

pañcaśūkam+vajram -> pañcaśūkaṃ vajram

pañcaśūkaṃ vajram+bhāvayet| -> pañcaśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayet|

tatas+maṇḍaladevatānām -> tato maṇḍaladevatānām

tato maṇḍaladevatānām+visarjanāya -> tato maṇḍaladevatānāṃ visarjanāya

tato maṇḍaladevatānāṃ visarjanāya+uṣṇīṣe -> tato maṇḍaladevatānāṃ visarjanāyoṣṇīṣe

varadavajrāgra+ityādinā -> varadavajrāgretyādinā

namas+te -> namas te

pūjām+stutim -> pūjāṃ stutim

pūjāṃ stutim+kṛtvā -> pūjāṃ stutiṃ kṛtvā

maṇḍalarājāgrīm+karmarājāgrīm -> maṇḍalarājāgrīṃ karmarājāgrīm

maṇḍalarājāgrīṃ karmarājāgrīm+binduyogam -> maṇḍalarājāgrīṃ karmarājāgrīṃ binduyogam

maṇḍalarājāgrīṃ karmarājāgrīṃ binduyogam+sūkṣmayogam -> maṇḍalarājāgrīṃ karmarājāgrīṃ binduyogaṃ sūkṣmayogam

maṇḍalarājāgrīṃ karmarājāgrīṃ binduyogaṃ sūkṣmayogam+bhāvayitvā -> maṇḍalarājāgrīṃ karmarājāgrīṃ binduyogaṃ sūkṣmayogaṃ bhāvayitvā

uṣṇīṣe+ityādi| -> uṣṇīṣa ityādi|

tadgarbhe+api -> tadgarbhe 'pi

tadgarbhe 'pi+ekaśūkam -> tadgarbhe 'py ekaśūkam

tadgarbhe 'py ekaśūkam+samasukhaphaladam -> tadgarbhe 'py ekaśūkaṃ samasukhaphaladam

tadgarbhe 'py ekaśūkaṃ samasukhaphaladam+guhyapadmodarastham|| -> tadgarbhe 'py ekaśūkaṃ samasukhaphaladaṃ guhyapadmodarastham||

tasya+api -> tasyāpi

tasyāpi+anyat -> tasyāpy anyat

tasyāpy anyat+dviguṇyam -> tasyāpy anyad dviguṇyam

tasyāpy anyad dviguṇyam+bhavati -> tasyāpy anyad dviguṇyaṃ bhavati

ca+anyat -> cānyat

cānyat+dviguṇyam| -> cānyad dviguṇyam|

dviguṇitam aparam+tasya -> dviguṇitam aparaṃ tasya

vajraṃ syāt+dharmacakre -> vajraṃ syād dharmacakre

surataratigataṃ yoginām+yogam -> surataratigataṃ yogināṃ yogam

surataratigataṃ yogināṃ yogam+etat -> surataratigataṃ yogināṃ yogam etat

praveśas+| -> praveśaḥ|

tathā+indvarkamadhye -> tathendvarkamadhye

padmāviṣṭaṃ svavajraspharaṇam+api -> padmāviṣṭaṃ svavajraspharaṇam api

prāṇapraveśas+viṣayavirahitāliṅganam -> prāṇapraveśo viṣayavirahitāliṅganam

prāṇapraveśo viṣayavirahitāliṅganam+viśvamātus -> prāṇapraveśo viṣayavirahitāliṅganaṃ viśvamātus

prāṇāyāmaniyamas+|| -> prāṇāyāmaniyamaḥ||

mṛtas+ayam -> mṛto 'yam

mṛto 'yam+iti -> mṛto 'yam iti

kim+tu -> kiṃ tu

evam+skandhābhāve -> evaṃ skandhābhāve

evaṃ skandhābhāve+api -> evaṃ skandhābhāve 'pi

yojanīyo vai+ekāntam| -> yojanīyo vā ekāntam|

prāṇo vrajan+yoginā -> prāṇo vrajan yoginā

yogabalena+uṣṇīṣam -> yogabalenoṣṇīṣam

skandhanirnāśahetubhūtas+bhavati| -> skandhanirnāśahetubhūto bhavati|

śirovyathāntāt+aniṣṭas -> śirovyathāntād aniṣṭas

śirovyathāntād aniṣṭas+maraṇabhayakaras -> śirovyathāntād aniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaras

śirovyathāntād aniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaras+bhavati -> śirovyathāntād aniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaro bhavati

tasmāt+ūrdhvam -> tasmād ūrdhvam

tasmād ūrdhvam+iti -> tasmād ūrdhvam iti

samasukhaphalapradas+bhavati| -> samasukhaphalaprado bhavati|

śirovyathām+na -> śirovyathāṃ na

yāvat+mastake -> yāvan mastake

yāvan mastake+iti -> yāvan mastaka iti

kartavyas+sa -> kartavyaḥ sa

yas+prāṇāyāmas -> yaḥ prāṇāyāmas

yaḥ prāṇāyāmas+yoginā -> yaḥ prāṇāyāmo yoginā

prāṇa+ityādi| -> prāṇetyādi|

loke+aprasiddhis -> loke 'prasiddhis

loke 'prasiddhis+|| -> loke 'prasiddhiḥ||

samasukham+kim -> samasukhaṃ kim

samasukhaṃ kim+tu -> samasukhaṃ kiṃ tu

skandhābhāve+api -> skandhābhāve 'pi

yojanīyas+vrajan -> yojanīyo vrajan

yojanīyo vrajan+vai -> yojanīyo vrajan vai

uṣṇīṣam+bhedayitvā -> uṣṇīṣaṃ bhedayitvā

tasmāt+ūrdhvam -> tasmād ūrdhvam

tasmād ūrdhvam+hi -> tasmād ūrdhvaṃ hi

tasmād ūrdhvaṃ hi+aniṣṭas -> tasmād ūrdhvaṃ hy aniṣṭas

tasmād ūrdhvaṃ hy aniṣṭas+maraṇabhayakaras -> tasmād ūrdhvaṃ hy aniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaras

tasmād ūrdhvaṃ hy aniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaras+skandhanirnāśahetus -> tasmād ūrdhvaṃ hy aniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaraḥ skandhanirnāśahetus

tasmād ūrdhvaṃ hy aniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaraḥ skandhanirnāśahetus+| -> tasmād ūrdhvaṃ hy aniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaraḥ skandhanirnāśahetuḥ|

yāvat+iṣṭas -> yāvad iṣṭas

prāṇāyāmas+samantāt -> prāṇāyāmaḥ samantāt

prāṇāyāmaḥ samantāt+samasukhaphaladas -> prāṇāyāmaḥ samantāt samasukhaphaladas

prāṇāyāmaḥ samantāt samasukhaphaladas+mastake -> prāṇāyāmaḥ samantāt samasukhaphalado mastake

idānīm+prāṇāyāmalakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ prāṇāyāmalakṣaṇam

idānīṃ prāṇāyāmalakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ prāṇāyāmalakṣaṇam ucyate---

pūrvoktaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaratattvasādhanam+utpannakrameṇa| -> pūrvoktaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaratattvasādhanam utpannakrameṇa|

sahaikatvam+iti -> sahaikatvam iti
