jñānayogas+iti -> jñānayoga iti

sahajas+iha -> sahaja iha

śāntas+iti -> śānta iti

śānta iti+ucyate| -> śānta ity ucyate|

yas+ekakṣaṇas -> ya ekakṣaṇas

ya ekakṣaṇas+| -> ya ekakṣaṇaḥ|

saukhyena+anaṣṭena -> saukhyenānaṣṭena

saukhyānaṣṭaikaśāntas+iti| -> saukhyānaṣṭaikaśānta iti|

evam+sādhanāṅgam -> evaṃ sādhanāṅgam

evaṃ sādhanāṅgam+kartavyam| -> evaṃ sādhanāṅgaṃ kartavyam|

syāt+iti -> syād iti

yas+tryakṣaras -> yas tryakṣaras

yas tryakṣaras+yogī -> yas tryakṣaro yogī

prajñāsṛṣṭabodhicittabindos+api -> prajñāsṛṣṭabodhicittabindor api

sṛṣṭas+ca -> sṛṣṭaś ca

sṛṣṭaś ca+asau -> sṛṣṭaś cāsau

sṛṣṭaś cāsau+indubindus -> sṛṣṭaś cāsāv indubindus

sṛṣṭaś cāsāv indubindus+sṛṣṭendubindus -> sṛṣṭaś cāsāv indubinduḥ sṛṣṭendubindus

sṛṣṭaś cāsāv indubinduḥ sṛṣṭendubindus+tasya -> sṛṣṭaś cāsāv indubinduḥ sṛṣṭendubindus tasya

prajñāsṛṣṭendubindos+iti| -> prajñāsṛṣṭendubindor iti|

sati+upasādhanam| -> saty upasādhanam|

cakārāt+prāṇāyāmas -> cakārāt prāṇāyāmas

cakārāt prāṇāyāmas+dhāraṇā -> cakārāt prāṇāyāmo dhāraṇā

ṣaḍaṅgas+| -> ṣaḍaṅgaḥ|

ca+upasādhane -> copasādhane

vighnāntakasya+amṛtapathagatayā -> vighnāntakasyāmṛtapathagatayā

dṛṣṭis+amṛtasthānagatā -> dṛṣṭir amṛtasthānagatā

vighnāntakas+amṛtakuṇḍalī -> vighnāntako 'mṛtakuṇḍalī

vighnāntakasya+iti -> vighnāntakasyeti

dhyānena+iti| -> dhyāneneti|

tatas+bimbaparyantam -> tato bimbaparyantam

tato bimbaparyantam+sevāṅgam -> tato bimbaparyantaṃ sevāṅgam

tato bimbaparyantaṃ sevāṅgam+bhavati -> tato bimbaparyantaṃ sevāṅgaṃ bhavati

caturvidham+divāyogena -> caturvidhaṃ divāyogena

nimittam+bhavati -> nimittaṃ bhavati

ūrdhvadṛṣṭyā+animiṣayā -> ūrdhvadṛṣṭyānimiṣayā

cakriṇas+iti -> cakriṇa iti

cakriṇa iti+uṣṇīṣasya| -> cakriṇa ity uṣṇīṣasya|

daśavidhas+| -> daśavidhaḥ|

sārdham+pratyayas -> sārdhaṃ pratyayas

sārdhaṃ pratyayas+bhavati| -> sārdhaṃ pratyayo bhavati|

daśavidhas+dhūmādinā -> daśavidho dhūmādinā

tasyām+sevāyām -> tasyāṃ sevāyām

tasyāṃ sevāyām+ādiyogas -> tasyāṃ sevāyām ādiyogas

tasyāṃ sevāyām ādiyogas+dhūmādinimittagrahaṇam -> tasyāṃ sevāyām ādiyogo dhūmādinimittagrahaṇam

tasyāṃ sevāyām ādiyogo dhūmādinimittagrahaṇam+cittasya -> tasyāṃ sevāyām ādiyogo dhūmādinimittagrahaṇaṃ cittasya

tasyāṃ sevāyām ādiyogo dhūmādinimittagrahaṇaṃ cittasya+iti| -> tasyāṃ sevāyām ādiyogo dhūmādinimittagrahaṇaṃ cittasyeti|

sevā+ityādi -> sevetyādi

sevā+ityādi| -> sevetyādi|

jñānayogas+|| -> jñānayogaḥ||

saukhyānaṣṭaikaśāntas+sahajas -> saukhyānaṣṭaikaśāntaḥ sahajas

saukhyānaṣṭaikaśāntaḥ sahajas+iha -> saukhyānaṣṭaikaśāntaḥ sahaja iha

tryakṣaras+sādhane -> tryakṣaraḥ sādhane

prajñāsṛṣṭendubindos+api -> prajñāsṛṣṭendubindor api

ṣaḍaṅgas+| -> ṣaḍaṅgaḥ|

ca+upasādhye -> copasādhye

vighnāntakasya+amṛtapathagatayā -> vighnāntakasyāmṛtapathagatayā

daśavidhas+cakriṇas -> daśavidhaś cakriṇas

daśavidhaś cakriṇas+krodhadṛṣṭyā -> daśavidhaś cakriṇaḥ krodhadṛṣṭyā

sevāyām+ādiyogas -> sevāyām ādiyogas

sevāyām ādiyogas+nabhasi -> sevāyām ādiyogo nabhasi

dṛṣṭis+ucyate--- -> dṛṣṭir ucyate---

idānīm+śūnyatābimbasādhanāya -> idānīṃ śūnyatābimbasādhanāya

haṭhayogas+|| -> haṭhayogaḥ||

bodhicittabindunirodhāt+akṣarakṣaṇam -> bodhicittabindunirodhād akṣarakṣaṇam

bodhicittabindunirodhād akṣarakṣaṇam+sādhayet -> bodhicittabindunirodhād akṣarakṣaṇaṃ sādhayet

bodhicittabindunirodhād akṣarakṣaṇaṃ sādhayet+nispandena -> bodhicittabindunirodhād akṣarakṣaṇaṃ sādhayen nispandena

bodhicittabindunirodhād akṣarakṣaṇaṃ sādhayen nispandena+iti -> bodhicittabindunirodhād akṣarakṣaṇaṃ sādhayen nispandeneti

prāṇam+madhyamāyām -> prāṇaṃ madhyamāyām

prāṇaṃ madhyamāyām+vāhayitvā -> prāṇaṃ madhyamāyāṃ vāhayitvā

nādābhyāsāt+vakṣyamāṇāt -> nādābhyāsād vakṣyamāṇāt

nādābhyāsād vakṣyamāṇāt+haṭhena -> nādābhyāsād vakṣyamāṇād dhaṭhena

sati+akṣararakṣaṇam -> saty akṣararakṣaṇam

saty akṣararakṣaṇam+na -> saty akṣararakṣaṇaṃ na

saty akṣararakṣaṇaṃ na+utpadyate -> saty akṣararakṣaṇaṃ notpadyate

saty akṣararakṣaṇaṃ notpadyate+ayantritaprāṇatayā -> saty akṣararakṣaṇaṃ notpadyate 'yantritaprāṇatayā

pratyāhārādibhis+bimbe -> pratyāhārādibhir bimbe

idānīm+haṭhayogas -> idānīṃ haṭhayogas

idānīṃ haṭhayogas+ucyate| -> idānīṃ haṭhayoga ucyate|

pratyāhārādiniyamas+| -> pratyāhārādiniyamaḥ|

daśavaśitādikam+prāptas -> daśavaśitādikaṃ prāptas

daśavaśitādikaṃ prāptas+bodhisattvas -> daśavaśitādikaṃ prāpto bodhisattvas

daśavaśitādikaṃ prāpto bodhisattvas+bhavati -> daśavaśitādikaṃ prāpto bodhisattvo bhavati

daśavaśitādikaṃ prāpto bodhisattvo bhavati+iti -> daśavaśitādikaṃ prāpto bodhisattvo bhavatīti

jñānadehas+iti| -> jñānadeha iti|

tasmāt+samādhiśuddhas -> tasmāt samādhiśuddhas

tasmāt samādhiśuddhas+vimalyam -> tasmāt samādhiśuddho vimalyam

tasmāt samādhiśuddho vimalyam+gatas -> tasmāt samādhiśuddho vimalyaṃ gatas

tasmāt samādhiśuddho vimalyaṃ gatas+katipayadivasais -> tasmāt samādhiśuddho vimalyaṃ gataḥ katipayadivasais

tasmāt samādhiśuddho vimalyaṃ gataḥ katipayadivasais+trivarṣatripakṣadivasais -> tasmāt samādhiśuddho vimalyaṃ gataḥ katipayadivasais trivarṣatripakṣadivasais

tasmāt samādhiśuddho vimalyaṃ gataḥ katipayadivasais trivarṣatripakṣadivasais+siddhyate -> tasmāt samādhiśuddho vimalyaṃ gataḥ katipayadivasais trivarṣatripakṣadivasaiḥ siddhyate

tat+sukham -> tat sukham

tat sukham+samādhis -> tat sukhaṃ samādhis

tat sukhaṃ samādhis+ucyate| -> tat sukhaṃ samādhir ucyate|

yat+akṣarasukham -> yad akṣarasukham

yad akṣarasukham+bhavati -> yad akṣarasukhaṃ bhavati

grāhyagrāhakacittayos+ekatvena -> grāhyagrāhakacittayor ekatvena

tasmāt+śuddhas -> tasmāc chuddhas

tasmāc chuddhas+samādhau -> tasmāc chuddhaḥ samādhau

tasmāc chuddhaḥ samādhau+iti| -> tasmāc chuddhaḥ samādhāv iti|

jñānabimbāt+śūnyabimbāt -> jñānabimbāc chūnyabimbāt

jñānabimbāc chūnyabimbāt+iti| -> jñānabimbāc chūnyabimbād iti|

pañcaraśmayas+niścaranti -> pañcaraśmayo niścaranti

śabdāt+romakūpāt -> śabdād romakūpāt

śabdād romakūpāt+spharanti -> śabdād romakūpāt spharanti

vimalam+prabhāmaṇḍalam -> vimalaṃ prabhāmaṇḍalam

vimalaṃ prabhāmaṇḍalam+bhavati| -> vimalaṃ prabhāmaṇḍalaṃ bhavati|

sarvavikalparahitatvam+tasmāt -> sarvavikalparahitatvaṃ tasmāt

sarvavikalparahitatvaṃ tasmāt+śuddhas -> sarvavikalparahitatvaṃ tasmāc chuddhas

sarvavikalparahitatvaṃ tasmāc chuddhas+yadā -> sarvavikalparahitatvaṃ tasmāc chuddho yadā

iha+anusmṛtis -> ihānusmṛtis

ihānusmṛtis+bimbāliṅganam -> ihānusmṛtir bimbāliṅganam

ihānusmṛtir bimbāliṅganam+cittasya -> ihānusmṛtir bimbāliṅganaṃ cittasya

saṃśuddhas+anusmṛtes -> saṃśuddho 'nusmṛtes

saṃśuddho 'nusmṛtes+iti| -> saṃśuddho 'nusmṛter iti|

sādhayet+bindurodhāt|| -> sādhayed bindurodhāt||

nādābhyāsāt+haṭhena -> nādābhyāsād dhaṭhena

nādābhyāsād dhaṭhena+abjagakuliśamaṇau -> nādābhyāsād dhaṭhenābjagakuliśamaṇau

mantriṇām+iṣṭasiddhis -> mantriṇām iṣṭasiddhis

pratyāhārādibhis+vai -> pratyāhārādibhir vai

jñānadehas+| -> jñānadehaḥ|

katipayadivasais+siddhyate -> katipayadivasaiḥ siddhyate

tasmāt+śuddhas -> tasmāc chuddhas

tasmāc chuddhas+samādhau -> tasmāc chuddhaḥ samādhau

prabhāmaṇḍalam+jñānabimbāt -> prabhāmaṇḍalaṃ jñānabimbāt

saṃśuddhas+anusmṛtes -> saṃśuddho 'nusmṛtes

saṃśuddho 'nusmṛtes+syāt -> saṃśuddho 'nusmṛteḥ syāt

saṃśuddho 'nusmṛteḥ syāt+vimalam -> saṃśuddho 'nusmṛteḥ syād vimalam

saṃśuddho 'nusmṛteḥ syād vimalam+api -> saṃśuddho 'nusmṛteḥ syād vimalam api

gatāgatakṣayeṇa+ekalokībhavati|| -> gatāgatakṣayeṇaikalokībhavati||

dhāraṇāyās+balena -> dhāraṇāyā balena

dhāraṇāyā balena+iti -> dhāraṇāyā baleneti

grāhyagrāhakacittam+viśati -> grāhyagrāhakacittaṃ viśati

śūnyatābimbam+iha -> śūnyatābimbam iha

daśabalam+iti -> daśabalam iti

mārakleśādināśam+viśati -> mārakleśādināśaṃ viśati

bodhisattvais+praśaṃsyate -> bodhisattvaiḥ praśaṃsyate

bodhisattvaiḥ praśaṃsyate+iti -> bodhisattvaiḥ praśaṃsyata iti

bodhisattvaiḥ praśaṃsyata iti+arthas -> bodhisattvaiḥ praśaṃsyata ity arthas

bodhisattvaiḥ praśaṃsyata ity arthas+| -> bodhisattvaiḥ praśaṃsyata ity arthaḥ|

śuddhas+san -> śuddhaḥ san

śuddhaḥ san+pūjyate -> śuddhaḥ san pūjyate

madhyamavāhakas+tadā -> madhyamavāhakas tadā

raviśaśimārgarahitas+yogī -> raviśaśimārgarahito yogī

śuddhas+iti| -> śuddha iti|

śuddhas+bhavati| -> śuddho bhavati|

evam+divyaśrotras -> evaṃ divyaśrotras

evaṃ divyaśrotras+dhyānena -> evaṃ divyaśrotro dhyānena

divyacakṣus+bhavati| -> divyacakṣur bhavati|

yadā+animiṣitacakṣus -> yadānimiṣitacakṣus

yadānimiṣitacakṣus+bhavati -> yadānimiṣitacakṣur bhavati

śuddhas+iti| -> śuddha iti|

varadānādikam+dadāti| -> varadānādikaṃ dadāti|

sarvamantrais+adhiṣṭhyate -> sarvamantrair adhiṣṭhyate

viśuddhas+bhavati -> viśuddho bhavati

pratyā+ityādi| -> pratyetyādi|

daśabalam+dhāraṇāyās -> daśabalaṃ dhāraṇāyās

daśabalaṃ dhāraṇāyās+balena|| -> daśabalaṃ dhāraṇāyā balena||

mārakleśādināśam+viśati -> mārakleśādināśaṃ viśati

śuddhas+śaśiravirahitas -> śuddhaḥ śaśiravirahitas

śuddhaḥ śaśiravirahitas+pūjyate -> śuddhaḥ śaśiravirahitaḥ pūjyate

śuddhas+| -> śuddhaḥ|

viṣayavirahitas+adhiṣṭhyate -> viṣayavirahito 'dhiṣṭhyate

idānīm+pratyāhārādiphalam -> idānīṃ pratyāhārādiphalam

idānīṃ pratyāhārādiphalam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ pratyāhārādiphalam ucyate---

buddhatvāya+iti|| -> buddhatvāyeti||

ṣaḍaṅgayogas+bhāvanīyas -> ṣaḍaṅgayogo bhāvanīyas

ṣaḍaṅgayogo bhāvanīyas+yoginā -> ṣaḍaṅgayogo bhāvanīyo yoginā

bhagavatā+uktā| -> bhagavatoktā|

evam+trimudrābhāvanā -> evaṃ trimudrābhāvanā

evam+karmamudrā -> evaṃ karmamudrā

evaṃ karmamudrā+akṣarasukhadāyinī -> evaṃ karmamudrākṣarasukhadāyinī

niḥspandagatis+adhimātrā -> niḥspandagatir adhimātrā

niḥspandagatir adhimātrā+iti| -> niḥspandagatir adhimātreti|

spandagatis+madhyamātrā -> spandagatir madhyamātrā

bodhicittasya+akṣaragatis -> bodhicittasyākṣaragatis

bodhicittasyākṣaragatis+mṛdumātrā -> bodhicittasyākṣaragatir mṛdumātrā

trividhagativaśāt+iti| -> trividhagativaśād iti|

tisras+mudrās -> tisro mudrās

tisro mudrās+trimātrās -> tisro mudrās trimātrās

tisro mudrās trimātrās+iti -> tisro mudrās trimātrā iti

bhavet+sādhanam -> bhavet sādhanam

bhavet sādhanam+viśvabhartus -> bhavet sādhanaṃ viśvabhartus

bhavet sādhanaṃ viśvabhartus+kālacakrasya| -> bhavet sādhanaṃ viśvabhartuḥ kālacakrasya|

etat+mṛdvādibhedais -> etan mṛdvādibhedais

etan mṛdvādibhedais+trividham -> etan mṛdvādibhedais trividham

etan mṛdvādibhedais trividham+api -> etan mṛdvādibhedais trividham api

evam+ṣaḍaṅgayogasādhanam| -> evaṃ ṣaḍaṅgayogasādhanam|

prāṇādīnām+abhāvatas -> prāṇādīnām abhāvatas

prāṇādīnām abhāvatas+iti| -> prāṇādīnām abhāvata iti|

sā+api -> sāpi

samādhis+ca -> samādhiś ca

samādhiś ca+iti| -> samādhiś ceti|

akṣaraṇasukhavaśāt+jñānabimbe -> akṣaraṇasukhavaśāj jñānabimbe

prajñopāyātmakena+iti -> prajñopāyātmakeneti

sā+anusmṛtis -> sānusmṛtis

sānusmṛtis+daśavidhā -> sānusmṛtir daśavidhā

caṇḍālyālokanam+yat -> caṇḍālyālokanaṃ yat

caṇḍālyālokanaṃ yat+tribhavasya -> caṇḍālyālokanaṃ yat tribhavasya

caṇḍālyālokanaṃ yat tribhavasya+ambare -> caṇḍālyālokanaṃ yat tribhavasyāmbare

tisras+mudrās -> tisro mudrās

tisro mudrās+trimātrās -> tisro mudrās trimātrās

tisro mudrās trimātrās+trividhagativaśāt -> tisro mudrās trimātrās trividhagativaśāt

tisro mudrās trimātrās trividhagativaśāt+karmasaṃkalpadivyās -> tisro mudrās trimātrās trividhagativaśāt karmasaṃkalpadivyās

tisro mudrās trimātrās trividhagativaśāt karmasaṃkalpadivyās+|| -> tisro mudrās trimātrās trividhagativaśāt karmasaṃkalpadivyāḥ||

bhavet+sādhanam -> bhavet sādhanam

bhavet sādhanam+viśvabhartus -> bhavet sādhanaṃ viśvabhartus

etat+mṛdvādibhedais -> etan mṛdvādibhedais

etan mṛdvādibhedais+trividham -> etan mṛdvādibhedais trividham

etan mṛdvādibhedais trividham+api -> etan mṛdvādibhedais trividham api

samādhis+| -> samādhiḥ|

prajñopāyātmakena+akṣaraṇasukhavaśāt -> prajñopāyātmakenākṣaraṇasukhavaśāt

prajñopāyātmakenākṣaraṇasukhavaśāt+jñānabimbe -> prajñopāyātmakenākṣaraṇasukhavaśāj jñānabimbe

ca+ambare -> cāmbare

cāmbare+anusmṛtis -> cāmbare 'nusmṛtis

cāmbare 'nusmṛtis+syāt -> cāmbare 'nusmṛtiḥ syāt

caṇḍālyālokanam+yat -> caṇḍālyālokanaṃ yat

caṇḍālyālokanaṃ yat+bhavati -> caṇḍālyālokanaṃ yad bhavati

ekacittam+nāma|| -> ekacittaṃ nāma||

gamanāgamanarahitas+| -> gamanāgamanarahitaḥ|

ubhayagatihatas+iti -> ubhayagatihata iti

prāṇapraveśas+| -> prāṇapraveśaḥ|

bindau+iti -> bindāv iti

daśavidhas+daśamaṇḍalarodhatas -> daśavidho daśamaṇḍalarodhatas

daśavidho daśamaṇḍalarodhatas+| -> daśavidho daśamaṇḍalarodhataḥ|

praveśas+sa -> praveśaḥ sa

skhalanam+nirodhas -> skhalanaṃ nirodhas

skhalanaṃ nirodhas+madhye -> skhalanaṃ nirodho madhye

vāmadakṣiṇamārgas+| -> vāmadakṣiṇamārgaḥ|

dvimārgas+iti -> dvimārga iti

prāṇāyāmas+nāma -> prāṇāyāmo nāma

dhyānam+daśavidham| -> dhyānaṃ daśavidham|

evam+grāhyagrāhakabhedena -> evaṃ grāhyagrāhakabhedena

cittasya+ekīkaraṇam| -> cittasyaikīkaraṇam|

acalasukham+iti -> acalasukham iti

bimbāsaktis+| -> bimbāsaktiḥ|

ratis+iti -> ratir iti

niścayārthas+| -> niścayārthaḥ|

vicāras+iti -> vicāra iti

tarkas+iti -> tarka iti

prajñā+iti -> prajñeti

prajñeti+ālokanam| -> prajñety ālokanam|

tasmin+eva -> tasminn eva

pravṛttis+anyais -> pravṛttir anyais

pravṛttir anyais+cakṣurādibhis -> pravṛttir anyaiś cakṣurādibhis

pravṛttir anyaiś cakṣurādibhis+pañcavidhais -> pravṛttir anyaiś cakṣurādibhiḥ pañcavidhais

pravṛttir anyaiś cakṣurādibhiḥ pañcavidhais+iti| -> pravṛttir anyaiś cakṣurādibhiḥ pañcavidhair iti|

viṣayaviṣayiṇām+daśānām -> viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānām

viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānām+sambandhena -> viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānāṃ sambandhena

viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānāṃ sambandhena+apravṛttis -> viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānāṃ sambandhenāpravṛttis

viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānāṃ sambandhenāpravṛttis+vijñānasya -> viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānāṃ sambandhenāpravṛttir vijñānasya

pratyāhāras+nāma -> pratyāhāro nāma

pratyā+ityādinā| -> pratyetyādinā|

ca+ekacittam|| -> caikacittam||

prāṇapraveśas+hi -> prāṇapraveśo hi

prāṇapraveśo hi+ubhayagatihatas -> prāṇapraveśo hy ubhayagatihatas

prāṇapraveśo hy ubhayagatihatas+dhāraṇā -> prāṇapraveśo hy ubhayagatihato dhāraṇā

bhavet+madhyame -> bhaven madhyame

prāṇāyāmas+dvimārgas -> prāṇāyāmo dvimārgas

prāṇāyāmo dvimārgas+skhalanam -> prāṇāyāmo dvimārgaḥ skhalanam

prāṇāyāmo dvimārgaḥ skhalanam+api -> prāṇāyāmo dvimārgaḥ skhalanam api

tarkas+vicāras -> tarko vicāras

tarko vicāras+ratis -> tarko vicāro ratis

tarko vicāro ratis+acalasukham -> tarko vicāro ratir acalasukham

tarko vicāro ratir acalasukham+dhyānam -> tarko vicāro ratir acalasukhaṃ dhyānam

tarko vicāro ratir acalasukhaṃ dhyānam+api -> tarko vicāro ratir acalasukhaṃ dhyānam api

tarko vicāro ratir acalasukhaṃ dhyānam api+ekacittam| -> tarko vicāro ratir acalasukhaṃ dhyānam apy ekacittam|

pratyāhāras+daśānām -> pratyāhāro daśānām

pratyāhāro daśānām+viṣayaviṣayiṇām -> pratyāhāro daśānāṃ viṣayaviṣayiṇām

pratyāhāro daśānāṃ viṣayaviṣayiṇām+apravṛttis -> pratyāhāro daśānāṃ viṣayaviṣayiṇām apravṛttis

pratyāhāro daśānāṃ viṣayaviṣayiṇām apravṛttis+śarīre -> pratyāhāro daśānāṃ viṣayaviṣayiṇām apravṛttiḥ śarīre

idānīm+pratyāhārādilakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ pratyāhārādilakṣaṇam

idānīṃ pratyāhārādilakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ pratyāhārādilakṣaṇam ucyate---

svaravyañjanais+vāmadakṣiṇaprāṇasaṃcāranirodhais -> svaravyañjanair vāmadakṣiṇaprāṇasaṃcāranirodhais

svaravyañjanair vāmadakṣiṇaprāṇasaṃcāranirodhais+|| -> svaravyañjanair vāmadakṣiṇaprāṇasaṃcāranirodhaiḥ||

ādikādyais+iti -> ādikādyair iti

ekaikayogas+pañcamaṇḍalavāhakas -> ekaikayogaḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhakas

ekaikayogaḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhakas+| -> ekaikayogaḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhakaḥ|

ekaikas+pañcabhedais -> ekaikaḥ pañcabhedais

ekaikaḥ pañcabhedais+iti| -> ekaikaḥ pañcabhedair iti|

nīyate+iti -> nīyata iti

nīyata iti+arthas -> nīyata ity arthas

nīyata ity arthas+| -> nīyata ity arthaḥ|

evam+bhagavān -> evaṃ bhagavān

evaṃ bhagavān+apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇas -> evaṃ bhagavān apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇas

evaṃ bhagavān apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇas+avāte -> evaṃ bhagavān apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇo 'vāte

samādhis+daśavāyūnām -> samādhir daśavāyūnām

samādhir daśavāyūnām+nirodhatas -> samādhir daśavāyūnāṃ nirodhatas

samādhir daśavāyūnāṃ nirodhatas+iti| -> samādhir daśavāyūnāṃ nirodhata iti|

vairocanas+daśavidhas -> vairocano daśavidhas

vairocano daśavidhas+| -> vairocano daśavidhaḥ|

cakrī+iti -> cakrīti

śrīsamādhis+ca -> śrīsamādhiś ca

ca+anusmṛtis -> cānusmṛtis

cānusmṛtis+ḍombyām -> cānusmṛtir ḍombyām

cānusmṛtir ḍombyām+madhyanāḍyām -> cānusmṛtir ḍombyāṃ madhyanāḍyām

cānusmṛtir ḍombyāṃ madhyanāḍyām+daśakāmāvasthābhedatas -> cānusmṛtir ḍombyāṃ madhyanāḍyāṃ daśakāmāvasthābhedatas

cānusmṛtir ḍombyāṃ madhyanāḍyāṃ daśakāmāvasthābhedatas+iti| -> cānusmṛtir ḍombyāṃ madhyanāḍyāṃ daśakāmāvasthābhedata iti|

saṃjñāskandhas+daśavidhas -> saṃjñāskandho daśavidhas

saṃjñāskandho daśavidhas+| -> saṃjñāskandho daśavidhaḥ|

kaladharas+iti -> kaladhara iti

ḍombyām+ca -> ḍombyāṃ ca

ḍombyāṃ ca+anusmṛtis -> ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtis

ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtis+syāt -> ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtiḥ syāt

ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtiḥ syāt+api -> ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtiḥ syād api

daśavidhas+iti| -> daśavidha iti|

vedanāskandhas+| -> vedanāskandhaḥ|

ratnapāṇis+iti -> ratnapāṇir iti

punar+api -> punar api

saṃskāraskandhas+vāmadakṣiṇadaśamaṇḍalaikalolībhūtatvāt -> saṃskāraskandho vāmadakṣiṇadaśamaṇḍalaikalolībhūtatvāt

saṃskāraskandho vāmadakṣiṇadaśamaṇḍalaikalolībhūtatvāt+iti| -> saṃskāraskandho vāmadakṣiṇadaśamaṇḍalaikalolībhūtatvād iti|

khaḍgī+iti -> khaḍgīti

daśavidhas+| -> daśavidhaḥ|

prāṇāyāmas+ca -> prāṇāyāmaś ca

dhyānam+iti -> dhyānam iti

daśavidhas+vijñānaskandhas -> daśavidho vijñānaskandhas

daśavidho vijñānaskandhas+viṣayaviṣayiṇām -> daśavidho vijñānaskandho viṣayaviṣayiṇām

daśavidho vijñānaskandho viṣayaviṣayiṇām+daśānām -> daśavidho vijñānaskandho viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānām

daśavidho vijñānaskandho viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānām+ekatvam -> daśavidho vijñānaskandho viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānām ekatvam

daśavidho vijñānaskandho viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānām ekatvam+viśvabimbe -> daśavidho vijñānaskandho viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānām ekatvaṃ viśvabimbe

dhyānam+akṣobhyas -> dhyānam akṣobhyas

dhyānam akṣobhyas+eva -> dhyānam akṣobhya eva

daśavidhas+dhūmamarīcikhadyotadīpajvālācandrādityarāhukalābindudarśanabhedena -> daśavidho dhūmamarīcikhadyotadīpajvālācandrādityarāhukalābindudarśanabhedena

daśavidho dhūmamarīcikhadyotadīpajvālācandrādityarāhukalābindudarśanabhedena+akalpitas -> daśavidho dhūmamarīcikhadyotadīpajvālācandrādityarāhukalābindudarśanabhedenākalpitas

daśavidho dhūmamarīcikhadyotadīpajvālācandrādityarāhukalābindudarśanabhedenākalpitas+jñānaskandhas -> daśavidho dhūmamarīcikhadyotadīpajvālācandrādityarāhukalābindudarśanabhedenākalpito jñānaskandhas

daśavidho dhūmamarīcikhadyotadīpajvālācandrādityarāhukalābindudarśanabhedenākalpito jñānaskandhas+| -> daśavidho dhūmamarīcikhadyotadīpajvālācandrādityarāhukalābindudarśanabhedenākalpito jñānaskandhaḥ|

jñānaskandhas+| -> jñānaskandhaḥ|

jinendras+iti -> jinendra iti

pratyāhāras+ādikarmaṇi -> pratyāhāra ādikarmaṇi

pratyāhāras+ityādinā| -> pratyāhāra ityādinā|

hi+ādikādyais -> hy ādikādyais

hy ādikādyais+|| -> hy ādikādyaiḥ||

yatas+bhidyate -> yato bhidyate

ekaikas+pañcabhedais -> ekaikaḥ pañcabhedais

ekaikaḥ pañcabhedais+punar -> ekaikaḥ pañcabhedaiḥ punar

ekaikaḥ pañcabhedaiḥ punar+api -> ekaikaḥ pañcabhedaiḥ punar api

kamaladharas+śrīsamādhis -> kamaladharaḥ śrīsamādhis

kamaladharaḥ śrīsamādhis+ca -> kamaladharaḥ śrīsamādhiś ca

ḍombyām+ca -> ḍombyāṃ ca

ḍombyāṃ ca+anusmṛtis -> ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtis

ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtis+syāt -> ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtiḥ syāt

ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtiḥ syāt+api -> ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtiḥ syād api

ratnapāṇis+| -> ratnapāṇiḥ|

punar+api -> punar api

prāṇāyāmas+ca -> prāṇāyāmaś ca

daśavidhas+dhyānam -> daśavidho dhyānam

daśavidho dhyānam+akṣobhyas -> daśavidho dhyānam akṣobhyas

daśavidho dhyānam akṣobhyas+eva -> daśavidho dhyānam akṣobhya eva

pratyāhāras+jinendras -> pratyāhāro jinendras

pratyāhāro jinendras+bhavati -> pratyāhāro jinendro bhavati

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

viṃśatyākārasambodhis+vibuddhas -> viṃśatyākārasambodhir vibuddhas

viṃśatyākārasambodhir vibuddhas+sarvavit -> viṃśatyākārasambodhir vibuddhaḥ sarvavit

viṃśatyākārasambodhir vibuddhaḥ sarvavit+paras -> viṃśatyākārasambodhir vibuddhaḥ sarvavit paras

viṃśatyākārasambodhir vibuddhaḥ sarvavit paras+|| -> viṃśatyākārasambodhir vibuddhaḥ sarvavit paraḥ||

dvādaśākārasatyārthas+ṣoḍaśākāratattvavit| -> dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavit|

tatas+--- -> tataḥ---

dvādaśabhūmīśvaras+bhavati| -> dvādaśabhūmīśvaro bhavati|

yāvat+na -> yāvan na

atas+mṛdvādibhedas -> ato mṛdvādibhedas

ato mṛdvādibhedas+bhūmilābhena -> ato mṛdvādibhedo bhūmilābhena

prādeśikaskandhadhātvāyatanādīnām+nirodhas -> prādeśikaskandhadhātvāyatanādīnāṃ nirodhas

prādeśikaskandhadhātvāyatanādīnāṃ nirodhas+| -> prādeśikaskandhadhātvāyatanādīnāṃ nirodhaḥ|

pravararasakulais+iti -> pravararasakulair iti

tasmāt+bindos -> tasmād bindos

tasmād bindos+viśvadarśanam -> tasmād bindor viśvadarśanam

tasmād bindor viśvadarśanam+bimbotpattis -> tasmād bindor viśvadarśanaṃ bimbotpattis

tasmād bindor viśvadarśanaṃ bimbotpattis+| -> tasmād bindor viśvadarśanaṃ bimbotpattiḥ|

tasmāt+iti -> tasmād iti

bimbotpattis+ca -> bimbotpattiś ca

binduparyantam+dhūmādinimittagrahaṇam| -> binduparyantaṃ dhūmādinimittagrahaṇam|

evam+sarvadevatānām -> evaṃ sarvadevatānām

evaṃ sarvadevatānām+caturvidham -> evaṃ sarvadevatānāṃ caturvidham

evaṃ sarvadevatānāṃ caturvidham+aṅgam -> evaṃ sarvadevatānāṃ caturvidham aṅgam

evaṃ sarvadevatānāṃ caturvidham aṅgam+yoginā -> evaṃ sarvadevatānāṃ caturvidham aṅgaṃ yoginā

punar+dantotthānāt -> punar dantotthānāt

punar dantotthānāt+ṣoḍaśavarṣordhvam -> punar dantotthānāt ṣoḍaśavarṣordhvam

punar dantotthānāt ṣoḍaśavarṣordhvam+prauḍhas -> punar dantotthānāt ṣoḍaśavarṣordhvaṃ prauḍhas

punar dantotthānāt ṣoḍaśavarṣordhvaṃ prauḍhas+putraduhitṛjanakatvāt -> punar dantotthānāt ṣoḍaśavarṣordhvaṃ prauḍhaḥ putraduhitṛjanakatvāt

punar dantotthānāt ṣoḍaśavarṣordhvaṃ prauḍhaḥ putraduhitṛjanakatvāt+iti| -> punar dantotthānāt ṣoḍaśavarṣordhvaṃ prauḍhaḥ putraduhitṛjanakatvād iti|

jalanidhikuliśais+iti -> jalanidhikuliśair iti

kalpanātmakaṃ bhāvayed ādikarmikas+| -> kalpanātmakaṃ bhāvayed ādikarmikaḥ|

evaṃ devatāsādhane+api -> evaṃ devatāsādhane 'pi

ṣaṭskandhaiś cakṣurādīnām+akṣaranyāsas -> ṣaṭskandhaiś cakṣurādīnām akṣaranyāsas

tatas+pravararasakulais -> tataḥ pravararasakulais

tataḥ pravararasakulais+iti -> tataḥ pravararasakulair iti

saptamāsais+garbhaniṣpattis -> saptamāsair garbhaniṣpattis

saptamāsair garbhaniṣpattis+kāyaniṣpattis -> saptamāsair garbhaniṣpattiḥ kāyaniṣpattis

saptamāsair garbhaniṣpattiḥ kāyaniṣpattis+iti -> saptamāsair garbhaniṣpattiḥ kāyaniṣpattir iti

saptamāsair garbhaniṣpattiḥ kāyaniṣpattir iti+arthas -> saptamāsair garbhaniṣpattiḥ kāyaniṣpattir ity arthas

saptamāsair garbhaniṣpattiḥ kāyaniṣpattir ity arthas+| -> saptamāsair garbhaniṣpattiḥ kāyaniṣpattir ity arthaḥ|

tatas+śukrādigrahaṇāt -> tataḥ śukrādigrahaṇāt

tataḥ śukrādigrahaṇāt+tasmāt -> tataḥ śukrādigrahaṇāt tasmāt

tataḥ śukrādigrahaṇāt tasmāt+bimbotpattis -> tataḥ śukrādigrahaṇāt tasmād bimbotpattis

tataḥ śukrādigrahaṇāt tasmād bimbotpattis+nāma -> tataḥ śukrādigrahaṇāt tasmād bimbotpattir nāma

saṃgrahas+| -> saṃgrahaḥ|

śukrabindūnām+grahaṇam -> śukrabindūnāṃ grahaṇam

tatas+kṣaṇāt -> tataḥ kṣaṇāt

tataḥ kṣaṇāt+paścāt -> tataḥ kṣaṇāt paścāt

tataḥ kṣaṇāt paścāt+saṃgrahas -> tataḥ kṣaṇāt paścāt saṃgrahas

tataḥ kṣaṇāt paścāt saṃgrahaś candrabindos+iti| -> tataḥ kṣaṇāt paścāt saṃgrahaś candrabindor iti|

skandhaparityāgāt+upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇāt -> skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇāt

skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇāt+yat -> skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yat

skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yat+antarālam -> skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālam

skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālam+śūnyatākṣaṇam -> skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam

skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam+ekam -> skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam ekam

skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam ekam+tribhavadarśanam -> skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam ekaṃ tribhavadarśanam

skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam ekaṃ tribhavadarśanam+śūnyam -> skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam ekaṃ tribhavadarśanaṃ śūnyam

skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam ekaṃ tribhavadarśanaṃ śūnyam+iti -> skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam ekaṃ tribhavadarśanaṃ śūnyam iti

skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam ekaṃ tribhavadarśanaṃ śūnyam iti+ucyate| -> skandhaparityāgād upapattyaṃśikaskandhagrahaṇād yad antarālaṃ śūnyatākṣaṇam ekaṃ tribhavadarśanaṃ śūnyam ity ucyate|

prāṇinām+maraṇānte -> prāṇināṃ maraṇānte

prathamaṃ śūnyatābodhis+iti -> prathamaṃ śūnyatābodhir iti

ādau+ityādi| -> ādāv ityādi|

tathā+eva|| -> tathaiva||

atra+upāyas -> atropāyas

atropāyas+caturdhā -> atropāyaś caturdhā

jalanidhikuliśaiḥ sādhanaṃ madhyamam+ca -> jalanidhikuliśaiḥ sādhanaṃ madhyamaṃ ca

tasmāt pravararasakulair akṣaranyāsas+eva| -> tasmāt pravararasakulair akṣaranyāsa eva|

idānīm+mṛdvādimātrābhedena -> idānīṃ mṛdvādimātrābhedena

evam+mahāsādhanam -> evaṃ mahāsādhanam

evaṃ mahāsādhanam+bhavati|| -> evaṃ mahāsādhanaṃ bhavati||

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

sarṣapādikam+iti -> sarṣapādikam iti

punas+prajñādharmodayanāsikāgre -> punaḥ prajñādharmodayanāsikāgre

suṣumnānāḍikordhvam+śukrasaṃyogāt -> suṣumnānāḍikordhvaṃ śukrasaṃyogāt

suṣumnānāḍikordhvaṃ śukrasaṃyogāt+mahāsādhanam -> suṣumnānāḍikordhvaṃ śukrasaṃyogān mahāsādhanam

suṣumnānāḍikordhvaṃ śukrasaṃyogān mahāsādhanam+iti -> suṣumnānāḍikordhvaṃ śukrasaṃyogān mahāsādhanam iti

suṣumnānāḍikordhvaṃ śukrasaṃyogān mahāsādhanam iti+ucyate -> suṣumnānāḍikordhvaṃ śukrasaṃyogān mahāsādhanam ity ucyate

mahāsādhanam+sūkṣmayogāt -> mahāsādhanaṃ sūkṣmayogāt

mahāsādhanaṃ sūkṣmayogāt+iti| -> mahāsādhanaṃ sūkṣmayogād iti|

tatas+mahāsādhanam -> tato mahāsādhanam

tato mahāsādhanam+prajñāsaṅge -> tato mahāsādhanaṃ prajñāsaṅge

tato mahāsādhanaṃ prajñāsaṅge+acyutam -> tato mahāsādhanaṃ prajñāsaṅge 'cyutam

tato mahāsādhanaṃ prajñāsaṅge 'cyutam+sukham -> tato mahāsādhanaṃ prajñāsaṅge 'cyutaṃ sukham

tato mahāsādhanaṃ prajñāsaṅge 'cyutaṃ sukham+sambhavati -> tato mahāsādhanaṃ prajñāsaṅge 'cyutaṃ sukhaṃ sambhavati

evam+sādhanam| -> evaṃ sādhanam|

bindūnām+sthitis -> bindūnāṃ sthitis

bindūnāṃ sthitis+iti -> bindūnāṃ sthitir iti

bindūnāṃ sthitir iti+arthas -> bindūnāṃ sthitir ity arthas

bindūnāṃ sthitir ity arthas+| -> bindūnāṃ sthitir ity arthaḥ|

sādhanam+syāt| -> sādhanaṃ syāt|

trivajrās+kāyavākcittabindavas -> trivajrāḥ kāyavākcittabindavas

trivajrāḥ kāyavākcittabindavas+abjasamarasagatā -> trivajrāḥ kāyavākcittabindavo 'bjasamarasagatā

iha+ānande -> ihānande

idānīm+sādhanam -> idānīṃ sādhanam

idānīṃ sādhanam+ucyate---ānanda -> idānīṃ sādhanam ucyate---ānanda

idānīṃ sādhanam ucyate---ānanda+ityādi| -> idānīṃ sādhanam ucyate---ānandetyādi|

neyārthena+iti -> neyārtheneti

neyārtheneti+upasādhanasiddhis -> neyārthenety upasādhanasiddhis

neyārthenety upasādhanasiddhis+| -> neyārthenety upasādhanasiddhiḥ|

kuliśakamalajena+amṛtena -> kuliśakamalajenāmṛtena

kuliśakamalajenāmṛtena+acyutena -> kuliśakamalajenāmṛtenācyutena

kuliśakamalajenāmṛtenācyutena+upasādhanam -> kuliśakamalajenāmṛtenācyutenopasādhanam

kuliśakamalajenāmṛtenācyutenopasādhanam+nītārthena| -> kuliśakamalajenāmṛtenācyutenopasādhanaṃ nītārthena|

dhyānam+prāṇāyāmas -> dhyānaṃ prāṇāyāmas

dhyānaṃ prāṇāyāmas+ca -> dhyānaṃ prāṇāyāmaś ca

śūnyatābimbe+anyais -> śūnyatābimbe 'nyais

śūnyatābimbe 'nyais+cakṣurādibhis -> śūnyatābimbe 'nyaiś cakṣurādibhis

śūnyatābimbe 'nyaiś cakṣurādibhis+māsādyais -> śūnyatābimbe 'nyaiś cakṣurādibhir māsādyais

śūnyatābimbe 'nyaiś cakṣurādibhir māsādyais+anyarūpādiviṣayagrahaṇam -> śūnyatābimbe 'nyaiś cakṣurādibhir māsādyair anyarūpādiviṣayagrahaṇam

śūnyatābimbe 'nyaiś cakṣurādibhir māsādyair anyarūpādiviṣayagrahaṇam+upasādhanam| -> śūnyatābimbe 'nyaiś cakṣurādibhir māsādyair anyarūpādiviṣayagrahaṇam upasādhanam|

tatparityāgas+pratyāhāras -> tatparityāgaḥ pratyāhāras

tatparityāgaḥ pratyāhāras+iti -> tatparityāgaḥ pratyāhāra iti

tatparityāgaḥ pratyāhāra iti+ucyate| -> tatparityāgaḥ pratyāhāra ity ucyate|

saṃsāriṇām+āhāras -> saṃsāriṇām āhāras

saṃsāriṇām āhāras+cakṣurādīndriyais -> saṃsāriṇām āhāraś cakṣurādīndriyais

saṃsāriṇām āhāraś cakṣurādīndriyais+rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇam| -> saṃsāriṇām āhāraś cakṣurādīndriyaī rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇam|

ucyate---pratyāhāras+iti| -> ucyate---pratyāhāra iti|

pratyāhāras+iti| -> pratyāhāra iti|

idānīm+upasādhanam -> idānīm upasādhanam

idānīm upasādhanam+ucyate---pratyā -> idānīm upasādhanam ucyate---pratyā

idānīm upasādhanam ucyate---pratyā+ityādi| -> idānīm upasādhanam ucyate---pratyetyādi|

jāpādikam+kartavyam -> jāpādikaṃ kartavyam

jāpādikaṃ kartavyam+sāmāyasiddhyartham|| -> jāpādikaṃ kartavyaṃ sāmāyasiddhyartham||

punar+akṣasūtrādinā -> punar akṣasūtrādinā

nītārthas+| -> nītārthaḥ|

vāgjalpitena+iti -> vāgjalpiteneti

prāṇena+ayantritena -> prāṇenāyantritena

devatās+varadās -> devatā varadās

recakapūrakakumbhakayogas+| -> recakapūrakakumbhakayogaḥ|

mantrajāpādibhiś ca+iti| -> mantrajāpādibhiś ceti|

bhavabhogaspṛhayā+iti| -> bhavabhogaspṛhayeti|

devatās+varadās -> devatā varadās

devatā varadās+bhavanti -> devatā varadā bhavanti

pañcapradīpās+| -> pañcapradīpāḥ|

pañcāmṛtam+viḍādikam| -> pañcāmṛtaṃ viḍādikam|

pañcāmṛtādyais+iti| -> pañcāmṛtādyair iti|

prathamam+sevā -> prathamaṃ sevā

iha+ādikarmikeṇa -> ihādikarmikeṇa

sevā+ityādi| -> sevetyādi|

mahāsādhanam+sūkṣmayogāt|| -> mahāsādhanaṃ sūkṣmayogāt||

sādhanam+syāt -> sādhanaṃ syāt

ānandādyais+trivajrābjasamarasagatā -> ānandādyais trivajrābjasamarasagatā

pratyāhārādibhis+syāt -> pratyāhārādibhiḥ syāt

pratyāhārādibhiḥ syāt+kuliśakamalajena -> pratyāhārādibhiḥ syāt kuliśakamalajena

pratyāhārādibhiḥ syāt kuliśakamalajena+amṛtena -> pratyāhārādibhiḥ syāt kuliśakamalajenāmṛtena

pratyāhārādibhiḥ syāt kuliśakamalajenāmṛtena+upasiddhis -> pratyāhārādibhiḥ syāt kuliśakamalajenāmṛtenopasiddhis

pratyāhārādibhiḥ syāt kuliśakamalajenāmṛtenopasiddhis+| -> pratyāhārādibhiḥ syāt kuliśakamalajenāmṛtenopasiddhiḥ|

pañcāmṛtādyais+jalanidhikuliśais -> pañcāmṛtādyair jalanidhikuliśais

pañcāmṛtādyair jalanidhikuliśais+mantrajāpādibhis -> pañcāmṛtādyair jalanidhikuliśair mantrajāpādibhis

pañcāmṛtādyair jalanidhikuliśair mantrajāpādibhis+ca -> pañcāmṛtādyair jalanidhikuliśair mantrajāpādibhiś ca

idānīm+sevādikam -> idānīṃ sevādikam

idānīṃ sevādikam+ucyate -> idānīṃ sevādikam ucyate

sahajasukhavaśāt+iti -> sahajasukhavaśād iti

sahajasukhavaśād iti+akṣarasukhavaśāt -> sahajasukhavaśād ity akṣarasukhavaśāt

sahajasukhavaśād ity akṣarasukhavaśāt+bhāvanā -> sahajasukhavaśād ity akṣarasukhavaśād bhāvanā

sahajasukhavaśād ity akṣarasukhavaśād bhāvanā+anāhatā -> sahajasukhavaśād ity akṣarasukhavaśād bhāvanānāhatā

tatas+prajñābje -> tataḥ prajñābje

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

dūtikās+|| -> dūtikāḥ||

kulikām+pūjayet -> kulikāṃ pūjayet

kulikāṃ pūjayet+nityam -> kulikāṃ pūjayen nityam

kulikāṃ pūjayen nityam+kālaviśeṣeṇa -> kulikāṃ pūjayen nityaṃ kālaviśeṣeṇa

śukraviṇmūtranirodhas+iti -> śukraviṇmūtranirodha iti

śukraviṇmūtranirodha iti+arthas -> śukraviṇmūtranirodha ity arthas

śukraviṇmūtranirodha ity arthas+| -> śukraviṇmūtranirodha ity arthaḥ|

tatas+nirodhāt -> tato nirodhāt

tato nirodhāt+ānandādyais -> tato nirodhād ānandādyais

tato nirodhād ānandādyais+iti -> tato nirodhād ānandādyair iti

tato nirodhād ānandādyair iti+ānandaparamaviramasahajais -> tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajais

tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajais+vajrābjais -> tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjais

tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjais+samarasagatais -> tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjaiḥ samarasagatais

tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjaiḥ samarasagatais+acyutatvāt -> tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjaiḥ samarasagatair acyutatvāt

tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjaiḥ samarasagatair acyutatvāt+bhāvanā -> tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjaiḥ samarasagatair acyutatvād bhāvanā

tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjaiḥ samarasagatair acyutatvād bhāvanā+iyam -> tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjaiḥ samarasagatair acyutatvād bhāvaneyam

tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjaiḥ samarasagatair acyutatvād bhāvaneyam+trivajrā -> tato nirodhād ānandādyair ity ānandaparamaviramasahajair vajrābjaiḥ samarasagatair acyutatvād bhāvaneyaṃ trivajrā

nirodhas+iti -> nirodha iti

nirodha iti+arthas -> nirodha ity arthas

nirodha ity arthas+| -> nirodha ity arthaḥ|

kāyavākcittayogas+iti -> kāyavākcittayoga iti

ebhis+abhyasyamānais -> ebhir abhyasyamānais

ebhir abhyasyamānais+vakṣyamāṇais -> ebhir abhyasyamānair vakṣyamāṇais

ebhir abhyasyamānair vakṣyamāṇais+sukanakakamale -> ebhir abhyasyamānair vakṣyamāṇaiḥ sukanakakamale

ebhir abhyasyamānair vakṣyamāṇaiḥ sukanakakamale+iti -> ebhir abhyasyamānair vakṣyamāṇaiḥ sukanakakamala iti

dhyānaṃ prāṇāyāmas+ca -> dhyānaṃ prāṇāyāmaś ca

pratyāhāras+tathā -> pratyāhāras tathā

tena+ayam -> tenāyam

tenāyam+ṣaḍaṅgayogas -> tenāyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgayogas

tenāyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgayogas+bhāvanīyas -> tenāyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgayogo bhāvanīyas

tenāyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgayogo bhāvanīyas+pratyāhārādiṣaḍbhis -> tenāyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgayogo bhāvanīyaḥ pratyāhārādiṣaḍbhis

tenāyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgayogo bhāvanīyaḥ pratyāhārādiṣaḍbhis+iti| -> tenāyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgayogo bhāvanīyaḥ pratyāhārādiṣaḍbhir iti|

eṣām+nirodhāt -> eṣāṃ nirodhāt

eṣāṃ nirodhāt+anāhatā -> eṣāṃ nirodhād anāhatā

madhyamāgatigatas+prāṇas -> madhyamāgatigataḥ prāṇas

madhyamāgatigataḥ prāṇas+cittajāpas -> madhyamāgatigataḥ prāṇaś cittajāpas

madhyamāgatigataḥ prāṇaś cittajāpas+iti -> madhyamāgatigataḥ prāṇaś cittajāpa iti

madhyamāgatigataḥ prāṇaś cittajāpa iti+ucyate| -> madhyamāgatigataḥ prāṇaś cittajāpa ity ucyate|

gatigataḥ prāṇo vāgjāpas+iti -> gatigataḥ prāṇo vāgjāpa iti

gatigataḥ prāṇo vāgjāpa iti+ucyate| -> gatigataḥ prāṇo vāgjāpa ity ucyate|

gatigataḥ prāṇaḥ kāyavajrajāpas+iti -> gatigataḥ prāṇaḥ kāyavajrajāpa iti

gatigataḥ prāṇaḥ kāyavajrajāpa iti+ucyate| -> gatigataḥ prāṇaḥ kāyavajrajāpa ity ucyate|

buddhānām+caturvimokṣabalena -> buddhānāṃ caturvimokṣabalena

buddhānāṃ caturvimokṣabalena+iti -> buddhānāṃ caturvimokṣabaleneti

evam+ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes

evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes+garbhajānām -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher garbhajānām

evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher garbhajānām+kāyavākcittajñānaniṣpattis -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher garbhajānāṃ kāyavākcittajñānaniṣpattis

evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher garbhajānāṃ kāyavākcittajñānaniṣpattis+devatānām -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher garbhajānāṃ kāyavākcittajñānaniṣpattir devatānām

evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher garbhajānāṃ kāyavākcittajñānaniṣpattir devatānām+bhāvanābalena -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher garbhajānāṃ kāyavākcittajñānaniṣpattir devatānāṃ bhāvanābalena

devatāmaṇḍalacakrākāraspharaṇam+saṃsāriṇām -> devatāmaṇḍalacakrākāraspharaṇaṃ saṃsāriṇām

devatāmaṇḍalacakrākāraspharaṇaṃ saṃsāriṇām+putraduhitṛspharaṇam -> devatāmaṇḍalacakrākāraspharaṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ putraduhitṛspharaṇam

devatāmaṇḍalacakrākāraspharaṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ putraduhitṛspharaṇam+bodhicittatas -> devatāmaṇḍalacakrākāraspharaṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ putraduhitṛspharaṇaṃ bodhicittatas

devatāmaṇḍalacakrākāraspharaṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ putraduhitṛspharaṇaṃ bodhicittatas+iti| -> devatāmaṇḍalacakrākāraspharaṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ putraduhitṛspharaṇaṃ bodhicittata iti|

traidhātukam+ekadā -> traidhātukam ekadā

traidhātukam ekadā+ākarṣaṇīyam -> traidhātukam ekadākarṣaṇīyam

traidhātukam ekadākarṣaṇīyam+iti -> traidhātukam ekadākarṣaṇīyam iti

tribhuvanasakalam+iti| -> tribhuvanasakalam iti|

acyutasukharaśmibhis+| -> acyutasukharaśmibhiḥ|

paścāt+jñānārciṣā -> paścāj jñānārciṣā

krameṇa+iti -> krameṇeti

bhavam+śodhayitvā -> bhavaṃ śodhayitvā

evam+kāmam -> evaṃ kāmam

evaṃ kāmam+rūpam -> evaṃ kāmaṃ rūpam

evaṃ kāmaṃ rūpam+hi -> evaṃ kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hi

evaṃ kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hi+arūpam -> evaṃ kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpam

evaṃ kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpam+trividham -> evaṃ kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpaṃ trividham

evaṃ kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpaṃ trividham+api -> evaṃ kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpaṃ trividham api

binduyogāt+sūkṣmayogas -> binduyogāt sūkṣmayogas

binduyogāt sūkṣmayogas+abhūt| -> binduyogāt sūkṣmayogo 'bhūt|

pratisenāsamam+tryadhvagatam -> pratisenāsamaṃ tryadhvagatam

pratisenāsamaṃ tryadhvagatam+jñānacakram -> pratisenāsamaṃ tryadhvagataṃ jñānacakram

pratisenāsamaṃ tryadhvagataṃ jñānacakram+syamambhūs -> pratisenāsamaṃ tryadhvagataṃ jñānacakraṃ syamambhūs

pratisenāsamaṃ tryadhvagataṃ jñānacakraṃ syamambhūs+iti -> pratisenāsamaṃ tryadhvagataṃ jñānacakraṃ syamambhūr iti

nānālaṃkārayuktam+ādarśagatam -> nānālaṃkārayuktam ādarśagatam

nānālaṃkārayuktam ādarśagatam+iva -> nānālaṃkārayuktam ādarśagatam iva

gatam+vaimalyam -> gataṃ vaimalyam

gataṃ vaimalyam+sphāritam -> gataṃ vaimalyaṃ sphāritam

gataṃ vaimalyaṃ sphāritam+bhavati| -> gataṃ vaimalyaṃ sphāritaṃ bhavati|

niḥspandādibhedena+ūrdhvam -> niḥspandādibhedenordhvam

niḥspandādibhedenordhvam+lalāṭe -> niḥspandādibhedenordhvaṃ lalāṭe

pañcadaśacandrakalāparipūrṇam+tathā -> pañcadaśacandrakalāparipūrṇaṃ tathā

lalāṭāt+ānandādibhedena -> lalāṭād ānandādibhedena

lalāṭād ānandādibhedena+āgatam -> lalāṭād ānandādibhedenāgatam

lalāṭād ānandādibhedenāgatam+vicitrādibhedena -> lalāṭād ānandādibhedenāgataṃ vicitrādibhedena

yathāgatam+tathāgatam -> yathāgataṃ tathāgatam

yathāgataṃ tathāgatam+sphāritam -> yathāgataṃ tathāgataṃ sphāritam

yathāgataṃ tathāgataṃ sphāritam+iti -> yathāgataṃ tathāgataṃ sphāritam iti

yathāgataṃ tathāgataṃ sphāritam iti+ucyate| -> yathāgataṃ tathāgataṃ sphāritam ity ucyate|

evam+prajñādharmodayastham -> evaṃ prajñādharmodayastham

evaṃ prajñādharmodayastham+bodhicittam -> evaṃ prajñādharmodayasthaṃ bodhicittam

evaṃ prajñādharmodayasthaṃ bodhicittam+punar -> evaṃ prajñādharmodayasthaṃ bodhicittaṃ punar

evaṃ prajñādharmodayasthaṃ bodhicittaṃ punar+api -> evaṃ prajñādharmodayasthaṃ bodhicittaṃ punar api

evaṃ prajñādharmodayasthaṃ bodhicittaṃ punar api+iti -> evaṃ prajñādharmodayasthaṃ bodhicittaṃ punar apīti

jñānabindus+| -> jñānabinduḥ|

cittabindus+kaṇṭhe -> cittabinduḥ kaṇṭhe

vāgbindus+hṛdaye -> vāgbindur hṛdaye

evam+drutas -> evaṃ drutas

evaṃ drutas+san -> evaṃ drutaḥ san

evaṃ drutaḥ san+guhye -> evaṃ drutaḥ san guhye

evaṃ drutaḥ san guhye+kāyabindus -> NO RULE FOUND (e+k)

kāyabindus+nābhau -> kāyabindur nābhau

prajñādharmodayas+ucyate| -> prajñādharmodaya ucyate|

evam+nābhihṛtkaṇṭhalalāṭoṣṇīṣakamalāni -> evaṃ nābhihṛtkaṇṭhalalāṭoṣṇīṣakamalāni

kamalam+prajñādharmodayas -> kamalaṃ prajñādharmodayas

kamalaṃ prajñādharmodayas+ucyate| -> kamalaṃ prajñādharmodaya ucyate|

tat+eva -> tad eva

tribhuvanasakalam+hi -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ hi

tribhuvanasakalaṃ hi+ekadā -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ hy ekadā

tribhuvanasakalaṃ hy ekadā+ākarṣaṇīyam|| -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ hy ekadākarṣaṇīyam||

paścāt+jñānārciṣā -> paścāj jñānārciṣā

bhavam+śodhayitvā -> bhavaṃ śodhayitvā

kāmam+rūpam -> kāmaṃ rūpam

kāmaṃ rūpam+hi -> kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hi

kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hi+arūpam -> kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpam

kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpam+trividham -> kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpaṃ trividham

kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpaṃ trividham+api -> kāmaṃ rūpaṃ hy arūpaṃ trividham api

jñānacakram+svayambhūs -> jñānacakraṃ svayambhūs

jñānacakraṃ svayambhūs+| -> jñānacakraṃ svayambhūḥ|

nānālaṃkārayuktādaraśagatam+iva -> nānālaṃkārayuktādaraśagatam iva

sakalam+sphāritam -> sakalaṃ sphāritam

sakalaṃ sphāritam+bindunā -> sakalaṃ sphāritaṃ bindunā

prajñādharmodayastham+punar -> prajñādharmodayasthaṃ punar

prajñādharmodayasthaṃ punar+api -> prajñādharmodayasthaṃ punar api

nābhes+guhyakamale|| -> nābher guhyakamale||

hṛdayāt+nābhau -> hṛdayān nābhau

kaṇṭhāt+hṛdaye -> kaṇṭhād dhṛdaye

śirasas+kaṇṭhe -> śirasaḥ kaṇṭhe

bodhicittam+iti -> bodhicittam iti

bodhicittam iti+arthas -> bodhicittam ity arthas

bodhicittam ity arthas+| -> bodhicittam ity arthaḥ|

yas+haṃkāras -> yo haṃkāras

yo haṃkāras+bindurūpam -> yo haṃkāro bindurūpam

yo haṃkāro bindurūpam+śukram -> yo haṃkāro bindurūpaṃ śukram

yo haṃkāro bindurūpaṃ śukram+āgantukam -> yo haṃkāro bindurūpaṃ śukram āgantukam

yo haṃkāro bindurūpaṃ śukram āgantukam+sa -> yo haṃkāro bindurūpaṃ śukram āgantukaṃ sa

janmabodhibījāt+śirasi -> janmabodhibījāc chirasi

sucandrāt+iti -> sucandrād iti

evam+sarvān -> evaṃ sarvān

evaṃ sarvān+dagdhvā -> evaṃ sarvān dagdhvā

manasas+dharmadhātugrahaṇāt -> manaso dharmadhātugrahaṇāt

manaso dharmadhātugrahaṇāt+sarveṣām -> manaso dharmadhātugrahaṇāt sarveṣām

manaso dharmadhātugrahaṇāt sarveṣām+apravṛttis -> manaso dharmadhātugrahaṇāt sarveṣām apravṛttis

manaso dharmadhātugrahaṇāt sarveṣām apravṛttis+iti -> manaso dharmadhātugrahaṇāt sarveṣām apravṛttir iti

rūpādīn+viṣayān -> rūpādīn viṣayān

rūpādīn viṣayān+api| -> rūpādīn viṣayān api|

cakṣurādīn+dahati -> cakṣurādīn dahati

vairocanādīn+pañcamaṇḍalagatān -> vairocanādin pañcamaṇḍalagatān

vairocanādin pañcamaṇḍalagatān+vāme -> vairocanādin pañcamaṇḍalagatān vāme

tejas+kāmāgnis -> tejaḥ kāmāgnis

tejaḥ kāmāgnis+tena -> tejaḥ kāmāgnis tena

jñānam+kāmas -> jñānaṃ kāmas

jñānaṃ kāmas+tasya -> jñānaṃ kāmas tasya

jñānatejaḥprabuddhā+iti| -> jñānatejaḥprabuddheti|

tasmin+navahatabhujage -> tasmin navahatabhujage

nāḍīcakram+navahatabhujagam -> nāḍīcakraṃ navahatabhujagam

nāḍīcakraṃ navahatabhujagam+dvāsaptatināḍikātmakam -> nāḍīcakraṃ navahatabhujagaṃ dvāsaptatināḍikātmakam

nāḍīcakraṃ navahatabhujagaṃ dvāsaptatināḍikātmakam+dvādaśarāśināḍyātmakam -> nāḍīcakraṃ navahatabhujagaṃ dvāsaptatināḍikātmakaṃ dvādaśarāśināḍyātmakam

nāḍīcakraṃ navahatabhujagaṃ dvāsaptatināḍikātmakaṃ dvādaśarāśināḍyātmakam+ṣaṣṭimaṇḍalanāḍyātmakam| -> nāḍīcakraṃ navahatabhujagaṃ dvāsaptatināḍikātmakaṃ dvādaśarāśināḍyātmakaṃ ṣaṣṭimaṇḍalanāḍyātmakam|

navahatabhujage+iti| -> navahatabhujaga iti|

bhagavatas+mañjuśriyas -> bhagavato mañjuśriyas

bhagavato mañjuśriyas+niyamas -> bhagavato mañjuśriyo niyamas

bhagavato mañjuśriyo niyamas+| -> bhagavato mañjuśriyo niyamaḥ|

mūlatantrānusāreṇa+avagantavyas -> mūlatantrānusāreṇāvagantavyas

mūlatantrānusāreṇāvagantavyas+iti -> mūlatantrānusāreṇāvagantavya iti

asmin+punas -> asmin punas

asmin punas+saṃkṣepatas -> asmin punaḥ saṃkṣepatas

asmin punaḥ saṃkṣepatas+uktas -> asmin punaḥ saṃkṣepata uktas

asmin punaḥ saṃkṣepata uktas+| -> asmin punaḥ saṃkṣepata uktaḥ|

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

dhyānādikam+ca -> dhyānādikaṃ ca

bhāvayet+akhilam -> bhāvayed akhilam

bhāvayed akhilam+tasyām -> bhāvayed akhilaṃ tasyām

bhāvayed akhilaṃ tasyām+yogī -> bhāvayed akhilaṃ tasyāṃ yogī

tasyām+bimbam -> tasyāṃ bimbam

tasyāṃ bimbam+carācaram| -> tasyāṃ bimbaṃ carācaram|

yatra+eva -> yatraiva

yatraiva+āropitam -> yatraivāropitam

yatraivāropitam+manas -> yatraivāropitaṃ manas

yatraivāropitaṃ manas+|| -> yatraivāropitaṃ manaḥ||

tat+ca -> tac ca

parijñānam+traidhātukam -> parijñānaṃ traidhātukam

parijñānaṃ traidhātukam+aśeṣatas -> parijñānaṃ traidhātukam aśeṣatas

parijñānaṃ traidhātukam aśeṣatas+| -> parijñānaṃ traidhātukam aśeṣataḥ|

smṛtas+|| -> smṛtaḥ||

sarṣapas+khyātas -> sarṣapaḥ khyātas

sarṣapaḥ khyātas+prāṇāyāmas -> sarṣapaḥ khyātaḥ prāṇāyāmas

sarṣapaḥ khyātaḥ prāṇāyāmas+sa -> sarṣapaḥ khyātaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ sa

pañcaraśmimayas+prāṇas -> pañcaraśmimayaḥ prāṇas

pañcaraśmimayaḥ prāṇas+pañcamaṇḍalavāhakas -> pañcaraśmimayaḥ prāṇaḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhakas

pañcaraśmimayaḥ prāṇaḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhakas+| -> pañcaraśmimayaḥ prāṇaḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhakaḥ|

nābhyūrdhvam+ḍombinī -> nābhyūrdhvaṃ ḍombinī

śaṅkhinī+iyam -> śaṅkhinīyam

śaṅkhinīyam+mahāmudrā -> śaṅkhinīyaṃ mahāmudrā

khyātas+niḥspandādigatordhvatas -> khyāto niḥspandādigatordhvatas

khyāto niḥspandādigatordhvatas+|| -> khyāto niḥspandādigatordhvataḥ||

sūkṣmayogas+iti -> sūkṣmayoga iti

akalas+kalanātītas -> akalaḥ kalanātītas

akalaḥ kalanātītas+caturthadhyānakoṭidhṛk| -> akalaḥ kalanātītaś caturthadhyānakoṭidhṛk|

khyātas+niḥspandādigatordhvatas -> khyāto niḥspandādigatordhvatas

khyāto niḥspandādigatordhvatas+|| -> khyāto niḥspandādigatordhvataḥ||

binduyogas+iti -> binduyoga iti

amṛtam+śukrarūpiṇam| -> amṛtaṃ śukrarūpiṇam|

dagdhe+aham -> dagdhe 'ham

dagdhe 'ham+sravate -> dagdhe 'haṃ sravate

cakṣurādīn+ca -> cakṣurādīṃś ca

traidhātukam+aśeṣatas -> traidhātukam aśeṣatas

traidhātukam aśeṣatas+|| -> traidhātukam aśeṣataḥ||

bhāvayet+buddhabimbam -> bhāvayed buddhabimbam

bhāvayed buddhabimbam+tu -> bhāvayed buddhabimbaṃ tu

ca+utsṛjet| -> cotsṛjet|

bodhicittam+na -> bodhicittaṃ na

liṅgam+pratiṣṭhāpya -> liṅgaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya

garvaṃ vajradharam+vahan|| -> garvaṃ vajradharaṃ vahan||

kurvan+tatas -> kurvaṃś tatas

kurvaṃś tatas+yogī -> kurvaṃś tato yogī

evam+sakamalam -> evaṃ sakamalam

evaṃ sakamalam+kuliśam -> evaṃ sakamalaṃ kuliśam

evaṃ sakamalaṃ kuliśam+kṛtvā -> evaṃ sakamalaṃ kuliśaṃ kṛtvā

tanmadhye+aṣṭadalam -> tanmadhye 'ṣṭadalam

tanmadhye 'ṣṭadalam+padmam -> tanmadhye 'ṣṭadalaṃ padmam

tanmadhye 'ṣṭadalaṃ padmam+āḥkāreṇa -> tanmadhye 'ṣṭadalaṃ padmam āḥkāreṇa

svakam+vajram -> svakaṃ vajram

svakaṃ vajram+pañcaśūkam -> svakaṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkam

svakaṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkam+vibhāvayet| -> svakaṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ vibhāvayet|

evam+sakuliśam -> evaṃ sakuliśam

evaṃ sakuliśam+kamalam -> evaṃ sakuliśaṃ kamalam

evaṃ sakuliśaṃ kamalam+prajñāyās -> evaṃ sakuliśaṃ kamalaṃ prajñāyās

evaṃ sakuliśaṃ kamalaṃ prajñāyās+spandahetutas -> evaṃ sakuliśaṃ kamalaṃ prajñāyāḥ spandahetutas

evaṃ sakuliśaṃ kamalaṃ prajñāyāḥ spandahetutas+|| -> evaṃ sakuliśaṃ kamalaṃ prajñāyāḥ spandahetutaḥ||

āḥkāreṇa+aṣṭadalam -> āḥkāreṇāṣṭadalam

āḥkāreṇāṣṭadalam+padmam -> āḥkāreṇāṣṭadalaṃ padmam

āḥkāreṇāṣṭadalaṃ padmam+hūṃkārakuliśānvitam| -> āḥkāreṇāṣṭadalaṃ padmaṃ hūṃkārakuliśānvitam|

tatas+padmam -> tataḥ padmam

tataḥ padmam+viśodhayet|| -> tataḥ padmaṃ viśodhayet||

kāyavākcittarāgān+ca -> kāyavākcittarāgāṃś ca

sādhanam+ārabhet|| -> sādhanam ārabhet||

suśikṣitām+kṛtvā -> suśikṣitāṃ kṛtvā

ṣoḍaśābdāṃ kulīnām+vā -> ṣoḍaśābdāṃ kulīnāṃ vā

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

madhyamānām+mahāmudrayā -> madhyamānāṃ mahāmudrayā

madhyamānāṃ mahāmudrayā+uttamayoginām -> madhyamānāṃ mahāmudrayottamayoginām

madhyamānāṃ mahāmudrayottamayoginām+iti| -> madhyamānāṃ mahāmudrayottamayoginām iti|

sādhanam+karmamudrayā -> sādhanaṃ karmamudrayā

sādhanaṃ karmamudrayā+uktam -> sādhanaṃ karmamudrayoktam

sādhanaṃ karmamudrayoktam+bālajanānām -> sādhanaṃ karmamudrayoktaṃ bālajanānām

sādhanaṃ karmamudrayoktaṃ bālajanānām+jñānamudrayā -> sādhanaṃ karmamudrayoktaṃ bālajanānāṃ jñānamudrayā

prajñāsamarpaṇam+karoti -> prajñāsamarpaṇaṃ karoti

prajñāsamarpaṇaṃ karoti+ācāryas -> prajñāsamarpaṇaṃ karoty ācāryas

prajñāsamarpaṇaṃ karoty ācāryas+| -> prajñāsamarpaṇaṃ karoty ācāryaḥ|

vivāhapāṇigrahaṇādikam+kāryam| -> vivāhapāṇigrahaṇādikaṃ kāryam|

tasya+upabhogāya -> tasyopabhogāya

narāṇām+ṣoḍaśavarṣānte -> narāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣānte

śukracyavanāt+sukhopalabdhis -> śukracyavanāt sukhopalabdhis

śukracyavanāt sukhopalabdhis+sūkṣmayogas -> śukracyavanāt sukhopalabdhiḥ sūkṣmayogas

śukracyavanāt sukhopalabdhiḥ sūkṣmayogas+| -> śukracyavanāt sukhopalabdhiḥ sūkṣmayogaḥ|

bodhicittabinduniṣpattis+binduyogas -> bodhicittabinduniṣpattir binduyogas

bodhicittabinduniṣpattir binduyogas+| -> bodhicittabinduniṣpattir binduyogaḥ|

vāṅniṣpattis+karmarājāgrī -> vāṅniṣpattiḥ karmarājāgrī

kāyaniṣpattis+maṇḍalarājāgrī| -> kāyaniṣpattir maṇḍalarājāgrī|

caṇḍālī+ityādinā| -> caṇḍālītyādinā|

yas+bindurūpam -> yo bindurūpam

yo bindurūpam+sa -> yo bindurūpaṃ sa

sucandrāt+sravati -> sucandrāt sravati

sarvān+dagdhvā -> sarvān dagdhvā

vairocanādīn+dahati -> vairocanādīn dahati

yat+tasya -> yat tasya

yat tasya+upāyas -> yat tasyopāyas

yat tasyopāyas+samyak -> yat tasyopāyaḥ samyak

yat tasyopāyaḥ samyak+binduyogas -> yat tasyopāyaḥ samyag binduyogas

yat tasyopāyaḥ samyag binduyogas+prakathyate|| -> yat tasyopāyaḥ samyag binduyogaḥ prakathyate||

praṇipatya+acyutam -> praṇipatyācyutam

praṇipatyācyutam+saukhyam -> praṇipatyācyutaṃ saukhyam

praṇipatyācyutaṃ saukhyam+ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudhṛk| -> praṇipatyācyutaṃ saukhyaṃ ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudhṛk|

utpannakramasādhanamahoddeśas+| -> utpannakramasādhanamahoddeśaḥ|

prāṇadevatotpādamahoddeśas+tṛtīyas -> prāṇadevatotpādamahoddeśas tṛtīyas

prāṇadevatotpādamahoddeśas tṛtīyas+|| -> prāṇadevatotpādamahoddeśas tṛtīyaḥ||

mūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām+dvādaśasāhasrikāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām+sādhanāpaṭale -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ sādhanāpaṭale

vāṅniṣpattis+dvitīyā|| -> vāṅniṣpattir dvitīyā||

evam+jātakasya -> evaṃ jātakasya

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

devatānām+padmāsanaviśuddhis -> devatānāṃ padmāsanaviśuddhis

devatānāṃ padmāsanaviśuddhis+prakampābhāvatas -> devatānāṃ padmāsanaviśuddhiḥ prakampābhāvatas

devatānāṃ padmāsanaviśuddhiḥ prakampābhāvatas+bhavati -> devatānāṃ padmāsanaviśuddhiḥ prakampābhāvato bhavati

devatānāṃ padmāsanaviśuddhiḥ prakampābhāvato bhavati+iti -> devatānāṃ padmāsanaviśuddhiḥ prakampābhāvato bhavatīti

prāṇavāyos+pracāras -> prāṇavāyoḥ pracāras

prāṇavāyoḥ pracāras+yas -> prāṇavāyoḥ pracāro yas

prāṇavāyoḥ pracāro yas+tena -> prāṇavāyoḥ pracāro yas tena

evam+samaviṣamagatau -> evaṃ samaviṣamagatau

pracāras+vajrāsanam -> pracāro vajrāsanam

pracāro vajrāsanam+iti| -> pracāro vajrāsanam iti|

pracāras+padmāsanam| -> pracāraḥ padmāsanam|

pracāras+lalitapadam| -> pracāro lalitapadam|

pracāras+maṇḍalapadam| -> pracāro maṇḍalapadam|

prāṇasaṃcāras+vaiśākhapadam| -> prāṇasaṃcāro vaiśākhapadam|

ca+iti -> ceti

ceti+ākāśamaṇḍale -> cety ākāśamaṇḍale

vāmanāḍyām+dakṣiṇanāḍyām -> vāmanāḍyāṃ dakṣiṇanāḍyām

vāmanāḍyāṃ dakṣiṇanāḍyām+vā -> vāmanāḍyāṃ dakṣiṇanāḍyāṃ vā

yat+tat -> yat tat

yat tat+yathākrameṇa -> yat tad yathākrameṇa

vajrāsanam+ca -> vajrāsanaṃ ca

padmāsanam+ca -> padmāsanaṃ ca

lalitapadam+ca -> lalitapadaṃ ca

vaiśākhapadam+maṇḍalam -> vaiśākhapadaṃ maṇḍalam

vaiśākhapadaṃ maṇḍalam+ca -> vaiśākhapadaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca

dakṣiṇacārāt+vāmasaṃkocanāt -> dakṣiṇacārād vāmasaṃkocanāt

dakṣiṇacārād vāmasaṃkocanāt+ālīḍham -> dakṣiṇacārād vāmasaṃkocanād ālīḍham

dakṣiṇacārād vāmasaṃkocanād ālīḍham+padam -> dakṣiṇacārād vāmasaṃkocanād ālīḍhaṃ padam

dakṣiṇacārād vāmasaṃkocanād ālīḍhaṃ padam+bhavati| -> dakṣiṇacārād vāmasaṃkocanād ālīḍhaṃ padaṃ bhavati|

arkacārāt+iti -> arkacārād iti

samapadam+bhavet| -> samapadaṃ bhavet|

samapadam+aparam -> samapadam aparam

samapadam aparam+ālīḍhapadam -> samapadam aparam ālīḍhapadam

samapadam aparam ālīḍhapadam+yathāsaṃkhyam -> samapadam aparam ālīḍhapadaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam

samapadam aparam ālīḍhapadaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam+agnicārāt -> samapadam aparam ālīḍhapadaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam agnicārāt

samapadam aparam ālīḍhapadaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam agnicārāt+iti -> samapadam aparam ālīḍhapadaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam agnicārād iti

mantradevatāyās+| -> mantradevatāyāḥ|

yat+pratyālīḍham -> yat pratyālīḍham

yat pratyālīḍham+padam -> yat pratyālīḍhaṃ padam

yat pratyālīḍhaṃ padam+tat -> yat pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tat

yat pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tat+ucyate -> yat pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tad ucyate

tathā+ākuñcanam -> tathākuñcanam

tathākuñcanam+dakṣiṇe -> tathākuñcanaṃ dakṣiṇe

prāṇasaṃcāras+yat -> prāṇasaṃcāro yat

prāṇasaṃcāro yat+tat -> prāṇasaṃcāro yat tat

prāṇasaṃcāro yat tat+bhavati| -> prāṇasaṃcāro yat tad bhavati|

prāṇas+api -> prāṇo 'pi

saṃkocas+bhavati| -> saṃkoco bhavati|

pracāras+bhavati -> pracāro bhavati

vāmanāḍyām+prāṇasya -> vāmanāḍyāṃ prāṇasya

saṃsāriṇām+yadā -> saṃsāriṇāṃ yadā

vāma+ityādi| -> vāmetyādi|

prāṇavāyos+|| -> prāṇavāyoḥ||

pracāras+samaviṣamagatau -> pracāraḥ samaviṣamagatau

varalalitapadam+padmavajrāsanam -> varalalitapadaṃ padmavajrāsanam

varalalitapadaṃ padmavajrāsanam+ca -> varalalitapadaṃ padmavajrāsanaṃ ca

vaiśākham+maṇḍalam -> vaiśākhaṃ maṇḍalam

vaiśākhaṃ maṇḍalam+vai -> vaiśākhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vai

pratyālīḍham+padam -> pratyālīḍhaṃ padam

pratyālīḍhaṃ padam+tat -> pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tat

pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tat+samapadam -> pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tat samapadam

pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tat samapadam+aparālīḍham -> pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tat samapadam aparālīḍham

pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tat samapadam aparālīḍham+agnyarkacārāt| -> pratyālīḍhaṃ padaṃ tat samapadam aparālīḍham agnyarkacārāt|

tathā+ākuñcanam -> tathākuñcanam

tathākuñcanam+dakṣiṇe -> tathākuñcanaṃ dakṣiṇe

prāṇapracāras+prabhavati -> prāṇapracāraḥ prabhavati

idānīm+pratyālīḍhapadādiviśuddhis -> idānīṃ pratyālīḍhapadādiviśuddhis

idānīṃ pratyālīḍhapadādiviśuddhis+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ pratyālīḍhapadādiviśuddhir ucyate---

nyāyas+|| -> nyāyaḥ||

nirāvaraṇadharmas+bhavati -> nirāvaraṇadharmo bhavati

nirāvaraṇadharmo bhavati+utpādavyayarahitas -> nirāvaraṇadharmo bhavaty utpādavyayarahitas

nirāvaraṇadharmo bhavaty utpādavyayarahitas+iti -> nirāvaraṇadharmo bhavaty utpādavyayarahita iti

evam+sāvaraṇadharme -> evaṃ sāvaraṇadharme

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

ṣaḍaṅgena+iti -> ṣaḍaṅgeneti

ca+akṣarārtham -> cākṣarārtham

cākṣarārtham+iti -> cākṣarārtham iti

cākṣarārtham iti+acyutakṣaṇārtham -> cākṣarārtham ity acyutakṣaṇārtham

cākṣarārtham ity acyutakṣaṇārtham+vakṣyamāṇena -> cākṣarārtham ity acyutakṣaṇārthaṃ vakṣyamāṇena

tattvam+yasmāt -> tattvaṃ yasmāt

tattvaṃ yasmāt+tasmāt -> tattvaṃ yasmāt tasmāt

tattvaṃ yasmāt tasmāt+tat -> tattvaṃ yasmāt tasmāt tat

tattvaṃ yasmāt tasmāt tat+bhāvanīyam -> tattvaṃ yasmāt tasmāt tad bhāvanīyam

tattvaṃ yasmāt tasmāt tad bhāvanīyam+aharniśikāle -> tattvaṃ yasmāt tasmāt tad bhāvanīyam aharniśikāle

mahāsukham+prayāti -> mahāsukhaṃ prayāti

mahāsukhaṃ prayāti+iti| -> mahāsukhaṃ prayātīti|

kṛte+ekasmin -> kṛta ekasmin

kṛta ekasmin+samaye -> kṛta ekasmin samaye

kālas+tasmin -> kālas tasmin

kālas tasmin+kāle -> kālas tasmin kāle

samayas+iti -> samaya iti

turyāvasthāyām+saukhyam -> turyāvasthāyāṃ saukhyam

turyāvasthāyāṃ saukhyam+prayāti| -> turyāvasthāyāṃ saukhyaṃ prayāti|

nirindriyam+manas -> nirindriyaṃ manas

nirindriyaṃ manas+bhavati -> nirindriyaṃ mano bhavati

nirindriyaṃ mano bhavati+iti -> nirindriyaṃ mano bhavatīti

nirindriyaṃ mano bhavatīti+arthas -> nirindriyaṃ mano bhavatīty arthas

nirindriyaṃ mano bhavatīty arthas+| -> nirindriyaṃ mano bhavatīty arthaḥ|

suṣuptāvasthāyām+nidrām -> suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ nidrām

suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ nidrām+ca -> suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ nidrāṃ ca

guṇavaśāt+iti -> guṇavaśād iti

cintām+vrajati -> cintāṃ vrajati

svapnāvasthāyām+adṛṣṭaviṣayeṣu -> svapnāvasthāyām adṛṣṭaviṣayeṣu

svapnāvasthāyām adṛṣṭaviṣayeṣu+ajaḍeṣu -> svapnāvasthāyām adṛṣṭaviṣayeṣv ajaḍeṣu

manas+kāyavāgindriyas -> manaḥ kāyavāgindriyas

manaḥ kāyavāgindriyas+karaṇabhūtais -> manaḥ kāyavāgindriyaḥ karaṇabhūtais

manaḥ kāyavāgindriyaḥ karaṇabhūtais+viṣayeṣu| -> manaḥ kāyavāgindriyaḥ karaṇabhūtair viṣayeṣu|

jāgradavasthāyām+bhogakartṛ -> jāgradavasthāyāṃ bhogakartṛ

saṃsāriṇām+nirmāṇe -> saṃsāriṇāṃ nirmāṇe

nirmāṇe+ityādi| -> nirmāṇa ityādi|

ca+akṣarārtham|| -> cākṣarārtham||

tasmāt+tat -> tasmāt tat

tasmāt tat+bhāvanīyam -> tasmāt tad bhāvanīyam

tasmāt tad bhāvanīyam+pratidinasamaye -> tasmāt tad bhāvanīyaṃ pratidinasamaye

saukhyam+prayāti -> saukhyaṃ prayāti

saukhyaṃ prayāti+atra -> saukhyaṃ prayāty atra

guṇavaśāt+dharmakāye -> guṇavaśād dharmakāye

sambhoge+adṛṣṭacintām -> sambhoge 'dṛṣṭacintām

sambhoge 'dṛṣṭacintām+vrajati -> sambhoge 'dṛṣṭacintāṃ vrajati

manas+kāyavāgindriyais -> manaḥ kāyavāgindriyais

manaḥ kāyavāgindriyais+ca -> manaḥ kāyavāgindriyaiś ca

idānīm+catuṣkāyakṛtyam -> idānīṃ catuṣkāyakṛtyam

idānīṃ catuṣkāyakṛtyam+āha--- -> idānīṃ catuṣkāyakṛtyam āha---

bhavaparijñānatas+iti||107|| -> bhavaparijñānata iti||107||

manas+viharati| -> mano viharati|

jinapates+sarvasattvārthakartus -> jinapateḥ sarvasattvārthakartus

jinapateḥ sarvasattvārthakartus+saṃvṛtyāvaraṇakṣayāt -> jinapateḥ sarvasattvārthakartuḥ saṃvṛtyāvaraṇakṣayāt

jinapateḥ sarvasattvārthakartuḥ saṃvṛtyāvaraṇakṣayāt+iti| -> jinapateḥ sarvasattvārthakartuḥ saṃvṛtyāvaraṇakṣayād iti|

kāyabhedas+bhavati| -> kāyabhedo bhavati|

evam+maṇḍale -> evaṃ maṇḍale

punar+uktas -> punar uktas

punar uktas+caturdhā| -> punar uktaś caturdhā|

kāyaniṣpattes+prāṇanirgamakālāt -> kāyaniṣpatteḥ prāṇanirgamakālāt

kāyaniṣpatteḥ prāṇanirgamakālāt+bāhye -> kāyaniṣpatteḥ prāṇanirgamakālād bāhye

tasmāt+nirmāṇakāyas -> tasmān nirmāṇakāyas

tasmān nirmāṇakāyas+jāgrallakṣaṇas -> tasmān nirmāṇakāyo jāgrallakṣaṇas

tasmān nirmāṇakāyo jāgrallakṣaṇas+| -> tasmān nirmāṇakāyo jāgrallakṣaṇaḥ|

tasmāt+sambhogakāyas -> tasmāt sambhogakāyas

tasmāt sambhogakāyas+svapnalakṣaṇas -> tasmāt sambhogakāyaḥ svapnalakṣaṇas

tasmāt sambhogakāyaḥ svapnalakṣaṇas+| -> tasmāt sambhogakāyaḥ svapnalakṣaṇaḥ|

tasmāt+dharmakāyas -> tasmād dharmakāyas

tasmād dharmakāyas+suṣuptāvasthālakṣaṇas -> tasmād dharmakāyaḥ suṣuptāvasthālakṣaṇas

tasmād dharmakāyaḥ suṣuptāvasthālakṣaṇas+| -> tasmād dharmakāyaḥ suṣuptāvasthālakṣaṇaḥ|

śuddhakāyas+sahajakāyas -> śuddhakāyaḥ sahajakāyas

śuddhakāyaḥ sahajakāyas+iti -> śuddhakāyaḥ sahajakāya iti

śuddhakāyaḥ sahajakāya iti+arthas -> śuddhakāyaḥ sahajakāya ity arthas

śuddhakāyaḥ sahajakāya ity arthas+| -> śuddhakāyaḥ sahajakāya ity arthaḥ|

śrīkārāt+advayam -> śrīkārād advayam

śrīkārād advayam+jñānam -> śrīkārād advayaṃ jñānam

śrīkārād advayaṃ jñānam+saṃvṛtyā -> śrīkārād advayaṃ jñānaṃ saṃvṛtyā

tat+eva -> tad eva

mahāsukham+iti -> mahāsukham iti

mahāsukham iti+uktam| -> mahāsukham ity uktam|

iha+ādhānakāle -> ihādhānakāle

prāṇinas+aṅge -> prāṇino 'ṅge

kāyaprabhedais+manas -> kāyaprabhedair manas

kāyaprabhedair manas+caturdhā -> kāyaprabhedair manaś caturdhā

avidyāvasānātas+turyādayas -> avidyāvasānātas turyādayas

avidyāvasānātas turyādayas+avasthās -> avidyāvasānātas turyādayo 'vasthās

avidyāvasānātas turyādayo 'vasthās+catasras -> avidyāvasānātas turyādayo 'vasthāś catasras

avidyāvasānātas turyādayo 'vasthāś catasras+saṃsāriṇām -> avidyāvasānātas turyādayo 'vasthāś catasraḥ saṃsāriṇām

avidyāvasānātas turyādayo 'vasthāś catasraḥ saṃsāriṇām+bhavanti| -> avidyāvasānātas turyādayo 'vasthāś catasraḥ saṃsāriṇāṃ bhavanti|

pratītyotpannadharmās+kṣaṇikās -> pratītyotpannadharmāḥ kṣaṇikās

pratītyotpannadharmāḥ kṣaṇikās+utpādavyayalakṣaṇās -> pratītyotpannadharmāḥ kṣaṇikā utpādavyayalakṣaṇās

pratītyotpannadharmāḥ kṣaṇikā utpādavyayalakṣaṇās+bhavasya -> pratītyotpannadharmāḥ kṣaṇikā utpādavyayalakṣaṇā bhavasya

pratītyotpannadharmāḥ kṣaṇikā utpādavyayalakṣaṇā bhavasya+aparijñānāt| -> pratītyotpannadharmāḥ kṣaṇikā utpādavyayalakṣaṇā bhavasyāparijñānāt|

śrīśuddhāt+ityādi| -> śrīśuddhād ityādi|

manas+prāṇinas -> manaḥ prāṇinas

manaḥ prāṇinas+aṅge -> manaḥ prāṇino 'ṅge

evaṃ kāyaprabhedais+viharati -> evaṃ kāyaprabhedair viharati

punar+aparā -> punar aparā

jinapateḥ sarvasattvārthakartus+| -> jinapateḥ sarvasattvārthakartuḥ|

bhogāt+nirmāṇakāyas -> bhogān nirmāṇakāyas

bhogān nirmāṇakāyas+bhavati -> bhogān nirmāṇakāyo bhavati

susambhogakāyas+hi -> susambhogakāyo hi

śrīśuddhāt+dharmakāyas -> śrīśuddhād dharmakāyas

śrīśuddhād dharmakāyas+bhavati -> śrīśuddhād dharmakāyo bhavati

idanīm+śuddhadharmakāyādyutpattis -> idanīṃ śuddhadharmakāyādyutpattis

idanīṃ śuddhadharmakāyādyutpattis+ucyate--- -> idanīṃ śuddhadharmakāyādyutpattir ucyate---

siddham+daśabhūmīśvaratvam|| -> siddhaṃ daśabhūmīśvaratvam||

bodhisattvānām+lavamātrāvaraṇatas -> bodhisattvānāṃ lavamātrāvaraṇatas

bodhisattvānāṃ lavamātrāvaraṇatas+evam -> bodhisattvānāṃ lavamātrāvaraṇata evam

bodhisattvānāṃ lavamātrāvaraṇata evam+krodhendrāṇām -> bodhisattvānāṃ lavamātrāvaraṇata evaṃ krodhendrāṇām

bodhisattvānāṃ lavamātrāvaraṇata evaṃ krodhendrāṇām+api -> bodhisattvānāṃ lavamātrāvaraṇata evaṃ krodhendrāṇām api

sopadhinirvāṇadhātutas+iti| -> sopadhinirvāṇadhātuta iti|

parijñānam+bhavati -> parijñānaṃ bhavati

yathābhūtam+tribhavasya -> yathābhūtaṃ tribhavasya

śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām+bodhisattvānām -> śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānām

śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānām+ca -> śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca

sambuddhānām+yaugapadyena -> sambuddhānāṃ yaugapadyena

yathābhūtadarśanam+parijñānam -> yathābhūtadarśanaṃ parijñānam

yathābhūtadarśanaṃ parijñānam+tat -> yathābhūtadarśanaṃ parijñānaṃ tat

yathābhūtadarśanaṃ parijñānaṃ tat+eva -> yathābhūtadarśanaṃ parijñānaṃ tad eva

iha+atītānāgatavartamāne -> ihātītānāgatavartamāne

parijñānam+nirvāṇam -> parijñānaṃ nirvāṇam

parijñānaṃ nirvāṇam+iti -> parijñānaṃ nirvāṇam iti

evam+bhavasya -> evaṃ bhavasya

bhagavatas+niyamas -> bhagavato niyamas

bhagavato niyamas+| -> bhagavato niyamaḥ|

skandhādayas+viśuddhās -> skandhādayo viśuddhās

skandhādayo viśuddhās+sarvāvaraṇakṣayāt -> skandhādayo viśuddhāḥ sarvāvaraṇakṣayāt

skandhādayo viśuddhāḥ sarvāvaraṇakṣayāt+iti -> skandhādayo viśuddhāḥ sarvāvaraṇakṣayād iti

sarvatas+sarvadā -> sarvataḥ sarvadā

trividhabhagavatās+sarve -> trividhabhagavatāḥ sarve

cyavanasukhakalpanāvaraṇakṣayāt+iti -> cyavanasukhakalpanāvaraṇakṣayād iti

sarvākāraśūnyatājñānam+tryadhvadarśanam| -> sarvākāraśūnyatājñānaṃ tryadhvadarśanam|

sahajānandas+paramākṣaras -> sahajānandaḥ paramākṣaras

sahajānandaḥ paramākṣaras+| -> sahajānandaḥ paramākṣaraḥ|

saṃsthitās+candramūrdhni| -> saṃsthitāś candramūrdhni|

pavidharahṛdaye+iti -> pavidharahṛdaya iti

anyās+tās -> anyās tās

anyās tās+kāyamudrādayas -> anyās tāḥ kāyamudrādayas

anyās tāḥ kāyamudrādayas+catasras -> anyās tāḥ kāyamudrādayaś catasras

anyās tāḥ kāyamudrādayaś catasras+viśuddhās -> anyās tāḥ kāyamudrādayaś catasro viśuddhās

anyās tāḥ kāyamudrādayaś catasro viśuddhās+iti| -> anyās tāḥ kāyamudrādayaś catasro viśuddhā iti|

kāyavākcittajñānavajrais+jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇais -> kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇais

kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇais+viśuddhais -> kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇair viśuddhais

kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇair viśuddhais+nirāvaraṇāt -> kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇair viśuddhair nirāvaraṇāt

kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇair viśuddhair nirāvaraṇāt+adhyātmamudrās -> kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇair viśuddhair nirāvaraṇād adhyātmamudrās

kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇair viśuddhair nirāvaraṇād adhyātmamudrās+śuddhās -> kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇair viśuddhair nirāvaraṇād adhyātmamudrāḥ śuddhās

kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇair viśuddhair nirāvaraṇād adhyātmamudrāḥ śuddhās+| -> kāyavākcittajñānavajrair jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇair viśuddhair nirāvaraṇād adhyātmamudrāḥ śuddhāḥ|

vajrais+iti -> vajrair iti

anyais+gandhādidhātubhis -> anyair gandhādidhātubhis

anyair gandhādidhātubhis+ṣaḍbhis -> anyair gandhādidhātubhiḥ ṣaḍbhis

anyair gandhādidhātubhiḥ ṣaḍbhis+ṣaṭ -> anyair gandhādidhātubhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaṭ

anyair gandhādidhātubhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaṭ+bāhyamudrās -> anyair gandhādidhātubhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ bāhyamudrās

anyair gandhādidhātubhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ bāhyamudrās+viśuddhās -> anyair gandhādidhātubhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ bāhyamudrā viśuddhās

anyair gandhādidhātubhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ bāhyamudrā viśuddhās+iti| -> anyair gandhādidhātubhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ bāhyamudrā viśuddhā iti|

prakṛtis+pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas -> prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas

prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas+teṣām -> prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣām

prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣām+guṇās -> prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣāṃ guṇās

prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣāṃ guṇās+ṣaṭ -> prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣāṃ guṇāḥ ṣaṭ

prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣāṃ guṇāḥ ṣaṭ+viṣayās -> prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣāṃ guṇāḥ ṣaḍ viṣayās

prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣāṃ guṇāḥ ṣaḍ viṣayās+teṣām -> prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣāṃ guṇāḥ ṣaḍ viṣayās teṣām

prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣāṃ guṇāḥ ṣaḍ viṣayās teṣām+āvaraṇakṣayāt| -> prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyādidhātusamūhas teṣāṃ guṇāḥ ṣaḍ viṣayās teṣām āvaraṇakṣayāt|

prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+iti -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād iti

caturviṃśatividhaprakṛtes+abhāvāt -> caturviṃśatividhaprakṛter abhāvāt

caturviṃśatividhaprakṛter abhāvāt+iti| -> caturviṃśatividhaprakṛter abhāvād iti|

bhartus+śuddhāni -> bhartuḥ śuddhāni

tattvais+caturviṃśatibhis -> tattvaiś caturviṃśatibhis

tattvaiś caturviṃśatibhis+nirāvaraṇais -> tattvaiś caturviṃśatibhir nirāvaraṇais

tattvaiś caturviṃśatibhir nirāvaraṇais+vajrādīni -> tattvaiś caturviṃśatibhir nirāvaraṇair vajrādīni

tattvaiś caturviṃśatibhir nirāvaraṇair vajrādīni+astrāṇi -> tattvaiś caturviṃśatibhir nirāvaraṇair vajrādīny astrāṇi

śuddhās+| -> śuddhāḥ|

bhūtās+iti -> bhūtā iti

siddhās+| -> siddhāḥ|

bhūtavṛndam+viśuddham -> bhūtavṛndaṃ viśuddham

bhūtavṛndaṃ viśuddham+evam -> bhūtavṛndaṃ viśuddham evam

bhūtavṛndaṃ viśuddham evam+anye -> bhūtavṛndaṃ viśuddham evam anye

keśais+siddhās -> keśaiḥ siddhās

keśaiḥ siddhās+samastās -> keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastās

keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastās+nirāvaraṇalomabhis -> keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastā nirāvaraṇalomabhis

keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastā nirāvaraṇalomabhis+sārdhatrikoṭibhis -> keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastā nirāvaraṇalomabhiḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhis

keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastā nirāvaraṇalomabhiḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhis+śmaśāne -> keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastā nirāvaraṇalomabhiḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhiḥ śmaśāne

ca+akṣarajñānayogāt|| -> cākṣarajñānayogāt||

saṃsthitās+candramūrdhni -> saṃsthitāś candramūrdhni

vajrais+adhyātmamudrās -> vajrair adhyātmamudrās

vajrair adhyātmamudrās+pavidharahṛdaye -> vajrair adhyātmamudrāḥ pavidharahṛdaye

bhartus+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> bhartuḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

bhartuḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+dhātubhis -> bhartuḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātubhis

bhartuḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātubhis+bāhyamudrās -> bhartuḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātubhir bāhyamudrās

bhartuḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātubhir bāhyamudrās+| -> bhartuḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātubhir bāhyamudrāḥ|

tattvais+astrāṇi -> tattvair astrāṇi

keśais+siddhās -> keśaiḥ siddhās

keśaiḥ siddhās+samastās -> keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastās

keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastās+citibhuvanagatam -> keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastāś citibhuvanagatam

keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastāś citibhuvanagatam+lomabhis -> keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastāś citibhuvanagataṃ lomabhis

keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastāś citibhuvanagataṃ lomabhis+bhūtavṛndam -> keśaiḥ siddhāḥ samastāś citibhuvanagataṃ lomabhir bhūtavṛndam

kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇa+iti -> kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇeti

kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇeti+anyās -> kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇety anyās

kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇety anyās+tās -> kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇety anyās tās

kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇety anyās tās+icchādayas -> kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇety anyās tā icchādayas

kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇety anyās tā icchādayas+śuddhās -> kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇety anyās tā icchādayaḥ śuddhās

kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇety anyās tā icchādayaḥ śuddhās+|| -> kāyakṛtyāvaraṇakṣayeṇety anyās tā icchādayaḥ śuddhāḥ||

ṣaṭtriṃśat+pūrvoktās -> ṣaṭtriṃśat pūrvoktās

ṣaṭtriṃśat pūrvoktās+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> ṣaṭtriṃśat pūrvoktāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

ṣaṭtriṃśat pūrvoktāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+kāyakṛtyais -> ṣaṭtriṃśat pūrvoktāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyais

ṣaṭtriṃśat pūrvoktāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyais+viśuddhās -> ṣaṭtriṃśat pūrvoktāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyair viśuddhās

ṣaṭtriṃśat pūrvoktāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyair viśuddhās+| -> ṣaṭtriṃśat pūrvoktāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyair viśuddhāḥ|

ṣaṭtriṃśat+pratīcchā -> ṣaṭtriṃśat pratīcchā

iha+icchā -> ihecchā

evam+ca -> evaṃ ca

evaṃ ca+icchādayas -> evaṃ cecchādayas

evaṃ cecchādayas+iti| -> evaṃ cecchādaya iti|

dviguṇanṛpatibhis+nāḍikābhis -> dviguṇanṛpatibhir nāḍikābhis

dviguṇanṛpatibhir nāḍikābhis+viśuddhās -> dviguṇanṛpatibhir nāḍikābhir viśuddhās

dviguṇanṛpatibhir nāḍikābhir viśuddhās+prajñopāyabhedena -> dviguṇanṛpatibhir nāḍikābhir viśuddhāḥ prajñopāyabhedena

nāgās+caṇḍās -> nāgāś caṇḍās

nāgāś caṇḍās+ca -> nāgāś caṇḍāś ca

śuddhās+| -> śuddhāḥ|

devās+anyās -> devā anyās

devā anyās+tās -> devā anyās tās

devā anyās tās+patradevyas -> devā anyās tāḥ patradevyas

devā anyās tāḥ patradevyas+iti -> devā anyās tāḥ patradevya iti

śuddhās+| -> śuddhāḥ|

teṣām+kamaladalagatās -> teṣāṃ kamaladalagatās

teṣāṃ kamaladalagatās+ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatam -> teṣāṃ kamaladalagatāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatam

teṣāṃ kamaladalagatāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatam+lāsyādiyuktam -> teṣāṃ kamaladalagatāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśataṃ lāsyādiyuktam

teṣāṃ kamaladalagatāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśataṃ lāsyādiyuktam+nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyais -> teṣāṃ kamaladalagatāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśataṃ lāsyādiyuktaṃ nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyais

teṣāṃ kamaladalagatāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśataṃ lāsyādiyuktaṃ nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyais+dinais -> teṣāṃ kamaladalagatāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśataṃ lāsyādiyuktaṃ nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyair dinais

teṣāṃ kamaladalagatāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśataṃ lāsyādiyuktaṃ nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyair dinais+ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatadināvaraṇakṣayeṇa -> teṣāṃ kamaladalagatāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśataṃ lāsyādiyuktaṃ nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyair dinaiḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatadināvaraṇakṣayeṇa

śuddhās+| -> śuddhāḥ|

naiṛtyavāyvagniṣaṇmukhasamudragaṇendraśakrabrahmarudrayakṣaviṣṇuyamās+iti -> naiṛtyavāyvagniṣaṇmukhasamudragaṇendraśakrabrahmarudrayakṣaviṣṇuyamā iti

daityādyās+iti| -> daityādyā iti|

śuddhās+| -> śuddhāḥ|

nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇa+anyās -> nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās

nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās+tās -> nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās tās

nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās tās+carcikādayas -> nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās tāś carcikādayas

nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās tāś carcikādayas+bhīmādayas -> nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās tāś carcikādayo bhīmādayas

nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās tāś carcikādayo bhīmādayas+ca -> nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās tāś carcikādayo bhīmādayaś ca

nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās tāś carcikādayo bhīmādayaś ca+iti -> nirmāṇacakrāvaraṇakṣayeṇānyās tāś carcikādayo bhīmādayaś ceti

cāmuṇḍādyās+aṣṭayāmais -> cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmais

cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmais+kamaladalagatās -> cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatās

cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatās+sūryalagnais -> cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnais

cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnais+ghaṭībhis -> cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhis

cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhis+ṣaṣṭibhis -> cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhis

cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhis+bhīmādayas -> cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādayas

cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādayas+catasras -> cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādayaś catasras

cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādayaś catasras+śūnyapatraviśuddhyā -> cāmuṇḍādyā aṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādayaś catasraḥ śūnyapatraviśuddhyā

evam+ca -> evaṃ ca

evaṃ ca+icchādayas -> evaṃ cecchādayas

evaṃ cecchādayas+tās -> evaṃ cecchādayas tās

evaṃ cecchādayas tās+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> evaṃ cecchādayas tāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

evaṃ cecchādayas tāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+kāyakṛtyais -> evaṃ cecchādayas tāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyais

evaṃ cecchādayas tāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyais+viśuddhās -> evaṃ cecchādayas tāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyair viśuddhās

evaṃ cecchādayas tāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyair viśuddhās+|| -> evaṃ cecchādayas tāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt kāyakṛtyair viśuddhāḥ||

dviguṇanṛpatibhis+nāḍikābhis -> dviguṇanṛpatibhir nāḍikābhis

dviguṇanṛpatibhir nāḍikābhis+viśuddhās -> dviguṇanṛpatibhir nāḍikābhir viśuddhās

nāgās+caṇḍās -> nāgāś caṇḍās

nāgāś caṇḍās+ca -> nāgāś caṇḍāś ca

daityādyās+sūryamāsais -> daityādyāḥ sūryamāsais

daityādyāḥ sūryamāsais+kamaladalagatās -> daityādyāḥ sūryamāsaiḥ kamaladalagatās

daityādyāḥ sūryamāsaiḥ kamaladalagatās+nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyais -> daityādyāḥ sūryamāsaiḥ kamaladalagatā nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyais

daityādyāḥ sūryamāsaiḥ kamaladalagatā nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyais+| -> daityādyāḥ sūryamāsaiḥ kamaladalagatā nāḍikāśvāsasaṃkhyaiḥ|

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭayāmais+kamaladalagatās -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatās

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatās+sūryalagnais -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnais

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnais+ghaṭībhis -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭayāmaiḥ kamaladalagatāḥ sūryalagnair ghaṭībhis

raudrākṣyādibhis+sārdham -> raudrākṣyādibhiḥ sārdham

raudrākṣyādibhiḥ sārdham+pariśuddhās -> raudrākṣyādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pariśuddhās

raudrākṣyādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pariśuddhās+iti|| -> raudrākṣyādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pariśuddhā iti||

pañcakarmendriyais+bhagavākpāṇipādapāyubhis -> pañcakarmendriyair bhagavākpāṇipādapāyubhis

pañcakarmendriyair bhagavākpāṇipādapāyubhis+karmendriyakriyābhis -> pañcakarmendriyair bhagavākpāṇipādapāyubhiḥ karmendriyakriyābhis

pañcakarmendriyair bhagavākpāṇipādapāyubhiḥ karmendriyakriyābhis+| -> pañcakarmendriyair bhagavākpāṇipādapāyubhiḥ karmendriyakriyābhiḥ|

punar+aparās -> punar aparās

punar aparās+sumbharājanīladaṇḍaṭakkyacalamahābalās -> punar aparāḥ sumbharājanīladaṇḍaṭakkyacalamahābalās

punar aparāḥ sumbharājanīladaṇḍaṭakkyacalamahābalās+| -> punar aparāḥ sumbharājanīladaṇḍaṭakkyacalamahābalāḥ|

uṣṇīṣavighnāntakaprajñāntakapadmāntakayamāntakakrodharājānas+śuddhās -> uṣṇīṣavighnāntakaprajñāntakapadmāntakayamāntakakrodharājānaḥ śuddhās

uṣṇīṣavighnāntakaprajñāntakapadmāntakayamāntakakrodharājānaḥ śuddhās+iti| -> uṣṇīṣavighnāntakaprajñāntakapadmāntakayamāntakakrodharājānaḥ śuddhā iti|

tais+balais -> tair balais

tair balais+viśuddhās -> tair balair viśuddhās

tair balair viśuddhās+| -> tair balair viśuddhāḥ|

aśraddhāvīryāsmṛtyasamādhyaprajñānām+āvaraṇakṣayeṇa -> aśraddhāvīryāsmṛtyasamādhyaprajñānām āvaraṇakṣayeṇa

śraddhābalam+vīryabalam -> śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalam

śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalam+smṛtibalam -> śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalam

śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalam+samādhibalam -> śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalam

śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalam+prajñābalam| -> śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalam|

pañcakrodhās+balais -> pañcakrodhā balais

pañcakrodhā balais+iti -> pañcakrodhā balair iti

cakṣurādayas+viśuddhās -> cakṣurādayo viśuddhās

cakṣurādayo viśuddhās+rūpavajrādibhis -> cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhis

cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhis+sārdham -> cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdham

cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdham+kṣitigarbhādayas -> cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣitigarbhādayas

cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣitigarbhādayas+bodhisattvās -> cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣitigarbhādayo bodhisattvās

cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣitigarbhādayo bodhisattvās+samudrās -> cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣitigarbhādayo bodhisattvāḥ samudrās

cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣitigarbhādayo bodhisattvāḥ samudrās+śuddhās -> cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣitigarbhādayo bodhisattvāḥ samudrāḥ śuddhās

cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣitigarbhādayo bodhisattvāḥ samudrāḥ śuddhās+| -> cakṣurādayo viśuddhā rūpavajrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣitigarbhādayo bodhisattvāḥ samudrāḥ śuddhāḥ|

rūpādayas+anye -> rūpādayo 'nye

rūpādiṣaḍviṣayais+cakṣurādibhis -> rūpādiṣaḍviṣayaiś cakṣurādibhis

rūpādiṣaḍviṣayaiś cakṣurādibhis+viṣayibhis -> rūpādiṣaḍviṣayaiś cakṣurādibhir viṣayibhis

rūpādiṣaḍviṣayaiś cakṣurādibhir viṣayibhis+viśuddhais -> rūpādiṣaḍviṣayaiś cakṣurādibhir viṣayibhir viśuddhais

rūpādiṣaḍviṣayaiś cakṣurādibhir viṣayibhir viśuddhais+anye -> rūpādiṣaḍviṣayaiś cakṣurādibhir viṣayibhir viśuddhair anye

viṣayaviṣayibhis+iti -> viṣayaviṣayibhir iti

dhātavas+viśuddhās -> dhātavo viśuddhās

dhātavo viśuddhās+bhavanti -> dhātavo viśuddhā bhavanti

dhātavo viśuddhā bhavanti+iti| -> dhātavo viśuddhā bhavantīti|

jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīdhātubhis+niruddhais -> jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīdhātubhir niruddhais

jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīdhātubhir niruddhais+anye -> jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīdhātubhir niruddhair anye

dhātubhis+iti -> dhātubhir iti

evam+ṣaṭ -> evaṃ ṣaṭ

evaṃ ṣaṭ+devyas -> evaṃ ṣaḍ devyas

evaṃ ṣaḍ devyas+viśvamātāvajradhātvīśavarītārāpāṇḍarāmāmakīlocanā -> evaṃ ṣaḍ devyo viśvamātāvajradhātvīśavarītārāpāṇḍarāmāmakīlocanā

evaṃ ṣaḍ devyo viśvamātāvajradhātvīśavarītārāpāṇḍarāmāmakīlocanā+iti| -> evaṃ ṣaḍ devyo viśvamātāvajradhātvīśavarītārāpāṇḍarāmāmakīlocaneti|

skandhās+vijñānādayas -> skandhā vijñānādayas

skandhā vijñānādayas+viśuddhās -> skandhā vijñānādayo viśuddhās

skandhā vijñānādayo viśuddhās+bhavanti -> skandhā vijñānādayo viśuddhā bhavanti

skandhā vijñānādayo viśuddhā bhavanti+iti| -> skandhā vijñānādayo viśuddhā bhavantīti|

māṃsaṃ+rudhiram -> NO RULE FOUND (ṃ+r)

rudhiram+mūtram -> rudhiraṃ mūtram

rudhiraṃ mūtram+viṭ -> rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viṭ

rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viṭ+iti -> rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viḍ iti

rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viḍ iti+ebhis -> rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viḍ ity ebhis

rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viḍ ity ebhis+viśuddhais -> rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viḍ ity ebhir viśuddhais

rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viḍ ity ebhir viśuddhais+nirāvaraṇais -> rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viḍ ity ebhir viśuddhair nirāvaraṇais

rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viḍ ity ebhir viśuddhair nirāvaraṇais+pañca -> rudhiraṃ mūtraṃ viḍ ity ebhir viśuddhair nirāvaraṇaiḥ pañca

śukram+bala -> śukraṃ bala

śukraṃ bala+iti -> śukraṃ baleti

punar+akṣobhyādayas -> punar akṣobhyādayas

punar akṣobhyādayas+śaśī -> punar akṣobhyādayaḥ śaśī

punar akṣobhyādayaḥ śaśī+iti -> punar akṣobhyādayaḥ śaśīti

vairocanas+| -> vairocanaḥ|

cakrī+iti -> cakrīti

rūpaskandhas+| -> rūpaskandhaḥ|

evam+amitābhas -> evam amitābhas

evam amitābhas+saṃjñā -> evam amitābhaḥ saṃjñā

cakāras+samuccayārthas -> cakāraḥ samuccayārthas

cakāraḥ samuccayārthas+| -> cakāraḥ samuccayārthaḥ|

vimalamaṇikaras+ratnasambhavas -> vimalamaṇikaro ratnasambhavas

vimalamaṇikaro ratnasambhavas+vedanā| -> vimalamaṇikaro ratnasambhavo vedanā|

viśuddhasaṃskāras+amoghasiddhis -> viśuddhasaṃskāro 'moghasiddhis

viśuddhasaṃskāro 'moghasiddhis+| -> viśuddhasaṃskāro 'moghasiddhiḥ|

saṃskārādayas+| -> saṃskārādayaḥ|

sati+anye -> saty anye

ca+anyais -> cānyais

cānyais+|| -> cānyaiḥ||

punar aparās+ca -> punar aparāś ca

punar aparāś ca+indriyais -> punar aparāś cendriyais

punar aparāś cendriyais+pañca -> punar aparāś cendriyaiḥ pañca

krodhās+balais -> krodhā balais

krodhā balais+vai -> krodhā balair vai

viṣayaviṣayibhir bodhisattvās+samudrās -> viṣayaviṣayibhir bodhisattvāḥ samudrās

śaśibalarudhiro mūtraviḍbhyāṃ viśuddhās+| -> śaśibalarudhiro mūtraviḍbhyāṃ viśuddhāḥ|

rūpam+hi -> rūpaṃ hi

ca+amitābhas -> cāmitābhas

saṃskāras+amoghasiddhis -> saṃskāro 'moghasiddhis

saṃskāro 'moghasiddhis+vimalamaṇikaras -> saṃskāro 'moghasiddhir vimalamaṇikaras

saṃskāro 'moghasiddhir vimalamaṇikaras+vedanā -> saṃskāro 'moghasiddhir vimalamaṇikaro vedanā

idānīṃ buddhānām+śuddhis -> idānīṃ buddhānāṃ śuddhis

ghaṭāḥ śuddhās+kapālāni -> ghaṭāḥ śuddhāḥ kapālāni

iti+aṣṭau -> ity aṣṭau

vijayaghaṭas+raja{}āsrāveṇa| -> vijayaghaṭo raja{}āsrāveṇa|

evaṃ jayaghaṭas+śukrāsrāveṇa| -> evaṃ jayaghaṭaḥ śukrāsrāveṇa|

daśavāyunirodhena+iti| -> daśavāyunirodheneti|
