samānādivāyūnām+ādhārabhūtās -> samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtās

samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtās+aṣṭanāḍyas -> samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas

samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas+tābhis -> samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas tābhis

samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas tābhis+dhūmādidivyās -> samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas tābhir dhūmādidivyās

samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas tābhir dhūmādidivyās+kṛṣṇadīptāntās -> samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas tābhir dhūmādidivyāḥ kṛṣṇadīptāntās

samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas tābhir dhūmādidivyāḥ kṛṣṇadīptāntās+śuddhās -> samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas tābhir dhūmādidivyāḥ kṛṣṇadīptāntāḥ śuddhās

samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas tābhir dhūmādidivyāḥ kṛṣṇadīptāntāḥ śuddhās+| -> samānādivāyūnām ādhārabhūtā aṣṭanāḍyas tābhir dhūmādidivyāḥ kṛṣṇadīptāntāḥ śuddhāḥ|

dhūma+ityādi| -> dhūmetyādi|

kumbhās+ca -> kumbhāś ca

kumbhāś ca+aṣṭa -> kumbhāś cāṣṭa

rudraḥ kleśaiḥ sabhāryas+vibhucaraṇatale -> rudraḥ kleśaiḥ sabhāryo vibhucaraṇatale

evam+maṇḍale -> evaṃ maṇḍale

buddhapūrvaṃgamo bodhisattvakrodhadevatāgaṇas+| -> buddhapūrvaṃgamo bodhisattvakrodhadevatāgaṇaḥ|

dharmās+pūrvaṃgamas -> dharmāḥ pūrvaṃgamas

dharmāḥ pūrvaṃgamas+dharmas -> dharmāḥ pūrvaṃgamo dharmas

dharmāḥ pūrvaṃgamo dharmas+(?)| -> dharmāḥ pūrvaṃgamo dharmaḥ(?)|

bhikṣumudraṇam+evam -> bhikṣumudraṇam evam

bhikṣumudraṇam evam+bhikṣupūrvaṃgamas -> bhikṣumudraṇam evaṃ bhikṣupūrvaṃgamas

bhikṣumudraṇam evaṃ bhikṣupūrvaṃgamas+saṃghas -> bhikṣumudraṇam evaṃ bhikṣupūrvaṃgamaḥ saṃghas

bhikṣumudraṇam evaṃ bhikṣupūrvaṃgamaḥ saṃghas+| -> bhikṣumudraṇam evaṃ bhikṣupūrvaṃgamaḥ saṃghaḥ|

dharmās+mudraṇam -> dharmā mudraṇam

dharmā mudraṇam+caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhānām -> dharmā mudraṇaṃ caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhānām

dharmā mudraṇaṃ caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhānām+devatānām -> dharmā mudraṇaṃ caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhānāṃ devatānām

dharmā mudraṇaṃ caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhānāṃ devatānām+ca -> dharmā mudraṇaṃ caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhānāṃ devatānāṃ ca

ca+arkas -> cārkas

cārkas+saṃsāracittalakṣaṇas -> cārkaḥ saṃsāracittalakṣaṇas

cārkaḥ saṃsāracittalakṣaṇaḥ prāṇārūḍhas+vijñānaskandhas -> cārkaḥ saṃsāracittalakṣaṇaḥ prāṇārūḍho vijñānaskandhas

teṣāṃ hetuphaladharmāṇām+śuddhyā -> teṣāṃ hetuphaladharmāṇāṃ śuddhyā

hetudharmās+sapta -> hetudharmāḥ sapta

dvādaśāṅgātmakaṃ makarādirāśicakram+hetuphalātmakam| -> dvādaśāṅgātmakaṃ makarādirāśicakraṃ hetuphalātmakam|

kālas+bāhye -> kālo bāhye

kālo bāhye+adhyātmani -> kālo bāhye 'dhyātmani

idānīm+nāyakādīnām -> idānīṃ nāyakādīnām

idānīṃ nāyakādīnām+aparaviśuddhis -> idānīṃ nāyakādīnām aparaviśuddhis

idānīṃ nāyakādīnām aparaviśuddhis+ucyate---śrīvajrī -> idānīṃ nāyakādīnām aparaviśuddhir ucyate---śrīvajrī

idānīṃ nāyakādīnām aparaviśuddhir ucyate---śrīvajrī+ityādi| -> idānīṃ nāyakādīnām aparaviśuddhir ucyate---śrīvajrītyādi|

cakraśuddhiniyamas+| -> cakraśuddhiniyamaḥ|

kriyākhyam+cakram -> kriyākhyaṃ cakram

kriyākhyaṃ cakram+śuddham -> kriyākhyaṃ cakraṃ śuddham

kriyākhyaṃ cakraṃ śuddham+iti -> kriyākhyaṃ cakraṃ śuddham iti

nāgais+cundābhis -> nāgaiś cundābhis

nāgaiś cundābhis+ebhis -> nāgaiś cundābhir ebhis

nāgaiś cundābhir ebhis+ṣoḍaśabhis -> nāgaiś cundābhir ebhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhis

nāgaiś cundābhir ebhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhis+kāyabhāgabhedena -> nāgaiś cundābhir ebhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kāyabhāgabhedena

nāgaiś cundābhir ebhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kāyabhāgabhedena+aṅgulīparvasandhiṣu -> nāgaiś cundābhir ebhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kāyabhāgabhedenāṅgulīparvasandhiṣu

karmacakram+surais -> karmacakraṃ surais

karmacakraṃ suraiḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatais+śuddham| -> karmacakraṃ suraiḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśataiḥ śuddham|

nṛpatibhiś ca+aṅgulīparvasandhau| -> nṛpatibhiś cāṅgulīparvasandhau|

cundānāgais+kriyākhyam -> cundānāgaiḥ kriyākhyam

cundānāgaiḥ kriyākhyam+bhavati -> cundānāgaiḥ kriyākhyaṃ bhavati

navatiyugahatais+karmacakram -> navatiyugahataiḥ karmacakram

navatiyugahataiḥ karmacakram+surais -> navatiyugahataiḥ karmacakraṃ surais

navatiyugahataiḥ karmacakraṃ surais+ca -> navatiyugahataiḥ karmacakraṃ suraiś ca

bāhos+pādasya -> bāhoḥ pādasya

guhyacakram+śuddham|| -> guhyacakraṃ śuddham||

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭabhis+lāsyādyaṣṭabhis -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭabhir lāsyādyaṣṭabhis

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭabhir lāsyādyaṣṭabhis+ca -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭabhir lāsyādyaṣṭabhiś ca

nirmāṇacakram+catuḥṣaṣṭyaram -> nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaram

nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaram+vasuphaṇiguṇitais -> nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitais

nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitais+catuḥṣaṣṭibhis -> nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitaiś catuḥṣaṣṭibhis

nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitaiś catuḥṣaṣṭibhis+bhīmādibhis -> nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitaiś catuḥṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādibhis

nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitaiś catuḥṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādibhis+śuddham -> nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitaiś catuḥṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādibhiḥ śuddham

nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitaiś catuḥṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādibhiḥ śuddham+iti| -> nirmāṇacakraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyaraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitaiś catuḥṣaṣṭibhir bhīmādibhiḥ śuddham iti|

dvātriṃśadbhis+śuddham| -> dvātriṃśadbhiḥ śuddham|

dvādaśāyatanais+catuḥkrodhais -> dvādaśāyatanaiś catuḥkrodhais

dvādaśāyatanaiś catuḥkrodhais+śoḍaśabhis -> dvādaśāyatanaiś catuḥkrodhaiḥ śoḍaśabhis

dvādaśāyatanaiś catuḥkrodhaiḥ śoḍaśabhis+prajñopāyabhedena -> dvādaśāyatanaiś catuḥkrodhaiḥ śoḍaśabhiḥ prajñopāyabhedena

sambhogacakram+dvātriṃśadaram -> sambhogacakraṃ dvātriṃśadaram

sambhogacakraṃ dvātriṃśadaram+dviguṇanṛpatibhis -> sambhogacakraṃ dvātriṃśadaraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhis

sambhogacakraṃ dvātriṃśadaraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhis+dvātriṃśadbhis -> sambhogacakraṃ dvātriṃśadaraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhir dvātriṃśadbhis

sambhogacakraṃ dvātriṃśadaraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhir dvātriṃśadbhis+bodhisattvādyais -> sambhogacakraṃ dvātriṃśadaraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhir dvātriṃśadbhir bodhisattvādyais

sambhogacakraṃ dvātriṃśadaraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhir dvātriṃśadbhir bodhisattvādyais+iti| -> sambhogacakraṃ dvātriṃśadaraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhir dvātriṃśadbhir bodhisattvādyair iti|

dharmaśaṅkhacintāmaṇidharmagaṇḍīkalpavṛkṣais+caturbhis -> dharmaśaṅkhacintāmaṇidharmagaṇḍīkalpavṛkṣaiś caturbhis

dharmaśaṅkhacintāmaṇidharmagaṇḍīkalpavṛkṣaiś caturbhis+uṣṇīṣacakram -> dharmaśaṅkhacintāmaṇidharmagaṇḍīkalpavṛkṣaiś caturbhir uṣṇīṣacakram

dharmaśaṅkhacintāmaṇidharmagaṇḍīkalpavṛkṣaiś caturbhir uṣṇīṣacakram+śuddham| -> dharmaśaṅkhacintāmaṇidharmagaṇḍīkalpavṛkṣaiś caturbhir uṣṇīṣacakraṃ śuddham|

sahajam+siddham -> sahajaṃ siddham

sahajaṃ siddham+iti -> sahajaṃ siddham iti

sahajaṃ siddham iti+anuktatvāt| -> sahajaṃ siddham ity anuktatvāt|

śoḍaśāram+cakram -> śoḍaśāraṃ cakram

śoḍaśāraṃ cakram+śuddham -> śoḍaśāraṃ cakraṃ śuddham

śoḍaśāraṃ cakraṃ śuddham+tat -> śoḍaśāraṃ cakraṃ śuddhaṃ tat

śoḍaśāraṃ cakraṃ śuddhaṃ tat+eva -> śoḍaśāraṃ cakraṃ śuddhaṃ tad eva

ṣoḍaśais+śiraso -> ṣoḍaśaiḥ śiraso

vidyābhis+locanādibhis -> vidyābhir locanādibhis

vidyābhir locanādibhis+catasṛbhis -> vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhis

vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhis+buddhais -> vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhais

vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhais+vairocanādibhis -> vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhair vairocanādibhis

vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhair vairocanādibhis+caturbhis -> vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhair vairocanādibhiś caturbhis

vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhair vairocanādibhiś caturbhis+ebhis -> vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhair vairocanādibhiś caturbhir ebhis

vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhair vairocanādibhiś caturbhir ebhis+aṣṭabhis -> vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhair vairocanādibhiś caturbhir ebhir aṣṭabhis

vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhair vairocanādibhiś caturbhir ebhir aṣṭabhis+kāyabhāvabhedena -> vidyābhir locanādibhiś catasṛbhir buddhair vairocanādibhiś caturbhir ebhir aṣṭabhiḥ kāyabhāvabhedena

kumbhais+aṣṭabhis -> kumbhair aṣṭabhis

kumbhair aṣṭabhis+dhūmādibhis -> kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhis

kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhis+sārdham -> kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham

kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham+aṣṭāram -> kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham aṣṭāram

kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham aṣṭāram+hṛccakram -> kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham aṣṭāraṃ hṛccakram

kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham aṣṭāraṃ hṛccakram+śuddham -> kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham aṣṭāraṃ hṛccakraṃ śuddham

kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham aṣṭāraṃ hṛccakraṃ śuddham+tat -> kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham aṣṭāraṃ hṛccakraṃ śuddhaṃ tat

kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham aṣṭāraṃ hṛccakraṃ śuddhaṃ tat+eva -> kumbhair aṣṭabhir dhūmādibhiḥ sārdham aṣṭāraṃ hṛccakraṃ śuddhaṃ tad eva

kumbhais+ityādi| -> kumbhair ityādi|

bhīmādibhis+ca|| -> bhīmādibhiś ca||

nirmāṇacakram+vasuphaṇiguṇitābhis -> nirmāṇacakraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitābhis

nirmāṇacakraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitābhis+ca -> nirmāṇacakraṃ vasuphaṇiguṇitābhiś ca

sambhogacakram+dviguṇanṛpatibhis -> sambhogacakraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhis

sambhogacakraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhis+bodhisattvādibhis -> sambhogacakraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhir bodhisattvādibhis

sambhogacakraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhir bodhisattvādibhis+syāt -> sambhogacakraṃ dviguṇanṛpatibhir bodhisattvādibhiḥ syāt

sahajam+ṣoḍaśāram -> sahajaṃ ṣoḍaśāram

sahajaṃ ṣoḍaśāram+prasiddham| -> sahajaṃ ṣoḍaśāraṃ prasiddham|

buddhais+śirasi -> buddhaiḥ śirasi

vidyābhis+ca -> vidyābhiś ca

vidyābhiś ca+eva -> vidyābhiś caiva

ca+aṣṭabhis -> cāṣṭabhis

cāṣṭabhis+dharmacakram -> cāṣṭabhir dharmacakram

kumbhais+dhūmādibhis -> kumbhair dhūmādibhis

kumbhair dhūmādibhis+ca -> kumbhair dhūmādibhiś ca

sarvacakranāḍikās+ucyante--- -> sarvacakranāḍikā ucyante---

idānīm+devatāviśuddhyā -> idānīṃ devatāviśuddhyā

bhagavatas+niyamas -> bhagavato niyamas

bhagavato niyamas+|| -> bhagavato niyamaḥ||

vaktavyam+atra -> vaktavyam atra

vaktavyam atra+utpattikrame -> vaktavyam atrotpattikrame

vaktavyam atrotpattikrame+iti -> vaktavyam atrotpattikrama iti

tatsvabhāvātmakas+aham -> tatsvabhāvātmako 'ham

tatsvabhāvātmako 'ham+iti -> tatsvabhāvātmako 'ham iti

pāṇigrahaṇam+ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes -> pāṇigrahaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes

pāṇigrahaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes+jñānapūjānurāgaṇam -> pāṇigrahaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher jñānapūjānurāgaṇam

pāṇigrahaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher jñānapūjānurāgaṇam+evam -> pāṇigrahaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher jñānapūjānurāgaṇam evam

pāṇigrahaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher jñānapūjānurāgaṇam evam+tatra -> pāṇigrahaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher jñānapūjānurāgaṇam evaṃ tatra

karṇavedhādikam+iti -> karṇavedhādikam iti

karṇavedhādikam iti+vivāhe -> NO RULE FOUND (i+v)

evam+vakṣyamāṇe -> evaṃ vakṣyamāṇe

evam+śūnye -> evaṃ śūnye

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

viśuddhadharmadhātusvabhāvātmakas+aham -> viśuddhadharmadhātusvabhāvātmako 'ham

tatra+ahaṃkāras -> tatrāhaṃkāras

maṇḍale+ādarśādipañcākārais -> maṇḍala ādarśādipañcākārais

maṇḍala ādarśādipañcākārais+devatāyās -> maṇḍala ādarśādipañcākārair devatāyās

maṇḍala ādarśādipañcākārair devatāyās+kāyaniṣpattis -> maṇḍala ādarśādipañcākārair devatāyāḥ kāyaniṣpattis

maṇḍala ādarśādipañcākārair devatāyāḥ kāyaniṣpattis+| -> maṇḍala ādarśādipañcākārair devatāyāḥ kāyaniṣpattiḥ|

kāyaniṣpattis+tathā -> kāyaniṣpattis tathā

idānīm+yathopapattyaṃśikapañcaskandhais -> idānīṃ yathopapattyaṃśikapañcaskandhais

idānīṃ yathopapattyaṃśikapañcaskandhais+garbhabālasya -> idānīṃ yathopapattyaṃśikapañcaskandhair garbhabālasya

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmakas+aham -> śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'ham

parityāgārtham+devatāskandhaniṣpādanārtham| -> parityāgārthaṃ devatāskandhaniṣpādanārtham|

yoginām+manuṣyaskandhāhaṃkārasthānāni -> yogināṃ manuṣyaskandhāhaṃkārasthānāni

yogināṃ manuṣyaskandhāhaṃkārasthānāni+ucyante -> yogināṃ manuṣyaskandhāhaṃkārasthānāny ucyante

māraṇāntikaskandhās+śūnyās -> māraṇāntikaskandhāḥ śūnyās

māraṇāntikaskandhāḥ śūnyās+bhavanti -> māraṇāntikaskandhāḥ śūnyā bhavanti

sarvasattvānām+maraṇānte -> sarvasattvānāṃ maraṇānte

idānīm+śūnyādyahaṃkārasthānāni -> idānīṃ śūnyādyahaṃkārasthānāni

idānīṃ śūnyādyahaṃkārasthānāni+ucyante----śūnye -> idānīṃ śūnyādyahaṃkārasthānāny ucyante----śūnye

idānīṃ śūnyādyahaṃkārasthānāny ucyante----śūnye+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ śūnyādyahaṃkārasthānāny ucyante----śūnya ityādinā|

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

sarvam+kartavyam -> sarvaṃ kartavyam

sarvaṃ kartavyam+iti -> sarvaṃ kartavyam iti

yat+anuktam -> yad anuktam

yad anuktam+tat -> yad anuktaṃ tat

yad anuktaṃ tat+anena -> yad anuktaṃ tad anena

tatra+eva -> tatraiva

aparam+anunāthanam -> aparam anunāthanam

aparam anunāthanam+abhiṣekapaṭaloktavidhinā -> aparam anunāthanam abhiṣekapaṭaloktavidhinā

ṣaṭ+kulās -> ṣaṭ kulās

ṣaṭ kulās+prajñārajaḥśukradharmatas -> ṣaṭ kulāḥ prajñārajaḥśukradharmatas

ṣaṭ kulāḥ prajñārajaḥśukradharmatas+iti| -> ṣaṭ kulāḥ prajñārajaḥśukradharmata iti|

trikulas+upāyas -> trikula upāyas

trikula upāyas+śukradharmatas -> trikula upāyaḥ śukradharmatas

trikula upāyaḥ śukradharmatas+| -> trikula upāyaḥ śukradharmataḥ|

evam+prajñāyās -> evaṃ prajñāyās

evaṃ prajñāyās+nābhau -> evaṃ prajñāyā nābhau

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

iti+ahaṃkāram -> ity ahaṃkāram

ity ahaṃkāram+udvahet -> ity ahaṃkāram udvahet

ity ahaṃkāram udvahet+yogī -> ity ahaṃkāram udvahed yogī

ity ahaṃkāram udvahed yogī+iti -> ity ahaṃkāram udvahed yogīti

sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittasvabhāvātmakas+aham -> sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittasvabhāvātmako 'ham

tatas+ekatvena -> tata ekatvena

evam+cittādhiṣṭhānam -> evaṃ cittādhiṣṭhānam

evaṃ cittādhiṣṭhānam+kṛtvā -> evaṃ cittādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā

cittavajriṇas+|| -> cittavajriṇaḥ||

adhiṣṭhānapadam+me -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me

adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me+adya -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me 'dya

daśadiksaṃsthitās+buddhās -> daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās

daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās+trivajrābhedyabhāvitās -> daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās trivajrābhedyabhāvitās

daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās trivajrābhedyabhāvitās+| -> daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās trivajrābhedyabhāvitāḥ|

cittavajriṇas+|| -> cittavajriṇaḥ||

adhiṣṭhānapadam+me -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me

adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me+adya -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me 'dya

cittavajradharas+śrīmān -> cittavajradharaḥ śrīmān

cittavajradharaḥ śrīmān+trivajrābhedyabhāvitas -> cittavajradharaḥ śrīmāṃś trivajrābhedyabhāvitas

cittavajradharaḥ śrīmāṃś trivajrābhedyabhāvitas+| -> cittavajradharaḥ śrīmāṃś trivajrābhedyabhāvitaḥ|

niveśya+idam -> niveśyedam

niveśyedam+udīrayet| -> niveśyedam udīrayet|

cittavajram+rāhumaṇḍale -> cittavajraṃ rāhumaṇḍale

tatas+cittavajrakuladevatībhis -> tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhis

tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhis+abhiṣiñcyamānam -> tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhir abhiṣiñcyamānam

tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhir abhiṣiñcyamānam+ātmānam -> tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhir abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānam

tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhir abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānam+vibhāvya -> tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhir abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānaṃ vibhāvya

tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhir abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānaṃ vibhāvya+adhiṣṭhānam -> tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhir abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānaṃ vibhāvyādhiṣṭhānam

tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhir abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānaṃ vibhāvyādhiṣṭhānam+kārayet| -> tataś cittavajrakuladevatībhir abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānaṃ vibhāvyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kārayet|

cittavajriṇas+iti| -> cittavajriṇa iti|

mām+sarve -> māṃ sarve

punar+ātmanas -> punar ātmanas

punar ātmanas+agratas -> punar ātmano 'gratas

punar ātmano 'gratas+saṃsthāpya -> punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpya

punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpya+abhiṣekam -> punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekam

punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekam+anunāthayet| -> punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekam anunāthayet|

cittavajravaineyānām+sattvānām -> cittavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānām

cittavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānām+dharmadeśanām -> cittavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanām

cittavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanām+kṛtvā -> cittavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā

paripūrṇam+vibhāvya -> paripūrṇaṃ vibhāvya

ghaṇṭāmaṇikhaḍgadharam+niścārya -> ghaṇṭāmaṇikhaḍgadharaṃ niścārya

ghaṇṭāmaṇikhaḍgadharaṃ niścārya+ākāśadhātum -> ghaṇṭāmaṇikhaḍgadharaṃ niścāryākāśadhātum

ghaṇṭāmaṇikhaḍgadharaṃ niścāryākāśadhātum+tena -> ghaṇṭāmaṇikhaḍgadharaṃ niścāryākāśadhātuṃ tena

vajracakrapadmadharam+vāme -> vajracakrapadmadharaṃ vāme

hūṃkārapariṇatam+vajram -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajram

hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajram+pañcaśūkam -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkam

hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkam+tatpariṇatam -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇatam

hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇatam+cittavajram -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇataṃ cittavajram

hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇataṃ cittavajram+saprajñam -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇataṃ cittavajraṃ saprajñam

hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇataṃ cittavajraṃ saprajñam+kṛṣṇam -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇataṃ cittavajraṃ saprajñaṃ kṛṣṇam

hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇataṃ cittavajraṃ saprajñaṃ kṛṣṇam+kṛṣṇasitaraktavadanam -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇataṃ cittavajraṃ saprajñaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇasitaraktavadanam

hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇataṃ cittavajraṃ saprajñaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇasitaraktavadanam+dakṣiṇe -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatpariṇataṃ cittavajraṃ saprajñaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇasitaraktavadanaṃ dakṣiṇe

bindupariṇatam+tadupari -> bindupariṇataṃ tadupari

rāhumaṇḍalam+nīlavarṇam -> rāhumaṇḍalaṃ nīlavarṇam

rāhumaṇḍalaṃ nīlavarṇam+vibhāvya -> rāhumaṇḍalaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ vibhāvya

vāgvajriṇas+|| -> vāgvajriṇaḥ||

adhiṣṭhānapadam+me -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me

adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me+adya -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me 'dya

daśadiksaṃsthitās+buddhās -> daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās

daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās+trivajrābhedyabhāvitās -> daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās trivajrābhedyabhāvitās

daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās trivajrābhedyabhāvitās+| -> daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās trivajrābhedyabhāvitāḥ|

vāgvajriṇas+|| -> vāgvajriṇaḥ||

adhiṣṭhānapadam+me -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me

adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me+adya -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me 'dya

vāgvajradharas+śrīmān -> vāgvajradharaḥ śrīmān

vāgvajradharaḥ śrīmān+trivajrābhedyabhāvitas -> vāgvajradharaḥ śrīmāṃś trivajrābhedyabhāvitas

vāgvajradharaḥ śrīmāṃś trivajrābhedyabhāvitas+| -> vāgvajradharaḥ śrīmāṃś trivajrābhedyabhāvitaḥ|

viniveśya+idam -> viniveśyedam

viniveśyedam+udīrayet--- -> viniveśyedam udīrayet---

tatas+vāgadhiṣṭhānam -> tato vāgadhiṣṭhānam

tato vāgadhiṣṭhānam+kuryāt -> tato vāgadhiṣṭhānaṃ kuryāt

tato vāgadhiṣṭhānaṃ kuryāt+vāgvajram -> tato vāgadhiṣṭhānaṃ kuryād vāgvajram

tato vāgadhiṣṭhānaṃ kuryād vāgvajram+sūryamaṇḍale -> tato vāgadhiṣṭhānaṃ kuryād vāgvajraṃ sūryamaṇḍale

tatas+vākkuladevībhis -> tato vākkuladevībhis

tato vākkuladevībhis+amṛtaghaṭais -> tato vākkuladevībhir amṛtaghaṭais

tato vākkuladevībhir amṛtaghaṭais+abhiṣiñcyamānam -> tato vākkuladevībhir amṛtaghaṭair abhiṣiñcyamānam

tato vākkuladevībhir amṛtaghaṭair abhiṣiñcyamānam+ātmānam -> tato vākkuladevībhir amṛtaghaṭair abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānam

tato vākkuladevībhir amṛtaghaṭair abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānam+vibhāvya -> tato vākkuladevībhir amṛtaghaṭair abhiṣiñcyamānam ātmānaṃ vibhāvya

mām+vāgvajriṇas -> māṃ vāgvajriṇas

māṃ vāgvajriṇas+| -> māṃ vāgvajriṇaḥ|

punar+ātmanas -> punar ātmanas

punar ātmanas+agratas -> punar ātmano 'gratas

punar ātmano 'gratas+saṃsthāpya -> punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpya

punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpya+abhiṣekam -> punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekam

punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekam+anunāthayet---abhiṣiñcantu -> punar ātmano 'grataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekam anunāthayet---abhiṣiñcantu

vāgvajravaineyānām+sattvānām -> vāgvajravaineyānāṃ sattvānām

vāgvajravaineyānāṃ sattvānām+dharmadeśanām -> vāgvajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanām

vāgvajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanām+kṛtvā -> vāgvajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā

paripūrṇam+vibhāvya -> paripūrṇaṃ vibhāvya

maṇighaṇṭākhaḍgadharam+niścārya -> maṇighaṇṭākhaḍgadharaṃ niścārya

maṇighaṇṭākhaḍgadharaṃ niścārya+ākāśadhātum -> maṇighaṇṭākhaḍgadharaṃ niścāryākāśadhātum

maṇighaṇṭākhaḍgadharaṃ niścāryākāśadhātum+tena -> maṇighaṇṭākhaḍgadharaṃ niścāryākāśadhātuṃ tena

padmavajracakradharam+vāme -> padmavajracakradharaṃ vāme

āḥkārapariṇatam+raktapadmam -> āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam

āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam+aṣṭadalam -> āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalam

āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalam+tatpariṇatam -> āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇatam

āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇatam+vāgvajram -> āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajram

āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajram+saprajñam -> āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajraṃ saprajñam

āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajraṃ saprajñam+raktam -> āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajraṃ saprajñaṃ raktam

āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajraṃ saprajñaṃ raktam+raktasitakṛṣṇavadanam -> āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajraṃ saprajñaṃ raktaṃ raktasitakṛṣṇavadanam

āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajraṃ saprajñaṃ raktaṃ raktasitakṛṣṇavadanam+dakṣiṇe -> āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmam aṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajraṃ saprajñaṃ raktaṃ raktasitakṛṣṇavadanaṃ dakṣiṇe

rephapariṇatam+sūryamaṇḍalam -> rephapariṇataṃ sūryamaṇḍalam

rephapariṇataṃ sūryamaṇḍalam+tadupari -> rephapariṇataṃ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ tadupari

evam+kaṇṭhe -> evaṃ kaṇṭhe

kāyavajriṇas+|| -> kāyavajriṇaḥ||

adhiṣṭhānapadam+me -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me

adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me+adya -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me 'dya

daśadiksaṃsthitās+buddhās -> daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās

daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās+trivajrābhedyabhāvitās -> daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās trivajrābhedyabhāvitās

daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās trivajrābhedyabhāvitās+| -> daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhās trivajrābhedyabhāvitāḥ|

kāyavajriṇas+|| -> kāyavajriṇaḥ||

adhiṣṭhānapadam+me -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me

adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me+adya -> adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me 'dya

kāyavajradharas+śrīmān -> kāyavajradharaḥ śrīmān

kāyavajradharaḥ śrīmān+trivajrābhedyabhāvitas -> kāyavajradharaḥ śrīmāṃś trivajrābhedyabhāvitas

kāyavajradharaḥ śrīmāṃś trivajrābhedyabhāvitas+| -> kāyavajradharaḥ śrīmāṃś trivajrābhedyabhāvitaḥ|

kāyavajram+praveśya -> kāyavajraṃ praveśya

kāyavajraṃ praveśya+idam -> kāyavajraṃ praveśyedam

kāyavajraṃ praveśyedam+udīrayet--- -> kāyavajraṃ praveśyedam udīrayet---

sati+adhiṣṭhānam -> saty adhiṣṭhānam

saty adhiṣṭhānam+kārayet| -> saty adhiṣṭhānaṃ kārayet|

tatas+abhiṣeke -> tato 'bhiṣeke

tatas+amṛtakalaśais -> tato 'mṛtakalaśais

tato 'mṛtakalaśais+kāyakuladevyas -> tato 'mṛtakalaśaiḥ kāyakuladevyas

tato 'mṛtakalaśaiḥ kāyakuladevyas+abhiṣiñcayanti| -> tato 'mṛtakalaśaiḥ kāyakuladevyo 'bhiṣiñcayanti|

mām+kāyavajradharās -> māṃ kāyavajradharās

māṃ kāyavajradharās+iti| -> māṃ kāyavajradharā iti|

punar+āgatya -> punar āgatya

punar āgatya+ātmanas -> punar āgatyātmanas

punar āgatyātmanas+puratas -> punar āgatyātmanaḥ puratas

punar āgatyātmanaḥ puratas+saṃsthāpya -> punar āgatyātmanaḥ purataḥ saṃsthāpya

punar āgatyātmanaḥ purataḥ saṃsthāpya+abhiṣekam -> punar āgatyātmanaḥ purataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekam

punar āgatyātmanaḥ purataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekam+anunāthayet| -> punar āgatyātmanaḥ purataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekam anunāthayet|

kāyavajravaineyānām+sattvānām -> kāyavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānām

kāyavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānām+dharmadeśanām -> kāyavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanām

kāyavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanām+kṛtvā -> kāyavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā

tena+ākāśadhātum -> tenākāśadhātum

tenākāśadhātum+samantāt -> tenākāśadhātuṃ samantāt

tenākāśadhātuṃ samantāt+paripūrṇam -> tenākāśadhātuṃ samantāt paripūrṇam

tenākāśadhātuṃ samantāt paripūrṇam+vibhāvya -> tenākāśadhātuṃ samantāt paripūrṇaṃ vibhāvya

tatas+lalāṭāt -> tato lalāṭāt

tato lalāṭāt+niścārya -> tato lalāṭān niścārya

khaḍgaghaṇṭāmaṇidharam+saprajñam -> khaḍgaghaṇṭāmaṇidharaṃ saprajñam

khaḍgaghaṇṭāmaṇidharaṃ saprajñam+niṣpādya -> khaḍgaghaṇṭāmaṇidharaṃ saprajñaṃ niṣpādya

cakravajrapadmadharam+vāme -> cakravajrapadmadharaṃ vāme

oṃkārapariṇatam+aṣṭāracakram -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakram

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakram+tatpariṇatam -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇatam

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇatam+kāyavajram -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajram

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajram+śuklavarṇam -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇam

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇam+trimukham -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukham

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukham+mūlam -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlam

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlam+śuklam -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklam

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklam+vāmam -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmam

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmam+raktam -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktam

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktam+dakṣiṇam -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇam

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇam+kṛṣṇam -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇam

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇam+ṣaḍbhujam -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ṣaḍbhujam

oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ṣaḍbhujam+dakṣiṇe -> oṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭāracakraṃ tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ṣaḍbhujaṃ dakṣiṇe

lalāṭe+akārapariṇatam -> lalāṭe 'kārapariṇatam

lalāṭe 'kārapariṇatam+candramaṇḍalam -> lalāṭe 'kārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalam

lalāṭe 'kārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalam+tadupari -> lalāṭe 'kārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalaṃ tadupari

atra+adhiṣṭhāne -> atrādhiṣṭhāne

paramajinapatim+snāpayet -> paramajinapatiṃ snāpayet

paramajinapatiṃ snāpayet+devatībhis -> paramajinapatiṃ snāpayed devatībhis

paramajinapatiṃ snāpayed devatībhis+yoginībhis -> paramajinapatiṃ snāpayed devatībhir yoginībhis

paramajinapatiṃ snāpayed devatībhir yoginībhis+| -> paramajinapatiṃ snāpayed devatībhir yoginībhiḥ|

mātaras+tathā -> mātaras tathā

etais+ca -> etaiś ca

etaiś ca+adhiṣṭhitāṅgam -> etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgam

etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgam+bālam -> etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ bālam

etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ bālam+yathā -> etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ bālaṃ yathā

kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānam+jāgratsvapnasuṣuptalakṣaṇam -> kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānaṃ jāgratsvapnasuṣuptalakṣaṇam

kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānaṃ jāgratsvapnasuṣuptalakṣaṇam+bhavati -> kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānaṃ jāgratsvapnasuṣuptalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati

yathā+utpannasya -> yathotpannasya

vajrais+ityādi| -> vajrair ityādi|

triśaraṇagamanāt+tatsvabhāvātmakas -> triśaraṇagamanāt tatsvabhāvātmakas

triśaraṇagamanāt tatsvabhāvātmakas+aham|| -> triśaraṇagamanāt tatsvabhāvātmako 'ham||

vaktavyam+sādhakena -> vaktavyaṃ sādhakena

etais+ca -> etaiś ca

etaiś ca+adhiṣṭhitāṅgam -> etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgam

etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgam+paramajinapatim -> etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ paramajinapatim

etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ paramajinapatim+snāpayet -> etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ paramajinapatiṃ snāpayet

etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ paramajinapatiṃ snāpayet+devatībhis -> etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ paramajinapatiṃ snāpayed devatībhis

etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ paramajinapatiṃ snāpayed devatībhis+| -> etaiś cādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ paramajinapatiṃ snāpayed devatībhiḥ|

galahṛdos+nābhiguhye -> galahṛdor nābhiguhye

vajrais+svāhānuyuktais -> vajraiḥ svāhānuyuktais

vajraiḥ svāhānuyuktais+śirasi -> vajraiḥ svāhānuyuktaiḥ śirasi

idānīm+kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānam -> idānīṃ kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānam

idānīṃ kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānam ucyate---

evam+devatābimbaniṣpattis -> evaṃ devatābimbaniṣpattis

evaṃ devatābimbaniṣpattis+|| -> evaṃ devatābimbaniṣpattiḥ||

devatāsādhane+utpattikramas -> devatāsādhana utpattikramas

devatāsādhana utpattikramas+iti| -> devatāsādhana utpattikrama iti|

bālasya+adhyātmapaṭale -> bālasyādhyātmapaṭale

veditavyam+samastam -> veditavyaṃ samastam

veditavyaṃ samastam+yathā -> veditavyaṃ samastaṃ yathā

candrādityādikādyais+trividhabhavagatais -> candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatais

candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatais+jñānabhedais -> candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānabhedais

candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānabhedais+ānandādyais -> candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānabhedair ānandādyais

candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānabhedair ānandādyais+vijñānabhedais -> candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānabhedair ānandādyair vijñānabhedais

candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānabhedair ānandādyair vijñānabhedais+dvādaśāyatanabhedais -> candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānabhedair ānandādyair vijñānabhedair dvādaśāyatanabhedais

candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānabhedair ānandādyair vijñānabhedair dvādaśāyatanabhedais+yoginā -> candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānabhedair ānandādyair vijñānabhedair dvādaśāyatanabhedair yoginā

samakulais+raja{}udbhavadhātukulais -> samakulaī raja{}udbhavadhātukulais

samakulaī raja{}udbhavadhātukulais+viṣamakulais -> samakulaī raja{}udbhavadhātukulair viṣamakulais

samakulaī raja{}udbhavadhātukulair viṣamakulais+śukrodbhūtadhātukulais -> samakulaī raja{}udbhavadhātukulair viṣamakulaiḥ śukrodbhūtadhātukulais

samakulaī raja{}udbhavadhātukulair viṣamakulaiḥ śukrodbhūtadhātukulais+| -> samakulaī raja{}udbhavadhātukulair viṣamakulaiḥ śukrodbhūtadhātukulaiḥ|

punar+eṣām -> punar eṣām

punar eṣām+catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇām -> punar eṣāṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇām

punar eṣāṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇām+prajñopāyāṅgabhāvais -> punar eṣāṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvais

punar eṣāṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvais+samaviṣamakulais -> punar eṣāṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samaviṣamakulais

punar eṣāṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samaviṣamakulais+iti| -> punar eṣāṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samaviṣamakulair iti|

buddhaniyamas+| -> buddhaniyamaḥ|

mokṣadam+dvādaśāṅgahetuphalanirodhatas -> mokṣadaṃ dvādaśāṅgahetuphalanirodhatas

mokṣadaṃ dvādaśāṅgahetuphalanirodhatas+iti -> mokṣadaṃ dvādaśāṅgahetuphalanirodhata iti

mokṣadam+yugalam -> mokṣadaṃ yugalam

mokṣadaṃ yugalam+jñānam -> mokṣadaṃ yugalaṃ jñānam

mokṣadaṃ yugalaṃ jñānam+nirmāṇakāyalakṣaṇam -> mokṣadaṃ yugalaṃ jñānaṃ nirmāṇakāyalakṣaṇam

mokṣadaṃ yugalaṃ jñānaṃ nirmāṇakāyalakṣaṇam+prāṇinām| -> mokṣadaṃ yugalaṃ jñānaṃ nirmāṇakāyalakṣaṇaṃ prāṇinām|

tat+dadāti -> tad dadāti

tad dadāti+iti -> tad dadātīti

bodhicittabindūnām+cyutikṣaṇas -> bodhicittabindūnāṃ cyutikṣaṇas

bodhicittabindūnāṃ cyutikṣaṇas+| -> bodhicittabindūnāṃ cyutikṣaṇaḥ|

mokṣas+atra -> mokṣo 'tra

yugalam+prāṇinām -> yugalaṃ prāṇinām

yugalaṃ prāṇinām+mokṣadam -> yugalaṃ prāṇināṃ mokṣadam

yugalaṃ prāṇināṃ mokṣadam+vai| -> yugalaṃ prāṇināṃ mokṣadaṃ vai|

paripūrṇadhātutvam+ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes -> paripūrṇadhātutvaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes

paripūrṇadhātutvaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes+bhavati -> paripūrṇadhātutvaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher bhavati

sukham+nirmāṇakāyas -> sukhaṃ nirmāṇakāyas

sukhaṃ nirmāṇakāyas+iti -> sukhaṃ nirmāṇakāya iti

jñānam+iti -> jñānam iti

maṇḍale+api| -> maṇḍale 'pi|

yugalam+tathā -> yugalaṃ tathā

bodhicittam+sambhogakāyas -> bodhicittaṃ sambhogakāyas

bodhicittaṃ sambhogakāyas+sarvasattvārthakartā -> bodhicittaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sarvasattvārthakartā

dharmadeśanārtham+maṇḍale -> dharmadeśanārthaṃ maṇḍale

dharmadeśanārthaṃ maṇḍale+api| -> dharmadeśanārthaṃ maṇḍale 'pi|

jalpanārtham+yathā -> jalpanārthaṃ yathā

yugalam+api -> yugalam api

evam+vāgvajram -> evaṃ vāgvajram

evaṃ vāgvajram+dharmakāyas -> evaṃ vāgvajraṃ dharmakāyas

evaṃ vāgvajraṃ dharmakāyas+bālasya -> evaṃ vāgvajraṃ dharmakāyo bālasya

candrādityādikādyais+trividhabhavagatais -> candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatais

candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatais+jñānavijñānabhedais -> candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānavijñānabhedais

candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānavijñānabhedais+|| -> candrādityādikādyais trividhabhavagatair jñānavijñānabhedaiḥ||

prajñopāyāṅgabhāvais+samaviṣamakulais -> prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samaviṣamakulais

prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samaviṣamakulais+yoginā -> prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaiḥ samaviṣamakulair yoginā

yugalam+prāṇinām -> yugalaṃ prāṇinām

yugalaṃ prāṇinām+mokṣadam -> yugalaṃ prāṇināṃ mokṣadam

yugalaṃ prāṇināṃ mokṣadam+vai| -> yugalaṃ prāṇināṃ mokṣadaṃ vai|

jñānam+nirmāṇakāyas -> jñānaṃ nirmāṇakāyas

jñānaṃ nirmāṇakāyas+bhavati -> jñānaṃ nirmāṇakāyo bhavati

bhavet+sarvasattvārthakartā -> bhavet sarvasattvārthakartā

cittam+sambhogakāyas -> cittaṃ sambhogakāyas

cittaṃ sambhogakāyas+yugalam -> cittaṃ sambhogakāyo yugalam

cittaṃ sambhogakāyo yugalam+api -> cittaṃ sambhogakāyo yugalam api

maṇḍale+api|| -> maṇḍale 'pi||

bimbaniṣpattihetos+sahajakāyas -> bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyas

bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyas+caturbhūtātmakam -> bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaś caturbhūtātmakam

bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaś caturbhūtātmakam+kāyavajram -> bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaś caturbhūtātmakaṃ kāyavajram

bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaś caturbhūtātmakaṃ kāyavajram+yugmam -> bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaś caturbhūtātmakaṃ kāyavajraṃ yugmam

bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaś caturbhūtātmakaṃ kāyavajraṃ yugmam+syāt -> bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaś caturbhūtātmakaṃ kāyavajraṃ yugmaṃ syāt

bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaś caturbhūtātmakaṃ kāyavajraṃ yugmaṃ syāt+yathā -> bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaś caturbhūtātmakaṃ kāyavajraṃ yugmaṃ syād yathā

idānīm+catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇām -> idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇām

idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇām+parasparam -> idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ parasparam

idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ parasparam+yogas -> idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ parasparaṃ yogas

idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ parasparaṃ yogas+ucyate---yugmam -> idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ parasparaṃ yoga ucyate---yugmam

idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ parasparaṃ yoga ucyate---yugmam+ityādi| -> idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ parasparaṃ yoga ucyate---yugmam ityādi|

catuḥkāyaviśuddhiniyamas+| -> catuḥkāyaviśuddhiniyamaḥ|

sarvasattvārthahetos+iti -> sarvasattvārthahetor iti

śvānāsyādayas+parijanasahitās -> śvānāsyādayaḥ parijanasahitās

śvānāsyādayaḥ parijanasahitās+sārdhatrikoṭibhūtais -> śvānāsyādayaḥ parijanasahitāḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhūtais

śvānāsyādayaḥ parijanasahitāḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhūtais+sahitās -> śvānāsyādayaḥ parijanasahitāḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhūtaiḥ sahitās

śvānāsyādayaḥ parijanasahitāḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhūtaiḥ sahitās+nirmāṇakāyas -> śvānāsyādayaḥ parijanasahitāḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhūtaiḥ sahitā nirmāṇakāyas

śvānāsyādayaḥ parijanasahitāḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhūtaiḥ sahitā nirmāṇakāyas+bhavati -> śvānāsyādayaḥ parijanasahitāḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhūtaiḥ sahitā nirmāṇakāyo bhavati

nirmāṇakāyas+tathā -> nirmāṇakāyas tathā

dantapātāt+punar -> dantapātāt punar

dantapātāt punar+utthānāt -> dantapātāt punar utthānāt

dantapātāt punar utthānāt+āmaraṇāvadhau -> dantapātāt punar utthānād āmaraṇāvadhau

sakalaphaṇikulam+iti| -> sakalaphaṇikulam iti|

sambhogakāyas+tathā -> sambhogakāyas tathā

rathasthās+ṣaṭ -> rathasthāḥ ṣaṭ

rathasthāḥ ṣaṭ+devyas -> rathasthāḥ ṣaḍ devyas

rathasthāḥ ṣaḍ devyas+iti| -> rathasthāḥ ṣaḍ devya iti|

devās+dvādaśa| -> devā dvādaśa|

hastapādādisaṃkucanam+asphuṭavacanam -> hastapādādisaṃkucanam asphuṭavacanam

hastapādādisaṃkucanam asphuṭavacanam+dharmakāyas -> hastapādādisaṃkucanam asphuṭavacanaṃ dharmakāyas

hastapādādisaṃkucanam asphuṭavacanaṃ dharmakāyas+tathā -> hastapādādisaṃkucanam asphuṭavacanaṃ dharmakāyas tathā

yugalam+dharmatādeśanārtham|| -> yugalaṃ dharmatādeśanārtham||

vāgvajram+dharmakāyas -> vāgvajraṃ dharmakāyas

vāgvajraṃ dharmakāyas+bhavati -> vāgvajraṃ dharmakāyo bhavati

yugmam+syāt -> yugmaṃ syāt

yugmaṃ syāt+kāyavajram -> yugmaṃ syāt kāyavajram

yugmaṃ syāt kāyavajram+sahajajinatanus -> yugmaṃ syāt kāyavajraṃ sahajajinatanus

yugmaṃ syāt kāyavajraṃ sahajajinatanus+bimbaniṣpattihetos -> yugmaṃ syāt kāyavajraṃ sahajajinatanur bimbaniṣpattihetos

sarvasattvārthahetos+| -> sarvasattvārthahetoḥ|

nirmāṇakāyas+bhavati -> nirmāṇakāyo bhavati

devādyās+dharmakāyas -> devādyā dharmakāyas

devādyā dharmakāyas+sakalaphaṇikulam -> devādyā dharmakāyaḥ sakalaphaṇikulam

devādyā dharmakāyaḥ sakalaphaṇikulam+ca -> devādyā dharmakāyaḥ sakalaphaṇikulaṃ ca

devādyā dharmakāyaḥ sakalaphaṇikulaṃ ca+atra -> devādyā dharmakāyaḥ sakalaphaṇikulaṃ cātra

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyas+parijanasahitās -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitās

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitās+catuḥṣaṣṭiyoginībhis -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāś catuḥṣaṣṭiyoginībhis

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāś catuḥṣaṣṭiyoginībhis+sahitās -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāś catuḥṣaṣṭiyoginībhiḥ sahitās

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāś catuḥṣaṣṭiyoginībhiḥ sahitās+iti|| -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāś catuḥṣaṣṭiyoginībhiḥ sahitā iti||

nābhicakrāt+prāṇinirgamas -> nābhicakrāt prāṇinirgamas

nābhicakrāt prāṇinirgamas+sahajakāyas -> nābhicakrāt prāṇinirgamaḥ sahajakāyas

nābhicakrāt prāṇinirgamaḥ sahajakāyas+tathā -> nābhicakrāt prāṇinirgamaḥ sahajakāyas tathā

yathā+utpannasya -> yathotpannasya

caturdhā+ucyate---cāmuṇḍā -> caturdhocyate---cāmuṇḍā

caturdhocyate---cāmuṇḍā+ityādi| -> caturdhocyate---cāmuṇḍetyādi|

idānīm+bāhye -> idānīṃ bāhye

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

cittakulavaśāt+iti -> cittakulavaśād iti

kulavaśāt+maṇḍale -> kulavaśān maṇḍale

yamāntakādayas+catuḥkrodhās -> yamāntakādayaś catuḥkrodhās

yamāntakādayaś catuḥkrodhās+iti -> yamāntakādayaś catuḥkrodhā iti

nirmāṇakāyas+tathā -> nirmāṇakāyas tathā

hastapādādikeśādisambhavaḥ prasavanasamayas+ca -> hastapādādikeśādisambhavaḥ prasavanasamayaś ca

tatas+yathā -> tato yathā

śabdavajrādayas+iti| -> śabdavajrādaya iti|

maṇḍale+api| -> maṇḍale 'pi|

bālasyāyatanodbhavas+sambhogakāyas -> bālasyāyatanodbhavaḥ sambhogakāyas

bālasyāyatanodbhavaḥ sambhogakāyas+tathā -> bālasyāyatanodbhavaḥ sambhogakāyas tathā

tatas+yathā -> tato yathā

buddhādyās+iti| -> buddhādyā iti|

skandhadhātūdbhavas+dharmakāyas -> skandhadhātūdbhavo dharmakāyas

skandhadhātūdbhavo dharmakāyas+tathā -> skandhadhātūdbhavo dharmakāyas tathā

tatas+yathā -> tato yathā

sahajakāyas+iti| -> sahajakāya iti|

dharmaśaṅkhādayas+aṣṭakumbhās -> dharmaśaṅkhādayo 'ṣṭakumbhās

dharmaśaṅkhādayo 'ṣṭakumbhās+ete -> dharmaśaṅkhādayo 'ṣṭakumbhā ete

divyās+dhūmādayas -> divyā dhūmādayas

divyā dhūmādayas+| -> divyā dhūmādayaḥ|

śuddhakāyas+tathā -> śuddhakāyas tathā

vijñānam+jñānam -> vijñānaṃ jñānam

vijñānaṃ jñānam+śukrarajogarbhe -> vijñānaṃ jñānaṃ śukrarajogarbhe

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyas+parijanasahitās -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitās

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitās+śuddhakāyas -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāḥ śuddhakāyas

cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāḥ śuddhakāyas+hi -> cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāḥ śuddhakāyo hi

kulavaśāt+maṇḍale -> kulavaśān maṇḍale

krodhās+nirmāṇakāyas -> krodhā nirmāṇakāyas

krodhā nirmāṇakāyas+bhavati -> krodhā nirmāṇakāyo bhavati

sambhogakāyas+| -> sambhogakāyaḥ|

rasakuliśādyās+ca -> rasakuliśādyāś ca

buddhādyās+dharmakāyas -> buddhādyā dharmakāyas

buddhādyā dharmakāyas+khalu -> buddhādyā dharmakāyaḥ khalu

divyādikumbhās+sahajajinatanus -> divyādikumbhāḥ sahajajinatanus

divyādikumbhāḥ sahajajinatanus+maṇḍale -> divyādikumbhāḥ sahajajinatanur maṇḍale

tadvat+eva -> tadvad eva

tadvad eva+iti|| -> tadvad eveti||

garbhotpattis+yathā -> garbhotpattir yathā

garbhotpattir yathā+eva -> garbhotpattir yathaiva

jinatanus+bāhyatas -> jinatanur bāhyatas

jinatanur bāhyatas+abhyantare -> jinatanur bāhyato 'bhyantare

evam+bhūyas -> evaṃ bhūyas

evaṃ bhūyas+dvibhedas -> evaṃ bhūyo dvibhedas

evaṃ bhūyo dvibhedas+bhavati -> evaṃ bhūyo dvibhedo bhavati

buddhanirmāṇakāyas+| -> buddhanirmāṇakāyaḥ|

devatābhis+saha -> devatābhiḥ saha

devādayas+parijanasahitās -> devādayaḥ parijanasahitās

devādayaḥ parijanasahitās+padmadale -> devādayaḥ parijanasahitāḥ padmadale

pracaṇḍās+śvānāsyādayas -> pracaṇḍāḥ śvānāsyādayas

pracaṇḍāḥ śvānāsyādayas+| -> pracaṇḍāḥ śvānāsyādayaḥ|

nāgās+karkoṭādayas -> nāgāḥ karkoṭādayas

nāgāḥ karkoṭādayas+| -> nāgāḥ karkoṭādayaḥ|

nairṛtyādayas+dvādaśa| -> nairṛtyādayo dvādaśa|

pravararathagatās+mārīcyādayas -> pravararathagatā mārīcyādayas

pravararathagatā mārīcyādayas+sūryadevās -> pravararathagatā mārīcyādayaḥ sūryadevās

pravararathagatā mārīcyādayaḥ sūryadevās+prasiddhās -> pravararathagatā mārīcyādayaḥ sūryadevāḥ prasiddhās

pravararathagatā mārīcyādayaḥ sūryadevāḥ prasiddhās+| -> pravararathagatā mārīcyādayaḥ sūryadevāḥ prasiddhāḥ|

tatas+kāyamaṇḍale -> tataḥ kāyamaṇḍale

yoginyas+bhogakāyas -> yoginyo bhogakāyas

yoginyo bhogakāyas+carcikādyās -> yoginyo bhogakāyaś carcikādyās

yoginyo bhogakāyaś carcikādyās+daladevībhis -> yoginyo bhogakāyaś carcikādyā daladevībhis

yoginyo bhogakāyaś carcikādyā daladevībhis+sārdham -> yoginyo bhogakāyaś carcikādyā daladevībhiḥ sārdham

yoginyo bhogakāyaś carcikādyā daladevībhiḥ sārdham+iti| -> yoginyo bhogakāyaś carcikādyā daladevībhiḥ sārdham iti|

tatas+vāṅmaṇḍale -> tato vāṅmaṇḍale

tadvat+eva|| -> tadvad eva||

gabhotpattis+yathā -> gabhotpattir yathā

gabhotpattir yathā+eva -> gabhotpattir yathaiva

jinatanus+bāhyatas -> jinatanur bāhyatas

jinatanur bāhyatas+abhyantare -> jinatanur bāhyato 'bhyantare

evam+bhūyas -> evaṃ bhūyas

evaṃ bhūyas+dvibhedas -> evaṃ bhūyo dvibhedas

evaṃ bhūyo dvibhedas+bhavati -> evaṃ bhūyo dvibhedo bhavati

nāgās+pracaṇḍās -> nāgāḥ pracaṇḍās

nāgāḥ pracaṇḍās+parijanasahitās -> nāgāḥ pracaṇḍāḥ parijanasahitās

nāgāḥ pracaṇḍāḥ parijanasahitās+buddhanirmāṇakāyas -> nāgāḥ pracaṇḍāḥ parijanasahitā buddhanirmāṇakāyas

nāgāḥ pracaṇḍāḥ parijanasahitā buddhanirmāṇakāyas+| -> nāgāḥ pracaṇḍāḥ parijanasahitā buddhanirmāṇakāyaḥ|

yoginyas+bhogakāyas -> yoginyo bhogakāyas

yoginyo bhogakāyas+pravararathagatās -> yoginyo bhogakāyaḥ pravararathagatās

yoginyo bhogakāyaḥ pravararathagatās+sūryadevās -> yoginyo bhogakāyaḥ pravararathagatāḥ sūryadevās

yoginyo bhogakāyaḥ pravararathagatāḥ sūryadevās+prasiddhās -> yoginyo bhogakāyaḥ pravararathagatāḥ sūryadevāḥ prasiddhās

etās+dharmakāyas -> etā dharmakāyas

etā dharmakāyas+sas -> etā dharmakāyaḥ sas

etā dharmakāyaḥ sas+eva|| -> etā dharmakāyaḥ sa eva||

rasakuliśās+iti -> rasakuliśā iti

samantabhadras+| -> samantabhadraḥ|

bodhisattvās+vajrapāṇis -> bodhisattvā vajrapāṇis

bodhisattvā vajrapāṇis+khagarbhas -> bodhisattvā vajrapāṇiḥ khagarbhas

bodhisattvā vajrapāṇiḥ khagarbhas+kṣitigarbhas -> bodhisattvā vajrapāṇiḥ khagarbhaḥ kṣitigarbhas

bodhisattvā vajrapāṇiḥ khagarbhaḥ kṣitigarbhas+lokeśvaras -> bodhisattvā vajrapāṇiḥ khagarbhaḥ kṣitigarbho lokeśvaras

bodhisattvā vajrapāṇiḥ khagarbhaḥ kṣitigarbho lokeśvaras+viṣkambhī -> bodhisattvā vajrapāṇiḥ khagarbhaḥ kṣitigarbho lokeśvaro viṣkambhī

krodhendrās+vighnāntakas -> krodhendrā vighnāntakas

krodhendrā vighnāntakas+prajñāntakas -> krodhendrā vighnāntakaḥ prajñāntakas

krodhendrā vighnāntakaḥ prajñāntakas+padmāntakas -> krodhendrā vighnāntakaḥ prajñāntakaḥ padmāntakas

krodhendrā vighnāntakaḥ prajñāntakaḥ padmāntakas+yamāntakas -> krodhendrā vighnāntakaḥ prajñāntakaḥ padmāntako yamāntakas

krodhendrā vighnāntakaḥ prajñāntakaḥ padmāntako yamāntakas+uṣṇīṣe| -> krodhendrā vighnāntakaḥ prajñāntakaḥ padmāntako yamāntaka uṣṇīṣe|

tatas+bāhyapuṭe -> tato bāhyapuṭe

maṇḍalādhipates+| -> maṇḍalādhipateḥ|

śuddhakāyas+jinasya -> śuddhakāyo jinasya

viṇmūtraraktamajjāghaṇṭās+aṣṭau -> viṇmūtraraktamajjāghaṇṭā aṣṭau

viṇmūtraraktamajjāghaṇṭā aṣṭau+iti| -> viṇmūtraraktamajjāghaṇṭā aṣṭāv iti|

kalaśās+rajaḥśukrayos -> kalaśā rajaḥśukrayos

kalaśā rajaḥśukrayos+kāyavākcittajñānabindubhedena -> kalaśā rajaḥśukrayoḥ kāyavākcittajñānabindubhedena

dharmaśaṅkhas+| -> dharmaśaṅkhaḥ|

evam+cintāmaṇis -> evaṃ cintāmaṇis

evaṃ cintāmaṇis+dharmagaṇḍī -> evaṃ cintāmaṇir dharmagaṇḍī

tarus+kalpavṛkṣas -> taruḥ kalpavṛkṣas

taruḥ kalpavṛkṣas+iti| -> taruḥ kalpavṛkṣa iti|

satarusakalaśās+iti| -> satarusakalaśā iti|

vidyās+tārāpāṇḍarāmāmakīlocanās -> vidyās tārāpāṇḍarāmāmakīlocanās

vidyās tārāpāṇḍarāmāmakīlocanās+iti| -> vidyās tārāpāṇḍarāmāmakīlocanā iti|

buddhās+amoghasiddhiratnasambhavāmitābhavairocanās -> buddhā amoghasiddhiratnasambhavāmitābhavairocanās

buddhā amoghasiddhiratnasambhavāmitābhavairocanās+| -> buddhā amoghasiddhiratnasambhavāmitābhavairocanāḥ|

vidyās+iti| -> vidyā iti|

buddhās+ca -> buddhāś ca

bindrūpiṇī+iti -> bindrūpiṇīti

marīcis+khadyotā -> marīciḥ khadyotā

devatābhāvanāyām+viśodhanīyas -> devatābhāvanāyāṃ viśodhanīyas

devatābhāvanāyāṃ viśodhanīyas+yoginā -> devatābhāvanāyāṃ viśodhanīyo yoginā

devatābhāvanāyāṃ viśodhanīyo yoginā+iti| -> devatābhāvanāyāṃ viśodhanīyo yogineti|

caturvidhas+kāyas -> caturvidhaḥ kāyas

caturvidhaḥ kāyas+uktas -> caturvidhaḥ kāya uktas

caturvidhaḥ kāya uktas+tathā -> caturvidhaḥ kāya uktas tathā

bālasya+adhyātmapaṭale -> bālasyādhyātmapaṭale

divyās+ityādi| -> divyā ityādi|

rasakuliśās+dharmakāyas -> rasakuliśā dharmakāyas

rasakuliśā dharmakāyas+sas -> rasakuliśā dharmakāyaḥ sas

rasakuliśā dharmakāyaḥ sas+eva|| -> rasakuliśā dharmakāyaḥ sa eva||

krodhendrās+bodhisattvās -> krodhendrā bodhisattvās

krodhendrā bodhisattvās+khalu -> krodhendrā bodhisattvāḥ khalu

vidyās+satarusakalaśās -> vidyāḥ satarusakalaśās

vidyāḥ satarusakalaśās+śauddhakāyas -> vidyāḥ satarusakalaśāḥ śauddhakāyas

vidyāḥ satarusakalaśāḥ śauddhakāyas+jinasya -> vidyāḥ satarusakalaśāḥ śauddhakāyo jinasya

divyās+buddhās -> divyā buddhās

divyā buddhās+ca -> divyā buddhāś ca

idānīm+catuḥkāyapariśuddhis -> idānīṃ catuḥkāyapariśuddhis

idānīṃ catuḥkāyapariśuddhis+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ catuḥkāyapariśuddhir ucyate---

viśvamātāvaśeṣās+itiparyantam -> viśvamātāvaśeṣā itiparyantam

viśvamātāvaśeṣā itiparyantam+kulakulīnayos -> viśvamātāvaśeṣā itiparyantaṃ kulakulīnayos

viśvamātāvaśeṣā itiparyantaṃ kulakulīnayos+sambandhas -> viśvamātāvaśeṣā itiparyantaṃ kulakulīnayoḥ sambandhas

viśvamātāvaśeṣā itiparyantaṃ kulakulīnayoḥ sambandhas+|| -> viśvamātāvaśeṣā itiparyantaṃ kulakulīnayoḥ sambandhaḥ||

viśvabhadras+ityādisārdhanavavṛttāni -> viśvabhadra ityādisārdhanavavṛttāni

idānīm+janyajanakādisambandhas -> idānīṃ janyajanakādisambandhas

idānīṃ janyajanakādisambandhas+śrīvajrī -> idānīṃ janyajanakādisambandhaḥ śrīvajrī

evaṃ lāsyādisarvās+prakaṭadaśavidhās -> evaṃ lāsyādisarvāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhās

evaṃ lāsyādisarvāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhās+viśvamātāvaśeṣās -> evaṃ lāsyādisarvāḥ prakaṭadaśavidhā viśvamātāvaśeṣās

atra+agneyyām -> atrāgneyyām

atrāgneyyām+sparśavajrā -> atrāgneyyāṃ sparśavajrā

paścāt+prajñādiṣaṭkam -> paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkam

paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkam+dharmadhātvādikam -> paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkaṃ dharmadhātvādikam

paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkaṃ dharmadhātvādikam+iti| -> paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkaṃ dharmadhātvādikam iti|

stambhas+ca -> stambhaś ca

stambhaś ca+anantavīryā -> stambhaś cānantavīryā

mānakas+jambhakī -> mānako jambhakī

jambhas+ca -> jambhaś ca

pracaṇḍas+tu -> pracaṇḍas tu

pracaṇḍas tu+asidhṛk -> pracaṇḍas tv asidhṛk

pracaṇḍas tv asidhṛk+atibalas -> pracaṇḍas tv asidhṛg atibalas

pracaṇḍas tv asidhṛg atibalas+stambhakī -> pracaṇḍas tv asidhṛg atibalaḥ stambhakī

paścāt+prajñādiṣaṭkam -> paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkam

paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkam+prakaṭam -> paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkaṃ prakaṭam

paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkaṃ prakaṭam+adhipatis -> paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkaṃ prakaṭam adhipatis

paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkaṃ prakaṭam adhipatis+svasvapadmāsane -> paścāt prajñādiṣaṭkaṃ prakaṭam adhipatiḥ svasvapadmāsane

tathāgatakulavaśāt+maṇḍalasya -> tathāgatakulavaśān maṇḍalasya

tathāgatakulavaśān maṇḍalasya+adhidaivam|| -> tathāgatakulavaśān maṇḍalasyādhidaivam||

ca+upāyaṣaṭkam -> copāyaṣaṭkam

copāyaṣaṭkam+bhavati| -> copāyaṣaṭkaṃ bhavati|

sagaganam+pūrvadvārasya -> sagaganaṃ pūrvadvārasya

dharmadhātus+bhavati -> dharmadhātur bhavati

cittam+vai -> cittaṃ vai

sparśakāyendriyam+pātāle -> sparśakāyendriyaṃ pātāle

jihvārasas+varuṇe -> jihvāraso varuṇe

jinavaśāt+maṇḍalasya -> jinavaśān maṇḍalasya

jinavaśān maṇḍalasya+adhidaivam|| -> jinavaśān maṇḍalasyādhidaivam||

ca+upāyaṣaṭkam -> copāyaṣaṭkam

copāyaṣaṭkam+bhavati -> copāyaṣaṭkaṃ bhavati

sagaganam+sarvatas -> sagaganaṃ sarvatas

sagaganaṃ sarvatas+dvāravāme -> sagaganaṃ sarvato dvāravāme

dharmadhātus+bhavati -> dharmadhātur bhavati

cittam+vai -> cittaṃ vai

kulavaśāt+dakṣiṇe -> kulavaśād dakṣiṇe

sparśakāyas+tathā -> sparśakāyas tathā

sparśakāyas tathā+eva -> sparśakāyas tathaiva

jihvārasas+syāt -> jihvārasaḥ syāt

jihvārasaḥ syāt+bhavati -> jihvārasaḥ syād bhavati

netram+rūpaviṣayas -> netraṃ rūpaviṣayas

netraṃ rūpaviṣayas+|| -> netraṃ rūpaviṣayaḥ||

samarasas+| -> samarasaḥ|

ghrāṇas+gandhas -> ghrāṇo gandhas

ghrāṇo gandhas+ca -> ghrāṇo gandhaś ca

tatas+bodhisattvapuṭe -> tato bodhisattvapuṭe

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

samarasās+bhavanti -> samarasā bhavanti

samarasā bhavanti+iti -> samarasā bhavantīti

evam+devībuddhānām -> evaṃ devībuddhānām

evaṃ devībuddhānām+antarāleṣu -> evaṃ devībuddhānām antarāleṣu

evaṃ devībuddhānām antarāleṣu+amṛtarasaghaṭās -> evaṃ devībuddhānām antarāleṣv amṛtarasaghaṭās

evaṃ devībuddhānām antarāleṣv amṛtarasaghaṭās+aṣṭakakṣapradeśe -> evaṃ devībuddhānām antarāleṣv amṛtarasaghaṭā aṣṭakakṣapradeśe

koṇadevyo nāyikyas+| -> koṇadevyo nāyikyaḥ|

ghrāṇas+gandhas -> ghrāṇo gandhas

toṣam+jihvendriyajanitam -> toṣaṃ jihvendriyajanitam

toṣaṃ jihvendriyajanitam+jihvāvijñānam -> toṣaṃ jihvendriyajanitaṃ jihvāvijñānam

caturmukham+dvicaraṇam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇam+prajñopāyodbhavantam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantam+bhartṛvat -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat+praharaṇasahitam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitam+gajacarmāmbaradharam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharam+pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam+akṣobhyamukuṭyinam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinam+kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇam+sarpābharaṇam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇam+hūṃkāravajranirmāṇam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇam+tam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ tam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ tam+vajravegam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ taṃ vajravegam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ taṃ vajravegam+preṣayet -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ taṃ vajravegaṃ preṣayet

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ taṃ vajravegaṃ preṣayet+ālayavijñānam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ taṃ vajravegaṃ preṣayed ālayavijñānam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ taṃ vajravegaṃ preṣayed ālayavijñānam+pravṛttivijñānam -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ taṃ vajravegaṃ preṣayed ālayavijñānaṃ pravṛttivijñānam

caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ taṃ vajravegaṃ preṣayed ālayavijñānaṃ pravṛttivijñānam+iti| -> caturmukhaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ bhartṛvat praharaṇasahitaṃ gajacarmāmbaradharaṃ pañcamudrāvibhūṣitam akṣobhyamukuṭyinaṃ kapālamuṇḍamālādhāriṇaṃ sarpābharaṇaṃ hūṃkāravajranirmāṇaṃ taṃ vajravegaṃ preṣayed ālayavijñānaṃ pravṛttivijñānam iti|

vajravegam+bhīmakāyam -> vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyam

vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyam+prahasitavadanam -> vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanam

vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanam+ca -> vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ ca

vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ ca+ardhadaṃṣṭrākarālam -> vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālam

vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālam+garjantam -> vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ garjantam

vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ garjantam+dvādaśanetram -> vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ garjantaṃ dvādaśanetram

vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ garjantaṃ dvādaśanetram+dvyadhikajinakaram -> vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ garjantaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ dvyadhikajinakaram

vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ garjantaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ dvyadhikajinakaram+ṣaḍviṃśatibhujam| -> vajravegaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ garjantaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ dvyadhikajinakaraṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujam|

nīlābham+prāṇam -> nīlābhaṃ prāṇam

nīlābhaṃ prāṇam+madhyamāviśuddhyā -> nīlābhaṃ prāṇaṃ madhyamāviśuddhyā

atas+bāhyadevatāniṣpattau -> ato bāhyadevatāniṣpattau

nirgamena+indriyāṇām -> nirgamenendriyāṇām

nirgamenendriyāṇām+prabodhas -> nirgamenendriyāṇāṃ prabodhas

nirgamenendriyāṇāṃ prabodhas+bāhyaviṣayāṇām -> nirgamenendriyāṇāṃ prabodho bāhyaviṣayāṇām

nirgamenendriyāṇāṃ prabodho bāhyaviṣayāṇām+ṣaḍvijñānānām -> nirgamenendriyāṇāṃ prabodho bāhyaviṣayāṇāṃ ṣaḍvijñānānām

nirgamenendriyāṇāṃ prabodho bāhyaviṣayāṇāṃ ṣaḍvijñānānām+pravṛttis -> nirgamenendriyāṇāṃ prabodho bāhyaviṣayāṇāṃ ṣaḍvijñānānāṃ pravṛttis

nirgamenendriyāṇāṃ prabodho bāhyaviṣayāṇāṃ ṣaḍvijñānānāṃ pravṛttis+adhyātmani| -> nirgamenendriyāṇāṃ prabodho bāhyaviṣayāṇāṃ ṣaḍvijñānānāṃ pravṛttir adhyātmani|

madhyamāprāṇanirgamas+nīlābhas -> madhyamāprāṇanirgamo nīlābhas

madhyamāprāṇanirgamo nīlābhas+tasya -> madhyamāprāṇanirgamo nīlābhas tasya

nīlābham+ityādinā| -> nīlābham ityādinā|

hetos+|| -> hetoḥ||

aṣṭāṅghrisyandanastham+jinaripumathanam -> aṣṭāṅghrisyandanasthaṃ jinaripumathanam

aṣṭāṅghrisyandanasthaṃ jinaripumathanam+jñānacakrasya -> aṣṭāṅghrisyandanasthaṃ jinaripumathanaṃ jñānacakrasya

prajñopāyodbhavantam+praharaṇasahitam -> prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ praharaṇasahitam

prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ praharaṇasahitam+preṣayet -> prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ praharaṇasahitaṃ preṣayet

prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ praharaṇasahitaṃ preṣayet+vajravegam -> prajñopāyodbhavantaṃ praharaṇasahitaṃ preṣayed vajravegam

garjantam+sūryanetram -> garjantaṃ sūryanetram

garjantaṃ sūryanetram+dvyadhikajinakaram -> garjantaṃ sūryanetraṃ dvyadhikajinakaram

garjantaṃ sūryanetraṃ dvyadhikajinakaram+vedavaktram -> garjantaṃ sūryanetraṃ dvyadhikajinakaraṃ vedavaktram

garjantaṃ sūryanetraṃ dvyadhikajinakaraṃ vedavaktram+dvipādam| -> garjantaṃ sūryanetraṃ dvyadhikajinakaraṃ vedavaktraṃ dvipādam|

nīlābham+bhīmakāyam -> nīlābhaṃ bhīmakāyam

nīlābhaṃ bhīmakāyam+prahasitavadanam -> nīlābhaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanam

nīlābhaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanam+ca -> nīlābhaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ ca

nīlābhaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ ca+ardhadaṃṣṭrākarālam -> nīlābhaṃ bhīmakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālam

idānīm+jñānacakrākarṣaṇam -> idānīṃ jñānacakrākarṣaṇam

idānīṃ jñānacakrākarṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ jñānacakrākarṣaṇam ucyate---

ityādipañcākārābhisambodhinā+avagantavyas -> ityādipañcākārābhisambodhināvagantavyas

ityādipañcākārābhisambodhināvagantavyas+|| -> ityādipañcākārābhisambodhināvagantavyaḥ||

vairocanas+mahādīptis -> vairocano mahādīptis

vairocano mahādīptis+jñānajyotis -> vairocano mahādīptir jñānajyotis

vairocano mahādīptir jñānajyotis+virocanas -> vairocano mahādīptir jñānajyotir virocanas

vairocano mahādīptir jñānajyotir virocanas+|| -> vairocano mahādīptir jñānajyotir virocanaḥ||

gaganodbhavas+svayaṃbhūs -> gaganodbhavaḥ svayaṃbhūs

gaganodbhavaḥ svayaṃbhūs+prajñājñānānalas -> gaganodbhavaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ prajñājñānānalas

gaganodbhavaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ prajñājñānānalas+mahān| -> gaganodbhavaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ prajñājñānānalo mahān|

sattvāśayena+uktas -> sattvāśayenoktas

sattvāśayenoktas+bhagavatā -> sattvāśayenokto bhagavatā

sattvāśayenokto bhagavatā+utpannakramas -> sattvāśayenokto bhagavatotpannakramas

sattvāśayenokto bhagavatotpannakramas+punas -> sattvāśayenokto bhagavatotpannakramaḥ punas

sattvāśayenokto bhagavatotpannakramaḥ punas+kalpanārahitas -> sattvāśayenokto bhagavatotpannakramaḥ punaḥ kalpanārahitas

sattvāśayenokto bhagavatotpannakramaḥ punaḥ kalpanārahitas+| -> sattvāśayenokto bhagavatotpannakramaḥ punaḥ kalpanārahitaḥ|

sattvānām+sas -> sattvānāṃ sas

sattvānāṃ sas+ekotpattikramas -> sattvānāṃ sa ekotpattikramas

sattvānāṃ sa ekotpattikramas+| -> sattvānāṃ sa ekotpattikramaḥ|

sas+upapādukotpādas -> sa upapādukotpādas

sa upapādukotpādas+| -> sa upapādukotpādaḥ|

yas+jhaṭiti -> yo jhaṭiti

manuṣyotpādas+| -> manuṣyotpādaḥ|

yas+jarāyujas -> yo jarāyujas

yo jarāyujas+sa -> yo jarāyujaḥ sa

brahmāṇḍajam+iti -> brahmāṇḍajam iti

lokadhātūtpādas+| -> lokadhātūtpādaḥ|

yas+aṇḍajas -> yo 'ṇḍajas

yo 'ṇḍajas+sa -> yo 'ṇḍajaḥ sa

evam+utpattikramas -> evam utpattikramas

evam utpattikramas+dvidhā---ekas -> evam utpattikramo dvidhā---ekas

evam utpattikramo dvidhā---ekas+jarāyujas -> evam utpattikramo dvidhā---eko jarāyujas

evam utpattikramo dvidhā---eko jarāyujas+dvitīyas -> evam utpattikramo dvidhā---eko jarāyujo dvitīyas

evam utpattikramo dvidhā---eko jarāyujo dvitīyas+aṇḍajas -> evam utpattikramo dvidhā---eko jarāyujo dvitīyo 'ṇḍajas

evam utpattikramo dvidhā---eko jarāyujo dvitīyo 'ṇḍajas+| -> evam utpattikramo dvidhā---eko jarāyujo dvitīyo 'ṇḍajaḥ|

viṃśatyākārasambodhau+upasādhanam -> viṃśatyākārasambodhāv upasādhanam

viṃśatyākārasambodhāv upasādhanam+vāṅniṣpattau| -> viṃśatyākārasambodhāv upasādhanaṃ vāṅniṣpattau|

sevāṅgam+kāyaniṣpattau -> sevāṅgaṃ kāyaniṣpattau

evam+pañcākārābhisambodhau -> evaṃ pañcākārābhisambodhau

yogibhis+viṃśatyākārasambodhilakṣaṇā| -> yogibhir viṃśatyākārasambodhilakṣaṇā|

devatāyām+bhāvanīyā -> devatāyāṃ bhāvanīyā

tatas+indriyaprabodhas -> tata indriyaprabodhas

tata indriyaprabodhas+jñānasattvapraveśas -> tata indriyaprabodho jñānasattvapraveśas

tata indriyaprabodho jñānasattvapraveśas+bālasya -> tata indriyaprabodho jñānasattvapraveśo bālasya

devatāyās+samayamaṇḍalaniṣpattis -> devatāyāḥ samayamaṇḍalaniṣpattis

devatāyāḥ samayamaṇḍalaniṣpattis+| -> devatāyāḥ samayamaṇḍalaniṣpattiḥ|

nagnas+jarāyucarmāmbaradharas -> nagno jarāyucarmāmbaradharas

nagno jarāyucarmāmbaradharas+bālas -> nagno jarāyucarmāmbaradharo bālas

nagno jarāyucarmāmbaradharo bālas+iti -> nagno jarāyucarmāmbaradharo bāla iti

puṣpakṣepas+| -> puṣpakṣepaḥ|

śiṣyāṇām+maṇḍalapraveśakāle -> śiṣyāṇāṃ maṇḍalapraveśakāle

prāṇādivāyūnām+daśānām -> prāṇādivāyūnāṃ daśānām

prāṇādivāyūnāṃ daśānām+utpādas -> prāṇādivāyūnāṃ daśānām utpādas

prāṇādivāyūnāṃ daśānām utpādas+| -> prāṇādivāyūnāṃ daśānām utpādaḥ|

garbhāt+nirgamakāle -> garbhān nirgamakāle

cakārāt+pūrvavat -> cakārāt pūrvavat

cakārāt pūrvavat+iti| -> cakārāt pūrvavad iti|

evam+maṇḍalotsarjanam -> evaṃ maṇḍalotsarjanam

evaṃ maṇḍalotsarjanam+ca| -> evaṃ maṇḍalotsarjanaṃ ca|

pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvān+tatas -> pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tatas

pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tatas+padmāt -> pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tataḥ padmāt

pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tataḥ padmāt+utsṛjet -> pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tataḥ padmād utsṛjet

pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tataḥ padmād utsṛjet+pūrvavat -> pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tataḥ padmād utsṛjet pūrvavat

pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tataḥ padmād utsṛjet pūrvavat+vaktrabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇān -> pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tataḥ padmād utsṛjet pūrvavad vaktrabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇān

pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tataḥ padmād utsṛjet pūrvavad vaktrabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇān+jñānacittavākkāyamaṇḍaleṣu| -> pratyekākṣaramantrasvabhāvāṃś tataḥ padmād utsṛjet pūrvavad vaktrabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇāñ jñānacittavākkāyamaṇḍaleṣu|

samayamaṇḍalārtham+buddhān -> samayamaṇḍalārthaṃ buddhān

samayamaṇḍalārthaṃ buddhān+pañcamaṇḍalasvabhāvān -> samayamaṇḍalārthaṃ buddhan pañcamaṇḍalasvabhāvān

samayamaṇḍalārthaṃ buddhan pañcamaṇḍalasvabhāvān+svakāye -> samayamaṇḍalārthaṃ buddhan pañcamaṇḍalasvabhāvan svakāye

gaganasthān+skandhadhātvāyatanādisvabhāvena -> gaganasthan skandhadhātvāyatanādisvabhāvena

rājan+iti -> rājann iti

bālānām+iva -> bālānām iva

vajrālaṃkārayuktas+jinapatimukuṭas -> vajrālaṃkārayukto jinapatimukuṭas

vajrālaṃkārayukto jinapatimukuṭas+akṣobhyamukuṭas -> vajrālaṃkārayukto jinapatimukuṭo 'kṣobhyamukuṭas

vajrālaṃkārayukto jinapatimukuṭo 'kṣobhyamukuṭas+prajñāliṅgitas -> vajrālaṃkārayukto jinapatimukuṭo 'kṣobhyamukuṭaḥ prajñāliṅgitas

vajrālaṃkārayukto jinapatimukuṭo 'kṣobhyamukuṭaḥ prajñāliṅgitas+vai -> vajrālaṃkārayukto jinapatimukuṭo 'kṣobhyamukuṭaḥ prajñāliṅgito vai

svacihnam+pañcasūkavajram -> svacihnaṃ pañcasūkavajram

svacihnaṃ pañcasūkavajram+hūṃkārapariṇatam| -> svacihnaṃ pañcasūkavajraṃ hūṃkārapariṇatam|

sphuradamalakaram+sphārayitvā -> sphuradamalakaraṃ sphārayitvā

bhūyautpattim+karoti -> bhūyautpattiṃ karoti

śūnyatāyām+praviṣṭas -> śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭas

śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭas+bhagavān -> śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān

śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān+gītikābhis -> śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhis

śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhis+prabodhitas -> śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitas

śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitas+san -> śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ san

śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ san+māyopamam -> śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ san māyopamam

śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ san māyopamam+sakalam -> śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ san māyopamaṃ sakalam

śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ san māyopamaṃ sakalam+jagat -> śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ san māyopamaṃ sakalaṃ jagat

śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ san māyopamaṃ sakalaṃ jagat+dṛṣṭvā -> śūnyatāyāṃ praviṣṭo bhagavān gītikābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ san māyopamaṃ sakalaṃ jagad dṛṣṭvā

gītam+śrutvā -> gītaṃ śrutvā

gītaṃ śrutvā+ityādinā| -> gītaṃ śrutvetyādinā|

sakalam+maṇḍalotsarjanam -> sakalaṃ maṇḍalotsarjanam

sakalaṃ maṇḍalotsarjanam+ca|| -> sakalaṃ maṇḍalotsarjanaṃ ca||

rājan+punar -> rājan punar

rājan punar+api -> rājan punar api

vajrālaṅkārayuktas+jinapatimukuṭas -> vajrālaṅkārayukto jinapatimukuṭas

vajrālaṅkārayukto jinapatimukuṭas+prajñayā -> vajrālaṅkārayukto jinapatimukuṭaḥ prajñayā

vajrālaṅkārayukto jinapatimukuṭaḥ prajñayā+āliṅgitas -> vajrālaṅkārayukto jinapatimukuṭaḥ prajñayāliṅgitas

vajrālaṅkārayukto jinapatimukuṭaḥ prajñayāliṅgitas+ca -> vajrālaṅkārayukto jinapatimukuṭaḥ prajñayāliṅgitaś ca

sphuradamalakaram+sphārayitvā -> sphuradamalakaraṃ sphārayitvā

dṛṣṭvā+utpattim -> dṛṣṭvotpattim

dṛṣṭvotpattim+karoti -> dṛṣṭvotpattiṃ karoti

tribhuvanasakalam+tu -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ tu

tribhuvanasakalaṃ tu+indrajālopamam -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ tv indrajālopamam

tribhuvanasakalaṃ tv indrajālopamam+vai -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ tv indrajālopamaṃ vai

gītam+śrutvā -> gītaṃ śrutvā

idānīm+devatotthānam -> idānīṃ devatotthānam

idānīṃ devatotthānam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ devatotthānam ucyate---

nītārthas+|| -> nītārthaḥ||

devatākāyastham+iti -> devatākāyastham iti

bālānām+iva -> bālānām iva

mūrcchāgatam+vijñānam -> mūrcchāgataṃ vijñānam

mūrcchāgataṃ vijñānam+prabodhayanti -> mūrcchāgataṃ vijñānaṃ prabodhayanti

evam+samasukhaphalade -> evaṃ samasukhaphalade

kālacakra+uttha -> kālacakrottha

śūnyamaṇḍalam+ādāya -> śūnyamaṇḍalam ādāya

kālacakra+uttha -> kālacakrottha

yoginām+sthitā| -> yogināṃ sthitā|

bhāgineyāham+vaimalye -> bhāgineyāhaṃ vaimalye

kālacakra+uttha -> kālacakrottha

yoginām+sthitā| -> yogināṃ sthitā|

ca+aham -> cāham

cāham+puruṣe -> cāhaṃ puruṣe

kālacakra+uttha -> kālacakrottha

yoginām+sthitā| -> yogināṃ sthitā|

ca+aham -> cāham

cāham+vipāke -> cāhaṃ vipāke

kālacakra+uttha -> kālacakrottha

yoginām+sthitā| -> yogināṃ sthitā|

locanā+aham -> locanāham

locanāham+jaganmātā -> locanāhaṃ jaganmātā

pañcamaṇḍalavāhārtham+bālānām -> pañcamaṇḍalavāhārthaṃ bālānām

pañcamaṇḍalavāhārthaṃ bālānām+bhagavatas -> pañcamaṇḍalavāhārthaṃ bālānāṃ bhagavatas

pañcamaṇḍalavāhārthaṃ bālānāṃ bhagavatas+jagadarthāya -> pañcamaṇḍalavāhārthaṃ bālānāṃ bhagavato jagadarthāya

pañcamaṇḍalavāhārthaṃ bālānāṃ bhagavato jagadarthāya+iti -> pañcamaṇḍalavāhārthaṃ bālānāṃ bhagavato jagadarthāyeti

maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsvabhāvinyas+tārāmāmakīpāṇḍarālocanādevyas -> maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsvabhāvinyas tārāmāmakīpāṇḍarālocanādevyas

maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsvabhāvinyas tārāmāmakīpāṇḍarālocanādevyas+codayanti -> maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsvabhāvinyas tārāmāmakīpāṇḍarālocanādevyaś codayanti

saprajñam+avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritam -> saprajñam avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritam

saprajñam avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritam+cittam -> saprajñam avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritaṃ cittam

saprajñam avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritaṃ cittam+jñānavajram -> saprajñam avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritaṃ cittaṃ jñānavajram

saprajñam avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritaṃ cittaṃ jñānavajram+ca -> saprajñam avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritaṃ cittaṃ jñānavajraṃ ca

saprajñam avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritaṃ cittaṃ jñānavajraṃ ca+iti| -> saprajñam avadhūtīśaṅkhinyāśritaṃ cittaṃ jñānavajraṃ ceti|

cakārāt prajñām+api -> cakārāt prajñām api

drutam+vajriṇam -> drutaṃ vajriṇam

drutaṃ vajriṇam+ca -> drutaṃ vajriṇaṃ ca

drutaṃ vajriṇaṃ ca+īkṣayitvā| -> drutaṃ vajriṇaṃ cekṣayitvā|

śaśinam+iva -> śaśinam iva

ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes+sukhaniṣpattaye| -> ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadheḥ sukhaniṣpattaye|

evam+kāyavākcittasamudbhūtam -> evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtam

evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtam+candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇam -> evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇam

evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇam+kālāgninā -> evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninā

evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninā+adhas -> evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādhas

evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādhas+ūrdhvam -> evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādha ūrdhvam

evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādha ūrdhvam+prajñāraśmibhis -> evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādha ūrdhvaṃ prajñāraśmibhis

evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādha ūrdhvaṃ prajñāraśmibhis+drutam -> evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādha ūrdhvaṃ prajñāraśmibhir drutam

evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādha ūrdhvaṃ prajñāraśmibhir drutam+prajñārāgadrutam -> evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādha ūrdhvaṃ prajñāraśmibhir drutaṃ prajñārāgadrutam

evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādha ūrdhvaṃ prajñāraśmibhir drutaṃ prajñārāgadrutam+iti -> evaṃ kāyavākcittasamudbhūtaṃ candrasūryarāhulakṣaṇaṃ kālāgninādha ūrdhvaṃ prajñāraśmibhir drutaṃ prajñārāgadrutam iti

hoḥkāram+ādyante -> hoḥkāram ādyante

nābhau+avadhūtīmārge -> nābhāv avadhūtīmārge

nābhāv avadhūtīmārge+uṣṇīṣe -> nābhāv avadhūtīmārga uṣṇīṣe

locanādidevyas+veditavyās -> locanādidevyo veditavyās

locanādidevyo veditavyās+sattvārthāya -> locanādidevyo veditavyāḥ sattvārthāya
