dvitīyamātrāniṣpattis+| -> dvitīyamātrāniṣpattiḥ|

bāhye+api -> bāhye 'pi

prasṛtis+ucyate| -> prasṛtir ucyate|

idānīm+bhavāṅge -> idānīṃ bhavāṅge

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

abhiṣekadānam+sattvānām -> abhiṣekadānaṃ sattvānām

abhiṣekadānaṃ sattvānām+kṛpārtham -> abhiṣekadānaṃ sattvānāṃ kṛpārtham

abhiṣekadānaṃ sattvānāṃ kṛpārtham+iti -> abhiṣekadānaṃ sattvānāṃ kṛpārtham iti

tatas+tān -> tatas tān

tatas tān+ca -> tatas tāṃś ca

sambuddhās+trivajrajñānalābhinas -> sambuddhās trivajrajñānalābhinas

sambuddhās trivajrajñānalābhinas+| -> sambuddhās trivajrajñānalābhinaḥ|

abhūvan+iha -> abhūvann iha

tathāgatās+|| -> tathāgatāḥ||

spṛṣṭās+sarve -> spṛṣṭāḥ sarve

jātās+vajraśriyā -> jātā vajraśriyā

sattvās+trikāyasamayāmṛtais -> sattvās trikāyasamayāmṛtais

sattvās trikāyasamayāmṛtais+| -> sattvās trikāyasamayāmṛtaiḥ|

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

teṣām+iti| -> teṣām iti|

pratyekadevatām+niṣpādya -> pratyekadevatāṃ niṣpādya

pratyekadevatāṃ niṣpādya+utsṛjet| -> pratyekadevatāṃ niṣpādyotsṛjet|

vistaratas+pratyekaikabījena -> vistarataḥ pratyekaikabījena

kāyas+trividhas -> kāyas trividhas

kāyas trividhas+vāk -> kāyas trividho vāk

kāyas trividho vāk+api -> kāyas trividho vāg api

evam+trividham -> evaṃ trividham

evaṃ trividham+cittam -> evaṃ trividhaṃ cittam

evaṃ trividhaṃ cittam+kāyākāreṇa -> evaṃ trividhaṃ cittaṃ kāyākāreṇa

vāgvajram+devatāgaṇam| -> vāgvajraṃ devatāgaṇam|

evam+vākkāyamaṇḍale -> evaṃ vākkāyamaṇḍale

evaṃ vākkāyamaṇḍale+api -> evaṃ vākkāyamaṇḍale 'pi

vāgvajram+devatānām -> vāgvajraṃ devatānām

vāgvajraṃ devatānām+alikalikulajam -> vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajam

vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajam+cakram -> vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajaṃ cakram

vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajaṃ cakram+indvarkamūrdhni| -> vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajaṃ cakram indvarkamūrdhni|

maṇḍalam+kāyavajram -> maṇḍalaṃ kāyavajram

maṇḍalaṃ kāyavajram+kāyavākcittalakṣaṇam| -> maṇḍalaṃ kāyavajraṃ kāyavākcittalakṣaṇam|

nāyakas+cittavajram -> nāyakaś cittavajram

nāyakaś cittavajram+bhavati -> nāyakaś cittavajraṃ bhavati

śrī+ityādinā| -> śrītyādinā|

makāras+|| -> makāraḥ||

keśarāṇi+api -> keśarāṇy api

keśarāṇy api+akāras -> keśarāṇy apy akāras

kandam+nālam -> kandaṃ nālam

kandaṃ nālam+tu -> kandaṃ nālaṃ tu

kandaṃ nālaṃ tu+akāras -> kandaṃ nālaṃ tv akāras

kandaṃ nālaṃ tv akāras+dalam -> kandaṃ nālaṃ tv akāro dalam

kandaṃ nālaṃ tv akāro dalam+api -> kandaṃ nālaṃ tv akāro dalam api

vāgvajram+devatānām -> vāgvajraṃ devatānām

vāgvajraṃ devatānām+alikalikulajam -> vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajam

vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajam+candram -> vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajaṃ candram

vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajaṃ candram+indvarkamūrdhni| -> vāgvajraṃ devatānām alikalikulajaṃ candram indvarkamūrdhni|

maṇḍalam+kāyavajram -> maṇḍalaṃ kāyavajram

cittavajram+bhavati -> cittavajraṃ bhavati

idānīm+ādhārādheyas -> idānīm ādhārādheyas

idānīm ādhārādheyas+ucyate--- -> idānīm ādhārādheya ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

sakalam+sādhanam -> sakalaṃ sādhanam

sakalaṃ sādhanam+vajriṇas -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇas

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇas+yat -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat+tasmāt -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmāt

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmāt+rājan -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan+svacittam -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittam

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittam+vyapagatakaluṣam -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣam

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣam+kalpanārahitam -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ kalpanārahitam

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ kalpanārahitam+maṇḍaleśam -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ kalpanārahitaṃ maṇḍaleśam

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ kalpanārahitaṃ maṇḍaleśam+kuryāt -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ kalpanārahitaṃ maṇḍaleśaṃ kuryāt

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ kalpanārahitaṃ maṇḍaleśaṃ kuryāt+iti -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ kalpanārahitaṃ maṇḍaleśaṃ kuryād iti

sādhanam+tat -> sādhanaṃ tat

sādhanaṃ tat+bhramam -> sādhanaṃ tad bhramam

sādhanaṃ tad bhramam+iti(?)| -> sādhanaṃ tad bhramam iti(?)|

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

yat+sādhyam -> yat sādhyam

yat sādhyam+sādhakas -> yat sādhyaṃ sādhakas

yat sādhyaṃ sādhakas+sas -> yat sādhyaṃ sādhakaḥ sas

yat sādhyaṃ sādhakaḥ sas+eva -> yat sādhyaṃ sādhakaḥ sa eva

yat sādhyaṃ sādhakaḥ sa eva+iti -> yat sādhyaṃ sādhakaḥ sa eveti

atas+buddhatvāya -> ato buddhatvāya

nityānityapadārthas+| -> nityānityapadārthaḥ|

kaścit+atra -> kaścid atra

hṛdayagatas+sādhyate -> hṛdayagataḥ sādhyate

paramārthatas+punar -> paramārthataḥ punar

paramārthataḥ punar+na -> paramārthataḥ punar na

cittaśuddhyarthahetos+vaktavyam -> cittaśuddhyarthahetor vaktavyam

cittaśuddhyarthahetor vaktavyam+sādhanam -> cittaśuddhyarthahetor vaktavyaṃ sādhanam

cittaśuddhyarthahetor vaktavyaṃ sādhanam+tvayā -> cittaśuddhyarthahetor vaktavyaṃ sādhanaṃ tvayā

jaḍānām+bālānām -> jaḍānāṃ bālānām

jaḍānāṃ bālānām+avatāraṇāya -> jaḍānāṃ bālānām avatāraṇāya

tat+api -> tad api

syāt+buddhāya| -> syād buddhāya|

teṣām+dṛṣṭvā -> teṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā

teṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā+ubhayos -> teṣāṃ dṛṣṭvobhayos

teṣāṃ dṛṣṭvobhayos+sādhanam -> teṣāṃ dṛṣṭvobhayoḥ sādhanam

teṣāṃ dṛṣṭvobhayoḥ sādhanam+na -> teṣāṃ dṛṣṭvobhayoḥ sādhanaṃ na

viyogam+ca -> viyogaṃ ca

vā+anityam -> vānityam

vānityam+paramāṇusamāgamam -> vānityaṃ paramāṇusamāgamam

vānityaṃ paramāṇusamāgamam+ca -> vānityaṃ paramāṇusamāgamaṃ ca

evam+nityam -> evaṃ nityam

evaṃ nityam+mahāśūnyam -> evaṃ nityaṃ mahāśūnyam

evaṃ nityaṃ mahāśūnyam+dṛṣṭvā -> evaṃ nityaṃ mahāśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā

tasmāt+rājan -> tasmād rājan

tasmād rājan+svacittam -> tasmād rājan svacittam

tasmād rājan svacittam+vyapagatakaluṣam -> tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣam

tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣam+maṇḍaleśam -> tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ maṇḍaleśam

tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ maṇḍaleśam+prakuryāt|| -> tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagatakaluṣaṃ maṇḍaleśaṃ prakuryāt||

sakalam+sādhanam -> sakalaṃ sādhanam

sakalaṃ sādhanam+vajriṇas -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇas

sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇas+yat -> sakalaṃ sādhanaṃ vajriṇo yat

bhramam+iti -> bhramam iti

yat+sādhyam -> yat sādhyam

yat sādhyam+sādhakas -> yat sādhyaṃ sādhakas

yat sādhyaṃ sādhakas+sa -> yat sādhyaṃ sādhakaḥ sa

kaścit+atra| -> kaścid atra|

hṛdayagatas+sādhyate -> hṛdayagataḥ sādhyate

vaktavyam+sādhanam -> vaktavyaṃ sādhanam

vaktavyaṃ sādhanam+vai -> vaktavyaṃ sādhanaṃ vai

jaḍadhiyām+cittaśuddhyarthahetos -> jaḍadhiyāṃ cittaśuddhyarthahetos

tat+api -> tad api

nityānityam+ca -> nityānityaṃ ca

dṛṣṭanaṣṭam+iti -> dṛṣṭanaṣṭam iti

śakrajālam+yathā -> śakrajālaṃ yathā

śakrajālaṃ yathā+eva -> śakrajālaṃ yathaiva

nityam+bhūtavṛndam -> nityaṃ bhūtavṛndam

nityaṃ bhūtavṛndam+pūrvoktam -> nityaṃ bhūtavṛndaṃ pūrvoktam

nityaṃ bhūtavṛndaṃ pūrvoktam+bhavati -> nityaṃ bhūtavṛndaṃ pūrvoktaṃ bhavati

trividhabhagavatas+anityatām -> trividhabhagavato 'nityatām

trividhabhagavato 'nityatām+na -> trividhabhagavato 'nityatāṃ na

sas+ākāśadhātus -> sa ākāśadhātus

sa ākāśadhātus+| -> sa ākāśadhātuḥ|

acchedyābhedyatvāt+khavajras -> acchedyābhedyatvāt khavajras

acchedyābhedyatvāt khavajras+ākāśadhātus -> acchedyābhedyatvāt khavajra ākāśadhātus

acchedyābhedyatvāt khavajra ākāśadhātus+nityas -> acchedyābhedyatvāt khavajra ākāśadhātur nityas

acchedyābhedyatvāt khavajra ākāśadhātur nityas+dravyābhāvāt| -> acchedyābhedyatvāt khavajra ākāśadhātur nityo dravyābhāvāt|

paramāṇudravyarahitas+acchedyas -> paramāṇudravyarahito 'cchedyas

paramāṇudravyarahito 'cchedyas+| -> paramāṇudravyarahito 'cchedyaḥ|

khas+iti -> kha iti

kha iti+ākāśadhātus -> kha ity ākāśadhātus

kha ity ākāśadhātus+navamas -> kha ity ākāśadhātur navamas

kha ity ākāśadhātur navamas+| -> kha ity ākāśadhātur navamaḥ|

tasmin+nityas -> tasmin nityas

tasmin nityas+khavajras -> tasmin nityaḥ khavajras

tasmin nityaḥ khavajras+iti| -> tasmin nityaḥ khavajra iti|

vastujātis+| -> vastujātiḥ|

jātis+vastusvarūpiṇī -> jātir vastusvarūpiṇī

evam+aṣṭadhā -> evam aṣṭadhā

evam+pṛthivījātis -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis

evaṃ pṛthivījātis+tarvādayas -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayas

evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayas+sthāvarās -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarās

evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarās+udakajātis -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātis

evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātis+svedajās -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās

evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās+tejojātis -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās tejojātis

evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās tejojātis+jarāyujās -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās tejojātir jarāyujās

evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās tejojātir jarāyujās+kālāgnijātis -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās tejojātir jarāyujāḥ kālāgnijātis

evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās tejojātir jarāyujāḥ kālāgnijātis+nārakās -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās tejojātir jarāyujāḥ kālāgnijātir nārakās

evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās tejojātir jarāyujāḥ kālāgnijātir nārakās+| -> evaṃ pṛthivījātis tarvādayaḥ sthāvarā udakajātiḥ svedajās tejojātir jarāyujāḥ kālāgnijātir nārakāḥ|

bhūtajānām+iti| -> bhūtajānām iti|

vastujātes+utpādas -> vastujāter utpādas

vastujāter utpādas+spharaṇam -> vastujāter utpādaḥ spharaṇam

vastujāter utpādaḥ spharaṇam+vināśas -> vastujāter utpādaḥ spharaṇaṃ vināśas

vastujāter utpādaḥ spharaṇaṃ vināśas+nidhanatā -> vastujāter utpādaḥ spharaṇaṃ vināśo nidhanatā

evam+ṣaḍdhātvātmakas -> evaṃ ṣaḍdhātvātmakas

evaṃ ṣaḍdhātvātmakas+mahāpuruṣapudgalas -> evaṃ ṣaḍdhātvātmako mahāpuruṣapudgalas

evaṃ ṣaḍdhātvātmako mahāpuruṣapudgalas+vastujātis -> evaṃ ṣaḍdhātvātmako mahāpuruṣapudgalo vastujātis

evaṃ ṣaḍdhātvātmako mahāpuruṣapudgalo vastujātis+| -> evaṃ ṣaḍdhātvātmako mahāpuruṣapudgalo vastujātiḥ|

rāhus+vijñānadhātus -> rāhur vijñānadhātus

rāhur vijñānadhātus+| -> rāhur vijñānadhātuḥ|

bindudvayam+sūryas -> bindudvayaṃ sūryas

bindudvayaṃ sūryas+vā -> bindudvayaṃ sūryo vā

bindudvayaṃ sūryo vā+ākāśadhātus -> bindudvayaṃ sūryo vākāśadhātus

bindudvayaṃ sūryo vākāśadhātus+| -> bindudvayaṃ sūryo vākāśadhātuḥ|

rajas+vā -> rajo vā

ākāśadhātus+candras -> ākāśadhātuś candras

ākāśadhātuś candras+anusvāras -> ākāśadhātuś candro 'nusvāras

ākāśadhātuś candro 'nusvāras+śukram -> ākāśadhātuś candro 'nusvāraḥ śukram

ākāśadhātuś candro 'nusvāraḥ śukram+vā -> ākāśadhātuś candro 'nusvāraḥ śukraṃ vā

catvāras+bhūtās -> catvāro bhūtās

catvāro bhūtās+| -> catvāro bhūtāḥ|

paramāṇudravyam+pṛthivyaptejovāyus -> paramāṇudravyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyus

paramāṇudravyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyus+iti -> paramāṇudravyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyur iti

vastujātes+| -> vastujāteḥ|

spharaṇam+ca -> spharaṇaṃ ca

dehe+adhyātmani -> dehe 'dhyātmani

tribhuvanasakalam+skandhadhātvāyatanādikam -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanādikam

tribhuvanasakalaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanādikam+maṇḍalākāram -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ maṇḍalākāram

tribhuvanasakalaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ maṇḍalākāram+uktam -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ maṇḍalākāram uktam

tribhuvanasakalaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ maṇḍalākāram uktam+bālajanānām -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ maṇḍalākāram uktaṃ bālajanānām

tribhuvanasakalaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ maṇḍalākāram uktaṃ bālajanānām+cittasthirīkaraṇārtham| -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ maṇḍalākāram uktaṃ bālajanānāṃ cittasthirīkaraṇārtham|

vajriṇas+ca -> vajriṇaś ca

iti+evam -> ity evam

ity evam+saptādibhis -> ity evaṃ saptādibhis

ity evaṃ saptādibhis+māsais -> ity evaṃ saptādibhir māsais

ity evaṃ saptādibhir māsais+jātakasya -> ity evaṃ saptādibhir māsair jātakasya

iti+evam -> ity evam

ity evam+ityādin|| -> ity evam ityādin||

śakrajālam+yathā -> śakrajālaṃ yathā

śakrajālaṃ yathā+eva|| -> śakrajālaṃ yathaiva||

nityam+bhūtavṛndam -> nityaṃ bhūtavṛndam

nityaṃ bhūtavṛndam+bhavati -> nityaṃ bhūtavṛndaṃ bhavati

tasmin+nityas -> tasmin nityas

tasmin nityas+khavajras -> tasmin nityaḥ khavajras

tasmin nityaḥ khavajras+trividhabhavagatas -> tasmin nityaḥ khavajras trividhabhavagatas

tasmin nityaḥ khavajras trividhabhavagatas+anityatām -> tasmin nityaḥ khavajras trividhabhavagato 'nityatām

tasmin nityaḥ khavajras trividhabhavagato 'nityatām+na -> tasmin nityaḥ khavajras trividhabhavagato 'nityatāṃ na

vastujātes+| -> vastujāteḥ|

tribhuvanasakalam+maṇḍalākāram -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ maṇḍalākāram

tribhuvanasakalaṃ maṇḍalākāram+uktam -> tribhuvanasakalaṃ maṇḍalākāram uktam

iti+evam -> ity evam

ity evam+vajriṇas -> ity evaṃ vajriṇas

ity evaṃ vajriṇas+ca -> ity evaṃ vajriṇaś ca

idānīm+nityānityam -> idānīṃ nityānityam

idānīṃ nityānityam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ nityānityam ucyate---

navanayanās+vahnivaktrās -> navanayanā vahnivaktrās

navanayanā vahnivaktrās+trimukhās -> navanayanā vahnivaktrās trimukhās

navanayanā vahnivaktrās trimukhās+ṛtuhastās -> navanayanā vahnivaktrās trimukhā ṛtuhastās

navanayanā vahnivaktrās trimukhā ṛtuhastās+ṣaḍbhujās -> navanayanā vahnivaktrās trimukhā ṛtuhastāḥ ṣaḍbhujās

navanayanā vahnivaktrās trimukhā ṛtuhastāḥ ṣaḍbhujās+sphāraṇīyās -> navanayanā vahnivaktrās trimukhā ṛtuhastāḥ ṣaḍbhujāḥ sphāraṇīyās

navanayanā vahnivaktrās trimukhā ṛtuhastāḥ ṣaḍbhujāḥ sphāraṇīyās+| -> navanayanā vahnivaktrās trimukhā ṛtuhastāḥ ṣaḍbhujāḥ sphāraṇīyāḥ|

tatas+dikpadmeṣu -> tato dikpadmeṣu

tato dikpadmeṣu+abdhibuddhās -> tato dikpadmeṣv abdhibuddhās

tato dikpadmeṣv abdhibuddhās+catvāras -> tato dikpadmeṣv abdhibuddhāś catvāras

tato dikpadmeṣv abdhibuddhāś catvāras+khalu -> tato dikpadmeṣv abdhibuddhāś catvāraḥ khalu

pūrvam+bhagavatas -> pūrvaṃ bhagavatas

pūrvaṃ bhagavatas+kāye -> pūrvaṃ bhagavataḥ kāye

tatparāvṛttam+devatādevatīgaṇamaṇḍalam -> tatparāvṛttaṃ devatādevatīgaṇamaṇḍalam

tatparāvṛttaṃ devatādevatīgaṇamaṇḍalam+ādhārādheyalakṣaṇam -> tatparāvṛttaṃ devatādevatīgaṇamaṇḍalam ādhārādheyalakṣaṇam

tatparāvṛttaṃ devatādevatīgaṇamaṇḍalam ādhārādheyalakṣaṇam+akṣobhyādhipatim -> tatparāvṛttaṃ devatādevatīgaṇamaṇḍalam ādhārādheyalakṣaṇam akṣobhyādhipatim

tatparāvṛttaṃ devatādevatīgaṇamaṇḍalam ādhārādheyalakṣaṇam akṣobhyādhipatim+dhyātvā -> tatparāvṛttaṃ devatādevatīgaṇamaṇḍalam ādhārādheyalakṣaṇam akṣobhyādhipatiṃ dhyātvā

candradravāpannān+svakuliśena -> candradravāpannan svakuliśena

candradravāpannan svakuliśena+utsṛjya -> candradravāpannan svakuliśenotsṛjya

maṇḍalacakrākārān+tathāgatān -> maṇḍalacakrākārāṃś tathāgatān

maṇḍalacakrākārāṃś tathāgatān+sadhātūn -> maṇḍalacakrākārāṃś tathāgatan sadhātūn

maṇḍalacakrākārāṃś tathāgatan sadhātūn+svakāye -> maṇḍalacakrākārāṃś tathāgatan sadhātun svakāye

punar+api -> punar api

tatas+tathā -> tatas tathā

tatas tathā+eva -> tatas tathaiva

yathāvat+antar -> yathāvad antar

yathāvad antar+bhāvayet| -> NO RULE FOUND (r+bh)

tam+svakāyāt -> taṃ svakāyāt

taṃ svakāyāt+niścārya -> taṃ svakāyān niścārya

devatāsvarūpāvirbhūtam+punar -> devatāsvarūpāvirbhūtaṃ punar

devatāsvarūpāvirbhūtaṃ punar+api -> devatāsvarūpāvirbhūtaṃ punar api

svakāye+akṣobhyādijinasamūham -> svakāye 'kṣobhyādijinasamūham

svakāye 'kṣobhyādijinasamūham+praveśya -> svakāye 'kṣobhyādijinasamūhaṃ praveśya

svakāye 'kṣobhyādijinasamūhaṃ praveśya+ākāśadidhātusamūham -> svakāye 'kṣobhyādijinasamūhaṃ praveśyākāśadidhātusamūham

svakāye 'kṣobhyādijinasamūhaṃ praveśyākāśadidhātusamūham+puruṣavidyācakṣurādirūpādiviṣayasvabhāvena -> svakāye 'kṣobhyādijinasamūhaṃ praveśyākāśadidhātusamūhaṃ puruṣavidyācakṣurādirūpādiviṣayasvabhāvena

mahārāgavaineyasaptalokam+ādibuddhadeśanāyām -> mahārāgavaineyasaptalokam ādibuddhadeśanāyām

mahārāgavaineyasaptalokam ādibuddhadeśanāyām+bhājanam -> mahārāgavaineyasaptalokam ādibuddhadeśanāyāṃ bhājanam

mahārāgavaineyasaptalokam ādibuddhadeśanāyāṃ bhājanam+abhisaṃvīkṣya -> mahārāgavaineyasaptalokam ādibuddhadeśanāyāṃ bhājanam abhisaṃvīkṣya

idānīm+nāmarūpādyutpādāya -> idānīṃ nāmarūpādyutpādāya

raktapīte+arkamūrdhni|| -> raktapīte 'rkamūrdhni||

tu+atha -> tv atha

tayos+aṣṭakakṣe -> tayor aṣṭakakṣe

tayor aṣṭakakṣe+aṣṭakumbhās -> tayor aṣṭakakṣe 'ṣṭakumbhās

tayor aṣṭakakṣe 'ṣṭakumbhās+| -> tayor aṣṭakakṣe 'ṣṭakumbhāḥ|

tārādidevyas+punar -> tārādidevyaḥ punar

tārādidevyaḥ punar+api -> tārādidevyaḥ punar api

navanayanās+vahnivaktrartuhastās -> navanayanā vahnivaktrartuhastās

dikpadmeṣu+abdhibuddhās -> dikpadmeṣv abdhibuddhās

dikpadmeṣv abdhibuddhās+khalu -> dikpadmeṣv abdhibuddhāḥ khalu

vajrasattvaniṣpattis+svamudrāsahitā|| -> vajrasattvaniṣpattiḥ svamudrāsahitā||

bhaktapātram+sitāyās -> bhaktapātraṃ sitāyās

bhaktapātraṃ sitāyās+| -> bhaktapātraṃ sitāyāḥ|

siddharasapātram+tṛtīye -> siddharasapātraṃ tṛtīye

siddharasapātraṃ tṛtīye+amṛtaphalam -> siddharasapātraṃ tṛtīye 'mṛtaphalam

siddharasapātraṃ tṛtīye 'mṛtaphalam+caturthe -> siddharasapātraṃ tṛtīye 'mṛtaphalaṃ caturthe

prathamahaste+amṛtapātram -> prathamahaste 'mṛtapātram

prathamahaste 'mṛtapātram+dvitīye -> prathamahaste 'mṛtapātraṃ dvitīye

dugdhapātram+dvitīye -> dugdhapātraṃ dvitīye

dugdhapātraṃ dvitīye+ambupātram -> dugdhapātraṃ dvitīye 'mbupātram

dugdhapātraṃ dvitīye 'mbupātram+tṛtīye -> dugdhapātraṃ dvitīye 'mbupātraṃ tṛtīye

śvetadīptāyās+prathame -> śvetadīptāyāḥ prathame

krameṇa+iti| -> krameṇeti|

maṇis+ḍamarukas -> maṇir ḍamarukas

maṇir ḍamarukas+caturthe -> maṇir ḍamarukaś caturthe

maṇir ḍamarukaś caturthe+iti| -> maṇir ḍamarukaś caturtha iti|

veṇus+tṛtīye -> veṇus tṛtīye

śaṅkhas+dvitīye -> śaṅkho dvitīye

pītadīptāyās+savye -> pītadīptāyāḥ savye

nūpuram+iti| -> nūpuram iti|

ratnakuṇḍalam+caturthe -> ratnakuṇḍalaṃ caturthe

vastram+dvitīye -> vastraṃ dvitīye

dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānam+tu -> dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānaṃ tu

dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānaṃ tu+amṛtarasaphalam -> dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānaṃ tv amṛtarasaphalam

dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānaṃ tv amṛtarasaphalam+bhaktapātram -> dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānaṃ tv amṛtarasaphalaṃ bhaktapātram

dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānaṃ tv amṛtarasaphalaṃ bhaktapātram+sitāyās -> dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānaṃ tv amṛtarasaphalaṃ bhaktapātraṃ sitāyās

dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānaṃ tv amṛtarasaphalaṃ bhaktapātraṃ sitāyās+|| -> dugdhāmbvauṣadhyapānaṃ tv amṛtarasaphalaṃ bhaktapātraṃ sitāyāḥ||

samaṇiḍamarukas+savyahaste -> samaṇiḍamarukaḥ savyahaste

pītāyās+śaṅkhaveṣū -> pītāyāḥ śaṅkhaveṣū

sphuradamalakaram+kuṇḍalam -> sphuradamalakaraṃ kuṇḍalam

sphuradamalakaraṃ kuṇḍalam+nūpuram -> sphuradamalakaraṃ kuṇḍalaṃ nūpuram

sphuradamalakaraṃ kuṇḍalaṃ nūpuram+ca -> sphuradamalakaraṃ kuṇḍalaṃ nūpuraṃ ca

vastram+vai -> vastraṃ vai

kaṭakam+iti -> kaṭakam iti

mukuṭas+caturthe -> mukuṭaś caturthe

hāras+tṛtīye -> hāras tṛtīye

pradīpas+dvitīye -> pradīpo dvitīye

raktadīpāyās+prathamahaste -> raktadīpāyāḥ prathamahaste

krameṇa+iti -> krameṇeti

suratarukusumam+caturthe -> suratarukusumaṃ caturthe

padmam+tṛtīye -> padmaṃ tṛtīye

samadaśaśadharam+kastūrikāsahitam -> samadaśaśadharaṃ kastūrikāsahitam

samadaśaśadharaṃ kastūrikāsahitam+karpūrapātram -> samadaśaśadharaṃ kastūrikāsahitaṃ karpūrapātram

samadaśaśadharaṃ kastūrikāsahitaṃ karpūrapātram+caturthe| -> samadaśaśadharaṃ kastūrikāsahitaṃ karpūrapātraṃ caturthe|

piṣṭam+raktam -> piṣṭaṃ raktam

piṣṭaṃ raktam+kuṅkumapātram -> piṣṭaṃ raktaṃ kuṅkumapātram

piṣṭaṃ raktaṃ kuṅkumapātram+tṛtīye -> piṣṭaṃ raktaṃ kuṅkumapātraṃ tṛtīye

śītapātram+candanapātram -> śītapātraṃ candanapātram

śītapātraṃ candanapātram+dvitīye -> śītapātraṃ candanapātraṃ dvitīye

kṛṣṇāyās+dhūpapātram -> kṛṣṇāyā dhūpapātram

kṛṣṇāyā dhūpapātram+prathamakaratale -> kṛṣṇāyā dhūpapātraṃ prathamakaratale

kṛṣṇa+ityādi| -> kṛṣṇetyādi|

samukuṭakaṭakam+dakṣiṇe -> samukuṭakaṭakaṃ dakṣiṇe

raktāyās+dīpahārau -> raktāyā dīpahārau

padmam+sutaratukusumam -> padmaṃ sutaratukusumam

padmaṃ sutaratukusumam+puṣpamālā -> padmaṃ sutaratukusumaṃ puṣpamālā

samadaśaśadharam+savyahaste -> samadaśaśadharaṃ savyahaste

piṣṭam+raktam -> piṣṭaṃ raktam

piṣṭaṃ raktam+tṛtīye -> piṣṭaṃ raktaṃ tṛtīye

śītapātram+dvitīye -> śītapātraṃ dvitīye

kṛṣṇāyās+dhūpapātram -> kṛṣṇāyā dhūpapātram

kṛṣṇāyā dhūpapātram+prathamakaratale -> kṛṣṇāyā dhūpapātraṃ prathamakaratale

cihnāni+ucyante--- -> cihnāny ucyante---

idānīm+kṛṣṇadīptādīnām -> idānīṃ kṛṣṇadīptādīnām

idānīṃ kṛṣṇadīptādīnām+savyavāmahasteṣu -> idānīṃ kṛṣṇadīptādīnāṃ savyavāmahasteṣu

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

jñātavyās+iti -> jñātavyā iti

bhagavatyās+alaṃkārās -> bhagavatyā alaṃkārās

bhagavatyā alaṃkārās+pañcamudrās -> bhagavatyā alaṃkārāḥ pañcamudrās

bhagavatyā alaṃkārāḥ pañcamudrās+tathā -> bhagavatyā alaṃkārāḥ pañcamudrās tathā

garbhapadmadevīnām+yathā -> garbhapadmadevīnāṃ yathā

kṛṣṇānām+pūrvam -> kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvam

kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvam+kṛṣṇam -> kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇam

kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇam+vāmam -> kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāmam

kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāmam+śuklam -> kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāmaṃ śuklam

kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāmaṃ śuklam+paścimam -> kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāmaṃ śuklaṃ paścimam

kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāmaṃ śuklaṃ paścimam+pītam -> kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāmaṃ śuklaṃ paścimaṃ pītam

kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāmaṃ śuklaṃ paścimaṃ pītam+iti| -> kṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāmaṃ śuklaṃ paścimaṃ pītam iti|

raktānām+prathamam -> raktānāṃ prathamam

raktānāṃ prathamam+raktam -> raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktam

raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktam+dakṣiṇam -> raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇam

raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇam+pītam -> raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pītam

raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pītam+vāmam -> raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pītaṃ vāmam

raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pītaṃ vāmam+nīlam -> raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pītaṃ vāmaṃ nīlam

raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pītaṃ vāmaṃ nīlam+paścimam -> raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pītaṃ vāmaṃ nīlaṃ paścimam

raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pītaṃ vāmaṃ nīlaṃ paścimam+śuklam| -> raktānāṃ prathamaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pītaṃ vāmaṃ nīlaṃ paścimaṃ śuklam|

śuklānām+śuklam -> śuklānāṃ śuklam

śuklānāṃ śuklam+pūrvam -> śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvam

śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvam+dakṣiṇam -> śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇam

śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇam+kṛṣṇam -> śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇam

śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇam+paścimam -> śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paścimam

śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paścimam+raktam -> śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paścimaṃ raktam

śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paścimaṃ raktam+vāmam -> śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paścimaṃ raktaṃ vāmam

śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paścimaṃ raktaṃ vāmam+pītam| -> śuklānāṃ śuklaṃ pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paścimaṃ raktaṃ vāmaṃ pītam|

evam+pītānām -> evaṃ pītānām

evaṃ pītānām+devīnām| -> evaṃ pītānāṃ devīnām|

viśvamātus+prathamam -> viśvamātuḥ prathamam

viśvamātuḥ prathamam+mukham -> viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukham

viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukham+hemābham -> viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābham

viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābham+dakṣiṇam -> viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇam

viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇam+śuklam -> viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śuklam

viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śuklam+vāmam -> viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śuklaṃ vāmam

viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śuklaṃ vāmam+raktam -> viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktam

viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktam+paścimam -> viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ paścimam

viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ paścimam+nīlam| -> viśvamātuḥ prathamaṃ mukhaṃ hemābhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ paścimaṃ nīlam|

bhagavatas+mukhabhedas -> bhagavato mukhabhedas

bhagavato mukhabhedas+caturdikṣu -> bhagavato mukhabhedaś caturdikṣu

pītadīptā+iti| -> pītadīpteti|

evam+pūrvapatre -> evaṃ pūrvapatre

kalpavṛkṣas+pītas -> kalpavṛkṣaḥ pītas

kalpavṛkṣaḥ pītas+iti| -> kalpavṛkṣaḥ pīta iti|

cintāmaṇis+kṛṣṇas -> cintāmaṇiḥ kṛṣṇas

cintāmaṇiḥ kṛṣṇas+vāyavye -> cintāmaṇiḥ kṛṣṇo vāyavye

dharmaśaṅkhas+śuklas -> dharmaśaṅkhaḥ śuklas

dharmaśaṅkhaḥ śuklas+nairṛtye -> dharmaśaṅkhaḥ śuklo nairṛtye

evam+tāsām -> evaṃ tāsām

evaṃ tāsām+pṛṣṭhatas -> evaṃ tāsāṃ pṛṣṭhatas

evaṃ tāsāṃ pṛṣṭhatas+īśe -> evaṃ tāsāṃ pṛṣṭhata īśe

vaktrabhedais+jinasya -> vaktrabhedair jinasya

vaktrabhedair jinasya+iti| -> vaktrabhedair jinasyeti|

catasras+ahicamaradharās -> catasro 'hicamaradharās

catasro 'hicamaradharās+aṣṭabhujais -> catasro 'hicamaradharā aṣṭabhujais

catasro 'hicamaradharā aṣṭabhujais+aṣṭacamaradharās -> catasro 'hicamaradharā aṣṭabhujair aṣṭacamaradharās

catasro 'hicamaradharā aṣṭabhujair aṣṭacamaradharās+| -> catasro 'hicamaradharā aṣṭabhujair aṣṭacamaradharāḥ|

tāsām+madhye -> tāsāṃ madhye

tās+vasukarakamalās -> tā vasukarakamalās

tā vasukarakamalās+aṣṭabhujās -> tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujās

tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujās+vedavaktrās -> tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujā vedavaktrās

tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujā vedavaktrās+caturmukhās -> tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujā vedavaktrāś caturmukhās

tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujā vedavaktrāś caturmukhās+arkanetrās -> tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujā vedavaktrāś caturmukhā arkanetrās

tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujā vedavaktrāś caturmukhā arkanetrās+dvādaśalocanās -> tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujā vedavaktrāś caturmukhā arkanetrā dvādaśalocanās

tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujā vedavaktrāś caturmukhā arkanetrā dvādaśalocanās+| -> tā vasukarakamalā aṣṭabhujā vedavaktrāś caturmukhā arkanetrā dvādaśalocanāḥ|

devyas+| -> devyaḥ|

tasyās+viśvamātus -> tasyā viśvamātus

tasyā viśvamātus+jñānapāramitāyās -> tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyās

tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyās+antarbhāvitās -> tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitās

tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitās+aparās -> tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparās

tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparās+pāramitās -> tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparāḥ pāramitās

tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparāḥ pāramitās+dānādayas -> tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparāḥ pāramitā dānādayas

tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparāḥ pāramitā dānādayas+pāramitās -> tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparāḥ pāramitā dānādayaḥ pāramitās

tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparāḥ pāramitā dānādayaḥ pāramitās+aṣṭapatreṣu -> tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparāḥ pāramitā dānādayaḥ pāramitā aṣṭapatreṣu

tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparāḥ pāramitā dānādayaḥ pāramitā aṣṭapatreṣu+aṣṭau -> tasyā viśvamātur jñānapāramitāyā antarbhāvitā aparāḥ pāramitā dānādayaḥ pāramitā aṣṭapatreṣv aṣṭau

evam+cintāmaṇis -> evaṃ cintāmaṇis

evaṃ cintāmaṇis+syāt -> evaṃ cintāmaṇiḥ syāt

evaṃ cintāmaṇiḥ syāt+bhavati -> evaṃ cintāmaṇiḥ syād bhavati

dharmaśaṅkhas+ca -> dharmaśaṅkhaś ca

tāsām+catasras -> tāsāṃ catasras

tāsāṃ catasras+tu -> tāsāṃ catasras tu

tāsāṃ catasras tu+ahicamaradharās -> tāsāṃ catasras tv ahicamaradharās

tāsāṃ catasras tv ahicamaradharās+vaktrabhedais -> tāsāṃ catasras tv ahicamaradharā vaktrabhedais

tāsāṃ catasras tv ahicamaradharā vaktrabhedais+jinasya| -> tāsāṃ catasras tv ahicamaradharā vaktrabhedair jinasya|

devyas+aṣṭapatre -> devyo 'ṣṭapatre

pañcamudrābhis+samāpattis -> pañcamudrābhiḥ samāpattis

pañcamudrābhiḥ samāpattis+tathā|| -> pañcamudrābhiḥ samāpattis tathā||

evam+ālīḍhas -> evam ālīḍhas

evam ālīḍhas+bhagavān -> evam ālīḍho bhagavān

evam ālīḍho bhagavān+pratyālīḍhā -> evam ālīḍho bhagavan pratyālīḍhā

divyaratnam+tathā -> divyaratnaṃ tathā

divyaratnaṃ tathā+eva -> divyaratnaṃ tathaiva

śatadalakamalam+dhavalam -> śatadalakamalaṃ dhavalam

śatadalakamalaṃ dhavalam+caturthe -> śatadalakamalaṃ dhavalaṃ caturthe

pāśas+tṛtīye -> pāśas tṛtīye

śuktis+dvitīye -> śuktir dvitīye

saravaḍamarukas+caturthe -> saravaḍamarukaś caturthe

saravaḍamarukaś caturthe+akṣasūtram -> saravaḍamarukaś caturthe 'kṣasūtram

saravaḍamarukaś caturthe 'kṣasūtram+iti| -> saravaḍamarukaś caturthe 'kṣasūtram iti|

dvitīye+aṅkuśas -> dvitīye 'ṅkuśas

dvitīye 'ṅkuśas+tṛtīye -> dvitīye 'ṅkuśas tṛtīye

tasyās+prathamakare -> tasyāḥ prathamakare

vasukarakamalā+aṣṭabhujā -> vasukarakamalāṣṭabhujā

vasukarakamalāṣṭabhujā+agratas -> vasukarakamalāṣṭabhujāgratas

vasukarakamalāṣṭabhujāgratas+āliṅgitā -> vasukarakamalāṣṭabhujāgrata āliṅgitā

sūryas+| -> sūryaḥ|

candras+raktapītadharmā -> candro raktapītadharmā

devyās+utpādas -> devyā utpādas

devyā utpādas+| -> devyā utpādaḥ|

bhagavatas+utpādas -> bhagavata utpādas

bhagavata utpādas+sūryarajaḥsvabhāvena -> bhagavata utpādaḥ sūryarajaḥsvabhāvena

tatra+ekasamarasāt -> tatraikasamarasāt

tatraikasamarasāt+candraśukrasvabhāvena -> tatraikasamarasāc candraśukrasvabhāvena

hemābhā+ityādinā| -> hemābhetyādinā|

mudrikābhis+|| -> mudrikābhiḥ||

pāśas+śatadalakamalam -> pāśaḥ śatadalakamalam

pāśaḥ śatadalakamalam+divyaratnam -> pāśaḥ śatadalakamalaṃ divyaratnam

pāśaḥ śatadalakamalaṃ divyaratnam+tathā -> pāśaḥ śatadalakamalaṃ divyaratnaṃ tathā

pāśaḥ śatadalakamalaṃ divyaratnaṃ tathā+eva -> pāśaḥ śatadalakamalaṃ divyaratnaṃ tathaiva

śuktis+ca -> śuktiś ca

sarabaḍamarukas+ca -> sarabaḍamarukaś ca

sarabaḍamarukaś ca+akṣasūtram -> sarabaḍamarukaś cākṣasūtram

sarabaḍamarukaś cākṣasūtram+krameṇa| -> sarabaḍamarukaś cākṣasūtraṃ krameṇa|

kartyaṅkuśas+vau -> kartyaṅkuśo vau

vasukarakamalā+āliṅgitā -> vasukarakamalāliṅgitā

idānīm+viśvamātālakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ viśvamātālakṣaṇam

idānīṃ viśvamātālakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ viśvamātālakṣaṇam ucyate---

rudrasya+iti -> rudrasyeti

rudrasyeti+akṣobhyapraveśas -> rudrasyety akṣobhyapraveśas

rudrasyety akṣobhyapraveśas+|| -> rudrasyety akṣobhyapraveśaḥ||

ratis+mārasya -> ratir mārasya

ratir mārasya+umā -> ratir mārasyomā

mārarudrayos+svadevyau -> mārarudrayoḥ svadevyau

dīnavaktram+dhṛtacaraṇatale -> dīnavaktraṃ dhṛtacaraṇatale

jinasya+iti| -> jinasyeti|

evam+vedāsyam -> evaṃ vedāsyam

evaṃ vedāsyam+brahmaṇas -> evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇas

evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇas+yat -> evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yat

evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yat+śirakamalam -> evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam

evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam+alam -> evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam alam

evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam alam+bhūṣaṇam -> evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam alaṃ bhūṣaṇam

evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam alaṃ bhūṣaṇam+vāmahaste -> evaṃ vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam alaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vāmahaste

brahmaśiras+iti| -> brahmaśira iti|

darpaṇas+tṛtīye -> darpaṇas tṛtīye

śaṅkhas+dvitīye -> śaṅkho dvitīye

jalacaras+iti -> jalacara iti

śvetakamalam+iti| -> śvetakamalam iti|

maṇiratnam+caturthe -> maṇiratnaṃ caturthe

pāśas+tṛtīye -> pāśas tṛtīye

kodaṇḍam+dvitīye -> kodaṇḍaṃ dvitīye

raktapūrṇam+kapālam -> raktapūrṇaṃ kapālam

raktapūrṇaṃ kapālam+iti| -> raktapūrṇaṃ kapālam iti|

khaṭvāṅgam+vikasitamukham -> khaṭvāṅgaṃ vikasitamukham

khaṭvāṅgaṃ vikasitamukham+caturthe -> khaṭvāṅgaṃ vikasitamukhaṃ caturthe

kheṭam+tṛtīye -> kheṭaṃ tṛtīye

dīnavaktram+dhṛtacaraṇatale -> dīnavaktraṃ dhṛtacaraṇatale

vedāsyam+brahmaṇas -> vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇas

vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇas+yat -> vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yat

vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yat+śirakamalam -> vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam

vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam+alam -> vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam alam

vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam alam+vāmahaste -> vedāsyaṃ brahmaṇo yac chirakamalam alaṃ vāmahaste

darpaṇas+śṛṅkhalā -> darpaṇaḥ śṛṅkhalā

kodaṇḍam+pāśaratne -> kodaṇḍaṃ pāśaratne

khaṭvāṅgavikasitamukham+raktapūrṇam -> khaṭvāṅgavikasitamukhaṃ raktapūrṇam

khaṭvāṅgavikasitamukhaṃ raktapūrṇam+kapālam -> khaṭvāṅgavikasitamukhaṃ raktapūrṇaṃ kapālam

heṭam+ca -> heṭaṃ ca

ghaṇṭām+k -> ghaṇṭāṃ k

cihnam+ucyate--- -> cihnam ucyate---

idānīm+vāmakṛṣṇakaratalacatuṣke -> idānīṃ vāmakṛṣṇakaratalacatuṣke

vajriṇas+ca -> vajriṇaś ca

vajriṇaś ca+iti|| -> vajriṇaś ceti||

dakṣiṇe+astravṛndam -> dakṣiṇe 'stravṛndam

dakṣiṇe 'stravṛndam+ravikarakamale -> dakṣiṇe 'stravṛndaṃ ravikarakamale

paśus+iti -> paśur iti

daṇḍas+| -> daṇḍaḥ|

kuntas+tṛtīye -> kuntas tṛtīye

cakram+dvitīye -> cakraṃ dvitīye

mudgaras+iti| -> mudgara iti|

raṇadḍamarukas+caturthe -> raṇadḍamarukaś caturthe

vajrāṅkuśas+tṛtīye -> vajrāṅkuśas tṛtīye

prathame+agnibāṇas -> prathame 'gnibāṇas

prathame 'gnibāṇas+dvitīye -> prathame 'gnibāṇo dvitīye

kartikā+iti| -> kartiketi|

triśūlam+caturthe -> triśūlaṃ caturthe

khaḍgas+tṛtīye -> khaḍgas tṛtīye

vajram+dvitīye -> vajraṃ dvitīye

kṛṣṇe+ityādinā| -> kṛṣṇa ityādinā|

vajriṇas+ca|| -> vajriṇaś ca||

kuntas+daṇḍas -> kunto daṇḍas

kunto daṇḍas+kuṭhāras -> kunto daṇḍaḥ kuṭhāras

kunto daṇḍaḥ kuṭhāras+ravikarakamale -> kunto daṇḍaḥ kuṭhāro ravikarakamale

saravaḍamarukas+mudgaras -> saravaḍamaruko mudgaras

saravaḍamaruko mudgaras+cakram -> saravaḍamaruko mudgaraś cakram

saravaḍamaruko mudgaraś cakram+eva -> saravaḍamaruko mudgaraś cakram eva

tasmāt+vajrāṅkuśas -> tasmād vajrāṅkuśas

tasmād vajrāṅkuśas+vai -> tasmād vajrāṅkuśo vai

vahnibāṇas+| -> vahnibāṇaḥ|

vajram+khaḍgas -> vajraṃ khaḍgas

vajraṃ khaḍgas+triśūlam -> vajraṃ khaḍgas triśūlam

vajraṃ khaḍgas triśūlam+bhuvanabhayakarā -> vajraṃ khaḍgas triśūlaṃ bhuvanabhayakarā

saṃsthitam+ca -> saṃsthitaṃ ca

saṃsthitaṃ ca+astravṛndam -> saṃsthitaṃ cāstravṛndam

idānīm+astravṛndam -> idānīm astravṛndam

idānīm astravṛndam+ucyate--- -> idānīm astravṛndam ucyate---

tṛtīyamāsas+prathamamātrā|| -> tṛtīyamāsaḥ prathamamātrā||

iti+avidyāsaṃskāravijñānānupraveśaniyamas -> ity avidyāsaṃskāravijñānānupraveśaniyamas

ity avidyāsaṃskāravijñānānupraveśaniyamas+garbhe -> ity avidyāsaṃskāravijñānānupraveśaniyamo garbhe

pratyekapañcavarṇās+tās -> pratyekapañcavarṇās tās

pratyekapañcavarṇās tās+mudrikābhis -> pratyekapañcavarṇās tā mudrikābhis

pratyekapañcavarṇās tā mudrikābhis+sphurantyas -> pratyekapañcavarṇās tā mudrikābhiḥ sphurantyas

pratyekapañcavarṇās tā mudrikābhiḥ sphurantyas+| -> pratyekapañcavarṇās tā mudrikābhiḥ sphurantyaḥ|

evam+śaśikarakamale -> evaṃ śaśikarakamale

śuklā+iti| -> śukleti|

parvapaṅktis+kṛṣṇā| -> parvapaṅktiḥ kṛṣṇā|

hastatalāt+sarvāṅgulīnām -> hastatalāt sarvāṅgulīnām

hastatalāt sarvāṅgulīnām+prathamā -> hastatalāt sarvāṅgulīnāṃ prathamā

aṅguṣṭhas+pītas -> aṅguṣṭhaḥ pītas

aṅguṣṭhaḥ pītas+| -> aṅguṣṭhaḥ pītaḥ|

pañcāṅgulyas+tās -> pañcāṅgulyas tās

pañcāṅgulyas tās+pratyekās -> pañcāṅgulyas tāḥ pratyekās

pañcāṅgulyas tāḥ pratyekās+triparvās -> pañcāṅgulyas tāḥ pratyekās triparvās

pañcāṅgulyas tāḥ pratyekās triparvās+| -> pañcāṅgulyas tāḥ pratyekās triparvāḥ|

evam+pratyekakare -> evaṃ pratyekakare

vakṣyamāṇapraharaṇais+sahitās -> vakṣyamāṇapraharaṇaiḥ sahitās

vakṣyamāṇapraharaṇaiḥ sahitās+| -> vakṣyamāṇapraharaṇaiḥ sahitāḥ|

ca+uttare -> cottare

evam+karās -> evaṃ karās

evaṃ karās+catvāras -> evaṃ karāś catvāras

evaṃ karāś catvāras+kṛṣṇās -> evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇās

evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇās+catvāras -> evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇāś catvāras

evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇāś catvāras+raktās -> evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇāś catvāro raktās

evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇāś catvāro raktās+catvāras -> evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇāś catvāro raktāś catvāras

evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇāś catvāro raktāś catvāras+śuklās -> evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇāś catvāro raktāś catvāraḥ śuklās

evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇāś catvāro raktāś catvāraḥ śuklās+| -> evaṃ karāś catvāraḥ kṛṣṇāś catvāro raktāś catvāraḥ śuklāḥ|

ca+uttare -> cottare

evam+dvau -> evaṃ dvau

evam+uttare -> evam uttare

dakṣiṇaskandham+prathamam -> dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamam

dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamam+nīlam -> dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlam

dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlam+dvitīyam -> dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlaṃ dvitīyam

dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlaṃ dvitīyam+raktam -> dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlaṃ dvitīyaṃ raktam

dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlaṃ dvitīyaṃ raktam+tṛtīyam -> dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlaṃ dvitīyaṃ raktaṃ tṛtīyam

dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlaṃ dvitīyaṃ raktaṃ tṛtīyam+śuklam| -> dakṣiṇaskandhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlaṃ dvitīyaṃ raktaṃ tṛtīyaṃ śuklam|

pañcavarṇās+sphurantyas -> pañcavarṇāḥ sphurantyas

pañcavarṇāḥ sphurantyas+|| -> pañcavarṇāḥ sphurantyaḥ||

pañcāṅgulyas+triparvās -> pañcāṅgulyas triparvās

pañcāṅgulyas triparvās+śaśikarakamale -> pañcāṅgulyas triparvāḥ śaśikarakamale

praharaṇasahitās+pāṇayas -> praharaṇasahitāḥ pāṇayas

praharaṇasahitāḥ pāṇayas+ca -> praharaṇasahitāḥ pāṇayaś ca

tadvat+vai -> tadvad vai

bāhavaś candravarṇās+| -> bāhavaś candravarṇāḥ|

savyāvasavye+asitaravivapuṣau -> savyāvasavye 'sitaravivapuṣau

ca+uttare -> cottare

raktam+śaśadharadhavalam -> raktaṃ śaśadharadhavalam

raktaṃ śaśadharadhavalam+dakṣiṇe -> raktaṃ śaśadharadhavalaṃ dakṣiṇe

skandham+nīlam -> skandhaṃ nīlam

skandhaṃ nīlam+ca -> skandhaṃ nīlaṃ ca

viśvavajram+ardhacandram -> viśvavajram ardhacandram

viśvavajram ardhacandram+vajrasattvamukuṭam| -> viśvavajram ardhacandraṃ vajrasattvamukuṭam|

paścimaṃ samādhistham+pītam| -> paścimaṃ samādhisthaṃ pītam|

dakṣiṇam+sarāgam -> dakṣiṇaṃ sarāgam

dakṣiṇaṃ sarāgam+raktam -> dakṣiṇaṃ sarāgaṃ raktam

dakṣiṇaṃ sarāgaṃ raktam+vāmam -> dakṣiṇaṃ sarāgaṃ raktaṃ vāmam

dakṣiṇaṃ sarāgaṃ raktaṃ vāmam+praśāntam -> dakṣiṇaṃ sarāgaṃ raktaṃ vāmaṃ praśāntam

dakṣiṇaṃ sarāgaṃ raktaṃ vāmaṃ praśāntam+śuklam| -> dakṣiṇaṃ sarāgaṃ raktaṃ vāmaṃ praśāntaṃ śuklam|

pūrvamukham+kṛṣṇam -> pūrvamukhaṃ kṛṣṇam

pūrvamukhaṃ kṛṣṇam+daṃṣṭrākarālogram| -> pūrvamukhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ daṃṣṭrākarālogram|

avasavyam+vāmam -> avasavyaṃ vāmam

avasavyaṃ vāmam+candravarṇam -> avasavyaṃ vāmaṃ candravarṇam

avasavyaṃ vāmaṃ candravarṇam+śuklam -> avasavyaṃ vāmaṃ candravarṇaṃ śuklam

avasavyaṃ vāmaṃ candravarṇaṃ śuklam+evam -> avasavyaṃ vāmaṃ candravarṇaṃ śuklam evam

avasavyaṃ vāmaṃ candravarṇaṃ śuklam evam+trikaṇṭham -> avasavyaṃ vāmaṃ candravarṇaṃ śuklam evaṃ trikaṇṭham

avasavyaṃ vāmaṃ candravarṇaṃ śuklam evaṃ trikaṇṭham+pūrvoktavidhānāt| -> avasavyaṃ vāmaṃ candravarṇaṃ śuklam evaṃ trikaṇṭhaṃ pūrvoktavidhānāt|

ravinibham+raktam| -> ravinibhaṃ raktam|

madhyakaṇṭham+nīlam -> madhyakaṇṭhaṃ nīlam

madhyakaṇṭhaṃ nīlam+dakṣiṇe -> madhyakaṇṭhaṃ nīlaṃ dakṣiṇe

evam+nīlāṅgam -> evaṃ nīlāṅgam

evaṃ nīlāṅgam+tathā -> evaṃ nīlāṅgaṃ tathā

śuklas+iti| -> śukla iti|

rudras+trinetras -> rudras trinetras

rudras trinetras+ekānanas -> rudras trinetra ekānanas

rudras trinetra ekānanas+caturbhujas -> rudras trinetra ekānanaś caturbhujas

rudras trinetra ekānanaś caturbhujas+triśūlaḍamarukakapālakhaṭvāṅgadharas -> rudras trinetra ekānanaś caturbhujas triśūlaḍamarukakapālakhaṭvāṅgadharas

rudras trinetra ekānanaś caturbhujas triśūlaḍamarukakapālakhaṭvāṅgadharas+vāmapādatale -> rudras trinetra ekānanaś caturbhujas triśūlaḍamarukakapālakhaṭvāṅgadharo vāmapādatale

raktavarṇas+| -> raktavarṇaḥ|

māras+kāmadevas -> māraḥ kāmadevas

māraḥ kāmadevas+pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastas -> māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastas

māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastas+pāśāṅkuśadharas -> māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharas

māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharas+caturbhujas -> māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharaś caturbhujas

māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharaś caturbhujas+ekavaktras -> māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharaś caturbhuja ekavaktras

māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharaś caturbhuja ekavaktras+raktavarṇas -> māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharaś caturbhuja ekavaktro raktavarṇas

māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharaś caturbhuja ekavaktro raktavarṇas+savye -> māraḥ kāmadevaḥ pañcapuṣpabāṇadhanurhastaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharaś caturbhuja ekavaktro raktavarṇaḥ savye

sulalitacaraṇālīḍhapādam+jinendram -> sulalitacaraṇālīḍhapādaṃ jinendram

sulalitacaraṇālīḍhapādaṃ jinendram+iti| -> sulalitacaraṇālīḍhapādaṃ jinendram iti|

rudrānaṅgayos+dvayos -> rudrānaṅgayor dvayos

rudrānaṅgayor dvayos+mārakleśapakṣayos -> rudrānaṅgayor dvayor mārakleśapakṣayos

rudrānaṅgayor dvayor mārakleśapakṣayos+vāmadakṣiṇapravāhayos -> rudrānaṅgayor dvayor mārakleśapakṣayor vāmadakṣiṇapravāhayos

rudrānaṅgayor dvayor mārakleśapakṣayor vāmadakṣiṇapravāhayos+hṛdi -> rudrānaṅgayor dvayor mārakleśapakṣayor vāmadakṣiṇapravāhayor hṛdi

śrīmati+oṃkārajāte -> śrīmaty oṃkārajāte

madhyam+savyāvasavyam -> madhyaṃ savyāvasavyam

madhyaṃ savyāvasavyam+bhramararavinibham -> madhyaṃ savyāvasavyaṃ bhramararavinibham

madhyaṃ savyāvasavyaṃ bhramararavinibham+candravarṇam -> madhyaṃ savyāvasavyaṃ bhramararavinibhaṃ candravarṇam

madhyaṃ savyāvasavyaṃ bhramararavinibhaṃ candravarṇam+ca -> madhyaṃ savyāvasavyaṃ bhramararavinibhaṃ candravarṇaṃ ca

māras+rakte -> māro rakte

rudrānaṅgadvayos+hṛtsulalitacaraṇālīḍhapādam -> rudrānaṅgadvayor hṛtsulalitacaraṇālīḍhapādam

rudrānaṅgadvayor hṛtsulalitacaraṇālīḍhapādam+jinendram| -> rudrānaṅgadvayor hṛtsulalitacaraṇālīḍhapādaṃ jinendram|

śrīmati+oṃkārajāte -> śrīmaty oṃkārajāte

maṇḍalakamalakarṇikāyām+svaśarīrāntarbhūtas -> maṇḍalakamalakarṇikāyāṃ svaśarīrāntarbhūtas

maṇḍalakamalakarṇikāyāṃ svaśarīrāntarbhūtas+devatāvinyāsas -> maṇḍalakamalakarṇikāyāṃ svaśarīrāntarbhūto devatāvinyāsas

maṇḍalakamalakarṇikāyāṃ svaśarīrāntarbhūto devatāvinyāsas+maṇḍalākāras -> maṇḍalakamalakarṇikāyāṃ svaśarīrāntarbhūto devatāvinyāso maṇḍalākāras

maṇḍalakamalakarṇikāyāṃ svaśarīrāntarbhūto devatāvinyāso maṇḍalākāras+ucyate|| -> maṇḍalakamalakarṇikāyāṃ svaśarīrāntarbhūto devatāvinyāso maṇḍalākāra ucyate||

kāyavijñānādhipates+lakṣaṇam| -> kāyavijñānādhipater lakṣaṇam|

yugāsyam+caturmukham -> yugāsyaṃ caturmukham

yugāsyaṃ caturmukham+trigrīvam -> yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvam

yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvam+dvādaśanetram -> yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvādaśanetram

yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvādaśanetram+vikasitavadanam -> yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ vikasitavadanam

yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ vikasitavadanam+ca -> yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ vikasitavadanaṃ ca

yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ vikasitavadanaṃ ca+ardhadaṃṣṭrākarālam -> yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ vikasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālam

yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ vikasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālam+iti -> yugāsyaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ vikasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālam iti

atas+vajrālaṃkāradeham -> ato vajrālaṃkāradeham

ato vajrālaṃkāradeham+jinakarakamalam -> ato vajrālaṃkāradehaṃ jinakarakamalam

ato vajrālaṃkāradehaṃ jinakarakamalam+caturviṃśatikaram -> ato vajrālaṃkāradehaṃ jinakarakamalaṃ caturviṃśatikaram

ato vajrālaṃkāradehaṃ jinakarakamalaṃ caturviṃśatikaram+sūryas -> ato vajrālaṃkāradehaṃ jinakarakamalaṃ caturviṃśatikaraṃ sūryas

ato vajrālaṃkāradehaṃ jinakarakamalaṃ caturviṃśatikaraṃ sūryas+iti -> ato vajrālaṃkāradehaṃ jinakarakamalaṃ caturviṃśatikaraṃ sūrya iti

nānāśarīrāvayavās+nānāvarṇās -> nānāśarīrāvayavā nānāvarṇās

nānāśarīrāvayavā nānāvarṇās+nānāsaṃsthānās -> nānāśarīrāvayavā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānās

nānāśarīrāvayavā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānās+eva -> nānāśarīrāvayavā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānā eva

nānāśarīrāvayavā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānā eva+utpadyante| -> nānāśarīrāvayavā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānā evotpadyante|

sarvālaṃkārasahitas+utpādas -> sarvālaṃkārasahita utpādas

sarvālaṃkārasahita utpādas+| -> sarvālaṃkārasahita utpādaḥ|

devatānām+utpādakāle -> devatānām utpādakāle

saṃsthānam+ucyate---vajra -> saṃsthānam ucyate---vajra

saṃsthānam ucyate---vajra+ityādi| -> saṃsthānam ucyate---vajretyādi|

idānīm+devatāvigrahe -> idānīṃ devatāvigrahe

kṛṣṇapratipadādikalās+deyās -> kṛṣṇapratipadādikalā deyās

kṛṣṇapratipadādikalā deyās+| -> kṛṣṇapratipadādikalā deyāḥ|

tatas+dakṣiṇāvartena -> tato dakṣiṇāvartena

bindus+| -> binduḥ|

la+iti -> leti

tatas+yaṇādeśena -> tato yaṇādeśena

tatas+guṇabhedena -> tato guṇabhedena

deyās+triṃśat -> deyās triṃśat

deyās triṃśat+svarās -> deyās triṃśat svarās

deyās triṃśat svarās+bindus -> deyās triṃśat svarā bindus

deyās triṃśat svarā bindus+visargas -> deyās triṃśat svarā bindur visargas

deyās triṃśat svarā bindur visargas+ca -> deyās triṃśat svarā bindur visargaś ca

deyās triṃśat svarā bindur visargaś ca+iti% -> deyās triṃśat svarā bindur visargaś ceti%

candramaṇḍale+ādyās -> candramaṇḍala ādyās

candramaṇḍala ādyās+dvātriṃśallakṣaṇārtham -> candramaṇḍala ādyā dvātriṃśallakṣaṇārtham

candramaṇḍala ādyā dvātriṃśallakṣaṇārtham+vāmadakṣiṇāvartena -> candramaṇḍala ādyā dvātriṃśallakṣaṇārthaṃ vāmadakṣiṇāvartena

ādyās+ityādinā| -> ādyā ityādinā|

trigrīvam+sūryanetram -> trigrīvaṃ sūryanetram

trigrīvaṃ sūryanetram+vikasitavadanam -> trigrīvaṃ sūryanetraṃ vikasitavadanam

trigrīvaṃ sūryanetraṃ vikasitavadanam+ca -> trigrīvaṃ sūryanetraṃ vikasitavadanaṃ ca

trigrīvaṃ sūryanetraṃ vikasitavadanaṃ ca+ardhadaṃṣṭrākarālam|| -> trigrīvaṃ sūryanetraṃ vikasitavadanaṃ cārdhadaṃṣṭrākarālam||

vajrālaṅkāradeham+jinavarakamalam -> vajrālaṅkāradehaṃ jinavarakamalam

vajrālaṅkāradehaṃ jinavarakamalam+sūryabāhum -> vajrālaṅkāradehaṃ jinavarakamalaṃ sūryabāhum

vajrālaṅkāradehaṃ jinavarakamalaṃ sūryabāhum+yugāsyam -> vajrālaṅkāradehaṃ jinavarakamalaṃ sūryabāhuṃ yugāsyam

muñcantam+pañcaraśmīn -> muñcantaṃ pañcaraśmīn

muñcantaṃ pañcaraśmīn+sphuradamalakaram -> muñcantaṃ pañcaraśmin sphuradamalakaram

muñcantaṃ pañcaraśmin sphuradamalakaram+bhāvayet -> muñcantaṃ pañcaraśmin sphuradamalakaraṃ bhāvayet

muñcantaṃ pañcaraśmin sphuradamalakaraṃ bhāvayet+kālacakram| -> muñcantaṃ pañcaraśmin sphuradamalakaraṃ bhāvayet kālacakram|

kuliśasahitās+pañcakādarśakādyais -> kuliśasahitāḥ pañcakādarśakādyais

ādyās+kādyendusūrye -> ādyāḥ kādyendusūrye

ādyāḥ kādyendusūrye+api -> ādyāḥ kādyendusūrye 'pi

garbhaniṣpattis+ucyate--- -> garbhaniṣpattir ucyate---

devatāniṣpattis+adhyātmani -> devatāniṣpattir adhyātmani

idānīm+bāhye -> idānīṃ bāhye

garbhaśodhanāvidhis+bhagavatas -> garbhaśodhanāvidhir bhagavatas

garbhaśodhanāvidhir bhagavatas+garbhāvakramaṇakāle|| -> garbhaśodhanāvidhir bhagavato garbhāvakramaṇakāle||

ādikādyam+tatas -> ādikādyaṃ tatas

ādikādyaṃ tatas+nyaset|| -> ādikādyaṃ tato nyaset||

sarvasampatkaram+dhyātvā -> sarvasampatkaraṃ dhyātvā

maṇḍalam+dharmadhātukam|| -> maṇḍalaṃ dharmadhātukam||

etat+śrīkālacakrasya -> etac chrīkālacakrasya

tat+cintāmaṇikādikam| -> tac cintāmaṇikādikam|

dundibhis+bodhivṛkṣas -> dundibhir bodhivṛkṣas

dundibhir bodhivṛkṣas+ca -> dundibhir bodhivṛkṣaś ca

cittavākkāyasaṃśuddham+dharmacakram -> cittavākkāyasaṃśuddhaṃ dharmacakram

cittavākkāyasaṃśuddhaṃ dharmacakram+mahāghaṭam|| -> cittavākkāyasaṃśuddhaṃ dharmacakraṃ mahāghaṭam||

candrasūryam+sadā -> candrasūryaṃ sadā

candrasūryaṃ sadā+uditam| -> candrasūryaṃ sadoditam|

pañcābhijñāmahāvalayais+veṣṭitam -> pañcābhijñāmahāvalayair veṣṭitam

pañcābhijñāmahāvalayair veṣṭitam+pañcabhis -> pañcābhijñāmahāvalayair veṣṭitaṃ pañcabhis

pañcābhijñāmahāvalayair veṣṭitaṃ pañcabhis+sadā|| -> pañcābhijñāmahāvalayair veṣṭitaṃ pañcabhiḥ sadā||

khacitam+saccatūratnais -> khacitaṃ saccatūratnais

khacitaṃ saccatūratnais+dvāraniryūhasandhiṣu| -> khacitaṃ saccatūratnair dvāraniryūhasandhiṣu|

caturbhis+saṃgrahais -> caturbhiḥ saṃgrahais

caturbhiḥ saṃgrahais+koṇam -> caturbhiḥ saṃgrahaiḥ koṇam

caturbhiḥ saṃgrahaiḥ koṇam+viśvavajrais -> caturbhiḥ saṃgrahaiḥ koṇaṃ viśvavajrais

caturbhiḥ saṃgrahaiḥ koṇaṃ viśvavajrais+alaṃkṛtam|| -> caturbhiḥ saṃgrahaiḥ koṇaṃ viśvavajrair alaṃkṛtam||

bodhyaṅgais+cāmaroddhūtam -> bodhyaṅgaiś cāmaroddhūtam

bodhyaṅgaiś cāmaroddhūtam+navāṅgais -> bodhyaṅgaiś cāmaroddhūtaṃ navāṅgais

bodhyaṅgaiś cāmaroddhūtaṃ navāṅgais+sragdāmamaṇḍitam| -> bodhyaṅgaiś cāmaroddhūtaṃ navāṅgaiḥ sragdāmamaṇḍitam|

ṛddhipādais+dhvajākīrṇam -> ṛddhipādair dhvajākīrṇam

ṛddhipādair dhvajākīrṇam+prahāṇais -> ṛddhipādair dhvajākīrṇaṃ prahāṇais

ṛddhipādair dhvajākīrṇaṃ prahāṇais+darpaṇojjvalam|| -> ṛddhipādair dhvajākīrṇaṃ prahāṇair darpaṇojjvalam||

śūnyatādivimokṣais+ca -> śūnyatādivimokṣaiś ca

kuśalais+kramaśīrṣakam|| -> kuśalaiḥ kramaśīrṣakam||

vaśitābhis+ca -> vaśitābhiś ca

hārārdhās+veṇikādharmais -> hārārdhā veṇikādharmais

hārārdhā veṇikādharmais+aṣṭādaśabhis -> hārārdhā veṇikādharmair aṣṭādaśabhis

hārārdhā veṇikādharmair aṣṭādaśabhis+eva -> hārārdhā veṇikādharmair aṣṭādaśabhir eva

daśapāramitāpūrṇais+vicitrās -> daśapāramitāpūrṇair vicitrās

daśapāramitāpūrṇair vicitrās+ratnapaṭṭikās -> daśapāramitāpūrṇair vicitrā ratnapaṭṭikās

daśapāramitāpūrṇair vicitrā ratnapaṭṭikās+|| -> daśapāramitāpūrṇair vicitrā ratnapaṭṭikāḥ||

vedikās+maṇḍalatraye| -> vedikā maṇḍalatraye|

samādhidhāriṇībhis+ca -> samādhidhāriṇībhiś ca

śraddhādibhis+balais -> śraddhādibhir balais

śraddhādibhir balais+pañca -> śraddhādibhir balaiḥ pañca

pañcaśraddhendriyādibhis+| -> pañcaśraddhendriyādibhiḥ|

triprākārais+triyānais -> triprākārais triyānais

triprākārais triyānais+ca -> triprākārais triyānaiś ca

śīlādipañcabhis+skandhais -> śīlādipañcabhiḥ skandhais

śīlādipañcabhiḥ skandhais+pañcavarṇam -> śīlādipañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ pañcavarṇam

śīlādipañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ pañcavarṇam+viśodhitam|| -> śīlādipañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ pañcavarṇaṃ viśodhitam||

cittavākkāyabhedatas+| -> cittavākkāyabhedataḥ|

kapolās+pakṣakais -> kapolāḥ pakṣakais

kapolāḥ pakṣakais+ca -> kapolāḥ pakṣakaiś ca

kapolāḥ pakṣakaiś ca+eva -> kapolāḥ pakṣakaiś caiva

rūpibhis+ca -> rūpibhiś ca

rūpibhiś ca+aṣṭabhis -> rūpibhiś cāṣṭabhis

rūpibhiś cāṣṭabhis+guṇais -> rūpibhiś cāṣṭabhir guṇais

rūpibhiś cāṣṭabhir guṇais+|| -> rūpibhiś cāṣṭabhir guṇaiḥ||

niryūhāṣṭavimokṣais+ca -> niryūhāṣṭavimokṣaiś ca

dhātubhis+| -> dhātubhiḥ|

stambhās+kūṭāgāram -> stambhāḥ kūṭāgāram

stambhāḥ kūṭāgāram+tu -> stambhāḥ kūṭāgāraṃ tu

śmaśānāni+aṣṭadikṣu -> śmaśānāny aṣṭadikṣu

āryāṣṭāṅgikamārgais+ca -> āryāṣṭāṅgikamārgaiś ca

bhūmibhis+dvādaśais -> bhūmibhir dvādaśais

bhūmibhir dvādaśais+tadvat -> bhūmibhir dvādaśais tadvat

bhūmibhir dvādaśais tadvat+toraṇāni -> bhūmibhir dvādaśais tadvat toraṇāni

caturbhis+smṛtyupasthānais -> caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānais

caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānais+caturasram -> caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturasram

caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturasram+samantatas -> caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturasraṃ samantatas

caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturasraṃ samantatas+| -> caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturasraṃ samantataḥ|

caturbrahmavihārais+ca -> caturbrahmavihāraiś ca

buddhadharmamahāsaṃghais+cittavākkāyamaṇḍalam| -> buddhadharmamahāsaṃghaiś cittavākkāyamaṇḍalam|

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

dharmaskandhaviśuddhis+ucyate| -> dharmaskandhaviśuddhir ucyate|

kāyadhātubhis+viśuddhis -> kāyadhātubhir viśuddhis

kāyadhātubhir viśuddhis+jñānapaṭale -> kāyadhātubhir viśuddhir jñānapaṭale

kuliśamayam+bodhicittamayam -> kuliśamayaṃ bodhicittamayam

kuliśamayaṃ bodhicittamayam+susambhogacakram -> kuliśamayaṃ bodhicittamayaṃ susambhogacakram

kuliśamayaṃ bodhicittamayaṃ susambhogacakram+jinasya -> kuliśamayaṃ bodhicittamayaṃ susambhogacakraṃ jinasya

kuliśamayaṃ bodhicittamayaṃ susambhogacakraṃ jinasya+iti| -> kuliśamayaṃ bodhicittamayaṃ susambhogacakraṃ jinasyeti|

ṣoḍaśastambhais+| -> ṣoḍaśastambhaiḥ|

dvyaṣṭastambhais+ṣoḍaśakalābhedena -> dvyaṣṭastambhaiḥ ṣoḍaśakalābhedena

kāyamaṇḍalabāhye+aṣṭaśmaśānais -> kāyamaṇḍalabāhye 'ṣṭaśmaśānais

kāyamaṇḍalabāhye 'ṣṭaśmaśānais+ca| -> kāyamaṇḍalabāhye 'ṣṭaśmaśānaiś ca|

maṇikanakamayais+toraṇais -> maṇikanakamayais toraṇais

maṇikanakamayais toraṇais+ca -> maṇikanakamayais toraṇaiś ca

rājan+iti -> rājann iti

evam+dvādaśa -> evaṃ dvādaśa

evam+pratyekamaṇḍale -> evaṃ pratyekamaṇḍale

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

vikalpabhāvāt+iti -> vikalpabhāvād iti

hṛdayāt+bāhūpabāhunakhāntam -> hṛdayād bāhūpabāhunakhāntam

hṛdayād bāhūpabāhunakhāntam+yāvat -> hṛdayād bāhūpabāhunakhāntaṃ yāvat

hṛdayād bāhūpabāhunakhāntaṃ yāvat+mātṛśarīre -> hṛdayād bāhūpabāhunakhāntaṃ yāvan mātṛśarīre

guhyakamalāt+adhas -> guhyakamalād adhas

guhyakamalād adhas+ūrdhvam -> guhyakamalād adha ūrdhvam

guhyakamalād adha ūrdhvam+hṛdayāt -> guhyakamalād adha ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayāt

guhyakamalād adha ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayāt+guhyakamalam -> guhyakamalād adha ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayād guhyakamalam

guhyakamalād adha ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayād guhyakamalam+śiras -> guhyakamalād adha ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayād guhyakamalaṃ śiras

guhyakamalād adha ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayād guhyakamalaṃ śiras+yāvat| -> guhyakamalād adha ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayād guhyakamalaṃ śiro yāvat|

tathā+evam -> tathaivam

tathaivam+adhyātmani -> tathaivam adhyātmani

evam+kāyamaṇḍalam -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam+caturlakṣayojanāyāmam -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmam

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmam+vāṅmaṇḍalam -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalam

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalam+tadardham -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardham

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardham+cittamaṇḍalam -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalam

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalam+tasya -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasya

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasya+api -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpi

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpi+ardham -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardham

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardham+mahāsukhacakram -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakram

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakram+tasya -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ tasya

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ tasya+api -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ tasyāpi

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ tasyāpi+ardham -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ tasyāpy ardham

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ tasyāpy ardham+bhagavatas -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ bhagavatas

evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ bhagavatas+padmam|| -> evaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturlakṣayojanāyāmaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tadardhaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ tasyāpy ardhaṃ bhagavataḥ padmam||

rathās+ca| -> rathāś ca|

evam+caturdvāre -> evaṃ caturdvāre

dvādaśakamalam+candrasūryais -> dvādaśakamalaṃ candrasūryais

dvādaśakamalaṃ candrasūryais+vihīnam| -> dvādaśakamalaṃ candrasūryair vihīnam|

dinakarakamalam+iti -> dinakarakamalam iti

tasya+eva -> tasyaiva

vasukamalam+idam -> vasukamalam idam

vasukamalam idam+kamalāṣṭam -> vasukamalam idaṃ kamalāṣṭam

vasukamalam idaṃ kamalāṣṭam+candrasūryais -> vasukamalam idaṃ kamalāṣṭaṃ candrasūryais

vasukamalam idaṃ kamalāṣṭaṃ candrasūryais+vihīnam| -> vasukamalam idaṃ kamalāṣṭaṃ candrasūryair vihīnam|

kuliśamayasusambhogacakram+jinasya|| -> kuliśamayasusambhogacakraṃ jinasya||

dvyaṣṭastambhais+ca -> dvyaṣṭastambhaiś ca

rājan+maṇikanakamayais -> rājan maṇikanakamayais

rājan maṇikanakamayais+toraṇais -> rājan maṇikanakamayais toraṇais

rājan maṇikanakamayais toraṇais+ca -> rājan maṇikanakamayais toraṇaiś ca

rathās+ca| -> rathāś ca|

dinakarakamalam+dvāramadhye -> dinakarakamalaṃ dvāramadhye

vasukamalam+idam -> vasukamalam idam

vasukamalam idam+candrasūryais -> vasukamalam idaṃ candrasūryais

vasukamalam idaṃ candrasūryais+vihīnam -> vasukamalam idaṃ candrasūryair vihīnam

cittamaṇḍalam+bhūvalayāntam|| -> cittamaṇḍalaṃ bhūvalayāntam||

maṇikaranikarais+maṇḍalam -> maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalam

maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalam+visphurantam -> maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam

maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam+oṃkāram -> maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam oṃkāram

maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam oṃkāram+jñānajātam -> maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam oṃkāraṃ jñānajātam

maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam oṃkāraṃ jñānajātam+jinavarakamalam -> maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam oṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ jinavarakamalam

maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam oṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ jinavarakamalam+candrasūryāsanānām -> maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam oṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ jinavarakamalaṃ candrasūryāsanānām

maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam oṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ jinavarakamalaṃ candrasūryāsanānām+iti -> maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam oṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ jinavarakamalaṃ candrasūryāsanānām iti

bhruṃkārapariṇatam+oṃkārapariṇatam -> bhruṃkārapariṇatam oṃkārapariṇatam

bhruṃkārapariṇatam oṃkārapariṇatam+vā -> bhruṃkārapariṇatam oṃkārapariṇataṃ vā

vajramayam+pañjaram -> vajramayaṃ pañjaram

vajramayaṃ pañjaram+vā -> vajramayaṃ pañjaraṃ vā

tena+eva -> tenaiva

sakuliśakamalam+iti -> sakuliśakamalam iti

kūṭāgāram+samantāt -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt

kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt+sphuradamalakaram -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaram

kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaram+vajrajam -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajam

kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajam+hūṃkārajam -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajaṃ hūṃkārajam

kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajaṃ hūṃkārajam+vajrapañjaram -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajaṃ hūṃkārajaṃ vajrapañjaram

kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajaṃ hūṃkārajaṃ vajrapañjaram+vā -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajaṃ hūṃkārajaṃ vajrapañjaraṃ vā

evam+tadupari -> evaṃ tadupari

guhyakamalakarṇikāyām+samāhāras -> guhyakamalakarṇikāyāṃ samāhāras

guhyakamalakarṇikāyāṃ samāhāras+teṣām -> guhyakamalakarṇikāyāṃ samāhāras teṣām

guhyakamalakarṇikāyāṃ samāhāras teṣām+iti| -> guhyakamalakarṇikāyāṃ samāhāras teṣām iti|

viṇmūtraśukravāhinyas+tisras -> viṇmūtraśukravāhinyas tisras

viṇmūtraśukravāhinyas tisras+nāḍyas -> viṇmūtraśukravāhinyas tisro nāḍyas

viṇmūtraśukravāhinyas tisro nāḍyas+candrasūryarāhumaṇḍalāni| -> viṇmūtraśukravāhinyas tisro nāḍyaś candrasūryarāhumaṇḍalāni|

guhyakamalam+bhagavatas -> guhyakamalaṃ bhagavatas

guhyakamalaṃ bhagavatas+kamalam -> guhyakamalaṃ bhagavataḥ kamalam

guhyakamalaṃ bhagavataḥ kamalam+iva| -> guhyakamalaṃ bhagavataḥ kamalam iva|

nābhes+guhyakamalaparyantam -> nābher guhyakamalaparyantam

nābher guhyakamalaparyantam+mahāmerus -> nābher guhyakamalaparyantaṃ mahāmerus

nābher guhyakamalaparyantaṃ mahāmerus+| -> nābher guhyakamalaparyantaṃ mahāmeruḥ|

toyamaṇḍalam+nābhau -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ nābhau

tejomaṇḍalam+hṛdaye -> tejomaṇḍalaṃ hṛdaye

vāyumaṇḍalam+kaṇṭhe -> vāyumaṇḍalaṃ kaṇṭhe

tatas+lokadhātum -> tato lokadhātum

tato lokadhātum+niṣpannam -> tato lokadhātuṃ niṣpannam

tato lokadhātuṃ niṣpannam+cintayet -> tato lokadhātuṃ niṣpannaṃ cintayet

tato lokadhātuṃ niṣpannaṃ cintayet+iti -> tato lokadhātuṃ niṣpannaṃ cintayed iti

bījākṣaram+vibhāvya -> bījākṣaraṃ vibhāvya

evam+samastam -> evaṃ samastam

evaṃ samastam+ekalolībhūtam -> evaṃ samastam ekalolībhūtam

rāhumaṇḍalam+nīlavarṇam -> rāhumaṇḍalaṃ nīlavarṇam

rāhumaṇḍalaṃ nīlavarṇam+bindupariṇatam| -> rāhumaṇḍalaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ bindupariṇatam|

tadupari+agnis -> tadupary agnis

tadupary agnis+iti -> tadupary agnir iti

visargapariṇatam+sūryamaṇḍalam| -> visargapariṇataṃ sūryamaṇḍalam|

hūṃkārapariṇatam+candramaṇḍalam -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalam

hūṃkārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalam+karṇikātulyam| -> hūṃkārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalaṃ karṇikātulyam|

tulyam+(?)sārdhadvādaśasahasrayojanāyāmāt -> tulyam(?)sārdhadvādaśasahasrayojanāyāmāt

tulyam(?)sārdhadvādaśasahasrayojanāyāmāt+kṣaṃkārapariṇatā| -> tulyam(?)sārdhadvādaśasahasrayojanāyāmāt kṣaṃkārapariṇatā|

viśvābjam+merupramāṇārdhena -> viśvābjaṃ merupramāṇārdhena

ṣoḍaśasahasram+ūrdhvam -> ṣoḍaśasahasram ūrdhvam

ṣoḍaśasahasram ūrdhvam+pañcāśatsahasram -> ṣoḍaśasahasram ūrdhvaṃ pañcāśatsahasram

ṣoḍaśasahasram ūrdhvaṃ pañcāśatsahasram+tanmadhye -> ṣoḍaśasahasram ūrdhvaṃ pañcāśatsahasraṃ tanmadhye

maṃkārapariṇatam+vajramayam -> maṃkārapariṇataṃ vajramayam

maṃkārapariṇataṃ vajramayam+mahāmerum -> maṃkārapariṇataṃ vajramayaṃ mahāmerum

maṃkārapariṇataṃ vajramayaṃ mahāmerum+adhas -> maṃkārapariṇataṃ vajramayaṃ mahāmerum adhas

maṃkārapariṇataṃ vajramayaṃ mahāmerum adhas+vistāreṇa -> maṃkārapariṇataṃ vajramayaṃ mahāmerum adho vistāreṇa

laṃkārapariṇatam+pṛthvīmaṇḍalam -> laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalam

laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalam+caturasram -> laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasram

laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasram+pītavarṇam -> laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam

laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam+adhas -> laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam adhas

laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam adhas+ūrdhvam -> laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam adha ūrdhvam

laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam adha ūrdhvam+hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitam -> laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitam

laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitam+vajralāñchitam -> laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitaṃ vajralāñchitam

laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitaṃ vajralāñchitam+lakṣayojanam| -> laṃkārapariṇataṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītavarṇam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitaṃ vajralāñchitaṃ lakṣayojanam|

toyamaṇḍalam+dvilakṣayojanam -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanam

toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanam+vaṃkārapariṇatam -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇatam

toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇatam+śuklam -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam

toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam+adhas -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adhas

toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adhas+ūrdhvam -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adha ūrdhvam

toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adha ūrdhvam+hūṃkārapariṇatam -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇatam

toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇatam+viśvavajradvayasahitam -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitam

toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitam+padmalāñchitam -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitaṃ padmalāñchitam

toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitaṃ padmalāñchitam+vṛttam| -> toyamaṇḍalaṃ dvilakṣayojanaṃ vaṃkārapariṇataṃ śuklam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitaṃ padmalāñchitaṃ vṛttam|

trilakṣayojanāyāmam+raṃkārapariṇatam -> trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇatam

trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇatam+trikoṇam -> trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇam

trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇam+vahnimaṇḍalam -> trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam

trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam+adhas -> trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adhas

trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adhas+ūrdhvam -> trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvam

trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvam+hūṃkārapariṇatam -> trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇatam

trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇatam+viśvavajradvayasahitam -> trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitam

trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitam+raktam -> trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitaṃ raktam

trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitaṃ raktam+svastikāṅkitam| -> trilakṣayojanāyāmaṃ raṃkārapariṇataṃ trikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataṃ viśvavajradvayasahitaṃ raktaṃ svastikāṅkitam|

caturlakṣayojanam+yaṃkārabījapariṇatam -> caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇatam

caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇatam+kṛṣṇam -> caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇataṃ kṛṣṇam

caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇataṃ kṛṣṇam+adhas -> caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇataṃ kṛṣṇam adhas

caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇataṃ kṛṣṇam adhas+ūrdhvam -> caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇataṃ kṛṣṇam adha ūrdhvam

caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇataṃ kṛṣṇam adha ūrdhvam+hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitam -> caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇataṃ kṛṣṇam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitam

caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇataṃ kṛṣṇam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitam+dhvajāṅkitam| -> caturlakṣayojanaṃ yaṃkārabījapariṇataṃ kṛṣṇam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkārapariṇataviśvavajradvayasahitaṃ dhvajāṅkitam|

dhanvākāram+tiryaṅmānena -> dhanvākāraṃ tiryaṅmānena

vāyumaṇḍalam+madhye -> vāyumaṇḍalaṃ madhye

mātṛśarīram+adhyātmani -> mātṛśarīram adhyātmani

vartulam+daśāravajramayam -> vartulaṃ daśāravajramayam

vartulaṃ daśāravajramayam+martye -> vartulaṃ daśāravajramayaṃ martye

bāhye+adhyātmani -> bāhye 'dhyātmani

bāhye 'dhyātmani+utpattinimittam -> bāhye 'dhyātmany utpattinimittam

bāhye 'dhyātmany utpattinimittam+anantākāśadhātus -> bāhye 'dhyātmany utpattinimittam anantākāśadhātus

bāhye 'dhyātmany utpattinimittam anantākāśadhātus+prajñādharmodayam -> bāhye 'dhyātmany utpattinimittam anantākāśadhātuḥ prajñādharmodayam

bāhye 'dhyātmany utpattinimittam anantākāśadhātuḥ prajñādharmodayam+trikoṇam| -> bāhye 'dhyātmany utpattinimittam anantākāśadhātuḥ prajñādharmodayaṃ trikoṇam|

śūnyam+ityādinā| -> śūnyam ityādinā|

oṃkāram+jñānajātam -> oṃkāraṃ jñānajātam

oṃkāraṃ jñānajātam+jinavarakamalam -> oṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ jinavarakamalam

oṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ jinavarakamalam+candrasūryāsanānām|| -> oṃkāraṃ jñānajātaṃ jinavarakamalaṃ candrasūryāsanānām||

maṇikaranikarais+maṇḍalam -> maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalam

maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalam+visphurantam -> maṇikaranikarair maṇḍalaṃ visphurantam

kūṭāgāram+samantāt -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt

kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt+sphuradamalakaram -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaram

kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaram+vajrajam -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajam

kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajam+pañjaram -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajaṃ pañjaram

kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajaṃ pañjaram+vā| -> kūṭāgāraṃ samantāt sphuradamalakaraṃ vajrajaṃ pañjaraṃ vā|

śūnyam+vāyvagniyohāni -> śūnyaṃ vāyvagniyohāni

śūnyaṃ vāyvagniyohāni+avanisuranagābjendusūryāgnayas -> śūnyaṃ vāyvagniyohāny avanisuranagābjendusūryāgnayas

śūnyaṃ vāyvagniyohāny avanisuranagābjendusūryāgnayas+ca -> śūnyaṃ vāyvagniyohāny avanisuranagābjendusūryāgnayaś ca

sādhanam+ucyate--- -> sādhanam ucyate---

bhagavatas+utpattikrameṇa -> bhagavata utpattikrameṇa

dharmacakrapravartanārtham+garbhāvakramaṇanyāyena -> dharmacakrapravartanārthaṃ garbhāvakramaṇanyāyena

idānīm+pūrvapraṇidhānaparipūraṇāya -> idānīṃ pūrvapraṇidhānaparipūraṇāya

kāyaniṣpattimahoddeśas+| -> kāyaniṣpattimahoddeśaḥ|

sthānarakṣāpāpadeśanādimahoddeśas+prathamas -> sthānarakṣāpāpadeśanādimahoddeśaḥ prathamas

sthānarakṣāpāpadeśanādimahoddeśaḥ prathamas+|| -> sthānarakṣāpāpadeśanādimahoddeśaḥ prathamaḥ||

śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām+dvādaśasāhasrikāyām -> śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām

śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām+sādhanāpaṭale -> śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ sādhanāpaṭale

tathāgataniyamas+|| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ||

traidhātukam+paramāṇudharmatātītam -> traidhātukaṃ paramāṇudharmatātītam

traidhātukaṃ paramāṇudharmatātītam+śūnyatābimbam -> traidhātukaṃ paramāṇudharmatātītaṃ śūnyatābimbam

traidhātukaṃ paramāṇudharmatātītaṃ śūnyatābimbam+vibhāvayet -> traidhātukaṃ paramāṇudharmatātītaṃ śūnyatābimbaṃ vibhāvayet

traidhātukaṃ paramāṇudharmatātītaṃ śūnyatābimbaṃ vibhāvayet+iti -> traidhātukaṃ paramāṇudharmatātītaṃ śūnyatābimbaṃ vibhāvayed iti

iti+uccārya -> ity uccārya

anabhisaṃskārajñānavajrasvabhāvātmakas+aham| -> anabhisaṃskārajñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'ham|

apraṇihitajñānavajrasvabhāvātmakas+aham| -> apraṇihitajñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'ham|

animittajñānavajrasvabhāvātmakas+aham| -> animittajñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'ham|

śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmakas+aham| -> śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'ham|

tatas+idam -> tata idam

tata idam+mantram -> tata idaṃ mantram

tata idaṃ mantram+uccārayet--- -> tata idaṃ mantram uccārayet---

sthāpayet+madhyabhūmau -> sthāpayen madhyabhūmau

sthāpayen madhyabhūmau+ālayavijñānam -> sthāpayen madhyabhūmāv ālayavijñānam

sthāpayen madhyabhūmāv ālayavijñānam+iti| -> sthāpayen madhyabhūmāv ālayavijñānam iti|

tamonte+ākāśadhātau -> tamonta ākāśadhātau

tatas+cittam -> tataś cittam

tataś cittam+vahnau -> tataś cittaṃ vahnau

vināśam+śīghram| -> vināśaṃ śīghram|

evam+dhātusamūhasya -> evaṃ dhātusamūhasya

nabhasi+antadhānam -> nabhasy antadhānam

nabhasy antadhānam+prayāti| -> nabhasy antadhānaṃ prayāti|

tatas+vāyus -> tato vāyus

tato vāyus+tat -> tato vāyus tat

tato vāyus tat+samastam -> tato vāyus tat samastam

tato vāyus tat samastam+toyam -> tato vāyus tat samastaṃ toyam

tato vāyus tat samastaṃ toyam+śoṣayitvā -> tato vāyus tat samastaṃ toyaṃ śoṣayitvā

toyam+bhavati -> toyaṃ bhavati

lavaṇavat+dravībhūtā -> lavaṇavad dravībhūtā

kaṭhinatām+tyaktvā -> kaṭhinatāṃ tyaktvā

paścāt+agnes -> paścād agnes

paścād agnes+abhāvāt -> paścād agner abhāvāt

paścād agner abhāvāt+dharitrī -> paścād agner abhāvād dharitrī

yatis+kārayet -> yatiḥ kārayet

yatiḥ kārayet+dehamadhye| -> yatiḥ kārayed dehamadhye|

toyena+agnes -> toyenāgnes

toyenāgnes+vināśam -> toyenāgner vināśam

toyenāgner vināśam+prathamam -> toyenāgner vināśaṃ prathamam

toyenāgner vināśaṃ prathamam+iha -> toyenāgner vināśaṃ prathamam iha

atas+tena -> atas tena

atas tena+eva -> atas tenaiva

toyena+agnes -> toyenāgnes

toyenāgnes+vināśas -> toyenāgner vināśas

toyenāgner vināśas+kriyate| -> toyenāgner vināśaḥ kriyate|

garbhajānām+maraṇakāle -> garbhajānāṃ maraṇakāle

toyena+ityādinā| -> toyenetyādinā|

sthāpayet+madhyabhūmau|| -> sthāpayen madhyabhūmau||

cittam+vahnau -> cittaṃ vahnau

tat+śoṣayitvā -> tac choṣayitvā

tac choṣayitvā+amburāśim -> tac choṣayitvāmburāśim

vāyus+vrajati -> vāyur vrajati

antardhānam+hi -> antardhānaṃ hi

lavaṇavat+toyamadhye -> lavaṇavat toyamadhye

paścāt+toyam -> paścāt toyam

paścāt toyam+dharitrī -> paścāt toyaṃ dharitrī

yatis+kārayet -> yatiḥ kārayet

yatiḥ kārayet+dehamadhye -> yatiḥ kārayed dehamadhye

toyena+agnes -> toyenāgnes

toyenāgnes+vināśam -> toyenāgner vināśam

toyenāgner vināśam+prathamam -> toyenāgner vināśaṃ prathamam

toyenāgner vināśaṃ prathamam+iha -> toyenāgner vināśaṃ prathamam iha

samādhis+ucyate--- -> samādhir ucyate---

idānīm+lokottaraskandhagrahaṇāya -> idānīṃ lokottaraskandhagrahaṇāya

bhagavatas+niyamas -> bhagavato niyamas

bhagavato niyamas+|| -> bhagavato niyamaḥ||

sarvasattvasaṃdarśanāya+iti -> sarvasattvasaṃdarśanāyeti

kāyavākcittavajram+dhyātavyam -> kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyam

kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyam+nāyakam -> kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyaṃ nāyakam

kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyaṃ nāyakam+laukikaphalasādhanāya -> kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyaṃ nāyakaṃ laukikaphalasādhanāya

maṇḍaleśam+iti| -> maṇḍaleśam iti|

kāyavākcittavajram+dhyātavyam -> kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyam

kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyam+bodhisattvais -> kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvais

kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvais+aparimitaguṇam -> kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvair aparimitaguṇam

kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvair aparimitaguṇam+maṇḍale -> kāyavākcittavajraṃ dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvair aparimitaguṇaṃ maṇḍale

tat+api -> tad api

samastam+buddhatvāya| -> samastaṃ buddhatvāya|

evam+jñātvā -> evaṃ jñātvā

buddhas+bhaveyam -> buddho bhaveyam

buddho bhaveyam+jagatas -> buddho bhaveyaṃ jagatas

buddho bhaveyaṃ jagatas+hitāya -> buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāya

buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāya+iti| -> buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāyeti|

ecam+ca -> ecaṃ ca

ecaṃ ca+animittapratijñā -> ecaṃ cānimittapratijñā

bodhis+parahitakaruṇā -> bodhiḥ parahitakaruṇā

buddhas+na -> buddho na

śūnyam+bhāvāt -> śūnyaṃ bhāvāt

śūnyaṃ bhāvāt+vihīnam -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnam

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnam+sakalajagat -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagat

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagat+idam -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idam

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idam+vasturūpasvabhāvam -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvam

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvam+yat -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvaṃ yat

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvaṃ yat+tasmāt -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvaṃ yat tasmāt

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvaṃ yat tasmāt+mahāśūnyāt -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvaṃ yat tasmān mahāśūnyāt

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvaṃ yat tasmān mahāśūnyāt+ca -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvaṃ yat tasmān mahāśūnyāc ca

śūnyam+ityādinā| -> śūnyam ityādinā|

dhyātavyam+bodhisattvais -> dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvais

dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvais+aparimitaguṇam -> dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvair aparimitaguṇam

dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvair aparimitaguṇam+maṇḍale -> dhyātavyaṃ bodhisattvair aparimitaguṇaṃ maṇḍale
