tasmāt+buddhas -> tasmād buddhas

tasmād buddhas+na -> tasmād buddho na

śūnyam+bhāvāt -> śūnyaṃ bhāvāt

śūnyaṃ bhāvāt+vihīnam -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnam

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnam+sakalajagat -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagat

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagat+idam -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idam

śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idam+vasturūpasvabhāvam -> śūnyaṃ bhāvād vihīnaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ vasturūpasvabhāvam

śūnyatālakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> śūnyatālakṣaṇam ucyate---

idānīm+punarbhavagrahaṇāya -> idānīṃ punarbhavagrahaṇāya

vaktavyas+|| -> vaktavyaḥ||

asya+arthas -> asyārthas

asyārthas+vakṣyamāṇe -> asyārtho vakṣyamāṇe

na+upalabhyate|| -> nopalabhyate||

bhāvas+syāt -> bhāvaḥ syāt

bhāvaḥ syāt+bhāvanā -> bhāvaḥ syād bhāvanā

bhāvas+na -> bhāvo na

na+eva -> naiva

bhāvanābhāvas+bhāvanā -> bhāvanābhāvo bhāvanā

traidhātukam+sacarācaram -> traidhātukaṃ sacarācaram

traidhātukaṃ sacarācaram+vicārayet -> traidhātukaṃ sacarācaraṃ vicārayet

traidhātukaṃ sacarācaraṃ vicārayet+anayā -> traidhātukaṃ sacarācaraṃ vicārayed anayā

tatas+caturvimokṣam -> tataś caturvimokṣam

tataś caturvimokṣam+vibhāvayet -> tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayet

tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayet+śūnyatām -> tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayec chūnyatām

tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayec chūnyatām+animittam -> tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayec chūnyatām animittam

tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayec chūnyatām animittam+apraṇihitam -> tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayec chūnyatām animittam apraṇihitam

tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayec chūnyatām animittam apraṇihitam+anabhisaṃskāram -> tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayec chūnyatām animittam apraṇihitam anabhisaṃskāram

tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayec chūnyatām animittam apraṇihitam anabhisaṃskāram+iti -> tataś caturvimokṣaṃ vibhāvayec chūnyatām animittam apraṇihitam anabhisaṃskāram iti

evam+kāmāśravam -> evaṃ kāmāśravam

evaṃ kāmāśravam+bhavāśravam -> evaṃ kāmāśravaṃ bhavāśravam

evaṃ kāmāśravaṃ bhavāśravam+avidyāśravam -> evaṃ kāmāśravaṃ bhavāśravam avidyāśravam

evaṃ kāmāśravaṃ bhavāśravam avidyāśravam+dṛṣṭyāśravam -> evaṃ kāmāśravaṃ bhavāśravam avidyāśravaṃ dṛṣṭyāśravam

evaṃ kāmāśravaṃ bhavāśravam avidyāśravaṃ dṛṣṭyāśravam+tyaktvā -> evaṃ kāmāśravaṃ bhavāśravam avidyāśravaṃ dṛṣṭyāśravaṃ tyaktvā

parityajet+evam -> parityajed evam

parityajed evam+rāgadveṣamohamānakleśān -> parityajed evaṃ rāgadveṣamohamānakleśān

parityajed evaṃ rāgadveṣamohamānakleśān+parityajati| -> parityajed evaṃ rāgadveṣamohamānakleśan parityajati|

evam+kaukṛtyastyānamiddhauddhatyavicikitsā -> evaṃ kaukṛtyastyānamiddhauddhatyavicikitsā

evaṃ kaukṛtyastyānamiddhauddhatyavicikitsā+iti -> evaṃ kaukṛtyastyānamiddhauddhatyavicikitseti

tatas+daśākuśalaparityāgam -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgam

tato daśākuśalaparityāgam+vibhāvayet -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet+prāṇātipātam -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam+adattādānam -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānam

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānam+kāmamithyācāram -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāram

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāram+mṛṣāvādam -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādam

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādam+pāruṣyam -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyam

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyam+paiśunyam -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyam

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyam+sambhinnapralāpam -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam+abhidhyām -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam abhidhyām

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam abhidhyām+vyāpādam -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādam

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādam+kudṛṣṭim -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādaṃ kudṛṣṭim

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādaṃ kudṛṣṭim+ca -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādaṃ kudṛṣṭiṃ ca

tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādaṃ kudṛṣṭiṃ ca+iti| -> tato daśākuśalaparityāgaṃ vibhāvayet prāṇātipātam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādaṃ kudṛṣṭiṃ ceti|

cintayet+dānam -> cintayed dānam

cintayed dānam+praiyavākyam -> cintayed dānaṃ praiyavākyam

cintayed dānaṃ praiyavākyam+arthacaryām -> cintayed dānaṃ praiyavākyam arthacaryām

cintayed dānaṃ praiyavākyam arthacaryām+samānārthatām -> cintayed dānaṃ praiyavākyam arthacaryāṃ samānārthatām

cintayed dānaṃ praiyavākyam arthacaryāṃ samānārthatām+iti| -> cintayed dānaṃ praiyavākyam arthacaryāṃ samānārthatām iti|

tatas+catvāri -> tataś catvāri

tatas+brahmavihārān -> tato brahmavihārān

tato brahmavihārān+smaret -> tato brahmavihāran smaret

tato brahmavihāran smaret+maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣām -> tato brahmavihāran smaren maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣām

tato brahmavihāran smaren maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣām+iti| -> tato brahmavihāran smaren maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣām iti|

evam+śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñopāyarpaṇidhibalajñānapāramitās -> evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñopāyarpaṇidhibalajñānapāramitās

evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñopāyarpaṇidhibalajñānapāramitās+vicintya -> evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñopāyarpaṇidhibalajñānapāramitā vicintya

puṇyajñānaśīlasambhārārtham+dānapāramitā| -> puṇyajñānaśīlasambhārārthaṃ dānapāramitā|

tatas+daśapāramitās -> tato daśapāramitās

tato daśapāramitās+cintayet| -> tato daśapāramitāś cintayet|

bodhicittotpādas+āśayaviśuddhis -> bodhicittotpāda āśayaviśuddhis

bodhicittotpāda āśayaviśuddhis+ahaṃkāramamakāraparityāgas -> bodhicittotpāda āśayaviśuddhir ahaṃkāramamakāraparityāgas

bodhicittotpāda āśayaviśuddhir ahaṃkāramamakāraparityāgas+kartavyas -> bodhicittotpāda āśayaviśuddhir ahaṃkāramamakāraparityāgaḥ kartavyas

bodhicittotpāda āśayaviśuddhir ahaṃkāramamakāraparityāgaḥ kartavyas+| -> bodhicittotpāda āśayaviśuddhir ahaṃkāramamakāraparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ|

evam+saptavidhām -> evaṃ saptavidhām

evaṃ saptavidhām+pūjām -> evaṃ saptavidhāṃ pūjām

evaṃ saptavidhāṃ pūjām+kṛtvā -> evaṃ saptavidhāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā

puṇyapariṇāmanā+iti| -> puṇyapariṇāmaneti|

tathāgatānām+adhyeṣaṇā -> tathāgatānām adhyeṣaṇā

evam+vandanā -> evaṃ vandanā

sattvārthahetos+iti| -> sattvārthahetor iti|

karomi+atra -> karomy atra

praṇidhim+iti -> praṇidhim iti

praṇidhānam+karoti---sambuddhas -> praṇidhānaṃ karoti---sambuddhas

praṇidhānaṃ karoti---sambuddhas+aham -> praṇidhānaṃ karoti---sambuddho 'ham

praṇidhānaṃ karoti---sambuddho 'ham+bhavāmi -> praṇidhānaṃ karoti---sambuddho 'haṃ bhavāmi

tatas+sattvārthāya -> tataḥ sattvārthāya

evam+triśaraṇam -> evaṃ triśaraṇam

evaṃ triśaraṇam+gatvā -> evaṃ triśaraṇaṃ gatvā

evaṃ triśaraṇaṃ gatvā+ātmaniryātanam -> evaṃ triśaraṇaṃ gatvātmaniryātanam

evaṃ triśaraṇaṃ gatvātmaniryātanam+kṛtvā -> evaṃ triśaraṇaṃ gatvātmaniryātanaṃ kṛtvā

saṃgham+bhavabhayaharaṇam -> saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇam

saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇam+bodhisīmnas -> saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ bodhisīmnas

saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ bodhisīmnas+prayāmi| -> saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ bodhisīmnaḥ prayāmi|

buddham+dharmam -> buddhaṃ dharmam

buddhaṃ dharmam+ca -> buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca

tatas+triśaraṇam -> tatas triśaraṇam

tatas triśaraṇam+gacchati| -> tatas triśaraṇaṃ gacchati|

tat+samastam -> tat samastam

tat samastam+vyapagatakaluṣas -> tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣas

tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣas+bodhicaryānurūḍhas -> tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣo bodhicaryānurūḍhas

tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣo bodhicaryānurūḍhas+mantrī| -> tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣo bodhicaryānurūḍho mantrī|

sambuddhais+bodhisattvais -> sambuddhair bodhisattvais

sambuddhair bodhisattvais+bahuvidhakuśalam -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalam

sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalam+yat -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat

sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat+kṛtam -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtam

sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtam+ca -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtaṃ ca

sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtaṃ ca+āryasaṃghais -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtaṃ cāryasaṃghais

sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtaṃ cāryasaṃghais+anumode -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtaṃ cāryasaṃghair anumode

sattvārthahetos+|| -> sattvārthahetoḥ||

karomi+atra -> karomy atra

praṇidhim+iti -> praṇidhim iti

sambuddhas+aham -> sambuddho 'ham

sambuddho 'ham+bhavāmi -> sambuddho 'haṃ bhavāmi

saṃgham+bhavabhayaharaṇam -> saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇam

saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇam+bodhisīmnas -> saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ bodhisīmnas

saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ bodhisīmnas+prayāmi -> saṃghaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ bodhisīmnaḥ prayāmi

buddham+dharmam -> buddhaṃ dharmam

buddhaṃ dharmam+ca -> buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca

tat+samastam -> tat samastam

tat samastam+vyapagatakaluṣas -> tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣas

tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣas+bodhicaryānurūḍhas -> tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣo bodhicaryānurūḍhas

tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣo bodhicaryānurūḍhas+| -> tat samastaṃ vyapagatakaluṣo bodhicaryānurūḍhaḥ|

sambuddhais+bodhisattvais -> sambuddhair bodhisattvais

sambuddhair bodhisattvais+bahuvidhakuśalam -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalam

sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalam+yat -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat

sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat+kṛtam -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtam

sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtam+ca -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtaṃ ca

sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtaṃ ca+āryasaṃghais -> sambuddhair bodhisattvair bahuvidhakuśalaṃ yat kṛtaṃ cāryasaṃghais

puṇyam+anumodayet--- -> puṇyam anumodayet---

idānīm+pāpadeśanāvasāne -> idānīṃ pāpadeśanāvasāne

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

triśaraṇagamanam+kāyavākcittaśuddhyā -> triśaraṇagamanaṃ kāyavākcittaśuddhyā

triśaraṇagamanaṃ kāyavākcittaśuddhyā+iti -> triśaraṇagamanaṃ kāyavākcittaśuddhyeti

tatas+kartavyam -> tataḥ kartavyam

tataḥ kartavyam+sādhakena -> tataḥ kartavyaṃ sādhakena

bahuvidhakaluṣam+saṃcitam -> bahuvidhakaluṣaṃ saṃcitam

bahuvidhakaluṣaṃ saṃcitam+deśayitvā -> bahuvidhakaluṣaṃ saṃcitaṃ deśayitvā

bahuvidhakaluṣaṃ saṃcitaṃ deśayitvā+ādau -> bahuvidhakaluṣaṃ saṃcitaṃ deśayitvādau

tatas+vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa -> tato vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa

ityādibhis+tathāgatānām -> ityādibhis tathāgatānām

ityādibhis tathāgatānām+pūjām -> ityādibhis tathāgatānāṃ pūjām

ityādibhis tathāgatānāṃ pūjām+kṛtvā -> ityādibhis tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā

ityādibhis tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā+abhiṣekapaṭaloktavidhinā -> ityādibhis tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvābhiṣekapaṭaloktavidhinā

iti+ebhis -> ity ebhis

ity ebhis+bījākṣarais -> ity ebhir bījākṣarais

ity ebhir bījākṣarais+niṣpannās -> ity ebhir bījākṣarair niṣpannās

ity ebhir bījākṣarair niṣpannās+yathāsaṃkhyam -> ity ebhir bījākṣarair niṣpannā yathāsaṃkhyam

ity ebhir bījākṣarair niṣpannā yathāsaṃkhyam+nṛtyā -> ity ebhir bījākṣarair niṣpannā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ nṛtyā

dvādaśapūjādevīnām+bījākṣarāṇi -> dvādaśapūjādevīnāṃ bījākṣarāṇi

tatas+candramaṇḍale -> tataś candramaṇḍale

candravajrapraviṣṭān+vibhāvya -> candravajrapraviṣṭān vibhāvya

teṣām+sphāritānām -> teṣāṃ sphāritānām

teṣāṃ sphāritānām+jinānām -> teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānām

teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānām+pūjārtham -> teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānāṃ pūjārtham

teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānāṃ pūjārtham+tān -> teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānāṃ pūjārthaṃ tān

teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānāṃ pūjārthaṃ tān+raśmīn -> teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānāṃ pūjārthaṃ tān raśmīn

teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānāṃ pūjārthaṃ tān raśmīn+punar -> teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānāṃ pūjārthaṃ tān raśmin punar

teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānāṃ pūjārthaṃ tān raśmin punar+ākṛṣya -> teṣāṃ sphāritānāṃ jinānāṃ pūjārthaṃ tān raśmin punar ākṛṣya

tathāgatān+pratibodhya -> tathāgatan pratibodhya

vajraraśmibhis+gaganatale -> vajraraśmibhir gaganatale

vaktrādiśuddhim+tatas -> vaktrādiśuddhiṃ tatas

vaktrādiśuddhiṃ tatas+candramaṇḍale -> vaktrādiśuddhiṃ tataś candramaṇḍale

evam+kṛtvā -> evaṃ kṛtvā

evam+kāyaśuddhis -> evaṃ kāyaśuddhis

evaṃ kāyaśuddhis+| -> evaṃ kāyaśuddhiḥ|

yāvat+pādāntam -> yāvat pādāntam

yāvat pādāntam+tāvat -> yāvat pādāntaṃ tāvat

yāvat pādāntaṃ tāvat+ātmānam -> yāvat pādāntaṃ tāvad ātmānam

yāvat pādāntaṃ tāvad ātmānam+saṃsparśayet| -> yāvat pādāntaṃ tāvad ātmānaṃ saṃsparśayet|

śirasā+ārabhya -> śirasārabhya

vaktraśuddhis+bhavati| -> vaktraśuddhir bhavati|

vaktrādiśuddhim+pañcāmṛtagulikayā -> vaktrādiśuddhiṃ pañcāmṛtagulikayā

pūrvam+kṛtvā -> pūrvaṃ kṛtvā

raśmīn+vividhān -> raśmīn vividhān

raśmīn vividhān+pañcavarṇān -> raśmīn vividhan pañcavarṇān

raśmīn vividhan pañcavarṇān+bhāvayet -> raśmīn vividhan pañcavarṇān bhāvayet

raśmīn vividhan pañcavarṇān bhāvayet+yogī| -> raśmīn vividhan pañcavarṇān bhāvayed yogī|

hūṃkārajam+vajram -> hūṃkārajaṃ vajram

hūṃkārajaṃ vajram+pañcaśūkam -> hūṃkārajaṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkam

hūṃkārajaṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkam+tasya -> hūṃkārajaṃ vajraṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tasya

tattvam+iti -> tattvam iti

karṇikāyām+aṃkārapariṇatam -> karṇikāyām aṃkārapariṇatam

karṇikāyām aṃkārapariṇatam+candramaṇḍalam -> karṇikāyām aṃkārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalam

karṇikāyām aṃkārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalam+tasya -> karṇikāyām aṃkārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalaṃ tasya

paṃkārapariṇatam+aṣṭadalaraktapadmam -> paṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭadalaraktapadmam

paṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭadalaraktapadmam+tadupari -> paṃkārapariṇatam aṣṭadalaraktapadmaṃ tadupari

devatārūpam+ātmānam -> devatārūpam ātmānam

devatārūpam ātmānam+jhaṭityākāreṇa -> devatārūpam ātmānaṃ jhaṭityākāreṇa

tatas+sādhanāpaṭaloktavidhinā -> tataḥ sādhanāpaṭaloktavidhinā

māranirghāṭanam+ca| -> māranirghāṭanaṃ ca|

ādau+ityādinā| -> ādāv ityādinā|

triśaraṇagamanam+kāyavākcittaśuddhyā|| -> triśaraṇagamanaṃ kāyavākcittaśuddhyā||

kartavyam+sādhakena -> kartavyaṃ sādhakena

pūjām+vicitrām -> pūjāṃ vicitrām

pūjāṃ vicitrām+bahuvidhakaluṣam -> pūjāṃ vicitrāṃ bahuvidhakaluṣam

pūjāṃ vicitrāṃ bahuvidhakaluṣam+saṃcitam -> pūjāṃ vicitrāṃ bahuvidhakaluṣaṃ saṃcitam

pūjāṃ vicitrāṃ bahuvidhakaluṣaṃ saṃcitam+deśayitvā -> pūjāṃ vicitrāṃ bahuvidhakaluṣaṃ saṃcitaṃ deśayitvā

sphāritānām+jinānām| -> sphāritānāṃ jinānām|

vāktrādiśuddhim+punar -> vāktrādiśuddhiṃ punar

vāktrādiśuddhiṃ punar+api -> vāktrādiśuddhiṃ punar api

vividhān+bhāvayet -> vividhān bhāvayet

vividhān bhāvayet+tattvaraśmīn -> vividhān bhāvayet tattvaraśmīn

idānīm+vaktraśuddhyādis -> idānīṃ vaktraśuddhyādis

idānīṃ vaktraśuddhyādis+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ vaktraśuddhyādir ucyate---

sthānaniyamas+|| -> sthānaniyamaḥ||

ca+upaviśya -> copaviśya

copaviśya+iti -> copaviśyeti

ca+āsane -> cāsane

pūrvoktarakṣām+iti -> pūrvoktarakṣām iti

pūrvoktarakṣām iti+abhiṣekapaṭaloktarakṣām -> pūrvoktarakṣām ity abhiṣekapaṭaloktarakṣām

pūrvoktarakṣām ity abhiṣekapaṭaloktarakṣām+kṛtvā| -> pūrvoktarakṣām ity abhiṣekapaṭaloktarakṣāṃ kṛtvā|

yogam+samārabhet|| -> yogaṃ samārabhet||

bhūbhṛtos+vigrahas -> bhūbhṛtor vigrahas

bhūbhṛtor vigrahas+na -> bhūbhṛtor vigraho na

bhūbhṛtor vigraho na+asti -> bhūbhṛtor vigraho nāsti

tatra+eva -> tatraiva

bhūpālas+prajā -> bhūpālaḥ prajā

dhārmikas+yatra -> dhārmiko yatra

ca+āha--- -> cāha---

sādhanam+tatra -> sādhanaṃ tatra

cittapratoṣas+bhavati -> cittapratoṣo bhavati

yasmin+deśe -> yasmin deśe

evam+karmānurūpeṇa -> evaṃ karmānurūpeṇa

guptabhūmyām+iti -> guptabhūmyām iti

cakārāt+mahodadhitaṭe -> cakārān mahodadhitaṭe

ca+uccāṭanavidveṣaṇārtham| -> coccāṭanavidveṣaṇārtham|

mahācaitye+aṣṭamahāsiddhyartham| -> mahācaitye 'ṣṭamahāsiddhyartham|

vaśyākṛṣṭyartham+sādhanam -> vaśyākṛṣṭyarthaṃ sādhanam

vaśyākṛṣṭyarthaṃ sādhanam+kuryāt -> vaśyākṛṣṭyarthaṃ sādhanaṃ kuryāt

vaśyākṛṣṭyarthaṃ sādhanaṃ kuryāt+mantrī| -> vaśyākṛṣṭyarthaṃ sādhanaṃ kuryān mantrī|

sthānam+bhavati| -> sthānaṃ bhavati|

udyāne+ityādinā| -> udyāna ityādinā|

ca+upaviśya|| -> copaviśya||

ca+āsane -> cāsane

pūrvoktarakṣām+khalu -> pūrvoktarakṣāṃ khalu

sādhanam+tatra -> sādhanaṃ tatra

yasmin+cittapratoṣas -> yasmiṃś cittapratoṣas

yasmiṃś cittapratoṣas+bhavati -> yasmiṃś cittapratoṣo bhavati

guptabhūmyām+tathā -> guptabhūmyāṃ tathā

guptabhūmyāṃ tathā+eva| -> guptabhūmyāṃ tathaiva|

sthānāni+ucyante--- -> sthānāny ucyante---

idānīm+asya -> idānīm asya

bhagavatas+niyamas -> bhagavato niyamas

bhagavato niyamas+|| -> bhagavato niyamaḥ||

evam+sādhayet -> evaṃ sādhayet

evaṃ sādhayet+kālacakram -> evaṃ sādhayet kālacakram

evaṃ sādhayet kālacakram+iti -> evaṃ sādhayet kālacakram iti

tam+ekam -> tam ekam

tam ekam+abhavabhavasamam -> tam ekam abhavabhavasamam

tam ekam abhavabhavasamam+nirvāṇabhavaikalolībhūtam -> tam ekam abhavabhavasamaṃ nirvāṇabhavaikalolībhūtam

tam ekam abhavabhavasamaṃ nirvāṇabhavaikalolībhūtam+nirāvaraṇatas -> tam ekam abhavabhavasamaṃ nirvāṇabhavaikalolībhūtaṃ nirāvaraṇatas

tam ekam abhavabhavasamaṃ nirvāṇabhavaikalolībhūtaṃ nirāvaraṇatas+| -> tam ekam abhavabhavasamaṃ nirvāṇabhavaikalolībhūtaṃ nirāvaraṇataḥ|

trāsyamānam+līlayā -> trāsyamānaṃ līlayā

trāsyamānaṃ līlayā+ākrāntam -> trāsyamānaṃ līlayākrāntam

trāsyamānaṃ līlayākrāntam+yena -> trāsyamānaṃ līlayākrāntaṃ yena

skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramāram+rāgadveṣamohamānātmakam -> skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramāraṃ rāgadveṣamohamānātmakam

skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramāraṃ rāgadveṣamohamānātmakam+rudram -> skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramāraṃ rāgadveṣamohamānātmakaṃ rudram

skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramāraṃ rāgadveṣamohamānātmakaṃ rudram+śaśiravihutabhuṅmaṇḍale -> skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramāraṃ rāgadveṣamohamānātmakaṃ rudraṃ śaśiravihutabhuṅmaṇḍale

pādābhyām+mārarudram -> pādābhyāṃ mārarudram

pādābhyāṃ mārarudram+iti| -> pādābhyāṃ mārarudram iti|

evam+śūnyaṣaḍvahniparvam| -> evaṃ śūnyaṣaḍvahniparvam|

ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatrayam+bhavati| -> ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatrayaṃ bhavati|

ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatāṅgulīparvam+pratyekakare -> ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatāṅgulīparvaṃ pratyekakare

evam+ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭipratyekaśvāsātmakena -> evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭipratyekaśvāsātmakena

caturviṃśatikaram+jinakarakamalam -> caturviṃśatikaraṃ jinakarakamalam

caturviṃśatikaraṃ jinakarakamalam+iti| -> caturviṃśatikaraṃ jinakarakamalam iti|

evam+pratyekārdhalagnam -> evaṃ pratyekārdhalagnam

evaṃ pratyekārdhalagnam+pakṣabhedena -> evaṃ pratyekārdhalagnaṃ pakṣabhedena

pratyekamāsātmakās+dvādaśabhujās -> pratyekamāsātmakā dvādaśabhujās

pratyekamāsātmakā dvādaśabhujās+tais -> pratyekamāsātmakā dvādaśabhujās tais

pratyekamāsātmakā dvādaśabhujās tais+bhujais -> pratyekamāsātmakā dvādaśabhujās tair bhujais

pratyekamāsātmakā dvādaśabhujās tair bhujais+sūryabāhum -> pratyekamāsātmakā dvādaśabhujās tair bhujaiḥ sūryabāhum

pratyekamāsātmakā dvādaśabhujās tair bhujaiḥ sūryabāhum+iti| -> pratyekamāsātmakā dvādaśabhujās tair bhujaiḥ sūryabāhum iti|

pūrvāparam+madhyaskandhaṣaṭskandham -> pūrvāparaṃ madhyaskandhaṣaṭskandham

pūrvāparaṃ madhyaskandhaṣaṭskandham+iti| -> pūrvāparaṃ madhyaskandhaṣaṭskandham iti|

evam+dvidvilagnātmakam -> evaṃ dvidvilagnātmakam

evaṃ dvidvilagnātmakam+vāme -> evaṃ dvidvilagnātmakaṃ vāme

caturmukham+viśvavarṇam -> caturmukhaṃ viśvavarṇam

caturmukhaṃ viśvavarṇam+vakṣyamāṇam -> caturmukhaṃ viśvavarṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇam

caturmukhaṃ viśvavarṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇam+iti| -> caturmukhaṃ viśvavarṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇam iti|

evam+tritrilagnātmakam -> evaṃ tritrilagnātmakam

evaṃ tritrilagnātmakam+pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottaravaktracatuṣkam -> evaṃ tritrilagnātmakaṃ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottaravaktracatuṣkam

evaṃ tritrilagnātmakaṃ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottaravaktracatuṣkam+udadhis -> evaṃ tritrilagnātmakaṃ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottaravaktracatuṣkam udadhis

evaṃ tritrilagnātmakaṃ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottaravaktracatuṣkam udadhis+iti -> evaṃ tritrilagnātmakaṃ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottaravaktracatuṣkam udadhir iti

tatas+caturlagnātmakam -> tataś caturlagnātmakam

tataś caturlagnātmakam+vāmadakṣiṇamadhyakaṇṭham -> tataś caturlagnātmakaṃ vāmadakṣiṇamadhyakaṇṭham

tataś caturlagnātmakaṃ vāmadakṣiṇamadhyakaṇṭham+śikhigalam -> tataś caturlagnātmakaṃ vāmadakṣiṇamadhyakaṇṭhaṃ śikhigalam

tataś caturlagnātmakaṃ vāmadakṣiṇamadhyakaṇṭhaṃ śikhigalam+iti -> tataś caturlagnātmakaṃ vāmadakṣiṇamadhyakaṇṭhaṃ śikhigalam iti

yugmapādam+iti| -> yugmapādam iti|

ṣaṭṣaṭlagnātmakam+vāmadakṣiṇacaraṇam| -> ṣaṭṣaṭlagnātmakaṃ vāmadakṣiṇacaraṇam|

dvādaśalagnātmakam+ahorātram -> dvādaśalagnātmakam ahorātram

dvādaśalagnātmakam ahorātram+ekāṅgam| -> dvādaśalagnātmakam ahorātram ekāṅgam|

candrāṅgam+ityādi| -> candrāṅgam ityādi|

rūpakalpanāniyamas+| -> rūpakalpanāniyamaḥ|

sādhanam+utpādakṣayavināśārtham -> sādhanam utpādakṣayavināśārtham

sādhanam utpādakṣayavināśārtham+yogibhis -> sādhanam utpādakṣayavināśārthaṃ yogibhis

sādhanam utpādakṣayavināśārthaṃ yogibhis+kartavyam -> sādhanam utpādakṣayavināśārthaṃ yogibhiḥ kartavyam

sādhanam utpādakṣayavināśārthaṃ yogibhiḥ kartavyam+vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa -> sādhanam utpādakṣayavināśārthaṃ yogibhiḥ kartavyaṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa

sādhanam utpādakṣayavināśārthaṃ yogibhiḥ kartavyaṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa+iti -> sādhanam utpādakṣayavināśārthaṃ yogibhiḥ kartavyaṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇeti

kālas+hi -> kālo hi

kālas+saṃharate -> kālaḥ saṃharate

ca+āha--- -> cāha---

cakram+ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakam -> cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakam

cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakam+dvādaśāṅgam -> cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgam

cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgam+pratītyalakṣaṇam -> cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyalakṣaṇam

cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyalakṣaṇam+rāśicakram -> cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyalakṣaṇaṃ rāśicakram

cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyalakṣaṇaṃ rāśicakram+laukikasaṃvṛtyā -> cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyalakṣaṇaṃ rāśicakraṃ laukikasaṃvṛtyā

cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyalakṣaṇaṃ rāśicakraṃ laukikasaṃvṛtyā+utpādakṣayahetubhūtam -> cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyalakṣaṇaṃ rāśicakraṃ laukikasaṃvṛtyotpādakṣayahetubhūtam

cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyalakṣaṇaṃ rāśicakraṃ laukikasaṃvṛtyotpādakṣayahetubhūtam+sarvasattvānām| -> cakraṃ ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsātmakaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyalakṣaṇaṃ rāśicakraṃ laukikasaṃvṛtyotpādakṣayahetubhūtaṃ sarvasattvānām|

evam+sūryacandradivāniśābhedena -> evaṃ sūryacandradivāniśābhedena

evaṃ sūryacandradivāniśābhedena+ahorātram -> evaṃ sūryacandradivāniśābhedenāhorātram

evaṃ sūryacandradivāniśābhedenāhorātram+kālas -> evaṃ sūryacandradivāniśābhedenāhorātraṃ kālas

evaṃ sūryacandradivāniśābhedenāhorātraṃ kālas+ucyate| -> evaṃ sūryacandradivāniśābhedenāhorātraṃ kāla ucyate|

candras+umā -> candra umā

rudras+tathā -> rudras tathā

ādityas+hi -> ādityo hi

naktam+prajñā -> naktaṃ prajñā

bhagavān+vajrī -> bhagavān vajrī

dinas+tu -> dinas tu

sāmānyena+uktam--- -> sāmānyenoktam---

tathā+aparatantrāntare -> tathāparatantrāntare

tathāparatantrāntare+api -> tathāparatantrāntare 'pi

śukram+padmam -> śukraṃ padmam

śukraṃ padmam+tayos -> śukraṃ padmaṃ tayos

śukraṃ padmaṃ tayos+aikyam -> śukraṃ padmaṃ tayor aikyam

śukraṃ padmaṃ tayor aikyam+kālacakram -> śukraṃ padmaṃ tayor aikyaṃ kālacakram

śukraṃ padmaṃ tayor aikyaṃ kālacakram+mahāsukham|| -> śukraṃ padmaṃ tayor aikyaṃ kālacakraṃ mahāsukham||

dinam+sūryas -> dinaṃ sūryas

dinaṃ sūryas+rajas -> dinaṃ sūryo rajas

dinaṃ sūryo rajas+vajram -> dinaṃ sūryo rajo vajram

dinaṃ sūryo rajo vajram+bhāvabhedais -> dinaṃ sūryo rajo vajraṃ bhāvabhedais

dinaṃ sūryo rajo vajraṃ bhāvabhedais+niśā -> dinaṃ sūryo rajo vajraṃ bhāvabhedair niśā

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

iha+ādibuddhe -> ihādibuddhe

candrāṅgam+ityādinā| -> candrāṅgam ityādinā|

līlākrāntam+tam -> līlākrāntaṃ tam

līlākrāntaṃ tam+ekam -> līlākrāntaṃ tam ekam

līlākrāntaṃ tam ekam+tu -> līlākrāntaṃ tam ekaṃ tu

līlākrāntaṃ tam ekaṃ tu+abhavabhavasamam -> līlākrāntaṃ tam ekaṃ tv abhavabhavasamam

līlākrāntaṃ tam ekaṃ tv abhavabhavasamam+sādhayet -> līlākrāntaṃ tam ekaṃ tv abhavabhavasamaṃ sādhayet

līlākrāntaṃ tam ekaṃ tv abhavabhavasamaṃ sādhayet+kālacakram|| -> līlākrāntaṃ tam ekaṃ tv abhavabhavasamaṃ sādhayet kālacakram||

pādābhyām+mārarudram -> pādābhyāṃ mārarudram

pādābhyāṃ mārarudram+śaśiravihutabhuṅmaṇḍale -> pādābhyāṃ mārarudraṃ śaśiravihutabhuṅmaṇḍale

ṣaṭskandham+sūryabāhum -> ṣaṭskandhaṃ sūryabāhum

ṣaṭskandhaṃ sūryabāhum+jinakarakamalam -> ṣaṭskandhaṃ sūryabāhuṃ jinakarakamalam

ṣaṭskandhaṃ sūryabāhuṃ jinakarakamalam+śūnyaṣaḍvahniparvam| -> ṣaṭskandhaṃ sūryabāhuṃ jinakarakamalaṃ śūnyaṣaḍvahniparvam|

candrāṅgam+yugmapādam -> candrāṅgaṃ yugmapādam

candrāṅgaṃ yugmapādam+śikhigalam -> candrāṅgaṃ yugmapādaṃ śikhigalam

candrāṅgaṃ yugmapādaṃ śikhigalam+udadhim -> candrāṅgaṃ yugmapādaṃ śikhigalam udadhim

candrāṅgaṃ yugmapādaṃ śikhigalam udadhim+śrīmukham -> candrāṅgaṃ yugmapādaṃ śikhigalam udadhiṃ śrīmukham

candrāṅgaṃ yugmapādaṃ śikhigalam udadhiṃ śrīmukham+viśvavarṇam| -> candrāṅgaṃ yugmapādaṃ śikhigalam udadhiṃ śrīmukhaṃ viśvavarṇam|

bhagavatas+rūpakalpanoddeśas -> bhagavato rūpakalpanoddeśas

bhagavato rūpakalpanoddeśas+ucyate--- -> bhagavato rūpakalpanoddeśa ucyate---

idānīm+kālaviśuddhyā -> idānīṃ kālaviśuddhyā

bhagavatas+niyamas -> bhagavato niyamas

bhagavato niyamas+|| -> bhagavato niyamaḥ||

jinapatis+laukikasiddhisādhanāya -> jinapatir laukikasiddhisādhanāya

jinapatir laukikasiddhisādhanāya+akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam -> jinapatir laukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam

jinapatir laukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam+rūpabhāvanayā -> jinapatir laukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ rūpabhāvanayā

jinapatir laukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ rūpabhāvanayā+iti -> jinapatir laukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ rūpabhāvanayeti

cakārāt+ca -> cakārāc ca

cakārāc ca+akṣobhyāditathāgatānām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānām+vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnām+vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānām+śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām+uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām+atinīlādikrodhadevīnām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnām+carcikādimātṛṇām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇām+viṣṇvādidevānām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānām+jayādināgarājānām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānām+śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānāṃ śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānāṃ śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānām+pratyekam -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānāṃ śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānāṃ pratyekam

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānāṃ śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānāṃ pratyekam+sādhanam -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānāṃ śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānāṃ pratyekaṃ sādhanam

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānāṃ śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānāṃ pratyekaṃ sādhanam+anyeṣām -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānāṃ śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānāṃ pratyekaṃ sādhanam anyeṣām

cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānāṃ śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānāṃ pratyekaṃ sādhanam anyeṣām+api -> cakārāc cākṣobhyāditathāgatānāṃ vajradhātvīśvaryādidevīnāṃ vajrapāṇyādibodhisattvānāṃ śabdavajrādiviṣayadevīnām uṣṇīṣādimahākrodharājānām atinīlādikrodhadevīnāṃ carcikādimātṛṇāṃ viṣṇvādidevānāṃ jayādināgarājānāṃ śvānāsyādipracaṇḍānāṃ pratyekaṃ sādhanam anyeṣām api

jinapatis+śākyamunis -> jinapatiḥ śākyamunis

jinapatiḥ śākyamunis+bhagavān -> jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavān

jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavān+kālacakrasamādhisamāpannas -> jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavan kālacakrasamādhisamāpannas

jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavan kālacakrasamādhisamāpannas+sādhanam -> jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavan kālacakrasamādhisamāpannaḥ sādhanam

jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavan kālacakrasamādhisamāpannaḥ sādhanam+vajriṇas -> jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavan kālacakrasamādhisamāpannaḥ sādhanaṃ vajriṇas

jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavan kālacakrasamādhisamāpannaḥ sādhanaṃ vajriṇas+śrīkālacakrabhagavatas -> jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavan kālacakrasamādhisamāpannaḥ sādhanaṃ vajriṇaḥ śrīkālacakrabhagavatas

jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavan kālacakrasamādhisamāpannaḥ sādhanaṃ vajriṇaḥ śrīkālacakrabhagavatas+| -> jinapatiḥ śākyamunir bhagavan kālacakrasamādhisamāpannaḥ sādhanaṃ vajriṇaḥ śrīkālacakrabhagavataḥ|

saucandravākyam+gadati -> saucandravākyaṃ gadati

idānīm+śrutvā -> idānīṃ śrutvā

yāvat+paṭalaparisamāptis -> yāvat paṭalaparisamāptis

yāvat paṭalaparisamāptis+tāvat -> yāvat paṭalaparisamāptis tāvat

yāvat paṭalaparisamāptis tāvat+bhagavatas -> yāvat paṭalaparisamāptis tāvad bhagavatas

yāvat paṭalaparisamāptis tāvad bhagavatas+prativacanam -> yāvat paṭalaparisamāptis tāvad bhagavataḥ prativacanam

yāvat paṭalaparisamāptis tāvad bhagavataḥ prativacanam+iti| -> yāvat paṭalaparisamāptis tāvad bhagavataḥ prativacanam iti|

tatas+caturthapādam -> tataś caturthapādam

tataś caturthapādam+ārabhya -> tataś caturthapādam ārabhya

sucandrādhyeṣaṇam+sādhanapaṭaladeśanāya| -> sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ sādhanapaṭaladeśanāya|

jinapatis+sādhanam -> jinapatiḥ sādhanam

jinapatiḥ sādhanam+vajriṇas -> jinapatiḥ sādhanaṃ vajriṇas

jinapatiḥ sādhanaṃ vajriṇas+ca|| -> jinapatiḥ sādhanaṃ vajriṇaś ca||

saucandravākyam+gadati -> saucandravākyaṃ gadati

samyak+jinavarasahitam -> samyag jinavarasahitam

samyag jinavarasahitam+sādhanam -> samyag jinavarasahitaṃ sādhanam

samyag jinavarasahitaṃ sādhanam+viśvabhartus -> samyag jinavarasahitaṃ sādhanaṃ viśvabhartus

bhūyas+pṛcchāmi -> bhūyaḥ pṛcchāmi

prajñājñānābhiṣekas+bhavabhayamathanas -> prajñājñānābhiṣeko bhavabhayamathanas

prajñājñānābhiṣeko bhavabhayamathanas+yogagamyas -> prajñājñānābhiṣeko bhavabhayamathano yogagamyas

prajñājñānābhiṣeko bhavabhayamathano yogagamyas+caturthas -> prajñājñānābhiṣeko bhavabhayamathano yogagamyaś caturthas

prajñājñānābhiṣeko bhavabhayamathano yogagamyaś caturthas+| -> prajñājñānābhiṣeko bhavabhayamathano yogagamyaś caturthaḥ|

labdhas+saptābhiṣekas -> labdhaḥ saptābhiṣekas

labdhaḥ saptābhiṣekas+jinajanaka -> labdhaḥ saptābhiṣeko jinajanaka

mahāparṣadas+prakāśayati -> mahāparṣadaḥ prakāśayati

sucandrādhyeṣaṇam+buddhabhagavatas -> sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ buddhabhagavatas

sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ buddhabhagavatas+prativacanam -> sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ buddhabhagavataḥ prativacanam

sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ buddhabhagavataḥ prativacanam+prathamavṛttena -> sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ buddhabhagavataḥ prativacanaṃ prathamavṛttena

ratnasiṃhāsanasthas+mañjuśrīs -> ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīs

ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīs+bhagavān -> ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān

ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān+nirmitakāyas -> ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyas

ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyas+yaśonarendras -> ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendras

ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendras+sūryarathādhyeṣitas -> ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ sūryarathādhyeṣitas

ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ sūryarathādhyeṣitas+san -> ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san

ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san+paramādibuddhāt -> ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san paramādibuddhāt

ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san paramādibuddhāt+sādhanāpaṭale -> ratnasiṃhāsanastho mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san paramādibuddhāt sādhanāpaṭale

kālacakram+iti -> kālacakram iti

kāyaḥ svābhāvikas+aparas -> kāyaḥ svābhāviko 'paras

kāyaḥ svābhāviko 'paras+|| -> kāyaḥ svābhāviko 'paraḥ||

na+api -> nāpi

nāpi+upāyas -> nāpy upāyas

nāpy upāyas+asau -> nāpy upāyo 'sau

śūnyatākaruṇābhinnas+rāgārāgavivarjitas -> śūnyatākaruṇābhinno rāgārāgavivarjitas

śūnyatākaruṇābhinno rāgārāgavivarjitas+| -> śūnyatākaruṇābhinno rāgārāgavivarjitaḥ|

dharmakāyas+nirāśrayas -> dharmakāyo nirāśrayas

dharmakāyo nirāśrayas+|| -> dharmakāyo nirāśrayaḥ||

bhāvas+na -> bhāvo na

bhāvo na+api -> bhāvo nāpi

bhāvo nāpi+abhāvas -> bhāvo nāpy abhāvas

bhāvo nāpy abhāvas+asau -> bhāvo nāpy abhāvo 'sau

nityas+yas -> nityo yas

nityo yas+na -> nityo yo na

nityo yo na+ekas -> nityo yo naikas

nityo yo naikas+na -> nityo yo naiko na

nityo yo naiko na+anekalakṣaṇas -> nityo yo naiko nānekalakṣaṇas

nityo yo naiko nānekalakṣaṇas+| -> nityo yo naiko nānekalakṣaṇaḥ|

na+anityas -> nānityas

nānityas+na -> nānityo na

nānityo na+api -> nānityo nāpi

kāyas+sambhogalakṣaṇas -> kāyaḥ sambhogalakṣaṇas

kāyaḥ sambhogalakṣaṇas+|| -> kāyaḥ sambhogalakṣaṇaḥ||

sattvāśayavaśena+eṣa -> sattvāśayavaśenaiṣa

sarvasattvarutais+ṛddhim -> sarvasattvarutair ṛddhim

sarvasattvarutair ṛddhim+ātmanas -> sarvasattvarutair ṛddhim ātmanas

sarvasattvarutair ṛddhim ātmanas+yas -> sarvasattvarutair ṛddhim ātmano yas

sarvasattvarutair ṛddhim ātmano yas+prakāśate| -> sarvasattvarutair ṛddhim ātmano yaḥ prakāśate|

sarvākāravaropetaḥ kāyas+nānādhimuktitas -> sarvākāravaropetaḥ kāyo nānādhimuktitas

sarvākāravaropetaḥ kāyo nānādhimuktitas+| -> sarvākāravaropetaḥ kāyo nānādhimuktitaḥ|

namas+|| -> namaḥ||

sattvānām+adhimukticittavaśatas -> sattvānām adhimukticittavaśatas

sattvānām adhimukticittavaśatas+yasya -> sattvānām adhimukticittavaśato yasya

sattvānām adhimukticittavaśato yasya+eva -> sattvānām adhimukticittavaśato yasyaiva

santo janās+| -> santo janāḥ|

rūpaṃ bhairavabhīṣaṇam+gatamadam -> rūpaṃ bhairavabhīṣaṇaṃ gatamadam

rūpaṃ bhairavabhīṣaṇaṃ gatamadam+paśyanti -> rūpaṃ bhairavabhīṣaṇaṃ gatamadaṃ paśyanti

puṇyajñānavinirmitaṃ bhagavatas+durdāntasattvās -> puṇyajñānavinirmitaṃ bhagavato durdāntasattvās

puṇyajñānavinirmitaṃ bhagavato durdāntasattvās+sadā -> puṇyajñānavinirmitaṃ bhagavato durdāntasattvāḥ sadā

dattena+ayam -> dattenāyam

dattenāyam+yat -> dattenāyaṃ yat

dattenāyaṃ yat+iha -> dattenāyaṃ yad iha

lokādhyātmaprathamanikhanakrāntapṛṣṭhābhiṣekaprāptam+puṇyam -> lokādhyātmaprathamanikhanakrāntapṛṣṭhābhiṣekaprāptaṃ puṇyam

lokādhyātmaprathamanikhanakrāntapṛṣṭhābhiṣekaprāptaṃ puṇyam+bhavabhayaharam -> lokādhyātmaprathamanikhanakrāntapṛṣṭhābhiṣekaprāptaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavabhayaharam

lokādhyātmaprathamanikhanakrāntapṛṣṭhābhiṣekaprāptaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavabhayaharam+lekhayitvā -> lokādhyātmaprathamanikhanakrāntapṛṣṭhābhiṣekaprāptaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavabhayaharaṃ lekhayitvā

lokādhyātmaprathamanikhanakrāntapṛṣṭhābhiṣekaprāptaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavabhayaharaṃ lekhayitvā+avukena(?)| -> lokādhyātmaprathamanikhanakrāntapṛṣṭhābhiṣekaprāptaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavabhayaharaṃ lekhayitvāvukena(?)|

vaḍavānalavat+samudrasekam -> vaḍavānalavat samudrasekam

vaḍavānalavat samudrasekam+maharatasukhajvalanais -> vaḍavānalavat samudrasekaṃ maharatasukhajvalanais

vaḍavānalavat samudrasekaṃ maharatasukhajvalanais+atṛptas -> vaḍavānalavat samudrasekaṃ maharatasukhajvalanair atṛptas

vaḍavānalavat samudrasekaṃ maharatasukhajvalanair atṛptas+|| -> vaḍavānalavat samudrasekaṃ maharatasukhajvalanair atṛptaḥ||

kuto 'vakāśas+| -> kuto 'vakāśaḥ|

asti+atra -> asty atra

svayam+kalpātītas -> svayaṃ kalpātītas

svayaṃ kalpātītas+gurucaraṇarāgāṅkitadhiyām|| -> svayaṃ kalpātīto gurucaraṇarāgāṅkitadhiyām||

phalaṃ saukhyam+bhūyas -> phalaṃ saukhyaṃ bhūyas

tatas+| -> tataḥ|

mahārāgāsekāt+tribhuvanabhuvas -> mahārāgāsekāt tribhuvanabhuvas

mahārāgāsekāt tribhuvanabhuvas+sarpati -> mahārāgāsekāt tribhuvanabhuvaḥ sarpati

sukhād bījāt+asmāt -> sukhād bījād asmāt

sukhād bījād asmāt+prabhavati -> sukhād bījād asmāt prabhavati

tāthāgatābhyāgataśreyaḥśrībhis+alaṃkṛtam -> tāthāgatābhyāgataśreyaḥśrībhir alaṃkṛtam

tāthāgatābhyāgataśreyaḥśrībhir alaṃkṛtam+ratiphalam -> tāthāgatābhyāgataśreyaḥśrībhir alaṃkṛtaṃ ratiphalam

tāthāgatābhyāgataśreyaḥśrībhir alaṃkṛtaṃ ratiphalam+mokṣasya -> tāthāgatābhyāgataśreyaḥśrībhir alaṃkṛtaṃ ratiphalaṃ mokṣasya

yat+satyam -> yat satyam

yat satyam+tat -> yat satyaṃ tat

yat satyaṃ tat+iha -> yat satyaṃ tad iha

yat satyaṃ tad iha+abhiṣekapaṭale -> yat satyaṃ tad ihābhiṣekapaṭale

gaditas+sekārthatattvakramas -> gaditaḥ sekārthatattvakramas

gaditaḥ sekārthatattvakramas+| -> gaditaḥ sekārthatattvakramaḥ|

paramārthatas+api -> paramārthato 'pi

evam+pratyayitais -> evaṃ pratyayitais

evaṃ pratyayitais+katham -> evaṃ pratyayitaiḥ katham

evaṃ pratyayitaiḥ katham+punar -> evaṃ pratyayitaiḥ kathaṃ punar

evaṃ pratyayitaiḥ kathaṃ punar+ayam -> evaṃ pratyayitaiḥ kathaṃ punar ayam

evaṃ pratyayitaiḥ kathaṃ punar ayam+satyena -> evaṃ pratyayitaiḥ kathaṃ punar ayaṃ satyena

gambhīrārthaprakāśārtham+bhagavān -> gambhīrārthaprakāśārthaṃ bhagavān

gambhīrārthaprakāśārthaṃ bhagavān+pratyayatrayam|| -> gambhīrārthaprakāśārthaṃ bhagavan pratyayatrayam||

gurupratyayatas+śuddham -> gurupratyayataḥ śuddham

gurupratyayataḥ śuddham+rajomaṇḍalam -> gurupratyayataḥ śuddhaṃ rajomaṇḍalam

gurupratyayataḥ śuddhaṃ rajomaṇḍalam+ādiśet| -> gurupratyayataḥ śuddhaṃ rajomaṇḍalam ādiśet|

proktas+ātmapratyayayogatas -> prokta ātmapratyayayogatas

prokta ātmapratyayayogatas+|| -> prokta ātmapratyayayogataḥ||

punar+adhyātmani -> punar adhyātmani

lokadhātukamaṇḍalas+| -> lokadhātukamaṇḍalaḥ|

āgamapratyayāt+ādau -> āgamapratyayād ādau

samāptā+iyam -> samāpteyam

samāpteyam+ṭīkā -> samāpteyaṃ ṭīkā

samāpteyaṃ ṭīkā+abhiṣekapaṭalasya|| -> samāpteyaṃ ṭīkābhiṣekapaṭalasya||

mudrādṛṣṭimaṇḍalavisarjanavīrabhojyavidhimahoddeśas+ṣaṣṭhas -> mudrādṛṣṭimaṇḍalavisarjanavīrabhojyavidhimahoddeśaḥ ṣaṣṭhas

mudrādṛṣṭimaṇḍalavisarjanavīrabhojyavidhimahoddeśaḥ ṣaṣṭhas+|| -> mudrādṛṣṭimaṇḍalavisarjanavīrabhojyavidhimahoddeśaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ||

śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām+dvādaśasāhasrikāyām -> śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām

śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām+abhiṣekapaṭale -> śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām abhiṣekapaṭale

paramādibuddhānusāreṇa+abhiṣekapaṭalaṭīkā -> paramādibuddhānusāreṇābhiṣekapaṭalaṭīkā

vajrācāryas+draṣṭavyas -> vajrācāryo draṣṭavyas

vajrācāryo draṣṭavyas+mokṣārthibhis -> vajrācāryo draṣṭavyo mokṣārthibhis

vajrācāryo draṣṭavyo mokṣārthibhis+kālacakratantradeśakas -> vajrācāryo draṣṭavyo mokṣārthibhiḥ kālacakratantradeśakas

vajrācāryo draṣṭavyo mokṣārthibhiḥ kālacakratantradeśakas+iti -> vajrācāryo draṣṭavyo mokṣārthibhiḥ kālacakratantradeśaka iti

kālacakras+ādibuddhas -> kālacakra ādibuddhas

kālacakra ādibuddhas+tathā -> kālacakra ādibuddhas tathā

mañjuśrīs+bhagavān -> mañjuśrīr bhagavān

mañjuśrīr bhagavān+yathā -> mañjuśrīr bhagavān yathā

sarvatantrāṇām+deśakas -> sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakas

sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakas+sarvamantrāṇām -> sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakaḥ sarvamantrāṇām

sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakaḥ sarvamantrāṇām+anujñāpakas -> sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakaḥ sarvamantrāṇām anujñāpakas

sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakaḥ sarvamantrāṇām anujñāpakas+sarvasiddhīnām -> sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakaḥ sarvamantrāṇām anujñāpakaḥ sarvasiddhīnām

sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakaḥ sarvamantrāṇām anujñāpakaḥ sarvasiddhīnām+sādhakas -> sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakaḥ sarvamantrāṇām anujñāpakaḥ sarvasiddhīnāṃ sādhakas

sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakaḥ sarvamantrāṇām anujñāpakaḥ sarvasiddhīnāṃ sādhakas+| -> sarvatantrāṇāṃ deśakaḥ sarvamantrāṇām anujñāpakaḥ sarvasiddhīnāṃ sādhakaḥ|

evam+kālacakramaṇḍale -> evaṃ kālacakramaṇḍale

evaṃ kālacakramaṇḍale+abhiṣiktas -> evaṃ kālacakramaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktas

evaṃ kālacakramaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktas+sarvayoginīyogatantreṣu -> evaṃ kālacakramaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvayoginīyogatantreṣu

evaṃ kālacakramaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvayoginīyogatantreṣu+abhiṣiktas -> evaṃ kālacakramaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvayoginīyogatantreṣv abhiṣiktas

evaṃ kālacakramaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvayoginīyogatantreṣv abhiṣiktas+bhavati -> evaṃ kālacakramaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvayoginīyogatantreṣv abhiṣikto bhavati

tena+atra -> tenātra

eṣām+vistāram -> eṣāṃ vistāram

eṣāṃ vistāram+prathamapaṭale -> eṣāṃ vistāraṃ prathamapaṭale

nāśam+prayānti| -> nāśaṃ prayānti|

evam+ṣoḍaśabhayāni -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśabhayāni

evaṃ ṣoḍaśabhayāni+anyāni -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśabhayāny anyāni

evaṃ ṣoḍaśabhayāny anyāni+api -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśabhayāny anyāny api

śatrubhayam+siṃhabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayam+gajabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayam+vahnibhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam+uragabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayam+taskarabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayam+pāśabandhabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayam+kṣubdhasamudrabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayam+piśācabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayam+vyādhibhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam+indropadravabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayam+dāridryaduḥkhabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayaṃ dāridryaduḥkhabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayaṃ dāridryaduḥkhabhayam+strīviyogaduḥkhabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayaṃ dāridryaduḥkhabhayaṃ strīviyogaduḥkhabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayaṃ dāridryaduḥkhabhayaṃ strīviyogaduḥkhabhayam+kṣubhitanṛpabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayaṃ dāridryaduḥkhabhayaṃ strīviyogaduḥkhabhayaṃ kṣubhitanṛpabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayaṃ dāridryaduḥkhabhayaṃ strīviyogaduḥkhabhayaṃ kṣubhitanṛpabhayam+vajrapātabhayam -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayaṃ dāridryaduḥkhabhayaṃ strīviyogaduḥkhabhayaṃ kṣubhitanṛpabhayaṃ vajrapātabhayam

śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayaṃ dāridryaduḥkhabhayaṃ strīviyogaduḥkhabhayaṃ kṣubhitanṛpabhayaṃ vajrapātabhayam+arthanāśabhayam| -> śatrubhayaṃ siṃhabhayaṃ gajabhayaṃ vahnibhayam uragabhayaṃ taskarabhayaṃ pāśabandhabhayaṃ kṣubdhasamudrabhayaṃ piśācabhayaṃ vyādhibhayam indropadravabhayaṃ dāridryaduḥkhabhayaṃ strīviyogaduḥkhabhayaṃ kṣubhitanṛpabhayaṃ vajrapātabhayam arthanāśabhayam|

nāśam+prayānti| -> nāśaṃ prayānti|

pratidinam+caraṇam -> pratidinaṃ caraṇam

pratidinaṃ caraṇam+yoginīnām -> pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnām

pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnām+pūrvoktānām -> pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūrvoktānām

pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūrvoktānām+adhyātmani -> pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūrvoktānām adhyātmani

pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūrvoktānām adhyātmani+avadhūtyādīnām -> pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūrvoktānām adhyātmany avadhūtyādīnām

pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūrvoktānām adhyātmany avadhūtyādīnām+caraṇam -> pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūrvoktānām adhyātmany avadhūtyādīnāṃ caraṇam

pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūrvoktānām adhyātmany avadhūtyādīnāṃ caraṇam+smarati -> pratidinaṃ caraṇaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūrvoktānām adhyātmany avadhūtyādīnāṃ caraṇaṃ smarati

kaścit+yas -> kaścid yas

kaścid yas+kulaputras -> kaścid yaḥ kulaputras

kaścid yaḥ kulaputras+maṇḍalam -> kaścid yaḥ kulaputro maṇḍalam

kaścid yaḥ kulaputro maṇḍalam+vartayitvā -> kaścid yaḥ kulaputro maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā

kaścid yaḥ kulaputro maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā+abhiṣekam -> kaścid yaḥ kulaputro maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvābhiṣekam

kaścid yaḥ kulaputro maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvābhiṣekam+gṛhītvā -> kaścid yaḥ kulaputro maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvābhiṣekaṃ gṛhītvā

śatrus+ityādinā| -> śatrur ityādinā|

pratidinacaraṇam+yas -> pratidinacaraṇaṃ yas

pratidinacaraṇaṃ yas+smaret -> pratidinacaraṇaṃ yaḥ smaret

pratidinacaraṇaṃ yaḥ smaret+yoginīnām|| -> pratidinacaraṇaṃ yaḥ smared yoginīnām||

nāśam+tasya -> nāśaṃ tasya

dāridryam+strīviyogas -> dāridryaṃ strīviyogas

dāridryaṃ strīviyogas+kṣubhitanṛpabhayam -> dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayam

dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayam+vajrapātas -> dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayaṃ vajrapātas

dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayaṃ vajrapātas+arthanāśas -> dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayaṃ vajrapāto 'rthanāśas

kṣubdhāmbhodhis+piśācās -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācās

kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācās+maraṇabhayakarās -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarās

kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarās+vyādhis -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhis

kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhis+indropasargas -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhir indropasargas

kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhir indropasargas+| -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhir indropasargaḥ|

śatrus+siṃhas -> śatruḥ siṃhas

śatruḥ siṃhas+gajendras -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendras

śatruḥ siṃho gajendras+havis -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havis

śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havis+uragapatis -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis

śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis+taskarās -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis taskarās

śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis taskarās+pāśabandhas -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis taskarāḥ pāśabandhas

idānīm+sarvabhayopadravaśamanam -> idānīṃ sarvabhayopadravaśamanam

idānīṃ sarvabhayopadravaśamanam+ucyate -> idānīṃ sarvabhayopadravaśamanam ucyate

vīrabhojyaniyamas+|| -> vīrabhojyaniyamaḥ||

pravarakaruṇayā+ānanditam -> pravarakaruṇayānanditam

pravarakaruṇayānanditam+preṣayet -> pravarakaruṇayānanditaṃ preṣayet

pravarakaruṇayānanditaṃ preṣayet+svasvadhāmni -> pravarakaruṇayānanditaṃ preṣayet svasvadhāmni

pravarakaruṇayānanditaṃ preṣayet svasvadhāmni+iti -> pravarakaruṇayānanditaṃ preṣayet svasvadhāmnīti

dakṣiṇām+dattvā -> dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā

saṃghadānārtham+tadā -> saṃghadānārthaṃ tadā

saṃghadānārthaṃ tadā+ātmaśaktyā -> saṃghadānārthaṃ tadātmaśaktyā

yatheṣṭam+tatas -> yatheṣṭaṃ tatas

yatheṣṭaṃ tatas+ācāryas -> yatheṣṭaṃ tata ācāryas

yatheṣṭaṃ tata ācāryas+śiṣyasya -> yatheṣṭaṃ tata ācāryaḥ śiṣyasya

yatheṣṭaṃ tata ācāryaḥ śiṣyasya+ājñām -> yatheṣṭaṃ tata ācāryaḥ śiṣyasyājñām

yatheṣṭaṃ tata ācāryaḥ śiṣyasyājñām+pradāya -> yatheṣṭaṃ tata ācāryaḥ śiṣyasyājñāṃ pradāya

evam+sakalagaṇacakram -> evaṃ sakalagaṇacakram

evaṃ sakalagaṇacakram+tarpayitvā -> evaṃ sakalagaṇacakraṃ tarpayitvā

sthitānām+deyam|| -> sthitānāṃ deyam||

tatas+bhikṣvādīnām -> tato bhikṣvādīnām

tato bhikṣvādīnām+ācāryāṇām -> tato bhikṣvādīnām ācāryāṇām

tato bhikṣvādīnām ācāryāṇām+anyeṣām -> tato bhikṣvādīnām ācāryāṇām anyeṣām

tato bhikṣvādīnām ācāryāṇām anyeṣām+abhiṣiktānām -> tato bhikṣvādīnām ācāryāṇām anyeṣām abhiṣiktānām

tato bhikṣvādīnām ācāryāṇām anyeṣām abhiṣiktānām+teṣu -> tato bhikṣvādīnām ācāryāṇām anyeṣām abhiṣiktānāṃ teṣu

kālacakrabhagavatas+prathamapaṭṭikām -> kālacakrabhagavataḥ prathamapaṭṭikām

kālacakrabhagavataḥ prathamapaṭṭikām+khānapānādikam -> kālacakrabhagavataḥ prathamapaṭṭikāṃ khānapānādikam

kālacakrabhagavataḥ prathamapaṭṭikāṃ khānapānādikam+dattvā -> kālacakrabhagavataḥ prathamapaṭṭikāṃ khānapānādikaṃ dattvā

maṇḍalam+kṛtvā -> maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā

teṣām+madhye -> teṣāṃ madhye

sarvam+prāk -> sarvaṃ prāk

sarvaṃ prāk+sthāpanīyam| -> sarvaṃ prāk sthāpanīyam|

tat+eva -> tad eva

khānapānādikam+deyam| -> khānapānādikaṃ deyam|

evam+bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām -> evaṃ bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām

evaṃ bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām+yathānukrameṇa -> evaṃ bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānāṃ yathānukrameṇa

khānapānādikas+daṇḍas -> khānapānādiko daṇḍas

khānapānādiko daṇḍas+deyas -> khānapānādiko daṇḍo deyas

khānapānādiko daṇḍo deyas+daṇḍādhipatinā| -> khānapānādiko daṇḍo deyo daṇḍādhipatinā|

nirghāṭitas+daṇḍam -> nirghāṭito daṇḍam

nirghāṭito daṇḍam+aṅgīkaroti -> nirghāṭito daṇḍam aṅgīkaroti

svagṛhāt+nirghāṭayet| -> svagṛhān nirghāṭayet|

saṃvṛtim+tyaktvā -> saṃvṛtiṃ tyaktvā

mithyābhiṣekābhimānas+kalaham -> mithyābhiṣekābhimānaḥ kalaham

mithyābhiṣekābhimānaḥ kalaham+karoti -> mithyābhiṣekābhimānaḥ kalahaṃ karoti

gaṇacakranāyakas+iti| -> gaṇacakranāyaka iti|

darśayati+abhijñādikam -> darśayaty abhijñādikam

darśayaty abhijñādikam+tadā -> darśayaty abhijñādikaṃ tadā

sāmarthyam+pṛcchyate| -> sāmarthyaṃ pṛcchyate|

kaścit+tadā -> kaścit tadā

vivādam+karoti -> vivādaṃ karoti

na+utpadyate| -> notpadyate|

yāvat+abhijñā -> yāvad abhijñā

jyeṣṭhās+na -> jyeṣṭhā na

punas+cellakagṛhasthās -> punaś cellakagṛhasthās

punaś cellakagṛhasthās+prāgabhiṣiktās -> punaś cellakagṛhasthāḥ prāgabhiṣiktās

punaś cellakagṛhasthāḥ prāgabhiṣiktās+bhikṣos -> punaś cellakagṛhasthāḥ prāgabhiṣiktā bhikṣos

punaś cellakagṛhasthāḥ prāgabhiṣiktā bhikṣos+vajradharasya -> punaś cellakagṛhasthāḥ prāgabhiṣiktā bhikṣor vajradharasya

sattvārthakaraṇe+aśaktatvāt -> sattvārthakaraṇe 'śaktatvāt

sattvārthakaraṇe 'śaktatvāt+iti(?)| -> sattvārthakaraṇe 'śaktatvād iti(?)|

jyeṣṭhās+dharmadeśakās -> jyeṣṭhā dharmadeśakās

jyeṣṭhā dharmadeśakās+upadeśakās -> jyeṣṭhā dharmadeśakā upadeśakās

jyeṣṭhā dharmadeśakā upadeśakās+iti -> jyeṣṭhā dharmadeśakā upadeśakā iti

evam+anye -> evam anye

evam anye+api -> evam anye 'pi

saṃtarpaṇīyas+| -> saṃtarpaṇīyaḥ|

jyeṣṭhas+anyagṛhe -> jyeṣṭho 'nyagṛhe

gaṇanāyakas+| -> gaṇanāyakaḥ|

mūrkhas+laghukas -> mūrkho laghukas

mūrkho laghukas+mahācāryas -> mūrkho laghuko mahācāryas

mūrkho laghuko mahācāryas+tantradeśakas -> mūrkho laghuko mahācāryas tantradeśakas

mūrkho laghuko mahācāryas tantradeśakas+tayos -> mūrkho laghuko mahācāryas tantradeśakas tayos

mūrkho laghuko mahācāryas tantradeśakas tayos+tantradeśakas -> mūrkho laghuko mahācāryas tantradeśakas tayos tantradeśakas

mūrkho laghuko mahācāryas tantradeśakas tayos tantradeśakas+sa -> mūrkho laghuko mahācāryas tantradeśakas tayos tantradeśakaḥ sa

kim+tu -> kiṃ tu

bhikṣūṇām+yas -> bhikṣūṇāṃ yas

bhikṣūṇāṃ yas+jyeṣṭhas -> bhikṣūṇāṃ yo jyeṣṭhas

bhikṣūṇāṃ yo jyeṣṭhas+sekena -> bhikṣūṇāṃ yo jyeṣṭhaḥ sekena

teṣām+jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhādinā -> teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhādinā

teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhādinā+āsanāni -> teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhādināsanāni

evam+bhikṣuṇīpaṅktis -> evaṃ bhikṣuṇīpaṅktis

evaṃ bhikṣuṇīpaṅktis+mahallikāpaṅktis -> evaṃ bhikṣuṇīpaṅktir mahallikāpaṅktis

evaṃ bhikṣuṇīpaṅktir mahallikāpaṅktis+upāsikāpaṅktis -> evaṃ bhikṣuṇīpaṅktir mahallikāpaṅktir upāsikāpaṅktis

evaṃ bhikṣuṇīpaṅktir mahallikāpaṅktir upāsikāpaṅktis+pṛthak| -> evaṃ bhikṣuṇīpaṅktir mahallikāpaṅktir upāsikāpaṅktiḥ pṛthak|

gṛhasthācāryapaṅktis+dakṣiṇābhimukhī| -> gṛhasthācāryapaṅktir dakṣiṇābhimukhī|

cellakapaṅktis+uttarābhimukhī -> cellakapaṅktir uttarābhimukhī

tasmāt+bhikṣuvajradharapaṅktis -> tasmād bhikṣuvajradharapaṅktis

tasmād bhikṣuvajradharapaṅktis+pūrvābhimukhī -> tasmād bhikṣuvajradharapaṅktiḥ pūrvābhimukhī

jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhatvam+vā -> jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhatvaṃ vā

jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhatvaṃ vā+abhiṣekatas -> jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhatvaṃ vābhiṣekatas

jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhatvaṃ vābhiṣekatas+| -> jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhatvaṃ vābhiṣekataḥ|

teṣām+bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām -> teṣāṃ bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām

teṣāṃ bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām+ekasaṃvaram -> teṣāṃ bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām ekasaṃvaram

teṣāṃ bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām ekasaṃvaram+sāmānyena -> teṣāṃ bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām ekasaṃvaraṃ sāmānyena

niyamāt+tantre -> niyamāt tantre

madhyamas+śrāvaṇerākhyas -> madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyas

madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyas+gṛhasthas -> madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas

madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas+tu -> madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tu

madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tu+adhamas -> madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas

madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas+tayos -> madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas tayos

madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas tayos+|| -> madhyamaḥ śrāvaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas tayoḥ||

daśatattvaparijñānāt+trayāṇām -> daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇām

daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇām+bhikṣus -> daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣus

daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣus+uttamas -> daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣur uttamas

daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣur uttamas+| -> daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣur uttamaḥ|

vajrācāryas+uttamas -> vajrācārya uttamas

vajrācārya uttamas+madhyamas -> vajrācārya uttamo madhyamas

vajrācārya uttamo madhyamas+adhamas -> vajrācārya uttamo madhyamo 'dhamas

vajrācārya uttamo madhyamo 'dhamas+iti| -> vajrācārya uttamo madhyamo 'dhama iti|

iha+ācāryaparīkṣāyām -> ihācāryaparīkṣāyām

ihācāryaparīkṣāyām+tridhā -> ihācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ tridhā

vidhis+ayam| -> vidhir ayam|

yatheṣṭam+iti| -> yatheṣṭam iti|

kumārikāṇām+dattvā -> kumārikāṇāṃ dattvā

kumārikāṇāṃ dattvā+ācāryas -> kumārikāṇāṃ dattvācāryas

kumārikāṇāṃ dattvācāryas+saśiṣyas -> kumārikāṇāṃ dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyas

kumārikāṇāṃ dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyas+sakalaguṇakulam -> kumārikāṇāṃ dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyaḥ sakalaguṇakulam

kumārikāṇāṃ dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyaḥ sakalaguṇakulam+vīrabhojjena -> kumārikāṇāṃ dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyaḥ sakalaguṇakulaṃ vīrabhojjena

phalasamam+śāṭikām -> phalasamaṃ śāṭikām

phalasamaṃ śāṭikām+kalaśagrīvāveṣṭitām -> phalasamaṃ śāṭikāṃ kalaśagrīvāveṣṭitām

phalasamaṃ śāṭikāṃ kalaśagrīvāveṣṭitām+kanyakānām -> phalasamaṃ śāṭikāṃ kalaśagrīvāveṣṭitāṃ kanyakānām

phalasamaṃ śāṭikāṃ kalaśagrīvāveṣṭitāṃ kanyakānām+iti -> phalasamaṃ śāṭikāṃ kalaśagrīvāveṣṭitāṃ kanyakānām iti

tatas+tāmbūlam -> tatas tāmbūlam

tatas tāmbūlam+gandhadhūpam -> tatas tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpam

tatas tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpam+kusumam -> tatas tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumam

tatas tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumam+ca -> tatas tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumaṃ ca

khaṇḍalaṅkukādyais+madhurāhārais -> khaṇḍalaṅkukādyair madhurāhārais

khaṇḍalaṅkukādyair madhurāhārais+pūrvāhne -> khaṇḍalaṅkukādyair madhurāhāraiḥ pūrvāhne

daśavārṣikām+yāvat -> daśavārṣikāṃ yāvat

daśavārṣikāṃ yāvat+dugdhena -> daśavārṣikāṃ yāvad dugdhena

daśakumārikām+pañcavarṣāt -> daśakumārikāṃ pañcavarṣāt

daśakumārikāṃ pañcavarṣāt+ārabhya -> daśakumārikāṃ pañcavarṣād ārabhya

gomayena+upalipte -> gomayenopalipte

tatas+maṇḍalagṛham -> tato maṇḍalagṛham

tato maṇḍalagṛham+āgatya -> tato maṇḍalagṛham āgatya

neyam+iti -> neyam iti

maṇḍalagṛham+ānayet| -> maṇḍalagṛham ānayet|

punar+gajaskandhe -> punar gajaskandhe

nītam+tam -> nītaṃ tam

nītaṃ tam+kalaśam -> nītaṃ taṃ kalaśam

nītaṃ taṃ kalaśam+udakapūrṇam -> nītaṃ taṃ kalaśam udakapūrṇam

nītaṃ taṃ kalaśam udakapūrṇam+kṛtvā -> nītaṃ taṃ kalaśam udakapūrṇaṃ kṛtvā

śuddhanadyām+samudragāminyām -> śuddhanadyāṃ samudragāminyām

śuddhanadyāṃ samudragāminyām+vāhayet| -> śuddhanadyāṃ samudragāminyāṃ vāhayet|

cchatracāmaradhvajapūjāsahitam+nītvā -> cchatracāmaradhvajapūjāsahitaṃ nītvā

tatas+sakalam -> tataḥ sakalam

tataḥ sakalam+rajas -> tataḥ sakalaṃ rajas

tataḥ sakalaṃ rajas+gajopari -> tataḥ sakalaṃ rajo gajopari

maṇḍalavisarjananiyamas+|| -> maṇḍalavisarjananiyamaḥ||

padmādikam+lopayet -> padmādikaṃ lopayet

padmādikaṃ lopayet+iti -> padmādikaṃ lopayed iti

rajastruṭimātram+dattvā -> rajastruṭimātraṃ dattvā

mahāsukhacakravajram+yāvat -> mahāsukhacakravajraṃ yāvat

mahāsukhacakravajraṃ yāvat+lopayet -> mahāsukhacakravajraṃ yāval lopayet

mahāsukhacakravajraṃ yāval lopayet+tatas -> mahāsukhacakravajraṃ yāval lopayet tatas

mahāsukhacakravajraṃ yāval lopayet tatas+svaśirasi -> mahāsukhacakravajraṃ yāval lopayet tataḥ svaśirasi

laukikān+vai -> laukikān vai

laukikān vai+indrādīn -> laukikān vā indrādīn

laukikān vā indrādīn+tatas -> laukikān vā indrādīṃś tatas

laukikān vā indrādīṃś tatas+aśvatthapatreṇa -> laukikān vā indrādīṃś tato 'śvatthapatreṇa

preṣayet+svasvadhāmni|| -> preṣayet svasvadhāmni||

śiṣyasya+ājñām -> śiṣyasyājñām

śiṣyasyājñām+pradāya -> śiṣyasyājñāṃ pradāya

dattvā+ācāryas -> dattvācāryas

dattvācāryas+saśiṣyas -> dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyas

dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyas+sakalagaṇakulam -> dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyaḥ sakalagaṇakulam

dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyaḥ sakalagaṇakulam+tarpayitvā -> dattvācāryaḥ saśiṣyaḥ sakalagaṇakulaṃ tarpayitvā

tāmbūlam+gandhadhūpam -> tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpam

tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpam+kusumaphalasamam -> tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumaphalasamam

tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumaphalasamam+śāṭikām -> tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumaphalasamaṃ śāṭikām

tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumaphalasamaṃ śāṭikām+kanyakānām| -> tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumaphalasamaṃ śāṭikāṃ kanyakānām|

rajas+vāhayet -> rajo vāhayet

rajo vāhayet+śuddhanadyām -> rajo vāhayec chuddhanadyām

sakalam+api -> sakalam api

laukikān+vai -> laukikān vai

jñānasattvam+praveśya|| -> jñānasattvaṃ praveśya||

bhagavatas+abhimukhas -> bhagavato 'bhimukhas

bhagavato 'bhimukhas+vajravajraghaṇṭām -> bhagavato 'bhimukho vajravajraghaṇṭām

bhagavato 'bhimukho vajravajraghaṇṭām+gṛhītvā -> bhagavato 'bhimukho vajravajraghaṇṭāṃ gṛhītvā

homam+prakṛtya -> homaṃ prakṛtya

homaṃ prakṛtya+ācāryas -> homaṃ prakṛtyācāryas

homaṃ prakṛtyācāryas+pūrvavat -> homaṃ prakṛtyācāryaḥ pūrvavat

homaṃ prakṛtyācāryaḥ pūrvavat+pūjām -> homaṃ prakṛtyācāryaḥ pūrvavat pūjām

homaṃ prakṛtyācāryaḥ pūrvavat pūjām+kṛtvā -> homaṃ prakṛtyācāryaḥ pūrvavat pūjāṃ kṛtvā

tatas+gaṇacakram -> tato gaṇacakram

tato gaṇacakram+visarjya -> tato gaṇacakraṃ visarjya

vīravīreśvarībhyas+iti| -> vīravīreśvarībhya iti|

tathā+anyat -> tathānyat

tathānyat+gaṇacakre -> tathānyad gaṇacakre

sakalaguṇakulāya+ātmaśaktyā -> sakalaguṇakulāyātmaśaktyā

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

vastrayugmam+pratyekam -> vastrayugmaṃ pratyekam

vastrayugmaṃ pratyekam+dvārasthebhyas -> vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyas

vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyas+pradeyam -> vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyam

vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyam+rakṣapālebhyas -> vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyas

vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyas+prāk -> vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāk

vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāk+yathāvibhavatas -> vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāg yathāvibhavatas

vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāg yathāvibhavatas+mukuṭādikam -> vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāg yathāvibhavato mukuṭādikam

vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāg yathāvibhavato mukuṭādikam+deyam -> vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāg yathāvibhavato mukuṭādikaṃ deyam

vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāg yathāvibhavato mukuṭādikaṃ deyam+iti -> vastrayugmaṃ pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāg yathāvibhavato mukuṭādikaṃ deyam iti

aparam+api -> aparam api

dattam+tat -> dattaṃ tat

dattaṃ tat+yoginībhyas -> dattaṃ tad yoginībhyas

dattaṃ tad yoginībhyas+ghaṭarakṣapālikābhyas -> dattaṃ tad yoginībhyo ghaṭarakṣapālikābhyas

dattaṃ tad yoginībhyo ghaṭarakṣapālikābhyas+deyam| -> dattaṃ tad yoginībhyo ghaṭarakṣapālikābhyo deyam|

yat+vastrayugmam -> yad vastrayugmam

yad vastrayugmam+sakañcukam -> yad vastrayugmaṃ sakañcukam

yad vastrayugmaṃ sakañcukam+ghaṭopari -> yad vastrayugmaṃ sakañcukaṃ ghaṭopari

sekānte+ityādinā| -> sekānta ityādinā|

jñānasattvam+praveśya|| -> jñānasattvaṃ praveśya||

homam+prakṛtya -> homaṃ prakṛtya

tathā+anyat -> tathānyat

dvārasthebhyas+pradeyam -> dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyam

dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyam+sakalaguṇakulāya -> dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ sakalaguṇakulāya

dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ sakalaguṇakulāya+ātmaśaktyā -> dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ sakalaguṇakulāyātmaśaktyā

kañcukam+vastrayugmam| -> kañcukaṃ vastrayugmam|

deyam+śrīyoginībhyas -> deyaṃ śrīyoginībhyas

deyaṃ śrīyoginībhyas+tu -> deyaṃ śrīyoginībhyas tu

deyaṃ śrīyoginībhyas tu+aparam -> deyaṃ śrīyoginībhyas tv aparam

deyaṃ śrīyoginībhyas tv aparam+api -> deyaṃ śrīyoginībhyas tv aparam api

śrīghaṭānām+mṛdutanusukhadam -> śrīghaṭānāṃ mṛdutanusukhadam

śrīghaṭānāṃ mṛdutanusukhadam+kañcukam -> śrīghaṭānāṃ mṛdutanusukhadaṃ kañcukam

śrīghaṭānāṃ mṛdutanusukhadaṃ kañcukam+vastrayugmam -> śrīghaṭānāṃ mṛdutanusukhadaṃ kañcukaṃ vastrayugmam

idānīm+maṇḍalavisarjanam -> idānīṃ maṇḍalavisarjanam

idānīṃ maṇḍalavisarjanam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ maṇḍalavisarjanam ucyate---

tathāgatasekaniyamas+|| -> tathāgatasekaniyamaḥ||

deyam+jinavarahṛdayam -> deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayam

deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayam+vajrapadam -> deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayaṃ vajrapadam

deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayaṃ vajrapadam+mātṛpūjāvihīnam -> deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayaṃ vajrapadaṃ mātṛpūjāvihīnam

deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayaṃ vajrapadaṃ mātṛpūjāvihīnam+iti -> deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayaṃ vajrapadaṃ mātṛpūjāvihīnam iti

anyeṣām+punar -> anyeṣāṃ punar

anyeṣāṃ punar+gṛhasthānām -> anyeṣāṃ punar gṛhasthānām

anyeṣāṃ punar gṛhasthānām+na -> anyeṣāṃ punar gṛhasthānāṃ na

anyeṣāṃ punar gṛhasthānāṃ na+eva -> anyeṣāṃ punar gṛhasthānāṃ naiva

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

bodhicittasthirīkaraṇāya+iti -> bodhicittasthirīkaraṇāyeti

sarvadoṣais+vimuktā -> sarvadoṣair vimuktā

hastamudrāniyamas+deyas -> hastamudrāniyamo deyas

hastamudrāniyamo deyas+| -> hastamudrāniyamo deyaḥ|

sevārtham+karmamudrābhāve -> sevārthaṃ karmamudrābhāve

kathanīyas+| -> kathanīyaḥ|

sakalaguṇanidhis+nāḍikāyogayuktas -> sakalaguṇanidhir nāḍikāyogayuktas

sakalaguṇanidhir nāḍikāyogayuktas+mahākṣarasukhakṣaṇas -> sakalaguṇanidhir nāḍikāyogayukto mahākṣarasukhakṣaṇas

sakalaguṇanidhir nāḍikāyogayukto mahākṣarasukhakṣaṇas+vācā -> sakalaguṇanidhir nāḍikāyogayukto mahākṣarasukhakṣaṇo vācā

kathanīyas+vācā -> kathanīyo vācā

kathanīyo vācā+iti| -> kathanīyo vāceti|

kalaśādikas+trividhas -> kalaśādikas trividhas

kalaśādikas trividhas+evam -> kalaśādikas trividha evam

kalaśādikas trividha evam+caturthas -> kalaśādikas trividha evaṃ caturthas

kalaśādikas trividha evaṃ caturthas+dhumādimārgas -> kalaśādikas trividha evaṃ caturtho dhumādimārgas

kalaśādikas trividha evaṃ caturtho dhumādimārgas+deyas -> kalaśādikas trividha evaṃ caturtho dhumādimārgo deyas

kalaśādikas trividha evaṃ caturtho dhumādimārgo deyas+iti -> kalaśādikas trividha evaṃ caturtho dhumādimārgo deya iti

saptābhiṣekas+tatas -> saptābhiṣekas tatas

saptābhiṣekas tatas+deyas -> saptābhiṣekas tato deyas

saptābhiṣekas tato deyas+| -> saptābhiṣekas tato deyaḥ|

deyas+yathānukrameṇa -> deyo yathānukrameṇa

dravyābhāve+abhiṣekas -> dravyābhāve 'bhiṣekas

dravyābhāve 'bhiṣekas+jinapativacanena -> dravyābhāve 'bhiṣeko jinapativacanena

dravyābhāve 'bhiṣeko jinapativacanena+avadhūtasya -> dravyābhāve 'bhiṣeko jinapativacanenāvadhūtasya

dravyābhāvas+tadā -> dravyābhāvas tadā

yadā+avadhūtasya -> yadāvadhūtasya

dravyābhāve+ityādinā| -> dravyābhāva ityādinā|

deyam+jinavarahṛdayam -> deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayam

deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayam+mātṛpūjāvihīnam|| -> deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayaṃ mātṛpūjāvihīnam||

anyeṣām+na -> anyeṣāṃ na

anyeṣāṃ na+eva -> anyeṣāṃ naiva

sarvadoṣais+vimuktās -> sarvadoṣair vimuktās

sevārtham+hastamudrā -> sevārthaṃ hastamudrā

evam+dhūmādimārgas -> evaṃ dhūmādimārgas

evaṃ dhūmādimārgas+sakalaguṇanidhis -> evaṃ dhūmādimārgaḥ sakalaguṇanidhis

evaṃ dhūmādimārgaḥ sakalaguṇanidhis+nāḍikāyogayuktas -> evaṃ dhūmādimārgaḥ sakalaguṇanidhir nāḍikāyogayuktas

evaṃ dhūmādimārgaḥ sakalaguṇanidhir nāḍikāyogayuktas+| -> evaṃ dhūmādimārgaḥ sakalaguṇanidhir nāḍikāyogayuktaḥ|

dravyābhāve+abhiṣekas -> dravyābhāve 'bhiṣekas

dravyābhāve 'bhiṣekas+jinapativacanena -> dravyābhāve 'bhiṣeko jinapativacanena

dravyābhāve 'bhiṣeko jinapativacanena+avadhūtasya -> dravyābhāve 'bhiṣeko jinapativacanenāvadhūtasya

śiṣyasya+abhiṣekaniyamas -> śiṣyasyābhiṣekaniyamas

śiṣyasyābhiṣekaniyamas+ucyate--- -> śiṣyasyābhiṣekaniyama ucyate---

idānīm+avadhūtasya -> idānīm avadhūtasya

karuṇābhiṣekaniyamas+|| -> karuṇābhiṣekaniyamaḥ||

vyapagatakaluṣās+bodhicaryānurūḍhās -> vyapagatakaluṣā bodhicaryānurūḍhās

vyapagatakaluṣā bodhicaryānurūḍhās+iti -> vyapagatakaluṣā bodhicaryānurūḍhā iti

preṣaṇīyās+vajrācāryeṇa -> preṣaṇīyā vajrācāryeṇa

tatas+te -> tatas te

tatas+vajriṇas -> tato vajriṇas

tato vajriṇas+labdhamārgās -> tato vajriṇo labdhamārgās

tato vajriṇo labdhamārgās+santas -> tato vajriṇo labdhamārgāḥ santas

tato vajriṇo labdhamārgāḥ santas+iti -> tato vajriṇo labdhamārgāḥ santa iti

śukreṇa+amalaśaśivapuṣā -> śukreṇāmalaśaśivapuṣā

buddhais+viṇmūtraraktamajjābhis -> buddhair viṇmūtraraktamajjābhis

buddhair viṇmūtraraktamajjābhis+tathā -> buddhair viṇmūtraraktamajjābhis tathā

ca+abhiṣicya -> cābhiṣicya

bhāvanāmātrāt+paramakaruṇayā -> bhāvanāmātrāt paramakaruṇayā

sattvās+anabhiṣiktās -> sattvā anabhiṣiktās

sattvā anabhiṣiktās+trividhabhavagatās -> sattvā anabhiṣiktās trividhabhavagatās

sattvā anabhiṣiktās trividhabhavagatās+tān -> sattvā anabhiṣiktās trividhabhavagatās tān

sattvā anabhiṣiktās trividhabhavagatās tān+sarvajñajñānavajrāṅkuśena -> sattvā anabhiṣiktās trividhabhavagatās tan sarvajñajñānavajrāṅkuśena

sattvā anabhiṣiktās trividhabhavagatās tan sarvajñajñānavajrāṅkuśena+ākṛṣya -> sattvā anabhiṣiktās trividhabhavagatās tan sarvajñajñānavajrāṅkuśenākṛṣya

sattvās+ityādinā| -> sattvā ityādinā|

preṣaṇīyās+vyapagatakaluṣās -> preṣaṇīyā vyapagatakaluṣās

preṣaṇīyā vyapagatakaluṣās+bodhicaryānurūḍhās -> preṣaṇīyā vyapagatakaluṣā bodhicaryānurūḍhās

preṣaṇīyā vyapagatakaluṣā bodhicaryānurūḍhās+|| -> preṣaṇīyā vyapagatakaluṣā bodhicaryānurūḍhāḥ||

vajriṇas+labdhamārgās -> vajriṇo labdhamārgās

buddhais+vajrāmṛtena -> buddhair vajrāmṛtena

buddhair vajrāmṛtena+amalaśaśivapuṣā -> buddhair vajrāmṛtenāmalaśaśivapuṣā

ca+abhiṣicya| -> cābhiṣicya|

tān+samantān -> tan samantān

tan samantān+paramakaruṇayā -> tan samantan paramakaruṇayā

sattvās+lokadhātau -> sattvā lokadhātau

idānīṃ karuṇābhiṣekas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ karuṇābhiṣeka ucyate---

evaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgadānaniyamas+|| -> evaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgadānaniyamaḥ||

kulagrahāt+iti| -> kulagrahād iti|

karmamudrājñānamudrāsiddhis+api -> karmamudrājñānamudrāsiddhir api

vinā+anantakalpais -> vinānantakalpais

vinānantakalpais+mahāmudrāsiddhis -> vinānantakalpair mahāmudrāsiddhis

vinānantakalpair mahāmudrāsiddhis+na -> vinānantakalpair mahāmudrāsiddhir na

tathāgataniyamas+| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ|

deyam+iti -> deyam iti

pañcavārān+kāmadānena -> pañcavāran kāmadānena

ca+anyat -> cānyat

cānyat+rūpabhāryādikam -> cānyad rūpabhāryādikam

cānyad rūpabhāryādikam+māsamadhye -> cānyad rūpabhāryādikaṃ māsamadhye

pañcāṃśāni+ātmakuṭumbabhogāya -> pañcāṃśāny ātmakuṭumbabhogāya

teṣām+cirāgantukadhātūnām -> teṣāṃ cirāgantukadhātūnām

teṣāṃ cirāgantukadhātūnām+ṣaḍaṃśam -> teṣāṃ cirāgantukadhātūnāṃ ṣaḍaṃśam

teṣāṃ cirāgantukadhātūnāṃ ṣaḍaṃśam+deyam -> teṣāṃ cirāgantukadhātūnāṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ deyam

teṣāṃ cirāgantukadhātūnāṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ deyam+yoginyādipūjārtham -> teṣāṃ cirāgantukadhātūnāṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ deyaṃ yoginyādipūjārtham

teṣāṃ cirāgantukadhātūnāṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ deyaṃ yoginyādipūjārtham+iti| -> teṣāṃ cirāgantukadhātūnāṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ deyaṃ yoginyādipūjārtham iti|

dhātavas+svarṇaratnadhānyādyacetananānidravyāṇi -> dhātavaḥ svarṇaratnadhānyādyacetananānidravyāṇi

dānaniyamas+| -> dānaniyamaḥ|

ṣaṣṭham+manas -> ṣaṣṭhaṃ manas

ṣaṣṭhaṃ manaḥ saguṇam+māyāprapañcarahitam -> ṣaṣṭhaṃ manaḥ saguṇaṃ māyāprapañcarahitam

ṣaṣṭhaṃ manaḥ saguṇaṃ māyāprapañcarahitam+sattvārtham -> ṣaṣṭhaṃ manaḥ saguṇaṃ māyāprapañcarahitaṃ sattvārtham

ṣaṣṭhaṃ manaḥ saguṇaṃ māyāprapañcarahitaṃ sattvārtham+deyam -> ṣaṣṭhaṃ manaḥ saguṇaṃ māyāprapañcarahitaṃ sattvārthaṃ deyam

ṣaṣṭhaṃ manaḥ saguṇaṃ māyāprapañcarahitaṃ sattvārthaṃ deyam+iti -> ṣaṣṭhaṃ manaḥ saguṇaṃ māyāprapañcarahitaṃ sattvārthaṃ deyam iti

cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyendriyāṇām+madhye -> cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyendriyāṇāṃ madhye

deyā+iti -> deyeti

pāṇipādapāyubhagādīndriyāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭham+vāgindriyam -> pāṇipādapāyubhagādīndriyāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vāgindriyam

pāṇipādapāyubhagādīndriyāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vāgindriyam+satyavacanārtham -> pāṇipādapāyubhagādīndriyāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vāgindriyaṃ satyavacanārtham

tam+dattvā -> taṃ dattvā

pradeyam+buddhabodhisattvāya -> pradeyaṃ buddhabodhisattvāya

sarvakālam+ṣaḍaṃśam -> sarvakālaṃ ṣaḍaṃśam

sarvakālaṃ ṣaḍaṃśam+sarvavastūnām -> sarvakālaṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ sarvavastūnām

sarvakālaṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ sarvavastūnām+dānam -> sarvakālaṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ sarvavastūnāṃ dānam

sarvakālaṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ sarvavastūnāṃ dānam+dātavyam -> sarvakālaṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ sarvavastūnāṃ dānaṃ dātavyam

ṣaḍbhāgam+ityādinā| -> ṣaḍbhāgam ityādinā|

bhujayugalālokane+aham -> bhujayugalālokane 'ham

bhujayugalālokane 'ham+pracaṇḍā -> bhujayugalālokane 'haṃ pracaṇḍā

bhujayugalālokane 'haṃ pracaṇḍā+iti -> bhujayugalālokane 'haṃ pracaṇḍeti

bhāvitātmā+iti -> bhāvitātmeti

ca+urudṛṣṭyā|| -> corudṛṣṭyā||

śuddhā+aham -> śuddhāham

śuddhāham+guhyadṛṣṭyā -> śuddhāhaṃ guhyadṛṣṭyā

śuddhāhaṃ guhyadṛṣṭyā+api -> śuddhāhaṃ guhyadṛṣṭyāpi

śuddhāhaṃ guhyadṛṣṭyāpi+aham -> śuddhāhaṃ guhyadṛṣṭyāpy aham

śuddhāhaṃ guhyadṛṣṭyāpy aham+api -> śuddhāhaṃ guhyadṛṣṭyāpy aham api

tu+aham -> tv aham

tv aham+iti -> tv aham iti

śaktā+aham -> śaktāham

śaktāham+skandhadṛṣṭyā -> śaktāhaṃ skandhadṛṣṭyā

bhujayugalālokane+aham -> bhujayugalālokane 'ham

bhujayugalālokane 'ham+pracaṇḍā -> bhujayugalālokane 'haṃ pracaṇḍā

svakucayugalālokane+aham -> svakucayugalālokane 'ham

svakucayugalālokane 'ham+sumudrā -> svakucayugalālokane 'haṃ sumudrā

svakucayugalālokane 'haṃ sumudrā+iti -> svakucayugalālokane 'haṃ sumudreti

saubhāgyam+svakīyam -> saubhāgyaṃ svakīyam

saubhāgyaṃ svakīyam+prakaṭayati| -> saubhāgyaṃ svakīyaṃ prakaṭayati|

guṇam+prakaṭayati -> guṇaṃ prakaṭayati

tathā+ūrṇadṛṣṭyā -> tathorṇadṛṣṭyā

tathorṇadṛṣṭyā+uttamā -> tathorṇadṛṣṭyottamā

tathorṇadṛṣṭyottamā+aham -> tathorṇadṛṣṭyottamāham

tathorṇadṛṣṭyottamāham+iti -> tathorṇadṛṣṭyottamāham iti

yoginas+svasvabhāvam -> yoginaḥ svasvabhāvam

yoginaḥ svasvabhāvam+ebhis -> yoginaḥ svasvabhāvam ebhis

yoginaḥ svasvabhāvam ebhis+iṅgitais -> yoginaḥ svasvabhāvam ebhir iṅgitais

yoginaḥ svasvabhāvam ebhir iṅgitais+iti| -> yoginaḥ svasvabhāvam ebhir iṅgitair iti|

krūrā+aham -> krūrāham

krūrāham+iti -> krūrāham iti

yoginas+bhayam -> yogino bhayam

yogino bhayam+prakaṭayati -> yogino bhayaṃ prakaṭayati

yogino bhayaṃ prakaṭayati+ajñatvāt -> yogino bhayaṃ prakaṭayaty ajñatvāt

yogino bhayaṃ prakaṭayaty ajñatvāt+iti| -> yogino bhayaṃ prakaṭayaty ajñatvād iti|

krodhadṛṣṭim+darśayati -> krodhadṛṣṭiṃ darśayati

bhṛkuṭīm+kṛtvā -> bhṛkuṭīṃ kṛtvā

idānīm+bhayadṛṣṭasya -> idānīṃ bhayadṛṣṭasya

idānīṃ bhayadṛṣṭasya+ucyante---iha -> idānīṃ bhayadṛṣṭasyocyante---iha

sambhāṣaṇadṛṣṭiniyamas+| -> sambhāṣaṇadṛṣṭiniyamaḥ|

kathayati+iti -> kathayatīti

tvam+saumyadṛṣṭyā -> tvaṃ saumyadṛṣṭyā

mitram+me -> mitraṃ me

kucayugālokane+aham -> kucayugālokane 'ham

kucayugālokane 'ham+sumudrā|| -> kucayugālokane 'haṃ sumudrā||

saubhāgyaṃ ca+oṣṭhadṛṣṭyā -> saubhāgyaṃ cauṣṭhadṛṣṭyā

guṇam+yoginī -> guṇaṃ yoginī

ūrṇādṛṣṭyottamāham+prakaṭayati -> ūrṇādṛṣṭyottamāhaṃ prakaṭayati

krūrāham+keśadṛṣṭyā -> krūrāhaṃ keśadṛṣṭyā

mitram+me -> mitraṃ me

suratam+kuru -> surataṃ kuru

surataṃ kuru+iti -> surataṃ kurv iti

tvam+vakradṛṣṭyā -> tvaṃ vakradṛṣṭyā

tvaṃ vakradṛṣṭyā+iti -> tvaṃ vakradṛṣṭyeti

tvam+iti -> tvam iti

kṣemas+te -> kṣemas te

kṣemas te+api -> kṣemas te 'pi

kṣemas te 'pi+ūrdhvadṛṣṭyā -> kṣemas te 'py ūrdhvadṛṣṭyā

sthānāt+āgamanakathanam| -> sthānād āgamanakathanam|

vāmakaragatasya+īkṣaṇāt -> vāmakaragatasyekṣaṇāt

vāmakaragatasyekṣaṇāt+taddiśas -> vāmakaragatasyekṣaṇāt taddiśas

vāmakaragatasyekṣaṇāt taddiśas+vai -> vāmakaragatasyekṣaṇāt taddiśo vai

tatas+pratyuktam -> tataḥ pratyuktam

tataḥ pratyuktam+yoginas -> tataḥ pratyuktaṃ yoginas

tataḥ pratyuktaṃ yoginas+syāt -> tataḥ pratyuktaṃ yoginaḥ syāt

tataḥ pratyuktaṃ yoginaḥ syāt+śirasi -> tataḥ pratyuktaṃ yoginaḥ syāc chirasi

kutas+sthānāt -> kutaḥ sthānāt

kutaḥ sthānāt+tvam -> kutaḥ sthānāt tvam

kutaḥ sthānāt tvam+iti -> kutaḥ sthānāt tvam iti

yoginn āgatas+asi -> yoginn āgato 'si

darśayet+tayā -> darśayet tayā

kṣemas+te -> kṣemas te

pratyuktaṃ yoginaḥ syāt+śirasi -> pratyuktaṃ yoginaḥ syāc chirasi
