subhagasyāgatas tvam+kutas -> subhagasyāgatas tvaṃ kutas

subhagasyāgatas tvaṃ kutas+ca -> subhagasyāgatas tvaṃ kutaś ca

idānīm+dṛṣṭisaṃketas -> idānīṃ dṛṣṭisaṃketas

idānīṃ dṛṣṭisaṃketas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ dṛṣṭisaṃketa ucyate---

mudrāsaṃketaniyamas+|| -> mudrāsaṃketaniyamaḥ||

yāvantyas+utpadyante -> yāvantya utpadyante

tāvat+laukikavādārtham -> tāval laukikavādārtham

tāval laukikavādārtham+pratimudrām -> tāval laukikavādārthaṃ pratimudrām

tāval laukikavādārthaṃ pratimudrām+na -> tāval laukikavādārthaṃ pratimudrāṃ na

abhijñās+yoginām -> abhijñā yoginām

abhijñā yoginām+yāvan -> abhijñā yogināṃ yāvan

abhijñā yogināṃ yāvan+na -> abhijñā yogināṃ yāvan na

abhijñā yogināṃ yāvan na+utpadyante -> abhijñā yogināṃ yāvan notpadyante

mudrāyās+pratimudrāyām -> mudrāyāḥ pratimudrāyām

mudrāyāḥ pratimudrāyām+kas -> mudrāyāḥ pratimudrāyāṃ kas

mudrāyāḥ pratimudrāyāṃ kas+samarthas -> mudrāyāḥ pratimudrāyāṃ kaḥ samarthas

mudrāyāḥ pratimudrāyāṃ kaḥ samarthas+avadhāritum|| -> mudrāyāḥ pratimudrāyāṃ kaḥ samartho 'vadhāritum||

yāvantas+dṛṣṭivikṣepās -> yāvanto dṛṣṭivikṣepās

yāvanto dṛṣṭivikṣepās+tāvat -> yāvanto dṛṣṭivikṣepās tāvat

yāvanto dṛṣṭivikṣepās tāvat+mudrās -> yāvanto dṛṣṭivikṣepās tāvan mudrās

yāvanto dṛṣṭivikṣepās tāvan mudrās+prakīrtitās -> yāvanto dṛṣṭivikṣepās tāvan mudrāḥ prakīrtitās

yāvanto dṛṣṭivikṣepās tāvan mudrāḥ prakīrtitās+| -> yāvanto dṛṣṭivikṣepās tāvan mudrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ|

mudrās+iti -> mudrā iti

mudrā iti+atas -> mudrā ity atas

mudrā ity atas+--- -> mudrā ity ataḥ---

tatsvabhāvās+tu -> tatsvabhāvās tu

veditavyās+yat -> veditavyā yat

veditavyā yat+yat -> veditavyā yad yat

veditavyā yad yat+vastusvabhāvas -> veditavyā yad yad vastusvabhāvas

veditavyā yad yad vastusvabhāvas+bhavati -> veditavyā yad yad vastusvabhāvo bhavati

tatas+pañcabhedais -> tataḥ pañcabhedais

tataḥ pañcabhedais+vibhinnās -> tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnās

tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnās+anyās -> tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyās

tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyās+mudrās -> tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyā mudrās

tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyā mudrās+tu -> tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyā mudrās tu

tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyā mudrās tu+anantās -> tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyā mudrās tv anantās

tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyā mudrās tv anantās+sakalatanugatās -> tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyā mudrās tv anantāḥ sakalatanugatās

tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyā mudrās tv anantāḥ sakalatanugatās+yoginā -> tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnā anyā mudrās tv anantāḥ sakalatanugatā yoginā

syāt+iti -> syād iti

syād iti+evam -> syād ity evam

syād ity evam+sarvamudrās -> syād ity evaṃ sarvamudrās

syād ity evaṃ sarvamudrās+punar -> syād ity evaṃ sarvamudrāḥ punar

syād ity evaṃ sarvamudrāḥ punar+api -> syād ity evaṃ sarvamudrāḥ punar api

pātramudrā+amṛtā -> pātramudrāmṛtā

mudrās+|| -> mudrāḥ||

tatsvabhāvās+ca -> tatsvabhāvāś ca

yat+yat -> yad yat

yad yat+vastusvabhāvas -> yad yad vastusvabhāvas

yad yad vastusvabhāvas+bhavati -> yad yad vastusvabhāvo bhavati

anyās+mudrās -> anyā mudrās

anyā mudrās+tu -> anyā mudrās tu

anyā mudrās tu+anantās -> anyā mudrās tv anantās

anyā mudrās tv anantās+sakalatanugatās -> anyā mudrās tv anantāḥ sakalatanugatās

anyā mudrās tv anantāḥ sakalatanugatās+yoginā -> anyā mudrās tv anantāḥ sakalatanugatā yoginā

tatas+pañcabhedais -> tataḥ pañcabhedais

tataḥ pañcabhedais+vibhinnās -> tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnās

tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnās+| -> tataḥ pañcabhedair vibhinnāḥ|

iti+evam -> ity evam

ity evam+sarvamudrās -> ity evaṃ sarvamudrās

ity evaṃ sarvamudrās+punar -> ity evaṃ sarvamudrāḥ punar

ity evaṃ sarvamudrāḥ punar+api -> ity evaṃ sarvamudrāḥ punar api

guṇavaśāt+dhūpayogena -> guṇavaśād dhūpayogena

savās tās+veditavyās -> savās tā veditavyās

savās tā veditavyās+| -> savās tā veditavyāḥ|

tāsām+svabhāvam -> tāsāṃ svabhāvam

tāsāṃ svabhāvam+jñātvā -> tāsāṃ svabhāvaṃ jñātvā

guṇavaśāt+dhūpayogena -> guṇavaśād dhūpayogena

pratimudrā anekās+bhavanti -> pratimudrā anekā bhavanti

evam+anekamudrādarśite -> evam anekamudrādarśite

vajravajraghaṇṭayos+khaḍgakapālayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos+triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayos+kartikākapālayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayos+bāṇacāpayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayos+aṅkuśapāśayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayos+ḍamarukaratnayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayos+mudgarapadmayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayos+cakraśaṅkhayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayos+kundadarpaṇayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayos+daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayos+parśubrahmavaktrayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayos+gajacarmatarjanyos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyos+mukuṭakuṇḍalayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayos+kaṇṭhikārucakayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayos+sīmantasindūrarekhayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayoḥ sīmantasindūrarekhayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayoḥ sīmantasindūrarekhayos+daṃṣṭrākanīyasyos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayoḥ sīmantasindūrarekhayor daṃṣṭrākanīyasyos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayoḥ sīmantasindūrarekhayor daṃṣṭrākanīyasyos+aṅguṣṭhānāmikayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayoḥ sīmantasindūrarekhayor daṃṣṭrākanīyasyor aṅguṣṭhānāmikayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayoḥ sīmantasindūrarekhayor daṃṣṭrākanīyasyor aṅguṣṭhānāmikayos+tarjanīmadhyamayos -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayoḥ sīmantasindūrarekhayor daṃṣṭrākanīyasyor aṅguṣṭhānāmikayos tarjanīmadhyamayos

vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayoḥ sīmantasindūrarekhayor daṃṣṭrākanīyasyor aṅguṣṭhānāmikayos tarjanīmadhyamayos+| -> vajravajraghaṇṭayoḥ khaḍgakapālayos triśūlakhaṭvāṅgayoḥ kartikākapālayor bāṇacāpayor aṅkuśapāśayor ḍamarukaratnayor mudgarapadmayoś cakraśaṅkhayoḥ kundadarpaṇayor daṇḍaśṛṅkhalayoḥ parśubrahmavaktrayor gajacarmatarjanyor mukuṭakuṇḍalayoḥ kaṇṭhikārucakayor mekhalānūpurayoḥ śṛṅīnakhyor nāgagaruḍayor hastapādayor mukhagudayor bhagaliṅgayoḥ stanauṣṭhayor netrabhruvos tilakakajjalayoḥ prakopaśikhāmokṣaṇayor jānūrvoḥ kaṇṭhalalāṭayor nābhihṛdayayoḥ sīmantasindūrarekhayor daṃṣṭrākanīyasyor aṅguṣṭhānāmikayos tarjanīmadhyamayoḥ|

parasparam+mudrāpratimudrā -> parasparaṃ mudrāpratimudrā

parasparaṃ mudrāpratimudrā+iti| -> parasparaṃ mudrāpratimudreti|

tatas+ca -> tataś ca

tatsvarūpās+mudrās -> tatsvarūpā mudrās

tatsvarūpā mudrās+| -> tatsvarūpā mudrāḥ|

kālacakrabhagavatas+vāmasavyabhujābhyām -> kālacakrabhagavato vāmasavyabhujābhyām

kālacakrabhagavato vāmasavyabhujābhyām+yāni -> kālacakrabhagavato vāmasavyabhujābhyāṃ yāni

pratimudrālakṣaṇam+ucyate| -> pratimudrālakṣaṇam ucyate|

idānīm+parasparamudrādarśane -> idānīṃ parasparamudrādarśane

bhagavatas+niyamas -> bhagavato niyamas

bhagavato niyamas+|| -> bhagavato niyamaḥ||

sāmarthyayuktā+iti -> sāmarthyayukteti

maraṇam+nayati -> maraṇaṃ nayati

karaṇīyam+anyathā -> karaṇīyam anyathā

tat+tena -> tat tena

bālayoginām+niyamam -> bālayogināṃ niyamam

bālayogināṃ niyamam+yat -> bālayogināṃ niyamaṃ yat

bālayogināṃ niyamaṃ yat+dadāti -> bālayogināṃ niyamaṃ yad dadāti

kartavyas+iti -> kartavya iti

tābhis+sārdham -> tābhiḥ sārdham

tābhiḥ sārdham+vādas -> tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ vādas

tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ vādas+na -> tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ vādo na

svakāyam+tatas -> svakāyaṃ tatas

svakāyaṃ tatas+vāmahastena -> svakāyaṃ tato vāmahastena

svakāyaṃ tato vāmahastena+ūrdhvam -> svakāyaṃ tato vāmahastenordhvam

svakāyaṃ tato vāmahastenordhvam+praṇāmam -> svakāyaṃ tato vāmahastenordhvaṃ praṇāmam

svakāyaṃ tato vāmahastenordhvaṃ praṇāmam+kṛtvā -> svakāyaṃ tato vāmahastenordhvaṃ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā

vāmakaratalam+dattvā -> vāmakaratalaṃ dattvā

tāsām+abhivādanam -> tāsām abhivādanam

tāsām abhivādanam+kṛtvā -> tāsām abhivādanaṃ kṛtvā

mudrām+darśayati -> mudrāṃ darśayati

gacchasi+iti -> gacchasīti

vadati+udaragatam -> vadaty udaragatam

vadaty udaragatam+idam -> vadaty udaragatam idam

vadaty udaragatam idam+bhakṣayāmas -> vadaty udaragatam idaṃ bhakṣayāmas

vadaty udaragatam idaṃ bhakṣayāmas+tava -> vadaty udaragatam idaṃ bhakṣayāmas tava

vadaty udaragatam idaṃ bhakṣayāmas tava+āntram -> vadaty udaragatam idaṃ bhakṣayāmas tavāntram

vadaty udaragatam idaṃ bhakṣayāmas tavāntram+he -> vadaty udaragatam idaṃ bhakṣayāmas tavāntraṃ he

dantais+saṃdaśyamāne -> dantaiḥ saṃdaśyamāne

dantaiḥ saṃdaśyamāne+api -> dantaiḥ saṃdaśyamāne 'pi

tathā+oṣṭhe -> tathauṣṭhe

raktapānam+karomi -> raktapānaṃ karomi

raktapānaṃ karomi+iti| -> raktapānaṃ karomīti|

piśitam+idam -> piśitam idam

piśitam idam+bhakṣaṇīyam -> piśitam idaṃ bhakṣaṇīyam

piśitam idaṃ bhakṣaṇīyam+mayā -> piśitam idaṃ bhakṣaṇīyaṃ mayā

piśitam idaṃ bhakṣaṇīyaṃ mayā+adya -> piśitam idaṃ bhakṣaṇīyaṃ mayādya

sati+idam -> satīdam

satīdam+vadati -> satīdaṃ vadati

pātanīyas tvam+atra -> pātanīyas tvam atra

sati+idam -> satīdam

satīdam+vadati -> satīdaṃ vadati

svadantair evam+keśacchede -> svadantair evaṃ keśacchede

svakeśān+chedayati -> svakeśāṃś chedayati

sāmarthyam+vinā -> sāmarthyaṃ vinā

pratimudrām+vā -> pratimudrāṃ vā

sādhako mithyāhaṃkāreṇa+avamānam -> sādhako mithyāhaṃkāreṇāvamānam

sādhako mithyāhaṃkāreṇāvamānam+karoti -> sādhako mithyāhaṃkāreṇāvamānaṃ karoti

keśa+ityādinā| -> keśetyādinā|

saṃdaśyamāne+api -> saṃdaśyamāne 'pi

saṃdaśyamāne 'pi+udaragatam -> saṃdaśyamāne 'py udaragatam

saṃdaśyamāne 'py udaragatam+idam -> saṃdaśyamāne 'py udaragatam idam

saṃdaśyamāne 'py udaragatam idam+bhakṣayāmas -> saṃdaśyamāne 'py udaragatam idaṃ bhakṣayāmas

bahuvidhasamayais tarpayāmo yatheṣṭam+iti -> bahuvidhasamayais tarpayāmo yatheṣṭam iti

cakramelāpako bhaviṣyati+iti -> cakramelāpako bhaviṣyatīti

mudrayā+adya -> mudrayādya

svakīyahaste 'nyonyam+bandhe -> svakīyahaste 'nyonyaṃ bandhe

svakīyahaste 'nyonyaṃ bandhe+aṅguṣṭhatarjanīmadhye -> svakīyahaste 'nyonyaṃ bandhe 'ṅguṣṭhatarjanīmadhye

vā+āropitā -> vāropitā

bhayam+prakaṭayati| -> bhayaṃ prakaṭayati|

kaniṣṭhā+āropitā -> kaniṣṭhāropitā

jānāsi+iti| -> jānāsīti|

mudrāsaṃketakam+na -> mudrāsaṃketakaṃ na

vadati+atimahāmūrkhas -> vadaty atimahāmūrkhas

vadaty atimahāmūrkhas+tvam -> vadaty atimahāmūrkhas tvam

vadaty atimahāmūrkhas tvam+yadā -> vadaty atimahāmūrkhas tvaṃ yadā

oṣṭhādikam+vakram -> oṣṭhādikaṃ vakram

oṣṭhādikaṃ vakram+darśayati| -> oṣṭhādikaṃ vakraṃ darśayati|

sādhakam+dṛṣṭvā -> sādhakaṃ dṛṣṭvā

kutracit+dūtikām -> kutracid dūtikām

kutracid dūtikām+dṛṣṭvā -> kutracid dūtikāṃ dṛṣṭvā

oṣṭha+ityādinā| -> oṣṭhetyādinā|

na+eva -> naiva

bhuktam+hi -> bhuktaṃ hi

bhuktaṃ hi+udaradaśanayos -> bhuktaṃ hy udaradaśanayos

bhuktaṃ hy udaradaśanayos+tāḍite -> bhuktaṃ hy udaradaśanayos tāḍite

muṣṭibandhāt+bhuvi -> muṣṭibandhād bhuvi

bhayam+tarjanī -> bhayaṃ tarjanī

kaṇḍūyamāne+atimūrkhas -> kaṇḍūyamāne 'timūrkhas

idānīm+nirbhartsamudrās -> idānīṃ nirbhartsamudrās

idānīṃ nirbhartsamudrās+ucyante--- -> idānīṃ nirbhartsamudrā ucyante---

kaniṣṭhādyās+aṅgulyanonyabaddhās -> kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhās

kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhās+atas -> kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā atas

kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā atas+bandhāt -> kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā ato bandhāt

kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā ato bandhāt+tarjanyānāmikābandhāt -> kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā ato bandhāt tarjanyānāmikābandhāt

kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā ato bandhāt tarjanyānāmikābandhāt+aṅguṣṭhamadhyamāprasārāt -> kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā ato bandhāt tarjanyānāmikābandhād aṅguṣṭhamadhyamāprasārāt

kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā ato bandhāt tarjanyānāmikābandhād aṅguṣṭhamadhyamāprasārāt+samayamelāpakam -> kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā ato bandhāt tarjanyānāmikābandhād aṅguṣṭhamadhyamāprasārāt samayamelāpakam

kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā ato bandhāt tarjanyānāmikābandhād aṅguṣṭhamadhyamāprasārāt samayamelāpakam+kathayati -> kaniṣṭhādyā aṅgulyanonyabaddhā ato bandhāt tarjanyānāmikābandhād aṅguṣṭhamadhyamāprasārāt samayamelāpakaṃ kathayati

karābhyām+sampuṭam -> karābhyāṃ sampuṭam

karābhyāṃ sampuṭam+kṛtvā -> karābhyāṃ sampuṭaṃ kṛtvā

aṅgulyanyonyabandhāt+iti -> aṅgulyanyonyabandhād iti

nakhais+ca -> nakhaiś ca

nakhaiś ca+iti| -> nakhaiś ceti|

kathitas+iti| -> kathita iti|

tathā+adharakucayugālekhane -> tathādharakucayugālekhane

bandhus+ekas -> bandhur ekas

bandhur ekas+mama -> bandhur eko mama

svāgatam+yoginas -> svāgataṃ yoginas

svāgataṃ yoginas+ca| -> svāgataṃ yoginaś ca|

sarvāṅgulyagrasārāt+pravadati -> sarvāṅgulyagrasārāt pravadati

tathā+abhivādanayogena -> tathābhivādanayogena

samayam+madhyamāṅguṣṭhasārāt|| -> samayaṃ madhyamāṅguṣṭhasārāt||

aṅgulyanyonyabandhāt+kathayati -> aṅgulyanyonyabandhāt kathayati

nakhais+ca -> nakhaiś ca

bhartā+api -> bhartāpi

bhartāpi+adharakucayugālekhane -> bhartāpy adharakucayugālekhane

bandhus+ekas -> bandhur ekas

bandhur ekas+mama -> bandhur eko mama

svāgatam+yoginas -> svāgataṃ yoginas

svāgataṃ yoginas+ca -> svāgataṃ yoginaś ca

sarvāṅgulyagrasārāt+pravadati -> sarvāṅgulyagrasārāt pravadati

tarpaṇam+te -> tarpaṇaṃ te

aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyām+choṭikām -> aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ choṭikām

aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ choṭikām+kṛtvā -> aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ choṭikāṃ kṛtvā

tvam+atra -> tvam atra

tvam atra+iti| -> tvam atreti|

niyatam+śreṣṭhamantrī -> niyataṃ śreṣṭhamantrī

tathā+aṅgulyās -> tathāṅgulyās

tathāṅgulyās+choṭikāyās -> tathāṅgulyāś choṭikāyās

tathāṅgulyāś choṭikāyās+aṅguṣṭhatarjanyās -> tathāṅgulyāś choṭikāyā aṅguṣṭhatarjanyās

tathāṅgulyāś choṭikāyā aṅguṣṭhatarjanyās+kathayati -> tathāṅgulyāś choṭikāyā aṅguṣṭhatarjanyāḥ kathayati

kṣemam+vāmāṅguṣṭhamuṣṭibandhāt -> kṣemaṃ vāmāṅguṣṭhamuṣṭibandhāt

kṣemaṃ vāmāṅguṣṭhamuṣṭibandhāt+iti| -> kṣemaṃ vāmāṅguṣṭhamuṣṭibandhād iti|

dvābhyām+tarjanīmadhyamābhyām -> dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyām

dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyām+pṛṣṭhatas -> dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhatas

dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhatas+saṃyuktābhyām -> dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ saṃyuktābhyām

dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ saṃyuktābhyām+susvāgatam -> dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ saṃyuktābhyāṃ susvāgatam

dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ saṃyuktābhyāṃ susvāgatam+kathitam -> dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ saṃyuktābhyāṃ susvāgataṃ kathitam

dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ saṃyuktābhyāṃ susvāgataṃ kathitam+bhavati| -> dvābhyāṃ tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ saṃyuktābhyāṃ susvāgataṃ kathitaṃ bhavati|

svāgatam+kathitam -> svāgataṃ kathitam

svāgataṃ kathitam+bhavet -> svāgataṃ kathitaṃ bhavet

svāgataṃ kathitaṃ bhavet+yoginyās -> svāgataṃ kathitaṃ bhaved yoginyās

svāgataṃ kathitaṃ bhaved yoginyās+yoginas -> svāgataṃ kathitaṃ bhaved yoginyā yoginas

svāgataṃ kathitaṃ bhaved yoginyā yoginas+yoginā -> svāgataṃ kathitaṃ bhaved yoginyā yogino yoginā

muṣṭim+baddhvā -> muṣṭiṃ baddhvā

muṣṭiṃ baddhvā+ūrdhvamukhām -> muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhām

muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhām+tarjanīm -> muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm

muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm+aṅguṣṭhābhimukhām -> muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm aṅguṣṭhābhimukhām

muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm aṅguṣṭhābhimukhām+śliṣṭām -> muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm aṅguṣṭhābhimukhāṃ śliṣṭām

muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm aṅguṣṭhābhimukhāṃ śliṣṭām+darśayet -> muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm aṅguṣṭhābhimukhāṃ śliṣṭāṃ darśayet

muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm aṅguṣṭhābhimukhāṃ śliṣṭāṃ darśayet+tasyās -> muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm aṅguṣṭhābhimukhāṃ śliṣṭāṃ darśayet tasyās

muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm aṅguṣṭhābhimukhāṃ śliṣṭāṃ darśayet tasyās+darśane -> muṣṭiṃ baddhvordhvamukhāṃ tarjanīm aṅguṣṭhābhimukhāṃ śliṣṭāṃ darśayet tasyā darśane

kutracit+darśanamātreṇa -> kutracid darśanamātreṇa

tarjanyā+ityādinā| -> tarjanyetyādinā|

tarpaṇam+te -> tarpaṇaṃ te

aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyām+sasamayasurayā -> aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ sasamayasurayā

tvam+atra -> tvam atra

niyatam+śreṣṭhamantrī -> niyataṃ śreṣṭhamantrī

aṅgulyās+choṭikāyās -> aṅgulyāś choṭikāyās

aṅgulyāś choṭikāyās+kathayati -> aṅgulyāś choṭikāyāḥ kathayati

kṣemam+aṅguṣṭhabandhāt| -> kṣemam aṅguṣṭhabandhāt|

dvābhyām+susvāgatam -> dvābhyāṃ susvāgatam

dvābhyāṃ susvāgatam+ca -> dvābhyāṃ susvāgataṃ ca

bhavet+svāgatam -> bhavet svāgatam

bhavet svāgatam+yoginas -> bhavet svāgataṃ yoginas

bhavet svāgataṃ yoginas+ca -> bhavet svāgataṃ yoginaś ca

kathitam+api -> kathitam api

tarjanyās+darśanam -> tarjanyā darśanam

tarjanyā darśanam+vai -> tarjanyā darśanaṃ vai

idānīm+vīravīreśvarīṇām -> idānīṃ vīravīreśvarīṇām

idānīṃ vīravīreśvarīṇām+parasparasambhāṣaṇamudrās -> idānīṃ vīravīreśvarīṇāṃ parasparasambhāṣaṇamudrās

idānīṃ vīravīreśvarīṇāṃ parasparasambhāṣaṇamudrās+ucyante--- -> idānīṃ vīravīreśvarīṇāṃ parasparasambhāṣaṇamudrā ucyante---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

tiryaṅmukhīnām+darśanīyā -> tiryaṅmukhīnāṃ darśanīyā

tiryaṅmukhīnāṃ darśanīyā+iti -> tiryaṅmukhīnāṃ darśanīyeti

jvālāmudrā+iti -> jvālāmudreti

sāritā+anyā -> sāritānyā

kim+tu -> kiṃ tu

varakaratalayos+tena -> varakaratalayos tena

varakaratalayos tena+eva -> varakaratalayos tenaiva

śliṣṭau+iti -> śliṣṭāv iti

śirasas+upari -> śirasa upari

śirasa upari+adhomukhena -> śirasa upary adhomukhena

śirasa upary adhomukhena+aṅguṣṭhau -> śirasa upary adhomukhenāṅguṣṭhau

dve+anyonyam -> dve 'nyonyam

dve 'nyonyam+granthite -> dve 'nyonyaṃ granthite

jvālāmudrāyām+madhyamānāmākaniṣṭhā -> jvālāmudrāyāṃ madhyamānāmākaniṣṭhā

phaṇinām+jātimudrā -> phaṇināṃ jātimudrā

pañcāṅgulyas+agraparvavakrā -> pañcāṅgulyo 'graparvavakrā

tarjanīmadhyamādyānāmikāṅguṣṭhayos+mukhayoge -> tarjanīmadhyamādyānāmikāṅguṣṭhayor mukhayoge

tarjanīmadhyamādyānāmikāṅguṣṭhayor mukhayoge+iti -> tarjanīmadhyamādyānāmikāṅguṣṭhayor mukhayoga iti

tarjanīmadhyamādyānāmikāṅguṣṭhayor mukhayoga iti+evam -> tarjanīmadhyamādyānāmikāṅguṣṭhayor mukhayoga ity evam

tarjanīmadhyamādyānāmikāṅguṣṭhayor mukhayoga ity evam+garuḍamudrā(?)| -> tarjanīmadhyamādyānāmikāṅguṣṭhayor mukhayoga ity evaṃ garuḍamudrā(?)|

baddhe+anyonyam -> baddhe 'nyonyam

baddhe 'nyonyam+kaniṣṭhe -> baddhe 'nyonyaṃ kaniṣṭhe

sāritā+anyā|| -> sāritānyā||

varakaratalayos+tarjanī -> varakaratalayos tarjanī

jvālāyām+śliṣṭajyeṣṭhau -> jvālāyāṃ śliṣṭajyeṣṭhau

ca+apare -> cāpare

cāpare+adhas -> cāpare 'dhas

cāpare 'dhas+ca -> cāpare 'dhaś ca

tarjanyantās+prasārās -> tarjanyantāḥ prasārās

tarjanyantāḥ prasārās+pratidivasabalau -> tarjanyantāḥ prasārāḥ pratidivasabalau

phaṇinām+jātimudrā -> phaṇināṃ jātimudrā

pakṣayogas+aṇḍajānām -> pakṣayogo 'ṇḍajānām

baddhe+anyonyam -> baddhe 'nyonyam

baddhe 'nyonyam+kaniṣṭhe -> baddhe 'nyonyaṃ kaniṣṭhe

śṛṅgiṇām+muṣṭibandhāt -> śṛṅgiṇāṃ muṣṭibandhāt

śṛṅgiṇāṃ muṣṭibandhāt+iti -> śṛṅgiṇāṃ muṣṭibandhād iti

dve+ardhavakre -> dve 'rdhavakre

dve 'rdhavakre+ardhacandrākāreṇa -> dve 'rdhavakre 'rdhacandrākāreṇa

dve 'rdhavakre 'rdhacandrākāreṇa+ubhayakaramuṣṭyupari -> dve 'rdhavakre 'rdhacandrākāreṇobhayakaramuṣṭyupari

nakhīnām+ekakaratale -> nakhīnām ekakaratale

idānīm+nakhīnām -> idānīṃ nakhīnām

idānīṃ nakhīnām+jātimudrā -> idānīṃ nakhīnāṃ jātimudrā

idānīṃ nakhīnāṃ jātimudrā+ucyate---pañca -> idānīṃ nakhīnāṃ jātimudrocyate---pañca

idānīṃ nakhīnāṃ jātimudrocyate---pañca+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ nakhīnāṃ jātimudrocyate---pañcetyādinā|

darśanīyā+aṣṭakulajānām -> darśanīyāṣṭakulajānām

darśanīyāṣṭakulajānām+iti| -> darśanīyāṣṭakulajānām iti|

evam+aṣṭavidhā -> evam aṣṭavidhā

vyantarāṇām+kulam -> vyantarāṇāṃ kulam

vyantarāṇāṃ kulam+syāt| -> vyantarāṇāṃ kulaṃ syāt|

tathā+upabāhukaratalasandhis -> tathopabāhukaratalasandhis

tathopabāhukaratalasandhis+darśitā -> tathopabāhukaratalasandhir darśitā

surāṇām+bāhūpabāhuparvasandhis -> surāṇāṃ bāhūpabāhuparvasandhis

surāṇāṃ bāhūpabāhuparvasandhis+kulam| -> surāṇāṃ bāhūpabāhuparvasandhiḥ kulam|

siddhānām+muṣṭibandhas -> siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandhas

siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandhas+darśitas -> siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandho darśitas

siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandho darśitas+kulam -> siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandho darśitaḥ kulam

siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandho darśitaḥ kulam+bhavati| -> siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandho darśitaḥ kulaṃ bhavati|

tathā+ūrdhvam -> tathordhvam

tathordhvam+caturaṅgulībhis -> tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhis

tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhis+muṣṭibandhas -> tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhas

tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhas+karatalam -> tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalam

tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalam+prakaṭitam -> tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalaṃ prakaṭitam

tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalaṃ prakaṭitam+darśitam -> tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalaṃ prakaṭitaṃ darśitam

tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalaṃ prakaṭitaṃ darśitam+rākṣasānām -> tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalaṃ prakaṭitaṃ darśitaṃ rākṣasānām

tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalaṃ prakaṭitaṃ darśitaṃ rākṣasānām+kulam -> tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalaṃ prakaṭitaṃ darśitaṃ rākṣasānāṃ kulam

tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalaṃ prakaṭitaṃ darśitaṃ rākṣasānāṃ kulam+syāt| -> tathordhvaṃ caturaṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhaḥ karatalaṃ prakaṭitaṃ darśitaṃ rākṣasānāṃ kulaṃ syāt|

kulam+bhavati| -> kulaṃ bhavati|

bhūtānām+kaniṣṭhā -> bhūtānāṃ kaniṣṭhā

śṛṅgiṇām+muṣṭibandhāt|| -> śṛṅgiṇāṃ muṣṭibandhāt||

dve+ardhavakre -> dve 'rdhavakre

hi+ubhayakaratalam -> hy ubhayakaratalam

hy ubhayakaratalam+jātimudrā -> hy ubhayakaratalaṃ jātimudrā

varakulam+parvasandhis -> varakulaṃ parvasandhis

varakulaṃ parvasandhis+surāṇām| -> varakulaṃ parvasandhiḥ surāṇām|

siddhānām+muṣṭibandhas -> siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandhas

siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandhas+bhavati -> siddhānāṃ muṣṭibandho bhavati

pravarakaratalam+rākṣasānām -> pravarakaratalaṃ rākṣasānām

pravarakaratalaṃ rākṣasānām+kulam -> pravarakaratalaṃ rākṣasānāṃ kulam

pravarakaratalaṃ rākṣasānāṃ kulam+syāt -> pravarakaratalaṃ rākṣasānāṃ kulaṃ syāt

bhūtānām+śrīkaniṣṭhā -> bhūtānāṃ śrīkaniṣṭhā

kulam+bhavati|| -> kulaṃ bhavati||

evam+phaṇīnām -> evaṃ phaṇīnām

evaṃ phaṇīnām+anāmikā -> evaṃ phaṇīnām anāmikā

kulam+bhavati| -> kulaṃ bhavati|

gandharvāṇām+muṣṭibandhāt -> gandharvāṇāṃ muṣṭibandhāt

gandharvāṇāṃ muṣṭibandhāt+madhyamā -> gandharvāṇāṃ muṣṭibandhān madhyamā

guhyakānām+yakṣāṇām -> guhyakānāṃ yakṣāṇām

guhyakānāṃ yakṣāṇām+kulamudrā| -> guhyakānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ kulamudrā|

sarvāsām+ḍākinīnām -> sarvāsāṃ ḍākinīnām

sarvāsāṃ ḍākinīnām+sādhāraṇam -> sarvāsāṃ ḍākinīnāṃ sādhāraṇam

sarvāsāṃ ḍākinīnāṃ sādhāraṇam+aṅguṣṭhadarśanam -> sarvāsāṃ ḍākinīnāṃ sādhāraṇam aṅguṣṭhadarśanam

sarvāsāṃ ḍākinīnāṃ sādhāraṇam aṅguṣṭhadarśanam+vajramuṣṭyupari -> sarvāsāṃ ḍākinīnāṃ sādhāraṇam aṅguṣṭhadarśanaṃ vajramuṣṭyupari

idānīm+kulamudrā -> idānīṃ kulamudrā

idānīṃ kulamudrā+ucyate---aṅguṣṭha -> idānīṃ kulamudrocyate---aṅguṣṭha

idānīṃ kulamudrocyate---aṅguṣṭha+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ kulamudrocyate---aṅguṣṭhetyādinā|

bhagavatas+cihnamudrā| -> bhagavataś cihnamudrā|

bhavati+iti -> bhavatīti

vā+aṅguṣṭhayogas -> vāṅguṣṭhayogas

vāṅguṣṭhayogas+tarjanīyogas -> vāṅguṣṭhayogas tarjanīyogas

vāṅguṣṭhayogas tarjanīyogas+valayas -> vāṅguṣṭhayogas tarjanīyogo valayas

vāṅguṣṭhayogas tarjanīyogo valayas+iva -> vāṅguṣṭhayogas tarjanīyogo valaya iva

śeṣāṅgulībhis+muṣṭibandhas -> śeṣāṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhas

śeṣāṅgulībhir muṣṭibandhas+iti -> śeṣāṅgulībhir muṣṭibandha iti

tābhyām+valayam -> tābhyāṃ valayam

tābhyāṃ valayam+iva -> tābhyāṃ valayam iva

tathā+ubhayahastayos -> tathobhayahastayos

tathobhayahastayos+aṅguṣṭhe -> tathobhayahastayor aṅguṣṭhe

madhyamā+anāmikā -> madhyamānāmikā

gandharvāṇām+phaṇīnām -> gandharvāṇāṃ phaṇīnām

gandharvāṇāṃ phaṇīnām+kramapariracitā -> gandharvāṇāṃ phaṇīnāṃ kramapariracitā

varakulam+tarjanī -> varakulaṃ tarjanī

aṅguṣṭhas+ḍākinīnām -> aṅguṣṭho ḍākinīnām

aṅguṣṭho ḍākinīnām+bhavati -> aṅguṣṭho ḍākinīnāṃ bhavati

tarjanīdvandvayogas+| -> tarjanīdvandvayogaḥ|

tadvat+keyūrayugme -> tadvat keyūrayugme

valayam+iva -> valayam iva

melāpakas+kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhāyās -> melāpakaḥ kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhāyās

melāpakaḥ kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhāyās+muṣṭibandhas -> melāpakaḥ kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhāyā muṣṭibandhas

melāpakaḥ kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhāyā muṣṭibandhas+iti -> melāpakaḥ kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhāyā muṣṭibandha iti

mekhalāyām+tryaṅgulyas -> mekhalāyāṃ tryaṅgulyas

mekhalāyāṃ tryaṅgulyas+anāmāmadhyamātarjanyas -> mekhalāyāṃ tryaṅgulyo 'nāmāmadhyamātarjanyas

mekhalāyāṃ tryaṅgulyo 'nāmāmadhyamātarjanyas+vāmasavyayos -> mekhalāyāṃ tryaṅgulyo 'nāmāmadhyamātarjanyo vāmasavyayos

mekhalāyāṃ tryaṅgulyo 'nāmāmadhyamātarjanyo vāmasavyayos+aṅgulyagre -> mekhalāyāṃ tryaṅgulyo 'nāmāmadhyamātarjanyo vāmasavyayor aṅgulyagre

evam+kaṇṭhikāmudrā| -> evaṃ kaṇṭhikāmudrā|

pṛṣṭhe+aṅgulīnām -> pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnām

pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnām+kramapariracitam -> pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitam

pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitam+parasparam -> pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ parasparam

pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ parasparam+bandhanam -> pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ parasparaṃ bandhanam

pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ parasparaṃ bandhanam+kaṇṭhikāyām| -> pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ parasparaṃ bandhanaṃ kaṇṭhikāyām|

ubhayahastayos+viṣamakarataladeśas -> ubhayahastayor viṣamakarataladeśas

ubhayahastayor viṣamakarataladeśas+pañcāṅgulīnām -> ubhayahastayor viṣamakarataladeśaḥ pañcāṅgulīnām

ubhayahastayor viṣamakarataladeśaḥ pañcāṅgulīnām+pṛṣṭhatas -> ubhayahastayor viṣamakarataladeśaḥ pañcāṅgulīnāṃ pṛṣṭhatas

ubhayahastayor viṣamakarataladeśaḥ pañcāṅgulīnāṃ pṛṣṭhatas+kuṇḍaleṣu -> ubhayahastayor viṣamakarataladeśaḥ pañcāṅgulīnāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuṇḍaleṣu

ubhayahastayor viṣamakarataladeśaḥ pañcāṅgulīnāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuṇḍaleṣu+iti -> ubhayahastayor viṣamakarataladeśaḥ pañcāṅgulīnāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuṇḍaleṣv iti

bhavati+iti -> bhavatīti

bhavatīti+ūrdhvatarjanīdvandvayogas -> bhavatīty ūrdhvatarjanīdvandvayogas

bhavatīty ūrdhvatarjanīdvandvayogas+| -> bhavatīty ūrdhvatarjanīdvandvayogaḥ|

hastābhyām+śaṅkhamudrā -> hastābhyāṃ śaṅkhamudrā

tryaṅgulyanyonyayogobhayakarakuṭilādyantayos+mekhalāyām|| -> tryaṅgulyanyonyayogobhayakarakuṭilādyantayor mekhalāyām||

pṛṣṭhe+aṅgulīnām -> pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnām

pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnām+kramapariracitam -> pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitam

pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitam+bandhanam -> pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ bandhanam

pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ bandhanam+kaṇṭhikāyām -> pṛṣṭhe 'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ bandhanaṃ kaṇṭhikāyām

karatalayos+pṛṣṭhatas -> karatalayoḥ pṛṣṭhatas

karatalayoḥ pṛṣṭhatas+kuṇḍalam -> karatalayoḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuṇḍalam

pañcāṅgulyaikayogas+api -> pañcāṅgulyaikayogo 'pi

hastābhyām+śaṅkhamudrā -> hastābhyāṃ śaṅkhamudrā

kuñcitā+iti -> kuñciteti

brahmaśirasi+aṅguṣṭhādyās -> brahmaśirasy aṅguṣṭhādyās

brahmaśirasy aṅguṣṭhādyās+catasras -> brahmaśirasy aṅguṣṭhādyāś catasras

brahmaśirasy aṅguṣṭhādyāś catasras+samamukhās -> brahmaśirasy aṅguṣṭhādyāś catasraḥ samamukhās

brahmaśirasy aṅguṣṭhādyāś catasraḥ samamukhās+dvandvayogena -> brahmaśirasy aṅguṣṭhādyāś catasraḥ samamukhā dvandvayogena

brahmaśirasy aṅguṣṭhādyāś catasraḥ samamukhā dvandvayogena+adhomukhā -> brahmaśirasy aṅguṣṭhādyāś catasraḥ samamukhā dvandvayogenādhomukhā

evam+śṛṅkhalāmudrā -> evaṃ śṛṅkhalāmudrā

evaṃ śṛṅkhalāmudrā+iti| -> evaṃ śṛṅkhalāmudreti|

tarjanyādikam+kṛtvā -> tarjanyādikaṃ kṛtvā

darpaṇamudrāyām+aṅgulīkam -> darpaṇamudrāyām aṅgulīkam

darpaṇamudrāyām aṅgulīkam+acchidram -> darpaṇamudrāyām aṅgulīkam acchidram

darpaṇamudrāyām aṅgulīkam acchidram+tathā -> darpaṇamudrāyām aṅgulīkam acchidraṃ tathā

ādarśābhimukham+susamakaratalam -> ādarśābhimukhaṃ susamakaratalam

ādarśābhimukhaṃ susamakaratalaṃ vāmā+iti -> ādarśābhimukhaṃ susamakaratalaṃ vāmeti

śaṅkhamudrā+iti| -> śaṅkhamudreti|

tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayos+yogas -> tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayor yogas

tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayor yogo 'ṅguṣṭhādhas+kaniṣṭhādimuṣṭis -> tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayor yogo 'ṅguṣṭhādhaḥ kaniṣṭhādimuṣṭis

evam+padmamudrā -> evaṃ padmamudrā

evaṃ padmamudrā+iti| -> evaṃ padmamudreti|

evam+aṅgulīnām -> evam aṅgulīnām

evam aṅgulīnām+vikāsas -> evam aṅgulīnāṃ vikāsas

evam aṅgulīnāṃ vikāsas+caturdalakamalavat -> evam aṅgulīnāṃ vikāsaś caturdalakamalavat

evam aṅgulīnāṃ vikāsaś caturdalakamalavat+ubhayahastābhyām -> evam aṅgulīnāṃ vikāsaś caturdalakamalavad ubhayahastābhyām

evam aṅgulīnāṃ vikāsaś caturdalakamalavad ubhayahastābhyām+aṣṭadalam -> evam aṅgulīnāṃ vikāsaś caturdalakamalavad ubhayahastābhyām aṣṭadalam

kuñcitādhas+kaniṣṭhā|| -> kuñcitādhaḥ kaniṣṭhā||

saṃmukhaṃ syāt susamakaratalam+sāṅgulīkam -> saṃmukhaṃ syāt susamakaratalaṃ sāṅgulīkam

anāme 'dhas+śarasamāśliṣṭe -> anāme 'dhaḥ śarasamāśliṣṭe

kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhābhyām+muṣṭis -> kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ muṣṭis

kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ muṣṭis+tarjanī -> kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ muṣṭis tarjanī

vakrā+atyantam -> vakrātyantam

vakrātyantam+iti -> vakrātyantam iti

vakrātyantam iti+aṅkuśamudrā| -> vakrātyantam ity aṅkuśamudrā|

vajramuṣṭibandhas+tarjanīmuṣṭyūrdhvam -> vajramuṣṭibandhas tarjanīmuṣṭyūrdhvam

vajramuṣṭibandhas tarjanīmuṣṭyūrdhvam+aṅkuśākārā -> vajramuṣṭibandhas tarjanīmuṣṭyūrdhvam aṅkuśākārā

tarjanyadhas+iti% -> tarjanyadha iti%

aṅguṣṭham+madhyamordhve -> aṅguṣṭhaṃ madhyamordhve

karṇordhvam+muṣṭibandhas -> karṇordhvaṃ muṣṭibandhas

karṇordhvaṃ muṣṭibandhas+varaśaramudrāyām| -> karṇordhvaṃ muṣṭibandho varaśaramudrāyām|

susamakaratale+aṅguṣṭhasāras -> susamakaratale 'ṅguṣṭhasāras

susamakaratale 'ṅguṣṭhasāras+kuṭhāre|| -> susamakaratale 'ṅguṣṭhasāraḥ kuṭhāre||

tiryaṅmuṣṭis+ca -> tiryaṅmuṣṭiś ca

madhyamordhvam+ca -> madhyamordhvaṃ ca

muṣṭibandhas+| -> muṣṭibandhaḥ|

tathā+eva -> tathaiva

tathaiva+aṅkuśe -> tathaivāṅkuśe

varaśaras+aṅguṣṭhakam -> varaśaro 'ṅguṣṭhakam

varaśaro 'ṅguṣṭhakam+madhyamordhve -> varaśaro 'ṅguṣṭhakaṃ madhyamordhve

karṇordhvam+muṣṭibandhas -> karṇordhvaṃ muṣṭibandhas

karṇordhvaṃ muṣṭibandhas+bhavati -> karṇordhvaṃ muṣṭibandho bhavati

durdāntānām+iti -> durdāntānām iti

śrīkartyām+muṣṭibandhas -> śrīkartyāṃ muṣṭibandhas

śrīkartyāṃ muṣṭibandhas+bhavati -> śrīkartyāṃ muṣṭibandho bhavati

saptami+iti -> saptamīti

punar+ardhamuṣṭyā -> punar ardhamuṣṭyā

tathā+aṅguṣṭhamuṣṭyardham -> tathāṅguṣṭhamuṣṭyardham

tathāṅguṣṭhamuṣṭyardham+tarjanyādyās -> tathāṅguṣṭhamuṣṭyardhaṃ tarjanyādyās

tathāṅguṣṭhamuṣṭyardhaṃ tarjanyādyās+iti -> tathāṅguṣṭhamuṣṭyardhaṃ tarjanyādyā iti

śliṣṭe+iti -> śliṣṭa iti

śliṣṭa iti+ūrdhve -> śliṣṭa ity ūrdhve

muṣṭyardham+tīkṣṇakhaḍge -> muṣṭyardhaṃ tīkṣṇakhaḍge

muṣṭyardham+anāmikākaniṣṭhāmuṣṭimadhye -> muṣṭyardham anāmikākaniṣṭhāmuṣṭimadhye

muṣṭyardham anāmikākaniṣṭhāmuṣṭimadhye+aṅguṣṭham -> muṣṭyardham anāmikākaniṣṭhāmuṣṭimadhye 'ṅguṣṭham

muṣṭyardham anāmikākaniṣṭhāmuṣṭimadhye 'ṅguṣṭham+eva -> muṣṭyardham anāmikākaniṣṭhāmuṣṭimadhye 'ṅguṣṭham eva

vāme+adhomuṣṭyā -> vāme 'dhomuṣṭyā

kuliśam+dakṣiṇe -> kuliśaṃ dakṣiṇe

kuliśaṃ dakṣiṇe+ūrdhvakṛtayā| -> kuliśaṃ dakṣiṇa ūrdhvakṛtayā|

śrīkartyām+muṣṭibandhas -> śrīkartyāṃ muṣṭibandhas

śrīkartyāṃ muṣṭibandhas+bhavati -> śrīkartyāṃ muṣṭibandho bhavati

viralās+tu -> viralās tu

viralās tu+ardhamuṣṭyā -> viralās tv ardhamuṣṭyā

tarjanyādyās+triśūlās -> tarjanyādyās triśūlās

tarjanyādyās triśūlās+punar -> tarjanyādyās triśūlāḥ punar

tarjanyādyās triśūlāḥ punar+api -> tarjanyādyās triśūlāḥ punar api

muṣṭyardham+tīkṣṇakhaḍge -> muṣṭyardhaṃ tīkṣṇakhaḍge

kuliśam+vajramuṣṭyā -> kuliśaṃ vajramuṣṭyā

prajñāliṅganāya+iti|| -> prajñāliṅganāyeti||

tathā+ārākārāṅgulīkās -> tathārākārāṅgulīkās

tathārākārāṅgulīkās+ubhayakaragatās -> tathārākārāṅgulīkā ubhayakaragatās

tathārākārāṅgulīkā ubhayakaragatās+aṅguṣṭhakādyās -> tathārākārāṅgulīkā ubhayakaragatā aṅguṣṭhakādyās

tathārākārāṅgulīkā ubhayakaragatā aṅguṣṭhakādyās+samastās -> tathārākārāṅgulīkā ubhayakaragatā aṅguṣṭhakādyāḥ samastās

tathārākārāṅgulīkā ubhayakaragatā aṅguṣṭhakādyāḥ samastās+iti -> tathārākārāṅgulīkā ubhayakaragatā aṅguṣṭhakādyāḥ samastā iti

tathārākārāṅgulīkā ubhayakaragatā aṅguṣṭhakādyāḥ samastā iti+aparā -> tathārākārāṅgulīkā ubhayakaragatā aṅguṣṭhakādyāḥ samastā ity aparā

divyamudrā+api -> divyamudrāpi

divyamudrāpi+iyam -> divyamudrāpīyam

divyamudrāpīyam+pūrvoktā -> divyamudrāpīyaṃ pūrvoktā

divyamudrāpīyaṃ pūrvoktā+iti| -> divyamudrāpīyaṃ pūrvokteti|

vajriṇas+darśanīyā -> vajriṇo darśanīyā

vajriṇo darśanīyā+iti| -> vajriṇo darśanīyeti|

evam+mudrā -> evaṃ mudrā

evaṃ mudrā+iyam -> evaṃ mudreyam

evaṃ mudreyam+pañcaśūkā -> evaṃ mudreyaṃ pañcaśūkā

kuñcite+adhas -> kuñcite 'dhas

kuñcite 'dhas+| -> kuñcite 'dhaḥ|

svakaratalagate+anāmike -> svakaratalagate 'nāmike

madhyamayos+pṛṣṭhabhāge -> madhyamayoḥ pṛṣṭhabhāge

dve+ardhavakre -> dve 'rdhavakre

dve 'rdhavakre+ardhacandrākāre -> dve 'rdhavakre 'rdhacandrākāre

pañcaśūkavajramudrāyās+karasampuṭam -> pañcaśūkavajramudrāyāḥ karasampuṭam

pañcaśūkavajramudrāyāḥ karasampuṭam+kṛtvā -> pañcaśūkavajramudrāyāḥ karasampuṭaṃ kṛtvā

pañcaśūkavajramudrāyāḥ karasampuṭaṃ kṛtvā+aṅguṣṭhau -> pañcaśūkavajramudrāyāḥ karasampuṭaṃ kṛtvāṅguṣṭhau

śliṣṭa+ityādinā| -> śliṣṭetyādinā|

ārākārāṅgulīkās+hi -> ārākārāṅgulīkā hi

ārākārāṅgulīkā hi+ubhayakaratale -> ārākārāṅgulīkā hy ubhayakaratale

ārākārāṅgulīkā hy ubhayakaratale+aṅguṣṭhakādyās -> ārākārāṅgulīkā hy ubhayakaratale 'ṅguṣṭhakādyās

ārākārāṅgulīkā hy ubhayakaratale 'ṅguṣṭhakādyās+samastās -> ārākārāṅgulīkā hy ubhayakaratale 'ṅguṣṭhakādyāḥ samastās

vajriṇas+darśanīyā -> vajriṇo darśanīyā

evaṃ savyāvartena+api -> evaṃ savyāvartenāpi

hṛdaye+sthitā -> NO RULE FOUND (e+s)

evam+tribhuvanavijayā -> evaṃ tribhuvanavijayā

kaniṣṭhayoḥ svayor bandhas+karapṛṣṭhayogena -> kaniṣṭhayoḥ svayor bandhaḥ karapṛṣṭhayogena

tāḍanīyam+anayā -> tāḍanīyam anayā

gatyartham+yoginā -> gatyarthaṃ yoginā

yojanīyam+bhūmyādyam -> yojanīyaṃ bhūmyādyam

yojanīyaṃ bhūmyādyam+maṇḍalārtham -> yojanīyaṃ bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārtham

yojanīyaṃ bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārtham+caraṇam -> yojanīyaṃ bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārthaṃ caraṇam

yojanīyaṃ bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārthaṃ caraṇam+api -> yojanīyaṃ bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārthaṃ caraṇam api

guṇavaśāt+tasya -> guṇavaśāt tasya

svacaraṇam+gamanārtham -> svacaraṇaṃ gamanārtham

svacaraṇaṃ gamanārtham+yat -> svacaraṇaṃ gamanārthaṃ yat

svacaraṇaṃ gamanārthaṃ yat+yat -> svacaraṇaṃ gamanārthaṃ yad yat

svacaraṇaṃ gamanārthaṃ yad yat+kāryopayogyam -> svacaraṇaṃ gamanārthaṃ yad yat kāryopayogyam

svacaraṇaṃ gamanārthaṃ yad yat kāryopayogyam+tat -> svacaraṇaṃ gamanārthaṃ yad yat kāryopayogyaṃ tat

svacaraṇaṃ gamanārthaṃ yad yat kāryopayogyaṃ tat+vastu -> svacaraṇaṃ gamanārthaṃ yad yat kāryopayogyaṃ tad vastu

caraṇam+devatāmūrtau -> caraṇaṃ devatāmūrtau

evam+gurum -> evaṃ gurum

evaṃ gurum+api -> evaṃ gurum api

śodhanīyam+bodhanīyam -> śodhanīyaṃ bodhanīyam

śodhanīyaṃ bodhanīyaṃ pradīpanīyam+iti| -> śodhanīyaṃ bodhanīyaṃ pradīpanīyam iti|

tathā+annam -> tathānnam

tathānnam+pānam -> tathānnaṃ pānam

tathānnaṃ pānam+savīryam -> tathānnaṃ pānaṃ savīryam

tathānnaṃ pānaṃ savīryam+māṃsais -> tathānnaṃ pānaṃ savīryaṃ māṃsais

tathānnaṃ pānaṃ savīryaṃ māṃsais+saha -> tathānnaṃ pānaṃ savīryaṃ māṃsaiḥ saha

kledajam+vā -> kledajaṃ vā

svedajam+vā| -> svedajaṃ vā|

kṣitijam+salilajam -> kṣitijaṃ salilajam

kṣitijaṃ salilajam+samayam -> kṣitijaṃ salilajaṃ samayam

kṣitijaṃ salilajaṃ samayam+garbhajam -> kṣitijaṃ salilajaṃ samayaṃ garbhajam

kṣitijaṃ salilajaṃ samayaṃ garbhajam+vā -> kṣitijaṃ salilajaṃ samayaṃ garbhajaṃ vā

yat+kiṃcit -> yat kiṃcit

yat kiṃcit+grāhyam -> yat kiṃcid grāhyam

yat kiṃcid grāhyam+vastu -> yat kiṃcid grāhyaṃ vastu

tathā+anayā -> tathānayā

bhūmyādyam+maṇḍalārtham -> bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārtham

bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārtham+caraṇam -> bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārthaṃ caraṇam

bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārthaṃ caraṇam+api -> bhūmyādyaṃ maṇḍalārthaṃ caraṇam api

tat+yojanīyam -> tad yojanīyam

guṇavaśāt+tasya -> guṇavaśāt tasya

yat+yat -> yad yat

yad yat+kāryopayogyam -> yad yat kāryopayogyam

yad yat kāryopayogyam+bhavati -> yad yat kāryopayogyaṃ bhavati

caraṇam+mudrayā -> caraṇaṃ mudrayā

annam+pānam -> annaṃ pānam

annaṃ pānam+savīryam -> annaṃ pānaṃ savīryam

annaṃ pānaṃ savīryaṃ gurum+api -> annaṃ pānaṃ savīryaṃ gurum api

kṣitijasalilajam+garbhajam -> kṣitijasalilajaṃ garbhajam

kṣitijasalilajaṃ garbhajam+svedajādyam -> kṣitijasalilajaṃ garbhajaṃ svedajādyam

yat+kiṃcit -> yat kiṃcit

yat kiṃcit+grāhyavastu -> yat kiṃcid grāhyavastu

pādāntaṃ pādanakhaparyantam+eva| -> pādāntaṃ pādanakhaparyantam eva|

uṣṇīṣasahitam+śirasārabhya -> uṣṇīṣasahitaṃ śirasārabhya

sarvāṅgam+sparśanīyam| -> sarvāṅgaṃ sparśanīyam|

hūṃkārajam+pañcaśūkam -> hūṃkārajaṃ pañcaśūkam

hūṃkārajaṃ pañcaśūkam+dhyātvā -> hūṃkārajaṃ pañcaśūkaṃ dhyātvā

anayos+sūryendvos -> anayoḥ sūryendvos

anayoḥ sūryendvos+sampuṭitam -> anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitam

anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitam+vajram -> anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitaṃ vajram

anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitaṃ vajram+bhayakaram -> anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitaṃ vajraṃ bhayakaram

anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitaṃ vajraṃ bhayakaram+karālavajram -> anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitaṃ vajraṃ bhayakaraṃ karālavajram

anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitaṃ vajraṃ bhayakaraṃ karālavajram+krodhajam -> anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitaṃ vajraṃ bhayakaraṃ karālavajraṃ krodhajam

anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitaṃ vajraṃ bhayakaraṃ karālavajraṃ krodhajam+iti| -> anayoḥ sūryendvoḥ sampuṭitaṃ vajraṃ bhayakaraṃ karālavajraṃ krodhajam iti|

evam+dakṣiṇahaste -> evaṃ dakṣiṇahaste

svarās+| -> svarāḥ|

supūrṇam+vimalaśaśadharam -> supūrṇaṃ vimalaśaśadharam

supūrṇaṃ vimalaśaśadharam+pañcadaśakalāparipūrṇam -> supūrṇaṃ vimalaśaśadharaṃ pañcadaśakalāparipūrṇam

iha+akārādipañcadaśasvarātmakam -> ihākārādipañcadaśasvarātmakam

ihākārādipañcadaśasvarātmakam+candramaṇḍalam -> ihākārādipañcadaśasvarātmakaṃ candramaṇḍalam

ihākārādipañcadaśasvarātmakaṃ candramaṇḍalam+vāme -> ihākārādipañcadaśasvarātmakaṃ candramaṇḍalaṃ vāme

supūrṇas+vimalaśaśadharas -> supūrṇo vimalaśaśadharas

supūrṇo vimalaśaśadharas+iti| -> supūrṇo vimalaśaśadhara iti|

mahākavacārtham+vāme -> mahākavacārthaṃ vāme

pādāntam+eva -> pādāntam eva

dhyātvā+aṅgam -> dhyātvāṅgam

dhyātvāṅgam+sparśanīyam -> dhyātvāṅgaṃ sparśanīyam

dhyātvāṅgaṃ sparśanīyam+samukuṭaśirasārabhya -> dhyātvāṅgaṃ sparśanīyaṃ samukuṭaśirasārabhya

sūryendvos+sampuṭastham -> sūryendvoḥ sampuṭastham

sūryendvoḥ sampuṭastham+bhayakarakuliśam -> sūryendvoḥ sampuṭasthaṃ bhayakarakuliśam

sūryendvoḥ sampuṭasthaṃ bhayakarakuliśam+krodhajam -> sūryendvoḥ sampuṭasthaṃ bhayakarakuliśaṃ krodhajam

sūryendvoḥ sampuṭasthaṃ bhayakarakuliśaṃ krodhajam+pañcaśūkam| -> sūryendvoḥ sampuṭasthaṃ bhayakarakuliśaṃ krodhajaṃ pañcaśūkam|

supūrṇas+vimalaśaśadharas -> supūrṇo vimalaśaśadharas

supūrṇo vimalaśaśadharas+dakṣiṇe -> supūrṇo vimalaśaśadharo dakṣiṇe

idānīm+divyamudrā -> idānīṃ divyamudrā

idānīṃ divyamudrā+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ divyamudrocyate---

evam+ṣaṭtathāgatānām -> evaṃ ṣaṭtathāgatānām

evaṃ ṣaṭtathāgatānām+niyamas -> evaṃ ṣaṭtathāgatānāṃ niyamas

evaṃ ṣaṭtathāgatānāṃ niyamas+|| -> evaṃ ṣaṭtathāgatānāṃ niyamaḥ||

madhyamādes+prasāras -> madhyamādeḥ prasāras

madhyamādeḥ prasāras+anāmikāyās -> madhyamādeḥ prasāro 'nāmikāyās

madhyamādeḥ prasāro 'nāmikāyās+kaniṣṭhāyās -> madhyamādeḥ prasāro 'nāmikāyāḥ kaniṣṭhāyās

madhyamādeḥ prasāro 'nāmikāyāḥ kaniṣṭhāyās+kiṃcidūrdhvam -> madhyamādeḥ prasāro 'nāmikāyāḥ kaniṣṭhāyāḥ kiṃcidūrdhvam

madhyamādeḥ prasāro 'nāmikāyāḥ kaniṣṭhāyāḥ kiṃcidūrdhvam+iti -> madhyamādeḥ prasāro 'nāmikāyāḥ kaniṣṭhāyāḥ kiṃcidūrdhvam iti

bhavet+vāmavalayanakhamelāpake -> bhaved vāmavalayanakhamelāpake

kaṭakas+iha -> kaṭaka iha

dakṣiṇakare+api -> dakṣiṇakare 'pi

tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayogas+vāme -> tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayogo vāme

ca+aparā -> cāparā

iyam+bodhyagrīmudrā -> iyaṃ bodhyagrīmudrā

punar+aparā -> punar aparā

muṣṭyā+avasavyamuṣṭau -> muṣṭyāvasavyamuṣṭau

evam+savye -> evaṃ savye

aparam+dakṣiṇam -> aparaṃ dakṣiṇam

aparaṃ dakṣiṇam+karatalam -> aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalam

aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalam+dakṣiṇajānūpari -> aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpari

aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpari+abhayapradam -> aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpary abhayapradam

aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpary abhayapradam+khaḍgapāṇes -> aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpary abhayapradaṃ khaḍgapāṇes

aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpary abhayapradaṃ khaḍgapāṇes+amoghasiddhes -> aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpary abhayapradaṃ khaḍgapāṇer amoghasiddhes

aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpary abhayapradaṃ khaḍgapāṇer amoghasiddhes+abhayamudrā -> aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpary abhayapradaṃ khaḍgapāṇer amoghasiddher abhayamudrā

aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpary abhayapradaṃ khaḍgapāṇer amoghasiddher abhayamudrā+iti| -> aparaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karatalaṃ dakṣiṇajānūpary abhayapradaṃ khaḍgapāṇer amoghasiddher abhayamudreti|

evam+vāmam -> evaṃ vāmam

evaṃ vāmam+karatalam -> evaṃ vāmaṃ karatalam

evaṃ vāmaṃ karatalam+uttānakam -> evaṃ vāmaṃ karatalam uttānakam

evaṃ vāmaṃ karatalam uttānakam+paryaṅkamūrdhni -> evaṃ vāmaṃ karatalam uttānakaṃ paryaṅkamūrdhni

bhavet+madhyamādes -> bhaven madhyamādes

bhaven madhyamādes+prasāras -> bhaven madhyamādeḥ prasāras

bhaven madhyamādeḥ prasāras+|| -> bhaven madhyamādeḥ prasāraḥ||

tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayogas+kaṭakas -> tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayogaḥ kaṭakas

tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayogaḥ kaṭakas+iha -> tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayogaḥ kaṭaka iha

ca+aparā -> cāparā

punar+aparā -> punar aparā

muṣṭyā+avasavyā -> muṣṭyāvasavyā

hi+aparakaratalam -> hy aparakaratalam

hy aparakaratalam+ca -> hy aparakaratalaṃ ca

hy aparakaratalaṃ ca+abhayam -> hy aparakaratalaṃ cābhayam

hy aparakaratalaṃ cābhayam+khaḍgapāṇes -> hy aparakaratalaṃ cābhayaṃ khaḍgapāṇes

vāmam+paryaṅkamūrdhni -> vāmaṃ paryaṅkamūrdhni

samādhimudrā+iti|| -> samādhimudreti||

savyahastas+samagatottānakas -> savyahastaḥ samagatottānakas

savyahastaḥ samagatottānakas+padmapāṇes -> savyahastaḥ samagatottānakaḥ padmapāṇes

savyahastaḥ samagatottānakaḥ padmapāṇes+amitābhasya -> savyahastaḥ samagatottānakaḥ padmapāṇer amitābhasya

evam+paryaṅke -> evaṃ paryaṅke

kim+tu -> kiṃ tu

kiṃ tu+uttānakas -> kiṃ tūttānakas

kiṃ tūttānakas+dakṣiṇakaras -> kiṃ tūttānako dakṣiṇakaras

kiṃ tūttānako dakṣiṇakaras+ratnapāṇes -> kiṃ tūttānako dakṣiṇakaro ratnapāṇes

kiṃ tūttānako dakṣiṇakaro ratnapāṇes+varadamudrā -> kiṃ tūttānako dakṣiṇakaro ratnapāṇer varadamudrā

kiṃ tūttānako dakṣiṇakaro ratnapāṇer varadamudrā+iti| -> kiṃ tūttānako dakṣiṇakaro ratnapāṇer varadamudreti|

tena+eva -> tenaiva

evam+bhūsparśā -> evaṃ bhūsparśā

evaṃ bhūsparśā+akṣobhyamudrā -> evaṃ bhūsparśākṣobhyamudrā

evaṃ bhūsparśākṣobhyamudrā+iti| -> evaṃ bhūsparśākṣobhyamudreti|

vāmahastas+bhavati -> vāmahasto bhavati

vāmahasto bhavati+uttānakas -> vāmahasto bhavaty uttānakas

vāmahasto bhavaty uttānakas+dakṣiṇas -> vāmahasto bhavaty uttānako dakṣiṇas

vāmahasto bhavaty uttānako dakṣiṇas+bhuvigatas -> vāmahasto bhavaty uttānako dakṣiṇo bhuvigatas

vāmahasto bhavaty uttānako dakṣiṇo bhuvigatas+dakṣiṇajānudeśāt -> vāmahasto bhavaty uttānako dakṣiṇo bhuvigato dakṣiṇajānudeśāt

vāmahasto bhavaty uttānako dakṣiṇo bhuvigato dakṣiṇajānudeśāt+bhūsparśam -> vāmahasto bhavaty uttānako dakṣiṇo bhuvigato dakṣiṇajānudeśād bhūsparśam

vāmahasto bhavaty uttānako dakṣiṇo bhuvigato dakṣiṇajānudeśād bhūsparśam+yāvat| -> vāmahasto bhavaty uttānako dakṣiṇo bhuvigato dakṣiṇajānudeśād bhūsparśaṃ yāvat|

pūrvam+paryaṅkam -> pūrvaṃ paryaṅkam

pūrvaṃ paryaṅkam+kṛtvā -> pūrvaṃ paryaṅkaṃ kṛtvā

idānīm+akṣobhyamudrā -> idānīm akṣobhyamudrā

idānīm akṣobhyamudrā+ucyate| -> idānīm akṣobhyamudrocyate|

savyāvasavyos+mūrdhni -> savyāvasavyor mūrdhni

vajramuṣṭibandhas+aṅguṣṭhau -> vajramuṣṭibandho 'ṅguṣṭhau

iha+ubhayakareṇa -> ihobhayakareṇa

savyahastas+bhavatisamagatottānakas -> savyahasto bhavatisamagatottānakas

savyahasto bhavatisamagatottānakas+padmapāṇes -> savyahasto bhavatisamagatottānakaḥ padmapāṇes

savyahasto bhavatisamagatottānakaḥ padmapāṇes+|| -> savyahasto bhavatisamagatottānakaḥ padmapāṇeḥ||

varadakaras+dakṣiṇas -> varadakaro dakṣiṇas

varadakaro dakṣiṇas+ratnapāṇes -> varadakaro dakṣiṇo ratnapāṇes

bhūsparśā+akṣobhyamudrā -> bhūsparśākṣobhyamudrā

bhuvigatas+dakṣiṇas -> bhuvigato dakṣiṇas

bhuvigato dakṣiṇas+jānudeśāt| -> bhuvigato dakṣiṇo jānudeśāt|

vāmahastas+bhavati -> vāmahasto bhavati

jinapates+vajramudrā -> jinapater vajramudrā

jinapater vajramudrā+ūrumūrdhni -> jinapater vajramudrorumūrdhni

idānīm+jinapates -> idānīṃ jinapates

idānīṃ jinapates+mudrā -> idānīṃ jinapater mudrā

idānīṃ jinapater mudrā+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ jinapater mudrocyate---

tadvat+eva -> tadvad eva

tadvad eva+iti -> tadvad eveti

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

vajramuṣṭibandhas+iti -> vajramuṣṭibandha iti

niyamitas+muṣṭibandhe -> niyamito muṣṭibandhe

vajrabandhas+iti -> vajrabandha iti

evam+bandhokte -> evaṃ bandhokte

gandharūparasasparśaśabdaguṇavaśāt+iti -> gandharūparasasparśaśabdaguṇavaśād iti

evam+mudrābandhārtham -> evaṃ mudrābandhārtham

evaṃ mudrābandhārtham+nāmabhedas -> evaṃ mudrābandhārthaṃ nāmabhedas

evaṃ mudrābandhārthaṃ nāmabhedas+bhavati -> evaṃ mudrābandhārthaṃ nāmabhedo bhavati

veditavyā+ācāryopadeśena -> veditavyācāryopadeśena

veditavyācāryopadeśena+iti| -> veditavyācāryopadeśeneti|

sakalaguṇanidhis+ākāśadhātutvāt| -> sakalaguṇanidhir ākāśadhātutvāt|

tasyās+anāmikāyās -> tasyā anāmikāyās

tasyā anāmikāyās+ante -> tasyā anāmikāyā ante

caturthī+anāmikā -> caturthy anāmikā

vṛddhā+aṅguṣṭhas -> vṛddhāṅguṣṭhas

vṛddhāṅguṣṭhas+tatas -> vṛddhāṅguṣṭhas tatas

vṛddhāṅguṣṭhas tatas+dvitīyā -> vṛddhāṅguṣṭhas tato dvitīyā

niyamitas+muṣṭibandhe -> niyamito muṣṭibandhe

vajrabandhas+bhavati -> vajrabandho bhavati

guṇavaśāt+aṅgulīnām -> guṇavaśād aṅgulīnām

guṇavaśād aṅgulīnām+krameṇa -> guṇavaśād aṅgulīnāṃ krameṇa

mudrārtham+nāmabhedas -> mudrārthaṃ nāmabhedas

mudrārthaṃ nāmabhedas+bhavati -> mudrārthaṃ nāmabhedo bhavati

sakalaguṇanidhis+yoginā -> sakalaguṇanidhir yoginā

madhyamā+anāmikā -> madhyamānāmikā

punar+api -> punar api

aṅguṣṭhas+tarjanī -> aṅguṣṭhas tarjanī

mudrābandhārtham+vṛddhāṅguṣṭhakādipañcāṅgulīnām -> mudrābandhārthaṃ vṛddhāṅguṣṭhakādipañcāṅgulīnām

mudrābandhārthaṃ vṛddhāṅguṣṭhakādipañcāṅgulīnām+saṃjñās -> mudrābandhārthaṃ vṛddhāṅguṣṭhakādipañcāṅgulīnāṃ saṃjñās

mudrābandhārthaṃ vṛddhāṅguṣṭhakādipañcāṅgulīnāṃ saṃjñās+iti--- -> mudrābandhārthaṃ vṛddhāṅguṣṭhakādipañcāṅgulīnāṃ saṃjñā iti---

sarvam+mudrādṛṣṭyaṅgacchomakam|| -> sarvaṃ mudrādṛṣṭyaṅgacchomakam||

yathoddhṛtam+mahātantrāt -> yathoddhṛtaṃ mahātantrāt

yathoddhṛtaṃ mahātantrāt+svalpatantreṇa -> yathoddhṛtaṃ mahātantrāt svalpatantreṇa

kālacakram+tam -> kālacakraṃ tam

kālacakraṃ tam+vakṣye -> kālacakraṃ taṃ vakṣye

dṛṣṭibhis+| -> dṛṣṭibhiḥ|

daityendrās+karamudrābhis -> daityendrāḥ karamudrābhis

daityendrāḥ karamudrābhis+trāsitās -> daityendrāḥ karamudrābhis trāsitās

daityendrāḥ karamudrābhis trāsitās+yena -> daityendrāḥ karamudrābhis trāsitā yena

mūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām+dvādaśasāhasrikāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām+pratiṣṭhāgaṇacakravidhiyogacaryāmahoddeśas -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāgaṇacakravidhiyogacaryāmahoddeśas

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāgaṇacakravidhiyogacaryāmahoddeśas+pañcamas -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāgaṇacakravidhiyogacaryāmahoddeśaḥ pañcamas

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāgaṇacakravidhiyogacaryāmahoddeśaḥ pañcamas+|| -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāgaṇacakravidhiyogacaryāmahoddeśaḥ pañcamaḥ||

tathāgataniyamas+|| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ||

sāmarthyatas+sakāśāt -> sāmarthyataḥ sakāśāt

sāmarthyataḥ sakāśāt+iti -> sāmarthyataḥ sakāśād iti

tatas+lokātikrāntām -> tato lokātikrāntām

tato lokātikrāntām+karotu -> tato lokātikrāntāṃ karotu

yāvat+siddhis -> yāvat siddhis

yāvat siddhis+bhavati| -> yāvat siddhir bhavati|

manasas+tām -> manasas tām

manasas tām+caryām -> manasas tāṃ caryām

manasas tāṃ caryām+karotu -> manasas tāṃ caryāṃ karotu

siddhyarthahetos+sakalaguṇanidhis -> siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhis

siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhis+labdhatattvas -> siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhir labdhatattvas

siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhir labdhatattvas+narendra -> siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhir labdhatattvo narendra

akaluṣahṛdayas+paṇḍitas -> akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitas

akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitas+chātras -> akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitaś chātras

akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitaś chātras+vā -> akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitaś chātro vā

kaulas+vā| -> kaulo vā|

vā+unmattarūpas -> vonmattarūpas

vonmattarūpas+vā -> vonmattarūpo vā

śuddhas+| -> śuddhaḥ|

kṣetrapālas+vā -> kṣetrapālo vā

sitapaṭas+vā -> sitapaṭo vā

luptakeśas+kṣapaṇakas -> luptakeśaḥ kṣapaṇakas

luptakeśaḥ kṣapaṇakas+vā -> luptakeśaḥ kṣapaṇako vā

brāhmaṇas+vā -> brāhmaṇo vā

snātakas+vā -> snātako vā

snātako vā+iti| -> snātako veti|

bhagavas+vā -> bhagavo vā

paramahaṃsas+| -> paramahaṃsaḥ|

nagnas+bhavatu -> nagno bhavatu

śaivas+vā -> śaivo vā

śaivo vā+atha -> śaivo vātha

labdhatattvābhiṣekas+bauddhas -> labdhatattvābhiṣeko bauddhas

labdhatattvābhiṣeko bauddhas+vā -> labdhatattvābhiṣeko bauddho vā

sādhakas+devatādevatīnām -> sādhako devatādevatīnām

sādhako devatādevatīnām+hariharādīnām -> sādhako devatādevatīnāṃ hariharādīnām

sādhako devatādevatīnāṃ hariharādīnām+carcikādīnām -> sādhako devatādevatīnāṃ hariharādīnāṃ carcikādīnām

sādhako devatādevatīnāṃ hariharādīnāṃ carcikādīnām+maṇḍalaviśodhitānām -> sādhako devatādevatīnāṃ hariharādīnāṃ carcikādīnāṃ maṇḍalaviśodhitānām

sādhako devatādevatīnāṃ hariharādīnāṃ carcikādīnāṃ maṇḍalaviśodhitānām+tena -> sādhako devatādevatīnāṃ hariharādīnāṃ carcikādīnāṃ maṇḍalaviśodhitānāṃ tena

kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale+abhiṣiktas -> kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktas

kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktas+sarvamaṇḍaleṣu -> kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvamaṇḍaleṣu

kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvamaṇḍaleṣu+abhiṣiktas -> kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvamaṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktas

kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvamaṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktas+tīrthikānām -> kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvamaṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktas tīrthikānām

kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvamaṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktas tīrthikānām+api -> kālacakratantrarājamaṇḍale 'bhiṣiktaḥ sarvamaṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktas tīrthikānām api

bauddhas+ityādinā| -> bauddha ityādinā|

siddhyarthahetos+sakalaguṇanidhis -> siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhis

siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhis+labdhatattvas -> siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhir labdhatattvas

siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhir labdhatattvas+narendra|| -> siddhyarthahetoḥ sakalaguṇanidhir labdhatattvo narendra||

ca+unmattarūpas -> conmattarūpas

conmattarūpas+api -> conmattarūpo 'pi

conmattarūpo 'pi+akaluṣahṛdayas -> conmattarūpo 'py akaluṣahṛdayas

conmattarūpo 'py akaluṣahṛdayas+paṇḍitas -> conmattarūpo 'py akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitas

conmattarūpo 'py akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitas+chātras -> conmattarūpo 'py akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitaś chātras

conmattarūpo 'py akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitaś chātras+eva -> conmattarūpo 'py akaluṣahṛdayaḥ paṇḍitaś chātra eva

kaulas+| -> kaulaḥ|

sitapaṭas+kṣetrapālas -> sitapaṭaḥ kṣetrapālas

sitapaṭaḥ kṣetrapālas+tu -> sitapaṭaḥ kṣetrapālas tu

luptakeśas+bhavatu -> luptakeśo bhavatu

snātakas+brāhmaṇas -> snātako brāhmaṇas

snātako brāhmaṇas+vā -> snātako brāhmaṇo vā

nagnas+bhagavas -> nagno bhagavas

nagno bhagavas+iti -> nagno bhagava iti

bauddhas+śaivas -> bauddhaḥ śaivas

bauddhaḥ śaivas+atha -> bauddhaḥ śaivo 'tha

yoginām+caryādharmas -> yogināṃ caryādharmas

yogināṃ caryādharmas+ucyate--- -> yogināṃ caryādharma ucyate---

idānīm+eṣām -> idānīm eṣām

idānīm eṣām+ārādhanāya -> idānīm eṣām ārādhanāya

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

tadvat+iti -> tadvad iti

evam+saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmais -> evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmais

evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmais+viśodhitam -> evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair viśodhitam

evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair viśodhitam+pīṭhādikam -> evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair viśodhitaṃ pīṭhādikam

evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair viśodhitaṃ pīṭhādikam+dharmakāyalakṣaṇam -> evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair viśodhitaṃ pīṭhādikaṃ dharmakāyalakṣaṇam

evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair viśodhitaṃ pīṭhādikaṃ dharmakāyalakṣaṇam+bhavati -> evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair viśodhitaṃ pīṭhādikaṃ dharmakāyalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati

veditavyās+ḍombyādayas -> veditavyā ḍombyādayas

veditavyā ḍombyādayas+| -> veditavyā ḍombyādayaḥ|

yoginyas+tās -> yoginyas tās

yoginyas tās+samastās -> yoginyas tāḥ samastās

yoginyas tāḥ samastās+kṣititalanilaye -> yoginyas tāḥ samastāḥ kṣititalanilaye

bodhipākṣikās+dharmās -> bodhipākṣikā dharmās

bodhipākṣikā dharmās+ye -> bodhipākṣikā dharmā ye

evam+saptatriṃśatprabhedais -> evaṃ saptatriṃśatprabhedais

evaṃ saptatriṃśatprabhedais+tribhuvananilaye -> evaṃ saptatriṃśatprabhedais tribhuvananilaye

samyaksamādhis+gṛdhrāsyā -> samyaksamādhir gṛdhrāsyā

samyaksamādhir gṛdhrāsyā+iti| -> samyaksamādhir gṛdhrāsyeti|

samyaksmṛtis+śūkarāsyā| -> samyaksmṛtiḥ śūkarāsyā|

samyagvyāyāmas+garuḍāsyā| -> samyagvyāyāmo garuḍāsyā|

samyagājīvas+jambukāsyā| -> samyagājīvo jambukāsyā|

samyakkarmāntas+ulūkāsyā| -> samyakkarmānta ulūkāsyā|

samyagvāk+vyāghrāsyā| -> samyagvāg vyāghrāsyā|

samyaksaṃkalpas+kākāsyā| -> samyaksaṃkalpaḥ kākāsyā|

samyagdṛṣṭis+śvānāsyā| -> samyagdṛṣṭiḥ śvānāsyā|

ca+aṣṭakam -> cāṣṭakam

cāṣṭakam+daityajānām -> cāṣṭakaṃ daityajānām

cāṣṭakaṃ daityajānām+iti| -> cāṣṭakaṃ daityajānām iti|

samyak+ca -> samyak ca

samyak ca+aṣṭāṅgamārgas -> samyak cāṣṭāṅgamārgas

samyak cāṣṭāṅgamārgas+bhavati -> samyak cāṣṭāṅgamārgo bhavati

sarvam+bhavati -> sarvaṃ bhavati

evam+pīṭhādi -> evaṃ pīṭhādi

yoginyas+tās -> yoginyas tās

yoginyas tās+samastās -> yoginyas tāḥ samastās

yoginyas tāḥ samastās+kṣititalanilaye -> yoginyas tāḥ samastāḥ kṣititalanilaye

dharmās+| -> dharmāḥ|

bodhipakṣās+ca -> bodhipakṣāś ca

saptatriṃśatprabhedais+tribhuvananilaye -> saptatriṃśatprabhedais tribhuvananilaye

ca+aṣṭakam -> cāṣṭakam

cāṣṭakam+daityajānām -> cāṣṭakaṃ daityajānām

samyak+ca -> samyak ca

samyak ca+aṣṭāṅgamārgas -> samyak cāṣṭāṅgamārgas

samyak cāṣṭāṅgamārgas+bhavati -> samyak cāṣṭāṅgamārgo bhavati

melāpakam+evam -> melāpakam evam

melāpakam evam+daśakam|| -> melāpakam evaṃ daśakam||

prajñendriyam+raudrākṣī -> prajñendriyaṃ raudrākṣī

prajñendriyaṃ raudrākṣī+iti -> prajñendriyaṃ raudrākṣīti

samādhīndriyam+bhṛkuṭī| -> samādhīndriyaṃ bhṛkuṭī|

smṛtīndriyam+jambhī| -> smṛtīndriyaṃ jambhī|

vīryendriyam+mārīcī| -> vīryendriyaṃ mārīcī|

śraddhendriyam+stambhī| -> śraddhendriyaṃ stambhī|

pañca+iti| -> pañceti|

prakaṭitaniyatāni+indriyāṇi -> prakaṭitaniyatānīndriyāṇi

prakaṭitaniyatānīndriyāṇi+eva -> prakaṭitaniyatānīndriyāṇy eva

prajñābalam+cundā -> prajñābalaṃ cundā

prajñābalaṃ cundā+iti -> prajñābalaṃ cundeti

prajñābalaṃ cundeti+upamelāpakam| -> prajñābalaṃ cundety upamelāpakam|

samādhibalam+mānī| -> samādhibalaṃ mānī|

smṛtibalam+vajraśṛṅkhalā| -> smṛtibalaṃ vajraśṛṅkhalā|

vīryabalam+atibalā| -> vīryabalam atibalā|

śraddhābalam+atinīlā| -> śraddhābalam atinīlā|

krodhabalāni+iti| -> krodhabalānīti|

chandohabhedas+iti -> chandohabheda iti

chandohabheda iti+aṣṭakam -> chandohabheda ity aṣṭakam

chandohabheda ity aṣṭakam+syāt| -> chandohabheda ity aṣṭakaṃ syāt|

mīmāṃsā{}ṛddhipādas+kaumārī -> mīmāṃsā{}ṛddhipādaḥ kaumārī

mīmāṃsā{}ṛddhipādaḥ kaumārī+iti -> mīmāṃsā{}ṛddhipādaḥ kaumārīti

citta{}ṛddhipādas+vārāhī| -> citta{}ṛddhipādo vārāhī|

vīrya{}ṛddhipādas+aindrī| -> vīrya{}ṛddhipāda aindrī|

cchanda{}ṛddhipādas+brahmāṇī| -> cchanda{}ṛddhipādo brahmāṇī|

aparajaladhayas+catasras -> aparajaladhayaś catasras

aparajaladhayaś catasras+devyas -> aparajaladhayaś catasro devyas

aparajaladhayaś catasro devyas+ṛddhipādās -> aparajaladhayaś catasro devya ṛddhipādās

aparajaladhayaś catasro devya ṛddhipādās+bhavanti| -> aparajaladhayaś catasro devya ṛddhipādā bhavanti|

upacchandohās+catvāras -> upacchandohāś catvāras

upacchandohāś catvāras+| -> upacchandohāś catvāraḥ|

utpannākuśalānām+buddhatvapariṇāmanāprahāṇam -> utpannākuśalānāṃ buddhatvapariṇāmanāprahāṇam

utpannākuśalānāṃ buddhatvapariṇāmanāprahāṇam+mahālakṣmīs -> utpannākuśalānāṃ buddhatvapariṇāmanāprahāṇaṃ mahālakṣmīs

utpannākuśalānāṃ buddhatvapariṇāmanāprahāṇaṃ mahālakṣmīs+| -> utpannākuśalānāṃ buddhatvapariṇāmanāprahāṇaṃ mahālakṣmīḥ|

anutpannānām+akuśalānām -> anutpannānām akuśalānām

anutpannānām akuśalānām+prahāṇam -> anutpannānām akuśalānāṃ prahāṇam

anutpannānām akuśalānāṃ prahāṇam+kuśalotpādanam -> anutpannānām akuśalānāṃ prahāṇaṃ kuśalotpādanam

anutpannānām akuśalānāṃ prahāṇaṃ kuśalotpādanam+māheśvarī| -> anutpannānām akuśalānāṃ prahāṇaṃ kuśalotpādanaṃ māheśvarī|

utpannānām+pāpānām -> utpannānāṃ pāpānām

utpannānāṃ pāpānām+prahāṇam -> utpannānāṃ pāpānāṃ prahāṇam

utpannānāṃ pāpānāṃ prahāṇam+kuśalamūlam -> utpannānāṃ pāpānāṃ prahāṇaṃ kuśalamūlam

utpannānāṃ pāpānāṃ prahāṇaṃ kuśalamūlam+vaiṣṇavī| -> utpannānāṃ pāpānāṃ prahāṇaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ vaiṣṇavī|

prahāṇam+carcikā| -> prahāṇaṃ carcikā|

anutpannānām+pāpānām -> anutpannānāṃ pāpānām

anutpannānāṃ pāpānām+anutpādāya -> anutpannānāṃ pāpānām anutpādāya

tathā+abdhis -> tathābdhis

tathābdhis+samyakprahāṇāni -> tathābdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāni

tathābdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāni+iti| -> tathābdhiḥ samyakprahāṇānīti|

kṣetram+dvidhā| -> kṣetraṃ dvidhā|

samādhisambodhyaṅgam+dharmadhātuvajrā -> samādhisambodhyaṅgaṃ dharmadhātuvajrā

samādhisambodhyaṅgaṃ dharmadhātuvajrā+iti| -> samādhisambodhyaṅgaṃ dharmadhātuvajreti|

praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgam+rasavajrā| -> praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgaṃ rasavajrā|

prītisambodhyaṅgam+sparśavajrā| -> prītisambodhyaṅgaṃ sparśavajrā|

upakṣetram+kāyabhedāt| -> upakṣetraṃ kāyabhedāt|

vīryasambodhyaṅgam+rūpavajrā| -> vīryasambodhyaṅgaṃ rūpavajrā|

dharmapravicayasambodhyaṅgam+sparśavajrā| -> dharmapravicayasambodhyaṅgaṃ sparśavajrā|

smṛtisambodhyaṅgam+śabdavajrā| -> smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ śabdavajrā|

śabdavajrādiṣaṭkam+iti| -> śabdavajrādiṣaṭkam iti|

aparam+api -> aparam api

kulapīṭham+upekṣāsambodhyaṅgam -> kulapīṭham upekṣāsambodhyaṅgam

kulapīṭham upekṣāsambodhyaṅgam+iti| -> kulapīṭham upekṣāsambodhyaṅgam iti|

saptabodhyaṅgānām+madhye -> saptabodhyaṅgānāṃ madhye

saptabodhyaṅgānāṃ madhye+ekam -> saptabodhyaṅgānāṃ madhya ekam

saptabodhyaṅgānāṃ madhya ekam+bodhyaṅgam -> saptabodhyaṅgānāṃ madhya ekaṃ bodhyaṅgam

saptabodhyaṅgānāṃ madhya ekaṃ bodhyaṅgam+mātā -> saptabodhyaṅgānāṃ madhya ekaṃ bodhyaṅgaṃ mātā

prasiddham+gopitam -> prasiddhaṃ gopitam

prasiddhaṃ gopitam+bhagavatā -> prasiddhaṃ gopitaṃ bhagavatā

prasiddhaṃ gopitaṃ bhagavatā+iti -> prasiddhaṃ gopitaṃ bhagavateti

prasiddhaṃ gopitaṃ bhagavateti+arthas -> prasiddhaṃ gopitaṃ bhagavatety arthas

prasiddhaṃ gopitaṃ bhagavatety arthas+| -> prasiddhaṃ gopitaṃ bhagavatety arthaḥ|

na+anyasmin -> nānyasmin

nānyasmin+tantre -> nānyasmiṃś tantre

pīṭhopapīṭhadvayam+iti -> pīṭhopapīṭhadvayam iti

vāmapūrvam+kāyabhedena -> vāmapūrvaṃ kāyabhedena

dharmānusmṛtyupasthānam+tārā -> dharmānusmṛtyupasthānaṃ tārā

dharmānusmṛtyupasthānaṃ tārā+iti -> dharmānusmṛtyupasthānaṃ tāreti

cittānusmṛtyupasthānam+māmakī -> cittānusmṛtyupasthānaṃ māmakī

vedanānusmṛtyupasthānam+pāṇḍarā -> vedanānusmṛtyupasthānaṃ pāṇḍarā

vedanānusmṛtyupasthānaṃ pāṇḍarā+iti -> vedanānusmṛtyupasthānaṃ pāṇḍareti

kāyānusmṛtyupasthānam+locanā -> kāyānusmṛtyupasthānaṃ locanā

catasras+devyas -> catasro devyas

catasro devyas+yathākrameṇa -> catasro devyo yathākrameṇa

devyas+arcis -> devyo 'rcis

devyo 'rcis+ityādinā| -> devyo 'rcir ityādinā|

prakaṭitaniyatāni+indriyāṇi -> prakaṭitaniyatānīndriyāṇi

prakaṭitaniyatānīndriyāṇi+eva -> prakaṭitaniyatānīndriyāṇy eva

krodhās+balāni -> krodhā balāni

abdhis+samyakprahāṇāni -> abdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāni

abdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāni+aparajaladhayas -> abdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāny aparajaladhayas

abdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāny aparajaladhayas+ca -> abdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāny aparajaladhayaś ca

abdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāny aparajaladhayaś ca+ṛddhipādāṣṭakam -> abdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāny aparajaladhayaś carddhipādāṣṭakam

abdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāny aparajaladhayaś carddhipādāṣṭakam+syāt -> abdhiḥ samyakprahāṇāny aparajaladhayaś carddhipādāṣṭakaṃ syāt

tu+aparam -> tv aparam

tv aparam+api -> tv aparam api

devyas+arcis -> devyo 'rcis

devyo 'rcis+smṛtyupasthānam -> devyo 'rciḥ smṛtyupasthānam

devyo 'rciḥ smṛtyupasthānam+api -> devyo 'rciḥ smṛtyupasthānam api

idānīm+saptratriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmais -> idānīṃ saptratriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmais

idānīṃ saptratriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmais+yoginīnām -> idānīṃ saptratriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair yoginīnām

idānīṃ saptratriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair yoginīnām+viśuddhis -> idānīṃ saptratriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair yoginīnāṃ viśuddhis

idānīṃ saptratriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair yoginīnāṃ viśuddhis+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ saptratriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmair yoginīnāṃ viśuddhir ucyate---

ca+aṅgulīkāntasīmnas -> cāṅgulīkāntasīmnas

cāṅgulīkāntasīmnas+iti -> cāṅgulīkāntasīmna iti

karacaraṇagatam+api -> karacaraṇagatam api

evam+chandohādikam -> evaṃ chandohādikam

evaṃ chandohādikam+api -> evaṃ chandohādikam api

athavā+ubhayabāhusandhidvayam -> athavobhayabāhusandhidvayam

athavobhayabāhusandhidvayaṃ kṣetram+urusandhidvayam -> athavobhayabāhusandhidvayaṃ kṣetram urusandhidvayam

athavobhayabāhusandhidvayaṃ kṣetram urusandhidvayam+upakṣetram| -> athavobhayabāhusandhidvayaṃ kṣetram urusandhidvayam upakṣetram|

dakṣiṇam+upaśmaśānam| -> dakṣiṇam upaśmaśānam|

melāpakam+dakṣiṇam -> melāpakaṃ dakṣiṇam

melāpakaṃ dakṣiṇam+upamelāpakam| -> melāpakaṃ dakṣiṇam upamelāpakam|

karapādasandhidvayam+vāme -> karapādasandhidvayaṃ vāme

dakṣiṇam+upacchandoham| -> dakṣiṇam upacchandoham|

vāmopabāhusandhis+jānūrusandhis -> vāmopabāhusandhir jānūrusandhis

vāmopabāhusandhir jānūrusandhis+chandoham| -> vāmopabāhusandhir jānūrusandhiś chandoham|

dakṣiṇam+upakṣetram| -> dakṣiṇam upakṣetram|

vāmabāhusandhis+vāmorukaṭisandhis -> vāmabāhusandhir vāmorukaṭisandhis

vāmabāhusandhir vāmorukaṭisandhis+kṣetram| -> vāmabāhusandhir vāmorukaṭisandhiḥ kṣetram|

dakṣiṇam+paścimam -> dakṣiṇaṃ paścimam

dakṣiṇaṃ paścimam+upapīṭham| -> dakṣiṇaṃ paścimam upapīṭham|

pūrvavāmāṅgam+pīṭham| -> pūrvavāmāṅgaṃ pīṭham|

karacaraṇādigatam+aparaviśuddhyā -> karacaraṇādigatam aparaviśuddhyā

dakṣiṇam+upaśmaśānam -> dakṣiṇam upaśmaśānam

dakṣiṇam upaśmaśānam+iti| -> dakṣiṇam upaśmaśānam iti|

vāmakarṇādicchidramalanirgamam+śmaśānam| -> vāmakarṇādicchidramalanirgamaṃ śmaśānam|

karmendriyasamūham+upamelāpakam| -> karmendriyasamūham upamelāpakam|

karmendriyasamūham+melāpakam| -> karmendriyasamūhaṃ melāpakam|

samānodānavyānanāgasamūham+upacchandoham| -> samānodānavyānanāgasamūham upacchandoham|

evam+kūrmakṛkaradevadattadhanaṃjayacatuṣkam -> evaṃ kūrmakṛkaradevadattadhanaṃjayacatuṣkam

evaṃ kūrmakṛkaradevadattadhanaṃjayacatuṣkam+chandoham| -> evaṃ kūrmakṛkaradevadattadhanaṃjayacatuṣkaṃ chandoham|

dakṣiṇendriyasamūham+upakṣetram| -> dakṣiṇendriyasamūham upakṣetram|

vāmendriyasamūham+kṣetram| -> vāmendriyasamūhaṃ kṣetram|

evam+dvidhā -> evaṃ dvidhā

upapīṭham+paścimam -> upapīṭhaṃ paścimam

upapīṭhaṃ paścimam+dakṣiṇāṅgam| -> upapīṭhaṃ paścimaṃ dakṣiṇāṅgam|

pratyekapīṭham+vāmāṅgam -> pratyekapīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgam

pratyekapīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgam+pūrvam| -> pratyekapīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgaṃ pūrvam|

tathā+ubhayaśarīre -> tathobhayaśarīre

evam+śmaśānāṣṭakam -> evaṃ śmaśānāṣṭakam

evaṃ śmaśānāṣṭakam+strīṇām -> evaṃ śmaśānāṣṭakaṃ strīṇām

evaṃ śmaśānāṣṭakaṃ strīṇām+puruṣāṇām -> evaṃ śmaśānāṣṭakaṃ strīṇāṃ puruṣāṇām

evaṃ śmaśānāṣṭakaṃ strīṇāṃ puruṣāṇām+upaśmaśānam -> evaṃ śmaśānāṣṭakaṃ strīṇāṃ puruṣāṇām upaśmaśānam

evaṃ śmaśānāṣṭakaṃ strīṇāṃ puruṣāṇām upaśmaśānam+iti -> evaṃ śmaśānāṣṭakaṃ strīṇāṃ puruṣāṇām upaśmaśānam iti

malanirgamam+śrotradvaye -> malanirgamaṃ śrotradvaye

evam+ghrāṇadvaye -> evaṃ ghrāṇadvaye

evam+strīṇām -> evaṃ strīṇām

evaṃ strīṇām+jihvālambanam -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanam

evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanam+karadvayam -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayam

evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayam+pādadvayam -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayam

evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayam+pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayam -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayam

evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayam+mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam

evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam+etat -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam etat

evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam etat+karmendriyadaśakam -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam etat karmendriyadaśakam

evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam etat karmendriyadaśakam+melāpakam -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam etat karmendriyadaśakaṃ melāpakam

evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam etat karmendriyadaśakaṃ melāpakam+puruṣāṇām -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam etat karmendriyadaśakaṃ melāpakaṃ puruṣāṇām

evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam etat karmendriyadaśakaṃ melāpakaṃ puruṣāṇām+upamelāpakam| -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ jihvālambanaṃ karadvayaṃ pādadvayaṃ pāyusavyetaranāḍīdvayaṃ mūtraśukranāḍīdvayam etat karmendriyadaśakaṃ melāpakaṃ puruṣāṇām upamelāpakam|

strīṇām+samānavāyvaṣṭakam -> strīṇāṃ samānavāyvaṣṭakam

strīṇāṃ samānavāyvaṣṭakam+chandoham -> strīṇāṃ samānavāyvaṣṭakaṃ chandoham

strīṇāṃ samānavāyvaṣṭakaṃ chandoham+puruṣāṇām -> strīṇāṃ samānavāyvaṣṭakaṃ chandohaṃ puruṣāṇām

strīṇāṃ samānavāyvaṣṭakaṃ chandohaṃ puruṣāṇām+upacchandoham| -> strīṇāṃ samānavāyvaṣṭakaṃ chandohaṃ puruṣāṇām upacchandoham|

evam+strīṇām -> evaṃ strīṇām

evaṃ strīṇām+ṣaḍāyatanam -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ ṣaḍāyatanam

evaṃ strīṇāṃ ṣaḍāyatanam+kṣetram -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kṣetram

evaṃ strīṇāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kṣetram+puruṣāṇām -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kṣetraṃ puruṣāṇām

evaṃ strīṇāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kṣetraṃ puruṣāṇām+upakṣetram| -> evaṃ strīṇāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kṣetraṃ puruṣāṇām upakṣetram|

puruṣavajram+bhavati| -> puruṣavajraṃ bhavati|

strīpadmam+bhavati| -> strīpadmaṃ bhavati|

pīṭham+sarvatra -> pīṭhaṃ sarvatra

pīṭham+ityādinā| -> pīṭham ityādinā|

sarvam+karacaraṇagatam -> sarvaṃ karacaraṇagatam

sarvaṃ karacaraṇagatam+ca -> sarvaṃ karacaraṇagataṃ ca

sarvaṃ karacaraṇagataṃ ca+aṅgulīkāntasīmnas -> sarvaṃ karacaraṇagataṃ cāṅgulīkāntasīmnas

sarvaṃ karacaraṇagataṃ cāṅgulīkāntasīmnas+|| -> sarvaṃ karacaraṇagataṃ cāṅgulīkāntasīmnaḥ||

evam+kṣetrādi -> evaṃ kṣetrādi

dakṣiṇam+ca -> dakṣiṇaṃ ca

dakṣiṇaṃ ca+upapīṭham -> dakṣiṇaṃ copapīṭham

pīṭham+vāmāṅgapūrvam -> pīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgapūrvam

pīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgapūrvam+hi -> pīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgapūrvaṃ hi

pīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgapūrvaṃ hi+aparam -> pīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgapūrvaṃ hy aparam

pīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgapūrvaṃ hy aparam+api -> pīṭhaṃ vāmāṅgapūrvaṃ hy aparam api

kṣetram+chandohamelāpakacitibhuvanam -> kṣetraṃ chandohamelāpakacitibhuvanam

kṣetraṃ chandohamelāpakacitibhuvanam+tadvat -> kṣetraṃ chandohamelāpakacitibhuvanaṃ tadvat

kṣetraṃ chandohamelāpakacitibhuvanaṃ tadvat+evam -> kṣetraṃ chandohamelāpakacitibhuvanaṃ tadvad evam

kṣetraṃ chandohamelāpakacitibhuvanaṃ tadvad evam+samastam| -> kṣetraṃ chandohamelāpakacitibhuvanaṃ tadvad evaṃ samastam|

vajram+eva -> vajram eva

vajram eva+upapīṭham -> vajram evopapīṭham

pīṭham+strīguhyapadmam -> pīṭhaṃ strīguhyapadmam

pīṭhaṃ strīguhyapadmam+prabhavati -> pīṭhaṃ strīguhyapadmaṃ prabhavati

idānīm+adhyātmapīṭhādisaṃjñā -> idānīm adhyātmapīṭhādisaṃjñā

idānīm adhyātmapīṭhādisaṃjñā+ucyate--- -> idānīm adhyātmapīṭhādisaṃjñocyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

veditavyam+iti -> veditavyam iti

evam+śūdrādikam -> evaṃ śūdrādikam

evaṃ śūdrādikam+gṛham -> evaṃ śūdrādikaṃ gṛham

evaṃ śūdrādikaṃ gṛham+pīṭhādisaṃjñayā -> evaṃ śūdrādikaṃ gṛhaṃ pīṭhādisaṃjñayā

ḍombīcaṇḍālīgṛham+iti| -> ḍombīcaṇḍālīgṛham iti|

ca+antyajam -> cāntyajam

cāntyajam+hi -> cāntyajaṃ hi

cāntyajaṃ hi+antyajam -> cāntyajaṃ hy antyajam

cāntyajaṃ hy antyajam+vai -> cāntyajaṃ hy antyajaṃ vai

tat+prakaṭitam -> tat prakaṭitam

tat prakaṭitam+avanau -> tat prakaṭitam avanau

paramabhuvigatam+mūlapīṭham -> paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭham

paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭham+suguhyam -> paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭhaṃ suguhyam

paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭhaṃ suguhyam+mātus -> paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭhaṃ suguhyaṃ mātus

paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭhaṃ suguhyaṃ mātus+veśma -> paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭhaṃ suguhyaṃ mātur veśma

śmaśānādyam+aṣṭavidham| -> śmaśānādyam aṣṭavidham|

śvānāsyādyam+veśma -> śvānāsyādyaṃ veśma

melāpakam+jambhikādyam -> melāpakaṃ jambhikādyam

melāpakaṃ jambhikādyam+veśma -> melāpakaṃ jambhikādyaṃ veśma

chandoham+aṣṭavidham| -> chandoham aṣṭavidham|

carcikādyam+veśma -> carcikādyaṃ veśma

kṣetram+ṣaḍvidham| -> kṣetraṃ ṣaḍvidham|

śabdavajrādyam+veśma -> śabdavajrādyaṃ veśma

pīṭham+tārādiveśma -> pīṭhaṃ tārādiveśma

sarvanagaryām+pīṭhādīni -> sarvanagaryāṃ pīṭhādīni

sarvanagaryāṃ pīṭhādīni+uktāni| -> sarvanagaryāṃ pīṭhādīny uktāni|

tāni+eva -> tāny eva

sarvapṛthvīvyāpakatvāt+bhoṭādicīnādiviṣyeṣu -> sarvapṛthvīvyāpakatvād bhoṭādicīnādiviṣyeṣu

sarvapṛthvīvyāpakatvād bhoṭādicīnādiviṣyeṣu+api% -> sarvapṛthvīvyāpakatvād bhoṭādicīnādiviṣyeṣv api%

yena+atra -> yenātra

punar+ekanagaryām -> punar ekanagaryām

punar ekanagaryām+api -> punar ekanagaryām api

ṣaṭtriṃśat+kulāni -> ṣaṭtriṃśat kulāni

vyāpakam+na -> vyāpakaṃ na

tat+eva -> tad eva

pīṭhādikam+uktam| -> pīṭhādikam uktam|

bālānām+deśabhramaṇārtham -> bālānāṃ deśabhramaṇārtham

bālānāṃ deśabhramaṇārtham+jālandharādinā -> bālānāṃ deśabhramaṇārthaṃ jālandharādinā

cāntyajam+hi -> cāntyajaṃ hi

cāntyajaṃ hi+antyajam -> cāntyajaṃ hy antyajam

tat prakaṭitam+avanau -> tat prakaṭitam avanau

śvānāsyādyaṃ śmaśānam+paramabhuvigatam -> śvānāsyādyaṃ śmaśānaṃ paramabhuvigatam

śvānāsyādyaṃ śmaśānaṃ paramabhuvigatam+mūlapīṭham -> śvānāsyādyaṃ śmaśānaṃ paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭham

śvānāsyādyaṃ śmaśānaṃ paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭham+suguhyam -> śvānāsyādyaṃ śmaśānaṃ paramabhuvigataṃ mūlapīṭhaṃ suguhyam

samayās+iti -> samayā iti

prabhedās+āsurīṇām -> prabhedā āsurīṇām

prabhedā āsurīṇām+aṣṭau -> prabhedā āsurīṇām aṣṭau

kṣayas+śvāsaniḥśvāsābhyām -> kṣayaḥ śvāsaniḥśvāsābhyām

kṣayaḥ śvāsaniḥśvāsābhyām+iti -> kṣayaḥ śvāsaniḥśvāsābhyām iti

pṛthivyādīnām+catuṣkam -> pṛthivyādīnāṃ catuṣkam

pṛthivyādīnāṃ catuṣkam+varṇādīnām -> pṛthivyādīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ varṇādīnām

pṛthivyādīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ varṇādīnām+api -> pṛthivyādīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ varṇādīnām api

prabhedās+krodhajānām -> prabhedāḥ krodhajānām

prabhedāḥ krodhajānām+iti| -> prabhedāḥ krodhajānām iti|

ṣaṭ+rasās -> ṣaḍ rasās

ṣaḍ rasās+gandhas -> ṣaḍ rasā gandhas

ṣaḍ rasā gandhas+varṇas -> ṣaḍ rasā gandho varṇas

ṣaḍ rasā gandho varṇas+śabdas -> ṣaḍ rasā gandho varṇaḥ śabdas

ṣaḍ rasā gandho varṇaḥ śabdas+sparśas -> ṣaḍ rasā gandho varṇaḥ śabdaḥ sparśas

ṣaḍ rasā gandho varṇaḥ śabdaḥ sparśas+iti -> ṣaḍ rasā gandho varṇaḥ śabdaḥ sparśa iti

punar+api -> punar api

bhūtajānām+samayās -> bhūtajānāṃ samayās

bhūtajānāṃ samayās+iti| -> bhūtajānāṃ samayā iti|

sthāvarajaṅgamās+bhūtās -> sthāvarajaṅgamā bhūtās

sthāvarajaṅgamā bhūtās+chandohabhede -> sthāvarajaṅgamā bhūtāś chandohabhede

iti+aṣṭau -> ity aṣṭau

toyam+tejas -> toyaṃ tejas

toyaṃ tejas+vāyus -> toyaṃ tejo vāyus

toyaṃ tejo vāyus+kṣitijās -> toyaṃ tejo vāyuḥ kṣitijās

toyaṃ tejo vāyuḥ kṣitijās+salilajās -> toyaṃ tejo vāyuḥ kṣitijāḥ salilajās

toyaṃ tejo vāyuḥ kṣitijāḥ salilajās+vahnijās -> toyaṃ tejo vāyuḥ kṣitijāḥ salilajā vahnijās

toyaṃ tejo vāyuḥ kṣitijāḥ salilajā vahnijās+vātajās -> toyaṃ tejo vāyuḥ kṣitijāḥ salilajā vahnijā vātajās

toyaṃ tejo vāyuḥ kṣitijāḥ salilajā vahnijā vātajās+ca -> toyaṃ tejo vāyuḥ kṣitijāḥ salilajā vahnijā vātajāś ca

rūpavajrādīnām+kṣetrabhedasamayās -> rūpavajrādīnāṃ kṣetrabhedasamayās

rūpavajrādīnāṃ kṣetrabhedasamayās+| -> rūpavajrādīnāṃ kṣetrabhedasamayāḥ|

ketus+---ete -> ketuḥ---ete

bhṛgus+śanis -> bhṛguḥ śanis

bhṛguḥ śanis+phaṇī -> bhṛguḥ śaniḥ phaṇī

bhaumaḥ saumyas+ca -> bhaumaḥ saumyaś ca

samayacatuṣkam+locanādīnām| -> samayacatuṣkaṃ locanādīnām|

kālāgnis+indus -> kālāgnir indus

kālāgnir indus+arkas -> kālāgnir indur arkas

kālāgnir indur arkas+rāhus -> kālāgnir indur arko rāhus

kālāgnir indur arko rāhus+pīṭhabhede -> kālāgnir indur arko rāhuḥ pīṭhabhede
