śmaśānaprabhedās+| -> śmaśānaprabhedāḥ|

karṇamalam+ghrāṇamalam -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam

karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam+akṣimalam -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalam

karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalam+jihvāmalam -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalam

karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalam+bhagamalam -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalam

karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalam+gudamalam -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalam

karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalam+liṅgamalam -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalaṃ liṅgamalam

karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalaṃ liṅgamalam+kakṣamalam -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalam

karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalam+aṣṭāṅgamalam -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalam aṣṭāṅgamalam

karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalam aṣṭāṅgamalam+iti -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalam aṣṭāṅgamalam iti

karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalam aṣṭāṅgamalam iti+aṣṭau -> karṇamalaṃ ghrāṇamalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ bhagamalaṃ gudamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalam aṣṭāṅgamalam ity aṣṭau

nidhanatāṣṭaśmaśānaprabhedās+|| -> nidhanatāṣṭaśmaśānaprabhedāḥ||

varṇādīnām+caturṇām -> varṇādīnāṃ caturṇām

varṇādīnāṃ caturṇām+vidiśi -> varṇādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ vidiśi

puratas+vāmasavye -> purato vāmasavye

pṛthvītoyāgnivāyus+kṣayam -> pṛthvītoyāgnivāyuḥ kṣayam

chandohabhedāḥ punar+api -> chandohabhedāḥ punar api

pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kṣitijasalilajās+vātajās -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kṣitijasalilajā vātajās

pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kṣitijasalilajā vātajās+vahnijās -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kṣitijasalilajā vātajā vahnijās

pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kṣitijasalilajā vātajā vahnijās+ca|| -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kṣitijasalilajā vātajā vahnijāś ca||

bhaumas+saumyas -> bhaumaḥ saumyas

bhaumaḥ saumyas+ca -> bhaumaḥ saumyaś ca

kālāgnīndvarkarāhuḥ prakaṭitaniyatam+pīṭhabhede -> kālāgnīndvarkarāhuḥ prakaṭitaniyataṃ pīṭhabhede

bukkaṃ medas+iti -> bukkaṃ meda iti

kālajaṃ phupphusam+nāḍī -> kālajaṃ phupphusaṃ nāḍī

tathāntram+pittam -> tathāntraṃ pittam

tathāntraṃ pittam+asthīni -> tathāntraṃ pittam asthīni

cchandohabhedās+| -> cchandohabhedāḥ|

kṛmis+lasivasālomakeśās -> kṛmir lasivasālomakeśās

kṛmir lasivasālomakeśās+iti -> kṛmir lasivasālomakeśā iti

kṛmir lasivasālomakeśā iti+aṣṭau -> kṛmir lasivasālomakeśā ity aṣṭau

gudaṃ bhagam+iti -> gudaṃ bhagam iti

karṇas+nāsākṣijihvā -> karṇo nāsākṣijihvā

sakalasattvānām+vividhānām -> sakalasattvānāṃ vividhānām

sakalasattvānāṃ vividhānām+tanugatam -> sakalasattvānāṃ vividhānāṃ tanugatam

sakalasattvānāṃ vividhānāṃ tanugatam+pīṭhabhede -> sakalasattvānāṃ vividhānāṃ tanugataṃ pīṭhabhede

viṇmūtram+raktamāṃsam -> viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsam

viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsam+iti| -> viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsam iti|

prabhedās+|| -> prabhedāḥ||

antrādyās+medasīmnas -> antrādyā medasīmnas

antrādyā medasīmnas+gik -> antrādyā medasīmno gik

antrādyā medasīmno gik+iti -> antrādyā medasīmno gig iti

ca+aṣṭacchandohabhedās -> cāṣṭacchandohabhedās

pūyādyās+keśasīmnas -> pūyādyāḥ keśasīmnas

pūyādyāḥ keśasīmnas+kṣititalanilaye -> pūyādyāḥ keśasīmnaḥ kṣititalanilaye

bhagam+kṣetrabhede -> bhagaṃ kṣetrabhede

gudam+api -> gudam api

karṇas+nāsākṣijihvā -> karṇo nāsākṣijihvā

viṇmūtram+raktamāṃsam -> viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsam

viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsam+vividhatanugatam -> viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsaṃ vividhatanugatam

viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsaṃ vividhatanugatam+pīṭhabhede -> viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsaṃ vividhatanugataṃ pīṭhabhede

idānīm+pīṭhādibhis -> idānīṃ pīṭhādibhis

idānīṃ pīṭhādibhis+samayaviśuddhis -> idānīṃ pīṭhādibhiḥ samayaviśuddhis

idānīṃ pīṭhādibhiḥ samayaviśuddhis+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ pīṭhādibhiḥ samayaviśuddhir ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

veditavyāni+iti -> veditavyānīti

yoginīnām+ekatvam -> yoginīnām ekatvam

yoginīnām ekatvam+śatakulāni -> yoginīnām ekatvaṃ śatakulāni

vacanāt+ṣaṭtriṃśat -> vacanāt ṣaṭtriṃśat

vacanāt ṣaṭtriṃśat+kulāni| -> vacanāt ṣaṭtriṃśat kulāni|

svabhāvaikam+śatam -> svabhāvaikaṃ śatam

svabhāvaikaṃ śatam+kulam| -> svabhāvaikaṃ śataṃ kulam|

trikulam+pañcakulam -> trikulaṃ pañcakulam

trikulaṃ pañcakulam+ca -> trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ ca

trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ ca+eva -> trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ caiva

śatasamayās+| -> śatasamayāḥ|

evam+śatakulabhedena -> evaṃ śatakulabhedena

catuḥṣaṣṭisamayās+| -> catuḥṣaṣṭisamayāḥ|

kapālanāḍīpravāhabhedena+iti -> kapālanāḍīpravāhabhedeneti

viṃśatis+dantās -> viṃśatir dantās

viṃśatir dantās+dvātriṃśat -> viṃśatir dantā dvātriṃśat

viṃśatir dantā dvātriṃśat+dvādaśakhaṇḍāni -> viṃśatir dantā dvātriṃśad dvādaśakhaṇḍāni

yoginyas+bhīmādayas -> yoginyo bhīmādayas

yoginyo bhīmādayas+yās -> yoginyo bhīmādayo yās

yoginyo bhīmādayo yās+aṣṭāṣṭakās -> yoginyo bhīmādayo yā aṣṭāṣṭakās

yoginyo bhīmādayo yā aṣṭāṣṭakās+catuḥṣaṣṭikās -> yoginyo bhīmādayo yā aṣṭāṣṭakāś catuḥṣaṣṭikās

yoginyo bhīmādayo yā aṣṭāṣṭakāś catuḥṣaṣṭikās+tāsām -> yoginyo bhīmādayo yā aṣṭāṣṭakāś catuḥṣaṣṭikās tāsām

yoginyo bhīmādayo yā aṣṭāṣṭakāś catuḥṣaṣṭikās tāsām+samayās -> yoginyo bhīmādayo yā aṣṭāṣṭakāś catuḥṣaṣṭikās tāsāṃ samayās

yoginyo bhīmādayo yā aṣṭāṣṭakāś catuḥṣaṣṭikās tāsāṃ samayās+nakhāni -> yoginyo bhīmādayo yā aṣṭāṣṭakāś catuḥṣaṣṭikās tāsāṃ samayā nakhāni

ulūkāsyā---āsām+samayāṣṭakam -> ulūkāsyā---āsāṃ samayāṣṭakam

ulūkāsyā---āsāṃ samayāṣṭakam+iti| -> ulūkāsyā---āsāṃ samayāṣṭakam iti|

samayāṣṭakam+āsurīṇām -> samayāṣṭakam āsurīṇām

samayāṣṭakam āsurīṇām+yathāsaṃkhyam| -> samayāṣṭakam āsurīṇāṃ yathāsaṃkhyam|

evam+karṇamalam -> evaṃ karṇamalam

evaṃ karṇamalam+nāsikāmalam -> evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam

evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam+akṣimalam -> evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalam

evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalam+jihvāmalam -> evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalam

evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalam+gudamalam -> evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalam

evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalam+bhagamalam -> evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalaṃ bhagamalam

evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalaṃ bhagamalam+liṅgamalam -> evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalaṃ bhagamalaṃ liṅgamalam

evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalaṃ bhagamalaṃ liṅgamalam+kakṣamalam -> evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalaṃ bhagamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalam

evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalaṃ bhagamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalam+sarvāṅgamalam -> evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalaṃ bhagamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalaṃ sarvāṅgamalam

evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalaṃ bhagamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalaṃ sarvāṅgamalam+iti -> evaṃ karṇamalaṃ nāsikāmalam akṣimalaṃ jihvāmalaṃ gudamalaṃ bhagamalaṃ liṅgamalaṃ kakṣamalaṃ sarvāṅgamalam iti

āsām+krodhadevatīnām -> āsāṃ krodhadevatīnām

āsāṃ krodhadevatīnām+samayadaśakam -> āsāṃ krodhadevatīnāṃ samayadaśakam

āsāṃ krodhadevatīnāṃ samayadaśakam+iti| -> āsāṃ krodhadevatīnāṃ samayadaśakam iti|

bukkam+medam -> bukkaṃ medam

bukkaṃ medam+evam -> bukkaṃ medam evam

bukkaṃ medam evam+daśakam -> bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakam

bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakam+bhavati -> bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakaṃ bhavati

bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakaṃ bhavati+antrādikam -> bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakaṃ bhavaty antrādikam

bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakaṃ bhavaty antrādikam+medaparyantam -> bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakaṃ bhavaty antrādikaṃ medaparyantam

bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakaṃ bhavaty antrādikaṃ medaparyantam+yathāsaṃkhyam -> bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakaṃ bhavaty antrādikaṃ medaparyantaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam

bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakaṃ bhavaty antrādikaṃ medaparyantaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam+jambhī -> bukkaṃ medam evaṃ daśakaṃ bhavaty antrādikaṃ medaparyantaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ jambhī

nakhadaśanāt+dvādaśa -> nakhadaśanād dvādaśa

nakhadaśanād dvādaśa+aṅgās -> nakhadaśanād dvādaśāṅgās

nakhadaśanād dvādaśāṅgās+kapālais -> nakhadaśanād dvādaśāṅgāḥ kapālais

nakhadaśanād dvādaśāṅgāḥ kapālais+|| -> nakhadaśanād dvādaśāṅgāḥ kapālaiḥ||

yoginyas+aṣṭāṣṭakās -> yoginyo 'ṣṭāṣṭakās

yoginyo 'ṣṭāṣṭakās+syus -> yoginyo 'ṣṭāṣṭakāḥ syus

yoginyo 'ṣṭāṣṭakāḥ syus+saha -> yoginyo 'ṣṭāṣṭakāḥ syuḥ saha

ca+aṣṭakam -> cāṣṭakam

cāṣṭakam+hi -> cāṣṭakaṃ hi

cāṣṭakaṃ hi+āsurīṇām -> cāṣṭakaṃ hy āsurīṇām

malam+pāyumadhye -> malaṃ pāyumadhye

gatam+api -> gatam api

daśakam+medayuktam -> daśakaṃ medayuktam

daśakaṃ medayuktam+narendra -> daśakaṃ medayuktaṃ narendra

bukkam+bhavati -> bukkaṃ bhavati

vividhatanugatam+sarvasattvānām -> vividhatanugataṃ sarvasattvānām

vividhatanugataṃ sarvasattvānām+tanugatam -> vividhatanugataṃ sarvasattvānāṃ tanugatam

vividhatanugataṃ sarvasattvānāṃ tanugatam+kālajam -> vividhatanugataṃ sarvasattvānāṃ tanugataṃ kālajam

vividhatanugataṃ sarvasattvānāṃ tanugataṃ kālajam+phupphusam|| -> vividhatanugataṃ sarvasattvānāṃ tanugataṃ kālajaṃ phupphusam||

tathā+antram -> tathāntram

tathāntram+pittam -> tathāntraṃ pittam

tathāntraṃ pittam+asthi -> tathāntraṃ pittam asthi

tathāntraṃ pittam asthi+iti| -> tathāntraṃ pittam asthīti|

yathāsaṃkhyam+carcikāvaiṣṇavīvārāhīkaumārī{}aindrībrahmāṇīraudrīmahālakṣmīyoginīnām -> yathāsaṃkhyaṃ carcikāvaiṣṇavīvārāhīkaumārī{}aindrībrahmāṇīraudrīmahālakṣmīyoginīnām

yathāsaṃkhyaṃ carcikāvaiṣṇavīvārāhīkaumārī{}aindrībrahmāṇīraudrīmahālakṣmīyoginīnām+bhūtajānām -> yathāsaṃkhyaṃ carcikāvaiṣṇavīvārāhīkaumārī{}aindrībrahmāṇīraudrīmahālakṣmīyoginīnāṃ bhūtajānām

yathāsaṃkhyaṃ carcikāvaiṣṇavīvārāhīkaumārī{}aindrībrahmāṇīraudrīmahālakṣmīyoginīnāṃ bhūtajānām+iti| -> yathāsaṃkhyaṃ carcikāvaiṣṇavīvārāhīkaumārī{}aindrībrahmāṇīraudrīmahālakṣmīyoginīnāṃ bhūtajānām iti|

samayāṣṭakam+ca -> samayāṣṭakaṃ ca

gudam+bhagam -> gudaṃ bhagam

gudaṃ bhagam+śabdagandharūparasasparśadharmadhātudevīnām -> gudaṃ bhagaṃ śabdagandharūparasasparśadharmadhātudevīnām

gudaṃ bhagaṃ śabdagandharūparasasparśadharmadhātudevīnām+samayaṣaṭkam -> gudaṃ bhagaṃ śabdagandharūparasasparśadharmadhātudevīnāṃ samayaṣaṭkam

gudaṃ bhagaṃ śabdagandharūparasasparśadharmadhātudevīnāṃ samayaṣaṭkam+śabdavajrādiṣaṭkam -> gudaṃ bhagaṃ śabdagandharūparasasparśadharmadhātudevīnāṃ samayaṣaṭkaṃ śabdavajrādiṣaṭkam

gudaṃ bhagaṃ śabdagandharūparasasparśadharmadhātudevīnāṃ samayaṣaṭkaṃ śabdavajrādiṣaṭkam+iti| -> gudaṃ bhagaṃ śabdagandharūparasasparśadharmadhātudevīnāṃ samayaṣaṭkaṃ śabdavajrādiṣaṭkam iti|

śukram+vajradhātvīśvarī -> śukraṃ vajradhātvīśvarī

śukraṃ vajradhātvīśvarī+ākāśadhātus -> śukraṃ vajradhātvīśvary ākāśadhātus

śukraṃ vajradhātvīśvary ākāśadhātus+anuktau -> śukraṃ vajradhātvīśvary ākāśadhātur anuktau

śukraṃ vajradhātvīśvary ākāśadhātur anuktau+api| -> śukraṃ vajradhātvīśvary ākāśadhātur anuktāv api|

mūtram+saraktam -> mūtraṃ saraktam

mūtraṃ saraktam+sapiśitam -> mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitam

mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitam+yathāsaṃkhyam -> mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam

mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam+pṛthivyaptejovāyudevatīnām -> mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyudevatīnām

mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyudevatīnām+catuṣkam -> mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyudevatīnāṃ catuṣkam

mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyudevatīnāṃ catuṣkam+bhavati -> mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyudevatīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ bhavati

mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyudevatīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ bhavati+iti| -> mūtraṃ saraktaṃ sapiśitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyudevatīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ bhavatīti|

vividhatanugatam+kālajam -> vividhatanugataṃ kālajam

vividhatanugataṃ kālajaṃ phupphusam+ca|| -> vividhatanugataṃ kālajaṃ phupphusaṃ ca||

antram+pittāsthimajjā -> antraṃ pittāsthimajjā

mūtram+saraktam -> mūtraṃ saraktam

mūtraṃ saraktam+bhavat -> mūtraṃ saraktaṃ bhavat

idānīm+viṣṭhādīnām -> idānīṃ viṣṭhādīnām

idānīṃ viṣṭhādīnām+samayadravyāṇām -> idānīṃ viṣṭhādīnāṃ samayadravyāṇām

idānīṃ viṣṭhādīnāṃ samayadravyāṇām+pṛthivyādidevatāviśuddhis -> idānīṃ viṣṭhādīnāṃ samayadravyāṇāṃ pṛthivyādidevatāviśuddhis

idānīṃ viṣṭhādīnāṃ samayadravyāṇāṃ pṛthivyādidevatāviśuddhis+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ viṣṭhādīnāṃ samayadravyāṇāṃ pṛthivyādidevatāviśuddhir ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

bhavati+iti -> bhavatīti

tatas+khecaratvam -> tataḥ khecaratvam

tataḥ khecaratvam+tena -> tataḥ khecaratvaṃ tena

yat+dattam -> yad dattam

yad dattam+samayadravyam -> yad dattaṃ samayadravyam

yad dattaṃ samayadravyam+tat -> yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tat

yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tat+bhakṣaṇīyam -> yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tad bhakṣaṇīyam

yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tad bhakṣaṇīyam+yāvat -> yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tad bhakṣaṇīyaṃ yāvat

yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tad bhakṣaṇīyaṃ yāvat+saptāvartam -> yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tad bhakṣaṇīyaṃ yāvat saptāvartam

yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tad bhakṣaṇīyaṃ yāvat saptāvartam+tat -> yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tad bhakṣaṇīyaṃ yāvat saptāvartaṃ tat

yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tad bhakṣaṇīyaṃ yāvat saptāvartaṃ tat+paryavasyati| -> yad dattaṃ samayadravyaṃ tad bhakṣaṇīyaṃ yāvat saptāvartaṃ tat paryavasyati|

likhitam+pūjayet -> likhitaṃ pūjayet

likhitaṃ pūjayet+sā -> likhitaṃ pūjayet sā

yasyās+yat -> yasyā yat

yasyā yac cihnam+dṛśyate -> yasyā yac cihnaṃ dṛśyate

kaṭyām+vā -> kaṭyāṃ vā

evam+lalāṭe -> evaṃ lalāṭe

maulis+vā -> maulir vā

maulir vā+akṣasūtram -> maulir vākṣasūtram

maulir vākṣasūtram+caṇḍālyās -> maulir vākṣasūtraṃ caṇḍālyās

maulir vākṣasūtraṃ caṇḍālyās+prajñāpāramitākulajāyās -> maulir vākṣasūtraṃ caṇḍālyāḥ prajñāpāramitākulajāyās

maulir vākṣasūtraṃ caṇḍālyāḥ prajñāpāramitākulajāyās+| -> maulir vākṣasūtraṃ caṇḍālyāḥ prajñāpāramitākulajāyāḥ|

ḍamarukam+paṭaham -> ḍamarukaṃ paṭaham

ḍamarukaṃ paṭahaṃ ḍombyā vajradhātvīśvarīkulajāyās+| -> ḍamarukaṃ paṭahaṃ ḍombyā vajradhātvīśvarīkulajāyāḥ|

evaṃ pūrvāparam+mātus -> evaṃ pūrvāparaṃ mātus

evaṃ pūrvāparaṃ mātus+cihnam -> evaṃ pūrvāparaṃ mātuś cihnam

evaṃ pūrvāparaṃ mātuś cihnam+caturdhā| -> evaṃ pūrvāparaṃ mātuś cihnaṃ caturdhā|

tāmrapātram+dvijātyās -> tāmrapātraṃ dvijātyās

tāmrapātraṃ dvijātyā māmakīkulajāyās+| -> tāmrapātraṃ dvijātyā māmakīkulajāyāḥ|

jalacaram+śaṅkhas -> jalacaraṃ śaṅkhas

jalacaraṃ śaṅkhas+| -> jalacaraṃ śaṅkhaḥ|

vaiśyāyā locanākulajāyās+| -> vaiśyāyā locanākulajāyāḥ|

kṣatriṇyās+pāṇḍarakulajāyās -> kṣatriṇyāḥ pāṇḍarakulajāyās

kṣatriṇyāḥ pāṇḍarakulajāyās+ratnapaṭṭam| -> kṣatriṇyāḥ pāṇḍarakulajāyā ratnapaṭṭam|

halam+vā -> halaṃ vā

śūdraguṇavaśāt+tārākulajānām -> śūdraguṇavaśāt tārākulajānām

śūdraguṇavaśāt tārākulajānām+utpalam -> śūdraguṇavaśāt tārākulajānām utpalam

śūdraguṇavaśāt tārākulajānām utpalam+vā -> śūdraguṇavaśāt tārākulajānām utpalaṃ vā

bhūyas+punas -> bhūyaḥ punas

bhūyaḥ punas+śūdrādicihnam -> bhūyaḥ punaḥ śūdrādicihnam

bhūyaḥ punaḥ śūdrādicihnam+tārādīnām -> bhūyaḥ punaḥ śūdrādicihnaṃ tārādīnām

bhūyaḥ punaḥ śūdrādicihnaṃ tārādīnām+ucyate| -> bhūyaḥ punaḥ śūdrādicihnaṃ tārādīnām ucyate|

ḍamarukapaṭaham+maulis -> ḍamarukapaṭahaṃ maulis

ḍamarukapaṭahaṃ maulis+eva -> ḍamarukapaṭahaṃ maulir eva

ḍamarukapaṭahaṃ maulir eva+akṣasūtram|| -> ḍamarukapaṭahaṃ maulir evākṣasūtram||

mātus+cihnam -> mātuś cihnam

mātuś cihnam+caturdhā -> mātuś cihnaṃ caturdhā

vaiśyāyās+tadvat -> vaiśyāyās tadvat

vaiśyāyās tadvat+evam -> vaiśyāyās tadvad evam

vaiśyāyās tadvad evam+jalacarasahitam -> vaiśyāyās tadvad evaṃ jalacarasahitam

vaiśyāyās tadvad evaṃ jalacarasahitam+tāmrapātram -> vaiśyāyās tadvad evaṃ jalacarasahitaṃ tāmrapātram

vaiśyāyās tadvad evaṃ jalacarasahitaṃ tāmrapātram+dvijātyās -> vaiśyāyās tadvad evaṃ jalacarasahitaṃ tāmrapātraṃ dvijātyās

kṣatriṇyās+ratnapaṭṭam -> kṣatriṇyā ratnapaṭṭam

kṣatriṇyā ratnapaṭṭam+bhavati -> kṣatriṇyā ratnapaṭṭaṃ bhavati

halam+vā -> halaṃ vā

guṇavaśāt+utpalam -> guṇavaśād utpalam

guṇavaśād utpalam+vā -> guṇavaśād utpalaṃ vā

bhūyas+śūdrādicihnam -> bhūyaḥ śūdrādicihnam

bhūyaḥ śūdrādicihnam+bhavati -> bhūyaḥ śūdrādicihnaṃ bhavati

yoginīnām+niyamas -> yoginīnāṃ niyamas

yoginīnāṃ niyamas+|| -> yoginīnāṃ niyamaḥ||

pūjanīyās+iti -> pūjanīyā iti

tās+tatkulinyas -> tās tatkulinyas

tās tatkulinyas+| -> tās tatkulinyaḥ|

yāsām+dṛśyante -> yāsāṃ dṛśyante

evam+ṣaṭtriṃśat -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat+cihnāni -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśac cihnāni

mukhādyaṣṭadvāraśuddhyā+aṣṭakulānām -> mukhādyaṣṭadvāraśuddhyāṣṭakulānām

mukhādyaṣṭadvāraśuddhyāṣṭakulānām+dṛśyante| -> mukhādyaṣṭadvāraśuddhyāṣṭakulānāṃ dṛśyante|

iti+aṣṭacihnāni -> ity aṣṭacihnāni

mayūrapiccham+ulūkāsyāyās -> mayūrapiccham ulūkāsyāyās

mayūrapiccham ulūkāsyāyās+| -> mayūrapiccham ulūkāsyāyāḥ|

garuḍāsyāyās+| -> garuḍāsyāyāḥ|

kāṇḍam+ca -> kāṇḍaṃ ca

vīṇopāṅgam+gṛdhrāsyāyās -> vīṇopāṅgaṃ gṛdhrāsyāyās

vīṇopāṅgaṃ gṛdhrāsyāyās+| -> vīṇopāṅgaṃ gṛdhrāsyāyāḥ|

māṃsaśūlam+kākāsyāyās -> māṃsaśūlaṃ kākāsyāyās

māṃsaśūlaṃ kākāsyāyās+| -> māṃsaśūlaṃ kākāsyāyāḥ|

vyāghrāsyāyās+| -> vyāghrāsyāyāḥ|

jambukāsyāyās+| -> jambukāsyāyāḥ|

sarāvam+śūkarāsyāyās -> sarāvaṃ śūkarāsyāyās

sarāvaṃ śūkarāsyāyās+| -> sarāvaṃ śūkarāsyāyāḥ|

mallam+iti -> mallam iti

tathā+āsurīṇām -> tathāsurīṇām

tathāsurīṇām+cihnam---gośṛṅgam -> tathāsurīṇāṃ cihnam---gośṛṅgam

tathāsurīṇāṃ cihnam---gośṛṅgam+śvānāsyāyās -> tathāsurīṇāṃ cihnam---gośṛṅgaṃ śvānāsyāyās

tathāsurīṇāṃ cihnam---gośṛṅgaṃ śvānāsyāyās+| -> tathāsurīṇāṃ cihnam---gośṛṅgaṃ śvānāsyāyāḥ|

karmendriyāṇām+iti| -> karmendriyāṇām iti|

daśakam+krodhajānām -> daśakaṃ krodhajānām

daśakaṃ krodhajānām+svacihnam -> daśakaṃ krodhajānāṃ svacihnam

daśakaṃ krodhajānāṃ svacihnam+dvidhā -> daśakaṃ krodhajānāṃ svacihnaṃ dvidhā

evam+bhavati -> evaṃ bhavati

balāyās+| -> balāyāḥ|

veṇudaṇḍam+iti -> veṇudaṇḍam iti

kuddālam+raudrākṣyās -> kuddālaṃ raudrākṣyās

kuddālaṃ raudrākṣyās+| -> kuddālaṃ raudrākṣyāḥ|

pūjanīyās+|| -> pūjanīyāḥ||

ṣaṭtriṃśat+cihnabhedās -> ṣaṭtriṃśac cihnabhedās

ṣaṭtriṃśac cihnabhedās+pravarabhuvitale -> ṣaṭtriṃśac cihnabhedāḥ pravarabhuvitale

śikhinas+piccham -> śikhinaḥ piccham

śikhinaḥ piccham+atra -> śikhinaḥ piccham atra

śikhinaḥ piccham atra+aṣṭamam -> śikhinaḥ piccham atrāṣṭamam

śikhinaḥ piccham atrāṣṭamam+ca -> śikhinaḥ piccham atrāṣṭamaṃ ca

kāṇḍam+bhavati -> kāṇḍaṃ bhavati

vīṇopāṅgam+ca -> vīṇopāṅgaṃ ca

gośṛṅgam+mallatantrī -> gośṛṅgaṃ mallatantrī

daśakam+krodhajānām -> daśakaṃ krodhajānām

daśakaṃ krodhajānām+svacihnam -> daśakaṃ krodhajānāṃ svacihnam

kuddālam+veṇudaṇḍam -> kuddālaṃ veṇudaṇḍam

kuddālaṃ veṇudaṇḍam+prabhavati -> kuddālaṃ veṇudaṇḍaṃ prabhavati

ātapatram+vajraśṛṅkhalāyās -> ātapatraṃ vajraśṛṅkhalāyās

ātapatraṃ vajraśṛṅkhalāyās+|| -> ātapatraṃ vajraśṛṅkhalāyāḥ||

bhṛkuṭyās+| -> bhṛkuṭyāḥ|

kṣurakas+cundāyās -> kṣurakaś cundāyās

kṣurakaś cundāyās+| -> kṣurakaś cundāyāḥ|

upāhaṭ+mārīcyās -> upāhaṇ mārīcyās

upāhaṇ mārīcyās+|% -> upāhaṇ mārīcyāḥ|%

atibalāyās+churikā| -> atibalāyāś churikā|

kuśas+māninyās -> kuśo māninyās

kuśo māninyās+| -> kuśo māninyāḥ|

stambhyās+kośakīṭas -> stambhyāḥ kośakīṭas

stambhyāḥ kośakīṭas+| -> stambhyāḥ kośakīṭaḥ|

jambhyās+alaktapātram -> jambhyā alaktapātram

jambhyā alaktapātram+dinakarasadṛśam -> jambhyā alaktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśam

jambhyā alaktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśam+vartulam| -> jambhyā alaktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ vartulam|

krodhajānām+daśakam| -> krodhajānāṃ daśakam|

bhūtajānām+amarādyakulajānām -> bhūtajānām amarādyakulajānām

bhūtajānām amarādyakulajānām+iti| -> bhūtajānām amarādyakulajānām iti|

iti+aṣṭacihnāni -> ity aṣṭacihnāni

śilācaturasram+lakṣmyās -> śilācaturasraṃ lakṣmyās

śilācaturasraṃ lakṣmyās+| -> śilācaturasraṃ lakṣmyāḥ|

triśūlam+raudryās -> triśūlaṃ raudryās

triśūlaṃ raudryās+| -> triśūlaṃ raudryāḥ|

matsyajālam+brahmāṇyās -> matsyajālaṃ brahmāṇyās

matsyajālaṃ brahmāṇyās+| -> matsyajālaṃ brahmāṇyāḥ|

mudgaras+vā -> mudgaro vā

mudgaro vā+aindryās -> mudgaro vaindryās

mudgaro vaindryās+| -> mudgaro vaindryāḥ|

ca+ātapatram|| -> cātapatram||

kṣurakas+iti -> kṣuraka iti

ca+upānahī -> copānahī

jambhyāde+alaktapātram -> jambhyāde 'laktapātram

jambhyāde 'laktapātram+dinakarasadṛśam -> jambhyāde 'laktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśam

jambhyāde 'laktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśam+kośakīṭas -> jambhyāde 'laktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ kośakīṭas

jambhyāde 'laktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ kośakīṭas+kuśas -> jambhyāde 'laktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ kośakīṭaḥ kuśas

jambhyāde 'laktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ kośakīṭaḥ kuśas+ca -> jambhyāde 'laktapātraṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ kośakīṭaḥ kuśaś ca

ca+aṣṭamam -> cāṣṭamam

cāṣṭamam+bhūtajānām| -> cāṣṭamaṃ bhūtajānām|

lakṣmīcihnam+śilā -> lakṣmīcihnaṃ śilā

prakaṭitaniyatas+matsyajālam -> prakaṭitaniyato matsyajālam

prakaṭitaniyato matsyajālam+triśūlam -> prakaṭitaniyato matsyajālaṃ triśūlam

mudgaras+vā -> mudgaro vā

pītavastram+kaumāryās -> pītavastraṃ kaumāryās

pītavastraṃ kaumāryās+|| -> pītavastraṃ kaumāryāḥ||

kacchukam+vārāhyās -> kacchukaṃ vārāhyās

kacchukaṃ vārāhyās+|% -> kacchukaṃ vārāhyāḥ|%

kalaśam+vaiṣṇavyās -> kalaśaṃ vaiṣṇavyās

kalaśaṃ vaiṣṇavyās+| -> kalaśaṃ vaiṣṇavyāḥ|

carcikāyās+| -> carcikāyāḥ|

kartikādyam+aṣṭavidham| -> kartikādyam aṣṭavidham|

śabdavajrādicihnam+evam -> śabdavajrādicihnam evam

śabdavajrādicihnam evam+vai -> śabdavajrādicihnam evaṃ vai

viṣayakulajānām+iti -> viṣayakulajānām iti

dharmodayas+dharmadhātuvajrāyās -> dharmodayo dharmadhātuvajrāyās

dharmodayo dharmadhātuvajrāyās+pañcasu -> dharmodayo dharmadhātuvajrāyāḥ pañcasu

vajram+sparśavajrāyās -> vajraṃ sparśavajrāyās

vajraṃ sparśavajrāyās+| -> vajraṃ sparśavajrāyāḥ|

gandhavajrāyās+| -> gandhavajrāyāḥ|

pātram+rasavajrāyās -> pātraṃ rasavajrāyās

pātraṃ rasavajrāyās+| -> pātraṃ rasavajrāyāḥ|

ādarśas+rūpavajrāyās -> ādarśo rūpavajrāyās

ādarśo rūpavajrāyās+| -> ādarśo rūpavajrāyāḥ|

śabdavajrāyās+| -> śabdavajrāyāḥ|

pañcamam+cakracihnam -> pañcamaṃ cakracihnam

pañcamaṃ cakracihnam+locanāyās -> pañcamaṃ cakracihnaṃ locanāyās

pañcamaṃ cakracihnaṃ locanāyās+vāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīkulānām -> pañcamaṃ cakracihnaṃ locanāyā vāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīkulānām

pañcamaṃ cakracihnaṃ locanāyā vāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīkulānām+cihnāni| -> pañcamaṃ cakracihnaṃ locanāyā vāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīkulānāṃ cihnāni|

śatadalakamalam+māmakyās -> śatadalakamalaṃ māmakyās

śatadalakamalaṃ māmakyās+| -> śatadalakamalaṃ māmakyāḥ|

ratnam+pāṇḍarāyās -> ratnaṃ pāṇḍarāyās

ratnaṃ pāṇḍarāyās+| -> ratnaṃ pāṇḍarāyāḥ|

bāṇas+vā -> bāṇo vā

evam+khaḍgas -> evaṃ khaḍgas

evaṃ khaḍgas+tārāyās -> evaṃ khaḍgas tārāyās

evaṃ khaḍgas tārāyās+| -> evaṃ khaḍgas tārāyāḥ|

sā+ākāśadhātukulinī| -> sākāśadhātukulinī|

rekhābhis+| -> rekhābhiḥ|

varṇatas+dṛśyate -> varṇato dṛśyate

yasyās+vajram -> yasyā vajram

yasyā vajram+pañcasu -> yasyā vajraṃ pañcasu

cihnam+veditavyam -> cihnaṃ veditavyam

cihnaṃ veditavyam+iti -> cihnaṃ veditavyam iti

cihnaṃ veditavyam iti+upāyas -> cihnaṃ veditavyam ity upāyas

cihnaṃ veditavyam ity upāyas+| -> cihnaṃ veditavyam ity upāyaḥ|

likhitam+vā -> likhitaṃ vā

tāsām+śarīrastham -> tāsāṃ śarīrastham

tāsāṃ śarīrastham+hastapādatalastham -> tāsāṃ śarīrasthaṃ hastapādatalastham

tāsāṃ śarīrasthaṃ hastapādatalastham+vā -> tāsāṃ śarīrasthaṃ hastapādatalasthaṃ vā

hastam+svakīyam -> hastaṃ svakīyam

hastaṃ svakīyam+lakṣaṇārtham -> hastaṃ svakīyaṃ lakṣaṇārtham

hastaṃ svakīyaṃ lakṣaṇārtham+samarpayanti| -> hastaṃ svakīyaṃ lakṣaṇārthaṃ samarpayanti|

parastriyas+api -> parastriyo 'pi

nārīpuruṣalakṣaṇam+śikṣitavyam| -> nārīpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ śikṣitavyam|

yoginīnām+karagrahaṇāya -> yoginīnāṃ karagrahaṇāya

tat+rekhābhis -> tad rekhābhis

tad rekhābhis+veditavyam| -> tad rekhābhir veditavyam|

yat+punar -> yat punar

yat punar+hastapādatale -> yat punar hastapādatale

tat+cihnam -> tac cihnam

tac cihnam+varṇatas -> tac cihnaṃ varṇatas

tac cihnaṃ varṇatas+veditavyam| -> tac cihnaṃ varṇato veditavyam|

kāyavarṇāt+yat -> kāyavarṇād yat

kāyavarṇād yat+aparavarṇāntaram -> kāyavarṇād yad aparavarṇāntaram

kāyavarṇād yad aparavarṇāntaram+adhigatam -> kāyavarṇād yad aparavarṇāntaram adhigatam

kāyavarṇād yad aparavarṇāntaram adhigatam+bhavati -> kāyavarṇād yad aparavarṇāntaram adhigataṃ bhavati

vā+ubhayaskandhe -> vobhayaskandhe

sthitānām+yoginīnām -> sthitānāṃ yoginīnām

sthitānāṃ yoginīnām+yadā -> sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ yadā

praviṣṭānām+grāme -> praviṣṭānāṃ grāme

kacchukam+pītavastram|| -> kacchukaṃ pītavastram||

kartikādyam+kalaśas -> kartikādyaṃ kalaśas

kartikādyaṃ kalaśas+iti -> kartikādyaṃ kalaśa iti

evam+vai -> evaṃ vai

ṣaṣṭhas+dharmodayas -> ṣaṣṭho dharmodayas

ṣaṣṭho dharmodayas+vai -> ṣaṣṭho dharmodayo vai

pātram+bhavati -> pātraṃ bhavati

vīṇā+ādarśas -> vīṇādarśas

vīṇādarśas+ca -> vīṇādarśaś ca

bāṇas+śatadalakamalam -> bāṇaḥ śatadalakamalam

bāṇaḥ śatadalakamalam+pañcamam -> bāṇaḥ śatadalakamalaṃ pañcamam

bāṇaḥ śatadalakamalaṃ pañcamam+cakracihnam -> bāṇaḥ śatadalakamalaṃ pañcamaṃ cakracihnam

vajram+khaḍgas -> vajraṃ khaḍgas

vajraṃ khaḍgas+ca -> vajraṃ khaḍgaś ca

idānīm+tārādikulotpannānām -> idānīṃ tārādikulotpannānām

idānīṃ tārādikulotpannānām+ṣaṭtriṃśat -> idānīṃ tārādikulotpannānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat

idānīṃ tārādikulotpannānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat+cihnāni -> idānīṃ tārādikulotpannānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśac cihnāni

idānīṃ tārādikulotpannānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśac cihnāni+ucyante--- -> idānīṃ tārādikulotpannānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśac cihnāny ucyante---

rājan+iti -> rājann iti

yoginīnām+pūjakarmārtham| -> yoginīnāṃ pūjakarmārtham|

daśavidham+cakramelāpake -> daśavidhaṃ cakramelāpake

viṭ+piśitam -> viṭ piśitam

viṭ piśitam+kālajam -> viṭ piśitaṃ kālajam

viṭ piśitaṃ kālajam+pittam -> viṭ piśitaṃ kālajaṃ pittam

viṭ piśitaṃ kālajaṃ pittam+raktam -> viṭ piśitaṃ kālajaṃ pittaṃ raktam

viṭ piśitaṃ kālajaṃ pittaṃ raktam+antram -> viṭ piśitaṃ kālajaṃ pittaṃ raktam antram

viṭ piśitaṃ kālajaṃ pittaṃ raktam antram+carmāṇi| -> viṭ piśitaṃ kālajaṃ pittaṃ raktam antraṃ carmāṇi|

śukram+mūtram -> śukraṃ mūtram

śukraṃ mūtram+ca -> śukraṃ mūtraṃ ca

tathā+adhyātmadravyam -> tathādhyātmadravyam

tathādhyātmadravyam+daśavidham -> tathādhyātmadravyaṃ daśavidham

tathādhyātmadravyaṃ daśavidham+bhavati -> tathādhyātmadravyaṃ daśavidhaṃ bhavati

pūjārtham+maṇḍalacakre -> pūjārthaṃ maṇḍalacakre

pūjārthaṃ maṇḍalacakre+api| -> pūjārthaṃ maṇḍalacakre 'pi|

toyapātram+arghapātram -> toyapātram arghapātram

toyapātram arghapātram+gandhapātram -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātram

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātram+dhūpapātram -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātram

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātram+puṣpapātram -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātram

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātram+phalapātram -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram+akṣatapātram -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātram

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātram+pradipapātram -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātram

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātram+naivedyapātram -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātram

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātram+vastrapātram -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātraṃ vastrapātram

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātraṃ vastrapātram+evam -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātraṃ vastrapātram evam

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātraṃ vastrapātram evam+daśavidham -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātraṃ vastrapātram evaṃ daśavidham

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātraṃ vastrapātram evaṃ daśavidham+pūjādravyam -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātraṃ vastrapātram evaṃ daśavidhaṃ pūjādravyam

toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātraṃ vastrapātram evaṃ daśavidhaṃ pūjādravyam+gaṇacakramelāpake -> toyapātram arghapātraṃ gandhapātraṃ dhūpapātraṃ puṣpapātraṃ phalapātram akṣatapātraṃ pradipapātraṃ naivedyapātraṃ vastrapātram evaṃ daśavidhaṃ pūjādravyaṃ gaṇacakramelāpake

toya+ityādinā| -> toyetyādinā|

daśavidham+cakramelāpake -> daśavidhaṃ cakramelāpake

rājan+bhavati -> rājan bhavati

antram+carmāṇi -> antraṃ carmāṇi

piśitam+kālajam -> piśitaṃ kālajam

piśitaṃ kālajam+pittaraktam -> piśitaṃ kālajaṃ pittaraktam

viṭ+api -> viḍ api

śukram+mūtram -> śukraṃ mūtram

śukraṃ mūtram+ca -> śukraṃ mūtraṃ ca

daśakam+cakramelāpake -> daśakaṃ cakramelāpake

vastram+bhavati -> vastraṃ bhavati

naivedyam+ca -> naivedyaṃ ca

naivedyaṃ ca+atra -> naivedyaṃ cātra

phalam+ca -> phalaṃ ca

phalaṃ ca+akṣatāni -> phalaṃ cākṣatāni

toyārgham+gandhadhūpam -> toyārghaṃ gandhadhūpam

toyārghaṃ gandhadhūpam+kusumam -> toyārghaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumam

toyārghaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumam+api -> toyārghaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumam api

idānīm+cakramelāpake -> idānīṃ cakramelāpake

idānīṃ cakramelāpake+arghādikam -> idānīṃ cakramelāpake 'rghādikam

idānīṃ cakramelāpake 'rghādikam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ cakramelāpake 'rghādikam ucyate---

tathāgataniyamas+|| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ||

pratipūrṇimāyām+kartavyā -> pratipūrṇimāyāṃ kartavyā

pratipūrṇimāyāṃ kartavyā+iti -> pratipūrṇimāyāṃ kartavyeti

evam+ṣaṭtriṃśatkulamaṇḍalānām -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkulamaṇḍalānām

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkulamaṇḍalānām+vartanam -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkulamaṇḍalānāṃ vartanam

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkulamaṇḍalānāṃ vartanam+yoginīnām -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkulamaṇḍalānāṃ vartanaṃ yoginīnām

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkulamaṇḍalānāṃ vartanaṃ yoginīnām+pūjā -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkulamaṇḍalānāṃ vartanaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūjā

nānāvyañjanadharmatvāt+iti| -> nānāvyañjanadharmatvād iti|

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

sārdham+sarvam -> sārdhaṃ sarvam

sārdhaṃ sarvam+saptatriṃśadātmakam -> sārdhaṃ sarvaṃ saptatriṃśadātmakam

sārdhaṃ sarvaṃ saptatriṃśadātmakam+veditavyam -> sārdhaṃ sarvaṃ saptatriṃśadātmakaṃ veditavyam

sārdhaṃ sarvaṃ saptatriṃśadātmakaṃ veditavyam+iti -> sārdhaṃ sarvaṃ saptatriṃśadātmakaṃ veditavyam iti

sārdhaṃ sarvaṃ saptatriṃśadātmakaṃ veditavyam iti+avanitalagatāni -> sārdhaṃ sarvaṃ saptatriṃśadātmakaṃ veditavyam ity avanitalagatāni

sārdhaṃ sarvaṃ saptatriṃśadātmakaṃ veditavyam ity avanitalagatāni+iti -> sārdhaṃ sarvaṃ saptatriṃśadātmakaṃ veditavyam ity avanitalagatānīti

ṣaṭtriṃśat+yogatantrāṇi -> ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇi

ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇi+evam -> ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇy evam

ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇy evam+yoginīkulatantrāṇi| -> ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇy evaṃ yoginīkulatantrāṇi|

evam+pratyekākṣareṇa -> evaṃ pratyekākṣareṇa

ṣaṭtriṃśat+mudrās -> ṣaṭtriṃśan mudrās

ṣaṭtriṃśan mudrās+| -> ṣaṭtriṃśan mudrāḥ|

ṣaṭtriṃśat+cihnāni -> ṣaṭtriṃśac cihnāni

etās+sakalaguṇagatās -> etāḥ sakalaguṇagatās

etāḥ sakalaguṇagatās+jātayas -> etāḥ sakalaguṇagatā jātayas

etāḥ sakalaguṇagatā jātayas+| -> etāḥ sakalaguṇagatā jātayaḥ|

ṣaṭtriṃśat+dhātubhedās -> ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedās

ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedās+| -> ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedāḥ|

evam+ṣaṭtriṃśat -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat+dhātubhedās -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedās

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedās+| -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedāḥ|

sārdham+saptatriṃśat| -> sārdhaṃ saptatriṃśat|

dharmās+bhagavatyā -> dharmā bhagavatyā

bodhipakṣās+ca -> bodhipakṣāś ca

tāsām+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> tāsāṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

tāsāṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+ākāśādiguṇavaśāt -> tāsāṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśād ākāśādiguṇavaśāt

tāsāṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśād ākāśādiguṇavaśāt+iti| -> tāsāṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśād ākāśādiguṇavaśād iti|

ṣaṭtriṃśat+ca -> ṣaṭtriṃśac ca

ṣaṭtriṃśac ca+akṣarāṇi -> ṣaṭtriṃśac cākṣarāṇi

niyamas+gaṇacakre| -> niyamo gaṇacakre|

rajobhis+samayadravyais -> rajobhiḥ samayadravyais

rajobhiḥ samayadravyais+devatās -> rajobhiḥ samayadravyair devatās

rajobhiḥ samayadravyair devatās+pūjanīyās -> rajobhiḥ samayadravyair devatāḥ pūjanīyās

rajobhiḥ samayadravyair devatāḥ pūjanīyās+yogibhis -> rajobhiḥ samayadravyair devatāḥ pūjanīyā yogibhis

rajobhiḥ samayadravyair devatāḥ pūjanīyā yogibhis+iti -> rajobhiḥ samayadravyair devatāḥ pūjanīyā yogibhir iti

śukrais+dinakarais -> śukrair dinakarais

śukrair dinakarais+iti -> śukrair dinakarair iti

lohitais+svedais -> lohitaiḥ svedais

lohitaiḥ svedais+medais -> lohitaiḥ svedair medais

lohitaiḥ svedair medais+aśrubhyām -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyām

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyām+kheṭakābhyām -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyām

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyām+siṃhāṇābhyām -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyām

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyām+jalais -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalais

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalais+lasibhis -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhis

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhis+(?)vasābhis -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhis

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhis+nānāvarṇais -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇais

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇais+nānāgandhais -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhais

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhais+jihvābhis -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhis

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhis+akṣibhis -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhir akṣibhis

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhir akṣibhis+karṇais -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhir akṣibhiḥ karṇais

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhir akṣibhiḥ karṇais+nāsikābhis -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhir akṣibhiḥ karṇair nāsikābhis

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhir akṣibhiḥ karṇair nāsikābhis+śaśi -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhir akṣibhiḥ karṇair nāsikābhiḥ śaśi

lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhir akṣibhiḥ karṇair nāsikābhiḥ śaśi+iti -> lohitaiḥ svedair medair aśrubhyāṃ kheṭakābhyāṃ siṃhāṇābhyāṃ jalair lasibhiḥ(?)vasābhir nānāvarṇair nānāgandhair jihvābhir akṣibhiḥ karṇair nāsikābhiḥ śaśīti

dantais+keśais -> dantaiḥ keśais

dantaiḥ keśais+tvagbhis -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhis

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhis+piśitais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitais+nahārubhis -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhis

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhis+asthibhis -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhis

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhis+bukkais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkais+padmais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmais+yonibhis -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhis

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhis+yūkābhis -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhis

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhis+lomakīṭais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭais+phupphusais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusais+antrais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrais+meḍhrais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrais+vīryais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryais+pittais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittais+ambubhis -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhis

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhis+pūyais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhiḥ pūyais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhiḥ pūyais+vividhatanugatais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhiḥ pūyair vividhatanugatais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhiḥ pūyair vividhatanugatais+sattvānām -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhiḥ pūyair vividhatanugataiḥ sattvānām

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhiḥ pūyair vividhatanugataiḥ sattvānām+śarīragatais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhiḥ pūyair vividhatanugataiḥ sattvānāṃ śarīragatais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhiḥ pūyair vividhatanugataiḥ sattvānāṃ śarīragatais+iti| -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagbhiḥ piśitair nahārubhir asthibhir bukkaiḥ padmair yonibhir yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ phupphusair antrair meḍhrair vīryaiḥ pittair ambubhiḥ pūyair vividhatanugataiḥ sattvānāṃ śarīragatair iti|

dantais+ityādinā| -> dantair ityādinā|

ṣaṭtriṃśat+yogatantrāṇi -> ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇi

ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇi+avanitalagatāni -> ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇy avanitalagatāni

ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇy avanitalagatāni+anyatra -> ṣaṭtriṃśad yogatantrāṇy avanitalagatāny anyatra

ṣaṭtriṃśat+dhātubhedās -> ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedās

ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedās+sakalaguṇagatās -> ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedāḥ sakalaguṇagatās

ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedāḥ sakalaguṇagatās+jātayas -> ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedāḥ sakalaguṇagatā jātayas

ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedāḥ sakalaguṇagatā jātayas+cihnamudrās -> ṣaṭtriṃśad dhātubhedāḥ sakalaguṇagatā jātayaś cihnamudrās

dharmās+| -> dharmāḥ|

prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+bodhipakṣās -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād bodhipakṣās

prakṛtiguṇavaśād bodhipakṣās+ca -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād bodhipakṣāś ca

ṣaṭtriṃśat+ca -> ṣaṭtriṃśac ca

ṣaṭtriṃśac ca+akṣarāṇi -> ṣaṭtriṃśac cākṣarāṇi

saśaśidinakarais+devatās -> saśaśidinakarair devatās

saśaśidinakarair devatās+pūjanīyās -> saśaśidinakarair devatāḥ pūjanīyās

viṣṭhais+|| -> viṣṭhaiḥ||

vasāvarṇagandhais+ca -> vasāvarṇagandhaiś ca

aśrubhyām+kheṭasiṃhāṇajalam -> aśrubhyāṃ kheṭasiṃhāṇajalam

aśrubhyāṃ kheṭasiṃhāṇajalam+iva -> aśrubhyāṃ kheṭasiṃhāṇajalam iva

vīryais+pittāmbupūyais -> vīryaiḥ pittāmbupūyais

vīryaiḥ pittāmbupūyais+vividhatanugatais -> vīryaiḥ pittāmbupūyair vividhatanugatais

vīryaiḥ pittāmbupūyair vividhatanugatais+lohitais -> vīryaiḥ pittāmbupūyair vividhatanugatair lohitais

vīryaiḥ pittāmbupūyair vividhatanugatair lohitais+svedamedais -> vīryaiḥ pittāmbupūyair vividhatanugatair lohitaiḥ svedamedais

phupphusais+antrameḍhrais -> phupphusair antrameḍhrais

phupphusair antrameḍhrais+| -> phupphusair antrameḍhraiḥ|

yūkābhis+lomakīṭais -> yūkābhir lomakīṭais

yūkābhir lomakīṭais+pravaranarapate -> yūkābhir lomakīṭaiḥ pravaranarapate

dantais+keśais -> dantaiḥ keśais

dantaiḥ keśais+tvagādyais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagādyais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagādyais+sapiśitasanahārvasthibukkais -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagādyaiḥ sapiśitasanahārvasthibukkais

dantaiḥ keśais tvagādyaiḥ sapiśitasanahārvasthibukkais+ca -> dantaiḥ keśais tvagādyaiḥ sapiśitasanahārvasthibukkaiś ca

idānīm+śarīrāvayavasamayās -> idānīṃ śarīrāvayavasamayās

idānīṃ śarīrāvayavasamayās+ucyante--- -> idānīṃ śarīrāvayavasamayā ucyante---

jugupsācittena+iti|| -> jugupsācitteneti||

kṣipram+nāśam -> kṣipraṃ nāśam

kṣipraṃ nāśam+prayāti -> kṣipraṃ nāśaṃ prayāti

dattān+samayān -> dattan samayān

dattan samayān+tyajati -> dattan samayāṃś tyajati

mūrkhas+mohāt -> mūrkho mohāt

mūrkho mohāt+kadācit -> mūrkho mohāt kadācit

mūrkho mohāt kadācit+gaṇacakrādike -> mūrkho mohāt kadācid gaṇacakrādike

punar+yoginībhis -> punar yoginībhis

punar yoginībhis+dattās -> punar yoginībhir dattās

punar yoginībhir dattās+| -> punar yoginībhir dattāḥ|

bhakṣaṇīyās+te -> bhakṣaṇīyās te

samastās+kulagatasamayās -> samastāḥ kulagatasamayās

samastāḥ kulagatasamayās+yoginā -> samastāḥ kulagatasamayā yoginā

evam+ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedās -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedās

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedās+kṣitibhuvanagatās -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedāḥ kṣitibhuvanagatās

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedāḥ kṣitibhuvanagatās+bhūcarīkhecarīṇām -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedāḥ kṣitibhuvanagatā bhūcarīkhecarīṇām

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedāḥ kṣitibhuvanagatā bhūcarīkhecarīṇām+dvāsaptatisamayās -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedāḥ kṣitibhuvanagatā bhūcarīkhecarīṇāṃ dvāsaptatisamayās

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedāḥ kṣitibhuvanagatā bhūcarīkhecarīṇāṃ dvāsaptatisamayās+| -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśajjātibhedāḥ kṣitibhuvanagatā bhūcarīkhecarīṇāṃ dvāsaptatisamayāḥ|

kākāsyādīnām+āsurīṇām -> kākāsyādīnām āsurīṇām

kākāsyādīnām āsurīṇām+bhavati -> kākāsyādīnām āsurīṇāṃ bhavati

bheruṇḍas+ambarīkas -> bheruṇḍo 'mbarīkas

bheruṇḍo 'mbarīkas+iti| -> bheruṇḍo 'mbarīka iti|

kṣipranāśam+prayāti|| -> kṣipranāśaṃ prayāti||

mūrkhas+mohāt -> mūrkho mohāt

mūrkho mohāt+kadācit -> mūrkho mohāt kadācit

mūrkho mohāt kadācit+tyajati -> mūrkho mohāt kadācit tyajati

samastās+kulagatasamayās -> samastāḥ kulagatasamayās

samastāḥ kulagatasamayās+yoginā -> samastāḥ kulagatasamayā yoginā

ca+aṣṭamas -> cāṣṭamas

cāṣṭamas+divyapakṣī -> cāṣṭamo divyapakṣī

bheruṇḍaś ca+ambarīkas -> bheruṇḍaś cāmbarīkas

bheruṇḍaś cāmbarīkas+bhavati -> bheruṇḍaś cāmbarīko bhavati

dātyūhas+| -> dātyūhaḥ|

gudamukhas+iti| -> gudamukha iti|

nīlākṣaś cakoras+anilas -> nīlākṣaś cakoro 'nilas

nīlākṣaś cakoro 'nilas+vāgvulikā -> nīlākṣaś cakoro 'nilo vāgvulikā

kāko ghṛdhra ulūkas+mṛgaripus -> kāko ghṛdhra ulūko mṛgaripus

kāko ghṛdhra ulūko mṛgaripus+iti -> kāko ghṛdhra ulūko mṛgaripur iti

nīlākṣaḥ śrīcakoras+tu -> nīlākṣaḥ śrīcakoras tu

nīlākṣaḥ śrīcakoras tu+anilagudamukhas -> nīlākṣaḥ śrīcakoras tv anilagudamukhas

nīlākṣaḥ śrīcakoras tv anilagudamukhas+bukkipādordhvaśāyī|| -> nīlākṣaḥ śrīcakoras tv anilagudamukho bukkipādordhvaśāyī||

kāko gṛdhro 'pi+ulūkas -> kāko gṛdhro 'py ulūkas

kāko gṛdhro 'py ulūkas+mṛgaripuśikhinau -> kāko gṛdhro 'py ulūko mṛgaripuśikhinau

śabdavajrādayas+ṣaṭ -> śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaṭ

śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaṭ+lāvas -> śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvas

śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvas+pārāvatas -> śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvatas

śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvatas+bakas -> śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvato bakas

śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvato bakas+caṭakas -> śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvato bakaś caṭakas

śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvato bakaś caṭakas+cakravākas -> śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvato bakaś caṭakaś cakravākas

śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvato bakaś caṭakaś cakravākas+haṃsas -> śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvato bakaś caṭakaś cakravāko haṃsas

śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvato bakaś caṭakaś cakravāko haṃsas+iti -> śabdavajrādayaḥ ṣaḍ lāvaḥ pārāvato bakaś caṭakaś cakravāko haṃsa iti

prakaṭitajaladhis+catvāras -> prakaṭitajaladhiś catvāras

prakaṭitajaladhiś catvāraḥ samayās tārādayas+| -> prakaṭitajaladhiś catvāraḥ samayās tārādayaḥ|

śārikā+iti -> śāriketi

cātakas+śukas -> cātakaḥ śukas

śvādicatuṣkam+yathā -> śvādicatuṣkaṃ yathā

evaṃ bhūcarajalacarasamayaniyamas+| -> evaṃ bhūcarajalacarasamayaniyamaḥ|

kṛkalāsas+ulūkāsyā -> kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyā

kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyā+iti -> kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyeti

kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyeti+aṣṭau -> kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyety aṣṭau

kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyety aṣṭau+asurajātīnām -> kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyety aṣṭāv asurajātīnām

kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyety aṣṭāv asurajātīnām+samayās -> kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyety aṣṭāv asurajātīnāṃ samayās

kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyety aṣṭāv asurajātīnāṃ samayās+rūpaparivartanam -> kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyety aṣṭāv asurajātīnāṃ samayā rūpaparivartanam

kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyety aṣṭāv asurajātīnāṃ samayā rūpaparivartanam+ca| -> kṛkalāsa ulūkāsyety aṣṭāv asurajātīnāṃ samayā rūpaparivartanaṃ ca|

iṣukas+garuḍāsyā -> iṣuko garuḍāsyā

śaśakas+śvānāsyā -> śaśakaḥ śvānāsyā

kapis+api -> kapir api

śālijātakas+jambukāsyā -> śālijātako jambukāsyā

mūṣakas+śūkarāsyā -> mūṣakaḥ śūkarāsyā

sasiṃhas+vasudaśakam -> sasiṃho vasudaśakam

śvā+aśvas -> śvāśvas

śvāśvas+gohastimeṣās -> śvāśvo gohastimeṣās

śvāśvo gohastimeṣās tv ajahariṇakharās+śūkaroṣṭrau -> śvāśvo gohastimeṣās tv ajahariṇakharāḥ śūkaroṣṭrau

evam+daśavidhā -> evaṃ daśavidhā

evam+viṇmūtramajjāpañcapradīpās -> evaṃ viṇmūtramajjāpañcapradīpās

evaṃ viṇmūtramajjāpañcapradīpās+aṣṭasamayās -> evaṃ viṇmūtramajjāpañcapradīpā aṣṭasamayās

evaṃ viṇmūtramajjāpañcapradīpā aṣṭasamayās+| -> evaṃ viṇmūtramajjāpañcapradīpā aṣṭasamayāḥ|

śvāśvagohastiyuktas+kleśānām -> śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānām

śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānām+vajradaṇḍas -> śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍas

śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍas+paśujanabhayadas -> śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadas

śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadas+ca -> śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś ca

śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś ca+aṣṭamas -> śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamas

śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamas+anyas -> śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyas

śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyas+atiraudras -> śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyo 'tiraudras

śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyo 'tiraudras+mahāmāṃsasamayas -> śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyo 'tiraudro mahāmāṃsasamayas

śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyo 'tiraudro mahāmāṃsasamayas+iti| -> śvāśvagohastiyuktaḥ kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyo 'tiraudro mahāmāṃsasamaya iti|

yuktas+maraṇabhayaharas -> yukto maraṇabhayaharas

yukto maraṇabhayaharas+| -> yukto maraṇabhayaharaḥ|

jinavaras+vairocanas -> jinavaro vairocanas

jinavaro vairocanas+tena -> jinavaro vairocanas tena

akṣobhyas+mūtram -> akṣobhyo mūtram

akṣobhyo mūtram+amoghasiddhis -> akṣobhyo mūtram amoghasiddhis

akṣobhyo mūtram amoghasiddhis+majjā -> akṣobhyo mūtram amoghasiddhir majjā

kim+punar -> kiṃ punar

kiṃ punar+yogayuktas -> kiṃ punar yogayuktas

kiṃ punar yogayuktas+acyutīkṛtas -> kiṃ punar yogayukto 'cyutīkṛtas

kiṃ punar yogayukto 'cyutīkṛtas+iti -> kiṃ punar yogayukto 'cyutīkṛta iti

kiṃ punar yogayukto 'cyutīkṛta iti+arthas -> kiṃ punar yogayukto 'cyutīkṛta ity arthas

kiṃ punar yogayukto 'cyutīkṛta ity arthas+| -> kiṃ punar yogayukto 'cyutīkṛta ity arthaḥ|

bhakṣitas+maraṇabhayaharas -> bhakṣito maraṇabhayaharas

bhakṣito maraṇabhayaharas+| -> bhakṣito maraṇabhayaharaḥ|

prajñādharmodayasthas+dinakarasahitas -> prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitas

prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitas+bodhicittadhātus -> prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahito bodhicittadhātus

prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahito bodhicittadhātus+bāhye -> prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahito bodhicittadhātur bāhye

ekas+rājan -> eko rājan

eko rājan+śaśāṅkas -> eko rājañ chaśāṅkas

eko rājañ chaśāṅkas+maraṇabhayaharas -> eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharas

eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharas+sevitas -> eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharaḥ sevitas

eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharaḥ sevitas+sarvakālam -> eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharaḥ sevitaḥ sarvakālam

eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharaḥ sevitaḥ sarvakālam+acyutasukhena| -> eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharaḥ sevitaḥ sarvakālam acyutasukhena|

kleśānām+vajradaṇḍas -> kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍas

kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍas+paśujanabhayadas -> kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadas

kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadas+ca -> kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś ca

kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś ca+aṣṭamas -> kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamas

kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamas+anyas -> kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyas

kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyas+atiraudras -> kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyo 'tiraudras

kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyo 'tiraudras+|| -> kleśānāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ paśujanabhayadaś cāṣṭamo 'nyo 'tiraudraḥ||

akṣobhyas+amoghasiddhis -> akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhis

akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhis+jinavarasahitas -> akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhir jinavarasahitas

akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhir jinavarasahitas+śvāśvagohastiyuktas -> akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhir jinavarasahitaḥ śvāśvagohastiyuktas

prajñādharmodayasthas+dinakarasahitas -> prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitas

prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitas+kim -> prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitaḥ kim

prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitaḥ kim+punar -> prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitaḥ kiṃ punar

prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitaḥ kiṃ punar+yogayuktas -> prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitaḥ kiṃ punar yogayuktas

prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitaḥ kiṃ punar yogayuktas+| -> prajñādharmodayastho dinakarasahitaḥ kiṃ punar yogayuktaḥ|

ekas+rājan -> eko rājan

eko rājan+śaśāṅkas -> eko rājañ chaśāṅkas

eko rājañ chaśāṅkas+maraṇabhayaharas -> eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharas

eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharas+sevitas -> eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharaḥ sevitas

eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharaḥ sevitas+sarvakālam -> eko rājañ chaśāṅko maraṇabhayaharaḥ sevitaḥ sarvakālam

guṇās+ucyante--- -> guṇā ucyante---

sevitas+yoginām -> sevito yoginām

sevito yoginām+tasya -> sevito yogināṃ tasya

caturthas+samayas -> caturthaḥ samayas

caturthaḥ samayas+bhavati -> caturthaḥ samayo bhavati

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

pānahetos+prakuryāt -> pānahetoḥ prakuryāt

pānahetoḥ prakuryāt+vajrapūjārtham -> pānahetoḥ prakuryād vajrapūjārtham

pānahetoḥ prakuryād vajrapūjārtham+iti -> pānahetoḥ prakuryād vajrapūjārtham iti

samayavairahitām+api -> samayavairahitām api

gaṇacakram+vinā -> gaṇacakraṃ vinā

mudrām+yām -> mudrāṃ yām

mudrāṃ yām+kāṃcit -> mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcit

mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcit+asmin -> mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin

mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin+madyapānakāle -> mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin madyapānakāle

tasmāt+prajñādhimuktam -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktam

tasmāt prajñādhimuktam+kaluṣamalaharam -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharam

tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharam+mantriṇām -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇām

tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇām+siddhidam -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇāṃ siddhidam

tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇāṃ siddhidam+syāt -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇāṃ siddhidaṃ syāt

tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇāṃ siddhidaṃ syāt+iti| -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇāṃ siddhidaṃ syād iti|

āvṛtas+māravṛndais -> āvṛto māravṛndais

āvṛto māravṛndais+bhavati| -> āvṛto māravṛndair bhavati|

madyapas+iti -> madyapa iti

madyapa iti+arthas -> madyapa ity arthas

madyapa ity arthas+| -> madyapa ity arthaḥ|

mudrāhīnas+pibet -> mudrāhīnaḥ pibet

mudrāhīnaḥ pibet+yas -> mudrāhīnaḥ pibed yas

mudrāhīnaḥ pibed yas+ācāryas -> mudrāhīnaḥ pibed ya ācāryas

mudrāhīnaḥ pibed ya ācāryas+sa -> mudrāhīnaḥ pibed ya ācāryaḥ sa

anyat+vā -> anyad vā

sarvam+madyam -> sarvaṃ madyam

sarvaṃ madyam+prajñāsvabhāvam -> sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvam

sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvam+madhujam -> sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ madhujam

sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ madhujam+guḍajam -> sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ madhujaṃ guḍajam

sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ madhujaṃ guḍajam+dhānyajam -> sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ madhujaṃ guḍajaṃ dhānyajam

sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ madhujaṃ guḍajaṃ dhānyajam+vṛkṣajam -> sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ madhujaṃ guḍajaṃ dhānyajaṃ vṛkṣajam

sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ madhujaṃ guḍajaṃ dhānyajaṃ vṛkṣajam+vā| -> sarvaṃ madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ madhujaṃ guḍajaṃ dhānyajaṃ vṛkṣajaṃ vā|

madyam+ityādinā| -> madyam ityādinā|

mudrām+yām -> mudrāṃ yām

mudrāṃ yām+kāṃcit -> mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcit

mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcit+asmin -> mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin

mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin+samayavirahitām -> mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin samayavirahitām

mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin samayavirahitām+pānahetos -> mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin samayavirahitāṃ pānahetos

mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin samayavirahitāṃ pānahetos+prakuryāt|| -> mudrāṃ yāṃ kāṃcid asmin samayavirahitāṃ pānahetoḥ prakuryāt||

tasmāt+prajñādhimuktam -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktam

tasmāt prajñādhimuktam+kaluṣamalaharam -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharam

tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharam+mantriṇām -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇām

tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇām+siddhidam -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇāṃ siddhidam

tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇāṃ siddhidam+syāt -> tasmāt prajñādhimuktaṃ kaluṣamalaharaṃ mantriṇāṃ siddhidaṃ syāt

ca+āvṛtas -> cāvṛtas

cāvṛto māravṛndais+| -> cāvṛto māravṛndaiḥ|

mudrāhīnaḥ pibet+yas -> mudrāhīnaḥ pibed yas

mudrāhīnaḥ pibed yas+sa -> mudrāhīnaḥ pibed yaḥ sa

madyam+prajñāsvabhāvam -> madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvam

madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvam+samadhujaguḍajam -> madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ samadhujaguḍajam

madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ samadhujaguḍajam+dhānyajam -> madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ samadhujaguḍajaṃ dhānyajam

madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ samadhujaguḍajaṃ dhānyajam+vṛkṣajam -> madyaṃ prajñāsvabhāvaṃ samadhujaguḍajaṃ dhānyajaṃ vṛkṣajam

pānaniyamas+ucyate--- -> pānaniyama ucyate---

evam+ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedabhinnās -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedabhinnās

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedabhinnās+kṣititalanilaye -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedabhinnāḥ kṣititalanilaye

veditavyās+carcikādīnām -> veditavyāś carcikādīnām

yoginām+sarvatra -> yogināṃ sarvatra

prakṛtiguṇajaḍas+matsyagandhas -> prakṛtiguṇajaḍo matsyagandhas

prakṛtiguṇajaḍo matsyagandho vṛṣaḥ syād ity amitābhas+| -> prakṛtiguṇajaḍo matsyagandho vṛṣaḥ syād ity amitābhaḥ|

stabdhākṣas+mandagāmī -> stabdhākṣo mandagāmī

ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedabhinnās+kṣititalanilaye -> ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedabhinnāḥ kṣititalanilaye

gajas+pūtigandhas -> gajaḥ pūtigandhas

gajaḥ pūtigandhas+atimūrkhas -> gajaḥ pūtigandho 'timūrkhas

prakṛtiguṇajaḍas+matsyagandhas -> prakṛtiguṇajaḍo matsyagandhas

prakṛtiguṇajaḍo matsyagandhas+vṛṣas -> prakṛtiguṇajaḍo matsyagandho vṛṣas

prakṛtiguṇajaḍo matsyagandho vṛṣas+syāt| -> prakṛtiguṇajaḍo matsyagandho vṛṣaḥ syāt|

stabdhākṣas+mandagāmī -> stabdhākṣo mandagāmī

paravaśas+mūtragandhas -> paravaśo mūtragandhas

paravaśo mūtragandhas+parārthī -> paravaśo mūtragandhaḥ parārthī

kāmalolas+bhavati -> kāmalolo bhavati

aśvas+vai -> aśvo vai

kṣaralaghuviṣayas+trastacittas -> kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacittas

kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacittas+atibhītas -> kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacitto 'tibhītas

kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacitto 'tibhītas+amoghasiddhis -> kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacitto 'tibhīto 'moghasiddhis

kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacitto 'tibhīto 'moghasiddhis+iti|| -> kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacitto 'tibhīto 'moghasiddhir iti||

sāraṅgas+śīghragāmī -> sāraṅgaḥ śīghragāmī

viṣayavirahitas+nirbhayas -> viṣayavirahito nirbhayas

viṣayavirahito nirbhayas+tyāgaśīlas -> viṣayavirahito nirbhayas tyāgaśīlas

viṣayavirahito nirbhayas tyāgaśīlas+akṣobhyas -> viṣayavirahito nirbhayas tyāgaśīlo 'kṣobhyas

viṣayavirahito nirbhayas tyāgaśīlo 'kṣobhyas+iti| -> viṣayavirahito nirbhayas tyāgaśīlo 'kṣobhya iti|

idānīm+yoginām -> idānīṃ yoginām

idānīṃ yoginām+lakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ yogināṃ lakṣaṇam

idānīṃ yogināṃ lakṣaṇam+ucyate---siṃhas -> idānīṃ yogināṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate---siṃhas

idānīṃ yogināṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate---siṃhas+ca -> idānīṃ yogināṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate---siṃhaś ca

idānīṃ yogināṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate---siṃhaś ca+ekāntavāsī -> idānīṃ yogināṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate---siṃhaś caikāntavāsī

ṣaṭtriṃśaddūtīnām+niyamas -> ṣaṭtriṃśaddūtīnāṃ niyamas

ṣaṭtriṃśaddūtīnāṃ niyamas+| -> ṣaṭtriṃśaddūtīnāṃ niyamaḥ|

miśrajātis+| -> miśrajātiḥ|

bhavet+sarvadā -> bhavet sarvadā

evam+dūtīnām -> evaṃ dūtīnām

evaṃ dūtīnām+śuddhajātis -> evaṃ dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātis

evaṃ dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātis+kvacit -> evaṃ dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātiḥ kvacit

evaṃ dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātiḥ kvacit+iha -> evaṃ dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātiḥ kvacid iha

sthūlakeśā+iti -> sthūlakeśeti

evam+sthūlā -> evaṃ sthūlā

kṣaralaghuviṣayas+trastacittas -> kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacittas

kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacittas+atibhītas -> kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacitto 'tibhītas

kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacitto 'tibhītas+|| -> kṣaralaghuviṣayas trastacitto 'tibhītaḥ||

sāraṅgas+śīghragāmī -> sāraṅgaḥ śīghragāmī

viṣayavirahitas+nirbhayas -> viṣayavirahito nirbhayas

viṣayavirahito nirbhayas+tyāgaśīlas -> viṣayavirahito nirbhayas tyāgaśīlas

siṃhas+ca -> siṃhaś ca

siṃhaś ca+ekāntavāsī -> siṃhaś caikāntavāsī

miśrajātis+| -> miśrajātiḥ|

bhavet+sarvadā -> bhavet sarvadā

dūtīnām+śuddhajātis -> dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātis

dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātis+kvacit -> dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātiḥ kvacit

dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātiḥ kvacit+iha -> dūtīnāṃ śuddhajātiḥ kvacid iha

dīrghakeśā+iti -> dīrghakeśeti

svalpakeśā+iti -> svalpakeśeti

vakrekeśā+iti -> vakrekeśeti

pralambā+acapalanayanā -> pralambācapalanayanā

evam+kiṃcittanvī -> evaṃ kiṃcittanvī

sattvavatsalā+iti -> sattvavatsaleti

tanvaṅgī+ityādinā| -> tanvaṅgītyādinā|

tu+acapalanayanā -> tv acapalanayanā

kiṃcit+tanvī -> kiṃcit tanvī

idānīm+śarīralakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ śarīralakṣaṇam

idānīṃ śarīralakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ śarīralakṣaṇam ucyate---

tatas+pūrvavat -> tataḥ pūrvavat

tataḥ pūrvavat+gandhaniyamas -> tataḥ pūrvavad gandhaniyamas

tataḥ pūrvavad gandhaniyamas+jātiniyamas -> tataḥ pūrvavad gandhaniyamo jātiniyamas

tataḥ pūrvavad gandhaniyamo jātiniyamas+ca -> tataḥ pūrvavad gandhaniyamo jātiniyamaś ca

tataḥ pūrvavad gandhaniyamo jātiniyamaś ca+iti|| -> tataḥ pūrvavad gandhaniyamo jātiniyamaś ceti||

vairocanas+gajas -> vairocano gajas

vairocano gajas+iti| -> vairocano gaja iti|

amitābhas+vṛṣabhas -> amitābho vṛṣabhas

amitābho vṛṣabhas+| -> amitābho vṛṣabhaḥ|

ratnasambhavas+aśvas -> ratnasambhavo 'śvas

ratnasambhavo 'śvas+| -> ratnasambhavo 'śvaḥ|

amoghasiddhis+mṛgas -> amoghasiddhir mṛgas

amoghasiddhir mṛgas+| -> amoghasiddhir mṛgaḥ|

akṣobhyas+siṃhas -> akṣobhyaḥ siṃhas

akṣobhyaḥ siṃhas+| -> akṣobhyaḥ siṃhaḥ|

siṃhas+mṛgas -> siṃho mṛgas

siṃho mṛgas+aśvas -> siṃho mṛgo 'śvas

siṃho mṛgo 'śvas+vṛṣabhas -> siṃho mṛgo 'śvo vṛṣabhas

siṃho mṛgo 'śvo vṛṣabhas+kuñjaras -> siṃho mṛgo 'śvo vṛṣabhaḥ kuñjaras

siṃho mṛgo 'śvo vṛṣabhaḥ kuñjaras+jātibhedāt| -> siṃho mṛgo 'śvo vṛṣabhaḥ kuñjaro jātibhedāt|

evam+yogī -> evaṃ yogī

evaṃ yogī+api -> evaṃ yogy api

śrīs+subhadrā -> śrīḥ subhadrā

śrīs+iti -> śrīr iti

hastinī+iti -> hastinīti

hastinīti+āsām -> hastinīty āsām

hastinīty āsām+kastūrikādigandhas -> hastinīty āsāṃ kastūrikādigandhas

hastinīty āsāṃ kastūrikādigandhas+yathākrameṇa -> hastinīty āsāṃ kastūrikādigandho yathākrameṇa

yathāsaṃkhyam+śrīs -> yathāsaṃkhyaṃ śrīs

yathāsaṃkhyaṃ śrīs+mudrā -> yathāsaṃkhyaṃ śrīr mudrā

akṣobhyas+amoghasiddhis -> akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhis

akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhis+vimalamaṇikaras -> akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhir vimalamaṇikaras

akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhir vimalamaṇikaras+padmapāṇis -> akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhir vimalamaṇikaraḥ padmapāṇis

akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhir vimalamaṇikaraḥ padmapāṇis+ca -> akṣobhyo 'moghasiddhir vimalamaṇikaraḥ padmapāṇiś ca

vṛṣabhas+kuñjaras -> vṛṣabhaḥ kuñjaras

vṛṣabhaḥ kuñjaras+jātibhedāt -> vṛṣabhaḥ kuñjaro jātibhedāt

siṃhas+mṛgas -> siṃho mṛgas

siṃho mṛgas+aśvas -> siṃho mṛgo 'śvas

siṃho mṛgo 'śvas+bhavati -> siṃho mṛgo 'śvo bhavati

kulavaśāt+māmakī -> kulavaśān māmakī

śrīs+tārā -> śrīs tārā

śrīs+mudrā -> śrīr mudrā

guṇavaśāt+āmiṣas -> guṇavaśād āmiṣas

guṇavaśād āmiṣaḥ pūtigandhas+|| -> guṇavaśād āmiṣaḥ pūtigandhaḥ||

kastūrigandhas+padmagandhas -> kastūrigandhaḥ padmagandhas

kastūrigandhaḥ padmagandhas+mūtragandhas -> kastūrigandhaḥ padmagandho mūtragandhas

kastūrigandhaḥ padmagandho mūtragandhas+prakṛtis -> kastūrigandhaḥ padmagandho mūtragandhaḥ prakṛtis

kastūrigandhaḥ padmagandho mūtragandhaḥ prakṛtis+ākāśādis -> kastūrigandhaḥ padmagandho mūtragandhaḥ prakṛtir ākāśādis

kastūrigandhaḥ padmagandho mūtragandhaḥ prakṛtir ākāśādis+tasya -> kastūrigandhaḥ padmagandho mūtragandhaḥ prakṛtir ākāśādis tasya

tāsām+bhavanti| -> tāsāṃ bhavanti|

guhyamudrā+ucyate| -> guhyamudrocyate|

ādau+ityādinā| -> ādāv ityādinā|

kastūrīpadmamūtrās+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> kastūrīpadmamūtrāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

kastūrīpadmamūtrāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+āmiṣas -> kastūrīpadmamūtrāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād āmiṣas

kastūrīpadmamūtrāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād āmiṣas+pūtigandhas -> kastūrīpadmamūtrāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād āmiṣaḥ pūtigandhas

śrīcatasro brahmakāyikādīnāṃ rūpiṇām+pṛthvīkṛtsnādibhāvitānām -> śrīcatasro brahmakāyikādīnāṃ rūpiṇāṃ pṛthvīkṛtsnādibhāvitānām

śrīcatasro brahmakāyikādīnāṃ rūpiṇāṃ pṛthvīkṛtsnādibhāvitānām+arūpiṇām -> śrīcatasro brahmakāyikādīnāṃ rūpiṇāṃ pṛthvīkṛtsnādibhāvitānām arūpiṇām

śrīcatasro brahmakāyikādīnāṃ rūpiṇāṃ pṛthvīkṛtsnādibhāvitānām arūpiṇām+śūnyadhātus -> śrīcatasro brahmakāyikādīnāṃ rūpiṇāṃ pṛthvīkṛtsnādibhāvitānām arūpiṇāṃ śūnyadhātus

śrīcatasro brahmakāyikādīnāṃ rūpiṇāṃ pṛthvīkṛtsnādibhāvitānām arūpiṇāṃ śūnyadhātus+| -> śrīcatasro brahmakāyikādīnāṃ rūpiṇāṃ pṛthvīkṛtsnādibhāvitānām arūpiṇāṃ śūnyadhātuḥ|

caṇḍās+daśadiśivilaye -> caṇḍā daśadiśivilaye

pātāleṣu+aṣṭa -> pātāleṣv aṣṭa

saptatriṃśattamas+vyāpakas -> saptatriṃśattamo vyāpakas

saptatriṃśattamo vyāpakas+śrīkulānām -> saptatriṃśattamo vyāpakaḥ śrīkulānām

saptatriṃśattamo vyāpakaḥ śrīkulānām+iti|| -> saptatriṃśattamo vyāpakaḥ śrīkulānām iti||

ekaikas+viśvabhartus -> ekaiko viśvabhartus

ekaiko viśvabhartus+tribhuvananilaye -> ekaiko viśvabhartus tribhuvananilaye

veditavyās+| -> veditavyāḥ|

ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedās+yoginīnām -> ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedā yoginīnām

ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedā yoginīnām+yoginā -> ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedā yoginīnāṃ yoginā

daityānām+aṣṭabhedās -> daityānām aṣṭabhedās

daityānām aṣṭabhedās+phaṇibhuvanagatās -> daityānām aṣṭabhedāḥ phaṇibhuvanagatās

daityānām aṣṭabhedāḥ phaṇibhuvanagatās+iti -> daityānām aṣṭabhedāḥ phaṇibhuvanagatā iti

evam+catvāras -> evaṃ catvāras

evaṃ catvāras+buddhabhedās -> evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedās

evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedās+ṣaṭ -> evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaṭ

evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaṭ+bodhisattvaprabhedās -> evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisattvaprabhedās

evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisattvaprabhedās+pretānām -> evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisattvaprabhedāḥ pretānām

evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisattvaprabhedāḥ pretānām+aṣṭabhedās -> evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisattvaprabhedāḥ pretānām aṣṭabhedās

evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisattvaprabhedāḥ pretānām aṣṭabhedās+krodhānām -> evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisattvaprabhedāḥ pretānām aṣṭabhedāḥ krodhānām

evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisattvaprabhedāḥ pretānām aṣṭabhedāḥ krodhānām+daśa -> evaṃ catvāro buddhabhedāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisattvaprabhedāḥ pretānām aṣṭabhedāḥ krodhānāṃ daśa

vyāpakas+śrīkulānām|| -> vyāpakaḥ śrīkulānām||

ekaikas+viśvabhartus -> ekaiko viśvabhartus

ekaiko viśvabhartus+tribhuvananilaye -> ekaiko viśvabhartus tribhuvananilaye

daityānām+ca -> daityānāṃ ca

daityānāṃ ca+aṣṭabhedās -> daityānāṃ cāṣṭabhedās

daityānāṃ cāṣṭabhedās+phaṇibhuvanagatās -> daityānāṃ cāṣṭabhedāḥ phaṇibhuvanagatās

daityānāṃ cāṣṭabhedāḥ phaṇibhuvanagatās+yoginā -> daityānāṃ cāṣṭabhedāḥ phaṇibhuvanagatā yoginā

pretabhedās+tathā -> pretabhedās tathā

pretabhedās tathā+aṣṭau| -> pretabhedās tathāṣṭau|

krodhānām+dikprabhedās -> krodhānāṃ dikprabhedās

krodhānāṃ dikprabhedās+kṣititalanilaye -> krodhānāṃ dikprabhedāḥ kṣititalanilaye

punas+ṛtavas -> punar ṛtavas

punar ṛtavas+bodhisattvaprabhedās -> punar ṛtavo bodhisattvaprabhedās

catvāras+buddhabhedās -> catvāro buddhabhedās

catvāro buddhabhedās+khalu -> catvāro buddhabhedāḥ khalu

vasavas+aṣṭabhedās -> vasavo 'ṣṭabhedās

vasavo 'ṣṭabhedās+śvānāsyādayas -> vasavo 'ṣṭabhedāḥ śvānāsyādayas

vasavo 'ṣṭabhedāḥ śvānāsyādayas+|| -> vasavo 'ṣṭabhedāḥ śvānāsyādayaḥ||

krodhabhedās+tayos -> krodhabhedās tayos

krodhabhedās tayos+dvau -> krodhabhedās tayor dvau

carcikādayas+daśa -> carcikādayo daśa

eṣām+punar -> eṣāṃ punar

eṣāṃ punar+bhedās -> eṣāṃ punar bhedās

eṣāṃ punar bhedās+catvāras -> eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāras

eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāras+śūdrādayas -> eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāraḥ śūdrādayas

eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāraḥ śūdrādayas+ṣaṭ -> eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāraḥ śūdrādayaḥ ṣaṭ

eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāraḥ śūdrādayaḥ ṣaṭ+śabdavajrādayas -> eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāraḥ śūdrādayaḥ ṣaṭ śabdavajrādayas

eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāraḥ śūdrādayaḥ ṣaṭ śabdavajrādayas+tathā -> eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāraḥ śūdrādayaḥ ṣaṭ śabdavajrādayas tathā

eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāraḥ śūdrādayaḥ ṣaṭ śabdavajrādayas tathā+aṣṭau -> eṣāṃ punar bhedāś catvāraḥ śūdrādayaḥ ṣaṭ śabdavajrādayas tathāṣṭau

yoginām+siddhidāni -> yogināṃ siddhidāni

yogināṃ siddhidāni+iti| -> yogināṃ siddhidānīti|

mūrkhāṇām+bandhanāni -> mūrkhāṇāṃ bandhanāni

yoginīnām+kulāni -> yoginīnāṃ kulāni

evam+ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṇabhedais -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṇabhedais

evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṇabhedais+kṣititalanilaye -> evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṇabhedaiḥ kṣititalanilaye

vasavas+ca -> vasavaś ca

vasavaś ca+ekam -> vasavaś caikam

vasavaś caikam+ekam -> vasavaś caikam ekam

vasavaś caikam ekam+krameṇa|| -> vasavaś caikam ekaṃ krameṇa||

catvāras+ṣaṭ -> catvāraḥ ṣaṭ

catvāraḥ ṣaṭ+tathā -> catvāraḥ ṣaṭ tathā

catvāraḥ ṣaṭ tathā+aṣṭau -> catvāraḥ ṣaṭ tathāṣṭau

yoginām+siddhidāni -> yogināṃ siddhidāni

mūrkhāṇām+bandhanāni -> mūrkhāṇāṃ bandhanāni

yoginīnām+kulāni -> yoginīnāṃ kulāni

ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṇabhedais+kṣititalanilaye -> ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṇabhedaiḥ kṣititalanilaye

pracaṇḍās+|| -> pracaṇḍāḥ||

śabarī+iti -> śabarīti

śabarīti+aṣṭau -> śabarīty aṣṭau

cāṣṭamā+ulūkavaktrā|| -> cāṣṭamolūkavaktrā||

krodhajātīyās+|| -> krodhajātīyāḥ||

veṇukārīti+aṣṭau -> veṇukārīty aṣṭau
