vanitās+yoginā -> vanitā yoginā

krodhajātās+khalu -> krodhajātāḥ khalu

veṇunṛtyā+atinīlā -> veṇunṛtyātinīlā

tathā+eva -> tathaiva

rajakī+iti -> rajakīti

rajakīti+aṣṭau| -> rajakīty aṣṭau|

bhūtayonis+| -> bhūtayoniḥ|

ca+aṣṭamī -> cāṣṭamī

lakṣmīs+pūrṇenduvaktrā -> lakṣmīḥ pūrṇenduvaktrā

ca+īśvarī -> ceśvarī

syāt+kṣititalanilaye -> syāt kṣititalanilaye

ḍombanaṭī+iti| -> ḍombanaṭīti|

evam+śabdavajrā -> evaṃ śabdavajrā

dvijadharmatas+---ṛkśākhā -> dvijadharmataḥ---ṛkśākhā

vaiśyadharmāt+vaṇik -> vaiśyadharmād vaṇik

vaiśyadharmād vaṇik+kāyasthas -> vaiśyadharmād vaṇik kāyasthas

vaiśyadharmād vaṇik kāyasthas+vaidyas -> vaiśyadharmād vaṇik kāyastho vaidyas

vaiśyadharmād vaṇik kāyastho vaidyas+ca -> vaiśyadharmād vaṇik kāyastho vaidyaś ca

vaiśyadharmād vaṇik kāyastho vaidyaś ca+iti| -> vaiśyadharmād vaṇik kāyastho vaidyaś ceti|

kṣatradharmeṇa---padātis+aśvārohas -> kṣatradharmeṇa---padātir aśvārohas

kṣatradharmeṇa---padātir aśvārohas+gajārohas -> kṣatradharmeṇa---padātir aśvāroho gajārohas

kṣatradharmeṇa---padātir aśvāroho gajārohas+rathārohas -> kṣatradharmeṇa---padātir aśvāroho gajāroho rathārohas

kṣatradharmeṇa---padātir aśvāroho gajāroho rathārohas+ca -> kṣatradharmeṇa---padātir aśvāroho gajāroho rathārohaś ca

kṣatradharmeṇa---padātir aśvāroho gajāroho rathārohaś ca+iti| -> kṣatradharmeṇa---padātir aśvāroho gajāroho rathārohaś ceti|

evam+tārā -> evaṃ tārā

caturvidhā---bhūmicasakas+gopālas -> caturvidhā---bhūmicasako gopālas

caturvidhā---bhūmicasako gopālas+mṛttikākarmakaras -> caturvidhā---bhūmicasako gopālo mṛttikākarmakaras

caturvidhā---bhūmicasako gopālo mṛttikākarmakaras+gṛhādīnām -> caturvidhā---bhūmicasako gopālo mṛttikākarmakaro gṛhādīnām

caturvidhā---bhūmicasako gopālo mṛttikākarmakaro gṛhādīnām+sthapatikas -> caturvidhā---bhūmicasako gopālo mṛttikākarmakaro gṛhādīnāṃ sthapatikas

caturvidhā---bhūmicasako gopālo mṛttikākarmakaro gṛhādīnāṃ sthapatikas+iti| -> caturvidhā---bhūmicasako gopālo mṛttikākarmakaro gṛhādīnāṃ sthapatika iti|

tārā+ityādinā| -> tāretyādinā|

sīvikā+aindrī|| -> sīvikaindrī||

syāt+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> syāt prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

syāt prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+vaiṣṇavī -> syāt prakṛtiguṇavaśād vaiṣṇavī

dharmadhātus+bhavati -> dharmadhātur bhavati

prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+sparśavajrā -> prakṛtiguṇavaśāt sparśavajrā

prakṛtiguṇavaśāt sparśavajrā+aṃśukārī -> prakṛtiguṇavaśāt sparśavajrāṃśukārī

samyak+vai -> samyag vai

śūdrādivarṇānām+ucyante--- -> śūdrādivarṇānām ucyante---

idānīm+tārādikulāni -> idānīṃ tārādikulāni

svasthacandrārkasīmnas+akṣayam -> svasthacandrārkasīmno 'kṣayam

svasthacandrārkasīmno 'kṣayam+iti -> svasthacandrārkasīmno 'kṣayam iti

svasthacandrārkasīmno 'kṣayam iti+arthas -> svasthacandrārkasīmno 'kṣayam ity arthas

svasthacandrārkasīmno 'kṣayam ity arthas+|| -> svasthacandrārkasīmno 'kṣayam ity arthaḥ||

narapate+iti -> narapata iti

narapata iti+āmantraṇam|% -> narapata ity āmantraṇam|%

tasyās+yoginyās -> tasyā yoginyās

tasyā yoginyās+tat -> tasyā yoginyās tat

tasyā yoginyās tat+sarvapuṇyam -> tasyā yoginyās tat sarvapuṇyam

tasyā yoginyās tat sarvapuṇyam+bhavati| -> tasyā yoginyās tat sarvapuṇyaṃ bhavati|

yat+puṇyam -> yat puṇyam

yat puṇyam+bhūmidāne -> yat puṇyaṃ bhūmidāne

puṇyahetos+triśuddhyā -> puṇyahetos triśuddhyā

puṇyahetos triśuddhyā+ācāryāya -> puṇyahetos triśuddhyācāryāya

kācit+vajrapūjām -> kācid vajrapūjām

kācid vajrapūjām+dadati -> kācid vajrapūjāṃ dadati

svasthacandrārkasīmnas+|| -> svasthacandrārkasīmnaḥ||

tasyās+tat -> tasyās tat

tasyās tat+sarvapuṇyam -> tasyās tat sarvapuṇyam

tasyās tat sarvapuṇyam+bhavati -> tasyās tat sarvapuṇyaṃ bhavati

yat+puṇyam -> yat puṇyam

yat puṇyam+bhūmidāne -> yat puṇyaṃ bhūmidāne

ācāryāya+induvaktrā -> ācāryāyenduvaktrā

puṇyahetos+triśuddhyā -> puṇyahetos triśuddhyā

kācit+vajrapūjām -> kācid vajrapūjām

kācid vajrapūjām+dadati -> kācid vajrapūjāṃ dadati

parasparacittaviśuddhiniyamas+|| -> parasparacittaviśuddhiniyamaḥ||

mocanīyās+yoginībhis -> mocanīyā yoginībhis

mocanīyā yoginībhis+iti -> mocanīyā yoginībhir iti

naptṛputrās+lohakārādayas -> naptṛputrā lohakārādayas

naptṛputrā lohakārādayas+| -> naptṛputrā lohakārādayaḥ|

haḍḍikādayas+| -> haḍḍikādayaḥ|

naptaras+aṣṭau -> naptaro 'ṣṭau

netrādyās+bhāgineyās -> netrādyā bhāgineyās

netrādyā bhāgineyās+kaṃsakārādayas -> netrādyā bhāgineyāḥ kaṃsakārādayas

netrādyā bhāgineyāḥ kaṃsakārādayas+| -> netrādyā bhāgineyāḥ kaṃsakārādayaḥ|

bhrātaras+sarvabuddhās -> bhrātaraḥ sarvabuddhās

bhrātaraḥ sarvabuddhās+śūdrādayas -> bhrātaraḥ sarvabuddhāḥ śūdrādayas

bhrātaraḥ sarvabuddhāḥ śūdrādayas+haḍḍikādayas -> bhrātaraḥ sarvabuddhāḥ śūdrādayo haḍḍikādayas

bhrātaraḥ sarvabuddhāḥ śūdrādayo haḍḍikādayas+| -> bhrātaraḥ sarvabuddhāḥ śūdrādayo haḍḍikādayaḥ|

tribhuvanajanakas+vajrasattvavat -> tribhuvanajanako vajrasattvavat

tribhuvanajanako vajrasattvavat+draṣṭavyas -> tribhuvanajanako vajrasattvavad draṣṭavyas

tribhuvanajanako vajrasattvavad draṣṭavyas+| -> tribhuvanajanako vajrasattvavad draṣṭavyaḥ|

yogibhis+śrīvajrī -> yogibhiḥ śrīvajrī

kāryā+iti -> kāryeti

varjanīyās+| -> varjanīyāḥ|

svamātrādayas+gotrajās -> svamātrādayo gotrajās

svamātrādayo gotrajās+āgatās -> svamātrādayo gotrajā āgatās

svamātrādayo gotrajā āgatās+svabhuvi -> svamātrādayo gotrajā āgatāḥ svabhuvi

evam+kulaviśuddhyā -> evaṃ kulaviśuddhyā

tanmaithunakaraṇāt+iti| -> tanmaithunakaraṇād iti|

caṇḍālas+nāyakatvāt| -> caṇḍālo nāyakatvāt|

sas+eva -> sa eva

ācāryas+ḍombas -> ācāryo ḍombas

ācāryo ḍombas+iti -> ācāryo ḍomba iti

evam+śrīvajrī -> evaṃ śrīvajrī

mocanīyās+kadācit|| -> mocanīyāḥ kadācit||

cakrasthās+yoginībhis -> cakrasthā yoginībhis

cakrasthā yoginībhis+svakulabhuvigatās -> cakrasthā yoginībhiḥ svakulabhuvigatās

cakrasthā yoginībhiḥ svakulabhuvigatās+sevanīyās -> cakrasthā yoginībhiḥ svakulabhuvigatāḥ sevanīyās

cakrasthā yoginībhiḥ svakulabhuvigatāḥ sevanīyās+prahṛṣṭās -> cakrasthā yoginībhiḥ svakulabhuvigatāḥ sevanīyāḥ prahṛṣṭās

netrādyās+bhrātṛputrās -> netrādyā bhrātṛputrās

netrādyā bhrātṛputrās+tu -> netrādyā bhrātṛputrās tu

netrādyā bhrātṛputrās tu+aparabahuvidhās -> netrādyā bhrātṛputrās tv aparabahuvidhās

netrādyā bhrātṛputrās tv aparabahuvidhās+naptaras -> netrādyā bhrātṛputrās tv aparabahuvidhā naptaras

netrādyā bhrātṛputrās tv aparabahuvidhā naptaras+naptṛputrās -> netrādyā bhrātṛputrās tv aparabahuvidhā naptaro naptṛputrās

netrādyā bhrātṛputrās tv aparabahuvidhā naptaro naptṛputrās+| -> netrādyā bhrātṛputrās tv aparabahuvidhā naptaro naptṛputrāḥ|

tribhuvanajanakas+bhrātaras -> tribhuvanajanako bhrātaras

tribhuvanajanako bhrātaras+sarvabuddhās -> tribhuvanajanako bhrātaraḥ sarvabuddhās

sarvās+tās -> sarvās tās

sarvās tās+nagnās -> sarvās tā nagnās

sarvās tā nagnās+vivastrās -> sarvās tā nagnā vivastrās

sarvās tā nagnā vivastrās+muktakeśās -> sarvās tā nagnā vivastrā muktakeśās

sarvās tā nagnā vivastrā muktakeśās+karoṭakartikāhastās -> sarvās tā nagnā vivastrā muktakeśāḥ karoṭakartikāhastās

sarvās tā nagnā vivastrā muktakeśāḥ karoṭakartikāhastās+saṃcaranti|| -> sarvās tā nagnā vivastrā muktakeśāḥ karoṭakartikāhastāḥ saṃcaranti||

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

mocanīyās+kadācit -> mocanīyāḥ kadācit

mocanīyāḥ kadācit+iti% -> mocanīyāḥ kadācid iti%

dvādaśabhūmyām+gatās -> dvādaśabhūmyāṃ gatās

dvādaśabhūmyāṃ gatās+sevanīyās -> dvādaśabhūmyāṃ gatāḥ sevanīyās

dvādaśabhūmyāṃ gatāḥ sevanīyās+sajane -> dvādaśabhūmyāṃ gatāḥ sevanīyāḥ sajane

tās+cakrasthās -> tāś cakrasthās

tāś cakrasthās+sarvakālam -> tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālam

tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālam+saṃcāreṇa -> tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇa

tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇa+āgatās -> tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇāgatās

tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇāgatās+svakulabhuvigatās -> tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇāgatāḥ svakulabhuvigatās

tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇāgatāḥ svakulabhuvigatās+yogibhis -> tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇāgatāḥ svakulabhuvigatā yogibhis

tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇāgatāḥ svakulabhuvigatā yogibhis+sevanīyās -> tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇāgatāḥ svakulabhuvigatā yogibhiḥ sevanīyās

tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇāgatāḥ svakulabhuvigatā yogibhiḥ sevanīyās+| -> tāś cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃcāreṇāgatāḥ svakulabhuvigatā yogibhiḥ sevanīyāḥ|

paśujanabhayadās+naptaras -> paśujanabhayadā naptaras

paśujanabhayadā naptaras+carcikādyās -> paśujanabhayadā naptaraś carcikādyās

paśujanabhayadā naptaraś carcikādyās+aṣṭau -> paśujanabhayadā naptaraś carcikādyā aṣṭau

sthitānām+yoginīnām -> sthitānāṃ yoginīnām

sthitānāṃ yoginīnām+locanādyās -> sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyās

sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyās+catasras -> sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyāś catasras

sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyāś catasras+yoginyas -> sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyāś catasro yoginyas

sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyāś catasro yoginyas+śabdavajrādyās -> sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyāś catasro yoginyaḥ śabdavajrādyās

sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyāś catasro yoginyaḥ śabdavajrādyās+ṣaṭ -> sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyāś catasro yoginyaḥ śabdavajrādyāḥ ṣaṭ

sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyāś catasro yoginyaḥ śabdavajrādyāḥ ṣaṭ+nīlā -> sthitānāṃ yoginīnāṃ locanādyāś catasro yoginyaḥ śabdavajrādyāḥ ṣaṇ nīlā

ca+iti| -> ceti|

sumātā+iti -> sumāteti

tatas+saṃcāre -> tataḥ saṃcāre

saṃcāras+kartavyas -> saṃcāraḥ kartavyas

saṃcāraḥ kartavyas+maithunam -> saṃcāraḥ kartavyo maithunam

saṃcāraḥ kartavyo maithunam+ca -> saṃcāraḥ kartavyo maithunaṃ ca

saṃcāraḥ kartavyo maithunaṃ ca+iti| -> saṃcāraḥ kartavyo maithunaṃ ceti|

tatas+pañcamapaṭaloktavidhinā -> tataḥ pañcamapaṭaloktavidhinā

mocanīyās+kadācit|| -> mocanīyāḥ kadācit||

cakrasthās+sarvakālam -> cakrasthāḥ sarvakālam

cakrasthāḥ sarvakālam+svakulabhuvigatās -> cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ svakulabhuvigatās

cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ svakulabhuvigatās+yogibhis -> cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ svakulabhuvigatā yogibhis

cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ svakulabhuvigatā yogibhis+sevanīyās -> cakrasthāḥ sarvakālaṃ svakulabhuvigatā yogibhiḥ sevanīyās

ṣaṭ+vajrās -> ṣaḍ vajrās

ṣaḍ vajrās+bhāgineyās -> ṣaḍ vajrā bhāgineyās

ṣaḍ vajrā bhāgineyās+paśujanabhayadās -> ṣaḍ vajrā bhāgineyāḥ paśujanabhayadās

ṣaḍ vajrā bhāgineyāḥ paśujanabhayadās+naptaras -> ṣaḍ vajrā bhāgineyāḥ paśujanabhayadā naptaras

ṣaḍ vajrā bhāgineyāḥ paśujanabhayadā naptaras+carcikādyās -> ṣaḍ vajrā bhāgineyāḥ paśujanabhayadā naptaraś carcikādyās

ṣaḍ vajrā bhāgineyāḥ paśujanabhayadā naptaraś carcikādyās+| -> ṣaḍ vajrā bhāgineyāḥ paśujanabhayadā naptaraś carcikādyāḥ|

locanādyās+bhaginyas -> locanādyā bhaginyas

sthānakulaniyamas+|| -> sthānakulaniyamaḥ||

iti+evam -> ity evam

ity evam+gaṇacakre -> ity evaṃ gaṇacakre

śiṣyas+karmavajribhis -> śiṣyaḥ karmavajribhis

śiṣyaḥ karmavajribhis+sārdham -> śiṣyaḥ karmavajribhiḥ sārdham

śiṣyaḥ karmavajribhiḥ sārdham+pūjādravyam -> śiṣyaḥ karmavajribhiḥ sārdhaṃ pūjādravyam

śiṣyaḥ karmavajribhiḥ sārdhaṃ pūjādravyam+ḍhaukayet| -> śiṣyaḥ karmavajribhiḥ sārdhaṃ pūjādravyaṃ ḍhaukayet|

maṇḍalam+kṛtvā -> maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā

bhakṣyabhojyādikam+pradīpasahitam -> bhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ pradīpasahitam

bhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ pradīpasahitam+vakṣyamāṇam -> bhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ pradīpasahitaṃ vakṣyamāṇam

bhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ pradīpasahitaṃ vakṣyamāṇam+daśaprakāram -> bhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ pradīpasahitaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ daśaprakāram

bhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ pradīpasahitaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ daśaprakāram+toyārghādikam -> bhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ pradīpasahitaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ daśaprakāraṃ toyārghādikam

bhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ pradīpasahitaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ daśaprakāraṃ toyārghādikam+dattvā -> bhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ pradīpasahitaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ daśaprakāraṃ toyārghādikaṃ dattvā

tatas+madyādikam -> tato madyādikam

tato madyādikam+dattvā -> tato madyādikaṃ dattvā

ardharātrād ghaṭikādvayordhvaṃ yāvat+sūryodayam -> ardharātrād ghaṭikādvayordhvaṃ yāvat sūryodayam

ardharātrād ghaṭikādvayordhvaṃ yāvat sūryodayam+tatas -> ardharātrād ghaṭikādvayordhvaṃ yāvat sūryodayaṃ tatas

ardharātrād ghaṭikādvayordhvaṃ yāvat sūryodayaṃ tatas+visarjayet -> ardharātrād ghaṭikādvayordhvaṃ yāvat sūryodayaṃ tato visarjayet

ardharātrād ghaṭikādvayordhvaṃ yāvat sūryodayaṃ tato visarjayet+gaṇacakram| -> ardharātrād ghaṭikādvayordhvaṃ yāvat sūryodayaṃ tato visarjayed gaṇacakram|

yām+yām -> yāṃ yām

yāṃ yām+kāmayitum -> yāṃ yāṃ kāmayitum

yāṃ yāṃ kāmayitum+samarthas -> yāṃ yāṃ kāmayituṃ samarthas

yāṃ yāṃ kāmayituṃ samarthas+śiṣyas -> yāṃ yāṃ kāmayituṃ samarthaḥ śiṣyas

yāṃ yāṃ kāmayituṃ samarthaḥ śiṣyas+tām -> yāṃ yāṃ kāmayituṃ samarthaḥ śiṣyas tām

yāṃ yāṃ kāmayituṃ samarthaḥ śiṣyas tām+tām -> yāṃ yāṃ kāmayituṃ samarthaḥ śiṣyas tāṃ tām

yāṃ yāṃ kāmayituṃ samarthaḥ śiṣyas tāṃ tām+samarpayet| -> yāṃ yāṃ kāmayituṃ samarthaḥ śiṣyas tāṃ tāṃ samarpayet|

mudrās+tadā -> mudrās tadā

sekavidhis+mahādhipataye| -> sekavidhir mahādhipataye|

svamudrām+samarpayet -> svamudrāṃ samarpayet

svamudrāṃ samarpayet+ācāryas -> svamudrāṃ samarpayed ācāryas

svamudrāṃ samarpayed ācāryas+iti -> svamudrāṃ samarpayed ācārya iti

tatas+bhāryājñānena -> tato bhāryājñānena

gurus+prajñāyās -> guruḥ prajñāyās

guruḥ prajñāyās+naranāsikām -> guruḥ prajñāyā naranāsikām

guruḥ prajñāyā naranāsikām+cūṣayet| -> guruḥ prajñāyā naranāsikāṃ cūṣayet|

śiṣyasya+akṣim -> śiṣyasyākṣim

śiṣyasyākṣim+baddhvā -> śiṣyasyākṣiṃ baddhvā

vajram+kṣipet| -> vajraṃ kṣipet|

śiṣyabhāryāyās+mukhe -> śiṣyabhāryāyā mukhe

gurus+śiṣyabhāryāyās -> guruḥ śiṣyabhāryāyās

guruḥ śiṣyabhāryāyās+stanam -> guruḥ śiṣyabhāryāyāḥ stanam

guruḥ śiṣyabhāryāyāḥ stanam+spṛśet -> guruḥ śiṣyabhāryāyāḥ stanaṃ spṛśet

guruḥ śiṣyabhāryāyāḥ stanaṃ spṛśet+kalaśābhiṣeke|% -> guruḥ śiṣyabhāryāyāḥ stanaṃ spṛśet kalaśābhiṣeke|%

prajñāyās+stanasparśanam -> prajñāyāḥ stanasparśanam

prajñāyāḥ stanasparśanam+upāyas -> prajñāyāḥ stanasparśanam upāyas

prajñāyāḥ stanasparśanam upāyas+karoti -> prajñāyāḥ stanasparśanam upāyaḥ karoti

punas+svabhāryām -> punaḥ svabhāryām

punaḥ svabhāryām+samarpayet| -> punaḥ svabhāryāṃ samarpayet|

tatas+sekakṣaṇe -> tataḥ sekakṣaṇe

bhāryām+svayam -> bhāryāṃ svayam

bhāryāṃ svayam+ācāryas -> bhāryāṃ svayam ācāryas

bhāryāṃ svayam ācāryas+abhigacchati -> bhāryāṃ svayam ācāryo 'bhigacchati

yā+āliṅgitā| -> yāliṅgitā|

svamudrā+ācāryeṇa -> svamudrācāryeṇa

paścāt+deyā -> paścād deyā

kuliśam+api -> kuliśam api

śuddhim+uttarottarābhiṣeke -> śuddhim uttarottarābhiṣeke

sarāgām+rajasvalām -> sarāgāṃ rajasvalām

sarāgāṃ rajasvalām+jñātvā -> sarāgāṃ rajasvalāṃ jñātvā

sarvālaṃkārayuktām+drutakanakanibhām -> sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhām

sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhām+dvādaśābdām -> sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdām

sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdām+sukanyām -> sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdāṃ sukanyām

sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdāṃ sukanyām+viṃśativarṣaparyantām -> sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdāṃ sukanyāṃ viṃśativarṣaparyantām

sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdāṃ sukanyāṃ viṃśativarṣaparyantām+prajñopāyātmakena -> sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdāṃ sukanyāṃ viṃśativarṣaparyantāṃ prajñopāyātmakena

punar+aparā -> punar aparā

tu+atha -> tv atha

paścāt+deyā -> paścād deyā

śuddhim+kuliśam -> śuddhiṃ kuliśam

śuddhiṃ kuliśam+api -> śuddhiṃ kuliśam api

sarvālaṃkārayuktām+drutakanakanibhām -> sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhām

sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhām+dvādaśābdām -> sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdām

sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdām+sukanyām -> sarvālaṃkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdāṃ sukanyām

tatas+mudrām -> tato mudrām

tato mudrām+samarpayet -> tato mudrāṃ samarpayet

tato mudrāṃ samarpayet+kalaśasekadānārtham -> tato mudrāṃ samarpayet kalaśasekadānārtham

tato mudrāṃ samarpayet kalaśasekadānārtham+iti|| -> tato mudrāṃ samarpayet kalaśasekadānārtham iti||

vijayaghaṭena+abhiṣecayet -> vijayaghaṭenābhiṣecayet

vijayaghaṭenābhiṣecayet+pūrvoktavidhinā| -> vijayaghaṭenābhiṣecayet pūrvoktavidhinā|

svabhāryayā+ekena -> svabhāryayaikena

gṛhastham+tāsām -> gṛhasthaṃ tāsām

gṛhasthaṃ tāsām+navānām -> gṛhasthaṃ tāsāṃ navānām

gṛhasthaṃ tāsāṃ navānām+madhye -> gṛhasthaṃ tāsāṃ navānāṃ madhye

gṛhasthaṃ tāsāṃ navānāṃ madhye+ekayā -> gṛhasthaṃ tāsāṃ navānāṃ madhya ekayā

ṣaḍbhis+mudrābhis -> ṣaḍbhir mudrābhis

ṣaḍbhir mudrābhis+caturbhis -> ṣaḍbhir mudrābhiś caturbhis

ṣaḍbhir mudrābhiś caturbhis+kalaśais -> ṣaḍbhir mudrābhiś caturbhiḥ kalaśais

ṣaḍbhir mudrābhiś caturbhiḥ kalaśais+snāpayet -> ṣaḍbhir mudrābhiś caturbhiḥ kalaśaiḥ snāpayet

ṣaḍbhir mudrābhiś caturbhiḥ kalaśaiḥ snāpayet+jayavijayābhyām -> ṣaḍbhir mudrābhiś caturbhiḥ kalaśaiḥ snāpayej jayavijayābhyām

ṣaḍbhir mudrābhiś caturbhiḥ kalaśaiḥ snāpayej jayavijayābhyām+api| -> ṣaḍbhir mudrābhiś caturbhiḥ kalaśaiḥ snāpayej jayavijayābhyām api|

śrāmaṇeram+tāsām -> śrāmaṇeraṃ tāsām

śrāmaṇeraṃ tāsām+madhye -> śrāmaṇeraṃ tāsāṃ madhye

daśabhis+nāgais -> daśabhir nāgais

daśabhir nāgais+aṣṭābhis -> daśabhir nāgair aṣṭābhis

daśabhir nāgair aṣṭābhis+ghaṭais -> daśabhir nāgair aṣṭābhir ghaṭais

daśabhir nāgair aṣṭābhir ghaṭais+jayavijayābhyām -> daśabhir nāgair aṣṭābhir ghaṭair jayavijayābhyām

daśabhir nāgair aṣṭābhir ghaṭair jayavijayābhyām+snāpayet -> daśabhir nāgair aṣṭābhir ghaṭair jayavijayābhyāṃ snāpayet

daśabhir nāgair aṣṭābhir ghaṭair jayavijayābhyāṃ snāpayet+bhikṣum| -> daśabhir nāgair aṣṭābhir ghaṭair jayavijayābhyāṃ snāpayed bhikṣum|

uttarottarābhiṣekas+pūrvoktābhis -> uttarottarābhiṣekaḥ pūrvoktābhis

uttarottarābhiṣekaḥ pūrvoktābhis+śūdrajātibhis -> uttarottarābhiṣekaḥ pūrvoktābhiḥ śūdrajātibhis

uttarottarābhiṣekaḥ pūrvoktābhiḥ śūdrajātibhis+| -> uttarottarābhiṣekaḥ pūrvoktābhiḥ śūdrajātibhiḥ|

tatas+uttarābhiṣekas -> tata uttarābhiṣekas

tata uttarābhiṣekas+| -> tata uttarābhiṣekaḥ|

saptavidhas+|| -> saptavidhaḥ||

evam+pūrvābhiṣekas -> evaṃ pūrvābhiṣekas

evaṃ pūrvābhiṣekas+toyādinā -> evaṃ pūrvābhiṣekas toyādinā

yoginīcakram+nagnam -> yoginīcakraṃ nagnam

yoginīcakraṃ nagnam+muktakeśam -> yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśam

yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśam+kartikākapālahastam -> yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ kartikākapālahastam

yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ kartikākapālahastam+viracayet -> yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ kartikākapālahastaṃ viracayet

yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ kartikākapālahastaṃ viracayet+navavidyābhis -> yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ kartikākapālahastaṃ viracayen navavidyābhis

yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ kartikākapālahastaṃ viracayen navavidyābhis+yathānukrameṇa -> yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ kartikākapālahastaṃ viracayen navavidyābhir yathānukrameṇa

yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ kartikākapālahastaṃ viracayen navavidyābhir yathānukrameṇa+iti| -> yoginīcakraṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ kartikākapālahastaṃ viracayen navavidyābhir yathānukrameṇeti|

āgneyyām+sparśavajrā -> āgneyyāṃ sparśavajrā

tatas+pūrve -> tataḥ pūrve

bhāryāyās+mātaram| -> bhāryāyā mātaram|

gṛhiṇas+tu -> gṛhiṇas tu

nagnīkṛtya+āliṅgayati| -> nagnīkṛtyāliṅgayati|

iti+adhyeṣitavantam -> ity adhyeṣitavantam

ity adhyeṣitavantam+sapatnīkam -> ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkam

ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkam+śiṣyam -> ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyam

ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyam+dṛṣṭvā -> ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvā

ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvā+ācāryas -> ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvācāryas

ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvācāryas+śabdavajrām -> ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvācāryaḥ śabdavajrām

ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvācāryaḥ śabdavajrām+sarvālaṃkārān -> ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvācāryaḥ śabdavajrāṃ sarvālaṃkārān

ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvācāryaḥ śabdavajrāṃ sarvālaṃkārān+apasarya -> ity adhyeṣitavantaṃ sapatnīkaṃ śiṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvācāryaḥ śabdavajrāṃ sarvālaṃkārān apasarya

śaraṇam+mama|| -> śaraṇaṃ mama||

ābodhimaṇḍaparyantam+na -> ābodhimaṇḍaparyantaṃ na

ābodhimaṇḍaparyantaṃ na+anyas -> ābodhimaṇḍaparyantaṃ nānyas

ābodhimaṇḍaparyantaṃ nānyas+asti -> ābodhimaṇḍaparyantaṃ nānyo 'sti

putradārādibhis+sārdham -> putradārādibhiḥ sārdham

putradārādibhiḥ sārdham+dāsas -> putradārādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dāsas

putradārādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dāsas+aham -> putradārādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dāso 'ham

putradārādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dāso 'ham+tava -> putradārādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dāso 'haṃ tava

prasādam+kuru -> prasādaṃ kuru

śūnyatākaruṇābhinnam+bodhicittam -> śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ bodhicittam

śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ bodhicittam+yat -> śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ bodhicittaṃ yat

śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ bodhicittaṃ yat+akṣaram| -> śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ bodhicittaṃ yad akṣaram|

namas+astu -> namo 'stu

namas+te -> namas te

tatas+adhyeṣayatas -> tato 'dhyeṣayatas

tato 'dhyeṣayatas+--- -> tato 'dhyeṣayataḥ---

kanakādikusumais+maṇḍalam -> kanakādikusumair maṇḍalam

kanakādikusumair maṇḍalam+kurutas -> kanakādikusumair maṇḍalaṃ kurutas

kanakādikusumair maṇḍalaṃ kurutas+dve -> kanakādikusumair maṇḍalaṃ kuruto dve

tām+gṛhītvā -> tāṃ gṛhītvā

tatas+guruniyamena -> tato guruniyamena

bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāṇām+caṇḍālī -> bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāṇāṃ caṇḍālī

sārdham+mama -> sārdhaṃ mama

sārdhaṃ mama+adhyeṣaṇām -> sārdhaṃ mamādhyeṣaṇām

sārdhaṃ mamādhyeṣaṇām+kuru| -> sārdhaṃ mamādhyeṣaṇāṃ kuru|

daśānām+madhye -> daśānāṃ madhye

tatas+ācāryas -> tata ācāryas

tata ācāryas+brūte---imām -> tata ācāryo brūte---imām

tata ācāryo brūte---imām+svakīyām -> tata ācāryo brūte---imāṃ svakīyām

tata ācāryo brūte---imāṃ svakīyām+bhāryām -> tata ācāryo brūte---imāṃ svakīyāṃ bhāryām

tata ācāryo brūte---imāṃ svakīyāṃ bhāryām+gṛhītvā -> tata ācāryo brūte---imāṃ svakīyāṃ bhāryāṃ gṛhītvā

kim+kartavyam -> kiṃ kartavyam

kiṃ kartavyam+he -> kiṃ kartavyaṃ he

idānīm+mayā -> idānīṃ mayā

śiṣyas+guros -> śiṣyo guros

śiṣyo guros+tatas -> śiṣyo guros tatas

śiṣyo guros tatas+ādeśam -> śiṣyo guros tata ādeśam

śiṣyo guros tata ādeśam+prārthayati| -> śiṣyo guros tata ādeśaṃ prārthayati|

mudrās+samarpayitvā -> mudrāḥ samarpayitvā

evam+daśa -> evaṃ daśa

tathāgataniyamas+| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ|

mudrās+deyās -> mudrā deyās

mudrā deyās+maṇḍalācāryapadābhilāṣiṇā -> mudrā deyā maṇḍalācāryapadābhilāṣiṇā

mudrā deyā maṇḍalācāryapadābhilāṣiṇā+iti -> mudrā deyā maṇḍalācāryapadābhilāṣiṇeti

aśeṣaviśvārthakaras+daśākāras -> aśeṣaviśvārthakaro daśākāras

aśeṣaviśvārthakaro daśākāras+vaśī -> aśeṣaviśvārthakaro daśākāro vaśī

daśākāras+daśārthārthas -> daśākāro daśārthārthas

daśākāro daśārthārthas+munīndras -> daśākāro daśārthārtho munīndras

daśākāro daśārthārtho munīndras+daśabalas -> daśākāro daśārthārtho munīndro daśabalas

daśākāro daśārthārtho munīndro daśabalas+vibhus -> daśākāro daśārthārtho munīndro daśabalo vibhus

daśākāro daśārthārtho munīndro daśabalo vibhus+| -> daśākāro daśārthārtho munīndro daśabalo vibhuḥ|

daśabhūmīśvaras+nāthas -> daśabhūmīśvaro nāthas

daśabhūmīśvaro nāthas+daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitas -> daśabhūmīśvaro nātho daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitas

daśabhūmīśvaro nātho daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitas+| -> daśabhūmīśvaro nātho daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitaḥ|

daśapāramitāśuddhis+daśapāramitānayas -> daśapāramitāśuddhir daśapāramitānayas

daśapāramitāśuddhir daśapāramitānayas+|| -> daśapāramitāśuddhir daśapāramitānayaḥ||

daśapāramitāprāptas+daśapāramitāśrayas -> daśapāramitāprāpto daśapāramitāśrayas

daśapāramitāprāpto daśapāramitāśrayas+| -> daśapāramitāprāpto daśapāramitāśrayaḥ|

mahāmantranayodbhūtas+mahāmantranayātmakas -> mahāmantranayodbhūto mahāmantranayātmakas

mahāmantranayodbhūto mahāmantranayātmakas+|| -> mahāmantranayodbhūto mahāmantranayātmakaḥ||

mahāmunis+| -> mahāmuniḥ|

mahāvairocanas+buddhas -> mahāvairocano buddhas

mahāvairocano buddhas+mahāmaunī -> mahāvairocano buddho mahāmaunī

nāmasaṃgītyām+dharmadhātustave -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ dharmadhātustave

tathā+āha -> tathāha

balāni+ābhis -> balāny ābhis

balāny ābhis+viśuddhāni -> balāny ābhir viśuddhāni

bhūmīs+daśa -> bhūmīr daśa

vaśitās+daśa -> vaśitā daśa

pāramitās+daśa -> pāramitā daśa

evam+uktakrameṇa -> evam uktakrameṇa

mahāvidyās+samākhyātās -> mahāvidyāḥ samākhyātās

mahāvidyāḥ samākhyātās+bhuktimuktiphalapradās -> mahāvidyāḥ samākhyātā bhuktimuktiphalapradās

mahāvidyāḥ samākhyātā bhuktimuktiphalapradās+|| -> mahāvidyāḥ samākhyātā bhuktimuktiphalapradāḥ||

kramāt+śūdrī -> kramāc chūdrī

vāyavyādyās+tu -> vāyavyādyās tu

bhikṣūṇām+śrāmaṇerāṇām -> bhikṣūṇāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇām

bhikṣūṇāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇām+dātavyas -> bhikṣūṇāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ dātavyas

bhikṣūṇāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ dātavyas+guruṇā -> bhikṣūṇāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ dātavyo guruṇā

maṇḍaleṣu+abhiṣiktābhis -> maṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktābhis

maṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktābhis+anyābhis -> maṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktābhir anyābhis

maṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktābhir anyābhis+śūdrajātibhis -> maṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktābhir anyābhiḥ śūdrajātibhis

maṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktābhir anyābhiḥ śūdrajātibhis+| -> maṇḍaleṣv abhiṣiktābhir anyābhiḥ śūdrajātibhiḥ|

dātavyas+anyābhis -> dātavyo 'nyābhis

dātavyo 'nyābhis+gṛhavāsinām|| -> dātavyo 'nyābhir gṛhavāsinām||

sekas+na -> seko na

guros+vidyās -> guror vidyās

guror vidyās+yadi -> guror vidyā yadi

guror vidyā yadi+etās -> guror vidyā yady etās

guror vidyā yady etās+kularakṣaṇāt| -> guror vidyā yady etāḥ kularakṣaṇāt|

pradātavyās+gṛhiṇā -> pradātavyā gṛhiṇā

vidyās+svagotrajās -> vidyāḥ svagotrajās

vidyāḥ svagotrajās+| -> vidyāḥ svagotrajāḥ|

tārādyās+dharmadhātvantās -> tārādyā dharmadhātvantās

tārādyā dharmadhātvantās+daśa -> tārādyā dharmadhātvantā daśa

ca+eva -> caiva

svamātus+bhaginī -> svamātur bhaginī

pitṛbhrātus+tathā -> pitṛbhrātus tathā

tathā+aṅganā|| -> tathāṅganā||

ca+eva -> caiva

bhāryāyās+jananī -> bhāryāyā jananī

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

vidyās+samarpaṇīyās -> vidyāḥ samarpaṇīyās

vidyāḥ samarpaṇīyās+gṛhasthaśiṣyena -> vidyāḥ samarpaṇīyā gṛhasthaśiṣyena

yathānukrameṇa+uktās -> yathānukrameṇoktās

yathānukrameṇoktās+daśa -> yathānukrameṇoktā daśa

tatas+sarvatantre -> tataḥ sarvatantre

caturvidhas+abhiṣekaniyamas -> caturvidho 'bhiṣekaniyamas

caturvidho 'bhiṣekaniyamas+| -> caturvidho 'bhiṣekaniyamaḥ|

devaviśuddhyā+ityādi -> devaviśuddhyetyādi

dvandvam+iti -> dvandvam iti

pāṇivyāptis+iti -> pāṇivyāptir iti

guhyas+iti -> guhya iti

guhya iti+īkṣaṇena -> guhya itīkṣaṇena

hasitena+ācāryas -> hasitenācāryas

hasitenācāryas+dviguṇātmakaśukrasukhena% -> hasitenācāryo dviguṇātmakaśukrasukhena%

tathā+āha -> tathāha

maṇḍalalekhanāya+itiprathamam -> maṇḍalalekhanāyetiprathamam

maṇḍalalekhanāyetiprathamam+śiṣyāvatāraṇe -> maṇḍalalekhanāyetiprathamaṃ śiṣyāvatāraṇe

maṇḍalalekhanāyetiprathamaṃ śiṣyāvatāraṇe+abhiṣekaniyamas -> maṇḍalalekhanāyetiprathamaṃ śiṣyāvatāraṇe 'bhiṣekaniyamas

maṇḍalalekhanāyetiprathamaṃ śiṣyāvatāraṇe 'bhiṣekaniyamas+| -> maṇḍalalekhanāyetiprathamaṃ śiṣyāvatāraṇe 'bhiṣekaniyamaḥ|

śiṣyāṇām+tantradeśanāya -> śiṣyāṇāṃ tantradeśanāya

yathā+ayam -> yathāyam

yathāyam+durbhagas -> yathāyaṃ durbhagas

yathāyaṃ durbhagas+sattvas -> yathāyaṃ durbhagaḥ sattvas

yathāyaṃ durbhagaḥ sattvas+asya -> yathāyaṃ durbhagaḥ sattvo 'sya

yathāyaṃ durbhagaḥ sattvo 'sya+adhikārāya -> yathāyaṃ durbhagaḥ sattvo 'syādhikārāya

jinam+vajrasattvam -> jinaṃ vajrasattvam

jinaṃ vajrasattvam+sākṣiṇam -> jinaṃ vajrasattvaṃ sākṣiṇam

jinaṃ vajrasattvaṃ sākṣiṇam+kṛtvā -> jinaṃ vajrasattvaṃ sākṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā

oṃkārādibījais+tatas -> oṃkārādibījais tatas

oṃkārādibījais tatas+mudrā -> oṃkārādibījais tato mudrā

pañcakulakalāpinīm+kṛtvā -> pañcakulakalāpinīṃ kṛtvā

tatas+prajñājñānābhiṣeke -> tataḥ prajñājñānābhiṣeke

guhyābhiṣekas+bhavati -> guhyābhiṣeko bhavati

mudrābhagam+ca -> mudrābhagaṃ ca

mudrābhagaṃ ca+ālokāpayati| -> mudrābhagaṃ cālokāpayati|

śiṣyāya+amṛtam -> śiṣyāyāmṛtam

śiṣyāyāmṛtam+dadāti -> śiṣyāyāmṛtaṃ dadāti

tatas+guhyapūjām -> tato guhyapūjām

tato guhyapūjām+kṛtvā -> tato guhyapūjāṃ kṛtvā

kalaśābhiṣekas+sas -> kalaśābhiṣekaḥ sas

kalaśābhiṣekaḥ sas+eva| -> kalaśābhiṣekaḥ sa eva|

svamudrāyās+tena -> svamudrāyās tena

stanasparśanam+kārayati -> stanasparśanaṃ kārayati

tatas+tuṣṭas -> tatas tuṣṭas

tatas tuṣṭas+gurus -> tatas tuṣṭo gurus

tatas tuṣṭo gurus+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> tatas tuṣṭo gurur lokasaṃvṛtyā

śiṣyas+gurum -> śiṣyo gurum

śiṣyo gurum+adhyeṣayati -> śiṣyo gurum adhyeṣayati

tatas+adhyeṣaṇādikam -> tato 'dhyeṣaṇādikam

tato 'dhyeṣaṇādikam+kṛtvā -> tato 'dhyeṣaṇādikaṃ kṛtvā

guros+samarpanīyā| -> guroḥ samarpanīyā|

tāvat+trastā -> tāvat trastā

deśakakaraṇāya+iti| -> deśakakaraṇāyeti|

aparas+mahācāryapadadānāya -> aparo mahācāryapadadānāya

tantraśrutādhikārāya+iti| -> tantraśrutādhikārāyeti|

ekas+sattvāvatāraṇārtham -> ekaḥ sattvāvatāraṇārtham

ekaḥ sattvāvatāraṇārtham+mārgaparijñāya -> ekaḥ sattvāvatāraṇārthaṃ mārgaparijñāya

iha+uttarābhiṣekas -> ihottarābhiṣekas

ihottarābhiṣekas+dvidhā| -> ihottarābhiṣeko dvidhā|

sākṣiṇam+ca -> sākṣiṇaṃ ca

sākṣiṇaṃ ca+atra -> sākṣiṇaṃ cātra

jinam+api -> jinam api

sakalajinakulais+śodhayitvā -> sakalajinakulaiḥ śodhayitvā

sakalajinakulaiḥ śodhayitvā+aṅgavaktrais -> sakalajinakulaiḥ śodhayitvāṅgavaktrais

guhyāt+guhyābhiṣekas -> guhyād guhyābhiṣekas

guhyād guhyābhiṣekas+bhavati -> guhyād guhyābhiṣeko bhavati

kumbhasekas+sas -> kumbhasekaḥ sas

kumbhasekaḥ sas+eva -> kumbhasekaḥ sa eva

śrīprajñāsparśanīyam+prathamam -> śrīprajñāsparśanīyaṃ prathamam

śrīprajñāsparśanīyaṃ prathamam+api -> śrīprajñāsparśanīyaṃ prathamam api

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

grāhyā+iti -> grāhyeti

vāyudhātus+arajastvāt -> vāyudhātur arajastvāt

vāyudhātur arajastvāt+na -> vāyudhātur arajastvān na

yāvat+dharmadhātus -> yāvad dharmadhātus

yāvad dharmadhātus+iti| -> yāvad dharmadhātur iti|

tejodhātum+ārabhya -> tejodhātum ārabhya

sekārtham+punas -> sekārthaṃ punas

sekārthaṃ punas+ṣaṭcatasras -> sekārthaṃ punaḥ ṣaṭcatasras

sekārthaṃ punaḥ ṣaṭcatasras+samasukhaphaladās -> sekārthaṃ punaḥ ṣaṭcatasraḥ samasukhaphaladās

sekārthaṃ punaḥ ṣaṭcatasraḥ samasukhaphaladās+| -> sekārthaṃ punaḥ ṣaṭcatasraḥ samasukhaphaladāḥ|

yāvat+mudrā -> yāvan mudrā

kākāsyā+iti -> kākāsyeti

asurāṃśās+śvānāsyā -> asurāṃśāḥ śvānāsyā

tatas+ekonacatvāriṃśadvarṣāt -> tata ekonacatvāriṃśadvarṣāt

tata ekonacatvāriṃśadvarṣāt+aṣṭau -> tata ekonacatvāriṃśadvarṣād aṣṭau

vaiṣṇavī+iti| -> vaiṣṇavīti|

bhūtāṃśās+| -> bhūtāṃśāḥ|

yatas+ekatriṃśadvarṣāt -> yata ekatriṃśadvarṣāt

yata ekatriṃśadvarṣāt+aṣṭau -> yata ekatriṃśadvarṣād aṣṭau

daśakrodhadevyas+| -> daśakrodhadevyaḥ|

raudrākṣī+iti -> raudrākṣīti

yathāsaṅkhyam+atinīlā -> yathāsaṅkhyam atinīlā

viṃśativarṣāt+ekaviṃśativarṣam -> viṃśativarṣād ekaviṃśativarṣam

viṃśativarṣād ekaviṃśativarṣam+ārabhya -> viṃśativarṣād ekaviṃśativarṣam ārabhya

krodhabhūtā+asurāṃśā -> krodhabhūtāsurāṃśā

krodhabhūtāsurāṃśā+iti -> krodhabhūtāsurāṃśeti

tatas+viṃśativarṣāt -> tato viṃśativarṣāt

tato viṃśativarṣāt+ūrdhvam -> tato viṃśativarṣād ūrdhvam

tato viṃśativarṣād ūrdhvam+mudrā -> tato viṃśativarṣād ūrdhvaṃ mudrā

dharmadhātus+iti| -> dharmadhātur iti|

gandhas+viṃśatitame -> gandho viṃśatitame

rūpam+ekonaviṃśatitame -> rūpam ekonaviṃśatitame

rasas+aṣṭādaśe -> raso 'ṣṭādaśe

sparśas+saptadaśe -> sparśaḥ saptadaśe

śabdas+ṣoḍaśe -> śabdaḥ ṣoḍaśe

catasras+| -> catasraḥ|

pṛthvī+iti -> pṛthvīti

tejas+| -> tejaḥ|

atas+vāyudhātus -> ato vāyudhātus

ato vāyudhātus+ekādaśe -> ato vāyudhātur ekādaśe

lādyās+vāyvādayas -> lādyā vāyvādayas

lādyā vāyvādayas+iti| -> lādyā vāyvādaya iti|

catasras+sevanīyās -> catasraḥ sevanīyās

catasraḥ sevanīyās+ca -> catasraḥ sevanīyāś ca

ṣaḍbhis+saha -> ṣaḍbhiḥ saha

yāvat+viṃśativarṣāṇi -> yāvad viṃśativarṣāṇi

yāvad viṃśativarṣāṇi+āliṅganīyās -> yāvad viṃśativarṣāṇy āliṅganīyās

yāvad viṃśativarṣāṇy āliṅganīyās+sarasajaladhayas -> yāvad viṃśativarṣāṇy āliṅganīyāḥ sarasajaladhayas

yāvad viṃśativarṣāṇy āliṅganīyāḥ sarasajaladhayas+iti -> yāvad viṃśativarṣāṇy āliṅganīyāḥ sarasajaladhaya iti

tasmāt+daśavarṣāt -> tasmād daśavarṣāt

tasmād daśavarṣāt+ekādaśavarṣam -> tasmād daśavarṣād ekādaśavarṣam

tasmād daśavarṣād ekādaśavarṣam+ādim -> tasmād daśavarṣād ekādaśavarṣam ādim

tasmād daśavarṣād ekādaśavarṣam ādim+kṛtvā -> tasmād daśavarṣād ekādaśavarṣam ādiṃ kṛtvā

pūjanīyā+iti -> pūjanīyeti

kumārikā+akṣatayonis -> kumārikākṣatayonis

kumārikākṣatayonis+| -> kumārikākṣatayoniḥ|

evam+dhātudvayena -> evaṃ dhātudvayena

tāvat+jñānadhātus -> tāvaj jñānadhātus

tāvaj jñānadhātus+avyayatvāt -> tāvaj jñānadhātur avyayatvāt

tāvaj jñānadhātur avyayatvāt+tatas -> tāvaj jñānadhātur avyayatvāt tatas

tāvaj jñānadhātur avyayatvāt tatas+dantapātāt -> tāvaj jñānadhātur avyayatvāt tato dantapātāt

tāvaj jñānadhātur avyayatvāt tato dantapātāt+ākāśadhātus -> tāvaj jñānadhātur avyayatvāt tato dantapātād ākāśadhātus

tāvaj jñānadhātur avyayatvāt tato dantapātād ākāśadhātus+| -> tāvaj jñānadhātur avyayatvāt tato dantapātād ākāśadhātuḥ|

yāvat+dantapātas -> yāvad dantapātas

yāvad dantapātas+na -> yāvad dantapāto na

atra+api -> atrāpi

yatas+ekā -> yata ekā

kalaśābhiṣekārtham+mudrām -> kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrām

kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrām+digvarṣam -> kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrāṃ digvarṣam

kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrāṃ digvarṣam+daśavarṣam -> kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrāṃ digvarṣaṃ daśavarṣam

kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrāṃ digvarṣaṃ daśavarṣam+yāvat -> kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrāṃ digvarṣaṃ daśavarṣaṃ yāvat

kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrāṃ digvarṣaṃ daśavarṣaṃ yāvat+varjayet -> kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrāṃ digvarṣaṃ daśavarṣaṃ yāvad varjayet

kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrāṃ digvarṣaṃ daśavarṣaṃ yāvad varjayet+kumārikām| -> kalaśābhiṣekārthaṃ mudrāṃ digvarṣaṃ daśavarṣaṃ yāvad varjayet kumārikām|

digvarṣam+ityādinā| -> digvarṣam ityādinā|

sekārtham+ṣaṭcatasras -> sekārthaṃ ṣaṭcatasras

sekārthaṃ ṣaṭcatasras+śamasukhphaladās -> sekārthaṃ ṣaṭcatasraḥ śamasukhphaladās

sekārthaṃ ṣaṭcatasraḥ śamasukhphaladās+ca -> sekārthaṃ ṣaṭcatasraḥ śamasukhphaladāś ca

sekārthaṃ ṣaṭcatasraḥ śamasukhphaladāś ca+aparās -> sekārthaṃ ṣaṭcatasraḥ śamasukhphaladāś cāparās

sekārthaṃ ṣaṭcatasraḥ śamasukhphaladāś cāparās+bhāvanārtham|| -> sekārthaṃ ṣaṭcatasraḥ śamasukhphaladāś cāparā bhāvanārtham||

krodhabhūtā+asurāṃśā -> krodhabhūtāsurāṃśā

lādyās+| -> lādyāḥ|

tasmāt+āliṅganīyās -> tasmād āliṅganīyās

tasmād āliṅganīyās+sarasajaladhayas -> tasmād āliṅganīyāḥ sarasajaladhayas

tasmād āliṅganīyāḥ sarasajaladhayas+sevanīyās -> tasmād āliṅganīyāḥ sarasajaladhayaḥ sevanīyās

tasmād āliṅganīyāḥ sarasajaladhayaḥ sevanīyās+ca -> tasmād āliṅganīyāḥ sarasajaladhayaḥ sevanīyāś ca

digvarṣam+yāvāt -> digvarṣaṃ yāvāt

digvarṣaṃ yāvāt+ekā -> digvarṣaṃ yāvād ekā

idānīm+uttarābhiṣekavidhānam -> idānīm uttarābhiṣekavidhānam

idānīm uttarābhiṣekavidhānam+ucyate--- -> idānīm uttarābhiṣekavidhānam ucyate---

kṛtā+iti|| -> kṛteti||

tena+atra -> tenātra

bodhim+itiparyantam -> bodhim itiparyantam

bodhim itiparyantam+subodham -> bodhim itiparyantaṃ subodham

bodhim itiparyantaṃ subodham+pratiṣṭhāvidhānam| -> bodhim itiparyantaṃ subodhaṃ pratiṣṭhāvidhānam|

sattvās+trividhabhagavatānuttarām -> sattvās trividhabhagavatānuttarām

sattvās trividhabhagavatānuttarām+yāntu -> sattvās trividhabhagavatānuttarāṃ yāntu

puṇyena+anena -> puṇyenānena

yāvat+praṇidhānam -> yāvat praṇidhānam

yāvat praṇidhānam+śiṣyas -> yāvat praṇidhānaṃ śiṣyas

yāvat praṇidhānaṃ śiṣyas+puṇyapariṇāmanām -> yāvat praṇidhānaṃ śiṣyaḥ puṇyapariṇāmanām

yāvat praṇidhānaṃ śiṣyaḥ puṇyapariṇāmanām+karoti| -> yāvat praṇidhānaṃ śiṣyaḥ puṇyapariṇāmanāṃ karoti|

trirekham+samantāt -> trirekhaṃ samantāt

trirekhaṃ samantāt+ityādikam -> trirekhaṃ samantād ityādikam

trirekhaṃ samantād ityādikam+vṛttam -> trirekhaṃ samantād ityādikaṃ vṛttam

trirekhaṃ samantād ityādikaṃ vṛttam+ārabhya -> trirekhaṃ samantād ityādikaṃ vṛttam ārabhya

vitānam+kṣititalanilaye -> vitānaṃ kṣititalanilaye

pratimādīnām+pratiṣṭhā| -> pratimādīnāṃ pratiṣṭhā|

sattvās+trividhabhavagatānuttarām -> sattvās trividhabhavagatānuttarām

sattvās trividhabhavagatānuttarām+yāntu -> sattvās trividhabhavagatānuttarāṃ yāntu

puṇyena+anena -> puṇyenānena

puṇyahetos+sakalaguṇakulam -> puṇyahetoḥ sakalaguṇakulam

puṇyahetoḥ sakalaguṇakulam+prārthanīyam -> puṇyahetoḥ sakalaguṇakulaṃ prārthanīyam

puṇyahetoḥ sakalaguṇakulaṃ prārthanīyam+parārtham -> puṇyahetoḥ sakalaguṇakulaṃ prārthanīyaṃ parārtham

dakṣiṇām+ca -> dakṣiṇāṃ ca

dakṣiṇāṃ ca+ātmaśaktyā| -> dakṣiṇāṃ cātmaśaktyā|

pradeyam+bhavati -> pradeyaṃ bhavati

kuṇḍalam+mekhalādim -> kuṇḍalaṃ mekhalādim

hāram+kaṭakam -> hāraṃ kaṭakam

hāraṃ kaṭakam+api -> hāraṃ kaṭakam api

maulim+paṭṭam -> mauliṃ paṭṭam

mauliṃ paṭṭam+ca -> mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca

kalpavṛkṣam+sakalatarugatam -> kalpavṛkṣaṃ sakalatarugatam

kalpavṛkṣaṃ sakalatarugatam+sekayitvā -> kalpavṛkṣaṃ sakalatarugataṃ sekayitvā

kalpavṛkṣaṃ sakalatarugataṃ sekayitvā+ekavṛkṣam|| -> kalpavṛkṣaṃ sakalatarugataṃ sekayitvaikavṛkṣam||

sitam+pāśahastam -> sitaṃ pāśahastam

sitaṃ pāśahastam+vibhāvya -> sitaṃ pāśahastaṃ vibhāvya

varuṇam+api -> varuṇam api

saptāmbhodhis+svabījais -> saptāmbhodhiḥ svabījais

saptāmbhodhiḥ svabījais+madhusalilayutam -> saptāmbhodhiḥ svabījair madhusalilayutam

saptāmbhodhiḥ svabījair madhusalilayutam+kṣepayet -> saptāmbhodhiḥ svabījair madhusalilayutaṃ kṣepayet

saptāmbhodhiḥ svabījair madhusalilayutaṃ kṣepayet+pañcagavyam| -> saptāmbhodhiḥ svabījair madhusalilayutaṃ kṣepayet pañcagavyam|

vasūn+vinyaset -> vasūn vinyaset

vasūn vinyaset+nāgarājān -> vasūn vinyasen nāgarājān

vāpyām+taḍāge -> vāpyāṃ taḍāge

pratiṣṭhām+varavividharasais -> pratiṣṭhāṃ varavividharasais

pratiṣṭhāṃ varavividharasais+saṃghabhojyam -> pratiṣṭhāṃ varavividharasaiḥ saṃghabhojyam

pratiṣṭhāṃ varavividharasaiḥ saṃghabhojyam+pradeyam|| -> pratiṣṭhāṃ varavividharasaiḥ saṃghabhojyaṃ pradeyam||

evam+kṛtvā -> evaṃ kṛtvā

nṛtyais+varavividhapaṭais -> nṛtyair varavividhapaṭais

nṛtyair varavividhapaṭais+cāmarais -> nṛtyair varavividhapaṭaiś cāmarais

nṛtyair varavividhapaṭaiś cāmarais+ātapatrais -> nṛtyair varavividhapaṭaiś cāmarair ātapatrais

gītais+vādyais -> gītair vādyais

gītair vādyais+ca -> gītair vādyaiś ca

paścāt+gandhais -> paścād gandhais

paścād gandhais+susurabhikusumais -> paścād gandhaiḥ susurabhikusumais

paścād gandhaiḥ susurabhikusumais+devatā -> paścād gandhaiḥ susurabhikusumair devatā

paścād gandhaiḥ susurabhikusumair devatā+abhyarcanīyā| -> paścād gandhaiḥ susurabhikusumair devatābhyarcanīyā|

bhavet+citritānām -> bhavec citritānām

bhavec citritānām+paṭānām -> bhavec citritānāṃ paṭānām

prathamam+api -> prathamam api

snānam+atra -> snānam atra

karakuliśena+upasaṃhārakāle|| -> karakuliśenopasaṃhārakāle||

bījāveśam+svakāye -> bījāveśaṃ svakāye

svasvabījais+krameṇa| -> svasvabījaiḥ krameṇa|

nyastavyam+devatānām -> nyastavyaṃ devatānām

nyastavyaṃ devatānām+svahṛdayakamale -> nyastavyaṃ devatānāṃ svahṛdayakamale

jñānākārāt+svadehāt -> jñānākārāt svadehāt

jñānākārāt svadehāt+trikuliśasahitam -> jñānākārāt svadehāt trikuliśasahitam

jñānākārāt svadehāt trikuliśasahitam+skandhadhātvādisarvam -> jñānākārāt svadehāt trikuliśasahitaṃ skandhadhātvādisarvam

śūnyam+sakalatanugatam -> śūnyaṃ sakalatanugatam

śūnyaṃ sakalatanugatam+bhasmanas -> śūnyaṃ sakalatanugataṃ bhasmanas

śūnyaṃ sakalatanugataṃ bhasmanas+bhāvanīyam|| -> śūnyaṃ sakalatanugataṃ bhasmano bhāvanīyam||

pañcākāram+hi -> pañcākāraṃ hi

kaṭakayos+nūpurāṇām -> kaṭakayor nūpurāṇām

kaṭakayor nūpurāṇām+ha -> kaṭakayor nūpurāṇāṃ ha

evam+ca -> evaṃ ca

evaṃ ca+akārayugmam -> evaṃ cākārayugmam

evaṃ cākārayugmam+bhavati -> evaṃ cākārayugmaṃ bhavati

yugalam+kaṇṭhikāmekhalāyām| -> yugalaṃ kaṇṭhikāmekhalāyām|

kādyās+vargās -> kādyā vargās

kādyā vargās+samātrās -> kādyā vargāḥ samātrās

kādyā vargāḥ samātrās+gaganarasaguṇās -> kādyā vargāḥ samātrā gaganarasaguṇās

kādyā vargāḥ samātrā gaganarasaguṇās+yogapaṭṭasya -> kādyā vargāḥ samātrā gaganarasaguṇā yogapaṭṭasya

daśaguṇitavasuvyañjanāni+uttarīṇām|| -> daśaguṇitavasuvyañjanāny uttarīṇām||

triguṇitadaśakās+kādivargās -> triguṇitadaśakāḥ kādivargās

triguṇitadaśakāḥ kādivargās+ca -> triguṇitadaśakāḥ kādivargāś ca

svarās+ca -> svarāś ca

maṇiparigaṇanālakṣaṇam+vyañjanāni| -> maṇiparigaṇanālakṣaṇaṃ vyañjanāni|

hūṃkāram+hi -> hūṃkāraṃ hi

hūṃkāraṃ hi+akṣasūtre -> hūṃkāraṃ hy akṣasūtre

pavimaṇikamalam+ca -> pavimaṇikamalaṃ ca

pavimaṇikamalaṃ ca+asis -> pavimaṇikamalaṃ cāsis

pavimaṇikamalaṃ cāsis+eva -> pavimaṇikamalaṃ cāsir eva

pavimaṇikamalaṃ cāsir eva+uttareṇa -> pavimaṇikamalaṃ cāsir evottareṇa

śrīcakram+caityagarbhe -> śrīcakraṃ caityagarbhe

pustakānām+ca -> pustakānāṃ ca

varṇais+bhinnam -> varṇair bhinnam

varṇair bhinnam+tat -> varṇair bhinnaṃ tat

varṇair bhinnaṃ tat+eva -> varṇair bhinnaṃ tad eva

dvātriṃśallakṣaṇādyais+sakalatanugatais -> dvātriṃśallakṣaṇādyaiḥ sakalatanugatais

dvātriṃśallakṣaṇādyaiḥ sakalatanugatais+vyañjanais -> dvātriṃśallakṣaṇādyaiḥ sakalatanugatair vyañjanais

dvātriṃśallakṣaṇādyaiḥ sakalatanugatair vyañjanais+khāṣṭabhis -> dvātriṃśallakṣaṇādyaiḥ sakalatanugatair vyañjanaiḥ khāṣṭabhis

dvātriṃśallakṣaṇādyaiḥ sakalatanugatair vyañjanaiḥ khāṣṭabhis+ca -> dvātriṃśallakṣaṇādyaiḥ sakalatanugatair vyañjanaiḥ khāṣṭabhiś ca

tat+svabījam -> tat svabījam

tat svabījam+śaśiravipuṭagam -> tat svabījaṃ śaśiravipuṭagam

tat svabījaṃ śaśiravipuṭagam+kāyavākcittayuktam| -> tat svabījaṃ śaśiravipuṭagaṃ kāyavākcittayuktam|

yat+bījam -> yad bījam

yad bījam+hi -> yad bījaṃ hi

yad bījaṃ hi+ādikādyos -> yad bījaṃ hy ādikādyos

yad bījaṃ hy ādikādyos+svakulaguṇagatam -> yad bījaṃ hy ādikādyoḥ svakulaguṇagatam

yad bījaṃ hy ādikādyoḥ svakulaguṇagatam+devatādevatīnām -> yad bījaṃ hy ādikādyoḥ svakulaguṇagataṃ devatādevatīnām

tasmāt+prakaṭitavadanā -> tasmāt prakaṭitavadanā

ācāryeṇa+eva -> ācāryeṇaiva

toṣam+samarasakaraṇam -> toṣaṃ samarasakaraṇam

toṣaṃ samarasakaraṇam+devatāyās -> toṣaṃ samarasakaraṇaṃ devatāyās

toṣaṃ samarasakaraṇaṃ devatāyās+ca -> toṣaṃ samarasakaraṇaṃ devatāyāś ca

veśam+bandham -> veśaṃ bandham

veśaṃ bandham+ca -> veśaṃ bandhaṃ ca

jñānasattvam+tribhavabhavasamam -> jñānasattvaṃ tribhavabhavasamam

jñānasattvaṃ tribhavabhavasamam+krodharājais -> jñānasattvaṃ tribhavabhavasamaṃ krodharājais

jñānasattvaṃ tribhavabhavasamaṃ krodharājais+svakāye| -> jñānasattvaṃ tribhavabhavasamaṃ krodharājaiḥ svakāye|

sakalās+devatāyās -> sakalā devatāyās

sakalā devatāyās+ca -> sakalā devatāyāś ca

bhavanīyās+punar -> bhavanīyāḥ punar

bhavanīyāḥ punar+api -> bhavanīyāḥ punar api

evam+vai -> evaṃ vai

kulavaśāt+bhāvayet -> kulavaśād bhāvayet

kulavaśād bhāvayet+mūrdhni -> kulavaśād bhāvayen mūrdhni

vidyādevyādibuddhān+alikalikulajān -> vidyādevyādibuddhān alikalikulajān

vidyādevyādibuddhān alikalikulajān+svasvabījais -> vidyādevyādibuddhān alikalikulajan svasvabījais

vidyādevyādibuddhān alikalikulajan svasvabījais+ca -> vidyādevyādibuddhān alikalikulajan svasvabījaiś ca

paścāt+pūrvoktayogais -> paścāt pūrvoktayogais

paścāt pūrvoktayogais+śaśiravipavijam -> paścāt pūrvoktayogaiḥ śaśiravipavijam

paścāt pūrvoktayogaiḥ śaśiravipavijam+bhāvayet -> paścāt pūrvoktayogaiḥ śaśiravipavijaṃ bhāvayet

paścāt pūrvoktayogaiḥ śaśiravipavijaṃ bhāvayet+kālacakram| -> paścāt pūrvoktayogaiḥ śaśiravipavijaṃ bhāvayet kālacakram|

śūnyasvabhāvam+jinavarasahitam -> śūnyasvabhāvaṃ jinavarasahitam

śūnyasvabhāvaṃ jinavarasahitam+kāyavākcittavajram -> śūnyasvabhāvaṃ jinavarasahitaṃ kāyavākcittavajram

saṃmukhas+tasya -> saṃmukhas tasya

paṭas+iti -> paṭa iti

caityādyam+pustakam -> caityādyaṃ pustakam

caityādyaṃ pustakam+vā -> caityādyaṃ pustakaṃ vā

sthāpanīyā+aparamukhakamalā -> sthāpanīyāparamukhakamalā

padmāṣṭapatram+svakuladiśigatais -> padmāṣṭapatraṃ svakuladiśigatais

padmāṣṭapatraṃ svakuladiśigatais+bhūṣitam -> padmāṣṭapatraṃ svakuladiśigatair bhūṣitam

padmāṣṭapatraṃ svakuladiśigatair bhūṣitam+pañcacihnais -> padmāṣṭapatraṃ svakuladiśigatair bhūṣitaṃ pañcacihnais

padmāṣṭapatraṃ svakuladiśigatair bhūṣitaṃ pañcacihnais+| -> padmāṣṭapatraṃ svakuladiśigatair bhūṣitaṃ pañcacihnaiḥ|

pañcarekhās+jināṃśais -> pañcarekhā jināṃśais

tanus+api -> tanur api

tatsthānāt+cālanīyā -> tatsthānāc cālanīyā

pradīpair varavividhaphalais+atra -> pradīpair varavividhaphalair atra

siddhārthais+ca -> siddhārthaiś ca

madhughṛtadadhibhis+snāpayet -> madhughṛtadadhibhiḥ snāpayet

madhughṛtadadhibhiḥ snāpayet+kṣīratoyais -> madhughṛtadadhibhiḥ snāpayet kṣīratoyais

madhughṛtadadhibhiḥ snāpayet kṣīratoyais+| -> madhughṛtadadhibhiḥ snāpayet kṣīratoyaiḥ|

cūrṇais+urvartayitvā -> cūrṇair urvartayitvā

puṣpādyais+gandhatailais -> puṣpādyair gandhatailais

puṣpādyair gandhatailais+raviśikhipacitais -> puṣpādyair gandhatailaī raviśikhipacitais

puṣpādyair gandhatailaī raviśikhipacitais+devatā -> puṣpādyair gandhatailaī raviśikhipacitair devatā

puṣpādyair gandhatailaī raviśikhipacitair devatā+abhyaṅganīyā -> puṣpādyair gandhatailaī raviśikhipacitair devatābhyaṅganīyā

sphuṭakanakamayam+snānam -> sphuṭakanakamayaṃ snānam

sphuṭakanakamayaṃ snānam+ārambhayet -> sphuṭakanakamayaṃ snānam ārambhayet

sphuṭakanakamayaṃ snānam ārambhayet+tat|| -> sphuṭakanakamayaṃ snānam ārambhayet tat||

sādhayet+gandhatoyam -> sādhayed gandhatoyam

tu+atha -> tv atha

satoyās+maṇikanakaghaṭās -> satoyā maṇikanakaghaṭās

satoyā maṇikanakaghaṭāḥ sūtritāḥ padmavaktrās+| -> satoyā maṇikanakaghaṭāḥ sūtritāḥ padmavaktrāḥ|

vitānam+kṣititalanilaye -> vitānaṃ kṣititalanilaye

vajrācāryādhipatyabhiṣekavidhipratiṣṭhāniyamas+|| -> vajrācāryādhipatyabhiṣekavidhipratiṣṭhāniyamaḥ||

tadā+ājñābhaṅgas -> tadājñābhaṅgas

tadājñābhaṅgas+bhavati -> tadājñābhaṅgo bhavati

tadājñābhaṅgo bhavati+ājñābhaṅgāt -> tadājñābhaṅgo bhavaty ājñābhaṅgāt

tadājñābhaṅgo bhavaty ājñābhaṅgāt+avīcigamanam -> tadājñābhaṅgo bhavaty ājñābhaṅgād avīcigamanam

tadājñābhaṅgo bhavaty ājñābhaṅgād avīcigamanam+bhavati -> tadājñābhaṅgo bhavaty ājñābhaṅgād avīcigamanaṃ bhavati

tadājñābhaṅgo bhavaty ājñābhaṅgād avīcigamanaṃ bhavati+ācāryadharmavilopanāt -> tadājñābhaṅgo bhavaty ājñābhaṅgād avīcigamanaṃ bhavaty ācāryadharmavilopanāt

tadājñābhaṅgo bhavaty ājñābhaṅgād avīcigamanaṃ bhavaty ācāryadharmavilopanāt+iti -> tadājñābhaṅgo bhavaty ājñābhaṅgād avīcigamanaṃ bhavaty ācāryadharmavilopanād iti

karaṇīyas+asimasivāṇijyādikas -> karaṇīyo 'simasivāṇijyādikas

karaṇīyo 'simasivāṇijyādikas+(?)| -> karaṇīyo 'simasivāṇijyādikaḥ(?)|

bhagavān+āha -> bhagavān āha

viśuddhām+abhiṣiktām -> viśuddhām abhiṣiktām

mudrām+dadāti| -> mudrāṃ dadāti|

teṣām+jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām -> teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām

teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām+ācāryahetos -> teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām ācāryahetos

teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām ācāryahetos+svajinakulavaśāt -> teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām ācāryahetoḥ svajinakulavaśāt

teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām ācāryahetoḥ svajinakulavaśāt+puṣpapātavaśāt -> teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām ācāryahetoḥ svajinakulavaśāt puṣpapātavaśāt

teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām ācāryahetoḥ svajinakulavaśāt puṣpapātavaśāt+eva -> teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhānām ācāryahetoḥ svajinakulavaśāt puṣpapātavaśād eva

brahmakaraṇāya+iti| -> brahmakaraṇāyeti|

vajrajñopavītam+suvarṇamayam -> vajrajñopavītaṃ suvarṇamayam

vajrajñopavītaṃ suvarṇamayaṃ sūtramayam+vā -> vajrajñopavītaṃ suvarṇamayaṃ sūtramayaṃ vā

śivas+|| -> śivaḥ||

muktis+mokṣas -> muktir mokṣas

brahmanirvāṇam+āptavān| -> brahmanirvāṇam āptavān|

brahmavid brāhmaṇas+brahmā -> brahmavid brāhmaṇo brahmā

mahātapās+taponiṣṭhas -> mahātapās taponiṣṭhas

mahātapās taponiṣṭhas+snātakas -> mahātapās taponiṣṭhaḥ snātakas

mahātapās taponiṣṭhaḥ snātakas+gautamas -> mahātapās taponiṣṭhaḥ snātako gautamas

mahātapās taponiṣṭhaḥ snātako gautamas+agraṇīs -> mahātapās taponiṣṭhaḥ snātako gautamo 'graṇīs

mahātapās taponiṣṭhaḥ snātako gautamo 'graṇīs+|| -> mahātapās taponiṣṭhaḥ snātako gautamo 'graṇīḥ||

vratottamas+| -> vratottamaḥ|

mahāvratadharas+mauñjī -> mahāvratadharo mauñjī

kṣemaprāptas+abhayaprāptas -> kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāptas

kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāptas+śītībhūtas -> kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāptaḥ śītībhūtas

kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāptaḥ śītībhūtas+hi -> kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāptaḥ śītībhūto hi

kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāptaḥ śītībhūto hi+anāvilas -> kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāptaḥ śītībhūto hy anāvilas

kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāptaḥ śītībhūto hy anāvilas+|| -> kṣemaprāpto 'bhayaprāptaḥ śītībhūto hy anāvilaḥ||

arhan+kṣīṇāsravas -> arhan kṣīṇāsravas

arhan kṣīṇāsravas+bhikṣus -> arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣus

arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣus+vītarāgas -> arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣur vītarāgas

arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣur vītarāgas+jitendriyas -> arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣur vītarāgo jitendriyas

arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣur vītarāgo jitendriyas+| -> arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣur vītarāgo jitendriyaḥ|

nānāniryāṇaniryātas+mahābhūtaikakāraṇas -> nānāniryāṇaniryāto mahābhūtaikakāraṇas

nānāniryāṇaniryāto mahābhūtaikakāraṇas+|| -> nānāniryāṇaniryāto mahābhūtaikakāraṇaḥ||

khaḍgas+pratyekanāyakas -> khaḍgaḥ pratyekanāyakas

khaḍgaḥ pratyekanāyakas+| -> khaḍgaḥ pratyekanāyakaḥ|

avaivartikas+hi -> avaivartiko hi

avaivartiko hi+anāgāmī -> avaivartiko hy anāgāmī

dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharas+kāntas -> dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ kāntas

dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ kāntas+trailokyasundaras -> dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ kāntas trailokyasundaras

dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ kāntas trailokyasundaras+|| -> dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ kāntas trailokyasundaraḥ||

trailokyaikakumārāṅgasthaviras+vṛddhas -> trailokyaikakumārāṅgasthaviro vṛddhas

trailokyaikakumārāṅgasthaviro vṛddhas+prajāpatis -> trailokyaikakumārāṅgasthaviro vṛddhaḥ prajāpatis

trailokyaikakumārāṅgasthaviro vṛddhaḥ prajāpatis+| -> trailokyaikakumārāṅgasthaviro vṛddhaḥ prajāpatiḥ|

bhagavān+nāmasaṃgītyām--- -> bhagavān nāmasaṃgītyām---

tathā+āha -> tathāha

dvitīyas+| -> dvitīyaḥ|

buddhas+eva -> buddha eva

dharmameghāyām+vyākṛtatvāt -> dharmameghāyāṃ vyākṛtatvāt

dharmameghāyāṃ vyākṛtatvāt+iti -> dharmameghāyāṃ vyākṛtatvād iti

kāraṇe+abhiṣiktas -> kāraṇe 'bhiṣiktas

kāraṇe 'bhiṣiktas+dharmadeśakas -> kāraṇe 'bhiṣikto dharmadeśakas

kāraṇe 'bhiṣikto dharmadeśakas+śiṣyakartā -> kāraṇe 'bhiṣikto dharmadeśakaḥ śiṣyakartā

tatas+prajñājñānābhiṣeke -> tataḥ prajñājñānābhiṣeke

tataḥ prajñājñānābhiṣeke+uttare -> tataḥ prajñājñānābhiṣeka uttare

sthaviras+iti| -> sthavira iti|

sādhumatīvyākaraṇāt+buddhayuvarājas -> sādhumatīvyākaraṇād buddhayuvarājas

sādhumatīvyākaraṇād buddhayuvarājas+| -> sādhumatīvyākaraṇād buddhayuvarājaḥ|

bhikṣus+bhavati -> bhikṣur bhavati

tatas+guhyābhiṣeke -> tato guhyābhiṣeke

syāt+acalāvyākaraṇāt -> syād acalāvyākaraṇāt

syād acalāvyākaraṇāt+buddhaputras -> syād acalāvyākaraṇād buddhaputras

syād acalāvyākaraṇād buddhaputras+kumāras -> syād acalāvyākaraṇād buddhaputraḥ kumāras

syād acalāvyākaraṇād buddhaputraḥ kumāras+iti -> syād acalāvyākaraṇād buddhaputraḥ kumāra iti

syād acalāvyākaraṇād buddhaputraḥ kumāra iti+arthas -> syād acalāvyākaraṇād buddhaputraḥ kumāra ity arthas

syād acalāvyākaraṇād buddhaputraḥ kumāra ity arthas+| -> syād acalāvyākaraṇād buddhaputraḥ kumāra ity arthaḥ|

śrāmaṇeras+ghaṭe -> śrāmaṇero ghaṭe

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

tena+upāsakas -> tenopāsakas

tenopāsakas+bhavati -> tenopāsako bhavati

tenopāsako bhavati+iti -> tenopāsako bhavatīti

salilasaṃjñake+abhiṣiktas -> salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktas

salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktas+san -> salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktaḥ san

salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktaḥ san+saptabhūmivyākaraṇāt -> salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktaḥ san saptabhūmivyākaraṇāt

salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktaḥ san saptabhūmivyākaraṇāt+upāsakas -> salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktaḥ san saptabhūmivyākaraṇād upāsakas

salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktaḥ san saptabhūmivyākaraṇād upāsakas+iti -> salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktaḥ san saptabhūmivyākaraṇād upāsaka iti

salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktaḥ san saptabhūmivyākaraṇād upāsaka iti+ucyate| -> salilasaṃjñake 'bhiṣiktaḥ san saptabhūmivyākaraṇād upāsaka ity ucyate|

ādau+ityādinā| -> ādāv ityādinā|

mudrām+viśuddhām|| -> mudrāṃ viśuddhām||

teṣām+ācāryahetos -> teṣām ācāryahetos

teṣām ācāryahetos+svajinakulavaśāt -> teṣām ācāryahetoḥ svajinakulavaśāt

teṣām ācāryahetoḥ svajinakulavaśāt+eva -> teṣām ācāryahetoḥ svajinakulavaśād eva

varagurus+vajrayajñopavītam -> varagurur vajrayajñopavītam

maulim+dadati -> mauliṃ dadati

mudrāṃ paṭṭam+ca -> mudrāṃ paṭṭaṃ ca

śrāmaṇeras+ghaṭe -> śrāmaṇero ghaṭe

ca+upāsakas -> copāsakas

copāsakas+vai -> copāsako vai

atas+ekavidhis -> ata ekavidhis

ata ekavidhis+ucyate--- -> ata ekavidhir ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

tantradeśanārtham+iti -> tantradeśanārtham iti

vācā+anujñayā -> vācānujñayā

bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām+abhiṣekam -> bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām abhiṣekam

bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām abhiṣekam+deyam -> bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām abhiṣekaṃ deyam

bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām abhiṣekaṃ deyam+vajrācāryeṇa -> bhikṣucellakagṛhasthānām abhiṣekaṃ deyaṃ vajrācāryeṇa

caturhastam+dvihastam -> caturhastaṃ dvihastam

caturhastaṃ dvihastam+ekahastam -> caturhastaṃ dvihastam ekahastam

caturhastaṃ dvihastam ekahastam+pīṭham -> caturhastaṃ dvihastam ekahastaṃ pīṭham

caturhastaṃ dvihastam ekahastaṃ pīṭham+kṛtvā -> caturhastaṃ dvihastam ekahastaṃ pīṭhaṃ kṛtvā

evam+yathānukrameṇa -> evaṃ yathānukrameṇa

adhamācāryas+| -> adhamācāryaḥ|

dvābhyāṃ kumārikābhyām+akṣatayonibhyām -> dvābhyāṃ kumārikābhyām akṣatayonibhyām

dvābhyāṃ kumārikābhyām akṣatayonibhyām+snāpayet| -> dvābhyāṃ kumārikābhyām akṣatayonibhyāṃ snāpayet|

daśabhis+kanyakābhis -> daśabhiḥ kanyakābhis

daśabhiḥ kanyakābhis+surūpābhis -> daśabhiḥ kanyakābhiḥ surūpābhis

daśabhiḥ kanyakābhiḥ surūpābhis+sarvālaṃkārayuktābhis -> daśabhiḥ kanyakābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ sarvālaṃkārayuktābhis

daśabhiḥ kanyakābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ sarvālaṃkārayuktābhis+aprasūtābhis -> daśabhiḥ kanyakābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ sarvālaṃkārayuktābhir aprasūtābhis

daśabhiḥ kanyakābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ sarvālaṃkārayuktābhir aprasūtābhis+aṣṭabhis -> daśabhiḥ kanyakābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ sarvālaṃkārayuktābhir aprasūtābhir aṣṭabhis

daśabhiḥ kanyakābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ sarvālaṃkārayuktābhir aprasūtābhir aṣṭabhis+| -> daśabhiḥ kanyakābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ sarvālaṃkārayuktābhir aprasūtābhir aṣṭabhiḥ|

etat+eva -> etad eva

hastadvayam+padmam -> hastadvayaṃ padmam

hastadvayaṃ padmam+aṣṭadalam -> hastadvayaṃ padmam aṣṭadalam

pañcaprākārarekhās+kṛtvā -> pañcaprākārarekhāḥ kṛtvā

evam+pūrvoktavidhinā -> evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā

evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā+oṣadhyādibhis -> evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinauṣadhyādibhis

evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinauṣadhyādibhis+yuktais -> evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinauṣadhyādibhir yuktais

evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinauṣadhyādibhir yuktais+ghaṭais -> evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinauṣadhyādibhir yuktair ghaṭais

evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinauṣadhyādibhir yuktair ghaṭais+sekas -> evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinauṣadhyādibhir yuktair ghaṭaiḥ sekas

evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinauṣadhyādibhir yuktair ghaṭaiḥ sekas+| -> evaṃ pūrvoktavidhinauṣadhyādibhir yuktair ghaṭaiḥ sekaḥ|

nāgair bhikṣos+vajradharasya -> nāgair bhikṣor vajradharasya

tridhādhipatitvam+deyam| -> tridhādhipatitvaṃ deyam|

ghaṭena+ekena -> ghaṭenaikena

tatas+pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās -> tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās

tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās+tais -> tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tais

tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tais+nāgais -> tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tair nāgais

tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tair nāgais+vā -> tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tair nāgair vā

tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tair nāgair vā+aṣṭabhis -> tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tair nāgair vāṣṭabhis

tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tair nāgair vāṣṭabhis+caturbhis -> tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tair nāgair vāṣṭabhiś caturbhis

tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tair nāgair vāṣṭabhiś caturbhis+vā -> tataḥ pūrvoktajayavijayaghaṭās tair nāgair vāṣṭabhiś caturbhir vā

tatas+jñātasarvatantras -> tato jñātasarvatantras

tato jñātasarvatantraḥ śiṣyas+guruṇā -> tato jñātasarvatantraḥ śiṣyo guruṇā

pratiṣṭhāṃ sasurāsurendrais+yas -> pratiṣṭhāṃ sasurāsurendrair yas

pratiṣṭhāṃ sasurāsurendrair yas+vanditas -> pratiṣṭhāṃ sasurāsurendrair yo vanditas

pratiṣṭhāṃ sasurāsurendrair yo vanditas+nāganarendravṛndais -> pratiṣṭhāṃ sasurāsurendrair yo vandito nāganarendravṛndais

pratiṣṭhāṃ sasurāsurendrair yo vandito nāganarendravṛndais+| -> pratiṣṭhāṃ sasurāsurendrair yo vandito nāganarendravṛndaiḥ|

pratiṣṭhāgaṇacakravidhiyogacaryāmahoddeśas+| -> pratiṣṭhāgaṇacakravidhiyogacaryāmahoddeśaḥ|

dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām+maṇḍalābhiṣekamahoddeśas -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ maṇḍalābhiṣekamahoddeśas

dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ maṇḍalābhiṣekamahoddeśas+caturthas -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ maṇḍalābhiṣekamahoddeśaś caturthas

dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ maṇḍalābhiṣekamahoddeśaś caturthas+|| -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ maṇḍalābhiṣekamahoddeśaś caturthaḥ||

mūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

sthūlāpattayas+anekās -> sthūlāpattayo 'nekās

sthūlāpattayo 'nekās+tāsām -> sthūlāpattayo 'nekās tāsām

sthūlāpattayo 'nekās tāsām+svalpadaṇḍas -> sthūlāpattayo 'nekās tāsāṃ svalpadaṇḍas

sthūlāpattayo 'nekās tāsāṃ svalpadaṇḍas+bhavati -> sthūlāpattayo 'nekās tāsāṃ svalpadaṇḍo bhavati

sthūlāpattayo 'nekās tāsāṃ svalpadaṇḍo bhavati+iti -> sthūlāpattayo 'nekās tāsāṃ svalpadaṇḍo bhavatīti

rudreti+ekādaśī| -> rudrety ekādaśī|

skandhakleśāt+ahi -> skandhakleśād ahi

skandhakleśād ahi+iti -> skandhakleśād ahīti

skandhakleśād ahīti+aṣṭamī| -> skandhakleśād ahīty aṣṭamī|

manus+vajrayāne -> manur vajrayāne

sarvastrīṇām+jugupsā -> sarvastrīṇāṃ jugupsā

tyāgatas+anyā -> tyāgato 'nyā

pradoṣāt+ravis -> pradoṣād ravis

pradoṣād ravis+api -> pradoṣād ravir api

dik+ca -> dik ca

śuddhadharme+arucis -> śuddhadharme 'rucis

śuddhadharme 'rucis+yā -> śuddhadharme 'rucir yā

skandhakleśāt+ahis -> skandhakleśād ahis

skandhakleśād ahis+syāt -> skandhakleśād ahiḥ syāt

skandhakleśād ahiḥ syāt+punar -> skandhakleśād ahiḥ syāt punar

skandhakleśād ahiḥ syāt punar+api -> skandhakleśād ahiḥ syāt punar api

guhyadānāt+mahāsukhadānāt -> guhyadānān mahāsukhadānāt

guhyadānān mahāsukhadānāt+ācāryāṇām -> guhyadānān mahāsukhadānād ācāryāṇām

guhyadānān mahāsukhadānād ācāryāṇām+āpattis -> guhyadānān mahāsukhadānād ācāryāṇām āpattis

guhyadānān mahāsukhadānād ācāryāṇām āpattis+|| -> guhyadānān mahāsukhadānād ācāryāṇām āpattiḥ||

giris+iti -> girir iti

ṣaṣṭhī+iti| -> ṣaṣṭhīti|

tattvapaṭalam+tasya -> tattvapaṭalaṃ tasya

siddhāntam+prajñāpāramitānayam -> siddhāntaṃ prajñāpāramitānayam

siddhāntaṃ prajñāpāramitānayam+mantranaye -> siddhāntaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ mantranaye

mūlāpattis+bhavati| -> mūlāpattir bhavati|

buddhatvakāṅkṣiṇām+pañcamī -> buddhatvakāṅkṣiṇāṃ pañcamī

yatas+atattvinām -> yato 'tattvinām

yato 'tattvinām+dvīndriyasukhena -> yato 'tattvināṃ dvīndriyasukhena

vināśāt+acyutasukham -> vināśād acyutasukham

vināśād acyutasukham+na -> vināśād acyutasukhaṃ na

bodhicittam+śukram -> bodhicittaṃ śukram

bodhicittaṃ śukram+tasya -> bodhicittaṃ śukraṃ tasya

bodhicittapraṇāśāt+iti| -> bodhicittapraṇāśād iti|

iṣus+iti -> iṣur iti

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

mūlāpattis+bhavati -> mūlāpattir bhavati

mūlāpattir bhavati+iti -> mūlāpattir bhavatīti

tadvat+maitrītyāgas -> tadvan maitrītyāgas

tadvan maitrītyāgas+sattvānām| -> tadvan maitrītyāgaḥ sattvānām|

pakvaphalam+na -> pakvaphalaṃ na

kvacit+sampūrṇas -> kvacit sampūrṇas

kvacit sampūrṇas+samarasas -> kvacit sampūrṇaḥ samarasas

kvacit sampūrṇaḥ samarasas+bhavati -> kvacit sampūrṇaḥ samaraso bhavati

pāṣāṇabhinnas+punar -> pāṣāṇabhinnaḥ punar

pāṣāṇabhinnaḥ punar+na -> pāṣāṇabhinnaḥ punar na

tatas+amaitrīcittam -> tato 'maitrīcittam

tato 'maitrīcittam+adhimātrādhimātrātmakam -> tato 'maitrīcittam adhimātrādhimātrātmakam

tato 'maitrīcittam adhimātrādhimātrātmakam+paripakvam -> tato 'maitrīcittam adhimātrādhimātrātmakaṃ paripakvam

tato 'maitrīcittam adhimātrādhimātrātmakaṃ paripakvam+yathā -> tato 'maitrīcittam adhimātrādhimātrātmakaṃ paripakvaṃ yathā

punas+samatvam -> punaḥ samatvam

punaḥ samatvam+yāti| -> punaḥ samatvaṃ yāti|

adhimātrātmakas+bhūmisphuṭitavat -> adhimātrātmako bhūmisphuṭitavat

adhimātrātmako bhūmisphuṭitavat+varṣodakena -> adhimātrātmako bhūmisphuṭitavad varṣodakena

punas+samatvam -> punaḥ samatvam

punaḥ samatvam+yāti| -> punaḥ samatvaṃ yāti|

madhyamas+vālukārekhāvat -> madhyamo vālukārekhāvat

madhyamo vālukārekhāvat+vātena -> madhyamo vālukārekhāvad vātena

daṇḍarekhāvat+maitrītyāgas -> daṇḍarekhāvan maitrītyāgas

daṇḍarekhāvan maitrītyāgas+kṣaṇamātram -> daṇḍarekhāvan maitrītyāgaḥ kṣaṇamātram

daṇḍarekhāvan maitrītyāgaḥ kṣaṇamātram+tatas -> daṇḍarekhāvan maitrītyāgaḥ kṣaṇamātraṃ tatas

daṇḍarekhāvan maitrītyāgaḥ kṣaṇamātraṃ tatas+nivartayati| -> daṇḍarekhāvan maitrītyāgaḥ kṣaṇamātraṃ tato nivartayati|

maitrītrāgas+catuḥprakāras -> maitrītrāgaś catuḥprakāras

maitrītrāgaś catuḥprakāras+mṛdumadhyādhimātrādhimātrādhimātrabhedena| -> maitrītrāgaś catuḥprakāro mṛdumadhyādhimātrādhimātrādhimātrabhedena|

maitrītyāgāt+caturthī -> maitrītyāgāc caturthī

maitrītyāgāc caturthī+iti| -> maitrītyāgāc caturthīti|

prakopam+karoti| -> prakopaṃ karoti|

evam+bhrātṛkopāt -> evaṃ bhrātṛkopāt

evaṃ bhrātṛkopāt+tṛtīyā -> evaṃ bhrātṛkopāt tṛtīyā

daśākuśalam+kurvate -> daśākuśalaṃ kurvate

daśākuśalaṃ kurvate+iti| -> daśākuśalaṃ kurvata iti|

parokṣe+api -> parokṣe 'pi

guros+| -> guroḥ|

mūlāpattis+bhavati -> mūlāpattir bhavati

tasya+ājñālaṅghane -> tasyājñālaṅghane

tasyājñālaṅghane+anyā -> tasyājñālaṅghane 'nyā

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

guros+daśākuśalapravṛttes -> guror daśākuśalapravṛttes

guror daśākuśalapravṛttes+iti -> guror daśākuśalapravṛtter iti

tasmāt+cittakhedāt -> tasmāc cittakhedāt

tasmāc cittakhedāt+mūlāpattis -> tasmāc cittakhedān mūlāpattis

tasmāc cittakhedān mūlāpattis+bhavati -> tasmāc cittakhedān mūlāpattir bhavati

śrīguros+cittakhedas -> śrīguroś cittakhedas

śrīguroś cittakhedas+daśākuśalapravṛttyā -> śrīguroś cittakhedo daśākuśalapravṛttyā

svārthatas+cittakhedas -> svārthataś cittakhedas

svārthataś cittakhedas+sas -> svārthataś cittakhedaḥ sas

svārthataś cittakhedaḥ sas+asadgurus -> svārthataś cittakhedaḥ so 'sadgurus

svārthataś cittakhedaḥ so 'sadgurus+iti| -> svārthataś cittakhedaḥ so 'sadgurur iti|

śrīgurus+| -> śrīguruḥ|

parārthatas+cittakhedas -> parārthataś cittakhedas

parārthataś cittakhedas+sa -> parārthataś cittakhedaḥ sa

parārthatas+svārthatas -> parārthataḥ svārthatas

parārthataḥ svārthatas+ca -> parārthataḥ svārthataś ca

parārthataḥ svārthataś ca+iti| -> parārthataḥ svārthataś ceti|

tayos+cittakhedāt -> tayoś cittakhedāt

tayoś cittakhedāt+dvidhā -> tayoś cittakhedād dvidhā

gurus+dvidhā--sadgurus -> gurur dvidhā--sadgurus

gurur dvidhā--sadgurus+asadgurus -> gurur dvidhā--sadgurur asadgurus

gurur dvidhā--sadgurur asadgurus+ca -> gurur dvidhā--sadgurur asadguruś ca

gurur dvidhā--sadgurur asadguruś ca+iti| -> gurur dvidhā--sadgurur asadguruś ceti|

śrīguros+cittakhedāt -> śrīguroś cittakhedāt

śrīguroś cittakhedāt+iti| -> śrīguroś cittakhedād iti|

śaśadharā+iti -> śaśadhareti

tathā+āha---mūlāpattis -> tathāha---mūlāpattis

tathāha---mūlāpattis+sutānām -> tathāha---mūlāpattiḥ sutānām

tathāha---mūlāpattiḥ sutānām+abhiṣiktānām -> tathāha---mūlāpattiḥ sutānām abhiṣiktānām

tathāha---mūlāpattiḥ sutānām abhiṣiktānām+śiṣyāṇām -> tathāha---mūlāpattiḥ sutānām abhiṣiktānāṃ śiṣyāṇām

tathāha---mūlāpattiḥ sutānām abhiṣiktānāṃ śiṣyāṇām+bhavati -> tathāha---mūlāpattiḥ sutānām abhiṣiktānāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ bhavati

pratyekam+bhavati -> pratyekaṃ bhavati

mūlāpattayas+caturdaśa| -> mūlāpattayaś caturdaśa|

mūlāpattis+ityādinā| -> mūlāpattir ityādinā|

nare+apācite -> nare 'pācite

giris+api -> girir api

punar+iṣus -> punar iṣus

punar iṣus+bodhicittapraṇāśāt -> punar iṣur bodhicittapraṇāśāt

maitrītyāgāt+caturthī -> maitrītyāgāc caturthī

bhrātṛkopāt+tṛtīyā| -> bhrātṛkopāt tṛtīyā|

tasya+ājñālaṅghane -> tasyājñālaṅghane

tasyājñālaṅghane+anyā -> tasyājñālaṅghane 'nyā

śrīguros+cittakhedāt -> śrīguroś cittakhedāt

mūlāpattis+sutānām -> mūlāpattiḥ sutānām

mūlāpattiḥ sutānām+bhavati -> mūlāpattiḥ sutānāṃ bhavati

idānīm+mūlāpattayas -> idānīṃ mūlāpattayas

idānīṃ mūlāpattayas+ucyante--- -> idānīṃ mūlāpattaya ucyante---

tathāgataniyamas+śiṣyais -> tathāgataniyamaḥ śiṣyais

tathāgataniyamaḥ śiṣyais+avaśyam -> tathāgataniyamaḥ śiṣyair avaśyam

tathāgataniyamaḥ śiṣyair avaśyam+kartavyas -> tathāgataniyamaḥ śiṣyair avaśyaṃ kartavyas

tathāgataniyamaḥ śiṣyair avaśyaṃ kartavyas+|| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ śiṣyair avaśyaṃ kartavyaḥ||

kaniṣṭhas+bhavati -> kaniṣṭho bhavati

kaniṣṭho bhavati+iti -> kaniṣṭho bhavatīti

laghutvam+vrajati -> laghutvaṃ vrajati

yas+prāk -> yaḥ prāk

yaḥ prāk+jyeṣṭhanāmā -> yaḥ prāg jyeṣṭhanāmā

bhūyas+vrajati -> bhūyo vrajati

tatra+ājñām -> tatrājñām

tatrājñām+labdhvā -> tatrājñāṃ labdhvā

punarkaraṇāya+iti| -> punarkaraṇāyeti|

punar+maṇḍalapraveśādikam -> punar maṇḍalapraveśādikam

punar maṇḍalapraveśādikam+karoti| -> punar maṇḍalapraveśādikaṃ karoti|

śuddhihetos+idam -> śuddhihetor idam

śuddhihetor idam+maṇḍalam -> śuddhihetor idaṃ maṇḍalam

śuddhihetor idaṃ maṇḍalam+vartayitvā -> śuddhihetor idaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā

sthitas+mūlāpattim -> sthito mūlāpattim

sthito mūlāpattim+vrajati -> sthito mūlāpattiṃ vrajati

sthitas+kumbhe -> sthitaḥ kumbhe

punar+idam -> punar idam

punar idam+maṇḍalam -> punar idaṃ maṇḍalam

punar idaṃ maṇḍalam+śuddhihetos -> punar idaṃ maṇḍalaṃ śuddhihetos

punar idaṃ maṇḍalaṃ śuddhihetos+iti| -> punar idaṃ maṇḍalaṃ śuddhihetor iti|

mūlāpattim+gatas -> mūlāpattiṃ gatas

mūlāpattiṃ gatas+yas -> mūlāpattiṃ gato yas

mūlāpattiṃ gato yas+viśati -> mūlāpattiṃ gato yo viśati

matam+buddhānām -> mataṃ buddhānām

mataṃ buddhānām+iti| -> mataṃ buddhānām iti|

yatati+iti -> yatatīti

buddhabodhisattvānām+sādhiṣṭhānam -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sādhiṣṭhānam

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sādhiṣṭhānam+gatvā -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sādhiṣṭhānaṃ gatvā

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sādhiṣṭhānaṃ gatvā+ātmanā -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sādhiṣṭhānaṃ gatvātmanā

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sādhiṣṭhānaṃ gatvātmanā+aśuddhim -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sādhiṣṭhānaṃ gatvātmanāśuddhim

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sādhiṣṭhānaṃ gatvātmanāśuddhim+na -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sādhiṣṭhānaṃ gatvātmanāśuddhiṃ na

svatas+ātmanas -> svata ātmanas

svata ātmanas+pāpadeśanādikam -> svata ātmanaḥ pāpadeśanādikam

svata ātmanaḥ pāpadeśanādikam+kṛtvā -> svata ātmanaḥ pāpadeśanādikaṃ kṛtvā

deyas+puṇyaśīlabalena -> deyaḥ puṇyaśīlabalena

daṇḍas+na -> daṇḍo na

atra+ācāryeṇa -> atrācāryeṇa

atrācāryeṇa+asya -> atrācāryeṇāsya

kas+arthas -> ko 'rthas

ko 'rthas+| -> ko 'rthaḥ|

śuddhis+na -> śuddhir na

śuddhir na+asti -> śuddhir nāsti

śuddhir nāsti+iti| -> śuddhir nāstīti|

mūlāpattis+bhavati -> mūlāpattir bhavati

śuddhis+iti| -> śuddhir iti|

na+asti -> nāsti

daṇḍas+deyas -> daṇḍo deyas

daṇḍo deyas+vrataniyamena -> daṇḍo deyo vrataniyamena

daṇḍo deyo vrataniyamena+iti| -> daṇḍo deyo vrataniyameneti|

tatra+eva -> tatraiva

tatraiva+ācāryeṇa -> tatraivācāryeṇa

kadācit+vrataniyamavaśāt -> kadācid vrataniyamavaśāt

kadācid vrataniyamavaśāt+puṇyaśīlasambhāravaśāt -> kadācid vrataniyamavaśāt puṇyaśīlasambhāravaśāt

kadācid vrataniyamavaśāt puṇyaśīlasambhāravaśāt+śuddhis -> kadācid vrataniyamavaśāt puṇyaśīlasambhāravaśāc chuddhis

kadācid vrataniyamavaśāt puṇyaśīlasambhāravaśāc chuddhis+bhavati| -> kadācid vrataniyamavaśāt puṇyaśīlasambhāravaśāc chuddhir bhavati|

mūlāpattis+bhavati -> mūlāpattir bhavati

sthitasya+abhiṣiktasya -> sthitasyābhiṣiktasya

sthitasya+iti| -> sthitasyeti|

guṇinas+paścādakaraṇasaṃvare -> guṇinaḥ paścādakaraṇasaṃvare

mantrajāpais+ṣaṭtriṃśadbhis -> mantrajāpaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhis

mantrajāpaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhis+sahasrais -> mantrajāpaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ sahasrais

mantrajāpaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ sahasrais+śuddhis -> mantrajāpaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ sahasraiḥ śuddhis

mantrajāpaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ sahasraiḥ śuddhis+bhavati| -> mantrajāpaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ sahasraiḥ śuddhir bhavati|

mūlāpattis+bhavati -> mūlāpattir bhavati

mūlāpattes+ityādinā| -> mūlāpatter ityādinā|

bhūyas+vrajati -> bhūyo vrajati

ājñām+labdhvā -> ājñāṃ labdhvā

punar+idam -> punar idam

punar idam+maṇḍalam -> punar idaṃ maṇḍalam

punar idaṃ maṇḍalam+śuddhihetos -> punar idaṃ maṇḍalaṃ śuddhihetos

mūlāpattim+gatas -> mūlāpattiṃ gatas

mūlāpattiṃ gatas+yas -> mūlāpattiṃ gato yas

mūlāpattiṃ gato yas+viśati -> mūlāpattiṃ gato yo viśati

śuddhis+| -> śuddhiḥ|

na+asti -> nāsti

kadācit+vrataniyamavaśāt -> kadācid vrataniyamavaśāt

kadācid vrataniyamavaśāt+uttare -> kadācid vrataniyamavaśād uttare

kadācit+kumbhe -> kadācit kumbhe

guṇinas+saptaseke -> guṇinaḥ saptaseke

mūlāpattes+viśuddhis -> mūlāpatter viśuddhis

mūlāpatter viśuddhis+bhavati -> mūlāpatter viśuddhir bhavati

idānīm+mūlāpattiviśuddhis -> idānīṃ mūlāpattiviśuddhis

idānīṃ mūlāpattiviśuddhis+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ mūlāpattiviśuddhir ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

viparyāsavaśāt+iti -> viparyāsavaśād iti

nārakam+duḥkham -> nārakaṃ duḥkham

nārakaṃ duḥkham+etat -> nārakaṃ duḥkham etat

nārakaṃ duḥkham etat+samastam -> nārakaṃ duḥkham etat samastam

nārakaṃ duḥkham etat samastam+sekādikam -> nārakaṃ duḥkham etat samastaṃ sekādikam

nārakaṃ duḥkham etat samastaṃ sekādikam+bhavati -> nārakaṃ duḥkham etat samastaṃ sekādikaṃ bhavati

mūlāpattim+vakṣyamāṇām -> mūlāpattiṃ vakṣyamāṇām

mūlāpattiṃ vakṣyamāṇām+śaṭhavaśāt -> mūlāpattiṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ śaṭhavaśāt

mūlāpattiṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ śaṭhavaśāt+daśākuśalapravṛttivaśāt -> mūlāpattiṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ śaṭhavaśād daśākuśalapravṛttivaśāt

mūlāpattiṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ śaṭhavaśād daśākuśalapravṛttivaśāt+tadā -> mūlāpattiṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ śaṭhavaśād daśākuśalapravṛttivaśāt tadā

tathāgataniyamas+| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ|

tatas+dvādaśabhūmyām -> tato dvādaśabhūmyām

tato dvādaśabhūmyām+buddhatvam -> tato dvādaśabhūmyāṃ buddhatvam

tato dvādaśabhūmyāṃ buddhatvam+yoginām -> tato dvādaśabhūmyāṃ buddhatvaṃ yoginām

tato dvādaśabhūmyāṃ buddhatvaṃ yoginām+iti -> tato dvādaśabhūmyāṃ buddhatvaṃ yoginām iti

evam+puṇyaśīlasambhārapūrvaṃgamas -> evaṃ puṇyaśīlasambhārapūrvaṃgamas

evaṃ puṇyaśīlasambhārapūrvaṃgamas+jñānasambhāras -> evaṃ puṇyaśīlasambhārapūrvaṃgamo jñānasambhāras

evaṃ puṇyaśīlasambhārapūrvaṃgamo jñānasambhāras+| -> evaṃ puṇyaśīlasambhārapūrvaṃgamo jñānasambhāraḥ|

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

mahāsukhavṛṣṭis+svārthaparārthakāriṇī -> mahāsukhavṛṣṭiḥ svārthaparārthakāriṇī

mahāsukhavṛṣṭiḥ svārthaparārthakāriṇī+iti -> mahāsukhavṛṣṭiḥ svārthaparārthakāriṇīti

dharmameghām+vrajati -> dharmameghāṃ vrajati

bhavabhayamathanam+mañjughoṣatvam -> bhavabhayamathanaṃ mañjughoṣatvam

bhavabhayamathanaṃ mañjughoṣatvam+eti| -> bhavabhayamathanaṃ mañjughoṣatvam eti|

prajñājñānābhiṣiktas+śīlasambhārabalena -> prajñājñānābhiṣiktaḥ śīlasambhārabalena

bodhisattvasya+acyavanam| -> bodhisattvasyācyavanam|

sādhumatīm+vrajati| -> sādhumatīṃ vrajati|

kumbhaguhyābhyām+abhiṣiktas -> kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktas

kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktas+san -> kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktaḥ san

kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktaḥ san+śīlavaśāt -> kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktaḥ sañ chīlavaśāt

kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktaḥ sañ chīlavaśāt+avaivartikām -> kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktaḥ sañ chīlavaśād avaivartikām

kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktaḥ sañ chīlavaśād avaivartikām+acalām -> kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktaḥ sañ chīlavaśād avaivartikām acalām

kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktaḥ sañ chīlavaśād avaivartikām acalām+vrajati| -> kumbhaguhyābhyām abhiṣiktaḥ sañ chīlavaśād avaivartikām acalāṃ vrajati|

niyatam+kumbhagubhyābhiṣiktas -> niyataṃ kumbhagubhyābhiṣiktas

niyataṃ kumbhagubhyābhiṣiktas+iti| -> niyataṃ kumbhagubhyābhiṣikta iti|

bhūyas+avaivartikādyām -> bhūyo 'vaivartikādyām

bhūyo 'vaivartikādyām+praviśati -> bhūyo 'vaivartikādyāṃ praviśati

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

tasmāt+śubhavaśāt -> tasmāc chubhavaśāt

tasmāc chubhavaśāt+saptabhūmīśvaratvam -> tasmāc chubhavaśāt saptabhūmīśvaratvam

tasmāc chubhavaśāt saptabhūmīśvaratvam+vrajati -> tasmāc chubhavaśāt saptabhūmīśvaratvaṃ vrajati

tasmāc chubhavaśāt saptabhūmīśvaratvaṃ vrajati+iti -> tasmāc chubhavaśāt saptabhūmīśvaratvaṃ vrajatīti

daśākuśalarahitas+mriyate -> daśākuśalarahito mriyate

saptabhūmīśvaratvam+vrajati| -> saptabhūmīśvaratvaṃ vrajati|

tena+eva -> tenaiva

maṇḍalacakram+sākṣātkaroti -> maṇḍalacakraṃ sākṣātkaroti

śubhavaśāt+saptabhūmīśvaratvam| -> śubhavaśāt saptabhūmīśvaratvam|

saptābhiṣekais+abhiṣiktas -> saptābhiṣekair abhiṣiktas

saptābhiṣekair abhiṣiktas+san -> saptābhiṣekair abhiṣiktaḥ san

saptābhiṣekair abhiṣiktaḥ san+mahāmaṇḍale -> saptābhiṣekair abhiṣiktaḥ san mahāmaṇḍale

siktas+ityādinā| -> sikta ityādinā|

śaṭhavaśāt+nārakam -> śaṭhavaśān nārakam

śaṭhavaśān nārakam+duḥkham -> śaṭhavaśān nārakaṃ duḥkham

śaṭhavaśān nārakaṃ duḥkham+etat|| -> śaṭhavaśān nārakaṃ duḥkham etat||

mūlāpattim+kadācit -> mūlāpattiṃ kadācit

mūlāpattiṃ kadācit+vrajati -> mūlāpattiṃ kadācid vrajati

prajñājñānābhiṣiktas+bhavabhayamathanam -> prajñājñānābhiṣikto bhavabhayamathanam

prajñājñānābhiṣikto bhavabhayamathanam+mañjughoṣatvam -> prajñājñānābhiṣikto bhavabhayamathanaṃ mañjughoṣatvam

prajñājñānābhiṣikto bhavabhayamathanaṃ mañjughoṣatvam+eti -> prajñājñānābhiṣikto bhavabhayamathanaṃ mañjughoṣatvam eti

niyatam+kumbhaguhyābhiṣiktas -> niyataṃ kumbhaguhyābhiṣiktas

niyataṃ kumbhaguhyābhiṣiktas+| -> niyataṃ kumbhaguhyābhiṣiktaḥ|

bhūyas+avaivartikādyām -> bhūyo 'vaivartikādyām

bhūyo 'vaivartikādyām+praviśati -> bhūyo 'vaivartikādyāṃ praviśati

śubhavaśāt+saptabhūmīśvaratvam -> śubhavaśāt saptabhūmīśvaratvam

siktas+saptābhiṣekais -> siktaḥ saptābhiṣekais

siktaḥ saptābhiṣekais+vrajati -> siktaḥ saptābhiṣekair vrajati

idānīm+abhiṣekaphalam -> idānīm abhiṣekaphalam

idānīm abhiṣekaphalam+ucyate--- -> idānīm abhiṣekaphalam ucyate---

vajrācāryāṇām+iti|| -> vajrācāryāṇām iti||

tathāgataniyamas+saptābhiṣekadāne -> tathāgataniyamaḥ saptābhiṣekadāne

śiṣyebhyas+iti -> śiṣyebhya iti

sampradeyās+ācāryeṇa -> sampradeyā ācāryeṇa

sapta+abhiṣekās -> saptābhiṣekās

saptābhiṣekās+kaluṣamalaharās -> saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharās

saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharās+maṇḍale -> saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharā maṇḍale

evaṃ ca+ete -> evaṃ caite

paropakāratas+| -> paropakārataḥ|

ājñābhiṣekas+sambodhilakṣmīs -> ājñābhiṣekaḥ sambodhilakṣmīs

ājñābhiṣekaḥ sambodhilakṣmīs+dharmacakrapravartane -> ājñābhiṣekaḥ sambodhilakṣmīr dharmacakrapravartane

sarvakālam+rāgadveṣādiviśuddhis -> sarvakālaṃ rāgadveṣādiviśuddhis

sarvakālaṃ rāgadveṣādiviśuddhis+nirāvaraṇatā -> sarvakālaṃ rāgadveṣādiviśuddhir nirāvaraṇatā

sarvakālaṃ rāgadveṣādiviśuddhir nirāvaraṇatā+iti| -> sarvakālaṃ rāgadveṣādiviśuddhir nirāvaraṇateti|

nāmābhiṣekas+maitryādiyogas -> nāmābhiṣeko maitryādiyogas

nāmābhiṣeko maitryādiyogas+caturbrahmavihāreṇa -> nāmābhiṣeko maitryādiyogaś caturbrahmavihāreṇa

vratābhiṣekas+rūpādiviṣayacakṣurādīndriyaviśuddhis -> vratābhiṣeko rūpādiviṣayacakṣurādīndriyaviśuddhis

vratābhiṣeko rūpādiviṣayacakṣurādīndriyaviśuddhis+divyacakṣurādipravṛttis -> vratābhiṣeko rūpādiviṣayacakṣurādīndriyaviśuddhir divyacakṣurādipravṛttis

vratābhiṣeko rūpādiviṣayacakṣurādīndriyaviśuddhir divyacakṣurādipravṛttis+iti| -> vratābhiṣeko rūpādiviṣayacakṣurādīndriyaviśuddhir divyacakṣurādipravṛttir iti|

vajram+vajraghaṇṭābhiṣekas -> vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭābhiṣekas

vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭābhiṣekas+lalanārasanāviśuddhis -> vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭābhiṣeko lalanārasanāviśuddhis

vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭābhiṣeko lalanārasanāviśuddhis+candrādityanirāvaraṇatā -> vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭābhiṣeko lalanārasanāviśuddhiś candrādityanirāvaraṇatā

vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭābhiṣeko lalanārasanāviśuddhiś candrādityanirāvaraṇatā+iti| -> vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭābhiṣeko lalanārasanāviśuddhiś candrādityanirāvaraṇateti|

śaktayas+pāramitāparipūraṇāya -> śaktayaḥ pāramitāparipūraṇāya

śaktayaḥ pāramitāparipūraṇāya+iti| -> śaktayaḥ pāramitāparipūraṇāyeti|

vīrapaṭṭābhiṣekas+dānādayas -> vīrapaṭṭābhiṣeko dānādayas

vīrapaṭṭābhiṣeko dānādayas+daśa -> vīrapaṭṭābhiṣeko dānādayo daśa

evam+mukuṭābhiṣekas -> evaṃ mukuṭābhiṣekas

evaṃ mukuṭābhiṣekas+vijñānādipañcaskandhaviśuddhis -> evaṃ mukuṭābhiṣeko vijñānādipañcaskandhaviśuddhis

evam+sambhāratrayeṇa -> evaṃ sambhāratrayeṇa

evam+śīlasambhārārtham -> evaṃ śīlasambhārārtham

evaṃ śīlasambhārārtham+striyas -> evaṃ śīlasambhārārthaṃ striyas

evaṃ śīlasambhārārthaṃ striyas+na -> evaṃ śīlasambhārārthaṃ striyo na

evaṃ śīlasambhārārthaṃ striyo na+avamanyās -> evaṃ śīlasambhārārthaṃ striyo nāvamanyās

deyāḥ sattvārthahetoḥ sadhanatanur iyam+na -> deyāḥ sattvārthahetoḥ sadhanatanur iyaṃ na

svaṃ ratnam+cintāmaṇis -> svaṃ ratnaṃ cintāmaṇis
