svārthatas+| -> svārthataḥ|

parastrīgrahaṇam+tiryaggatigamananivāraṇāya -> parastrīgrahaṇaṃ tiryaggatigamananivāraṇāya

svārthatas+| -> svārthataḥ|

evam+adattādānam -> evam adattādānam

evam adattādānam+pretagatigamananivāraṇāya -> evam adattādānaṃ pretagatigamananivāraṇāya

svārthatas+| -> svārthataḥ|

mṛṣāvākyam+vaktavyam -> mṛṣāvākyaṃ vaktavyam

mṛṣāvākyaṃ vaktavyam+na -> mṛṣāvākyaṃ vaktavyaṃ na

patitānām+abhyuddharaṇāya -> patitānām abhyuddharaṇāya

evam+amārge -> evam amārge

neyārthas+| -> neyārthaḥ|

māraṇam+kuryāt -> māraṇaṃ kuryāt

māraṇaṃ kuryāt+bhagavān -> māraṇaṃ kuryād bhagavān

māraṇaṃ kuryād bhagavān+iti -> māraṇaṃ kuryād bhagavān iti

pūrvasādhitam+mantram -> pūrvasādhitaṃ mantram

pūrvasādhitaṃ mantram+krodhakule -> pūrvasādhitaṃ mantraṃ krodhakule

pūrvasādhitaṃ mantraṃ krodhakule+akṣobhyasamādhinā -> pūrvasādhitaṃ mantraṃ krodhakule 'kṣobhyasamādhinā

pūrvasādhitaṃ mantraṃ krodhakule 'kṣobhyasamādhinā+anena -> pūrvasādhitaṃ mantraṃ krodhakule 'kṣobhyasamādhinānena

idānīm+yadā -> idānīṃ yadā

idānīṃ yadā+āmaraṇāntam -> idānīṃ yadāmaraṇāntam

idānīṃ yadāmaraṇāntam+pañcānantaryam -> idānīṃ yadāmaraṇāntaṃ pañcānantaryam

idānīṃ yadāmaraṇāntaṃ pañcānantaryam+karoti -> idānīṃ yadāmaraṇāntaṃ pañcānantaryaṃ karoti

svārthatas+iti| -> svārthata iti|

samayasevāvarṇāvarṇābhigamanam+svaśarīraparyantam -> samayasevāvarṇāvarṇābhigamanaṃ svaśarīraparyantam

samayasevāvarṇāvarṇābhigamanaṃ svaśarīraparyantam+dānam -> samayasevāvarṇāvarṇābhigamanaṃ svaśarīraparyantaṃ dānam

samayasevāvarṇāvarṇābhigamanaṃ svaśarīraparyantaṃ dānam+api -> samayasevāvarṇāvarṇābhigamanaṃ svaśarīraparyantaṃ dānam api

parastrīgrahaṇam+api -> parastrīgrahaṇam api

evam+mṛṣāvādas -> evaṃ mṛṣāvādas

evaṃ mṛṣāvādas+parāpakāras -> evaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ parāpakāras

evaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ parāpakāras+adattādānam -> evaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ parāpakāro 'dattādānam

evaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ parāpakāro 'dattādānam+api -> evaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ parāpakāro 'dattādānam api

kartavyam+śāntipuṣṭivaśyākṛṣṭibhis -> kartavyaṃ śāntipuṣṭivaśyākṛṣṭibhis

kartavyaṃ śāntipuṣṭivaśyākṛṣṭibhis+vinā| -> kartavyaṃ śāntipuṣṭivaśyākṛṣṭibhir vinā|

tāvat+mantriṇā -> tāvan mantriṇā

yāvat+pañcābhijñās -> yāvat pañcābhijñās

yāvat pañcābhijñās+na -> yāvat pañcābhijñā na

mantriṇas+śubhāśubhakarmāparijñānāt| -> mantriṇaḥ śubhāśubhakarmāparijñānāt|

tasmāt+tasya -> tasmāt tasya

tasmāt tasya+apakāratas -> tasmāt tasyāpakāratas

tasmāt tasyāpakāratas+narakam -> tasmāt tasyāpakārato narakam

tasmāt tasyāpakārato narakam+bhavati -> tasmāt tasyāpakārato narakaṃ bhavati

caṇḍāśokas+dharmāśokavat| -> caṇḍāśoko dharmāśokavat|

paścāt+puṣpakartā -> paścāt puṣpakartā

kaścit+pūrvam -> kaścit pūrvam

kaścit pūrvam+pañcānantaryakārī -> kaścit pūrvaṃ pañcānantaryakārī

pañcānantaryam+pūrvāparam -> pañcānantaryaṃ pūrvāparam

pañcānantaryaṃ pūrvāparam+jñātvā -> pañcānantaryaṃ pūrvāparaṃ jñātvā

pañcānantaryaṃ pūrvāparaṃ jñātvā+iha -> pañcānantaryaṃ pūrvāparaṃ jñātveha

tat+eva -> tad eva

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

prāṇātipātam+bhagavān -> prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān

prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān+yat -> prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat

prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat+kuryāt -> prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt

prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt+tat -> prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt tat

prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt tat+pañcānantaryakāriṇām -> prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt tat pañcānantaryakāriṇām

prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt tat pañcānantaryakāriṇām+buddhaśāsanāpakāriṇām -> prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt tat pañcānantaryakāriṇāṃ buddhaśāsanāpakāriṇām

prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt tat pañcānantaryakāriṇāṃ buddhaśāsanāpakāriṇām+samayabhedinām -> prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt tat pañcānantaryakāriṇāṃ buddhaśāsanāpakāriṇāṃ samayabhedinām

prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt tat pañcānantaryakāriṇāṃ buddhaśāsanāpakāriṇāṃ samayabhedinām+iti -> prāṇātipātaṃ bhagavān yat kuryāt tat pañcānantaryakāriṇāṃ buddhaśāsanāpakāriṇāṃ samayabhedinām iti

bāhyās+ādhyātmikās -> bāhyā ādhyātmikās

bāhyā ādhyātmikās+ca -> bāhyā ādhyātmikāś ca

bāhyā ādhyātmikāś ca+iti| -> bāhyā ādhyātmikāś ceti|

prāṇātipātādayas+samayās -> prāṇātipātādayaḥ samayās

prāṇātipātādayaḥ samayās+dvidhā -> prāṇātipātādayaḥ samayā dvidhā

idānīm+viśuddhadharmadeśanām -> idānīṃ viśuddhadharmadeśanām

idānīṃ viśuddhadharmadeśanām+āha---kuryāt -> idānīṃ viśuddhadharmadeśanām āha---kuryāt

idānīṃ viśuddhadharmadeśanām āha---kuryāt+prāṇātipātam -> idānīṃ viśuddhadharmadeśanām āha---kuryāt prāṇātipātam

idānīṃ viśuddhadharmadeśanām āha---kuryāt prāṇātipātam+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ viśuddhadharmadeśanām āha---kuryāt prāṇātipātam ityādinā|

toyādiśuddhis+na -> toyādiśuddhir na

toyādiśuddhir na+asti -> toyādiśuddhir nāsti

toyādiśuddhir nāsti+aparavidhes -> toyādiśuddhir nāsty aparavidhes

toyādiśuddhir nāsty aparavidhes+balavattvāt -> toyādiśuddhir nāsty aparavidher balavattvāt

toyādiśuddhir nāsty aparavidher balavattvāt+iti| -> toyādiśuddhir nāsty aparavidher balavattvād iti|

evam+laghutantre -> evaṃ laghutantre

ratnasambhavas+| -> ratnasambhavaḥ|

tathāgatas+madhye -> tathāgato madhye

puṣpam+patati -> puṣpaṃ patati

vacanāt+yatra -> vacanād yatra

nāmasaṃgītyāṃ pañcabuddhātmamukuṭas+iti -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ pañcabuddhātmamukuṭa iti

bhagavatas+niyamas -> bhagavato niyamas

bhagavato niyamas+| -> bhagavato niyamaḥ|

pūrvāparavirodhas+| -> pūrvāparavirodhaḥ|

pañcābhiṣekās+bālajanāvatāraṇe| -> pañcābhiṣekā bālajanāvatāraṇe|

yat+uktam -> yad uktam

yad uktam+pañcatathāgataviśuddhyā -> yad uktaṃ pañcatathāgataviśuddhyā

iha+anyatantrāntare -> ihānyatantrāntare

saptābhiṣekaniyamas+| -> saptābhiṣekaniyamaḥ|

anyasmin+vā! -> anyasmin vā!

sarvasattvānām+puṇyajñānaphalāptaye| -> sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyajñānaphalāptaye|

laukikasiddhisādhanāya+akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam -> laukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam

laukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam+nāyakatvena -> laukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ nāyakatvena

saptābhiṣekais+vyākṛtas -> saptābhiṣekair vyākṛtas

saptābhiṣekair vyākṛtas+anujñātas -> saptābhiṣekair vyākṛto 'nujñātas

saptābhiṣekair vyākṛto 'nujñātas+mayā -> saptābhiṣekair vyākṛto 'nujñāto mayā

mayā+amukavajrācāryeṇa -> mayāmukavajrācāryeṇa

mayāmukavajrācāryeṇa+amukaśiṣyas -> mayāmukavajrācāryeṇāmukaśiṣyas

mayāmukavajrācāryeṇāmukaśiṣyas+abhiṣiktas -> mayāmukavajrācāryeṇāmukaśiṣyo 'bhiṣiktas

mayāmukavajrācāryeṇāmukaśiṣyo 'bhiṣiktas+| -> mayāmukavajrācāryeṇāmukaśiṣyo 'bhiṣiktaḥ|

iha+amukasaṃvatsare -> ihāmukasaṃvatsare

ihāmukasaṃvatsare+amukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām -> ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām

ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām+amukamāse -> ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse

ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse+amukapūrṇimāyām -> ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām

ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām+amukavāre -> ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām amukavāre

ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām amukavāre+amukatithau -> ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām amukavāre 'mukatithau

ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām amukavāre 'mukatithau+amukanakṣatre -> ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām amukavāre 'mukatithāv amukanakṣatre

ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām amukavāre 'mukatithāv amukanakṣatre+amukayoge -> ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām amukavāre 'mukatithāv amukanakṣatre 'mukayoge

ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām amukavāre 'mukatithāv amukanakṣatre 'mukayoge+amukakaraṇe -> ihāmukasaṃvatsare 'mukakalkirājadharmadeśanāyām amukamāse 'mukapūrṇimāyām amukavāre 'mukatithāv amukanakṣatre 'mukayoge 'mukakaraṇe

vajrācāryas+jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhārtham -> vajrācāryo jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhārtham

vajrācāryo jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhārtham+saṃvatsarādikam -> vajrācāryo jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhārthaṃ saṃvatsarādikam

vajrācāryo jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhārthaṃ saṃvatsarādikam+udghoṣayati| -> vajrācāryo jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhārthaṃ saṃvatsarādikam udghoṣayati|

buddhādhiṣṭhānam+cintayet| -> buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ cintayet|

tatas+śiṣyāya -> tataḥ śiṣyāya

saptābhiṣekavidhim+maṇḍale -> saptābhiṣekavidhiṃ maṇḍale

tadyathā---kuryāt prāṇātipātam+khalu -> tadyathā---kuryāt prāṇātipātaṃ khalu

deśayet+śuddhadharmam| -> deśayec chuddhadharmam|

tābhyām+ācāryas -> tābhyām ācāryas

tābhyām ācāryas+vajram -> tābhyām ācāryo vajram

tābhyām ācāryo vajram+vajraghaṇṭām -> tābhyām ācāryo vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭām

tābhyām ācāryo vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭām+pradāya -> tābhyām ācāryo vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭāṃ pradāya

dattvā+amukavajra -> dattvāmukavajra

vajravajraghaṇṭām+kare -> vajravajraghaṇṭāṃ kare

tatas+śiṣyāya -> tataḥ śiṣyāya

abhiṣekam+dattvā -> abhiṣekaṃ dattvā

janmasthāneṣu+anujñābhiṣeke -> janmasthāneṣv anujñābhiṣeke

janmasthāneṣv anujñābhiṣeke+abhiṣicya -> janmasthāneṣv anujñābhiṣeke 'bhiṣicya

janmasthāneṣv anujñābhiṣeke 'bhiṣicya+anena -> janmasthāneṣv anujñābhiṣeke 'bhiṣicyānena

śiṣyam+ānayitvā -> śiṣyam ānayitvā

punar+dakṣiṇāvartena -> punar dakṣiṇāvartena

tatas+jñānaviśuddhinimittam -> tato jñānaviśuddhinimittam

tato jñānaviśuddhinimittam+cittavajram -> tato jñānaviśuddhinimittaṃ cittavajram

tato jñānaviśuddhinimittaṃ cittavajram+viśodhayitvā -> tato jñānaviśuddhinimittaṃ cittavajraṃ viśodhayitvā

tatas+hastapādeṣu -> tato hastapādeṣu

tatas+śrotrādiṣu -> tataḥ śrotrādiṣu

hāryam+parasvam -> hāryaṃ parasvam

hāryaṃ parasvam+varakamalakule -> hāryaṃ parasvaṃ varakamalakule

hāryaṃ parasvaṃ varakamalakule+api -> hāryaṃ parasvaṃ varakamalakule 'pi

hāryaṃ parasvaṃ varakamalakule 'pi+eva -> hāryaṃ parasvaṃ varakamalakule 'py eva

kuliśakule+asatyavākyam -> kuliśakule 'satyavākyam

kuryāt+prāṇātipātam -> kuryāt prāṇātipātam

deśayet+śuddhadharmam| -> deśayec chuddhadharmam|

vajraṃ ghaṇṭām+pradāya -> vajraṃ ghaṇṭāṃ pradāya

krodhais+maitryādināmasphuṭajinapatinā -> krodhair maitryādināmasphuṭajinapatinā

krodhair maitryādināmasphuṭajinapatinā+ājñā -> krodhair maitryādināmasphuṭajinapatinājñā

janmasthāneṣu+abhiṣiñcayet -> janmasthāneṣv abhiṣiñcayet

tatas+mukuṭābhiṣeke -> tato mukuṭābhiṣeke

prakṣipya+udakābhiṣekam -> prakṣipyodakābhiṣekam

prakṣipyodakābhiṣekam+punas -> prakṣipyodakābhiṣekaṃ punas

prakṣipyodakābhiṣekaṃ punas+pañcajanmasthāneṣu -> prakṣipyodakābhiṣekaṃ punaḥ pañcajanmasthāneṣu

prakṣipyodakābhiṣekaṃ punaḥ pañcajanmasthāneṣu+abhiṣecayet -> prakṣipyodakābhiṣekaṃ punaḥ pañcajanmasthāneṣv abhiṣecayet

prakṣipyodakābhiṣekaṃ punaḥ pañcajanmasthāneṣv abhiṣecayet+anena -> prakṣipyodakābhiṣekaṃ punaḥ pañcajanmasthāneṣv abhiṣecayed anena

toyam+gṛhītvā -> toyaṃ gṛhītvā

tatas+kāyaviśuddhyartham -> tataḥ kāyaviśuddhyartham

tataḥ kāyaviśuddhyartham+tārādidevīmantrais -> tataḥ kāyaviśuddhyarthaṃ tārādidevīmantrais

tataḥ kāyaviśuddhyarthaṃ tārādidevīmantrais+sarvakalaśeṣu -> tataḥ kāyaviśuddhyarthaṃ tārādidevīmantraiḥ sarvakalaśeṣu

sārdham+pradakṣiṇam -> sārdhaṃ pradakṣiṇam

sārdhaṃ pradakṣiṇam+kṛtvā -> sārdhaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā

sārdhaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā+uttaradvāre -> sārdhaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvottaradvāre

kulaśuddhim+kṛtvā -> kulaśuddhiṃ kṛtvā

kulaśuddhiṃ kṛtvā+ācāryas -> kulaśuddhiṃ kṛtvācāryas

kulaśuddhiṃ kṛtvācāryas+śiṣyam -> kulaśuddhiṃ kṛtvācāryaḥ śiṣyam

kulaśuddhiṃ kṛtvācāryaḥ śiṣyam+vāmahastena -> kulaśuddhiṃ kṛtvācāryaḥ śiṣyaṃ vāmahastena

tatas+pūrvadvāre -> tataḥ pūrvadvāre

darśayet+maṇḍalam -> darśayen maṇḍalam

darśayen maṇḍalam+samastam| -> darśayen maṇḍalaṃ samastam|

nāyakam+ādim -> nāyakam ādim

nāyakam ādim+kṛtvā -> nāyakam ādiṃ kṛtvā

tatas+kuladevatāmaṇḍale -> tataḥ kuladevatāmaṇḍale

sivyanayanam+udghāṭayāmi -> sivyanayanam udghāṭayāmi

mantreṇa+udghāṭanam| -> mantreṇodghāṭanam|

mantreṇa+ācāryas -> mantreṇācāryas

mantreṇācāryas+puṣpamokṣam -> mantreṇācāryaḥ puṣpamokṣam

mantreṇācāryaḥ puṣpamokṣam+śiṣyam -> mantreṇācāryaḥ puṣpamokṣaṃ śiṣyam

mantreṇācāryaḥ puṣpamokṣaṃ śiṣyam+kārayati| -> mantreṇācāryaḥ puṣpamokṣaṃ śiṣyaṃ kārayati|

puṣpakṣepamantras+---oṃ -> puṣpakṣepamantraḥ---oṃ

tatas+kuladevatāviśodhanāya -> tataḥ kuladevatāviśodhanāya

evam+hi -> evaṃ hi

kṣipet+toyapūrṇe| -> kṣipet toyapūrṇe|

tais+pañcaviṃśatibhis -> taiḥ pañcaviṃśatibhis

taiḥ pañcaviṃśatibhis+punas -> taiḥ pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ punas

taiḥ pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ punas+poṭalikām -> taiḥ pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ punaḥ poṭalikām

taiḥ pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ punaḥ poṭalikām+baddhvā -> taiḥ pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ punaḥ poṭalikāṃ baddhvā

vanauṣadhyas+śasyāni -> vanauṣadhyaḥ śasyāni

evam+lohāni -> evaṃ lohāni

pūrvoktakakṣapuṭauṣadhyas+pañca -> pūrvoktakakṣapuṭauṣadhyaḥ pañca

pūrvoktakakṣapuṭauṣadhyaḥ pañca+iti| -> pūrvoktakakṣapuṭauṣadhyaḥ pañceti|

vāyavye+iti| -> vāyavya iti|

iti+ekabhāgikās -> ity ekabhāgikās

ity ekabhāgikās+jayavijayaghaṭe| -> ity ekabhāgikā jayavijayaghaṭe|

tathā+oṣadhyas -> tathauṣadhyas

tathauṣadhyas+| -> tathauṣadhyaḥ|

evam+ayaḥkāntam -> evam ayaḥkāntam

evam ayaḥkāntam+tīkṣṇam -> evam ayaḥkāntaṃ tīkṣṇam

evam ayaḥkāntaṃ tīkṣṇam+tāmram -> evam ayaḥkāntaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tāmram

evam ayaḥkāntaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tāmram+rūpyam -> evam ayaḥkāntaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tāmraṃ rūpyam

evam ayaḥkāntaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tāmraṃ rūpyam+suvarṇam| -> evam ayaḥkāntaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tāmraṃ rūpyaṃ suvarṇam|

pītam+paścimavāyavyaghaṭe -> pītaṃ paścimavāyavyaghaṭe

śvetam+uttareśānaghaṭe -> śvetam uttareśānaghaṭe

raktam+dakṣiṇanairṛtyaghaṭe -> raktaṃ dakṣiṇanairṛtyaghaṭe

kṛṣṇam+pūrvāgneyaghaṭe -> kṛṣṇaṃ pūrvāgneyaghaṭe

nīlaratnam+pūrvāparajayavijayaghaṭe -> nīlaratnaṃ pūrvāparajayavijayaghaṭe

haritaratnam+vijayaśaṅkhe -> haritaratnaṃ vijayaśaṅkhe

saratnais+| -> saratnaiḥ|

evam+mṛṇamayais -> evaṃ mṛṇamayais

evaṃ mṛṇamayais+vā -> evaṃ mṛṇamayair vā

niyamas+daridrāṇām| -> niyamo daridrāṇām|

saurabhyapuṣpāṇi+iti -> saurabhyapuṣpāṇīti

pañcavarṇās+bhavanti| -> pañcavarṇā bhavanti|

devanāgānām+maṇayas -> devanāgānāṃ maṇayas

devanāgānāṃ maṇayas+ājñācakravartinas -> devanāgānāṃ maṇaya ājñācakravartinas

devanāgānāṃ maṇaya ājñācakravartinas+mahāratnābhiṣeke -> devanāgānāṃ maṇaya ājñācakravartino mahāratnābhiṣeke

yathāvibhavatas+grāhyāṇi| -> yathāvibhavato grāhyāṇi|

sphaṭikajīvajātiḍoharīkācaharitamaṇayas+iti| -> sphaṭikajīvajātiḍoharīkācaharitamaṇaya iti|

tathā+adhamāni -> tathādhamāni

muktāpravālarājapaṭṭaśūlamaṇiṣaḍbindukās+ca -> muktāpravālarājapaṭṭaśūlamaṇiṣaḍbindukāś ca

muktāpravālarājapaṭṭaśūlamaṇiṣaḍbindukāś ca+iti| -> muktāpravālarājapaṭṭaśūlamaṇiṣaḍbindukāś ceti|

indranīlapadmarāgacandrakāntakarkeṭakamarakatāni+iti -> indranīlapadmarāgacandrakāntakarkeṭakamarakatānīti

tatas+ratnāni -> tato ratnāni

bhāgās+ṅgulisaṃkhyās -> NO RULE FOUND (ās+ṅ)

ṅgulisaṃkhyās+| -> ṅgulisaṃkhyāḥ|

kakṣapuṭabhāgena+iti| -> kakṣapuṭabhāgeneti|

kulatthās+kṛṣṇacaṇakās -> kulatthāḥ kṛṣṇacaṇakās

kulatthāḥ kṛṣṇacaṇakās+| -> kulatthāḥ kṛṣṇacaṇakāḥ|

pañcamam+atasī -> pañcamam atasī

caturtham+masūrikās -> caturthaṃ masūrikās

caturthaṃ masūrikās+śuklasarṣapās -> caturthaṃ masūrikāḥ śuklasarṣapās

caturthaṃ masūrikāḥ śuklasarṣapās+khaṅgus -> caturthaṃ masūrikāḥ śuklasarṣapāḥ khaṅgus

caturthaṃ masūrikāḥ śuklasarṣapāḥ khaṅgus+tuvarikā -> caturthaṃ masūrikāḥ śuklasarṣapāḥ khaṅgus tuvarikā

tṛtīyam+mauṭham -> tṛtīyaṃ mauṭham

tṛtīyaṃ mauṭham+tripuṭas -> tṛtīyaṃ mauṭhaṃ tripuṭas

tṛtīyaṃ mauṭhaṃ tripuṭas+kṛṣṇasarṣapās -> tṛtīyaṃ mauṭhaṃ tripuṭaḥ kṛṣṇasarṣapās

tṛtīyaṃ mauṭhaṃ tripuṭaḥ kṛṣṇasarṣapās+yavās -> tṛtīyaṃ mauṭhaṃ tripuṭaḥ kṛṣṇasarṣapā yavās

tṛtīyaṃ mauṭhaṃ tripuṭaḥ kṛṣṇasarṣapā yavās+māṣās -> tṛtīyaṃ mauṭhaṃ tripuṭaḥ kṛṣṇasarṣapā yavā māṣās

tṛtīyaṃ mauṭhaṃ tripuṭaḥ kṛṣṇasarṣapā yavā māṣās+| -> tṛtīyaṃ mauṭhaṃ tripuṭaḥ kṛṣṇasarṣapā yavā māṣāḥ|

dvitīyam+kodravās -> dvitīyaṃ kodravās

dvitīyaṃ kodravās+mudgās -> dvitīyaṃ kodravā mudgās

dvitīyaṃ kodravā mudgās+kalās -> dvitīyaṃ kodravā mudgāḥ kalās

dvitīyaṃ kodravā mudgāḥ kalās+śuklatilās -> dvitīyaṃ kodravā mudgāḥ kalāḥ śuklatilās

dvitīyaṃ kodravā mudgāḥ kalāḥ śuklatilās+godhūmās -> dvitīyaṃ kodravā mudgāḥ kalāḥ śuklatilā godhūmās

dvitīyaṃ kodravā mudgāḥ kalāḥ śuklatilā godhūmās+| -> dvitīyaṃ kodravā mudgāḥ kalāḥ śuklatilā godhūmāḥ|

dhānyam+mahādhānyam -> dhānyaṃ mahādhānyam

dhānyaṃ mahādhānyam+māṣās -> dhānyaṃ mahādhānyaṃ māṣās

dhānyaṃ mahādhānyaṃ māṣās+śvetacaṇakās -> dhānyaṃ mahādhānyaṃ māṣāḥ śvetacaṇakās

dhānyaṃ mahādhānyaṃ māṣāḥ śvetacaṇakās+kṛṣṇatilās -> dhānyaṃ mahādhānyaṃ māṣāḥ śvetacaṇakāḥ kṛṣṇatilās

dhānyaṃ mahādhānyaṃ māṣāḥ śvetacaṇakāḥ kṛṣṇatilās+iti -> dhānyaṃ mahādhānyaṃ māṣāḥ śvetacaṇakāḥ kṛṣṇatilā iti

evam+yathāsaṃkhyam -> evaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam

evaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam+dhānyādiśasyasamūham| -> evaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dhānyādiśasyasamūham|

pañcamanyāsas+| -> pañcamanyāsaḥ|

veśyā+āyaṣṭimadhu -> veśyāyaṣṭimadhu

bhṛṅgarājas+bhāga -> bhṛṅgarājo bhāga

tatas+pañcamas -> tataḥ pañcamas

tataḥ pañcamas+nyāsas -> tataḥ pañcamo nyāsas

tataḥ pañcamo nyāsas+ucyate---brāhmaṇī -> tataḥ pañcamo nyāsa ucyate---brāhmaṇī

tataḥ pañcamo nyāsa ucyate---brāhmaṇī+iti -> tataḥ pañcamo nyāsa ucyate---brāhmaṇīti

kṛtāñjalis+bhāga -> kṛtāñjalir bhāga

putrī+iti -> putrīti

tatas+caturthanyāsas -> tataś caturthanyāsas

tataś caturthanyāsas+ucyate---mātā -> tataś caturthanyāsa ucyate---mātā

tataś caturthanyāsa ucyate---mātā+iti -> tataś caturthanyāsa ucyate---māteti

jyotis+iti -> jyotir iti

vāruṇī+iti -> vāruṇīti

tatas+tṛtīyas -> tatas tṛtīyas

tatas tṛtīyas+ucyate----pārthivī -> tatas tṛtīya ucyate----pārthivī

tatas tṛtīya ucyate----pārthivī+iti -> tatas tṛtīya ucyate----pārthivīti

dvitīyapañcakanyāsas+| -> dvitīyapañcakanyāsaḥ|

carcikā+iti -> carciketi

kaumārī+iti -> kaumārīti

vārāhī+iti -> vārāhīti

lakṣmī+iti -> lakṣmīti

tatas+dvitīyas -> tato dvitīyas

tato dvitīyas+ucyate---aindrī -> tato dvitīya ucyate---aindrī

tato dvitīya ucyate---aindrī+iti -> tato dvitīya ucyate---aindrīti

tato dvitīya ucyate---aindrīti+indravāruṇī -> tato dvitīya ucyate---aindrītīndravāruṇī

prathamapātas+| -> prathamapātaḥ|

raudrī+iti -> raudrīti

brāhmī+iti -> brāhmīti

idānīm+āsām -> idānīm āsām

idānīm āsām+prakaṭanāmāni -> idānīm āsāṃ prakaṭanāmāni

idānīm āsāṃ prakaṭanāmāni+ucyante---iha -> idānīm āsāṃ prakaṭanāmāny ucyante---iha

iti+auṣadhyas -> ity auṣadhyas

ity auṣadhyas+mahāsiddhibhuktiṛddhipradās -> ity auṣadhyo mahāsiddhibhuktiṛddhipradās

ity auṣadhyo mahāsiddhibhuktiṛddhipradās+sadā|| -> ity auṣadhyo mahāsiddhibhuktiṛddhipradāḥ sadā||

jyotis+vāyavī -> jyotir vāyavī

netrenvagnyādibhis+bhāgais -> netrenvagnyādibhir bhāgais

netrenvagnyādibhir bhāgais+brāhmyādyās -> netrenvagnyādibhir bhāgair brāhmyādyās

netrenvagnyādibhir bhāgair brāhmyādyās+pañcapañcakais -> netrenvagnyādibhir bhāgair brāhmyādyāḥ pañcapañcakais

netrenvagnyādibhir bhāgair brāhmyādyāḥ pañcapañcakais+|| -> netrenvagnyādibhir bhāgair brāhmyādyāḥ pañcapañcakaiḥ||

rājan+oṣadhīs -> rājann oṣadhīs

rājann oṣadhīs+pātayet -> rājann oṣadhīḥ pātayet

rājann oṣadhīḥ pātayet+kramāt| -> rājann oṣadhīḥ pātayet kramāt|

tatra+oṣadhyas -> tatrauṣadhyas

gandhayuktais+iti| -> gandhayuktair iti|

saratnais+| -> saratnaiḥ|

mṛṇmayais+vā -> mṛṇmayair vā

maṇikanakaghaṭais+tadabhāve -> maṇikanakaghaṭais tadabhāve

tribhis+jayaghaṭais -> tribhir jayaghaṭais

tribhir jayaghaṭais+tribhis -> tribhir jayaghaṭais tribhis

tribhir jayaghaṭais tribhis+vijayaghaṭais -> tribhir jayaghaṭais tribhir vijayaghaṭais

tribhir jayaghaṭais tribhir vijayaghaṭais+caturghaṭapakṣe -> tribhir jayaghaṭais tribhir vijayaghaṭaiś caturghaṭapakṣe

jayavijayaghaṭais+pañcabhis -> jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhis

jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhis+jayaghaṭais -> jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir jayaghaṭais

jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir jayaghaṭais+pañcabhis -> jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir jayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhis

jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir jayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhis+vijayaghaṭais -> jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir jayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir vijayaghaṭais

jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir jayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir vijayaghaṭais+aṣṭaghaṭapakṣe -> jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir jayaghaṭaiḥ pañcabhir vijayaghaṭair aṣṭaghaṭapakṣe

nāgais+iti -> nāgair iti

nāgair iti+aṣṭābhis -> nāgair ity aṣṭābhis

nāgair ity aṣṭābhis+caturbhis -> nāgair ity aṣṭābhiś caturbhis

nāgair ity aṣṭābhiś caturbhis+vā| -> nāgair ity aṣṭābhiś caturbhir vā|

nāgais+ityādinā| -> nāgair ityādinā|

viṣayais+sendriyais -> viṣayaiḥ sendriyais

viṣayaiḥ sendriyais+yojanīyam|| -> viṣayaiḥ sendriyair yojanīyam||

vajram+ghaṇṭārkacandrāt -> vajraṃ ghaṇṭārkacandrāt

vajraṃ ghaṇṭārkacandrāt+vratam -> vajraṃ ghaṇṭārkacandrād vratam

vajraṃ ghaṇṭārkacandrād vratam+api -> vajraṃ ghaṇṭārkacandrād vratam api

varagurus+śaktibhis -> varaguruḥ śaktibhis

varaguruḥ śaktibhis+paṭṭam -> varaguruḥ śaktibhiḥ paṭṭam

varaguruḥ śaktibhiḥ paṭṭam+eva -> varaguruḥ śaktibhiḥ paṭṭam eva

maulim+buddhaprabhedais -> mauliṃ buddhaprabhedais

mauliṃ buddhaprabhedais+dadati -> mauliṃ buddhaprabhedair dadati

gandhayuktais+jayavijayaghaṭais -> gandhayuktair jayavijayaghaṭais

gandhayuktair jayavijayaghaṭais+snāpayet -> gandhayuktair jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ snāpayet

gandhayuktair jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ snāpayet+devatīnām| -> gandhayuktair jayavijayaghaṭaiḥ snāpayed devatīnām|

nāgais+rājan -> nāgaī rājan

nāgaī rājan+caturbhis -> nāgaī rājaṃś caturbhis

nāgaī rājaṃś caturbhis+maṇikanakaghaṭais -> nāgaī rājaṃś caturbhir maṇikanakaghaṭais

nāgaī rājaṃś caturbhir maṇikanakaghaṭais+mṛṇmayais -> nāgaī rājaṃś caturbhir maṇikanakaghaṭair mṛṇmayais

nāgaī rājaṃś caturbhir maṇikanakaghaṭair mṛṇmayais+vā -> nāgaī rājaṃś caturbhir maṇikanakaghaṭair mṛṇmayair vā

vidhis+ucyate--- -> vidhir ucyate---

idānīm+saptābhiṣekasya -> idānīṃ saptābhiṣekasya

tathāgataniyamas+|| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ||

anuttaras+vakṣyamāṇas -> anuttaro vakṣyamāṇas

anuttaro vakṣyamāṇas+sampradeyas -> anuttaro vakṣyamāṇaḥ sampradeyas

anuttaro vakṣyamāṇaḥ sampradeyas+iti -> anuttaro vakṣyamāṇaḥ sampradeya iti

anuttaro vakṣyamāṇaḥ sampradeya iti+ācāryasya -> anuttaro vakṣyamāṇaḥ sampradeya ity ācāryasya

karmamudrām+pūjayitvā -> karmamudrāṃ pūjayitvā

kalaśādikas+| -> kalaśādikaḥ|

paścāt+saptābhiṣekas -> paścāt saptābhiṣekas

paścāt saptābhiṣekas+udakādikas -> paścāt saptābhiṣeka udakādikas

paścāt saptābhiṣeka udakādikas+trividhas -> paścāt saptābhiṣeka udakādikas trividhas

paścāt saptābhiṣeka udakādikas trividhas+iha -> paścāt saptābhiṣeka udakādikas trividha iha

kuladevatām+darśayitvā -> kuladevatāṃ darśayitvā

tatas+tasya -> tatas tasya

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

karmamudrāsiddhis+iti -> karmamudrāsiddhir iti

supuṣpam+tryakṣarābhimantritam -> supuṣpaṃ tryakṣarābhimantritam

supuṣpaṃ tryakṣarābhimantritam+patati -> supuṣpaṃ tryakṣarābhimantritaṃ patati

yasmin+sthāne -> yasmin sthāne

netrodghāṭanam+kṛtvā -> netrodghāṭanaṃ kṛtvā

divyendriyāṇi+udghāṭaya -> divyendriyāṇy udghāṭaya

paścāt+choṭayet -> paścāc choṭayet

paścāc choṭayet+anena -> paścāc choṭayed anena

prāk+puṣpamokṣam -> prāk puṣpamokṣam

prāk puṣpamokṣam+kṛtvā -> prāk puṣpamokṣaṃ kṛtvā

netrapuṭam+yaugapadyena -> netrapuṭaṃ yaugapadyena

puṣpamokṣas+pūrvoktaniyamena -> puṣpamokṣaḥ pūrvoktaniyamena

tatas+karakamalapuṭāt -> tataḥ karakamalapuṭāt

tataḥ karakamalapuṭāt+bāhye -> tataḥ karakamalapuṭād bāhye

samantāt+deyam -> samantād deyam

samantād deyam+puṣpāñjaliviśuddhyā| -> samantād deyaṃ puṣpāñjaliviśuddhyā|

tryakṣarais+puṣpam -> tryakṣaraiḥ puṣpam

tryakṣaraiḥ puṣpam+ekam -> tryakṣaraiḥ puṣpam ekam

tryakṣaraiḥ puṣpam ekam+saptābhimantritam -> tryakṣaraiḥ puṣpam ekaṃ saptābhimantritam

tryakṣaraiḥ puṣpam ekaṃ saptābhimantritam+tasya -> tryakṣaraiḥ puṣpam ekaṃ saptābhimantritaṃ tasya

prokṣaṇam+kṛtvā -> prokṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā

tatas+kalyāṇamitreṇa -> tataḥ kalyāṇamitreṇa

niṣaṇṇas+dadāti| -> niṣaṇṇo dadāti|

sekam+dadāti| -> sekaṃ dadāti|

tadā+ācāryas -> tadācāryas

tadācāryas+utthitas -> tadācārya utthitas

tadācārya utthitas+śiṣyāya -> tadācārya utthitaḥ śiṣyāya

maṇḍale+utthitā -> maṇḍala utthitā

sthitas+| -> sthitaḥ|

tatas+pūrvadvāre -> tataḥ pūrvadvāre

tataḥ pūrvadvāre+ācāryas -> tataḥ pūrvadvāra ācāryas

tataḥ pūrvadvāra ācāryas+nāyakamūrtyānuttara -> tataḥ pūrvadvāra ācāryo nāyakamūrtyānuttara

trivārān+maṇḍale| -> trivārān maṇḍale|

kalyāṇamitras+ādau -> kalyāṇamitra ādau

tatas+cakṣurādīni -> tataś cakṣurādīni

sūkṣmavastreṇa+anena -> sūkṣmavastreṇānena

mukham+bandhayet -> mukhaṃ bandhayet

mukhaṃ bandhayet+śāntyādiṣu -> mukhaṃ bandhayec chāntyādiṣu

prathamam+vratadānānantaram| -> prathamaṃ vratadānānantaram|

śrīmantreṇa+ityādinā| -> śrīmantreṇetyādinā|

yathā+anuttaras -> yathānuttaras

yathānuttaras+sampradeyas -> yathānuttaraḥ sampradeyas

yathānuttaraḥ sampradeyas+|| -> yathānuttaraḥ sampradeyaḥ||

paścāt+saptābhiṣekas -> paścāt saptābhiṣekas

paścāt saptābhiṣekas+trividhas -> paścāt saptābhiṣekas trividhas

paścāt saptābhiṣekas trividhas+iha -> paścāt saptābhiṣekas trividha iha

tat+kulam -> tat kulam

tat kulam+tasya -> tat kulaṃ tasya

supuṣpam+patati -> supuṣpaṃ patati

yasmin+sthāne -> yasmin sthāne

puṣpamokṣas+| -> puṣpamokṣaḥ|

trivārān+karakamalapuṭāt -> trivāran karakamalapuṭāt

trivāran karakamalapuṭāt+maṇḍale -> trivāran karakamalapuṭān maṇḍale

puṣpam+ekam -> puṣpam ekam

puṣpam ekam+pradeyam -> puṣpam ekaṃ pradeyam

śrīmantreṇa+abhimantrya -> śrīmantreṇābhimantrya

idānīm+maṇḍalapraveśas -> idānīṃ maṇḍalapraveśas

idānīṃ maṇḍalapraveśas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ maṇḍalapraveśa ucyate---

vratadānaniyamas+|| -> vratadānaniyamaḥ||

śiṣyāya+iti -> śiṣyāyeti

śiṣyais+iti -> śiṣyair iti

pañcaviṃśat+vratāni -> pañcaviṃśad vratāni

bhuvanapates+vajrasattvasya -> bhuvanapater vajrasattvasya

rūpāsaktis+śabdāsaktis -> rūpāsaktiḥ śabdāsaktis

rūpāsaktiḥ śabdāsaktis+gandhāsaktis -> rūpāsaktiḥ śabdāsaktir gandhāsaktis

rūpāsaktiḥ śabdāsaktir gandhāsaktis+rasāsaktis -> rūpāsaktiḥ śabdāsaktir gandhāsaktī rasāsaktis

rūpāsaktiḥ śabdāsaktir gandhāsaktī rasāsaktis+sparśāsaktis -> rūpāsaktiḥ śabdāsaktir gandhāsaktī rasāsaktiḥ sparśāsaktis

rūpāsaktiḥ śabdāsaktir gandhāsaktī rasāsaktiḥ sparśāsaktis+iti| -> rūpāsaktiḥ śabdāsaktir gandhāsaktī rasāsaktiḥ sparśāsaktir iti|

tathā+āsaktis -> tathāsaktis

tathāsaktis+tu -> tathāsaktis tu

tathāsaktis tu+indriyāṇām -> tathāsaktis tv indriyāṇām

tathāsaktis tv indriyāṇām+iti -> tathāsaktis tv indriyāṇām iti

kuryāt+iti| -> kuryād iti|

mitradroham+prabhudroham -> mitradrohaṃ prabhudroham

mitradrohaṃ prabhudroham+buddhadroham -> mitradrohaṃ prabhudrohaṃ buddhadroham

mitradrohaṃ prabhudrohaṃ buddhadroham+saṃghadroham -> mitradrohaṃ prabhudrohaṃ buddhadrohaṃ saṃghadroham

mitradrohaṃ prabhudrohaṃ buddhadrohaṃ saṃghadroham+viśvastadroham -> mitradrohaṃ prabhudrohaṃ buddhadrohaṃ saṃghadrohaṃ viśvastadroham

mitradrohaṃ prabhudrohaṃ buddhadrohaṃ saṃghadrohaṃ viśvastadroham+iti -> mitradrohaṃ prabhudrohaṃ buddhadrohaṃ saṃghadrohaṃ viśvastadroham iti

hatyā+iti| -> hatyeti|

pratimāstūpādes+visaṃvādas -> pratimāstūpāder visaṃvādas

pratimāstūpāder visaṃvādas+aparā -> pratimāstūpāder visaṃvādo 'parā

tridaśanaraguros+iti -> tridaśanaraguror iti

kuryāt+sarvadā -> kuryāt sarvadā

pūrvāparāṇām+daśānām -> pūrvāparāṇāṃ daśānām

pūrvāparāṇāṃ daśānām+ādimām -> pūrvāparāṇāṃ daśānām ādimām

pūrvāparāṇāṃ daśānām ādimām+pañcahatyām -> pūrvāparāṇāṃ daśānām ādimāṃ pañcahatyām

pūrvāparāṇāṃ daśānām ādimāṃ pañcahatyām+na -> pūrvāparāṇāṃ daśānām ādimāṃ pañcahatyāṃ na

kuryāt+iti -> kuryād iti

kuryād iti+upapāpakāni -> kuryād ity upapāpakāni

daityadharmam+mlecchadharmam -> daityadharmaṃ mlecchadharmam

daityadharmaṃ mlecchadharmam+na -> daityadharmaṃ mlecchadharmaṃ na

dyūtam+sāvadyabhojyam -> dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyam

dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyam+pūrvoktam -> dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktam

dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktam+kuvacanapaṭhanam -> dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanam

dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanam+bhūtadharmam -> dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanaṃ bhūtadharmam

dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanaṃ bhūtadharmam+pitṛkāryam -> dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanaṃ bhūtadharmaṃ pitṛkāryam

dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanaṃ bhūtadharmaṃ pitṛkāryam+yāgakāryam -> dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanaṃ bhūtadharmaṃ pitṛkāryaṃ yāgakāryam

dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanaṃ bhūtadharmaṃ pitṛkāryaṃ yāgakāryam+vedoktam| -> dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanaṃ bhūtadharmaṃ pitṛkāryaṃ yāgakāryaṃ vedoktam|

tadā+aparāṇi -> tadāparāṇi

tatas+yadi -> tato yadi

tato yadi+icchati -> tato yadīcchati

bhuvanapates+pañcaviṃśat -> bhuvanapateḥ pañcaviṃśat

bhuvanapateḥ pañcaviṃśat+vratāni|| -> bhuvanapateḥ pañcaviṃśad vratāni||

droham+mitraprabhūṇām -> drohaṃ mitraprabhūṇām

drohaṃ mitraprabhūṇām+tridaśanaraguros -> drohaṃ mitraprabhūṇāṃ tridaśanaraguros

drohaṃ mitraprabhūṇāṃ tridaśanaraguros+saṃghaviśvāsinām -> drohaṃ mitraprabhūṇāṃ tridaśanaraguroḥ saṃghaviśvāsinām

drohaṃ mitraprabhūṇāṃ tridaśanaraguroḥ saṃghaviśvāsinām+ca -> drohaṃ mitraprabhūṇāṃ tridaśanaraguroḥ saṃghaviśvāsināṃ ca

gobālastrīnarāṇām+tridaśanaraguros -> gobālastrīnarāṇāṃ tridaśanaraguros

gobālastrīnarāṇāṃ tridaśanaraguros+pañcahatyām -> gobālastrīnarāṇāṃ tridaśanaraguroḥ pañcahatyām

gobālastrīnarāṇāṃ tridaśanaraguroḥ pañcahatyām+na -> gobālastrīnarāṇāṃ tridaśanaraguroḥ pañcahatyāṃ na

dyūtam+sāvadyabhojyam -> dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyam

dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyam+kuvacanapaṭhanam -> dyūtaṃ sāvadyabhojyaṃ kuvacanapaṭhanam

puṇyasambhārāya+iti -> puṇyasambhārāyeti

vipaśyādayaḥ śākyamuniparyantās tathāgatās teṣāṃ gatis+puṇyaśīlajñānasambhārātmikā -> vipaśyādayaḥ śākyamuniparyantās tathāgatās teṣāṃ gatiḥ puṇyaśīlajñānasambhārātmikā

pravarās+bhadrakalpe -> pravarā bhadrakalpe

dīrgho hūṃkāro vāgvajraṃ hrasvas+cittavajram| -> dīrgho hūṃkāro vāgvajraṃ hrasvaś cittavajram|

atra+ubhayos -> atrobhayos

atrobhayos+kāyavākcittavajraviṣaye -> atrobhayoḥ kāyavākcittavajraviṣaye

iti+upāyasya -> ity upāyasya

tatas+oṃ -> tata oṃ

praṣṭavyas+yat -> praṣṭavyo yat

praṣṭavyo yat+kiṃcit -> praṣṭavyo yat kiṃcit

praṣṭavyo yat kiṃcit+kāryam -> praṣṭavyo yat kiṃcit kāryam

praṣṭavyo yat kiṃcit kāryam+abhimatam| -> praṣṭavyo yat kiṃcit kāryam abhimatam|

teṣām+lakṣaṇam -> teṣāṃ lakṣaṇam

anye 'nantāveśās+bhūtarākṣasaceṭakādīnām| -> anye 'nantāveśā bhūtarākṣasaceṭakādīnām|

iha+āveśas -> ihāveśas

ihāveśas+divyānām| -> ihāveśo divyānām|

laukikī+iti| -> laukikīti|

akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam+yāvat -> akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ yāvat

akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ yāvat+tathāgatais -> akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ yāvat tathāgatais

akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ yāvat tathāgatais+uktā -> akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ yāvat tathāgatair uktā

bahuvividhabhavais+mantriṇām -> bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇām

bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇām+siddhis -> bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇāṃ siddhis

bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇāṃ siddhis+asti| -> bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇāṃ siddhir asti|

narapate+iti -> narapata iti

narapata iti+āmantraṇam| -> narapata ity āmantraṇam|

bhavyasūnos+bhavati| -> bhavyasūnor bhavati|

buddhais+āsvādyamānais -> buddhair āsvādyamānais

buddhair āsvādyamānais+kvacit -> buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacit

buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacit+amṛtavaśāt -> buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacid amṛtavaśāt

buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacid amṛtavaśāt+maṇḍale -> buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacid amṛtavaśān maṇḍale

kadācit+guruparvakrameṇa -> kadācid guruparvakrameṇa

bhavati+iti| -> bhavatīti|

mantrajāpādibhis+ca -> mantrajāpādibhiś ca

mantrajāpādibhiś ca+āveśas -> mantrajāpādibhiś cāveśas

mantrajāpādibhiś cāveśas+bhavati| -> mantrajāpādibhiś cāveśo bhavati|

nānāvidhibhis+bahuvidhasamayais -> nānāvidhibhir bahuvidhasamayais

nānāvidhibhir bahuvidhasamayais+rakṣitais -> nānāvidhibhir bahuvidhasamayaī rakṣitais

nānāvidhibhir bahuvidhasamayaī rakṣitais+bodhicittabindvādibhis -> nānāvidhibhir bahuvidhasamayaī rakṣitair bodhicittabindvādibhis

nānāvidhibhir bahuvidhasamayaī rakṣitair bodhicittabindvādibhis+tathā -> nānāvidhibhir bahuvidhasamayaī rakṣitair bodhicittabindvādibhis tathā

pūrvasevābhedais+iti -> pūrvasevābhedair iti

bhāvanāyās+balena -> bhāvanāyā balena

mantriṇām+ācāryāṇām -> mantriṇām ācāryāṇām

mantriṇām ācāryāṇām+vai -> mantriṇām ācāryāṇāṃ vai

mantriṇām ācāryāṇāṃ vai+ekāntam -> mantriṇām ācāryāṇāṃ vā ekāntam

mantriṇām ācāryāṇāṃ vā ekāntam+bhavati -> mantriṇām ācāryāṇāṃ vā ekāntaṃ bhavati

divyāveśas+yas -> divyāveśo yas

divyāveśo yas+sa -> divyāveśo yaḥ sa

āveśas+ityādinā| -> āveśa ityādinā|

bahuvividhabhavais+mantriṇām -> bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇām

bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇām+siddhis -> bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇāṃ siddhis

bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇāṃ siddhis+asti|| -> bahuvividhabhavair mantriṇāṃ siddhir asti||

buddhair āsvādyamānais+kvacit -> buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacit

buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacit+amṛtavaśāt -> buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacid amṛtavaśāt

buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacid amṛtavaśāt+maṇḍale -> buddhair āsvādyamānaiḥ kvacid amṛtavaśān maṇḍale

sevābhedaiḥ kadācit+bahuvidhasamayais -> sevābhedaiḥ kadācid bahuvidhasamayais

yogy adhiṣṭhitaḥ san girisamas+bhavati -> yogy adhiṣṭhitaḥ san girisamo bhavati

yogy adhiṣṭhitaḥ san girisamo bhavati+anekaśatamanuṣyais -> yogy adhiṣṭhitaḥ san girisamo bhavaty anekaśatamanuṣyais

yogy adhiṣṭhitaḥ san girisamo bhavaty anekaśatamanuṣyaiś cālayitum+na -> yogy adhiṣṭhitaḥ san girisamo bhavaty anekaśatamanuṣyaiś cālayituṃ na

krodhāviṣṭas+manuṣyādīnām -> krodhāviṣṭo manuṣyādīnām

krodhāviṣṭo manuṣyādīnām+agamyavidhinā -> krodhāviṣṭo manuṣyādīnām agamyavidhinā

yas+śiṣyas -> yaḥ śiṣyas

yaḥ śiṣyas+sa -> yaḥ śiṣyaḥ sa

pūravam+ajñas -> pūravam ajñas

pūravam ajñas+asau -> pūravam ajño 'sau

ripos+mārasamūhasya -> ripor mārasamūhasya

ripor mārasamūhasya+iti| -> ripor mārasamūhasyeti|

hūṃkāramiśram+bhayadam -> hūṃkāramiśraṃ bhayadam

hūṃkāramiśraṃ bhayadam+api -> hūṃkāramiśraṃ bhayadam api

hāsyam+karoti| -> hāsyaṃ karoti|

bahuvidhakiraṇais+iti -> bahuvidhakiraṇair iti

krodhāviṣṭas+san -> krodhāviṣṭaḥ san

krodhāviṣṭaḥ san+vajranṛtyam -> krodhāviṣṭaḥ san vajranṛtyam

krodhāviṣṭaḥ san vajranṛtyam+karoti| -> krodhāviṣṭaḥ san vajranṛtyaṃ karoti|

sas+eva -> sa eva

yas+śiṣyas -> yaḥ śiṣyas

yaḥ śiṣyas+prāk -> yaḥ śiṣyaḥ prāk

yaḥ śiṣyaḥ prāk+kiṃcit -> yaḥ śiṣyaḥ prāk kiṃcit

yaḥ śiṣyaḥ prāk kiṃcit+nāṭyalakṣaṇam -> yaḥ śiṣyaḥ prāk kiṃcin nāṭyalakṣaṇam

yaḥ śiṣyaḥ prāk kiṃcin nāṭyalakṣaṇam+na -> yaḥ śiṣyaḥ prāk kiṃcin nāṭyalakṣaṇaṃ na

vajranṛtyam+iti| -> vajranṛtyam iti|

pratyālīḍhādipādais+vividhakaraṇais -> pratyālīḍhādipādair vividhakaraṇais

pratyālīḍhādipādair vividhakaraṇais+nṛtyate -> pratyālīḍhādipādair vividhakaraṇair nṛtyate

niśceṣṭatām+nayati| -> niśceṣṭatāṃ nayati|

māravṛndam+dharmaviheṭhakam -> māravṛndaṃ dharmaviheṭhakam

māravṛndaṃ dharmaviheṭhakam+tam -> māravṛndaṃ dharmaviheṭhakaṃ tam

māravṛndaṃ dharmaviheṭhakaṃ tam+bhūmyām -> māravṛndaṃ dharmaviheṭhakaṃ taṃ bhūmyām

māravṛndaṃ dharmaviheṭhakaṃ taṃ bhūmyām+pātayati -> māravṛndaṃ dharmaviheṭhakaṃ taṃ bhūmyāṃ pātayati

yam+tarjayati -> yaṃ tarjayati

śatacūrṇam+karoti -> śatacūrṇaṃ karoti

krodharājas+āviṣṭas -> krodharāja āviṣṭas

krodharāja āviṣṭas+san -> krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san

krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san+praharaṇaśobhitakarais -> krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśobhitakarais

krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśobhitakarais+sthāvaram -> krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśobhitakaraiḥ sthāvaram

krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśobhitakaraiḥ sthāvaram+jaṅgamam -> krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśobhitakaraiḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamam

krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśobhitakaraiḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamam+yam -> krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśobhitakaraiḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ yam

krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśobhitakaraiḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ yam+hanti -> krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśobhitakaraiḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ yaṃ hanti

āviṣṭas+krodharājas -> āviṣṭaḥ krodharājas

āviṣṭaḥ krodharājas+praharaṇasukarais -> āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais

āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais+tarjayan -> āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais tarjayan

āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais tarjayan+māravṛndam -> āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais tarjayan māravṛndam

āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais tarjayan māravṛndam+iti| -> āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais tarjayan māravṛndam iti|

guṇavaśāt+devatā -> guṇavaśād devatā

guṇavaśād devatā+anyā -> guṇavaśād devatānyā

nirlajjas+nirviśaṅkas -> nirlajjo nirviśaṅkas

nirlajjo nirviśaṅkas+bhavati -> nirlajjo nirviśaṅko bhavati

ripos+vajragītam -> ripor vajragītam

ripor vajragītam+karoti -> ripor vajragītaṃ karoti

hāsyam+hūṃkāramiśram -> hāsyaṃ hūṃkāramiśram

hāsyaṃ hūṃkāramiśram+bhayadam -> hāsyaṃ hūṃkāramiśraṃ bhayadam

hāsyaṃ hūṃkāramiśraṃ bhayadam+api -> hāsyaṃ hūṃkāramiśraṃ bhayadam api

pratyālīḍhapādais+bahuvidhakiraṇais -> pratyālīḍhapādair bahuvidhakiraṇais

pratyālīḍhapādair bahuvidhakiraṇais+nṛtyate -> pratyālīḍhapādair bahuvidhakiraṇair nṛtyate

āviṣṭas+krodharājas -> āviṣṭaḥ krodharājas

āviṣṭaḥ krodharājas+praharaṇasukarais -> āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais

āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais+tarjayan -> āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais tarjayan

āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais tarjayan+māravṛndam -> āviṣṭaḥ krodharājaḥ praharaṇasukarais tarjayan māravṛndam

vṛttena+uktam|| -> vṛttenoktam||

tadyathā+aṣṭāśītitamena -> tadyathāṣṭāśītitamena

tatra+idam -> tatredam

tatredam+lakṣaṇam -> tatredaṃ lakṣaṇam

tatredaṃ lakṣaṇam+bhavati| -> tatredaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati|

krodhāveśam+karoti| -> krodhāveśaṃ karoti|

tatas+siddhyati| -> tataḥ siddhyati|

pūrvasevām+kuryāt| -> pūrvasevāṃ kuryāt|

krodhabhartus+krodhāveśanam -> krodhabhartuḥ krodhāveśanam

krodhabhartuḥ krodhāveśanam+iti -> krodhabhartuḥ krodhāveśanam iti

krodhabhartuḥ krodhāveśanam iti+arthas -> krodhabhartuḥ krodhāveśanam ity arthas

krodhabhartuḥ krodhāveśanam ity arthas+| -> krodhabhartuḥ krodhāveśanam ity arthaḥ|

codanam+kṛtvā -> codanaṃ kṛtvā

iti+anena -> ity anena

vajra+āveśaya -> vajrāveśaya

aralapisahitam+iti -> aralapisahitam iti

mantram+hūṃkāram -> mantraṃ hūṃkāram

mantraṃ hūṃkāram+ekam| -> mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekam|

dhūpam+devatāveśanārtham| -> dhūpaṃ devatāveśanārtham|

tat+eva -> tad eva

pūrvam+dhūpam -> pūrvaṃ dhūpam

pūrvaṃ dhūpam+sādhayitvā -> pūrvaṃ dhūpaṃ sādhayitvā

jinavarasamayais+pañcāmṛtapañcapradīpais -> jinavarasamayaiḥ pañcāmṛtapañcapradīpais

jinavarasamayaiḥ pañcāmṛtapañcapradīpais+| -> jinavarasamayaiḥ pañcāmṛtapañcapradīpaiḥ|

jihvāyām+pañcāmṛtam -> jihvāyāṃ pañcāmṛtam

jihvāyāṃ pañcāmṛtam+dadyāt| -> jihvāyāṃ pañcāmṛtaṃ dadyāt|

śiṣyam+tatas -> śiṣyaṃ tatas

śiṣyaṃ tatas+tasya -> śiṣyaṃ tatas tasya

pūrvabhūmyām+ānayitvā -> pūrvabhūmyām ānayitvā

kāṇḍapaṭam+dattvā -> kāṇḍapaṭaṃ dattvā

śuddhim+kṛtvā -> śuddhiṃ kṛtvā

culukatrayam+udakasya -> culukatrayam udakasya

tatas+mukhe -> tato mukhe

pūrvoktam+śāntyādikam -> pūrvoktaṃ śāntyādikam

pūrvoktaṃ śāntyādikam+aṣṭadikṣu| -> pūrvoktaṃ śāntyādikam aṣṭadikṣu|

tatkarmaprasaram+tasya -> tatkarmaprasaraṃ tasya

tatas+ullālayitvā -> tata ullālayitvā

ebhis+saptābhimantritam -> ebhiḥ saptābhimantritam

ebhiḥ saptābhimantritam+kṛtvā -> ebhiḥ saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā

jinavarakuliśais+iti -> jinavarakuliśair iti

siddhyartham+dantakāṣṭham -> siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭham

siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭham+pūrvoktavidhinā -> siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā

prārthitas+gurus -> prārthito gurus

prārthito gurus+hṛṣṭatuṣṭas -> prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭas

prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭas+san -> prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ san

prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ san+śiṣyam -> prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyam

prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyam+snātam -> prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyaṃ snātam

prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyaṃ snātam+gandhānuliptam -> prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyaṃ snātaṃ gandhānuliptam

prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyaṃ snātaṃ gandhānuliptam+vrataniyamayutam -> prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyaṃ snātaṃ gandhānuliptaṃ vrataniyamayutam

prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyaṃ snātaṃ gandhānuliptaṃ vrataniyamayutam+pūrvabhūmyām -> prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyaṃ snātaṃ gandhānuliptaṃ vrataniyamayutaṃ pūrvabhūmyām

prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyaṃ snātaṃ gandhānuliptaṃ vrataniyamayutaṃ pūrvabhūmyām+maṇḍalabāhye -> prārthito gurur hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ sañ chiṣyaṃ snātaṃ gandhānuliptaṃ vrataniyamayutaṃ pūrvabhūmyāṃ maṇḍalabāhye

sati+abhiṣekāya -> saty abhiṣekāya

mantram+hūṃkāram -> mantraṃ hūṃkāram

mantraṃ hūṃkāram+ekam -> mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekam

mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekam+tu -> mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekaṃ tu

mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekaṃ tu+aralapisahitam -> mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekaṃ tv aralapisahitam

mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekaṃ tv aralapisahitam+codanam -> mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekaṃ tv aralapisahitaṃ codanam

mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekaṃ tv aralapisahitaṃ codanam+krodhabhartus -> mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekaṃ tv aralapisahitaṃ codanaṃ krodhabhartus

mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekaṃ tv aralapisahitaṃ codanaṃ krodhabhartus+|| -> mantraṃ hūṃkāram ekaṃ tv aralapisahitaṃ codanaṃ krodhabhartuḥ||

jinavarasamayais+dhūpam -> jinavarasamayair dhūpam

jinavarasamayair dhūpam+āveśanārtham -> jinavarasamayair dhūpam āveśanārtham

jihvāyām+ca -> jihvāyāṃ ca

jihvāyāṃ ca+amṛtam -> jihvāyāṃ cāmṛtam

jihvāyāṃ cāmṛtam+vai -> jihvāyāṃ cāmṛtaṃ vai

siddhyartham+dantakāṣṭham -> siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭham

siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭham+jinavarakuliśais -> siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ jinavarakuliśais

siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ jinavarakuliśais+ca -> siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ jinavarakuliśaiś ca

siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ jinavarakuliśaiś ca+abhimantrya -> siddhyarthaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ jinavarakuliśaiś cābhimantrya

snātas+gandhānuliptas -> snāto gandhānuliptas

snāto gandhānuliptas+vrataniyamayutas -> snāto gandhānulipto vrataniyamayutas

snāto gandhānulipto vrataniyamayutas+pūrvabhūmyām -> snāto gandhānulipto vrataniyamayutaḥ pūrvabhūmyām

snāto gandhānulipto vrataniyamayutaḥ pūrvabhūmyām+niveśya -> snāto gandhānulipto vrataniyamayutaḥ pūrvabhūmyāṃ niveśya

praṇidhānam+karomi|| -> praṇidhānaṃ karomi||

śūnyatākaruṇātmikām+mahāmudrāsiddhim -> śūnyatākaruṇātmikāṃ mahāmudrāsiddhim

śūnyatākaruṇātmikāṃ mahāmudrāsiddhim+iti -> śūnyatākaruṇātmikāṃ mahāmudrāsiddhim iti

sthitas+san -> sthitaḥ san

sthitaḥ san+bodhim -> sthitaḥ san bodhim

sthitaḥ san bodhim+utpādayāmi -> sthitaḥ san bodhim utpādayāmi

sattvānām+mokṣahetos -> sattvānāṃ mokṣahetos

sattvānāṃ mokṣahetos+jinajanakakule -> sattvānāṃ mokṣahetor jinajanakakule

sattvānāṃ mokṣahetor jinajanakakule+ekaśūkavajre -> sattvānāṃ mokṣahetor jinajanakakula ekaśūkavajre

praṇidhānam+karomi| -> praṇidhānaṃ karomi|

śīlasambhārāya+iti -> śīlasambhārāyeti

saṃvaram+brahmacaryam -> saṃvaraṃ brahmacaryam

saṃvaraṃ brahmacaryam+pālayāmi -> saṃvaraṃ brahmacaryaṃ pālayāmi

sphuṭam+padmasamparke -> sphuṭaṃ padmasamparke

sthitas+varṇāvarṇābhigamane -> sthito varṇāvarṇābhigamane

pūjām+sarvopakaraṇais -> pūjāṃ sarvopakaraṇais

pūjāṃ sarvopakaraṇais+karomi -> pūjāṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ karomi

pūjāṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ karomi+iti -> pūjāṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ karomīti

sthitas+san -> sthitaḥ san

sthitaḥ san+gurubuddhabodhisattvānām -> sthitaḥ san gurubuddhabodhisattvānām

sthitaḥ san gurubuddhabodhisattvānām+anyeṣām -> sthitaḥ san gurubuddhabodhisattvānām anyeṣām

sthitaḥ san gurubuddhabodhisattvānām anyeṣām+api -> sthitaḥ san gurubuddhabodhisattvānām anyeṣām api

pūjām+khaḍge -> pūjāṃ khaḍge

sthitas+pañcāmṛtādyam -> sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyam

sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyam+gokudahanam -> sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyaṃ gokudahanam

sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyaṃ gokudahanam+skandhendriyasamūham -> sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyaṃ gokudahanaṃ skandhendriyasamūham

sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyaṃ gokudahanaṃ skandhendriyasamūham+rakṣāmi -> sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyaṃ gokudahanaṃ skandhendriyasamūhaṃ rakṣāmi

sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyaṃ gokudahanaṃ skandhendriyasamūhaṃ rakṣāmi+iti -> sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyaṃ gokudahanaṃ skandhendriyasamūhaṃ rakṣāmīti

jinavarasamayam+pālayāmi -> jinavarasamayaṃ pālayāmi

jinavarasamayaṃ pālayāmi+atra -> jinavarasamayaṃ pālayāmy atra

dānam+dāsyāmi -> dānaṃ dāsyāmi

dānaṃ dāsyāmi+iti -> dānaṃ dāsyāmīti

cintāmaṇim+sādhayitvā -> cintāmaṇiṃ sādhayitvā

dānam+daśavidham -> dānaṃ daśavidham

dānaṃ daśavidham+matam|| -> dānaṃ daśavidhaṃ matam||

daśavidham+dānam -> daśavidhaṃ dānam

daśavidhaṃ dānam+dāsyāmi--- -> daśavidhaṃ dānaṃ dāsyāmi---

sthitas+| -> sthitaḥ|

dānam+dāsyāmi -> dānaṃ dāsyāmi

sthitas+imam -> sthita imam

sthita imam+samayam -> sthita imaṃ samayam

sthita imaṃ samayam+gṛhṇāmi| -> sthita imaṃ samayaṃ gṛhṇāmi|

dhārayāmi+iṣṭavajre -> dhārayāmīṣṭavajre

mudrām+gurum -> mudrāṃ gurum

mudrāṃ gurum+api -> mudrāṃ gurum api

vajram+ghaṇṭām -> vajraṃ ghaṇṭām

vajraṃ ghaṇṭām+ca -> vajraṃ ghaṇṭāṃ ca

bodhim+utpādayāmi|| -> bodhim utpādayāmi||

sattvānām+mokṣahetos -> sattvānāṃ mokṣahetos

sattvānāṃ mokṣahetos+jinajanakakule -> sattvānāṃ mokṣahetor jinajanakakule

saṃvaram+pālayāmi -> saṃvaraṃ pālayāmi

pūjām+khaḍge -> pūjāṃ khaḍge

jinavarasamayam+pālayāmi -> jinavarasamayaṃ pālayāmi

jinavarasamayaṃ pālayāmi+atra -> jinavarasamayaṃ pālayāmy atra

dānam+dāsyāmi -> dānaṃ dāsyāmi

dhārayāmi+iṣṭavajre -> dhārayāmīṣṭavajre

mudrām+gurum -> mudrāṃ gurum

mudrāṃ gurum+api -> mudrāṃ gurum api

vajram+ghaṇṭām -> vajraṃ ghaṇṭām

vajraṃ ghaṇṭām+ca -> vajraṃ ghaṇṭāṃ ca

tatas+praṇidhānam -> tataḥ praṇidhānam

tataḥ praṇidhānam+karoti|| -> tataḥ praṇidhānaṃ karoti||

adhyeṣyas+gurus -> adhyeṣyo gurus

adhyeṣyo gurus+syāt -> adhyeṣyo guruḥ syāt

adhyeṣyo guruḥ syāt+sakanakakusumais -> adhyeṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumais

adhyeṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumais+maṇḍalam -> adhyeṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumair maṇḍalam

adhyeṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumair maṇḍalam+kārayitvā -> adhyeṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumair maṇḍalaṃ kārayitvā

bhavabhayaharayos+kāyavākcittaśuddhyā -> bhavabhayaharayoḥ kāyavākcittaśuddhyā

bhavabhayaharayoḥ kāyavākcittaśuddhyā+iti| -> bhavabhayaharayoḥ kāyavākcittaśuddhyeti|

yuṣmatpādābjayos+vai -> yuṣmatpādābjayor vai

adya+eva -> adyaiva

adyaiva+aham -> adyaivāham

adyaivāham+jinānām -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānām

adyaivāhaṃ jinānām+śaraṇam -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam

adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam+adhigatas -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigatas

adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigatas+bodhisīmnas -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigato bodhisīmnas

adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigato bodhisīmnas+| -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigato bodhisīmnaḥ|

praṇidhānam+ca| -> praṇidhānaṃ ca|

tatas+adhyeṣaṇām -> tato 'dhyeṣaṇām

tato 'dhyeṣaṇām+karoti -> tato 'dhyeṣaṇāṃ karoti

evam+dakṣiṇām -> evaṃ dakṣiṇām

evaṃ dakṣiṇām+dattvā -> evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā

na+asti| -> nāsti|

kanyakām+gotrajām -> kanyakāṃ gotrajām

kanyakāṃ gotrajām+anyām -> kanyakāṃ gotrajām anyām

kanyakāṃ gotrajām anyām+yadi -> kanyakāṃ gotrajām anyāṃ yadi

sasutaduhitaram+dadāti| -> sasutaduhitaraṃ dadāti|

dravyam+ātmānam -> dravyam ātmānam

dravyam ātmānam+triśuddhyā -> dravyam ātmānaṃ triśuddhyā

iti+adheṣyas -> ity adheṣyas

ity adheṣyas+gurus -> ity adheṣyo gurus

ity adheṣyo gurus+syāt -> ity adheṣyo guruḥ syāt

ity adheṣyo guruḥ syāt+sakanakakusumais -> ity adheṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumais

ity adheṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumais+maṇḍalam -> ity adheṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumair maṇḍalam

ity adheṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumair maṇḍalam+kārayitvā|| -> ity adheṣyo guruḥ syāt sakanakakusumair maṇḍalaṃ kārayitvā||

bhavabhayaharayos+kāyavākcittaśuddhyā -> bhavabhayaharayoḥ kāyavākcittaśuddhyā

yuṣmatpādābjayos+vai -> yuṣmatpādābjayor vai

adya+eva -> adyaiva

adyaiva+aham -> adyaivāham

adyaivāham+jinānām -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānām

adyaivāhaṃ jinānām+śaraṇam -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam

adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam+adhigatas -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigatas

adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigatas+raudrasaṃsārabhītas -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigato raudrasaṃsārabhītas

adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigato raudrasaṃsārabhītas+| -> adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇam adhigato raudrasaṃsārabhītaḥ|

sasutaduhitaram+kanyakām -> sasutaduhitaraṃ kanyakām

sasutaduhitaraṃ kanyakām+gotrajānyām -> sasutaduhitaraṃ kanyakāṃ gotrajānyām

dravyātmānam+triśuddhyā -> dravyātmānaṃ triśuddhyā

varasutas+dakṣiṇām -> varasuto dakṣiṇām

varasuto dakṣiṇām+śuddhihetos -> varasuto dakṣiṇāṃ śuddhihetos

varasuto dakṣiṇāṃ śuddhihetos+|| -> varasuto dakṣiṇāṃ śuddhihetoḥ||

maṇḍalam+kṛtvā -> maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā

tatas+ācāryasya -> tata ācāryasya

tata ācāryasya+aṅghrimūle -> tata ācāryasyāṅghrimūle

yathoktam+pūjām -> yathoktaṃ pūjām

yathoktaṃ pūjām+kṛtvā -> yathoktaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā

evam+śiṣyas -> evaṃ śiṣyas

evaṃ śiṣyas+ātmaśaktyā -> evaṃ śiṣya ātmaśaktyā

daśavidhām+iti -> daśavidhām iti

tatas+ratnais -> tato ratnais

tato ratnais+indranīlādibhis -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhis

tato ratnair indranīlādibhis+hemapuṣpais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpais+bahuvividhapaṭais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭais+pañcavarṇais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇais+vastrais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrais+gandhadhūpapradīpais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpais+ghaṇṭādarśais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśais+vitānais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānais+vividhaphalais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalais+pañcavarṇapatākābhis -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhis

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhis+nṛtyais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyais+vādyais -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyair vādyais

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyair vādyais+pūjām -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyair vādyaiḥ pūjām

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyair vādyaiḥ pūjām+vicitrām -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyair vādyaiḥ pūjāṃ vicitrām

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyair vādyaiḥ pūjāṃ vicitrām+kṛtvā -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyair vādyaiḥ pūjāṃ vicitrāṃ kṛtvā

tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyair vādyaiḥ pūjāṃ vicitrāṃ kṛtvā+api -> tato ratnair indranīlādibhir hemapuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭaiḥ pañcavarṇair vastrair gandhadhūpapradīpair ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhir nṛtyair vādyaiḥ pūjāṃ vicitrāṃ kṛtvāpi

pūrvamantrapadais+tatas -> pūrvamantrapadais tatas

pūrvamantrapadais tatas+arcanārtham -> pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārtham

pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārtham+prathamam -> pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamam

pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamam+gandham -> pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamaṃ gandham

pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamaṃ gandham+candanādikam -> pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ candanādikam

pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ candanādikam+gṛhītvā -> pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ candanādikaṃ gṛhītvā

pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ candanādikaṃ gṛhītvā+aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyām -> pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ candanādikaṃ gṛhītvāṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyām

pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ candanādikaṃ gṛhītvāṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyām+bāhye% -> pūrvamantrapadais tato 'rcanārthaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ candanādikaṃ gṛhītvāṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ bāhye%

saha+ekīkṛtya -> sahaikīkṛtya

sahaikīkṛtya+arghādikam -> sahaikīkṛtyārghādikam

sahaikīkṛtyārghādikam+dattvā -> sahaikīkṛtyārghādikaṃ dattvā

tatas+jñānacakram -> tato jñānacakram

tato jñānacakram+samayacakreṇa -> tato jñānacakraṃ samayacakreṇa

devatālambanam+kṛtvā -> devatālambanaṃ kṛtvā

ratnais+ityādi| -> ratnair ityādi|

varasutas+dakṣiṇām -> varasuto dakṣiṇām

varasuto dakṣiṇām+śuddhihetos -> varasuto dakṣiṇāṃ śuddhihetos

varasuto dakṣiṇāṃ śuddhihetos+|| -> varasuto dakṣiṇāṃ śuddhihetoḥ||

ācāryasya+aṅghrimūle -> ācāryasyāṅghrimūle

pūjām+vicitrām -> pūjāṃ vicitrām

pūjāṃ vicitrām+aparadaśavidhām -> pūjāṃ vicitrām aparadaśavidhām

pūjāṃ vicitrām aparadaśavidhām+ca -> pūjāṃ vicitrām aparadaśavidhāṃ ca

pūjāṃ vicitrām aparadaśavidhāṃ ca+ātmaśaktyā -> pūjāṃ vicitrām aparadaśavidhāṃ cātmaśaktyā

ghaṇṭādarśais+vitānais -> ghaṇṭādarśair vitānais

ghaṇṭādarśair vitānais+vividhaphalapatākādibhis -> ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalapatākādibhis

ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalapatākādibhis+nṛtyavādais -> ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalapatākādibhir nṛtyavādais

ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalapatākādibhir nṛtyavādais+| -> ghaṇṭādarśair vitānair vividhaphalapatākādibhir nṛtyavādaiḥ|

ratnais+hemendupuṣpais -> ratnair hemendupuṣpais

ratnair hemendupuṣpais+bahuvividhapaṭais -> ratnair hemendupuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭais

ratnair hemendupuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭais+gandhadhūpapradīpais -> ratnair hemendupuṣpair bahuvividhapaṭair gandhadhūpapradīpais

idānīm+devatārcanam -> idānīṃ devatārcanam

idānīṃ devatārcanam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ devatārcanam ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

evam+sarvatantrāntareṣu -> evaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣu

pṛthivyādiprakṛtis+tadguṇavaśāt -> pṛthivyādiprakṛtis tadguṇavaśāt

pṛthivyādiprakṛtis tadguṇavaśāt+iti -> pṛthivyādiprakṛtis tadguṇavaśād iti

karmabhedais+anekais -> karmabhedair anekais

karmabhedair anekais+jñātavyas -> karmabhedair anekair jñātavyas

karmabhedair anekair jñātavyas+maṇḍale -> karmabhedair anekair jñātavyo maṇḍale

karmabhedair anekair jñātavyo maṇḍale+asmin -> karmabhedair anekair jñātavyo maṇḍale 'smin

karmabhedair anekair jñātavyo maṇḍale 'smin+kālacakre -> karmabhedair anekair jñātavyo maṇḍale 'smin kālacakre

bahuvidhas+anekapadikas -> bahuvidho 'nekapadikas

bahuvidho 'nekapadikas+bhavati| -> bahuvidho 'nekapadiko bhavati|

devatādevatīnām+sa -> devatādevatīnāṃ sa

mālāmantras+tathā -> mālāmantras tathā

mālāmantras tathā+anyas -> mālāmantras tathānyas

mālāmantras tathānyas+bhavati -> mālāmantras tathānyo bhavati

jāpas+iti| -> jāpa iti|

yuktam+jāpārtham| -> yuktaṃ jāpārtham|

oṃkāreṇa+ādibhūtena -> oṃkāreṇādibhūtena

hrāṃkārādyam+ṣaḍaṅgam -> hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam

hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam+upahṛdayam -> hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam upahṛdayam

hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam upahṛdayam+bhagavatas -> hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam upahṛdayaṃ bhagavatas

hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam upahṛdayaṃ bhagavatas+| -> hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam upahṛdayaṃ bhagavataḥ|

caturvaktrasahitas+| -> caturvaktrasahitaḥ|

pūrvoktas+oṃ -> pūrvokta oṃ

kūṭamantras+jinasya -> kūṭamantro jinasya

hṛdayam+api -> hṛdayam api

hūṃkāras+jñānabījam -> hūṃkāro jñānabījam

hūṃkāro jñānabījam+prajñopāyapṛthagutpādāya -> hūṃkāro jñānabījaṃ prajñopāyapṛthagutpādāya

bhagavatas+pṛthagutpādāya -> bhagavataḥ pṛthagutpādāya

tasya+eva -> tasyaiva

jñātavyas+maṇḍale -> jñātavyo maṇḍale

jñātavyo maṇḍale+asmin -> jñātavyo maṇḍale 'smin

jñātavyo maṇḍale 'smin+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> jñātavyo maṇḍale 'smin prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

jñātavyo maṇḍale 'smin prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+devatādevatīnām|| -> jñātavyo maṇḍale 'smin prakṛtiguṇavaśād devatādevatīnām||

bahuvidhas+karmabhedais -> bahuvidhaḥ karmabhedais

bahuvidhaḥ karmabhedais+anekais -> bahuvidhaḥ karmabhedair anekais

mālāmantras+tathā -> mālāmantras tathā

mālāmantras tathā+anyas -> mālāmantras tathānyas

mālāmantras tathānyas+bhavati -> mālāmantras tathānyo bhavati

hrāṃkārādyam+ṣaḍaṅgam -> hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam

hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam+hi -> hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ hi

hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ hi+upahṛdayam -> hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ hy upahṛdayam

hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ hy upahṛdayam+idam -> hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ hy upahṛdayam idam

hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ hy upahṛdayam idam+kāyavajrādiyuktam| -> hrāṃkārādyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ hy upahṛdayam idaṃ kāyavajrādiyuktam|

mahākūṭamantras+savaktras -> mahākūṭamantraḥ savaktras

hūṃkāras+jñānabījam -> hūṃkāro jñānabījam

hūṃkāro jñānabījam+hṛdayam -> hūṃkāro jñānabījaṃ hṛdayam

hūṃkāro jñānabījaṃ hṛdayam+api -> hūṃkāro jñānabījaṃ hṛdayam api

phreṃkāras+viśvamātus -> phreṃkāro viśvamātus

phreṃkāro viśvamātus+bījam -> phreṃkāro viśvamātur bījam

phreṃkāro viśvamātur bījam+mantras -> phreṃkāro viśvamātur bījaṃ mantras

phreṃkāro viśvamātur bījaṃ mantras+jinasya -> phreṃkāro viśvamātur bījaṃ mantro jinasya

ṣaḍaṅgas+| -> ṣaḍaṅgaḥ|

pṛthivyaptejovāyuśūnyajñānasvarasahitas+hraṃkāramantras -> pṛthivyaptejovāyuśūnyajñānasvarasahito hraṃkāramantras

pṛthivyaptejovāyuśūnyajñānasvarasahito hraṃkāramantras+eva -> pṛthivyaptejovāyuśūnyajñānasvarasahito hraṃkāramantra eva

kavacam+netram -> kavacaṃ netram

kavacaṃ netram+astram -> kavacaṃ netram astram

kavacaṃ netram astram+iti -> kavacaṃ netram astram iti

namas+| -> namaḥ|

rasapadais+ṣaḍbhis -> rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhis

rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhis+sārdham -> rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārdham

rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārdham+ṣaḍaṅgam -> rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam

rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍaṅgam+namas -> rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ namas

rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ namas+ādyais -> rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ nama ādyais

rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ nama ādyais+iti| -> rasapadaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ nama ādyair iti|

hraṃkāraṣaṭkam+bhavati| -> hraṃkāraṣaṭkaṃ bhavati|

sādyam+iti -> sādyam iti

sādyam iti+ādyais -> sādyam ity ādyais

sādyam ity ādyais+ṣaṭsvarais -> sādyam ity ādyaiḥ ṣaṭsvarais

sādyam ity ādyaiḥ ṣaṭsvarais+sārdham| -> sādyam ity ādyaiḥ ṣaṭsvaraiḥ sārdham|

jaḥkāreṇāṅkuśaṃ kuryāt+praveśe -> jaḥkāreṇāṅkuśaṃ kuryāt praveśe

aṅkuśādyās+iti| -> aṅkuśādyā iti|

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

sas+eva -> sa eva

sa eva+iti -> sa eveti

namontas+bhavati -> namonto bhavati

sarvakarmaṇi+arcane -> sarvakarmaṇy arcane

svāhāntas+bhavati| -> svāhānto bhavati|

sas+eva -> sa eva

sarveṣām+nāmamantras -> sarveṣāṃ nāmamantras

sarveṣāṃ nāmamantras+hṛdayam -> sarveṣāṃ nāmamantro hṛdayam

sarveṣāṃ nāmamantro hṛdayam+ucyate| -> sarveṣāṃ nāmamantro hṛdayam ucyate|

svāhāntamantras+| -> svāhāntamantraḥ|

praṇavaṃ prathamam+iti -> praṇavaṃ prathamam iti

anuktamantrāṇām+api| -> anuktamantrāṇām api|

oṃkāra iti+arthas -> oṃkāra ity arthas

oṃkāra ity arthas+| -> oṃkāra ity arthaḥ|

pūrvaṃ+praṇavam -> NO RULE FOUND (ṃ+p)

praṇavam+bhavati -> praṇavaṃ bhavati

sarveṣām+maṇḍale -> sarveṣāṃ maṇḍale

sarveṣām+ityādinā| -> sarveṣām ityādinā|

gṛhṇa+arghakam -> gṛhṇārghakam

gṛhṇārghakam+me|| -> gṛhṇārghakaṃ me||

punar idam+gṛhṇa -> punar idaṃ gṛhṇa

toṣe+arghadāne -> toṣe 'rghadāne

jaḥhūṃvaṃhoṅkuśādyās+kramapariracitāvāhane -> jaḥhūṃvaṃhoṅkuśādyāḥ kramapariracitāvāhane

namontas+| -> namontaḥ|

bhavet+devatādevatīnām -> bhaved devatādevatīnām

pūrvaṃ praṇavas+iti -> pūrvaṃ praṇava iti

sarveṣām+nāma -> sarveṣāṃ nāma

idānīṃ mantraniyamam+āha--- -> idānīṃ mantraniyamam āha---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

rajomaṇḍalam+bhagavatas -> rajomaṇḍalaṃ bhagavatas

rajomaṇḍalaṃ bhagavatas+kāyas -> rajomaṇḍalaṃ bhagavataḥ kāyas

rajomaṇḍalaṃ bhagavataḥ kāyas+veditavyas -> rajomaṇḍalaṃ bhagavataḥ kāyo veditavyas

rajomaṇḍalaṃ bhagavataḥ kāyo veditavyas+iti -> rajomaṇḍalaṃ bhagavataḥ kāyo veditavya iti

gandhādikam+maṇḍalabāhye -> gandhādikaṃ maṇḍalabāhye

puṣpakṣepas+vakṣyamāṇas -> puṣpakṣepo vakṣyamāṇas

puṣpakṣepo vakṣyamāṇas+kartavyas -> puṣpakṣepo vakṣyamāṇaḥ kartavyas

puṣpakṣepo vakṣyamāṇaḥ kartavyas+| -> puṣpakṣepo vakṣyamāṇaḥ kartavyaḥ|

tasmāt+vijayakalaśe -> tasmād vijayakalaśe

puṣpam+pātiṣyati| -> puṣpaṃ pātiṣyati|

pratyekadevatānām+api -> pratyekadevatānām api

hastam+ekam -> hastam ekam

tatas+aparamaṇḍalam -> tato 'paramaṇḍalam

tato 'paramaṇḍalam+vijayakalaśāgratas -> tato 'paramaṇḍalaṃ vijayakalaśāgratas

tato 'paramaṇḍalaṃ vijayakalaśāgratas+kṛtvā -> tato 'paramaṇḍalaṃ vijayakalaśāgrataḥ kṛtvā

maṇḍalam+kṛtvā -> maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā

śiṣyāṇām+ca -> śiṣyāṇāṃ ca

śiṣyāṇāṃ ca+iti -> śiṣyāṇāṃ ceti

śiṣyāṇāṃ ceti+adhyeṣya -> śiṣyāṇāṃ cety adhyeṣya

śiṣyāṇāṃ cety adhyeṣya+argham -> śiṣyāṇāṃ cety adhyeṣyārgham

śiṣyāṇāṃ cety adhyeṣyārgham+maṇḍalarajas -> śiṣyāṇāṃ cety adhyeṣyārghaṃ maṇḍalarajas

śiṣyāṇāṃ cety adhyeṣyārghaṃ maṇḍalarajas+bāhye -> śiṣyāṇāṃ cety adhyeṣyārghaṃ maṇḍalarajo bāhye

varadas+bhava -> varado bhava

saparivāras+tvam -> saparivāras tvam

saparivāras tvam+bhagavan -> saparivāras tvaṃ bhagavan

saparivāras tvaṃ bhagavan+me -> saparivāras tvaṃ bhagavan me

argham+pratīccha -> arghaṃ pratīccha

tatas+pratiṣṭhāpayitvā -> tataḥ pratiṣṭhāpayitvā

sekahetos+| -> sekahetoḥ|

samarasam+karoti -> samarasaṃ karoti

samayamaṇḍalam+dhyātvā -> samayamaṇḍalaṃ dhyātvā

praveśayet+vaṃkāreṇa -> praveśayed vaṃkāreṇa

maṇḍalarājāgrīṃ karmarājāgrīṃ binduyogam+sūkṣmayogam -> maṇḍalarājāgrīṃ karmarājāgrīṃ binduyogaṃ sūkṣmayogam

kriyāyogayogānuviddhayoginītantreṣu+anekeṣu -> kriyāyogayogānuviddhayoginītantreṣv anekeṣu

kriyāyogayogānuviddhayoginītantreṣv anekeṣūktāḥ svatantroktā mantrās+tais -> kriyāyogayogānuviddhayoginītantreṣv anekeṣūktāḥ svatantroktā mantrās tais

kriyāyogayogānuviddhayoginītantreṣv anekeṣūktāḥ svatantroktā mantrās tais+svamantrais -> kriyāyogayogānuviddhayoginītantreṣv anekeṣūktāḥ svatantroktā mantrās taiḥ svamantrais

kriyāyogayogānuviddhayoginītantreṣv anekeṣūktāḥ svatantroktā mantrās taiḥ svamantrais+tantroktavidhinā -> kriyāyogayogānuviddhayoginītantreṣv anekeṣūktāḥ svatantroktā mantrās taiḥ svamantrais tantroktavidhinā

marakatādicūrṇais+tathā -> marakatādicūrṇais tathā

vajrais+tathā -> vajrais tathā

vajrais tathā+akhaṇḍaśasyais -> vajrais tathākhaṇḍaśasyais

vajrais tathākhaṇḍaśasyais+| -> vajrais tathākhaṇḍaśasyaiḥ|

mudgādyais+taṇḍulais -> mudgādyais taṇḍulais

mudgādyais taṇḍulais+vā -> mudgādyais taṇḍulair vā

mudgādyais taṇḍulair vā+akhaṇḍakais -> mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakais

mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakais+bahuvidhamaṇibhis -> mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhis

mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhis+cūrṇaraṅgais -> mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhiś cūrṇaraṅgais

mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhiś cūrṇaraṅgais+piṣṭaraṅgais -> mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhiś cūrṇaraṅgaiḥ piṣṭaraṅgais

mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhiś cūrṇaraṅgaiḥ piṣṭaraṅgais+sādhāraṇais -> mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhiś cūrṇaraṅgaiḥ piṣṭaraṅgaiḥ sādhāraṇais

mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhiś cūrṇaraṅgaiḥ piṣṭaraṅgaiḥ sādhāraṇais+sarvasattvānām -> mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhiś cūrṇaraṅgaiḥ piṣṭaraṅgaiḥ sādhāraṇaiḥ sarvasattvānām

mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhiś cūrṇaraṅgaiḥ piṣṭaraṅgaiḥ sādhāraṇaiḥ sarvasattvānām+iti| -> mudgādyais taṇḍulair vākhaṇḍakair bahuvidhamaṇibhiś cūrṇaraṅgaiḥ piṣṭaraṅgaiḥ sādhāraṇaiḥ sarvasattvānām iti|

pañcabhedais+iti -> pañcabhedair iti

śasyais+vā -> śasyair vā

muktācūrṇam+śuklam -> muktācūrṇaṃ śuklam

muktācūrṇaṃ śuklam+pravālacūrṇam -> muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇam

muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇam+raktam -> muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktam

muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktam+rājāvartacūrṇam -> muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktaṃ rājāvartacūrṇam

muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktaṃ rājāvartacūrṇam+kṛṣṇam -> muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktaṃ rājāvartacūrṇaṃ kṛṣṇam

muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktaṃ rājāvartacūrṇaṃ kṛṣṇam+haritam -> muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktaṃ rājāvartacūrṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ haritam

muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktaṃ rājāvartacūrṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ haritam+caturaṅgamiśram -> muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktaṃ rājāvartacūrṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ haritaṃ caturaṅgamiśram

muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktaṃ rājāvartacūrṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ haritaṃ caturaṅgamiśram+iti| -> muktācūrṇaṃ śuklaṃ pravālacūrṇaṃ raktaṃ rājāvartacūrṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ haritaṃ caturaṅgamiśram iti|

sāmānyacakravartinas+kanakacūrṇam -> sāmānyacakravartinaḥ kanakacūrṇam

sāmānyacakravartinaḥ kanakacūrṇam+pītam| -> sāmānyacakravartinaḥ kanakacūrṇaṃ pītam|

marakatais+haritacūrṇam -> marakatair haritacūrṇam

marakatair haritacūrṇam+indranīlais -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlais

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlais+kṛṣṇam -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇam

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇam+padmarāgais -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgais

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgais+raktam -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktam

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktam+candrakāntais -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntais

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntais+śvetam -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetam

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetam+karketakais -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetaṃ karketakais

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetaṃ karketakais+pītam -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetaṃ karketakaiḥ pītam

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetaṃ karketakaiḥ pītam+mahānīlais -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetaṃ karketakaiḥ pītaṃ mahānīlais

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetaṃ karketakaiḥ pītaṃ mahānīlais+nīlam -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetaṃ karketakaiḥ pītaṃ mahānīlair nīlam

marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetaṃ karketakaiḥ pītaṃ mahānīlair nīlam+iti| -> marakatair haritacūrṇam indranīlaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ padmarāgaī raktaṃ candrakāntaiḥ śvetaṃ karketakaiḥ pītaṃ mahānīlair nīlam iti|

vajrādyais+pañcaratnais -> vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnais

vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnais+cūrṇam -> vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnaiś cūrṇam

vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnaiś cūrṇam+kārayet| -> vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnaiś cūrṇaṃ kārayet|

pañcaraṅgās+karaṇīyās -> pañcaraṅgāḥ karaṇīyās

pañcaraṅgāḥ karaṇīyās+| -> pañcaraṅgāḥ karaṇīyāḥ|

gandhapuṣpādibhis+paścāt -> gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ paścāt

gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ paścāt+raṅgapātam -> gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ paścād raṅgapātam

gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ paścād raṅgapātam+ārabhet| -> gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ paścād raṅgapātam ārabhet|

tatas+balim -> tato balim

tato balim+dattvā -> tato baliṃ dattvā

vajrādyais+ityādinā| -> vajrādyair ityādinā|

vahnivāyvos+krameṇa|| -> vahnivāyvoḥ krameṇa||

pītais+śvetāruṇādyais -> pītaiḥ śvetāruṇādyais

pītaiḥ śvetāruṇādyais+kṣitijalavalaye -> pītaiḥ śvetāruṇādyaiḥ kṣitijalavalaye

rajaḥpātanam+buddhabhedais -> rajaḥpātanaṃ buddhabhedais

pañcabhedais+bahuvidhamaṇibhis -> pañcabhedair bahuvidhamaṇibhis

pañcabhedair bahuvidhamaṇibhis+piṣṭaraṅgais -> pañcabhedair bahuvidhamaṇibhiḥ piṣṭaraṅgais

pañcabhedair bahuvidhamaṇibhiḥ piṣṭaraṅgais+tathā -> pañcabhedair bahuvidhamaṇibhiḥ piṣṭaraṅgais tathā

pañcabhedair bahuvidhamaṇibhiḥ piṣṭaraṅgais tathā+eva| -> pañcabhedair bahuvidhamaṇibhiḥ piṣṭaraṅgais tathaiva|

śasyais+vā -> śasyair vā

vajrādyais+pañcaratnais -> vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnais

vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnais+kanakamarakatais -> vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnaiḥ kanakamarakatais

vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnaiḥ kanakamarakatais+vidrumais -> vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnaiḥ kanakamarakatair vidrumais

vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnaiḥ kanakamarakatair vidrumais+mauktikādyais -> vajrādyaiḥ pañcaratnaiḥ kanakamarakatair vidrumair mauktikādyais

idānīm+rajaḥpātavidhim -> idānīṃ rajaḥpātavidhim

idānīṃ rajaḥpātavidhim+āha--- -> idānīṃ rajaḥpātavidhim āha---

maṇḍalasūtrapātaniyamas+|| -> maṇḍalasūtrapātaniyamaḥ||

pūrvāparam+toraṇakalaśam -> pūrvāparaṃ toraṇakalaśam

pūrvāparaṃ toraṇakalaśam+varjayitvā -> pūrvāparaṃ toraṇakalaśaṃ varjayitvā

pūrvāparaṃ toraṇakalaśaṃ varjayitvā+ākāśapātālaratham -> pūrvāparaṃ toraṇakalaśaṃ varjayitvākāśapātālaratham

pūrvāparaṃ toraṇakalaśaṃ varjayitvākāśapātālaratham+darśayet -> pūrvāparaṃ toraṇakalaśaṃ varjayitvākāśapātālarathaṃ darśayet

pūrvāparaṃ toraṇakalaśaṃ varjayitvākāśapātālarathaṃ darśayet+kāyamaṇḍale| -> pūrvāparaṃ toraṇakalaśaṃ varjayitvākāśapātālarathaṃ darśayet kāyamaṇḍale|

syandanam+kuryāt -> syandanaṃ kuryāt

syandanaṃ kuryāt+indrādidevatāpaṭṭikātulyam| -> syandanaṃ kuryād indrādidevatāpaṭṭikātulyam|

dvārasya+ardhe -> dvārasyārdhe

toraṇam+dvādaśāṅgulam -> toraṇaṃ dvādaśāṅgulam

toraṇaṃ dvādaśāṅgulam+varjayitvā -> toraṇaṃ dvādaśāṅgulaṃ varjayitvā

tatra+eva -> tatraiva

dvādaśabhis+| -> dvādaśabhiḥ|

syandanam+dvāramadhye -> syandanaṃ dvāramadhye

bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādhas+vedikāyām -> bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām

bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām+āsanam -> bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām āsanam

bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām āsanam+phaṇinām -> bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām āsanaṃ phaṇinām

bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām āsanaṃ phaṇinām+vāyvādimaṇḍalam -> bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām āsanaṃ phaṇināṃ vāyvādimaṇḍalam

bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām āsanaṃ phaṇināṃ vāyvādimaṇḍalam+dvādaśabhis -> bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām āsanaṃ phaṇināṃ vāyvādimaṇḍalaṃ dvādaśabhis

bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām āsanaṃ phaṇināṃ vāyvādimaṇḍalaṃ dvādaśabhis+| -> bāhyamaṇḍalastambhādho vedikāyām āsanaṃ phaṇināṃ vāyvādimaṇḍalaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ|

pratyekam+aṣṭāram -> pratyekam aṣṭāram

pratyekam aṣṭāram+dvādaśabhis -> pratyekam aṣṭāraṃ dvādaśabhis

pratyekam aṣṭāraṃ dvādaśabhis+iti| -> pratyekam aṣṭāraṃ dvādaśabhir iti|

yat+dvārāntacakram -> yad dvārāntacakram

yad dvārāntacakram+tat -> yad dvārāntacakraṃ tat

yad dvārāntacakraṃ tat+vāyvagnivalayamadhye -> yad dvārāntacakraṃ tad vāyvagnivalayamadhye

caturviṃśadbhis+vajrārcis -> caturviṃśadbhir vajrārcis

caturviṃśadbhir vajrārcis+iti| -> caturviṃśadbhir vajrārcir iti|

vajrāvalīm+kuryāt -> vajrāvalīṃ kuryāt

vajrāvalīṃ kuryāt+dvādaśabhis -> vajrāvalīṃ kuryād dvādaśabhis

vajrāvalīṃ kuryād dvādaśabhis+| -> vajrāvalīṃ kuryād dvādaśabhiḥ|

teṣām+ante -> teṣām ante

arkakoṣṭhais+dvādaśabhis -> arkakoṣṭhair dvādaśabhis

arkakoṣṭhair dvādaśabhis+iti -> arkakoṣṭhair dvādaśabhir iti

raviśaśyudayavalayam+kuryāt| -> raviśaśyudayavalayaṃ kuryāt|

teṣām+trivalayānām -> teṣāṃ trivalayānām

teṣāṃ trivalayānām+ādibhāge -> teṣāṃ trivalayānām ādibhāge

pūrvabhāge+apare -> pūrvabhāge 'pare

sūryais+ca -> sūryaiś ca

phaṇinām+syandanam -> phaṇināṃ syandanam

phaṇināṃ syandanam+devatīnām -> phaṇināṃ syandanaṃ devatīnām

stambhādhas+maṇḍalam -> stambhādho maṇḍalam

stambhādho maṇḍalam+ca -> stambhādho maṇḍalaṃ ca

kuryāt+koṣṭhais -> kuryāt koṣṭhais

kuryāt koṣṭhais+tadardhais -> kuryāt koṣṭhais tadardhais

kuryāt koṣṭhais tadardhais+yat -> kuryāt koṣṭhais tadardhair yat

kuryāt koṣṭhais tadardhair yat+anilavalaye -> kuryāt koṣṭhais tadardhair yad anilavalaye

raviśaśivalayam+bāhyavajrāvalīm -> raviśaśivalayaṃ bāhyavajrāvalīm

raviśaśivalayaṃ bāhyavajrāvalīm+ca -> raviśaśivalayaṃ bāhyavajrāvalīṃ ca

teṣām+ādyantabhāge -> teṣām ādyantabhāge

caturviṃśadbhis+prakuryāt|| -> caturviṃśadbhiḥ prakuryāt||

evam+prākārādyam -> evaṃ prākārādyam

evaṃ prākārādyam+toraṇādyam -> evaṃ prākārādyaṃ toraṇādyam

evaṃ prākārādyaṃ toraṇādyam+trivalayaracanodakatejovāyuvalayaracanām -> evaṃ prākārādyaṃ toraṇādyaṃ trivalayaracanodakatejovāyuvalayaracanām

evaṃ prākārādyaṃ toraṇādyaṃ trivalayaracanodakatejovāyuvalayaracanām+tryaṣṭakais -> evaṃ prākārādyaṃ toraṇādyaṃ trivalayaracanodakatejovāyuvalayaracanāṃ tryaṣṭakais

evaṃ prākārādyaṃ toraṇādyaṃ trivalayaracanodakatejovāyuvalayaracanāṃ tryaṣṭakais+iti -> evaṃ prākārādyaṃ toraṇādyaṃ trivalayaracanodakatejovāyuvalayaracanāṃ tryaṣṭakair iti

tasmāt+madhyamaṇḍaladvāram -> tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāram

tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāram+rajoguṇavaśāt -> tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśāt

tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśāt+dviguṇam -> tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇam

tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇam+tasmāt -> tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇaṃ tasmāt

tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇaṃ tasmāt+sattvaguṇavaśāt -> tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇaṃ tasmāt sattvaguṇavaśāt

tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇaṃ tasmāt sattvaguṇavaśāt+kāyamaṇḍaladvāram -> tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇaṃ tasmāt sattvaguṇavaśāt kāyamaṇḍaladvāram

tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇaṃ tasmāt sattvaguṇavaśāt kāyamaṇḍaladvāram+caturguṇam -> tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇaṃ tasmāt sattvaguṇavaśāt kāyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ caturguṇam

tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇaṃ tasmāt sattvaguṇavaśāt kāyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ caturguṇam+iti| -> tasmān madhyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ rajoguṇavaśād dviguṇaṃ tasmāt sattvaguṇavaśāt kāyamaṇḍaladvāraṃ caturguṇam iti|

evam+garbhadvāram -> evaṃ garbhadvāram

evaṃ garbhadvāram+tamoguṇavaśāt| -> evaṃ garbhadvāraṃ tamoguṇavaśāt|

kuryāt+iti| -> kuryād iti|

evam+aṣṭaviṃśaddalāni -> evam aṣṭaviṃśaddalāni

tṛtīyasavyāvasavyena+aṣṭadalāni| -> tṛtīyasavyāvasavyenāṣṭadalāni|

saptavibhāgam+kṛtvā -> saptavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā

sūryakoṣṭhais+dvādaśārdhāṅgulabhāgais -> sūryakoṣṭhair dvādaśārdhāṅgulabhāgais

sūryakoṣṭhair dvādaśārdhāṅgulabhāgais+iti| -> sūryakoṣṭhair dvādaśārdhāṅgulabhāgair iti|

dviguṇam+anudalam -> dviguṇam anudalam

dviguṇam anudalam+iti| -> dviguṇam anudalam iti|
