niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

yāvat+iti -> yāvad iti

pañcarekhām+hi -> pañcarekhāṃ hi

catuviṃśadbhis+ardhāṅgulais -> catuviṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulais

catuviṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulais+bhavati -> catuviṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulair bhavati

rasaguṇitayugais+iti -> rasaguṇitayugair iti

tasmāt+vāṅmaṇḍalāntāt -> tasmād vāṅmaṇḍalāntāt

tasmād vāṅmaṇḍalāntāt+śrīraṅgabhūmī -> tasmād vāṅmaṇḍalāntāc chrīraṅgabhūmī

śeṣam+bhāgadvayam -> śeṣaṃ bhāgadvayam

śeṣaṃ bhāgadvayam+tiṣṭhati| -> śeṣaṃ bhāgadvayaṃ tiṣṭhati|

caturbhāgās+dvādaśārdhāṅgulātmakās -> caturbhāgā dvādaśārdhāṅgulātmakās

caturbhāgā dvādaśārdhāṅgulātmakās+teṣu -> caturbhāgā dvādaśārdhāṅgulātmakās teṣu

tasmāt+ityādinā| -> tasmād ityādinā|

trivalayaracanām+tryaṣṭakais -> trivalayaracanāṃ tryaṣṭakais

trivalayaracanāṃ tryaṣṭakais+ca -> trivalayaracanāṃ tryaṣṭakaiś ca

prākārādyam+tathā -> prākārādyaṃ tathā

prākārādyaṃ tathā+eva -> prākārādyaṃ tathaiva

garbhadvāram+dviguṇyam -> garbhadvāraṃ dviguṇyam

garbhadvāraṃ dviguṇyam+trividhaguṇavaśāt -> garbhadvāraṃ dviguṇyaṃ trividhaguṇavaśāt

garbhadvāraṃ dviguṇyaṃ trividhaguṇavaśāt+dvāram -> garbhadvāraṃ dviguṇyaṃ trividhaguṇavaśād dvāram

garbhadvāraṃ dviguṇyaṃ trividhaguṇavaśād dvāram+api -> garbhadvāraṃ dviguṇyaṃ trividhaguṇavaśād dvāram api

garbhadvāraṃ dviguṇyaṃ trividhaguṇavaśād dvāram api+atra -> garbhadvāraṃ dviguṇyaṃ trividhaguṇavaśād dvāram apy atra

dikkoṇeṣu+arkapadmam -> dikkoṇeṣv arkapadmam

dikkoṇeṣv arkapadmam+dviguṇam -> dikkoṇeṣv arkapadmaṃ dviguṇam

dikkoṇeṣv arkapadmaṃ dviguṇam+anudalam -> dikkoṇeṣv arkapadmaṃ dviguṇam anudalam

dikkoṇeṣv arkapadmaṃ dviguṇam anudalam+sūryakoṣṭhais -> dikkoṇeṣv arkapadmaṃ dviguṇam anudalaṃ sūryakoṣṭhais

dikkoṇeṣv arkapadmaṃ dviguṇam anudalaṃ sūryakoṣṭhais+prakuryāt| -> dikkoṇeṣv arkapadmaṃ dviguṇam anudalaṃ sūryakoṣṭhaiḥ prakuryāt|

rasaguṇitayugais+pañcarekhām -> rasaguṇitayugaiḥ pañcarekhām

rasaguṇitayugaiḥ pañcarekhām+hi -> rasaguṇitayugaiḥ pañcarekhāṃ hi

tasmāt+śrīraṅgabhūmī -> tasmāc chrīraṅgabhūmī

idānīm+kāyamaṇḍalam -> idānīṃ kāyamaṇḍalam

idānīṃ kāyamaṇḍalam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ kāyamaṇḍalam ucyate---

buddhadevīnām+madhye| -> buddhadevīnāṃ madhye|

tatas+buddhāsanāt -> tato buddhāsanāt

tato buddhāsanāt+bāhye -> tato buddhāsanād bāhye

tato buddhāsanād bāhye+aṅgulārdhena -> tato buddhāsanād bāhye 'ṅgulārdhena

sārdhasārdhavibhāgena+iti| -> sārdhasārdhavibhāgeneti|

prākārabhūmitoraṇastambhās+bhavanti -> prākārabhūmitoraṇastambhā bhavanti

sūtram+dattvā -> sūtraṃ dattvā

sārdham+trīṇi -> sārdhaṃ trīṇi

sārdhaṃ trīṇi+ardhāṅgulāni -> sārdhaṃ trīṇy ardhāṅgulāni

sūtram+pātayitvā -> sūtraṃ pātayitvā

tatas+caturbhis -> tataś caturbhis

tataś caturbhis+ardhāṅgulais -> tataś caturbhir ardhāṅgulais

tataś caturbhir ardhāṅgulais+devatākamalāni -> tataś caturbhir ardhāṅgulair devatākamalāni

tatas+kamalapatrabāhye -> tataḥ kamalapatrabāhye

tataḥ kamalapatrabāhye+ekena -> tataḥ kamalapatrabāhya ekena

tataḥ kamalapatrabāhya ekena+ardhāṅgulabhāgena -> tataḥ kamalapatrabāhya ekenārdhāṅgulabhāgena

pakṣakam+bhavati| -> pakṣakaṃ bhavati|

rekhātrayam+bhavati| -> rekhātrayaṃ bhavati|

śeṣam+tryardhāṅgulam -> śeṣaṃ tryardhāṅgulam

śeṣaṃ tryardhāṅgulam+dvidhā -> śeṣaṃ tryardhāṅgulaṃ dvidhā

sūtram+pātayitvā -> sūtraṃ pātayitvā

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

bhavati+iti -> bhavatīti

dvādaśārdhāṅgulais+bhagavatas -> dvādaśārdhāṅgulair bhagavatas

dvādaśārdhāṅgulair bhagavatas+padmam -> dvādaśārdhāṅgulair bhagavataḥ padmam

dvādaśārdhāṅgulair bhagavataḥ padmam+padmatribhāgikā -> dvādaśārdhāṅgulair bhagavataḥ padmaṃ padmatribhāgikā

evam+brahmasthāne -> evaṃ brahmasthāne

evaṃ brahmasthāne+arkakoṣṭhais -> evaṃ brahmasthāne 'rkakoṣṭhais

evaṃ brahmasthāne 'rkakoṣṭhais+iti -> evaṃ brahmasthāne 'rkakoṣṭhair iti

nāyakakamalam+śeṣāṇām -> nāyakakamalaṃ śeṣāṇām

nāyakakamalaṃ śeṣāṇām+devatādevatīnām -> nāyakakamalaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ devatādevatīnām

nāyakakamalaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ devatādevatīnām+āsanānām -> nāyakakamalaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ devatādevatīnām āsanānām

nāyakakamalaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ devatādevatīnām āsanānām+triguṇam| -> nāyakakamalaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ devatādevatīnām āsanānāṃ triguṇam|

tatas+vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparadikṣu -> tato vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparadikṣu

tato vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparadikṣu+abdhis -> tato vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparadikṣv abdhis

tato vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparadikṣv abdhis+iti -> tato vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparadikṣv abdhir iti

padmāsanārtham+iti| -> padmāsanārtham iti|

nāyakāsanārtham+caturṣu -> nāyakāsanārthaṃ caturṣu

brahmasūtrāt+vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparam -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparam

brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparam+aṅgulārdhadvayam -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparam aṅgulārdhadvayam

brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparam aṅgulārdhadvayam+sūtram -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparam aṅgulārdhadvayaṃ sūtram

brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparam aṅgulārdhadvayaṃ sūtram+pātayet| -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇapūrvāparam aṅgulārdhadvayaṃ sūtraṃ pātayet|

ṣaṭkoṣṭhais+toraṇādhas -> ṣaṭkoṣṭhais toraṇādhas

ṣaṭkoṣṭhais toraṇādhas+vasukamalayutā -> ṣaṭkoṣṭhais toraṇādho vasukamalayutā

ca+ardhahārāvasāne -> cārdhahārāvasāne

varjyam+prabhavati -> varjyaṃ prabhavati

sūtrārdham+mūrdhni -> sūtrārdhaṃ mūrdhni

sastambham+toraṇam -> sastambhaṃ toraṇam

sastambhaṃ toraṇam+syāt -> sastambhaṃ toraṇaṃ syāt

sastambhaṃ toraṇaṃ syāt+triguṇitadaśabhis -> sastambhaṃ toraṇaṃ syāt triguṇitadaśabhis

sastambhaṃ toraṇaṃ syāt triguṇitadaśabhis+dvāramūlāt -> sastambhaṃ toraṇaṃ syāt triguṇitadaśabhir dvāramūlāt

sastambhaṃ toraṇaṃ syāt triguṇitadaśabhir dvāramūlāt+itas -> sastambhaṃ toraṇaṃ syāt triguṇitadaśabhir dvāramūlād itas

sastambhaṃ toraṇaṃ syāt triguṇitadaśabhir dvāramūlād itas+ca| -> sastambhaṃ toraṇaṃ syāt triguṇitadaśabhir dvāramūlād itaś ca|

naṣṭakālais+bhavati -> naṣṭakālair bhavati

tasya+ardhe -> tasyārdhe

stambham+ardham|| -> stambham ardham||

kapālam+tribhis -> kapālaṃ tribhis

kapālaṃ tribhis+api -> kapālaṃ tribhir api

ṛturasais+dvāraniryūhakās -> ṛturasair dvāraniryūhakās

ṛturasair dvāraniryūhakās+ca -> ṛturasair dvāraniryūhakāś ca

trirekham+bhavati -> trirekhaṃ bhavati

dikkoṇeṣu+abdhikoṣṭhais -> dikkoṇeṣv abdhikoṣṭhais

dikkoṇeṣv abdhikoṣṭhais+śaśiravikamalāni -> dikkoṇeṣv abdhikoṣṭhaiḥ śaśiravikamalāni

dikkoṇeṣv abdhikoṣṭhaiḥ śaśiravikamalāni+eva -> dikkoṇeṣv abdhikoṣṭhaiḥ śaśiravikamalāny eva

trirekham+hi -> trirekhaṃ hi

dinakarais+ca -> dinakaraiś ca

tatsthānāt+raṅgabhūmis -> tatsthānād raṅgabhūmis

tatsthānād raṅgabhūmis+bhavati -> tatsthānād raṅgabhūmir bhavati

trimaṇḍale+api -> trimaṇḍale 'pi

trimaṇḍale 'pi+evam|| -> trimaṇḍale 'py evam||

cakram+ca -> cakraṃ ca

cakrāṣṭabhāgikam+dvāram -> cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāram

cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāram+svasvacakramānāt -> cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāraṃ svasvacakramānāt

cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāraṃ svasvacakramānāt+bhavati| -> cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāraṃ svasvacakramānād bhavati|

evam+cittavākkāyamaṇḍale -> evaṃ cittavākkāyamaṇḍale

tryardhāṅgulabhāgāṣṭakam+kāyamaṇḍaladvārārtham -> tryardhāṅgulabhāgāṣṭakaṃ kāyamaṇḍaladvārārtham

tryardhāṅgulabhāgāṣṭakaṃ kāyamaṇḍaladvārārtham+uktam -> tryardhāṅgulabhāgāṣṭakaṃ kāyamaṇḍaladvārārtham uktam

tryardhāṅgulabhāgāṣṭakaṃ kāyamaṇḍaladvārārtham uktam+iti| -> tryardhāṅgulabhāgāṣṭakaṃ kāyamaṇḍaladvārārtham uktam iti|

evam+tryardhāṅgulam -> evaṃ tryardhāṅgulam

evaṃ tryardhāṅgulam+bhāgacatuṣkam -> evaṃ tryardhāṅgulaṃ bhāgacatuṣkam

evaṃ tryardhāṅgulaṃ bhāgacatuṣkam+vāṅmaṇḍaladvārārtham -> evaṃ tryardhāṅgulaṃ bhāgacatuṣkaṃ vāṅmaṇḍaladvārārtham

evaṃ tryardhāṅgulaṃ bhāgacatuṣkaṃ vāṅmaṇḍaladvārārtham+uktam| -> evaṃ tryardhāṅgulaṃ bhāgacatuṣkaṃ vāṅmaṇḍaladvārārtham uktam|

brahmasūtrāt+vāmadakṣiṇam -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇam

brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇam+pūrvāparam -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇaṃ pūrvāparam

brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇaṃ pūrvāparam+bhāgadvayam -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇaṃ pūrvāparaṃ bhāgadvayam

brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇaṃ pūrvāparaṃ bhāgadvayam+caturdvāramānārtham -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇaṃ pūrvāparaṃ bhāgadvayaṃ caturdvāramānārtham

brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇaṃ pūrvāparaṃ bhāgadvayaṃ caturdvāramānārtham+uktam -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇaṃ pūrvāparaṃ bhāgadvayaṃ caturdvāramānārtham uktam

brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇaṃ pūrvāparaṃ bhāgadvayaṃ caturdvāramānārtham uktam+bhagavatā -> brahmasūtrād vāmadakṣiṇaṃ pūrvāparaṃ bhāgadvayaṃ caturdvāramānārtham uktaṃ bhagavatā

vasuyugais+aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhis -> vasuyugair aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhis

vasuyugair aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhis+ardhāṅgulais -> vasuyugair aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulais

vasuyugair aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulais+tryardhāṅgulātmakais -> vasuyugair aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulais tryardhāṅgulātmakais

vasuyugair aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulais tryardhāṅgulātmakais+ṣoḍaśavibhāgais -> vasuyugair aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulais tryardhāṅgulātmakaiḥ ṣoḍaśavibhāgais

vasuyugair aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulais tryardhāṅgulātmakaiḥ ṣoḍaśavibhāgais+iti| -> vasuyugair aṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhir ardhāṅgulais tryardhāṅgulātmakaiḥ ṣoḍaśavibhāgair iti|

evam+bhavati -> evaṃ bhavati

ṣoḍaśavibhāgās+tryardhāṅgulās -> ṣoḍaśavibhāgās tryardhāṅgulās

ṣoḍaśavibhāgās tryardhāṅgulās+bhavanti -> ṣoḍaśavibhāgās tryardhāṅgulā bhavanti

sūtram+dattvā -> sūtraṃ dattvā

bhāgāṣṭakam+ṣoḍaśavibhāgam -> bhāgāṣṭakaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgam

bhāgāṣṭakaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgam+kuryāt| -> bhāgāṣṭakaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgaṃ kuryāt|

bhāgacatuṣkam+apare -> bhāgacatuṣkam apare

bhāgacatuṣkam apare+api -> bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'pi

bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'pi+evam -> bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evam

bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evam+vāmadakṣiṇe -> bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe

bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe+api -> bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe 'pi

bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe 'pi+evam -> bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe 'py evam

bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe 'py evam+tyaktvā -> bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe 'py evaṃ tyaktvā

bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe 'py evaṃ tyaktvā+aparam -> bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe 'py evaṃ tyaktvāparam

bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe 'py evaṃ tyaktvāparam+garbhe -> bhāgacatuṣkam apare 'py evaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe 'py evaṃ tyaktvāparaṃ garbhe

punas+cittamaṇḍalārtham -> punaś cittamaṇḍalārtham

punaś cittamaṇḍalārtham+pūrve -> punaś cittamaṇḍalārthaṃ pūrve

ṣoḍaśavibhāgās+ṣaḍardhāṅgulās -> ṣoḍaśavibhāgāḥ ṣaḍardhāṅgulās

ṣoḍaśavibhāgāḥ ṣaḍardhāṅgulās+bhavanti| -> ṣoḍaśavibhāgāḥ ṣaḍardhāṅgulā bhavanti|

sūtram+dattvā -> sūtraṃ dattvā

ṣoḍaśavibhāgam+kuryāt| -> ṣoḍaśavibhāgaṃ kuryāt|

bhāgāṣṭakam+yat -> bhāgāṣṭakaṃ yat

bhāgāṣṭakaṃ yat+tat -> bhāgāṣṭakaṃ yat tat

bhāgāṣṭakaṃ yat tat+eva -> bhāgāṣṭakaṃ yat tad eva

tatas+vāṅmaṇḍale -> tato vāṅmaṇḍale

caturvibhāgam+tyaktvā -> caturvibhāgaṃ tyaktvā

caturvibhāgaṃ tyaktvā+ubhayapārśve -> caturvibhāgaṃ tyaktvobhayapārśve

caturvibhāgaṃ tyaktvobhayapārśve+aṣṭabhāgās -> caturvibhāgaṃ tyaktvobhayapārśve 'ṣṭabhāgās

caturvibhāgaṃ tyaktvobhayapārśve 'ṣṭabhāgās+tyaktās -> caturvibhāgaṃ tyaktvobhayapārśve 'ṣṭabhāgās tyaktās

caturvibhāgaṃ tyaktvobhayapārśve 'ṣṭabhāgās tyaktās+bhavanti -> caturvibhāgaṃ tyaktvobhayapārśve 'ṣṭabhāgās tyaktā bhavanti

tatas+bāhye -> tato bāhye

atas+prathamam -> ataḥ prathamam

ataḥ prathamam+ṣoḍaśavibhāgam -> ataḥ prathamaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgam

ataḥ prathamaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgam+maṇḍalārtham -> ataḥ prathamaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgaṃ maṇḍalārtham

ataḥ prathamaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgaṃ maṇḍalārtham+bhūmitalam -> ataḥ prathamaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgaṃ maṇḍalārthaṃ bhūmitalam

ataḥ prathamaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgaṃ maṇḍalārthaṃ bhūmitalam+kartavyam| -> ataḥ prathamaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgaṃ maṇḍalārthaṃ bhūmitalaṃ kartavyam|

evam+ṣoḍaśabhāgeṣu -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśabhāgeṣu

pratyekavibhāgas+dvādaśārdhāṅgulas -> pratyekavibhāgo dvādaśārdhāṅgulas

pratyekavibhāgo dvādaśārdhāṅgulas+bhavati| -> pratyekavibhāgo dvādaśārdhāṅgulo bhavati|

dviguṇaṣaṇnavativibhāgārdhāṅgulās+uktās -> dviguṇaṣaṇnavativibhāgārdhāṅgulā uktās

dviguṇaṣaṇnavativibhāgārdhāṅgulā uktās+bhavanti -> dviguṇaṣaṇnavativibhāgārdhāṅgulā uktā bhavanti

atra+api -> atrāpi

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

varjayitvā+iti -> varjayitveti

sūtrapātas+kartavyas -> sūtrapātaḥ kartavyas

sūtrapātaḥ kartavyas+lopyāni -> sūtrapātaḥ kartavyo lopyāni

bhagavatā+uktas -> bhagavatoktas

bhagavatoktas+| -> bhagavatoktaḥ|

ityādisūtraniyamas+kāyavākcittamaṇḍale -> ityādisūtraniyamaḥ kāyavākcittamaṇḍale

tatas+dvyabdhyādibhāgais -> tato dvyabdhyādibhāgais

tato dvyabdhyādibhāgais+tam -> tato dvyabdhyādibhāgais tam

tato dvyabdhyādibhāgais tam+sūtrayet -> tato dvyabdhyādibhāgais taṃ sūtrayet

tato dvyabdhyādibhāgais taṃ sūtrayet+maṇḍalatrayam|| -> tato dvyabdhyādibhāgais taṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalatrayam||

evam+tripakṣasaṃśuddham -> evaṃ tripakṣasaṃśuddham

evaṃ tripakṣasaṃśuddham+maṇḍalam -> evaṃ tripakṣasaṃśuddhaṃ maṇḍalam

evaṃ tripakṣasaṃśuddhaṃ maṇḍalam+triguṇātmakam| -> evaṃ tripakṣasaṃśuddhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ triguṇātmakam|

cittamaṇḍalakam+kuryāt -> cittamaṇḍalakaṃ kuryāt

cittamaṇḍalakaṃ kuryāt+punas -> cittamaṇḍalakaṃ kuryāt punas

cittamaṇḍalakaṃ kuryāt punas+ṣoḍaśabhāgikam|| -> cittamaṇḍalakaṃ kuryāt punaḥ ṣoḍaśabhāgikam||

vāgādyam+maṇḍalam -> vāgādyaṃ maṇḍalam

vāgādyaṃ maṇḍalam+kuryāt -> vāgādyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt

vāgādyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt+tatas -> vāgādyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt tatas

vāgādyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt tatas+vāṅmaṇḍalam -> vāgādyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt tato vāṅmaṇḍalam

vāgādyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt tato vāṅmaṇḍalam+tyajet| -> vāgādyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt tato vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ tyajet|

punas+ṣoḍaśabhāgikam|| -> punaḥ ṣoḍaśabhāgikam||

kāyamaṇḍalakam+tyaktvā -> kāyamaṇḍalakaṃ tyaktvā

caturasram+samam -> caturasraṃ samam

caturasraṃ samam+bhūmyām -> caturasraṃ samaṃ bhūmyām

caturasraṃ samaṃ bhūmyām+kṛtvā -> caturasraṃ samaṃ bhūmyāṃ kṛtvā

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

niṣprapañcacandrakalāśuddhyā+iti| -> niṣprapañcacandrakalāśuddhyeti|

sūtrapātas+ucyate| -> sūtrapāta ucyate|

tasmāt+mūlatantrānusāreṇa -> tasmān mūlatantrānusāreṇa

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

iti+aparavidhau -> ity aparavidhau

tasmāt+yāni -> tasmād yāni

yat+aparam -> yad aparam

yad aparam+dvyabdhyādibhāgais -> yad aparaṃ dvyabdhyādibhāgais

yad aparaṃ dvyabdhyādibhāgais+tat -> yad aparaṃ dvyabdhyādibhāgais tat

yad aparaṃ dvyabdhyādibhāgais tat+bālaśiṣyaprabodhāya -> yad aparaṃ dvyabdhyādibhāgais tad bālaśiṣyaprabodhāya

yad aparaṃ dvyabdhyādibhāgais tad bālaśiṣyaprabodhāya+uktam -> yad aparaṃ dvyabdhyādibhāgais tad bālaśiṣyaprabodhāyoktam

yad aparaṃ dvyabdhyādibhāgais tad bālaśiṣyaprabodhāyoktam+iti| -> yad aparaṃ dvyabdhyādibhāgais tad bālaśiṣyaprabodhāyoktam iti|

tasmāt+ebhis -> tasmād ebhis

tasmād ebhis+ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhais -> tasmād ebhir ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhais

tasmād ebhir ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhais+yat -> tasmād ebhir ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhair yat

tasmād ebhir ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhair yat+mānam -> tasmād ebhir ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhair yan mānam

tasmād ebhir ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhair yan mānam+tat -> tasmād ebhir ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhair yan mānaṃ tat

tasmād ebhir ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhair yan mānaṃ tat+ācāryaprapañcārtham| -> tasmād ebhir ardhāṅguloktakoṣṭhair yan mānaṃ tad ācāryaprapañcārtham|

dvyabdhyekābdhyekasūryais+ityādibhāgais -> dvyabdhyekābdhyekasūryair ityādibhāgais

dvyabdhyekābdhyekasūryair ityādibhāgais+niyamas -> dvyabdhyekābdhyekasūryair ityādibhāgair niyamas

dvyabdhyekābdhyekasūryair ityādibhāgair niyamas+| -> dvyabdhyekābdhyekasūryair ityādibhāgair niyamaḥ|

svarūpatas+bhūyas -> svarūpato bhūyas

svarūpato bhūyas+catuḥpañcāśadādivṛttadvayena -> svarūpato bhūyaś catuḥpañcāśadādivṛttadvayena

svarūpato bhūyaś catuḥpañcāśadādivṛttadvayena+uktam| -> svarūpato bhūyaś catuḥpañcāśadādivṛttadvayenoktam|

trikoṣṭhais+||37|| -> trikoṣṭhaiḥ||37||

ghaṭakapāllāsanam+vā -> ghaṭakapāllāsanaṃ vā

buddhādyabjam+caturbhis -> buddhādyabjaṃ caturbhis

buddhādyabjaṃ caturbhis+prabhavati -> buddhādyabjaṃ caturbhiḥ prabhavati

brahmasthāne+arkakoṣṭhais -> brahmasthāne 'rkakoṣṭhais

brahmasthāne 'rkakoṣṭhais+punar -> brahmasthāne 'rkakoṣṭhaiḥ punar

brahmasthāne 'rkakoṣṭhaiḥ punar+api -> brahmasthāne 'rkakoṣṭhaiḥ punar api

bhavet+devatādyāsanānām -> bhaved devatādyāsanānām

bhartus+triguṇam -> bhartus triguṇam

bhartus triguṇam+api -> bhartus triguṇam api

cakram+vā -> cakraṃ vā

cakraṃ vā+abjam -> cakraṃ vābjam

cakraṃ vābjam+hi -> cakraṃ vābjaṃ hi

sūtrapātaniyamas+yas -> sūtrapātaniyamo yas

sūtrapātaniyamo yas+saprapañcārthena -> sūtrapātaniyamo yaḥ saprapañcārthena

sūtrapātaniyamo yaḥ saprapañcārthena+uktas -> sūtrapātaniyamo yaḥ saprapañcārthenoktas

sūtrapātaniyamo yaḥ saprapañcārthenoktas+|| -> sūtrapātaniyamo yaḥ saprapañcārthenoktaḥ||

pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkam+vajrāvalim -> pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvalim

pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvalim+darśayet -> pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayet

pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayet+bāhyabhūmyām -> pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām

pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām+ākāśabhūmyām -> pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām ākāśabhūmyām

pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām ākāśabhūmyām+iti -> pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām ākāśabhūmyām iti

pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām ākāśabhūmyām iti+arthas -> pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām ākāśabhūmyām ity arthas

pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām ākāśabhūmyām ity arthas+| -> pṛthivyādivalayacatuṣkaṃ vajrāvaliṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām ākāśabhūmyām ity arthaḥ|

pañcaprakārān+toraṇam -> pañcaprakārāṃś toraṇam

pañcaprakārāṃś toraṇam+ca -> pañcaprakārāṃś toraṇaṃ ca

tatas+kāyamaṇḍale -> tataḥ kāyamaṇḍale

dvāraparyantam+iti| -> dvāraparyantam iti|

vāṅmaṇḍalasūtrebhyas+dviguṇais -> vāṅmaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇais

vāṅmaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇais+kāyamaṇḍalam -> vāṅmaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇaiḥ kāyamaṇḍalam

vāṅmaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇaiḥ kāyamaṇḍalam+bhavati -> vāṅmaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇaiḥ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ bhavati

dvārasīmnas+| -> dvārasīmnaḥ|

garbhamaṇḍalasūtrebhyas+dviguṇasūtrais -> garbhamaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇasūtrais

garbhamaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇasūtrais+vāṅmaṇḍalam -> garbhamaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇasūtrair vāṅmaṇḍalam

garbhamaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇasūtrair vāṅmaṇḍalam+bhavati -> garbhamaṇḍalasūtrebhyo dviguṇasūtrair vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ bhavati

mahāmaṇḍalam+dvārasīmnas -> mahāmaṇḍalaṃ dvārasīmnas

mahāmaṇḍalaṃ dvārasīmnas+iti| -> mahāmaṇḍalaṃ dvārasīmna iti|

dvānavatyadhikaśatais+racitam -> dvānavatyadhikaśataī racitam

dvānavatyadhikaśataī racitam+iti| -> dvānavatyadhikaśataī racitam iti|

samastais+iti -> samastair iti

garbhāt+bāhye -> garbhād bāhye

cittamaṇḍalam+bhavati -> cittamaṇḍalaṃ bhavati

cittamaṇḍalaṃ bhavati+iti -> cittamaṇḍalaṃ bhavatīti

cittamaṇḍalaṃ bhavatīti+arthas -> cittamaṇḍalaṃ bhavatīty arthas

cittamaṇḍalaṃ bhavatīty arthas+| -> cittamaṇḍalaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ|

sūtreṣu+aṣṭacatvāriṃśatsūtrais -> sūtreṣv aṣṭacatvāriṃśatsūtrais

sūtreṣv aṣṭacatvāriṃśatsūtrais+maṇḍalagarbhamadhye -> sūtreṣv aṣṭacatvāriṃśatsūtrair maṇḍalagarbhamadhye

vasuyugais+iti| -> vasuyugair iti|

sūtrais+ardhāṅguloktais -> sūtrair ardhāṅguloktais

sūtrair ardhāṅguloktais+bhavati -> sūtrair ardhāṅguloktair bhavati

ṣaṇnavatis+iti -> ṣaṇnavatir iti

ṣaṇnavatis+paścime -> ṣaṇnavatiḥ paścime

ṣaṇnavatis+pūrve -> ṣaṇnavatiḥ pūrve

ṣaṇnavatis+| -> ṣaṇnavatiḥ|

madhyabrahmasūtrāt+dakṣiṇadigvibhāge -> madhyabrahmasūtrād dakṣiṇadigvibhāge

tatas+brahmasūtrāt -> tato brahmasūtrāt

tato brahmasūtrāt+sūtram -> tato brahmasūtrāt sūtram

tato brahmasūtrāt sūtram+rasanavatis -> tato brahmasūtrāt sūtraṃ rasanavatis

tato brahmasūtrāt sūtraṃ rasanavatis+idam -> tato brahmasūtrāt sūtraṃ rasanavatir idam

tato brahmasūtrāt sūtraṃ rasanavatir idam+digvibhāgapradeyam -> tato brahmasūtrāt sūtraṃ rasanavatir idaṃ digvibhāgapradeyam

tato brahmasūtrāt sūtraṃ rasanavatir idaṃ digvibhāgapradeyam+iti| -> tato brahmasūtrāt sūtraṃ rasanavatir idaṃ digvibhāgapradeyam iti|

koṇasūtram+pātayet -> koṇasūtraṃ pātayet

koṇasūtraṃ pātayet+vā -> koṇasūtraṃ pātayed vā

brahmasūtraniyamas+| -> brahmasūtraniyamaḥ|

dakṣiṇābhimukhas+brahmasūtram -> dakṣiṇābhimukho brahmasūtram

dakṣiṇābhimukho brahmasūtram+pātayet -> dakṣiṇābhimukho brahmasūtraṃ pātayet

dakṣiṇābhimukho brahmasūtraṃ pātayet+iti -> dakṣiṇābhimukho brahmasūtraṃ pātayed iti

tatas+ācāryas -> tata ācāryas

tata ācāryas+dakṣiṇe -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇe

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇe+uttarābhimukhas -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇa uttarābhimukhas

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇa uttarābhimukhas+śiṣyas -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇa uttarābhimukhaḥ śiṣyas

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇa uttarābhimukhaḥ śiṣyas+uttare -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇa uttarābhimukhaḥ śiṣya uttare

brahmasūtram+pātayet| -> brahmasūtraṃ pātayet|

paścimābhimukhas+maṇḍalabhūmim -> paścimābhimukho maṇḍalabhūmim

paścimābhimukho maṇḍalabhūmim+caturasrām -> paścimābhimukho maṇḍalabhūmiṃ caturasrām

paścimābhimukho maṇḍalabhūmiṃ caturasrām+māpayitvā -> paścimābhimukho maṇḍalabhūmiṃ caturasrāṃ māpayitvā

śiṣyas+karmavajrī -> śiṣyaḥ karmavajrī

vajrācāryas+pūrvābhimukhas -> vajrācāryaḥ pūrvābhimukhas

vajrācāryaḥ pūrvābhimukhas+pūrve -> vajrācāryaḥ pūrvābhimukhaḥ pūrve

pūrvamaṇḍalabhūmyām+paścime -> pūrvamaṇḍalabhūmyāṃ paścime

sūtram+ityādinā| -> sūtram ityādinā|

prākārān+toraṇādyam -> prākārāṃś toraṇādyam

prākārāṃś toraṇādyam+śikhicalavalayam -> prākārāṃś toraṇādyaṃ śikhicalavalayam

prākārāṃś toraṇādyaṃ śikhicalavalayam+darśayet -> prākārāṃś toraṇādyaṃ śikhicalavalayaṃ darśayet

prākārāṃś toraṇādyaṃ śikhicalavalayaṃ darśayet+bāhyabhūmyām|| -> prākārāṃś toraṇādyaṃ śikhicalavalayaṃ darśayed bāhyabhūmyām||

mahāmaṇḍalam+dvārasīmnas -> mahāmaṇḍalaṃ dvārasīmnas

samastais+racitam -> samastaī racitam

samastaī racitam+api -> samastaī racitam api

garbhāt+bāhye -> garbhād bāhye

vasuyugais+maṇḍalam -> vasuyugair maṇḍalam

vasuyugair maṇḍalam+garbhamadhye| -> vasuyugair maṇḍalaṃ garbhamadhye|

sūtrais+ardhāṅguloktais -> sūtrair ardhāṅguloktais

sūtrair ardhāṅguloktais+bhavati -> sūtrair ardhāṅguloktair bhavati

brahmasūtrād rasanavatis+idam -> brahmasūtrād rasanavatir idam

brahmasūtrād rasanavatir idam+digvibhāgapradeyam -> brahmasūtrād rasanavatir idaṃ digvibhāgapradeyam

sūtram+vai -> sūtraṃ vai

yat+tat -> yat tat

yat tat+idānīm -> yat tad idānīm

yat tad idānīm+vitanyate -> yat tad idānīṃ vitanyate

paramādibuddhāt+uddhṛtam -> paramādibuddhād uddhṛtam

paramādibuddhād uddhṛtam+maṇḍalalakṣaṇam -> paramādibuddhād uddhṛtaṃ maṇḍalalakṣaṇam

paramādibuddhād uddhṛtaṃ maṇḍalalakṣaṇam+pañcatriṃśattamādivṛttais -> paramādibuddhād uddhṛtaṃ maṇḍalalakṣaṇaṃ pañcatriṃśattamādivṛttais

paramādibuddhād uddhṛtaṃ maṇḍalalakṣaṇaṃ pañcatriṃśattamādivṛttais+saṃgītam -> paramādibuddhād uddhṛtaṃ maṇḍalalakṣaṇaṃ pañcatriṃśattamādivṛttaiḥ saṃgītam

paramādibuddhād uddhṛtaṃ maṇḍalalakṣaṇaṃ pañcatriṃśattamādivṛttaiḥ saṃgītam+mañjuśriyā -> paramādibuddhād uddhṛtaṃ maṇḍalalakṣaṇaṃ pañcatriṃśattamādivṛttaiḥ saṃgītaṃ mañjuśriyā

caturhaste+aṅgulārdhas -> caturhaste 'ṅgulārdhas

caturhaste 'ṅgulārdhas+tatsūtrais -> caturhaste 'ṅgulārdhas tatsūtrais

caturhaste 'ṅgulārdhas tatsūtrais+śrīmaṇḍalatraye|| -> caturhaste 'ṅgulārdhas tatsūtraiḥ śrīmaṇḍalatraye||

ahaṃkāravināśārtham ṛṣīṇām+jātivādinām| -> ahaṃkāravināśārtham ṛṣīṇāṃ jātivādinām|

mūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām+dvādaśasāhasrikāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām+rakṣācakrapūrvaṃgamabhūmyādisaṃgrahamahoddeśas -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ rakṣācakrapūrvaṃgamabhūmyādisaṃgrahamahoddeśas

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ rakṣācakrapūrvaṃgamabhūmyādisaṃgrahamahoddeśas+abhiṣekapaṭale -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ rakṣācakrapūrvaṃgamabhūmyādisaṃgrahamahoddeśo 'bhiṣekapaṭale

mantrajāpam+kuryāt -> mantrajāpaṃ kuryāt

mantrajāpaṃ kuryāt+iti|| -> mantrajāpaṃ kuryād iti||

punar+gandhadhūpādikam -> punar gandhadhūpādikam

punar gandhadhūpādikam+balim -> punar gandhadhūpādikaṃ balim

punar gandhadhūpādikaṃ balim+dattvā -> punar gandhadhūpādikaṃ baliṃ dattvā

tatas+gandhadhūpādikam -> tato gandhadhūpādikam

tato gandhadhūpādikam+dattvā -> tato gandhadhūpādikaṃ dattvā

tatas+uttarabhūmyām -> tata uttarabhūmyām

tata uttarabhūmyām+tatas -> tata uttarabhūmyāṃ tatas

tata uttarabhūmyāṃ tatas+dakṣiṇottarabrahmasūtrān -> tata uttarabhūmyāṃ tato dakṣiṇottarabrahmasūtrān

tata uttarabhūmyāṃ tato dakṣiṇottarabrahmasūtrān+paścimabhūmyām -> tata uttarabhūmyāṃ tato dakṣiṇottarabrahmasūtran paścimabhūmyām

tata uttarabhūmyāṃ tato dakṣiṇottarabrahmasūtran paścimabhūmyām+tatas -> tata uttarabhūmyāṃ tato dakṣiṇottarabrahmasūtran paścimabhūmyāṃ tatas

tata uttarabhūmyāṃ tato dakṣiṇottarabrahmasūtran paścimabhūmyāṃ tatas+pūrvabhūmyām| -> tata uttarabhūmyāṃ tato dakṣiṇottarabrahmasūtran paścimabhūmyāṃ tataḥ pūrvabhūmyām|

dakṣiṇabhūmyām+sūtram -> dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sūtram

dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sūtram+pātayet| -> dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sūtraṃ pātayet|

pūrvāparabrahmasūtrāt+ārabhya -> pūrvāparabrahmasūtrād ārabhya

nairṛtyeśānam+tatas -> nairṛtyeśānaṃ tatas

nairṛtyeśānaṃ tatas+diśāparigham -> nairṛtyeśānaṃ tato diśāparigham

nairṛtyeśānaṃ tato diśāparigham+varjayitvā -> nairṛtyeśānaṃ tato diśāparighaṃ varjayitvā

vāyavyāgneyasūtram+pātayet| -> vāyavyāgneyasūtraṃ pātayet|

punas+tena -> punas tena

punas tena+eva -> punas tenaiva

koṇasūtram+pātayet| -> koṇasūtraṃ pātayet|

tatas+svarucinā -> tataḥ svarucinā

gatam+pūrvāparadakṣiṇottarakīlakamūrdhni -> gataṃ pūrvāparadakṣiṇottarakīlakamūrdhni

tatas+ācāryas -> tata ācāryas

tata ācāryas+dakṣiṇabhūmyām -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyām

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyām+sthitas -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitas

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitas+śiṣyas -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣyas

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣyas+uttarabhūmyām -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣya uttarabhūmyām

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣya uttarabhūmyām+sthitas -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣya uttarabhūmyāṃ sthitas

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣya uttarabhūmyāṃ sthitas+dakṣiṇottaram -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣya uttarabhūmyāṃ sthito dakṣiṇottaram

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣya uttarabhūmyāṃ sthito dakṣiṇottaram+brahmasūtram -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣya uttarabhūmyāṃ sthito dakṣiṇottaraṃ brahmasūtram

tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣya uttarabhūmyāṃ sthito dakṣiṇottaraṃ brahmasūtram+caturdvāreṣu -> tata ācāryo dakṣiṇabhūmyāṃ sthitaḥ śiṣya uttarabhūmyāṃ sthito dakṣiṇottaraṃ brahmasūtraṃ caturdvāreṣu

niṣaṇṇas+pūrvāparam -> niṣaṇṇaḥ pūrvāparam

niṣaṇṇaḥ pūrvāparam+brahmasūtram -> niṣaṇṇaḥ pūrvāparaṃ brahmasūtram

niṣaṇṇaḥ pūrvāparaṃ brahmasūtram+pātayet| -> niṣaṇṇaḥ pūrvāparaṃ brahmasūtraṃ pātayet|

niṣaṇṇas+śiṣyas -> niṣaṇṇaḥ śiṣyas

niṣaṇṇaḥ śiṣyas+dakṣiṇaparyaṅkas -> niṣaṇṇaḥ śiṣyo dakṣiṇaparyaṅkas

niṣaṇṇaḥ śiṣyo dakṣiṇaparyaṅkas+vāmapādas -> niṣaṇṇaḥ śiṣyo dakṣiṇaparyaṅko vāmapādas

niṣaṇṇaḥ śiṣyo dakṣiṇaparyaṅko vāmapādas+bhūmau -> niṣaṇṇaḥ śiṣyo dakṣiṇaparyaṅko vāmapādo bhūmau

vāmārdhaparyaṅkas+dakṣiṇapādas -> vāmārdhaparyaṅko dakṣiṇapādas

vāmārdhaparyaṅko dakṣiṇapādas+avanau -> vāmārdhaparyaṅko dakṣiṇapādo 'vanau

sarvadharmān+sūtraya -> sarvadharman sūtraya

mantram+udāharet| -> mantram udāharet|

tatas+vajrasūtreṇa -> tato vajrasūtreṇa

vajrasattvas+aham -> vajrasattvo 'ham

vajrasattvo 'ham+vajrabhūmim -> vajrasattvo 'haṃ vajrabhūmim

vajrasattvo 'haṃ vajrabhūmim+sūtrayāmi -> vajrasattvo 'haṃ vajrabhūmiṃ sūtrayāmi

kāyavākcittaikabhūtās+sarvadharmās -> kāyavākcittaikabhūtāḥ sarvadharmās

kāyavākcittaikabhūtāḥ sarvadharmās+ekākāreṇa -> kāyavākcittaikabhūtāḥ sarvadharmā ekākāreṇa

paścimapūrvabhūmyām+prasārya -> paścimapūrvabhūmyāṃ prasārya

paścimapūrvabhūmyāṃ prasārya+imam -> paścimapūrvabhūmyāṃ prasāryemam

paścimapūrvabhūmyāṃ prasāryemam+mantram -> paścimapūrvabhūmyāṃ prasāryemaṃ mantram

paścimapūrvabhūmyāṃ prasāryemaṃ mantram+uccārayet -> paścimapūrvabhūmyāṃ prasāryemaṃ mantram uccārayet

paścimābhimukhas+sūtram -> paścimābhimukhaḥ sūtram

paścimābhimukhaḥ sūtram+saṃgṛhya -> paścimābhimukhaḥ sūtraṃ saṃgṛhya

śiṣyas+dakṣiṇamuṣṭyā -> śiṣyo dakṣiṇamuṣṭyā

śāntyādikarmābhiprāyeṇa+āloḍya -> śāntyādikarmābhiprāyeṇāloḍya

śāntyādikarmābhiprāyeṇāloḍya+ācāryas -> śāntyādikarmābhiprāyeṇāloḍyācāryas

śāntyādikarmābhiprāyeṇāloḍyācāryas+vāmamuṣṭyā -> śāntyādikarmābhiprāyeṇāloḍyācāryo vāmamuṣṭyā

tatas+śrīkhaṇḍaśālipiṣṭarudhiraviṣacityaṅgārakuṅkumaraktacandanaharidrātālakodakena -> tataḥ śrīkhaṇḍaśālipiṣṭarudhiraviṣacityaṅgārakuṅkumaraktacandanaharidrātālakodakena

tatas+maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyām -> tato maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyām

tato maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyām+pūrvābhimukhas -> tato maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyāṃ pūrvābhimukhas

tato maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyāṃ pūrvābhimukhas+vajrasūtram -> tato maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyāṃ pūrvābhimukho vajrasūtram

tato maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyāṃ pūrvābhimukho vajrasūtram+gandhadhūpādibhis -> tato maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyāṃ pūrvābhimukho vajrasūtraṃ gandhadhūpādibhis

tato maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyāṃ pūrvābhimukho vajrasūtraṃ gandhadhūpādibhis+sampūjya -> tato maṇḍalapaścimabhūmyāṃ pūrvābhimukho vajrasūtraṃ gandhadhūpādibhiḥ sampūjya

balim+dadyāt| -> baliṃ dadyāt|

punar+eva -> punar eva

vajravajraghaṇṭām+gṛhītvā -> vajravajraghaṇṭāṃ gṛhītvā

tatas+śayyām -> tataḥ śayyām

tataḥ śayyām+vihāya -> tataḥ śayyāṃ vihāya

punas+punas -> punaḥ punas

punaḥ punas+śayyāsanam -> punaḥ punaḥ śayyāsanam

punaḥ punaḥ śayyāsanam+kuryāt -> punaḥ punaḥ śayyāsanaṃ kuryāt

punaḥ punaḥ śayyāsanaṃ kuryāt+yāvat -> punaḥ punaḥ śayyāsanaṃ kuryād yāvat

punaḥ punaḥ śayyāsanaṃ kuryād yāvat+śubhanimittam -> punaḥ punaḥ śayyāsanaṃ kuryād yāvac chubhanimittam

punaḥ punaḥ śayyāsanaṃ kuryād yāvac chubhanimittam+labhate| -> punaḥ punaḥ śayyāsanaṃ kuryād yāvac chubhanimittaṃ labhate|

tatas+māranigraham -> tato māranigraham

tato māranigraham+kṛtvā -> tato māranigrahaṃ kṛtvā

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

daśalakṣajāpas+daśāyutahomas -> daśalakṣajāpo daśāyutahomas

daśalakṣajāpo daśāyutahomas+iti -> daśalakṣajāpo daśāyutahoma iti

pūrvam+koṭijāpas -> pūrvaṃ koṭijāpas

pūrvaṃ koṭijāpas+daśalakṣahomas -> pūrvaṃ koṭijāpo daśalakṣahomas

pūrvaṃ koṭijāpo daśalakṣahomas+kartavyas -> pūrvaṃ koṭijāpo daśalakṣahomaḥ kartavyas

pūrvaṃ koṭijāpo daśalakṣahomaḥ kartavyas+| -> pūrvaṃ koṭijāpo daśalakṣahomaḥ kartavyaḥ|

asya+api -> asyāpi

sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnām+sarvaduṣṭānām -> sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnāṃ sarvaduṣṭānām

sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnāṃ sarvaduṣṭānām+saptavāram -> sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnāṃ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ saptavāram

sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnāṃ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ saptavāram+āvartitas -> sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnāṃ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ saptavāram āvartitas

sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnāṃ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ saptavāram āvartitas+nigraham -> sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnāṃ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ saptavāram āvartito nigraham

sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnāṃ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ saptavāram āvartito nigraham+karoti| -> sarvamāravighnāparājitapretādyadhipatīnāṃ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ saptavāram āvartito nigrahaṃ karoti|

pratyaṅgamālāmantras+bhagavatas -> pratyaṅgamālāmantro bhagavatas

pratyaṅgamālāmantro bhagavatas+vajrabhairavakālacakrasya -> pratyaṅgamālāmantro bhagavato vajrabhairavakālacakrasya

iti+ākāśacakre| -> ity ākāśacakre|

tāni+eva| -> tāny eva|

ḍākinījālasya+api -> ḍākinījālasyāpi

idānīm+māraśatakulamuṇḍamālābījāni| -> idānīṃ māraśatakulamuṇḍamālābījāni|

sarvam+karoti|| -> sarvaṃ karoti||

tatas+paṭhitamātreṇa -> tataḥ paṭhitamātreṇa

pūrvasevāniyamas+| -> pūrvasevāniyamaḥ|

sarvāṣṭamahāsiddhayas+daśalakṣahomena -> sarvāṣṭamahāsiddhayo daśalakṣahomena

sarvāṣṭamahāsiddhayo daśalakṣahomena+iti -> sarvāṣṭamahāsiddhayo daśalakṣahomeneti

ṣoḍaśapadikam+mantram -> ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ mantram

ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ mantram+bhagavatas -> ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ mantraṃ bhagavatas

ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ mantraṃ bhagavatas+|| -> ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ mantraṃ bhagavataḥ||

vajraḍākinīsaṃtoṣitahṛdayāya+indrāgniyamanaiṛtyavaruṇavāyukubereśānabrahmaviṣṇuvināyakakārtikeyanandimahākālagrahanakṣatrakṣetrapālasurendrāsurendraphaṇīndrabhūtendranarendrasaṃstutacaraṇāya -> vajraḍākinīsaṃtoṣitahṛdayāyendrāgniyamanaiṛtyavaruṇavāyukubereśānabrahmaviṣṇuvināyakakārtikeyanandimahākālagrahanakṣatrakṣetrapālasurendrāsurendraphaṇīndrabhūtendranarendrasaṃstutacaraṇāya

vajraḍākinīsaṃtoṣitahṛdayāyendrāgniyamanaiṛtyavaruṇavāyukubereśānabrahmaviṣṇuvināyakakārtikeyanandimahākālagrahanakṣatrakṣetrapālasurendrāsurendraphaṇīndrabhūtendranarendrasaṃstutacaraṇāya+iti -> vajraḍākinīsaṃtoṣitahṛdayāyendrāgniyamanaiṛtyavaruṇavāyukubereśānabrahmaviṣṇuvināyakakārtikeyanandimahākālagrahanakṣatrakṣetrapālasurendrāsurendraphaṇīndrabhūtendranarendrasaṃstutacaraṇāyeti

namas+bhagavate -> namo bhagavate

namas+vajraḍākinībhyas -> namo vajraḍākinībhyas

namo vajraḍākinībhyas+| -> namo vajraḍākinībhyaḥ|

namo buddhabodhisattvadevībhyas+| -> namo buddhabodhisattvadevībhyaḥ|

namas+viśvamātre| -> namo viśvamātre|

namo vajrakrodhendrarājebhyas+| -> namo vajrakrodhendrarājebhyaḥ|

namas+buddhabodhisattvebhyas -> namo buddhabodhisattvebhyas

namo buddhabodhisattvebhyas+| -> namo buddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ|

namas+vajrasattvāya| -> namo vajrasattvāya|

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

tatas+ṣoḍaśapadikam -> tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikam

tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikam+ḍākinījālasahitam -> tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitam

tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitam+duṣṭanigrahamantram -> tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantram

tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantram+mārādinigrahārtham -> tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantraṃ mārādinigrahārtham

tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantraṃ mārādinigrahārtham+kālacakrabhagavatas -> tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantraṃ mārādinigrahārthaṃ kālacakrabhagavatas

tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantraṃ mārādinigrahārthaṃ kālacakrabhagavatas+āvartayet -> tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantraṃ mārādinigrahārthaṃ kālacakrabhagavata āvartayet

tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantraṃ mārādinigrahārthaṃ kālacakrabhagavata āvartayet+mantrī -> tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantraṃ mārādinigrahārthaṃ kālacakrabhagavata āvartayen mantrī

tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantraṃ mārādinigrahārthaṃ kālacakrabhagavata āvartayen mantrī+iti -> tataḥ ṣoḍaśapadikaṃ ḍākinījālasahitaṃ duṣṭanigrahamantraṃ mārādinigrahārthaṃ kālacakrabhagavata āvartayen mantrīti

evam+sarvamantramudrāvinyāsam -> evaṃ sarvamantramudrāvinyāsam

evaṃ sarvamantramudrāvinyāsam+kṛtvā -> evaṃ sarvamantramudrāvinyāsaṃ kṛtvā

vāmadakṣiṇapādanūpurayos+tiṣṭha -> vāmadakṣiṇapādanūpurayos tiṣṭha

mekhalākaṇṭhikayos+tiṣṭha -> mekhalākaṇṭhikayos tiṣṭha

śiras+agrapṛṣṭhapādadvayam -> śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayam

śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayam+lambamānam -> śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayaṃ lambamānam

śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayaṃ lambamānam+pādadvayam -> śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayaṃ lambamānaṃ pādadvayam

śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayaṃ lambamānaṃ pādadvayam+uddhṛtam -> śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayaṃ lambamānaṃ pādadvayam uddhṛtam

śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayaṃ lambamānaṃ pādadvayam uddhṛtam+cintayet -> śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayaṃ lambamānaṃ pādadvayam uddhṛtaṃ cintayet

śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayaṃ lambamānaṃ pādadvayam uddhṛtaṃ cintayet+iti -> śiro 'grapṛṣṭhapādadvayaṃ lambamānaṃ pādadvayam uddhṛtaṃ cintayed iti

caturmudrāvidhis+| -> caturmudrāvidhiḥ|

triṃśatsvarasaptatihrasvadīrghavyañjanasvabhāvadaityakulaśataśirobhis+muṇḍamālāvalambinīm -> triṃśatsvarasaptatihrasvadīrghavyañjanasvabhāvadaityakulaśataśirobhir muṇḍamālāvalambinīm

triṃśatsvarasaptatihrasvadīrghavyañjanasvabhāvadaityakulaśataśirobhir muṇḍamālāvalambinīm+skandhe -> triṃśatsvarasaptatihrasvadīrghavyañjanasvabhāvadaityakulaśataśirobhir muṇḍamālāvalambinīṃ skandhe

saha+aparacaturmudrāmantrapadāni| -> sahāparacaturmudrāmantrapadāni|

idānīm+ṣaṇmudrāmantrapadāni--- -> idānīṃ ṣaṇmudrāmantrapadāni---

iti+uttarottarābhiṣekavidhis -> ity uttarottarābhiṣekavidhis

ity uttarottarābhiṣekavidhis+|| -> ity uttarottarābhiṣekavidhiḥ||

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇa+abhiṣiktas -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktas

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktas+vajrasattvena -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvena

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvena+ātmanā -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanā

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanā+aham -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāham

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāham+dvitīyas -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyas

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyas+dvādaśabhūmilabdhas -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdhas

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdhas+vajrasattvas -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvas

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvas+mahārthas -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthas

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthas+paramākṣaras -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras+trailokyavijayas -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras trailokyavijayas

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras trailokyavijayas+kālacakras -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras trailokyavijayaḥ kālacakras

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras trailokyavijayaḥ kālacakras+bhagavān -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras trailokyavijayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras trailokyavijayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān+evaṃkāras -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras trailokyavijayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān evaṃkāras

dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras trailokyavijayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān evaṃkāras+| -> dharmadhātvakṣaracaturthābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvenātmanāhaṃ dvitīyo dvādaśabhūmilabdho vajrasattvo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras trailokyavijayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān evaṃkāraḥ|

tatas+vajrasattvāhaṃkāram -> tato vajrasattvāhaṃkāram

tato vajrasattvāhaṃkāram+udvahet| -> tato vajrasattvāhaṃkāram udvahet|

atas+adhyeṣya -> ato 'dhyeṣya

ato 'dhyeṣya+ātmānam -> ato 'dhyeṣyātmānam

ato 'dhyeṣyātmānam+vaimalyena -> ato 'dhyeṣyātmānaṃ vaimalyena

ato 'dhyeṣyātmānaṃ vaimalyena+abhiṣiktam -> ato 'dhyeṣyātmānaṃ vaimalyenābhiṣiktam

ato 'dhyeṣyātmānaṃ vaimalyenābhiṣiktam+bhāvayet| -> ato 'dhyeṣyātmānaṃ vaimalyenābhiṣiktaṃ bhāvayet|

mahāmudrājñānābhiṣekam+me -> mahāmudrājñānābhiṣekaṃ me

tatas+uttarāt -> tata uttarāt

tata uttarāt+uttaram -> tata uttarād uttaram

tata uttarād uttaram+caturthābhiṣekam -> tata uttarād uttaraṃ caturthābhiṣekam

tata uttarād uttaraṃ caturthābhiṣekam+upadeśatas -> tata uttarād uttaraṃ caturthābhiṣekam upadeśatas

tata uttarād uttaraṃ caturthābhiṣekam upadeśatas+prārthayet -> tata uttarād uttaraṃ caturthābhiṣekam upadeśataḥ prārthayet

tata uttarād uttaraṃ caturthābhiṣekam upadeśataḥ prārthayet+anena -> tata uttarād uttaraṃ caturthābhiṣekam upadeśataḥ prārthayed anena

prajñājñānena+abhiṣiktas -> prajñājñānenābhiṣiktas

prajñājñānenābhiṣiktas+dvitīyavajradharas -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharas

prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharas+aham -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'ham

prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'ham+dharmameghābhūmilabdhas -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdhas

prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdhas+aham -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham

prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham+iti -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham iti

prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham iti+ahaṃkāram -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham ity ahaṃkāram

prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham ity ahaṃkāram+kuryāt -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham ity ahaṃkāraṃ kuryāt

prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham ity ahaṃkāraṃ kuryāt+iti -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham ity ahaṃkāraṃ kuryād iti

prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham ity ahaṃkāraṃ kuryād iti+anuttarābhiṣekavidhis -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham ity ahaṃkāraṃ kuryād ity anuttarābhiṣekavidhis

prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham ity ahaṃkāraṃ kuryād ity anuttarābhiṣekavidhis+|| -> prajñājñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo 'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho 'ham ity ahaṃkāraṃ kuryād ity anuttarābhiṣekavidhiḥ||

guhyābhiṣekeṇa+abhiṣiktas -> guhyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktas

guhyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktas+vajrasattvayuvarājas -> guhyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājas

guhyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājas+navabhūmilabdhas -> guhyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājo navabhūmilabdhas

guhyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājo navabhūmilabdhas+aham| -> guhyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājo navabhūmilabdho 'ham|

vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇa+abhiṣiktas -> vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktas

vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktas+vajrasattvayuvarājas -> vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājas

vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājas+acalābhūmilabdhas -> vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājo 'calābhūmilabdhas

vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājo 'calābhūmilabdhas+aham -> vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājo 'calābhūmilabdho 'ham

vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājo 'calābhūmilabdho 'ham+iti| -> vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājo 'calābhūmilabdho 'ham iti|

tatas+ahaṃkāram -> tato 'haṃkāram

tato 'haṃkāram+āvahet| -> tato 'haṃkāram āvahet|

tatas+ātmānam -> tata ātmānam

tata ātmānam+vakṣyamāṇavidhinā -> tata ātmānaṃ vakṣyamāṇavidhinā

tata ātmānaṃ vakṣyamāṇavidhinā+abhiṣiktam -> tata ātmānaṃ vakṣyamāṇavidhinābhiṣiktam

tata ātmānaṃ vakṣyamāṇavidhinābhiṣiktam+bhāvayet| -> tata ātmānaṃ vakṣyamāṇavidhinābhiṣiktaṃ bhāvayet|

iti+adhyeṣya -> ity adhyeṣya

dadatām+huṃ -> dadatāṃ huṃ

prajñājñānābhiṣekam+me -> prajñājñānābhiṣekaṃ me

dadatām+huṃ -> dadatāṃ huṃ

guhyābhiṣekam+me -> guhyābhiṣekaṃ me

dadatām+huṃ -> dadatāṃ huṃ

kalaśābhiṣekam+me -> kalaśābhiṣekaṃ me

kalaśādikam+uttarābhiṣekam -> kalaśādikam uttarābhiṣekam

kalaśādikam uttarābhiṣekam+prārthayet -> kalaśādikam uttarābhiṣekaṃ prārthayet

kalaśādikam uttarābhiṣekaṃ prārthayet+ebhis -> kalaśādikam uttarābhiṣekaṃ prārthayed ebhis

kalaśādikam uttarābhiṣekaṃ prārthayed ebhis+mantrapadais -> kalaśādikam uttarābhiṣekaṃ prārthayed ebhir mantrapadais

kalaśādikam uttarābhiṣekaṃ prārthayed ebhir mantrapadais+--- -> kalaśādikam uttarābhiṣekaṃ prārthayed ebhir mantrapadaiḥ---

tatas+mantrī -> tato mantrī

saptābhiṣekānujñāvidhis+|| -> saptābhiṣekānujñāvidhiḥ||

sarvatathāgatasaptābhiṣekasaptabhūmiprāptas+aham -> sarvatathāgatasaptābhiṣekasaptabhūmiprāpto 'ham

sarvatathāgatasaptābhiṣekasaptabhūmiprāpto 'ham+iti -> sarvatathāgatasaptābhiṣekasaptabhūmiprāpto 'ham iti

tatas+saptābhiṣekalabdhas -> tataḥ saptābhiṣekalabdhas

tataḥ saptābhiṣekalabdhas+ahaṃkāram -> tataḥ saptābhiṣekalabdho 'haṃkāram

tataḥ saptābhiṣekalabdho 'haṃkāram+āvahet| -> tataḥ saptābhiṣekalabdho 'haṃkāram āvahet|

tatas+abhiṣiktam -> tato 'bhiṣiktam

tato 'bhiṣiktam+saptābhiṣekais -> tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ saptābhiṣekais

tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ saptābhiṣekais+ātmānam -> tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ saptābhiṣekair ātmānam

tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ saptābhiṣekair ātmānam+bhāvayet -> tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ saptābhiṣekair ātmānaṃ bhāvayet

tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ saptābhiṣekair ātmānaṃ bhāvayet+iti| -> tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ saptābhiṣekair ātmānaṃ bhāvayed iti|

iti+adhyeṣaṇām -> ity adhyeṣaṇām

ity adhyeṣaṇām+kṛtvā -> ity adhyeṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā

dadatām+haḥ -> dadatāṃ haḥ

evam+padmavajracihnau -> evaṃ padmavajracihnau

sarvakrodharājās+sabhāryās -> sarvakrodharājāḥ sabhāryās

sarvakrodharājāḥ sabhāryās+maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsarvasamatāsvabhāvam -> sarvakrodharājāḥ sabhāryā maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsarvasamatāsvabhāvam

sarvakrodharājāḥ sabhāryā maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsarvasamatāsvabhāvam+vajrapūrvaṃgamam -> sarvakrodharājāḥ sabhāryā maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsarvasamatāsvabhāvaṃ vajrapūrvaṃgamam

sarvakrodharājāḥ sabhāryā maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsarvasamatāsvabhāvaṃ vajrapūrvaṃgamam+nāma -> sarvakrodharājāḥ sabhāryā maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsarvasamatāsvabhāvaṃ vajrapūrvaṃgamaṃ nāma

sarvakāmopabhogam+vajravratam -> sarvakāmopabhogaṃ vajravratam

mām+svāhā|| -> māṃ svāhā||

tatas+abhiṣekam -> tato 'bhiṣekam

tato 'bhiṣekam+prārthayet -> tato 'bhiṣekaṃ prārthayet

tato 'bhiṣekaṃ prārthayet+iti| -> tato 'bhiṣekaṃ prārthayed iti|

vakṣyamāṇam+ṣaḍviṃśatibhujam -> vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujam

vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujam+dvādaśalocanam -> vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanam

vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanam+ṣaṭskandham -> vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandham

vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandham+caturmukham -> vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandhaṃ caturmukham

vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandhaṃ caturmukham+trigrīvam -> vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandhaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvam

vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandhaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvam+dvicaraṇam -> vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandhaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvicaraṇam

vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandhaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvicaraṇam+vakṣyamāṇāyudhadharam -> vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandhaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇāyudhadharam

vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandhaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇāyudhadharam+vicintya -> vakṣyamāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ dvādaśalocanaṃ ṣaṭskandhaṃ caturmukhaṃ trigrīvaṃ dvicaraṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇāyudhadharaṃ vicintya

jñānasattvam+ekīkṛtya -> jñānasattvam ekīkṛtya

tatas+māravighnopadravaśamanāya -> tato māravighnopadravaśamanāya

ḍākinyākarṣaṇamantras+| -> ḍākinyākarṣaṇamantraḥ|

khānapānaṃ kurvatīś cintayet+iti -> khānapānaṃ kurvatīś cintayed iti

vajraḍākinīnām+balim -> vajraḍākinīnāṃ balim

vajraḍākinīnāṃ baliṃ gandhapuṣpadhūpapradīpākṣatasahitām+pūrvoktavidhinā -> vajraḍākinīnāṃ baliṃ gandhapuṣpadhūpapradīpākṣatasahitāṃ pūrvoktavidhinā

ity ākarṣaṇamantras+| -> ity ākarṣaṇamantraḥ|

vṛtās+samagrās -> vṛtāḥ samagrās

vṛtāḥ samagrās+suradevatāgaṇais -> vṛtāḥ samagrāḥ suradevatāgaṇais

vṛtāḥ samagrāḥ suradevatāgaṇais+saṃtoṣyamāṇās -> vṛtāḥ samagrāḥ suradevatāgaṇaiḥ saṃtoṣyamāṇās

vṛtāḥ samagrāḥ suradevatāgaṇaiḥ saṃtoṣyamāṇās+varavajrasattvam|| -> vṛtāḥ samagrāḥ suradevatāgaṇaiḥ saṃtoṣyamāṇā varavajrasattvam||

mitrabāndhavais+| -> mitrabāndhavaiḥ|

buddhās+pitaras -> buddhāḥ pitaras

buddhāḥ pitaras+samātaras -> buddhāḥ pitaraḥ samātaras

buddhāḥ pitaraḥ samātaras+saputrabhṛtyais -> buddhāḥ pitaraḥ samātaraḥ saputrabhṛtyais

buddhāḥ pitaraḥ samātaraḥ saputrabhṛtyais+saha -> buddhāḥ pitaraḥ samātaraḥ saputrabhṛtyaiḥ saha

tatas+buddhān -> tato buddhān

tato buddhān+āvāhayet--- -> tato buddhān āvāhayet---

mārakāyikān+kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyān -> mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyān

mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyān+kartikapālahastān -> mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastān

mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastān+sādhujanāpakāraratān -> mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastan sādhujanāpakāraratān

mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastan sādhujanāpakāraratān+paśyet -> mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastan sādhujanāpakāraratan paśyet

mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastan sādhujanāpakāraratan paśyet+ācāryas -> mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastan sādhujanāpakāraratan paśyed ācāryas

mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastan sādhujanāpakāraratan paśyed ācāryas+śiṣyas -> mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastan sādhujanāpakāraratan paśyed ācāryaḥ śiṣyas

mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastan sādhujanāpakāraratan paśyed ācāryaḥ śiṣyas+vā -> mārakāyikan kṣutpipāsārtarūkṣaśuṣkakāyan kartikapālahastan sādhujanāpakāraratan paśyed ācāryaḥ śiṣyo vā

kiṃcit+na -> kiṃcin na

māravighnavināyakādīnām+vināśam -> māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśam

māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśam+kurvatas -> māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśaṃ kurvatas

māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśaṃ kurvatas+rakṣācakrāntam -> māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśaṃ kurvato rakṣācakrāntam

māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśaṃ kurvato rakṣācakrāntam+yāvat -> māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśaṃ kurvato rakṣācakrāntaṃ yāvat

māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśaṃ kurvato rakṣācakrāntaṃ yāvat+tathā -> māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśaṃ kurvato rakṣācakrāntaṃ yāvat tathā

māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśaṃ kurvato rakṣācakrāntaṃ yāvat tathā+api -> māravighnavināyakādīnāṃ vināśaṃ kurvato rakṣācakrāntaṃ yāvat tathāpi

punas+saṃdhyābhāṣāntareṇa -> punaḥ saṃdhyābhāṣāntareṇa

ṣaḍaṅganyāsavidhis+|| -> ṣaḍaṅganyāsavidhiḥ||

sarvatathāgatahṛdayaśiraḥśikhākavacanetrāstravajraṣaḍaṅgasvabhāvātmakas+aham -> sarvatathāgatahṛdayaśiraḥśikhākavacanetrāstravajraṣaḍaṅgasvabhāvātmako 'ham

sarvatathāgatahṛdayaśiraḥśikhākavacanetrāstravajraṣaḍaṅgasvabhāvātmako 'ham+iti -> sarvatathāgatahṛdayaśiraḥśikhākavacanetrāstravajraṣaḍaṅgasvabhāvātmako 'ham iti

tatas+oṃ -> tata oṃ

nyaset+astram| -> nyased astram|

vāmayā+aśubhe -> vāmayāśubhe

ubhayahastābhyām+sarvāṅgam -> ubhayahastābhyāṃ sarvāṅgam

ubhayahastābhyāṃ sarvāṅgam+saṃsparśayet| -> ubhayahastābhyāṃ sarvāṅgaṃ saṃsparśayet|

namas+| -> namaḥ|

karābhyām+sampuṭam -> karābhyāṃ sampuṭam

karābhyāṃ sampuṭam+kṛtvā -> karābhyāṃ sampuṭaṃ kṛtvā

karābhyāṃ sampuṭaṃ kṛtvā+aṅguṣṭhayugmena -> karābhyāṃ sampuṭaṃ kṛtvāṅguṣṭhayugmena

paścāt+ṣaḍaṅganyāsam -> paścāt ṣaḍaṅganyāsam

paścāt ṣaḍaṅganyāsam+karoti| -> paścāt ṣaḍaṅganyāsaṃ karoti|

tatas+ṣaṭkulanyāsam -> tataḥ ṣaṭkulanyāsam

tataḥ ṣaṭkulanyāsam+kṛtvā -> tataḥ ṣaṭkulanyāsaṃ kṛtvā

kāyavākcittajñānaviśuddhis+|| -> kāyavākcittajñānaviśuddhiḥ||

sarvatathāgatavajrakāyasvabhāvātmakas+aham -> sarvatathāgatavajrakāyasvabhāvātmako 'ham

sarvatathāgatavajrakāyasvabhāvātmako 'ham+iti -> sarvatathāgatavajrakāyasvabhāvātmako 'ham iti

tatas+ahaṃkāram -> tato 'haṃkāram

tato 'haṃkāram+oṃ -> tato 'haṃkāram oṃ

kāyavākcittajñānavajram+vajrakāyasvabhāvam -> kāyavākcittajñānavajraṃ vajrakāyasvabhāvam

kāyavākcittajñānavajraṃ vajrakāyasvabhāvam+kuru -> kāyavākcittajñānavajraṃ vajrakāyasvabhāvaṃ kuru

tatas+idam -> tata idam

tata idam+mantram -> tata idaṃ mantram

tata idaṃ mantram+uccārayet---oṃ -> tata idaṃ mantram uccārayet---oṃ

pādāṅgulīnakhaparyantam+ātmānam -> pādāṅgulīnakhaparyantam ātmānam

pādāṅgulīnakhaparyantam ātmānam+saṃsparśayet| -> pādāṅgulīnakhaparyantam ātmānaṃ saṃsparśayet|

tayā+uṣṇīṣāt -> tayoṣṇīṣāt

tayoṣṇīṣāt+ārabhya -> tayoṣṇīṣād ārabhya

tatas+tais -> tatas tais

tatas tais+candrārkarāhubījais -> tatas taiś candrārkarāhubījais

tatas taiś candrārkarāhubījais+pañcaśūkavajramudrām -> tatas taiś candrārkarāhubījaiḥ pañcaśūkavajramudrām

tatas taiś candrārkarāhubījaiḥ pañcaśūkavajramudrām+bandhayet -> tatas taiś candrārkarāhubījaiḥ pañcaśūkavajramudrāṃ bandhayet

tatas taiś candrārkarāhubījaiḥ pañcaśūkavajramudrāṃ bandhayet+vakṣyamāṇām| -> tatas taiś candrārkarāhubījaiḥ pañcaśūkavajramudrāṃ bandhayed vakṣyamāṇām|

hūṃkāram+nīlavarṇam -> hūṃkāraṃ nīlavarṇam

hūṃkāraṃ nīlavarṇam+candrārkayos -> hūṃkāraṃ nīlavarṇaṃ candrārkayos

hūṃkāraṃ nīlavarṇaṃ candrārkayos+madhye -> hūṃkāraṃ nīlavarṇaṃ candrārkayor madhye

tatas+hastasampuṭe -> tato hastasampuṭe

yāvat+lākārādayas -> yāval lākārādayas

yāval lākārādayas+deyās -> yāval lākārādayo deyās

kaniṣṭhādhas+tṛtīyam -> kaniṣṭhādhas tṛtīyam

kaniṣṭhādhas tṛtīyam+parva -> kaniṣṭhādhas tṛtīyaṃ parva

vṛddhāṅguṣṭhordhvaparvāt+ārabhya -> vṛddhāṅguṣṭhordhvaparvād ārabhya

nyastavyās+kaniṣṭhāmūlaparvādiṣu| -> nyastavyāḥ kaniṣṭhāmūlaparvādiṣu|

tatas+pūrvoktakrameṇa -> tataḥ pūrvoktakrameṇa

tataḥ pūrvoktakrameṇa+akārādilakārāntās -> tataḥ pūrvoktakrameṇākārādilakārāntās

tataḥ pūrvoktakrameṇākārādilakārāntās+pañcadaśasvarās -> tataḥ pūrvoktakrameṇākārādilakārāntāḥ pañcadaśasvarās

karaprakṣālanamantras+| -> karaprakṣālanamantraḥ|

karam+mardayet| -> karaṃ mardayet|

parasparam+kareṇa -> parasparaṃ kareṇa

karam+viśodhaya -> karaṃ viśodhaya

idānīm+karaśuddhinyāsamantram -> idānīṃ karaśuddhinyāsamantram

idānīṃ karaśuddhinyāsamantram+ucyate| -> idānīṃ karaśuddhinyāsamantram ucyate|

vajravaktraśuddhis+ṣaṭkulanyāsavidhiniyamas -> vajravaktraśuddhiḥ ṣaṭkulanyāsavidhiniyamas

vajravaktraśuddhiḥ ṣaṭkulanyāsavidhiniyamas+|| -> vajravaktraśuddhiḥ ṣaṭkulanyāsavidhiniyamaḥ||

nīlam+vajrasattvam -> nīlaṃ vajrasattvam

nīlaṃ vajrasattvam+nyaset -> nīlaṃ vajrasattvaṃ nyaset

nīlaṃ vajrasattvaṃ nyaset+vakṣyamāṇabhujavarṇāyudhadharam -> nīlaṃ vajrasattvaṃ nyased vakṣyamāṇabhujavarṇāyudhadharam

nīlaṃ vajrasattvaṃ nyased vakṣyamāṇabhujavarṇāyudhadharam+iti -> nīlaṃ vajrasattvaṃ nyased vakṣyamāṇabhujavarṇāyudhadharam iti

śyāmam+akṣobhyam -> śyāmam akṣobhyam

śyāmam akṣobhyam+guhye -> śyāmam akṣobhyaṃ guhye

pītam+vairocanam -> pītaṃ vairocanam

pītaṃ vairocanam+uṣṇīṣe -> pītaṃ vairocanam uṣṇīṣe

kṛṣṇam+amoghasiddhim -> kṛṣṇam amoghasiddhim

kṛṣṇam amoghasiddhim+nābhau -> kṛṣṇam amoghasiddhiṃ nābhau

raktam+ratnasambhavam -> raktaṃ ratnasambhavam

raktaṃ ratnasambhavam+hṛdaye -> raktaṃ ratnasambhavaṃ hṛdaye

śuklam+amitābham -> śuklam amitābham

śuklam amitābham+kaṇṭhe -> śuklam amitābhaṃ kaṇṭhe

ttas+lalāṭe -> tto lalāṭe

iti+uccārya -> ity uccārya

svabhāvaśuddhās+sarvadharmās -> svabhāvaśuddhāḥ sarvadharmās

svabhāvaśuddhāḥ sarvadharmās+svabhāvaśuddhas -> svabhāvaśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśuddhas

svabhāvaśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśuddhas+aham -> svabhāvaśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśuddho 'ham

tatas+mantram -> tato mantram

tato mantram+idam -> tato mantram idam

tato mantram idam+uccārayet--- -> tato mantram idam uccārayet---

haritavarṇena+ātmānam -> haritavarṇenātmānam

haritavarṇenātmānam+dhyāyāt -> haritavarṇenātmānaṃ dhyāyāt

haritavarṇenātmānaṃ dhyāyāt+mantrī -> haritavarṇenātmānaṃ dhyāyān mantrī

haritavarṇenātmānaṃ dhyāyān mantrī+iti| -> haritavarṇenātmānaṃ dhyāyān mantrīti|

haṃkārapariṇatena+ākāśamaṇḍalena -> haṃkārapariṇatenākāśamaṇḍalena

pītena+iti| -> pīteneti|

raktavarṇam+dhyāyāt -> raktavarṇaṃ dhyāyāt

raktavarṇaṃ dhyāyāt+evam -> raktavarṇaṃ dhyāyād evam

raktavarṇaṃ dhyāyād evam+rephapariṇatena| -> raktavarṇaṃ dhyāyād evaṃ rephapariṇatena|

tatas+śaśāṅkavapus -> tataḥ śaśāṅkavapus

tataḥ śaśāṅkavapus+ātmānam -> tataḥ śaśāṅkavapur ātmānam

tataḥ śaśāṅkavapur ātmānam+dhyāyāt -> tataḥ śaśāṅkavapur ātmānaṃ dhyāyāt

tataḥ śaśāṅkavapur ātmānaṃ dhyāyāt+śāntau -> tataḥ śaśāṅkavapur ātmānaṃ dhyāyāc chāntau

pādanakhāntam+yāvat -> pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat

pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat+svaśarīram -> pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat svaśarīram

pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat svaśarīram+sarpakañcukavat -> pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat svaśarīraṃ sarpakañcukavat

pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat svaśarīraṃ sarpakañcukavat+tyajet -> pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat svaśarīraṃ sarpakañcukavat tyajet

pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat svaśarīraṃ sarpakañcukavat tyajet+trīn -> pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat svaśarīraṃ sarpakañcukavat tyajet trīn

pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat svaśarīraṃ sarpakañcukavat tyajet trīn+vārān| -> pādanakhāntaṃ yāvat svaśarīraṃ sarpakañcukavat tyajet trīn vārān|

tatas+tena -> tatas tena

tatas tena+uṣṇīṣam -> tatas tenoṣṇīṣam

tatas tenoṣṇīṣam+ārabhya -> tatas tenoṣṇīṣam ārabhya

vaṃkārapariṇatam+vajracandramaṇḍalam -> vaṃkārapariṇataṃ vajracandramaṇḍalam

vaṃkārapariṇataṃ vajracandramaṇḍalam+ṣoḍaśakalāpūrṇam -> vaṃkārapariṇataṃ vajracandramaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalāpūrṇam

vaṃkārapariṇataṃ vajracandramaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalāpūrṇam+dhyāyāt -> vaṃkārapariṇataṃ vajracandramaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalāpūrṇaṃ dhyāyāt

vaṃkārapariṇataṃ vajracandramaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalāpūrṇaṃ dhyāyāt+mantrī| -> vaṃkārapariṇataṃ vajracandramaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalāpūrṇaṃ dhyāyān mantrī|

idam+mantram -> idaṃ mantram

idaṃ mantram+uccārya -> idaṃ mantram uccārya

idaṃ mantram uccārya+uṣṇīṣopari -> idaṃ mantram uccāryoṣṇīṣopari

skandhadhātvāyatanam+niḥsvabhāvam -> skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ niḥsvabhāvam

skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ niḥsvabhāvam+svāhā -> skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ svāhā

skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ svāhā+iti| -> skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ svāheti|

kāyavākcittajñānavajram+vajrāmṛtasvabhāvam -> kāyavākcittajñānavajraṃ vajrāmṛtasvabhāvam

kāyavākcittajñānavajraṃ vajrāmṛtasvabhāvam+kuru -> kāyavākcittajñānavajraṃ vajrāmṛtasvabhāvaṃ kuru

devatāniṣpādanam+prati -> devatāniṣpādanaṃ prati

tatas+śūnyatālambanam -> tataḥ śūnyatālambanam

tataḥ śūnyatālambanam+kṛtvā -> tataḥ śūnyatālambanaṃ kṛtvā

mukhaviśuddhim+tathāgatānām -> mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānām

mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānām+pūjām -> mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjām

mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjām+pāpadeśanām -> mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanām

mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanām+puṇyānumodanām -> mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanām

mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanām+triśaraṇagamanam -> mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanam

mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanam+ātmabhāvaniryātanam -> mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanam ātmabhāvaniryātanam

mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanam ātmabhāvaniryātanam+bodhicittotpādanam -> mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanam ātmabhāvaniryātanaṃ bodhicittotpādanam

mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanam ātmabhāvaniryātanaṃ bodhicittotpādanam+mārgāśrayaṇam -> mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanam ātmabhāvaniryātanaṃ bodhicittotpādanaṃ mārgāśrayaṇam

mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanam ātmabhāvaniryātanaṃ bodhicittotpādanaṃ mārgāśrayaṇam+kṛtvā -> mukhaviśuddhiṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanam ātmabhāvaniryātanaṃ bodhicittotpādanaṃ mārgāśrayaṇaṃ kṛtvā

prathamam+sādhanāpaṭale -> prathamaṃ sādhanāpaṭale

devatāsamādhis+māranigraham -> devatāsamādhir māranigraham

devatāsamādhir māranigraham+mantram -> devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantram

devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantram+kālacakrabhagavatas -> devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantraṃ kālacakrabhagavatas

devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantraṃ kālacakrabhagavatas+aṅganyāsas -> devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantraṃ kālacakrabhagavato 'ṅganyāsas

devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantraṃ kālacakrabhagavato 'ṅganyāsas+kāyavākcittaśodhanam -> devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantraṃ kālacakrabhagavato 'ṅganyāsaḥ kāyavākcittaśodhanam

devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantraṃ kālacakrabhagavato 'ṅganyāsaḥ kāyavākcittaśodhanam+ca -> devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantraṃ kālacakrabhagavato 'ṅganyāsaḥ kāyavākcittaśodhanaṃ ca

devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantraṃ kālacakrabhagavato 'ṅganyāsaḥ kāyavākcittaśodhanaṃ ca+ucyate| -> devatāsamādhir māranigrahaṃ mantraṃ kālacakrabhagavato 'ṅganyāsaḥ kāyavākcittaśodhanaṃ cocyate|

idānīm+pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam -> idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam

idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam+ārabhya -> idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhya

idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhya+idam -> idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhyedam

idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhyedam+samādhim -> idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhyedaṃ samādhim

idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhyedaṃ samādhim+yāvat -> idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhyedaṃ samādhiṃ yāvat

idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhyedaṃ samādhiṃ yāvat+mantravidhis -> idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhyedaṃ samādhiṃ yāvan mantravidhis

idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhyedaṃ samādhiṃ yāvan mantravidhis+ucyate| -> idānīṃ pūrvabhūmyāvāhanādyam ārabhyedaṃ samādhiṃ yāvan mantravidhir ucyate|

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

devyas+bhāvyās -> devyo bhāvyās

devyo bhāvyās+sūtrākāreṇa -> devyo bhāvyāḥ sūtrākāreṇa

devyo bhāvyāḥ sūtrākāreṇa+iti -> devyo bhāvyāḥ sūtrākāreṇeti

samarasās+buddhās -> samarasā buddhās

samarasā buddhās+bhāvyās -> samarasā buddhā bhāvyās

samarasā buddhā bhāvyās+raja{}ākāreṇa -> samarasā buddhā bhāvyā raja{}ākāreṇa

devīs+iti| -> devīr iti|

buddhān+ākṛṣya -> buddhān ākṛṣya

śrīkālacakram+śaśadharamadanākrāntam -> śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam

śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam+ālīḍhapādam -> śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam ālīḍhapādam

śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam ālīḍhapādam+prajñābhartros -> śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam ālīḍhapādaṃ prajñābhartros

śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam ālīḍhapādaṃ prajñābhartros+hṛdabje -> śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam ālīḍhapādaṃ prajñābhartror hṛdabje

hūṃkārasahitais+| -> hūṃkārasahitaiḥ|

savajrais+iti -> savajrair iti

kakārādyais+vyañjanais -> kakārādyair vyañjanais

kakārādyair vyañjanais+candrasūryātmakais -> kakārādyair vyañjanaiś candrasūryātmakais

kakārādyair vyañjanaiś candrasūryātmakais+| -> kakārādyair vyañjanaiś candrasūryātmakaiḥ|

kādyais+iti -> kādyair iti

ādyais+iti -> ādyair iti

ādyair iti+ākārādyais -> ādyair ity ākārādyais

ādyair ity ākārādyais+svarais -> ādyair ity ākārādyaiḥ svarais

ādyair ity ākārādyaiḥ svarais+| -> ādyair ity ākārādyaiḥ svaraiḥ|

bhāvyās+|| -> bhāvyāḥ||

samarasās+nyastasūtre -> samarasā nyastasūtre

devīs+rajasi -> devī rajasi

buddhān+ākṛṣya -> buddhān ākṛṣya

prajñābhartros+hṛdabje -> prajñābhartror hṛdabje

śrīkālacakram+śaśadharamadanākrāntam -> śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam

śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam+ālīḍhapādam| -> śrīkālacakraṃ śaśadharamadanākrāntam ālīḍhapādam|

ādyais+kādyais -> ādyaiḥ kādyais

ādyaiḥ kādyais+savajrais -> ādyaiḥ kādyaiḥ savajrais

ādyaiḥ kādyaiḥ savajrais+svahṛdayakamale -> ādyaiḥ kādyaiḥ savajraiḥ svahṛdayakamale

saṃkṣepatas+--- -> saṃkṣepataḥ---

idānīm+iṣṭadevatālambanam -> idānīm iṣṭadevatālambanam

idānīm iṣṭadevatālambanam+ucyate -> idānīm iṣṭadevatālambanam ucyate

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

veditavyas+iti -> veditavya iti

tu+atibalaparighas -> tv atibalaparighas

tv atibalaparighas+mantriṇā -> tv atibalaparigho mantriṇā

tasmāt+yuddhe -> tasmād yuddhe

kalahavigrahas+bhavati| -> kalahavigraho bhavati|

prahāras+bhavati -> prahāro bhavati

sainyanāśas+bhavati -> sainyanāśo bhavati

daṇḍākāras+| -> daṇḍākāraḥ|

phaṇī+iva -> phaṇīva

yāvat+gatayos -> yāvad gatayos

yāvad gatayos+dvayos -> yāvad gatayor dvayos

yāvad gatayor dvayos+sainyayos -> yāvad gatayor dvayoḥ sainyayos

yāvad gatayor dvayoḥ sainyayos+madhye -> yāvad gatayor dvayoḥ sainyayor madhye

āgneyyām+vāyavyām -> āgneyyāṃ vāyavyām

āgneyyāṃ vāyavyām+diśi -> āgneyyāṃ vāyavyāṃ diśi

śikhipavanagatas+iti| -> śikhipavanagata iti|

evam+bhūmau -> evaṃ bhūmau

varjanīyas+| -> varjanīyaḥ|

parighas+maṇḍale -> parigho maṇḍale

anayos+madhye -> anayor madhye

prajñāṅgam+dakṣiṇapaścimam -> prajñāṅgaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimam

prajñāṅgaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimam+upāyāṅgam -> prajñāṅgaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimam upāyāṅgam

prajñāṅgaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimam upāyāṅgam+pūrvottaram| -> prajñāṅgaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimam upāyāṅgaṃ pūrvottaram|

varjanīyas+iti| -> varjanīya iti|

parighas+maṇḍale -> parigho maṇḍale

veditavyas+|| -> veditavyaḥ||

tu+atibalaparighas -> tv atibalaparighas

tv atibalaparighas+mantriṇā -> tv atibalaparigho mantriṇā

tasmāt+yuddhe -> tasmād yuddhe

tu+aṅgayuddhe -> tv aṅgayuddhe

sainyanāśas+bhavati -> sainyanāśo bhavati

phaṇī+iva| -> phaṇīva|

śikhipavanagatas+sainyamadhye -> śikhipavanagataḥ sainyamadhye

saparighas+maṇḍale -> saparigho maṇḍale

idānīm+parighas -> idānīṃ parighas

idānīṃ parighas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ parigha ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

sūtrapātas+vidheyas -> sūtrapāto vidheyas

sūtrapāto vidheyas+iti -> sūtrapāto vidheya iti

evam+vyatikrameṇa -> evaṃ vyatikrameṇa

paryaṅkam+dakṣiṇapādatalam -> paryaṅkaṃ dakṣiṇapādatalam

paryaṅkaṃ dakṣiṇapādatalam+bhūminiṣaṇṇam -> paryaṅkaṃ dakṣiṇapādatalaṃ bhūminiṣaṇṇam

paryaṅkaṃ dakṣiṇapādatalaṃ bhūminiṣaṇṇam+samapadena| -> paryaṅkaṃ dakṣiṇapādatalaṃ bhūminiṣaṇṇaṃ samapadena|

iha+ācāryasya -> ihācāryasya

samaviṣamapadais+sūtrapātas -> samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapātas

samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapātas+vidheyas -> samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapāto vidheyas

samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapāto vidheyas+| -> samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapāto vidheyaḥ|

tatas+bhūyas -> tato bhūyas

tato bhūyas+labdhe -> tato bhūyo labdhe

yāvat+nimittam -> yāvan nimittam

yāvan nimittam+punar -> yāvan nimittaṃ punar

yāvan nimittaṃ punar+bhavati| -> yāvan nimittaṃ punar bhavati|

vibhos+mantrajāpam -> vibhor mantrajāpam

vibhor mantrajāpam+prakuryāt -> vibhor mantrajāpaṃ prakuryāt

vibhor mantrajāpaṃ prakuryāt+ācāryas -> vibhor mantrajāpaṃ prakuryād ācāryas

vibhor mantrajāpaṃ prakuryād ācāryas+| -> vibhor mantrajāpaṃ prakuryād ācāryaḥ|

durnimittam+punar -> durnimittaṃ punar

durnimittaṃ punar+api -> durnimittaṃ punar api

tat+dṛṣṭvā -> tad dṛṣṭvā

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

prakaṭayati+iti -> prakaṭayatīti

rājabhaṅgam+ca -> rājabhaṅgaṃ ca

gurvādīnām+bhayam -> gurvādīnāṃ bhayam

gurvādīnāṃ bhayam+prakaṭayati -> gurvādīnāṃ bhayaṃ prakaṭayati

maṇḍalikāvātena+uddhūtam -> maṇḍalikāvātenoddhūtam

maṇḍalikāvātenoddhūtam+rajas -> maṇḍalikāvātenoddhūtaṃ rajas

maṇḍalikāvātenoddhūtaṃ rajas+yadā -> maṇḍalikāvātenoddhūtaṃ rajo yadā

vātoddhūtam+rajas -> vātoddhūtaṃ rajas

vātoddhūtaṃ rajas+cet -> vātoddhūtaṃ rajaś cet

vātoddhūtaṃ rajaś cet+iha -> vātoddhūtaṃ rajaś ced iha

putrakāṇām+kṣatis -> putrakāṇāṃ kṣatis

putrakāṇāṃ kṣatis+| -> putrakāṇāṃ kṣatiḥ|

guros+kṣatis -> guroḥ kṣatis

guroḥ kṣatis+bhavati| -> guroḥ kṣatir bhavati|

samaviṣamapadais+sūtrapātas -> samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapātas

samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapātas+vidheyas -> samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapāto vidheyas

samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapāto vidheyas+|| -> samaviṣamapadaiḥ sūtrapāto vidheyaḥ||

bhūyas+labdhe -> bhūyo labdhe

vibhos+mantrajāpam -> vibhor mantrajāpam

vibhor mantrajāpam+prakuryāt -> vibhor mantrajāpaṃ prakuryāt

durnimittam+punar -> durnimittaṃ punar

durnimittaṃ punar+api -> durnimittaṃ punar api

tat+dṛṣṭvā -> tad dṛṣṭvā

bhayam+rājyabhaṅgas -> bhayaṃ rājyabhaṅgas

bhayaṃ rājyabhaṅgas+ca -> bhayaṃ rājyabhaṅgaś ca

vātoddhūtam+rajas -> vātoddhūtaṃ rajas

vātoddhūtaṃ rajas+cet -> vātoddhūtaṃ rajaś cet

vātoddhūtaṃ rajaś cet+prakaṭayati -> vātoddhūtaṃ rajaś cet prakaṭayati

kṣatis+api -> kṣatir api

guros+ca -> guroś ca

idānīm+durnimittalakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ durnimittalakṣaṇam

idānīṃ durnimittalakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ durnimittalakṣaṇam ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

prathamam+pūrvadiśam -> prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam

prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam+aparam -> prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparam

prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparam+paścimadiśam -> prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparaṃ paścimadiśam

prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparaṃ paścimadiśam+maṇḍalam -> prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparaṃ paścimadiśaṃ maṇḍalam

prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparaṃ paścimadiśaṃ maṇḍalam+sūtraṇīyam -> prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparaṃ paścimadiśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sūtraṇīyam

prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparaṃ paścimadiśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sūtraṇīyam+guruśiṣyābhyām -> prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparaṃ paścimadiśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sūtraṇīyaṃ guruśiṣyābhyām

prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparaṃ paścimadiśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sūtraṇīyaṃ guruśiṣyābhyām+iti -> prathamaṃ pūrvadiśam aparaṃ paścimadiśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sūtraṇīyaṃ guruśiṣyābhyām iti

śiṣyas+vā -> śiṣyo vā

suptas+yāvat -> supto yāvat

supto yāvat+ācāryas -> supto yāvad ācāryas

supto yāvad ācāryas+nimittam -> supto yāvad ācāryo nimittam

supto yāvad ācāryo nimittam+labhate -> supto yāvad ācāryo nimittaṃ labhate

tatas+vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa -> tato vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa

vijayakalaśam+dattvā -> vijayakalaśaṃ dattvā

rajas+bhāṇḍāni -> rajo bhāṇḍāni

vajram+yame -> vajraṃ yame

sūtram+sure -> sūtraṃ sure

ṣoḍaśahasta evaṃ sahasrahastam+yāvat -> ṣoḍaśahasta evaṃ sahasrahastaṃ yāvat

ca+uttare -> cottare

vasunṛpayugasāhasram+eva -> vasunṛpayugasāhasram eva

idānīṃ saṃkṣepatas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ saṃkṣepata ucyate---

tasmāt+buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānam -> tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānam

tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānam+śiṣyādīnām -> tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnām

tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnām+kurvantu -> tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ kurvantu

tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ kurvantu+iti -> tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ kurvantv iti

tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ kurvantv iti+adhyeṣaṇāniyamas -> tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ kurvantv ity adhyeṣaṇāniyamas

tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ kurvantv ity adhyeṣaṇāniyamas+rakṣaniyamas -> tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ kurvantv ity adhyeṣaṇāniyamo rakṣaniyamas

tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ kurvantv ity adhyeṣaṇāniyamo rakṣaniyamas+|| -> tasmād buddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ kurvantv ity adhyeṣaṇāniyamo rakṣaniyamaḥ||

tatas+buddhān -> tato buddhān

tato buddhān+adhyeṣayet -> tato buddhān adhyeṣayet

tato buddhān adhyeṣayet+sattvānām -> tato buddhān adhyeṣayet sattvānām

tato buddhān adhyeṣayet sattvānām+mokṣahetos -> tato buddhān adhyeṣayet sattvānāṃ mokṣahetos

tato buddhān adhyeṣayet sattvānāṃ mokṣahetos+amukam -> tato buddhān adhyeṣayet sattvānāṃ mokṣahetor amukam

tato buddhān adhyeṣayet sattvānāṃ mokṣahetor amukam+api -> tato buddhān adhyeṣayet sattvānāṃ mokṣahetor amukam api

pustakānāṃ rakṣām+kṛtvā -> pustakānāṃ rakṣāṃ kṛtvā

cakārāt+aparāyām -> cakārād aparāyām

sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇam+pūrṇimāyām -> sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pūrṇimāyām

sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pūrṇimāyām+dadati -> sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ dadati

sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ dadati+iti -> sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ dadatīti

sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ dadatīti+āgamapāṭhas -> sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ dadatīty āgamapāṭhas

sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ dadatīty āgamapāṭhas+| -> sekādyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ dadatīty āgamapāṭhaḥ|

trayodaśyām+caturdaśyām -> trayodaśyāṃ caturdaśyām

trayodaśyāṃ caturdaśyām+śrīrajaḥpāras -> trayodaśyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrīrajaḥpāras

trayodaśyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrīrajaḥpāras+| -> trayodaśyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrīrajaḥpāraḥ|

dvādaśyām+sūtrapātas -> dvādaśyāṃ sūtrapātas

dvādaśyāṃ sūtrapātas+kartavyas -> dvādaśyāṃ sūtrapātaḥ kartavyas

dvādaśyāṃ sūtrapātaḥ kartavyas+| -> dvādaśyāṃ sūtrapātaḥ kartavyaḥ|

tatas+maṇḍalālekhanakālam -> tato maṇḍalālekhanakālam

tato maṇḍalālekhanakālam+jñātvā -> tato maṇḍalālekhanakālaṃ jñātvā

putrakāṇām+śiṣyāṇām -> putrakāṇāṃ śiṣyāṇām

putrakāṇāṃ śiṣyāṇām+saṃgrahas -> putrakāṇāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahas

putrakāṇāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahas+pūrṇimāyām| -> putrakāṇāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaḥ pūrṇimāyām|

pūrṇāyām+arcanādikam| -> pūrṇāyām arcanādikam|

tatas+grahaṇam -> tato grahaṇam

tato grahaṇam+api -> tato grahaṇam api

pūrayet+iti| -> pūrayed iti|

bhūmim+śodhayet -> bhūmiṃ śodhayet

bhūmiṃ śodhayet+pūrvoktamṛttikayā -> bhūmiṃ śodhayet pūrvoktamṛttikayā

kṛṣṇapañcamyām+daśamyām -> kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ daśamyām

kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ daśamyām+amāvasyāyām -> kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ daśamyām amāvasyāyām

kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ daśamyām amāvasyāyām+naṣṭacandre -> kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ daśamyām amāvasyāyāṃ naṣṭacandre

pūrayet+iti| -> pūrayed iti|

tatas+pūrvoktamṛttikayā -> tataḥ pūrvoktamṛttikayā

bhūmim+śodhayet| -> bhūmiṃ śodhayet|

śuklapañcamyām+daśamyām -> śuklapañcamyāṃ daśamyām

śuklapañcamyāṃ daśamyām+pañcadaśamyām -> śuklapañcamyāṃ daśamyāṃ pañcadaśamyām

śuklapañcamyāṃ daśamyāṃ pañcadaśamyām+viṣṭim -> śuklapañcamyāṃ daśamyāṃ pañcadaśamyāṃ viṣṭim

śuklapañcamyāṃ daśamyāṃ pañcadaśamyāṃ viṣṭim+varjayitvā -> śuklapañcamyāṃ daśamyāṃ pañcadaśamyāṃ viṣṭiṃ varjayitvā

jñātvā+iha -> jñātveha

kālāvadhim+jñātvā -> kālāvadhiṃ jñātvā

ṣaṭ+pūrṇās -> ṣaṭ pūrṇās

ṣaṭ pūrṇās+tadyathā -> ṣaṭ pūrṇās tadyathā

pūrṇāyām+ityādi| -> pūrṇāyām ityādi|

na+anyarātrau -> nānyarātrau

tasmin+rātrau -> tasmin rātrau

varagurus+mārabhaṅge -> varagurur mārabhaṅge

sekādyam+pūrṇimāyām -> sekādyaṃ pūrṇimāyām

sekādyaṃ pūrṇimāyām+dadati -> sekādyaṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ dadati

śrīrajaḥpātas+eva| -> śrīrajaḥpāta eva|

dvādaśyām+sūtrapātas -> dvādaśyāṃ sūtrapātas

dvādaśyāṃ sūtrapātas+madanamanudine -> dvādaśyāṃ sūtrapāto madanamanudine

saṃgrahas+putrakāṇām -> saṃgrahaḥ putrakāṇām

pūrṇāyām+bhūmiśuddhis -> pūrṇāyāṃ bhūmiśuddhis

pūrṇāyāṃ bhūmiśuddhis+grahaṇam -> pūrṇāyāṃ bhūmiśuddhir grahaṇam

pūrṇāyāṃ bhūmiśuddhir grahaṇam+api -> pūrṇāyāṃ bhūmiśuddhir grahaṇam api

idānīm+bhūmiśodhanārtham -> idānīṃ bhūmiśodhanārtham

idānīṃ bhūmiśodhanārtham+dinam -> idānīṃ bhūmiśodhanārthaṃ dinam

idānīṃ bhūmiśodhanārthaṃ dinam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ bhūmiśodhanārthaṃ dinam ucyate---

sthānaśuddhiniyamas+|| -> sthānaśuddhiniyamaḥ||

yāgādihetos+iti -> yāgādihetor iti

prāsādārtham+gṛhārtham -> prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārtham

prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārtham+prakaṭitaniyatas -> prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyatas

prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyatas+ca -> prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyataś ca

prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyataś ca+atra -> prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyataś cātra

maṇḍalārtham+hi -> maṇḍalārthaṃ hi

sukhakaras+bhavati -> sukhakaro bhavati

kācas+vā -> kāco vā

śaṅkhas+ca -> śaṅkhaś ca

ratnam+vā -> ratnaṃ vā

guṇavaśāt+śodhanīyam -> guṇavaśāc chodhanīyam

guṇavaśāc chodhanīyam+hi -> guṇavaśāc chodhanīyaṃ hi

vināśas+bhavati -> vināśo bhavati

tasmin+sthāne -> tasmin sthāne

śṛṅgam+asādhāraṇam -> śṛṅgam asādhāraṇam

śṛṅgam asādhāraṇam+maraṇabhayakaram -> śṛṅgam asādhāraṇaṃ maraṇabhayakaram

śṛṅgam asādhāraṇaṃ maraṇabhayakaram+śubhakarmaṇi -> śṛṅgam asādhāraṇaṃ maraṇabhayakaraṃ śubhakarmaṇi

sāṅgāram+aṅgāram -> sāṅgāram aṅgāram

sāṅgāram aṅgāram+vā -> sāṅgāram aṅgāraṃ vā

tasmāt+śodhanīyam -> tasmāc chodhanīyam

tasmāc chodhanīyam+śalyam -> tasmāc chodhanīyaṃ śalyam

tasmāc chodhanīyaṃ śalyam+manuṣyāsthi -> tasmāc chodhanīyaṃ śalyaṃ manuṣyāsthi

vighnakaram+bhavati| -> vighnakaraṃ bhavati|

śalyādikam+niviṣṭam -> śalyādikaṃ niviṣṭam

śalyādikaṃ niviṣṭam+śubhakarmaṇi -> śalyādikaṃ niviṣṭaṃ śubhakarmaṇi

yāgādihetos+|| -> yāgādihetoḥ||

prāsādārtham+gṛhārtham -> prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārtham

prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārtham+prakaṭitaniyatas -> prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyatas

prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyatas+ca -> prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyataś ca

prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyataś ca+atra -> prāsādārthaṃ gṛhārthaṃ prakaṭitaniyataś cātra

kācas+viṣayasukhakaras -> kāco viṣayasukhakaras

kāco viṣayasukhakaro maṇḍalārtham+hi -> kāco viṣayasukhakaro maṇḍalārthaṃ hi

ratnaṃ śaṅkhas+ca -> ratnaṃ śaṅkhaś ca

guṇavaśāt+śodhanīyam -> guṇavaśāc chodhanīyam

guṇavaśāc chodhanīyam+hi -> guṇavaśāc chodhanīyaṃ hi

vināśas+bhavati -> vināśo bhavati

tasmin+sthāne -> tasmin sthāne

śalyam+sāṅgāraśṛṅgam -> śalyaṃ sāṅgāraśṛṅgam

śalyaṃ sāṅgāraśṛṅgam+maraṇabhayakaram -> śalyaṃ sāṅgāraśṛṅgaṃ maraṇabhayakaram

śalyaṃ sāṅgāraśṛṅgaṃ maraṇabhayakaram+bhūmigarbhe -> śalyaṃ sāṅgāraśṛṅgaṃ maraṇabhayakaraṃ bhūmigarbhe

idānīm+bhūmikhāninimittam -> idānīṃ bhūmikhāninimittam

idānīṃ bhūmikhāninimittam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ bhūmikhāninimittam ucyate---

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

vinyaset+praharaṇasahitān -> vinyaset praharaṇasahitān

vinyaset praharaṇasahitān+bhūmikīlanarakṣaṇārtham -> vinyaset praharaṇasahitān bhūmikīlanarakṣaṇārtham

vinyaset praharaṇasahitān bhūmikīlanarakṣaṇārtham+iti -> vinyaset praharaṇasahitān bhūmikīlanarakṣaṇārtham iti

uktakrodhān+daśadigvibhāge -> uktakrodhān daśadigvibhāge

sarvān+dṛḍhakhadiramayais -> sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayais

sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayais+kīlakais -> sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakais

sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakais+kīlayet -> sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet

sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet+kṣmām -> sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet kṣmām

sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet kṣmām+vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa -> sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet kṣmāṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa

sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet kṣmāṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa+iti -> sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet kṣmāṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇeti

sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet kṣmāṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇeti+adhyeṣaṇāniyamas -> sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet kṣmāṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇety adhyeṣaṇāniyamas

sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet kṣmāṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇety adhyeṣaṇāniyamas+| -> sarvān dṛḍhakhadiramayaiḥ kīlakaiḥ kīlayet kṣmāṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇety adhyeṣaṇāniyamaḥ|

tān+eva -> tān eva

tān eva+adhyeṣya -> tān evādhyeṣya

sekahetos+| -> sekahetoḥ|

mām+vai -> māṃ vai

vyapagatakaluṣās+bodhisattvās -> vyapagatakaluṣā bodhisattvās

vyapagatakaluṣā bodhisattvās+sabhāryās -> vyapagatakaluṣā bodhisattvāḥ sabhāryās

buddhās+sarvadikṣu -> buddhāḥ sarvadikṣu

praharaṇasahitān+vinyaset -> praharaṇasahitān vinyaset

praharaṇasahitān vinyaset+rakṣaṇārtham|| -> praharaṇasahitān vinyased rakṣaṇārtham||

dikkrodhān+digvibhāge -> dikkrodhān digvibhāge

tān eva+adhyeṣya -> tān evādhyeṣya

mām+vai -> māṃ vai

vyapagatakaluṣās+bodhisattvās -> vyapagatakaluṣā bodhisattvās

buddhās+sarvadikṣu -> buddhāḥ sarvadikṣu

tatas+buddhādīnām -> tato buddhādīnām

tato buddhādīnām+vakṣyamāṇapūjām -> tato buddhādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇapūjām

tato buddhādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇapūjām+kṛtvā -> tato buddhādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇapūjāṃ kṛtvā

tato buddhādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇapūjāṃ kṛtvā+arghādikam -> tato buddhādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇapūjāṃ kṛtvārghādikam

tato buddhādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇapūjāṃ kṛtvārghādikam+dattvā -> tato buddhādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇapūjāṃ kṛtvārghādikaṃ dattvā

sākṣibhūtayā+iti| -> sākṣibhūtayeti|

māranāśam+karomi -> māranāśaṃ karomi

śiṣyāṇām+sekahetos -> śiṣyāṇāṃ sekahetos

śiṣyāṇāṃ sekahetos+aham -> śiṣyāṇāṃ sekahetor aham

sainyaṃ prabalam+api -> sainyaṃ prabalam api

tām+vai -> tāṃ vai

tāṃ vai+iti -> tāṃ vā iti

tāṃ vā iti+anuprārthanā|| -> tāṃ vā ity anuprārthanā||

paścāt+śuddhim -> paścāc chuddhim

paścāc chuddhim+yatheṣṭām -> paścāc chuddhiṃ yatheṣṭām

paścāc chuddhiṃ yatheṣṭām+kuru -> paścāc chuddhiṃ yatheṣṭāṃ kuru

sasalilakusumais+arghagandhādisahitais -> sasalilakusumair arghagandhādisahitais

sasalilakusumair arghagandhādisahitais+argham -> sasalilakusumair arghagandhādisahitair argham

sasalilakusumair arghagandhādisahitair argham+asyai -> sasalilakusumair arghagandhādisahitair argham asyai
