ebhir mantrapadais+pūrvoktārghapātre -> ebhir mantrapadaiḥ pūrvoktārghapātre

bhūmim+ca -> bhūmiṃ ca

bhūmiṃ ca+āvāhayitvā -> bhūmiṃ cāvāhayitvā

tām+vai|| -> tāṃ vai||

paścāt+śuddhim -> paścāc chuddhim

paścāc chuddhim+yatheṣṭām -> paścāc chuddhiṃ yatheṣṭām

paścāc chuddhiṃ yatheṣṭām+bhuvinilaye -> paścāc chuddhiṃ yatheṣṭāṃ bhuvinilaye

sasalilakusumais+argham -> sasalilakusumair argham

sasalilakusumair argham+asyai -> sasalilakusumair argham asyai

bhūmim+ca -> bhūmiṃ ca

bhūmiṃ ca+āvāhayitvā -> bhūmiṃ cāvāhayitvā

gatam+nirdahet -> gataṃ nirdahet

gataṃ nirdahet+māravṛndam| -> gataṃ nirdahen māravṛndam|

paścāt+vajrais -> paścād vajrais

paścād vajrais+caturbhis -> paścād vajraiś caturbhis

paścād vajraiś caturbhis+diśi -> paścād vajraiś caturbhir diśi

balim+kṣetrapālāya -> baliṃ kṣetrapālāya

trivajrais+prathamam -> trivajraiḥ prathamam

trivajraiḥ prathamam+api -> trivajraiḥ prathamam api

bhūmiśuddhinimittam+ucyate--- -> bhūmiśuddhinimittam ucyate---

idānīm+pṛthivyāvāhanam -> idānīṃ pṛthivyāvāhanam

idānīṃ pṛthivyāvāhanam+vakṣyamāṇasamādhinā -> idānīṃ pṛthivyāvāhanaṃ vakṣyamāṇasamādhinā

idānīm+eṣām -> idānīm eṣām

idānīm eṣām+krodhādīnām -> idānīm eṣāṃ krodhādīnām

idānīm eṣāṃ krodhādīnām+pratyekam -> idānīm eṣāṃ krodhādīnāṃ pratyekam

idānīm eṣāṃ krodhādīnāṃ pratyekam+balimantrapadāni -> idānīm eṣāṃ krodhādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ balimantrapadāni

vyapagatakaluṣam+yoginā -> vyapagatakaluṣaṃ yoginā

ātmānam+tasya -> ātmānaṃ tasya

madhye+abjam -> madhye 'bjam

madhye 'bjam+sūryahastam -> madhye 'bjaṃ sūryahastam

madhye 'bjaṃ sūryahastam+bhavati -> madhye 'bjaṃ sūryahastaṃ bhavati

kṣititalanilayāt+ambare -> kṣititalanilayād ambare

prātas+chāyāvasāne -> prātaś chāyāvasāne

triprākārān+trivajrais -> triprākārāṃś trivajrais

triprākārāṃś trivajrais+mahivalayagatān -> triprākārāṃś trivajrair mahivalayagatān

triprākārāṃś trivajrair mahivalayagatān+dūradṛṣṭyā -> triprākārāṃś trivajrair mahivalayagatān dūradṛṣṭyā

triprākārāṃś trivajrair mahivalayagatān dūradṛṣṭyā+avasāne -> triprākārāṃś trivajrair mahivalayagatān dūradṛṣṭyāvasāne

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

tasmāt+yat -> tasmād yat

tasmād yat+kiṃcit -> tasmād yat kiṃcit

tasmād yat kiṃcit+iṣṭam -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭam

tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭam+guruniyamayutam -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutam

tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutam+sādhakais -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ sādhakais

tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ sādhakais+sādhanīyam -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ sādhakaiḥ sādhanīyam

tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ sādhakaiḥ sādhanīyam+iti -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ sādhakaiḥ sādhanīyam iti

atas+bhagavatas -> ato bhagavatas

ato bhagavatas+niyamas -> ato bhagavato niyamas

ato bhagavato niyamas+| -> ato bhagavato niyamaḥ|

cittadhāturakṣakās+| -> cittadhāturakṣakāḥ|

pṛthvītoyodbhūtās+kāyadhāturakṣakās -> pṛthvītoyodbhūtāḥ kāyadhāturakṣakās

pṛthvītoyodbhūtāḥ kāyadhāturakṣakās+agnivāyudhātūdbhūtās -> pṛthvītoyodbhūtāḥ kāyadhāturakṣakā agnivāyudhātūdbhūtās

pṛthvītoyodbhūtāḥ kāyadhāturakṣakā agnivāyudhātūdbhūtās+vāgdhāturakṣakās -> pṛthvītoyodbhūtāḥ kāyadhāturakṣakā agnivāyudhātūdbhūtā vāgdhāturakṣakās

pṛthvītoyodbhūtāḥ kāyadhāturakṣakā agnivāyudhātūdbhūtā vāgdhāturakṣakās+śūnyajñānadhātūdbhūtās -> pṛthvītoyodbhūtāḥ kāyadhāturakṣakā agnivāyudhātūdbhūtā vāgdhāturakṣakāḥ śūnyajñānadhātūdbhūtās

pṛthvītoyodbhūtāḥ kāyadhāturakṣakā agnivāyudhātūdbhūtā vāgdhāturakṣakāḥ śūnyajñānadhātūdbhūtās+sarvatra -> pṛthvītoyodbhūtāḥ kāyadhāturakṣakā agnivāyudhātūdbhūtā vāgdhāturakṣakāḥ śūnyajñānadhātūdbhūtāḥ sarvatra

deyās+| -> deyāḥ|

kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānām+kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇām -> kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇām

kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇām+jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitās -> kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitās

kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitās+krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtās -> kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitāḥ krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtās

kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitāḥ krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtās+ṣaḍvargātmikās -> kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitāḥ krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtāḥ ṣaḍvargātmikās

kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitāḥ krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtāḥ ṣaḍvargātmikās+rakṣāpālās -> kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitāḥ krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtāḥ ṣaḍvargātmikā rakṣāpālās

kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitāḥ krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtāḥ ṣaḍvargātmikā rakṣāpālās+abhyantarabāhyatas -> kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitāḥ krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtāḥ ṣaḍvargātmikā rakṣāpālā abhyantarabāhyatas

kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitāḥ krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtāḥ ṣaḍvargātmikā rakṣāpālā abhyantarabāhyatas+sampuṭayogena -> kāyavākcittadharmaviśuddhānāṃ kūṭāgāratriprākārapañcaprākārāṇāṃ jñānākāśavāyuteja{}udakapṛthvīṣaḍdhātujanitāḥ krodharājarūpārūpadaśadikpālagrahanāgabhūtāḥ ṣaḍvargātmikā rakṣāpālā abhyantarabāhyataḥ sampuṭayogena

tato ghajhaḍhabhadhadhas+kūṭākārān -> tato ghajhaḍhabhadhadhaḥ kūṭākārān

bhāvyau+iti| -> bhāvyāv iti|

toyakṛtsnāv uttareśānayos+toyamaṇḍalam -> toyakṛtsnāv uttareśānayos toyamaṇḍalam

lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannam+mahābalam -> lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ mahābalam

lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ mahābalam+pītam -> lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ mahābalaṃ pītam

lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ mahābalaṃ pītam+vajroṣṇīṣadvāreṇa -> lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ mahābalaṃ pītaṃ vajroṣṇīṣadvāreṇa

lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannam+yamāntakam -> lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ yamāntakam

lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ yamāntakam+pītam -> lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ yamāntakaṃ pītam

lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ yamāntakaṃ pītam+pāyudvāreṇa -> lḷkārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ yamāntakaṃ pītaṃ pāyudvāreṇa

niścārya+īśānāre -> niścāryeśānāre

vūkāraniṣpannam+acalam -> vūkāraniṣpannam acalam

vūkāraniṣpannam acalaṃ śuklam+mūtradvāreṇa -> vūkāraniṣpannam acalaṃ śuklaṃ mūtradvāreṇa

sthāpayet+candre -> sthāpayec candre

ṛkāraniṣpannam+ṭakkirājam -> ṛkāraniṣpannaṃ ṭakkirājam

ṛkāraniṣpannaṃ ṭakkirājam+raktam -> ṛkāraniṣpannaṃ ṭakkirājaṃ raktam

ṛkāraniṣpannaṃ ṭakkirājaṃ raktam+dakṣiṇacakṣurdvāreṇa -> ṛkāraniṣpannaṃ ṭakkirājaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇacakṣurdvāreṇa

sthāpayet+sūrye -> sthāpayet sūrye

ṛkāraniṣpannaṃ prajñāntakam+raktam -> ṛkāraniṣpannaṃ prajñāntakaṃ raktam

sthāpayet+candre -> sthāpayec candre

niścārya+āgneyāre -> niścāryāgneyāre

yīkāraniṣpannaṃ nīladaṇḍam+kṛṣṇam -> yīkāraniṣpannaṃ nīladaṇḍaṃ kṛṣṇam

yīkāraniṣpannaṃ nīladaṇḍaṃ kṛṣṇam+dakṣiṇanāsādvāreṇa -> yīkāraniṣpannaṃ nīladaṇḍaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dakṣiṇanāsādvāreṇa

sthāpayet+iti -> sthāpayed iti

kṛṣṇavarṇam+pūrvāre -> kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ pūrvāre

evam+yikāraniṣpannam -> evaṃ yikāraniṣpannam

evaṃ yikāraniṣpannam+vighnāntakam -> evaṃ yikāraniṣpannaṃ vighnāntakam

evaṃ yikāraniṣpannaṃ vighnāntakam+vāmanāsādvāreṇa -> evaṃ yikāraniṣpannaṃ vighnāntakaṃ vāmanāsādvāreṇa

niścārya+iti| -> niścāryeti|

sthāpayet+dakṣiṇakarṇadvāreṇa -> sthāpayed dakṣiṇakarṇadvāreṇa

evam+dīrghahākāraniṣpannam -> evaṃ dīrghahākāraniṣpannam

evaṃ dīrghahākāraniṣpannam+sumbharājam -> evaṃ dīrghahākāraniṣpannaṃ sumbharājam

evaṃ dīrghahākāraniṣpannaṃ sumbharājaṃ nīlavarṇam+vajrabhūmitale -> evaṃ dīrghahākāraniṣpannaṃ sumbharājaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ vajrabhūmitale

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

candrāsanasthās+iti -> candrāsanasthā iti

sūryāsanasthās+uttare -> sūryāsanasthā uttare

sūryasthās+| -> sūryasthāḥ|

candrasthās+dikṣu -> candrasthā dikṣu

sūryasthās+tathā -> sūryasthās tathā

candrasthās+vidikṣu -> candrasthā vidikṣu

evam+kāyabhedena -> evaṃ kāyabhedena

candrasthās+| -> candrasthāḥ|

sūryasthās+sarve -> sūryasthāḥ sarve

atas+sūryasya -> ataḥ sūryasya

ataḥ sūryasya+ṛṇadhanabhedena -> ataḥ sūryasyarṇadhanabhedena

śaśinas+vajravegas -> śaśino vajravegas

śaśino vajravegas+yugais -> śaśino vajravego yugais

śaśino vajravego yugais+yamāntakādayas -> śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayas

śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayas+catvāras -> śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayaś catvāras

śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayaś catvāras+rasais -> śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayaś catvāro rasais

śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayaś catvāro rasais+uṣṇīṣādayas -> śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayaś catvāro rasair uṣṇīṣādayas

śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayaś catvāro rasair uṣṇīṣādayas+ṣaṭ -> śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayaś catvāro rasair uṣṇīṣādayaḥ ṣaṭ

śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayaś catvāro rasair uṣṇīṣādayaḥ ṣaṭ+iti| -> śaśino vajravego yugair yamāntakādayaś catvāro rasair uṣṇīṣādayaḥ ṣaḍ iti|

rasayugaśaśinas+iti -> rasayugaśaśina iti

ravikās+ekādaśa -> ravikā ekādaśa

krodhānām+pañcavidhas -> krodhānāṃ pañcavidhas

krodhānāṃ pañcavidhas+nyāsas -> krodhānāṃ pañcavidho nyāsas

krodhānāṃ pañcavidho nyāsas+ravikābhedena| -> krodhānāṃ pañcavidho nyāso ravikābhedena|

voṣṇīṣam+sthāpayet -> voṣṇīṣaṃ sthāpayet

hakārotpannam+haritavarṇam -> hakārotpannaṃ haritavarṇam

hakārotpannaṃ haritavarṇam+vakṣyamāṇabhujāyudhavaktram -> hakārotpannaṃ haritavarṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇabhujāyudhavaktram

hakārotpannaṃ haritavarṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇabhujāyudhavaktram+vāmakarṇadvāreṇa -> hakārotpannaṃ haritavarṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇabhujāyudhavaktraṃ vāmakarṇadvāreṇa

tatas+hṛdaye -> tato hṛdaye

samādhis+---prathamam -> samādhiḥ---prathamam

samādhiḥ---prathamam+vajravegam -> samādhiḥ---prathamaṃ vajravegam

samādhiḥ---prathamaṃ vajravegam+ātmānam -> samādhiḥ---prathamaṃ vajravegam ātmānam

samādhiḥ---prathamaṃ vajravegam ātmānam+dhyātvā -> samādhiḥ---prathamaṃ vajravegam ātmānaṃ dhyātvā

krodhādikam+devatāgaṇam -> krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇam

krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇam+sphāraṇīyam -> krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇaṃ sphāraṇīyam

krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇaṃ sphāraṇīyam+maṇḍalabhūmirakṣārtham -> krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇaṃ sphāraṇīyaṃ maṇḍalabhūmirakṣārtham

krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇaṃ sphāraṇīyaṃ maṇḍalabhūmirakṣārtham+śiṣyādīnām -> krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇaṃ sphāraṇīyaṃ maṇḍalabhūmirakṣārthaṃ śiṣyādīnām

krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇaṃ sphāraṇīyaṃ maṇḍalabhūmirakṣārthaṃ śiṣyādīnām+ca -> krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇaṃ sphāraṇīyaṃ maṇḍalabhūmirakṣārthaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ ca

krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇaṃ sphāraṇīyaṃ maṇḍalabhūmirakṣārthaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ ca+iti| -> krodhādikaṃ devatāgaṇaṃ sphāraṇīyaṃ maṇḍalabhūmirakṣārthaṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ ceti|

tasmāt+tam -> tasmāt tam

tasmāt tam+krodhendram -> tasmāt taṃ krodhendram

tasmāt taṃ krodhendram+yat -> tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat

tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat+kiṃcit -> tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcit

tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcit+iṣṭam -> tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭam

tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭam+guruniyamayutam -> tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutam

tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutam+buddhavacanayuktam -> tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ buddhavacanayuktam

tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ buddhavacanayuktam+sādhakais -> tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ buddhavacanayuktaṃ sādhakais

tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ buddhavacanayuktaṃ sādhakais+sādhanīyam -> tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ buddhavacanayuktaṃ sādhakaiḥ sādhanīyam

tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ buddhavacanayuktaṃ sādhakaiḥ sādhanīyam+iti| -> tasmāt taṃ krodhendraṃ yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ guruniyamayutaṃ buddhavacanayuktaṃ sādhakaiḥ sādhanīyam iti|

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

vakṣyamāṇas+iti -> vakṣyamāṇa iti

bhāvanīyas+mantriṇā -> bhāvanīyo mantriṇā

dvyadhikajinakaras+vajravegas -> dvyadhikajinakaro vajravegas

dvyadhikajinakaro vajravegas+yugāsyas -> dvyadhikajinakaro vajravego yugāsyas

dvyadhikajinakaro vajravego yugāsyas+iti -> dvyadhikajinakaro vajravego yugāsya iti

evam+krodhendras -> evaṃ krodhendras

evaṃ krodhendras+cakramadhye -> evaṃ krodhendraś cakramadhye

vakṣyamāṇakrodhavajravegarūpam+ṣaḍviṃśatibhujam -> vakṣyamāṇakrodhavajravegarūpaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujam

vakṣyamāṇakrodhavajravegarūpaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujam+caturmukham -> vakṣyamāṇakrodhavajravegarūpaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ caturmukham

vakṣyamāṇakrodhavajravegarūpaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ caturmukham+vyapagatakaluṣam| -> vakṣyamāṇakrodhavajravegarūpaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ caturmukhaṃ vyapagatakaluṣam|

ātmānam+tasya -> ātmānaṃ tasya

nemis+vā -> nemir vā

dvādaśahastam+bhāvayet -> dvādaśahastaṃ bhāvayet

dvādaśahastaṃ bhāvayet+aṣṭāram -> dvādaśahastaṃ bhāvayed aṣṭāram

dvādaśahastaṃ bhāvayed aṣṭāram+tasya -> dvādaśahastaṃ bhāvayed aṣṭāraṃ tasya

cakram+vā -> cakraṃ vā

tatas+kūṭāgāramadhye -> tataḥ kūṭāgāramadhye

tataḥ kūṭāgāramadhye+abjam -> tataḥ kūṭāgāramadhye 'bjam

tataḥ kūṭāgāramadhye 'bjam+vā -> tataḥ kūṭāgāramadhye 'bjaṃ vā

vajrabhūmim+rāṣṭrasīmāntam -> vajrabhūmiṃ rāṣṭrasīmāntam

vajrabhūmiṃ rāṣṭrasīmāntam+bhāvayet| -> vajrabhūmiṃ rāṣṭrasīmāntaṃ bhāvayet|

śarajālam+niśitam -> śarajālaṃ niśitam

śarajālaṃ niśitam+madhye -> śarajālaṃ niśitaṃ madhye

sarvatra+ūrdhve -> sarvatrordhve

adhas+śūlāni -> adhaḥ śūlāni

tatas+rāṣṭrarakṣārtham -> tato rāṣṭrarakṣārtham

tato rāṣṭrarakṣārtham+rāṣṭrasīmāyām -> tato rāṣṭrarakṣārthaṃ rāṣṭrasīmāyām

tato rāṣṭrarakṣārthaṃ rāṣṭrasīmāyām+pañcaprākāram -> tato rāṣṭrarakṣārthaṃ rāṣṭrasīmāyāṃ pañcaprākāram

tato rāṣṭrarakṣārthaṃ rāṣṭrasīmāyāṃ pañcaprākāram+bhāvayet| -> tato rāṣṭrarakṣārthaṃ rāṣṭrasīmāyāṃ pañcaprākāraṃ bhāvayet|

maṇḍalacatuṣṭayena+ekībhūtena| -> maṇḍalacatuṣṭayenaikībhūtena|

prākāratrayam+tena -> prākāratrayaṃ tena

prākāratrayaṃ tena+eva -> prākāratrayaṃ tenaiva

yatra+ākāśabhūmis -> yatrākāśabhūmis

yatrākāśabhūmis+militā -> yatrākāśabhūmir militā

hastaśatadvayam+kūṭāgāram -> hastaśatadvayaṃ kūṭāgāram

hastaśatadvayaṃ kūṭāgāram+bhāvayet| -> hastaśatadvayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ bhāvayet|

prātas+chāyāvasāne -> prātaś chāyāvasāne

prātaś chāyāvasāne+iti -> prātaś chāyāvasāna iti

tatas+caturmaṇḍalāni -> tataś caturmaṇḍalāni

tataś caturmaṇḍalāni+ekīkṛtya -> tataś caturmaṇḍalāny ekīkṛtya

prathamam+yaṃkārapariṇatam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇatam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇatam+vāyumaṇḍalam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam+adhas -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adhas

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adhas+ūrdhvam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvam+hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam+evam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evam+raṃkārātmakam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam+agnimaṇḍalam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam agnimaṇḍalam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam agnimaṇḍalam+vaṃkārātmakam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam agnimaṇḍalaṃ vaṃkārātmakam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam agnimaṇḍalaṃ vaṃkārātmakam+udakamaṇḍalam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam agnimaṇḍalaṃ vaṃkārātmakam udakamaṇḍalam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam agnimaṇḍalaṃ vaṃkārātmakam udakamaṇḍalam+laṃkārātmakam -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam agnimaṇḍalaṃ vaṃkārātmakam udakamaṇḍalaṃ laṃkārātmakam

prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam agnimaṇḍalaṃ vaṃkārātmakam udakamaṇḍalaṃ laṃkārātmakam+pṛthvīmaṇḍalam| -> prathamaṃ yaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalam adha ūrdhvaṃ hūṃkāravajrasampuṭitam evaṃ raṃkārātmakam agnimaṇḍalaṃ vaṃkārātmakam udakamaṇḍalaṃ laṃkārātmakaṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalam|

rakṣācakram+cintayet|| -> rakṣācakraṃ cintayet||

tatas+māravṛndam -> tato māravṛndam

tato māravṛndam+dagdhvā -> tato māravṛndaṃ dagdhvā

sthāpanādhipam+visarjya -> sthāpanādhipaṃ visarjya

balim+dattvā -> baliṃ dattvā

evam+prāguktavidhinā -> evaṃ prāguktavidhinā

vajradharas+ājñāpayati -> vajradhara ājñāpayati

maṇḍalabhūmyām+tiṣṭhatu -> maṇḍalabhūmyāṃ tiṣṭhatu

idam+sthānam -> idaṃ sthānam

idaṃ sthānam+tyaktvā -> idaṃ sthānaṃ tyaktvā

saparivārakas+sarvasattvānām -> saparivārakaḥ sarvasattvānām

saparivārakaḥ sarvasattvānām+śāntim -> saparivārakaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntim

saparivārakaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntim+puṣṭim -> saparivārakaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭim

saparivārakaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭim+rakṣāvaraṇaguptim -> saparivārakaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptim

saparivārakaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptim+karotu| -> saparivārakaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karotu|

idam+balim -> idaṃ balim

idaṃ balim+gṛhṇātu -> idaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇātu

saparivāras+śīghram -> saparivāraḥ śīghram

saparivāraḥ śīghram+āgacchatu -> saparivāraḥ śīghram āgacchatu

idam+balim -> idaṃ balim

idaṃ balim+gandham -> idaṃ baliṃ gandham

idaṃ baliṃ gandham+puṣpam -> idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpam

idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpam+dhūpam -> idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpam

idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpam+pradīpākṣaram -> idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ pradīpākṣaram

idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ pradīpākṣaram+dadāmahe -> idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ pradīpākṣaraṃ dadāmahe

samaviṣamākṣaras+tasya -> samaviṣamākṣaras tasya

yas+kṣetrapālas -> yaḥ kṣetrapālas

yaḥ kṣetrapālas+tadgrāmanāmnā -> yaḥ kṣetrapālas tadgrāmanāmnā

atas+prathamam -> ataḥ prathamam

ataḥ prathamam+bhūmau -> ataḥ prathamaṃ bhūmau

mantranyāsas+veditavyas -> mantranyāso veditavyas

mantranyāso veditavyas+iti| -> mantranyāso veditavya iti|

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

nāyakatvāt+vacanam -> nāyakatvād vacanam

nāyakatvād vacanam+vistaratas -> nāyakatvād vacanaṃ vistaratas

nāyakatvād vacanaṃ vistaratas+sarvavajrais -> nāyakatvād vacanaṃ vistarataḥ sarvavajrais

nāyakatvād vacanaṃ vistarataḥ sarvavajrais+nirdahet -> nāyakatvād vacanaṃ vistarataḥ sarvavajrair nirdahet

nāyakatvād vacanaṃ vistarataḥ sarvavajrair nirdahet+iti -> nāyakatvād vacanaṃ vistarataḥ sarvavajrair nirdahed iti

caturbhis+iti -> caturbhir iti

gatam+nirdahet -> gataṃ nirdahet

gataṃ nirdahet+māravṛndam| -> gataṃ nirdahen māravṛndam|

paścāt+vajrais -> paścād vajrais

paścād vajrais+caturbhis -> paścād vajraiś caturbhis

paścād vajraiś caturbhis+diśi -> paścād vajraiś caturbhir diśi

balim+kṣetrapālāya -> baliṃ kṣetrapālāya

trivajrais+prathamam -> trivajraiḥ prathamam

trivajraiḥ prathamam+iha -> trivajraiḥ prathamam iha

niyamas+uktas -> niyama uktas

niyama uktas+--- -> niyama uktaḥ---

māravighnavināyakānām+kīlanārtham -> māravighnavināyakānāṃ kīlanārtham

māravighnavināyakānāṃ kīlanārtham+sthānarakṣārtham -> māravighnavināyakānāṃ kīlanārthaṃ sthānarakṣārtham

māravighnavināyakānāṃ kīlanārthaṃ sthānarakṣārtham+rakṣācakram -> māravighnavināyakānāṃ kīlanārthaṃ sthānarakṣārthaṃ rakṣācakram

māravighnavināyakānāṃ kīlanārthaṃ sthānarakṣārthaṃ rakṣācakram+bhāvayet -> māravighnavināyakānāṃ kīlanārthaṃ sthānarakṣārthaṃ rakṣācakraṃ bhāvayet

māravighnavināyakānāṃ kīlanārthaṃ sthānarakṣārthaṃ rakṣācakraṃ bhāvayet+mantrī| -> māravighnavināyakānāṃ kīlanārthaṃ sthānarakṣārthaṃ rakṣācakraṃ bhāvayen mantrī|

gatam+bhāvayet -> gataṃ bhāvayet

gataṃ bhāvayet+krodhavṛndam -> gataṃ bhāvayet krodhavṛndam

gataṃ bhāvayet krodhavṛndam+iti| -> gataṃ bhāvayet krodhavṛndam iti|

tatas+paścāt -> tataḥ paścāt

tataḥ paścāt+cakre -> tataḥ paścāc cakre

mārāvṛndam+dagdhvā -> mārāvṛndaṃ dagdhvā

kṛṣṇajvālābhis+dakṣiṇanairṛtyayos -> kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayos

kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayos+raktajvālābhis -> kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhis

kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhis+uttareśānayos -> kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhir uttareśānayos

kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhir uttareśānayos+śvetajvālābhis -> kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhir uttareśānayoḥ śvetajvālābhis

kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhir uttareśānayoḥ śvetajvālābhis+paścimavāyavyayos -> kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhir uttareśānayoḥ śvetajvālābhiḥ paścimavāyavyayos

kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhir uttareśānayoḥ śvetajvālābhiḥ paścimavāyavyayos+pītajvālābhis -> kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhir uttareśānayoḥ śvetajvālābhiḥ paścimavāyavyayoḥ pītajvālābhis

kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhir uttareśānayoḥ śvetajvālābhiḥ paścimavāyavyayoḥ pītajvālābhis+iti -> kṛṣṇajvālābhir dakṣiṇanairṛtyayo raktajvālābhir uttareśānayoḥ śvetajvālābhiḥ paścimavāyavyayoḥ pītajvālābhir iti

haritajvālābhis+adhas -> haritajvālābhir adhas

haritajvālābhir adhas+nīlajvālābhis -> haritajvālābhir adho nīlajvālābhis

haritajvālābhir adho nīlajvālābhis+pūrve -> haritajvālābhir adho nīlajvālābhiḥ pūrve

haritajvālābhir adho nīlajvālābhiḥ pūrve+agnau -> haritajvālābhir adho nīlajvālābhiḥ pūrve 'gnau

sakalam+māravṛndam -> sakalaṃ māravṛndam

sakalaṃ māravṛndam+sattvaviheṭhakam -> sakalaṃ māravṛndaṃ sattvaviheṭhakam

sakalaṃ māravṛndaṃ sattvaviheṭhakam+nirdahet| -> sakalaṃ māravṛndaṃ sattvaviheṭhakaṃ nirdahet|

tatas+tadvajranirgatais -> tatas tadvajranirgatais

tatas tadvajranirgatais+vajrajvālābhis -> tatas tadvajranirgatair vajrajvālābhis

tatas tadvajranirgatair vajrajvālābhis+daśadiksthitam -> tatas tadvajranirgatair vajrajvālābhir daśadiksthitam

tatas tadvajranirgatair vajrajvālābhir daśadiksthitam+api -> tatas tadvajranirgatair vajrajvālābhir daśadiksthitam api

evam+vajrakāyam -> evaṃ vajrakāyam

evaṃ vajrakāyam+ātmānam -> evaṃ vajrakāyam ātmānam

evaṃ vajrakāyam ātmānam+bhāvayet -> evaṃ vajrakāyam ātmānaṃ bhāvayet

evaṃ vajrakāyam ātmānaṃ bhāvayet+iti| -> evaṃ vajrakāyam ātmānaṃ bhāvayed iti|

lalābhyām+iti| -> lalābhyām iti|

pādatalayos+vavābhyām -> pādatalayor vavābhyām

pādatalayor vavābhyām+tathā -> pādatalayor vavābhyāṃ tathā

hahābhyām+pañcaśūkam -> hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkam

hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkam+tatas -> hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatas

hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tatas+jihvātālukāyām -> hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyām

hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyām+yayābhyām -> hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyāṃ yayābhyām

hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyāṃ yayābhyām+pañcaśūkam -> hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyāṃ yayābhyāṃ pañcaśūkam

hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyāṃ yayābhyāṃ pañcaśūkam+hastatalayos -> hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyāṃ yayābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ hastatalayos

hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyāṃ yayābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ hastatalayos+rarābhyām -> hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyāṃ yayābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ hastatalayo rarābhyām

hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyāṃ yayābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ hastatalayo rarābhyām+tathā -> hahābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ tato jihvātālukāyāṃ yayābhyāṃ pañcaśūkaṃ hastatalayo rarābhyāṃ tathā

evam+uṣṇīṣe -> evam uṣṇīṣe

evam+śrotrayos -> evaṃ śrotrayos

evaṃ śrotrayos+a{}ābhyām -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyām

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyām+triśūkam -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkam

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkam+vajram -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajram

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajram+bhāvayet -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayet

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayet+e{}aibhyām -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyām

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyām+ghrāṇarandhrayos -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayos

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayos+arārbhyām -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyām

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyām+netrayos -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayos

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayos+o{}aubhyām -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyām

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyām+jihvālambikayos -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayos

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayos+alālbhyām -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayor alālbhyām

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayor alālbhyām+vajraguhyayos -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayor alālbhyāṃ vajraguhyayos

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayor alālbhyāṃ vajraguhyayos+aṃaḥbhyām -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayor alālbhyāṃ vajraguhyayor aṃaḥbhyām

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayor alālbhyāṃ vajraguhyayor aṃaḥbhyām+manaḥśukranāḍyām -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayor alālbhyāṃ vajraguhyayor aṃaḥbhyāṃ manaḥśukranāḍyām

evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayor alālbhyāṃ vajraguhyayor aṃaḥbhyāṃ manaḥśukranāḍyām+iti| -> evaṃ śrotrayor a{}ābhyāṃ triśūkaṃ vajraṃ bhāvayed e{}aibhyāṃ ghrāṇarandhrayor arārbhyāṃ netrayor o{}aubhyāṃ jihvālambikayor alālbhyāṃ vajraguhyayor aṃaḥbhyāṃ manaḥśukranāḍyām iti|

tathā+adhyātmapaṭaloktabījākṣarais -> tathādhyātmapaṭaloktabījākṣarais

tathādhyātmapaṭaloktabījākṣarais+pratyekāṅguliparvasu -> tathādhyātmapaṭaloktabījākṣaraiḥ pratyekāṅguliparvasu

saptadaśaśūkaṃ trayastriṃśaśūkaṃ navaśūkaṃ pañcaṣaṣṭiśūkam+pañcaśūkam -> saptadaśaśūkaṃ trayastriṃśaśūkaṃ navaśūkaṃ pañcaṣaṣṭiśūkaṃ pañcaśūkam

harītakīcūrṇaṃ guḍasahitam+kaṣāyadhūpas -> harītakīcūrṇaṃ guḍasahitaṃ kaṣāyadhūpas

harītakīcūrṇaṃ guḍasahitaṃ kaṣāyadhūpas+| -> harītakīcūrṇaṃ guḍasahitaṃ kaṣāyadhūpaḥ|

kaṣāyadhūpas+| -> kaṣāyadhūpaḥ|

evam+mohane -> evaṃ mohane

moditas+ugradhūpas -> modita ugradhūpas

modita ugradhūpas+iti| -> modita ugradhūpa iti|

vaśye+ākṛṣṭau -> vaśya ākṛṣṭau

vaśya ākṛṣṭau+ugradhūpas -> vaśya ākṛṣṭāv ugradhūpas

vaśya ākṛṣṭāv ugradhūpas+iti| -> vaśya ākṛṣṭāv ugradhūpa iti|

viḍmāṃsadhūpas+madhurudhirayutas -> viḍmāṃsadhūpo madhurudhirayutas

viḍmāṃsadhūpo madhurudhirayutas+iti| -> viḍmāṃsadhūpo madhurudhirayuta iti|

māraṇe+uccāṭane -> māraṇa uccāṭane

śītadravyais+| -> śītadravyaiḥ|

śāntipuṣṭyos+śītas -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śītas

śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śītas+dhūpas -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpas

śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpas+śītāgurusihlakakarpūrais -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrais

śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrais+dhūpas -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpas

śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpas+madhuśarkarāsahitas -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpo madhuśarkarāsahitas

śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpo madhuśarkarāsahitas+śītas -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpo madhuśarkarāsahitaḥ śītas

śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpo madhuśarkarāsahitaḥ śītas+dhūpas -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpo madhuśarkarāsahitaḥ śīto dhūpas

śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpo madhuśarkarāsahitaḥ śīto dhūpas+iti -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpo madhuśarkarāsahitaḥ śīto dhūpa iti

śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpo madhuśarkarāsahitaḥ śīto dhūpa iti+ucyate -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śīto dhūpaḥ śītāgurusihlakakarpūrair dhūpo madhuśarkarāsahitaḥ śīto dhūpa ity ucyate

idānīm+dhūpās -> idānīṃ dhūpās

idānīṃ dhūpās+ucyante---śītas -> idānīṃ dhūpā ucyante---śītas

idānīṃ dhūpā ucyante---śītas+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ dhūpā ucyante---śīta ityādinā|

puṣpārcananiyamas+|| -> puṣpārcananiyamaḥ||

pītais+iti -> pītair iti

raktais+mohane -> raktair mohane

vaśye+ākṛṣṭau -> vaśya ākṛṣṭau

sakaṭukais+kṛṣṇais -> sakaṭukaiḥ kṛṣṇais

sakaṭukaiḥ kṛṣṇais+sakaṇṭakais -> sakaṭukaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ sakaṇṭakais

sakaṭukaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ sakaṇṭakais+iti| -> sakaṭukaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ sakaṇṭakair iti|

sugandhapuṣpais+śvetais -> sugandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetais

sugandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetais+devatādīnām -> sugandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetair devatādīnām

sugandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetair devatādīnām+arcanam -> sugandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetair devatādīnām arcanam

sugandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetair devatādīnām arcanam+māraṇe -> sugandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetair devatādīnām arcanaṃ māraṇe

sugandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetair devatādīnām arcanaṃ māraṇe+uccāṭane -> sugandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetair devatādīnām arcanaṃ māraṇa uccāṭane

idānīm+arcanārtham -> idānīm arcanārtham

idānīm arcanārtham+śāntyādipuṣpāṇi -> idānīm arcanārthaṃ śāntyādipuṣpāṇi

idānīm arcanārthaṃ śāntyādipuṣpāṇi+ucyante---saugandhais -> idānīm arcanārthaṃ śāntyādipuṣpāṇy ucyante---saugandhais

idānīm arcanārthaṃ śāntyādipuṣpāṇy ucyante---saugandhais+ityādinā| -> idānīm arcanārthaṃ śāntyādipuṣpāṇy ucyante---saugandhair ityādinā|

sugatakulavaśāt+iti -> sugatakulavaśād iti

rudrākṣais+akṣasūtram -> rudrākṣair akṣasūtram

rudrākṣair akṣasūtram+iti -> rudrākṣair akṣasūtram iti

rudrākṣair akṣasūtram iti+akṣasūtraniyamas -> rudrākṣair akṣasūtram ity akṣasūtraniyamas

rudrākṣair akṣasūtram ity akṣasūtraniyamas+| -> rudrākṣair akṣasūtram ity akṣasūtraniyamaḥ|

īśākṣas+iti -> īśākṣa iti

stambhane+īśākṣas -> stambhana īśākṣas

stambhana īśākṣas+| -> stambhana īśākṣaḥ|

raktacandanabījais+kṛtam| -> raktacandanabījaiḥ kṛtam|

padmākṣasūtram+atha -> padmākṣasūtram atha

kharadantakṛtam+vā -> kharadantakṛtaṃ vā

kharadantakṛtaṃ vā+asthibhis -> kharadantakṛtaṃ vāsthibhis

kharadantakṛtaṃ vāsthibhis+kṛtam -> kharadantakṛtaṃ vāsthibhiḥ kṛtam

kharadantakṛtaṃ vāsthibhiḥ kṛtam+vaśye -> kharadantakṛtaṃ vāsthibhiḥ kṛtaṃ vaśye

naradantakṛtam+uccāṭane -> naradantakṛtam uccāṭane

muktāphalam+māraṇe -> muktāphalaṃ māraṇe

sphāṭikyam+akṣasūtram -> sphāṭikyam akṣasūtram

sphāṭikyam akṣasūtram+puṣṭau -> sphāṭikyam akṣasūtraṃ puṣṭau

sphāṭikyais+ityādinā| -> sphāṭikyair ityādinā|

śītas+viṇmāṃsadhūpas -> śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpas

śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpas+madhurarudhirayutas -> śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpo madhurarudhirayutas

śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpo madhurarudhirayutas+api -> śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpo madhurarudhirayuto 'pi

śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpo madhurarudhirayuto 'pi+ugraūpas -> śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpo madhurarudhirayuto 'py ugraūpas

śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpo madhurarudhirayuto 'py ugraūpas+kaṣāyas -> śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpo madhurarudhirayuto 'py ugraūpaḥ kaṣāyas

śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpo madhurarudhirayuto 'py ugraūpaḥ kaṣāyas+|| -> śīto viṇmāṃsadhūpo madhurarudhirayuto 'py ugraūpaḥ kaṣāyaḥ||

saugandhais+śvetapuṣpais -> saugandhaiḥ śvetapuṣpais

saugandhaiḥ śvetapuṣpais+sakaṭukaṣaṇais -> saugandhaiḥ śvetapuṣpaiḥ sakaṭukaṣaṇais

saugandhaiḥ śvetapuṣpaiḥ sakaṭukaṣaṇais+arcanām -> saugandhaiḥ śvetapuṣpaiḥ sakaṭukaṣaṇair arcanām

saugandhaiḥ śvetapuṣpaiḥ sakaṭukaṣaṇair arcanām+raktapītais -> saugandhaiḥ śvetapuṣpaiḥ sakaṭukaṣaṇair arcanāṃ raktapītais

padmākhyeśākṣariṣṭais+sugatakulavaśāt -> padmākhyeśākṣariṣṭaiḥ sugatakulavaśāt

padmākhyeśākṣariṣṭaiḥ sugatakulavaśāt+mantrajāpe -> padmākhyeśākṣariṣṭaiḥ sugatakulavaśān mantrajāpe

padmākhyeśākṣariṣṭaiḥ sugatakulavaśān mantrajāpe+akṣasūtram| -> padmākhyeśākṣariṣṭaiḥ sugatakulavaśān mantrajāpe 'kṣasūtram|

varakharadaśanais+vā -> varakharadaśanair vā

varakharadaśanair vā+asthibhis -> varakharadaśanair vāsthibhis

varakharadaśanair vāsthibhis+pūjajīvais -> varakharadaśanair vāsthibhiḥ pūjajīvais

sphāṭikyais+mauktikais -> sphāṭikyair mauktikais

sphāṭikyair mauktikais+vā -> sphāṭikyair mauktikair vā

idānīm+mantrajāpārtham -> idānīṃ mantrajāpārtham

idānīṃ mantrajāpārtham+śāntyādīni -> idānīṃ mantrajāpārthaṃ śāntyādīni

idānīṃ mantrajāpārthaṃ śāntyādīni+akṣasūtrāṇi -> idānīṃ mantrajāpārthaṃ śāntyādīny akṣasūtrāṇi

idānīṃ mantrajāpārthaṃ śāntyādīny akṣasūtrāṇi+ucyante--- -> idānīṃ mantrajāpārthaṃ śāntyādīny akṣasūtrāṇy ucyante---

iti+aṣṭavidhāsanabhedaniyamas -> ity aṣṭavidhāsanabhedaniyamas

ity aṣṭavidhāsanabhedaniyamas+|| -> ity aṣṭavidhāsanabhedaniyamaḥ||

gudas+niṣaṇṇas -> gudo niṣaṇṇas

gudo niṣaṇṇas+vāmam -> gudo niṣaṇṇo vāmam

gudo niṣaṇṇo vāmam+utkaṭavat| -> gudo niṣaṇṇo vāmam utkaṭavat|

dakṣiṇam+gudagatam -> dakṣiṇaṃ gudagatam

dakṣiṇaṃ gudagatam+caraṇopari -> dakṣiṇaṃ gudagataṃ caraṇopari

gudas+niṣaṇṇas -> gudo niṣaṇṇas

gudo niṣaṇṇas+dakṣiṇam -> gudo niṣaṇṇo dakṣiṇam

gudo niṣaṇṇo dakṣiṇam+utkaṭavat -> gudo niṣaṇṇo dakṣiṇam utkaṭavat

gudo niṣaṇṇo dakṣiṇam utkaṭavat+iti| -> gudo niṣaṇṇo dakṣiṇam utkaṭavad iti|

vāmacaraṇam+gudagaram -> vāmacaraṇaṃ gudagaram

vāmacaraṇaṃ gudagaram+caraṇopari -> vāmacaraṇaṃ gudagaraṃ caraṇopari

gudagatacaraṇam+iti| -> gudagatacaraṇam iti|

paryaṅkārdham+dvibhedam| -> paryaṅkārdhaṃ dvibhedam|

namras+iti -> namra iti

vāmapādas+paryaṅkavat -> vāmapādaḥ paryaṅkavat

vāmapādaḥ paryaṅkavat+dakṣiṇas -> vāmapādaḥ paryaṅkavad dakṣiṇas

vāmapādaḥ paryaṅkavad dakṣiṇas+utkaṭavat -> vāmapādaḥ paryaṅkavad dakṣiṇa utkaṭavat

vāmapādaḥ paryaṅkavad dakṣiṇa utkaṭavat+kiṃciddakṣiṇe -> vāmapādaḥ paryaṅkavad dakṣiṇa utkaṭavat kiṃciddakṣiṇe

paryaṅkārdham+dvibhedam -> paryaṅkārdhaṃ dvibhedam

paryaṅkārdhaṃ dvibhedam+iti| -> paryaṅkārdhaṃ dvibhedam iti|

phiccakamūlalagnau+ūrdhvam -> phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvam

phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvam+gatam -> phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gatam

phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gatam+jānudvayam -> phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ jānudvayam

phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ jānudvayam+ūrudvayam -> phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ jānudvayam ūrudvayam

phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ jānudvayam ūrudvayam+ca -> phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ jānudvayam ūrudvayaṃ ca

phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ jānudvayam ūrudvayaṃ ca+iti -> phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ jānudvayam ūrudvayaṃ ceti

phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ jānudvayam ūrudvayaṃ ceti+utkaṭam| -> phiccakamūlalagnāv ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ jānudvayam ūrudvayaṃ cety utkaṭam|

bhūmyām+dvau -> bhūmyāṃ dvau

ca+utkaṭam -> cotkaṭam

cotkaṭam+bhavati| -> cotkaṭaṃ bhavati|

utkaṭam+ca -> utkaṭaṃ ca

utkaṭaṃ ceti+uccāṭane -> utkaṭaṃ cety uccāṭane

daityāsanam+māraṇe -> daityāsanaṃ māraṇe

daityāsanaṃ māraṇe 'haṃkārakūrmapādavat+(?) -> daityāsanaṃ māraṇe 'haṃkārakūrmapādavat(?)

tiryaguttānena+iti -> tiryaguttāneneti

vāmas+api -> vāmo 'pi

paryaṅkas+| -> paryaṅkaḥ|

dakṣiṇapādas+gatas -> dakṣiṇapādo gatas

dakṣiṇapādo gatas+uttānakas -> dakṣiṇapādo gata uttānakas

dakṣiṇapādo gata uttānakas+iti -> dakṣiṇapādo gata uttānaka iti

paryaṅkas+iti| -> paryaṅka iti|

krameṇa+āsanāni -> krameṇāsanāni

idānīm+śāntyādikarmasādhanārtham -> idānīṃ śāntyādikarmasādhanārtham

idānīṃ śāntyādikarmasādhanārtham+āsanāni -> idānīṃ śāntyādikarmasādhanārtham āsanāni

idānīṃ śāntyādikarmasādhanārtham āsanāni+ucyante---paryaṅkas -> idānīṃ śāntyādikarmasādhanārtham āsanāny ucyante---paryaṅkas

idānīṃ śāntyādikarmasādhanārtham āsanāny ucyante---paryaṅkas+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ śāntyādikarmasādhanārtham āsanāny ucyante---paryaṅka ityādinā|

sūtravidhiniyamas+|| -> sūtravidhiniyamaḥ||

sūtrapātena+iti -> sūtrapāteneti

sahasrahastaparyantam+sūtrayet -> sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayet

sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayet+maṇḍalam -> sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalam

sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalam+garbhacakrārebhyas -> sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalaṃ garbhacakrārebhyas

sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalaṃ garbhacakrārebhyas+punas -> sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalaṃ garbhacakrārebhyaḥ punas

sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalaṃ garbhacakrārebhyaḥ punas+punas -> sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalaṃ garbhacakrārebhyaḥ punaḥ punas

sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalaṃ garbhacakrārebhyaḥ punaḥ punas+sūtrasthāne -> sahasrahastaparyantaṃ sūtrayen maṇḍalaṃ garbhacakrārebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ sūtrasthāne

kāyāt+dviguṇam -> kāyād dviguṇam

kāyād dviguṇam+aṣṭahastam -> kāyād dviguṇam aṣṭahastam

kāyād dviguṇam aṣṭahastam+trividhapathagatam -> kāyād dviguṇam aṣṭahastaṃ trividhapathagatam

kāyād dviguṇam aṣṭahastaṃ trividhapathagatam+kāyavākcittanāḍīgatam -> kāyād dviguṇam aṣṭahastaṃ trividhapathagataṃ kāyavākcittanāḍīgatam

kāyād dviguṇam aṣṭahastaṃ trividhapathagataṃ kāyavākcittanāḍīgatam+ekalolībhūtam -> kāyād dviguṇam aṣṭahastaṃ trividhapathagataṃ kāyavākcittanāḍīgatam ekalolībhūtam

kāyād dviguṇam aṣṭahastaṃ trividhapathagataṃ kāyavākcittanāḍīgatam ekalolībhūtam+tena -> kāyād dviguṇam aṣṭahastaṃ trividhapathagataṃ kāyavākcittanāḍīgatam ekalolībhūtaṃ tena

kāyas+narāṇām -> kāyo narāṇām

kāyo narāṇām+caturhastas -> kāyo narāṇāṃ caturhastas

kāyo narāṇāṃ caturhastas+| -> kāyo narāṇāṃ caturhastaḥ|

tadūrdhvam+sūtravṛttaniyamas -> tadūrdhvaṃ sūtravṛttaniyamas

tadūrdhvaṃ sūtravṛttaniyamas+bhagavatas -> tadūrdhvaṃ sūtravṛttaniyamo bhagavatas

tadūrdhvaṃ sūtravṛttaniyamo bhagavatas+iti| -> tadūrdhvaṃ sūtravṛttaniyamo bhagavata iti|

tasmāt+idam -> tasmād idam

tasmād idam+vacanam -> tasmād idaṃ vacanam

tasmād idaṃ vacanam+sāmānyamaṇḍale -> tasmād idaṃ vacanaṃ sāmānyamaṇḍale

kas+asau -> ko 'sau

ko 'sau+ācāryas -> ko 'sāv ācāryas

ko 'sāv ācāryas+sūtrapātam -> ko 'sāv ācāryaḥ sūtrapātam

ko 'sāv ācāryaḥ sūtrapātam+kariṣyati -> ko 'sāv ācāryaḥ sūtrapātaṃ kariṣyati

sūtram+bhavati| -> sūtraṃ bhavati|

ṣaḍaṅgulādhikaṣaḍhastam+vṛttena -> ṣaḍaṅgulādhikaṣaḍhastaṃ vṛttena

cakrāṣṭabhāgikam+dvāram -> cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāram

cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāram+pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatahastam -> cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāraṃ pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatahastam

cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāraṃ pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatahastam+bhaviṣyati| -> cakrāṣṭabhāgikaṃ dvāraṃ pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatahastaṃ bhaviṣyati|

vṛttam+sūtram -> vṛttaṃ sūtram

vṛttaṃ sūtram+tadā -> vṛttaṃ sūtraṃ tadā

sarvasmin+maṇḍale -> sarvasmin maṇḍale

tasmāt+ucyate---iha -> tasmād ucyate---iha

kasyacit+vacanam -> kasyacid vacanam

kasyacid vacanam+bhaviṣyati| -> kasyacid vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati|

yavamātram+dīrghatvena -> yavamātraṃ dīrghatvena

yavamātraṃ dīrghatvena+aṣṭahastakam -> yavamātraṃ dīrghatvenāṣṭahastakam

yavamātraṃ dīrghatvenāṣṭahastakam+iti -> yavamātraṃ dīrghatvenāṣṭahastakam iti

maṇḍalāt+dviguṇam -> maṇḍalād dviguṇam

maṇḍalād dviguṇam+katham -> maṇḍalād dviguṇaṃ katham

maṇḍalād dviguṇaṃ katham+| -> maṇḍalād dviguṇaṃ katham|

dvāviṃśatibhāgikam+sūtram -> dvāviṃśatibhāgikaṃ sūtram

dvāviṃśatibhāgikaṃ sūtram+vṛttena -> dvāviṃśatibhāgikaṃ sūtraṃ vṛttena

sūtrapātas+abhidheyas -> sūtrapāto 'bhidheyas

sūtrapāto 'bhidheyas+atyadbhutatvāt -> sūtrapāto 'bhidheyo 'tyadbhutatvāt

sūtrapāto 'bhidheyo 'tyadbhutatvāt+iti|| -> sūtrapāto 'bhidheyo 'tyadbhutatvād iti||

punar+hastasahasramaṇḍale -> punar hastasahasramaṇḍale

niyamas+sūtradviguṇatayās -> niyamaḥ sūtradviguṇatayās

niyamaḥ sūtradviguṇatayās+| -> niyamaḥ sūtradviguṇatayāḥ|

evam+vāṅmaṇḍalam -> evaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalam

evaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalam+ṣoḍaśahastam -> evaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśahastam

evaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśahastam+kāyamaṇḍalam -> evaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśahastaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam

evaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśahastaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam+viṃśatihastam -> evaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśahastaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ viṃśatihastam

evaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśahastaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ viṃśatihastam+iti -> evaṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśahastaṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ viṃśatihastam iti

niyamāt+caturviṃśatihastam -> niyamāc caturviṃśatihastam

niyamāc caturviṃśatihastam+sūtram| -> niyamāc caturviṃśatihastaṃ sūtram|

cittamaṇḍalam+dvādaśahastam -> cittamaṇḍalaṃ dvādaśahastam

cittamaṇḍalaṃ dvādaśahastam+prakuryāt -> cittamaṇḍalaṃ dvādaśahastaṃ prakuryāt

cittamaṇḍalaṃ dvādaśahastaṃ prakuryāt+iti -> cittamaṇḍalaṃ dvādaśahastaṃ prakuryād iti

tatra+ādibuddhe -> tatrādibuddhe

dviguṇam+sūtram -> dviguṇaṃ sūtram

dviguṇaṃ sūtram+maṇḍalāt -> dviguṇaṃ sūtraṃ maṇḍalāt

dviguṇaṃ sūtraṃ maṇḍalāt+iti| -> dviguṇaṃ sūtraṃ maṇḍalād iti|

sūtraniyamas+maṇḍalaniyamas -> sūtraniyamo maṇḍalaniyamas

sūtraniyamo maṇḍalaniyamas+ca -> sūtraniyamo maṇḍalaniyamaś ca

sūtraniyamo maṇḍalaniyamaś ca+ācāryahastena -> sūtraniyamo maṇḍalaniyamaś cācāryahastena

yāvat+sahasrahastam -> yāvat sahasrahastam

yāvat sahasrahastam+tāvat -> yāvat sahasrahastaṃ tāvat

yāvat sahasrahastaṃ tāvat+bhavati -> yāvat sahasrahastaṃ tāvad bhavati

svātmavibhāgena+ekahastam -> svātmavibhāgenaikahastam

svātmavibhāgenaikahastam+ārabhya -> svātmavibhāgenaikahastam ārabhya

maṇḍalam+sadā -> maṇḍalaṃ sadā

ca+anyat -> cānyat

cānyat+lakṣaṇam -> cānyal lakṣaṇam

cānyal lakṣaṇam+maṇḍale| -> cānyal lakṣaṇaṃ maṇḍale|

sūtram+ekam -> sūtram ekam

sūtram ekam+kartavyam| -> sūtram ekaṃ kartavyam|

ṣoḍaśahastam+yāvat -> ṣoḍaśahastaṃ yāvat

ṣoḍaśahastaṃ yāvat+ācāryahastena -> ṣoḍaśahastaṃ yāvad ācāryahastena

dviguṇam+caturguṇam -> dviguṇaṃ caturguṇam

dviguṇaṃ caturguṇam+vā -> dviguṇaṃ caturguṇaṃ vā

tat+eva -> tad eva

tad eva+aṣṭahastam -> tad evāṣṭahastam

tad evāṣṭahastam+iti -> tad evāṣṭahastam iti

tatas+trivṛttam -> tatas trivṛttam

tatas trivṛttam+kārayet -> tatas trivṛttaṃ kārayet

tatas trivṛttaṃ kārayet+vajrācāryāṅguṣṭhayavapramāṇena -> tatas trivṛttaṃ kārayed vajrācāryāṅguṣṭhayavapramāṇena

kanyākartitasūtrais+triguṇātkamais -> kanyākartitasūtrais triguṇātkamais

kanyākartitasūtrais triguṇātkamais+anekais -> kanyākartitasūtrais triguṇātkamair anekais

kanyākartitasūtrais triguṇātkamair anekais+sūtram -> kanyākartitasūtrais triguṇātkamair anekaiḥ sūtram

kanyākartitasūtrais triguṇātkamair anekaiḥ sūtram+vartayitvā -> kanyākartitasūtrais triguṇātkamair anekaiḥ sūtraṃ vartayitvā

sūtram+hastāṣṭakam -> sūtraṃ hastāṣṭakam

sūtraṃ hastāṣṭakam+ityādinā| -> sūtraṃ hastāṣṭakam ityādinā|

paryaṅkardham+dvibhedam -> paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedam

paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedam+gudagatacaraṇam -> paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedaṃ gudagatacaraṇam

paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedaṃ gudagatacaraṇam+ca -> paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedaṃ gudagatacaraṇaṃ ca

paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedaṃ gudagatacaraṇaṃ ca+āsanam -> paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedaṃ gudagatacaraṇaṃ cāsanam

paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedaṃ gudagatacaraṇaṃ cāsanam+karmabhedais -> paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedaṃ gudagatacaraṇaṃ cāsanaṃ karmabhedais

paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedaṃ gudagatacaraṇaṃ cāsanaṃ karmabhedais+|| -> paryaṅkardhaṃ dvibhedaṃ gudagatacaraṇaṃ cāsanaṃ karmabhedaiḥ||

kramapariracitam+vajradaityotkaṭam -> kramapariracitaṃ vajradaityotkaṭam

kramapariracitaṃ vajradaityotkaṭam+ca -> kramapariracitaṃ vajradaityotkaṭaṃ ca

paryaṅkas+śāntikādau -> paryaṅkaḥ śāntikādau

ca+anyat| -> cānyat|

trividhapathagatam+sūtram -> trividhapathagataṃ sūtram

trividhapathagataṃ sūtram+ekam -> trividhapathagataṃ sūtram ekam

trividhapathagataṃ sūtram ekam+na -> trividhapathagataṃ sūtram ekaṃ na

vṛttam+trivṛttam -> vṛttaṃ trivṛttam

sūtram+hastāṣṭakam -> sūtraṃ hastāṣṭakam

sūtraṃ hastāṣṭakam+syāt -> sūtraṃ hastāṣṭakaṃ syāt

sūtraṃ hastāṣṭakaṃ syāt+bhavati -> sūtraṃ hastāṣṭakaṃ syād bhavati

idānīm+sūtralakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ sūtralakṣaṇam

idānīṃ sūtralakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ sūtralakṣaṇam ucyate---

rajoniyamas+|| -> rajoniyamaḥ||

devatānām+bhavati -> devatānāṃ bhavati

devatānāṃ bhavati+iti -> devatānāṃ bhavatīti

pañcākāram+rajomaṇḍale -> pañcākāraṃ rajomaṇḍale

tasmāt+api -> tasmād api

yasmāt+pañcākārajñānaraśmispharaṇāt -> yasmāt pañcākārajñānaraśmispharaṇāt

yasmāt pañcākārajñānaraśmispharaṇāt+tribhavagatas -> yasmāt pañcākārajñānaraśmispharaṇāt tribhavagatas

yasmāt pañcākārajñānaraśmispharaṇāt tribhavagatas+skandhadhātvāyatanasnirāvaraṇabhedena -> yasmāt pañcākārajñānaraśmispharaṇāt tribhavagataḥ skandhadhātvāyatanasnirāvaraṇabhedena

jinendras+vajrasattvas -> jinendro vajrasattvas

jinendro vajrasattvas+pañcākāras -> jinendro vajrasattvaḥ pañcākāras

jinendro vajrasattvaḥ pañcākāras+hi -> jinendro vajrasattvaḥ pañcākāro hi

idānīm+rajoviśuddhis -> idānīṃ rajoviśuddhis

idānīṃ rajoviśuddhis+ucyate---pañcākāras -> idānīṃ rajoviśuddhir ucyate---pañcākāras

idānīṃ rajoviśuddhir ucyate---pañcākāras+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ rajoviśuddhir ucyate---pañcākāra ityādinā|

devatāniyamas+|| -> devatāniyamaḥ||

haritas+iti -> harita iti

harita iti+īṣaddhasitarāgamūrtis -> harita itīṣaddhasitarāgamūrtis

harita itīṣaddhasitarāgamūrtis+iti -> harita itīṣaddhasitarāgamūrtir iti

devatāvarṇas+śāntikādau| -> devatāvarṇaḥ śāntikādau|

stabdhas+pītavarṇas -> stabdhaḥ pītavarṇas

stabdhaḥ pītavarṇas+iti -> stabdhaḥ pītavarṇa iti

sarāgo raktavarṇas+mohanastambhanādye -> sarāgo raktavarṇo mohanastambhanādye

krūras+kṛṣṇavarṇas -> krūraḥ kṛṣṇavarṇas

krūraḥ kṛṣṇavarṇas+vaśyākṛṣṭau -> krūraḥ kṛṣṇavarṇo vaśyākṛṣṭau

śāntaḥ śuklavarṇas+bhavati -> śāntaḥ śuklavarṇo bhavati

kuṇḍe+agnidevatāmaṇḍale -> kuṇḍe 'gnidevatāmaṇḍale

tasmāt+api -> tasmād api

pañcākāram+hi -> pañcākāraṃ hi

pañcākāras+jinendras -> pañcākāro jinendras

pañcākāro jinendras+trividhabhavagatas -> pañcākāro jinendras trividhabhavagatas

pañcākāro jinendras trividhabhavagatas+skandhadhātvādibhedais -> pañcākāro jinendras trividhabhavagataḥ skandhadhātvādibhedais

cādhidevas+| -> cādhidevaḥ|

evam+karmadvaye -> evaṃ karmadvaye

homapātraniyamas+|| -> homapātraniyamaḥ||

vajracihnam+iti -> vajracihnam iti

dravyahomaśruvāyām+daṇḍapṛṣṭhe -> dravyahomaśruvāyāṃ daṇḍapṛṣṭhe

ṣaḍaṅgulam+padmam -> ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ padmam

ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ padmam+karatalamānena -> ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ padmaṃ karatalamānena

ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ padmaṃ karatalamānena+iti -> ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ padmaṃ karatalamāneneti

tatra+eva -> tatraiva

tiryak+vibhāgas -> tiryag vibhāgas

tiryag vibhāgas+iti -> tiryag vibhāga iti

culukam+bhavati -> culukaṃ bhavati

culukaṃ bhavati+ūrṇāsthānāt -> culukaṃ bhavaty ūrṇāsthānāt

culukaṃ bhavaty ūrṇāsthānāt+hṛdayam -> culukaṃ bhavaty ūrṇāsthānād dhṛdayam

culukaṃ bhavaty ūrṇāsthānād dhṛdayam+yāvat -> culukaṃ bhavaty ūrṇāsthānād dhṛdayaṃ yāvat

culukaṃ bhavaty ūrṇāsthānād dhṛdayaṃ yāvat+mukhatas -> culukaṃ bhavaty ūrṇāsthānād dhṛdayaṃ yāvan mukhatas

culukaṃ bhavaty ūrṇāsthānād dhṛdayaṃ yāvan mukhatas+vā -> culukaṃ bhavaty ūrṇāsthānād dhṛdayaṃ yāvan mukhato vā

hṛdayakamalād vajraparyantam+iti -> hṛdayakamalād vajraparyantam iti

hastamātradaṇḍāt+iti -> hastamātradaṇḍād iti

pātrī+iti -> pātrīti

kārye+āhutī -> kārya āhutī

chidram+ghṛtadhārāyās -> chidraṃ ghṛtadhārāyās

chidraṃ ghṛtadhārāyās+nirgamārtham -> chidraṃ ghṛtadhārāyā nirgamārtham

chidraṃ ghṛtadhārāyā nirgamārtham+mūtraśukradhārānirgamavat| -> chidraṃ ghṛtadhārāyā nirgamārthaṃ mūtraśukradhārānirgamavat|

pañcaśūkavajram+madhyaśūke -> pañcaśūkavajraṃ madhyaśūke

padmam+padmapatrāgramayam -> padmaṃ padmapatrāgramayam

padmaṃ padmapatrāgramayam+oṣṭhābhyantarapārśvam -> padmaṃ padmapatrāgramayam oṣṭhābhyantarapārśvam

padmaṃ padmapatrāgramayam oṣṭhābhyantarapārśvam+bāhye -> padmaṃ padmapatrāgramayam oṣṭhābhyantarapārśvaṃ bāhye

hastamātradaṇḍasya+agre -> hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre

hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre+añjalyākārapātram -> hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre 'ñjalyākārapātram

hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre 'ñjalyākārapātram+caturasram -> hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre 'ñjalyākārapātraṃ caturasram

hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre 'ñjalyākārapātraṃ caturasram+ca -> hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre 'ñjalyākārapātraṃ caturasraṃ ca

hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre 'ñjalyākārapātraṃ caturasraṃ ca+aṅgulaikocchritam -> hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre 'ñjalyākārapātraṃ caturasraṃ cāṅgulaikocchritam

hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre 'ñjalyākārapātraṃ caturasraṃ cāṅgulaikocchritam+samatale -> hastamātradaṇḍasyāgre 'ñjalyākārapātraṃ caturasraṃ cāṅgulaikocchritaṃ samatale

śruvakam+ucyate| -> śruvakam ucyate|

vidhis+iti| -> vidhir iti|

caturaṅgulāni+aṣṭadalāni -> caturaṅgulāny aṣṭadalāni

caturaṅgulāny aṣṭadalāni+evam -> caturaṅgulāny aṣṭadalāny evam

caturaṅgulāny aṣṭadalāny evam+dvādaśāṅgulam| -> caturaṅgulāny aṣṭadalāny evaṃ dvādaśāṅgulam|

vasudalakamalam+dvādaśāṅguṣṭhakam -> vasudalakamalaṃ dvādaśāṅguṣṭhakam

vasudalakamalaṃ dvādaśāṅguṣṭhakam+ca -> vasudalakamalaṃ dvādaśāṅguṣṭhakaṃ ca

vasudalakamalaṃ dvādaśāṅguṣṭhakaṃ ca+iti| -> vasudalakamalaṃ dvādaśāṅguṣṭhakaṃ ceti|

evam+sphaṭikādyarghapātre -> evaṃ sphaṭikādyarghapātre

sarvam+dvādaśāṅgulam -> sarvaṃ dvādaśāṅgulam

sarvaṃ dvādaśāṅgulam+sakarṇikāṣṭadalātmakam| -> sarvaṃ dvādaśāṅgulaṃ sakarṇikāṣṭadalātmakam|

sphaṭikapātram+arghadānārtham -> sphaṭikapātram arghadānārtham

sphaṭikapātram arghadānārtham+śarāvākṛtis -> sphaṭikapātram arghadānārthaṃ śarāvākṛtis

sphaṭikapātram arghadānārthaṃ śarāvākṛtis+kacolākṛti -> sphaṭikapātram arghadānārthaṃ śarāvākṛtiḥ kacolākṛti

sphaṭikapātram arghadānārthaṃ śarāvākṛtiḥ kacolākṛti+iti -> sphaṭikapātram arghadānārthaṃ śarāvākṛtiḥ kacolākṛtīti

sphaṭikapātram arghadānārthaṃ śarāvākṛtiḥ kacolākṛtīti+arthas -> sphaṭikapātram arghadānārthaṃ śarāvākṛtiḥ kacolākṛtīty arthas

sphaṭikapātram arghadānārthaṃ śarāvākṛtiḥ kacolākṛtīty arthas+| -> sphaṭikapātram arghadānārthaṃ śarāvākṛtiḥ kacolākṛtīty arthaḥ|

culukam+ca -> culukaṃ ca

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

kartavyam+iti -> kartavyam iti

nyāsādyam+prokṣaṇādyam -> nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyam

nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyam+svahṛdayakuliśena -> nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśena

nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśena+utsarjanam -> nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśenotsarjanam

nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśenotsarjanam+devatānām -> nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśenotsarjanaṃ devatānām

nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśenotsarjanaṃ devatānām+ācāryeṇa -> nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśenotsarjanaṃ devatānām ācāryeṇa

bhūminyāsādyam+prokṣaṇādyam -> bhūminyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyam

bhūminyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyam+svahṛdayakuliśotsarjanam -> bhūminyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśotsarjanam

bhūminyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśotsarjanam+devatānām| -> bhūminyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśotsarjanaṃ devatānām|

kulavaśāt+raṅgapātas -> kulavaśād raṅgapātas

kulavaśād raṅgapātas+ca -> kulavaśād raṅgapātaś ca

evam+kuṇḍe -> evaṃ kuṇḍe

haritasahitas+iti| -> haritasahita iti|

pītas+vā -> pīto vā

haritam+śvetas -> haritaṃ śvetas

haritaṃ śvetas+kṛṣṇas -> haritaṃ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇas

haritaṃ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇas+raktas -> haritaṃ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇo raktas

haritaṃ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇo raktas+vā -> haritaṃ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇo rakto vā

mohanastambhanayos+pītam -> mohanastambhanayoḥ pītam

mohanastambhanayoḥ pītam+sarvakarmaṇi -> mohanastambhanayoḥ pītaṃ sarvakarmaṇi

śāntipuṣṭayos+śvetam -> śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetam

śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetam+rajas -> śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetaṃ rajas

śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetaṃ rajas+māraṇoccāṭanayos -> śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetaṃ rajo māraṇoccāṭanayos

śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetaṃ rajo māraṇoccāṭanayos+kṛṣṇam -> śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetaṃ rajo māraṇoccāṭanayoḥ kṛṣṇam

śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetaṃ rajo māraṇoccāṭanayoḥ kṛṣṇam+rajas -> śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetaṃ rajo māraṇoccāṭanayoḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rajas

śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetaṃ rajo māraṇoccāṭanayoḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rajas+vaśyākṛṣṭau -> śāntipuṣṭayoḥ śvetaṃ rajo māraṇoccāṭanayoḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rajo vaśyākṛṣṭau

rajaḥpātas+bhavati| -> rajaḥpāto bhavati|

idānīm+rajovidhis -> idānīṃ rajovidhis

idānīṃ rajovidhis+ucyate---iha -> idānīṃ rajovidhir ucyate---iha

homakuṇḍāsananiyamas+śāntikarmādike| -> homakuṇḍāsananiyamaḥ śāntikarmādike|

ākṛṣṭau+īśāne -> ākṛṣṭāv īśāne

yāmye+āsanam -> yāmya āsanam

yāmya āsanam+kartavyam -> yāmya āsanaṃ kartavyam

yāmya āsanaṃ kartavyam+vakṣyamāṇam -> yāmya āsanaṃ kartavyaṃ vakṣyamāṇam

yāmya āsanaṃ kartavyaṃ vakṣyamāṇam+puṣṭau -> yāmya āsanaṃ kartavyaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ puṣṭau

raṅgabhūmis+|| -> raṅgabhūmiḥ||

buddhaprabhedais+surayamavaruṇeṣu -> buddhaprabhedaiḥ surayamavaruṇeṣu

buddhaprabhedaiḥ surayamavaruṇeṣu+uttare -> buddhaprabhedaiḥ surayamavaruṇeṣūttare

syāt+api -> syād api

raṅgam+karmadvaye -> raṅgaṃ karmadvaye

ācāryasya+āsanam -> ācāryasyāsanam

ācāryasyāsanam+vai -> ācāryasyāsanaṃ vai

idānīm+ācāryasya -> idānīm ācāryasya

idānīm ācāryasya+āsanadigvibhāgas -> idānīm ācāryasyāsanadigvibhāgas

idānīm ācāryasyāsanadigvibhāgas+ucyate--- -> idānīm ācāryasyāsanadigvibhāga ucyate---

homadravyaniyamas+|| -> homadravyaniyamaḥ||

dhuttūrakapuṣpais+saha -> dhuttūrakapuṣpaiḥ saha

dhuttūrakapuṣpaiḥ saha+iti -> dhuttūrakapuṣpaiḥ saheti

raktakaravīrādipuṣpais+saha -> raktakaravīrādipuṣpaiḥ saha

raktakaravīrādipuṣpaiḥ saha+ākṛṣṭau -> raktakaravīrādipuṣpaiḥ sahākṛṣṭau

rājikālavaṇābhyām+saha -> rājikālavaṇābhyāṃ saha

māṃsaviṣābhyām+saha -> māṃsaviṣābhyāṃ saha

māṃsaviṣābhyāṃ saha+uccāṭane -> māṃsaviṣābhyāṃ sahoccāṭane

pañcaśasyais+māraṇe -> pañcaśasyair māraṇe

homas+puṣṭau -> homaḥ puṣṭau

idānīm+homadravyāṇi -> idānīṃ homadravyāṇi

idānīṃ homadravyāṇi+ucyante---kṣīra -> idānīṃ homadravyāṇy ucyante---kṣīra

idānīṃ homadravyāṇy ucyante---kṣīra+ityādi| -> idānīṃ homadravyāṇy ucyante---kṣīretyādi|

samidhaniyamas+| -> samidhaniyamaḥ|

grāhyās+iti -> grāhyā iti

tadupari+ūnādhikās -> tadupary ūnādhikās

tadupary ūnādhikās+na -> tadupary ūnādhikā na

kaniṣṭhāṅgulīpramāṇena+aṅguṣṭham -> kaniṣṭhāṅgulīpramāṇenāṅguṣṭham

kaniṣṭhāṅgulīpramāṇenāṅguṣṭham+yāvat| -> kaniṣṭhāṅgulīpramāṇenāṅguṣṭhaṃ yāvat|

dvādaśāṅgulās+| -> dvādaśāṅgulāḥ|

ardhahastās+sarve -> ardhahastāḥ sarve

bilvajās+iti| -> bilvajā iti|

mohane+unmattajās -> mohana unmattajās

mohana unmattajās+stambhane -> mohana unmattajāḥ stambhane

bilvam+nirmālyamālāsukanakakusumāni -> bilvaṃ nirmālyamālāsukanakakusumāni

bilvaṃ nirmālyamālāsukanakakusumāni+eva -> bilvaṃ nirmālyamālāsukanakakusumāny eva

māṃsam+saviṣam -> māṃsaṃ saviṣam

māṃsaṃ saviṣam+api -> māṃsaṃ saviṣam api

śasyam+ca -> śasyaṃ ca

bilvonmattārdhahastās+śaraśatagaṇanā -> bilvonmattārdhahastāḥ śaraśatagaṇanā

palāśajās+|| -> palāśajāḥ||

khadirajās+ākṛṣṭau -> khadirajā ākṛṣṭau

pañcaśatāni+evam -> pañcaśatāny evam

pañcaśatāny evam+vaśye -> pañcaśatāny evaṃ vaśye

kaniṣṭhāṅgulīsaṃsthānāni+iti -> kaniṣṭhāṅgulīsaṃsthānānīti

pañcaśatasaṃkhyās+kṣīravṛkṣāṇām -> pañcaśatasaṃkhyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām

pañcaśatasaṃkhyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām+iti -> pañcaśatasaṃkhyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām iti

pañcaśatasaṃkhyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām iti+udumbarāśvatthanyagrodhaparkaṭīmadhuvṛkṣāṇām -> pañcaśatasaṃkhyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām ity udumbarāśvatthanyagrodhaparkaṭīmadhuvṛkṣāṇām

pañcaśatasaṃkhyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām ity udumbarāśvatthanyagrodhaparkaṭīmadhuvṛkṣāṇām+iti| -> pañcaśatasaṃkhyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām ity udumbarāśvatthanyagrodhaparkaṭīmadhuvṛkṣāṇām iti|

sakṣīrās+samidhas -> sakṣīrāḥ samidhas

sakṣīrāḥ samidhas+śaraśata -> sakṣīrāḥ samidhaḥ śaraśata

sakṣīrāḥ samidhaḥ śaraśata+iti -> sakṣīrāḥ samidhaḥ śaraśateti

homasamidhas+ucyante---sakṣīra -> homasamidha ucyante---sakṣīra

homasamidha ucyante---sakṣīra+ityādi| -> homasamidha ucyante---sakṣīretyādi|

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

yojanīyaṃ tat+eva -> yojanīyaṃ tad eva

yojanīyaṃ tad eva+iti -> yojanīyaṃ tad eveti

tathā+uditalagnam -> tathoditalagnam

tathoditalagnam+krūragrahastham -> tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahastham

tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahastham+maṅgalaśanikālāgnigrahasahitam -> tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maṅgalaśanikālāgnigrahasahitam

tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maṅgalaśanikālāgnigrahasahitam+varjitam -> tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maṅgalaśanikālāgnigrahasahitaṃ varjitam

tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maṅgalaśanikālāgnigrahasahitaṃ varjitam+yatas -> tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maṅgalaśanikālāgnigrahasahitaṃ varjitaṃ yatas

tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maṅgalaśanikālāgnigrahasahitaṃ varjitaṃ yatas+maraṇabhayakaram| -> tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maṅgalaśanikālāgnigrahasahitaṃ varjitaṃ yato maraṇabhayakaram|

puṣṭikārye+api -> puṣṭikārye 'pi

madhyāhnam+ca -> madhyāhnaṃ ca

madhyāhnaṃ ca+ardharātram -> madhyāhnaṃ cārdharātram

madhyāhnaṃ cārdharātram+ca -> madhyāhnaṃ cārdharātraṃ ca

khadirajās+kiṃśukākṛṣṭivaśye|| -> khadirajāḥ kiṃśukākṛṣṭivaśye||

kākapicchāni+api -> kākapicchāny api

sakṣīrās+śāntipuṣṭyos -> sakṣīrāḥ śāntipuṣṭyos

sakṣīrāḥ śāntipuṣṭyos+śaraśatasamidhas -> sakṣīrāḥ śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śaraśatasamidhas

sakṣīrāḥ śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śaraśatasamidhas+māraṇe -> sakṣīrāḥ śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śaraśatasamidho māraṇe

lagnam+krūragrahastham -> lagnaṃ krūragrahastham

lagnaṃ krūragrahastham+maraṇabhayakaram -> lagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maraṇabhayakaram

lagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maraṇabhayakaram+tadvat -> lagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maraṇabhayakaraṃ tadvat

lagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maraṇabhayakaraṃ tadvat+evam -> lagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maraṇabhayakaraṃ tadvad evam

lagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maraṇabhayakaraṃ tadvad evam+prasiddham| -> lagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maraṇabhayakaraṃ tadvad evaṃ prasiddham|

madhyāhnam+ca -> madhyāhnaṃ ca

madhyāhnaṃ ca+ardharātram -> madhyāhnaṃ cārdharātram

madhyāhnaṃ cārdharātram+dinaniśisamaye -> madhyāhnaṃ cārdharātraṃ dinaniśisamaye

idānīm+śāntipuṣṭyos -> idānīṃ śāntipuṣṭyos

idānīṃ śāntipuṣṭyoḥ krūravelālagnapratiṣedhas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ śāntipuṣṭyoḥ krūravelālagnapratiṣedha ucyate---

vaktavyas+iti|| -> vaktavya iti||

tadā+ardhapraharam -> tadārdhapraharam

tadārdhapraharam ekam+homam -> tadārdhapraharam ekaṃ homam

tadārdhapraharam ekaṃ homam+kṛtvā -> tadārdhapraharam ekaṃ homaṃ kṛtvā

praharam+ekam -> praharam ekam

praharam ekam+homam -> praharam ekaṃ homam

praharam ekaṃ homam+kartum -> praharam ekaṃ homaṃ kartum

praharam ekaṃ homaṃ kartum+na -> praharam ekaṃ homaṃ kartuṃ na

vakṣyamāṇāsanam+baddhvā -> vakṣyamāṇāsanaṃ baddhvā

kuryāt+mantrī| -> kuryān mantrī|

pauṣṭikam evaṃ sarvatra+api| -> pauṣṭikam evaṃ sarvatrāpi|

pūrvāhṇāt+ardhaprahare -> pūrvāhṇād ardhaprahare

pratidinaṃ pūrvāhṇād aṣṭayāmāḥ praharās+teṣu -> pratidinaṃ pūrvāhṇād aṣṭayāmāḥ praharās teṣu

idānīm+śāntikādivelā -> idānīṃ śāntikādivelā

tulyās+ṣoḍaśāṅgulās -> tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulās

tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulās+caturaṅgulagrīvās -> tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāś caturaṅgulagrīvās

tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāś caturaṅgulagrīvās+ṣaḍaṅgulāsyās -> tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāś caturaṅgulagrīvāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyās

tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāś caturaṅgulagrīvāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyās+sthūloṣṭhās -> tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāś caturaṅgulagrīvāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyāḥ sthūloṣṭhās

tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāś caturaṅgulagrīvāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyāḥ sthūloṣṭhās+aṅguṣṭhadvayena -> tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāś caturaṅgulagrīvāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyāḥ sthūloṣṭhā aṅguṣṭhadvayena

tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāś caturaṅgulagrīvāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyāḥ sthūloṣṭhā aṅguṣṭhadvayena+iti -> tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāś caturaṅgulagrīvāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyāḥ sthūloṣṭhā aṅguṣṭhadvayeneti

kharvās+vṛttocchrayeṇa -> kharvā vṛttocchrayeṇa

caturviṃśatyaṅgulās+aṅgulaikauṣṭhās -> caturviṃśatyaṅgulā aṅgulaikauṣṭhās

caturviṃśatyaṅgulā aṅgulaikauṣṭhās+ṣaḍaṅgulāsyās -> caturviṃśatyaṅgulā aṅgulaikauṣṭhāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyās

caturviṃśatyaṅgulā aṅgulaikauṣṭhāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyās+iti -> caturviṃśatyaṅgulā aṅgulaikauṣṭhāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulāsyā iti

dvādaśāṅgulās+ucchrayeṇa -> dvādaśāṅgulā ucchrayeṇa

dīrghagrīvā aṣṭāṅgulavaktrās+kṛṣṇāṅgās -> dīrghagrīvā aṣṭāṅgulavaktrāḥ kṛṣṇāṅgās

ghaṭāḥ syus+iti| -> ghaṭāḥ syur iti|

ca+anye -> cānye

śaśadharadhavalās+śāntipuṣṭyos -> śaśadharadhavalāḥ śāntipuṣṭyos

śaśadharadhavalāḥ śāntipuṣṭyos+na -> śaśadharadhavalāḥ śāntipuṣṭyor na

kaṇṭharandhram+bhāgaikena -> kaṇṭharandhraṃ bhāgaikena

kaṇṭharandhraṃ bhāgaikena+oṣṭhadvayāyāmas -> kaṇṭharandhraṃ bhāgaikenauṣṭhadvayāyāmas

kaṇṭharandhraṃ bhāgaikenauṣṭhadvayāyāmas+| -> kaṇṭharandhraṃ bhāgaikenauṣṭhadvayāyāmaḥ|

oṣṭhāntāt+oṣṭhāntamukham -> oṣṭhāntād oṣṭhāntamukham

oṣṭhāntād oṣṭhāntamukham+aṣṭāṅgulam -> oṣṭhāntād oṣṭhāntamukham aṣṭāṅgulam

oṣṭhāntād oṣṭhāntamukham aṣṭāṅgulam+aṣṭāṅgulam -> oṣṭhāntād oṣṭhāntamukham aṣṭāṅgulam aṣṭāṅgulam

oṣṭhāntād oṣṭhāntamukham aṣṭāṅgulam aṣṭāṅgulam+bhāgatrayam -> oṣṭhāntād oṣṭhāntamukham aṣṭāṅgulam aṣṭāṅgulaṃ bhāgatrayam

oṣṭhāntād oṣṭhāntamukham aṣṭāṅgulam aṣṭāṅgulaṃ bhāgatrayam+kṛtvā -> oṣṭhāntād oṣṭhāntamukham aṣṭāṅgulam aṣṭāṅgulaṃ bhāgatrayaṃ kṛtvā

dvyaṅguloṣṭhās+mukhāt -> dvyaṅguloṣṭhā mukhāt

dvyaṅguloṣṭhā mukhāt+avadhes -> dvyaṅguloṣṭhā mukhād avadhes

dvyaṅguloṣṭhā mukhād avadhes+ṣaḍaṅgulagrīvās -> dvyaṅguloṣṭhā mukhād avadheḥ ṣaḍaṅgulagrīvās

dvyaṅguloṣṭhā mukhād avadheḥ ṣaḍaṅgulagrīvās+aṣṭāṅgulāsyās -> dvyaṅguloṣṭhā mukhād avadheḥ ṣaḍaṅgulagrīvā aṣṭāṅgulāsyās

dvyaṅguloṣṭhā mukhād avadheḥ ṣaḍaṅgulagrīvā aṣṭāṅgulāsyās+| -> dvyaṅguloṣṭhā mukhād avadheḥ ṣaḍaṅgulagrīvā aṣṭāṅgulāsyāḥ|

yeṣām+te -> yeṣāṃ te

dvyaṅgulau+oṣṭhau -> dvyaṅgulāv oṣṭhau

dvyaṅguloṣṭhās+iti -> dvyaṅguloṣṭhā iti

dviguṇitadaśakena+ucchritās -> dviguṇitadaśakenocchritās

dviguṇitadaśakenocchritās+iti -> dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā iti

dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā iti+adhas -> dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhas

dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhas+kalaśagarbhāt -> dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhaḥ kalaśagarbhāt

dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhaḥ kalaśagarbhāt+mukhauṣṭhāntās -> dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhaḥ kalaśagarbhān mukhauṣṭhāntās

dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhaḥ kalaśagarbhān mukhauṣṭhāntās+viṃśatyaṅgulās -> dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhaḥ kalaśagarbhān mukhauṣṭhāntā viṃśatyaṅgulās

dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhaḥ kalaśagarbhān mukhauṣṭhāntā viṃśatyaṅgulās+ucchrayeṇa -> dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhaḥ kalaśagarbhān mukhauṣṭhāntā viṃśatyaṅgulā ucchrayeṇa

dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhaḥ kalaśagarbhān mukhauṣṭhāntā viṃśatyaṅgulā ucchrayeṇa+iti| -> dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā ity adhaḥ kalaśagarbhān mukhauṣṭhāntā viṃśatyaṅgulā ucchrayeṇeti|

dvyaṣṭāṅgulās+uktās -> dvyaṣṭāṅgulā uktās

dvyaṣṭāṅgulā uktās+ṣoḍaśāṅgulās -> dvyaṣṭāṅgulā uktāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulās

dvyaṣṭāṅgulā uktāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulās+uktās -> dvyaṣṭāṅgulā uktāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulā uktās

dvyaṣṭāṅgulā uktāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulā uktās+| -> dvyaṣṭāṅgulā uktāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulā uktāḥ|

ca+aṣṭakarma -> cāṣṭakarma

evam+tatra -> evaṃ tatra

evaṃ tatra+ardhayāmais -> evaṃ tatrārdhayāmais

evaṃ tatrārdhayāmais+dinaniśisamaye -> evaṃ tatrārdhayāmair dinaniśisamaye

pūrvāhṇāt+aṣṭayāmās -> pūrvāhṇād aṣṭayāmās

pūrvāhṇād aṣṭayāmās+pratidinasamaye -> pūrvāhṇād aṣṭayāmāḥ pratidinasamaye

ca+anye| -> cānye|

ṣaḍgrīvāṣṭāṅgulāsyās+śaśadharadhavalās -> ṣaḍgrīvāṣṭāṅgulāsyāḥ śaśadharadhavalās

ṣaḍgrīvāṣṭāṅgulāsyāḥ śaśadharadhavalās+śāntipuṣṭyos -> ṣaḍgrīvāṣṭāṅgulāsyāḥ śaśadharadhavalāḥ śāntipuṣṭyos

ṣaḍgrīvāṣṭāṅgulāsyāḥ śaśadharadhavalāḥ śāntipuṣṭyos+na -> ṣaḍgrīvāṣṭāṅgulāsyāḥ śaśadharadhavalāḥ śāntipuṣṭyor na

vṛttās+dvyaṣṭāṅguloktās -> vṛttā dvyaṣṭāṅguloktās

vṛttā dvyaṣṭāṅguloktās+dviguṇitadaśakena -> vṛttā dvyaṣṭāṅguloktā dviguṇitadaśakena

vṛttā dvyaṣṭāṅguloktā dviguṇitadaśakena+ucchritās -> vṛttā dvyaṣṭāṅguloktā dviguṇitadaśakenocchritās

vṛttā dvyaṣṭāṅguloktā dviguṇitadaśakenocchritās+dvyaṅguloṣṭhās -> vṛttā dvyaṣṭāṅguloktā dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā dvyaṅguloṣṭhās

śāntipuṣṭyartham+ghaṭalakṣaṇam -> śāntipuṣṭyarthaṃ ghaṭalakṣaṇam

śāntipuṣṭyarthaṃ ghaṭalakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> śāntipuṣṭyarthaṃ ghaṭalakṣaṇam ucyate---

dārujās+daśakalaśās -> dārujā daśakalaśās

dārujā daśakalaśās+iti|| -> dārujā daśakalaśā iti||

mṛṇmayās+mohane -> mṛṇmayā mohane

tāmrās+stambhane -> tāmrāḥ stambhane

sauvarṇās+ākṛṣṭau -> sauvarṇā ākṛṣṭau

vidveṣe+āyasās -> vidveṣa āyasās

vidveṣa āyasās+vaśye -> vidveṣa āyasā vaśye

mānuṣakapālās+uccāṭane -> mānuṣakapālā uccāṭane

raupyās+māraṇe -> raupyā māraṇe

sphāṭikakalaśās+puṣṭau -> sphāṭikakalaśāḥ puṣṭau

idānīm+kalaśās -> idānīṃ kalaśās

idānīṃ kalaśās+ucyante| -> idānīṃ kalaśā ucyante|

kīlakaniyamas+sārvakarmike -> kīlakaniyamaḥ sārvakarmike

kīlakaniyamaḥ sārvakarmike+udumbarajās -> kīlakaniyamaḥ sārvakarmika udumbarajās

kīlakaniyamaḥ sārvakarmika udumbarajās+| -> kīlakaniyamaḥ sārvakarmika udumbarajāḥ|

bilvajās+iti -> bilvajā iti

cūtajās+mohane -> cūtajā mohane

cūtajā mohane+arkajās -> cūtajā mohane 'rkajās

cūtajā mohane 'rkajās+stambhane -> cūtajā mohane 'rkajāḥ stambhane

khadirajās+ākṛṣṭau -> khadirajā ākṛṣṭau

nyagrodhakīlakās+daśadikkīlanārtham -> nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārtham

nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārtham+puṣṭau -> nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭau

nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭau+aśvatthās -> nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthās

nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthās+māraṇe -> nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthā māraṇe

nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthā māraṇe+asthimayās -> nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthā māraṇe 'sthimayās

nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthā māraṇe 'sthimayās+uccāṭane -> nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthā māraṇe 'sthimayā uccāṭane

nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthā māraṇe 'sthimayā uccāṭane+āyasās -> nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthā māraṇe 'sthimayā uccāṭana āyasās

nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthā māraṇe 'sthimayā uccāṭana āyasās+vaśye -> nyagrodhakīlakā daśadikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭāv aśvatthā māraṇe 'sthimayā uccāṭana āyasā vaśye

tāmrākhyās+hemakumbhās -> tāmrākhyā hemakumbhās

tāmrākhyā hemakumbhās+prakaṭitaniyatās -> tāmrākhyā hemakumbhāḥ prakaṭitaniyatās

tāmrākhyā hemakumbhāḥ prakaṭitaniyatās+dārujās -> tāmrākhyā hemakumbhāḥ prakaṭitaniyatā dārujās

tāmrākhyā hemakumbhāḥ prakaṭitaniyatā dārujās+mṛṇmayās -> tāmrākhyā hemakumbhāḥ prakaṭitaniyatā dārujā mṛṇmayās

tāmrākhyā hemakumbhāḥ prakaṭitaniyatā dārujā mṛṇmayās+ca|| -> tāmrākhyā hemakumbhāḥ prakaṭitaniyatā dārujā mṛṇmayāś ca||

evam+sphāṭikyakumbhās -> evaṃ sphāṭikyakumbhās

evaṃ sphāṭikyakumbhās+vararajatamayās -> evaṃ sphāṭikyakumbhā vararajatamayās

evaṃ sphāṭikyakumbhā vararajatamayās+śrīkapālāyasās -> evaṃ sphāṭikyakumbhā vararajatamayāḥ śrīkapālāyasās

evaṃ sphāṭikyakumbhā vararajatamayāḥ śrīkapālāyasās+ca -> evaṃ sphāṭikyakumbhā vararajatamayāḥ śrīkapālāyasāś ca

nyagrodhāśvatthakāsthīni+ayasakhadirajam -> nyagrodhāśvatthakāsthīny ayasakhadirajam

nyagrodhāśvatthakāsthīny ayasakhadirajam+cūtabilvārkajam -> nyagrodhāśvatthakāsthīny ayasakhadirajaṃ cūtabilvārkajam

nyagrodhāśvatthakāsthīny ayasakhadirajaṃ cūtabilvārkajam+ca| -> nyagrodhāśvatthakāsthīny ayasakhadirajaṃ cūtabilvārkajaṃ ca|

kīlakam+ca -> kīlakaṃ ca

kīlakaṃ ca+aṣṭabhedais -> kīlakaṃ cāṣṭabhedais

sarvakarmasu+api -> sarvakarmasv api

vajram+vā -> vajraṃ vā

idānīm+bhūmikīlanārtham -> idānīṃ bhūmikīlanārtham

idānīṃ bhūmikīlanārtham+kīlakās -> idānīṃ bhūmikīlanārthaṃ kīlakās

idānīṃ bhūmikīlanārthaṃ kīlakās+ucyante--- -> idānīṃ bhūmikīlanārthaṃ kīlakā ucyante---

cihnam+sarvakarmaṇi -> cihnaṃ sarvakarmaṇi

vajram+vā -> vajraṃ vā

vedībāhye+anyat -> vedībāhye 'nyat

vedībāhye 'nyat+anyat -> vedībāhye 'nyad anyat

vedībāhye 'nyad anyat+vakṣyate| -> vedībāhye 'nyad anyad vakṣyate|

śāntipuṣṭyos+śeṣakarmaṇi -> śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śeṣakarmaṇi

vedyās+samam -> vedyāḥ samam

vedyāḥ samam+tadbāhye -> vedyāḥ samaṃ tadbāhye

vedyāḥ samaṃ tadbāhye+abjapatrāṇi -> vedyāḥ samaṃ tadbāhye 'bjapatrāṇi

vedis+kuṇḍadvādaśabhāgikam -> vediḥ kuṇḍadvādaśabhāgikam

vediḥ kuṇḍadvādaśabhāgikam+oṣṭham -> vediḥ kuṇḍadvādaśabhāgikam oṣṭham

vediḥ kuṇḍadvādaśabhāgikam oṣṭham+cihnāvalī -> vediḥ kuṇḍadvādaśabhāgikam oṣṭhaṃ cihnāvalī

khānis+kuṇḍe -> khāniḥ kuṇḍe

viṃśatyaṅgulam+trikoṇam -> viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇam

viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇam+ṣaṭkoṇam -> viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇaṃ ṣaṭkoṇam

viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇaṃ ṣaṭkoṇam+triṃśadaṅgulam -> viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇaṃ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ triṃśadaṅgulam

viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇaṃ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ triṃśadaṅgulam+ṣaṣṭyaṅgulam -> viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇaṃ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ triṃśadaṅgulaṃ ṣaṣṭyaṅgulam

viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇaṃ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ triṃśadaṅgulaṃ ṣaṣṭyaṅgulam+aṣṭakoṇam -> viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇaṃ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ triṃśadaṅgulaṃ ṣaṣṭyaṅgulam aṣṭakoṇam

viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇaṃ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ triṃśadaṅgulaṃ ṣaṣṭyaṅgulam aṣṭakoṇam+kuṇḍārdhamānā -> viṃśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇaṃ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ triṃśadaṅgulaṃ ṣaṣṭyaṅgulam aṣṭakoṇaṃ kuṇḍārdhamānā

ekahastam+vṛttam -> ekahastaṃ vṛttam

ekahastaṃ vṛttam+dvihastam -> ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastam

ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastam+caturasram -> ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram

ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram+ardhahastam -> ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastam

ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastam+dhanurākāram -> ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastaṃ dhanurākāram

ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastaṃ dhanurākāram+vṛttapramāṇam -> ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastaṃ dhanurākāraṃ vṛttapramāṇam

ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastaṃ dhanurākāraṃ vṛttapramāṇam+pañcakoṇam -> ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastaṃ dhanurākāraṃ vṛttapramāṇaṃ pañcakoṇam

ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastaṃ dhanurākāraṃ vṛttapramāṇaṃ pañcakoṇam+catvāriṃśadaṅgulam -> ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastaṃ dhanurākāraṃ vṛttapramāṇaṃ pañcakoṇaṃ catvāriṃśadaṅgulam

ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastaṃ dhanurākāraṃ vṛttapramāṇaṃ pañcakoṇaṃ catvāriṃśadaṅgulam+saptakoṇam| -> ekahastaṃ vṛttaṃ dvihastaṃ caturasram ardhahastaṃ dhanurākāraṃ vṛttapramāṇaṃ pañcakoṇaṃ catvāriṃśadaṅgulaṃ saptakoṇam|

kuṇḍaṃ grāmāṣṭadikṣu+aiśānyādiṣu -> kuṇḍaṃ grāmāṣṭadikṣv aiśānyādiṣu

vajrāṅkuśaḥ śṛṅkhalāhis+|| -> vajrāṅkuśaḥ śṛṅkhalāhiḥ||

ardhendum+pañcakoṇam -> ardhenduṃ pañcakoṇam

ardhenduṃ pañcakoṇam+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> ardhenduṃ pañcakoṇaṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

ardhenduṃ pañcakoṇaṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+saptakoṇam -> ardhenduṃ pañcakoṇaṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt saptakoṇam

ardhenduṃ pañcakoṇaṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt saptakoṇam+trikoṇam| -> ardhenduṃ pañcakoṇaṃ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt saptakoṇaṃ trikoṇam|

idānīm+śāntyādikuṇḍam -> idānīṃ śāntyādikuṇḍam

idānīṃ śāntyādikuṇḍam+ucyate| -> idānīṃ śāntyādikuṇḍam ucyate|

karmakaraṇaniyamas+|| -> karmakaraṇaniyamaḥ||

kuryāt+mantrī -> kuryān mantrī

kuryān mantrī+iti -> kuryān mantrīti

sārvakarmikamaṇḍalam+kuṇḍam -> sārvakarmikamaṇḍalaṃ kuṇḍam

sārvakarmikamaṇḍalaṃ kuṇḍam+homam -> sārvakarmikamaṇḍalaṃ kuṇḍaṃ homam

sārvakarmikamaṇḍalaṃ kuṇḍaṃ homam+ca -> sārvakarmikamaṇḍalaṃ kuṇḍaṃ homaṃ ca

stambhanam+kīlanam -> stambhanaṃ kīlanam

stambhanaṃ kīlanam+ca -> stambhanaṃ kīlanaṃ ca

stambhanaṃ kīlanaṃ ca+iti| -> stambhanaṃ kīlanaṃ ceti|

vidveṣoccāṭanam+nairṛtyām -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyām

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyām+vaśyam -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyam

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyam+dakṣiṇe -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇe

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇe+ākṛṣṭis -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇa ākṛṣṭis

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇa ākṛṣṭis+stobhanam -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇa ākṛṣṭiḥ stobhanam

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇa ākṛṣṭiḥ stobhanam+vāyavyām -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇa ākṛṣṭiḥ stobhanaṃ vāyavyām

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇa ākṛṣṭiḥ stobhanaṃ vāyavyām+mohanam -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇa ākṛṣṭiḥ stobhanaṃ vāyavyāṃ mohanam

vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇa ākṛṣṭiḥ stobhanaṃ vāyavyāṃ mohanam+paścime -> vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vaśyaṃ dakṣiṇa ākṛṣṭiḥ stobhanaṃ vāyavyāṃ mohanaṃ paścime

tathā+āgneyyām -> tathāgneyyām

tathāgneyyām+māraṇam -> tathāgneyyāṃ māraṇam

tathāgneyyāṃ māraṇam+pūrve -> tathāgneyyāṃ māraṇaṃ pūrve

śāntipuṣṭikarmaniyamas+| -> śāntipuṣṭikarmaniyamaḥ|

rājadhānyām+iti -> rājadhānyām iti

grāmavat+bāhye -> grāmavad bāhye

śāntikam+pauṣṭikam -> śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikam

śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikam+kartavyam| -> śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ kartavyam|

rājagṛhasya+aiśānyām -> rājagṛhasyaiśānyām

rājagṛhasyaiśānyām+uttareṇa -> rājagṛhasyaiśānyām uttareṇa

śāntikam+pauṣṭikam -> śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikam

śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikam+na -> śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ na

śavadahanādiśmaśānāṣṭakam+tena -> śavadahanādiśmaśānāṣṭakaṃ tena

mahārājadhānyām+punar -> mahārājadhānyāṃ punar

mahārājadhānyāṃ punar+aṣṭadikṣu -> mahārājadhānyāṃ punar aṣṭadikṣu

kuryāt+uttare -> kuryād uttare

kuryād uttare+api -> kuryād uttare 'pi

grāmabāhye+aiśānyām -> grāmabāhya aiśānyām

grāmabāhya aiśānyām+śāntikam -> grāmabāhya aiśānyāṃ śāntikam

grāmabāhya aiśānyāṃ śāntikam+pauṣṭikam -> grāmabāhya aiśānyāṃ śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikam

grāmabāhya aiśānyāṃ śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikam+jvarāpaharaṇam -> grāmabāhya aiśānyāṃ śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ jvarāpaharaṇam

grāmabāhya aiśānyāṃ śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ jvarāpaharaṇam+vā -> grāmabāhya aiśānyāṃ śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ jvarāpaharaṇaṃ vā

stambhanam+mohanam -> stambhanaṃ mohanam

stambhanaṃ mohanam+ca|| -> stambhanaṃ mohanaṃ ca||

vāyavyām+paścime -> vāyavyāṃ paścime

satatam+vaśyam -> satataṃ vaśyam

satataṃ vaśyam+ākarṣaṇam -> satataṃ vaśyam ākarṣaṇam

satataṃ vaśyam ākarṣaṇam+ca -> satataṃ vaśyam ākarṣaṇaṃ ca

sphuṭam+api -> sphuṭam api

nairṛtyām+dakṣiṇe -> nairṛtyāṃ dakṣiṇe

āgneyyām+pūrvabhāge -> āgneyyāṃ pūrvabhāge

śāntikam+pauṣṭikam -> śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikam

śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikam+ca -> śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ ca

aiśānyām+ca -> aiśānyāṃ ca

aiśānyāṃ ca+uttare -> aiśānyāṃ cottare

idānīm+śāntikādyartham -> idānīṃ śāntikādyartham

idānīṃ śāntikādyartham+digvibhāgas -> idānīṃ śāntikādyarthaṃ digvibhāgas

idānīṃ śāntikādyarthaṃ digvibhāgas+ucyate -> idānīṃ śāntikādyarthaṃ digvibhāga ucyate

idānīṃ śāntikādyarthaṃ digvibhāga ucyate+aiśānyām -> idānīṃ śāntikādyarthaṃ digvibhāga ucyata aiśānyām

idānīṃ śāntikādyarthaṃ digvibhāga ucyata aiśānyām+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ śāntikādyarthaṃ digvibhāga ucyata aiśānyām ityādinā|

bhūmiparīkṣākriyāniyamas+|| -> bhūmiparīkṣākriyāniyamaḥ||

ṣat+iti -> ṣad iti

śvetaraktāyām+api -> śvetaraktāyām api

haritāyām+sādhāraṇam -> haritāyāṃ sādhāraṇam

haritāyāṃ sādhāraṇam+sārvakarmikam -> haritāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ sārvakarmikam

haritāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ sārvakarmikam+kāryam -> haritāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ sārvakarmikaṃ kāryam

haritāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ sārvakarmikaṃ kāryam+tadā% -> haritāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ sārvakarmikaṃ kāryaṃ tadā%

kṣepaṇīyam+iti| -> kṣepaṇīyam iti|

kiṃcit+api -> kiṃcid api

haritāyām+na -> haritāyāṃ na

sphaṭikam+puṣṭau -> sphaṭikaṃ puṣṭau

manaḥśilām+śvetāyām -> manaḥśilāṃ śvetāyām

manaḥśilāṃ śvetāyām+śāntau -> manaḥśilāṃ śvetāyāṃ śāntau

hiṅgulam+stobhe -> hiṅgulaṃ stobhe

kiṃcit+kṣepaṇīyam| -> kiṃcit kṣepaṇīyam|

haritāyām+sarvakarmakaratvāt -> haritāyāṃ sarvakarmakaratvāt

haritāyāṃ sarvakarmakaratvāt+na -> haritāyāṃ sarvakarmakaratvān na

bhāvayet+rasāsvādanārtham -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārtham

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārtham+kṛṣṇāyām -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyām

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyām+lavaṇāmbum -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbum

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbum+kṣepayet -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet+pītāyām -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyām

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyām+guḍam -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍam

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍam+raktāyām -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyām

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyām+trikaṭukam -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukam

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukam+śvetāyām -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukaṃ śvetāyām

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukaṃ śvetāyām+tiktam -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukaṃ śvetāyāṃ tiktam

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukaṃ śvetāyāṃ tiktam+kaṣāyam -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukaṃ śvetāyāṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyam

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukaṃ śvetāyāṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyam+ca -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukaṃ śvetāyāṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyaṃ ca

bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukaṃ śvetāyāṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyaṃ ca+iti -> bhāvayed rasāsvādanārthaṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ lavaṇāmbuṃ kṣepayet pītāyāṃ guḍaṃ raktāyāṃ trikaṭukaṃ śvetāyāṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyaṃ ceti

kṛṣṇamṛtīkām+pūtimāṃsatoyena -> kṛṣṇamṛtīkāṃ pūtimāṃsatoyena

bhāvayet+| -> bhāvayet|

bhāvayet+pītamṛttikām -> bhāvayet pītamṛttikām

bhāvayet pītamṛttikām+kharāśvamanuṣyamūtreṇa -> bhāvayet pītamṛttikāṃ kharāśvamanuṣyamūtreṇa

bhāvayet+raktamṛttikām -> bhāvayed raktamṛttikām

bhāvayed raktamṛttikām+padmodakena -> bhāvayed raktamṛttikāṃ padmodakena

bhūgandhārtham+śvetamṛttikām -> bhūgandhārthaṃ śvetamṛttikām

bhūgandhārthaṃ śvetamṛttikām+candanodakena -> bhūgandhārthaṃ śvetamṛttikāṃ candanodakena

khānim+pūrayet -> khāniṃ pūrayet

khāniṃ pūrayet+karmānurūpatas -> khāniṃ pūrayet karmānurūpatas

khāniṃ pūrayet karmānurūpatas+| -> khāniṃ pūrayet karmānurūpataḥ|

khanet+tatas -> khanet tatas

khanet tatas+aparamṛttikayā -> khanet tato 'paramṛttikayā

khānim+khanitvā -> khāniṃ khanitvā

khāniṃ khanitvā+udakāntam -> khāniṃ khanitvodakāntam

khāniṃ khanitvodakāntam+śilāntam -> khāniṃ khanitvodakāntaṃ śilāntam

khāniṃ khanitvodakāntaṃ śilāntam+vā -> khāniṃ khanitvodakāntaṃ śilāntaṃ vā

karmānurūpatas+bhūmis -> karmānurūpato bhūmis

karmānurūpato bhūmis+na -> karmānurūpato bhūmir na

kartavyam+tatra -> kartavyaṃ tatra

bhagavatā+uktam---iha -> bhagavatoktam---iha

bhūmis+bhavati -> bhūmir bhavati

vanapurādidigvibhāgeṣu+ebhis -> vanapurādidigvibhāgeṣv ebhis

vanapurādidigvibhāgeṣv ebhis+lakṣaṇais -> vanapurādidigvibhāgeṣv ebhir lakṣaṇais

vanapurādidigvibhāgeṣv ebhir lakṣaṇais+yuktā -> vanapurādidigvibhāgeṣv ebhir lakṣaṇair yuktā

yadi+īdṛśas -> yadīdṛśas

yadīdṛśas+bhūmilakṣaṇaniyamas -> yadīdṛśo bhūmilakṣaṇaniyamas

yadīdṛśo bhūmilakṣaṇaniyamas+śāntikādyartham -> yadīdṛśo bhūmilakṣaṇaniyamaḥ śāntikādyartham

yadīdṛśo bhūmilakṣaṇaniyamaḥ śāntikādyartham+tadā -> yadīdṛśo bhūmilakṣaṇaniyamaḥ śāntikādyarthaṃ tadā

bhūmilakṣaṇaniyamas+| -> bhūmilakṣaṇaniyamaḥ|

veditavyā+iti -> veditavyeti

sakalaguṇanidhis+sākāśadhātulakṣaṇā -> sakalaguṇanidhiḥ sākāśadhātulakṣaṇā

sakalaguṇanidhis+yoginā -> sakalaguṇanidhir yoginā

ca+antyajātis -> cāntyajātis

sarvasmin+karmabhāge -> sarvasmin karmabhāge

raktā+ākṛṣṭau -> raktākṛṣṭau

idānīm+śāntyādyartham -> idānīṃ śāntyādyartham

idānīṃ śāntyādyartham+bhūmim -> idānīṃ śāntyādyarthaṃ bhūmim

idānīṃ śāntyādyarthaṃ bhūmim+āha--- -> idānīṃ śāntyādyarthaṃ bhūmim āha---

svādatas+jātiniyamas -> svādato jātiniyamas

svādato jātiniyamas+|| -> svādato jātiniyamaḥ||

anyas+rasas -> anyo rasas

anyo rasas+tiktas -> anyo rasas tiktas

anyo rasas tiktas+kaṣāyas -> anyo rasas tiktaḥ kaṣāyas

anyo rasas tiktaḥ kaṣāyas+dvijātis -> anyo rasas tiktaḥ kaṣāyo dvijātis

anyo rasas tiktaḥ kaṣāyo dvijātis+iti -> anyo rasas tiktaḥ kaṣāyo dvijātir iti

nṛpas+iti -> nṛpa iti

viḍjātis+kaṭukāsvādena -> viḍjātiḥ kaṭukāsvādena

samadhurakaṭukā+iti -> samadhurakaṭuketi

jātis+| -> jātiḥ|

caturvarṇatas+veditavyā -> caturvarṇato veditavyā

viṅnṛpe 'nyo dvijātis+|| -> viṅnṛpe 'nyo dvijātiḥ||

varṇatas+veditavyā| -> varṇato veditavyā|

guṇavaśāt+śūdraviḍrājaviprā -> guṇavaśāc chūdraviḍrājaviprā

bhūmes+jātis -> bhūmer jātis
