idānīm+bhūmilakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ bhūmilakṣaṇam

idānīṃ bhūmilakṣaṇam+ucyate -> idānīṃ bhūmilakṣaṇam ucyate

sekārtham+bhūparīkṣām -> sekārthaṃ bhūparīkṣām

sekārthaṃ bhūparīkṣām+ityādi -> sekārthaṃ bhūparīkṣām ityādi

paravañcakasya+iti -> paravañcakasyeti

paravañcakasyeti+ācāryānuśāsanam -> paravañcakasyety ācāryānuśāsanam

paravañcakasyety ācāryānuśāsanam+vṛttam| -> paravañcakasyety ācāryānuśāsanaṃ vṛttam|

narakagamanam+bhavati -> narakagamanaṃ bhavati

parijñānābhāvāt+kurvatas -> parijñānābhāvāt kurvatas

parijñānābhāvāt kurvatas+duṣṭācāryasya -> parijñānābhāvāt kurvato duṣṭācāryasya

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

kuryāt+iti -> kuryād iti

vajrācāryas+śiṣyāṇām -> vajrācāryaḥ śiṣyāṇām

vajrācāryaḥ śiṣyāṇām+saṃgraham -> vajrācāryaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgraham

vajrācāryaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgraham+yat -> vajrācāryaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yat

vajrācāryaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yat+maṇḍalālekhanam -> vajrācāryaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yan maṇḍalālekhanam

vajrācāryaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yan maṇḍalālekhanam+ca -> vajrācāryaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yan maṇḍalālekhanaṃ ca

vaktavyam+tat -> vaktavyaṃ tat

vaktavyaṃ tat+samastam -> vaktavyaṃ tat samastam

vaktavyaṃ tat samastam+śubhāśubhakarmaphalārtham -> vaktavyaṃ tat samastaṃ śubhāśubhakarmaphalārtham

vaktavyaṃ tat samastaṃ śubhāśubhakarmaphalārtham+śāntikādyam -> vaktavyaṃ tat samastaṃ śubhāśubhakarmaphalārthaṃ śāntikādyam

vaktavyaṃ tat samastaṃ śubhāśubhakarmaphalārthaṃ śāntikādyam+kuryāt -> vaktavyaṃ tat samastaṃ śubhāśubhakarmaphalārthaṃ śāntikādyaṃ kuryāt

vaktavyaṃ tat samastaṃ śubhāśubhakarmaphalārthaṃ śāntikādyaṃ kuryāt+iti -> vaktavyaṃ tat samastaṃ śubhāśubhakarmaphalārthaṃ śāntikādyaṃ kuryād iti

yat+bhūmyādikam -> yad bhūmyādikam

yad bhūmyādikam+gṛhītam -> yad bhūmyādikaṃ gṛhītam

yad bhūmyādikaṃ gṛhītam+vakṣyamāṇe -> yad bhūmyādikaṃ gṛhītaṃ vakṣyamāṇe

śiṣyāṇām+saṃgraham -> śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgraham

śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgraham+yat -> śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yat

śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yat+paramajinapates -> śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yat paramajinapates

śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yat paramajinapates+maṇḍalālekhanam|| -> śiṣyāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ yat paramajinapater maṇḍalālekhanam||

sakalasarajasām+homakīlādikānām -> sakalasarajasāṃ homakīlādikānām

kuṇḍānām+lakṣaṇam -> kuṇḍānāṃ lakṣaṇam

kuṇḍānāṃ lakṣaṇam+vai -> kuṇḍānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai

śāntikādyam+prakuryāt| -> śāntikādyaṃ prakuryāt|

jñātvā+ācāryas -> jñātvācāryas

jñātvācāryas+samastam -> jñātvācāryaḥ samastam

jñātvācāryaḥ samastam+tu -> jñātvācāryaḥ samastaṃ tu

jñātvācāryaḥ samastaṃ tu+aśubhaśubhaphale -> jñātvācāryaḥ samastaṃ tv aśubhaśubhaphale

sekārtham+bhūparīkṣām -> sekārthaṃ bhūparīkṣām

sekārthaṃ bhūparīkṣām+vanapuranigame -> sekārthaṃ bhūparīkṣāṃ vanapuranigame

idānīm+sekārtham -> idānīṃ sekārtham

idānīṃ sekārtham+bhūmyādilakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ sekārthaṃ bhūmyādilakṣaṇam

idānīṃ sekārthaṃ bhūmyādilakṣaṇam+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ sekārthaṃ bhūmyādilakṣaṇam ucyate---

pūjāniyamas+|| -> pūjāniyamaḥ||

pūjādivastugrāhakās+iti -> pūjādivastugrāhakā iti

yasmāt+āśayagrāhakās -> yasmād āśayagrāhakās

yasmād āśayagrāhakās+buddhās -> yasmād āśayagrāhakā buddhās

yasmād āśayagrāhakā buddhās+vajrayoginyas -> yasmād āśayagrāhakā buddhā vajrayoginyas

yasmād āśayagrāhakā buddhā vajrayoginyas+ca -> yasmād āśayagrāhakā buddhā vajrayoginyaś ca

niyamas+na -> niyamo na

niyamo na+asti| -> niyamo nāsti|

guros+api -> guror api

tebhyas+deśanām -> tebhyo deśanām

tebhyo deśanām+prati -> tebhyo deśanāṃ prati

avadhūtaśiṣyāṇām+punas -> avadhūtaśiṣyāṇāṃ punas

avadhūtaśiṣyāṇāṃ punas+pūjāniyamas -> avadhūtaśiṣyāṇāṃ punaḥ pūjāniyamas

avadhūtaśiṣyāṇāṃ punaḥ pūjāniyamas+na -> avadhūtaśiṣyāṇāṃ punaḥ pūjāniyamo na

avadhūtaśiṣyāṇāṃ punaḥ pūjāniyamo na+asti -> avadhūtaśiṣyāṇāṃ punaḥ pūjāniyamo nāsti

gṛhasthānām+dhaninām -> gṛhasthānāṃ dhaninām

gṛhasthānāṃ dhaninām+niyamas -> gṛhasthānāṃ dhanināṃ niyamas

gṛhasthānāṃ dhanināṃ niyamas+| -> gṛhasthānāṃ dhanināṃ niyamaḥ|

bhūtādīnām+pratyaham -> bhūtādīnāṃ pratyaham

bhūtādīnāṃ pratyaham+valis -> bhūtādīnāṃ pratyahaṃ valis

bhūtādīnāṃ pratyahaṃ valis+dātavyas -> bhūtādīnāṃ pratyahaṃ valir dātavyas

bhūtādīnāṃ pratyahaṃ valir dātavyas+buddhapūjāmaṇḍalādikam -> bhūtādīnāṃ pratyahaṃ valir dātavyo buddhapūjāmaṇḍalādikam

bhūtādīnāṃ pratyahaṃ valir dātavyo buddhapūjāmaṇḍalādikam+kartavyam -> bhūtādīnāṃ pratyahaṃ valir dātavyo buddhapūjāmaṇḍalādikaṃ kartavyam

bhūtādīnāṃ pratyahaṃ valir dātavyo buddhapūjāmaṇḍalādikaṃ kartavyam+iti -> bhūtādīnāṃ pratyahaṃ valir dātavyo buddhapūjāmaṇḍalādikaṃ kartavyam iti

bāhyavighnopaśamanārtham+sadā -> bāhyavighnopaśamanārthaṃ sadā

bāhyavighnopaśamanārthaṃ sadā+aṣṭamyām -> bāhyavighnopaśamanārthaṃ sadāṣṭamyām

bāhyavighnopaśamanārthaṃ sadāṣṭamyām+caturdaśyām -> bāhyavighnopaśamanārthaṃ sadāṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyām

bāhyavighnopaśamanārthaṃ sadāṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyām+yathāvibhaktas -> bāhyavighnopaśamanārthaṃ sadāṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ yathāvibhaktas

bāhyavighnopaśamanārthaṃ sadāṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ yathāvibhaktas+kartavyā -> bāhyavighnopaśamanārthaṃ sadāṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ yathāvibhaktaḥ kartavyā

puṇyasambhāreṇa+anye -> puṇyasambhāreṇānye

puṇyasambhāreṇānye+api -> puṇyasambhāreṇānye 'pi

śṛṇoti+iti -> śṛṇotīti

yoginīpūjām+kṛtvā -> yoginīpūjāṃ kṛtvā

kaścit+yogyas -> kaścid yogyas

kaścid yogyas+śiṣyas -> kaścid yogyaḥ śiṣyas

kaścid yogyaḥ śiṣyas+śrutārthī -> kaścid yogyaḥ śiṣyaḥ śrutārthī

guros+vajrācāryasya -> guror vajrācāryasya

guror vajrācāryasya+iti| -> guror vajrācāryasyeti|

caitrapūrṇimāyām+tadā -> caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ tadā

caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ tadā+abdam -> caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ tadābdam

caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ tadābdam+ekam -> caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ tadābdam ekam

caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ tadābdam ekam+deśanābhāvas -> caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ tadābdam ekaṃ deśanābhāvas

caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ tadābdam ekaṃ deśanābhāvas+tantrarāje -> caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ tadābdam ekaṃ deśanābhāvas tantrarāje

atha+asāmagrīvaśāt -> athāsāmagrīvaśāt

athāsāmagrīvaśāt+pūjābhāvas -> athāsāmagrīvaśāt pūjābhāvas

athāsāmagrīvaśāt pūjābhāvas+bhavati -> athāsāmagrīvaśāt pūjābhāvo bhavati

sakalaguṇanidhes+tantrarājasya -> sakalaguṇanidhes tantrarājasya

maṇḍalālekhanābhāve+api -> maṇḍalālekhanābhāve 'pi

yoginīnām+khānapānādinā -> yoginīnāṃ khānapānādinā

caitrapūrṇimāyām+maṇḍalam -> caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ maṇḍalam

caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ maṇḍalam+vartayitvā -> caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā

idānīm+kālacakradeśanārtham -> idānīṃ kālacakradeśanārtham

idānīṃ kālacakradeśanārtham+yoginīpūjāniyamas -> idānīṃ kālacakradeśanārthaṃ yoginīpūjāniyamas

idānīṃ kālacakradeśanārthaṃ yoginīpūjāniyamas+ucyate| -> idānīṃ kālacakradeśanārthaṃ yoginīpūjāniyama ucyate|

sekādiniyamas+| -> sekādiniyamaḥ|

kartavyas+iti -> kartavya iti

tathā+anyasmin -> tathānyasmin

tathānyasmin+api -> tathānyasminn api

vajrācāryeṇa+abhiṣekās -> vajrācāryeṇābhiṣekās

vajrācāryeṇābhiṣekās+deyās -> vajrācāryeṇābhiṣekā deyās

vajrācāryeṇābhiṣekā deyās+pratimādīnām -> vajrācāryeṇābhiṣekā deyāḥ pratimādīnām

vajrācāryeṇābhiṣekā deyāḥ pratimādīnām+pratiṣṭhā -> vajrācāryeṇābhiṣekā deyāḥ pratimādīnāṃ pratiṣṭhā

evam+caitrapūrṇimām -> evaṃ caitrapūrṇimām

evaṃ caitrapūrṇimām+mukhatas -> evaṃ caitrapūrṇimāṃ mukhatas

evaṃ caitrapūrṇimāṃ mukhatas+kṛtvā -> evaṃ caitrapūrṇimāṃ mukhataḥ kṛtvā

bhagavatas+abhiṣekaniyamas -> bhagavato 'bhiṣekaniyamas

bhagavato 'bhiṣekaniyamas+| -> bhagavato 'bhiṣekaniyamaḥ|

vaktavyas+iti -> vaktavya iti

caturtham+upadeśena -> caturtham upadeśena

sahitās+| -> sahitāḥ|

jñānasambhāras+tasmāt -> jñānasambhāras tasmāt

jñānasambhāras tasmāt+jñānasambhārahetos -> jñānasambhāras tasmāj jñānasambhārahetos

jñānasambhāras tasmāj jñānasambhārahetos+uttarābhiṣekās -> jñānasambhāras tasmāj jñānasambhārahetor uttarābhiṣekās

jñānasambhāras tasmāj jñānasambhārahetor uttarābhiṣekās+deyās -> jñānasambhāras tasmāj jñānasambhārahetor uttarābhiṣekā deyās

jñānasambhāras tasmāj jñānasambhārahetor uttarābhiṣekā deyās+te -> jñānasambhāras tasmāj jñānasambhārahetor uttarābhiṣekā deyās te

svamāṃsādīṣṭataradānādyartham+sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatābhāvanārtham -> svamāṃsādīṣṭataradānādyarthaṃ sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatābhāvanārtham

svamāṃsādīṣṭataradānādyarthaṃ sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatābhāvanārtham+bodhicittākṣarārtham -> svamāṃsādīṣṭataradānādyarthaṃ sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatābhāvanārthaṃ bodhicittākṣarārtham

svamāṃsādīṣṭataradānādyarthaṃ sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatābhāvanārthaṃ bodhicittākṣarārtham+tena -> svamāṃsādīṣṭataradānādyarthaṃ sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatābhāvanārthaṃ bodhicittākṣarārthaṃ tena

tatas+jñānasambhārārtham -> tato jñānasambhārārtham

tato jñānasambhārārtham+uttarābhiṣekatrayam -> tato jñānasambhārārtham uttarābhiṣekatrayam

tato jñānasambhārārtham uttarābhiṣekatrayam+deyam| -> tato jñānasambhārārtham uttarābhiṣekatrayaṃ deyam|

puṇyasambhāras+tasmāt -> puṇyasambhāras tasmāt

puṇyasambhāras tasmāt+puṇyasambhārahetos -> puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetos

puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetos+saptābhiṣekās -> puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetoḥ saptābhiṣekās

puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetoḥ saptābhiṣekās+deyās -> puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetoḥ saptābhiṣekā deyās

puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetoḥ saptābhiṣekā deyās+iti -> puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetoḥ saptābhiṣekā deyā iti

puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetoḥ saptābhiṣekā deyā iti+ahiṃsādipañcaviṃśat -> puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetoḥ saptābhiṣekā deyā ity ahiṃsādipañcaviṃśat

puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetoḥ saptābhiṣekā deyā ity ahiṃsādipañcaviṃśat+vratāni -> puṇyasambhāras tasmāt puṇyasambhārahetoḥ saptābhiṣekā deyā ity ahiṃsādipañcaviṃśad vratāni

prathamam+saptābhiṣekadānapravṛttyartham -> prathamaṃ saptābhiṣekadānapravṛttyartham

prathamaṃ saptābhiṣekadānapravṛttyartham+mantrajāpamaṇḍalabhāvanārtham -> prathamaṃ saptābhiṣekadānapravṛttyarthaṃ mantrajāpamaṇḍalabhāvanārtham

prathamaṃ saptābhiṣekadānapravṛttyarthaṃ mantrajāpamaṇḍalabhāvanārtham+tena -> prathamaṃ saptābhiṣekadānapravṛttyarthaṃ mantrajāpamaṇḍalabhāvanārthaṃ tena

deyās+saptābhiṣekās -> deyāḥ saptābhiṣekās

deyāḥ saptābhiṣekās+kaluṣamalaharās -> deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharās

deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharās+puṇyahetos -> deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharāḥ puṇyahetos

deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharāḥ puṇyahetos+sutānām -> deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharāḥ puṇyahetoḥ sutānām

deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharāḥ puṇyahetoḥ sutānām+iti| -> deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharāḥ puṇyahetoḥ sutānām iti|

maṇḍalam+vartayitvā -> maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā

vajrācāryāṇām+babhūva -> vajrācāryāṇāṃ babhūva

vajrācāryāṇāṃ babhūva+iti| -> vajrācāryāṇāṃ babhūveti|

tena+asyām -> tenāsyām

tenāsyām+pūrṇimāyām -> tenāsyāṃ pūrṇimāyām

tenāsyāṃ pūrṇimāyām+tathāgataniyamas -> tenāsyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ tathāgataniyamas

tenāsyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ tathāgataniyamas+kālacakre -> tenāsyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ tathāgataniyamaḥ kālacakre

vyākṛtās+tathāgatena -> vyākṛtās tathāgatena

vyākṛtās tathāgatena+anāgate -> vyākṛtās tathāgatenānāgate

vyākṛtās tathāgatenānāgate+adhvani| -> vyākṛtās tathāgatenānāgate 'dhvani|

devāsurādayas+buddhatve -> devāsurādayo buddhatve

buddhābhiṣekam+kṛtvā -> buddhābhiṣekaṃ kṛtvā

tasmin+eva -> tasminn eva

maṇḍalasthānaniyamas+| -> maṇḍalasthānaniyamaḥ|

evam+caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedena -> evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedena

evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedena+aparam -> evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedenāparam

evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedenāparam+pātālamaṇḍalam -> evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedenāparaṃ pātālamaṇḍalam

evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedenāparaṃ pātālamaṇḍalam+ṣoḍaśavibhāgikam -> evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedenāparaṃ pātālamaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgikam

evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedenāparaṃ pātālamaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgikam+kāyavākcittamaṇḍalātmakam -> evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedenāparaṃ pātālamaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgikaṃ kāyavākcittamaṇḍalātmakam

evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedenāparaṃ pātālamaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgikaṃ kāyavākcittamaṇḍalātmakam+ṣoḍaśaśūnyatākaruṇāviśuddhyā| -> evaṃ caturviṃśatikakṣapakṣakalābhedenāparaṃ pātālamaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśavibhāgikaṃ kāyavākcittamaṇḍalātmakaṃ ṣoḍaśaśūnyatākaruṇāviśuddhyā|

caitragarbhamaṇḍalam+śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalam -> caitragarbhamaṇḍalaṃ śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalam

caitragarbhamaṇḍalaṃ śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalam+iti| -> caitragarbhamaṇḍalaṃ śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalam iti|

śaṃkareṇa+ānītās -> śaṃkareṇānītās

śaṃkareṇānītās+iti| -> śaṃkareṇānītā iti|

viṣṇunā+ānītās -> viṣṇunānītās

viṣṇunānītās+dakṣiṇe -> viṣṇunānītā dakṣiṇe

saptaśalākābhedena+avaropitās -> saptaśalākābhedenāvaropitās

saptaśalākābhedenāvaropitās+pūrve -> saptaśalākābhedenāvaropitāḥ pūrve

yena+aṣṭāviṃśannakṣatraviśuddhyā -> yenāṣṭāviṃśannakṣatraviśuddhyā

yenāṣṭāviṃśannakṣatraviśuddhyā+aṣṭāviṃśatstambhās -> yenāṣṭāviṃśannakṣatraviśuddhyāṣṭāviṃśatstambhās

yenāṣṭāviṃśannakṣatraviśuddhyāṣṭāviṃśatstambhās+caturṣu -> yenāṣṭāviṃśannakṣatraviśuddhyāṣṭāviṃśatstambhāś caturṣu

katham+nakṣatramaṇḍalam -> kathaṃ nakṣatramaṇḍalam

kathaṃ nakṣatramaṇḍalam+iti -> kathaṃ nakṣatramaṇḍalam iti

śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalam+ṣaḍvibhāgikam -> śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgikam

śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgikam+ādibuddham -> śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgikam ādibuddham

śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgikam ādibuddham+maṇḍalais -> śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgikam ādibuddhaṃ maṇḍalais

śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgikam ādibuddhaṃ maṇḍalais+visphāritam -> śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgikam ādibuddhaṃ maṇḍalair visphāritam

śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgikam ādibuddhaṃ maṇḍalair visphāritam+iti| -> śrīmannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍvibhāgikam ādibuddhaṃ maṇḍalair visphāritam iti|

dharmadhātuvāgīśvaramaṇḍalam+ṣoḍaśakalāvibhāgalakṣaṇam -> dharmadhātuvāgīśvaramaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalāvibhāgalakṣaṇam

dharmadhātuvāgīśvaramaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalāvibhāgalakṣaṇam+tadupari -> dharmadhātuvāgīśvaramaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśakalāvibhāgalakṣaṇaṃ tadupari

caitrapūrṇimāyām+śrīdhānyakaṭake -> caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ śrīdhānyakaṭake

yānatrayadeśanām+kṛtvā -> yānatrayadeśanāṃ kṛtvā

tatas+dharmacakram -> tato dharmacakram

tato dharmacakram+pravartayitvā -> tato dharmacakraṃ pravartayitvā

śākyamunis+bhagavān -> śākyamunir bhagavān

śākyamunir bhagavān+vaiśākhapūrṇimāyām -> śākyamunir bhagavān vaiśākhapūrṇimāyām

śākyamunir bhagavān vaiśākhapūrṇimāyām+aruṇodaye -> śākyamunir bhagavān vaiśākhapūrṇimāyām aruṇodaye

śākyamunir bhagavān vaiśākhapūrṇimāyām aruṇodaye+abhisambuddhas -> śākyamunir bhagavān vaiśākhapūrṇimāyām aruṇodaye 'bhisambuddhas

śākyamunir bhagavān vaiśākhapūrṇimāyām aruṇodaye 'bhisambuddhas+| -> śākyamunir bhagavān vaiśākhapūrṇimāyām aruṇodaye 'bhisambuddhaḥ|

iha+āryaviṣaye -> ihāryaviṣaye

guros+deśanā -> guror deśanā

pūjābhāve+abdam -> pūjābhāve 'bdam

pūjābhāve 'bdam+ekam -> pūjābhāve 'bdam ekam

pūjābhāve 'bdam ekam+na -> pūjābhāve 'bdam ekaṃ na

yoginīnām+sakalaguṇanidhes -> yoginīnāṃ sakalaguṇanidhes

yoginīnāṃ sakalaguṇanidhes+deśanāyās -> yoginīnāṃ sakalaguṇanidher deśanāyās

yoginīnāṃ sakalaguṇanidher deśanāyās+nimittam -> yoginīnāṃ sakalaguṇanidher deśanāyā nimittam

deyās+saptābhiṣekās -> deyāḥ saptābhiṣekās

deyāḥ saptābhiṣekās+kaluṣamalaharās -> deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharās

deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharās+puṇyahetos -> deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharāḥ puṇyahetos

deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharāḥ puṇyahetos+sutānām| -> deyāḥ saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharāḥ puṇyahetoḥ sutānām|

maṇḍalam+vartayitvā -> maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā

caitrānte+ityādinā| -> caitrānta ityādinā|

śuklaparvaniyamas+bhagavatā -> śuklaparvaniyamo bhagavatā

śuklaparvaniyamo bhagavatā+uktas -> śuklaparvaniyamo bhagavatoktas

śuklaparvaniyamo bhagavatoktas+vitanyate -> śuklaparvaniyamo bhagavatokto vitanyate

tantradeśanārtham+yoginīnām -> tantradeśanārthaṃ yoginīnām

tantradeśanārthaṃ yoginīnām+pūjākaraṇāya -> tantradeśanārthaṃ yoginīnāṃ pūjākaraṇāya

maṇḍalavartanāya+abhiṣekadānāya -> maṇḍalavartanāyābhiṣekadānāya

idānīm+vajrācāryasya -> idānīṃ vajrācāryasya

śiṣyaparīkṣāniyamas+|| -> śiṣyaparīkṣāniyamaḥ||

bhagavatas+niyamas -> bhagavato niyamas

bhagavato niyamas+| -> bhagavato niyamaḥ|

viheṭhayati+iti -> viheṭhayatīti

gurvārādhanam+karoti -> gurvārādhanaṃ karoti

adhamas+punas -> adhamaḥ punas

adhamaḥ punas+pañcaśikṣāpadahetos -> adhamaḥ punaḥ pañcaśikṣāpadahetos

adhamaḥ punaḥ pañcaśikṣāpadahetos+saṃgrāhyas -> adhamaḥ punaḥ pañcaśikṣāpadahetoḥ saṃgrāhyas

adhamaḥ punaḥ pañcaśikṣāpadahetoḥ saṃgrāhyas+yadi -> adhamaḥ punaḥ pañcaśikṣāpadahetoḥ saṃgrāhyo yadi

aparas+madhyamas -> aparo madhyamas

aparo madhyamas+puṇas -> aparo madhyamaḥ puṇas

aparo madhyamaḥ puṇas+puṇyahetos -> aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetos

aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetos+saṃgrāhyas -> aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetoḥ saṃgrāhyas

aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetoḥ saṃgrāhyas+madhyamaguṇais -> aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetoḥ saṃgrāhyo madhyamaguṇais

aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetoḥ saṃgrāhyo madhyamaguṇais+yuktas -> aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetoḥ saṃgrāhyo madhyamaguṇair yuktas

aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetoḥ saṃgrāhyo madhyamaguṇair yuktas+saptābhiṣekahetos -> aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetoḥ saṃgrāhyo madhyamaguṇair yuktaḥ saptābhiṣekahetos

aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetoḥ saṃgrāhyo madhyamaguṇair yuktaḥ saptābhiṣekahetos+| -> aparo madhyamaḥ puṇaḥ puṇyahetoḥ saṃgrāhyo madhyamaguṇair yuktaḥ saptābhiṣekahetoḥ|

ādiśabdāt+caturthābhiṣekahetos -> ādiśabdāc caturthābhiṣekahetos

ādiśabdāc caturthābhiṣekahetos+sas -> ādiśabdāc caturthābhiṣekahetoḥ sas

ādiśabdāc caturthābhiṣekahetoḥ sas+eva| -> ādiśabdāc caturthābhiṣekahetoḥ sa eva|

prajñājñānasekādihetos+saṃgrāhyas -> prajñājñānasekādihetoḥ saṃgrāhyas

prajñājñānasekādihetoḥ saṃgrāhyas+| -> prajñājñānasekādihetoḥ saṃgrāhyaḥ|

itthaṃbhūtas+mahāśiṣyas -> itthaṃbhūto mahāśiṣyas

itthaṃbhūto mahāśiṣyas+sunipuṇaguruṇā -> itthaṃbhūto mahāśiṣyaḥ sunipuṇaguruṇā

duṣṭānām+saṅganaṣṭas -> duṣṭānāṃ saṅganaṣṭas

duṣṭānāṃ saṅganaṣṭas+iti| -> duṣṭānāṃ saṅganaṣṭa iti|

naṣṭas+yasya -> naṣṭo yasya

naṣṭo yasya+asau -> naṣṭo yasyāsau

duṣṭās+teṣām -> duṣṭās teṣām

duṣṭās teṣām+saṅgas -> duṣṭās teṣāṃ saṅgas

duṣṭās teṣāṃ saṅgas+daśākuśalapathas -> duṣṭās teṣāṃ saṅgo daśākuśalapathas

duṣṭās teṣāṃ saṅgo daśākuśalapathas+sa -> duṣṭās teṣāṃ saṅgo daśākuśalapathaḥ sa

maṭhavihāropabhoginas+te -> maṭhavihāropabhoginas te

tapasvinas+api -> tapasvino 'pi

tapasvino 'pi+ekapudgalena -> tapasvino 'py ekapudgalena

gṛhasthācāryās+tathā -> gṛhasthācāryās tathā

dhanārthinas+ye -> dhanārthino ye

duṣṭānām+saṅganaṣṭas -> duṣṭānāṃ saṅganaṣṭas

duṣṭānāṃ saṅganaṣṭas+iti| -> duṣṭānāṃ saṅganaṣṭa iti|

tāvat+guptas -> tāvad guptas

tāvad guptas+atiguptas -> tāvad gupto 'tiguptas

tāvad gupto 'tiguptas+iti| -> tāvad gupto 'tigupta iti|

yāvat+svatas -> yāvat svatas

yāvat svatas+anubhavas -> yāvat svato 'nubhavas

yāvat svato 'nubhavas+na -> yāvat svato 'nubhavo na

labdhatattve+atiguptas -> labdhatattve 'tiguptas

labdhatattve 'tiguptas+iti -> labdhatattve 'tigupta iti

yasyāsāv acapalahṛdayas+iti| -> yasyāsāv acapalahṛdaya iti|

laukikamārgais+hṛdayam -> laukikamārgair hṛdayam

laukikamārgair hṛdayam+na -> laukikamārgair hṛdayaṃ na

acapalahṛdayas+iti| -> acapalahṛdaya iti|

tantroktasaṃvaraparipālakas+iti| -> tantroktasaṃvaraparipālaka iti|

tantrabhaktas+iti -> tantrabhakta iti

laukikasiddhinirapekṣakas+iti| -> laukikasiddhinirapekṣaka iti|

śrāddhas+| -> śrāddhaḥ|

guṇajñas+iti -> guṇajña iti

sarvasaṅgavivarjito dravyādinirapekṣakas+iti| -> sarvasaṅgavivarjito dravyādinirapekṣaka iti|

tyāgaśīlas+iti -> tyāgaśīla iti

guruniyamaratas+caturdaśamūlāpattirahitas -> guruniyamarataś caturdaśamūlāpattirahitas

guruniyamarataś caturdaśamūlāpattirahitas+daśakuśaladharmaratas -> guruniyamarataś caturdaśamūlāpattirahito daśakuśaladharmaratas

guruniyamarataś caturdaśamūlāpattirahito daśakuśaladharmaratas+iti| -> guruniyamarataś caturdaśamūlāpattirahito daśakuśaladharmarata iti|

saṃgrāhyas+iti -> saṃgrāhya iti

sas+upāsakaśikṣayā -> sa upāsakaśikṣayā

saṃgrāhyas+na -> saṃgrāhyo na

adhamas+abhiṣekeṇa -> adhamo 'bhiṣekeṇa

saṃgrāhyas+madhyamas -> saṃgrāhyo madhyamas

saṃgrāhyo madhyamas+puṇyahetos -> saṃgrāhyo madhyamaḥ puṇyahetos

saṃgrāhyo madhyamaḥ puṇyahetos+iti| -> saṃgrāhyo madhyamaḥ puṇyahetor iti|

mantramudrāmaṇḍalacakrabhāvanārtham+saptābhiṣekeṇa -> mantramudrāmaṇḍalacakrabhāvanārthaṃ saptābhiṣekeṇa

yas+asau -> yo 'sau

saṃgrāhyas+kalaśaguhyādikena| -> saṃgrāhyaḥ kalaśaguhyādikena|

śūnyatāmārgabhāvanārtham+sekena -> śūnyatāmārgabhāvanārthaṃ sekena

yas+mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanārthī -> yo mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanārthī

dvitīyas+laukikasiddhisādhanārthī| -> dvitīyo laukikasiddhisādhanārthī|

śiṣyas+dvividhā---ekas -> śiṣyo dvividhā---ekas

śiṣyo dvividhā---ekas+mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanārthī -> śiṣyo dvividhā---eko mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanārthī

punar+madhyamas -> punar madhyamas

punar madhyamas+puṇyahetos -> punar madhyamaḥ puṇyahetos

punar madhyamaḥ puṇyahetos+|| -> punar madhyamaḥ puṇyahetoḥ||

prajñāsekādihetor aparas+iti -> prajñāsekādihetor apara iti

grāhyaśiṣyaḥ sas+eva -> grāhyaśiṣyaḥ sa eva

tantrabhaktas+api -> tantrabhakto 'pi

tantrabhakto 'pi+acapalahṛdayas -> tantrabhakto 'py acapalahṛdayas

tantrabhakto 'py acapalahṛdayas+labdhatattve -> tantrabhakto 'py acapalahṛdayo labdhatattve

tantrabhakto 'py acapalahṛdayo labdhatattve+atiguptas -> tantrabhakto 'py acapalahṛdayo labdhatattve 'tiguptas

tantrabhakto 'py acapalahṛdayo labdhatattve 'tiguptas+| -> tantrabhakto 'py acapalahṛdayo labdhatattve 'tiguptaḥ|

gambhīrodāracittas+guruniyamaratas -> gambhīrodāracitto guruniyamaratas

gambhīrodāracitto guruniyamaratas+tyāgaśīlas -> gambhīrodāracitto guruniyamaratas tyāgaśīlas

gambhīras+ityādinā|| -> gambhīra ityādinā||

idānīm+prajñājñānābhiṣekārtham -> idānīṃ prajñājñānābhiṣekārtham

idānīṃ prajñājñānābhiṣekārtham+sacchiṣyalakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ prajñājñānābhiṣekārthaṃ sacchiṣyalakṣaṇam

idānīṃ prajñājñānābhiṣekārthaṃ sacchiṣyalakṣaṇam+ucyate -> idānīṃ prajñājñānābhiṣekārthaṃ sacchiṣyalakṣaṇam ucyate

gurus+sevanīyas -> guruḥ sevanīyas

guruḥ sevanīyas+doṣarahitas -> guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahitas

guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahitas+doṣayuktas -> guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahito doṣayuktas

guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahito doṣayuktas+varjanīyas -> guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahito doṣayukto varjanīyas

guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahito doṣayukto varjanīyas+iti -> guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahito doṣayukto varjanīya iti

guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahito doṣayukto varjanīya iti+ācāryaparīkṣāprakathananiyamas -> guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahito doṣayukto varjanīya ity ācāryaparīkṣāprakathananiyamas

guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahito doṣayukto varjanīya ity ācāryaparīkṣāprakathananiyamas+|| -> guruḥ sevanīyo doṣarahito doṣayukto varjanīya ity ācāryaparīkṣāprakathananiyamaḥ||

tasmāt+sarvaprakāreṇa -> tasmāt sarvaprakāreṇa

sati+api -> saty api

saugatānām+yat -> saugatānāṃ yat

saugatānāṃ yat+amī -> saugatānāṃ yad amī

saugatānāṃ yad amī+aparādhadaśāpannān -> saugatānāṃ yad amy aparādhadaśāpannān

saugatānāṃ yad amy aparādhadaśāpannān+ārādhayanti -> saugatānāṃ yad amy aparādhadaśāpannān ārādhayanti

katham+kāṣāyadhāriṇā -> kathaṃ kāṣāyadhāriṇā

tasmāt+gṛhasthācāryās -> tasmād gṛhasthācāryās

tasmād gṛhasthācāryās+bhikṣubhis -> tasmād gṛhasthācāryā bhikṣubhis

tasmād gṛhasthācāryā bhikṣubhis+na -> tasmād gṛhasthācāryā bhikṣubhir na

kauśīdyābhimāno na+asti -> kauśīdyābhimāno nāsti

lokāvadhyānam+yat -> lokāvadhyānaṃ yat

lokāvadhyānaṃ yat+gṛhasthacellakānām -> lokāvadhyānaṃ yad gṛhasthacellakānām

lokāvadhyānaṃ yad gṛhasthacellakānām+tat -> lokāvadhyānaṃ yad gṛhasthacellakānāṃ tat

lokāvadhyānaṃ yad gṛhasthacellakānāṃ tat+kauśīdyatvena -> lokāvadhyānaṃ yad gṛhasthacellakānāṃ tat kauśīdyatvena

lokāvadhyānaṃ yad gṛhasthacellakānāṃ tat kauśīdyatvena+uttaraliṅgāgrahaṇāt -> lokāvadhyānaṃ yad gṛhasthacellakānāṃ tat kauśīdyatvenottaraliṅgāgrahaṇāt

lokāvadhyānaṃ yad gṛhasthacellakānāṃ tat kauśīdyatvenottaraliṅgāgrahaṇāt+prātimokṣāśrutaparijñānena| -> lokāvadhyānaṃ yad gṛhasthacellakānāṃ tat kauśīdyatvenottaraliṅgāgrahaṇāt prātimokṣāśrutaparijñānena|

saddharmādīn+puraskṛtya -> saddharmādin puraskṛtya

guros+āgatasya -> guror āgatasya

guror āgatasya+arthādigauravam -> guror āgatasyārthādigauravam

guror āgatasyārthādigauravam+kartavyam| -> guror āgatasyārthādigauravaṃ kartavyam|

kim+asatkarmapādaprakṣālanādikam -> kim asatkarmapādaprakṣālanādikam

kim asatkarmapādaprakṣālanādikam+pañcāṅgavandanām -> kim asatkarmapādaprakṣālanādikaṃ pañcāṅgavandanām

kim asatkarmapādaprakṣālanādikaṃ pañcāṅgavandanām+tyaktvā -> kim asatkarmapādaprakṣālanādikaṃ pañcāṅgavandanāṃ tyaktvā

tulyas+bhavati -> tulyo bhavati

bhikṣus+vajrācāryeṇa -> bhikṣur vajrācāryeṇa

navakas+api -> navako 'pi

kuryāt+tyaktvā -> kuryāt tyaktvā

kuryāt tyaktvā+asatkarmavandanām|| -> kuryāt tyaktvāsatkarmavandanām||

sarvam+etat -> sarvam etat

sarvam etat+vratī -> sarvam etad vratī

āsanadānasamutthānam+arthakriyādigauravam| -> āsanadānasamutthānam arthakriyādigauravam|

vandyas+vratadharais -> vandyo vratadharais

vandyo vratadharais+buddhyā -> vandyo vratadharair buddhyā

navakas+api -> navako 'pi

saddharmādīn+puraskṛtya -> saddharmādin puraskṛtya

navakas+saddharmavyākhyānena -> navakaḥ saddharmavyākhyānena

trikālam+bhikṣubhis -> trikālaṃ bhikṣubhis

trikālaṃ bhikṣubhis+kāṣāyadhāribhis -> trikālaṃ bhikṣubhiḥ kāṣāyadhāribhis

trikālaṃ bhikṣubhiḥ kāṣāyadhāribhis+vajrācāryas -> trikālaṃ bhikṣubhiḥ kāṣāyadhāribhir vajrācāryas

trikālaṃ bhikṣubhiḥ kāṣāyadhāribhir vajrācāryas+vandyate -> trikālaṃ bhikṣubhiḥ kāṣāyadhāribhir vajrācāryo vandyate

neyārthas+| -> neyārthaḥ|

gurus+iti -> gurur iti

tais+vandanām -> tair vandanām

tair vandanām+kurvadbhis -> tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhis

tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhis+pañcaskandhais -> tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhiḥ pañcaskandhais

tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhiḥ pañcaskandhais+api -> tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhiḥ pañcaskandhair api

guros+vandanām -> guror vandanām

guror vandanām+kurvanti| -> guror vandanāṃ kurvanti|

śiṣyās+trisandhyam -> śiṣyās trisandhyam

śiṣyās trisandhyam+āgatya -> śiṣyās trisandhyam āgatya

evam+lokadhātusthās -> evaṃ lokadhātusthās

evaṃ lokadhātusthās+te -> evaṃ lokadhātusthās te

pañcaskandhās+tathāgatās -> pañcaskandhās tathāgatās

pañcaskandhās tathāgatās+iti -> pañcaskandhās tathāgatā iti

pañcaskandhās tathāgatā iti+ucyante| -> pañcaskandhās tathāgatā ity ucyante|

adhas+bhūmigṛhe -> adho bhūmigṛhe

sthitānām+śiṣyāṇām -> sthitānāṃ śiṣyāṇām

sthitānāṃ śiṣyāṇām+śarīrāṇi -> sthitānāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ śarīrāṇi

sthitānāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ śarīrāṇi+ucyante| -> sthitānāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ śarīrāṇy ucyante|

vacanāt+lokadhātuśabdena -> vacanāl lokadhātuśabdena

viśvam+iti -> viśvam iti

neyārthas+ucyate| -> neyārtha ucyate|

tathā+upacāreṇa -> tathopacāreṇa

bhagavatas+nītārthas -> bhagavato nītārthas

bhagavato nītārthas+|| -> bhagavato nītārthaḥ||

tathāgatas+iti -> tathāgata iti

tais+vandanām -> tair vandanām

tair vandanām+kurvadbhis -> tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhis

tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhis+maulisthitais -> tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhir maulisthitais

tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhir maulisthitais+tathāgatais -> tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhir maulisthitais tathāgatais

tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhir maulisthitais tathāgatais+pañcaskandhais -> tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhir maulisthitais tathāgataiḥ pañcaskandhais

tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhir maulisthitais tathāgataiḥ pañcaskandhais+api -> tair vandanāṃ kurvadbhir maulisthitais tathāgataiḥ pañcaskandhair api

buddhabhagavatas+vandanām -> buddhabhagavato vandanām

buddhabhagavato vandanām+kurvanti| -> buddhabhagavato vandanāṃ kurvanti|

bodhisattvās+traikālyam -> bodhisattvās traikālyam

bodhisattvās traikālyam+āgatya -> bodhisattvās traikālyam āgatya

daśadiglokadhātusthās+te -> daśadiglokadhātusthās te

tathāgatās+kulamudrāsvarūpeṇa -> tathāgatāḥ kulamudrāsvarūpeṇa

tathāgatāḥ kulamudrāsvarūpeṇa+avasthitās -> tathāgatāḥ kulamudrāsvarūpeṇāvasthitās

tathāgatāḥ kulamudrāsvarūpeṇāvasthitās+te -> tathāgatāḥ kulamudrāsvarūpeṇāvasthitās te

lokadhātavas+ucyante| -> lokadhātava ucyante|

bodhisattvās+teṣām -> bodhisattvās teṣām

bodhisattvās teṣām+mukuṭās -> bodhisattvās teṣāṃ mukuṭās

bodhisattvās teṣāṃ mukuṭās+saptaratnamayās -> bodhisattvās teṣāṃ mukuṭāḥ saptaratnamayās

bodhisattvās teṣāṃ mukuṭāḥ saptaratnamayās+nītārthena -> bodhisattvās teṣāṃ mukuṭāḥ saptaratnamayā nītārthena

tathāgatais+daśadiglokadhātusthais -> tathāgatair daśadiglokadhātusthais

tathāgatair daśadiglokadhātusthais+iti -> tathāgatair daśadiglokadhātusthair iti

vajrācāryas+sarvagas -> vajrācāryaḥ sarvagas

vajrācāryaḥ sarvagas+sarvajñas -> vajrācāryaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvajñas

vajrācāryaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvajñas+eva| -> vajrācāryaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvajña eva|

kāyavākcittam+abhedyam -> kāyavākcittam abhedyam

kāyavākcittam abhedyam+vajravat -> kāyavākcittam abhedyaṃ vajravat

kāyavākcittam abhedyaṃ vajravat+ācarati -> kāyavākcittam abhedyaṃ vajravad ācarati

sattvārtham+prati -> sattvārthaṃ prati

yasmāt+tasmāt -> yasmāt tasmāt

yasmāt tasmāt+kāyavākcittābhedyatvāt -> yasmāt tasmāt kāyavākcittābhedyatvāt

yasmāt tasmāt kāyavākcittābhedyatvāt+vajrācāryas -> yasmāt tasmāt kāyavākcittābhedyatvād vajrācāryas

yasmāt tasmāt kāyavākcittābhedyatvād vajrācāryas+śākyamunis -> yasmāt tasmāt kāyavākcittābhedyatvād vajrācāryaḥ śākyamunis

yasmāt tasmāt kāyavākcittābhedyatvād vajrācāryaḥ śākyamunis+tathāgatas -> yasmāt tasmāt kāyavākcittābhedyatvād vajrācāryaḥ śākyamunis tathāgatas

yasmāt tasmāt kāyavākcittābhedyatvād vajrācāryaḥ śākyamunis tathāgatas+iti| -> yasmāt tasmāt kāyavākcittābhedyatvād vajrācāryaḥ śākyamunis tathāgata iti|

labdhas+asau -> labdho 'sau

labdho 'sau+abhiṣekāgralabdhas -> labdho 'sāv abhiṣekāgralabdhas

labdho 'sāv abhiṣekāgralabdhas+| -> labdho 'sāv abhiṣekāgralabdhaḥ|

kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām+agratas -> kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agratas

kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agratas+mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām -> kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agrato mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām

kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agrato mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām+antimas -> kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agrato mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām antimas

kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agrato mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām antimas+abhisambodhilakṣaṇas -> kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agrato mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām antimo 'bhisambodhilakṣaṇas

kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agrato mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām antimo 'bhisambodhilakṣaṇas+acchedyas -> kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agrato mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām antimo 'bhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'cchedyas

kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agrato mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām antimo 'bhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'cchedyas+sa -> kalaśaguhyaprajñājñānābhiṣekāṇām agrato mahāmudrāprajñāpāramitāmahākṣarasukhakṣaṇānām antimo 'bhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'cchedyaḥ sa

nītārthas+tāvat -> nītārthas tāvat

nītārthas tāvat+ucyate---iha -> nītārthas tāvad ucyate---iha

neyārthena+avagantavyam -> neyārthenāvagantavyam

neyārthenāvagantavyam+paṇḍitais -> neyārthenāvagantavyaṃ paṇḍitais

neyārthenāvagantavyaṃ paṇḍitais+iti| -> neyārthenāvagantavyaṃ paṇḍitair iti|

ityādivacanam+paramārthasatyena -> ityādivacanaṃ paramārthasatyena

abhiṣekāgralabdhas+hi -> abhiṣekāgralabdho hi

kim+na -> kiṃ na

kiṃ na+aparagāthayā -> kiṃ nāparagāthayā

kiṃ nāparagāthayā+uktavacanam -> kiṃ nāparagāthayoktavacanam

kiṃ nāparagāthayoktavacanam+vicāryate| -> kiṃ nāparagāthayoktavacanaṃ vicāryate|

kim+ca -> kiṃ ca

jitendriyas+|| -> jitendriyaḥ||

mantravyākhyākṛt+ācāryas -> mantravyākhyākṛd ācāryas

mantravyākhyākṛd ācāryas+prasannātmā -> mantravyākhyākṛd ācāryaḥ prasannātmā

mantratantraprayogajñas+kṛpālus -> mantratantraprayogajñaḥ kṛpālus

mantratantraprayogajñaḥ kṛpālus+śāstrakovidas -> mantratantraprayogajñaḥ kṛpāluḥ śāstrakovidas

mantratantraprayogajñaḥ kṛpāluḥ śāstrakovidas+|| -> mantratantraprayogajñaḥ kṛpāluḥ śāstrakovidaḥ||

dhīras+vinītas -> dhīro vinītas

dhīro vinītas+matimān -> dhīro vinīto matimān

dhīro vinīto matimān+kṣamāvān -> dhīro vinīto matiman kṣamāvān

dhīro vinīto matiman kṣamāvān+ārjavas -> dhīro vinīto matiman kṣamāvān ārjavas

dhīro vinīto matiman kṣamāvān ārjavas+aśaṭhas -> dhīro vinīto matiman kṣamāvān ārjavo 'śaṭhas

dhīro vinīto matiman kṣamāvān ārjavo 'śaṭhas+| -> dhīro vinīto matiman kṣamāvān ārjavo 'śaṭhaḥ|

guṇās+api -> guṇā api

guṇā api+uktās -> guṇā apy uktās

guṇā apy uktās+| -> guṇā apy uktāḥ|

pūrvoktaniyamas+doṣayuktasya -> pūrvoktaniyamo doṣayuktasya

evam+anekaprakāreṇa -> evam anekaprakāreṇa

evam anekaprakāreṇa+ācāryaparīkṣāyām -> evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyām

evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyām+bhagavatā -> evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatā

evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatā+uktas -> evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatoktas

evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatoktas+gurus -> evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatokto gurus

evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatokto gurus+śiṣyais -> evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatokto guruḥ śiṣyais

evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatokto guruḥ śiṣyais+ārādhanīyas -> evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatokto guruḥ śiṣyair ārādhanīyas

evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatokto guruḥ śiṣyair ārādhanīyas+iti -> evam anekaprakāreṇācāryaparīkṣāyāṃ bhagavatokto guruḥ śiṣyair ārādhanīya iti

triṣu+ekadeśe -> triṣv ekadeśe

vihārādes+pratiṣṭhādyam -> vihārādeḥ pratiṣṭhādyam

vihārādeḥ pratiṣṭhādyam+kartavyam -> vihārādeḥ pratiṣṭhādyaṃ kartavyam

vihārādeḥ pratiṣṭhādyaṃ kartavyam+liṅginā -> vihārādeḥ pratiṣṭhādyaṃ kartavyaṃ liṅginā

saṃghas+gacchati -> saṃgho gacchati

saṃgho gacchati+agauravam|| -> saṃgho gacchaty agauravam||

dharmas+ca -> dharmaś ca

buddhas+ca -> buddhaś ca

bhūmilābham+vinā -> bhūmilābhaṃ vinā

bhūmilābhaṃ vinā+ācāryas -> bhūmilābhaṃ vinācāryas

bhūmilābhaṃ vinācāryas+gṛhasthas -> bhūmilābhaṃ vinācāryo gṛhasthas

bhūmilābhaṃ vinācāryo gṛhasthas+pūjyate -> bhūmilābhaṃ vinācāryo gṛhasthaḥ pūjyate

yas+|| -> yaḥ||

kartavayas+eva -> kartavaya eva

śrutaparijñānais+liṅgī -> śrutaparijñānair liṅgī

bhūmilābham+vinā -> bhūmilābhaṃ vinā

kartavyas+gurus -> kartavyo gurus

kartavyo gurus+rājñā -> kartavyo gurū rājñā

madhyamas+śrāmaṇerākhyas -> madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyas

madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyas+gṛhasthas -> madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas

madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas+tu -> madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tu

madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tu+adhamas -> madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas

madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas+tayos -> madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas tayos

madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas tayos+|| -> madhyamaḥ śrāmaṇerākhyo gṛhasthas tv adhamas tayoḥ||

daśatattvaparijñānāt+trayāṇām -> daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇām

daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇām+bhikṣus -> daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣus

daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣus+uttamas -> daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣur uttamas

daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣur uttamas+| -> daśatattvaparijñānāt trayāṇāṃ bhikṣur uttamaḥ|

trividhas+gurus -> trividho gurus

trividho gurus+ācāryaparīkṣāyām -> trividho gurur ācāryaparīkṣāyām

trividho gurur ācāryaparīkṣāyām+uktas -> trividho gurur ācāryaparīkṣāyām uktas

trividho gurur ācāryaparīkṣāyām uktas+| -> trividho gurur ācāryaparīkṣāyām uktaḥ|

iti+ādinā| -> ity ādinā|

vajradharas+bhuvi|| -> vajradharo bhuvi||

mūrkhas+na -> mūrkho na

sevakas+lāṅgalī -> sevako lāṅgalī

yas+gṛhī -> yo gṛhī

tathā+ādibuddhe--- -> tathādibuddhe---

varjanīyas+eva| -> varjanīya eva|

atas+vacanāt -> ato vacanāt

ato vacanāt+kṛtas -> ato vacanāt kṛtas

ato vacanāt kṛtas+api -> ato vacanāt kṛto 'pi

kuryāt+gurum -> kuryād gurum

kuryād gurum+śiṣyas -> kuryād guruṃ śiṣyas

kuryād guruṃ śiṣyas+subuddhimān|| -> kuryād guruṃ śiṣyaḥ subuddhimān||

svotkarṣaṇam+ca -> svotkarṣaṇaṃ ca

niṣkṛpam+krodhanam -> niṣkṛpaṃ krodhanam

niṣkṛpaṃ krodhanam+krūram -> niṣkṛpaṃ krodhanaṃ krūram

niṣkṛpaṃ krodhanaṃ krūram+stabdham -> niṣkṛpaṃ krodhanaṃ krūraṃ stabdham

niṣkṛpaṃ krodhanaṃ krūraṃ stabdham+lubdham -> niṣkṛpaṃ krodhanaṃ krūraṃ stabdhaṃ lubdham

niṣkṛpaṃ krodhanaṃ krūraṃ stabdhaṃ lubdham+asaṃyatam| -> niṣkṛpaṃ krodhanaṃ krūraṃ stabdhaṃ lubdham asaṃyatam|

tathāgatena+uktā| -> tathāgatenoktā|

yatas+gurvārādhanāya -> yato gurvārādhanāya

yato gurvārādhanāya+ācāryasya -> yato gurvārādhanāyācāryasya

kutas+| -> kutaḥ|

tat+na| -> tan na|

kadācana+iti -> kadācaneti

guṇās+grāhyās -> guṇā grāhyās

guṇā grāhyās+doṣās -> guṇā grāhyā doṣās

guṇā grāhyā doṣās+na -> guṇā grāhyā doṣā na

guṇā grāhyā doṣā na+eva -> guṇā grāhyā doṣā naiva

yat+vaktavyam -> yad vaktavyam

yad vaktavyam+bālajanais -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanais

yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanais+sanmārganaṣṭais -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ sanmārganaṣṭais

yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ sanmārganaṣṭais+ācāryasya -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ sanmārganaṣṭair ācāryasya

tasmāt+ucyate---iha -> tasmād ucyate---iha

tasmād ucyate---iha+anāgate -> tasmād ucyate---ihānāgate

tasmād ucyate---ihānāgate+adhvani -> tasmād ucyate---ihānāgate 'dhvani

keṣāṃcit+mārganaṣṭānām -> keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānām

keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānām+vacanam -> keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānāṃ vacanam

keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānāṃ vacanam+bhaviṣyati| -> keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānāṃ vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati|

guṇās+grāhyās -> guṇā grāhyās

guṇā grāhyās+iti -> guṇā grāhyā iti

tasmāt+ācāryasya -> tasmād ācāryasya

doṣās+na -> doṣā na

doṣā na+eva -> doṣā naiva

tasmāt+ucyate -> tasmād ucyate

keṣāṃcit+mārganaṣṭānām -> keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānām

keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānām+vacanam -> keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānāṃ vacanam

keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānāṃ vacanam+bhaviṣyati -> keṣāṃcin mārganaṣṭānāṃ vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati

guṇās+grāhyās -> guṇā grāhyās

guṇā grāhyās+iti -> guṇā grāhyā iti

yat+vaktavyam -> yad vaktavyam

yad vaktavyam+bālajanais -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanais

yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanais+sanmārganaṣṭais -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ sanmārganaṣṭais

yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ sanmārganaṣṭais+ācāryasya -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ sanmārganaṣṭair ācāryasya

guṇās+grāhyās -> guṇā grāhyās

guṇā grāhyās+iha -> guṇā grāhyā iha

guṇā grāhyā iha+anāgate -> guṇā grāhyā ihānāgate

guṇā grāhyā ihānāgate+adhvani -> guṇā grāhyā ihānāgate 'dhvani

tasmāt+ācāryasya -> tasmād ācāryasya

daśadiglokadhātusthais+traikālyam -> daśadiglokadhātusthais traikālyam

daśadiglokadhātusthais traikālyam+etya -> daśadiglokadhātusthais traikālyam etya

vajrācāryas+tathāgatais -> vajrācāryas tathāgatais

vajrācāryas tathāgatais+| -> vajrācāryas tathāgataiḥ|

abhiṣekāgralabdhas+hi -> abhiṣekāgralabdho hi

siddhis+doṣavākyatas -> siddhir doṣavākyatas

siddhir doṣavākyatas+|| -> siddhir doṣavākyataḥ||

guṇagrāhaṇāt+bhavet -> guṇagrāhaṇād bhavet

guṇagrāhaṇād bhavet+siddhis -> guṇagrāhaṇād bhavet siddhis

guṇagrāhaṇād bhavet siddhis+na -> guṇagrāhaṇād bhavet siddhir na

guṇās+grāhyās -> guṇā grāhyās

guṇā grāhyās+doṣās -> guṇā grāhyā doṣās

guṇā grāhyā doṣās+na -> guṇā grāhyā doṣā na

guṇā grāhyā doṣā na+eva -> guṇā grāhyā doṣā naiva

tathāgatena+uktam -> tathāgatenoktam

tathāgatenoktam+tadyathā -> tathāgatenoktaṃ tadyathā

tathāgataniyamas+| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ|

varjanīyas+iti -> varjanīya iti

dvīndriyasukhārtham+kāmukas -> dvīndriyasukhārthaṃ kāmukas

dvīndriyasukhārthaṃ kāmukas+ca -> dvīndriyasukhārthaṃ kāmukaś ca

kāmukas+ca -> kāmukaś ca

kāmukaś ca+indriyārtham -> kāmukaś cendriyārtham

kāmukaś cendriyārtham+iti -> kāmukaś cendriyārtham iti

varjanīyas+asamāhitas -> varjanīyo 'samāhitas

varjanīyo 'samāhitas+iti -> varjanīyo 'samāhita iti

varjanīyo 'samāhita iti+arthas -> varjanīyo 'samāhita ity arthas

varjanīyo 'samāhita ity arthas+| -> varjanīyo 'samāhita ity arthaḥ|

pramattas+madyapānena -> pramatto madyapānena

saṃsaktas+iti| -> saṃsakta iti|

samantāt+prakāreṇa -> samantāt prakāreṇa

bhogāsaktas+bāhyasāṃsārikabhogeṣu -> bhogāsakto bāhyasāṃsārikabhogeṣu

varjanīyas+| -> varjanīyaḥ|

tantradeśakas+iti -> tantradeśaka iti

abhiṣekam+vinā -> abhiṣekaṃ vinā

siktas+iti| -> sikta iti|

naṣṭacittas+na -> naṣṭacitto na

varjanīyas+| -> varjanīyaḥ|

mithyāvādī+iti -> mithyāvādīti

sacchiṣyāṇām+vañcanārthī -> sacchiṣyāṇāṃ vañcanārthī

mūrkhas+sanmārgopadeśarahitas -> mūrkhaḥ sanmārgopadeśarahitas

mūrkhaḥ sanmārgopadeśarahitas+iti| -> mūrkhaḥ sanmārgopadeśarahita iti|

aśrutas+ca -> aśrutaś ca

aśrutaś ca+iti -> aśrutaś ceti

saṃsārabhogārtham+dravyasaṃcayakārakas -> saṃsārabhogārthaṃ dravyasaṃcayakārakas

saṃsārabhogārthaṃ dravyasaṃcayakārakas+iti| -> saṃsārabhogārthaṃ dravyasaṃcayakāraka iti|

dravyalubdhas+tathā -> dravyalubdhas tathā

dravyalubdhas+api -> dravyalubdho 'pi

varjanīyas+| -> varjanīyaḥ|

sas+api -> so 'pi

lokajugupsitais+guhyasamayais -> lokajugupsitair guhyasamayais

lokajugupsitair guhyasamayais+prakaṭena -> lokajugupsitair guhyasamayaiḥ prakaṭena

lokajugupsitair guhyasamayaiḥ prakaṭena+ācaritais -> lokajugupsitair guhyasamayaiḥ prakaṭenācaritais

lokajugupsitair guhyasamayaiḥ prakaṭenācaritais+samayavirahitas -> lokajugupsitair guhyasamayaiḥ prakaṭenācaritaiḥ samayavirahitas

lokajugupsitair guhyasamayaiḥ prakaṭenācaritaiḥ samayavirahitas+bhavati -> lokajugupsitair guhyasamayaiḥ prakaṭenācaritaiḥ samayavirahito bhavati

samayavirahitas+iti -> samayavirahita iti

krodhena+abhibhūtas -> krodhenābhibhūtas

krodhenābhibhūtas+| -> krodhenābhibhūtaḥ|

karuṇārahitas+varjanīyas -> karuṇārahito varjanīyas

karuṇārahito varjanīyas+tathā -> karuṇārahito varjanīyas tathā

samyaṅmārgavettā+iti -> samyaṅmārgavetteti

uttamottamasattvān+paśyan -> uttamottamasattvan paśyan

uttamottamasattvan paśyan+mānarahitas -> uttamottamasattvan paśyan mānarahitas

uttamottamasattvan paśyan mānarahitas+bhavati -> uttamottamasattvan paśyan mānarahito bhavati

adhas+adhas -> adho 'dhas

adho 'dhas+sattvān -> adho 'dhaḥ sattvān

adho 'dhaḥ sattvān+paśyan -> adho 'dhaḥ sattvan paśyan

adho 'dhaḥ sattvan paśyan+iti -> adho 'dhaḥ sattvan paśyann iti

varjanīyas+| -> varjanīyaḥ|

yasya+asti -> yasyāsti

mānas+api -> māno 'pi

māno 'pi+anekadhā---paṇḍitābhimānas -> māno 'py anekadhā---paṇḍitābhimānas

māno 'py anekadhā---paṇḍitābhimānas+dravyaiśvaryābhimānas -> māno 'py anekadhā---paṇḍitābhimāno dravyaiśvaryābhimānas

māno 'py anekadhā---paṇḍitābhimāno dravyaiśvaryābhimānas+daśatattvaparijñānamārgarūpādyabhimānas -> māno 'py anekadhā---paṇḍitābhimāno dravyaiśvaryābhimāno daśatattvaparijñānamārgarūpādyabhimānas

māno 'py anekadhā---paṇḍitābhimāno dravyaiśvaryābhimāno daśatattvaparijñānamārgarūpādyabhimānas+sa -> māno 'py anekadhā---paṇḍitābhimāno dravyaiśvaryābhimāno daśatattvaparijñānamārgarūpādyabhimānaḥ sa

mānas+asya -> māno 'sya

māno 'sya+asti -> māno 'syāsti

māno 'syāsti+iti -> māno 'syāstīti

budhais+paṇḍitais -> budhaiḥ paṇḍitais

budhaiḥ paṇḍitais+iti| -> budhaiḥ paṇḍitair iti|

gurus+samyaksambodhihetos -> guruḥ samyaksambodhihetos

guruḥ samyaksambodhihetos+narakam -> guruḥ samyaksambodhihetor narakam

guruḥ samyaksambodhihetor narakam+iva -> guruḥ samyaksambodhihetor narakam iva

gurus+śiṣyais -> guruḥ śiṣyais

guruḥ śiṣyais+varjanīyas -> guruḥ śiṣyair varjanīyas

guruḥ śiṣyair varjanīyas+kṛtas -> guruḥ śiṣyair varjanīyaḥ kṛtas

guruḥ śiṣyair varjanīyaḥ kṛtas+api -> guruḥ śiṣyair varjanīyaḥ kṛto 'pi

mānādidoṣasahitas+gurus -> mānādidoṣasahito gurus

mānādidoṣasahito gurus+yas -> mānādidoṣasahito gurur yas

mānādidoṣasahito gurur yas+sa -> mānādidoṣasahito gurur yaḥ sa

budhais+varjanīyas -> budhair varjanīyas

budhair varjanīyas+sas -> budhair varjanīyaḥ sas

budhair varjanīyaḥ sas+eva|| -> budhair varjanīyaḥ sa eva||

śiṣyais+sambodhihetos -> śiṣyaiḥ sambodhihetos

śiṣyaiḥ sambodhihetos+narakam -> śiṣyaiḥ sambodhihetor narakam

śiṣyaiḥ sambodhihetor narakam+iva -> śiṣyaiḥ sambodhihetor narakam iva

bhogāsaktas+pramattas -> bhogāsaktaḥ pramattas

bhogāsaktaḥ pramattas+sakaṭukavacanas -> bhogāsaktaḥ pramattaḥ sakaṭukavacanas

bhogāsaktaḥ pramattaḥ sakaṭukavacanas+kāmukas -> bhogāsaktaḥ pramattaḥ sakaṭukavacanaḥ kāmukas

bhogāsaktaḥ pramattaḥ sakaṭukavacanaḥ kāmukas+ca -> bhogāsaktaḥ pramattaḥ sakaṭukavacanaḥ kāmukaś ca

bhogāsaktaḥ pramattaḥ sakaṭukavacanaḥ kāmukaś ca+indriyārtham -> bhogāsaktaḥ pramattaḥ sakaṭukavacanaḥ kāmukaś cendriyārtham

siktas+| -> siktaḥ|

naṣṭacittas+na -> naṣṭacitto na

śiṣyāṇām+vañcanārthī -> śiṣyāṇāṃ vañcanārthī

krodhābhibhūtas+samayavirahitas -> krodhābhibhūtaḥ samayavirahitas

krodhābhibhūtaḥ samayavirahitas+dravyalubdhas -> krodhābhibhūtaḥ samayavirahito dravyalubdhas

krodhābhibhūtaḥ samayavirahito dravyalubdhas+aśrutas -> krodhābhibhūtaḥ samayavirahito dravyalubdho 'śrutas

krodhābhibhūtaḥ samayavirahito dravyalubdho 'śrutas+ca -> krodhābhibhūtaḥ samayavirahito dravyalubdho 'śrutaś ca

tṛtīyavṛttena+eva -> tṛtīyavṛttenaiva

tṛtīyavṛttenaiva+āha---mānī -> tṛtīyavṛttenaivāha---mānī

tṛtīyavṛttenaivāha---mānī+ityādinā| -> tṛtīyavṛttenaivāha---mānītyādinā|

idānīm+duṣṭācāryadoṣaparīkṣārtham -> idānīṃ duṣṭācāryadoṣaparīkṣārtham

idānīṃ duṣṭācāryadoṣaparīkṣārtham+iha -> idānīṃ duṣṭācāryadoṣaparīkṣārtham iha

vajrācāryasevāniyamas+|| -> vajrācāryasevāniyamaḥ||

vajrasattvas+prasiddhas -> vajrasattvaḥ prasiddhas

vajrasattvaḥ prasiddhas+nirmitakāyena -> vajrasattvaḥ prasiddho nirmitakāyena

vajrasattvaḥ prasiddho nirmitakāyena+iti -> vajrasattvaḥ prasiddho nirmitakāyeneti

vajradaṇḍas+| -> vajradaṇḍaḥ|

yas+paramākṣarasukhaprāptas -> yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāptas

yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāptas+mārāṇām -> yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāpto mārāṇām

yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāpto mārāṇām+skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramārāṇām -> yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāpto mārāṇāṃ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramārāṇām

yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāpto mārāṇāṃ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramārāṇām+caturṇām -> yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāpto mārāṇāṃ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramārāṇāṃ caturṇām

yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāpto mārāṇāṃ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramārāṇāṃ caturṇām+vajradaṇḍas -> yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāpto mārāṇāṃ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramārāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ vajradaṇḍas

yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāpto mārāṇāṃ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramārāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ vajradaṇḍas+iva -> yaḥ paramākṣarasukhaprāpto mārāṇāṃ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputramārāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ vajradaṇḍa iva

tattvatas+brahmacārī -> tattvato brahmacārī

narakabhayaharas+bhavati| -> narakabhayaharo bhavati|

gurus+ārādhitas -> gurur ārādhitas

gurur ārādhitas+san -> gurur ārādhitaḥ san

gurur ārādhitaḥ san+śiṣyāṇām -> gurur ārādhitaḥ sañ chiṣyāṇām

gurur ārādhitaḥ sañ chiṣyāṇām+mārgadātā -> gurur ārādhitaḥ sañ chiṣyāṇāṃ mārgadātā

vartate+iti| -> vartata iti|

samyaksambuddhamārgas+tatra -> samyaksambuddhamārgas tatra

pravṛttis+asya| -> pravṛttir asya|

kṣāntiśīlas+iti| -> kṣāntiśīla iti|

vyapagatakaluṣas+iti| -> vyapagatakaluṣa iti|

vividhaprakāreṇa+apagatam -> vividhaprakāreṇāpagatam

vividhaprakāreṇāpagatam+yasya -> vividhaprakāreṇāpagataṃ yasya

rāgadveṣamohamānerṣyāmātsaryasamūhas+kaluṣam -> rāgadveṣamohamānerṣyāmātsaryasamūhaḥ kaluṣam

rāgadveṣamohamānerṣyāmātsaryasamūhaḥ kaluṣam+tat -> rāgadveṣamohamānerṣyāmātsaryasamūhaḥ kaluṣaṃ tat

rāgadveṣamohamānerṣyāmātsaryasamūhaḥ kaluṣaṃ tat+eva -> rāgadveṣamohamānerṣyāmātsaryasamūhaḥ kaluṣaṃ tad eva

vyapagatakaluṣas+iti -> vyapagatakaluṣa iti

sarvaputrakalatrādisvaśarīranirapekṣas+iti| -> sarvaputrakalatrādisvaśarīranirapekṣa iti|

alubdhas+iti -> alubdha iti

tattvam+dhyātum -> tattvaṃ dhyātum

tattvaṃ dhyātum+śīlam -> tattvaṃ dhyātuṃ śīlam

tattvaṃ dhyātuṃ śīlam+asya -> tattvaṃ dhyātuṃ śīlam asya

tattvaṃ dhyātuṃ śīlam asya+iti -> tattvaṃ dhyātuṃ śīlam asyeti

tattvaṃ dhyātuṃ śīlam asyeti+arthas -> tattvaṃ dhyātuṃ śīlam asyety arthas

tattvaṃ dhyātuṃ śīlam asyety arthas+| -> tattvaṃ dhyātuṃ śīlam asyety arthaḥ|

tat+eva -> tad eva

vaktavyam+paramākṣarajñānasiddhau -> vaktavyaṃ paramākṣarajñānasiddhau

tattvam+dvidhā---laukikasiddhisādhakam -> tattvaṃ dvidhā---laukikasiddhisādhakam

tattvaṃ dvidhā---laukikasiddhisādhakam+samyaksambuddhatvasādhakam -> tattvaṃ dvidhā---laukikasiddhisādhakaṃ samyaksambuddhatvasādhakam

tattvaṃ dvidhā---laukikasiddhisādhakaṃ samyaksambuddhatvasādhakam+iti -> tattvaṃ dvidhā---laukikasiddhisādhakaṃ samyaksambuddhatvasādhakam iti

vajrayānam+tasmin -> vajrayānaṃ tasmin

vajrayānaṃ tasmin+adhirūḍhas -> vajrayānaṃ tasminn adhirūḍhas

vajrayānaṃ tasminn adhirūḍhas+vajrayānādhirūḍhas -> vajrayānaṃ tasminn adhirūḍho vajrayānādhirūḍhas

vajrayānaṃ tasminn adhirūḍho vajrayānādhirūḍhas+iti| -> vajrayānaṃ tasminn adhirūḍho vajrayānādhirūḍha iti|

vajram+mokṣas -> vajraṃ mokṣas

vajraṃ mokṣas+yāyate -> vajraṃ mokṣo yāyate

vajraṃ mokṣo yāyate+anena -> vajraṃ mokṣo yāyate 'nena

vajraṃ mokṣo yāyate 'nena+iti -> vajraṃ mokṣo yāyate 'neneti

vajrayānam+samyaksambuddhayānam -> vajrayānaṃ samyaksambuddhayānam

vajrayānaṃ samyaksambuddhayānam+tīrthikaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānānām -> vajrayānaṃ samyaksambuddhayānaṃ tīrthikaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānānām

vajrayānaṃ samyaksambuddhayānaṃ tīrthikaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānānām+abhedyatvāt| -> vajrayānaṃ samyaksambuddhayānaṃ tīrthikaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānānām abhedyatvāt|

vajrayānādhirūḍhas+iti| -> vajrayānādhirūḍha iti|

sevanīyas+putrakalatrādibhis -> sevanīyaḥ putrakalatrādibhis

sevanīyaḥ putrakalatrādibhis+ārādhanīyas -> sevanīyaḥ putrakalatrādibhir ārādhanīyas

sevanīyaḥ putrakalatrādibhir ārādhanīyas+iti -> sevanīyaḥ putrakalatrādibhir ārādhanīya iti

sevanīyaḥ putrakalatrādibhir ārādhanīya iti+arthas -> sevanīyaḥ putrakalatrādibhir ārādhanīya ity arthas

sevanīyaḥ putrakalatrādibhir ārādhanīya ity arthas+| -> sevanīyaḥ putrakalatrādibhir ārādhanīya ity arthaḥ|

samyak+prakāreṇa -> samyak prakāreṇa

gurus+ādau -> gurur ādau

samayas+dvividhas -> samayo dvividhas

samayo dvividhas+bāhyas -> samayo dvividho bāhyas

samayo dvividho bāhyas+ādhyātmikas -> samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmikas

samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmikas+neyanītārthena -> samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthena

samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthena+avagantavyas -> samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyas

samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyas+vakṣyamāṇas -> samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyo vakṣyamāṇas

samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyo vakṣyamāṇas+samayas -> samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyo vakṣyamāṇaḥ samayas

samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyo vakṣyamāṇaḥ samayas+asya -> samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyo vakṣyamāṇaḥ samayo 'sya

samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyo vakṣyamāṇaḥ samayo 'sya+asti -> samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyo vakṣyamāṇaḥ samayo 'syāsti

samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyo vakṣyamāṇaḥ samayo 'syāsti+iti -> samayo dvividho bāhya ādhyātmiko neyanītārthenāvagantavyo vakṣyamāṇaḥ samayo 'syāstīti

samayī+iti| -> samayīti|

saṃsevanīyas+gurus -> saṃsevanīyo gurus

saṃsevanīyo gurus+api -> saṃsevanīyo gurur api

atas+āha---ādau -> ata āha---ādau

dharmaviparyāsāt+narakagamanam -> dharmaviparyāsān narakagamanam

dharmaviparyāsān narakagamanam+bhavati|| -> dharmaviparyāsān narakagamanaṃ bhavati||

śiṣyāṇām+dharmaviparyāsas -> śiṣyāṇāṃ dharmaviparyāsas

śiṣyāṇāṃ dharmaviparyāsas+bhavati -> śiṣyāṇāṃ dharmaviparyāso bhavati

śiṣyāṇāṃ dharmaviparyāso bhavati+iti -> śiṣyāṇāṃ dharmaviparyāso bhavatīti

guros+ārādhanena -> guror ārādhanena

samyak+parīkṣayitvā -> samyak parīkṣayitvā

prathamam+laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhis -> prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhis

prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhis+śiṣyais -> prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ śiṣyais

prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ śiṣyais+gurus -> prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ śiṣyair gurus

prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ śiṣyair gurus+sevanīyas -> prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ śiṣyair guruḥ sevanīyas

prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ śiṣyair guruḥ sevanīyas+tam -> prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ śiṣyair guruḥ sevanīyas tam

prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ śiṣyair guruḥ sevanīyas tam+ca -> prathamaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhikāṅkṣibhiḥ śiṣyair guruḥ sevanīyas taṃ ca

vajrasattvas+prasiddhas -> vajrasattvaḥ prasiddhas

vajrasattvaḥ prasiddhas+|| -> vajrasattvaḥ prasiddhaḥ||

mārāṇām+vajradaṇḍas -> mārāṇāṃ vajradaṇḍas

mārāṇāṃ vajradaṇḍas+sa -> mārāṇāṃ vajradaṇḍaḥ sa

narakabhayaharas+tattvatas -> narakabhayaharas tattvatas

narakabhayaharas tattvatas+brahmacārī -> narakabhayaharas tattvato brahmacārī

śiṣyāṇām+mārgadātā -> śiṣyāṇāṃ mārgadātā

tu+alubdhas -> tv alubdhas

tv alubdhas+vyapagatakaluṣas -> tv alubdho vyapagatakaluṣas

tv alubdho vyapagatakaluṣas+kṣāntiśīlas -> tv alubdho vyapagatakaluṣaḥ kṣāntiśīlas

tv alubdho vyapagatakaluṣaḥ kṣāntiśīlas+adhvavartī| -> tv alubdho vyapagatakaluṣaḥ kṣāntiśīlo 'dhvavartī|

saṃsevanīyas+gurus -> saṃsevanīyo gurus

saṃsevanīyo gurus+api -> saṃsevanīyo gurur api

dvitīyavṛttena+āha---ādau -> dvitīyavṛttenāha---ādau

dvitīyavṛttenāha---ādau+ityādinā|| -> dvitīyavṛttenāha---ādāv ityādinā||

idānīm+vajrācāryaparīkṣām -> idānīṃ vajrācāryaparīkṣām

idānīṃ vajrācāryaparīkṣām+gurvārādhanāya -> idānīṃ vajrācāryaparīkṣāṃ gurvārādhanāya

deśakādhyeṣakavacanasaṃgrahas+|| -> deśakādhyeṣakavacanasaṃgrahaḥ||

sarvam+vakṣyamāṇakramatas -> sarvaṃ vakṣyamāṇakramatas

sarvaṃ vakṣyamāṇakramatas+iti -> sarvaṃ vakṣyamāṇakramata iti

sugatas+maṇḍalam -> sugato maṇḍalam

sugato maṇḍalam+kālacakram -> sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakram

sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakram+sarvam -> sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakraṃ sarvam

sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakraṃ sarvam+deśayati -> sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakraṃ sarvaṃ deśayati

sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakraṃ sarvaṃ deśayati+iti -> sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakraṃ sarvaṃ deśayatīti

sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakraṃ sarvaṃ deśayatīti+arthas -> sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakraṃ sarvaṃ deśayatīty arthas

sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakraṃ sarvaṃ deśayatīty arthas+| -> sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakraṃ sarvaṃ deśayatīty arthaḥ|

tat+eva -> tad eva

tad eva+adhyeṣaṇāvacanam -> tad evādhyeṣaṇāvacanam

tad evādhyeṣaṇāvacanam+saucandravākyam -> tad evādhyeṣaṇāvacanaṃ saucandravākyam

tad evādhyeṣaṇāvacanaṃ saucandravākyam+śrutvā -> tad evādhyeṣaṇāvacanaṃ saucandravākyaṃ śrutvā

ca+iti -> ceti

rajomaṇḍalam+na -> rajomaṇḍalaṃ na

atas+mahāsukhasādhanāya -> ato mahāsukhasādhanāya

kāyavākcittavajrāṇām+na -> kāyavākcittavajrāṇāṃ na

kāyavākcittavajrāṇāṃ na+aparam -> kāyavākcittavajrāṇāṃ nāparam

kāyavākcittavajrāṇāṃ nāparam+pañcaraṅgikam|| -> kāyavākcittavajrāṇāṃ nāparaṃ pañcaraṅgikam||

kāyendriyam+bhagas -> kāyendriyaṃ bhagas

kāyendriyaṃ bhagas+cittam -> kāyendriyaṃ bhagaś cittam

kāyendriyaṃ bhagaś cittam+maṇḍalam -> kāyendriyaṃ bhagaś cittaṃ maṇḍalam

kāyendriyaṃ bhagaś cittaṃ maṇḍalam+trividham -> kāyendriyaṃ bhagaś cittaṃ maṇḍalaṃ trividham

kāyendriyaṃ bhagaś cittaṃ maṇḍalaṃ trividham+bhavet| -> kāyendriyaṃ bhagaś cittaṃ maṇḍalaṃ trividhaṃ bhavet|

jñānasādhanāya+aparam -> jñānasādhanāyāparam

jñānasādhanāyāparam+maṇḍalatrayam -> jñānasādhanāyāparaṃ maṇḍalatrayam

jñānasādhanāyāparaṃ maṇḍalatrayam+bhagavatā -> jñānasādhanāyāparaṃ maṇḍalatrayaṃ bhagavatā

jñānasādhanāyāparaṃ maṇḍalatrayaṃ bhagavatā+uktam| -> jñānasādhanāyāparaṃ maṇḍalatrayaṃ bhagavatoktam|

mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanārtham+jñānasambhārārtham -> mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanārthaṃ jñānasambhārārtham

mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanārthaṃ jñānasambhārārtham+iti| -> mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanārthaṃ jñānasambhārārtham iti|

kāraṇena+idam -> kāraṇenedam

kāraṇenedam+sucandrādhyeṣaṇam -> kāraṇenedaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇam

kāraṇenedaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇam+laukikasiddhisādhanārtham -> kāraṇenedaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ laukikasiddhisādhanārtham

kāraṇenedaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ laukikasiddhisādhanārtham+puṇyasambhārārtham -> kāraṇenedaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ laukikasiddhisādhanārthaṃ puṇyasambhārārtham

kāraṇenedaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ laukikasiddhisādhanārthaṃ puṇyasambhārārtham+na -> kāraṇenedaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ laukikasiddhisādhanārthaṃ puṇyasambhārārthaṃ na

tathāgataniyamas+| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ|

bhavati+iti -> bhavatīti

kurvatas+bodhis -> kurvato bodhis

kurvato bodhis+durlabhā -> kurvato bodhir durlabhā

vajrācāryas+tadā -> vajrācāryas tadā

mahāmudrāsiddhyartham+sūtrapātanādikam -> mahāmudrāsiddhyarthaṃ sūtrapātanādikam

mahāmudrāsiddhyarthaṃ sūtrapātanādikam+karoti -> mahāmudrāsiddhyarthaṃ sūtrapātanādikaṃ karoti

jñānam+manastrāṇabhūtatvāt -> jñānaṃ manastrāṇabhūtatvāt

jñānaṃ manastrāṇabhūtatvāt+tena -> jñānaṃ manastrāṇabhūtatvāt tena

mantram+iti -> mantram iti

kurvatas+bodhi -> kurvato bodhi

kuryāt+mantratattvena -> kuryān mantratattvena

pātanam+vajrasūtrāṇām -> pātanaṃ vajrasūtrāṇām

pātanaṃ vajrasūtrāṇām+rajasas -> pātanaṃ vajrasūtrāṇāṃ rajasas

pātanaṃ vajrasūtrāṇāṃ rajasas+api -> pātanaṃ vajrasūtrāṇāṃ rajaso 'pi

bhagavān+ādibuddhe--- -> bhagavān ādibuddhe---

tathā+āha -> tathāha

bhagavatas+pratiṣedhāt| -> bhagavataḥ pratiṣedhāt|

rajomaṇḍalālekhanam+na -> rajomaṇḍalālekhanaṃ na

rajomaṇḍalālekhanaṃ na+asti -> rajomaṇḍalālekhanaṃ nāsti

daśatattvasaṃyuktalaukikasiddhisādhanāya+akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam -> daśatattvasaṃyuktalaukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam

daśatattvasaṃyuktalaukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam+laukikasatyena -> daśatattvasaṃyuktalaukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ laukikasatyena

daśatattvasaṃyuktalaukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ laukikasatyena+iti| -> daśatattvasaṃyuktalaukikasiddhisādhanāyākaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ laukikasatyeneti|

pratimādīnām+pratiṣṭhākaraṇāya -> pratimādīnāṃ pratiṣṭhākaraṇāya

maṇḍalam+deśanīyam -> maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyam

maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyam+śiṣyāṇām -> maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyaṃ śiṣyāṇām

maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyaṃ śiṣyāṇām+sekadānāya -> maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyaṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ sekadānāya

tat+idānīm -> tad idānīm

tad idānīm+sattvānām -> tad idānīṃ sattvānām

tad idānīṃ sattvānām+puṇyajñānalābhāya -> tad idānīṃ sattvānāṃ puṇyajñānalābhāya

sarvam+jñātam -> sarvaṃ jñātam

sarvaṃ jñātam+iti -> sarvaṃ jñātam iti

sarvaṃ jñātam iti+arthas -> sarvaṃ jñātam ity arthas

sarvaṃ jñātam ity arthas+| -> sarvaṃ jñātam ity arthaḥ|

kartrādibhedas+itiparyantam -> kartrādibheda itiparyantam

kartrādibheda itiparyantam+śrutam -> kartrādibheda itiparyantaṃ śrutam

kartrādibheda itiparyantaṃ śrutam+mayā -> kartrādibheda itiparyantaṃ śrutaṃ mayā

mānam+dinaniśisamayam -> mānaṃ dinaniśisamayam

mānaṃ dinaniśisamayam+māsasaṃkrāntibhedādi% -> mānaṃ dinaniśisamayaṃ māsasaṃkrāntibhedādi%

bhagavan+yat -> bhagavan yat

bhagavan yat+bhagavatā -> bhagavan yad bhagavatā

bhagavan yad bhagavatā+uktam -> bhagavan yad bhagavatoktam

bhagavan yad bhagavatoktam+adhyātmapaṭale -> bhagavan yad bhagavatoktam adhyātmapaṭale

sucandras+āha---iha -> sucandra āha---iha

tathāgataprativacanam+punar -> tathāgataprativacanaṃ punar

tathāgataprativacanaṃ punar+adhyeṣaṇābhāvas -> tathāgataprativacanaṃ punar adhyeṣaṇābhāvas

tathāgataprativacanaṃ punar adhyeṣaṇābhāvas+paṭalāntam -> tathāgataprativacanaṃ punar adhyeṣaṇābhāvaḥ paṭalāntam

tathāgataprativacanaṃ punar adhyeṣaṇābhāvaḥ paṭalāntam+yāvat -> tathāgataprativacanaṃ punar adhyeṣaṇābhāvaḥ paṭalāntaṃ yāvat

tathāgataprativacanaṃ punar adhyeṣaṇābhāvaḥ paṭalāntaṃ yāvat+iti| -> tathāgataprativacanaṃ punar adhyeṣaṇābhāvaḥ paṭalāntaṃ yāvad iti|

sugatas+maṇḍalam -> sugato maṇḍalam

sugato maṇḍalam+kālacakram -> sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakram

sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakram+ityādi -> sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakram ityādi

saucandravākyam+pravadati -> saucandravākyaṃ pravadati

tatas+śrutvā -> tataḥ śrutvā

maṇḍalam+deśanīyam -> maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyam

maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyam+itiparyantam -> maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyam itiparyantam

maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyam itiparyantam+sucandrādhyeṣaṇam| -> maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyam itiparyantaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇam|

mānam+utyādinā -> mānam utyādinā

sugatas+maṇḍalam -> sugato maṇḍalam

sugato maṇḍalam+kālacakram|| -> sugato maṇḍalaṃ kālacakram||

saucandravākyam+pravadati -> saucandravākyaṃ pravadati

maṇḍalam+deśanīyam -> maṇḍalaṃ deśanīyam

kartrādibhedas+śrutam -> kartrādibhedaḥ śrutam

kartrādibhedaḥ śrutam+iti -> kartrādibhedaḥ śrutam iti

puruṣas+tīrthikānām -> puruṣas tīrthikānām

puruṣas tīrthikānām+matam -> puruṣas tīrthikānāṃ matam

puruṣas tīrthikānāṃ matam+ca| -> puruṣas tīrthikānāṃ mataṃ ca|

nāḍīnām+sūkṣmasaṃkhyā -> nāḍīnāṃ sūkṣmasaṃkhyā

mānam+dinaniśisamayas -> mānaṃ dinaniśisamayas

mānaṃ dinaniśisamayas+māsasaṃkrāntibhedās -> mānaṃ dinaniśisamayo māsasaṃkrāntibhedās

mānam+ityādinā--- -> mānam ityādinā---

tat+eva -> tad eva

prathamavṛttam+deśitam| -> prathamavṛttaṃ deśitam|

paramādibuddhāt+sucandrādhyeṣaṇārthapratipādakam -> paramādibuddhāt sucandrādhyeṣaṇārthapratipādakam

paramādibuddhāt sucandrādhyeṣaṇārthapratipādakam+laghutantre -> paramādibuddhāt sucandrādhyeṣaṇārthapratipādakaṃ laghutantre

paramādibuddhāt sucandrādhyeṣaṇārthapratipādakaṃ laghutantre+abhiṣekapaṭale -> paramādibuddhāt sucandrādhyeṣaṇārthapratipādakaṃ laghutantre 'bhiṣekapaṭale

likhyate+atra -> likhyate 'tra

mūlatantrāvabodhatas+| -> mūlatantrāvabodhataḥ|

ṭīkā+abhiṣekapaṭale -> ṭīkābhiṣekapaṭale

trimaṇḍalatrivajrāgram+ghoṣavajram -> trimaṇḍalatrivajrāgraṃ ghoṣavajram

trimaṇḍalatrivajrāgraṃ ghoṣavajram+anakṣaram|| -> trimaṇḍalatrivajrāgraṃ ghoṣavajram anakṣaram||

praṇamya+evam -> praṇamyaivam

praṇamyaivam+trikāyāgram -> praṇamyaivaṃ trikāyāgram

praṇamyaivaṃ trikāyāgram+kālacakram -> praṇamyaivaṃ trikāyāgraṃ kālacakram

praṇamyaivaṃ trikāyāgraṃ kālacakram+mahāsukham| -> praṇamyaivaṃ trikāyāgraṃ kālacakraṃ mahāsukham|

namas+|| -> namaḥ||

viśvam+vyākṛtam -> viśvaṃ vyākṛtam

viśvaṃ vyākṛtam+ekaśāstṛviṣaye -> viśvaṃ vyākṛtam ekaśāstṛviṣaye

mārādayas+dhvaṃsitās -> mārādayo dhvaṃsitās

mārādayo dhvaṃsitās+| -> mārādayo dhvaṃsitāḥ|

hayādikam+daśavidham -> hayādikaṃ daśavidham

hayādikaṃ daśavidham+dānam -> hayādikaṃ daśavidhaṃ dānam

hayādikaṃ daśavidhaṃ dānam+ca -> hayādikaṃ daśavidhaṃ dānaṃ ca

dattam+yena -> dattaṃ yena

namas+śrīkālacakrāya| -> namaḥ śrīkālacakrāya|

yat+aṇubhis -> yad aṇubhis

tat+katham -> tat katham

tat katham+nityam -> tat kathaṃ nityam

tat kathaṃ nityam+bhavati -> tat kathaṃ nityaṃ bhavati

cakārāt+mokṣas -> cakārān mokṣas

cakārān mokṣas+api -> cakārān mokṣo 'pi

trailokyam+aṇubhis -> trailokyam aṇubhis

trailokyam aṇubhis+jātam -> trailokyam aṇubhir jātam

trailokyam aṇubhir jātam+na -> trailokyam aṇubhir jātaṃ na

trailokyam aṇubhir jātaṃ na+aṇubhis -> trailokyam aṇubhir jātaṃ nāṇubhis

trailokyam aṇubhir jātaṃ nāṇubhis+vinā -> trailokyam aṇubhir jātaṃ nāṇubhir vinā

mokṣam+pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣam -> mokṣaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣam

mokṣaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣam+sukhapadam -> mokṣaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣaṃ sukhapadam

mokṣaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣaṃ sukhapadam+pudgalarahitam -> mokṣaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣaṃ sukhapadaṃ pudgalarahitam

mokṣaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣaṃ sukhapadaṃ pudgalarahitam+iti -> mokṣaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣaṃ sukhapadaṃ pudgalarahitam iti

nityas+saṃsārāt -> nityaḥ saṃsārāt

nityaḥ saṃsārāt+karmamuktas -> nityaḥ saṃsārāt karmamuktas

nityaḥ saṃsārāt karmamuktas+san -> nityaḥ saṃsārāt karmamuktaḥ san

nityaḥ saṃsārāt karmamuktaḥ san+vrajati -> nityaḥ saṃsārāt karmamuktaḥ san vrajati

kāraṇena+idam -> kāraṇenedam

kāraṇenedam+nityam -> kāraṇenedaṃ nityam

kāraṇenedaṃ nityam+jīvas -> kāraṇenedaṃ nityaṃ jīvas

kāraṇenedaṃ nityaṃ jīvas+api -> kāraṇenedaṃ nityaṃ jīvo 'pi

prāṇinas+kutra -> prāṇinaḥ kutra

tadā+anyatribhuvanābhāvāt -> tadānyatribhuvanābhāvāt

tadānyatribhuvanābhāvāt+sarve -> tadānyatribhuvanābhāvāt sarve

kṣayas+bhavati -> kṣayo bhavati

yat+yasya -> yad yasya

kadācit+kṣayam -> kadācit kṣayam

kadācit kṣayam+yāsyati -> kadācit kṣayaṃ yāsyati

kadācit kṣayaṃ yāsyati+iti| -> kadācit kṣayaṃ yāsyatīti|

tena+idam -> tenedam

tenedam+tribhuvanam -> tenedaṃ tribhuvanam

tenedaṃ tribhuvanam+anādinidhanam -> tenedaṃ tribhuvanam anādinidhanam

tenedaṃ tribhuvanam anādinidhanam+utpādavyayarahitam -> tenedaṃ tribhuvanam anādinidhanam utpādavyayarahitam

tenedaṃ tribhuvanam anādinidhanam utpādavyayarahitam+sarvam -> tenedaṃ tribhuvanam anādinidhanam utpādavyayarahitaṃ sarvam

tenedaṃ tribhuvanam anādinidhanam utpādavyayarahitaṃ sarvam+vajramayam -> tenedaṃ tribhuvanam anādinidhanam utpādavyayarahitaṃ sarvaṃ vajramayam

tenedaṃ tribhuvanam anādinidhanam utpādavyayarahitaṃ sarvaṃ vajramayam+na -> tenedaṃ tribhuvanam anādinidhanam utpādavyayarahitaṃ sarvaṃ vajramayaṃ na

tribhuvanam+dvitīyam -> tribhuvanaṃ dvitīyam

tribhuvanaṃ dvitīyam+na -> tribhuvanaṃ dvitīyaṃ na

tribhuvanaṃ dvitīyaṃ na+asti -> tribhuvanaṃ dvitīyaṃ nāsti

kṣapaṇakasiddhānte+ekam -> kṣapaṇakasiddhānta ekam

kṣapaṇakasiddhānta ekam+eva -> kṣapaṇakasiddhānta ekam eva

sukhapadam+yat -> sukhapadaṃ yat

sukhapadaṃ yat+sthitam -> sukhapadaṃ yat sthitam

sukhapadaṃ yat sthitam+lokamūrdhni -> sukhapadaṃ yat sthitaṃ lokamūrdhni

sukhapadaṃ yat sthitaṃ lokamūrdhni+iti| -> sukhapadaṃ yat sthitaṃ lokamūrdhnīti|

saṃsārāt+karmamuktas -> saṃsārāt karmamuktas

saṃsārāt karmamuktas+vrajati -> saṃsārāt karmamukto vrajati

atas+jīvajātyādidravyam -> ato jīvajātyādidravyam

ato jīvajātyādidravyam+anityam -> ato jīvajātyādidravyam anityam

ato jīvajātyādidravyam anityam+iti -> ato jīvajātyādidravyam anityam iti

parasparavirodhāt+asadṛśasadṛśayos -> parasparavirodhād asadṛśasadṛśayos

parasparavirodhād asadṛśasadṛśayos+yathā| -> parasparavirodhād asadṛśasadṛśayor yathā|

nityānityayos+ekatvam -> nityānityayor ekatvam

nityānityayor ekatvam+na -> nityānityayor ekatvaṃ na

nityānityayor ekatvaṃ na+asti -> nityānityayor ekatvaṃ nāsti

nityānityasaṃyogadoṣas+iti| -> nityānityasaṃyogadoṣa iti|

evam+jātivyaktyos -> evaṃ jātivyaktyos

evaṃ jātivyaktyos+api -> evaṃ jātivyaktyor api

paṭas+| -> paṭaḥ|

sūtrais+vinā -> sūtrair vinā

ca+evam -> caivam

caivam+dṛśyate -> caivaṃ dṛśyate

paryāyas+bhavati -> paryāyo bhavati

dravyais+vinā -> dravyair vinā

atha+anyatvam -> athānyatvam

athānyatvam+tadā -> athānyatvaṃ tadā

dravyaparyāyayos+bhedas -> dravyaparyāyayor bhedas

dravyaparyāyayor bhedas+na -> dravyaparyāyayor bhedo na

dravyaparyāyayor bhedo na+asti| -> dravyaparyāyayor bhedo nāsti|

yadi+ekatvam -> yady ekatvam

yady ekatvam+tadā -> yady ekatvaṃ tadā

āha---dravyaparyāyayos+ekatvam -> āha---dravyaparyāyayor ekatvam

āha---dravyaparyāyayor ekatvam+anyatvam -> āha---dravyaparyāyayor ekatvam anyatvam

āha---dravyaparyāyayor ekatvam anyatvam+vā| -> āha---dravyaparyāyayor ekatvam anyatvaṃ vā|

siddhāntas+| -> siddhāntaḥ|

siddhis+iti -> siddhir iti

na+anyathā -> nānyathā

svaguṇayutas+iti -> svaguṇayuta iti

evam+dravyotpattivyayātmā -> evaṃ dravyotpattivyayātmā

vairāṇi+iti -> vairāṇīti

karmaṇas+ca -> karmaṇaś ca

balavat+ajñānabalena -> balavad ajñānabalena

balavad ajñānabalena+evam -> balavad ajñānabalenaivam

balavad ajñānabalenaivam+jīvasya -> balavad ajñānabalenaivaṃ jīvasya

balavad ajñānabalenaivaṃ jīvasya+api -> balavad ajñānabalenaivaṃ jīvasyāpi

kutracit+caturgatisaṃsāraviṣaye -> kutracic caturgatisaṃsāraviṣaye

jīvas+balavān -> jīvo balavān

jīvo balavān+kaivalyajñānabalena| -> jīvo balavan kaivalyajñānabalena|

asyās+gāthāyās -> asyā gāthāyās

asyā gāthāyās+artham -> asyā gāthāyā artham

asyā gāthāyā artham+āha---kutracit -> asyā gāthāyā artham āha---kutracit

asyā gāthāyā artham āha---kutracit+iti| -> asyā gāthāyā artham āha---kutracid iti|

syādvādas+| -> syādvādaḥ|

dravyaparyāyābhyām+jīvadravyam -> dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ jīvadravyam

dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ jīvadravyam+nityam -> dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ jīvadravyaṃ nityam

dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ jīvadravyaṃ nityam+vikāras -> dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ jīvadravyaṃ nityaṃ vikāras

dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ jīvadravyaṃ nityaṃ vikāras+anityas -> dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ jīvadravyaṃ nityaṃ vikāro 'nityas

dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ jīvadravyaṃ nityaṃ vikāro 'nityas+iti -> dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ jīvadravyaṃ nityaṃ vikāro 'nitya iti

suvarṇam+kuṇḍābhyām -> suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍābhyām

suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍābhyām+nityānityam -> suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍābhyāṃ nityānityam

suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍābhyāṃ nityānityam+tathā -> suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍābhyāṃ nityānityaṃ tathā

syādvādas+| -> syādvādaḥ|

āha---dravyaparyāyābhyām+nityānityam -> āha---dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ nityānityam

āha---dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ nityānityam+iti -> āha---dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ nityānityam iti

sas+anityas -> so 'nityas

so 'nityas+siddhas -> so 'nityaḥ siddhas

so 'nityaḥ siddhas+iti| -> so 'nityaḥ siddha iti|

yas+vikārī -> yo vikārī

yas+nityas -> yo nityas

yo nityas+sas -> yo nityaḥ sas

yo nityaḥ sas+avikārī -> yo nityaḥ so 'vikārī

bhavet+sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt -> bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt

bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt+sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt -> bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt

bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt+sthūlatām -> bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlatām

bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlatām+kim -> bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlatāṃ kim

bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlatāṃ kim+prayāti -> bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlatāṃ kiṃ prayāti

bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlatāṃ kiṃ prayāti+iti| -> bhavet sūkṣmakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlakāyagrahaṇāt sthūlatāṃ kiṃ prayātīti|

nityas+kāyaprabhāvāt -> nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvāt

nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvāt+aṇus -> nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvād aṇus

nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvād aṇus+api -> nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvād aṇur api

chinnāvayavamūrtes+abhāvāt -> chinnāvayavamūrter abhāvāt

chinnāvayavamūrter abhāvāt+iti| -> chinnāvayavamūrter abhāvād iti|

kim+vinaśyate -> kiṃ vinaśyate

cet+tadā -> cet tadā

siddham+iti -> siddham iti

kāyapramāṇas+iti -> kāyapramāṇa iti

jīvas+nityas -> jīvo nityas

jīvo nityas+sa -> jīvo nityaḥ sa

śāśvatam+tat -> śāśvataṃ tat

śāśvataṃ tat+na -> śāśvataṃ tan na

trailokyam+ca -> trailokyaṃ ca

trailokyaṃ ca+aṇubhis -> trailokyaṃ cāṇubhis

trailokyaṃ cāṇubhis+yat -> trailokyaṃ cāṇubhir yat

trailokyaṃ cāṇubhir yat+racitam -> trailokyaṃ cāṇubhir yad racitam

trailokyaṃ cāṇubhir yad racitam+api -> trailokyaṃ cāṇubhir yad racitam api

sukhapadam+yat -> sukhapadaṃ yat

sukhapadaṃ yat+sthitam -> sukhapadaṃ yat sthitam

sukhapadaṃ yat sthitam+lokamūrdhni -> sukhapadaṃ yat sthitaṃ lokamūrdhni

saṃsārāt+karmamuktas -> saṃsārāt karmamuktas

saṃsārāt karmamuktas+vrajati -> saṃsārāt karmamukto vrajati

bhavet+sthūlatām -> bhavet sthūlatām

bhavet sthūlatām+kim -> bhavet sthūlatāṃ kim

bhavet sthūlatāṃ kim+prayāti| -> bhavet sthūlatāṃ kiṃ prayāti|

nityas+kāyaprabhāvāt -> nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvāt

nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvāt+aṇus -> nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvād aṇus

nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvād aṇus+api -> nityaḥ kāyaprabhāvād aṇur api

karacaraṇacchedanāt+naśyate -> karacaraṇacchedanān naśyate

jīvas+kāyapramāṇas -> jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇas

jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇas+yadi -> jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo yadi

jīvas+ityādi| -> jīva ityādi|

idānīm+kṣapaṇakamatadūṣaṇam -> idānīṃ kṣapaṇakamatadūṣaṇam

idānīṃ kṣapaṇakamatadūṣaṇam+ucyate -> idānīṃ kṣapaṇakamatadūṣaṇam ucyate

lokāyatamatadūṣaṇaniyamas+| -> lokāyatamatadūṣaṇaniyamaḥ|

sukhaphaladam+mārganaṣṭam -> sukhaphaladaṃ mārganaṣṭam

sukhaphaladaṃ mārganaṣṭam+narāṇām -> sukhaphaladaṃ mārganaṣṭaṃ narāṇām

sukhaphaladaṃ mārganaṣṭaṃ narāṇām+iti -> sukhaphaladaṃ mārganaṣṭaṃ narāṇām iti

tasmāt+etat -> tasmād etat

tasmād etat+cārvākavākyam -> tasmād etac cārvākavākyam

tasmād etac cārvākavākyam+na -> tasmād etac cārvākavākyaṃ na

bhūtasaṃyogaśaktis+iti -> bhūtasaṃyogaśaktir iti

param+amṛṣā -> param amṛṣā

atha+eṣām -> athaiṣām

athaiṣām+sthāvarāṇām -> athaiṣāṃ sthāvarāṇām

athaiṣāṃ sthāvarāṇām+jantuśaktis -> athaiṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jantuśaktis

athaiṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jantuśaktis+na -> athaiṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jantuśaktir na

athaiṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jantuśaktir na+asti -> athaiṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jantuśaktir nāsti

athaiṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jantuśaktir nāsti+iti -> athaiṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jantuśaktir nāstīti

sendriyam+cittam -> sendriyaṃ cittam

sendriyaṃ cittam+iti -> sendriyaṃ cittam iti

vṛkṣāṇām+pṛthvyādibhis -> vṛkṣāṇāṃ pṛthvyādibhis

vṛkṣāṇāṃ pṛthvyādibhis+ekībhūtānām -> vṛkṣāṇāṃ pṛthvyādibhir ekībhūtānām

vṛkṣāṇāṃ pṛthvyādibhir ekībhūtānām+kim -> vṛkṣāṇāṃ pṛthvyādibhir ekībhūtānāṃ kim

vṛkṣāṇāṃ pṛthvyādibhir ekībhūtānāṃ kim+na -> vṛkṣāṇāṃ pṛthvyādibhir ekībhūtānāṃ kiṃ na

siddham+tadā -> siddhaṃ tadā

madirāśaktivat+sendriyam -> madirāśaktivat sendriyam

madirāśaktivat sendriyam+cittam -> madirāśaktivat sendriyaṃ cittam

madirāśaktivat sendriyaṃ cittam+narāṇām -> madirāśaktivat sendriyaṃ cittaṃ narāṇām

madirāśaktivat sendriyaṃ cittaṃ narāṇām+iti -> madirāśaktivat sendriyaṃ cittaṃ narāṇām iti

pūrvoktais+bhūtais -> pūrvoktair bhūtais

pūrvoktair bhūtais+pṛthvyādibhis -> pūrvoktair bhūtaiḥ pṛthvyādibhis

pūrvoktair bhūtaiḥ pṛthvyādibhis+ekībhūtais -> pūrvoktair bhūtaiḥ pṛthvyādibhir ekībhūtais

pūrvoktair bhūtaiḥ pṛthvyādibhir ekībhūtais+yadi -> pūrvoktair bhūtaiḥ pṛthvyādibhir ekībhūtair yadi

sukhaphaladam+mārganaṣṭam -> sukhaphaladaṃ mārganaṣṭam

sukhaphaladaṃ mārganaṣṭam+narāṇām|| -> sukhaphaladaṃ mārganaṣṭaṃ narāṇām||

etat+cārvākavākyam -> etac cārvākavākyam

etac cārvākavākyam+na -> etac cārvākavākyaṃ na

na+asti -> nāsti

nāsti+eṣām -> nāsty eṣām

nāsty eṣām+jantuśaktis -> nāsty eṣāṃ jantuśaktis

nāsty eṣāṃ jantuśaktis+tu -> nāsty eṣāṃ jantuśaktis tu

nāsty eṣāṃ jantuśaktis tu+atha -> nāsty eṣāṃ jantuśaktis tv atha

syāt+kṣitijalahutabhugmārutākāśayogāt| -> syāt kṣitijalahutabhugmārutākāśayogāt|

vṛkṣāṇām+kim -> vṛkṣāṇāṃ kim

vṛkṣāṇāṃ kim+na -> vṛkṣāṇāṃ kiṃ na

madirāśaktivat+sākṣicittam -> madirāśaktivat sākṣicittam

bhūtais+yadi -> bhūtair yadi

bhūtair yadi+ekabhūtais -> bhūtair yady ekabhūtais

bhūtair yady ekabhūtais+prabhavati -> bhūtair yady ekabhūtaiḥ prabhavati

bhūtais+ityādi| -> bhūtair ityādi|

idānīm+cārvākamatadūṣaṇam -> idānīṃ cārvākamatadūṣaṇam

idānīṃ cārvākamatadūṣaṇam+ucyate -> idānīṃ cārvākamatadūṣaṇam ucyate

niyamas+|| -> niyamaḥ||

atas+anyajātiprahīṇam -> ato 'nyajātiprahīṇam

ato 'nyajātiprahīṇam+iti -> ato 'nyajātiprahīṇam iti

rahmaṇas+niyamena -> rahmaṇo niyamena

rahmaṇo niyamena+iti| -> rahmaṇo niyameneti|

duḥkham+vā -> duḥkhaṃ vā

sukham+vā -> sukhaṃ vā

vā+anayā -> vānayā

manuṣyas+mṛtas -> manuṣyo mṛtas

manuṣyo mṛtas+svarge -> manuṣyo mṛtaḥ svarge

tāyinām+mlecchānām -> tāyināṃ mlecchānām

tāyināṃ mlecchānām+matam| -> tāyināṃ mlecchānāṃ matam|

matam+kim -> mataṃ kim

mataṃ kim+tu -> mataṃ kiṃ tu

mataṃ kiṃ tu+anyajātiprahīṇam -> mataṃ kiṃ tv anyajātiprahīṇam

mataṃ kiṃ tv anyajātiprahīṇam+iti -> mataṃ kiṃ tv anyajātiprahīṇam iti

tāyinām+prabhavati -> tāyināṃ prabhavati

etat+vai -> etad vai

praveśas+bhavati -> praveśo bhavati

praveśo bhavati+iti| -> praveśo bhavatīti|

saṃsārāt+nirgamas -> saṃsārān nirgamas

saṃsārān nirgamas+syāt -> saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syāt

saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syāt+aparimitabhavais -> saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavais

saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavais+na -> saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavair na

saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavair na+eva -> saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavair naiva

evam+na -> evaṃ na

karmaphalopabhogatas+iti| -> karmaphalopabhogata iti|

nṛṇām+jātijātyantareṇa -> nṛṇāṃ jātijātyantareṇa

karmanāśas+na -> karmanāśo na

yadi+evam -> yady evam

yady evam+tadā -> yady evaṃ tadā

kṛtāni+anyajātyām -> kṛtāny anyajātyām

kṛtāny anyajātyām+iti -> kṛtāny anyajātyām iti

yeṣām+matam -> yeṣāṃ matam

yeṣāṃ matam+jantus -> yeṣāṃ mataṃ jantus

yeṣāṃ mataṃ jantus+pūrvakṛtāni -> yeṣāṃ mataṃ jantuḥ pūrvakṛtāni

matam+ca -> mataṃ ca

mataṃ ca+anyajātiprahīṇam|| -> mataṃ cānyajātiprahīṇam||

tāyinām+tu -> tāyināṃ tu

etat+vai -> etad vai

saṃsārāt+nirgamas -> saṃsārān nirgamas

saṃsārān nirgamas+syāt -> saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syāt

saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syāt+aparimitabhavais -> saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavais

saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavais+na -> saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavair na

saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavair na+eva -> saṃsārān nirgamaḥ syād aparimitabhavair naiva

nṛṇām+jātijātyantareṇa| -> nṛṇāṃ jātijātyantareṇa|

yadi+evam -> yady evam

yady evam+karmanāśas -> yady evaṃ karmanāśas

yady evaṃ karmanāśas+na -> yady evaṃ karmanāśo na

kṛtāni+aihikāni -> kṛtāny aihikāni

kṛtāny aihikāni+anyajātyā -> kṛtāny aihikāny anyajātyā

karmāṇi+anubhavati -> karmāṇy anubhavati

jantus+pūrvāṇi -> jantuḥ pūrvāṇi

idānīm+pūrvakarmopabhogavartamānakaramasaṃcayapratiṣedhas -> idānīṃ pūrvakarmopabhogavartamānakaramasaṃcayapratiṣedhas

idānīṃ pūrvakarmopabhogavartamānakaramasaṃcayapratiṣedhas+ucyate---jantus -> idānīṃ pūrvakarmopabhogavartamānakaramasaṃcayapratiṣedha ucyate---jantus

idānīṃ pūrvakarmopabhogavartamānakaramasaṃcayapratiṣedha ucyate---jantus+ityādi| -> idānīṃ pūrvakarmopabhogavartamānakaramasaṃcayapratiṣedha ucyate---jantur ityādi|

bauddhasiddhāntaniyamas+|| -> bauddhasiddhāntaniyamaḥ||

tryadhvaparijñānāya+iti -> tryadhvaparijñānāyeti

yas+| -> yaḥ|

kas+asau| -> ko 'sau|

yas+anaṣṭas -> yo 'naṣṭas

yo 'naṣṭas+naṣṭapakṣas -> yo 'naṣṭo naṣṭapakṣas

yo 'naṣṭo naṣṭapakṣas+sa -> yo 'naṣṭo naṣṭapakṣaḥ sa

catuṣkoṭivinirmuktam+tattvam -> catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ tattvam

catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ tattvam+mādhyamikās -> catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ tattvaṃ mādhyamikās

catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ tattvaṃ mādhyamikās+vidus -> catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ tattvaṃ mādhyamikā vidus

catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ tattvaṃ mādhyamikā vidus+|| -> catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ tattvaṃ mādhyamikā viduḥ||

ca+api -> cāpi

cāpi+anubhayātmakam| -> cāpy anubhayātmakam|

sat+asat -> sad asat

sad asat+na -> sad asan na

sat+na -> san na

san na+asat -> san nāsat

san nāsat+na -> san nāsan na

viyogāt+gaganābjavat|| -> viyogād gaganābjavat||

dhīrāṇām+vijñānam -> dhīrāṇāṃ vijñānam

dhīrāṇāṃ vijñānam+paramārthasat| -> dhīrāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ paramārthasat|

na+iṣṭam -> neṣṭam

neṣṭam+tat -> neṣṭaṃ tat

neṣṭaṃ tat+api -> neṣṭaṃ tad api

atas+mādhyamikas -> ato mādhyamikas

ato mādhyamikas+āha--- -> ato mādhyamika āha---

tayos+ekatvābhāvas -> tayor ekatvābhāvas

tayor ekatvābhāvas+iti| -> tayor ekatvābhāva iti|

miśrāt+parasparavirodhena -> miśrāt parasparavirodhena

śakyate+aniruddhāt -> śakyate 'niruddhāt

śakyate 'niruddhāt+api -> śakyate 'niruddhād api

nirodhāt+aparasya -> nirodhād aparasya

nirodhād aparasya+utpādas -> nirodhād aparasyotpādas

nirodhād aparasyotpādas+vaktum -> nirodhād aparasyotpādo vaktum

nirodhād aparasyotpādo vaktum+na -> nirodhād aparasyotpādo vaktuṃ na

atas+pūrvavijñānasya -> ataḥ pūrvavijñānasya

pradīpamālā+iva -> pradīpamāleva

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādas+atha -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'tha

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'tha+aniruddhāt -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhāt

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhāt+utpādas -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas+tadā -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadā

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadā+aniruddhāt -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt+pradīpāt -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt+pradīpotpādavat -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat+tasmāt -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat tasmāt

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat tasmāt+aparotpādas -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat tasmād aparotpādas

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat tasmād aparotpādas+evam -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat tasmād aparotpāda evam

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat tasmād aparotpāda evam+utpādāt -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat tasmād aparotpāda evam utpādāt

niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat tasmād aparotpāda evam utpādāt+utpādena -> niruddhapradīpaparapradīpotpādo 'thāniruddhād utpādas tadāniruddhāt pradīpāt pradīpotpādavat tasmād aparotpāda evam utpādād utpādena

niruddhadharmāt+utpādas -> niruddhadharmād utpādas

niruddhadharmād utpādas+tadā -> niruddhadharmād utpādas tadā

kim+pūrvadharmaniruddhāt -> kiṃ pūrvadharmaniruddhāt

kiṃ pūrvadharmaniruddhāt+aparadharmotpādas -> kiṃ pūrvadharmaniruddhād aparadharmotpādas

kiṃ pūrvadharmaniruddhād aparadharmotpādas+atha -> kiṃ pūrvadharmaniruddhād aparadharmotpādo 'tha
