kiṃ pūrvadharmaniruddhād aparadharmotpādo 'tha+aniruddhadharmāt| -> kiṃ pūrvadharmaniruddhād aparadharmotpādo 'thāniruddhadharmāt|

bhaṅgotpādas+dharmasya -> bhaṅgotpādo dharmasya

yas+ekakṣaṇe -> ya ekakṣaṇe

kim+ca -> kiṃ ca

kiṃ ca+anyat| -> kiṃ cānyat|

jātijarāmaraṇānām+aikyam -> jātijarāmaraṇānām aikyam

jātijarāmaraṇānām aikyam+iti|| -> jātijarāmaraṇānām aikyam iti||

sati+ekakāle -> saty ekakāle

kṣaṇas+| -> kṣaṇaḥ|

kālas+iti -> kāla iti

bhaṅgas+| -> bhaṅgaḥ|

sthitis+na -> sthitir na

yasmin+kāle -> yasmin kāle

yasmin kāle+utpādas -> yasmin kāla utpādas

yasmin kāla utpādas+tasmin -> yasmin kāla utpādas tasmin

yasmin kāla utpādas tasmin+kāle -> yasmin kāla utpādas tasmin kāle

na+utpādasthitī -> notpādasthitī

bhaṅgas+tasmin -> bhaṅgas tasmin

bhaṅgas tasmin+kāle -> bhaṅgas tasmin kāle

yasmin+kāle -> yasmin kāle

na+utpādabhaṅgau -> notpādabhaṅgau

sthitis+tasmin -> sthitis tasmin

sthitis tasmin+kāle -> sthitis tasmin kāle

yasmin+kāle -> yasmin kāle

atha+utpādāt -> athotpādāt

athotpādāt+sthitis -> athotpādāt sthitis

athotpādāt sthitis+sthites -> athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthites

athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthites+bhaṅgas -> athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgas

athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgas+bhaṅgāt -> athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgāt

athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgāt+utpādas -> athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpādas

athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpādas+evam -> athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpāda evam

athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpāda evam+sthitibhaṅgotpādānām -> athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpāda evaṃ sthitibhaṅgotpādānām

athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpāda evaṃ sthitibhaṅgotpādānām+ekatvam -> athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpāda evaṃ sthitibhaṅgotpādānām ekatvam

athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpāda evaṃ sthitibhaṅgotpādānām ekatvam+na -> athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpāda evaṃ sthitibhaṅgotpādānām ekatvaṃ na

athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpāda evaṃ sthitibhaṅgotpādānām ekatvaṃ na+asti -> athotpādāt sthitiḥ sthiter bhaṅgo bhaṅgād utpāda evaṃ sthitibhaṅgotpādānām ekatvaṃ nāsti

śaśaviṣāṇasya+api -> śaśaviṣāṇasyāpi

bhaṅgotpādas+ca -> bhaṅgotpādaś ca

kim+sthityā -> kiṃ sthityā

yas+dharmāṇām -> yo dharmāṇām

yo dharmāṇām+ekakṣaṇāt -> yo dharmāṇām ekakṣaṇāt

yo dharmāṇām ekakṣaṇāt+bhaṅgotpādas -> yo dharmāṇām ekakṣaṇād bhaṅgotpādas

yo dharmāṇām ekakṣaṇād bhaṅgotpādas+bhavati -> yo dharmāṇām ekakṣaṇād bhaṅgotpādo bhavati

idānīm+kṣaṇabhaṅgotpādadoṣas -> idānīṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgotpādadoṣas

idānīṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgotpādadoṣas+ucyate|| -> idānīṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgotpādadoṣa ucyate||

traidhātukamātratvam+asiddham|| -> traidhātukamātratvam asiddham||

pratijñāhānis+iti -> pratijñāhānir iti

vijñānamātram+traidhātukam -> vijñānamātraṃ traidhātukam

vijñānamātraṃ traidhātukam+na -> vijñānamātraṃ traidhātukaṃ na

vijñānasya+avidyāmātratas -> vijñānasyāvidyāmātratas

vijñānasyāvidyāmātratas+| -> vijñānasyāvidyāmātrataḥ|

vijñānamātram+tadātmakatvam -> vijñānamātraṃ tadātmakatvam

vijñānamātraṃ tadātmakatvam+tadātmakatvāt -> vijñānamātraṃ tadātmakatvaṃ tadātmakatvāt

vijñānamātraṃ tadātmakatvaṃ tadātmakatvāt+avidyāpagamas -> vijñānamātraṃ tadātmakatvaṃ tadātmakatvād avidyāpagamas

vijñānamātraṃ tadātmakatvaṃ tadātmakatvād avidyāpagamas+na -> vijñānamātraṃ tadātmakatvaṃ tadātmakatvād avidyāpagamo na

vijñānamātraṃ tadātmakatvaṃ tadātmakatvād avidyāpagamo na+asti -> vijñānamātraṃ tadātmakatvaṃ tadātmakatvād avidyāpagamo nāsti

evam+avidyā -> evam avidyā

traidhātukam+ca -> traidhātukaṃ ca

tribhuvanalakṣaṇas+tribhavam -> tribhuvanalakṣaṇas tribhavam

tribhuvanalakṣaṇas tribhavam+traidhātukam| -> tribhuvanalakṣaṇas tribhavaṃ traidhātukam|

saṃsāras+api -> saṃsāro 'pi

tasmāt+iyam -> tasmād iyam

tasmād iyam+avidyā -> tasmād iyam avidyā

ca+evam| -> caivam|

bhavati+evam -> bhavaty evam

bhavaty evam+prajñāpāramitā -> bhavaty evaṃ prajñāpāramitā

bhavaty evaṃ prajñāpāramitā+iyam| -> bhavaty evaṃ prajñāpāramiteyam|

yadi+avidyā -> yady avidyā

āha---kim+iyam -> āha---kim iyam

āha---kim iyam+avidyā -> āha---kim iyam avidyā

āha---kim iyam avidyā+apagamas -> āha---kim iyam avidyāpagamas

āha---kim iyam avidyāpagamas+na -> āha---kim iyam avidyāpagamo na

āha---kim iyam avidyāpagamo na+asti -> āha---kim iyam avidyāpagamo nāsti

āha---avidyāvāsanāvaśena+iti| -> āha---avidyāvāsanāvaśeneti|

pratibhāsate+iti| -> pratibhāsata iti|

bāhyarūpam+katham -> bāhyarūpaṃ katham

bāhyarūpaṃ katham+grāhyasvabhāvena -> bāhyarūpaṃ kathaṃ grāhyasvabhāvena

jñānāt+anyat -> jñānād anyat

jñānād anyat+bāhyavasturūpam -> jñānād anyad bāhyavasturūpam

jñānād anyad bāhyavasturūpam+na -> jñānād anyad bāhyavasturūpaṃ na

jñānād anyad bāhyavasturūpaṃ na+asti -> jñānād anyad bāhyavasturūpaṃ nāsti

vijñānamātram+traidhātukam| -> vijñānamātraṃ traidhātukam|

vijñānavādinas+naṣṭās -> vijñānavādino naṣṭās

vijñānavādino naṣṭās+viyogatas -> vijñānavādino naṣṭā viyogatas

vijñānavādino naṣṭā viyogatas+iti| -> vijñānavādino naṣṭā viyogata iti|

atas+vijñānavicāreṇa -> ato vijñānavicāreṇa

ato vijñānavicāreṇa+ekānekasvabhāvena -> ato vijñānavicāreṇaikānekasvabhāvena

yas+tu -> yas tu

atas+hetuvyapadeśamātratas -> ato hetuvyapadeśamātratas

ato hetuvyapadeśamātratas+kāryasiddhis -> ato hetuvyapadeśamātrataḥ kāryasiddhis

ato hetuvyapadeśamātrataḥ kāryasiddhis+na -> ato hetuvyapadeśamātrataḥ kāryasiddhir na

kaṇṭhatālvādibhis+prayatnatas -> kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnatas

kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnatas+janitas -> kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janitas

kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janitas+yasmāt -> kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt

kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt+tasmāt -> kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt tasmāt

kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt tasmāt+anityas -> kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt tasmād anityas

kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt tasmād anityas+śabdas -> kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt tasmād anityaḥ śabdas

kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt tasmād anityaḥ śabdas+siddhas -> kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt tasmād anityaḥ śabdaḥ siddhas

kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt tasmād anityaḥ śabdaḥ siddhas+| -> kaṇṭhatālvādibhiḥ prayatnato janito yasmāt tasmād anityaḥ śabdaḥ siddhaḥ|

śabdas+api -> śabdo 'pi

ghaṭas+mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrapuruṣahastavyāyāmāt -> ghaṭo mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrapuruṣahastavyāyāmāt

ghaṭo mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrapuruṣahastavyāyāmāt+kṛtakas -> ghaṭo mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrapuruṣahastavyāyāmāt kṛtakas

ghaṭo mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrapuruṣahastavyāyāmāt kṛtakas+tathā -> ghaṭo mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrapuruṣahastavyāyāmāt kṛtakas tathā

kas+dṛṣṭāntas -> ko dṛṣṭāntas

ko dṛṣṭāntas+| -> ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ|

kṛtakatvāt+iti| -> kṛtakatvād iti|

kas+hetus -> ko hetus

ko hetus+| -> ko hetuḥ|

vakṣyati+anityas -> vakṣyaty anityas

vakṣyaty anityas+śabdas -> vakṣyaty anityaḥ śabdas

vakṣyaty anityaḥ śabdas+| -> vakṣyaty anityaḥ śabdaḥ|

paras+api -> paro 'pi

āha---na+iyam -> āha---neyam

āha---neyam+pratijñā| -> āha---neyaṃ pratijñā|

yasmāt+tasmāt -> yasmāt tasmāt

yasmāt tasmāt+śabdas -> yasmāt tasmāc chabdas

yasmāt tasmāc chabdas+nityas -> yasmāt tasmāc chabdo nityas

yasmāt tasmāc chabdo nityas+siddhas -> yasmāt tasmāc chabdo nityaḥ siddhas

yasmāt tasmāc chabdo nityaḥ siddhas+iti| -> yasmāt tasmāc chabdo nityaḥ siddha iti|

śabdas+api -> śabdo 'pi

yathā+ākāśam -> yathākāśam

yathākāśam+amūrtatvāt -> yathākāśam amūrtatvāt

yathākāśam amūrtatvāt+nityam -> yathākāśam amūrtatvān nityam

yathākāśam amūrtatvān nityam+tathā -> yathākāśam amūrtatvān nityaṃ tathā

kas+dṛṣṭāntas -> ko dṛṣṭāntas

ko dṛṣṭāntas+| -> ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ|

amūrtatvāt+iti| -> amūrtatvād iti|

kas+hetus -> ko hetus

ko hetus+| -> ko hetuḥ|

nityas+śabdas -> nityaḥ śabdas

nityaḥ śabdas+| -> nityaḥ śabdaḥ|

śabdavādinām+pratijñā -> śabdavādināṃ pratijñā

yathā+agnis -> yathāgnis

yathāgnis+ubhayadāhakas -> yathāgnir ubhayadāhakas

yathāgnir ubhayadāhakas+na -> yathāgnir ubhayadāhako na

yathāgnir ubhayadāhako na+asau -> yathāgnir ubhayadāhako nāsau

yathāgnir ubhayadāhako nāsau+ekasya -> yathāgnir ubhayadāhako nāsāv ekasya

yathāgnir ubhayadāhako nāsāv ekasya+iti| -> yathāgnir ubhayadāhako nāsāv ekasyeti|

pakṣam+dūṣayiṣyati -> pakṣaṃ dūṣayiṣyati

mama+api -> mamāpi

dūṣaṇalakṣaṇaprāptas+tava -> dūṣaṇalakṣaṇaprāptas tava

pakṣam+sādhayiṣyati| -> pakṣaṃ sādhayiṣyati|

mama+api -> mamāpi

sādhakalakṣaṇaprāptas+tadā -> sādhakalakṣaṇaprāptas tadā

yuṣmākam+hetus -> yuṣmākaṃ hetus

yuṣmākaṃ hetus+vṛthā| -> yuṣmākaṃ hetur vṛthā|

śakyakaraṇāt+satkāryasiddhis -> śakyakaraṇāt satkāryasiddhis

śakyakaraṇāt satkāryasiddhis+iti| -> śakyakaraṇāt satkāryasiddhir iti|

iha+upādānakāraṇāt -> ihopādānakāraṇāt

ihopādānakāraṇāt+sarvasambhavābhāvāt -> ihopādānakāraṇāt sarvasambhavābhāvāt

ihopādānakāraṇāt sarvasambhavābhāvāt+śaktasya -> ihopādānakāraṇāt sarvasambhavābhāvāc chaktasya

āha---kadācit+yuktis -> āha---kadācid yuktis

āha---kadācid yuktis+ucyate| -> āha---kadācid yuktir ucyate|

labhyate+uktam -> labhyata uktam

labhyata uktam+śāstravidbhis -> labhyata uktaṃ śāstravidbhis

labhyata uktaṃ śāstravidbhis+iti| -> labhyata uktaṃ śāstravidbhir iti|

vaktum+na -> vaktuṃ na

samayas+iti -> samaya iti

samayas+asiddhas -> samayo 'siddhas

samayo 'siddhas+| -> samayo 'siddhaḥ|

āha---āptāgamāt+asmākam -> āha---āptāgamād asmākam

āha---āptāgamād asmākam+samayas -> āha---āptāgamād asmākaṃ samayas

āha---āptāgamād asmākaṃ samayas+eṣas -> āha---āptāgamād asmākaṃ samaya eṣas

āha---āptāgamād asmākaṃ samaya eṣas+| -> āha---āptāgamād asmākaṃ samaya eṣaḥ|

sat+tat -> sat tat

sat tat+mama -> sat tan mama

sat tan mama+asat -> sat tan mamāsat

sat tan mamāsat+siddham -> sat tan mamāsat siddham

sat tan mamāsat siddham+yuktivivarjitatvāt| -> sat tan mamāsat siddhaṃ yuktivivarjitatvāt|

yat+tava -> yat tava

mama+api -> mamāpi

mamāpi+icchātas -> mamāpīcchātas

mamāpīcchātas+| -> mamāpīcchātaḥ|

yadi+icchātas -> yadīcchātas

yadīcchātas+siddham -> yadīcchātaḥ siddham

yadīcchātaḥ siddham+bhavati -> yadīcchātaḥ siddhaṃ bhavati

mama+iti -> mameti

tava+icchātas -> tavecchātas

tavecchātas+siddhis -> tavecchātaḥ siddhis

tavecchātaḥ siddhis+na -> tavecchātaḥ siddhir na

yat+kāryam -> yat kāryam

yat kāryam+tat -> yat kāryaṃ tat

yat kāryaṃ tat+kāryam -> yat kāryaṃ tat kāryam

yat kāryaṃ tat kāryam+iti -> yat kāryaṃ tat kāryam iti

yat+kāraṇam -> yat kāraṇam

yat kāraṇam+tat -> yat kāraṇaṃ tat

yat kāraṇaṃ tat+kāraṇam -> yat kāraṇaṃ tat kāraṇam

yat kāraṇaṃ tat kāraṇam+eva -> yat kāraṇaṃ tat kāraṇam eva

siddhis+kāraṇasya -> siddhiḥ kāraṇasya

āha---na+āpekṣikā -> āha---nāpekṣikā

evam+sarveṣām -> evaṃ sarveṣām

evaṃ sarveṣām+īśvarādīnām -> evaṃ sarveṣām īśvarādīnām

evaṃ sarveṣām īśvarādīnām+kāraṇānām -> evaṃ sarveṣām īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇānām

evaṃ sarveṣām īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇānām+aniyatatvam -> evaṃ sarveṣām īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇānām aniyatatvam

evaṃ sarveṣām īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇānām aniyatatvam+akāraṇatvam -> evaṃ sarveṣām īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇānām aniyatatvam akāraṇatvam

evaṃ sarveṣām īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇānām aniyatatvam akāraṇatvam+siddham| -> evaṃ sarveṣām īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇānām aniyatatvam akāraṇatvaṃ siddham|

tasmāt+aniyatatvāt -> tasmād aniyatatvāt

tasmād aniyatatvāt+akāraṇatvaprasaṅgas -> tasmād aniyatatvād akāraṇatvaprasaṅgas

tasmād aniyatatvād akāraṇatvaprasaṅgas+| -> tasmād aniyatatvād akāraṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ|

kāryāpekṣikatvāt+aniyatatvaprasaṅgas -> kāryāpekṣikatvād aniyatatvaprasaṅgas

kāryāpekṣikatvād aniyatatvaprasaṅgas+| -> kāryāpekṣikatvād aniyatatvaprasaṅgaḥ|

kāraṇābhāvas+kāraṇasya -> kāraṇābhāvaḥ kāraṇasya

kāraṇatvāt+kāryābhāvas -> kāraṇatvāt kāryābhāvas

kāraṇatvāt kāryābhāvas+tadabhāve -> kāraṇatvāt kāryābhāvas tadabhāve

kāraṇatvaprasaṅgas+| -> kāraṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ|

evam+parāpekṣikatvāt -> evaṃ parāpekṣikatvāt

evaṃ parāpekṣikatvāt+ubhayos -> evaṃ parāpekṣikatvād ubhayos

evaṃ parāpekṣikatvād ubhayos+api -> evaṃ parāpekṣikatvād ubhayor api

kāraṇam+apekṣya| -> kāraṇam apekṣya|

kāryam+ca -> kāryaṃ ca

yat+kāraṇatvam -> yat kāraṇatvam

yat kāraṇatvam+tat -> yat kāraṇatvaṃ tat

yat kāraṇatvaṃ tat+kāryam -> yat kāraṇatvaṃ tat kāryam

yat kāraṇatvaṃ tat kāryam+apekṣya -> yat kāraṇatvaṃ tat kāryam apekṣya

parāpekṣikatvāt+iti| -> parāpekṣikatvād iti|

sarvābhāvas+na -> sarvābhāvo na

pratiṣedhas+bhavati -> pratiṣedho bhavati

pratiṣedho bhavati+ubhayapratiṣedhāt -> pratiṣedho bhavaty ubhayapratiṣedhāt

pratiṣedho bhavaty ubhayapratiṣedhāt+sarvābhāvas -> pratiṣedho bhavaty ubhayapratiṣedhāt sarvābhāvas

pratiṣedho bhavaty ubhayapratiṣedhāt sarvābhāvas+iti -> pratiṣedho bhavaty ubhayapratiṣedhāt sarvābhāva iti

kāryasya+api -> kāryasyāpi

bhavati+iti -> bhavatīti

sadasat+kāryam -> sadasat kāryam

sadasat kāryam+kāraṇe -> sadasat kāryaṃ kāraṇe

sat+kāryam -> sat kāryam

sat kāryam+na -> sat kāryaṃ na

sat kāryaṃ na+asat -> sat kāryaṃ nāsat

sat kāryaṃ nāsat+kāryam -> sat kāryaṃ nāsat kāryam

sat kāryaṃ nāsat kāryam+na -> sat kāryaṃ nāsat kāryaṃ na

atas+na -> ato na

yat+asat -> yad asat

yad asat+tat -> yad asat tat

yad asat tat+sat -> yad asat tat sat

yad asat tat sat+na -> yad asat tat san na

yat+sat -> yat sat

yat sat+tat -> yat sat tat

yat sat tat+asat -> yat sat tad asat

yat sat tad asat+na -> yat sat tad asan na

ubhayātmakam+kāryam -> ubhayātmakaṃ kāryam

ubhayātmakaṃ kāryam+na -> ubhayātmakaṃ kāryaṃ na

tantuturīvemādayas+kāraṇabhūtās -> tantuturīvemādayaḥ kāraṇabhūtās

tantuturīvemādayaḥ kāraṇabhūtās+na -> tantuturīvemādayaḥ kāraṇabhūtā na

sattvāt+asat -> sattvād asat

sattvād asat+kāryam -> sattvād asat kāryam

sattvād asat kāryam+na -> sattvād asat kāryaṃ na

sattvād asat kāryaṃ na+asattvāt -> sattvād asat kāryaṃ nāsattvāt

sattvād asat kāryaṃ nāsattvāt+kūrmaromavat| -> sattvād asat kāryaṃ nāsattvāt kūrmaromavat|

mṛdādayas+kāraṇabhūtās -> mṛdādayaḥ kāraṇabhūtās

mṛdādayaḥ kāraṇabhūtās+na -> mṛdādayaḥ kāraṇabhūtā na

sat+kāryam -> sat kāryam

sat kāryam+na -> sat kāryaṃ na

tat+kim -> tat kim

tat kim+sat -> tat kiṃ sat

tat kiṃ sat+kāryam -> tat kiṃ sat kāryam

tat kiṃ sat kāryam+asat -> tat kiṃ sat kāryam asat

tat kiṃ sat kāryam asat+vā| -> tat kiṃ sat kāryam asad vā|

kāryam+yat -> kāryaṃ yat

kāryaṃ yat+bhavati -> kāryaṃ yad bhavati

yasmāt+tasmāt -> yasmāt tasmāt

yasmāt tasmāt+kāraṇam -> yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam

yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam+asti -> yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam asti

yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam asti+iti -> yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam astīti

yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam astīti+atas -> yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam astīty atas

yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam astīty atas+īśvarādikam -> yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam astīty ata īśvarādikam

yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam astīty ata īśvarādikam+siddham -> yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam astīty ata īśvarādikaṃ siddham

yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam astīty ata īśvarādikaṃ siddham+iti| -> yasmāt tasmāt kāraṇam astīty ata īśvarādikaṃ siddham iti|

kāryam+na -> kāryaṃ na

pratītyotpādas+siddhas -> pratītyotpādaḥ siddhas

pratītyotpādaḥ siddhas+| -> pratītyotpādaḥ siddhaḥ|

kenacit+na -> kenacin na

kenacin na+iti -> kenacin neti

vastūnām+śaktis -> vastūnāṃ śaktis

vastūnāṃ śaktis+eṣā| -> vastūnāṃ śaktir eṣā|

kim+tu -> kiṃ tu

kiṃcit+eṣām -> kiṃcid eṣām

kiṃcid eṣām+vastūnām -> kiṃcid eṣāṃ vastūnām

kiṃcid eṣāṃ vastūnām+vastu -> kiṃcid eṣāṃ vastūnāṃ vastu

na+icchayā -> necchayā

saṃyogāt+iti| -> saṃyogād iti|

kāntapāṣāṇāt+ayaḥśalākābhramaṇam -> kāntapāṣāṇād ayaḥśalākābhramaṇam

kāntapāṣāṇād ayaḥśalākābhramaṇam+bhavati -> kāntapāṣāṇād ayaḥśalākābhramaṇaṃ bhavati

kāntāt+iti -> kāntād iti

śuddhabīje+aṅkuras -> śuddhabīje 'ṅkuras

śuddhabīje 'ṅkuras+syāt -> śuddhabīje 'ṅkuraḥ syāt

śuddhabīje 'ṅkuraḥ syāt+pṛthvītoyādisaṃyogāt -> śuddhabīje 'ṅkuraḥ syāt pṛthvītoyādisaṃyogāt

śuddhabīje 'ṅkuraḥ syāt pṛthvītoyādisaṃyogāt+iti| -> śuddhabīje 'ṅkuraḥ syāt pṛthvītoyādisaṃyogād iti|

svaravasaṃyogāt+pratiravas -> svaravasaṃyogāt pratiravas

svaravasaṃyogāt pratiravas+bhavati| -> svaravasaṃyogāt pratiravo bhavati|

jihvāsrāvas+bhavati -> jihvāsrāvo bhavati

jihvāsrāvo bhavati+amlahetos -> jihvāsrāvo bhavaty amlahetos

jihvāsrāvo bhavaty amlahetos+sakāśāt -> jihvāsrāvo bhavaty amlahetoḥ sakāśāt

jihvāsrāvo bhavaty amlahetoḥ sakāśāt+iti| -> jihvāsrāvo bhavaty amlahetoḥ sakāśād iti|

anyasya+amlabhakṣaṇasaṃyogāt -> anyasyāmlabhakṣaṇasaṃyogāt

anyasyāmlabhakṣaṇasaṃyogāt+anyasya -> anyasyāmlabhakṣaṇasaṃyogād anyasya

vastusaṃyogāt+vastupratibimbas -> vastusaṃyogād vastupratibimbas

vastusaṃyogād vastupratibimbas+bhavati| -> vastusaṃyogād vastupratibimbo bhavati|

salilam+cakārāt -> salilaṃ cakārāt

salilaṃ cakārāt+sūryakāntes -> salilaṃ cakārāt sūryakāntes

salilaṃ cakārāt sūryakāntes+agnis -> salilaṃ cakārāt sūryakānter agnis

salilaṃ cakārāt sūryakānter agnis+bhavati| -> salilaṃ cakārāt sūryakānter agnir bhavati|

candrakiraṇasaṃyogāt+candrakāntes -> candrakiraṇasaṃyogāc candrakāntes

candrakiraṇasaṃyogāc candrakāntes+bhavati -> candrakiraṇasaṃyogāc candrakānter bhavati

saṃyogāt+iti -> saṃyogād iti

sarvavastūnām+saṃyogāt -> sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogāt

sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogāt+utpādas -> sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogād utpādas

sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogād utpādas+idam -> sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogād utpāda idam

sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogād utpāda idam+prāpya -> sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogād utpāda idaṃ prāpya

sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogād utpāda idaṃ prāpya+idam -> sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogād utpāda idaṃ prāpyedam

sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogād utpāda idaṃ prāpyedam+utpadyate| -> sarvavastūnāṃ saṃyogād utpāda idaṃ prāpyedam utpadyate|

kenacit+na|| -> kenacin na||

vastūnām+śaktis -> vastūnāṃ śaktis

vastūnāṃ śaktis+eṣā -> vastūnāṃ śaktir eṣā

kiṃcit+eṣām -> kiṃcid eṣām

bhavet+na -> bhaven na

bhaven na+icchayā -> bhaven necchayā

kāntāt+ca -> kāntāc ca

kāntāc ca+ayaḥśalākābhramaṇam -> kāntāc cāyaḥśalākābhramaṇam

kāntāc cāyaḥśalākābhramaṇam+api -> kāntāc cāyaḥśalākābhramaṇam api

jihvāsrāvas+amlahetos -> jihvāsrāvo 'mlahetos

jihvāsrāvo 'mlahetos+svaravatas -> jihvāsrāvo 'mlahetoḥ svaravatas

jihvāsrāvo 'mlahetoḥ svaravatas+itaras -> jihvāsrāvo 'mlahetoḥ svaravata itaras

jihvāsrāvo 'mlahetoḥ svaravata itaras+śuddhabījāṅkuras -> jihvāsrāvo 'mlahetoḥ svaravata itaraḥ śuddhabījāṅkuras

jihvāsrāvo 'mlahetoḥ svaravata itaraḥ śuddhabījāṅkuras+syāt| -> jihvāsrāvo 'mlahetoḥ svaravata itaraḥ śuddhabījāṅkuraḥ syāt|

salilam+darpaṇe -> salilaṃ darpaṇe

saṃyogāt+indukāntes -> saṃyogād indukāntes

saṃyogād indukāntes+bhavati -> saṃyogād indukānter bhavati

saṃyogāt+ityādi| -> saṃyogād ityādi|

idānīm+pratītyotpādas -> idānīṃ pratītyotpādas

idānīṃ pratītyotpādas+ucyate -> idānīṃ pratītyotpāda ucyate

nyāyas+iti -> nyāya iti

nyāya iti+icchāpratiṣedhas -> nyāya itīcchāpratiṣedhas

nyāya itīcchāpratiṣedhas+kartus -> nyāya itīcchāpratiṣedhaḥ kartus

nyāya itīcchāpratiṣedhaḥ kartus+| -> nyāya itīcchāpratiṣedhaḥ kartuḥ|

kartus+karmarūpam -> kartuḥ karmarūpam

kartuḥ karmarūpam+iti -> kartuḥ karmarūpam iti

na+icchayā -> necchayā

sarvam+viśvam -> sarvaṃ viśvam

sarvaṃ viśvam+carācaram -> sarvaṃ viśvaṃ carācaram

sarvaṃ viśvaṃ carācaram+bhavati -> sarvaṃ viśvaṃ carācaraṃ bhavati

parokṣam+pramāṇam -> parokṣaṃ pramāṇam

parokṣaṃ pramāṇam+yasmāt -> parokṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasmāt

parokṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasmāt+tasmāt -> parokṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasmāt tasmāt

parokṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasmāt tasmāt+dravyasaṃyogāt -> parokṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasmāt tasmād dravyasaṃyogāt

parokṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasmāt tasmād dravyasaṃyogāt+eva -> parokṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasmāt tasmād dravyasaṃyogād eva

pratyakṣam+na -> pratyakṣaṃ na

kartus+sādhakam -> kartuḥ sādhakam

kartuḥ sādhakam+na -> kartuḥ sādhakaṃ na

viṣayavirahitas+niṣkalas -> viṣayavirahito niṣkalas

viṣayavirahito niṣkalas+sarvakartā -> viṣayavirahito niṣkalaḥ sarvakartā

viśvam+karoti| -> viśvaṃ karoti|

kartus+ādau -> kartur ādau

pṛthivyādiparamāṇavas+na -> pṛthivyādiparamāṇavo na

khe+ākāśe -> kha ākāśe

na+icchayā -> necchayā

sarvam+bhavati -> sarvaṃ bhavati

saṃyogāt+eva -> saṃyogād eva

kartus+pramāṇam -> kartuḥ pramāṇam

pratyakṣam+parokṣam -> pratyakṣaṃ parokṣam

pratyakṣaṃ parokṣam+viṣayavirahitasya -> pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ viṣayavirahitasya

pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ viṣayavirahitasya+asya -> pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ viṣayavirahitasyāsya

viśvam+viṣayavirahitas -> viśvaṃ viṣayavirahitas

viśvaṃ viṣayavirahitas+sarvakartā -> viśvaṃ viṣayavirahitaḥ sarvakartā

kartus+ādau -> kartur ādau

pṛthvītoyāgnivātārṇavas+iha -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātārṇava iha

pṛthvī+ityādi| -> pṛthvītyādi|

kartus+parāpekṣikatvam -> kartuḥ parāpekṣikatvam

kartuḥ parāpekṣikatvam+ucyate -> kartuḥ parāpekṣikatvam ucyate

idānīm+svatantrasya -> idānīṃ svatantrasya

svakarmaphalopabhogas+siddhas -> svakarmaphalopabhogaḥ siddhas

svakarmaphalopabhogaḥ siddhas+kartāram -> svakarmaphalopabhogaḥ siddhaḥ kartāram

svakarmaphalopabhogaḥ siddhaḥ kartāram+vinā| -> svakarmaphalopabhogaḥ siddhaḥ kartāraṃ vinā|

muktvā+iti -> muktveti

kaścit+īśas -> kaścid īśas

kaścid īśas+aśubhaśubhaphaladas -> kaścid īśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladas

kaścid īśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladas+prāṇinām -> kaścid īśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladaḥ prāṇinām

kaścid īśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladaḥ prāṇinām+karma -> kaścid īśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladaḥ prāṇināṃ karma

ca+evam -> caivam

caivam+tasmāt -> caivaṃ tasmāt

caivaṃ tasmāt+kartā -> caivaṃ tasmāt kartā

evam+karmaphalābhāvas -> evaṃ karmaphalābhāvas

evaṃ karmaphalābhāvas+kartṛvādinām -> evaṃ karmaphalābhāvaḥ kartṛvādinām

evaṃ karmaphalābhāvaḥ kartṛvādinām+siddhas -> evaṃ karmaphalābhāvaḥ kartṛvādināṃ siddhas

evaṃ karmaphalābhāvaḥ kartṛvādināṃ siddhas+| -> evaṃ karmaphalābhāvaḥ kartṛvādināṃ siddhaḥ|

svatantratā+īśvareṇa -> svatantrateśvareṇa

nigraham+na -> nigrahaṃ na

prayojakas+katham -> prayojakaḥ katham

prayojakaḥ katham+viruddhakarmaṇi -> prayojakaḥ kathaṃ viruddhakarmaṇi

kartus+parādhīnatā| -> kartuḥ parādhīnatā|

preritas+san -> preritaḥ san

preritaḥ san+karma -> preritaḥ san karma

samantāt+iti -> samantād iti

svatantras+prayojakas -> svatantraḥ prayojakas

svatantraḥ prayojakas+iti| -> svatantraḥ prayojaka iti|

āha---na+api -> āha---nāpi

āha---nāpi+īśas -> āha---nāpīśas

āha---nāpīśas+karmakartā -> āha---nāpīśaḥ karmakartā

nyāyas+| -> nyāyaḥ|

kartā+iti -> karteti

evam+yas -> evaṃ yas

evaṃ yas+karma -> evaṃ yaḥ karma

kumbhakāras+| -> kumbhakāraḥ|

kumbham+karoti -> kumbhaṃ karoti

kumbhaṃ karoti+iti -> kumbhaṃ karotīti

karmaṇas+phalabhoktā -> karmaṇaḥ phalabhoktā

tat+karma -> tat karma

yat+kriyate -> yat kriyate

yas+karoti -> yaḥ karoti

ca+evam| -> caivam|

anyas+vaṭakam -> anyo vaṭakam

anyo vaṭakam+aśnāti -> anyo vaṭakam aśnāti

anyo vaṭakam aśnāti+anyas -> anyo vaṭakam aśnāty anyas

anyo vaṭakam aśnāty anyas+pipāsayā -> anyo vaṭakam aśnāty anyaḥ pipāsayā

ca+anyas -> cānyas

cānyas+iti| -> cānya iti|

iha+asti -> ihāsti

ihāsti+īśvaras -> ihāstīśvaras

ihāstīśvaras+sarvakartā -> ihāstīśvaraḥ sarvakartā

ca+īśas -> ceśas

ceśas+aśubhaśubhaphaladas -> ceśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladas

ceśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladas+prāṇinām -> ceśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladaḥ prāṇinām

ceśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladaḥ prāṇinām+karma -> ceśo 'śubhaśubhaphaladaḥ prāṇināṃ karma

tasmāt+kartā -> tasmāt kartā

kartus+eṣā -> kartur eṣā

param+aparādhīnatā -> param aparādhīnatā

kartā+anyas -> kartānyas

kartānyas+preritas -> kartānyaḥ preritas

kartānyaḥ preritas+san -> kartānyaḥ preritaḥ san

kartānyaḥ preritaḥ san+yadi -> kartānyaḥ preritaḥ san yadi

bhavet+sarvakartā -> bhavet sarvakartā

na+api -> nāpi

nāpi+īśas -> nāpīśas

nāpīśas+karmakartā -> nāpīśaḥ karmakartā

ca+anyas -> cānyas

jagatas+karmabhoktā -> jagataḥ karmabhoktā

asti+īśas -> astīśas

astīśas+sarvakartā -> astīśaḥ sarvakartā

dūṣaṇam+ucyate -> dūṣaṇam ucyate

dūṣaṇam ucyate+asti -> dūṣaṇam ucyate 'sti

dūṣaṇam ucyate 'sti+ityādi| -> dūṣaṇam ucyate 'stītyādi|

idānīm+īśvaramatasya -> idānīm īśvaramatasya

sārdham+dūṣaṇīyam -> sārdhaṃ dūṣaṇīyam

sārdhaṃ dūṣaṇīyam+iti|| -> sārdhaṃ dūṣaṇīyam iti||

brahmamatam+vaiṣṇavamatam -> brahmamataṃ vaiṣṇavamatam

brahmamataṃ vaiṣṇavamatam+īśvareṇa -> brahmamataṃ vaiṣṇavamatam īśvareṇa

sarvapralāpam+nirarthakam -> sarvapralāpaṃ nirarthakam

sarvapralāpaṃ nirarthakam+vicāryamāṇam -> sarvapralāpaṃ nirarthakaṃ vicāryamāṇam

sarvapralāpaṃ nirarthakaṃ vicāryamāṇam+iti -> sarvapralāpaṃ nirarthakaṃ vicāryamāṇam iti

na+aśvamedhāt -> nāśvamedhāt

nāśvamedhāt+paratas -> nāśvamedhāt paratas

nāśvamedhāt paratas+dharmas -> nāśvamedhāt parato dharmas

nāśvamedhāt parato dharmas+asti -> nāśvamedhāt parato dharmo 'sti

nāśvamedhāt parato dharmo 'sti+iti -> nāśvamedhāt parato dharmo 'stīti

mukhādiyonis+janasya -> mukhādiyonir janasya

vedas+svayambhūs -> vedaḥ svayambhūs

vedaḥ svayambhūs+na -> vedaḥ svayambhūr na

tasmāt+na -> tasmān na

śukavākyam+prasiddham| -> śukavākyaṃ prasiddham|

svargas+narakas -> svargo narakas

svargo narakas+kena -> svargo narakaḥ kena

yadi+evam -> yady evam

yady evam+gamyate -> yady evaṃ gamyate

paśum+hatvā -> paśuṃ hatvā

yūpam+chittvā -> yūpaṃ chittvā

dūṣitam+tadyathā--- -> dūṣitaṃ tadyathā---

evam+aśvamedhādiyāgaphalam -> evam aśvamedhādiyāgaphalam

evam aśvamedhādiyāgaphalam+śukena -> evam aśvamedhādiyāgaphalaṃ śukena

yasmāt+tasmāt -> yasmāt tasmāt

yasmāt tasmāt+jātis -> yasmāt tasmāj jātis

yasmāt tasmāj jātis+aniyatā -> yasmāt tasmāj jātir aniyatā

yasmāt tasmāj jātir aniyatā+iti -> yasmāt tasmāj jātir aniyateti

dhātvindriyasukhaduḥkhavidyāgamādibhis+bhedas -> dhātvindriyasukhaduḥkhavidyāgamādibhir bhedas

dhātvindriyasukhaduḥkhavidyāgamādibhir bhedas+na -> dhātvindriyasukhaduḥkhavidyāgamādibhir bhedo na

bhedas+na -> bhedo na

aparas+api -> aparo 'pi

prajānām+api| -> prajānām api|

yathā+udumbaraphalānām -> yathodumbaraphalānām

yathodumbaraphalānām+mūlamadhyāgrajātānām -> yathodumbaraphalānāṃ mūlamadhyāgrajātānām

yathodumbaraphalānāṃ mūlamadhyāgrajātānām+bhedas -> yathodumbaraphalānāṃ mūlamadhyāgrajātānāṃ bhedas

yathodumbaraphalānāṃ mūlamadhyāgrajātānāṃ bhedas+na -> yathodumbaraphalānāṃ mūlamadhyāgrajātānāṃ bhedo na

yathodumbaraphalānāṃ mūlamadhyāgrajātānāṃ bhedo na+asti -> yathodumbaraphalānāṃ mūlamadhyāgrajātānāṃ bhedo nāsti

sas+eva -> sa eva

bhedas+tadā -> bhedas tadā

brahmaṇas+mukhādibhedena -> brahmaṇo mukhādibhedena

pṛthak+pṛthak -> pṛthak pṛthak

pṛthak pṛthak+jātis -> pṛthak pṛthag jātis

pṛthak pṛthag jātis+evam -> pṛthak pṛthag jātir evam

pṛthak pṛthag jātir evam+varṇānām -> pṛthak pṛthag jātir evaṃ varṇānām

pṛthak pṛthag jātir evaṃ varṇānām+api| -> pṛthak pṛthag jātir evaṃ varṇānām api|

pitus+catvāras -> pituś catvāras

pituś catvāras+putrās -> pituś catvāraḥ putrās

pituś catvāraḥ putrās+teṣām -> pituś catvāraḥ putrās teṣām

pituś catvāraḥ putrās teṣām+na -> pituś catvāraḥ putrās teṣāṃ na

yathā+ekasya -> yathaikasya

katham+caturvarṇās -> kathaṃ caturvarṇās

kathaṃ caturvarṇās+bhavanti| -> kathaṃ caturvarṇā bhavanti|

prajānām+tadā -> prajānāṃ tadā

yadi+ekas -> yady ekas

yady ekas+sraṣṭā -> yady ekaḥ sraṣṭā

aparam+api -> aparam api

nyāyas+| -> nyāyaḥ|

jātikṣayas+jātikṣayāt -> jātikṣayo jātikṣayāt

jātikṣayo jātikṣayāt+narakam -> jātikṣayo jātikṣayān narakam

jātikṣayo jātikṣayān narakam+iti -> jātikṣayo jātikṣayān narakam iti

mlecchadharmapravṛttis+bhavati| -> mlecchadharmapravṛttir bhavati|

sārdham+bhavati -> sārdhaṃ bhavati

vivāhas+bhaginyā -> vivāho bhaginyā

evam+kṣatriyādīnām -> evaṃ kṣatriyādīnām

evaṃ kṣatriyādīnām+api -> evaṃ kṣatriyādīnām api

bhaginyas+bhavanti -> bhaginyo bhavanti

bhaginyo bhavanti+ekayonisamutpannatvāt -> bhaginyo bhavanty ekayonisamutpannatvāt

bhaginyo bhavanty ekayonisamutpannatvāt+iti| -> bhaginyo bhavanty ekayonisamutpannatvād iti|

syus+tadā -> syus tadā

tatas+jātās -> tato jātās

tato jātās+| -> tato jātāḥ|

kim+brāhmaṇyas -> kiṃ brāhmaṇyas

kiṃ brāhmaṇyas+api -> kiṃ brāhmaṇyo 'pi

atas+pṛcchāmi -> ataḥ pṛcchāmi

brahmamukhāt+brāhmaṇās -> brahmamukhād brāhmaṇās

brahmamukhād brāhmaṇās+jātās -> brahmamukhād brāhmaṇā jātās

brahmamukhād brāhmaṇā jātās+kila -> brahmamukhād brāhmaṇā jātāḥ kila

kim+ca -> kiṃ ca

kiṃ ca+anyat -> kiṃ cānyat

kiṃ cānyat+ia -> kiṃ cānyad ia

brāhmaṇais+tāvat -> brāhmaṇais tāvat

brāhmaṇais tāvat+iti| -> brāhmaṇais tāvad iti|

yonis+na -> yonir na

eṣām+caturṇām -> eṣāṃ caturṇām

eṣāṃ caturṇām+antimas -> eṣāṃ caturṇām antimas

eṣāṃ caturṇām antimas+varṇas -> eṣāṃ caturṇām antimo varṇas

eṣāṃ caturṇām antimo varṇas+pañcamas -> eṣāṃ caturṇām antimo varṇaḥ pañcamas

eṣāṃ caturṇām antimo varṇaḥ pañcamas+caṇḍālānām -> eṣāṃ caturṇām antimo varṇaḥ pañcamaś caṇḍālānām

eṣāṃ caturṇām antimo varṇaḥ pañcamaś caṇḍālānām+teṣām -> eṣāṃ caturṇām antimo varṇaḥ pañcamaś caṇḍālānāṃ teṣām

eṣāṃ caturṇām antimo varṇaḥ pañcamaś caṇḍālānāṃ teṣām+kā -> eṣāṃ caturṇām antimo varṇaḥ pañcamaś caṇḍālānāṃ teṣāṃ kā

evam+catvāras -> evaṃ catvāras

evaṃ catvāras+varṇās -> evaṃ catvāro varṇās

evaṃ catvāro varṇās+| -> evaṃ catvāro varṇāḥ|

ādiśabdāt+ūrudvayam -> ādiśabdād ūrudvayam

ādiśabdād ūrudvayam+vaiśyānām -> ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānām

ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānām+yonis -> ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānāṃ yonis

ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānāṃ yonis+pādadvayam -> ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānāṃ yoniḥ pādadvayam

ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānāṃ yoniḥ pādadvayam+śūdrāṇām -> ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānāṃ yoniḥ pādadvayaṃ śūdrāṇām

ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānāṃ yoniḥ pādadvayaṃ śūdrāṇām+yonis -> ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānāṃ yoniḥ pādadvayaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ yonis

ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānāṃ yoniḥ pādadvayaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ yonis+| -> ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyānāṃ yoniḥ pādadvayaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ yoniḥ|

kṣatriyāṇām+yonis -> kṣatriyāṇāṃ yonis

kṣatriyāṇāṃ yonis+| -> kṣatriyāṇāṃ yoniḥ|

evam+bhujau -> evaṃ bhujau

brahmamukham+brāhmaṇānām -> brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇānām

brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇānām+yonis -> brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yonis

brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yonis+tadutpannatvāt -> brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yonis tadutpannatvāt

brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yonis tadutpannatvāt+iti| -> brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yonis tadutpannatvād iti|

idānīm+pūrvoktam -> idānīṃ pūrvoktam

idānīṃ pūrvoktam+brāhmaṇādīnām -> idānīṃ pūrvoktaṃ brāhmaṇādīnām

idānīṃ pūrvoktaṃ brāhmaṇādīnām+yonidūṣaṇam -> idānīṃ pūrvoktaṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ yonidūṣaṇam

idānīṃ pūrvoktaṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ yonidūṣaṇam+ucyate| -> idānīṃ pūrvoktaṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ yonidūṣaṇam ucyate|

mañjuśriyas+niyamas -> mañjuśriyo niyamas

mañjuśriyo niyamas+| -> mañjuśriyo niyamaḥ|

jñeyas+iti -> jñeya iti

vedas+kṛtakas -> vedaḥ kṛtakas

vedaḥ kṛtakas+siddhas -> vedaḥ kṛtakaḥ siddhas

vedaḥ kṛtakaḥ siddhas+saṃkṣepatas -> vedaḥ kṛtakaḥ siddhaḥ saṃkṣepatas

vedaḥ kṛtakaḥ siddhaḥ saṃkṣepatas+| -> vedaḥ kṛtakaḥ siddhaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ|

nṛṇām+jñāninām -> nṛṇāṃ jñāninām

nṛṇāṃ jñāninām+paṇḍitānām -> nṛṇāṃ jñānināṃ paṇḍitānām

nṛṇāṃ jñānināṃ paṇḍitānām+iti -> nṛṇāṃ jñānināṃ paṇḍitānām iti

tasmāt+vedas -> tasmād vedas

tasmād vedas+pramāṇam -> tasmād vedaḥ pramāṇam

tasmād vedaḥ pramāṇam+na -> tasmād vedaḥ pramāṇaṃ na

nāsavargas+vedas -> nāsavargo vedas

nāsavargo vedas+eṣa -> nāsavargo veda eṣa

yasmāt+śūdrādijātis -> yasmāc chūdrādijātis

yasmāc chūdrādijātis+paṭhati -> yasmāc chūdrādijātiḥ paṭhati

dvijamukhapaṭhitas+sarvagas -> dvijamukhapaṭhitaḥ sarvagas

dvijamukhapaṭhitaḥ sarvagas+anye -> dvijamukhapaṭhitaḥ sarvago 'nye

prādeśikas+ca -> prādeśikaś ca

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

mukhoccāritas+sthānabhedāt -> mukhoccāritaḥ sthānabhedāt

mukhoccāritaḥ sthānabhedāt+iti -> mukhoccāritaḥ sthānabhedād iti

atas+vedas -> ato vedas

ato vedas+na -> ato vedo na

ato vedo na+ākāśatulyas -> ato vedo nākāśatulyas

ato vedo nākāśatulyas+kṛtakas -> ato vedo nākāśatulyaḥ kṛtakas

ato vedo nākāśatulyaḥ kṛtakas+iha -> ato vedo nākāśatulyaḥ kṛtaka iha

nṛṇām+jñāninām -> nṛṇāṃ jñāninām

nṛṇāṃ jñāninām+paṇḍitānām|| -> nṛṇāṃ jñānināṃ paṇḍitānām||

tasmāt+vedas -> tasmād vedas

tasmād vedas+pramāṇam -> tasmād vedaḥ pramāṇam

tasmād vedaḥ pramāṇam+na -> tasmād vedaḥ pramāṇaṃ na

na+asarvagas -> nāsarvagas

nāsarvagas+vedas -> nāsarvago vedas

nāsarvago vedas+eṣas -> nāsarvago veda eṣas

yasmāt+śūdrādijātis -> yasmāc chūdrādijātis

yasmāc chūdrādijātis+paṭhati -> yasmāc chūdrādijātiḥ paṭhati

dvijamukhapaṭhitas+sarvagas -> dvijamukhapaṭhitaḥ sarvagas

dvijamukhapaṭhitaḥ sarvagas+anye -> dvijamukhapaṭhitaḥ sarvago 'nye

prādeśikas+ca -> prādeśikaś ca

mukhoccāritas+sthānabhedāt -> mukhoccāritaḥ sthānabhedāt

vedas+na -> vedo na

vedo na+ākāśatulyas -> vedo nākāśatulyas

vedo nākāśatulyas+kṛtakas -> vedo nākāśatulyaḥ kṛtakas

vedo nākāśatulyaḥ kṛtakas+iha -> vedo nākāśatulyaḥ kṛtaka iha

āsīt+pāṭhāt -> āsīt pāṭhāt

āsīt pāṭhāt+mukhapāṭhāt -> āsīt pāṭhān mukhapāṭhāt

āsīt pāṭhān mukhapāṭhāt+kṛtakas -> āsīt pāṭhān mukhapāṭhāt kṛtakas

āsīt pāṭhān mukhapāṭhāt kṛtakas+siddhas -> āsīt pāṭhān mukhapāṭhāt kṛtakaḥ siddhas

āsīt pāṭhān mukhapāṭhāt kṛtakaḥ siddhas+(?)|| -> āsīt pāṭhān mukhapāṭhāt kṛtakaḥ siddhaḥ(?)||

deśakas+siddhas -> deśakaḥ siddhas

deśakaḥ siddhas+| -> deśakaḥ siddhaḥ|

tasmāt+deśakas -> tasmād deśakas

tasmād deśakas+brahmā -> tasmād deśako brahmā

tasmād deśako brahmā+asti -> tasmād deśako brahmāsti

tasmād deśako brahmāsti+aviditaviṣaye -> tasmād deśako brahmāsty aviditaviṣaye

tasmād deśako brahmāsty aviditaviṣaye+anāgatārthe -> tasmād deśako brahmāsty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe

tasmād deśako brahmāsty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe+api -> tasmād deśako brahmāsty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe 'pi

tasmād deśako brahmāsty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe 'pi+atītas -> tasmād deśako brahmāsty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe 'py atītas

tasmād deśako brahmāsty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe 'py atītas+iti -> tasmād deśako brahmāsty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe 'py atīta iti

atas+arthas -> ato 'rthas

ato 'rthas+anyas -> ato 'rtho 'nyas

ato 'rtho 'nyas+vedas -> ato 'rtho 'nyo vedas

ato 'rtho 'nyo vedas+anyas -> ato 'rtho 'nyo vedo 'nyas

ato 'rtho 'nyo vedo 'nyas+iti -> ato 'rtho 'nyo vedo 'nya iti

ca+artham -> cārtham

cārtham+indras -> cārtham indras

cārtham indras+paśus -> cārtham indraḥ paśus

cārtham indraḥ paśus+āsīt -> cārtham indraḥ paśur āsīt

cārtham indraḥ paśur āsīt+ityādipāṭhena -> cārtham indraḥ paśur āsīd ityādipāṭhena

cārtham indraḥ paśur āsīd ityādipāṭhena+iti| -> cārtham indraḥ paśur āsīd ityādipāṭheneti|

vaktrais+caturbhis -> vaktraiś caturbhis

vaktraiś caturbhis+prakaṭayati -> vaktraiś caturbhiḥ prakaṭayati

mlecchais+vedadharme -> mlecchair vedadharme

mlecchair vedadharme+ucchādite -> mlecchair vedadharma ucchādite

vedābhāvas+bhavati -> vedābhāvo bhavati

kim+ca -> kiṃ ca

kiṃ ca+anyat---iha -> kiṃ cānyat---iha

saha+ekatvam -> sahaikatvam

sahaikatvam+iti -> sahaikatvam iti

nityatvam+na -> nityatvaṃ na

nityatvaṃ na+arthena -> nityatvaṃ nārthena

tasmāt+na -> tasmān na

śabdārthayos+ekatvam -> śabdārthayor ekatvam

śabdārthayor ekatvam+tadā -> śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadā

śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadā+agniśabdas -> śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadāgniśabdas

śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadāgniśabdas+uktas -> śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadāgniśabda uktas

śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadāgniśabda uktas+svamukham -> śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadāgniśabda uktaḥ svamukham

śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadāgniśabda uktaḥ svamukham+kim -> śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadāgniśabda uktaḥ svamukhaṃ kim

śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadāgniśabda uktaḥ svamukhaṃ kim+na -> śabdārthayor ekatvaṃ tadāgniśabda uktaḥ svamukhaṃ kiṃ na

vyāpakas+arthasya -> vyāpako 'rthasya

vyāpako 'rthasya+abhinnas -> vyāpako 'rthasyābhinnas

vyāpako 'rthasyābhinnas+| -> vyāpako 'rthasyābhinnaḥ|

vṛthā---nityas+śabdas -> vṛthā---nityaḥ śabdas

vṛthā---nityaḥ śabdas+aparas -> vṛthā---nityaḥ śabdo 'paras

vṛthā---nityaḥ śabdo 'paras+asti -> vṛthā---nityaḥ śabdo 'paro 'sti

ca+evam -> caivam

caivam+tasmāt -> caivaṃ tasmāt

caivaṃ tasmāt+iyam -> caivaṃ tasmād iyam

caivaṃ tasmād iyam+pratijñā -> caivaṃ tasmād iyaṃ pratijñā

ghaṭas+iti -> ghaṭa iti

ghaṭa iti+ukte -> ghaṭa ity ukte

sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūtatvena+avasthitas -> sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūtatvenāvasthitas

sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūtatvenāvasthitas+nityas -> sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūtatvenāvasthito nityas

sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūtatvenāvasthito nityas+vedas -> sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūtatvenāvasthito nityo vedas

sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūtatvenāvasthito nityo vedas+tadā -> sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūtatvenāvasthito nityo vedas tadā

atas+āha---iha -> ata āha---iha

sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūtas+nityas -> sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūto nityas

sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūto nityas+tasya -> sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūto nityas tasya

sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūto nityas tasya+ayam -> sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūto nityas tasyāyam

sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūto nityas tasyāyam+abhivyañjakas -> sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūto nityas tasyāyam abhivyañjakas

sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūto nityas tasyāyam abhivyañjakas+iti -> sarvaśabdārthaikalolībhūto nityas tasyāyam abhivyañjaka iti

na+ayam -> nāyam

nāyam+vedaśabdas -> nāyaṃ vedaśabdas

nāyaṃ vedaśabdas+anyas -> nāyaṃ vedaśabdo 'nyas

nāyaṃ vedaśabdo 'nyas+vedas -> nāyaṃ vedaśabdo 'nyo vedas

nāyaṃ vedaśabdo 'nyo vedas+karṇavivarāntare -> nāyaṃ vedaśabdo 'nyo vedaḥ karṇavivarāntare

svayambhūs+iti -> svayambhūr iti

janitas+yasmāt -> janito yasmāt

janito yasmāt+tasmāt -> janito yasmāt tasmāt

janito yasmāt tasmāt+na -> janito yasmāt tasmān na

yas+śabdas -> yaḥ śabdas

yaḥ śabdas+arthavācī -> yaḥ śabdo 'rthavācī

āha---vedaśabdasya+arthavācakatvāt| -> āha---vedaśabdasyārthavācakatvāt|

kutas+| -> kutaḥ|

vicāryamāṇas+vedas -> vicāryamāṇo vedas

vicāryamāṇo vedas+svayambhūs -> vicāryamāṇo vedaḥ svayambhūs

vicāryamāṇo vedaḥ svayambhūs+na -> vicāryamāṇo vedaḥ svayambhūr na

deśakas+api -> deśako 'pi

deśako 'pi+asti -> deśako 'py asti

deśako 'py asti+aviditaviṣaye -> deśako 'py asty aviditaviṣaye

deśako 'py asty aviditaviṣaye+anāgatārthe -> deśako 'py asty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe

deśako 'py asty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe+api -> deśako 'py asty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe 'pi

deśako 'py asty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe 'pi+atīte|| -> deśako 'py asty aviditaviṣaye 'nāgatārthe 'py atīte||

tasmāt+vai -> tasmād vai

śabdas+agnis -> śabdo 'gnis

śabdo 'gnis+uktas -> śabdo 'gnir uktas

mukham+kim -> mukhaṃ kim

mukhaṃ kim+na -> mukhaṃ kiṃ na

śabdasya+arthas -> śabdasyārthas

śabdasyārthas+api -> śabdasyārtho 'pi

śabdasyārtho 'pi+abhinnas -> śabdasyārtho 'py abhinnas

śabdasyārtho 'py abhinnas+tu -> śabdasyārtho 'py abhinnas tu

śabdasyārtho 'py abhinnas tu+atha -> śabdasyārtho 'py abhinnas tv atha

ca+artham| -> cārtham|

vaktrais+caturbhis -> vaktraiś caturbhis

vaktraiś caturbhis+prakaṭayati -> vaktraiś caturbhiḥ prakaṭayati

vedaśabdas+arthavācī -> vedaśabdo 'rthavācī

svayambhūs+tribhuvananilaye -> svayambhūs tribhuvananilaye

vedas+asau -> vedo 'sau

dūṣaṇam+ucyate---vedas -> dūṣaṇam ucyate---vedas

dūṣaṇam ucyate---vedas+ityādi| -> dūṣaṇam ucyate---veda ityādi|

idānīm+tīrthikānām -> idānīṃ tīrthikānām

idānīṃ tīrthikānām+matasya -> idānīṃ tīrthikānāṃ matasya

kṣapaṇakamataniyamas+| -> kṣapaṇakamataniyamaḥ|

jinānām+iti -> jinānām iti

nigaditam+pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣam -> nigaditaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣam

nigaditaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣam+chatrākāram -> nigaditaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣaṃ chatrākāram

nigaditaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣaṃ chatrākāram+sā -> nigaditaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśadyojanalakṣaṃ chatrākāraṃ sā

mokṣapramāṇam+hi -> mokṣapramāṇaṃ hi

mokṣapramāṇaṃ hi+upari -> mokṣapramāṇaṃ hy upari

yasmin+siddhānte -> yasmin siddhānte

mokṣas+| -> mokṣaḥ|

jīvas+kāyapramāṇas -> jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇas

jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇas+aparimitabhavais -> jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo 'parimitabhavais

jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo 'parimitabhavais+nityajīve -> jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo 'parimitabhavair nityajīve

iti+etat -> ity etat

ity etat+mokṣamārgam -> ity etan mokṣamārgam

ity etan mokṣamārgam+arhadbhis -> ity etan mokṣamārgam arhadbhis

ity etan mokṣamārgam arhadbhis+proktam| -> ity etan mokṣamārgam arhadbhiḥ proktam|

kāyaguptis+vāgguptis -> kāyaguptir vāgguptis

kāyaguptir vāgguptis+cittaguptis -> kāyaguptir vāgguptiś cittaguptis

kāyaguptir vāgguptiś cittaguptis+ca -> kāyaguptir vāgguptiś cittaguptiś ca

kāyaguptir vāgguptiś cittaguptiś ca+iti| -> kāyaguptir vāgguptiś cittaguptiś ceti|

samitibhedās+pañca -> samitibhedāḥ pañca

cāritrabhedās+trayodaśa---vratabhedās -> cāritrabhedās trayodaśa---vratabhedās

cāritrabhedās trayodaśa---vratabhedās+pañca -> cāritrabhedās trayodaśa---vratabhedāḥ pañca

jñānabhedās+pañca---matis -> jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matis

jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matis+śrutis -> jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matiḥ śrutis

jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matiḥ śrutis+avadhis -> jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matiḥ śrutir avadhis

jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matiḥ śrutir avadhis+manaḥparyeṣaṇam -> jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matiḥ śrutir avadhir manaḥparyeṣaṇam

jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matiḥ śrutir avadhir manaḥparyeṣaṇam+kaivalyajñānam -> jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matiḥ śrutir avadhir manaḥparyeṣaṇaṃ kaivalyajñānam

jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matiḥ śrutir avadhir manaḥparyeṣaṇaṃ kaivalyajñānam+iti| -> jñānabhedāḥ pañca---matiḥ śrutir avadhir manaḥparyeṣaṇaṃ kaivalyajñānam iti|

gatibhedās+pañca---narakatiryaṅmanuṣyadevamokṣagatis -> gatibhedāḥ pañca---narakatiryaṅmanuṣyadevamokṣagatis

gatibhedāḥ pañca---narakatiryaṅmanuṣyadevamokṣagatis+ca -> gatibhedāḥ pañca---narakatiryaṅmanuṣyadevamokṣagatiś ca

gatibhedāḥ pañca---narakatiryaṅmanuṣyadevamokṣagatiś ca+iti| -> gatibhedāḥ pañca---narakatiryaṅmanuṣyadevamokṣagatiś ceti|

samitayas+pañca---īryāsamitis -> samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitis

samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitis+bhāṣāsamitis -> samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitis

samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitis+paryeṣaṇāsamitis -> samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitis

samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitis+ādānanikṣepaṇasamitis -> samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitir ādānanikṣepaṇasamitis

samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitir ādānanikṣepaṇasamitis+nikaṭapratiṣṭhāpanāsamitis -> samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitir ādānanikṣepaṇasamitir nikaṭapratiṣṭhāpanāsamitis

samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitir ādānanikṣepaṇasamitir nikaṭapratiṣṭhāpanāsamitis+utsargasamitis -> samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitir ādānanikṣepaṇasamitir nikaṭapratiṣṭhāpanāsamitir utsargasamitis

samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitir ādānanikṣepaṇasamitir nikaṭapratiṣṭhāpanāsamitir utsargasamitis+iti| -> samitayaḥ pañca---īryāsamitir bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitir ādānanikṣepaṇasamitir nikaṭapratiṣṭhāpanāsamitir utsargasamitir iti|

prathamam+dvitīyam -> prathamaṃ dvitīyam

prathamaṃ dvitīyam+satyam -> prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyam

prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyam+tṛtīyam -> prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyam

prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyam+dattādānam -> prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānam

prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānam+caturtham -> prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānaṃ caturtham

prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānaṃ caturtham+brahmacaryam -> prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānaṃ caturthaṃ brahmacaryam

prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānaṃ caturthaṃ brahmacaryam+pañcamam -> prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānaṃ caturthaṃ brahmacaryaṃ pañcamam

prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānaṃ caturthaṃ brahmacaryaṃ pañcamam+sarvaparigrahaparityāgas -> prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānaṃ caturthaṃ brahmacaryaṃ pañcamaṃ sarvaparigrahaparityāgas

prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānaṃ caturthaṃ brahmacaryaṃ pañcamaṃ sarvaparigrahaparityāgas+iti| -> prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ satyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dattādānaṃ caturthaṃ brahmacaryaṃ pañcamaṃ sarvaparigrahaparityāga iti|

kṣapaṇakānām+vratāni -> kṣapaṇakānāṃ vratāni

vratasamitigatis+jñānacāritrabhedās -> vratasamitigatir jñānacāritrabhedās

vratasamitigatir jñānacāritrabhedās+iti -> vratasamitigatir jñānacāritrabhedā iti

kāyās+iti -> kāyā iti

kāyā iti+āhārikas -> kāyā ity āhārikas

kāyā ity āhārikas+kāyas -> kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyas

kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyas+jyotiḥkāyas -> kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyas

kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyas+naisargikakāyas -> kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyo naisargikakāyas

kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyo naisargikakāyas+upapādukakāyas -> kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyo naisargikakāya upapādukakāyas

kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyo naisargikakāya upapādukakāyas+caramakāyas -> kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyo naisargikakāya upapādukakāyaś caramakāyas

kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyo naisargikakāya upapādukakāyaś caramakāyas+ca -> kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyo naisargikakāya upapādukakāyaś caramakāyaś ca

kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyo naisargikakāya upapādukakāyaś caramakāyaś ca+iti -> kāyā ity āhārikaḥ kāyo jyotiḥkāyo naisargikakāya upapādukakāyaś caramakāyaś ceti

pañca+anye -> pañcānye

jīvānām+ṣaṭkāyaleśās -> jīvānāṃ ṣaṭkāyaleśās

jīvānāṃ ṣaṭkāyaleśās+| -> jīvānāṃ ṣaṭkāyaleśāḥ|

pṛthvīkāyaleśās+apkāyaleśās -> pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās

pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās+tejakāyaleśās -> pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās tejakāyaleśās

pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās tejakāyaleśās+vāyukāyaleśās -> pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās tejakāyaleśā vāyukāyaleśās

pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās tejakāyaleśā vāyukāyaleśās+vanaspatikāyaleśās -> pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās tejakāyaleśā vāyukāyaleśā vanaspatikāyaleśās

pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās tejakāyaleśā vāyukāyaleśā vanaspatikāyaleśās+trasakāyaleśās -> pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās tejakāyaleśā vāyukāyaleśā vanaspatikāyaleśās trasakāyaleśās

pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās tejakāyaleśā vāyukāyaleśā vanaspatikāyaleśās trasakāyaleśās+iti -> pṛthvīkāyaleśā apkāyaleśās tejakāyaleśā vāyukāyaleśā vanaspatikāyaleśās trasakāyaleśā iti

jīvaṣaṭkāyaleśās+iti -> jīvaṣaṭkāyaleśā iti

jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaravarjanam+nirjarabandhamokṣagatyāgatis -> jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaravarjanaṃ nirjarabandhamokṣagatyāgatis

jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaravarjanaṃ nirjarabandhamokṣagatyāgatis+ca -> jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaravarjanaṃ nirjarabandhamokṣagatyāgatiś ca

jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaravarjanaṃ nirjarabandhamokṣagatyāgatiś ca+iti| -> jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaravarjanaṃ nirjarabandhamokṣagatyāgatiś ceti|

jīvas+kālas -> jīvaḥ kālas

jīvaḥ kālas+ākāśavat -> jīvaḥ kāla ākāśavat

jīvaḥ kāla ākāśavat+nityam -> jīvaḥ kāla ākāśavan nityam

jīvaḥ kāla ākāśavan nityam+navapadavihitam -> jīvaḥ kāla ākāśavan nityaṃ navapadavihitam

jīvaḥ kāla ākāśavan nityaṃ navapadavihitam+iti -> jīvaḥ kāla ākāśavan nityaṃ navapadavihitam iti

eṣām+madhye -> eṣāṃ madhye

jīvas+pudgalas -> jīvaḥ pudgalas

jīvaḥ pudgalas+kālas -> jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kālas

jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kālas+ākāśam -> jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kāla ākāśam

jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kāla ākāśam+puṇyam -> jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kāla ākāśaṃ puṇyam

jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kāla ākāśaṃ puṇyam+pāpam -> jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kāla ākāśaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpam

jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kāla ākāśaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpam+ca -> jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kāla ākāśaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ ca

jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kāla ākāśaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ ca+iti| -> jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kāla ākāśaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ ceti|

dravyaṣaṭkam+iti -> dravyaṣaṭkam iti

traikālyam+iti -> traikālyam iti

traikālyam iti+atītam -> traikālyam ity atītam

traikālyam ity atītam+anāgatam -> traikālyam ity atītam anāgatam

traikālyam ity atītam anāgatam+vartamānam -> traikālyam ity atītam anāgataṃ vartamānam

traikālyam ity atītam anāgataṃ vartamānam+ca -> traikālyam ity atītam anāgataṃ vartamānaṃ ca

traikālyam ity atītam anāgataṃ vartamānaṃ ca+iti| -> traikālyam ity atītam anāgataṃ vartamānaṃ ceti|

dravyaparyāyābhyām+nityānityavyavahāras -> dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ nityānityavyavahāras

dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ nityānityavyavahāras+| -> dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ nityānityavyavahāraḥ|

nigaditam+deśanā -> nigaditaṃ deśanā

yasmin+mokṣapramāṇam -> yasmin mokṣapramāṇam

yasmin mokṣapramāṇam+hi -> yasmin mokṣapramāṇaṃ hi

yasmin mokṣapramāṇaṃ hi+upari -> yasmin mokṣapramāṇaṃ hy upari

jīvas+kāyapramāṇas -> jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇas

jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇas+hi -> jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo hi

jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo hi+aparimitabhavais -> jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo hy aparimitabhavais

jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo hy aparimitabhavais+brahmacaryeṇa -> jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo hy aparimitabhavair brahmacaryeṇa

kāyās+vratasamitigatis -> kāyā vratasamitigatis

kāyā vratasamitigatis+jñānacāritrabhedās -> kāyā vratasamitigatir jñānacāritrabhedās

kāyā vratasamitigatir jñānacāritrabhedās+| -> kāyā vratasamitigatir jñānacāritrabhedāḥ|

pañca+anye -> pañcānye

traikālyam+dravyaṣaṭkam -> traikālyaṃ dravyaṣaṭkam

traikālyaṃ dravyaṣaṭkam+navapadavihitam -> traikālyaṃ dravyaṣaṭkaṃ navapadavihitam

traikālyaṃ dravyaṣaṭkaṃ navapadavihitam+jīvaṣaṭkāyaleśās -> traikālyaṃ dravyaṣaṭkaṃ navapadavihitaṃ jīvaṣaṭkāyaleśās

idānīm+kṣapaṇakamatam -> idānīṃ kṣapaṇakamatam

idānīṃ kṣapaṇakamatam+ucyate---traikālyam -> idānīṃ kṣapaṇakamatam ucyate---traikālyam

idānīṃ kṣapaṇakamatam ucyate---traikālyam+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ kṣapaṇakamatam ucyate---traikālyam ityādinā|

tāyimataniyamas+| -> tāyimataniyamaḥ|

pūrvoktakriyā+iti -> pūrvoktakriyeti

nṛṇām+rahmaṇas -> nṛṇāṃ rahmaṇas

nṛṇāṃ rahmaṇas+| -> nṛṇāṃ rahmaṇaḥ|

rahmaṇas+pratoṣāt -> rahmaṇaḥ pratoṣāt

rahmaṇaḥ pratoṣāt+apratoṣāt -> rahmaṇaḥ pratoṣād apratoṣāt

rahmaṇaḥ pratoṣād apratoṣāt+narakas -> rahmaṇaḥ pratoṣād apratoṣān narakas

rahmaṇaḥ pratoṣād apratoṣān narakas+bhavati -> rahmaṇaḥ pratoṣād apratoṣān narako bhavati

svargas+tasya -> svargas tasya

mlecchānām+śvetavāsinām -> mlecchānāṃ śvetavāsinām

mlecchānāṃ śvetavāsinām+bhuktihetos -> mlecchānāṃ śvetavāsināṃ bhuktihetos

mlecchānāṃ śvetavāsināṃ bhuktihetos+| -> mlecchānāṃ śvetavāsināṃ bhuktihetoḥ|

tāyinām+iti -> tāyinām iti

sṛṣṭam+samastam -> sṛṣṭaṃ samastam

sṛṣṭaṃ samastam+sacaram -> sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaram

sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaram+jaṅgamam -> sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaraṃ jaṅgamam

sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaraṃ jaṅgamam+acaram -> sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaraṃ jaṅgamam acaram

sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaraṃ jaṅgamam acaram+sthāvaram -> sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaraṃ jaṅgamam acaraṃ sthāvaram

sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaraṃ jaṅgamam acaraṃ sthāvaram+vastu| -> sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaraṃ jaṅgamam acaraṃ sthāvaraṃ vastu|

idānīm+mlecchatāyinām -> idānīṃ mlecchatāyinām

idānīṃ mlecchatāyinām+matam -> idānīṃ mlecchatāyināṃ matam

idānīṃ mlecchatāyināṃ matam+ucyate---kartrā -> idānīṃ mlecchatāyināṃ matam ucyate---kartrā

idānīṃ mlecchatāyināṃ matam ucyate---kartrā+ityādi| -> idānīṃ mlecchatāyināṃ matam ucyate---kartretyādi|

lokāyatamataniyamas+| -> lokāyatamataniyamaḥ|

veditavyā+iti -> veditavyeti

sphuṭam+amaraguros -> sphuṭam amaraguros

sphuṭam amaraguros+bṛhaspates -> sphuṭam amaraguror bṛhaspates

sphuṭam amaraguror bṛhaspates+deśanā -> sphuṭam amaraguror bṛhaspater deśanā

kaścit+paralokam -> kaścit paralokam

kaścit paralokam+kāyas -> kaścit paralokaṃ kāyas

kaścit paralokaṃ kāyas+asti -> kaścit paralokaṃ kāyo 'sti

kaścit paralokaṃ kāyo 'sti+iti -> kaścit paralokaṃ kāyo 'stīti

harītakīguḍādisaṃyogāt+madirāśaktivat -> harītakīguḍādisaṃyogān madirāśaktivat

harītakīguḍādisaṃyogān madirāśaktivat+bhūtānām -> harītakīguḍādisaṃyogān madirāśaktivad bhūtānām

harītakīguḍādisaṃyogān madirāśaktivad bhūtānām+saṃyogaśaktis -> harītakīguḍādisaṃyogān madirāśaktivad bhūtānāṃ saṃyogaśaktis

harītakīguḍādisaṃyogān madirāśaktivad bhūtānāṃ saṃyogaśaktis+tasya -> harītakīguḍādisaṃyogān madirāśaktivad bhūtānāṃ saṃyogaśaktis tasya

harītakīguḍādisaṃyogān madirāśaktivad bhūtānāṃ saṃyogaśaktis tasya+abhāve -> harītakīguḍādisaṃyogān madirāśaktivad bhūtānāṃ saṃyogaśaktis tasyābhāve

karmaphalam+na| -> karmaphalaṃ na|

bhūtavṛndasya+abhāve -> bhūtavṛndasyābhāve

pṛthivyādikam+tān -> pṛthivyādikaṃ tān

pṛthivyādikaṃ tān+bhuṅkte -> pṛthivyādikaṃ tān bhuṅkte

guṇās+sattvādayas -> guṇāḥ sattvādayas

guṇāḥ sattvādayas+viṣayās -> guṇāḥ sattvādayo viṣayās

guṇāḥ sattvādayo viṣayās+gandhādayas -> guṇāḥ sattvādayo viṣayā gandhādayas

guṇāḥ sattvādayo viṣayā gandhādayas+bhūtavṛndam -> guṇāḥ sattvādayo viṣayā gandhādayo bhūtavṛndam

guṇāḥ sattvādayo viṣayā gandhādayo bhūtavṛndam+iti -> guṇāḥ sattvādayo viṣayā gandhādayo bhūtavṛndam iti

guṇaviṣayān+iti -> guṇaviṣayān iti

na+asti| -> nāsti|

karmapākas+api -> karmapāko 'pi

na+asti -> nāsti

nāsti+iti -> nāstīti

dehinām+na -> dehināṃ na

dehināṃ na+asti -> dehināṃ nāsti

dehināṃ nāsti+īśas -> dehināṃ nāstīśas

dehināṃ nāstīśas+kartā -> dehināṃ nāstīśaḥ kartā

idānīm+lokāyatamatam -> idānīṃ lokāyatamatam

idānīṃ lokāyatamatam+ucyate---na -> idānīṃ lokāyatamatam ucyate---na

idānīṃ lokāyatamatam ucyate---na+asti -> idānīṃ lokāyatamatam ucyate---nāsti

idānīṃ lokāyatamatam ucyate---nāsti+ityādi| -> idānīṃ lokāyatamatam ucyate---nāstītyādi|

rahmaṇas+sā|| -> rahmaṇaḥ sā||

nṛṇām+deśanā -> nṛṇāṃ deśanā

pratoṣāt+bhavati -> pratoṣād bhavati

svargas+tasya -> svargas tasya

sṛṣṭam+asmastam -> sṛṣṭam asmastam

sṛṣṭam asmastam+sacaram -> sṛṣṭam asmastaṃ sacaram

sṛṣṭam asmastaṃ sacaram+acarajam -> sṛṣṭam asmastaṃ sacaram acarajam

sṛṣṭam asmastaṃ sacaram acarajam+tāyinām -> sṛṣṭam asmastaṃ sacaram acarajaṃ tāyinām

sṛṣṭam asmastaṃ sacaram acarajaṃ tāyinām+bhuktihetos -> sṛṣṭam asmastaṃ sacaram acarajaṃ tāyināṃ bhuktihetos

sphuṭam+amaraguros -> sphuṭam amaraguros

sphuṭam amaraguros+deśanā -> sphuṭam amaraguror deśanā

phalam+na -> phalaṃ na

tasya+abhāve -> tasyābhāve

guṇaviṣayān+bhūtavṛndam -> guṇaviṣayān bhūtavṛndam

guṇaviṣayān bhūtavṛndam+hi -> guṇaviṣayān bhūtavṛndaṃ hi

na+asti -> nāsti

nāsti+īśas -> nāstīśas

nāstīśas+karmapākas -> nāstīśaḥ karmapākas

nāstīśaḥ karmapākas+api -> nāstīśaḥ karmapāko 'pi

śivamataniyamas+|| -> śivamataniyamaḥ||

śivasya+iti -> śivasyeti

etat+sarvam -> etat sarvam

etat sarvam+hi -> etat sarvaṃ hi

teṣām+dvādaśarāśīnām -> teṣāṃ dvādaśarāśīnām

teṣāṃ dvādaśarāśīnām+bhedās -> teṣāṃ dvādaśarāśīnāṃ bhedās

teṣāṃ dvādaśarāśīnāṃ bhedās+varṣāyanakālayugaṛtumāsapakṣadinaghaṭikāpāṇīpalaśvāsās -> teṣāṃ dvādaśarāśīnāṃ bhedā varṣāyanakālayugaṛtumāsapakṣadinaghaṭikāpāṇīpalaśvāsās

teṣāṃ dvādaśarāśīnāṃ bhedā varṣāyanakālayugaṛtumāsapakṣadinaghaṭikāpāṇīpalaśvāsās+iti| -> teṣāṃ dvādaśarāśīnāṃ bhedā varṣāyanakālayugaṛtumāsapakṣadinaghaṭikāpāṇīpalaśvāsā iti|

prāṇinām+tanugatās -> prāṇināṃ tanugatās

prāṇināṃ tanugatās+dvādaśarāśayas -> prāṇināṃ tanugatā dvādaśarāśayas

prāṇināṃ tanugatā dvādaśarāśayas+ganthiśabdena -> prāṇināṃ tanugatā dvādaśarāśayo ganthiśabdena

prāṇināṃ tanugatā dvādaśarāśayo ganthiśabdena+ucyante -> prāṇināṃ tanugatā dvādaśarāśayo ganthiśabdenocyante

dvādaśagranthibhedās+iti -> dvādaśagranthibhedā iti

dvādaśagranthibhedā iti+iha -> dvādaśagranthibhedā itīha

śivatvam+sakalatanugatam -> śivatvaṃ sakalatanugatam

śivatvaṃ sakalatanugatam+iti -> śivatvaṃ sakalatanugatam iti

śukrabindos+bhedam -> śukrabindor bhedam

śukrabindor bhedam+cyavanasukhāvasthālakṣaṇam -> śukrabindor bhedaṃ cyavanasukhāvasthālakṣaṇam

śukrabindor bhedaṃ cyavanasukhāvasthālakṣaṇam+tat -> śukrabindor bhedaṃ cyavanasukhāvasthālakṣaṇaṃ tat

śukrabindor bhedaṃ cyavanasukhāvasthālakṣaṇaṃ tat+eva -> śukrabindor bhedaṃ cyavanasukhāvasthālakṣaṇaṃ tad eva

bindos+bhedam -> bindor bhedam

bindor bhedam+śivatvam -> bindor bhedaṃ śivatvam

bindor bhedaṃ śivatvam+iti -> bindor bhedaṃ śivatvam iti

bindor bhedaṃ śivatvam iti+iha -> bindor bhedaṃ śivatvam itīha

tyāgabhāvas+teṣām -> tyāgabhāvas teṣām

tyāgabhāvas teṣām+vighaṭanam -> tyāgabhāvas teṣāṃ vighaṭanam

tyāgabhāvas teṣāṃ vighaṭanam+iti -> tyāgabhāvas teṣāṃ vighaṭanam iti

tyāgabhāvas teṣāṃ vighaṭanam iti+arthas -> tyāgabhāvas teṣāṃ vighaṭanam ity arthas

tyāgabhāvas teṣāṃ vighaṭanam ity arthas+| -> tyāgabhāvas teṣāṃ vighaṭanam ity arthaḥ|

yojanam+melāpakam -> yojanaṃ melāpakam

yojanaṃ melāpakam+iti -> yojanaṃ melāpakam iti

eṣām+ṣaṇmārgādīnām -> eṣāṃ ṣaṇmārgādīnām

eṣāṃ ṣaṇmārgādīnām+utpādakāle -> eṣāṃ ṣaṇmārgādīnām utpādakāle

tasyās+trividhapadagates -> tasyās trividhapadagates

tasyās trividhapadagates+yojanam -> tasyās trividhapadagater yojanam

tasyās trividhapadagater yojanam+iti| -> tasyās trividhapadagater yojanam iti|

padagatis+---piṇḍasthā -> padagatiḥ---piṇḍasthā

śivatattvam+sarvavyāpi| -> śivatattvaṃ sarvavyāpi|

sacchivatvam+iti -> sacchivatvam iti

ātmā+iti -> ātmeti

ātmeti+ātmatattvam -> ātmety ātmatattvam

ātmety ātmatattvam+nityam| -> ātmety ātmatattvaṃ nityam|

vidyā+iti -> vidyeti

vidyeti+ānandādikāmatattvam| -> vidyety ānandādikāmatattvam|

cakārāt+aparam -> cakārād aparam

cakārād aparam+mantradeham -> cakārād aparaṃ mantradeham

cakārād aparaṃ mantradeham+iti -> cakārād aparaṃ mantradeham iti

cakārād aparaṃ mantradeham iti+ālikālyātmakam -> cakārād aparaṃ mantradeham ity ālikālyātmakam

cakārād aparaṃ mantradeham ity ālikālyātmakam+mantratattvam -> cakārād aparaṃ mantradeham ity ālikālyātmakaṃ mantratattvam

cakārād aparaṃ mantradeham ity ālikālyātmakaṃ mantratattvam+iti| -> cakārād aparaṃ mantradeham ity ālikālyātmakaṃ mantratattvam iti|

akhilam+iti -> akhilam iti

ṣaṣṭhas+jñānadhātus -> ṣaṣṭho jñānadhātus

ṣaṣṭho jñānadhātus+| -> ṣaṣṭho jñānadhātuḥ|

parapadam+iti -> parapadam iti

pañcatattvam+iti -> pañcatattvam iti

pañcatattvam iti+ākāśādidhātusamūham| -> pañcatattvam ity ākāśādidhātusamūham|

pravartakās+iti| -> pravartakā iti|

ṣaṇmārgās+ṣaḍviṣayeṣu -> ṣaṇmārgāḥ ṣaḍviṣayeṣu

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

ebhis+sārdham -> ebhiḥ sārdham

ebhiḥ sārdham+ṣaṇmārgādikam -> ebhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārgādikam

ebhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārgādikam+veditavyam -> ebhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārgādikaṃ veditavyam

ebhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārgādikaṃ veditavyam+iti -> ebhiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārgādikaṃ veditavyam iti

nirvāṇam+kāṣṭhāvasthātas -> nirvāṇaṃ kāṣṭhāvasthātas

nirvāṇaṃ kāṣṭhāvasthātas+(?)| -> nirvāṇaṃ kāṣṭhāvasthātaḥ(?)|

kālas+prakṛtiguṇās -> kālaḥ prakṛtiguṇās

kālaḥ prakṛtiguṇās+śūnyatā -> kālaḥ prakṛtiguṇāḥ śūnyatā

vacanāt+kartā -> vacanāt kartā

vacanāt kartā+ātmā -> vacanāt kartātmā

ekamūrtis+trayas -> ekamūrtis trayas

ekamūrtis trayas+devās -> ekamūrtis trayo devās

ekamūrtis trayo devās+brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarās -> ekamūrtis trayo devā brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarās

ekamūrtis trayo devā brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarās+| -> ekamūrtis trayo devā brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ|

sārdham+ṣaṇmārāgikam -> sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārāgikam

sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārāgikam+kutas -> sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārāgikaṃ kutas

sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārāgikaṃ kutas+| -> sārdhaṃ ṣaṇmārāgikaṃ kutaḥ|

etat+sarvam -> etat sarvam

etat sarvam+hi -> etat sarvaṃ hi

bindos+bhedam -> bindor bhedam

bindor bhedam+śivatvam -> bindor bhedaṃ śivatvam

bindor bhedaṃ śivatvam+sakalatanugatam -> bindor bhedaṃ śivatvaṃ sakalatanugatam

bindor bhedaṃ śivatvaṃ sakalatanugatam+dvādaśagranthibhedās -> bindor bhedaṃ śivatvaṃ sakalatanugataṃ dvādaśagranthibhedās

sacchivatvam+trividhapadagates -> sacchivatvaṃ trividhapadagates

sacchivatvaṃ trividhapadagates+yojanam -> sacchivatvaṃ trividhapadagater yojanam

sacchivatvaṃ trividhapadagater yojanam+tyāgabhāvas -> sacchivatvaṃ trividhapadagater yojanaṃ tyāgabhāvas

sacchivatvaṃ trividhapadagater yojanaṃ tyāgabhāvas+| -> sacchivatvaṃ trividhapadagater yojanaṃ tyāgabhāvaḥ|

ṣaṇmārgās+pañcatattvam -> ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvam

ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvam+parapadam -> ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvaṃ parapadam

ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvaṃ parapadam+akhilam -> ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvaṃ parapadam akhilam

ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvaṃ parapadam akhilam+ca -> ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvaṃ parapadam akhilaṃ ca

ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvaṃ parapadam akhilaṃ ca+aparam -> ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvaṃ parapadam akhilaṃ cāparam

ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvaṃ parapadam akhilaṃ cāparam+mantradeham -> ṣaṇmārgāḥ pañcatattvaṃ parapadam akhilaṃ cāparaṃ mantradeham

idānīm+īśvaramatam -> idānīm īśvaramatam

idānīm īśvaramatam+ucyate---ṣaṇmārgās -> idānīm īśvaramatam ucyate---ṣaṇmārgās

idānīm īśvaramatam ucyate---ṣaṇmārgās+ityādi| -> idānīm īśvaramatam ucyate---ṣaṇmārgā ityādi|

vaiṣṇavamataniyamas+|| -> vaiṣṇavamataniyamaḥ||

viṣṇos+iti -> viṣṇor iti

sā+atra -> sātra

dāyakas+asti -> dāyako 'sti

dāyako 'sti+iti| -> dāyako 'stīti|

hetus+phalasya -> hetuḥ phalasya

paśyati+iti -> paśyatīti

paśyatīti+āhus -> paśyatīty āhus

paśyatīty āhus+ekībhūtas -> paśyatīty āhur ekībhūtas

paśyatīty āhur ekībhūtas+ityāditas -> paśyatīty āhur ekībhūta ityāditas

paśyatīty āhur ekībhūta ityāditas+(?)| -> paśyatīty āhur ekībhūta ityāditaḥ(?)|

naṣṭadharmatā+asti -> naṣṭadharmatāsti

sattvādayas+guṇās -> sattvādayo guṇās

sattvādayo guṇās+santi -> sattvādayo guṇāḥ santi

pṛthivyādiprakṛtis+asti -> pṛthivyādiprakṛtir asti

kālas+asti -> kālo 'sti

śubhāśubhakarma+asti -> śubhāśubhakarmāsti

tadyathā---kartā+asti -> tadyathā---kartāsti

tadyathā---kartāsti+ātmā -> tadyathā---kartāsty ātmā

tadyathā---kartāsty ātmā+asti -> tadyathā---kartāsty ātmāsti

brahmamataniyamas+| -> brahmamataniyamaḥ|

brahmaṇas+sā -> brahmaṇaḥ sā

brahmaṇaḥ sā+ityādi -> brahmaṇaḥ setyādi

bhavet+deśanā -> bhaved deśanā

svargasādhane+aśvamedhayajñāt -> svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt

svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt+paras -> svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paras

svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paras+na -> svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paro na

svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paro na+anyas -> svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paro nānyas

svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paro nānyas+dānādidharmas -> svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paro nānyo dānādidharmas

svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paro nānyo dānādidharmas+asti -> svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paro nānyo dānādidharmo 'sti

svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paro nānyo dānādidharmo 'sti+iti -> svargasādhane 'śvamedhayajñāt paro nānyo dānādidharmo 'stīti

na+anyas -> nānyas

nānyas+dharmas -> nānyo dharmas

nānyo dharmas+aśvamedhāt -> nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhāt

nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhāt+iti -> nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhād iti

nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhād iti+iha -> nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhād itīha

śūdrayonis+iti| -> śūdrayonir iti|

kṣatriyonis+ādiśabdāt -> kṣatriyonir ādiśabdāt

kṣatriyonir ādiśabdāt+ūrudvayam -> kṣatriyonir ādiśabdād ūrudvayam

kṣatriyonir ādiśabdād ūrudvayam+vaiśyayonis -> kṣatriyonir ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyayonis

kṣatriyonir ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyayonis+pādau -> kṣatriyonir ādiśabdād ūrudvayaṃ vaiśyayoniḥ pādau

brahmamukham+brāhmaṇayonis -> brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇayonis

brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇayonis+bhujau -> brahmamukhaṃ brāhmaṇayonir bhujau

yonis+janasya -> yonir janasya

yonir janasya+iti| -> yonir janasyeti|

vedas+svayambhūs -> vedaḥ svayambhūs

vedaḥ svayambhūs+akartṛkas -> vedaḥ svayambhūr akartṛkas

vedaḥ svayambhūr akartṛkas+ākāśavat -> vedaḥ svayambhūr akartṛka ākāśavat

vedaḥ svayambhūr akartṛka ākāśavat+mukhakaracaraṇādau -> vedaḥ svayambhūr akartṛka ākāśavan mukhakaracaraṇādau

yasmin+mate -> yasmin mate

viṣṇos+|| -> viṣṇoḥ||

sā+atra -> sātra

hetus+phalasya -> hetuḥ phalasya

guṇās+śūnyatā -> guṇāḥ śūnyatā

karmakālas+prakṛtis -> karmakālaḥ prakṛtis

karmakālaḥ prakṛtis+api -> karmakālaḥ prakṛtir api

kartā+ātmā -> kartātmā

brahmaṇas+sā| -> brahmaṇaḥ sā|

bhavet+deśanā -> bhaved deśanā

na+anyas -> nānyas

nānyas+dharmas -> nānyo dharmas

nānyo dharmas+aśvamedhāt -> nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhāt

nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhāt+paras -> nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhāt paras

nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhāt paras+iti -> nānyo dharmo 'śvamedhāt para iti

yonis+janasya -> yonir janasya

yasmin+vedas -> yasmin vedas

yasmin vedas+svayambhūs -> yasmin vedaḥ svayambhūs

yasmin vedaḥ svayambhūs+mukhakaracaraṇādau -> yasmin vedaḥ svayambhūr mukhakaracaraṇādau

idānīm+brahmaviṣṇvos -> idānīṃ brahmaviṣṇvos

idānīṃ brahmaviṣṇvos+matam -> idānīṃ brahmaviṣṇvor matam

idānīṃ brahmaviṣṇvor matam+ucyate---yasmin -> idānīṃ brahmaviṣṇvor matam ucyate---yasmin

idānīṃ brahmaviṣṇvor matam ucyate---yasmin+ityādi| -> idānīṃ brahmaviṣṇvor matam ucyate---yasminn ityādi|

tathāgatamataniyamas+|| -> tathāgatamataniyamaḥ||

bauddhadṛṣṭivaśāt+sattvāśayena -> bauddhadṛṣṭivaśāt sattvāśayena

bauddhadṛṣṭivaśāt sattvāśayena+iti -> bauddhadṛṣṭivaśāt sattvāśayeneti

vajriṇas+sā -> vajriṇaḥ sā

yānatraye+etat -> yānatraya etat

yānatraya etat+nairātmyādikam -> yānatraya etan nairātmyādikam

yānatraya etan nairātmyādikam+deśakās -> yānatraya etan nairātmyādikaṃ deśakās

yānatraya etan nairātmyādikaṃ deśakās+vadanti -> yānatraya etan nairātmyādikaṃ deśakā vadanti

yasmin+iti -> yasminn iti

pratisenopamā+iti| -> pratisenopameti|

tathā+eva -> tathaiva

tathaiva+ajaḍā -> tathaivājaḍā

dharmakāyādayas+sahajas -> dharmakāyādayaḥ sahajas

dharmakāyādayaḥ sahajas+caturthas -> dharmakāyādayaḥ sahajaś caturthas

dharmakāyādayaḥ sahajaś caturthas+iti| -> dharmakāyādayaḥ sahajaś caturtha iti|

trikāyās+iti -> trikāyā iti

rūpādayas+| -> rūpādayaḥ|

pañcaskandhās+iti -> pañcaskandhā iti

vaktavyās+| -> vaktavyāḥ|

dviguṇitanavakās+iti -> dviguṇitanavakā iti

dviguṇitanavakā iti+aṣṭādaśa -> dviguṇitanavakā ity aṣṭādaśa

dviguṇitanavakā ity aṣṭādaśa+āveṇikās -> dviguṇitanavakā ity aṣṭādaśāveṇikās

dviguṇitanavakā ity aṣṭādaśāveṇikās+buddhadharmās -> dviguṇitanavakā ity aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmās

dviguṇitanavakā ity aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmās+vakṣyamāṇe -> dviguṇitanavakā ity aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā vakṣyamāṇe

caturāryasatyam+duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇam -> caturāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇam

caturāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇam+ca -> caturāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇaṃ ca

caturāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇaṃ ca+iti| -> caturāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇaṃ ceti|

vedasatyam+iti -> vedasatyam iti

narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānām+gatis -> narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatis

narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatis+ṣaḍgatis -> narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatis

narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatis+dvādaśāṅgapratītes -> narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatir dvādaśāṅgapratītes

narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatir dvādaśāṅgapratītes+sākṣāt -> narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatir dvādaśāṅgapratīteḥ sākṣāt

narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatir dvādaśāṅgapratīteḥ sākṣāt+sambhūtis -> narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatir dvādaśāṅgapratīteḥ sākṣāt sambhūtis

narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatir dvādaśāṅgapratīteḥ sākṣāt sambhūtis+ṣaḍgatikānām -> narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatir dvādaśāṅgapratīteḥ sākṣāt sambhūtiḥ ṣaḍgatikānām

narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatir dvādaśāṅgapratīteḥ sākṣāt sambhūtiḥ ṣaḍgatikānām+iti| -> narakapretatiryaṅmanuṣyāsuradevānāṃ gatiḥ ṣaḍgatir dvādaśāṅgapratīteḥ sākṣāt sambhūtiḥ ṣaḍgatikānām iti|

ṛtugatis+iti -> ṛtugatir iti

tribhavas+kālarūpas -> tribhavaḥ kālarūpas

tribhavaḥ kālarūpas+arūpas -> tribhavaḥ kālarūpo 'rūpas

tribhavaḥ kālarūpo 'rūpas+| -> tribhavaḥ kālarūpo 'rūpaḥ|

karmavipākas+trividhas -> karmavipākas trividhas

karmavipākas trividhas+---kāyikavācikamānasikas -> karmavipākas trividhaḥ---kāyikavācikamānasikas

karmavipākas trividhaḥ---kāyikavācikamānasikas+ca -> karmavipākas trividhaḥ---kāyikavācikamānasikaś ca

karmavipākas trividhaḥ---kāyikavācikamānasikaś ca+iti| -> karmavipākas trividhaḥ---kāyikavācikamānasikaś ceti|

nairātmyam+dvividham---pudgalanairātyam -> nairātmyaṃ dvividham---pudgalanairātyam

nairātmyaṃ dvividham---pudgalanairātyam+dharmanairātmyam -> nairātmyaṃ dvividham---pudgalanairātyaṃ dharmanairātmyam

nairātmyaṃ dvividham---pudgalanairātyaṃ dharmanairātmyam+iti| -> nairātmyaṃ dvividham---pudgalanairātyaṃ dharmanairātmyam iti|

nairātmya+ityādi(?)| -> nairātmyetyādi(?)|

viśeṣas+sa -> viśeṣaḥ sa

śūnyatātattvam+prati -> śūnyatātattvaṃ prati

bauddhatīrthikayos+viśeṣas -> bauddhatīrthikayor viśeṣas

bauddhatīrthikayor viśeṣas+na -> bauddhatīrthikayor viśeṣo na

bauddhatīrthikayor viśeṣo na+asti -> bauddhatīrthikayor viśeṣo nāsti

tulyas+vyāvahārikam -> tulyo vyāvahārikam

tulyo vyāvahārikam+kartṛkaraṇādikam -> tulyo vyāvahārikaṃ kartṛkaraṇādikam

tulyo vyāvahārikaṃ kartṛkaraṇādikam+ca -> tulyo vyāvahārikaṃ kartṛkaraṇādikaṃ ca

dhātvindriyādivicāras+api -> dhātvindriyādivicāro 'pi

bhāvasaṃkalpasa+samānas -> NO RULE FOUND (a+s)

samānas+| -> samānaḥ|

viśvarūpas+maṇis -> viśvarūpo maṇis

viśvarūpo maṇis+yathā|| -> viśvarūpo maṇir yathā||

tanmayatām+yāti -> tanmayatāṃ yāti

manas+| -> manaḥ|

manas+saṃyujyate -> manaḥ saṃyujyate

vicāryamāṇas+sarvadarśanasiddhāntas -> vicāryamāṇaḥ sarvadarśanasiddhāntas

vicāryamāṇaḥ sarvadarśanasiddhāntas+samānas -> vicāryamāṇaḥ sarvadarśanasiddhāntaḥ samānas

vicāryamāṇaḥ sarvadarśanasiddhāntaḥ samānas+laukikasiddhaye -> vicāryamāṇaḥ sarvadarśanasiddhāntaḥ samāno laukikasiddhaye

vitanyate---nairātmya+ityādi| -> vitanyate---nairātmyetyādi|

idānīm+paramādibuddhāt -> idānīṃ paramādibuddhāt

idānīṃ paramādibuddhāt+mañjuśriyā -> idānīṃ paramādibuddhān mañjuśriyā

idānīṃ paramādibuddhān mañjuśriyā+uditam -> idānīṃ paramādibuddhān mañjuśriyoditam

idānīṃ paramādibuddhān mañjuśriyoditam+svaparadarśanānumatam -> idānīṃ paramādibuddhān mañjuśriyoditaṃ svaparadarśanānumatam

idānīṃ paramādibuddhān mañjuśriyoditaṃ svaparadarśanānumatam+ṭīkayā -> idānīṃ paramādibuddhān mañjuśriyoditaṃ svaparadarśanānumataṃ ṭīkayā

kiṃcit+matam -> kiṃcin matam

kiṃcin matam+uktam -> kiṃcin matam uktam

kiṃcin matam uktam+vitanyate|| -> kiṃcin matam uktaṃ vitanyate||

jagannātham+kālacakram -> jagannāthaṃ kālacakram

jagannāthaṃ kālacakram+mahāsukham| -> jagannāthaṃ kālacakraṃ mahāsukham|

vajriṇas+sā|| -> vajriṇaḥ sā||

yasmin+etat -> yasminn etat

yasminn etat+vadanti -> yasminn etad vadanti

tathā+eva -> tathaiva

tathaiva+ajaḍā -> tathaivājaḍā

pañcaskandhās+trikāyās -> pañcaskandhās trikāyās

pañcaskandhās trikāyās+sahakas -> pañcaskandhās trikāyāḥ sahakas

pañcaskandhās trikāyāḥ sahakas+iti -> pañcaskandhās trikāyāḥ sahaka iti

sambhūtis+vedasatyam -> sambhūtir vedasatyam

sambhūtir vedasatyam+dviguṇitanavakāveṇikās -> sambhūtir vedasatyaṃ dviguṇitanavakāveṇikās

sambhūtir vedasatyaṃ dviguṇitanavakāveṇikās+buddhadharmās -> sambhūtir vedasatyaṃ dviguṇitanavakāveṇikā buddhadharmās

sambhūtir vedasatyaṃ dviguṇitanavakāveṇikā buddhadharmās+| -> sambhūtir vedasatyaṃ dviguṇitanavakāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ|

nairātmyam+karmapākas -> nairātmyaṃ karmapākas

nairātmyaṃ karmapākas+tribhavaṛtugatis -> nairātmyaṃ karmapākas tribhavaṛtugatis

nairātmyaṃ karmapākas tribhavaṛtugatis+dvādaśāṅgapratītes -> nairātmyaṃ karmapākas tribhavaṛtugatir dvādaśāṅgapratītes

pañcāmṛtayogas+tatas -> pañcāmṛtayogas tatas

pañcāmṛtayogas tatas+pañcāmṛtam -> pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtam

pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtam+bhakṣitam -> pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ bhakṣitam

pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ bhakṣitam+yoginām -> pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ bhakṣitaṃ yoginām

pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ bhakṣitaṃ yoginām+āyudam -> pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ bhakṣitaṃ yoginām āyudam

pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ bhakṣitaṃ yoginām āyudam+syāt -> pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ bhakṣitaṃ yoginām āyudaṃ syāt

pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ bhakṣitaṃ yoginām āyudaṃ syāt+iti| -> pañcāmṛtayogas tataḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ bhakṣitaṃ yoginām āyudaṃ syād iti|

pañcadravyāṇi+ekīkṛtya -> pañcadravyāṇy ekīkṛtya

pañcadravyāṇi+adhyātmani -> pañcadravyāṇy adhyātmani

vacanāt+bāhye -> vacanād bāhye

dehe+iti -> deha iti

idānīm+pañcāmṛtayogas -> idānīṃ pañcāmṛtayogas

idānīṃ pañcāmṛtayogas+āyurvṛddhyartham -> idānīṃ pañcāmṛtayoga āyurvṛddhyartham

idānīṃ pañcāmṛtayoga āyurvṛddhyartham+ucyate---viṭ -> idānīṃ pañcāmṛtayoga āyurvṛddhyartham ucyate---viṭ

idānīṃ pañcāmṛtayoga āyurvṛddhyartham ucyate---viṭ+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ pañcāmṛtayoga āyurvṛddhyartham ucyate---viḍ ityādinā|

rujam+bhakṣitam -> rujaṃ bhakṣitam

rujaṃ bhakṣitam+varṣayogāt|| -> rujaṃ bhakṣitaṃ varṣayogāt||

strīpuṣpam+śukramiśram -> strīpuṣpaṃ śukramiśram

strīpuṣpaṃ śukramiśram+tu -> strīpuṣpaṃ śukramiśraṃ tu

strīpuṣpaṃ śukramiśraṃ tu+apaharati -> strīpuṣpaṃ śukramiśraṃ tv apaharati

bhuktam+pañcapradīpam -> bhuktaṃ pañcapradīpam

bhuktaṃ pañcapradīpam+sakalarujaharam -> bhuktaṃ pañcapradīpaṃ sakalarujaharam

bhuktaṃ pañcapradīpaṃ sakalarujaharam+makṣokācchardimiśram -> bhuktaṃ pañcapradīpaṃ sakalarujaharaṃ makṣokācchardimiśram

sapalitān+aṅgahātān -> sapalitān aṅgahātān

sapalitān aṅgahātān+jarān -> sapalitān aṅgahātāñ jarān

sapalitān aṅgahātāñ jarān+ca| -> sapalitān aṅgahātāñ jarāṃś ca|

sadhyānam+puṣpanasyam -> sadhyānaṃ puṣpanasyam

sadhyānaṃ puṣpanasyam+harati -> sadhyānaṃ puṣpanasyaṃ harati

viṇmūtram+śukraraktam -> viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktam

viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktam+nṛpalalasahitam -> viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktaṃ nṛpalalasahitam

viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktaṃ nṛpalalasahitam+bhakṣitam -> viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktaṃ nṛpalalasahitaṃ bhakṣitam

viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktaṃ nṛpalalasahitaṃ bhakṣitam+ca -> viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktaṃ nṛpalalasahitaṃ bhakṣitaṃ ca

viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktaṃ nṛpalalasahitaṃ bhakṣitaṃ ca+āyudam -> viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktaṃ nṛpalalasahitaṃ bhakṣitaṃ cāyudam

viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktaṃ nṛpalalasahitaṃ bhakṣitaṃ cāyudam+syāt -> viṇmūtraṃ śukraraktaṃ nṛpalalasahitaṃ bhakṣitaṃ cāyudaṃ syāt

mukharogādyupaśamananiyamas+|| -> mukharogādyupaśamananiyamaḥ||

saukhyadam+bhavati -> saukhyadaṃ bhavati

saukhyadaṃ bhavati+iti -> saukhyadaṃ bhavatīti

sarpadaṣṭe+api -> sarpadaṣṭe 'pi

sahitam+saukhyadam -> sahitaṃ saukhyadam

sahitaṃ saukhyadam+ca -> sahitaṃ saukhyadaṃ ca

sahitaṃ saukhyadaṃ ca+api -> sahitaṃ saukhyadaṃ cāpi

bhūtapretādigraste+akṣobhyanasyam -> bhūtapretādigraste 'kṣobhyanasyam

bhūtapretādigraste 'kṣobhyanasyam+trikaṭukena -> bhūtapretādigraste 'kṣobhyanasyaṃ trikaṭukena

bhūtārte+iti -> bhūtārta iti

śītam+iti| -> śītam iti|

praviṣṭam+yathāsaṃkhyam -> praviṣṭaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam

praviṣṭaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam+ubhayarujaharam -> praviṣṭaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam ubhayarujaharam

praviṣṭaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam ubhayarujaharam+mūtram -> praviṣṭaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram

praviṣṭaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram+uṣṇam -> praviṣṭaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram uṣṇam

praviṣṭaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram uṣṇam+ca -> praviṣṭaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram uṣṇaṃ ca

śītam+kṛtam -> śītaṃ kṛtam

śītaṃ kṛtam+netre -> śītaṃ kṛtaṃ netre

praviṣṭam+netraroge -> praviṣṭaṃ netraroge

mūtram+uṣṇam -> mūtram uṣṇam

mūtram uṣṇam+kṛtam -> mūtram uṣṇaṃ kṛtam

mūtram uṣṇaṃ kṛtam+karṇe -> mūtram uṣṇaṃ kṛtaṃ karṇe

karṇayogas+bhavati -> karṇayogo bhavati

yoginām+iti| -> yoginām iti|

toyanasyam+tathā -> toyanasyaṃ tathā

toyanasyaṃ tathā+eva -> toyanasyaṃ tathaiva

rujaharam+bhavati| -> rujaharaṃ bhavati|

pratyūṣe+akṣobhyam -> pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyam

pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyam+nasyam -> pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyaṃ nasyam

pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyaṃ nasyam+kṛtam -> pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyaṃ nasyaṃ kṛtam

pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyaṃ nasyaṃ kṛtam+śirasi -> pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyaṃ nasyaṃ kṛtaṃ śirasi

rogas+bhavati -> rogo bhavati

cakārāt+dantakīṭasya -> cakārād dantakīṭasya

ca+eva -> caiva

caiva+iti -> caiveti

dhṛtam+mukharujaśamanam -> dhṛtaṃ mukharujaśamanam

dhṛtaṃ mukharujaśamanam+bhavati| -> dhṛtaṃ mukharujaśamanaṃ bhavati|

yoginas+mukharogas -> yogino mukharogas

yogino mukharogas+bhavati -> yogino mukharogo bhavati

yogino mukharogo bhavati+akṣobhyam -> yogino mukharogo bhavaty akṣobhyam

yogino mukharogo bhavaty akṣobhyam+kiṃciduṣṇam -> yogino mukharogo bhavaty akṣobhyaṃ kiṃciduṣṇam

yogino mukharogo bhavaty akṣobhyaṃ kiṃciduṣṇam+kṛtvā -> yogino mukharogo bhavaty akṣobhyaṃ kiṃciduṣṇaṃ kṛtvā

bhūtārte+akṣobhyanasyam -> bhūtārte 'kṣobhyanasyam

bhūtārte 'kṣobhyanasyam+trikaṭukasahitam -> bhūtārte 'kṣobhyanasyaṃ trikaṭukasahitam

bhūtārte 'kṣobhyanasyaṃ trikaṭukasahitam+saukhyadam -> bhūtārte 'kṣobhyanasyaṃ trikaṭukasahitaṃ saukhyadam

bhūtārte 'kṣobhyanasyaṃ trikaṭukasahitaṃ saukhyadam+ca -> bhūtārte 'kṣobhyanasyaṃ trikaṭukasahitaṃ saukhyadaṃ ca

bhūtārte 'kṣobhyanasyaṃ trikaṭukasahitaṃ saukhyadaṃ ca+api -> bhūtārte 'kṣobhyanasyaṃ trikaṭukasahitaṃ saukhyadaṃ cāpi

praviṣṭam+hi -> praviṣṭaṃ hi

praviṣṭaṃ hi+ubhayarujaharam -> praviṣṭaṃ hy ubhayarujaharam

praviṣṭaṃ hy ubhayarujaharam+mūtram -> praviṣṭaṃ hy ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram

praviṣṭaṃ hy ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram+uṣṇam -> praviṣṭaṃ hy ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram uṣṇam

praviṣṭaṃ hy ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram uṣṇam+ca -> praviṣṭaṃ hy ubhayarujaharaṃ mūtram uṣṇaṃ ca

rujaharam+toyanasyam -> rujaharaṃ toyanasyam

rujaharaṃ toyanasyam+tathā -> rujaharaṃ toyanasyaṃ tathā

rujaharaṃ toyanasyaṃ tathā+eva| -> rujaharaṃ toyanasyaṃ tathaiva|

pratyūṣe+akṣobhyanasyam -> pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyanasyam

pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyanasyam+śirasi -> pratyūṣe 'kṣobhyanasyaṃ śirasi

ca+eva -> caiva

akṣobhyam+kiṃciduṣṇam -> akṣobhyaṃ kiṃciduṣṇam

akṣobhyaṃ kiṃciduṣṇam+mukharujaśamanam -> akṣobhyaṃ kiṃciduṣṇaṃ mukharujaśamanam

akṣobhyaṃ kiṃciduṣṇaṃ mukharujaśamanam+dantaśūlasya -> akṣobhyaṃ kiṃciduṣṇaṃ mukharujaśamanaṃ dantaśūlasya

idānīm+avadhūtayogibhaiṣajyam -> idānīm avadhūtayogibhaiṣajyam

idānīm avadhūtayogibhaiṣajyam+ucyate--- -> idānīm avadhūtayogibhaiṣajyam ucyate---

pratividhānam+upadiśan -> pratividhānam upadiśan

pratividhānam upadiśan+āha---ākuñcya -> pratividhānam upadiśann āha---ākuñcya

pratividhānam upadiśann āha---ākuñcya+ityādinā|| -> pratividhānam upadiśann āha---ākuñcyetyādinā||

idānīm+jaṭhararogopaśamanāya -> idānīṃ jaṭhararogopaśamanāya

vātādirogopaśamaniyamas+|| -> vātādirogopaśamaniyamaḥ||

nābhes+adhas -> nābher adhas

nābher adhas+sakalarujaharas -> nābher adhaḥ sakalarujaharas

nābher adhaḥ sakalarujaharas+aparas -> nābher adhaḥ sakalarujaharo 'paras

nābher adhaḥ sakalarujaharo 'paras+ca -> nābher adhaḥ sakalarujaharo 'paraś ca

nābher adhaḥ sakalarujaharo 'paraś ca+iti -> nābher adhaḥ sakalarujaharo 'paraś ceti

prāṇavāyus+atas -> prāṇavāyur atas

prāṇavāyur atas+sakalarujaharas -> prāṇavāyur ataḥ sakalarujaharas

prāṇavāyur ataḥ sakalarujaharas+nābhimūle -> prāṇavāyur ataḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle

prāṇavāyur ataḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle+apānas -> prāṇavāyur ataḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle 'pānas

prāṇavāyur ataḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle 'pānas+vahati -> prāṇavāyur ataḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle 'pāno vahati

yatas+nābhyūrdhvam -> yato nābhyūrdhvam

yato nābhyūrdhvam+vahati -> yato nābhyūrdhvaṃ vahati

kasmāt+hetos -> kasmād dhetos

kasmād dhetos+| -> kasmād dhetoḥ|

ca+iṣṭas -> ceṣṭas

ceṣṭas+| -> ceṣṭaḥ|

nāḍyas+sannipātakāriṇyas -> nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas

nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas+tāsām -> nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsām

nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsām+dhātusamatvakaraṇāya -> nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāya

nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāya+ūrdhvādhas -> nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāyordhvādhas

nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāyordhvādhas+prāṇāpānayos -> nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāyordhvādhaḥ prāṇāpānayos

nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāyordhvādhaḥ prāṇāpānayos+nirodhas -> nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāyordhvādhaḥ prāṇāpānayor nirodhas

nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāyordhvādhaḥ prāṇāpānayor nirodhas+iṣṭas -> nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāyordhvādhaḥ prāṇāpānayor nirodha iṣṭas

nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāyordhvādhaḥ prāṇāpānayor nirodha iṣṭas+iti -> nāḍyaḥ sannipātakāriṇyas tāsāṃ dhātusamatvakaraṇāyordhvādhaḥ prāṇāpānayor nirodha iṣṭa iti

ca+iti| -> ceti|

sukhakaras+sannipāte -> sukhakaraḥ sannipāte

ūrdhvādhas+sannirodhas -> ūrdhvādhaḥ sannirodhas

ūrdhvādhaḥ sannirodhas+bhavati -> ūrdhvādhaḥ sannirodho bhavati

yogas+kartavyas -> yogaḥ kartavyas

yogaḥ kartavyas+iti| -> yogaḥ kartavya iti|

tāsām+samadhātukaraṇāya -> tāsāṃ samadhātukaraṇāya

tāsāṃ samadhātukaraṇāya+asau -> tāsāṃ samadhātukaraṇāyāsau

catvāriṃśat+pittadoṣakāriṇyas -> catvāriṃśat pittadoṣakāriṇyas

catvāriṃśat pittadoṣakāriṇyas+| -> catvāriṃśat pittadoṣakāriṇyaḥ|

nāḍyas+kaṇṭhe -> nāḍyaḥ kaṇṭhe

lambikāyām+jihvām -> lambikāyāṃ jihvām

lambikāyāṃ jihvām+āropya -> lambikāyāṃ jihvām āropya

lambikāyāṃ jihvām āropya+amṛtapānam -> lambikāyāṃ jihvām āropyāmṛtapānam

lambikāyāṃ jihvām āropyāmṛtapānam+stūkādikam -> lambikāyāṃ jihvām āropyāmṛtapānaṃ stūkādikam

lambikāyāṃ jihvām āropyāmṛtapānaṃ stūkādikam+(?)kartavyam| -> lambikāyāṃ jihvām āropyāmṛtapānaṃ stūkādikam(?)kartavyam|

bāhyavātam+śītkāreṇa -> bāhyavātaṃ śītkāreṇa

muñcanam+kṛtvā -> muñcanaṃ kṛtvā

tayos+prāṇāpānayos -> tayoḥ prāṇāpānayos

tayoḥ prāṇāpānayos+bāhye -> tayoḥ prāṇāpānayor bāhye

tayos+muñcanam -> tayor muñcanam

tayor muñcanam+pittadoṣe -> tayor muñcanaṃ pittadoṣe

tayor muñcanaṃ pittadoṣe+iti -> tayor muñcanaṃ pittadoṣa iti

punar+api -> punar api

prāṇanirodhas+kartavyas -> prāṇanirodhaḥ kartavyas

prāṇanirodhaḥ kartavyas+yoginā -> prāṇanirodhaḥ kartavyo yoginā

prāṇanirodhaḥ kartavyo yoginā+iti| -> prāṇanirodhaḥ kartavyo yogineti|

syāt+iti -> syād iti

prāṇāyāmas+iṣṭas -> prāṇāyāma iṣṭas

prāṇāyāma iṣṭas+bhavati| -> prāṇāyāma iṣṭo bhavati|

tāsām+samadhātukaraṇāya -> tāsāṃ samadhātukaraṇāya

nāḍyas+śleṣmadoṣakārinyas -> nāḍyaḥ śleṣmadoṣakārinyas

nāḍyaḥ śleṣmadoṣakārinyas+| -> nāḍyaḥ śleṣmadoṣakārinyaḥ|

lalāṭe+uṣṇīṣe -> lalāṭa uṣṇīṣe

samaste+iti| -> samasta iti|

mantriṇām+vātaroge -> mantriṇāṃ vātaroge

tāsām+samadhātutvakaraṇāya -> tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāya

tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāya+apānasya -> tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāyāpānasya

tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāyāpānasya+ākuñcanam -> tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāyāpānasyākuñcanam
