tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāyāpānasyākuñcanam+iṣṭam -> tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāyāpānasyākuñcanam iṣṭam

tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāyāpānasyākuñcanam iṣṭam+sukhakaram -> tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāyāpānasyākuñcanam iṣṭaṃ sukhakaram

tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāyāpānasyākuñcanam iṣṭaṃ sukhakaram+bhavati -> tāsāṃ samadhātutvakaraṇāyāpānasyākuñcanam iṣṭaṃ sukhakaraṃ bhavati

pūrvoktās+aśītināḍyas -> pūrvoktā aśītināḍyas

pūrvoktā aśītināḍyas+vātadoṣakāriṇyas -> pūrvoktā aśītināḍyo vātadoṣakāriṇyas

pūrvoktā aśītināḍyo vātadoṣakāriṇyas+nābhau -> pūrvoktā aśītināḍyo vātadoṣakāriṇyo nābhau

nābhyūrdhvam+prāṇavāyus -> nābhyūrdhvaṃ prāṇavāyus

nābhyūrdhvaṃ prāṇavāyus+sakalarujaharas -> nābhyūrdhvaṃ prāṇavāyuḥ sakalarujaharas

nābhyūrdhvaṃ prāṇavāyuḥ sakalarujaharas+nābhimūle -> nābhyūrdhvaṃ prāṇavāyuḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle

nābhyūrdhvaṃ prāṇavāyuḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle+aparas -> nābhyūrdhvaṃ prāṇavāyuḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle 'paras

nābhyūrdhvaṃ prāṇavāyuḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle 'paras+ca|| -> nābhyūrdhvaṃ prāṇavāyuḥ sakalarujaharo nābhimūle 'paraś ca||

sukhakaras+sannipāte -> sukhakaraḥ sannipāte

ūrdhvādhas+san -> ūrdhvādhaḥ san

ūrdhvādhaḥ san+nirodhas -> ūrdhvādhaḥ san nirodhas

ūrdhvādhaḥ san nirodhas+bhavati -> ūrdhvādhaḥ san nirodho bhavati

tayos+muñcanam -> tayor muñcanam

tayor muñcanam+pittadoṣe| -> tayor muñcanaṃ pittadoṣe|

syāt+punar -> syāt punar

syāt punar+api -> syāt punar api

prāṇāyāmas+kaphe -> prāṇāyāmaḥ kaphe

āpānākuñcaneṣṭam+bhavati -> āpānākuñcaneṣṭaṃ bhavati

idānīm+vātarogādiśamanam -> idānīṃ vātarogādiśamanam

idānīṃ vātarogādiśamanam+ucyate -> idānīṃ vātarogādiśamanam ucyate

idānīṃ vātarogādiśamanam ucyate+apāna -> idānīṃ vātarogādiśamanam ucyate 'pāna

idānīṃ vātarogādiśamanam ucyate 'pāna+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ vātarogādiśamanam ucyate 'pānetyādinā|

bhāvanīyās+vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa -> bhāvanīyā vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa

bhāvanīyā vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa+iti -> bhāvanīyā vakṣyamāṇakrameṇeti

bhāvanīyā vakṣyamāṇakrameṇeti+akālamaraṇavañcanāniyamas -> bhāvanīyā vakṣyamāṇakrameṇety akālamaraṇavañcanāniyamas

bhāvanīyā vakṣyamāṇakrameṇety akālamaraṇavañcanāniyamas+|| -> bhāvanīyā vakṣyamāṇakrameṇety akālamaraṇavañcanāniyamaḥ||

buddhadevyas+abhayakarakamalās -> buddhadevyo 'bhayakarakamalās

buddhadevyo 'bhayakarakamalās+yoginā -> buddhadevyo 'bhayakarakamalā yoginā

ṣaṭcakre+uṣṇīṣādike -> ṣaṭcakra uṣṇīṣādike

karacaraṇais+aṅgulīparvāt -> karacaraṇair aṅgulīparvāt

karacaraṇair aṅgulīparvāt+nakhāntāt -> karacaraṇair aṅgulīparvān nakhāntāt

karacaraṇair aṅgulīparvān nakhāntāt+pūrayitvā -> karacaraṇair aṅgulīparvān nakhāntāt pūrayitvā

prāṇena+āpūrayitvā -> prāṇenāpūrayitvā

yoginām+iti| -> yoginām iti|

sā+akālamṛtyos -> sākālamṛtyos

sākālamṛtyos+bhavati -> sākālamṛtyor bhavati

prāṇāpānadvayos+ca -> prāṇāpānadvayoś ca

madhyanāḍyām+praveśas -> madhyanāḍyāṃ praveśas

madhyanāḍyāṃ praveśas+kartavyas -> madhyanāḍyāṃ praveśaḥ kartavyas

madhyanāḍyāṃ praveśaḥ kartavyas+| -> madhyanāḍyāṃ praveśaḥ kartavyaḥ|

madhyame+agnau -> madhyame 'gnau

madhyame 'gnau+iti -> madhyame 'gnāv iti

samaviṣamagatau+iti -> samaviṣamagatāv iti

mārtaṇḍendvos+nirodhas -> mārtaṇḍendvor nirodhas

mārtaṇḍendvor nirodhas+dakṣiṇavāmanāḍyos -> mārtaṇḍendvor nirodho dakṣiṇavāmanāḍyos

mārtaṇḍendvor nirodho dakṣiṇavāmanāḍyos+nirodhas -> mārtaṇḍendvor nirodho dakṣiṇavāmanāḍyor nirodhas

mārtaṇḍendvor nirodho dakṣiṇavāmanāḍyor nirodhas+| -> mārtaṇḍendvor nirodho dakṣiṇavāmanāḍyor nirodhaḥ|

yadā+akālamaraṇalakṣaṇam -> yadākālamaraṇalakṣaṇam

yadākālamaraṇalakṣaṇam+paśyati -> yadākālamaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ paśyati

bhāvanīyās+|| -> bhāvanīyāḥ||

buddhadevyas+abhayakarakamalās -> buddhadevyo 'bhayakarakamalās

buddhadevyo 'bhayakarakamalās+yoginā -> buddhadevyo 'bhayakarakamalā yoginā

karacaraṇais+aṅguliparvāt -> karacaraṇair aṅguliparvāt

karacaraṇair aṅguliparvāt+nakhāntāt -> karacaraṇair aṅguliparvān nakhāntāt

prāṇena+āpūrayitvā -> prāṇenāpūrayitvā

kālamṛtyos+| -> kālamṛtyoḥ|

prāṇāpānadvayos+ca -> prāṇāpānadvayoś ca

madhyame+agnau -> madhyame 'gnau

mārtaṇḍendvos+nirodhas -> mārtaṇḍendvor nirodhas

mārtaṇḍendvor nirodhas+samaviṣamagatau -> mārtaṇḍendvor nirodhaḥ samaviṣamagatau

mārtaṇḍa+ityādinā| -> mārtaṇḍetyādinā|

idānīm+akālamaraṇavañcanā -> idānīm akālamaraṇavañcanā

idānīm akālamaraṇavañcanā+ucyate -> idānīm akālamaraṇavañcanocyate

mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanamārganiyamas+|| -> mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanamārganiyamaḥ||

mahāmudrāsiddhis+prāpyate -> mahāmudrāsiddhiḥ prāpyate

mahāmudrāsiddhiḥ prāpyate+ebhis -> mahāmudrāsiddhiḥ prāpyata ebhis

mahāmudrāsiddhiḥ prāpyata ebhis+skandhais -> mahāmudrāsiddhiḥ prāpyata ebhiḥ skandhais

mahāmudrāsiddhiḥ prāpyata ebhiḥ skandhais+śūnyādivimokṣaśodhitais -> mahāmudrāsiddhiḥ prāpyata ebhiḥ skandhaiḥ śūnyādivimokṣaśodhitais

mahāmudrāsiddhiḥ prāpyata ebhiḥ skandhaiḥ śūnyādivimokṣaśodhitais+iti -> mahāmudrāsiddhiḥ prāpyata ebhiḥ skandhaiḥ śūnyādivimokṣaśodhitair iti

tais+iti -> tair iti

janmani+iha| -> janmanīha|

tasmāt+niṣyandāt -> tasmān niṣyandāt

tasmān niṣyandāt+vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam -> tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam

tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam+iṣṭam -> tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭam

tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭam+yat -> tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat

tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat+kiṃcit -> tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcit

tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcit+avācyam -> tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcid avācyam

tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcid avācyam+tat -> tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcid avācyaṃ tat

tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcid avācyaṃ tat+katipayadivasais -> tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcid avācyaṃ tat katipayadivasais

tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcid avācyaṃ tat katipayadivasais+prāpyate -> tasmān niṣyandād vipākapuruṣakāravaimalyam iṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcid avācyaṃ tat katipayadivasaiḥ prāpyate

tasmāt+yat -> tasmād yat

tasmād yat+kiṃcit -> tasmād yat kiṃcit

tasmād yat kiṃcit+iṣṭam -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭam

tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭam+iti -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭam iti

nirodham+upaśamam -> nirodham upaśamam

nirodham upaśamam+niṣyandādikam -> nirodham upaśamaṃ niṣyandādikam

nirodham upaśamaṃ niṣyandādikam+akṣaram -> nirodham upaśamaṃ niṣyandādikam akṣaram

nirodham upaśamaṃ niṣyandādikam akṣaram+karoti| -> nirodham upaśamaṃ niṣyandādikam akṣaraṃ karoti|

yasya+asti -> yasyāsti

yasyāsti+iti -> yasyāstīti

prāṇāpānayos+parasparam -> prāṇāpānayoḥ parasparam

prāṇāpānayoḥ parasparam+saṃyogas -> prāṇāpānayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogas

prāṇāpānayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogas+yogas -> prāṇāpānayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogo yogas

prāṇāpānayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogo yogas+sa -> prāṇāpānayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogo yogaḥ sa

rāhus+iva -> rāhur iva

grahas+iva -> graha iva

paścāt+indvos -> paścād indvos

paścād indvos+nirodham -> paścād indvor nirodham

paścād indvor nirodham+iti -> paścād indvor nirodham iti

prāṇam+āpānavāyum -> prāṇam āpānavāyum

prāṇam āpānavāyum+nābhicakre -> prāṇam āpānavāyuṃ nābhicakre

tasmāt+avadhes -> tasmād avadhes

tasmād avadhes+sthiram -> tasmād avadheḥ sthiram

tasmād avadheḥ sthiram+api -> tasmād avadheḥ sthiram api

bhāvayet+viśvasīmnas -> bhāvayed viśvasīmnas

bhāvayed viśvasīmnas+viśvam -> bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvam

bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvam+sarvākāram -> bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvaṃ sarvākāram

bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvaṃ sarvākāram+viśvam -> bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvaṃ sarvākāraṃ viśvam

bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvaṃ sarvākāraṃ viśvam+tatparyantam -> bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvaṃ sarvākāraṃ viśvaṃ tatparyantam

bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvaṃ sarvākāraṃ viśvaṃ tatparyantam+cittam -> bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvaṃ sarvākāraṃ viśvaṃ tatparyantaṃ cittam

bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvaṃ sarvākāraṃ viśvaṃ tatparyantaṃ cittam+iti| -> bhāvayed viśvasīmno viśvaṃ sarvākāraṃ viśvaṃ tatparyantaṃ cittam iti|

dhūmādimārgam+guruniyamavaśāt -> dhūmādimārgaṃ guruniyamavaśāt

dhūmādimārgaṃ guruniyamavaśāt+vakṣyamāṇakramāt -> dhūmādimārgaṃ guruniyamavaśād vakṣyamāṇakramāt

dhūmādimārgaṃ guruniyamavaśād vakṣyamāṇakramāt+iti| -> dhūmādimārgaṃ guruniyamavaśād vakṣyamāṇakramād iti|

janmani+iha|| -> janmanīha||

tasmāt+yat -> tasmād yat

tasmād yat+kiṃcit -> tasmād yat kiṃcit

tasmād yat kiṃcit+iṣṭam -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭam

tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭam+katipayadivasais -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ katipayadivasais

tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ katipayadivasais+prāpyate -> tasmād yat kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ katipayadivasaiḥ prāpyate

paścāt+indvos -> paścād indvos

paścād indvos+nirodham -> paścād indvor nirodham

paścād indvor nirodham+grahas -> paścād indvor nirodhaṃ grahas

paścād indvor nirodhaṃ grahas+iva -> paścād indvor nirodhaṃ graha iva

prāṇam+āpānavāyum| -> prāṇam āpānavāyum|

tasmāt sthiram+api -> tasmāt sthiram api

dhūmādimārgaṃ guruniyamavaśād bhāvayet+viśvasīmnas -> dhūmādimārgaṃ guruniyamavaśād bhāvayed viśvasīmnas

nāḍiyogam+bhāvayet| -> nāḍiyogaṃ bhāvayet|

dvādaśalagne+iha -> dvādaśalagna iha

bhāvayet+nāḍiyogam -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogam

bhāvayen nāḍiyogam+lalanārasanayos -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayos

bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayos+yogāt -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogāt

bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogāt+nāḍiyogam -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogam

bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogam+madhyamāyām -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyām

bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyām+bhāvayet -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet

bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet+prāṇavāyum -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet prāṇavāyum

bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet prāṇavāyum+apānam -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet prāṇavāyum apānam

bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet prāṇavāyum apānam+śaṅkhinyām -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet prāṇavāyum apānaṃ śaṅkhinyām

bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet prāṇavāyum apānaṃ śaṅkhinyām+viṇmmūtranāḍiyogam -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet prāṇavāyum apānaṃ śaṅkhinyāṃ viṇmmūtranāḍiyogam

bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet prāṇavāyum apānaṃ śaṅkhinyāṃ viṇmmūtranāḍiyogam+iti| -> bhāvayen nāḍiyogaṃ lalanārasanayor yogān nāḍiyogaṃ madhyamāyāṃ bhāvayet prāṇavāyum apānaṃ śaṅkhinyāṃ viṇmmūtranāḍiyogam iti|

rakṣaṇahetos+pratidinasamaye -> rakṣaṇahetoḥ pratidinasamaye

bodhicittam+tasya -> bodhicittaṃ tasya

tasmāt+kāyārthahetos -> tasmāt kāyārthahetos

tasmāt kāyārthahetos+kāyārthas -> tasmāt kāyārthahetoḥ kāyārthas

tasmāt kāyārthahetoḥ kāyārthas+iti -> tasmāt kāyārthahetoḥ kāyārtha iti

janmani+iha -> janmanīha

paramasukham+anāsravam -> paramasukham anāsravam

paramasukham anāsravam+sukham -> paramasukham anāsravaṃ sukham

paramasukham anāsravaṃ sukham+prāpyate -> paramasukham anāsravaṃ sukhaṃ prāpyate

siddhis+na -> siddhir na

siddhihetos+| -> siddhihetoḥ|

sakalajinatanus+pañcaskandhāditanus -> sakalajinatanuḥ pañcaskandhāditanus

sakalajinatanuḥ pañcaskandhāditanus+mantriṇā -> sakalajinatanuḥ pañcaskandhāditanur mantriṇā

atas+kāraṇāt -> ataḥ kāraṇāt

ataḥ kāraṇāt+ādau -> ataḥ kāraṇād ādau

tathā+apānaśaktis -> tathāpānaśaktis

tathāpānaśaktis+--- -> tathāpānaśaktiḥ---

bhūtoyāgnimarucchūnyam+saṃhāreṇa -> bhūtoyāgnimarucchūnyaṃ saṃhāreṇa

bhagavān+āha -> bhagavān āha

sattvānām+prāṇas -> sattvānāṃ prāṇas

sattvānāṃ prāṇas+apānas -> sattvānāṃ prāṇo 'pānas

sattvānāṃ prāṇo 'pānas+ca -> sattvānāṃ prāṇo 'pānaś ca

kiṃkaratvam+prayāti|| -> kiṃkaratvaṃ prayāti||

sidhe+anyasiddhis -> sidhe 'nyasiddhis

sidhe 'nyasiddhis+tribhuvanailaye -> sidhe 'nyasiddhis tribhuvanailaye

janmani+iha| -> janmanīha|

paramasukham+prāpyate -> paramasukhaṃ prāpyate

siddhis+na -> siddhir na

sakalajinatanus+mantriṇā -> sakalajinatanur mantriṇā

idānīm+laukikalokottarasiddhihetos -> idānīṃ laukikalokottarasiddhihetos

idānīṃ laukikalokottarasiddhihetos+tanurakṣaṇam -> idānīṃ laukikalokottarasiddhihetos tanurakṣaṇam

idānīṃ laukikalokottarasiddhihetos tanurakṣaṇam+upadiśan -> idānīṃ laukikalokottarasiddhihetos tanurakṣaṇam upadiśan

idānīṃ laukikalokottarasiddhihetos tanurakṣaṇam upadiśan+āha---adau -> idānīṃ laukikalokottarasiddhihetos tanurakṣaṇam upadiśann āha---adau

idānīṃ laukikalokottarasiddhihetos tanurakṣaṇam upadiśann āha---adau+ityādi -> idānīṃ laukikalokottarasiddhihetos tanurakṣaṇam upadiśann āha---adāv ityādi

rasāyanādibālatantramahoddeśas+| -> rasāyanādibālatantramahoddeśaḥ|

tām+cittaśaktim -> tāṃ cittaśaktim

turyā+utpādanirodhadharmiṇī -> turyotpādanirodhadharmiṇī

turyotpādanirodhadharmiṇī+avasthā -> turyotpādanirodhadharmiṇy avasthā

tāsām+pradātā -> tāsāṃ pradātā

jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇās+iti -> jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaturyālakṣaṇā iti

cittaśaktayas+atra -> cittaśaktayo 'tra

cittaśaktim+vivarjya| -> cittaśaktiṃ vivarjya|

kaścit+asti -> kaścid asti

duḥkhasaukhyos+pradātā -> duḥkhasaukhyoḥ pradātā

saṃsāre+ātmā -> saṃsāra ātmā

viṣayavirahitas+dehamadhye -> viṣayavirahito dehamadhye

jalam+nīyamāne -> jalaṃ nīyamāne

ākāśam+kumbhamadhye -> ākāśaṃ kumbhamadhye

cittaśaktim+vivarjya| -> cittaśaktiṃ vivarjya|

kaścit+bhavati -> kaścid bhavati

bandhas+mokṣas -> bandho mokṣas

bandho mokṣas+na -> bandho mokṣo na

idānīm+duḥkhasaukhyapradātā -> idānīṃ duḥkhasaukhyapradātā

idānīṃ duḥkhasaukhyapradātā+ucyate---ātmā -> idānīṃ duḥkhasaukhyapradātocyate---ātmā

idānīṃ duḥkhasaukhyapradātocyate---ātmā+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ duḥkhasaukhyapradātocyate---ātmetyādinā|

prakṛtis+jñānamūrtis -> prakṛtir jñānamūrtis

prakṛtir jñānamūrtis+sā -> prakṛtir jñānamūrtiḥ sā

cakārāt+aparā -> cakārād aparā

prakṛtis+sthūlādi -> prakṛtiḥ sthūlādi

evam+trividhā -> evaṃ trividhā

paśyati+iti -> paśyatīti

paśyatīti+āhus -> paśyatīty āhus

paśyatīty āhus+ekībhūtas -> paśyatīty āhur ekībhūtas

paśyatīty āhur ekībhūtas+ityādilakṣaṇā(?)| -> paśyatīty āhur ekībhūta ityādilakṣaṇā(?)|

sarvabhāvaparityāgāt+iti -> sarvabhāvaparityāgād iti

manomayendriyais+māyopamabhāvagrahaṇāt -> manomayendriyair māyopamabhāvagrahaṇāt

manomayendriyair māyopamabhāvagrahaṇāt+iti| -> manomayendriyair māyopamabhāvagrahaṇād iti|

jaḍavāsanāgrāhakasya+iti| -> jaḍavāsanāgrāhakasyeti|

jāgradbhāvagrahaṇāt+iti -> jāgradbhāvagrahaṇād iti

varṇabindvādibhedais+sthūlāsthūlendriyeṣu -> varṇabindvādibhedaiḥ sthūlāsthūlendriyeṣu

guṇagatā+iti -> guṇagateti

eṣām+punas -> eṣāṃ punas

eṣāṃ punas+tridhā -> eṣāṃ punas tridhā

prakṛtis+pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśamanobuddhyahaṃkārātmikāṣṭavidhā -> prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśamanobuddhyahaṃkārātmikāṣṭavidhā

prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśamanobuddhyahaṃkārātmikāṣṭavidhā+iti -> prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśamanobuddhyahaṃkārātmikāṣṭavidheti

śarīre+ādau -> śarīra ādau

śarīra ādau+aṣṭavidhā -> śarīra ādāv aṣṭavidhā

jñānamūrtis+prakṛtis -> jñānamūrtiḥ prakṛtis

jñānamūrtiḥ prakṛtis+avikṛtis -> jñānamūrtiḥ prakṛtir avikṛtis

jñānamūrtiḥ prakṛtir avikṛtis+jīvabhūtā -> jñānamūrtiḥ prakṛtir avikṛtir jīvabhūtā

prakṛtis+adhigatā -> prakṛtir adhigatā

varṇabindvādibhedais+| -> varṇabindvādibhedaiḥ|

manas+buddhyahaṃkāracittam -> mano buddhyahaṃkāracittam

pṛthvītoyāgnivātās+gaganam -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātā gaganam

pṛthvītoyāgnivātā gaganam+api -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātā gaganam api

prakṛtis+ucyate---pṛthvī -> prakṛtir ucyate---pṛthvī

prakṛtir ucyate---pṛthvī+ityādinā| -> prakṛtir ucyate---pṛthvītyādinā|

idānīm+pṛthivyādyaṣṭavidhā -> idānīṃ pṛthivyādyaṣṭavidhā

karmabandhaniyamas+|| -> karmabandhaniyamaḥ||

muhyate+ajñānalokas -> muhyate 'jñānalokas

muhyate 'jñānalokas+mithyātmakartāparikalpanayā -> muhyate 'jñānaloko mithyātmakartāparikalpanayā

muhyate 'jñānaloko mithyātmakartāparikalpanayā+iti -> muhyate 'jñānaloko mithyātmakartāparikalpanayeti

karoti+iti -> karotīti

karotīti+arthas -> karotīty arthas

karotīty arthas+| -> karotīty arthaḥ|

prakṛtivirahitas+aṣṭādaśadhāturahitas -> prakṛtivirahito 'ṣṭādaśadhāturahitas

prakṛtivirahito 'ṣṭādaśadhāturahitas+na -> prakṛtivirahito 'ṣṭādaśadhāturahito na

kim+karoti -> kiṃ karoti

kas+kartā -> kaḥ kartā

prakṛtiguṇagatam+duḥkhasaukhyam -> prakṛtiguṇagataṃ duḥkhasaukhyam

prakṛtiguṇagataṃ duḥkhasaukhyam+karoti -> prakṛtiguṇagataṃ duḥkhasaukhyaṃ karoti

tasmāt+rājan -> tasmād rājan

tasmād rājan+svakarma -> tasmād rājan svakarma

muñcati+ātmānam -> muñcaty ātmānam

muñcaty ātmānam+saṃsāraduḥkhāt -> muñcaty ātmānaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhāt

muñcaty ātmānaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhāt+iti| -> muñcaty ātmānaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhād iti|

tasmāt+nirvikalpamanasā -> tasmān nirvikalpamanasā

prakṛtigataguṇais+vikalpais -> prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpais

prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpais+muktas -> prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair muktas

prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair muktas+nirvikalpas -> prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair mukto nirvikalpas

prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair mukto nirvikalpas+bhavati -> prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair mukto nirvikalpo bhavati

punas+sas -> punaḥ sas

punaḥ sas+ātmā -> punaḥ sa ātmā

nirvikalpāt+iti -> nirvikalpād iti

punar+api -> punar api

ātmānam+ca -> ātmānaṃ ca

ātmānaṃ ca+ātmanā -> ātmānaṃ cātmanā

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas+tais -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas tais

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas tais+prakṛtigataguṇais -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇais

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇais+vikalpais -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpais

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpais+badhnāti -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāti

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāti+ātmānam -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānam

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānam+kośakīṭas -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭas

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭas+yathā -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathā

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathā+eva -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaiva

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaiva+ātmānam -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaivātmānam

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaivātmānam+guṇais -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaivātmānaṃ guṇais

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaivātmānaṃ guṇais+svatanunirgatais -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaivātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ svatanunirgatais

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaivātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ svatanunirgatais+tantubhis -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaivātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ svatanunirgatais tantubhis

bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaivātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ svatanunirgatais tantubhis+badhnāti| -> bhāvābhavavikalpalakṣaṇas taiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair vikalpair badhnāty ātmānaṃ kośakīṭo yathaivātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ svatanunirgatais tantubhir badhnāti|

gataguṇās+utpādanirodhalakṣaṇās -> gataguṇā utpādanirodhalakṣaṇās

gataguṇā utpādanirodhalakṣaṇās+gandhādayas -> gataguṇā utpādanirodhalakṣaṇā gandhādayas

gataguṇā utpādanirodhalakṣaṇā gandhādayas+saṃsāracittasya -> gataguṇā utpādanirodhalakṣaṇā gandhādayaḥ saṃsāracittasya

prakṛtis+skandhadhātvāyatanasamūhas -> prakṛtiḥ skandhadhātvāyatanasamūhas

prakṛtiḥ skandhadhātvāyatanasamūhas+tatra -> prakṛtiḥ skandhadhātvāyatanasamūhas tatra

vikalpais+prakṛtigataguṇais -> vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇais

vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇais+iti| -> vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇair iti|

ca+ātmānam -> cātmānam

cātmānam+badhnāti -> cātmānaṃ badhnāti

skandhāhaṃkāramātras+saṃsāras -> skandhāhaṃkāramātraḥ saṃsāras

skandhāhaṃkāramātraḥ saṃsāras+ātmā -> skandhāhaṃkāramātraḥ saṃsāra ātmā

prakṛtivirahitas+muhyate -> prakṛtivirahito muhyate

prakṛtivirahito muhyate+ajñānalokas -> prakṛtivirahito muhyate 'jñānalokas

prakṛtivirahito muhyate 'jñānalokas+|| -> prakṛtivirahito muhyate 'jñānalokaḥ||

kim+karoti -> kiṃ karoti

kas+kartā -> kaḥ kartā

tasmād rājan+svakarma -> tasmād rājan svakarma

punar+api -> punar api

ātmānam+ca -> ātmānaṃ ca

ātmānaṃ ca+ātmanā -> ātmānaṃ cātmanā

vikalpais+prakṛtigataguṇais -> vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇais

vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇais+kośakīṭas -> vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇaiḥ kośakīṭas

vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇaiḥ kośakīṭas+yathā -> vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇaiḥ kośakīṭo yathā

vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇaiḥ kośakīṭo yathā+eva -> vikalpaiḥ prakṛtigataguṇaiḥ kośakīṭo yathaiva

badhnāti+ātmā -> badhnāty ātmā

idānīm+saṃsārabandhas -> idānīṃ saṃsārabandhas

idānīṃ saṃsārabandhas+ucyate---badhnāti -> idānīṃ saṃsārabandha ucyate---badhnāti

idānīṃ saṃsārabandha ucyate---badhnāti+ātmā -> idānīṃ saṃsārabandha ucyate---badhnāty ātmā

idānīṃ saṃsārabandha ucyate---badhnāty ātmā+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ saṃsārabandha ucyate---badhnāty ātmetyādinā|

samudayaniyamas+| -> samudayaniyamaḥ|

kālaprabhāvāt+cyutikṣaṇaprabhāvāt -> kālaprabhāvāc cyutikṣaṇaprabhāvāt

kālaprabhāvāc cyutikṣaṇaprabhāvāt+iti -> kālaprabhāvāc cyutikṣaṇaprabhāvād iti

kālaprabhāvāc cyutikṣaṇaprabhāvād iti+arthas -> kālaprabhāvāc cyutikṣaṇaprabhāvād ity arthas

kālaprabhāvāc cyutikṣaṇaprabhāvād ity arthas+| -> kālaprabhāvāc cyutikṣaṇaprabhāvād ity arthaḥ|

etat+trailokyakṛtsnam -> etat trailokyakṛtsnam

etat trailokyakṛtsnam+spharaṇanidhanatām -> etat trailokyakṛtsnaṃ spharaṇanidhanatām

etat trailokyakṛtsnaṃ spharaṇanidhanatām+yāti -> etat trailokyakṛtsnaṃ spharaṇanidhanatāṃ yāti

śukradhātus+ucyate| -> śukradhātur ucyate|

catvāras+arūpiṇas -> catvāro 'rūpiṇas

catvāro 'rūpiṇas+| -> catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ|

dharmadhātus+manas -> dharmadhātur manas

dharmadhātur manas+ca -> dharmadhātur manaś ca

dharmadhātur manaś ca+iti -> dharmadhātur manaś ceti

śabdas+śūnyam -> śabdaḥ śūnyam

śabdaḥ śūnyam+hi -> śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hi

śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hi+arūpam -> śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hy arūpam

śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hy arūpam+bhavati -> śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hy arūpaṃ bhavati

śeṣās+gauṇās -> śeṣā gauṇās

śeṣā gauṇās+bhavanti -> śeṣā gauṇā bhavanti

śeṣā gauṇā bhavanti+iti -> śeṣā gauṇā bhavantīti

eṣām+aṣṭarūpiṇām -> eṣām aṣṭarūpiṇām

eṣām aṣṭarūpiṇām+ekas -> eṣām aṣṭarūpiṇām ekas

eṣām aṣṭarūpiṇām ekas+guṇas -> eṣām aṣṭarūpiṇām eko guṇas

eṣām aṣṭarūpiṇām eko guṇas+mukhyas -> eṣām aṣṭarūpiṇām eko guṇo mukhyas

eṣām aṣṭarūpiṇām eko guṇo mukhyas+bhavati -> eṣām aṣṭarūpiṇām eko guṇo mukhyo bhavati

rūpiṇas+syus -> rūpiṇaḥ syus

rūpiṇaḥ syus+samuditaviṣayās -> rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayās

rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayās+ekamukhyās -> rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyās

rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyās+samastās -> rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyāḥ samastās

rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyāḥ samastās+| -> rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyāḥ samastāḥ|

vāyus+iti -> vāyur iti

vāyur iti+ete -> vāyur ity ete

vāyur ity ete+aṣṭau -> vāyur ity ete 'ṣṭau

toyas+vahnis -> toyo vahnis

toyo vahnis+ca -> toyo vahniś ca

samudayas+gandhas -> samudayo gandhas

samudayo gandhas+varṇas -> samudayo gandho varṇas

samudayo gandho varṇas+rasas -> samudayo gandho varṇo rasas

samudayo gandho varṇo rasas+sparśas -> samudayo gandho varṇo rasaḥ sparśas

samudayo gandho varṇo rasaḥ sparśas+iti -> samudayo gandho varṇo rasaḥ sparśa iti

samudayāt+utpādas -> samudayād utpādas

samudayād utpādas+na -> samudayād utpādo na

samudayād utpādo na+ekadharmāt -> samudayād utpādo naikadharmāt

samudayād utpādo naikadharmāt+iti| -> samudayād utpādo naikadharmād iti|

dharmadhātus+manas -> dharmadhātur manas

dharmadhātur manas+ca|| -> dharmadhātur manaś ca||

śabdas+śūnyam -> śabdaḥ śūnyam

śabdaḥ śūnyam+hi -> śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hi

śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hi+arūpam -> śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hy arūpam

śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hy arūpam+bhavati -> śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hy arūpaṃ bhavati

etat+trailokyakṛtsnam -> etat trailokyakṛtsnam

etat trailokyakṛtsnam+spharaṇanidhanatām -> etat trailokyakṛtsnaṃ spharaṇanidhanatām

etat trailokyakṛtsnaṃ spharaṇanidhanatām+yāti -> etat trailokyakṛtsnaṃ spharaṇanidhanatāṃ yāti

rūpiṇas+syus -> rūpiṇaḥ syus

rūpiṇaḥ syus+samuditaviṣayās -> rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayās

rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayās+ekamukhyās -> rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyās

rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyās+samastās -> rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyāḥ samastās

rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyāḥ samastās+| -> rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyāḥ samastāḥ|

toyavahnis+ca -> toyavahniś ca

gandhas+varṇas -> gandho varṇas

gandho varṇas+rasas -> gandho varṇo rasas

gandho varṇo rasas+sparśas -> gandho varṇo rasaḥ sparśas

gandho varṇo rasaḥ sparśas+iti -> gandho varṇo rasaḥ sparśa iti

idānīm+samudayādikam -> idānīṃ samudayādikam

idānīṃ samudayādikam+ucyate--gandhas -> idānīṃ samudayādikam ucyate--gandhas

idānīṃ samudayādikam ucyate--gandhas+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ samudayādikam ucyate--gandha ityādinā|

kartṛkṣayaniyamas+|| -> kartṛkṣayaniyamaḥ||

nirvāṇalakṣaṇas+na -> nirvāṇalakṣaṇo na

nirvāṇalakṣaṇo na+asti -> nirvāṇalakṣaṇo nāsti

nirvāṇalakṣaṇo nāsti+iti -> nirvāṇalakṣaṇo nāstīti

nirvāṇalakṣaṇo nāstīti+arthas -> nirvāṇalakṣaṇo nāstīty arthas

nirvāṇalakṣaṇo nāstīty arthas+iti -> nirvāṇalakṣaṇo nāstīty artha iti

atas+sṛṣṭisaṃhārakartā -> ataḥ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakartā

viṣayavirahitas+nirguṇas -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇas

viṣayavirahito nirguṇas+niḥsvabhāvas -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvas

viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvas+sahajakāyas -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyas

viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyas+niḥkalas -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyo niḥkalas

viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyo niḥkalas+savargas -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyo niḥkalaḥ savargas

viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyo niḥkalaḥ savargas+vyāpī -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyo niḥkalaḥ savargo vyāpī

viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyo niḥkalaḥ savargo vyāpī+iti| -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyo niḥkalaḥ savargo vyāpīti|

tatas+vyomavyāpī -> tato vyomavyāpī

bhavet+yatas -> bhaved yatas

bhaved yatas+sṛṣṭikartā -> bhaved yataḥ sṛṣṭikartā

eṣām+cyutikṣaṇādīnām -> eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnām

eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnām+kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇas -> eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnāṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇas

eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnāṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇas+saṃhārakartā -> eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnāṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇaḥ saṃhārakartā

eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnāṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇaḥ saṃhārakartā+aparas -> eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnāṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇaḥ saṃhārakartāparas

eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnāṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇaḥ saṃhārakartāparas+iha -> eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnāṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇaḥ saṃhārakartāpara iha

kartā+ālayavijñānalakṣaṇas -> kartālayavijñānalakṣaṇas

kartālayavijñānalakṣaṇas+śukracyutikṣaṇas -> kartālayavijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śukracyutikṣaṇas

kartālayavijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śukracyutikṣaṇas+sahajānandas -> kartālayavijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śukracyutikṣaṇaḥ sahajānandas

kartālayavijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śukracyutikṣaṇaḥ sahajānandas+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> kartālayavijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śukracyutikṣaṇaḥ sahajānando lokasaṃvṛtyā

kartālayavijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śukracyutikṣaṇaḥ sahajānando lokasaṃvṛtyā+iti| -> kartālayavijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śukracyutikṣaṇaḥ sahajānando lokasaṃvṛtyeti|

karaṇam+etat -> karaṇam etat

karaṇam etat+samastam| -> karaṇam etat samastam|

ahorātram+tithayas -> ahorātraṃ tithayas

ahorātraṃ tithayas+pañcadaśa -> ahorātraṃ tithayaḥ pañcadaśa

pakṣās+caturviṃśatis -> pakṣāś caturviṃśatis

pakṣāś caturviṃśatis+dinaniśi -> pakṣāś caturviṃśatir dinaniśi

varṣās+māsās -> varṣā māsās

varṣā māsās+ca -> varṣā māsāś ca

karaṇam+indriyāṇām -> karaṇam indriyāṇām

karaṇam indriyāṇām+ṣaṭkam -> karaṇam indriyāṇāṃ ṣaṭkam

karaṇam indriyāṇāṃ ṣaṭkam+śrotrakāyacakṣurjihvāghrāṇamanaḥṣaṭkam| -> karaṇam indriyāṇāṃ ṣaṭkaṃ śrotrakāyacakṣurjihvāghrāṇamanaḥṣaṭkam|

śabdasparśarūparasagandhadharmadhātuṣaṭkam+karma -> śabdasparśarūparasagandhadharmadhātuṣaṭkaṃ karma

viṣayavirahitas+nirguṇas -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇas

viṣayavirahito nirguṇas+niḥsvabhāvas -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvas

viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvas+|| -> viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ||

bhavet+sṛṣṭikartā -> bhavet sṛṣṭikartā

eṣām+saṃhārakartā -> eṣāṃ saṃhārakartā

eṣāṃ saṃhārakartā+aparas -> eṣāṃ saṃhārakartāparas

eṣāṃ saṃhārakartāparas+iha -> eṣāṃ saṃhārakartāpara iha

pakṣās+dinaniśitithayas -> pakṣā dinaniśitithayas

pakṣā dinaniśitithayas+candrasūryau -> pakṣā dinaniśitithayaś candrasūryau

varṣās+māsās -> varṣā māsās

varṣā māsās+ca -> varṣā māsāś ca

karaṇam+tu -> karaṇaṃ tu

karaṇaṃ tu+indriyāṇām -> karaṇaṃ tv indriyāṇām

karaṇaṃ tv indriyāṇām+ca -> karaṇaṃ tv indriyāṇāṃ ca

śabdādyam+karmaṣaṭkam -> śabdādyaṃ karmaṣaṭkam

śabdādyaṃ karmaṣaṭkam+bhavati -> śabdādyaṃ karmaṣaṭkaṃ bhavati

śabdādyam+ityādinā| -> śabdādyam ityādinā|

idānīm+karmakaraṇādikam -> idānīṃ karmakaraṇādikam

idānīṃ karmakaraṇādikam+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> idānīṃ karmakaraṇādikaṃ lokasaṃvṛtyā

idānīṃ karmakaraṇādikaṃ lokasaṃvṛtyā+ucyate -> idānīṃ karmakaraṇādikaṃ lokasaṃvṛtyocyate

saṃvṛtikartāniyamas+|| -> saṃvṛtikartāniyamaḥ||

krameṇa+iti -> krameṇeti

sṛṣṭihetos+punar -> sṛṣṭihetoḥ punar

sṛṣṭihetoḥ punar+aparotpādahetos -> sṛṣṭihetoḥ punar aparotpādahetos

sṛṣṭihetoḥ punar aparotpādahetos+muñcati -> sṛṣṭihetoḥ punar aparotpādahetor muñcati

tyajati+iti -> tyajatīti

tyajatīti+arthas -> tyajatīty arthas

tyajatīty arthas+| -> tyajatīty arthaḥ|

vikurvitān+khalu -> vikurvitan khalu

nānābhāvais+graste -> nānābhāvair graste

bhūyas+punas -> bhūyaḥ punas

bhūyaḥ punas+muñcanti -> bhūyaḥ punar muñcanti

bhūyaḥ punar muñcanti+anantān -> bhūyaḥ punar muñcanty anantān

bhūyaḥ punar muñcanty anantān+śarīre -> bhūyaḥ punar muñcanty anantāñ charīre

rātribhāge+utpattikāle| -> rātribhāga utpattikāle|

candrādityādidevān+grasati -> candrādityādidevān grasati

viṭ+iti| -> viḍ iti|

rudras+mūtram -> rudro mūtram

rudro mūtram+viṣṇus -> rudro mūtraṃ viṣṇus

rudro mūtraṃ viṣṇus+brahmā -> rudro mūtraṃ viṣṇur brahmā

rajas+śukrādhārasthitas -> rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitas

rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitas+kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārtham -> rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārtham

rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārtham+candras -> rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candras

rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candras+śukram -> rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candraḥ śukram

rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candraḥ śukram+īśvaras -> rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candraḥ śukram īśvaras

rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candraḥ śukram īśvaras+rajas -> rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candraḥ śukram īśvaro rajas

rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candraḥ śukram īśvaro rajas+sūryas -> rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candraḥ śukram īśvaro rajaḥ sūryas

rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candraḥ śukram īśvaro rajaḥ sūryas+sadāśivas -> rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārthaṃ candraḥ śukram īśvaro rajaḥ sūryaḥ sadāśivas

candras+śukram -> candraḥ śukram

candraḥ śukram+ādityas -> candraḥ śukram ādityas

candraḥ śukram ādityas+rajas -> candraḥ śukram ādityo rajas

candraḥ śukram ādityo rajas+ādiśabdena -> candraḥ śukram ādityo raja ādiśabdena

sas+ālayavijñānalakṣaṇas -> sa ālayavijñānalakṣaṇas

sa ālayavijñānalakṣaṇas+mātṛgarbhe -> sa ālayavijñānalakṣaṇo mātṛgarbhe

rātribhāge+utpattikāle -> rātribhāga utpattikāle

rātribhāgas+candras -> rātribhāgaś candras

rātribhāgaś candras+sṛṣṭis -> rātribhāgaś candraḥ sṛṣṭis

rātribhāgaś candraḥ sṛṣṭis+divābhāgas -> rātribhāgaś candraḥ sṛṣṭir divābhāgas

rātribhāgaś candraḥ sṛṣṭir divābhāgas+sūryas -> rātribhāgaś candraḥ sṛṣṭir divābhāgaḥ sūryas

rātribhāgaś candraḥ sṛṣṭir divābhāgaḥ sūryas+saṃhāras -> rātribhāgaś candraḥ sṛṣṭir divābhāgaḥ sūryaḥ saṃhāras

rātribhāgaś candraḥ sṛṣṭir divābhāgaḥ sūryaḥ saṃhāras+tān(?)| -> rātribhāgaś candraḥ sṛṣṭir divābhāgaḥ sūryaḥ saṃhāras tān(?)|

sabhūtān+iti -> sabhūtān iti

sabhūtān iti+iha -> sabhūtān itīha

bhagavān+rātribhāge -> bhagavān rātribhāge

yatas+candrādityādidevān -> yataś candrādityādidevān

yataś candrādityādidevān+grasati -> yataś candrādityādidevān grasati

prasiddham+vākyam -> prasiddhaṃ vākyam

prasiddhaṃ vākyam+iti -> prasiddhaṃ vākyam iti

prasiddhaṃ vākyam iti+ucyate| -> prasiddhaṃ vākyam ity ucyate|

sarvatra+agnisūryasomātmakam -> sarvatrāgnisūryasomātmakam

sarvatrāgnisūryasomātmakam+jagat -> sarvatrāgnisūryasomātmakaṃ jagat

sarvatrāgnisūryasomātmakaṃ jagat+iti -> sarvatrāgnisūryasomātmakaṃ jagad iti

sūryacandras+iti| -> sūryacandra iti|

kasmāt+na -> kasmān na

karoti+iti -> karotīti

karotīti+arthas -> karotīty arthas

karotīty arthas+| -> karotīty arthaḥ|

sūryas+rajas -> sūryo rajas

sūryo rajas+candras -> sūryo rajaś candras

sūryo rajaś candras+śukram -> sūryo rajaś candraḥ śukram

sūryo rajaś candraḥ śukram+ālayavijñānena -> sūryo rajaś candraḥ śukram ālayavijñānena

sūryas+| -> sūryaḥ|

punar+api -> punar api

cyutikṣaṇas+loke -> cyutikṣaṇo loke

bālakaumārādirūpam+karoti -> bālakaumārādirūpaṃ karoti

prasavanasamayam+karoti -> prasavanasamayaṃ karoti

tatas+garbhāśaye -> tato garbhāśaye

rajaḥśukrasaṃyuktam+ālayavijñānadharmī -> rajaḥśukrasaṃyuktam ālayavijñānadharmī

yas+cyutikṣaṇas -> yaś cyutikṣaṇas

yaś cyutikṣaṇas+sattvānām -> yaś cyutikṣaṇaḥ sattvānām

yaś cyutikṣaṇaḥ sattvānām+utpattim -> yaś cyutikṣaṇaḥ sattvānām utpattim

yaś cyutikṣaṇaḥ sattvānām utpattim+karoti -> yaś cyutikṣaṇaḥ sattvānām utpattiṃ karoti

punas+api -> punar api

prasavanasamayam+bālakaumārarūpam -> prasavanasamayaṃ bālakaumārarūpam

idānīṃ lokasaṃvṛtyām+sṛṣṭisaṃhāralakṣaṇas -> idānīṃ lokasaṃvṛtyāṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhāralakṣaṇas

idānīṃ lokasaṃvṛtyāṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhāralakṣaṇas+kartā -> idānīṃ lokasaṃvṛtyāṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhāralakṣaṇaḥ kartā

praṇidhānacittam+prasthānacittam -> praṇidhānacittaṃ prasthānacittam

dharmadānaṃ mahācakriṇas tat+svadehe -> dharmadānaṃ mahācakriṇas tat svadehe

yat+bāhye -> yad bāhye

mokṣamārgalābhas+| -> mokṣamārgalābhaḥ|

śrījayo yas+bāhye -> śrījayo yo bāhye

tat+svadehe -> tat svadehe

yas+bāhye -> yo bāhye

danubalam+hastyaśvapādātikam -> danubalaṃ hastyaśvapādātikam

danubalaṃ hastyaśvapādātikam+sa -> danubalaṃ hastyaśvapādātikaṃ sa

yat+bāhye -> yad bāhye

dehe 'vidyāpravṛttis+iti -> dehe 'vidyāpravṛttir iti

yas+bāhye -> yo bāhye

yo bāhye+aśvatthāmā -> yo bāhye 'śvatthāmā

māyārūpam+tu -> māyārūpaṃ tu

niyatam+dehinām -> niyataṃ dehinām

vividhamahitale+anekabuddhās -> vividhamahitale 'nekabuddhās

vividhamahitale 'nekabuddhās+viśuddhās -> vividhamahitale 'nekabuddhā viśuddhās

vividhamahitale 'nekabuddhā viśuddhās+| -> vividhamahitale 'nekabuddhā viśuddhāḥ|

śrīrajas+bodhicittam -> śrīrajo bodhicittam

mañjuśrīs+lokanāthas -> mañjuśrīr lokanāthas

mañjuśrīr lokanāthas+tribhuvanavijayī -> mañjuśrīr lokanāthas tribhuvanavijayī

putras+brahmāsureśas -> putro brahmāsureśas

putro brahmāsureśas+tridaśanaraguros -> putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguros

putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguros+pṛṣṭhatas -> putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhatas

putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhatas+ca -> putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca

putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca+agratas -> putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāgratas

putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāgratas+yas -> putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāgrato yas

putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāgrato yas+|| -> putro brahmāsureśas tridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāgrato yaḥ||

dharmadānam+bhavabhayaharaṇam -> dharmadānaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇam

dharmadānaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇam+dravyapūrṇā -> dharmadānaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ dravyapūrṇā

bhavabhayanidhanam+śrījayas -> bhavabhayanidhanaṃ śrījayas

bhavabhayanidhanaṃ śrījayas+mokṣamārgas -> bhavabhayanidhanaṃ śrījayo mokṣamārgas

bhavabhayanidhanaṃ śrījayo mokṣamārgas+| -> bhavabhayanidhanaṃ śrījayo mokṣamārgaḥ|

saṃhāras+tasya -> saṃhāras tasya

danubalasakalam+mārapakṣas -> danubalasakalaṃ mārapakṣas

danubalasakalaṃ mārapakṣas+caturdhā -> danubalasakalaṃ mārapakṣaś caturdhā

tu+avidyā -> tv avidyā

kṛnmatis+duḥkhadātā -> kṛnmatir duḥkhadātā

kṛnmatir duḥkhadātā+akuśalapathi -> kṛnmatir duḥkhadātākuśalapathi

kṛnmatir duḥkhadātākuśalapathi+iti -> kṛnmatir duḥkhadātākuśalapathīti

yas+bāhye -> yo bāhye

yas+bāhye -> yo bāhye

hanūmān+sa -> hanūman sa

rudras+sa -> rudraḥ sa

yas+bāhye -> yo bāhye

gajaturagarathās+kiṃkarās -> gajaturagarathāḥ kiṃkarās

gajaturagarathāḥ kiṃkarās+āryāpramāṇās -> gajaturagarathāḥ kiṃkarā āryāpramāṇās

gajaturagarathāḥ kiṃkarā āryāpramāṇās+catvāras -> gajaturagarathāḥ kiṃkarā āryāpramāṇāś catvāras

gajaturagarathāḥ kiṃkarā āryāpramāṇāś catvāras+dehe -> gajaturagarathāḥ kiṃkarā āryāpramāṇāś catvāro dehe

tasmād dhetos+| -> tasmād dhetoḥ|

samyagjñānam+svadehe -> samyagjñānaṃ svadehe

yas+kalkī -> yaḥ kalkī

dvādaśāṅkās+niruddhās -> dvādaśāṅkā niruddhās

dvādaśāṅkā niruddhās+iti| -> dvādaśāṅkā niruddhā iti|

suravarapatayo dvādaśeśvarādayas+| -> suravarapatayo dvādaśeśvarādayaḥ|

cittavajra iti+arthas -> cittavajra ity arthas

prathamapataḷa uktas+sa -> prathamapataḷa uktaḥ sa

yat+kṛnmatis -> yat kṛnmatis

pāpaṃ mlecchendraduṣṭas+tu -> pāpaṃ mlecchendraduṣṭas tu

pāpaṃ mlecchendraduṣṭas tu+akuśalapathi -> pāpaṃ mlecchendraduṣṭas tv akuśalapathi

hanumāñ chrāvakam+prāṇinām -> hanumāñ chrāvakaṃ prāṇinām

hanumāñ chrāvakaṃ prāṇinām+ca -> hanumāñ chrāvakaṃ prāṇināṃ ca

idānīm+cakravartimlecchayuddham -> idānīṃ cakravartimlecchayuddham

prāṇādivāyuprakṛtyabhedā api+evam -> prāṇādivāyuprakṛtyabhedā apy evam

sandhibhedās+ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās -> sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās

sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās+tais -> sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās tais

sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās tais+sandhibhedais -> sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās taiḥ sandhibhedais

sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās taiḥ sandhibhedais+ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatanāḍīcakrabhedās -> sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās taiḥ sandhibhedaiḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatanāḍīcakrabhedās

sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās taiḥ sandhibhedaiḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatanāḍīcakrabhedās+bhavanti -> sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās taiḥ sandhibhedaiḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatanāḍīcakrabhedā bhavanti

sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās taiḥ sandhibhedaiḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatanāḍīcakrabhedā bhavanti+iti| -> sandhibhedāḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasaṃkhyās taiḥ sandhibhedaiḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatanāḍīcakrabhedā bhavantīti|

bahuvidham+sandhibhedais -> bahuvidhaṃ sandhibhedais

bahuvidhaṃ sandhibhedais+anekais -> bahuvidhaṃ sandhibhedair anekais

bahuvidhaṃ sandhibhedair anekais+iti| -> bahuvidhaṃ sandhibhedair anekair iti|

etac chrīnāḍicakram+bhavati -> etac chrīnāḍicakraṃ bhavati

candrapathagatā+iḍā -> candrapathagateḍā

trividhapathagatās+iti -> trividhapathagatā iti

piṅgās+sūkṣmās -> piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās

piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās+tu -> piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tu

piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tu+iḍādyās -> piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tv iḍādyās

piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tv iḍādyās+tisras -> piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tv iḍādyās tisras

piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tv iḍādyās tisras+nāḍyas -> piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tv iḍādyās tisro nāḍyas

piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tv iḍādyās tisro nāḍyas+iḍādayas -> piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tv iḍādyās tisro nāḍya iḍādayas

piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tv iḍādyās tisro nāḍya iḍādayas+| -> piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tv iḍādyās tisro nāḍya iḍādayaḥ|

piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās+tu -> piṅgāḥ sūkṣmās tu

prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+iti -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād iti

prakṛtiguṇavaśād ity udakaprakṛtivaśāt+gātrabhaṅgam -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād ity udakaprakṛtivaśād gātrabhaṅgam

prakṛtiguṇavaśād ity udakaprakṛtivaśād gātrabhaṅgam+tathā -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād ity udakaprakṛtivaśād gātrabhaṅgaṃ tathā

prakṛtiguṇavaśād ity udakaprakṛtivaśād gātrabhaṅgaṃ tathā+eva -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād ity udakaprakṛtivaśād gātrabhaṅgaṃ tathaiva

vyāno vyādhim+karoti -> vyāno vyādhiṃ karoti

karacaraṇair nāṭyam+karoti -> karacaraṇair nāṭyaṃ karoti

gītādikaṃ hāsyālāpādikam+karoti -> gītādikaṃ hāsyālāpādikaṃ karoti

sas+eva -> sa eva

sa eva+udānas -> sa evodānas

vāyus+mukhakaracaraṇais -> vāyur mukhakaracaraṇais

vāyur mukhakaracaraṇair gītanāṭyam+karoti| -> vāyur mukhakaracaraṇair gītanāṭyaṃ karoti|

spandati+udānas -> spandaty udānas

spandaty udānas+nāma -> spandaty udāno nāma

samarasam+karoti -> samarasaṃ karoti

samarasaṃ karoti+iti -> samarasaṃ karotīti

samarasaṃ karotīti+arthas -> samarasaṃ karotīty arthas

samarasaṃ karotīty arthas+| -> samarasaṃ karotīty arthaḥ|

vāyus+saptadhātuṣu -> vāyuḥ saptadhātuṣu

samānas+nāma -> samāno nāma

sakalam+samarasam -> sakalaṃ samarasam

sakalaṃ samarasam+tulyarasam -> sakalaṃ samarasaṃ tulyarasam

sakalaṃ samarasaṃ tulyarasam+yāvat -> sakalaṃ samarasaṃ tulyarasaṃ yāvat

sakalaṃ samarasaṃ tulyarasaṃ yāvat+kāye -> sakalaṃ samarasaṃ tulyarasaṃ yāvat kāye

annapānam+samastam -> annapānaṃ samastam

annapānaṃ samastam+yat -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yat

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yat+rasam -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasam

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasam+bhakṣitam -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam+udakādipītam -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītam

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītam+tat -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat+sakalam -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam+apānavāyus -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyus

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyus+adhas -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyur adhas

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyur adhas+neti -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyur adho neti

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyur adho neti+iti -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyur adho netīti

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyur adho netīti+āgamas -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyur adho netīty āgamas

annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyur adho netīty āgamas+| -> annapānaṃ samastaṃ yad rasaṃ bhakṣitam udakādipītaṃ tat sakalam apānavāyur adho netīty āgamaḥ|

tasyās+pathagatas -> tasyāḥ pathagatas

tasyāḥ pathagatas+iti| -> tasyāḥ pathagata iti|

śaśipathas+iḍā -> śaśipatha iḍā

arkapathas+piṅgalā -> arkapathaḥ piṅgalā

prāṇas+prāṇam -> prāṇaḥ prāṇam

prāṇaḥ prāṇam+balam -> prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ balam

prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ balam+karoti -> prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ balaṃ karoti

prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ balaṃ karoti+arkaśaśipathagatas -> prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ balaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagatas

prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ balaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagatas+san| -> prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ balaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagataḥ san|

prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+gātrabhaṅgam -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād gātrabhaṅgam

prakṛtiguṇavaśād gātrabhaṅgam+tathā -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād gātrabhaṅgaṃ tathā

prakṛtiguṇavaśād gātrabhaṅgaṃ tathā+eva|| -> prakṛtiguṇavaśād gātrabhaṅgaṃ tathaiva||

vyānas+vyādhim -> vyāno vyādhim

vyāno vyādhim+karoti -> vyāno vyādhiṃ karoti

spandati+udānas -> spandaty udānas

spandaty udānas+mukhakaracaraṇais -> spandaty udāno mukhakaracaraṇais

spandaty udāno mukhakaracaraṇais+gītanāṭyam -> spandaty udāno mukhakaracaraṇair gītanāṭyam

spandaty udāno mukhakaracaraṇair gītanāṭyam+karoti -> spandaty udāno mukhakaracaraṇair gītanāṭyaṃ karoti

samānas+| -> samānaḥ|

āpānas+na -> āpāno na

āpāno na+iti -> āpāno neti

āpāno neti+adhastāt -> āpāno nety adhastāt

āpāno nety adhastāt+sakalasamarasam -> āpāno nety adhastāt sakalasamarasam

āpāno nety adhastāt sakalasamarasam+neti -> āpāno nety adhastāt sakalasamarasaṃ neti

prāṇas+prāṇam -> prāṇaḥ prāṇam

prāṇaḥ prāṇam+karoti -> prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ karoti

prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ karoti+arkaśaśipathagatas -> prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagatas

prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagatas+tu -> prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagatas tu

prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagatas tu+annapānam -> prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagatas tv annapānam

prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagatas tv annapānam+samastam -> prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ karoty arkaśaśipathagatas tv annapānaṃ samastam

prāṇas+ityādinā| -> prāṇa ityādinā|

idānīm+prāṇādikṛtyam -> idānīṃ prāṇādikṛtyam

idānīṃ prāṇādikṛtyam+ucyate -> idānīṃ prāṇādikṛtyam ucyate

sūryasya+aṣṭādaśaśatais -> sūryasyāṣṭādaśaśatais

sūryasyāṣṭādaśaśatais+daṇḍais -> sūryasyāṣṭādaśaśatair daṇḍais

sūryasyāṣṭādaśaśatair daṇḍais+ekasaṃkrāntis -> sūryasyāṣṭādaśaśatair daṇḍair ekasaṃkrāntis

sūryasyāṣṭādaśaśatair daṇḍair ekasaṃkrāntis+bhavati| -> sūryasyāṣṭādaśaśatair daṇḍair ekasaṃkrāntir bhavati|

saṃkrāntis+prāṇayugmais -> saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmais

saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmais+dviguṇanavaśatais -> saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmair dviguṇanavaśatais

saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmair dviguṇanavaśatais+iti| -> saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmair dviguṇanavaśatair iti|

prāṇaśaktis+saṃkramantī -> prāṇaśaktiḥ saṃkramantī

prāṇaśaktis+ca -> prāṇaśaktiś ca

pratidinam+dvādaśasaṃkrāntibhedena -> pratidinaṃ dvādaśasaṃkrāntibhedena

tathā+adhyātmani -> tathādhyātmani

sūryas+dvādaśarāśiṣu -> sūryo dvādaśarāśiṣu

jñātavyam+lagnamānam -> jñātavyaṃ lagnamānam

jñātavyaṃ lagnamānam+dhanam -> jñātavyaṃ lagnamānaṃ dhanam

jñātavyaṃ lagnamānaṃ dhanam+ṛṇaviṣayam -> jñātavyaṃ lagnamānaṃ dhanam ṛṇaviṣayam

jñātavyaṃ lagnamānaṃ dhanam ṛṇaviṣayam+ca -> jñātavyaṃ lagnamānaṃ dhanam ṛṇaviṣayaṃ ca

jñātavyaṃ lagnamānaṃ dhanam ṛṇaviṣayaṃ ca+ayanam -> jñātavyaṃ lagnamānaṃ dhanam ṛṇaviṣayaṃ cāyanam

jñātavyaṃ lagnamānaṃ dhanam ṛṇaviṣayaṃ cāyanam+savyamānam|| -> jñātavyaṃ lagnamānaṃ dhanam ṛṇaviṣayaṃ cāyanaṃ savyamānam||

dinaniśam+tatra -> dinaniśaṃ tatra

sthitas+arkas -> sthito 'rkas

sthito 'rkas+bhramati -> sthito 'rko bhramati

yasmin+lagne -> yasmiṃ lagne

saṃkrāntis+prāṇayugmais -> saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmais

saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmais+dviguṇanavaśatais -> saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmair dviguṇanavaśatais

saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmair dviguṇanavaśatais+karkilagne -> saṃkrāntiḥ prāṇayugmair dviguṇanavaśataiḥ karkilagne

idānīm+prāṇaśaktes -> idānīṃ prāṇaśaktes

idānīṃ prāṇaśaktes+nābhyādicaṅkramaṇam -> idānīṃ prāṇaśakter nābhyādicaṅkramaṇam

idānīṃ prāṇaśakter nābhyādicaṅkramaṇam+ucyate--nābhi -> idānīṃ prāṇaśakter nābhyādicaṅkramaṇam ucyate--nābhi

idānīṃ prāṇaśakter nābhyādicaṅkramaṇam ucyate--nābhi+ityādinā| -> idānīṃ prāṇaśakter nābhyādicaṅkramaṇam ucyate--nābhītyādinā|

evam+dvātriṃśat -> evaṃ dvātriṃśat

evaṃ dvātriṃśat+iti| -> evaṃ dvātriṃśad iti|

saha+aṣṭaviṃśat -> sahāṣṭaviṃśat

sahāṣṭaviṃśat+nakṣatrāṇi -> sahāṣṭaviṃśan nakṣatrāṇi

śaktis+|| -> śaktiḥ||

śiras+guhyapadmam -> śiro guhyapadmam

śiro guhyapadmam+ca -> śiro guhyapadmaṃ ca

nandādyaṅguṣṭhaparvakamalam+api -> nandādyaṅguṣṭhaparvakamalam api

śukram+kṛmikulasahitam -> śukraṃ kṛmikulasahitam

śukraṃ kṛmikulasahitam+bhūtayonis -> śukraṃ kṛmikulasahitaṃ bhūtayonis

śukraṃ kṛmikulasahitaṃ bhūtayonis+caturdhā -> śukraṃ kṛmikulasahitaṃ bhūtayoniś caturdhā

nāḍyas+nadyantrameghās -> nāḍyo nadyantrameghās

nāḍyo nadyantrameghās+tu -> nāḍyo nadyantrameghās tu

nāḍyo nadyantrameghās tu+aparaśaśikalās -> nāḍyo nadyantrameghās tv aparaśaśikalās

nāḍyo nadyantrameghās tv aparaśaśikalās+dhātavas -> nāḍyo nadyantrameghās tv aparaśaśikalā dhātavas

nāḍyo nadyantrameghās tv aparaśaśikalā dhātavas+dvisvabhāvās -> nāḍyo nadyantrameghās tv aparaśaśikalā dhātavo dvisvabhāvās

nāḍyo nadyantrameghās tv aparaśaśikalā dhātavo dvisvabhāvās+| -> nāḍyo nadyantrameghās tv aparaśaśikalā dhātavo dvisvabhāvāḥ|

sandhibhedāt+bhavanti -> sandhibhedād bhavanti

nakṣatram+dantapaṅkis -> nakṣatraṃ dantapaṅkis

nakṣatraṃ dantapaṅkis+tu -> nakṣatraṃ dantapaṅkis tu

nakṣatraṃ dantapaṅkis tu+anuditaghaṭikā -> nakṣatraṃ dantapaṅkis tv anuditaghaṭikā

nakṣatram+ityādinā| -> nakṣatram ityādinā|

idānīm+nakṣatrādikam -> idānīṃ nakṣatrādikam

idānīṃ nakṣatrādikam+ucyate -> idānīṃ nakṣatrādikam ucyate

pṛthivyādiniyamas+|| -> pṛthivyādiniyamaḥ||

vaktavyas+iti -> vaktavya iti

eṣām+punar -> eṣāṃ punar

eṣāṃ punar+maṅgalādīnām -> eṣāṃ punar maṅgalādīnām

eṣāṃ punar maṅgalādīnām+ṣaḍindriyabhedas -> eṣāṃ punar maṅgalādīnāṃ ṣaḍindriyabhedas

eṣāṃ punar maṅgalādīnāṃ ṣaḍindriyabhedas+vakṣyamāṇe -> eṣāṃ punar maṅgalādīnāṃ ṣaḍindriyabhedo vakṣyamāṇe

gudarandhram+candras -> gudarandhraṃ candras

gudarandhraṃ candras+mūtrarandhram -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhram

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhram+ravis -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ ravis

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ ravis+śukrarandhram -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhram

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhram+kālāgnis -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnis

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnis+mukharandhram -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhram

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhram+rāhus -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhus

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhus+dakṣiṇanetrarandhram -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhram

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhram+maṅgalas -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalas

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalas+vāmanetrarandhram -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhram

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhram+budhas -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budhas

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budhas+dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhram -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhram

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhram+bṛhaspatis -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatis

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatis+vāmaghrāṇarandhram -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhram

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhram+śukras -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukras

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukras+dakṣiṇakarṇarandhram -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukro dakṣiṇakarṇarandhram

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukro dakṣiṇakarṇarandhram+mandas -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukro dakṣiṇakarṇarandhraṃ mandas

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukro dakṣiṇakarṇarandhraṃ mandas+vāmakarṇarandhram -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukro dakṣiṇakarṇarandhraṃ mando vāmakarṇarandhram

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukro dakṣiṇakarṇarandhraṃ mando vāmakarṇarandhram+ketus -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukro dakṣiṇakarṇarandhraṃ mando vāmakarṇarandhraṃ ketus

gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukro dakṣiṇakarṇarandhraṃ mando vāmakarṇarandhraṃ ketus+iti| -> gudarandhraṃ candro mūtrarandhraṃ raviḥ śukrarandhraṃ kālāgnir mukharandhraṃ rāhur dakṣiṇanetrarandhraṃ maṅgalo vāmanetrarandhraṃ budho dakṣiṇaghrāṇarandhraṃ bṛhaspatir vāmaghrāṇarandhraṃ śukro dakṣiṇakarṇarandhraṃ mando vāmakarṇarandhraṃ ketur iti|

randhrabhedās+daśa -> randhrabhedā daśa

jyotiṣas+ādityādayas -> jyotiṣa ādityādayas

jyotiṣa ādityādayas+grahās -> jyotiṣa ādityādayo grahās

jyotiṣa ādityādayo grahās+te -> jyotiṣa ādityādayo grahās te

nāḍyas+pañcamaṇḍalavāhinyas -> nāḍyaḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhinyas

nāḍyaḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhinyas+| -> nāḍyaḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhinyaḥ|

saṃkrāntis+māsais -> saṃkrāntir māsais

saṃkrāntir māsais+triṃśadbhis -> saṃkrāntir māsais triṃśadbhis

saṃkrāntir māsais triṃśadbhis+dinais -> saṃkrāntir māsais triṃśadbhir dinais

saṃkrāntir māsais triṃśadbhir dinais+iti -> saṃkrāntir māsais triṃśadbhir dinair iti

saṃkrāntir māsais triṃśadbhir dinair iti+adhyātmani -> saṃkrāntir māsais triṃśadbhir dinair ity adhyātmani

ebhis+yugmais -> ebhir yugmais

ebhir yugmais+dviguṇanavaśatais -> ebhir yugmair dviguṇanavaśatais

ebhir yugmair dviguṇanavaśatais+iti -> ebhir yugmair dviguṇanavaśatair iti

ebhir yugmair dviguṇanavaśatair iti+aṣṭādaśaśatais -> ebhir yugmair dviguṇanavaśatair ity aṣṭādaśaśatais

ebhir yugmair dviguṇanavaśatair ity aṣṭādaśaśatais+saṃkrāntis -> ebhir yugmair dviguṇanavaśatair ity aṣṭādaśaśataiḥ saṃkrāntis

ebhir yugmair dviguṇanavaśatair ity aṣṭādaśaśataiḥ saṃkrāntis+ekā -> ebhir yugmair dviguṇanavaśatair ity aṣṭādaśaśataiḥ saṃkrāntir ekā

śvāsaniḥśvāsayugmam+nirgamapraveśayugmam -> śvāsaniḥśvāsayugmaṃ nirgamapraveśayugmam

śvāsaniḥśvāsayugmaṃ nirgamapraveśayugmam+prāṇavāyus -> śvāsaniḥśvāsayugmaṃ nirgamapraveśayugmaṃ prāṇavāyus

śvāsaniḥśvāsayugmaṃ nirgamapraveśayugmaṃ prāṇavāyus+iti -> śvāsaniḥśvāsayugmaṃ nirgamapraveśayugmaṃ prāṇavāyur iti

indradhanus+viṭ -> indradhanur viṭ

indradhanur viṭ+api| -> indradhanur viḍ api|

vajram+śabdas -> vajraṃ śabdas

vajraṃ śabdas+hṛdaye -> vajraṃ śabdo hṛdaye

vajraṃ śabdo hṛdaye+antrāṇām -> vajraṃ śabdo hṛdaye 'ntrāṇām

vajraṃ śabdo hṛdaye 'ntrāṇām+garjis -> vajraṃ śabdo hṛdaye 'ntrāṇāṃ garjis

vajraṃ śabdo hṛdaye 'ntrāṇāṃ garjis+yā| -> vajraṃ śabdo hṛdaye 'ntrāṇāṃ garjir yā|

śarīre+amṛtam -> śarīre 'mṛtam

śarīre 'mṛtam+jihvālambikābhyām -> śarīre 'mṛtaṃ jihvālambikābhyām

śarīre 'mṛtaṃ jihvālambikābhyām+stukasrāvas -> śarīre 'mṛtaṃ jihvālambikābhyāṃ stukasrāvas

śarīre 'mṛtaṃ jihvālambikābhyāṃ stukasrāvas+| -> śarīre 'mṛtaṃ jihvālambikābhyāṃ stukasrāvaḥ|

vṛṣṭis+yā -> vṛṣṭir yā

skandhaparyantam+amaragirivaras -> skandhaparyantam amaragirivaras

skandhaparyantam amaragirivaras+merus -> skandhaparyantam amaragirivaro merus

skandhaparyantam amaragirivaro merus+iti| -> skandhaparyantam amaragirivaro merur iti|

pṛṣṭhāsthidaṇḍas+kaṭim -> pṛṣṭhāsthidaṇḍaḥ kaṭim

pṛṣṭhāsthidaṇḍaḥ kaṭim+ārabhya -> pṛṣṭhāsthidaṇḍaḥ kaṭim ārabhya

chidram+śūnyam -> chidraṃ śūnyam

chidraṃ śūnyam+dṛdhāsthi -> chidraṃ śūnyaṃ dṛdhāsthi

vāyus+laghutvam -> vāyur laghutvam

vāyur laghutvam+yatas -> vāyur laghutvaṃ yatas

vāyur laghutvaṃ yatas+saṃkocanam -> vāyur laghutvaṃ yataḥ saṃkocanam

vāyur laghutvaṃ yataḥ saṃkocanam+prasāraṇam -> vāyur laghutvaṃ yataḥ saṃkocanaṃ prasāraṇam

vāyur laghutvaṃ yataḥ saṃkocanaṃ prasāraṇam+karoti| -> vāyur laghutvaṃ yataḥ saṃkocanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ karoti|

havis+uṣṇatvam -> havir uṣṇatvam

havir uṣṇatvam+ca| -> havir uṣṇatvaṃ ca|

kaṭhinam+ambu -> kaṭhinam ambu

randhrabhedās+|| -> randhrabhedāḥ||

dviguṇanavaśatais+jyotiṣā -> dviguṇanavaśatair jyotiṣā

yugmais+saṃkrāntis -> yugmaiḥ saṃkrāntis

yugmaiḥ saṃkrāntis+ekā -> yugmaiḥ saṃkrāntir ekā

ghaṭikās+śvāsaniḥśvāsayugmam -> ghaṭikāḥ śvāsaniḥśvāsayugmam

vāyus+viṭ -> vāyur viṭ

vāyur viṭ+api -> vāyur viḍ api

vajram+śabdas -> vajraṃ śabdas

vajraṃ śabdas+ca -> vajraṃ śabdaś ca

tu+amaragiravaras -> tv amaragiravaras

tv amaragiravaras+vṛṣṭis -> tv amaragiravaro vṛṣṭis

tv amaragiravaro vṛṣṭis+atra -> tv amaragiravaro vṛṣṭir atra

tv amaragiravaro vṛṣṭir atra+amṛtam -> tv amaragiravaro vṛṣṭir atrāmṛtam

tv amaragiravaro vṛṣṭir atrāmṛtam+syāt| -> tv amaragiravaro vṛṣṭir atrāmṛtaṃ syāt|

chidram+śūnyam -> chidraṃ śūnyam

chidraṃ śūnyam+dṛḍhāsthi -> chidraṃ śūnyaṃ dṛḍhāsthi

vāyus+laghutvam -> vāyur laghutvam

havis+uṣṇam -> havir uṣṇam

havir uṣṇam+ca -> havir uṣṇaṃ ca

dravam+api -> dravam api

kāṭhinyam+ambu -> kāṭhinyam ambu

pṛthvī+ityādinā|| -> pṛthvītyādinā||

pṛthivyādīnām+lakṣaṇam -> pṛthivyādīnāṃ lakṣaṇam

pṛthivyādīnāṃ lakṣaṇam+ucyate -> pṛthivyādīnāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate

idānīm+śarīre -> idānīṃ śarīre

prakṛtipuruṣaniyamas+|| -> prakṛtipuruṣaniyamaḥ||

prabhāsvarā+asti -> prabhāsvarāsti

prabhāsvarāsti+iti -> prabhāsvarāstīti

punar+grāhyadharmarahitā -> punar grāhyadharmarahitā

punar grāhyadharmarahitā+aparā -> punar grāhyadharmarahitāparā

grāhakadharmiṇas+grāhyadharmiṇas -> grāhakadharmiṇo grāhyadharmiṇas

grāhakadharmiṇo grāhyadharmiṇas+prakṛtis -> grāhakadharmiṇo grāhyadharmiṇaḥ prakṛtis

grāhakadharmiṇo grāhyadharmiṇaḥ prakṛtis+| -> grāhakadharmiṇo grāhyadharmiṇaḥ prakṛtiḥ|

prakṛtis+puruṣasya -> prakṛtiḥ puruṣasya

bhuktis+bhavati| -> bhuktir bhavati|

trividhabhavagatasya+ātmakarmārjitasya -> trividhabhavagatasyātmakarmārjitasya

vibhos+ca| -> vibhoś ca|

bhuktis+eṣā -> bhuktir eṣā

caturviṃśatis+dehe -> caturviṃśatir dehe

tattvāni+etāni -> tattvāny etāni

prakṛtis+api -> prakṛtir api

prakṛtir api+iti| -> prakṛtir apīti|

evam+buddhis -> evaṃ buddhis

evaṃ buddhis+api -> evaṃ buddhir api

evaṃ buddhir api+ahaṃkāras -> evaṃ buddhir apy ahaṃkāras

evaṃ buddhir apy ahaṃkāras+api -> evaṃ buddhir apy ahaṃkāro 'pi

manas+sattvarajastamobhis -> manaḥ sattvarajastamobhis

manaḥ sattvarajastamobhis+sahitam -> manaḥ sattvarajastamobhiḥ sahitam

manaḥ sattvarajastamobhiḥ sahitam+manas -> manaḥ sattvarajastamobhiḥ sahitaṃ manas

manaḥ sattvarajastamobhiḥ sahitaṃ manas+| -> manaḥ sattvarajastamobhiḥ sahitaṃ manaḥ|

saguṇam+api -> saguṇam api

ca+uktās -> coktās

coktās+| -> coktāḥ|

śabdatantramātrādayas+iti -> śabdatantramātrādaya iti

tanmātrās+iti -> tanmātrā iti

tattvāni+etāni -> tattvāny etāni

evaṃ nāḍīcchedas+api -> evaṃ nāḍīcchedo 'pi

cakāras+samuccaye| -> cakāraḥ samuccaye|

puṃsām+ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes -> puṃsāṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes

puṃsāṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes+śukrasambhavas -> puṃsāṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadheḥ śukrasambhavas

puṃsāṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadheḥ śukrasambhavas+yāvat -> puṃsāṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadheḥ śukrasambhavo yāvat

sūryavṛddhis+| -> sūryavṛddhiḥ|

strīṇām+rajaḥsambhavas -> strīṇāṃ rajaḥsambhavas

strīṇāṃ rajaḥsambhavas+yāvat -> strīṇāṃ rajaḥsambhavo yāvat

strīṇāṃ rajaḥsambhavo yāvat+iti -> strīṇāṃ rajaḥsambhavo yāvad iti

dinakaras+dhātuvṛddhim -> dinakaro dhātuvṛddhim

dinakaro dhātuvṛddhim+svadehe -> dinakaro dhātuvṛddhiṃ svadehe

dhātuvṛddhim+karoti| -> dhātuvṛddhiṃ karoti|

cakrārāt+śukram -> cakrārāc chukram

cakrārāc chukram+ca -> cakrārāc chukraṃ ca

yāvat+iti| -> yāvad iti|

satyām+dhātuvṛddhim -> satyāṃ dhātuvṛddhim

satyāṃ dhātuvṛddhim+rajas -> satyāṃ dhātuvṛddhiṃ rajas

satyāṃ dhātuvṛddhiṃ rajas+karoti -> satyāṃ dhātuvṛddhiṃ rajaḥ karoti

tatas+candraśukranāḍī -> tataś candraśukranāḍī

vṛddhim+karoti -> vṛddhiṃ karoti

vṛddhiṃ karoti+iti| -> vṛddhiṃ karotīti|

śaśadharas+cakārāt -> śaśadharaś cakārāt

śaśadharaś cakārāt+trayodaśabhis -> śaśadharaś cakārāt trayodaśabhis

śaśadharaś cakārāt trayodaśabhis+māsais -> śaśadharaś cakārāt trayodaśabhir māsais

śaśadharaś cakārāt trayodaśabhir māsais+iti -> śaśadharaś cakārāt trayodaśabhir māsair iti

śaśadharaś cakārāt trayodaśabhir māsair iti+arkas -> śaśadharaś cakārāt trayodaśabhir māsair ity arkas

śaśadharaś cakārāt trayodaśabhir māsair ity arkas+ca -> śaśadharaś cakārāt trayodaśabhir māsair ity arkaś ca

garbhādhānasyaikamāsam+varjayitvā -> garbhādhānasyaikamāsaṃ varjayitvā

dvādaśamāsāntam+yāvat| -> dvādaśamāsāntaṃ yāvat|

cakārāt+bāhye -> cakārād bāhye

cakārād bāhye+api -> cakārād bāhye 'pi

vṛddhim+kṛtvā| -> vṛddhiṃ kṛtvā|

dvādaśaguṇitam+garbhamadhye -> dvādaśaguṇitaṃ garbhamadhye

nāḍīnām+ṣaṭsahasram -> nāḍīnāṃ ṣaṭsahasram

nāḍīnāṃ ṣaṭsahasram+dinakaraguṇitam -> nāḍīnāṃ ṣaṭsahasraṃ dinakaraguṇitam

nāḍīnāṃ ṣaṭsahasraṃ dinakaraguṇitam+iti -> nāḍīnāṃ ṣaṭsahasraṃ dinakaraguṇitam iti

dvādaśamāsāvadhes+ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatadinais -> dvādaśamāsāvadheḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatadinais

dvādaśamāsāvadheḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatadinais+dvāsaptatisahasrasaṃkhyā% -> dvādaśamāsāvadheḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatadinair dvāsaptatisahasrasaṃkhyā%

triṃśadbhis+dinais -> triṃśadbhir dinais

triṃśadbhir dinais+ṣaṭsahasrasaṃkhyā -> triṃśadbhir dinaiḥ ṣaṭsahasrasaṃkhyā

garbhamāsāt+ekāt -> garbhamāsād ekāt

garbhamāsād ekāt+ūrdhvam -> garbhamāsād ekād ūrdhvam

garbhamāsād ekād ūrdhvam+pratyaham -> garbhamāsād ekād ūrdhvaṃ pratyaham

garbhamāsād ekād ūrdhvaṃ pratyaham+nāḍīśatadvayam -> garbhamāsād ekād ūrdhvaṃ pratyahaṃ nāḍīśatadvayam

garbhamāsād ekād ūrdhvaṃ pratyahaṃ nāḍīśatadvayam+bhavati -> garbhamāsād ekād ūrdhvaṃ pratyahaṃ nāḍīśatadvayaṃ bhavati

dinadinam+yugmasaṃkhyākrameṇa|| -> dinadinaṃ yugmasaṃkhyākrameṇa||

vṛddhim+tyajati -> vṛddhiṃ tyajati

nāḍīnām+ṣaṭsahasram -> nāḍīnāṃ ṣaṭsahasram

nāḍī+ityādinā| -> nāḍītyādinā|

parasparaṃ prajñopāyāliṅganavidhiniyamas+|| -> parasparaṃ prajñopāyāliṅganavidhiniyamaḥ||

vaktavyās+iti -> vaktavyā iti

devyas+pṛthivyādayas -> devyaḥ pṛthivyādayas

devyaḥ pṛthivyādayas+sabuddhās -> devyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ sabuddhās

devyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ sabuddhās+vairocanādibhis -> devyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ sabuddhā vairocanādibhis

devyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ sabuddhā vairocanādibhis+sārdham -> devyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ sabuddhā vairocanādibhiḥ sārdham

devyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ sabuddhā vairocanādibhiḥ sārdham+viṣayaviṣayiṇas -> devyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ sabuddhā vairocanādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ viṣayaviṣayiṇas

devyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ sabuddhā vairocanādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ viṣayaviṣayiṇas+maṇḍale% -> devyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ sabuddhā vairocanādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ viṣayaviṣayiṇo maṇḍale%

evam+uktakrameṇa -> evam uktakrameṇa

karmendriyādyās+iti| -> karmendriyādyā iti|

śaṅkhinīndriyam+upāyas -> śaṅkhinīndriyam upāyas

śukracyavanam+prajñā% -> śukracyavanaṃ prajñā%

bhagas+upāyas -> bhaga upāyas

evaṃ śrotrāt+śabdādayas -> evaṃ śrotrāc chabdādayas

evaṃ śrotrāc chabdādayas+anye -> evaṃ śrotrāc chabdādayo 'nye

evaṃ śrotrāc chabdādayo 'nye+iti| -> evaṃ śrotrāc chabdādayo 'nya iti|

śrīrajas+dharmadhātuviṣayam -> śrīrajo dharmadhātuviṣayam

śrīrajo dharmadhātuviṣayam+bodhicittam -> śrīrajo dharmadhātuviṣayaṃ bodhicittam

śrīrajo dharmadhātuviṣayaṃ bodhicittam+eva| -> śrīrajo dharmadhātuviṣayaṃ bodhicittam eva|

rūpaskandhas+iti| -> rūpaskandha iti|
