evaṃ vāto viṭ+prajñopāyavāyudhāti -> evaṃ vāto viṭ prajñopāyavāyudhāti

viśeṣāt+mūtram -> viśeṣān mūtram

viśeṣān mūtram+saṃjñāskandhas -> viśeṣān mūtraṃ saṃjñāskandhas

viśeṣān mūtraṃ saṃjñāskandhas+iti| -> viśeṣān mūtraṃ saṃjñāskandha iti|

atas+mūtram -> ato mūtram

ato mūtram+saṃjñādharmas -> ato mūtraṃ saṃjñādharmas

ato mūtraṃ saṃjñādharmas+śukram -> ato mūtraṃ saṃjñādharmaḥ śukram

ato mūtraṃ saṃjñādharmaḥ śukram+jñānadharmas -> ato mūtraṃ saṃjñādharmaḥ śukraṃ jñānadharmas

ato mūtraṃ saṃjñādharmaḥ śukraṃ jñānadharmas+iti -> ato mūtraṃ saṃjñādharmaḥ śukraṃ jñānadharma iti

śukracyavanadharmatas+| -> śukracyavanadharmataḥ|

mūtrasrāvatas+yat -> mūtrasrāvato yat

mūtrasrāvato yat+mahāsukhajñānam -> mūtrasrāvato yan mahāsukhajñānam

mūtrasrāvato yan mahāsukhajñānam+tat -> mūtrasrāvato yan mahāsukhajñānaṃ tat

mūtrasrāvato yan mahāsukhajñānaṃ tat+ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes -> mūtrasrāvato yan mahāsukhajñānaṃ tat ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes

mūtrasrāvato yan mahāsukhajñānaṃ tat ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes+bhavati -> mūtrasrāvato yan mahāsukhajñānaṃ tat ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadher bhavati

śukradhātus+saṃjñāskandhas -> śukradhātuḥ saṃjñāskandhas

śukradhātuḥ saṃjñāskandhas+katham -> śukradhātuḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ katham

śukradhātuḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ katham+mūtram -> śukradhātuḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ kathaṃ mūtram

śukradhātuḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ kathaṃ mūtram+iti -> śukradhātuḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ kathaṃ mūtram iti

śukradhātuḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ kathaṃ mūtram iti+ucyate| -> śukradhātuḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ kathaṃ mūtram ity ucyate|

anayos+prajñopāyatas -> anayoḥ prajñopāyatas

anayoḥ prajñopāyatas+|% -> anayoḥ prajñopāyataḥ|%

mūtram+iti -> mūtram iti

pāvakas+iti -> pāvaka iti

sārdham+vedanāskandhas -> sārdhaṃ vedanāskandhas

sārdhaṃ vedanāskandhas+| -> sārdhaṃ vedanāskandhaḥ|

evam+prajñopāyas -> evaṃ prajñopāyas

evaṃ prajñopāyas+sasalilarudhiram -> evaṃ prajñopāyaḥ sasalilarudhiram

evaṃ prajñopāyaḥ sasalilarudhiram+udakadhātunā -> evaṃ prajñopāyaḥ sasalilarudhiram udakadhātunā

jñāpakāt+prajñopāyāsthimāṃsam -> jñāpakāt prajñopāyāsthimāṃsam

jñāpakāt prajñopāyāsthimāṃsam+iti| -> jñāpakāt prajñopāyāsthimāṃsam iti|

tayos+parasparam -> tayoḥ parasparam

tayoḥ parasparam+saṃyogas -> tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogas

tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogas+pṛthivīsaṃskārayos -> tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayos

tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayos+yat -> tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayor yat

tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayor yat+kaṭhinatattvam -> tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayor yat kaṭhinatattvam

tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayor yat kaṭhinatattvam+tat -> tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayor yat kaṭhinatattvaṃ tat

tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayor yat kaṭhinatattvaṃ tat+pṛthivīdhātus -> tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayor yat kaṭhinatattvaṃ tat pṛthivīdhātus

tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayor yat kaṭhinatattvaṃ tat pṛthivīdhātus+iti -> tayoḥ parasparaṃ saṃyogaḥ pṛthivīsaṃskārayor yat kaṭhinatattvaṃ tat pṛthivīdhātur iti

prajñā+asthidhātus -> prajñāsthidhātus

prajñāsthidhātus+upāyas -> prajñāsthidhātur upāyas

prajñāsthidhātur upāyas+māṃsadhātus -> prajñāsthidhātur upāyo māṃsadhātus

prajñāsthidhātur upāyo māṃsadhātus+| -> prajñāsthidhātur upāyo māṃsadhātuḥ|

veditavyās+|| -> veditavyāḥ||

evam+devyas -> evaṃ devyas

evaṃ devyas+sabuddhās -> evaṃ devyaḥ sabuddhās

evaṃ devyaḥ sabuddhās+viṣayaviṣayiṇas -> evaṃ devyaḥ sabuddhā viṣayaviṣayiṇas

evaṃ devyaḥ sabuddhā viṣayaviṣayiṇas+maṇḍale -> evaṃ devyaḥ sabuddhā viṣayaviṣayiṇo maṇḍale

svajinakulavaśāt+vāksvarūpādayas -> svajinakulavaśād vāksvarūpādayas

svajinakulavaśād vāksvarūpādayas+ca -> svajinakulavaśād vāksvarūpādayaś ca

śrotrāt+śabdādayas -> śrotrāc chabdādayas

śrotrāc chabdādayas+anye -> śrotrāc chabdādayo 'nye

śrīrajas+cittam -> śrīrajaś cittam

śrīrajaś cittam+eva| -> śrīrajaś cittam eva|

vātas+viṭśūnyaśukram -> vāto viṭśūnyaśukram

vāto viṭśūnyaśukram+bhavati -> vāto viṭśūnyaśukraṃ bhavati

prajñopāyāsthimāṃsam+sasalilarudhiram -> prajñopāyāsthimāṃsaṃ sasalilarudhiram

prajñopāyāsthimāṃsaṃ sasalilarudhiram+pāvakas -> prajñopāyāsthimāṃsaṃ sasalilarudhiraṃ pāvakas

prajñopāyāsthimāṃsaṃ sasalilarudhiraṃ pāvakas+mūtram -> prajñopāyāsthimāṃsaṃ sasalilarudhiraṃ pāvako mūtram

prajñopāyāsthimāṃsaṃ sasalilarudhiraṃ pāvako mūtram+eva -> prajñopāyāsthimāṃsaṃ sasalilarudhiraṃ pāvako mūtram eva

prajñā+ityādi| -> prajñetyādi|

prajñopāyāliṅganam+asthimāṃsādidhātūnām -> prajñopāyāliṅganam asthimāṃsādidhātūnām

prajñopāyāliṅganam asthimāṃsādidhātūnām+āha -> prajñopāyāliṅganam asthimāṃsādidhātūnām āha

kāyabhāvaprakṛtivarṇaniyamas+|| -> kāyabhāvaprakṛtivarṇaniyamaḥ||

haritas+kāyabhāvaprabhedais -> haritaḥ kāyabhāvaprabhedais

haritaḥ kāyabhāvaprabhedais+iti -> haritaḥ kāyabhāvaprabhedair iti

nīlas+bhavati -> nīlo bhavati

atas+jñānākāśe -> ato jñānākāśe

haritās+| -> haritāḥ|

nīlavarṇās+ākāśaprakṛtayos -> nīlavarṇā ākāśaprakṛtayos

nīlavarṇā ākāśaprakṛtayos+bhāvabhedena -> nīlavarṇā ākāśaprakṛtayor bhāvabhedena

jñānadhātuprakṛtayas+kālabhedena -> jñānadhātuprakṛtayaḥ kālabhedena

manendriyam+śabdas -> manendriyaṃ śabdas

manendriyaṃ śabdas+divyendriyam -> manendriyaṃ śabdo divyendriyam

manendriyaṃ śabdo divyendriyam+mūtrasrāvas -> manendriyaṃ śabdo divyendriyaṃ mūtrasrāvas

manendriyaṃ śabdo divyendriyaṃ mūtrasrāvas+| -> manendriyaṃ śabdo divyendriyaṃ mūtrasrāvaḥ|

nīlās+| -> nīlāḥ|

haritavarṇās+jñānaprakṛtibhāvabhedena -> haritavarṇā jñānaprakṛtibhāvabhedena

ākāśaprakṛtayas+kāyabhedena -> ākāśaprakṛtayaḥ kāyabhedena

varṇas+veditavyas -> varṇo veditavyas

varṇo veditavyas+evam -> varṇo veditavya evam

varṇo veditavya evam+śrotrendriyam -> varṇo veditavya evaṃ śrotrendriyam

varṇo veditavya evaṃ śrotrendriyam+dharmadhātuviṣayam -> varṇo veditavya evaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ dharmadhātuviṣayam

varṇo veditavya evaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ dharmadhātuviṣayam+bhagendriyam -> varṇo veditavya evaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ dharmadhātuviṣayaṃ bhagendriyam

varṇo veditavya evaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ dharmadhātuviṣayaṃ bhagendriyam+śukracyavanam|% -> varṇo veditavya evaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ dharmadhātuviṣayaṃ bhagendriyaṃ śukracyavanam|%

vātaprakṛtau+agniprakṛtau -> vātaprakṛtāv agniprakṛtau

sitavarṇās+bhavanti -> sitavarṇā bhavanti

sitavarṇā bhavanti+agniprakṛtibhāvavaśāt -> sitavarṇā bhavanty agniprakṛtibhāvavaśāt

sitavarṇā bhavanty agniprakṛtibhāvavaśāt+raktavarṇās -> sitavarṇā bhavanty agniprakṛtibhāvavaśād raktavarṇās

sitavarṇā bhavanty agniprakṛtibhāvavaśād raktavarṇās+bhavanti| -> sitavarṇā bhavanty agniprakṛtibhāvavaśād raktavarṇā bhavanti|

evam+jihvendriyam -> evaṃ jihvendriyam

evaṃ jihvendriyam+varṇarūpam -> evaṃ jihvendriyaṃ varṇarūpam

evaṃ jihvendriyaṃ varṇarūpam+pādendriyam -> evaṃ jihvendriyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ pādendriyam

evaṃ jihvendriyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ pādendriyam+ādānam -> evaṃ jihvendriyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ pādendriyam ādānam

evaṃ jihvendriyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ pādendriyam ādānam+udakaprakṛtayas -> evaṃ jihvendriyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ pādendriyam ādānam udakaprakṛtayas

evaṃ jihvendriyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ pādendriyam ādānam udakaprakṛtayas+kāyabhedena -> evaṃ jihvendriyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ pādendriyam ādānam udakaprakṛtayaḥ kāyabhedena

bhāvavaśāt+udakaprakṛtayas -> bhāvavaśād udakaprakṛtayas

bhāvavaśād udakaprakṛtayas+sitās -> bhāvavaśād udakaprakṛtayaḥ sitās

bhāvavaśād udakaprakṛtayaḥ sitās+bhavanti| -> bhāvavaśād udakaprakṛtayaḥ sitā bhavanti|

pītās+cakṣurindriyam -> pītāś cakṣurindriyam

pītāś cakṣurindriyam+rasas -> pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasas

pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasas+pāṇīndriyam -> pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyam

pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyam+gatis -> pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyaṃ gatis

pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyaṃ gatis+tejaḥprakṛtayas -> pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyaṃ gatis tejaḥprakṛtayas

pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyaṃ gatis tejaḥprakṛtayas+kāyavaśāt -> pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyaṃ gatis tejaḥprakṛtayaḥ kāyavaśāt

pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyaṃ gatis tejaḥprakṛtayaḥ kāyavaśāt+raktavarṇās -> pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyaṃ gatis tejaḥprakṛtayaḥ kāyavaśād raktavarṇās

pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyaṃ gatis tejaḥprakṛtayaḥ kāyavaśād raktavarṇās+bhavanti -> pītāś cakṣurindriyaṃ rasaḥ pāṇīndriyaṃ gatis tejaḥprakṛtayaḥ kāyavaśād raktavarṇā bhavanti

kṛṣṇavarṇās+pṛthivībhāvabhedena -> kṛṣṇavarṇāḥ pṛthivībhāvabhedena

evam+ghrāṇendriyam -> evaṃ ghrāṇendriyam

evaṃ ghrāṇendriyam+sparśas -> evaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ sparśas

evaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ sparśas+vāgindriyam -> evaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ sparśo vāgindriyam

evaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ sparśo vāgindriyam+viṭsrāvas -> evaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ sparśo vāgindriyaṃ viṭsrāvas

evaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ sparśo vāgindriyaṃ viṭsrāvas+vāyuprakṛtayas -> evaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ sparśo vāgindriyaṃ viṭsrāvo vāyuprakṛtayas

evaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ sparśo vāgindriyaṃ viṭsrāvo vāyuprakṛtayas+kāyabhedena -> evaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ sparśo vāgindriyaṃ viṭsrāvo vāyuprakṛtayaḥ kāyabhedena

kāyendriyam+gandhaviṣayam -> kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayam

kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayam+pāyvindriyam -> kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam

kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam+ālāpas -> kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpas

kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpas+pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvatas -> kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvatas

kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvatas+pītavarṇās -> kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvataḥ pītavarṇās

kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvataḥ pītavarṇās+bhāvavaśāt -> kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvataḥ pītavarṇā bhāvavaśāt

kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvataḥ pītavarṇā bhāvavaśāt+vāyuprakṛtitas -> kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvataḥ pītavarṇā bhāvavaśād vāyuprakṛtitas

kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvataḥ pītavarṇā bhāvavaśād vāyuprakṛtitas+kṛṣṇavarṇās -> kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvataḥ pītavarṇā bhāvavaśād vāyuprakṛtitaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇās

kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvataḥ pītavarṇā bhāvavaśād vāyuprakṛtitaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇās+| -> kāyendriyaṃ gandhaviṣayaṃ pāyvindriyam ālāpaḥ pṛthivīkāyasvabhāvataḥ pītavarṇā bhāvavaśād vāyuprakṛtitaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇāḥ|

prakṛtayas+pṛthivyādidhātavas -> prakṛtayaḥ pṛthivyādidhātavas

prakṛtayaḥ pṛthivyādidhātavas+kāyendriyādīnām -> prakṛtayaḥ pṛthivyādidhātavaḥ kāyendriyādīnām

prakṛtayaḥ pṛthivyādidhātavaḥ kāyendriyādīnām+gandhādiviṣayāṇām -> prakṛtayaḥ pṛthivyādidhātavaḥ kāyendriyādīnāṃ gandhādiviṣayāṇām

prakṛtayaḥ pṛthivyādidhātavaḥ kāyendriyādīnāṃ gandhādiviṣayāṇām+caturṇām -> prakṛtayaḥ pṛthivyādidhātavaḥ kāyendriyādīnāṃ gandhādiviṣayāṇāṃ caturṇām

prakṛtayaḥ pṛthivyādidhātavaḥ kāyendriyādīnāṃ gandhādiviṣayāṇāṃ caturṇām+bhavanti| -> prakṛtayaḥ pṛthivyādidhātavaḥ kāyendriyādīnāṃ gandhādiviṣayāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ bhavanti|

kāyas+jñātavyas -> kāyo jñātavyas

kāyo jñātavyas+yogayuktais -> kāyo jñātavyo yogayuktais

kāyo jñātavyo yogayuktais+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> kāyo jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

kāyo jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+dhātuvarṇādibhedais -> kāyo jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātuvarṇādibhedais

kāyo jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātuvarṇādibhedais+iti| -> kāyo jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātuvarṇādibhedair iti|

samarasas+bhāvamadhye -> samaraso bhāvamadhye

kham+iva -> kham iva

bhāvapraveśas+| -> bhāvapraveśaḥ|

grāhyagrāhakayos+parasparam -> grāhyagrāhakayoḥ parasparam

grāhyagrāhakayoḥ parasparam+ekatvam -> grāhyagrāhakayoḥ parasparam ekatvam

grāhyagrāhakayoḥ parasparam ekatvam+samarasatvam -> grāhyagrāhakayoḥ parasparam ekatvaṃ samarasatvam

grāhyagrāhakayoḥ parasparam ekatvaṃ samarasatvam+atas -> grāhyagrāhakayoḥ parasparam ekatvaṃ samarasatvam atas

grāhyagrāhakayoḥ parasparam ekatvaṃ samarasatvam atas+kāye -> grāhyagrāhakayoḥ parasparam ekatvaṃ samarasatvam ataḥ kāye

bhāvasaṃjñas+bhavati| -> bhāvasaṃjño bhavati|

yas+grāhyas -> yo grāhyas

yo grāhyas+sāmagrīvaśāt -> yo grāhyaḥ sāmagrīvaśāt

yo grāhyaḥ sāmagrīvaśāt+sa -> yo grāhyaḥ sāmagrīvaśāt sa

kāyasaṃjñas+bhavati -> kāyasaṃjño bhavati

yas+grāhakas -> yo grāhakas

yo grāhakas+dhātus -> yo grāhako dhātus

yo grāhako dhātus+sāmagrīvaśāt -> yo grāhako dhātuḥ sāmagrīvaśāt

yo grāhako dhātuḥ sāmagrīvaśāt+sa -> yo grāhako dhātuḥ sāmagrīvaśāt sa

grāhyagrāhakabhedas+dhātūnām -> grāhyagrāhakabhedo dhātūnām

grāhyagrāhakabhedo dhātūnām+parasparam -> grāhyagrāhakabhedo dhātūnāṃ parasparam

grāhyagrāhakabhedo dhātūnāṃ parasparam+bhavati|% -> grāhyagrāhakabhedo dhātūnāṃ parasparaṃ bhavati|%

haritas+kāyabhāvaprabhedais -> haritaḥ kāyabhāvaprabhedais

haritaḥ kāyabhāvaprabhedais+|| -> haritaḥ kāyabhāvaprabhedaiḥ||

nīlas+bhavati -> nīlo bhavati

sitas+bhūmivātāgnitoye -> sito bhūmivātāgnitoye

varṇas+tu -> varṇas tu

varṇas tu+aruṇas -> varṇas tv aruṇas

varṇas tv aruṇas+iti -> varṇas tv aruṇa iti

pītas+kṛṣṇas -> pītaḥ kṛṣṇas

pītaḥ kṛṣṇas+ca -> pītaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca

jñātavyas+yogayuktais -> jñātavyo yogayuktais

jñātavyo yogayuktais+prakṛtiguṇavaśāt -> jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt

jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt+dhātuvarṇādibhedais -> jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātuvarṇādibhedais

jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātuvarṇādibhedais+| -> jñātavyo yogayuktaiḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśād dhātuvarṇādibhedaiḥ|

samarasas+bhāvamadhye -> samaraso bhāvamadhye

bhāvapraveśas+kham -> bhāvapraveśaḥ kham

bhāvapraveśaḥ kham+iva -> bhāvapraveśaḥ kham iva

kāye+ityādinā| -> kāya ityādinā|

bhāvapraveśadhātuvarṇās+ucyante -> bhāvapraveśadhātuvarṇā ucyante

ṣaṭkulaniyamas+|| -> ṣaṭkulaniyamaḥ||

bhartus+kāyavākcittāni -> bhartuḥ kāyavākcittāni

bhartuḥ kāyavākcittāni+iti -> bhartuḥ kāyavākcittānīti

vajrakulam+iti -> vajrakulam iti

khaḍgakulam+prāṇe -> khaḍgakulaṃ prāṇe

kamalakulam+apāne -> kamalakulam apāne

mātus+trikulāni -> mātus trikulāni

kartikākulam+apāne -> kartikākulam apāne

kartikākulam apāne+iti -> kartikākulam apāna iti

ratnakulam+prāṇe -> ratnakulaṃ prāṇe

cakrakulam+apāne -> cakrakulam apāne

prāṇāpānatrināḍikābhedatas+trināḍīsaṃjñālakṣaṇāni -> prāṇāpānatrināḍikābhedatas trināḍīsaṃjñālakṣaṇāni

tāni+ityādi| -> tānītyādi|

tāni+eva -> tāny eva

tāny eva+āha -> tāny evāha

pṛthivyādidhātūtpannānām+vikārāṇām -> pṛthivyādidhātūtpannānāṃ vikārāṇām

pṛthivyādidhātūtpannānāṃ vikārāṇām+yathānukrameṇa -> pṛthivyādidhātūtpannānāṃ vikārāṇāṃ yathānukrameṇa

pṛthivyādidhātūtpannānāṃ vikārāṇāṃ yathānukrameṇa+iti|| -> pṛthivyādidhātūtpannānāṃ vikārāṇāṃ yathānukrameṇeti||

yathākramam+rajaḥśukrayos -> yathākramaṃ rajaḥśukrayos

yathākramaṃ rajaḥśukrayos+kulam -> yathākramaṃ rajaḥśukrayoḥ kulam

yathākramaṃ rajaḥśukrayoḥ kulam+bhavati| -> yathākramaṃ rajaḥśukrayoḥ kulaṃ bhavati|

bhartus+kāyas -> bhartuḥ kāyas

bhartuḥ kāyas+vāk -> bhartuḥ kāyo vāk

bhartuḥ kāyo vāk+cittam -> bhartuḥ kāyo vāk cittam

bhartuḥ kāyo vāk cittam+ca% -> bhartuḥ kāyo vāk cittaṃ ca%

vajrakulam+bhavati| -> vajrakulaṃ bhavati|

tadvat+uṣṇīṣamadhye -> tadvad uṣṇīṣamadhye

tadvad uṣṇīṣamadhye+ākāśadhātukamale -> tadvad uṣṇīṣamadhya ākāśadhātukamale

khaḍgakulam+bhavati| -> khaḍgakulaṃ bhavati|

kamalakulam+bhavati -> kamalakulaṃ bhavati

evam+śirasi -> evaṃ śirasi

mātus+yathāsaṃkhyam -> mātur yathāsaṃkhyam

mātur yathāsaṃkhyam+kāyas -> mātur yathāsaṃkhyaṃ kāyas

mātur yathāsaṃkhyaṃ kāyas+vāk -> mātur yathāsaṃkhyaṃ kāyo vāk

mātur yathāsaṃkhyaṃ kāyo vāk+cittam -> mātur yathāsaṃkhyaṃ kāyo vāk cittam

mātur yathāsaṃkhyaṃ kāyo vāk cittam+ca| -> mātur yathāsaṃkhyaṃ kāyo vāk cittaṃ ca|

kartikākulam+bhavati -> kartikākulaṃ bhavati

ratnakulam+bhavati -> ratnakulaṃ bhavati

kaṇṭhe+agnipadme -> kaṇṭhe 'gnipadme

cakrakulam+bhavati -> cakrakulaṃ bhavati

bhartus+pitus -> bhartuḥ pitus

bhartuḥ pitus+kulāni -> bhartuḥ pituḥ kulāni

yathāsaṃkhyam+mātus -> yathāsaṃkhyaṃ mātus

yathāsaṃkhyaṃ mātus+kulāni -> yathāsaṃkhyaṃ mātuḥ kulāni

nābhau+ityādinā| -> nābhāv ityādinā|

ṣaṭkulāni+ucyante -> ṣaṭkulāny ucyante

tāni+ūrdhvādhas -> tāny ūrdhvādhas

tāny ūrdhvādhas+trināḍyas -> tāny ūrdhvādhas trināḍyas

tāny ūrdhvādhas trināḍyas+trividhapathagatās -> tāny ūrdhvādhas trināḍyas trividhapathagatās

tāny ūrdhvādhas trināḍyas trividhapathagatās+candrasūryāgnibhedais -> tāny ūrdhvādhas trināḍyas trividhapathagatāś candrasūryāgnibhedais

tāny ūrdhvādhas trināḍyas trividhapathagatāś candrasūryāgnibhedais+|| -> tāny ūrdhvādhas trināḍyas trividhapathagatāś candrasūryāgnibhedaiḥ||

cakram+ratnam -> cakraṃ ratnam

cakraṃ ratnam+khapadmam -> cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmam

cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmam+jalajam -> cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmaṃ jalajam

cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmaṃ jalajam+asivaram -> cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmaṃ jalajam asivaram

cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmaṃ jalajam asivaram+ṣaṭkulam -> cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmaṃ jalajam asivaraṃ ṣaṭkulam

cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmaṃ jalajam asivaraṃ ṣaṭkulam+vajrayuktam -> cakraṃ ratnaṃ khapadmaṃ jalajam asivaraṃ ṣaṭkulaṃ vajrayuktam

bhavet+kāyavākcittavajram| -> bhavet kāyavākcittavajram|

trividham+api -> trividham api

mātus+bhartus -> mātur bhartus

mātur bhartus+krameṇa -> mātur bhartuḥ krameṇa

tadvat+uṣṇīṣamadhye -> tadvad uṣṇīṣamadhye

kamalam+dharmasambhogaśuddham -> kamalaṃ dharmasambhogaśuddham

kamalaṃ dharmasambhogaśuddham+iti|| -> kamalaṃ dharmasambhogaśuddham iti||

hṛccakram+kaṇṭhacakram -> hṛccakraṃ kaṇṭhacakram

hṛccakraṃ kaṇṭhacakram+śirasi -> hṛccakraṃ kaṇṭhacakraṃ śirasi

tejoguṇas+sambhogakāyādhārasya -> tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasya

tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasya+udakaguṇas -> tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasyodakaguṇas

tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasyodakaguṇas+nirmāṇakāyādhārasya -> tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasyodakaguṇo nirmāṇakāyādhārasya

tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasyodakaguṇo nirmāṇakāyādhārasya+iti -> tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasyodakaguṇo nirmāṇakāyādhārasyeti

tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasyodakaguṇo nirmāṇakāyādhārasyeti+ādhārādheyabhāvas -> tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasyodakaguṇo nirmāṇakāyādhārasyety ādhārādheyabhāvas

tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasyodakaguṇo nirmāṇakāyādhārasyety ādhārādheyabhāvas+| -> tejoguṇaḥ sambhogakāyādhārasyodakaguṇo nirmāṇakāyādhārasyety ādhārādheyabhāvaḥ|

cakrāṇām+guṇas -> cakrāṇāṃ guṇas

cakrāṇāṃ guṇas+jñānākāśabhūmiguṇas -> cakrāṇāṃ guṇo jñānākāśabhūmiguṇas

cakrāṇāṃ guṇo jñānākāśabhūmiguṇas+sahajakāyādhārāṇām -> cakrāṇāṃ guṇo jñānākāśabhūmiguṇaḥ sahajakāyādhārāṇām

cakrāṇāṃ guṇo jñānākāśabhūmiguṇaḥ sahajakāyādhārāṇām+vāyuguṇas -> cakrāṇāṃ guṇo jñānākāśabhūmiguṇaḥ sahajakāyādhārāṇāṃ vāyuguṇas

cakrāṇāṃ guṇo jñānākāśabhūmiguṇaḥ sahajakāyādhārāṇāṃ vāyuguṇas+dharmakāyādhārasya -> cakrāṇāṃ guṇo jñānākāśabhūmiguṇaḥ sahajakāyādhārāṇāṃ vāyuguṇo dharmakāyādhārasya

guṇavaśāt+iti -> guṇavaśād iti

niyamas+| -> niyamaḥ|

nirmāṇakāyas+adhidevatā -> nirmāṇakāyo 'dhidevatā

nirmāṇakāyo 'dhidevatā+iti -> nirmāṇakāyo 'dhidevateti

nirmāṇakāyas+adhidevatā| -> nirmāṇakāyo 'dhidevatā|

śirasas+abje -> śiraso 'bje

bindau+iti -> bindāv iti

sambhogakāyas+adhidevatā -> sambhogakāyo 'dhidevatā

dharmakāyas+kaṇṭhābje -> dharmakāyaḥ kaṇṭhābje

niḥsvabhāvā+akalpanāsvabhāvā -> niḥsvabhāvākalpanāsvabhāvā

viśuddhakāyas+adhidevatā -> viśuddhakāyo 'dhidevatā

atas+guhyakamale -> ato guhyakamale

sahajakāyas+trikamaleṣu -> sahajakāyas trikamaleṣu

catvāras+kāyās -> catvāraḥ kāyās

catvāraḥ kāyās+ādheyās -> catvāraḥ kāyā ādheyās

catvāraḥ kāyā ādheyās+teṣu -> catvāraḥ kāyā ādheyās teṣu

ṣaṭ+cakrāṇi -> ṣaṭ cakrāṇi

ṣaṭ cakrāṇi+ādhārabhūtāni -> ṣaṭ cakrāṇy ādhārabhūtāni

kamalam+dharmasambhogaśuddham|| -> kamalaṃ dharmasambhogaśuddham||

hṛccakram+kaṇṭhacakram -> hṛccakraṃ kaṇṭhacakram

hṛccakraṃ kaṇṭhacakram+śirasi -> hṛccakraṃ kaṇṭhacakraṃ śirasi

guṇavaśāt+ca -> guṇavaśāc ca

guṇavaśāc ca+ādhidaivakrameṇa -> guṇavaśāc cādhidaivakrameṇa

nirmāṇakāyas+bhavati -> nirmāṇakāyo bhavati

dharmakāyas+bhavati -> dharmakāyo bhavati

sahajajinatanus+niḥsvabhāvasvabhāvā -> sahajajinatanur niḥsvabhāvasvabhāvā

guhya+ityādinā| -> guhyetyādinā|

idānīm+ādhārādheyasamudāyas -> idānīm ādhārādheyasamudāyas

idānīm ādhārādheyasamudāyas+ucyate -> idānīm ādhārādheyasamudāya ucyate

vahniprakṛtis+sūryas -> vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryas

vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryas+rajas -> vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryo rajas

vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryo rajas+kālus -> vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryo rajaḥ kālus

vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryo rajaḥ kālus+sūryarajas -> vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryo rajaḥ kāluḥ sūryarajas

vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryo rajaḥ kāluḥ sūryarajas+kālisvabhāvā -> vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryo rajaḥ kāluḥ sūryarajaḥ kālisvabhāvā

ca+iti| -> ceti|

niścayas+| -> niścayaḥ|

bhavati+udake -> bhavaty udake

bhavaty udake+iti -> bhavaty udaka iti

saṃjñānāmasvaradharmacandras+śukram -> saṃjñānāmasvaradharmacandraḥ śukram

saṃjñānāmasvaradharmacandraḥ śukram+toyaprakṛtis -> saṃjñānāmasvaradharmacandraḥ śukraṃ toyaprakṛtis

saṃjñānāmasvaradharmacandraḥ śukraṃ toyaprakṛtis+toyaprakṛtitvāt -> saṃjñānāmasvaradharmacandraḥ śukraṃ toyaprakṛtis toyaprakṛtitvāt

saṃjñānāmasvaradharmacandraḥ śukraṃ toyaprakṛtis toyaprakṛtitvāt+saṃjñā -> saṃjñānāmasvaradharmacandraḥ śukraṃ toyaprakṛtis toyaprakṛtitvāt saṃjñā

cakārāt+udake -> cakārād udake

bhavati+iti| -> bhavatīti|

dharaṇyām+mukhyatas -> dharaṇyāṃ mukhyatas

dharaṇyāṃ mukhyatas+rūpam -> dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpam

dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpam+siddham -> dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpaṃ siddham

dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpaṃ siddham+saṃjñādayas -> dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpaṃ siddhaṃ saṃjñādayas

dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpaṃ siddhaṃ saṃjñādayas+gauṇatas -> dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpaṃ siddhaṃ saṃjñādayo gauṇatas

dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpaṃ siddhaṃ saṃjñādayo gauṇatas+siddhās -> dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpaṃ siddhaṃ saṃjñādayo gauṇataḥ siddhās

dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpaṃ siddhaṃ saṃjñādayo gauṇataḥ siddhās+| -> dharaṇyāṃ mukhyato rūpaṃ siddhaṃ saṃjñādayo gauṇataḥ siddhāḥ|

dhātuskandhānām+aikyam -> dhātuskandhānām aikyam

dhātuskandhānām aikyam+siddham -> dhātuskandhānām aikyaṃ siddham

dhātuskandhānām aikyaṃ siddham+ucyate| -> dhātuskandhānām aikyaṃ siddham ucyate|

sarvam+bhavati -> sarvaṃ bhavati

siddham+eva -> siddham eva

siddham eva+atra -> siddham evātra

vijñānam+jñānamiśram -> vijñānaṃ jñānamiśram

vijñānaṃ jñānamiśram+sagaganakuliśe -> vijñānaṃ jñānamiśraṃ sagaganakuliśe

siddhasaṃskāras+eva| -> siddhasaṃskāra eva|

ca+udake -> codake

siddham+rūpam -> siddhaṃ rūpam

siddhaṃ rūpam+dharaṇyām -> siddhaṃ rūpaṃ dharaṇyām

siddhaṃ rūpaṃ dharaṇyām+tribhuvananilaye -> siddhaṃ rūpaṃ dharaṇyāṃ tribhuvananilaye

siddhim+āha---siddham -> siddhim āha---siddham

siddhim āha---siddham+ityādi -> siddhim āha---siddham ityādi

rūpādīnām+skandhānām -> rūpādīnāṃ skandhānām

rūpādīnāṃ skandhānām+pratyekadhātau -> rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ pratyekadhātau

kāyabhedas+jñānam -> kāyabhedo jñānam

kāyabhedo jñānam+vijñānam -> kāyabhedo jñānaṃ vijñānam

kāyabhedo jñānaṃ vijñānam+ca -> kāyabhedo jñānaṃ vijñānaṃ ca

caturvidhas+kāyabhedas -> caturvidhaḥ kāyabhedas

caturvidhaḥ kāyabhedas+| -> caturvidhaḥ kāyabhedaḥ|

dantebhyas+patitebhyas -> dantebhyaḥ patitebhyas

dantebhyaḥ patitebhyas+mṛtyuparyantam -> dantebhyaḥ patitebhyo mṛtyuparyantam

dantebhyaḥ patitebhyo mṛtyuparyantam+nirmāṇakāyas -> dantebhyaḥ patitebhyo mṛtyuparyantaṃ nirmāṇakāyas

dantebhyaḥ patitebhyo mṛtyuparyantaṃ nirmāṇakāyas+bāhye -> dantebhyaḥ patitebhyo mṛtyuparyantaṃ nirmāṇakāyo bāhye

yāvat+sambhogakāyas -> yāvat sambhogakāyas

yāvat sambhogakāyas+aṣṭavarṣaparyantam -> yāvat sambhogakāyo 'ṣṭavarṣaparyantam

yāvat sambhogakāyo 'ṣṭavarṣaparyantam+parisphuṭavacanāt| -> yāvat sambhogakāyo 'ṣṭavarṣaparyantaṃ parisphuṭavacanāt|

tasmāt+pātas -> tasmāt pātas

tasmāt pātas+dvijānām -> tasmāt pāto dvijānām

tasmāt pāto dvijānām+dantānām -> tasmāt pāto dvijānāṃ dantānām

tasmāt pāto dvijānāṃ dantānām+pātas -> tasmāt pāto dvijānāṃ dantānāṃ pātas

tasmāt pāto dvijānāṃ dantānāṃ pātas+bhavati -> tasmāt pāto dvijānāṃ dantānāṃ pāto bhavati

dharmakāyas+| -> dharmakāyaḥ|

vacanam+yat -> vacanaṃ yat

vacanaṃ yat+tat -> vacanaṃ yat tat

vacanaṃ yat tat+saṃjñālakṣaṇam -> vacanaṃ yat tat saṃjñālakṣaṇam

vacanaṃ yat tat saṃjñālakṣaṇam+sa -> vacanaṃ yat tat saṃjñālakṣaṇaṃ sa

tasmāt+prāṇasaṃcāravaśāt -> tasmāt prāṇasaṃcāravaśāt

tasmāt prāṇasaṃcāravaśāt+dantodbhavas -> tasmāt prāṇasaṃcāravaśād dantodbhavas

tasmāt prāṇasaṃcāravaśād dantodbhavas+yas -> tasmāt prāṇasaṃcāravaśād dantodbhavo yas

tasmāt prāṇasaṃcāravaśād dantodbhavo yas+asphuṭam -> tasmāt prāṇasaṃcāravaśād dantodbhavo yo 'sphuṭam

tasmāt prāṇasaṃcāravaśād dantodbhavo yo 'sphuṭam+api -> tasmāt prāṇasaṃcāravaśād dantodbhavo yo 'sphuṭam api

sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūham+yāvat -> sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūhaṃ yāvat

sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūhaṃ yāvat+tāvat -> sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūhaṃ yāvat tāvat

sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūhaṃ yāvat tāvat+śuddhakāyas -> sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūhaṃ yāvat tāvac chuddhakāyas

sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūhaṃ yāvat tāvac chuddhakāyas+madhyamāpravāhatas -> sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūhaṃ yāvat tāvac chuddhakāyo madhyamāpravāhatas

sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūhaṃ yāvat tāvac chuddhakāyo madhyamāpravāhatas+| -> sapādaṣaṭpañcāśatśvāsasamūhaṃ yāvat tāvac chuddhakāyo madhyamāpravāhataḥ|

saṃśuddhakāyas+sas -> saṃśuddhakāyaḥ sas

saṃśuddhakāyaḥ sas+eva -> saṃśuddhakāyaḥ sa eva

nirguṇas+vāgvajraviṣaye -> nirguṇo vāgvajraviṣaye

prathamas+udbhavas -> prathama udbhavas

prathama udbhavas+yas -> prathama udbhavo yas

prathama udbhavo yas+madhyanāḍyām -> prathama udbhavo yo madhyanāḍyām

prathama udbhavo yo madhyanāḍyām+bhavati -> prathama udbhavo yo madhyanāḍyāṃ bhavati

tatas+bāhye -> tato bāhye

jinapates+bāhyanirmāṇakāyas -> jinapater bāhyanirmāṇakāyas

jinapater bāhyanirmāṇakāyas+|| -> jinapater bāhyanirmāṇakāyaḥ||

dantebhyas+mṛtyusīmne -> dantebhyo mṛtyusīmne

sambhogakāyas+jinasya -> sambhogakāyo jinasya

tasmāt+pātas -> tasmāt pātas

tasmāt pātas+dvijānām -> tasmāt pāto dvijānām

tasmāt pāto dvijānām+prasavati -> tasmāt pāto dvijānāṃ prasavati

vacanam+dharmakāyas -> vacanaṃ dharmakāyas

vacanaṃ dharmakāyas+tathā -> vacanaṃ dharmakāyas tathā

vacanaṃ dharmakāyas tathā+eva| -> vacanaṃ dharmakāyas tathaiva|

tasmāt+dantodbhavas -> tasmād dantodbhavas

tasmād dantodbhavas+yas -> tasmād dantodbhavo yas

tasmād dantodbhavo yas+asphuṭam -> tasmād dantodbhavo yo 'sphuṭam

tasmād dantodbhavo yo 'sphuṭam+api -> tasmād dantodbhavo yo 'sphuṭam api

nirguṇas+śuddhakāyas -> nirguṇaḥ śuddhakāyas

nirguṇaḥ śuddhakāyas+sas -> nirguṇaḥ śuddhakāyaḥ sas

nirguṇaḥ śuddhakāyaḥ sas+eva -> nirguṇaḥ śuddhakāyaḥ sa eva

śvāsodbhavas+yas -> śvāsodbhavo yas

śvāsodbhavo yas+bhavati -> śvāsodbhavo yo bhavati

prasavanasamayas+yones -> prasavanasamayo yones

prasavanasamayo yones+utpādas -> prasavanasamayo yoner utpādas

prasavanasamayo yoner utpādas+nirmāṇakāyas -> prasavanasamayo yoner utpādo nirmāṇakāyas

prasavanasamayo yoner utpādo nirmāṇakāyas+ucyate -> prasavanasamayo yoner utpādo nirmāṇakāya ucyate

tasmāt+keśādijāte -> tasmāt keśādijāte

tasmāt keśādijāte+āditas -> tasmāt keśādijāta āditas

tasmāt keśādijāta āditas+lomaviṇmūtraniṣpattis -> tasmāt keśādijāta ādito lomaviṇmūtraniṣpattis

tasmāt keśādijāta ādito lomaviṇmūtraniṣpattis+| -> tasmāt keśādijāta ādito lomaviṇmūtraniṣpattiḥ|

guṇavaśāt+divasavaśāt -> guṇavaśād divasavaśāt

guṇavaśād divasavaśāt+sambhogakāyas -> guṇavaśād divasavaśāt sambhogakāyas

guṇavaśād divasavaśāt sambhogakāyas+bhavati| -> guṇavaśād divasavaśāt sambhogakāyo bhavati|

atas+adhyātmaśotrādīnām -> ato 'dhyātmaśotrādīnām

ato 'dhyātmaśotrādīnām+indriyāṇām -> ato 'dhyātmaśotrādīnām indriyāṇām

ato 'dhyātmaśotrādīnām indriyāṇām+śabdādīnām -> ato 'dhyātmaśotrādīnām indriyāṇāṃ śabdādīnām

ato 'dhyātmaśotrādīnām indriyāṇāṃ śabdādīnām+viṣayāṇām -> ato 'dhyātmaśotrādīnām indriyāṇāṃ śabdādīnāṃ viṣayāṇām

ato 'dhyātmaśotrādīnām indriyāṇāṃ śabdādīnāṃ viṣayāṇām+jāte -> ato 'dhyātmaśotrādīnām indriyāṇāṃ śabdādīnāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ jāte

dharmakāyas+jinasya -> dharmakāyo jinasya

dhātuskandhānām+udbhavas -> dhātuskandhānām udbhavas

dhātuskandhānām udbhavas+yas -> dhātuskandhānām udbhavo yas

dhātuskandhānām udbhavo yas+daśavidhas -> dhātuskandhānām udbhavo yo daśavidhas

dhātuskandhānām udbhavo yo daśavidhas+sa -> dhātuskandhānām udbhavo yo daśavidhaḥ sa

mātāpitrālayavijñānaikasukhāvasthātas+| -> mātāpitrālayavijñānaikasukhāvasthātaḥ|

bhagavatā+ucyate -> bhagavatocyate

śuddhakāyas+sa -> śuddhakāyaḥ sa

kamalagatās+mātṛkamalagatās -> kamalagatā mātṛkamalagatās

kamalagatā mātṛkamalagatās+trayas -> kamalagatā mātṛkamalagatās trayas

kamalagatā mātṛkamalagatās trayas+ekībhūtās -> kamalagatā mātṛkamalagatās traya ekībhūtās

kamalagatā mātṛkamalagatās traya ekībhūtās+garbhaniṣpātaye -> kamalagatā mātṛkamalagatās traya ekībhūtā garbhaniṣpātaye

tāvat+vijñānam -> tāvad vijñānam

tāvad vijñānam+ālayavijñānam -> tāvad vijñānam ālayavijñānam

tāvad vijñānam ālayavijñānam+satsaukhyam -> tāvad vijñānam ālayavijñānaṃ satsaukhyam

tāvad vijñānam ālayavijñānaṃ satsaukhyam+jñānam -> tāvad vijñānam ālayavijñānaṃ satsaukhyaṃ jñānam

tāvad vijñānam ālayavijñānaṃ satsaukhyaṃ jñānam+iti| -> tāvad vijñānam ālayavijñānaṃ satsaukhyaṃ jñānam iti|

nirmāṇakāyas+|| -> nirmāṇakāyaḥ||

prasavanasamayas+ca -> prasavanasamayaś ca

prasavanasamayaś ca+atra -> prasavanasamayaś cātra

tasmāt+keśādijāte -> tasmāt keśādijāte

guṇavaśāt+śrotraśabdādijāte -> guṇavaśāc chrotraśabdādijāte

tasmāt+sambhogakāyas -> tasmāt sambhogakāyas

tasmāt sambhogakāyas+bhavati -> tasmāt sambhogakāyo bhavati

daśavidhas+dharmakāyas -> daśavidho dharmakāyas

daśavidho dharmakāyas+jinasya| -> daśavidho dharmakāyo jinasya|

dhātuskandhodbhavas+yas -> dhātuskandhodbhavo yas

dhātuskandhodbhavo yas+bhavati -> dhātuskandhodbhavo yo bhavati

kamalagatās+śuddhakāyas -> kamalagatāḥ śuddhakāyas

kamalagatāḥ śuddhakāyas+sa -> kamalagatāḥ śuddhakāyaḥ sa

vijñānam+candrasūryau -> vijñānaṃ candrasūryau

vijñānaṃ candrasūryau+api -> vijñānaṃ candrasūryāv api

jñānavijñānabhedāt+iti|| -> jñānavijñānabhedād iti||

ṣaḍvijñānabhedāt+bāhye -> ṣaḍvijñānabhedād bāhye

jñānabhedāt+garbhe -> jñānabhedād garbhe

kāyasamūhas+iha -> kāyasamūha iha

punar+asau -> punar asau

tasmāt+dantapātāt -> tasmād dantapātāt

tasmād dantapātāt+nirmāṇakāyas -> tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyas

tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyas+prakaṭitas -> tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭitas

tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭitas+niyatas -> tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭito niyatas

tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭito niyatas+mṛtyusīmnas -> tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭito niyato mṛtyusīmnas

tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭito niyato mṛtyusīmnas+narāṇām -> tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭito niyato mṛtyusīmno narāṇām

tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭito niyato mṛtyusīmno narāṇām+garbhajānām -> tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭito niyato mṛtyusīmno narāṇāṃ garbhajānām

tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭito niyato mṛtyusīmno narāṇāṃ garbhajānām+iti| -> tasmād dantapātān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭito niyato mṛtyusīmno narāṇāṃ garbhajānām iti|

nṛpa+iti -> nṛpeti

nṛpeti+āmantraṇam| -> nṛpety āmantraṇam|

tāvat+sambhogakāyas -> tāvat sambhogakāyas

tāvat sambhogakāyas+jinasya -> tāvat sambhogakāyo jinasya

tatas+dantotthānāt -> tato dantotthānāt

tato dantotthānāt+yāvat -> tato dantotthānād yāvat

tato dantotthānād yāvat+dantaprapātas -> tato dantotthānād yāvad dantaprapātas

tato dantotthānād yāvad dantaprapātas+bhavati -> tato dantotthānād yāvad dantaprapāto bhavati

yāvat+dantotthānam -> yāvad dantotthānam

yāvad dantotthānam+tāvat -> yāvad dantotthānaṃ tāvat

yāvad dantotthānaṃ tāvat+dharmakāyas -> yāvad dantotthānaṃ tāvad dharmakāyas

yāvad dantotthānaṃ tāvad dharmakāyas+bhavati| -> yāvad dantotthānaṃ tāvad dharmakāyo bhavati|

tatas+prasavanasamayam -> tataḥ prasavanasamayam

tataḥ prasavanasamayam+ārabhya -> tataḥ prasavanasamayam ārabhya

śarīriṇas+| -> śarīriṇaḥ|

tāvat+pañcābhijñas -> tāvat pañcābhijñas

tāvat pañcābhijñas+saṃśuddhakāyas -> tāvat pañcābhijñaḥ saṃśuddhakāyas

tāvat pañcābhijñaḥ saṃśuddhakāyas+bhavati -> tāvat pañcābhijñaḥ saṃśuddhakāyo bhavati

yāvat+tiṣṭhati -> yāvat tiṣṭhati

bhagavatas+suviśuddhakāyādikam -> bhagavataḥ suviśuddhakāyādikam

bhagavataḥ suviśuddhakāyādikam+yogibhis -> bhagavataḥ suviśuddhakāyādikaṃ yogibhis

bhagavataḥ suviśuddhakāyādikaṃ yogibhis+veditavyam| -> bhagavataḥ suviśuddhakāyādikaṃ yogibhir veditavyam|

paścāt+tat -> paścāt tat

paścāt tat+vai -> paścāt tad vai

viśuddhakāyādikam+garbhajātasya -> viśuddhakāyādikaṃ garbhajātasya

prathamam+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> prathamaṃ lokasaṃvṛtyā

punar+asau -> punar asau

tasmāt+nirmāṇakāyas -> tasmān nirmāṇakāyas

tasmān nirmāṇakāyas+prakaṭitaniyatas -> tasmān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭitaniyatas

tasmān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭitaniyatas+mṛtyusīmnas -> tasmān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭitaniyato mṛtyusīmnas

tasmān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭitaniyato mṛtyusīmnas+narāṇām -> tasmān nirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭitaniyato mṛtyusīmno narāṇām

sambhogakāyas+jinasya| -> sambhogakāyo jinasya|

prapātas+prabhavati -> prapātaḥ prabhavati

dantānām+vai -> dantānāṃ vai

saṃśuddhakāyas+prasavanasamayāt -> saṃśuddhakāyaḥ prasavanasamayāt

saṃśuddhakāyaḥ prasavanasamayāt+dantabhāve -> saṃśuddhakāyaḥ prasavanasamayād dantabhāve

samudāyasatyam+āha---garbhe -> samudāyasatyam āha---garbhe

samudāyasatyam āha---garbhe+ityādinā|| -> samudāyasatyam āha---garbha ityādinā||

praveśas+atikaṣṭas -> praveśo 'tikaṣṭas

praveśo 'tikaṣṭas+dūrāt -> praveśo 'tikaṣṭo dūrāt

praveśo 'tikaṣṭo dūrāt+dūrataras -> praveśo 'tikaṣṭo dūrād dūrataras

praveśo 'tikaṣṭo dūrād dūrataras+saṃsāriṇām -> praveśo 'tikaṣṭo dūrād dūrataraḥ saṃsāriṇām

praveśo 'tikaṣṭo dūrād dūrataraḥ saṃsāriṇām+saṃsārasukhābhilāṣiṇām -> praveśo 'tikaṣṭo dūrād dūrataraḥ saṃsāriṇāṃ saṃsārasukhābhilāṣiṇām

praveśo 'tikaṣṭo dūrād dūrataraḥ saṃsāriṇāṃ saṃsārasukhābhilāṣiṇām+iti| -> praveśo 'tikaṣṭo dūrād dūrataraḥ saṃsāriṇāṃ saṃsārasukhābhilāṣiṇām iti|

evam+paramasukhapade -> evaṃ paramasukhapade

evaṃ paramasukhapade+aho -> evaṃ paramasukhapade 'ho

tasyām+bhāvanāyām -> tasyāṃ bhāvanāyām

tasyāṃ bhāvanāyām+buddhatvam -> tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ buddhatvam

tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ buddhatvam+iṣṭam -> tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ buddhatvam iṣṭam

tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ buddhatvam iṣṭam+bhavati| -> tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ buddhatvam iṣṭaṃ bhavati|

bhāvanāyām+kasyāṃcit -> bhāvanāyāṃ kasyāṃcit

bhāvanāyāṃ kasyāṃcit+sālambanaśūnyatānirālambanakaruṇātmikāyām -> bhāvanāyāṃ kasyāṃcit sālambanaśūnyatānirālambanakaruṇātmikāyām

bhāvanāyāṃ kasyāṃcit sālambanaśūnyatānirālambanakaruṇātmikāyām+puṇyajñānavaśena -> bhāvanāyāṃ kasyāṃcit sālambanaśūnyatānirālambanakaruṇātmikāyāṃ puṇyajñānavaśena

tatas+kvacit -> tataḥ kvacit

tataḥ kvacit+akhilamatis -> tataḥ kvacid akhilamatis

tataḥ kvacid akhilamatis+vartate -> tataḥ kvacid akhilamatir vartate

pravṛttis+| -> pravṛttiḥ|

yānam+mantranayam -> yānaṃ mantranayam

yānaṃ mantranayam+pāramitānayam -> yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayam

yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayam+phalahetvātmakam -> yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayaṃ phalahetvātmakam

yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayaṃ phalahetvātmakam+ekalolībhūtam -> yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayaṃ phalahetvātmakam ekalolībhūtam

yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayaṃ phalahetvātmakam ekalolībhūtam+tasmin -> yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayaṃ phalahetvātmakam ekalolībhūtaṃ tasmin

yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayaṃ phalahetvātmakam ekalolībhūtaṃ tasmin+pravṛttis -> yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayaṃ phalahetvātmakam ekalolībhūtaṃ tasmin pravṛttis

yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayaṃ phalahetvātmakam ekalolībhūtaṃ tasmin pravṛttis+vajrayāne -> yānaṃ mantranayaṃ pāramitānayaṃ phalahetvātmakam ekalolībhūtaṃ tasmin pravṛttir vajrayāne

tat+eva -> tad eva

pravṛttis+vajram -> pravṛttir vajram

pravṛttir vajram+abhedyam -> pravṛttir vajram abhedyam

pravṛttir vajram abhedyam+acchedyam -> pravṛttir vajram abhedyam acchedyam

pravṛttir vajram abhedyam acchedyam+mahat -> pravṛttir vajram abhedyam acchedyaṃ mahat

pravṛttir vajram abhedyam acchedyaṃ mahat+iti| -> pravṛttir vajram abhedyam acchedyaṃ mahad iti|

tasmāt+śrīvajrayāne -> tasmāc chrīvajrayāne

pravṛttis+bhavati -> pravṛttir bhavati

śubhavaśāt+ādiyāne -> śubhavaśād ādiyāne

tatas+api -> tato 'pi

dānādyanurāgas+api| -> dānādyanurāgo 'pi|

tasmāt+buddhe -> tasmād buddhe

tasmād buddhe+anurāgas -> tasmād buddhe 'nurāgas

tasmād buddhe 'nurāgas+kadācit -> tasmād buddhe 'nurāgaḥ kadācit

tasmād buddhe 'nurāgaḥ kadācit+śubhavaśāt -> tasmād buddhe 'nurāgaḥ kadācic chubhavaśāt

tasmād buddhe 'nurāgaḥ kadācic chubhavaśāt+bhavati -> tasmād buddhe 'nurāgaḥ kadācic chubhavaśād bhavati

narāṇām+tīrthikadānādidharmeṣu| -> narāṇāṃ tīrthikadānādidharmeṣu|

bhavet+tatas -> bhavet tatas

bhavet tatas+dharmabuddhis -> bhavet tato dharmabuddhis

bhavet tato dharmabuddhis+kadācit -> bhavet tato dharmabuddhiḥ kadācit

bhavet tato dharmabuddhiḥ kadācit+bhavati -> bhavet tato dharmabuddhiḥ kadācid bhavati

mānuṣatvam+kvacit -> mānuṣatvaṃ kvacit

mānuṣatvaṃ kvacit+api -> mānuṣatvaṃ kvacid api

praveśas+atikaṣṭas -> praveśo 'tikaṣṭas

praveśo 'tikaṣṭas+|| -> praveśo 'tikaṣṭaḥ||

tasyām+buddhatvam -> tasyāṃ buddhatvam

tasyāṃ buddhatvam+iṣṭam -> tasyāṃ buddhatvam iṣṭam

tasyāṃ buddhatvam iṣṭam+paramasukhapade -> tasyāṃ buddhatvam iṣṭaṃ paramasukhapade

tasyāṃ buddhatvam iṣṭaṃ paramasukhapade+aho -> tasyāṃ buddhatvam iṣṭaṃ paramasukhapade 'ho

kvacit+akhilamatis -> kvacid akhilamatis

kvacid akhilamatis+vartate -> kvacid akhilamatir vartate

tasmāt+śrīvajrayāne -> tasmāc chrīvajrayāne

pravṛttis+| -> pravṛttiḥ|

śubhavaśāt+ādiyāne -> śubhavaśād ādiyāne

tasmāt+buddhe -> tasmād buddhe

tasmād buddhe+anurāgas -> tasmād buddhe 'nurāgas

tasmād buddhe 'nurāgas+bhavati -> tasmād buddhe 'nurāgo bhavati

bhavet+dharmabuddhis -> bhaved dharmabuddhis

bhaved dharmabuddhis+kadācit -> bhaved dharmabuddhiḥ kadācit

mānuṣatvam+kvacit -> mānuṣatvaṃ kvacit

mānuṣatvaṃ kvacit+api -> mānuṣatvaṃ kvacid api

saṃsāre+ityādi| -> saṃsāra ityādi|

mārgasatyam+āha -> mārgasatyam āha

duḥkham+gṛhṇāti -> duḥkhaṃ gṛhṇāti

duḥkhaṃ gṛhṇāti+iti|| -> duḥkhaṃ gṛhṇātīti||

mohitam+ahaṃkāramamakārātmikayā -> mohitam ahaṃkāramamakārātmikayā

duḥkham+sakalajagat -> duḥkhaṃ sakalajagat

duḥkhaṃ sakalajagat+idam -> duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idam

duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idam+mohitam -> duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ mohitam

duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ mohitam+māyayā -> duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ mohitaṃ māyayā

evam+duḥkhāt -> evaṃ duḥkhāt

evaṃ duḥkhāt+gṛhṇāti -> evaṃ duḥkhād gṛhṇāti

pāpavaśāt+daśakulaśalaparityāgāt| -> pāpavaśād daśakulaśalaparityāgāt|

raudram+duḥkham -> raudraṃ duḥkham

raudraṃ duḥkham+bhavati -> raudraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati

āditas+pretatiryaggatau -> āditaḥ pretatiryaggatau

bhayadam+rauravādyam| -> bhayadaṃ rauravādyam|

jarāmaraṇaduḥkham+punar -> jarāmaraṇaduḥkhaṃ punar

jarāmaraṇaduḥkhaṃ punar+api -> jarāmaraṇaduḥkhaṃ punar api

vṛddhatve+api -> vṛddhatve 'pi

strīviyogaduḥkham+dhanavibhavahatam -> strīviyogaduḥkhaṃ dhanavibhavahatam

strīviyogaduḥkhaṃ dhanavibhavahatam+duḥkham -> strīviyogaduḥkhaṃ dhanavibhavahataṃ duḥkham

strīviyogaduḥkhaṃ dhanavibhavahataṃ duḥkham+tadabhāvāt| -> strīviyogaduḥkhaṃ dhanavibhavahataṃ duḥkhaṃ tadabhāvāt|

viṣṭhābhakṣaṇam+śūkaravat -> viṣṭhābhakṣaṇaṃ śūkaravat

viṣṭhābhakṣaṇaṃ śūkaravat+kaumāre -> viṣṭhābhakṣaṇaṃ śūkaravat kaumāre

mudgarayantrapīḍitavat+bālabhāve -> mudgarayantrapīḍitavad bālabhāve

mudgarayantrapīḍitavad bālabhāve+api -> mudgarayantrapīḍitavad bālabhāve 'pi

sthitānām+garbhasthaduḥkham -> sthitānāṃ garbhasthaduḥkham

sthitānāṃ garbhasthaduḥkham+kumbhīpākasadṛśam -> sthitānāṃ garbhasthaduḥkhaṃ kumbhīpākasadṛśam

sthitānāṃ garbhasthaduḥkhaṃ kumbhīpākasadṛśam+bhavati -> sthitānāṃ garbhasthaduḥkhaṃ kumbhīpākasadṛśaṃ bhavati

saṃsāriṇām+prathamam -> saṃsāriṇāṃ prathamam

saṃsāriṇāṃ prathamam+tāvat -> saṃsāriṇāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat

saṃsāriṇāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat+garbhe -> saṃsāriṇāṃ prathamaṃ tāvad garbhe

duḥkham+sakalajagat -> duḥkhaṃ sakalajagat

duḥkhaṃ sakalajagat+idam -> duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idam

duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idam+mohitam -> duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ mohitam

duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ mohitam+māyayā -> duḥkhaṃ sakalajagad idaṃ mohitaṃ māyayā

duḥkhāt+gṛhṇāti -> duḥkhād gṛhṇāti

bhayadam+ṣaḍgatau -> bhayadaṃ ṣaḍgatau

mṛtyuduḥkham+punar -> mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ punar

mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ punar+api -> mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ punar api

strīdhanavibhavahatam+kleśaduḥkham -> strīdhanavibhavahataṃ kleśaduḥkham

strīdhanavibhavahataṃ kleśaduḥkham+mahat -> strīdhanavibhavahataṃ kleśaduḥkhaṃ mahat

strīdhanavibhavahataṃ kleśaduḥkhaṃ mahat+yat| -> strīdhanavibhavahataṃ kleśaduḥkhaṃ mahad yat|

bālabhāve+api -> bālabhāve 'pi

garbhasthaduḥkham+prasavanasamaye -> garbhasthaduḥkhaṃ prasavanasamaye

garbhe+ityādi| -> garbha ityādi|

saṃsāriṇām+duḥkhasatyam -> saṃsāriṇāṃ duḥkhasatyam

saṃsāriṇāṃ duḥkhasatyam+āha -> saṃsāriṇāṃ duḥkhasatyam āha

garbhotpattiniyamas+|| -> garbhotpattiniyamaḥ||

garbhajātakasya+iti -> garbhajātakasyeti

ghoraduḥkham+bhavati -> ghoraduḥkhaṃ bhavati

kvacit+daśame -> kvacid daśame

kvacid daśame+ekādaśe -> kvacid daśama ekādaśe

tatas+randhrākhye -> tato randhrākhye

bhavatas+| -> bhavataḥ|

ca+aṣṭame -> cāṣṭame

tatas+rasanotpādakālāt -> tato rasanotpādakālāt

tato rasanotpādakālāt+iha -> tato rasanotpādakālād iha

kaṭhinās+| -> kaṭhināḥ|

pūrvacakṣurādayas+bhavanti -> pūrvacakṣurādayo bhavanti

tatas+ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatamarmāṇi -> tataḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatamarmāṇi

tataḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatamarmāṇi+asthīni -> tataḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatamarmāṇy asthīni

śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyās+dviśatasaṃkhyās -> śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyā dviśatasaṃkhyās

śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyā dviśatasaṃkhyās+pratyaham -> śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyā dviśatasaṃkhyāḥ pratyaham

śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyā dviśatasaṃkhyāḥ pratyaham+nāḍikās -> śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyā dviśatasaṃkhyāḥ pratyahaṃ nāḍikās

śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyā dviśatasaṃkhyāḥ pratyahaṃ nāḍikās+bhavanti| -> śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyā dviśatasaṃkhyāḥ pratyahaṃ nāḍikā bhavanti|

garbhamāsāt+ūrdhvam -> garbhamāsād ūrdhvam

garbhamāsād ūrdhvam+pratidinasamaye -> garbhamāsād ūrdhvaṃ pratidinasamaye

sampūrṇāni+āyatanāni -> sampūrṇāny āyatanāni

tatas+bhrūkeśās -> tato bhrūkeśās

tato bhrūkeśās+romarandhrāṇi -> tato bhrūkeśā romarandhrāṇi

ghoraduḥkham+prasavanasamaye -> ghoraduḥkhaṃ prasavanasamaye

mūtragūthe+aṣṭame -> mūtragūthe 'ṣṭame

marmāṇi+asthīni -> marmāṇy asthīni

śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyās+| -> śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyāḥ|

jātās+pratidinasamaye -> jātāḥ pratidinasamaye

māsāt+ūrdhvam -> māsād ūrdhvam

māsād ūrdhvam+hi -> māsād ūrdhvaṃ hi

nāḍikās+sāvaśeṣās -> nāḍikāḥ sāvaśeṣās

bhrūkeśās+randhraromāṇi -> bhrūkeśā randhraromāṇi

bhrūkeśā randhraromāṇi+api -> bhrūkeśā randhraromāṇy api

buddhamārgam+praśaṃsayati|| -> buddhamārgaṃ praśaṃsayati||

bhavaduḥkham+nindayati -> bhavaduḥkhaṃ nindayati

vairāgyam+karoti -> vairāgyaṃ karoti

pūrvanivāsānusmṛtim+ca -> pūrvanivāsānusmṛtiṃ ca

vetti+abhijñābalena -> vetty abhijñābalena

sukhaduḥkham+ca -> sukhaduḥkhaṃ ca

māṃsam+rudhiram -> māṃsaṃ rudhiram

māṃsaṃ rudhiram+bhavati -> māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ bhavati

cakārāt+vārāhye -> cakārād vārāhye

tāvat+yas -> tāvad yas

tāvad yas+ṣaṣṭhe -> tāvad yaḥ ṣaṣṭhe

sandhayas+ca -> sandhayaś ca

ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatāni+asthīni -> ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatāny asthīni

kharasahutabhuk+iti -> kharasahutabhug iti

ca+asthīni -> cāsthīni

māṃsāni+āśritya -> māṃsāny āśritya

bhavanti+iti -> bhavantīti

sahajasambhoganāḍyas+atisūkṣmās -> sahajasambhoganāḍyo 'tisūkṣmās

sahajasambhoganāḍyo 'tisūkṣmās+caturthe -> sahajasambhoganāḍyo 'tisūkṣmāś caturthe

karacaraṇānām+ṣaṭsandhiṣu -> karacaraṇānāṃ ṣaṭsandhiṣu

samaśiras+kūrmas -> samaśiraḥ kūrmas

samaśiraḥ kūrmas+aparās -> samaśiraḥ kūrmo 'parās

samaśiraḥ kūrmo 'parās+sūkṣmanāḍyas -> samaśiraḥ kūrmo 'parāḥ sūkṣmanāḍyas

samaśiraḥ kūrmo 'parāḥ sūkṣmanāḍyas+karacaraṇamukhe% -> samaśiraḥ kūrmo 'parāḥ sūkṣmanāḍyaḥ karacaraṇamukhe%

kaṇṭhas+bhavati -> kaṇṭho bhavati

rudhiram+vedanā -> rudhiraṃ vedanā

māṃsam+bhavati -> māṃsaṃ bhavati

sandhayas+ca -> sandhayaś ca

kharasaśikhinas+pañcame -> kharasaśikhinaḥ pañcame

ca+asthīni -> cāsthīni

māṃsāni+āśritya -> māṃsāny āśritya

samaśiras+pūrṇamāse -> samaśiraḥ pūrṇamāse

kaṇṭhas+bhavati -> kaṇṭho bhavati

sphoṭakās+bhavanti|| -> sphoṭakā bhavanti||

kūrmāvasthāyām+mukhakaracaraṇasthāneṣu -> kūrmāvasthāyāṃ mukhakaracaraṇasthāneṣu

prāk+matsyāvasthādine -> prāṅ matsyāvasthādine

mukhakaracaraṇoddeśanam+kiṃcit -> mukhakaracaraṇoddeśanaṃ kiṃcit

mukhakaracaraṇoddeśanaṃ kiṃcit+atra -> mukhakaracaraṇoddeśanaṃ kiṃcid atra

mukhakaracaraṇoddeśanaṃ kiṃcid atra+iha -> mukhakaracaraṇoddeśanaṃ kiṃcid atreha

tatas+sarpyamāṇaprabhāvāt| -> tataḥ sarpyamāṇaprabhāvāt|

tathā+atyantasūkṣmās -> tathātyantasūkṣmās

tathātyantasūkṣmās+tās -> tathātyantasūkṣmās tās

tathātyantasūkṣmās tās+sarvās -> tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvās

tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvās+pūrvoktās -> tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktās

tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktās+nābhināḍyas -> tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktā nābhināḍyas

tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktā nābhināḍyas+karacaraṇamukhasthānakaraṇāya -> tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktā nābhināḍyaḥ karacaraṇamukhasthānakaraṇāya

tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktā nābhināḍyaḥ karacaraṇamukhasthānakaraṇāya+ūrdhvatas -> tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktā nābhināḍyaḥ karacaraṇamukhasthānakaraṇāyordhvatas

tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktā nābhināḍyaḥ karacaraṇamukhasthānakaraṇāyordhvatas+sarpyamāṇās -> tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktā nābhināḍyaḥ karacaraṇamukhasthānakaraṇāyordhvataḥ sarpyamāṇās

tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktā nābhināḍyaḥ karacaraṇamukhasthānakaraṇāyordhvataḥ sarpyamāṇās+karacaraṇamukhasthāneṣu -> tathātyantasūkṣmās tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvoktā nābhināḍyaḥ karacaraṇamukhasthānakaraṇāyordhvataḥ sarpyamāṇāḥ karacaraṇamukhasthāneṣu

tās+nāḍyas -> tā nāḍyas

tā nāḍyas+bhavanti -> tā nāḍyo bhavanti

dvādaśarāśisaṃkrāntivaśāt+catuḥṣaṣṭīnām -> dvādaśarāśisaṃkrāntivaśāc catuḥṣaṣṭīnām

dvādaśarāśisaṃkrāntivaśāc catuḥṣaṣṭīnām+ādhārabhūtās -> dvādaśarāśisaṃkrāntivaśāc catuḥṣaṣṭīnām ādhārabhūtās

dvādaśarāśisaṃkrāntivaśāc catuḥṣaṣṭīnām ādhārabhūtās+dvādaśa -> dvādaśarāśisaṃkrāntivaśāc catuḥṣaṣṭīnām ādhārabhūtā dvādaśa

nābhipradeśe+aṣṭāṣṭākās -> nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākās

nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākās+catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyas -> nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākāś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyas

nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākāś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyas+bhavanti -> nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākāś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyo bhavanti

nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākāś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyo bhavanti+atisūkṣmās -> nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākāś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyo bhavanty atisūkṣmās

nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākāś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyo bhavanty atisūkṣmās+anuktā -> nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākāś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyo bhavanty atisūkṣmā anuktā

nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākāś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyo bhavanty atisūkṣmā anuktā+api -> nābhipradeśe 'ṣṭāṣṭākāś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍavāhinyo bhavanty atisūkṣmā anuktāpi

tās+ca -> tāś ca

tāś ca+atyantasūkṣmās -> tāś cātyantasūkṣmās

tāś cātyantasūkṣmās+bālapramāṇās -> tāś cātyantasūkṣmā bālapramāṇās

tāś cātyantasūkṣmā bālapramāṇās+nābhau -> tāś cātyantasūkṣmā bālapramāṇā nābhau

daśavidhās+nāḍyas -> daśavidhā nāḍyas

daśavidhā nāḍyas+prāṇādivāyvādhārās -> daśavidhā nāḍyaḥ prāṇādivāyvādhārās

daśavidhā nāḍyaḥ prāṇādivāyvādhārās+bhavanti| -> daśavidhā nāḍyaḥ prāṇādivāyvādhārā bhavanti|

tatas+māsāt -> tato māsāt

tato māsāt+ūrdhvam -> tato māsād ūrdhvam

tato māsād ūrdhvam+bodhicittasya -> tato māsād ūrdhvaṃ bodhicittasya

tato māsād ūrdhvaṃ bodhicittasya+aṅkurībhūtasya -> tato māsād ūrdhvaṃ bodhicittasyāṅkurībhūtasya

pañcāmṛtarasagatam+paścāt -> pañcāmṛtarasagataṃ paścāt

pañcāmṛtarasagataṃ paścāt+bījāṅkurasya -> pañcāmṛtarasagataṃ paścād bījāṅkurasya

pañcāmṛtarasagataṃ paścād bījāṅkurasya+iti -> pañcāmṛtarasagataṃ paścād bījāṅkurasyeti

māsam+ekam -> māsam ekam

māsam ekam+yāvat -> māsam ekaṃ yāvat

māsam ekaṃ yāvat+raktam -> māsam ekaṃ yāvad raktam

māsam ekaṃ yāvad raktam+bījam -> māsam ekaṃ yāvad raktaṃ bījam

māsam ekaṃ yāvad raktaṃ bījam+prarohati -> māsam ekaṃ yāvad raktaṃ bījaṃ prarohati

bhavati+ekasmāt -> bhavaty ekasmāt

bhavaty ekasmāt+raktāt -> bhavaty ekasmād raktāt

bhavaty ekasmād raktāt+raktabījaprarohaṇāt -> bhavaty ekasmād raktād raktabījaprarohaṇāt

bhavaty ekasmād raktād raktabījaprarohaṇāt+iti| -> bhavaty ekasmād raktād raktabījaprarohaṇād iti|

māṃsam+ca -> māṃsaṃ ca

carmaraktam+ca -> carmaraktaṃ ca

snāyavas+bhavanti -> snāyavo bhavanti

śukras+ityādinā| -> śukra ityādinā|

prasūtiparyantās+ucyante -> prasūtiparyantā ucyante

mātṛgarbhasthayos+śukrarajasos -> mātṛgarbhasthayoḥ śukrarajasos

mātṛgarbhasthayoḥ śukrarajasos+vikārās -> mātṛgarbhasthayoḥ śukrarajasor vikārās

mātṛgarbhasthayoḥ śukrarajasor vikārās+garbhādhānam -> mātṛgarbhasthayoḥ śukrarajasor vikārā garbhādhānam

mātṛgarbhasthayoḥ śukrarajasor vikārā garbhādhānam+ārabhya -> mātṛgarbhasthayoḥ śukrarajasor vikārā garbhādhānam ārabhya

vakṣyamāṇāyām+paramākṣarajñānasiddhau -> vakṣyamāṇāyāṃ paramākṣarajñānasiddhau

narakāvāptihetukam+iti -> narakāvāptihetukam iti

yat+matsyādikam -> yan matsyādikam

yan matsyādikam+purāṇam -> yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇam

yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇam+racitam -> yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇaṃ racitam

yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇaṃ racitam+duṣṭabrahmaṛṣibhis -> yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇaṃ racitaṃ duṣṭabrahmaṛṣibhis

yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇaṃ racitaṃ duṣṭabrahmaṛṣibhis+tat -> yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇaṃ racitaṃ duṣṭabrahmaṛṣibhis tat

yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇaṃ racitaṃ duṣṭabrahmaṛṣibhis tat+bālānām -> yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇaṃ racitaṃ duṣṭabrahmaṛṣibhis tad bālānām

yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇaṃ racitaṃ duṣṭabrahmaṛṣibhis tad bālānām+vañcanāya -> yan matsyādikaṃ purāṇaṃ racitaṃ duṣṭabrahmaṛṣibhis tad bālānāṃ vañcanāya

daśāvatāras+| -> daśāvatāraḥ|

dvātriṃśaddaśanāni+udbhavam -> dvātriṃśaddaśanāny udbhavam

pūrvoktas+dvinṛpati -> pūrvokto dvinṛpati

ca+aṣṭāṣṭakānyās -> cāṣṭāṣṭakānyās

cāṣṭāṣṭakānyās+karacaraṇamukheṣu -> cāṣṭāṣṭakānyāḥ karacaraṇamukheṣu

cāṣṭāṣṭakānyāḥ karacaraṇamukheṣu+ūrdhvatas -> cāṣṭāṣṭakānyāḥ karacaraṇamukheṣūrdhvatas

cāṣṭāṣṭakānyāḥ karacaraṇamukheṣūrdhvatas+sarpyamāṇā -> cāṣṭāṣṭakānyāḥ karacaraṇamukheṣūrdhvataḥ sarpyamāṇā

nāḍikā+atyantasūkṣmā| -> nāḍikātyantasūkṣmā|

paścāt+bījāṅkurasya -> paścād bījāṅkurasya

raktam+bījam -> raktaṃ bījam

raktaṃ bījam+prarohati -> raktaṃ bījaṃ prarohati

raktaṃ bījaṃ prarohati+amṛtarasagatam -> raktaṃ bījaṃ prarohaty amṛtarasagatam

raktaṃ bījaṃ prarohaty amṛtarasagatam+garbhamadhyaikamāse -> raktaṃ bījaṃ prarohaty amṛtarasagataṃ garbhamadhyaikamāse

carmaraktam+ca -> carmaraktaṃ ca

mṛtyum+ca -> mṛtyuṃ ca

niyamam+yāti -> niyamaṃ yāti

vratam+api -> vratam api

śāntim+karoti -> śāntiṃ karoti

kapaṭam+kārayet -> kapaṭaṃ kārayet

kapaṭaṃ kārayet+sā -> kapaṭaṃ kārayet sā

kapaṭaṃ kārayet sā+eva -> kapaṭaṃ kārayet saiva

sphuṭam+api -> sphuṭam api

bhūyas+rāmye -> bhūyo rāmye

bālabhāvas+dvinṛpatidaśanāni -> bālabhāvo dvinṛpatidaśanāni

bālabhāvo dvinṛpatidaśanāni+udbhavam -> bālabhāvo dvinṛpatidaśanāny udbhavam

bālabhāvo dvinṛpatidaśanāny udbhavam+yānti -> bālabhāvo dvinṛpatidaśanāny udbhavaṃ yānti

karābhyām+yonividāraṇāt|| -> karābhyāṃ yonividāraṇāt||

prasūtis+bhavati -> prasūtir bhavati

evam+saptamāsāt -> evaṃ saptamāsāt

evaṃ saptamāsāt+jātadinam -> evaṃ saptamāsāj jātadinam

evaṃ saptamāsāj jātadinam+yāvat -> evaṃ saptamāsāj jātadinaṃ yāvat

evaṃ saptamāsāj jātadinaṃ yāvat+nārasiṃhe -> evaṃ saptamāsāj jātadinaṃ yāvan nārasiṃhe

tṛtīyaṛtudinam+yāvat -> tṛtīyaṛtudinaṃ yāvat

tṛtīyaṛtudinaṃ yāvat+| -> tṛtīyaṛtudinaṃ yāvat|

bodhicittaviṣṇos+sūryāyatanam -> bodhicittaviṣṇoḥ sūryāyatanam

bodhicittaviṣṇoḥ sūryāyatanam+dvādaśāyatanodbhavas -> bodhicittaviṣṇoḥ sūryāyatanaṃ dvādaśāyatanodbhavas

bodhicittaviṣṇoḥ sūryāyatanaṃ dvādaśāyatanodbhavas+bhavati -> bodhicittaviṣṇoḥ sūryāyatanaṃ dvādaśāyatanodbhavo bhavati

cakārāt+aparaṛtudinam -> cakārād aparaṛtudinam

cakārād aparaṛtudinam+yāvat| -> cakārād aparaṛtudinaṃ yāvat|

kūrmabhāvas+bhavati| -> kūrmabhāvo bhavati|

tatas+kaurmye -> tataḥ kaurmye

bodhicittavajras+viṣṇus -> bodhicittavajro viṣṇus

bodhicittavajro viṣṇus+katidinam -> bodhicittavajro viṣṇuḥ katidinam

bodhicittavajro viṣṇuḥ katidinam+ṛtidinam -> bodhicittavajro viṣṇuḥ katidinam ṛtidinam

bodhicittavajro viṣṇuḥ katidinam ṛtidinam+yāvat -> bodhicittavajro viṣṇuḥ katidinam ṛtidinaṃ yāvat

bodhicittavajro viṣṇuḥ katidinam ṛtidinaṃ yāvat+| -> bodhicittavajro viṣṇuḥ katidinam ṛtidinaṃ yāvat|

matsyākāras+bhavati -> matsyākāro bhavati

matsya+ityādinā| -> matsyetyādinā|

cittavajradharaviṣṇos+daśāvasthākṛtyam -> cittavajradharaviṣṇor daśāvasthākṛtyam

cittavajradharaviṣṇor daśāvasthākṛtyam+ucyate -> cittavajradharaviṣṇor daśāvasthākṛtyam ucyate

daśāvasthāniyamas+|| -> daśāvasthāniyamaḥ||

garbhajānām+iti -> garbhajānām iti

ca+antimā -> cāntimā

vṛddhatve+api -> vṛddhatve 'pi

vṛddhatve 'pi+ekaśāntā -> vṛddhatve 'py ekaśāntā

sarvabhūtasya+ekalolībhūtatvāt -> sarvabhūtasyaikalolībhūtatvāt

sarvabhūtasyaikalolībhūtatvāt+śarīre -> sarvabhūtasyaikalolībhūtatvāc charīre

palitotpattes+maraṇadivasam -> palitotpatter maraṇadivasam

palitotpatter maraṇadivasam+yāvat -> palitotpatter maraṇadivasaṃ yāvat

palitotpatter maraṇadivasaṃ yāvat+buddhāvasthā -> palitotpatter maraṇadivasaṃ yāvad buddhāvasthā

ṣoḍaśavarṣāt+palitotpattim -> ṣoḍaśavarṣāt palitotpattim

ṣoḍaśavarṣāt palitotpattim+yāvat -> ṣoḍaśavarṣāt palitotpattiṃ yāvat

ṣoḍaśavarṣāt palitotpattiṃ yāvat+kṛṣṇāvasthā -> ṣoḍaśavarṣāt palitotpattiṃ yāvat kṛṣṇāvasthā

tathā+aparā -> tathāparā

dantapātāt+ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes -> dantapātāt ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes

dantapātāt ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadhes+prathamavipulā -> dantapātāt ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadheḥ prathamavipulā

yauvane+anyā -> yauvane 'nyā

yauvane 'nyā+iti -> yauvane 'nyeti

dantotthānāt+dantapātam -> dantotthānād dantapātam

dantotthānād dantapātam+yāvat -> dantotthānād dantapātaṃ yāvat

dantotthānād dantapātaṃ yāvat+paraśurāmāvasthā|| -> dantotthānād dantapātaṃ yāvat paraśurāmāvasthā||

dantotthānāt+vāmanāvasthā -> dantotthānād vāmanāvasthā

bālakāle+api -> bālakāle 'pi

tathā+ekā -> tathaikā

matsyakūrmavarāhāvasthās+tisras -> matsyakūrmavarāhāvasthās tisras

matsyakūrmavarāhāvasthās tisras+bhavanti -> matsyakūrmavarāhāvasthās tisro bhavanti

daśāvasthālakṣaṇam+bhavati| -> daśāvasthālakṣaṇaṃ bhavati|

patitam+yadā -> patitaṃ yadā

śukram+sajīvam -> śukraṃ sajīvam

śukraṃ sajīvam+ālayavijñānasahitam -> śukraṃ sajīvam ālayavijñānasahitam

śukraṃ sajīvam ālayavijñānasahitam+guhyābje -> śukraṃ sajīvam ālayavijñānasahitaṃ guhyābje

bodhibījam+iti -> bodhibījam iti

patitam+api -> patitam api

prasūtis+|| -> prasūtiḥ||

bhavet+nārasiṃhe -> bhaven nārasiṃhe

sūryāyatanam+api -> sūryāyatanam api

katidinam+kūrmabhāvas -> katidinaṃ kūrmabhāvas

katidinaṃ kūrmabhāvas+ca -> katidinaṃ kūrmabhāvaś ca

matsyākāras+tu -> matsyākāras tu

ca+antimā -> cāntimā

vṛddhatve+api -> vṛddhatve 'pi

vṛddhatve 'pi+ekaśāntā -> vṛddhatve 'py ekaśāntā

samyak+tathā -> samyak tathā

samyak tathā+ekā -> samyak tathaikā

vipulā+ekā -> vipulaikā

yauvane+anyā -> yauvane 'nyā

bālakāle+api -> bālakāle 'pi

tisras+tathā -> tisras tathā

tisras tathā+ekā -> tisras tathaikā

daśavidhās+ca -> daśavidhāś ca

daśavidhāś ca+api -> daśavidhāś cāpi

daśavidhāś cāpi+avasthās -> daśavidhāś cāpy avasthās

daśavidhāś cāpy avasthās+daśa -> daśavidhāś cāpy avasthā daśa

daśavidhāś cāpy avasthā daśa+etās -> daśavidhāś cāpy avasthā daśaitās

kṛṣṇas+buddhas -> kṛṣṇo buddhas

kṛṣṇo buddhas+narendras -> kṛṣṇo buddho narendras

kṛṣṇo buddho narendras+bhavati -> kṛṣṇo buddho narendro bhavati

naraharis+vāmanas -> naraharir vāmanas

naraharir vāmanas+rāmarāmau| -> naraharir vāmano rāmarāmau|

matsyas+kūrmas -> matsyaḥ kūrmas

matsyaḥ kūrmas+varāhas -> matsyaḥ kūrmo varāhas

matsyaḥ kūrmo varāhas+bhavati -> matsyaḥ kūrmo varāho bhavati

bodhibījam+sajīvam -> bodhibījaṃ sajīvam

patitam+api -> patitam api

guhya+ityādinā| -> guhyetyādinā|

adhyātmacittavajradharaviṣṇos+daśāvasthās -> adhyātmacittavajradharaviṣṇor daśāvasthās

adhyātmacittavajradharaviṣṇor daśāvasthās+ucyante -> adhyātmacittavajradharaviṣṇor daśāvasthā ucyante

śaktayas+dhūmādayas -> śaktayo dhūmādayas

śaktayo dhūmādayas+kāyavākcittadharmiṇyas -> śaktayo dhūmādayaḥ kāyavākcittadharmiṇyas

śaktayo dhūmādayaḥ kāyavākcittadharmiṇyas+sphārayanti -> śaktayo dhūmādayaḥ kāyavākcittadharmiṇyaḥ sphārayanti

śaktayo dhūmādayaḥ kāyavākcittadharmiṇyaḥ sphārayanti+iti -> śaktayo dhūmādayaḥ kāyavākcittadharmiṇyaḥ sphārayantīti

nānābhāvais+anekais -> nānābhāvair anekais

nānābhāvair anekais+satanuravamanas -> nānābhāvair anekaiḥ satanuravamanas

nānābhāvair anekaiḥ satanuravamanas+iti -> nānābhāvair anekaiḥ satanuravamana iti

gaganam+kālatas -> gaganaṃ kālatas

gaganaṃ kālatas+sṛṣṭis -> gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭis

gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭis+evam -> gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭir evam

gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭir evam+pūrvoktavidhānatas -> gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭir evaṃ pūrvoktavidhānatas

gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭir evaṃ pūrvoktavidhānatas+| -> gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭir evaṃ pūrvoktavidhānataḥ|

vṛddhes+bhūyas -> vṛddher bhūyas

vṛddher bhūyas+avakāśam -> vṛddher bhūyo 'vakāśam

vṛddher bhūyo 'vakāśam+dadati -> vṛddher bhūyo 'vakāśaṃ dadati

bhakṣitānām+rasānām -> bhakṣitānāṃ rasānām

bhakṣitānāṃ rasānām+pravaradaśavidhas -> bhakṣitānāṃ rasānāṃ pravaradaśavidhas

bhakṣitānāṃ rasānāṃ pravaradaśavidhas+mārutas -> bhakṣitānāṃ rasānāṃ pravaradaśavidho mārutas

bhakṣitānāṃ rasānāṃ pravaradaśavidho mārutas+prāṇādivṛddhim -> bhakṣitānāṃ rasānāṃ pravaradaśavidho mārutaḥ prāṇādivṛddhim

bhakṣitānāṃ rasānāṃ pravaradaśavidho mārutaḥ prāṇādivṛddhim+karoti -> bhakṣitānāṃ rasānāṃ pravaradaśavidho mārutaḥ prāṇādivṛddhiṃ karoti

bhakṣitānāṃ rasānāṃ pravaradaśavidho mārutaḥ prāṇādivṛddhiṃ karoti+asya -> bhakṣitānāṃ rasānāṃ pravaradaśavidho mārutaḥ prāṇādivṛddhiṃ karoty asya

tejas+pākam -> tejaḥ pākam

tejaḥ pākam+karoti -> tejaḥ pākaṃ karoti

toyam+evam -> toyam evam

toyam evam+dravatvam -> toyam evaṃ dravatvam

toyam evaṃ dravatvam+karoti -> toyam evaṃ dravatvaṃ karoti

śarīrasya+utpattaye -> śarīrasyotpattaye

sphuṭam+gurughanatām -> sphuṭaṃ gurughanatām

sphuṭaṃ gurughanatām+karoti -> sphuṭaṃ gurughanatāṃ karoti

guhyakamalagatān+ṣaḍrasān -> guhyakamalagatan ṣaḍrasān

guhyakamalagatan ṣaḍrasān+bhakṣayitvā -> guhyakamalagatan ṣaḍrasān bhakṣayitvā

nānābhāvais+anekais -> nānābhāvair anekais

nānābhāvair anekais+satanuravamanas -> nānābhāvair anekaiḥ satanuravamanas

nānābhāvair anekaiḥ satanuravamanas+śaktayas -> nānābhāvair anekaiḥ satanuravamanaḥ śaktayas

nānābhāvair anekaiḥ satanuravamanaḥ śaktayas+sphārayanti|| -> nānābhāvair anekaiḥ satanuravamanaḥ śaktayaḥ sphārayanti||

gaganam+kālatas -> gaganaṃ kālatas

gaganaṃ kālatas+sṛṣṭis -> gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭis

gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭis+evam -> gaganaṃ kālataḥ sṛṣṭir evam

vṛddhes+bhūyas -> vṛddher bhūyas

vṛddher bhūyas+avakāśam -> vṛddher bhūyo 'vakāśam

vṛddher bhūyo 'vakāśam+dadati -> vṛddher bhūyo 'vakāśaṃ dadati

pravaradaśavidhas+mārutas -> pravaradaśavidho mārutas

pravaradaśavidho mārutas+vṛddhim -> pravaradaśavidho māruto vṛddhim

pravaradaśavidho māruto vṛddhim+asya| -> pravaradaśavidho māruto vṛddhim asya|

tejas+pākam -> tejaḥ pākam

tejaḥ pākam+karoti -> tejaḥ pākaṃ karoti

sphuṭagurughanatām+toyam -> sphuṭagurughanatāṃ toyam

sphuṭagurughanatāṃ toyam+eva -> sphuṭagurughanatāṃ toyam eva

svadhātukṛtyam+āha---bījasya -> svadhātukṛtyam āha---bījasya

svadhātukṛtyam āha---bījasya+ityādi| -> svadhātukṛtyam āha---bījasyetyādi|

garbhādhānaniyamas+|| -> garbhādhānaniyamaḥ||

kāle+iti -> kāla iti

garbhabālakaumārādikās+daśāvasthās -> garbhabālakaumārādikā daśāvasthās

garbhabālakaumārādikā daśāvasthās+prasavanasamaye -> garbhabālakaumārādikā daśāvasthāḥ prasavanasamaye

divyās+dhūmādayas -> divyā dhūmādayas

divyā dhūmādayas+daśāvasthās -> divyā dhūmādayo daśāvasthās

divyā dhūmādayo daśāvasthās+tās -> divyā dhūmādayo daśāvasthās tās

divyā dhūmādayo daśāvasthās tās+kurvanti| -> divyā dhūmādayo daśāvasthās tāḥ kurvanti|

divyās+kurvanti -> divyāḥ kurvanti

divyāḥ kurvanti+avasthās -> divyāḥ kurvanty avasthās

divyāḥ kurvanty avasthās+iti -> divyāḥ kurvanty avasthā iti

matsyādes+siddhis -> matsyādeḥ siddhis

matsyādeḥ siddhis+garbhaniṣpattis -> matsyādeḥ siddhir garbhaniṣpattis

matsyādeḥ siddhir garbhaniṣpattis+bhavati| -> matsyādeḥ siddhir garbhaniṣpattir bhavati|

evam+anena -> evam anena

kālatas+siddhis -> kālataḥ siddhis

kālataḥ siddhis+evam| -> kālataḥ siddhir evam|

narapate+iti -> narapata iti

narapata iti+āmantraṇam| -> narapata ity āmantraṇam|

vṛddhes+sakāśāt -> vṛddheḥ sakāśāt

vṛddheḥ sakāśāt+kham -> vṛddheḥ sakāśāt kham

vṛddheḥ sakāśāt kham+śūnyam -> vṛddheḥ sakāśāt khaṃ śūnyam

vṛddheḥ sakāśāt khaṃ śūnyam+avakāśam -> vṛddheḥ sakāśāt khaṃ śūnyam avakāśam

vṛddheḥ sakāśāt khaṃ śūnyam avakāśam+dadāti| -> vṛddheḥ sakāśāt khaṃ śūnyam avakāśaṃ dadāti|

mārutas+vṛddhim -> māruto vṛddhim

māruto vṛddhim+asya -> māruto vṛddhim asya

rasarasam+tejas -> rasarasaṃ tejas

rasarasaṃ tejas+| -> rasarasaṃ tejaḥ|

yat+tat -> yat tat

yat tat+grasati -> yat tad grasati

ṣaḍrasam+mātṛbhakṣitam -> ṣaḍrasaṃ mātṛbhakṣitam

ṣaḍrasaṃ mātṛbhakṣitam+pītam -> ṣaḍrasaṃ mātṛbhakṣitaṃ pītam

ṣaḍrasaṃ mātṛbhakṣitaṃ pītam+ca -> ṣaḍrasaṃ mātṛbhakṣitaṃ pītaṃ ca

rasarasam+iti -> rasarasam iti

tejas+prabodham -> tejaḥ prabodham

tejaḥ prabodham+karoti| -> tejaḥ prabodhaṃ karoti|

bījasya+ambunā -> bījasyāmbunā

paścāt+tejas -> paścāt tejas

paścāt tejas+bodham -> paścāt tejo bodham

paścāt tejo bodham+karoti -> paścāt tejo bodhaṃ karoti

paścāt tejo bodhaṃ karoti+iti -> paścāt tejo bodhaṃ karotīti

paścāt tejo bodhaṃ karotīti+asya -> paścāt tejo bodhaṃ karotīty asya

guhyakamalagatam+atas -> guhyakamalagatam atas

guhyakamalagatam atas+guhyakamalāt -> guhyakamalagatam ato guhyakamalāt

guhyakamalagatam ato guhyakamalāt+rohayati -> guhyakamalagatam ato guhyakamalād rohayati

guhyakamalagatam ato guhyakamalād rohayati+ambu -> guhyakamalagatam ato guhyakamalād rohayaty ambu

kamalagatam+iti -> kamalagatam iti

yas+pṛthvīdhātus -> yaḥ pṛthvīdhātus

yaḥ pṛthvīdhātus+sas -> yaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ sas

yaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ sas+iti -> yaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ sa iti

yaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ sa iti+arthas -> yaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ sa ity arthas

yaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ sa ity arthas+| -> yaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ sa ity arthaḥ|

tat+bījam -> tad bījam

tad bījam+dhayye -> tad bījaṃ dhayye

tat+bījam -> tad bījam

tad bījam+ucyate| -> tad bījam ucyate|

dvīndriyasaṃyogāt+yat -> dvīndriyasaṃyogād yat

dvīndriyasaṃyogād yat+cyutam -> dvīndriyasaṃyogād yac cyutam

dvīndriyasaṃyogād yac cyutam+bhagaraktam -> dvīndriyasaṃyogād yac cyutaṃ bhagaraktam

dvīndriyasaṃyogād yac cyutaṃ bhagaraktam+guhyakamale -> dvīndriyasaṃyogād yac cyutaṃ bhagaraktaṃ guhyakamale

divyās+kurvanti -> divyāḥ kurvanti

divyāḥ kurvanti+avasthās -> divyāḥ kurvanty avasthās

divyāḥ kurvanty avasthās+prasavanasamaye -> divyāḥ kurvanty avasthāḥ prasavanasamaye

kālatas+siddhis -> kālataḥ siddhis

kālataḥ siddhis+evam -> kālataḥ siddhir evam

vṛddhes+kham -> vṛddheḥ kham

vṛddheḥ kham+ca -> vṛddheḥ khaṃ ca

vṛddheḥ khaṃ ca+avakāśam -> vṛddheḥ khaṃ cāvakāśam

vṛddheḥ khaṃ cāvakāśam+dadati -> vṛddheḥ khaṃ cāvakāśaṃ dadati

rasarasam+mārutas -> rasarasaṃ mārutas

rasarasaṃ mārutas+vṛddhim -> rasarasaṃ māruto vṛddhim

rasarasaṃ māruto vṛddhim+asya| -> rasarasaṃ māruto vṛddhim asya|

tejas+bodham -> tejo bodham

tejo bodham+karoti -> tejo bodhaṃ karoti

kamalagatam+atas -> kamalagatam atas

kamalagatam atas+rohayati -> kamalagatam ato rohayati

kamalagatam ato rohayati+ambu -> kamalagatam ato rohayaty ambu

bījam+dhatte -> bījaṃ dhatte

garbhādhānādikam+āha---bījam -> garbhādhānādikam āha---bījam

garbhādhānādikam āha---bījam+ityādinā|| -> garbhādhānādikam āha---bījam ityādinā||

kāryakāraṇasāmagrīniyamas+|| -> kāryakāraṇasāmagrīniyamaḥ||

vaktavyam+iti -> vaktavyam iti

saṃkṣepavivaraṇam+vakṣyamāṇe -> saṃkṣepavivaraṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇe

iha+adhyātmapaṭale -> ihādhyātmapaṭale

ihādhyātmapaṭale+asya -> ihādhyātmapaṭale 'sya

yoginā+iti| -> yogineti|

evambhūtasthaśāntam+mahāsukham -> evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ mahāsukham

evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ mahāsukham+trividhabhavagatam -> evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ mahāsukhaṃ trividhabhavagatam

evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ mahāsukhaṃ trividhabhavagatam+veditavyam -> evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ mahāsukhaṃ trividhabhavagataṃ veditavyam

evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ mahāsukhaṃ trividhabhavagataṃ veditavyam+svakāye -> evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ mahāsukhaṃ trividhabhavagataṃ veditavyaṃ svakāye

śāśvatam+nirāvaraṇam -> śāśvataṃ nirāvaraṇam

śāśvataṃ nirāvaraṇam+ucyate| -> śāśvataṃ nirāvaraṇam ucyate|

vimiśram+samarasam -> vimiśraṃ samarasam

vimiśraṃ samarasam+ca -> vimiśraṃ samarasaṃ ca

vimiśraṃ samarasaṃ ca+akṣaram -> vimiśraṃ samarasaṃ cākṣaram

vimiśraṃ samarasaṃ cākṣaram+śāśvatam -> vimiśraṃ samarasaṃ cākṣaraṃ śāśvatam

vimiśraṃ samarasaṃ cākṣaraṃ śāśvatam+bhavati| -> vimiśraṃ samarasaṃ cākṣaraṃ śāśvataṃ bhavati|

grāhakacittam+grāhyacittābhāse -> grāhakacittaṃ grāhyacittābhāse

sarvasattvānām+vijñānam -> sarvasattvānāṃ vijñānam

sarvasattvānāṃ vijñānam+tat -> sarvasattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ tat

sarvasattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ tat+eva -> sarvasattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ tad eva

yat+svaśarīre -> yat svaśarīre

vyāpyavyāpakasambandhena+avasthitam -> vyāpyavyāpakasambandhenāvasthitam

vyāpyavyāpakasambandhenāvasthitam+saṃvṛtyā -> vyāpyavyāpakasambandhenāvasthitaṃ saṃvṛtyā
