jñānaṃ vimiśram+iti -> jñānaṃ vimiśram iti

jñānaṃ vimiśram iti+iha -> jñānaṃ vimiśram itīha

pṛthvyaptejovāyurasavṛndam+khadhātau -> pṛthvyaptejovāyurasavṛndaṃ khadhātau

bhūtavṛndam+khadhātau -> bhūtavṛndaṃ khadhātau

bhūtavṛndaṃ khadhātau+iti -> bhūtavṛndaṃ khadhātāv iti

pṛthvyaptejovāyurasebhyas+ṣaṭ -> pṛthvyaptejovāyurasebhyaḥ ṣaṭ

pṛthvyaptejovāyurasebhyaḥ ṣaṭ+rasās -> pṛthvyaptejovāyurasebhyaḥ ṣaḍ rasās

pṛthvyaptejovāyurasebhyaḥ ṣaḍ rasās+ca -> pṛthvyaptejovāyurasebhyaḥ ṣaḍ rasāś ca

bhūtebhyas+ṣaṭ -> bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaṭ

bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaṭ+rasās -> bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaḍ rasās

bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaḍ rasās+iti -> bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaḍ rasā iti

lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlās+ṣaṭ -> lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaṭ

lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaṭ+rasās -> lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaḍ rasās

lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaḍ rasās+eṣām -> lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaḍ rasā eṣām

lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaḍ rasā eṣām+āhārapānavaśāt -> lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaḍ rasā eṣām āhārapānavaśāt

lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaḍ rasā eṣām āhārapānavaśāt+dhātuvṛndam -> lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaḍ rasā eṣām āhārapānavaśād dhātuvṛndam

lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaḍ rasā eṣām āhārapānavaśād dhātuvṛndam+bhavati| -> lavaṇamadhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyāmlāḥ ṣaḍ rasā eṣām āhārapānavaśād dhātuvṛndaṃ bhavati|

sakalam+ṣaḍrasāhārapānāt -> sakalaṃ ṣaḍrasāhārapānāt

sakalaṃ ṣaḍrasāhārapānāt+iti -> sakalaṃ ṣaḍrasāhārapānād iti

lomatvakraktamāṃsāsthimajjādikam+dhātuvṛndam -> lomatvakraktamāṃsāsthimajjādikaṃ dhātuvṛndam

lomatvakraktamāṃsāsthimajjādikaṃ dhātuvṛndam+bhavati -> lomatvakraktamāṃsāsthimajjādikaṃ dhātuvṛndaṃ bhavati

dhātuvṛndam+iti -> dhātuvṛndam iti

evambhūtasthaśāntam+trividhabhavagatam -> evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ trividhabhavagatam

evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ trividhabhavagatam+veditavyam -> evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ trividhabhavagataṃ veditavyam

evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ trividhabhavagataṃ veditavyam+svakāye|| -> evambhūtasthaśāntaṃ trividhabhavagataṃ veditavyaṃ svakāye||

samarasam+ca -> samarasaṃ ca

samarasaṃ ca+akṣaram -> samarasaṃ cākṣaram

samarasaṃ cākṣaram+śāśvatam -> samarasaṃ cākṣaraṃ śāśvatam

samarasaṃ cākṣaraṃ śāśvatam+ca -> samarasaṃ cākṣaraṃ śāśvataṃ ca

jñānam+vimiśram -> jñānaṃ vimiśram

jñānaṃ vimiśram+bhavati -> jñānaṃ vimiśraṃ bhavati

prakaṭitaniyatam+bhūtavṛndam -> prakaṭitaniyataṃ bhūtavṛndam

prakaṭitaniyataṃ bhūtavṛndam+khadhātau| -> prakaṭitaniyataṃ bhūtavṛndaṃ khadhātau|

bhūtebhyas+ṣaṭ -> bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaṭ

bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaṭ+rasās -> bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaḍ rasās

bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaḍ rasās+ca -> bhūtebhyaḥ ṣaḍ rasāś ca

sakalam+ṣaḍrasāhārapānāt -> sakalaṃ ṣaḍrasāhārapānāt

dehe+asmin -> dehe 'smin

dehe 'smin+dhātuvṛndam -> dehe 'smin dhātuvṛndam

dehe 'smin dhātuvṛndam+bhavati -> dehe 'smin dhātuvṛndaṃ bhavati

kāryakāraṇasāmagrīsaṃgrahavṛttam+tṛtīyam -> kāryakāraṇasāmagrīsaṃgrahavṛttaṃ tṛtīyam

kāryakāraṇasāmagrīsaṃgrahavṛttaṃ tṛtīyam+āha---dehe -> kāryakāraṇasāmagrīsaṃgrahavṛttaṃ tṛtīyam āha---dehe

kāryakāraṇasāmagrīsaṃgrahavṛttaṃ tṛtīyam āha---dehe+ityādi--- -> kāryakāraṇasāmagrīsaṃgrahavṛttaṃ tṛtīyam āha---deha ityādi---

idānīm+manuṣyaśarīrotpattaye -> idānīṃ manuṣyaśarīrotpattaye

viśvasaṃgrahoddeśaniyamas+|| -> viśvasaṃgrahoddeśaniyamaḥ||

bodhicittacaturbindubhedais+jñātavyas -> bodhicittacaturbindubhedair jñātavyas

bodhicittacaturbindubhedair jñātavyas+iti -> bodhicittacaturbindubhedair jñātavya iti

śūnyabhedais+iti -> śūnyabhedair iti

sthitatvāt+iti| -> sthitatvād iti|

gatis+api -> gatir api

śūnyabhedais+| -> śūnyabhedaiḥ|

trividhavibhugatis+yoginā -> trividhavibhugatir yoginā

samastam+jñātavyam -> samastaṃ jñātavyam

samastaṃ jñātavyam+yoginā| -> samastaṃ jñātavyaṃ yoginā|

vakrās+grahās -> vakrā grahās

vakrā grahās+maṅgalādayas -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayas

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayas+dakṣiṇavāmabījais -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījais

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījais+pūrvoktais -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktais

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktais+saṃkrāntis -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntis

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntis+dvādaśavargabhedais -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedais

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedais+māsās -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsās

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsās+api -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā api

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā api+evam -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evam

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evam+pakṣās -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣās

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣās+ṣaḍvargārdhabhedais -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedais

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedais+dinaniśitithayas -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedair dinaniśitithayas

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedair dinaniśitithayas+kādyais -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedair dinaniśitithayaḥ kādyais

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedair dinaniśitithayaḥ kādyais+sasvarais -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedair dinaniśitithayaḥ kādyaiḥ sasvarais

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedair dinaniśitithayaḥ kādyaiḥ sasvarais+pūrvoktais -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedair dinaniśitithayaḥ kādyaiḥ sasvaraiḥ pūrvoktais

vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedair dinaniśitithayaḥ kādyaiḥ sasvaraiḥ pūrvoktais+iti -> vakrā grahā maṅgalādayo dakṣiṇavāmabījaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ saṃkrāntir dvādaśavargabhedair māsā apy evaṃ pakṣāḥ ṣaḍvargārdhabhedair dinaniśitithayaḥ kādyaiḥ sasvaraiḥ pūrvoktair iti

surāvāsas+svargas -> surāvāsaḥ svargas

surāvāsaḥ svargas+hūṃkāreṇa| -> surāvāsaḥ svargo hūṃkāreṇa|

rāhus+vyañjanena -> rāhur vyañjanena

rāhur vyañjanena+asvareṇa -> rāhur vyañjanenāsvareṇa

candras+bindunā -> candro bindunā

candro bindunā+arkas -> candro bindunārkas

candro bindunārkas+visargeṇa -> candro bindunārko visargeṇa

rāśicakram+ādikādyais -> rāśicakram ādikādyais

rāśicakram ādikādyais+samastais -> rāśicakram ādikādyaiḥ samastais

rāśicakram ādikādyaiḥ samastais+ca -> rāśicakram ādikādyaiḥ samastaiś ca

tālavyais+| -> tālavyaiḥ|

vāyavas+daśa -> vāyavo daśa

suradhanus+indradhanus -> suradhanur indradhanus

suradhanur indradhanus+dantyais -> suradhanur indradhanur dantyais

suradhanur indradhanur dantyais+| -> suradhanur indradhanur dantyaiḥ|

kuliśam+vidyut -> kuliśaṃ vidyut

kuliśaṃ vidyut+punar -> kuliśaṃ vidyut punar

kuliśaṃ vidyut punar+mūrdhanyais -> kuliśaṃ vidyut punar mūrdhanyais

kuliśaṃ vidyut punar mūrdhanyais+| -> kuliśaṃ vidyut punar mūrdhanyaiḥ|

pṛthvītoyāgnivātās+| -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ|

oṣṭhyais+toyam -> oṣṭhyais toyam

oṣṭhyais toyam+mūrdhanyais -> oṣṭhyais toyaṃ mūrdhanyais

oṣṭhyais toyaṃ mūrdhanyais+agnis -> oṣṭhyais toyaṃ mūrdhanyair agnis

oṣṭhyais toyaṃ mūrdhanyair agnis+tālavyais -> oṣṭhyais toyaṃ mūrdhanyair agnis tālavyais

oṣṭhyais toyaṃ mūrdhanyair agnis tālavyais+vāyus -> oṣṭhyais toyaṃ mūrdhanyair agnis tālavyair vāyus

oṣṭhyais toyaṃ mūrdhanyair agnis tālavyair vāyus+iti% -> oṣṭhyais toyaṃ mūrdhanyair agnis tālavyair vāyur iti%

dantyavarṇais+pṛthvī -> dantyavarṇaiḥ pṛthvī

pṛthivyādikam+samastam -> pṛthivyādikaṃ samastam

pṛthivyādikaṃ samastam+jñātavyam -> pṛthivyādikaṃ samastaṃ jñātavyam

pṛthivyādikaṃ samastaṃ jñātavyam+svasvavarṇais -> pṛthivyādikaṃ samastaṃ jñātavyaṃ svasvavarṇais

pṛthivyādikaṃ samastaṃ jñātavyaṃ svasvavarṇais+iti| -> pṛthivyādikaṃ samastaṃ jñātavyaṃ svasvavarṇair iti|

śūnyabhedais+|| -> śūnyabhedaiḥ||

jñātavyam+svasvavarṇais -> jñātavyaṃ svasvavarṇais

jñātavyaṃ svasvavarṇais+trividhavibhugatis -> jñātavyaṃ svasvavarṇais trividhavibhugatis

jñātavyaṃ svasvavarṇais trividhavibhugatis+yoginā -> jñātavyaṃ svasvavarṇais trividhavibhugatir yoginā

saṃkrāntis+māsapakṣās -> saṃkrāntir māsapakṣās

saṃkrāntir māsapakṣās+dinaniśitithayas -> saṃkrāntir māsapakṣā dinaniśitithayas

saṃkrāntir māsapakṣā dinaniśitithayas+dehamadhye -> saṃkrāntir māsapakṣā dinaniśitithayo dehamadhye

rāhumeruphaṇimanujasurās+rāśivakrās -> rāhumeruphaṇimanujasurā rāśivakrās

rāhumeruphaṇimanujasurā rāśivakrās+satārās -> rāhumeruphaṇimanujasurā rāśivakrāḥ satārās

rāhumeruphaṇimanujasurā rāśivakrāḥ satārās+| -> rāhumeruphaṇimanujasurā rāśivakrāḥ satārāḥ|

pṛthvītoyāgnivātās+kuliśasuradhanus -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kuliśasuradhanus

pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kuliśasuradhanus+vāyavas -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kuliśasuradhanur vāyavas

pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kuliśasuradhanur vāyavas+rāśicakram -> pṛthvītoyāgnivātāḥ kuliśasuradhanur vāyavo rāśicakram

deśanāvṛttam+āha---pṛthivī -> deśanāvṛttam āha---pṛthivī

deśanāvṛttam āha---pṛthivī+ityādi| -> deśanāvṛttam āha---pṛthivītyādi|

akāras+ādis -> akāra ādis

akāra ādis+yeṣām -> akāra ādir yeṣām

akāra ādir yeṣām+svarāṇām -> akāra ādir yeṣāṃ svarāṇām

akāra ādir yeṣāṃ svarāṇām+te -> akāra ādir yeṣāṃ svarāṇāṃ te

ādyās+ityādi| -> ādyā ityādi|

nṛṇām+mṛtyus -> nṛṇāṃ mṛtyus

nṛṇāṃ mṛtyus+ādisvarasya|| -> nṛṇāṃ mṛtyur ādisvarasya||

tasmin+saṃgrāmarogas -> tasmin saṃgrāmarogas

tasmin saṃgrāmarogas+yadi -> tasmin saṃgrāmarogo yadi

punas+kṛttikāyoge -> punaḥ kṛttikāyoge

punaḥ kṛttikāyoge+eva -> punaḥ kṛttikāyoga eva

bhaume+aniṣṭhodaye -> bhaume 'niṣṭhodaye

bhaumādivāras+| -> bhaumādivāraḥ|

bhavet+tatra -> bhavet tatra

kurvanti+atra -> kurvanty atra

kurvanty atra+udayānte -> kurvanty atrodayānte

prathamatithivaśāt+pañcanandādiyoge -> prathamatithivaśāt pañcanandādiyoge

svarās+ye -> svarā ye

ādyās+pañca -> ādyāḥ pañca

idānīm+svarodayas -> idānīṃ svarodayas

idānīṃ svarodayas+ucyate--- -> idānīṃ svarodaya ucyate---

svarodayayantravidhiniyamamahoddeśas+| -> svarodayayantravidhiniyamamahoddeśaḥ|

labdham+tasya -> labdhaṃ tasya

labdhaṃ tasya+api -> labdhaṃ tasyāpi

labdhaṃ tasyāpi+adhas -> labdhaṃ tasyāpy adhas

punas+ṣaḍbhis -> punaḥ ṣaḍbhis

punaḥ ṣaḍbhis+hatam -> punaḥ ṣaḍbhir hatam

punaḥ ṣaḍbhir hatam+śeṣam -> punaḥ ṣaḍbhir hataṃ śeṣam

punaḥ ṣaḍbhir hataṃ śeṣam+pañcaṣaṣṭyā -> punaḥ ṣaḍbhir hataṃ śeṣaṃ pañcaṣaṣṭyā

hatam+śeṣam -> hataṃ śeṣam

hataṃ śeṣam+bhāgalabdham -> hataṃ śeṣaṃ bhāgalabdham

hataṃ śeṣaṃ bhāgalabdham+tatas -> hataṃ śeṣaṃ bhāgalabdhaṃ tatas

hataṃ śeṣaṃ bhāgalabdhaṃ tatas+api -> hataṃ śeṣaṃ bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'pi

hataṃ śeṣaṃ bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'pi+adhas -> hataṃ śeṣaṃ bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'py adhas

hataṃ śeṣaṃ bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'py adhas+|| -> hataṃ śeṣaṃ bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'py adhaḥ||

punas+ṣaṣṭyā -> punaḥ ṣaṣṭyā

hatam+bhūyas -> hataṃ bhūyas

hataṃ bhūyas+bhāgalabdham -> hataṃ bhūyo bhāgalabdham

hataṃ bhūyo bhāgalabdham+tatas -> hataṃ bhūyo bhāgalabdhaṃ tatas

hataṃ bhūyo bhāgalabdhaṃ tatas+api -> hataṃ bhūyo bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'pi

hataṃ bhūyo bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'pi+adhas -> hataṃ bhūyo bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'py adhas

hataṃ bhūyo bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'py adhas+| -> hataṃ bhūyo bhāgalabdhaṃ tato 'py adhaḥ|

śeṣam+ṣaṣṭyā -> śeṣaṃ ṣaṣṭyā

dhanam+kṣipet|| -> dhanaṃ kṣipet||

hatam+labdham -> hataṃ labdham

hataṃ labdham+mūrdhni -> hataṃ labdhaṃ mūrdhni

khartvagnyāgatam+ekābdam -> khartvagnyāgatam ekābdam

khartvagnyāgatam ekābdam+dvistham -> khartvagnyāgatam ekābdaṃ dvistham

khartvagnyāgatam ekābdaṃ dvistham+dviguṇitam -> khartvagnyāgatam ekābdaṃ dvisthaṃ dviguṇitam

khartvagnyāgatam ekābdaṃ dvisthaṃ dviguṇitam+tu -> khartvagnyāgatam ekābdaṃ dvisthaṃ dviguṇitaṃ tu

khartvagnyāgatam ekābdaṃ dvisthaṃ dviguṇitaṃ tu+adhas -> khartvagnyāgatam ekābdaṃ dvisthaṃ dviguṇitaṃ tv adhas

khartvagnyāgatam ekābdaṃ dvisthaṃ dviguṇitaṃ tv adhas+| -> khartvagnyāgatam ekābdaṃ dvisthaṃ dviguṇitaṃ tv adhaḥ|

śvāsarāśicakraprabhogāntās+uktās -> śvāsarāśicakraprabhogāntā uktās

śvāsarāśicakraprabhogāntā uktās+mūlatantre -> śvāsarāśicakraprabhogāntā uktā mūlatantre

yatra+arkasya -> yatrārkasya

śodhayet+pūrvoktavidhinā| -> śodhayet pūrvoktavidhinā|

tatas+ravipadāni -> tato ravipadāni

pratyaham+sūryamaṇḍaladinais -> pratyahaṃ sūryamaṇḍaladinais

pratyahaṃ sūryamaṇḍaladinais+labdham -> pratyahaṃ sūryamaṇḍaladinair labdham

pratyahaṃ sūryamaṇḍaladinair labdham+prakṣipya -> pratyahaṃ sūryamaṇḍaladinair labdhaṃ prakṣipya

tasmin+dhruvake -> tasmin dhruvake

pañcadaśa+iti -> pañcadaśeti

viṃśatis+ghaṭikāsthāne -> viṃśatir ghaṭikāsthāne

sūryabhogas+nakṣatrasthāne -> sūryabhogo nakṣatrasthāne

tasmin+dine -> tasmin dine

karaṇena+iti| -> karaṇeneti|

nivartate+uttaratas -> nivartata uttaratas

nivartata uttaratas+tat -> nivartata uttaratas tat

nivartata uttaratas tat+saṃkrāntidinam -> nivartata uttaratas tat saṃkrāntidinam

nivartata uttaratas tat saṃkrāntidinam+sūryasya -> nivartata uttaratas tat saṃkrāntidinaṃ sūryasya

yasmāt+dināt -> yasmād dināt

yasmād dināt+ārabhya -> yasmād dinād ārabhya

daśadivasam+yāvat -> daśadivasaṃ yāvat

daśadivasaṃ yāvat+parīkṣā -> daśadivasaṃ yāvat parīkṣā

atra+ūnādhikam -> atronādhikam

atronādhikam+katham -> atronādhikaṃ katham

atronādhikaṃ katham+jñāyate| -> atronādhikaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate|

narakadvayam+paṅkāmbha -> narakadvayaṃ paṅkāmbha

tathā+udakavalaye -> tathodakavalaye

narakadvayam+agninarakam -> narakadvayam agninarakam

narakadvayam agninarakam+ekam -> narakadvayam agninarakam ekam

narakadvayam agninarakam ekam+tadupari -> narakadvayam agninarakam ekaṃ tadupari

evam+agnivalaye -> evam agnivalaye

narakadvayam+pañcaviṃśat -> narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat

narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat+sahasrayojanavibhāgam -> narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat sahasrayojanavibhāgam

narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat sahasrayojanavibhāgam+adhas -> narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat sahasrayojanavibhāgam adhas

narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat sahasrayojanavibhāgam adhas+ūrdhvam -> narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat sahasrayojanavibhāgam adha ūrdhvam

narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat sahasrayojanavibhāgam adha ūrdhvam+tiryak -> narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat sahasrayojanavibhāgam adha ūrdhvaṃ tiryak

narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat sahasrayojanavibhāgam adha ūrdhvaṃ tiryak+mānena -> narakadvayaṃ pañcaviṃśat sahasrayojanavibhāgam adha ūrdhvaṃ tiryaṅ mānena

tasmin+mahākharavāte -> tasmin mahākharavāte

vāyumaṇḍalam+pañcāśatsahasram -> vāyumaṇḍalaṃ pañcāśatsahasram

vāyumaṇḍalaṃ pañcāśatsahasram+bhavati| -> vāyumaṇḍalaṃ pañcāśatsahasraṃ bhavati|

narakaphaṇipuram+yojanānām -> narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānām

narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānām+dvilakṣam -> narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānāṃ dvilakṣam

narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānāṃ dvilakṣam+bhavati| -> narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānāṃ dvilakṣaṃ bhavati|

narakāṇi+aṣṭamam -> narakāṇy aṣṭamam

narakāṇy aṣṭamam+phaṇipuram -> narakāṇy aṣṭamaṃ phaṇipuram

narakāṇy aṣṭamaṃ phaṇipuram+iti| -> narakāṇy aṣṭamaṃ phaṇipuram iti|

tasmāt+vāyvantāt -> tasmād vāyvantāt

tasmād vāyvantāt+merum -> tasmād vāyvantān merum

tasmād vāyvantān merum+yāvat -> tasmād vāyvantān meruṃ yāvat

tasmād vāyvantān meruṃ yāvat+sapta -> tasmād vāyvantān meruṃ yāvat sapta

adhas+vāyumaṇḍalam -> adho vāyumaṇḍalam

adho vāyumaṇḍalam+ākāśadhātau -> adho vāyumaṇḍalam ākāśadhātau

adho vāyumaṇḍalam ākāśadhātau+avasthitam| -> adho vāyumaṇḍalam ākāśadhātāv avasthitam|

vāyvantāt+merusīmnas -> vāyvantān merusīmnas

vāyvantān merusīmnas+pṛthvītoyatejomaṇḍalānām| -> vāyvantān merusīmnaḥ pṛthvītoyatejomaṇḍalānām|

ṛṣīṇām+paripācanārtham -> ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārtham

ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārtham+lokadhātumānam -> ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārthaṃ lokadhātumānam

ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārthaṃ lokadhātumānam+kāyamaṇḍalārtham -> ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārthaṃ lokadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārtham

ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārthaṃ lokadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārtham+bhagavatā -> ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārthaṃ lokadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ bhagavatā

ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārthaṃ lokadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ bhagavatā+uktam -> ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārthaṃ lokadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ bhagavatoktam

ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārthaṃ lokadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ bhagavatoktam+iti| -> ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanārthaṃ lokadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ bhagavatoktam iti|

evam+sarvam -> evaṃ sarvam

evaṃ sarvam+parijñāya -> evaṃ sarvaṃ parijñāya

vastumānam+kathayati| -> vastumānaṃ kathayati|

lokadhātum+dṛṣṭvā -> lokadhātuṃ dṛṣṭvā

kaścit+tathāgatas -> kaścit tathāgatas

kaścit tathāgatas+abhiniveśena -> kaścit tathāgato 'bhiniveśena

tathāgatena+uktam -> tathāgatenoktam

tathāgatenoktam+pratibhāsate| -> tathāgatenoktaṃ pratibhāsate|

atas+lokadhātumānam -> ato lokadhātumānam

ato lokadhātumānam+sattvānām -> ato lokadhātumānaṃ sattvānām

ato lokadhātumānaṃ sattvānām+svacittavāsanāvaśena -> ato lokadhātumānaṃ sattvānāṃ svacittavāsanāvaśena

pātālasiddhim+āpannās -> pātālasiddhim āpannās

pātālasiddhim āpannās+apsarasas -> pātālasiddhim āpannā apsarasas

pātālasiddhim āpannā apsarasas+puragāminas -> pātālasiddhim āpannā apsarasaḥ puragāminas

pātālasiddhim āpannā apsarasaḥ puragāminas+|| -> pātālasiddhim āpannā apsarasaḥ puragāminaḥ||

sarvatas+| -> sarvataḥ|

sacchidrām+sudṛḍhām -> sacchidrāṃ sudṛḍhām

sacchidrāṃ sudṛḍhām+bhūmim -> sacchidrāṃ sudṛḍhāṃ bhūmim

sacchidrāṃ sudṛḍhāṃ bhūmim+siddhās -> sacchidrāṃ sudṛḍhāṃ bhūmiṃ siddhās

sacchidrāṃ sudṛḍhāṃ bhūmiṃ siddhās+paśyanti -> sacchidrāṃ sudṛḍhāṃ bhūmiṃ siddhāḥ paśyanti

sūcyagram+parvatākāram -> sūcyagraṃ parvatākāram

sūcyagraṃ parvatākāram+bhavanam -> sūcyagraṃ parvatākāraṃ bhavanam

sūcyagraṃ parvatākāraṃ bhavanam+pāpakāriṇas -> sūcyagraṃ parvatākāraṃ bhavanaṃ pāpakāriṇas

sūcyagraṃ parvatākāraṃ bhavanaṃ pāpakāriṇas+|| -> sūcyagraṃ parvatākāraṃ bhavanaṃ pāpakāriṇaḥ||

gṛhavāsam+adātāras -> gṛhavāsam adātāras

gṛhavāsam adātāras+pretās -> gṛhavāsam adātāraḥ pretās

gṛhavāsam adātāraḥ pretās+paśyanti -> gṛhavāsam adātāraḥ pretāḥ paśyanti

parāpakāratas+satyam -> parāpakārataḥ satyam

parāpakārataḥ satyam+avīcyādipradāyakam|| -> parāpakārataḥ satyam avīcyādipradāyakam||

sattvopakāratas+asatyam -> sattvopakārato 'satyam

sattvopakārato 'satyam+puṇyasambhārahetukam| -> sattvopakārato 'satyaṃ puṇyasambhārahetukam|

māninas+|| -> māninaḥ||

sarvajñasya+api -> sarvajñasyāpi

vaśam+yānti -> vaśaṃ yānti

tāvat+tena -> tāvat tena

teṣām+svaparasiddhāntam -> teṣāṃ svaparasiddhāntam

teṣāṃ svaparasiddhāntam+yāvat -> teṣāṃ svaparasiddhāntaṃ yāvat

teṣāṃ svaparasiddhāntaṃ yāvat+yuktyā -> teṣāṃ svaparasiddhāntaṃ yāvad yuktyā

nānāmārgasamārūḍhās+jñānāhaṃkāramāninas -> nānāmārgasamārūḍhā jñānāhaṃkāramāninas

nānāmārgasamārūḍhā jñānāhaṃkāramāninas+|| -> nānāmārgasamārūḍhā jñānāhaṃkāramāninaḥ||

nānādhimuktikās+sattvās -> nānādhimuktikāḥ sattvās

nānādhimuktikāḥ sattvās+nānāsiddhāntavedakās -> nānādhimuktikāḥ sattvā nānāsiddhāntavedakās

nānādhimuktikāḥ sattvā nānāsiddhāntavedakās+| -> nānādhimuktikāḥ sattvā nānāsiddhāntavedakāḥ|

ca+āha--- -> cāha---

mantavyam+sattvāśayavaśena -> mantavyaṃ sattvāśayavaśena

mantavyaṃ sattvāśayavaśena+iti| -> mantavyaṃ sattvāśayavaśeneti|

kasyacit+matam -> kasyacin matam

kasyacin matam+bhavati -> kasyacin mataṃ bhavati

kasyacin mataṃ bhavati+tadvacanam -> NO RULE FOUND (i+t)

tadvacanam+paṇḍitais -> tadvacanaṃ paṇḍitais

tadvacanaṃ paṇḍitais+na -> tadvacanaṃ paṇḍitair na

kim+bhagavān -> kiṃ bhagavān

kiṃ bhagavān+mṛṣāvādī -> kiṃ bhagavān mṛṣāvādī

kiṃ bhagavān mṛṣāvādī+iti -> kiṃ bhagavān mṛṣāvādīti

lokadhātos+mānam -> lokadhātor mānam

lokadhātor mānam+ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam -> lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam

lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam+adhikam -> lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam adhikam

lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam adhikam+uktam -> lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam adhikam uktam

lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam adhikam uktam+katham -> lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam adhikam uktaṃ katham

lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam adhikam uktaṃ katham+lokadhātos -> lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam adhikam uktaṃ kathaṃ lokadhātos

lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam adhikam uktaṃ kathaṃ lokadhātos+caturlakṣayojanamānam| -> lokadhātor mānaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣam adhikam uktaṃ kathaṃ lokadhātoś caturlakṣayojanamānam|

bhrāntis+iyam -> bhrāntir iyam

bhrāntir iyam+na -> bhrāntir iyaṃ na

bauddhakośam+dṛṣṭvā -> bauddhakośaṃ dṛṣṭvā

atas+atra -> ato 'tra

lokadhātumānam+pratiṣṭhāpitam| -> lokadhātumānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam|

tat+brahmāṇḍamānavidhvaṃsanārtham -> tad brahmāṇḍamānavidhvaṃsanārtham

tad brahmāṇḍamānavidhvaṃsanārtham+grahagaṇitarāśigolāyuktyā -> tad brahmāṇḍamānavidhvaṃsanārthaṃ grahagaṇitarāśigolāyuktyā

sūryarathādīnām+paripācanāya -> sūryarathādīnāṃ paripācanāya

ekam+brahmāṇḍam -> ekaṃ brahmāṇḍam

ekaṃ brahmāṇḍam+koṭiyojanāyām -> ekaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ koṭiyojanāyām

ekaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ koṭiyojanāyām+iti -> ekaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ koṭiyojanāyām iti

kośamatam+nānāvidham -> kośamataṃ nānāvidham

kośamataṃ nānāvidham+vedasiddhāntābhiprāyeṇa -> kośamataṃ nānāvidhaṃ vedasiddhāntābhiprāyeṇa

yatas+lokadhātumānaviṣaye -> yato lokadhātumānaviṣaye

kim+ca -> kiṃ ca

tāpāt+chedāt -> tāpāc chedāt

tāpāc chedāt+ca -> tāpāc chedāc ca

syāt+bhagavatas -> syād bhagavatas

syād bhagavatas+tāpāt -> syād bhagavatas tāpāt

syād bhagavatas tāpāt+chedāt -> syād bhagavatas tāpāc chedāt

syād bhagavatas tāpāc chedāt+ityādyā| -> syād bhagavatas tāpāc chedād ityādyā|

bhavatu+atra -> bhavatv atra

evam+lokadhātumānam -> evaṃ lokadhātumānam

evaṃ lokadhātumānam+saṃvṛtyā -> evaṃ lokadhātumānaṃ saṃvṛtyā

lokadhātus+caturlakṣam -> lokadhātuś caturlakṣam

lokadhātuś caturlakṣam+bhavati -> lokadhātuś caturlakṣaṃ bhavati

lokadhātuś caturlakṣaṃ bhavati+anyathā -> lokadhātuś caturlakṣaṃ bhavaty anyathā

meros+lakṣayojanamānena -> meror lakṣayojanamānena

kāyas+caturhastas -> kāyaś caturhastas

kāyaś caturhastas+| -> kāyaś caturhastaḥ|

śarīrakaṅkālam+hastam -> śarīrakaṅkālaṃ hastam

śarīrakaṅkālaṃ hastam+ekam -> śarīrakaṅkālaṃ hastam ekam

śarīrakaṅkālaṃ hastam ekam+ucchrayam -> śarīrakaṅkālaṃ hastam ekam ucchrayam

śarīrakaṅkālaṃ hastam ekam ucchrayam+tena -> śarīrakaṅkālaṃ hastam ekam ucchrayaṃ tena

lakṣayojanocchrayas+tathā -> lakṣayojanocchrayas tathā

merus+laukikamānena -> merur laukikamānena

vacanāt+lokadhātumānam -> vacanāl lokadhātumānam

vacanāl lokadhātumānam+lokadhātumaṇḍalārtham -> vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārtham

vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārtham+kāyadhātumānam -> vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānam

vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānam+kāyamaṇḍalārtham -> vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārtham

vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārtham+kāyamaṇḍalam -> vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam

vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam+iti -> vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam iti

vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam iti+uktam -> vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam ity uktam

vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam ity uktam+iti -> vacanāl lokadhātumānaṃ lokadhātumaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyadhātumānaṃ kāyamaṇḍalārthaṃ kāyamaṇḍalam ity uktam iti

yat+lokadhātumānam -> yal lokadhātumānam

yal lokadhātumānam+tadyathā -> yal lokadhātumānaṃ tadyathā

paramārthatas+veditavyam| -> paramārthato veditavyam|

evam+lokadhātumānam -> evaṃ lokadhātumānam

evaṃ lokadhātumānam+api -> evaṃ lokadhātumānam api

tasyām+guhāyām -> tasyāṃ guhāyām

tasyāṃ guhāyām+praviṣṭasya -> tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ praviṣṭasya

kenacit+vistāritā -> kenacid vistāritā

sasainyacakravatī+āgatas -> sasainyacakravaty āgatas

sasainyacakravaty āgatas+praviśati -> sasainyacakravaty āgataḥ praviśati

tasyām+guhāyām -> tasyāṃ guhāyām

tasyāṃ guhāyām+tasya -> tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ tasya

yasyām+guhāyām -> yasyāṃ guhāyām

yasyāṃ guhāyām+pañcahastapramāṇāyām -> yasyāṃ guhāyāṃ pañcahastapramāṇāyām

yasyāṃ guhāyāṃ pañcahastapramāṇāyām+vītarāgas -> yasyāṃ guhāyāṃ pañcahastapramāṇāyāṃ vītarāgas

yasyāṃ guhāyāṃ pañcahastapramāṇāyāṃ vītarāgas+bodhisattvas -> yasyāṃ guhāyāṃ pañcahastapramāṇāyāṃ vītarāgo bodhisattvas

yasyāṃ guhāyāṃ pañcahastapramāṇāyāṃ vītarāgo bodhisattvas+vā -> yasyāṃ guhāyāṃ pañcahastapramāṇāyāṃ vītarāgo bodhisattvo vā

sattvānām+puṇyapāpavaśāt -> sattvānāṃ puṇyapāpavaśāt

sattvānāṃ puṇyapāpavaśāt+iti| -> sattvānāṃ puṇyapāpavaśād iti|

paramārthatas+mānonmānam -> paramārthato mānonmānam

paramārthato mānonmānam+lokadhātos -> paramārthato mānonmānaṃ lokadhātos

paramārthato mānonmānaṃ lokadhātos+na -> paramārthato mānonmānaṃ lokadhātor na

lokadhātos+| -> lokadhātoḥ|

mānam+sattvādīnām -> mānaṃ sattvādīnām

mānaṃ sattvādīnām+deśitam -> mānaṃ sattvādīnāṃ deśitam

mānaṃ sattvādīnāṃ deśitam+pratibhāsate -> mānaṃ sattvādīnāṃ deśitaṃ pratibhāsate

vāyvantān+merusīmnas -> vāyvantān merusīmnas

vāyvantān merusīmnas+narakaphaṇipuram -> vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuram

vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuram+yojanānām -> vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānām

vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānām+dvilakṣam -> vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānāṃ dvilakṣam

vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānāṃ dvilakṣam+iti| -> vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānāṃ dvilakṣam iti|

śūnyam+ekam -> śūnyam ekam

śūnyam ekam+tribhuvanarahitam -> śūnyam ekaṃ tribhuvanarahitam

śūnyam ekaṃ tribhuvanarahitam+nirguṇam -> śūnyam ekaṃ tribhuvanarahitaṃ nirguṇam

śūnyam ekaṃ tribhuvanarahitaṃ nirguṇam+tattvahīnam|| -> śūnyam ekaṃ tribhuvanarahitaṃ nirguṇaṃ tattvahīnam||

tat+bāhye -> tad bāhye

pañcāśadāsyam+dhruvapadam -> pañcāśadāsyaṃ dhruvapadam

pañcāśadāsyaṃ dhruvapadam+acalam -> pañcāśadāsyaṃ dhruvapadam acalam

pañcāśadāsyaṃ dhruvapadam acalam+pañcaviṃśat -> pañcāśadāsyaṃ dhruvapadam acalaṃ pañcaviṃśat

pañcāśadāsyaṃ dhruvapadam acalaṃ pañcaviṃśat+tathā -> pañcāśadāsyaṃ dhruvapadam acalaṃ pañcaviṃśat tathā

pañcāśadāsyaṃ dhruvapadam acalaṃ pañcaviṃśat tathā+eva -> pañcāśadāsyaṃ dhruvapadam acalaṃ pañcaviṃśat tathaiva

meros+lakṣam -> meror lakṣam

meror lakṣam+pramāṇam -> meror lakṣaṃ pramāṇam

meror lakṣaṃ pramāṇam+grahaṇanilayāt -> meror lakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ grahaṇanilayāt

meror lakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ grahaṇanilayāt+pañcaviṃśatsahasram| -> meror lakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ grahaṇanilayāt pañcaviṃśatsahasram|

vāyvantān+merusīmnas -> vāyvantān merusīmnas

vāyvantān merusīmnas+narakaphaṇipuram -> vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuram

vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuram+yojanānām -> vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānām

vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānām+dvilakṣam -> vāyvantān merusīmno narakaphaṇipuraṃ yojanānāṃ dvilakṣam

vāyvantān+merusīmnas -> vāyvantān merusīmnas

vāyvantān merusīmnas+iti--- -> vāyvantān merusīmna iti---

vitanomi+iti -> vitanomīti

daśamādivṛttais+saṃgītam -> daśamādivṛttaiḥ saṃgītam

daśamādivṛttaiḥ saṃgītam+tat -> daśamādivṛttaiḥ saṃgītaṃ tat

daśamādivṛttaiḥ saṃgītaṃ tat+eva -> daśamādivṛttaiḥ saṃgītaṃ tad eva

lokadhātumānam+bhagavatā -> lokadhātumānaṃ bhagavatā

lokadhātumānaṃ bhagavatā+uktam -> lokadhātumānaṃ bhagavatoktam

lokadhātumānaṃ bhagavatoktam+paramādibuddhāt -> lokadhātumānaṃ bhagavatoktaṃ paramādibuddhāt

lokadhātumānaṃ bhagavatoktaṃ paramādibuddhāt+mañjuśriyā -> lokadhātumānaṃ bhagavatoktaṃ paramādibuddhān mañjuśriyā

idānīm+sattvāśayavaśena -> idānīṃ sattvāśayavaśena

sṛṣṭis+tasyās -> sṛṣṭis tasyās

sā+adṛṣṭis -> sādṛṣṭis

sādṛṣṭis+ca -> sādṛṣṭiś ca

sṛṣṭau+iti| -> sṛṣṭāv iti|

ṣaḍdhātvātmakas+pudgaladhātus -> ṣaḍdhātvātmakaḥ pudgaladhātus

ṣaḍdhātvātmakaḥ pudgaladhātus+nirāvaraṇas -> ṣaḍdhātvātmakaḥ pudgaladhātur nirāvaraṇas

ṣaḍdhātvātmakaḥ pudgaladhātur nirāvaraṇas+| -> ṣaḍdhātvātmakaḥ pudgaladhātur nirāvaraṇaḥ|

jaṅgamas+iti -> jaṅgama iti

pañcātmakas+sthāvaradhātus -> pañcātmakaḥ sthāvaradhātus

pañcātmakaḥ sthāvaradhātus+nirvāraṇas -> pañcātmakaḥ sthāvaradhātur nirvāraṇas

pañcātmakaḥ sthāvaradhātur nirvāraṇas+| -> pañcātmakaḥ sthāvaradhātur nirvāraṇaḥ|

evam+vāyudhātus -> evaṃ vāyudhātus

evaṃ vāyudhātus+tejodhātus -> evaṃ vāyudhātus tejodhātus

evaṃ vāyudhātus tejodhātus+udakadhātus -> evaṃ vāyudhātus tejodhātur udakadhātus

evaṃ vāyudhātus tejodhātur udakadhātus+pṛthivīdhātus -> evaṃ vāyudhātus tejodhātur udakadhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātus

evaṃ vāyudhātus tejodhātur udakadhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātus+sthiras -> evaṃ vāyudhātus tejodhātur udakadhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ sthiras

evaṃ vāyudhātus tejodhātur udakadhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ sthiras+iti -> evaṃ vāyudhātus tejodhātur udakadhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ sthira iti

ambaram+iti -> ambaram iti

ambaram iti+ākāśadhātus -> ambaram ity ākāśadhātus

ambaram ity ākāśadhātus+nirāvaraṇas -> ambaram ity ākāśadhātur nirāvaraṇas

ambaram ity ākāśadhātur nirāvaraṇas+| -> ambaram ity ākāśadhātur nirāvaraṇaḥ|

sūryas+nirāvaraṇam| -> sūryo nirāvaraṇam|

candras+nirāvaraṇam -> candro nirāvaraṇam

candro nirāvaraṇam+jñānam -> candro nirāvaraṇaṃ jñānam

candro nirāvaraṇaṃ jñānam+iti -> candro nirāvaraṇaṃ jñānam iti

kāyas+iti -> kāya iti

paśuc+cittasaṃkalpamuktas -> NO RULE FOUND (c+c)

cittasaṃkalpamuktas+|| -> cittasaṃkalpamuktaḥ||

samyak+na -> samyaṅ na

evam+yas -> evaṃ yas

evaṃ yas+vetti -> evaṃ yo vetti

muktis+atra -> muktir atra

muktir atra+eva -> muktir atraiva

sambhūtis+mantrayones -> sambhūtir mantrayones

sambhūtir mantrayones+bhavati -> sambhūtir mantrayoner bhavati

jñāne+ambare -> jñāne 'mbare

kāya+ityādinā| -> kāyetyādinā|

deśitam+vajrakāyasaṃgrahavṛttam -> deśitaṃ vajrakāyasaṃgrahavṛttam

deśitaṃ vajrakāyasaṃgrahavṛttam+pañcamam -> deśitaṃ vajrakāyasaṃgrahavṛttaṃ pañcamam

deśitaṃ vajrakāyasaṃgrahavṛttaṃ pañcamam+vitanomi -> deśitaṃ vajrakāyasaṃgrahavṛttaṃ pañcamaṃ vitanomi

deśitaṃ vajrakāyasaṃgrahavṛttaṃ pañcamaṃ vitanomi+iti -> deśitaṃ vajrakāyasaṃgrahavṛttaṃ pañcamaṃ vitanomīti

lokadhātor vistareṇotpādas+pañcamapaṭale -> lokadhātor vistareṇotpādaḥ pañcamapaṭale

jaṅgamasattvā veditavyās+|| -> jaṅgamasattvā veditavyāḥ||

mukhakāyādyavayavatvam+gatās -> mukhakāyādyavayavatvaṃ gatās

mukhakāyādyavayavatvaṃ gatās+tathā -> mukhakāyādyavayavatvaṃ gatās tathā

śukradravaparamāṇavas+aṇḍamadhye -> śukradravaparamāṇavo 'ṇḍamadhye

mervādayas+sthāvarās -> mervādayaḥ sthāvarās

mervādayaḥ sthāvarās+iti| -> mervādayaḥ sthāvarā iti|

lavaṇam+jaṅgamānām -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām+utpattaye -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye+aṇḍam -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍam

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍam+cakāras -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāras

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāras+samuccayas -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayas

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayas+yathā -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathā

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathā+ātapasaṃyogāt -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathātapasaṃyogāt

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathātapasaṃyogāt+lavaṇās -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathātapasaṃyogāl lavaṇās

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathātapasaṃyogāl lavaṇās+udakaparamāṇavas -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathātapasaṃyogāl lavaṇā udakaparamāṇavas

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathātapasaṃyogāl lavaṇā udakaparamāṇavas+lavaṇakaṭhinatvam -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathātapasaṃyogāl lavaṇā udakaparamāṇavo lavaṇakaṭhinatvam

lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathātapasaṃyogāl lavaṇā udakaparamāṇavo lavaṇakaṭhinatvam+yāni -> lavaṇaṃ jaṅgamānām utpattaye 'ṇḍaṃ cakāraḥ samuccayo yathātapasaṃyogāl lavaṇā udakaparamāṇavo lavaṇakaṭhinatvaṃ yāni

dṛṣṭāntas+sthāvarāṇām -> dṛṣṭāntaḥ sthāvarāṇām

dṛṣṭāntaḥ sthāvarāṇām+utpattaye -> dṛṣṭāntaḥ sthāvarāṇām utpattaye

tu+aṇḍajās -> tv aṇḍajās

tv aṇḍajās+ca -> tv aṇḍajāś ca

tv aṇḍajāś ca+aṇḍamadhye -> tv aṇḍajāś cāṇḍamadhye

lavaṇam+iva -> lavaṇam iva

sambhūtās+śūnyamadhye -> sambhūtāḥ śūnyamadhye

nārakās+| -> nārakāḥ|

dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās+tasyās -> dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās

dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās+talam -> dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talam

dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talam+vividhamahitalam -> dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalam

dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalam+nāgabhuvanam -> dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanam

dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanam+saptanarakabhuvanam -> dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanaṃ saptanarakabhuvanam

dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanaṃ saptanarakabhuvanam+tasmin -> dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanaṃ saptanarakabhuvanaṃ tasmin

dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanaṃ saptanarakabhuvanaṃ tasmin+vividhamahyām -> dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanaṃ saptanarakabhuvanaṃ tasmin vividhamahyām

dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanaṃ saptanarakabhuvanaṃ tasmin vividhamahyām+manuṣyās -> dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanaṃ saptanarakabhuvanaṃ tasmin vividhamahyāṃ manuṣyās

dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanaṃ saptanarakabhuvanaṃ tasmin vividhamahyāṃ manuṣyās+tale -> dvādaśakhaṇḍasvabhāvās tasyās talaṃ vividhamahitalaṃ nāgabhuvanaṃ saptanarakabhuvanaṃ tasmin vividhamahyāṃ manuṣyās tale

ca+iti -> ceti

mahi+iti -> mahīti

mahopapādukās+rasayonis -> mahopapādukā rasayonis

mahopapādukā rasayonis+| -> mahopapādukā rasayoniḥ|

aṇḍajās+garuḍādayas -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayas

aṇḍajā garuḍādayas+vāyuyonis -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonis

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonis+jarāyujās -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujās

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujās+gajendrādayas -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayas

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayas+agniyonis -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyonis

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyonis+saṃsvedajās -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajās

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajās+kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayas -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayas

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayas+jalayonis -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayo jalayonis

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayo jalayonis+upapādukās -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayo jalayonir upapādukās

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayo jalayonir upapādukās+vṛkṣādayas -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayo jalayonir upapādukā vṛkṣādayas

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayo jalayonir upapādukā vṛkṣādayas+bhūmiyonis -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayo jalayonir upapādukā vṛkṣādayo bhūmiyonis

aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayo jalayonir upapādukā vṛkṣādayo bhūmiyonis+iti| -> aṇḍajā garuḍādayo vāyuyonir jarāyujā gajendrādayo 'gniyoniḥ saṃsvedajāḥ kīṭapataṅgakṛmyādayo jalayonir upapādukā vṛkṣādayo bhūmiyonir iti|

tiryagyonis+caturdhā| -> tiryagyoniś caturdhā|

devās+cāturmahārājakāyikādayas -> devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayas

devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayas+bhūtās -> devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayo bhūtās

devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayo bhūtās+aparājitapretādayas -> devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayo bhūtā aparājitapretādayas

devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayo bhūtā aparājitapretādayas+nāgās -> devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayo bhūtā aparājitapretādayo nāgās

devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayo bhūtā aparājitapretādayo nāgās+anantādayas -> devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayo bhūtā aparājitapretādayo nāgā anantādayas

devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayo bhūtā aparājitapretādayo nāgā anantādayas+| -> devāś cāturmahārājakāyikādayo bhūtā aparājitapretādayo nāgā anantādayaḥ|

evam+pañcaśūnyeṣu -> evaṃ pañcaśūnyeṣu

evam+pṛthivīparamāṇavas -> evaṃ pṛthivīparamāṇavas

evaṃ pṛthivīparamāṇavas+āśliṣṭās -> evaṃ pṛthivīparamāṇava āśliṣṭās

evaṃ pṛthivīparamāṇava āśliṣṭās+indracāpam -> evaṃ pṛthivīparamāṇava āśliṣṭā indracāpam

evaṃ pṛthivīparamāṇava āśliṣṭā indracāpam+gagane -> evaṃ pṛthivīparamāṇava āśliṣṭā indracāpaṃ gagane

evam+toyaparamāṇavas -> evaṃ toyaparamāṇavas

evaṃ toyaparamāṇavas+āśliṣṭās -> evaṃ toyaparamāṇava āśliṣṭās

evaṃ toyaparamāṇava āśliṣṭās+santas -> evaṃ toyaparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santas

evaṃ toyaparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santas+vāyvagnisaṃyuktavṛṣṭijalam -> evaṃ toyaparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyvagnisaṃyuktavṛṣṭijalam

evaṃ toyaparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyvagnisaṃyuktavṛṣṭijalam+iti -> evaṃ toyaparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyvagnisaṃyuktavṛṣṭijalam iti

evaṃ toyaparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyvagnisaṃyuktavṛṣṭijalam iti+ucyate| -> evaṃ toyaparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyvagnisaṃyuktavṛṣṭijalam ity ucyate|

evam+agniparamāṇavas -> evam agniparamāṇavas

evam agniparamāṇavas+āśliṣṭās -> evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭās

evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭās+santas -> evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santas

evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santas+vāyusaṃyuktavidyut -> evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyusaṃyuktavidyut

evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyusaṃyuktavidyut+agnis -> evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyusaṃyuktavidyud agnis

evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyusaṃyuktavidyud agnis+iti -> evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyusaṃyuktavidyud agnir iti

evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyusaṃyuktavidyud agnir iti+ucyate| -> evam agniparamāṇava āśliṣṭāḥ santo vāyusaṃyuktavidyud agnir ity ucyate|

tasmāt+saṃyogāt -> tasmāt saṃyogāt

tasmāt saṃyogāt+laghupañcalatāgamanāt -> tasmāt saṃyogāl laghupañcalatāgamanāt

tasmāt saṃyogāl laghupañcalatāgamanāt+vāyus -> tasmāt saṃyogāl laghupañcalatāgamanād vāyus

tasmāt saṃyogāl laghupañcalatāgamanād vāyus+iti -> tasmāt saṃyogāl laghupañcalatāgamanād vāyur iti

tasmāt saṃyogāl laghupañcalatāgamanād vāyur iti+ucyate| -> tasmāt saṃyogāl laghupañcalatāgamanād vāyur ity ucyate|

prathamam+tāvat -> prathamaṃ tāvat

prathamaṃ tāvat+vāyuparamāṇavas -> prathamaṃ tāvad vāyuparamāṇavas

prathamaṃ tāvad vāyuparamāṇavas+anyonyāśliṣṭās -> prathamaṃ tāvad vāyuparamāṇavo 'nyonyāśliṣṭās

prathamaṃ tāvad vāyuparamāṇavo 'nyonyāśliṣṭās+bhavanti| -> prathamaṃ tāvad vāyuparamāṇavo 'nyonyāśliṣṭā bhavanti|

paramāṇuṣu+utpādakālavaśāt -> paramāṇuṣūtpādakālavaśāt

paramāṇuṣūtpādakālavaśāt+vāyus -> paramāṇuṣūtpādakālavaśād vāyus

paramāṇuṣūtpādakālavaśād vāyus+iti| -> paramāṇuṣūtpādakālavaśād vāyur iti|

vyāpakas+iti -> vyāpaka iti

ṣaṣṭhas+guṇas -> ṣaṣṭho guṇas

ṣaṣṭho guṇas+dharmadhātus -> ṣaṣṭho guṇo dharmadhātus

ṣaṣṭho guṇo dharmadhātus+sarvatra -> ṣaṣṭho guṇo dharmadhātuḥ sarvatra

paramāṇurūpeṇa+avasthitāni -> paramāṇurūpeṇāvasthitāni

cakṣurādīnām+indriyāṇām -> cakṣurādīnām indriyāṇām

cakṣurādīnām indriyāṇām+agocarāṇi -> cakṣurādīnām indriyāṇām agocarāṇi

śūnyāni+iti -> śūnyānīti

atas+saṃvartāt -> ataḥ saṃvartāt

ataḥ saṃvartāt+utpādakālavaśāt -> ataḥ saṃvartād utpādakālavaśāt

ataḥ saṃvartād utpādakālavaśāt+śūnyeṣu -> ataḥ saṃvartād utpādakālavaśāc chūnyeṣu

ataḥ saṃvartād utpādakālavaśāc chūnyeṣu+iti -> ataḥ saṃvartād utpādakālavaśāc chūnyeṣv iti

saṃvartas+vivartakālas -> saṃvarto vivartakālas

saṃvarto vivartakālas+ca -> saṃvarto vivartakālaś ca

saṃvarto vivartakālaś ca+iti| -> saṃvarto vivartakālaś ceti|

bhagavatas+vacanāt -> bhagavato vacanāt

bhagavato vacanāt+lokadhātūtpādanirodhās -> bhagavato vacanāl lokadhātūtpādanirodhās

bhagavato vacanāl lokadhātūtpādanirodhās+veditavyās -> bhagavato vacanāl lokadhātūtpādanirodhā veditavyās

bhagavato vacanāl lokadhātūtpādanirodhā veditavyās+| -> bhagavato vacanāl lokadhātūtpādanirodhā veditavyāḥ|

nityas+na -> nityo na

nityo na+anityas -> nityo nānityas

nityo nānityas+bhaṇāmi -> nityo nānityo bhaṇāmi

nityo nānityo bhaṇāmi+iti -> nityo nānityo bhaṇāmīti

pudgalas+pudgalas -> pudgalaḥ pudgalas

pudgalaḥ pudgalas+bhāravāhas -> pudgalaḥ pudgalo bhāravāhas

pudgalaḥ pudgalo bhāravāhas+na -> pudgalaḥ pudgalo bhāravāho na

tathā+api -> tathāpi

paramāṇusaṃdohātmakalokadhātus+asti| -> paramāṇusaṃdohātmakalokadhātur asti|

prathamam+vaibhāṣikamatam -> prathamaṃ vaibhāṣikamatam

prathamaṃ vaibhāṣikamatam+āśritya -> prathamaṃ vaibhāṣikamatam āśritya

atas+yānatrayaparijñānāya -> ato yānatrayaparijñānāya

bhagavatā+uktas -> bhagavatoktas

bhagavatoktas+iti| -> bhagavatokta iti|

gṛhasthānām+pravrajyārahitānām -> gṛhasthānāṃ pravrajyārahitānām

gṛhasthānāṃ pravrajyārahitānām+maṭhavihāropabhogas -> gṛhasthānāṃ pravrajyārahitānāṃ maṭhavihāropabhogas

gṛhasthānāṃ pravrajyārahitānāṃ maṭhavihāropabhogas+kutracit -> gṛhasthānāṃ pravrajyārahitānāṃ maṭhavihāropabhogaḥ kutracit

gṛhasthānāṃ pravrajyārahitānāṃ maṭhavihāropabhogaḥ kutracit+yāne -> gṛhasthānāṃ pravrajyārahitānāṃ maṭhavihāropabhogaḥ kutracid yāne

atas+gṛhasthas -> ato gṛhasthas

ato gṛhasthas+vṛddhas -> ato gṛhastho vṛddhas

ato gṛhastho vṛddhas+na -> ato gṛhastho vṛddho na

yāvat+tapasvī -> yāvat tapasvī

prātimokṣaśrutādhikāras+na -> prātimokṣaśrutādhikāro na

prātimokṣaśrutādhikāro na+asti -> prātimokṣaśrutādhikāro nāsti

tapovṛddhas+gṛhasthasya -> tapovṛddho gṛhasthasya

atas+yānatrayajñātā -> ato yānatrayajñātā

evam+catvāras -> evaṃ catvāras

evaṃ catvāras+vṛddhās -> evaṃ catvāro vṛddhās

evaṃ catvāro vṛddhās+ārādhanīyās -> evaṃ catvāro vṛddhā ārādhanīyās

evaṃ catvāro vṛddhā ārādhanīyās+sattvais -> evaṃ catvāro vṛddhā ārādhanīyāḥ sattvais

evaṃ catvāro vṛddhā ārādhanīyāḥ sattvais+iti| -> evaṃ catvāro vṛddhā ārādhanīyāḥ sattvair iti|

dhanavṛddhas+rājā -> dhanavṛddho rājā

dhanavṛddho rājā+ihalokabhogārthibhis -> dhanavṛddho rājehalokabhogārthibhis

dhanavṛddho rājehalokabhogārthibhis+ārādhanīyas -> dhanavṛddho rājehalokabhogārthibhir ārādhanīyas

dhanavṛddho rājehalokabhogārthibhir ārādhanīyas+| -> dhanavṛddho rājehalokabhogārthibhir ārādhanīyaḥ|

paralokārtham+ārādhanīyās -> paralokārtham ārādhanīyās

paralokārtham ārādhanīyās+sattvais -> paralokārtham ārādhanīyāḥ sattvais

paralokārtham ārādhanīyāḥ sattvais+iti| -> paralokārtham ārādhanīyāḥ sattvair iti|

śrutavṛddhas+paṇḍitas -> śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitas

śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitas+pūjyas -> śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyas

śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyas+śāsanodyotakas -> śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyaḥ śāsanodyotakas

śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyaḥ śāsanodyotakas+paravādinām -> śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyaḥ śāsanodyotakaḥ paravādinām

śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyaḥ śāsanodyotakaḥ paravādinām+mārakāyikānām -> śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyaḥ śāsanodyotakaḥ paravādināṃ mārakāyikānām

śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyaḥ śāsanodyotakaḥ paravādināṃ mārakāyikānām+damakas -> śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyaḥ śāsanodyotakaḥ paravādināṃ mārakāyikānāṃ damakas

śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyaḥ śāsanodyotakaḥ paravādināṃ mārakāyikānāṃ damakas+| -> śrutavṛddhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pūjyaḥ śāsanodyotakaḥ paravādināṃ mārakāyikānāṃ damakaḥ|

vandyas+tapovṛddhāt -> vandyas tapovṛddhāt

vandyas tapovṛddhāt+gṛhasthānām -> vandyas tapovṛddhād gṛhasthānām

vandyas tapovṛddhād gṛhasthānām+abhijñābhāvāt| -> vandyas tapovṛddhād gṛhasthānām abhijñābhāvāt|

gṛhasthācāryāṇām+sarvadā -> gṛhasthācāryāṇāṃ sarvadā

mantriṇām+abhiṣekeṇa -> mantriṇām abhiṣekeṇa

kāṣāyadhāriṇām+varṣāgreṇa -> kāṣāyadhāriṇāṃ varṣāgreṇa

tapovṛddhas+kāṣāyadhārī -> tapovṛddhaḥ kāṣāyadhārī

tasya+abhāve -> tasyābhāve

pūjyas+daśabhikṣusamas -> pūjyo daśabhikṣusamas

pūjyo daśabhikṣusamas+bhagavatā -> pūjyo daśabhikṣusamo bhagavatā

pūjyo daśabhikṣusamo bhagavatā+uktas -> pūjyo daśabhikṣusamo bhagavatoktas

pūjyo daśabhikṣusamo bhagavatoktas+iti| -> pūjyo daśabhikṣusamo bhagavatokta iti|

mudritābhūmiprāptas+vajrācāryas -> mudritābhūmiprāpto vajrācāryas

mudritābhūmiprāpto vajrācāryas+bhikṣus -> mudritābhūmiprāpto vajrācāryo bhikṣus

mudritābhūmiprāpto vajrācāryo bhikṣus+gṛhasthas -> mudritābhūmiprāpto vajrācāryo bhikṣur gṛhasthas

mudritābhūmiprāpto vajrācāryo bhikṣur gṛhasthas+vā -> mudritābhūmiprāpto vajrācāryo bhikṣur gṛhastho vā

jñānavṛddhas+abhijñālābhī -> jñānavṛddho 'bhijñālābhī

catvāras+vṛddhās -> catvāro vṛddhās

catvāro vṛddhās+paralokehalokārtham -> catvāro vṛddhāḥ paralokehalokārtham

catvāro vṛddhāḥ paralokehalokārtham+ārādhanīyās -> catvāro vṛddhāḥ paralokehalokārtham ārādhanīyās

catvāro vṛddhāḥ paralokehalokārtham ārādhanīyās+sattvais -> catvāro vṛddhāḥ paralokehalokārtham ārādhanīyāḥ sattvais

catvāro vṛddhāḥ paralokehalokārtham ārādhanīyāḥ sattvais+| -> catvāro vṛddhāḥ paralokehalokārtham ārādhanīyāḥ sattvaiḥ|

ratnatrayam+viḍambayitvā| -> ratnatrayaṃ viḍambayitvā|

bāhyaviṣayopabhogāsaktas+san -> bāhyaviṣayopabhogāsaktaḥ san

bāhyaviṣayopabhogāsaktaḥ san+narakam -> bāhyaviṣayopabhogāsaktaḥ san narakam

bāhyaviṣayopabhogāsaktaḥ san narakam+yāti -> bāhyaviṣayopabhogāsaktaḥ san narakaṃ yāti

bāhyaviṣayopabhogāsaktaḥ san narakaṃ yāti+ācāryavyapadeśena -> bāhyaviṣayopabhogāsaktaḥ san narakaṃ yāty ācāryavyapadeśena

saṃdhyābhāṣāntaram+ajñāyamānas -> saṃdhyābhāṣāntaram ajñāyamānas

saṃdhyābhāṣāntaram ajñāyamānas+prāṇātipātādikam -> saṃdhyābhāṣāntaram ajñāyamānaḥ prāṇātipātādikam

saṃdhyābhāṣāntaram ajñāyamānaḥ prāṇātipātādikam+maṭhavihāradravyopabhogam -> saṃdhyābhāṣāntaram ajñāyamānaḥ prāṇātipātādikaṃ maṭhavihāradravyopabhogam

saṃdhyābhāṣāntaram ajñāyamānaḥ prāṇātipātādikaṃ maṭhavihāradravyopabhogam+kṛtvā -> saṃdhyābhāṣāntaram ajñāyamānaḥ prāṇātipātādikaṃ maṭhavihāradravyopabhogaṃ kṛtvā

kālāt+sarvajñamārganaṣṭas -> kālāt sarvajñamārganaṣṭas

kālāt sarvajñamārganaṣṭas+bhavati| -> kālāt sarvajñamārganaṣṭo bhavati|

yas+punar -> yaḥ punar

yaḥ punar+yānatritayābhisandhim -> yaḥ punar yānatritayābhisandhim

yaḥ punar yānatritayābhisandhim+na -> yaḥ punar yānatritayābhisandhiṃ na

bhagavatā+uktas -> bhagavatoktas

bhagavatoktas+| -> bhagavatoktaḥ|

yānatritayanirjātas+ekayānaphale -> yānatritayanirjāta ekayānaphale

yānatritayanirjāta ekayānaphale+sthitas -> NO RULE FOUND (e+s)

sthitas+| -> sthitaḥ|

tu+aṇḍajās -> tv aṇḍajās

tv aṇḍajās+ca -> tv aṇḍajāś ca

tv aṇḍajāś ca+aṇḍamadhye|| -> tv aṇḍajāś cāṇḍamadhye||

lavaṇam+iva -> lavaṇam iva

sambhūtās+śūnyamadhye -> sambhūtāḥ śūnyamadhye

mānuṣās+nārakās -> mānuṣā nārakās

mānuṣā nārakās+ca -> mānuṣā nārakāś ca

tiryagyonis+caturdhā -> tiryagyoniś caturdhā

nāgās+| -> nāgāḥ|

ṛkṣāṇi+indvarkatārāgrahaṇaṛṣayas -> ṛkṣāṇīndvarkatārāgrahaṇaṛṣayas

ṛkṣāṇīndvarkatārāgrahaṇaṛṣayas+devabhūtās -> ṛkṣāṇīndvarkatārāgrahaṇaṛṣayo devabhūtās

ṛkṣāṇīndvarkatārāgrahaṇaṛṣayo devabhūtās+ca -> ṛkṣāṇīndvarkatārāgrahaṇaṛṣayo devabhūtāś ca

vāyujvalanajaladharās+dvīpaśailās -> vāyujvalanajaladharā dvīpaśailās

vāyujvalanajaladharā dvīpaśailās+samudrās -> vāyujvalanajaladharā dvīpaśailāḥ samudrās

kālāt+śūnyeṣu -> kālāc chūnyeṣu

kālāt+śūnyeṣu -> kālāc chūnyeṣu

kālāc chūnyeṣu+ityādinā--- -> kālāc chūnyeṣv ityādinā---

deśitam+vivṛṇomi -> deśitaṃ vivṛṇomi

paramādibuddhāt+caturthavṛttena -> paramādibuddhāc caturthavṛttena

idānīm+bhagavatas -> idānīṃ bhagavatas

idānīṃ bhagavatas+lokadhātusaṃgraham -> idānīṃ bhagavato lokadhātusaṃgraham

idānīṃ bhagavato lokadhātusaṃgraham+mañjuśriyā -> idānīṃ bhagavato lokadhātusaṃgrahaṃ mañjuśriyā

bhagavatas+prativacanasaṃgrahoddeśas -> bhagavataḥ prativacanasaṃgrahoddeśas

bhagavataḥ prativacanasaṃgrahoddeśas+|| -> bhagavataḥ prativacanasaṃgrahoddeśaḥ||

sarvasattvānām+nirāvaraṇapadaprāptaye -> sarvasattvānāṃ nirāvaraṇapadaprāptaye

sarvasattvānāṃ nirāvaraṇapadaprāptaye+iti -> sarvasattvānāṃ nirāvaraṇapadaprāptaya iti

maṇḍalam+ca -> maṇḍalaṃ ca

maṇḍalaṃ ca+abhiṣekam -> maṇḍalaṃ cābhiṣekam

maṇḍalaṃ cābhiṣekam+vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa -> maṇḍalaṃ cābhiṣekaṃ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa

tvam+sunarapate -> tvaṃ sunarapate

samastam+etat -> samastam etat

samastam etat+yogam -> samastam etad yogam

samastam etad yogam+vyākhyāyamānam -> samastam etad yogaṃ vyākhyāyamānam

samastam etad yogaṃ vyākhyāyamānam+mayā -> samastam etad yogaṃ vyākhyāyamānaṃ mayā

nirdiṣṭam+iti| -> nirdiṣṭam iti|

karmamudrājñānamudrāsiddhirahitam+bhagavatā -> karmamudrājñānamudrāsiddhirahitaṃ bhagavatā

tathatāsaṃketakam+vāgudāhāravarjitam -> tathatāsaṃketakaṃ vāgudāhāravarjitam

tathatāsaṃketakaṃ vāgudāhāravarjitam+pāramārthikam -> tathatāsaṃketakaṃ vāgudāhāravarjitaṃ pāramārthikam

tathatāsaṃketakaṃ vāgudāhāravarjitaṃ pāramārthikam+mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanāya -> tathatāsaṃketakaṃ vāgudāhāravarjitaṃ pāramārthikaṃ mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanāya

saṃjñārūpiṇas+saṃjñinām -> saṃjñārūpiṇaḥ saṃjñinām

saṃjñārūpiṇaḥ saṃjñinām+bhāvānām -> saṃjñārūpiṇaḥ saṃjñināṃ bhāvānām

saṃjñārūpiṇaḥ saṃjñināṃ bhāvānām+pratipādakās -> saṃjñārūpiṇaḥ saṃjñināṃ bhāvānāṃ pratipādakās

saṃjñārūpiṇaḥ saṃjñināṃ bhāvānāṃ pratipādakās+laukikasiddhisādhanāya -> saṃjñārūpiṇaḥ saṃjñināṃ bhāvānāṃ pratipādakā laukikasiddhisādhanāya

pravyāhāramantrasaṃketena+iti| -> pravyāhāramantrasaṃketeneti|

veditavyās+| -> veditavyāḥ|

atra+akuhavisarjanīyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyās+kaṇṭhyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyās+icuyaśās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās+tālavyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyās+ṛṭuraṣās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣās+mūrdhnyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyās+upūpadhmānīyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyās+oṣṭhyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyās+ḷtulasās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasās+dantyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyās+evam -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam+ubhayasthānīyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās+tristhānīyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyās+catuḥsthānīyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyāś catuḥsthānīyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyāś catuḥsthānīyās+pañcasthānīyās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyāś catuḥsthānīyāḥ pañcasthānīyās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyāś catuḥsthānīyāḥ pañcasthānīyās+mantrās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyāś catuḥsthānīyāḥ pañcasthānīyā mantrās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyāś catuḥsthānīyāḥ pañcasthānīyā mantrās+kūṭamantrās -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyāś catuḥsthānīyāḥ pañcasthānīyā mantrāḥ kūṭamantrās

atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyāś catuḥsthānīyāḥ pañcasthānīyā mantrāḥ kūṭamantrās+ca -> atrākuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyā icuyaśās tālavyā ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhnyā upūpadhmānīyā oṣṭhyā ḷtulasā dantyā evam ubhayasthānīyās tristhānīyāś catuḥsthānīyāḥ pañcasthānīyā mantrāḥ kūṭamantrāś ca

iti+ākāśadhātvādyam -> ity ākāśadhātvādyam

ity ākāśadhātvādyam+mantrasaṃketakam -> ity ākāśadhātvādyaṃ mantrasaṃketakam

ity ākāśadhātvādyaṃ mantrasaṃketakam+pravyāhāralakṣaṇam -> ity ākāśadhātvādyaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāralakṣaṇam

ity ākāśadhātvādyaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāralakṣaṇam+kaṇṭhādyuccāritadharmas -> ity ākāśadhātvādyaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāralakṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhādyuccāritadharmas

ity ākāśadhātvādyaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāralakṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhādyuccāritadharmas+bhagavatā -> ity ākāśadhātvādyaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāralakṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhādyuccāritadharmo bhagavatā

ity ākāśadhātvādyaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāralakṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhādyuccāritadharmo bhagavatā+uktam| -> ity ākāśadhātvādyaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāralakṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhādyuccāritadharmo bhagavatoktam|

na+uccāritam -> noccāritam

noccāritam+na -> noccāritaṃ na

noccāritaṃ na+uccāritasvaravyañjanalakṣaṇam| -> noccāritaṃ noccāritasvaravyañjanalakṣaṇam|

evam+nirvāṇam -> evaṃ nirvāṇam

evaṃ nirvāṇam+jñānadhātus -> evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātus

evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātus+anāhatam| -> evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātur anāhatam|

bhagavatā+uktam| -> bhagavatoktam|

pāramārthikam+saṃketam -> pāramārthikaṃ saṃketam

pāramārthikaṃ saṃketam+mantrayāne -> pāramārthikaṃ saṃketaṃ mantrayāne

pañcākṣaras+mahāśūnyas -> pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyas

pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyas+binduśūnyas -> pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo binduśūnyas

pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo binduśūnyas+ṣaḍakṣaras -> pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo binduśūnyaḥ ṣaḍakṣaras

pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo binduśūnyaḥ ṣaḍakṣaras+| -> pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo binduśūnyaḥ ṣaḍakṣaraḥ|

anakṣaras+mantrayonis -> anakṣaro mantrayonis

anakṣaro mantrayonis+mahāmantrakulatrayas -> anakṣaro mantrayonir mahāmantrakulatrayas

anakṣaro mantrayonir mahāmantrakulatrayas+| -> anakṣaro mantrayonir mahāmantrakulatrayaḥ|

punas+tatra -> punas tatra

punas tatra+eva -> punas tatraiva

sarvābhilāpahetvagryas+sarvavāksuprabhāsvaras -> sarvābhilāpahetvagryaḥ sarvavāksuprabhāsvaras

sarvābhilāpahetvagryaḥ sarvavāksuprabhāsvaras+|| -> sarvābhilāpahetvagryaḥ sarvavāksuprabhāsvaraḥ||

mahāprāṇas+hi -> mahāprāṇo hi

mahāprāṇo hi+anutpādas -> mahāprāṇo hy anutpādas

mahāprāṇo hy anutpādas+vāgudāhāravarjitas -> mahāprāṇo hy anutpādo vāgudāhāravarjitas

mahāprāṇo hy anutpādo vāgudāhāravarjitas+| -> mahāprāṇo hy anutpādo vāgudāhāravarjitaḥ|

akāras+sarvavarṇāgryas -> akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgryas

akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgryas+mahārthas -> akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgryo mahārthas

akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgryo mahārthas+paramākṣaras -> akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgryo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras

akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgryo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras+|| -> akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgryo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaraḥ||

bhagavān+buddhas -> bhagavān buddhas

bhagavān buddhas+sambuddhas -> bhagavān buddhaḥ sambuddhas

bhagavān buddhaḥ sambuddhas+akārasambhavas -> bhagavān buddhaḥ sambuddho 'kārasambhavas

bhagavān buddhaḥ sambuddho 'kārasambhavas+| -> bhagavān buddhaḥ sambuddho 'kārasambhavaḥ|

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

tathatāsaṃketakam+tatra -> tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatra

tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatra+akāras -> tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatrākāras

tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatrākāras+mukham -> tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatrākāro mukham

tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatrākāro mukham+sarvadharmāṇām -> tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatrākāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām

tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatrākāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām+ādyanutpannatvāt -> tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatrākāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ādyanutpannatvāt

tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatrākāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ādyanutpannatvāt+iti| -> tathatāsaṃketakaṃ tatrākāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ādyanutpannatvād iti|

ityādimantrasaṃjñās+yatra -> ityādimantrasaṃjñā yatra

pravyāhārasaṃketakam+tatra -> pravyāhārasaṃketakaṃ tatra

pāramārthikam+vāgudāhāravarjitam| -> pāramārthikaṃ vāgudāhāravarjitam|

mantrasaṃketakam+pravyāhāras -> mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāras

mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāras+laukikam -> mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāro laukikam

mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāro laukikam+tathatā -> mantrasaṃketakaṃ pravyāhāro laukikaṃ tathatā

saṃketakam+dvidhā---ekam -> saṃketakaṃ dvidhā---ekam

saṃketakaṃ dvidhā---ekam+mantrasaṃketakam -> saṃketakaṃ dvidhā---ekaṃ mantrasaṃketakam

saṃketakaṃ dvidhā---ekaṃ mantrasaṃketakam+dvitīyam -> saṃketakaṃ dvidhā---ekaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ dvitīyam

saṃketakaṃ dvidhā---ekaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ dvitīyam+tathatāsaṃketakam| -> saṃketakaṃ dvidhā---ekaṃ mantrasaṃketakaṃ dvitīyaṃ tathatāsaṃketakam|

sahitam+pravyāhāramantrasaṃketena -> sahitaṃ pravyāhāramantrasaṃketena

sahitaṃ pravyāhāramantrasaṃketena+iti| -> sahitaṃ pravyāhāramantrasaṃketeneti|

tayos+gatis -> tayor gatis

tayor gatis+padagatis -> tayor gatiḥ padagatis

tayor gatiḥ padagatis+kaṇṭhatālumūrdhauṣṭhadantasthāneṣu -> tayor gatiḥ padagatiḥ kaṇṭhatālumūrdhauṣṭhadantasthāneṣu

tayor gatiḥ padagatiḥ kaṇṭhatālumūrdhauṣṭhadantasthāneṣu+uccāras -> tayor gatiḥ padagatiḥ kaṇṭhatālumūrdhauṣṭhadantasthāneṣūccāras

tayor gatiḥ padagatiḥ kaṇṭhatālumūrdhauṣṭhadantasthāneṣūccāras+svaravyañjanānām -> tayor gatiḥ padagatiḥ kaṇṭhatālumūrdhauṣṭhadantasthāneṣūccāraḥ svaravyañjanānām

tayor gatiḥ padagatiḥ kaṇṭhatālumūrdhauṣṭhadantasthāneṣūccāraḥ svaravyañjanānām+iti -> tayor gatiḥ padagatiḥ kaṇṭhatālumūrdhauṣṭhadantasthāneṣūccāraḥ svaravyañjanānām iti

padam+dvidhā---ālikālyātmakam| -> padaṃ dvidhā---ālikālyātmakam|

padagatisahitam+iti| -> padagatisahitam iti|

vijñānam+ṣaḍdhātvākhyas -> vijñānaṃ ṣaḍdhātvākhyas

vijñānaṃ ṣaḍdhātvākhyas+mahāpuruṣapudgalas -> vijñānaṃ ṣaḍdhātvākhyo mahāpuruṣapudgalas

vijñānaṃ ṣaḍdhātvākhyo mahāpuruṣapudgalas+|| -> vijñānaṃ ṣaḍdhātvākhyo mahāpuruṣapudgalaḥ||

tejas+vāyus -> tejo vāyus

tejo vāyus+ākāśadhātukam| -> tejo vāyur ākāśadhātukam|

pṛthivī+āpas -> pṛthivy āpas

pṛthivy āpas+tathā -> pṛthivy āpas tathā

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

evam+vyāpyavyāpakasambandhas -> evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakasambandhas

evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakasambandhas+yogas -> evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakasambandho yogas

evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakasambandho yogas+iti| -> evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakasambandho yoga iti|

dhātavas+ākāśādyās -> dhātava ākāśādyās

dhātava ākāśādyās+vyāpyavyāpakas -> dhātava ākāśādyā vyāpyavyāpakas

dhātava ākāśādyā vyāpyavyāpakas+jñānadhātus -> dhātava ākāśādyā vyāpyavyāpako jñānadhātus

dhātava ākāśādyā vyāpyavyāpako jñānadhātus+| -> dhātava ākāśādyā vyāpyavyāpako jñānadhātuḥ|

madhye+anuktatvāt -> madhye 'nuktatvāt

madhye 'nuktatvāt+ākāśavāyutejastoyadhātavas -> madhye 'nuktatvād ākāśavāyutejastoyadhātavas

madhye 'nuktatvād ākāśavāyutejastoyadhātavas+| -> madhye 'nuktatvād ākāśavāyutejastoyadhātavaḥ|

nirvāṇam+jñānadhātus -> nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātus

nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātus+yasya -> nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātur yasya

nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātur yasya+ādis -> nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātur yasyādis

nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātur yasyādis+ante -> nirvāṇaṃ jñānadhātur yasyādir ante

jñātam+kālacakrayogam -> jñātaṃ kālacakrayogam

jñātaṃ kālacakrayogam+nirvāṇādyam -> jñātaṃ kālacakrayogaṃ nirvāṇādyam

jñātaṃ kālacakrayogaṃ nirvāṇādyam+dharāntam| -> jñātaṃ kālacakrayogaṃ nirvāṇādyaṃ dharāntam|

eṣām+kulais -> eṣāṃ kulais

eṣāṃ kulais+ebhis -> eṣāṃ kulair ebhis

eṣāṃ kulair ebhis+pravarasuranarādibhis -> eṣāṃ kulair ebhiḥ pravarasuranarādibhis

eṣāṃ kulair ebhiḥ pravarasuranarādibhis+na -> eṣāṃ kulair ebhiḥ pravarasuranarādibhir na

pravarasurās+cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntās -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntās

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntās+narās -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narās

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narās+cakravartyādayas -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayas

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayas+rākṣasās -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasās

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasās+naiṛtyādayas -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayas

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayas+daityās -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityās

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityās+aparājitādayas -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayas

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayas+nāgās -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgās

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgās+anantādayas -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayas

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayas+vītarāgās -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayo vītarāgās

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayo vītarāgās+āryānandādayas -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayo vītarāgā āryānandādayas

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayo vītarāgā āryānandādayas+paramaṛṣayas -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayo vītarāgā āryānandādayaḥ paramaṛṣayas

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayo vītarāgā āryānandādayaḥ paramaṛṣayas+nāradādayas -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayo vītarāgā āryānandādayaḥ paramaṛṣayo nāradādayas

pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayo vītarāgā āryānandādayaḥ paramaṛṣayo nāradādayas+| -> pravarasurāś cāturmahārājakāyikādinaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāntā narāś cakravartyādayo rākṣasā naiṛtyādayo daityā aparājitādayo nāgā anantādayo vītarāgā āryānandādayaḥ paramaṛṣayo nāradādayaḥ|

jñātam+atas -> jñātam atas

jñātam atas+tuṣṭas -> jñātam atas tuṣṭas

jñātam atas tuṣṭas+aham -> jñātam atas tuṣṭo 'ham

jñātam atas tuṣṭo 'ham+iti -> jñātam atas tuṣṭo 'ham iti

jñātam atas tuṣṭo 'ham iti+atra -> jñātam atas tuṣṭo 'ham ity atra

pṛṣṭam+etat -> pṛṣṭam etat

pṛṣṭam etat+kālacakrayogam -> pṛṣṭam etat kālacakrayogam

pṛṣṭam etat kālacakrayogam+tat -> pṛṣṭam etat kālacakrayogaṃ tat

pṛṣṭam etat kālacakrayogaṃ tat+pravarasuranarādibhis -> pṛṣṭam etat kālacakrayogaṃ tat pravarasuranarādibhis

pṛṣṭam etat kālacakrayogaṃ tat pravarasuranarādibhis+na -> pṛṣṭam etat kālacakrayogaṃ tat pravarasuranarādibhir na

yatas+yat -> yato yat

yato yat+tvayā -> yato yat tvayā

kutas+| -> kutaḥ|

tuṣṭas+aham -> tuṣṭo 'ham

tuṣṭo 'ham+te| -> tuṣṭo 'haṃ te|

sucandra+iti -> sucandreti

sucandreti+āmantraṇam| -> sucandrety āmantraṇam|

tuṣṭas+aham -> tuṣṭo 'ham

tuṣṭo 'ham+te -> tuṣṭo 'haṃ te

maṇḍalam+ca -> maṇḍalaṃ ca

maṇḍalaṃ ca+abhiṣekam|| -> maṇḍalaṃ cābhiṣekam||

yogam+vyākhyāyamānam -> yogaṃ vyākhyāyamānam

yogaṃ vyākhyāyamānam+ṛṇu -> yogaṃ vyākhyāyamānam ṛṇu

nirvāṇādyam+dharāntam -> nirvāṇādyaṃ dharāntam

nirvāṇādyaṃ dharāntam+padagatisahitam -> nirvāṇādyaṃ dharāntaṃ padagatisahitam

nirvāṇādyaṃ dharāntaṃ padagatisahitam+dehamadhye -> nirvāṇādyaṃ dharāntaṃ padagatisahitaṃ dehamadhye

pṛṣṭam+etat| -> pṛṣṭam etat|

jñātam+vītarāgais -> jñātaṃ vītarāgais

jñātaṃ vītarāgais+paramamunikulais -> jñātaṃ vītarāgaiḥ paramamunikulais

jñātaṃ vītarāgaiḥ paramamunikulais+yat -> jñātaṃ vītarāgaiḥ paramamunikulair yat

jñātaṃ vītarāgaiḥ paramamunikulair yat+tvayā -> jñātaṃ vītarāgaiḥ paramamunikulair yat tvayā

pravarasuranarais+rākṣasais -> pravarasuranaraī rākṣasais

pravarasuranaraī rākṣasais+daityanāgais -> pravarasuranaraī rākṣasair daityanāgais

tuṣṭas+aham -> tuṣṭo 'ham

tuṣṭo 'ham+te -> tuṣṭo 'haṃ te

tuṣṭas+aham -> tuṣṭo 'ham

tuṣṭo 'ham+ityādinā|| -> tuṣṭo 'ham ityādinā||

saṃgītam+tat -> saṃgītaṃ tat

saṃgītaṃ tat+eva -> saṃgītaṃ tad eva

idānīm+bhagavatas -> idānīṃ bhagavatas

idānīṃ bhagavatas+prativacanam -> idānīṃ bhagavataḥ prativacanam

idānīṃ bhagavataḥ prativacanam+paramādibuddhāt -> idānīṃ bhagavataḥ prativacanaṃ paramādibuddhāt

idānīṃ bhagavataḥ prativacanaṃ paramādibuddhāt+mañjuśriyā -> idānīṃ bhagavataḥ prativacanaṃ paramādibuddhān mañjuśriyā

prativacanasaṃgrahoddeśas+| -> prativacanasaṃgrahoddeśaḥ|

lokadhātusaṃgrahoddeśas+| -> lokadhātusaṃgrahoddeśaḥ|

maṇḍalābhiṣekādisaṃgrahoddeśas+ṣaṣṭhas -> maṇḍalābhiṣekādisaṃgrahoddeśaḥ ṣaṣṭhas

maṇḍalābhiṣekādisaṃgrahoddeśaḥ ṣaṣṭhas+|| -> maṇḍalābhiṣekādisaṃgrahoddeśaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ||

dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

deśayitavyam+iti|| -> deśayitavyam iti||

evam+paramādibuddham -> evaṃ paramādibuddham

evaṃ paramādibuddham+mokṣārthibhis -> evaṃ paramādibuddhaṃ mokṣārthibhis

evaṃ paramādibuddhaṃ mokṣārthibhis+sacchiṣyais -> evaṃ paramādibuddhaṃ mokṣārthibhiḥ sacchiṣyais

evaṃ paramādibuddhaṃ mokṣārthibhiḥ sacchiṣyais+śrotavyam -> evaṃ paramādibuddhaṃ mokṣārthibhiḥ sacchiṣyaiḥ śrotavyam

evaṃ paramādibuddhaṃ mokṣārthibhiḥ sacchiṣyaiḥ śrotavyam+sadguruṇā -> evaṃ paramādibuddhaṃ mokṣārthibhiḥ sacchiṣyaiḥ śrotavyaṃ sadguruṇā

vajradharabhagavatas+mārgarahitās -> vajradharabhagavato mārgarahitās

vajradharabhagavato mārgarahitās+|% -> vajradharabhagavato mārgarahitāḥ|%

saṃsāriṇas+sarve -> saṃsāriṇaḥ sarve

mantrayānam+na -> mantrayānaṃ na

mantrayānam+na -> mantrayānaṃ na

vajradharajñānakāyam+na -> vajradharajñānakāyaṃ na

vajradharajñānakāyam+na -> vajradharajñānakāyaṃ na

nāmasaṃgītim+na -> nāmasaṃgītiṃ na

nāmasaṃgītim+na -> nāmasaṃgītiṃ na

paramādibuddham+na -> paramādibuddhaṃ na

atas+ye -> ato ye

saṃdeśitas+vajrapāṇes -> saṃdeśito vajrapāṇes

saṃdeśito vajrapāṇes+iti| -> saṃdeśito vajrapāṇer iti|

nāmasaṃgītyām+bhagavatā -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ bhagavatā

nītārthas+mantrayānasya -> nītārtho mantrayānasya

niḥsaṃdehās+bhaviṣyanti -> niḥsaṃdehā bhaviṣyanti

sattvās+yena -> sattvā yena

likhitam+nāmasaṃgītim -> likhitaṃ nāmasaṃgītim

likhitaṃ nāmasaṃgītim+pramāṇīkṛtya| -> likhitaṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ pramāṇīkṛtya|

bhavyasattvānāṃ cittādhimuktim+jñātvā -> bhavyasattvānāṃ cittādhimuktiṃ jñātvā

likhitam+śītānadyuttare -> likhitaṃ śītānadyuttare

prakaṭam+pustake -> prakaṭaṃ pustake

idam+viśuddhakramam -> idaṃ viśuddhakramam

idaṃ viśuddhakramam+mahāmudrāsiddhidāyakam -> idaṃ viśuddhakramaṃ mahāmudrāsiddhidāyakam

idaṃ viśuddhakramaṃ mahāmudrāsiddhidāyakam+pāmādibuddhe -> idaṃ viśuddhakramaṃ mahāmudrāsiddhidāyakaṃ pāmādibuddhe

gurupāramparyakrameṇa+āgatam -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāgatam

gurupāramparyakrameṇāgatam+iti| -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāgatam iti|

mantradevatābāhyasiddhisādhanam+vīrakramasvādhiṣṭhānakramam -> mantradevatābāhyasiddhisādhanaṃ vīrakramasvādhiṣṭhānakramam

mantradevatābāhyasiddhisādhanaṃ vīrakramasvādhiṣṭhānakramam+ca -> mantradevatābāhyasiddhisādhanaṃ vīrakramasvādhiṣṭhānakramaṃ ca

na+āgatas -> nāgatas

nāgatas+yathā -> nāgato yathā

prakaṭas+iti -> prakaṭa iti

dhūmādimārgas+ca -> dhūmādimārgaś ca

caturtham+prajñājñānam -> caturthaṃ prajñājñānam

caturthaṃ prajñājñānam+prakaṭam| -> caturthaṃ prajñājñānaṃ prakaṭam|

laghutantre+api -> laghutantre 'pi

punas+paramādibuddhe -> punaḥ paramādibuddhe

prakaṭas+iti| -> prakaṭa iti|

dhūmādimārgas+suguptas -> dhūmādimārgaḥ suguptas

dhūmādimārgaḥ suguptas+kvacit -> dhūmādimārgaḥ suguptaḥ kvacit

dhūmādimārgaḥ suguptaḥ kvacit+mūlatantreṣu -> dhūmādimārgaḥ suguptaḥ kvacin mūlatantreṣu

caturtham+prajñājñānam -> caturthaṃ prajñājñānam

vajrayānadeśakās+bhaviṣyanti| -> vajrayānadeśakā bhaviṣyanti|

nottānīkṛtaṃ yat+āryaviṣaye -> nottānīkṛtaṃ yad āryaviṣaye

caturthaṃ prajñājñānābhiṣekam+sarvatantrāntareṣu -> caturthaṃ prajñājñānābhiṣekaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣu

evam+anāgate -> evam anāgate

evam anāgate+adhvani -> evam anāgate 'dhvani

bhagavatoktam+iti| -> bhagavatoktam iti|

hetuphalayos+abhedena -> hetuphalayor abhedena

tṛtīyam+jñānam -> tṛtīyaṃ jñānam

tṛtīyaṃ jñānam+buddhajñānam -> tṛtīyaṃ jñānaṃ buddhajñānam

tṛtīyaṃ jñānaṃ buddhajñānam+vadiṣyanti -> tṛtīyaṃ jñānaṃ buddhajñānaṃ vadiṣyanti

tat+punas -> tat punas

tat punas+tathāśabdena -> tat punas tathāśabdena

tṛtīyam+prajñājñānam -> tṛtīyaṃ prajñājñānam

tṛtīyaṃ prajñājñānam+caturtham -> tṛtīyaṃ prajñājñānaṃ caturtham

tṛtīyaṃ prajñājñānaṃ caturtham+tat -> tṛtīyaṃ prajñājñānaṃ caturthaṃ tat

tṛtīyaṃ prajñājñānaṃ caturthaṃ tat+eva -> tṛtīyaṃ prajñājñānaṃ caturthaṃ tad eva

buddhajñānam+dvīndriyajam -> buddhajñānaṃ dvīndriyajam

buddhajñānaṃ dvīndriyajam+sukham -> buddhajñānaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ sukham

buddhajñānaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ sukham+bālamatīnām -> buddhajñānaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ sukhaṃ bālamatīnām

buddhajñānaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ sukhaṃ bālamatīnām+prakāśayiṣyanti -> buddhajñānaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ sukhaṃ bālamatīnāṃ prakāśayiṣyanti

vajrapadam+viparītam -> vajrapadaṃ viparītam

vajrapadaṃ viparītam+deśayiṣyanti -> vajrapadaṃ viparītaṃ deśayiṣyanti

mārakāyikās+sattvānām -> mārakāyikāḥ sattvānām

mārakāyikāḥ sattvānām+guravas -> mārakāyikāḥ sattvānāṃ guravas

mārakāyikāḥ sattvānāṃ guravas+bhūtvā -> mārakāyikāḥ sattvānāṃ guravo bhūtvā

tantraṭīkām+kariṣyanti -> tantraṭīkāṃ kariṣyanti

tantrārtham+ajānantas -> tantrārtham ajānantas

tantrārtham ajānantas+api -> tantrārtham ajānanto 'pi

vajrapadam+ajñāyamānās -> vajrapadam ajñāyamānās

vajrapadam ajñāyamānāḥ parasparam+vivādam -> vajrapadam ajñāyamānāḥ parasparaṃ vivādam

vajrapadam ajñāyamānāḥ parasparaṃ vivādam+kariṣyanti -> vajrapadam ajñāyamānāḥ parasparaṃ vivādaṃ kariṣyanti

anye+api -> anye 'pi

dravyavaśāt+vajrapadam -> dravyavaśād vajrapadam

dravyavaśād vajrapadam+duṣṭasattvebhyas -> dravyavaśād vajrapadaṃ duṣṭasattvebhyas

dravyavaśād vajrapadaṃ duṣṭasattvebhyas+prakāśayiṣyanti| -> dravyavaśād vajrapadaṃ duṣṭasattvebhyaḥ prakāśayiṣyanti|

teṣām+kleśam -> teṣāṃ kleśam

teṣāṃ kleśam+utpādayiṣyanti -> teṣāṃ kleśam utpādayiṣyanti
