daśākuśalakarmapathaparityaktānāṃ lokottarābhiṣekam+na -> daśākuśalakarmapathaparityaktānāṃ lokottarābhiṣekaṃ na

rājādīnām+prāk -> rājādīnāṃ prāk

rājādīnāṃ prāk+kiṃkarās -> rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarās

rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarās+paścāt -> rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścāt

rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścāt+guravas -> rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravas

rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravas+bhaviṣyanti -> rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravo bhaviṣyanti

rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravo bhaviṣyanti+anyeṣām -> rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravo bhaviṣyanty anyeṣām

rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravo bhaviṣyanty anyeṣām+dravyahīnānām -> rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravo bhaviṣyanty anyeṣāṃ dravyahīnānām

rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravo bhaviṣyanty anyeṣāṃ dravyahīnānām+bhavyacittānām -> rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravo bhaviṣyanty anyeṣāṃ dravyahīnānāṃ bhavyacittānām

rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravo bhaviṣyanty anyeṣāṃ dravyahīnānāṃ bhavyacittānām+api -> rājādīnāṃ prāk kiṃkarāḥ paścād guravo bhaviṣyanty anyeṣāṃ dravyahīnānāṃ bhavyacittānām api

lokottarābhiṣekam+dāsyanti -> lokottarābhiṣekaṃ dāsyanti

dharmavikrayam+kariṣyanti -> dharmavikrayaṃ kariṣyanti

dharmavikrayaṃ kariṣyanti+abhavyānām -> dharmavikrayaṃ kariṣyanty abhavyānām

dharmavikrayaṃ kariṣyanty abhavyānām+dravyalobhena -> dharmavikrayaṃ kariṣyanty abhavyānāṃ dravyalobhena

dravyārtham+dravyābhimāninām -> dravyārthaṃ dravyābhimāninām

dravyārthaṃ dravyābhimāninām+īśvarāṇām -> dravyārthaṃ dravyābhimāninām īśvarāṇām

dravyārthaṃ dravyābhimāninām īśvarāṇām+gṛham -> dravyārthaṃ dravyābhimāninām īśvarāṇāṃ gṛham

dravyārthaṃ dravyābhimāninām īśvarāṇāṃ gṛham+gatvā -> dravyārthaṃ dravyābhimāninām īśvarāṇāṃ gṛhaṃ gatvā

vajrācāryās+dravyaluṇṭhakās -> vajrācāryā dravyaluṇṭhakās

vajrācāryā dravyaluṇṭhakās+bhaviṣyanti -> vajrācāryā dravyaluṇṭhakā bhaviṣyanti

iha+āryaviṣaye -> ihāryaviṣaye

ihāryaviṣaye+anāgate -> ihāryaviṣaye 'nāgate

ihāryaviṣaye 'nāgate+adhvani -> ihāryaviṣaye 'nāgate 'dhvani

hetos+| -> hetoḥ|

tat+kasya -> tat kasya

sarvam+samyak -> sarvaṃ samyak

sarvaṃ samyak+vyākhyāhi| -> sarvaṃ samyag vyākhyāhi|

lokottarābhiṣekas+ekādaśamas -> lokottarābhiṣeka ekādaśamas

lokottarābhiṣeka ekādaśamas+caturthas -> lokottarābhiṣeka ekādaśamaś caturthas

lokottarābhiṣeka ekādaśamaś caturthas+iti -> lokottarābhiṣeka ekādaśamaś caturtha iti

tathā+uttarās -> tathottarās

tathottarās+---kalaśas -> tathottarāḥ---kalaśas

tathottarāḥ---kalaśas+guhyas -> tathottarāḥ---kalaśo guhyas

tathottarāḥ---kalaśo guhyas+prajñājñānam -> tathottarāḥ---kalaśo guhyaḥ prajñājñānam

tathottarāḥ---kalaśo guhyaḥ prajñājñānam+iti| -> tathottarāḥ---kalaśo guhyaḥ prajñājñānam iti|

laukikābhiṣekās+---udakamukuṭapaṭṭavajraghaṇṭāmahāvratanāmānujñās -> laukikābhiṣekāḥ---udakamukuṭapaṭṭavajraghaṇṭāmahāvratanāmānujñās

laukikābhiṣekāḥ---udakamukuṭapaṭṭavajraghaṇṭāmahāvratanāmānujñās+iti -> laukikābhiṣekāḥ---udakamukuṭapaṭṭavajraghaṇṭāmahāvratanāmānujñā iti

punas+sūtrapātarahitam -> punaḥ sūtrapātarahitam

punaḥ sūtrapātarahitam+rajaḥpātarahitam -> punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitam

punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitam+varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitam -> punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitam

punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitam+sarvākāram -> punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitaṃ sarvākāram

punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitaṃ sarvākāram+ākāśadhātau -> punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitaṃ sarvākāram ākāśadhātau

punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitaṃ sarvākāram ākāśadhātau+ādarśapratisenopamam -> punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitaṃ sarvākāram ākāśadhātāv ādarśapratisenopamam

punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitaṃ sarvākāram ākāśadhātāv ādarśapratisenopamam+iti|| -> punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthānarūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitaṃ sarvākāram ākāśadhātāv ādarśapratisenopamam iti||

rajaḥsūtrapātena+iti| -> rajaḥsūtrapāteneti|

rajomaṇḍalam+ākhyāhi -> rajomaṇḍalam ākhyāhi

samyak+tridaśanaraguros -> samyak tridaśanaraguros

samyak tridaśanaraguros+maṇḍalam -> samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalam

samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalam+ca -> samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalaṃ ca

samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalaṃ ca+abhiṣekam -> samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalaṃ cābhiṣekam

samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalaṃ cābhiṣekam+iti| -> samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalaṃ cābhiṣekam iti|

etat+vyākhyāhi -> etad vyākhyāhi

tathā+uttarāyaṇam -> tathottarāyaṇam

tathottarāyaṇam+dakṣiṇāyanam| -> tathottarāyaṇaṃ dakṣiṇāyanam|

devānām+divābhuktis -> devānāṃ divābhuktis

devānāṃ divābhuktis+asurāṇām -> devānāṃ divābhuktir asurāṇām

devānāṃ divābhuktir asurāṇām+rātribhuktis -> devānāṃ divābhuktir asurāṇāṃ rātribhuktis

devānāṃ divābhuktir asurāṇāṃ rātribhuktis+| -> devānāṃ divābhuktir asurāṇāṃ rātribhuktiḥ|

bhuktidevāsurāṇām+iti| -> bhuktidevāsurāṇām iti|

kriyāniyamas+| -> kriyāniyamaḥ|

vyākhyāhi+iti -> vyākhyāhīti

lokadhātus+| -> lokadhātuḥ|

tribhuvanam+iti -> tribhuvanam iti

vaktavyam+tribhuvanaracanām -> vaktavyaṃ tribhuvanaracanām

vaktavyaṃ tribhuvanaracanām+iti -> vaktavyaṃ tribhuvanaracanām iti

vaktavyaṃ tribhuvanaracanām iti+iha -> vaktavyaṃ tribhuvanaracanām itīha

mānam+adhyātmapaṭale -> mānam adhyātmapaṭale

evam+dehe -> evaṃ dehe

atha+eke -> athaike

athaike+indriyādayas -> athaika indriyādayas

athaika indriyādayas+ṣaṭ -> athaika indriyādayaḥ ṣaṭ

athaika indriyādayaḥ ṣaṭ+jīvakāyās -> athaika indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ jīvakāyās

athaika indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ jīvakāyās+iti| -> athaika indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ jīvakāyā iti|

vikārās+| -> vikārāḥ|

viṣayās+pṛthivyādīnām -> viṣayāḥ pṛthivyādīnām

viṣayāḥ pṛthivyādīnām+ṣaṭ -> viṣayāḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ ṣaṭ

viṣayāḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ ṣaṭ+rasās -> viṣayāḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ ṣaḍ rasās

viṣayāḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ ṣaḍ rasās+iti -> viṣayāḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ ṣaḍ rasā iti

grahās+pañca -> grahāḥ pañca

grahāḥ pañca+indriyāṇi| -> grahāḥ pañcendriyāṇi|

maṅgalādayas+pañca -> maṅgalādayaḥ pañca

prakṛtis+| -> prakṛtiḥ|

dhātavas+rāhusūryacandrās -> dhātavo rāhusūryacandrās

dhātavo rāhusūryacandrās+iti -> dhātavo rāhusūryacandrā iti

dhātavo rāhusūryacandrā iti+aṣṭau -> dhātavo rāhusūryacandrā ity aṣṭau

siddhas+| -> siddhaḥ|

pañcaviṃśatyātmakas+iti -> pañcaviṃśatyātmaka iti

vikṛtis+svabhāvarahitas -> vikṛtiḥ svabhāvarahitas

vikṛtiḥ svabhāvarahitas+iti|| -> vikṛtiḥ svabhāvarahita iti||

prakṛtis+na -> prakṛtir na

puruṣas+vyāpakatvāt -> puruṣo vyāpakatvāt

puruṣo vyāpakatvāt+na -> puruṣo vyāpakatvān na

vikṛtayas+ca -> vikṛtayaś ca

vikṛtayaś ca+iti| -> vikṛtayaś ceti|

prakṛtis+na -> prakṛtir na

caturviṃśatis+prakṛtis -> caturviṃśatiḥ prakṛtis

caturviṃśatiḥ prakṛtis+puruṣas -> caturviṃśatiḥ prakṛtiḥ puruṣas

caturviṃśatiḥ prakṛtiḥ puruṣas+na -> caturviṃśatiḥ prakṛtiḥ puruṣo na

divyendriyam+ca -> divyendriyaṃ ca

divyendriyaṃ ca+iti| -> divyendriyaṃ ceti|

viṣayās+pañca -> viṣayāḥ pañca

pañca+indriyāṇi -> pañcendriyāṇi

vikārās+iti -> vikārā iti

ṣoḍaśakās+tu -> ṣoḍaśakās tu

pṛthvyaptejovāyumanobuddhyahaṃkāras+ca -> pṛthvyaptejovāyumanobuddhyahaṃkāraś ca

pṛthvyaptejovāyumanobuddhyahaṃkāraś ca+iti| -> pṛthvyaptejovāyumanobuddhyahaṃkāraś ceti|

mahadādyās+prakṛtivikṛtayas -> mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayas

mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayas+sapta -> mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapta

mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapta+iti -> mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapteti

ākāśadhātus+iti| -> ākāśadhātur iti|

sattvānām+janikā -> sattvānāṃ janikā

mūlaprakṛtis+avikṛtis -> mūlaprakṛtir avikṛtis

mūlaprakṛtir avikṛtis+iti| -> mūlaprakṛtir avikṛtir iti|

puruṣas+pañcaviṃśatitamas -> puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśatitamas

puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśatitamas+iti| -> puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśatitama iti|

tīrthikānām+prakṛtis -> tīrthikānāṃ prakṛtis

tīrthikānāṃ prakṛtis+caturviṃśatyātmikā -> tīrthikānāṃ prakṛtiś caturviṃśatyātmikā

tīrthikais+parikalpitas -> tīrthikaiḥ parikalpitas

tīrthikaiḥ parikalpitas+dharmas -> tīrthikaiḥ parikalpito dharmas

tīrthikaiḥ parikalpito dharmas+prakṛtipuruṣādikas -> tīrthikaiḥ parikalpito dharmaḥ prakṛtipuruṣādikas

tīrthikaiḥ parikalpito dharmaḥ prakṛtipuruṣādikas+iti| -> tīrthikaiḥ parikalpito dharmaḥ prakṛtipuruṣādika iti|

anyas+api -> anyo 'pi

na+asti| -> nāsti|

paramārthatas+kartā -> paramārthataḥ kartā

svayam+prabhus -> svayaṃ prabhus

svayaṃ prabhus+|| -> svayaṃ prabhuḥ||

svayam+rājā -> svayaṃ rājā

svayam+hartā -> svayaṃ hartā

svayam+kartā -> svayaṃ kartā

bhagavān+tantrāntare--- -> bhagavāṃś tantrāntare---

tathā+āha -> tathāha

prakṛtipuruṣas+ucyate| -> prakṛtipuruṣa ucyate|

idānīm+tīrthikāvatāraṇāya -> idānīṃ tīrthikāvatāraṇāya

evam+yoginyas -> evaṃ yoginyas

evaṃ yoginyas+carcikādyās -> evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyās

evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyās+aṣṭau -> evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭau

evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭau+asurās -> evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭāv asurās

evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭāv asurās+nāgarājānas -> evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭāv asurā nāgarājānas

evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭāv asurā nāgarājānas+śvānāsyādayas -> evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭāv asurā nāgarājānaḥ śvānāsyādayas

evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭāv asurā nāgarājānaḥ śvānāsyādayas+devyas -> evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭāv asurā nāgarājānaḥ śvānāsyādayo devyas

evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭāv asurā nāgarājānaḥ śvānāsyādayo devyas+iti| -> evaṃ yoginyaś carcikādyā aṣṭāv asurā nāgarājānaḥ śvānāsyādayo devya iti|

vakṣyamāṇās+iti| -> vakṣyamāṇā iti|

devās+dvādaśahastapādasandhau -> devā dvādaśahastapādasandhau

ṣaṭ+krodhadevyas -> ṣaṭ krodhadevyas

ṣaṭ krodhadevyas+ṣaṭ -> ṣaṭ krodhadevyaḥ ṣaṭ

ṣaṭ krodhadevyaḥ ṣaṭ+karmendriyakriyās -> ṣaṭ krodhadevyaḥ ṣaṭ karmendriyakriyās

ṣaṭ krodhadevyaḥ ṣaṭ karmendriyakriyās+| -> ṣaṭ krodhadevyaḥ ṣaṭ karmendriyakriyāḥ|

ṣaṭ+krodhās -> ṣaṭ krodhās

ṣaṭ krodhās+ṣaṭ -> ṣaṭ krodhāḥ ṣaṭ

ṣaṭ krodhāḥ ṣaṭ+karmendriyāṇi| -> ṣaṭ krodhāḥ ṣaṭ karmendriyāṇi|

cakārāt+bodhisattvās -> cakārād bodhisattvās

cakārād bodhisattvās+mana{}indriyādayas -> cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayas

cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayas+ṣaṭ -> cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaṭ

cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaṭ+evam -> cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evam

cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evam+ṣaṭ -> cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evaṃ ṣaṭ

cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evaṃ ṣaṭ+dhātavas -> cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evaṃ ṣaḍ dhātavas

cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evaṃ ṣaḍ dhātavas+ṣaṭ -> cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evaṃ ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ ṣaṭ

cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evaṃ ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ ṣaṭ+viṣayās -> cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evaṃ ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ ṣaḍ viṣayās

cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evaṃ ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ ṣaḍ viṣayās+| -> cakārād bodhisattvā mana{}indriyādayaḥ ṣaḍ evaṃ ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ ṣaḍ viṣayāḥ|

devāsurān+ca -> devāsurāṃś ca

devāsurāṃś ca+iti| -> devāsurāṃś ceti|

buddhās+jñānavijñānādayas -> buddhā jñānavijñānādayas

buddhā jñānavijñānādayas+ṣaṭ -> buddhā jñānavijñānādayaḥ ṣaṭ

buddhā jñānavijñānādayaḥ ṣaṭ+skandhās -> buddhā jñānavijñānādayaḥ ṣaṭ skandhās

buddhā jñānavijñānādayaḥ ṣaṭ skandhās+iti| -> buddhā jñānavijñānādayaḥ ṣaṭ skandhā iti|

idānīm+kulakulīnās -> idānīṃ kulakulīnās

idānīṃ kulakulīnās+ucyante---buddhas -> idānīṃ kulakulīnā ucyante---buddhas

idānīṃ kulakulīnā ucyante---buddhas+ityādi| -> idānīṃ kulakulīnā ucyante---buddha ityādi|

svabhāvaikam+śatam -> svabhāvaikaṃ śatam

svabhāvaikaṃ śatam+kulam| -> svabhāvaikaṃ śataṃ kulam|

trikulam+pañcakulam -> trikulaṃ pañcakulam

trikulaṃ pañcakulam+ca -> trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ ca

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

maraṇāt+iti| -> maraṇād iti|

jñānadhātūdbhūtakāle+ubhayos -> jñānadhātūdbhūtakāla ubhayos

jñānadhātūdbhūtakāla ubhayos+catuḥkulam -> jñānadhātūdbhūtakāla ubhayoś catuḥkulam

jñānadhātūdbhūtakāla ubhayoś catuḥkulam+ṣaṭkulam -> jñānadhātūdbhūtakāla ubhayoś catuḥkulaṃ ṣaṭkulam

jñānadhātūdbhūtakāla ubhayoś catuḥkulaṃ ṣaṭkulam+ā -> jñānadhātūdbhūtakāla ubhayoś catuḥkulaṃ ṣaṭkulam ā

śukracyutikālam+yāvat -> śukracyutikālaṃ yāvat

śukracyutikālaṃ yāvat+trikulam -> śukracyutikālaṃ yāvat trikulam

śukracyutikālaṃ yāvat trikulam+pañcakulam -> śukracyutikālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulam

śukracyutikālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulam+veditavyam| -> śukracyutikālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ veditavyam|

kanyāyās+dvādaśabdais -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdais

kanyāyā dvādaśabdais+puṃsas -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsas

kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsas+ṣoḍaśābdais -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdais

kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdais+kanyāyās -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyās

kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyās+rajas -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajas

kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajas+kālam -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālam

kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālam+yāvat -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālaṃ yāvat

kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālaṃ yāvat+trikulam -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālaṃ yāvat trikulam

kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālaṃ yāvat trikulam+pañcakulam -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulam

kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulam+veditavyam -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ veditavyam

kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ veditavyam+puruṣasya -> kanyāyā dvādaśabdaiḥ puṃsaḥ ṣoḍaśābdaiḥ kanyāyā rajaḥ kālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ veditavyaṃ puruṣasya

garbhajānām+iti| -> garbhajānām iti|

sārdham+ṣaṭ -> sārdhaṃ ṣaṭ

sārdhaṃ ṣaṭ+kulāni -> sārdhaṃ ṣaṭ kulāni

ṣaṭ+kulāni -> ṣaṭ kulāni

evam+pañca -> evaṃ pañca

kāyatrayam+kāyacatuṣkam -> kāyatrayaṃ kāyacatuṣkam

kāyatrayaṃ kāyacatuṣkam+bhavati -> kāyatrayaṃ kāyacatuṣkaṃ bhavati

kāyatrayaṃ kāyacatuṣkaṃ bhavati+avasthātrayam -> kāyatrayaṃ kāyacatuṣkaṃ bhavaty avasthātrayam

kāyatrayaṃ kāyacatuṣkaṃ bhavaty avasthātrayam+avasthācatuṣkam -> kāyatrayaṃ kāyacatuṣkaṃ bhavaty avasthātrayam avasthācatuṣkam

kāyatrayaṃ kāyacatuṣkaṃ bhavaty avasthātrayam avasthācatuṣkam+bhavati| -> kāyatrayaṃ kāyacatuṣkaṃ bhavaty avasthātrayam avasthācatuṣkaṃ bhavati|

sārdham+catuḥkulāni -> sārdhaṃ catuḥkulāni

evam+kāyavākcittakulāni -> evaṃ kāyavākcittakulāni

dhātavas+ṣaḍindriyādīnām -> dhātavaḥ ṣaḍindriyādīnām

dhātavaḥ ṣaḍindriyādīnām+ṣaṭ -> dhātavaḥ ṣaḍindriyādīnāṃ ṣaṭ

dhātavaḥ ṣaḍindriyādīnāṃ ṣaṭ+kulāni -> dhātavaḥ ṣaḍindriyādīnāṃ ṣaṭ kulāni

dhātavaḥ ṣaḍindriyādīnāṃ ṣaṭ kulāni+iti| -> dhātavaḥ ṣaḍindriyādīnāṃ ṣaṭ kulānīti|

śabdas+aḥ| -> śabdo 'ḥ|

śrotram+a| -> śrotram a|

mama{}indriyam+aṃ| -> mama{}indriyam aṃ|

akāśadhātus+ā| -> akāśadhātur ā|

jñānadhātus+aḥ| -> jñānadhātur aḥ|

vijñānaskandhas+a| -> vijñānaskandho '|

jñānavijñānaskandhādīnām+svarās -> jñānavijñānaskandhādīnāṃ svarās

jñānavijñānaskandhādīnāṃ svarās+tadyathā---jñānaskandhas -> jñānavijñānaskandhādīnāṃ svarās tadyathā---jñānaskandhas

jñānavijñānaskandhādīnāṃ svarās tadyathā---jñānaskandhas+aṃ| -> jñānavijñānaskandhādīnāṃ svarās tadyathā---jñānaskandho 'ṃ|

evam+vaṃkāras -> evaṃ vaṃkāras

evaṃ vaṃkāras+pañcākṣaras -> evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaras

evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaras+mahāśūnyas -> evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyas

evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyas+nirālambanakaruṇātmakas -> evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo nirālambanakaruṇātmakas

evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo nirālambanakaruṇātmakas+paramāṇudharmatātītas -> evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo nirālambanakaruṇātmakaḥ paramāṇudharmatātītas

evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo nirālambanakaruṇātmakaḥ paramāṇudharmatātītas+pratisenārūpasadṛśas -> evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo nirālambanakaruṇātmakaḥ paramāṇudharmatātītaḥ pratisenārūpasadṛśas

evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo nirālambanakaruṇātmakaḥ paramāṇudharmatātītaḥ pratisenārūpasadṛśas+yogigamyas -> evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo nirālambanakaruṇātmakaḥ paramāṇudharmatātītaḥ pratisenārūpasadṛśo yogigamyas

evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo nirālambanakaruṇātmakaḥ paramāṇudharmatātītaḥ pratisenārūpasadṛśo yogigamyas+iti|| -> evaṃ vaṃkāraḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo nirālambanakaruṇātmakaḥ paramāṇudharmatātītaḥ pratisenārūpasadṛśo yogigamya iti||

evam+dīrghaguṇavṛddhiyaṇādeśavikārās -> evaṃ dīrghaguṇavṛddhiyaṇādeśavikārās

evaṃ dīrghaguṇavṛddhiyaṇādeśavikārās+jñātavyās -> evaṃ dīrghaguṇavṛddhiyaṇādeśavikārā jñātavyās

evaṃ dīrghaguṇavṛddhiyaṇādeśavikārā jñātavyās+iti| -> evaṃ dīrghaguṇavṛddhiyaṇādeśavikārā jñātavyā iti|

ḷkāraśūnyam+halākṛtis -> ḷkāraśūnyaṃ halākṛtis

ḷkāraśūnyaṃ halākṛtis+| -> ḷkāraśūnyaṃ halākṛtiḥ|

pūrve+ikāraśūnyam -> pūrva ikāraśūnyam

pūrva ikāraśūnyam+daṇḍākāram| -> pūrva ikāraśūnyaṃ daṇḍākāram|

ṛkāraśūnyam+bindudvayam -> ṛkāraśūnyaṃ bindudvayam

ṛkāraśūnyaṃ bindudvayam+vāme -> ṛkāraśūnyaṃ bindudvayaṃ vāme

ṛkāraśūnyaṃ bindudvayaṃ vāme+ukāraśūnyam -> ṛkāraśūnyaṃ bindudvayaṃ vāma ukāraśūnyam

ṛkāraśūnyaṃ bindudvayaṃ vāma ukāraśūnyam+bindum -> ṛkāraśūnyaṃ bindudvayaṃ vāma ukāraśūnyaṃ bindum

ṛkāraśūnyaṃ bindudvayaṃ vāma ukāraśūnyaṃ bindum+ekam| -> ṛkāraśūnyaṃ bindudvayaṃ vāma ukāraśūnyaṃ bindum ekam|

tadyathā---madhye+akāraśūnyam -> tadyathā---madhye 'kāraśūnyam

tadyathā---madhye 'kāraśūnyam+kartikākāram -> tadyathā---madhye 'kāraśūnyaṃ kartikākāram

tadyathā---madhye 'kāraśūnyaṃ kartikākāram+dakṣiṇe -> tadyathā---madhye 'kāraśūnyaṃ kartikākāraṃ dakṣiṇe

svarasaṃjñīni+anuccāryāṇi -> svarasaṃjñīny anuccāryāṇi

pañcabhis+ekalolībhūtais -> pañcabhir ekalolībhūtais

pañcabhir ekalolībhūtais+pañcākṣaras -> pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaras

pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaras+mahāśūnyas -> pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyas

pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyas+vaṃkāras -> pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo vaṃkāras

pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo vaṃkāras+vajrasattvas -> pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo vaṃkāro vajrasattvas

pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo vaṃkāro vajrasattvas+mahāsukhakuliśam -> pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo vaṃkāro vajrasattvo mahāsukhakuliśam

pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo vaṃkāro vajrasattvo mahāsukhakuliśam+ucyate| -> pañcabhir ekalolībhūtaiḥ pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo vaṃkāro vajrasattvo mahāsukhakuliśam ucyate|

evam+uktakrameṇa -> evam uktakrameṇa

halākṛtim+anuccāryam -> halākṛtim anuccāryam

halākṛtim anuccāryam+iti| -> halākṛtim anuccāryam iti|

saṃjñācihnam+madhyānāhatacihnāt -> saṃjñācihnaṃ madhyānāhatacihnāt

saṃjñācihnaṃ madhyānāhatacihnāt+paścimena -> saṃjñācihnaṃ madhyānāhatacihnāt paścimena

samarasatvam+ekalolībhūtatvam -> samarasatvam ekalolībhūtatvam

samarasatvam ekalolībhūtatvam+varam -> samarasatvam ekalolībhūtatvaṃ varam

samarasatvam ekalolībhūtatvaṃ varam+iti -> samarasatvam ekalolībhūtatvaṃ varam iti

eṣām+nirāvaraṇatā -> eṣāṃ nirāvaraṇatā

tadyathā---rūpaskandhapṛthivīdhātukāyendriyagandhāpāyvālāpās+| -> tadyathā---rūpaskandhapṛthivīdhātukāyendriyagandhāpāyvālāpāḥ|

pañcamaṃ śūnyam+iti -> pañcamaṃ śūnyam iti

pañcamaṃ śūnyam iti+uktam| -> pañcamaṃ śūnyam ity uktam|

daṇḍākāram+rekhāmātram -> daṇḍākāraṃ rekhāmātram

eṣām+nirāvaraṇatā -> eṣāṃ nirāvaraṇatā

dvitīyaśūnyamuktas+tadyatha---saṃskāraskandhavāyudhātughrāṇasaṃsparśavāgindriyaviṭsrāvās -> dvitīyaśūnyamuktas tadyatha---saṃskāraskandhavāyudhātughrāṇasaṃsparśavāgindriyaviṭsrāvās

dvitīyaśūnyamuktas tadyatha---saṃskāraskandhavāyudhātughrāṇasaṃsparśavāgindriyaviṭsrāvās+| -> dvitīyaśūnyamuktas tadyatha---saṃskāraskandhavāyudhātughrāṇasaṃsparśavāgindriyaviṭsrāvāḥ|

trayas+śūnyasaṃjñās -> trayaḥ śūnyasaṃjñās

trayaḥ śūnyasaṃjñāḥ syus+| -> trayaḥ śūnyasaṃjñāḥ syuḥ|

pūrvacakārāt+amī -> pūrvacakārād amī

varas+ca -> varaś ca

varas+ca -> varaś ca

bindum ekam+anuccāryam -> bindum ekam anuccāryam

bindum ekam anuccāryam+iti|| -> bindum ekam anuccāryam iti||

bindum+iti -> bindum iti

bindum iti+anayā -> bindum ity anayā

eṣām+nirāvaraṇatā -> eṣāṃ nirāvaraṇatā

tṛtīyaṃ śūnyam+iti -> tṛtīyaṃ śūnyam iti

jñānam+iti -> jñānam iti

jñānam iti+anayā -> jñānam ity anayā

cakāras+samuccayārtham -> cakāraḥ samuccayārtham

cakāraḥ samuccayārtham+uddiṣṭas -> cakāraḥ samuccayārtham uddiṣṭas

cakāraḥ samuccayārtham uddiṣṭas+samuccayārthapratipādakatvāt| -> cakāraḥ samuccayārtham uddiṣṭaḥ samuccayārthapratipādakatvāt|

tatas+jñānam -> tato jñānam

tato jñānam+ca -> tato jñānaṃ ca

tato jñānaṃ ca+iti -> tato jñānaṃ ceti

tato jñānaṃ ceti+atra -> tato jñānaṃ cety atra

kartikākāram+rekhāmātram -> kartikākāraṃ rekhāmātram

kartikākāraṃ rekhāmātram uccāryaṃ prathamākṣaramahāśūnyam+iti| -> kartikākāraṃ rekhāmātram uccāryaṃ prathamākṣaramahāśūnyam iti|

saṃjñācihnam+savyavāmapūrvāparamadhye -> saṃjñācihnaṃ savyavāmapūrvāparamadhye

asya+anāhatasya -> asyānāhatasya

tat+eva -> tad eva

tad eva+anāhatam -> tad evānāhatam

tad evānāhatam+uktam -> tad evānāhatam uktam

tad evānāhatam uktam+jinais -> tad evānāhatam uktaṃ jinais

tad evānāhatam uktaṃ jinais+| -> tad evānāhatam uktaṃ jinaiḥ|

sarvābhāvas+iti -> sarvābhāva iti

samarasatvam+ekalolībhūtatvam -> samarasatvam ekalolībhūtatvam

eṣām+nirāvaraṇatā -> eṣāṃ nirāvaraṇatā

tadyathā---jñānaskandhavijñānaskandhajñānadhātvākāśadhātumanaḥśrotraśabdadharmadhātudivyendriyabhagamūtrasrāvaśukracyutis+ca| -> tadyathā---jñānaskandhavijñānaskandhajñānadhātvākāśadhātumanaḥśrotraśabdadharmadhātudivyendriyabhagamūtrasrāvaśukracyutiś ca|

bindum+varakuliśadharam -> binduṃ varakuliśadharam

binduṃ varakuliśadharam+iti -> binduṃ varakuliśadharam iti

binduṃ varakuliśadharam iti+ebhis -> binduṃ varakuliśadharam ity ebhis

binduṃ varakuliśadharam ity ebhis+caturdaśākṣarais -> binduṃ varakuliśadharam ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣarais

binduṃ varakuliśadharam ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣarais+| -> binduṃ varakuliśadharam ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣaraiḥ|

śūnyādisaṃjñābhis+ṣaḍdhātus -> śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātus

śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātus+ayam -> śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātur ayam

śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātur ayam+mahāpuruṣapudgalas -> śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ mahāpuruṣapudgalas

śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ mahāpuruṣapudgalas+saṃgṛhītas -> śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ mahāpuruṣapudgalaḥ saṃgṛhītas

śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ mahāpuruṣapudgalaḥ saṃgṛhītas+śūnyam -> śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ mahāpuruṣapudgalaḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ śūnyam

śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ mahāpuruṣapudgalaḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ śūnyaṃ jñānam+ca -> śūnyādisaṃjñābhiḥ ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ mahāpuruṣapudgalaḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ śūnyaṃ jñānaṃ ca

yogibhiḥ saṃjñāvikalpas+na -> yogibhiḥ saṃjñāvikalpo na

tasmāt+nānāsaṃjñābhis -> tasmān nānāsaṃjñābhis

tasmān nānāsaṃjñābhis+nirdeśitasya -> tasmān nānāsaṃjñābhir nirdeśitasya

tasmān nānāsaṃjñābhir nirdeśitasya+ekasya -> tasmān nānāsaṃjñābhir nirdeśitasyaikasya

tasmān nānāsaṃjñābhir nirdeśitasyaikasya+api -> tasmān nānāsaṃjñābhir nirdeśitasyaikasyāpi

bhāvās+nirdiṣṭās -> bhāvā nirdiṣṭās

bhāvā nirdiṣṭāḥ saṃgītikārakais+ca -> bhāvā nirdiṣṭāḥ saṃgītikārakaiś ca

śāstrasaṃjñābhis+deśasaṃjñābhis -> śāstrasaṃjñābhir deśasaṃjñābhis

śāstrasaṃjñābhir deśasaṃjñābhir mantrākṣarasaṃjñābhir ekaikākṣarasaṃjñābhis+ye -> śāstrasaṃjñābhir deśasaṃjñābhir mantrākṣarasaṃjñābhir ekaikākṣarasaṃjñābhir ye

bhāvas+bhavati -> bhāvo bhavati

bhāvo bhavati+evam -> bhāvo bhavaty evam

bhāvo bhavaty evam+ghaṭasaṃjñayā -> bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayā

bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayā+uddiṣṭas -> bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayoddiṣṭas

bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayoddiṣṭas+bhāvas -> bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo bhāvas

bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo bhāvas+na -> bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo bhāvo na

bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo bhāvo na+abhāvas -> bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo bhāvo nābhāvas

bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo bhāvo nābhāvas+bhavati -> bhāvo bhavaty evaṃ ghaṭasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo bhāvo nābhāvo bhavati

khapuṣpasaṃjñayā+uddiṣṭas -> khapuṣpasaṃjñayoddiṣṭas

khapuṣpasaṃjñayoddiṣṭas+abhāvas -> khapuṣpasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo 'bhāvas

khapuṣpasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo 'bhāvas+na -> khapuṣpasaṃjñayoddiṣṭo 'bhāvo na

saṃjñāpūrvakas+vyavahāras -> saṃjñāpūrvako vyavahāras

saṃjñāpūrvako vyavahāras+khapuṣpādau -> saṃjñāpūrvako vyavahāraḥ khapuṣpādau

bhāve+api -> bhāve 'pi

sarvatra+asati -> sarvatrāsati

śūnyam+ityādibhis -> śūnyam ityādibhis

śūnyam ityādibhis+saṃjñābhis -> śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhis

śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhis+adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvās -> śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvās

śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvās+prakāśitās -> śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitās

śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitās+pratyekendriyāṇām -> śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām

śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām+agocarās -> śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām agocarās

śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām agocarās+pratyekendriyāṇām -> śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām agocarāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām

śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām agocarāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām+gocarās -> śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām agocarāḥ pratyekendriyāṇāṃ gocarās

śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām agocarāḥ pratyekendriyāṇāṃ gocarās+iti| -> śūnyam ityādibhiḥ saṃjñābhir adṛṣṭadṛṣṭabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ pratyekendriyāṇām agocarāḥ pratyekendriyāṇāṃ gocarā iti|

ṭīkāyām+saṃkṣepatas -> ṭīkāyāṃ saṃkṣepatas

ṭīkāyāṃ saṃkṣepatas+vaktavyas -> ṭīkāyāṃ saṃkṣepato vaktavyas

ṭīkāyāṃ saṃkṣepato vaktavyas+iti|| -> ṭīkāyāṃ saṃkṣepato vaktavya iti||

bālamatīnām+tena -> bālamatīnāṃ tena

bālamatīnāṃ tena+ādau -> bālamatīnāṃ tenādau

sugamas+bhavati -> sugamo bhavati

tantraguptārthas+prakāśitas -> tantraguptārthaḥ prakāśitas

tantraguptārthaḥ prakāśitas+san -> tantraguptārthaḥ prakāśitaḥ san

tantraguptārthaḥ prakāśitaḥ san+vakṣyamāṇe -> tantraguptārthaḥ prakāśitaḥ san vakṣyamāṇe

prathamam+adhyeṣaṇāvṛttena -> prathamam adhyeṣaṇāvṛttena

śūnyam+ityādinā| -> śūnyam ityādinā|

tat+idam -> tad idam

tad idam+vivṛṇomi -> tad idaṃ vivṛṇomi

iha+adhyeṣaṇārthatvam -> ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvam

ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvam+pañcākṣaramahāśūnyam -> ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyam

ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyam+binduśūnyam -> ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyam

ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyam+ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnām -> ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnām

ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnām+saṃgrahārtham -> ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnāṃ saṃgrahārtham

ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnāṃ saṃgrahārtham+bhagavatā -> ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnāṃ saṃgrahārthaṃ bhagavatā

ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnāṃ saṃgrahārthaṃ bhagavatā+uktam -> ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnāṃ saṃgrahārthaṃ bhagavatoktam

ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnāṃ saṃgrahārthaṃ bhagavatoktam+iti -> ihādhyeṣaṇārthatvaṃ pañcākṣaramahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṣaṭkulādīnāṃ saṃgrahārthaṃ bhagavatoktam iti

samyak+tridaśanaraguros -> samyak tridaśanaraguros

samyak tridaśanaraguros+maṇḍalam -> samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalam

samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalam+ca -> samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalaṃ ca

samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalaṃ ca+abhiṣekam|| -> samyak tridaśanaraguror maṇḍalaṃ cābhiṣekam||

etat+vyākhyāhi -> etad vyākhyāhi

mānam+tribhuvanaracanām -> mānaṃ tribhuvanaracanām

mānaṃ tribhuvanaracanām+bhaktis -> mānaṃ tribhuvanaracanāṃ bhaktis

mānaṃ tribhuvanaracanāṃ bhaktis+devāsurāṇām -> mānaṃ tribhuvanaracanāṃ bhaktir devāsurāṇām

puruṣam+pañcaviṃśātmakam -> puruṣaṃ pañcaviṃśātmakam

puruṣaṃ pañcaviṃśātmakam+ca| -> puruṣaṃ pañcaviṃśātmakaṃ ca|

bindum+varakuliśadharam -> binduṃ varakuliśadharam

binduṃ varakuliśadharam+buddhadevāsurān -> binduṃ varakuliśadharaṃ buddhadevāsurān

binduṃ varakuliśadharaṃ buddhadevāsurān+ca -> binduṃ varakuliśadharaṃ buddhadevāsurāṃś ca

śūnyam+jñānam -> śūnyaṃ jñānam

śūnyaṃ jñānam+ca -> śūnyaṃ jñānaṃ ca

idānīm+sūryarathādhyeṣitas -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitas

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitas+san -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san+mañjuśrīs -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīs

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīs+bhagavān -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān+nirmitakāyas -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyas

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyas+yaśonarendras -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendras

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendras+paramādibuddhāt -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ paramādibuddhāt

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ paramādibuddhāt+tathāgatavyākṛtam -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ paramādibuddhāt tathāgatavyākṛtam

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ paramādibuddhāt tathāgatavyākṛtam+sucandrādhyeṣaṇam -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ paramādibuddhāt tathāgatavyākṛtaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇam

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ paramādibuddhāt tathāgatavyākṛtaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇam+dvitīyavṛttena -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ paramādibuddhāt tathāgatavyākṛtaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ dvitīyavṛttena

idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ paramādibuddhāt tathāgatavyākṛtaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ dvitīyavṛttena+āha--- -> idānīṃ sūryarathādhyeṣitaḥ san mañjuśrīr bhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendraḥ paramādibuddhāt tathāgatavyākṛtaṃ sucandrādhyeṣaṇaṃ dvitīyavṛttenāha---

maṇḍalābhiṣekādisaṃgrahoddeśas+| -> maṇḍalābhiṣekādisaṃgrahoddeśaḥ|

vimalaprabhāyām+deśakādisaṃgrahoddeśas -> vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakādisaṃgrahoddeśas

vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakādisaṃgrahoddeśas+pañcamas -> vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakādisaṃgrahoddeśaḥ pañcamas

vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakādisaṃgrahoddeśaḥ pañcamas+|| -> vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakādisaṃgrahoddeśaḥ pañcamaḥ||

mūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

deśayiṣyati+iti|| -> deśayiṣyatīti||

saṃdeśitas+deśyate -> saṃdeśito deśyate

atītavartamānānāgatakālais+atītavartamānānāgatasamayais -> atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayais

atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayais+parṣadbhis -> atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhis

atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhis+iti -> atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhir iti

atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhir iti+anantānantabuddhakṣetreṣu -> atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhir ity anantānantabuddhakṣetreṣu

atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhir ity anantānantabuddhakṣetreṣu+anantānantasattvānām -> atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhir ity anantānantabuddhakṣetreṣv anantānantasattvānām

atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhir ity anantānantabuddhakṣetreṣv anantānantasattvānām+anantānantatathāgatais -> atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhir ity anantānantabuddhakṣetreṣv anantānantasattvānām anantānantatathāgatais

atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhir ity anantānantabuddhakṣetreṣv anantānantasattvānām anantānantatathāgatais+buddhatvāya -> atītavartamānānāgatakālair atītavartamānānāgatasamayaiḥ parṣadbhir ity anantānantabuddhakṣetreṣv anantānantasattvānām anantānantatathāgatair buddhatvāya

etat+paramādibuddhayogam -> etat paramādibuddhayogam

etat paramādibuddhayogam+atītabuddhais -> etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhais

etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhais+deśitam -> etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhair deśitam

etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhair deśitam+vartamānais -> etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhair deśitaṃ vartamānais

etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhair deśitaṃ vartamānais+deśyate -> etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhair deśitaṃ vartamānair deśyate

etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhair deśitaṃ vartamānair deśyate+anāgatais -> etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhair deśitaṃ vartamānair deśyate 'nāgatais

etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhair deśitaṃ vartamānair deśyate 'nāgatais+deśayiṣyate| -> etat paramādibuddhayogam atītabuddhair deśitaṃ vartamānair deśyate 'nāgatair deśayiṣyate|

prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas+| -> prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahaḥ|

janmani+iti -> janmanīti

puṇyajñānasambhārābhyām+narāṇām -> puṇyajñānasambhārābhyāṃ narāṇām

puṇyajñānasambhārābhyāṃ narāṇām+iha -> puṇyajñānasambhārābhyāṃ narāṇām iha

buddhatvam+vajrasattvam -> buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvam

buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvam+ca -> buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvaṃ ca

buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvaṃ ca+iti -> buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvaṃ ceti

iha+ākāśadhātau -> ihākāśadhātau

prayojanam+iti -> prayojanam iti

tatas+uttarottaram -> tata uttarottaram

tata uttarottaram+prayojanasya -> tata uttarottaraṃ prayojanasya

tata uttarottaraṃ prayojanasya+api -> tata uttarottaraṃ prayojanasyāpi

prayojanam+vīrakramādhiṣṭhānakrameṇa -> prayojanaṃ vīrakramādhiṣṭhānakrameṇa

prayojanaṃ vīrakramādhiṣṭhānakrameṇa+iti| -> prayojanaṃ vīrakramādhiṣṭhānakrameṇeti|

laukikasiddhisādhanam+adhiṣṭhānabhāvanābalena -> laukikasiddhisādhanam adhiṣṭhānabhāvanābalena

sattvārthakaraṇam+prayojanam -> sattvārthakaraṇaṃ prayojanam

sattvārthakaraṇaṃ prayojanam+puṇyasambhāreṇa -> sattvārthakaraṇaṃ prayojanaṃ puṇyasambhāreṇa

mokṣahetos+narāṇām -> mokṣahetor narāṇām

mokṣahetor narāṇām+prathamam -> mokṣahetor narāṇāṃ prathamam

mokṣahetor narāṇāṃ prathamam+tāvat -> mokṣahetor narāṇāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat

mokṣahetor narāṇāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat+maṇḍalapraveśādinā -> mokṣahetor narāṇāṃ prathamaṃ tāvan maṇḍalapraveśādinā

idānīm+prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas -> idānīṃ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas

idānīṃ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas+ucyate---mokṣahetos -> idānīṃ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgraha ucyate---mokṣahetos

idānīṃ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgraha ucyate---mokṣahetos+narāṇām -> idānīṃ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgraha ucyate---mokṣahetor narāṇām

idānīṃ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgraha ucyate---mokṣahetor narāṇām+iti| -> idānīṃ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgraha ucyate---mokṣahetor narāṇām iti|

dharmadeśanāsaṃgrahas+|| -> dharmadeśanāsaṃgrahaḥ||

kālacakram+abhidheyam -> kālacakram abhidheyam

kālacakram abhidheyam+vajrayogam -> kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogam

kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogam+tantrasvabhāvatayā -> kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayā

kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayā+avasthitam -> kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayāvasthitam

kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayāvasthitam+ādibuddham -> kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayāvasthitam ādibuddham

kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayāvasthitam ādibuddham+pṛcchet -> kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayāvasthitam ādibuddhaṃ pṛcchet

kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayāvasthitam ādibuddhaṃ pṛcchet+sucandras -> kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayāvasthitam ādibuddhaṃ pṛcchet sucandras

kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayāvasthitam ādibuddhaṃ pṛcchet sucandras+iti -> kālacakram abhidheyaṃ vajrayogaṃ tantrasvabhāvatayāvasthitam ādibuddhaṃ pṛcchet sucandra iti

kālacakrābhidhāne+ādikādiprajñopāyātmake -> kālacakrābhidhāna ādikādiprajñopāyātmake

kaliyugasamayas+tasmin -> kaliyugasamayas tasmin

kaliyugasamayas tasmin+kaliyugasamaye -> kaliyugasamayas tasmin kaliyugasamaye

kalim+yunakti -> kaliṃ yunakti

kaliṃ yunakti+iti -> kaliṃ yunaktīti

asmin+asamaye -> asminn asamaye

iti+asamayas -> ity asamayas

ity asamayas+svaramelāpakas -> ity asamayaḥ svaramelāpakas

ity asamayaḥ svaramelāpakas+| -> ity asamayaḥ svaramelāpakaḥ|

atra+asamayas -> atrāsamayas

atrāsamayas+--- -> atrāsamayaḥ---

kas+alis -> ko 'lis

ko 'lis+vyañjanapaṅktis -> ko 'lir vyañjanapaṅktis

ko 'lir vyañjanapaṅktis+| -> ko 'lir vyañjanapaṅktiḥ|

kas+alis -> ko 'lis

ko 'lis+--- -> ko 'liḥ---

samayas+asamayas -> samayo 'samayas

samayo 'samayas+svaramelāpakas -> samayo 'samayaḥ svaramelāpakas

samayo 'samayaḥ svaramelāpakas+iti -> samayo 'samayaḥ svaramelāpaka iti

samayo 'samayaḥ svaramelāpaka iti+ucyate| -> samayo 'samayaḥ svaramelāpaka ity ucyate|

tathā+asya -> tathāsya

veditavyas+iti| -> veditavya iti|

nirdiṣṭatvāt+rajaḥsvabhāvāt -> nirdiṣṭatvād rajaḥsvabhāvāt

nirdiṣṭatvād rajaḥsvabhāvāt+vā -> nirdiṣṭatvād rajaḥsvabhāvād vā

kakāras+mukham -> kakāro mukham

kakāro mukham+sarvavyañjānām -> kakāro mukhaṃ sarvavyañjānām

kakāro mukhaṃ sarvavyañjānām+ādau -> kakāro mukhaṃ sarvavyañjānām ādau

kas+alis -> ko 'lis

ko 'lis+kalis -> ko 'liḥ kalis

ko 'liḥ kalis+kakārādivyañjanapaṅktis -> ko 'liḥ kaliḥ kakārādivyañjanapaṅktis

ko 'liḥ kaliḥ kakārādivyañjanapaṅktis+iti| -> ko 'liḥ kaliḥ kakārādivyañjanapaṅktir iti|

kaliyugasamaye+iti -> kaliyugasamaya iti

evam+jñānacittavākkāyātmakam -> evaṃ jñānacittavākkāyātmakam

evaṃ jñānacittavākkāyātmakam+yogam -> evaṃ jñānacittavākkāyātmakaṃ yogam

evaṃ jñānacittavākkāyātmakaṃ yogam+pṛcchet -> evaṃ jñānacittavākkāyātmakaṃ yogaṃ pṛcchet

evaṃ jñānacittavākkāyātmakaṃ yogaṃ pṛcchet+śrīkālacakre -> evaṃ jñānacittavākkāyātmakaṃ yogaṃ pṛcchec chrīkālacakre

vaktavyas+asmin -> vaktavyo 'smin

vaktavyo 'smin+lokadhātupaṭale -> vaktavyo 'smiṃ lokadhātupaṭale

vaktavyo 'smiṃ lokadhātupaṭale+uddeśamātreṇa -> vaktavyo 'smiṃ lokadhātupaṭala uddeśamātreṇa

vaktavyo 'smiṃ lokadhātupaṭala uddeśamātreṇa+uddiṣṭas -> vaktavyo 'smiṃ lokadhātupaṭala uddeśamātreṇoddiṣṭas

vaktavyo 'smiṃ lokadhātupaṭala uddeśamātreṇoddiṣṭas+iti| -> vaktavyo 'smiṃ lokadhātupaṭala uddeśamātreṇoddiṣṭa iti|

vajrayogas+jñānapaṭale -> vajrayogo jñānapaṭale

anekavikalpabhāvasaṃjñājāgraccitābhāvacittam+nirmāṇakāyas -> anekavikalpabhāvasaṃjñājāgraccitābhāvacittaṃ nirmāṇakāyas

anekavikalpabhāvasaṃjñājāgraccitābhāvacittaṃ nirmāṇakāyas+padmapatrāyatākṣas -> anekavikalpabhāvasaṃjñājāgraccitābhāvacittaṃ nirmāṇakāyaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas

anekavikalpabhāvasaṃjñājāgraccitābhāvacittaṃ nirmāṇakāyaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas+iti| -> anekavikalpabhāvasaṃjñājāgraccitābhāvacittaṃ nirmāṇakāyaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣa iti|

prāṇotpāditasadasatsvapnacittābhāvacittam+sambhogakāyas -> prāṇotpāditasadasatsvapnacittābhāvacittaṃ sambhogakāyas

prāṇotpāditasadasatsvapnacittābhāvacittaṃ sambhogakāyas+dinakaravapus -> prāṇotpāditasadasatsvapnacittābhāvacittaṃ sambhogakāyo dinakaravapus

prāṇotpāditasadasatsvapnacittābhāvacittaṃ sambhogakāyo dinakaravapus+iti| -> prāṇotpāditasadasatsvapnacittābhāvacittaṃ sambhogakāyo dinakaravapur iti|

tamobhibhūtasuṣuptacittābhāvacittam+dharmakāyas -> tamobhibhūtasuṣuptacittābhāvacittaṃ dharmakāyas

tamobhibhūtasuṣuptacittābhāvacittaṃ dharmakāyas+jñānakāyas -> tamobhibhūtasuṣuptacittābhāvacittaṃ dharmakāyo jñānakāyas

tamobhibhūtasuṣuptacittābhāvacittaṃ dharmakāyo jñānakāyas+iti| -> tamobhibhūtasuṣuptacittābhāvacittaṃ dharmakāyo jñānakāya iti|

durvārarāgamalāvaliptobhayendriyātmakaturyacittābhāvacittam+svābhāvikakāyas -> durvārarāgamalāvaliptobhayendriyātmakaturyacittābhāvacittaṃ svābhāvikakāyas

durvārarāgamalāvaliptobhayendriyātmakaturyacittābhāvacittaṃ svābhāvikakāyas+sarvajñas -> durvārarāgamalāvaliptobhayendriyātmakaturyacittābhāvacittaṃ svābhāvikakāyaḥ sarvajñas

durvārarāgamalāvaliptobhayendriyātmakaturyacittābhāvacittaṃ svābhāvikakāyaḥ sarvajñas+iti| -> durvārarāgamalāvaliptobhayendriyātmakaturyacittābhāvacittaṃ svābhāvikakāyaḥ sarvajña iti|

caturvidham+cittavajram -> caturvidhaṃ cittavajram

caturvidhaṃ cittavajram+viśuddham -> caturvidhaṃ cittavajraṃ viśuddham

caturvidhaṃ cittavajraṃ viśuddham+catuḥkāyalakṣaṇam -> caturvidhaṃ cittavajraṃ viśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyalakṣaṇam

caturvidhaṃ cittavajraṃ viśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyalakṣaṇam+bhavati| -> caturvidhaṃ cittavajraṃ viśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati|

pañcākārābhisambuddhas+cittavajras -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajras

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajras+paramākṣarasukhas -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukhas

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukhas+viṃśatyākārasambuddhas -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddhas

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddhas+vāgvajras -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajras

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajras+dvādaśākārasatyārthas -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthas

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthas+sarvasattvarutais -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutais

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutais+dharmadeśakas -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśakas

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśakas+māyājālābhisambuddhas -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhas

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhas+kāyavajras -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajras

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajras+ṣoḍaśākāratattvavit -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavit

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavit+anantamāyājālais -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid anantamāyājālais

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid anantamāyājālais+sphāritakāyas -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid anantamāyājālaiḥ sphāritakāyas

pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid anantamāyājālaiḥ sphāritakāyas+iti| -> pañcākārābhisambuddhaś cittavajraḥ paramākṣarasukho viṃśatyākārasambuddho vāgvajro dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśako māyājālābhisambuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid anantamāyājālaiḥ sphāritakāya iti|

evam+ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhas -> evam ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhas

evam ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhas+jñānavajras -> evam ekakṣaṇābhisambuddho jñānavajras

evam ekakṣaṇābhisambuddho jñānavajras+sarvārthadarśī|| -> evam ekakṣaṇābhisambuddho jñānavajraḥ sarvārthadarśī||

anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhas+kāyavajras -> anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajras

anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajras+prajñopāyātmakas -> anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakas

anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakas+nirmāṇakāyas -> anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyas

anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyas+sarvākārajñatāprāptas -> anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptas

anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptas+padmapatrāyatākṣas -> anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas

anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas+anantānantanirmāṇakāyais -> anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣo 'nantānantanirmāṇakāyais

anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣo 'nantānantanirmāṇakāyais+yugapat -> anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣo 'nantānantanirmāṇakāyair yugapat

anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣo 'nantānantanirmāṇakāyair yugapat+sarvākārakāyavyūhaṛddhispharaṇāt -> anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣo 'nantānantanirmāṇakāyair yugapat sarvākārakāyavyūhaṛddhispharaṇāt

anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣo 'nantānantanirmāṇakāyair yugapat sarvākārakāyavyūhaṛddhispharaṇāt+iti| -> anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako nirmāṇakāyaḥ sarvākārajñatāprāptaḥ padmapatrāyatākṣo 'nantānantanirmāṇakāyair yugapat sarvākārakāyavyūhaṛddhispharaṇād iti|

apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhas+vāgvajras -> apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajras

apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajras+prajñopāyātmakas -> apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakas

apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakas+sambhogakāyas -> apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyas

apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyas+mārgajñatāprāptas -> apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāptas

apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāptas+dinakaravapus -> apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāpto dinakaravapus

apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāpto dinakaravapus+anantānantasattvarutais -> apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāpto dinakaravapur anantānantasattvarutais

apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāpto dinakaravapur anantānantasattvarutais+yugapat -> apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāpto dinakaravapur anantānantasattvarutair yugapat

apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāpto dinakaravapur anantānantasattvarutair yugapat+laukikalokottaradharmadeśakatvāt -> apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāpto dinakaravapur anantānantasattvarutair yugapal laukikalokottaradharmadeśakatvāt

apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāpto dinakaravapur anantānantasattvarutair yugapal laukikalokottaradharmadeśakatvāt+iti| -> apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddho vāgvajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sambhogakāyo mārgajñatāprāpto dinakaravapur anantānantasattvarutair yugapal laukikalokottaradharmadeśakatvād iti|

animittavimokṣaviśuddhas+cittavajras -> animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajras

animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajras+prajñopāyātmakas -> animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakas

animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakas+dharmakāyas -> animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmakāyas

animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmakāyas+mārgākārajñatāprāptas -> animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmakāyo mārgākārajñatāprāptas

animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmakāyo mārgākārajñatāprāptas+jñānakāyas -> animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmakāyo mārgākārajñatāprāpto jñānakāyas

animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmakāyo mārgākārajñatāprāpto jñānakāyas+paramākṣarasukhena -> animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmakāyo mārgākārajñatāprāpto jñānakāyaḥ paramākṣarasukhena

animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmakāyo mārgākārajñatāprāpto jñānakāyaḥ paramākṣarasukhena+avasthitatvāt| -> animittavimokṣaviśuddhaś cittavajraḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmakāyo mārgākārajñatāprāpto jñānakāyaḥ paramākṣarasukhenāvasthitatvāt|

śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddhas+jñānavajras -> śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajras

śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajras+prajñopāyātmakas -> śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakas

śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakas+sahajakāyas -> śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sahajakāyas

śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sahajakāyas+sarvajñatāprāptas -> śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sahajakāyaḥ sarvajñatāprāptas

śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sahajakāyaḥ sarvajñatāprāptas+sarvajñas -> śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sahajakāyaḥ sarvajñatāprāptaḥ sarvajñas

śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sahajakāyaḥ sarvajñatāprāptaḥ sarvajñas+sarvadarśitatvāt| -> śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ sahajakāyaḥ sarvajñatāprāptaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśitatvāt|

evam+etam -> evam etam

evam etam+vajrayogam -> evam etaṃ vajrayogam

evam etaṃ vajrayogam+caturvidham -> evam etaṃ vajrayogaṃ caturvidham

evam etaṃ vajrayogaṃ caturvidham+buddham -> evam etaṃ vajrayogaṃ caturvidhaṃ buddham

evam etaṃ vajrayogaṃ caturvidhaṃ buddham+pṛcchet -> evam etaṃ vajrayogaṃ caturvidhaṃ buddhaṃ pṛcchet

evam etaṃ vajrayogaṃ caturvidhaṃ buddhaṃ pṛcchet+vajrapāṇis -> evam etaṃ vajrayogaṃ caturvidhaṃ buddhaṃ pṛcched vajrapāṇis

evam etaṃ vajrayogaṃ caturvidhaṃ buddhaṃ pṛcched vajrapāṇis+iti| -> evam etaṃ vajrayogaṃ caturvidhaṃ buddhaṃ pṛcched vajrapāṇir iti|

nirmāṇakāyas+anabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddham -> nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddham

nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddham+kāyavajram -> nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajram

nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajram+padmapatrāyatākṣas -> nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣas

nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣas+prajñopāyātmakas -> nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakas

nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakas+saṃsthānayogas -> nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ saṃsthānayogas

nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ saṃsthānayogas+iti -> nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ saṃsthānayoga iti

nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ saṃsthānayoga iti+uktas -> nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ saṃsthānayoga ity uktas

nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ saṃsthānayoga ity uktas+| -> nirmāṇakāyo 'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣaviśuddhaṃ kāyavajraṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ saṃsthānayoga ity uktaḥ|

sas+eva -> sa eva

sambhogakāyas+apraṇihitavimokṣaviśuddham -> sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddham

sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddham+vāgvajram -> sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajram

sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajram+dinakaravapus -> sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapus

sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapus+prajñopāyātmakas -> sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmakas

sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmakas+mantrayogas -> sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmako mantrayogas

sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmako mantrayogas+iti -> sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmako mantrayoga iti

sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmako mantrayoga iti+uktas -> sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmako mantrayoga ity uktas

sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmako mantrayoga ity uktas+| -> sambhogakāyo 'praṇihitavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ vāgvajraṃ dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmako mantrayoga ity uktaḥ|

sas+eva -> sa eva

dharmakāyas+animittavimokṣaviśuddham -> dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddham

dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddham+cittavajram -> dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajram

dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajram+jñānakāyas -> dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyas

dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyas+prajñopāyātmakas -> dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmakas

dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmakas+dharmayogas -> dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmayogas

dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmayogas+iti -> dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmayoga iti

dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmayoga iti+uktas -> dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmayoga ity uktas

dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmayoga ity uktas+| -> dharmakāyo 'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaṃ cittavajraṃ jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmayoga ity uktaḥ|

sas+eva -> sa eva

sahajakāyas+śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddhas -> sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddhas

sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddhas+jñānavajras -> sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajras

sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajras+sarvajñas -> sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ sarvajñas

sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ sarvajñas+prajñopāyātmakas -> sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ sarvajñaḥ prajñopāyātmakas

sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ sarvajñaḥ prajñopāyātmakas+viśuddhayogas -> sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ sarvajñaḥ prajñopāyātmako viśuddhayogas

sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ sarvajñaḥ prajñopāyātmako viśuddhayogas+iti| -> sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ sarvajñaḥ prajñopāyātmako viśuddhayoga iti|

sas+eva -> sa eva

ṣoḍaśākāram+tattvam -> ṣoḍaśākāraṃ tattvam

ṣoḍaśākāraṃ tattvam+iti -> ṣoḍaśākāraṃ tattvam iti

cittādhimuktivaśāt+sattvānām -> cittādhimuktivaśāt sattvānām

cittādhimuktivaśāt sattvānām+pratibhāsate|| -> cittādhimuktivaśāt sattvānāṃ pratibhāsate||

evam+sahajavāk -> evaṃ sahajavāk

evaṃ sahajavāk+sahajacittam -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittam

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittam+sahajajñānam -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānam

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānam+dharmavāk -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāk

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāk+dharmacittam -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittam

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittam+dharmajñānam -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānam

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānam+sambhogavāk -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk+sambhogacittam -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittam

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittam+sambhogajñānam -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānam

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānam+nirmāṇavāk -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ nirmāṇavāk

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ nirmāṇavāk+nirmāṇacittam -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittam

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittam+nirmāṇajñānam -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānam

evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānam+iti -> evaṃ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānaṃ dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānam iti

tatas+dharmakāyas -> tato dharmakāyas

tato dharmakāyas+tatas -> tato dharmakāyas tatas

tato dharmakāyas tatas+sambhogakāyas -> tato dharmakāyas tataḥ sambhogakāyas

tato dharmakāyas tataḥ sambhogakāyas+tatas -> tato dharmakāyas tataḥ sambhogakāyas tatas

tato dharmakāyas tataḥ sambhogakāyas tatas+nirmāṇakāyas -> tato dharmakāyas tataḥ sambhogakāyas tato nirmāṇakāyas

tato dharmakāyas tataḥ sambhogakāyas tato nirmāṇakāyas+| -> tato dharmakāyas tataḥ sambhogakāyas tato nirmāṇakāyaḥ|

tattvam+sahajakāyas -> tattvaṃ sahajakāyas

tattvaṃ sahajakāyas+iti -> tattvaṃ sahajakāya iti

tattvaṃ sahajakāya iti+ucyate| -> tattvaṃ sahajakāya ity ucyate|

tat+eva -> tad eva

ṣoḍaśākāratattvavit+iti -> ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid iti

ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid iti+uktas -> ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid ity uktas

ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid ity uktas+bhagavatā| -> ṣoḍaśākāratattvavid ity ukto bhagavatā|

evam+ṣoḍaśākāratattvam -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśākāratattvam

evaṃ ṣoḍaśākāratattvam+yadā -> evaṃ ṣoḍaśākāratattvaṃ yadā

evam+kāyasahajānandas -> evaṃ kāyasahajānandas

evaṃ kāyasahajānandas+vāksahajānandas -> evaṃ kāyasahajānando vāksahajānandas

evaṃ kāyasahajānando vāksahajānandas+cittasahajānandas -> evaṃ kāyasahajānando vāksahajānandaś cittasahajānandas

evaṃ kāyasahajānando vāksahajānandaś cittasahajānandas+jñānasahajānandas -> evaṃ kāyasahajānando vāksahajānandaś cittasahajānando jñānasahajānandas

evaṃ kāyasahajānando vāksahajānandaś cittasahajānando jñānasahajānandas+| -> evaṃ kāyasahajānando vāksahajānandaś cittasahajānando jñānasahajānandaḥ|

evam+kāyaviramānandas -> evaṃ kāyaviramānandas

evaṃ kāyaviramānandas+vākviramānandas -> evaṃ kāyaviramānando vākviramānandas

evaṃ kāyaviramānando vākviramānandas+cittaviramānandas -> evaṃ kāyaviramānando vākviramānandaś cittaviramānandas

evaṃ kāyaviramānando vākviramānandaś cittaviramānandas+jñānaviramānandas -> evaṃ kāyaviramānando vākviramānandaś cittaviramānando jñānaviramānandas

evaṃ kāyaviramānando vākviramānandaś cittaviramānando jñānaviramānandas+| -> evaṃ kāyaviramānando vākviramānandaś cittaviramānando jñānaviramānandaḥ|

evam+kāyaparamānandas -> evaṃ kāyaparamānandas

evaṃ kāyaparamānandas+vākparamānandas -> evaṃ kāyaparamānando vākparamānandas

evaṃ kāyaparamānando vākparamānandas+cittaparamānandas -> evaṃ kāyaparamānando vākparamānandaś cittaparamānandas

evaṃ kāyaparamānando vākparamānandaś cittaparamānandas+jñānaparamānandas -> evaṃ kāyaparamānando vākparamānandaś cittaparamānando jñānaparamānandas

evaṃ kāyaparamānando vākparamānandaś cittaparamānando jñānaparamānandas+| -> evaṃ kāyaparamānando vākparamānandaś cittaparamānando jñānaparamānandaḥ|

tatas+kāyānandas -> tataḥ kāyānandas

tataḥ kāyānandas+vāgānandas -> tataḥ kāyānando vāgānandas

tataḥ kāyānando vāgānandas+cittānandas -> tataḥ kāyānando vāgānandaś cittānandas

tataḥ kāyānando vāgānandaś cittānandas+jñānānandas -> tataḥ kāyānando vāgānandaś cittānando jñānānandas

tataḥ kāyānando vāgānandaś cittānando jñānānandas+| -> tataḥ kāyānando vāgānandaś cittānando jñānānandaḥ|

ānandaparamaviramasahajabhedais+caturvidham| -> ānandaparamaviramasahajabhedaiś caturvidham|

ṣoḍaśākāram+ca| -> ṣoḍaśākāraṃ ca|

sattvānām+svacittāśayavaśāt -> sattvānāṃ svacittāśayavaśāt

sattvānāṃ svacittāśayavaśāt+caturvidham -> sattvānāṃ svacittāśayavaśāc caturvidham

sattvānāṃ svacittāśayavaśāc caturvidham+pratibhāsate -> sattvānāṃ svacittāśayavaśāc caturvidhaṃ pratibhāsate

tat+eva -> tad eva

jinais+| -> jinaiḥ|

ekānekakṣaṇarahitam+jñānam -> ekānekakṣaṇarahitaṃ jñānam

ekānekakṣaṇarahitaṃ jñānam+tattvam -> ekānekakṣaṇarahitaṃ jñānaṃ tattvam

ekānekakṣaṇarahitaṃ jñānaṃ tattvam+iti -> ekānekakṣaṇarahitaṃ jñānaṃ tattvam iti

ekānekakṣaṇarahitaṃ jñānaṃ tattvam iti+ucyate -> ekānekakṣaṇarahitaṃ jñānaṃ tattvam ity ucyate

rahitam+apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇam -> rahitam apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇam

rahitam apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇam+buddhānām -> rahitam apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ buddhānām

rahitam apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ buddhānām+niḥsvabhāvam -> rahitam apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ buddhānāṃ niḥsvabhāvam

rahitam apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ buddhānāṃ niḥsvabhāvam+iti|| -> rahitam apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ buddhānāṃ niḥsvabhāvam iti||

pakṣas+parasparāpekṣikatvāt -> pakṣaḥ parasparāpekṣikatvāt

pakṣaḥ parasparāpekṣikatvāt+iti| -> pakṣaḥ parasparāpekṣikatvād iti|

ekas+anekas -> eko 'nekas

eko 'nekas+śāśvatas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvatas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvatas+ucchedas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedas+bhavas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavas+nirvāṇam -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇam

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇam+rūpam -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam+arūpam -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpam

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpam+śabdas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdas+aśabdas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdas+kṣaṇas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇas+akṣaṇas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇas+rāgas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgas+arāgas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgas+dveṣas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣas+adveṣas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣo 'dveṣas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣo 'dveṣas+mohas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣo 'dveṣo mohas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣo 'dveṣo mohas+amohas -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣo 'dveṣo moho 'mohas

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣo 'dveṣo moho 'mohas+iti -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣo 'dveṣo moho 'moha iti

eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣo 'dveṣo moho 'moha iti+evamādi -> eko 'nekaḥ śāśvata ucchedo bhavo nirvāṇaṃ rūpam arūpaṃ śabdo 'śabdaḥ kṣaṇo 'kṣaṇo rāgo 'rāgo dveṣo 'dveṣo moho 'moha ity evamādi

na+asti -> nāsti

bhāvas+abhāvas -> bhāvo 'bhāvas

bhāvo 'bhāvas+sat -> bhāvo 'bhāvaḥ sat

bhāvo 'bhāvaḥ sat+asat -> bhāvo 'bhāvaḥ sad asat

bhāvo 'bhāvaḥ sad asat+asti -> bhāvo 'bhāvaḥ sad asad asti

pakṣas+nāma -> pakṣo nāma

atas+niḥsvabhāvapakṣas -> ato niḥsvabhāvapakṣas

ato niḥsvabhāvapakṣas+apakṣas -> ato niḥsvabhāvapakṣo 'pakṣas

ato niḥsvabhāvapakṣo 'pakṣas+bhagavatā -> ato niḥsvabhāvapakṣo 'pakṣo bhagavatā

ato niḥsvabhāvapakṣo 'pakṣo bhagavatā+uktas -> ato niḥsvabhāvapakṣo 'pakṣo bhagavatoktas

ato niḥsvabhāvapakṣo 'pakṣo bhagavatoktas+|| -> ato niḥsvabhāvapakṣo 'pakṣo bhagavatoktaḥ||

kṣaṇadharmarahitam+cittam -> kṣaṇadharmarahitaṃ cittam

kṣaṇadharmarahitaṃ cittam+niḥsvabhāvam -> kṣaṇadharmarahitaṃ cittaṃ niḥsvabhāvam

kṣaṇadharmarahitaṃ cittaṃ niḥsvabhāvam+iti -> kṣaṇadharmarahitaṃ cittaṃ niḥsvabhāvam iti

kṣaṇadharmarahitaṃ cittaṃ niḥsvabhāvam iti+ucyate| -> kṣaṇadharmarahitaṃ cittaṃ niḥsvabhāvam ity ucyate|

tāvat+ekānekavicāras -> tāvad ekānekavicāras

tāvad ekānekavicāras+dharmāṇām -> tāvad ekānekavicāro dharmāṇām

tāvad ekānekavicāro dharmāṇām+kṣaṇikacittapratibhāsāt| -> tāvad ekānekavicāro dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikacittapratibhāsāt|

yāvat+laukikasattā -> yāval laukikasattā

sarvakṣaṇābhāvas+ekānekarahitas -> sarvakṣaṇābhāva ekānekarahitas

sarvakṣaṇābhāva ekānekarahitas+paramādvayayogas -> sarvakṣaṇābhāva ekānekarahitaḥ paramādvayayogas

sarvakṣaṇābhāva ekānekarahitaḥ paramādvayayogas+buddhānām -> sarvakṣaṇābhāva ekānekarahitaḥ paramādvayayogo buddhānām

sarvakṣaṇābhāva ekānekarahitaḥ paramādvayayogo buddhānām+paramārthas -> sarvakṣaṇābhāva ekānekarahitaḥ paramādvayayogo buddhānāṃ paramārthas

sarvakṣaṇābhāva ekānekarahitaḥ paramādvayayogo buddhānāṃ paramārthas+sattāsattārahitatvāt| -> sarvakṣaṇābhāva ekānekarahitaḥ paramādvayayogo buddhānāṃ paramārthaḥ sattāsattārahitatvāt|

tat+prathamam -> tat prathamam

tat prathamam+paramākṣarasukhakṣaṇābhisambuddhas -> tat prathamaṃ paramākṣarasukhakṣaṇābhisambuddhas

tat prathamaṃ paramākṣarasukhakṣaṇābhisambuddhas+san -> tat prathamaṃ paramākṣarasukhakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san

tat prathamaṃ paramākṣarasukhakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san+ekaviṃśatisahasraṣaṭśataparamākṣarasukhakṣaṇabhāvakas -> tat prathamaṃ paramākṣarasukhakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ sann ekaviṃśatisahasraṣaṭśataparamākṣarasukhakṣaṇabhāvakas

tat prathamaṃ paramākṣarasukhakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ sann ekaviṃśatisahasraṣaṭśataparamākṣarasukhakṣaṇabhāvakas+| -> tat prathamaṃ paramākṣarasukhakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ sann ekaviṃśatisahasraṣaṭśataparamākṣarasukhakṣaṇabhāvakaḥ|

ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhas+sarvakṣaṇavibhāvakas -> ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ sarvakṣaṇavibhāvakas

ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ sarvakṣaṇavibhāvakas+| -> ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ sarvakṣaṇavibhāvakaḥ|

ekānekavirodhāt+iti| -> ekānekavirodhād iti|

evam+paramārthasattābhāvāt -> evaṃ paramārthasattābhāvāt

evaṃ paramārthasattābhāvāt+ekakṣaṇas -> evaṃ paramārthasattābhāvād ekakṣaṇas

evaṃ paramārthasattābhāvād ekakṣaṇas+na -> evaṃ paramārthasattābhāvād ekakṣaṇo na

evaṃ paramārthasattābhāvād ekakṣaṇo na+asti -> evaṃ paramārthasattābhāvād ekakṣaṇo nāsti

naṣṭabījāt+aṅkuras -> naṣṭabījād aṅkuras

naṣṭabījād aṅkuras+na -> naṣṭabījād aṅkuro na

naṣṭabījād aṅkuro na+anaṣṭabījāt -> naṣṭabījād aṅkuro nānaṣṭabījāt

naṣṭabījād aṅkuro nānaṣṭabījāt+aṅkuras -> naṣṭabījād aṅkuro nānaṣṭabījād aṅkuras

naṣṭabījād aṅkuro nānaṣṭabījād aṅkuras+bhavati -> naṣṭabījād aṅkuro nānaṣṭabījād aṅkuro bhavati

niruddhāt+na -> niruddhān na

prākkṣaṇāt+aniruddhāt -> prākkṣaṇād aniruddhāt

prākkṣaṇād aniruddhāt+aparakṣaṇas -> prākkṣaṇād aniruddhād aparakṣaṇas

prākkṣaṇād aniruddhād aparakṣaṇas+na -> prākkṣaṇād aniruddhād aparakṣaṇo na

etat+eva -> etad eva

yathānukrameṇa+utpādakṣaṇāt -> yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt

yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt+sthitikṣaṇas -> yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇas

yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇas+sthitikṣaṇāt -> yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇaḥ sthitikṣaṇāt

yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇaḥ sthitikṣaṇāt+bhaṅgakṣaṇas -> yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇaḥ sthitikṣaṇād bhaṅgakṣaṇas

yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇaḥ sthitikṣaṇād bhaṅgakṣaṇas+bhaṅgakṣaṇāt -> yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇaḥ sthitikṣaṇād bhaṅgakṣaṇo bhaṅgakṣaṇāt

yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇaḥ sthitikṣaṇād bhaṅgakṣaṇo bhaṅgakṣaṇāt+utpādakṣaṇas -> yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇaḥ sthitikṣaṇād bhaṅgakṣaṇo bhaṅgakṣaṇād utpādakṣaṇas

yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇaḥ sthitikṣaṇād bhaṅgakṣaṇo bhaṅgakṣaṇād utpādakṣaṇas+bhavati| -> yathānukrameṇotpādakṣaṇāt sthitikṣaṇaḥ sthitikṣaṇād bhaṅgakṣaṇo bhaṅgakṣaṇād utpādakṣaṇo bhavati|

sarvadharmāṇām+sati -> sarvadharmāṇāṃ sati

sarvadharmāṇāṃ sati+ekakāle -> sarvadharmāṇāṃ saty ekakāle

sarvadharmāṇāṃ saty ekakāle+utpādasthitibhaṅgakṣaṇānām -> sarvadharmāṇāṃ saty ekakāla utpādasthitibhaṅgakṣaṇānām

sarvadharmāṇāṃ saty ekakāla utpādasthitibhaṅgakṣaṇānām+na -> sarvadharmāṇāṃ saty ekakāla utpādasthitibhaṅgakṣaṇānāṃ na

sarvadharmāṇāṃ saty ekakāla utpādasthitibhaṅgakṣaṇānāṃ na+aikyam| -> sarvadharmāṇāṃ saty ekakāla utpādasthitibhaṅgakṣaṇānāṃ naikyam|

yugapat+ca -> yugapac ca

syāt+iti -> syād iti

sarvadharmāṇām+kṣaṇotpādas -> sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇotpādas

sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇotpādas+kṣaṇasthitis -> sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇotpādaḥ kṣaṇasthitis

sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇotpādaḥ kṣaṇasthitis+kṣaṇabhaṅgas -> sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇotpādaḥ kṣaṇasthitiḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgas

sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇotpādaḥ kṣaṇasthitiḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgas+na -> sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇotpādaḥ kṣaṇasthitiḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgo na

evam+yathānukrameṇa -> evaṃ yathānukrameṇa

sthitis+bhavati| -> sthitir bhavati|

na+utpādas -> notpādas

notpādas+na -> notpādo na

tasmin+kṣaṇe -> tasmin kṣaṇe

bhaṅgas+sarvadharmāṇām -> bhaṅgaḥ sarvadharmāṇām

bhaṅgaḥ sarvadharmāṇām+bhavati -> bhaṅgaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhavati

yasmin+kṣaṇe -> yasmin kṣaṇe

bhaṅgas+na -> bhaṅgo na

bhaṅgo na+utpādas -> bhaṅgo notpādas

bhaṅgo notpādas+| -> bhaṅgo notpādaḥ|

tasmin+kṣaṇe -> tasmin kṣaṇe

sthitis+bhavati -> sthitir bhavati

yasmin+kṣaṇe -> yasmin kṣaṇe

sthitis+bhaṅgas -> sthitir bhaṅgas

sthitir bhaṅgas+| -> sthitir bhaṅgaḥ|

tasmin+kṣaṇe -> tasmin kṣaṇe

dharmāṇām+utpādas -> dharmāṇām utpādas

dharmāṇām utpādas+bhavati -> dharmāṇām utpādo bhavati

yasmin+kṣaṇe -> yasmin kṣaṇe

bhaṅgas+niranvayatvāt| -> bhaṅgo niranvayatvāt|

sthitis+na -> sthitir na

sarvatathāgatās+abhisambuddhās -> sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās

sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās+tasmāt -> sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt

sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt+kṣaṇāt -> sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt kṣaṇāt

sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt kṣaṇāt+sarvadharmāṇām -> sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt kṣaṇāt sarvadharmāṇām

sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt kṣaṇāt sarvadharmāṇām+na -> sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt kṣaṇāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ na

sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt kṣaṇāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ na+utpādas -> sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt kṣaṇāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ notpādas

sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt kṣaṇāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ notpādas+na -> sarvatathāgatā abhisambuddhās tasmāt kṣaṇāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ notpādo na

yasmin+pūrṇakṣaṇe -> yasmin pūrṇakṣaṇe

tatas+pūrṇas -> tataḥ pūrṇas

tataḥ pūrṇas+tasmin -> tataḥ pūrṇas tasmin

tataḥ pūrṇas tasmin+kṣaṇe -> tataḥ pūrṇas tasmin kṣaṇe

tataḥ pūrṇas tasmin kṣaṇe+abhisambuddhas -> tataḥ pūrṇas tasmin kṣaṇe 'bhisambuddhas

tataḥ pūrṇas tasmin kṣaṇe 'bhisambuddhas+samyaksambuddhas -> tataḥ pūrṇas tasmin kṣaṇe 'bhisambuddhaḥ samyaksambuddhas

tataḥ pūrṇas tasmin kṣaṇe 'bhisambuddhaḥ samyaksambuddhas+iti| -> tataḥ pūrṇas tasmin kṣaṇe 'bhisambuddhaḥ samyaksambuddha iti|

śvāsasaṃkhyāntam+yāvat| -> śvāsasaṃkhyāntaṃ yāvat|

asau+ekakṣaṇasambuddhas -> asāv ekakṣaṇasambuddhas

asāv ekakṣaṇasambuddhas+sarvakṣaṇavibhāvakas -> asāv ekakṣaṇasambuddhaḥ sarvakṣaṇavibhāvakas

asāv ekakṣaṇasambuddhaḥ sarvakṣaṇavibhāvakas+bhavati -> asāv ekakṣaṇasambuddhaḥ sarvakṣaṇavibhāvako bhavati

sthitas+na -> sthito na

yathā+agnis -> yathāgnis

yathāgnis+na -> yathāgnir na

yathāgnir na+araṇyām -> yathāgnir nāraṇyām

yathāgnir nāraṇyām+sthitas -> yathāgnir nāraṇyāṃ sthitas

yathāgnir nāraṇyāṃ sthitas+na -> yathāgnir nāraṇyāṃ sthito na

bhavanirvāṇayos+na -> bhavanirvāṇayor na

bhavanirvāṇayor na+aikyam -> bhavanirvāṇayor naikyam

bhavanirvāṇayor naikyam+chāyātapayos -> bhavanirvāṇayor naikyaṃ chāyātapayos

bhavanirvāṇayor naikyaṃ chāyātapayos+yathā| -> bhavanirvāṇayor naikyaṃ chāyātapayor yathā|

sthitas+parasparavirodhāt| -> sthitaḥ parasparavirodhāt|

sthitas+bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhitatvāt -> sthito bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhitatvāt

sthito bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhitatvāt+na -> sthito bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhitatvān na

sthito bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhitatvān na+ubhaye -> sthito bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhitatvān nobhaye

viśuddhas+vajrayogas -> viśuddho vajrayogas

viśuddho vajrayogas+ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhas -> viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhas

viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhas+san -> viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san

viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san+mahārthas -> viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san mahārthas

viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san mahārthas+paramākṣaras -> viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras

viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras+sahajānandas -> viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san mahārthaḥ paramākṣaraḥ sahajānandas

viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san mahārthaḥ paramākṣaraḥ sahajānandas+na -> viśuddho vajrayoga ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaḥ san mahārthaḥ paramākṣaraḥ sahajānando na

vajrayogas+tathāgatena -> vajrayogas tathāgatena

paramāṇudharmatātītaḥ śūnyadharmavivarjitas+| -> paramāṇudharmatātītaḥ śūnyadharmavivarjitaḥ|

tathāgatavacanam+niranvayatvāt| -> tathāgatavacanaṃ niranvayatvāt|

paramārthasatyatas+ubhayacittayos -> paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayos

paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayos+vaidharmyāt -> paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyāt

paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyāt+astināstivyatikrāntas -> paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyād astināstivyatikrāntas

paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyād astināstivyatikrāntas+bhāvābhāvakṣayas -> paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyād astināstivyatikrānto bhāvābhāvakṣayas

paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyād astināstivyatikrānto bhāvābhāvakṣayas+vajrayogas -> paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyād astināstivyatikrānto bhāvābhāvakṣayo vajrayogas

paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyād astināstivyatikrānto bhāvābhāvakṣayo vajrayogas+advayas -> paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyād astināstivyatikrānto bhāvābhāvakṣayo vajrayogo 'dvayas

paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyād astināstivyatikrānto bhāvābhāvakṣayo vajrayogo 'dvayas+iti -> paramārthasatyata ubhayacittayor vaidharmyād astināstivyatikrānto bhāvābhāvakṣayo vajrayogo 'dvaya iti

tat+cittam -> tac cittam

tac cittam+yat -> tac cittaṃ yat

tac cittaṃ yat+cittam -> tac cittaṃ yac cittam

tac cittaṃ yac cittam+acittam -> tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittam

tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittam+śāśvatocchedadharmalakṣaṇāpagatam -> tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittaṃ śāśvatocchedadharmalakṣaṇāpagatam

tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittaṃ śāśvatocchedadharmalakṣaṇāpagatam+śūnyatākaruṇābhinnam -> tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittaṃ śāśvatocchedadharmalakṣaṇāpagataṃ śūnyatākaruṇābhinnam

tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittaṃ śāśvatocchedadharmalakṣaṇāpagataṃ śūnyatākaruṇābhinnam+iti| -> tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittaṃ śāśvatocchedadharmalakṣaṇāpagataṃ śūnyatākaruṇābhinnam iti|

lokopamām+atikrāntatvāt -> lokopamām atikrāntatvāt

lokopamām atikrāntatvāt+asti -> lokopamām atikrāntatvād asti

atas+saṃvṛtis -> ataḥ saṃvṛtis

ataḥ saṃvṛtis+śūnyatārūpiṇī -> ataḥ saṃvṛtiḥ śūnyatārūpiṇī

rūpalakṣaṇam+paramāṇos -> rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇos

rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇos+abhāvāt -> rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇor abhāvāt

rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇor abhāvāt+na -> rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇor abhāvān na

rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇor abhāvān na+arūpalakṣaṇam -> rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇor abhāvān nārūpalakṣaṇam

rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇor abhāvān nārūpalakṣaṇam+śūnye -> rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇor abhāvān nārūpalakṣaṇaṃ śūnye

punas+śūnyatākaruṇātmakasya -> punaḥ śūnyatākaruṇātmakasya

virodhāt+iti|| -> virodhād iti||

sallakṣaṇam+na -> sallakṣaṇaṃ na

yena+asallakṣaṇam -> yenāsallakṣaṇam

yenāsallakṣaṇam+cittam -> yenāsallakṣaṇaṃ cittam

yenāsallakṣaṇaṃ cittam+bhavati -> yenāsallakṣaṇaṃ cittaṃ bhavati

tena+asallakṣaṇam -> tenāsallakṣaṇam

tenāsallakṣaṇam+na -> tenāsallakṣaṇaṃ na

yena+asallakṣaṇam -> yenāsallakṣaṇam

yenāsallakṣaṇam+cittam -> yenāsallakṣaṇaṃ cittam

yenāsallakṣaṇaṃ cittam+bhavati -> yenāsallakṣaṇaṃ cittaṃ bhavati

tena+asallakṣaṇam -> tenāsallakṣaṇam

tenāsallakṣaṇam+cittam -> tenāsallakṣaṇaṃ cittam

tenāsallakṣaṇaṃ cittam+na -> tenāsallakṣaṇaṃ cittaṃ na

sallakṣaṇam+cittam -> sallakṣaṇaṃ cittam

sallakṣaṇaṃ cittam+bhavati -> sallakṣaṇaṃ cittaṃ bhavati

bhāvābhāvasvarūpatas+| -> bhāvābhāvasvarūpataḥ|

yat+asat -> yad asat

yad asat+tat -> yad asat tat

yad asat tat+sat -> yad asat tat sat

yad asat tat sat+na -> yad asat tat san na

yat+yat -> yad yat

yad yat+tat -> yad yat tat

yad yat tat+asat -> yad yat tad asat

yad yat tad asat+na -> yad yat tad asan na

lokottaradṛṣṭāntas+anayos -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayos

lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayos+ghaṭakhapuṣpayos -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayos

lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayos+ekatvavaidharmyāt -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyāt

lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyāt+bhavati -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavati

lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavati+anayos -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayos

lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayos+ghaṭakhapuṣpayos -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayos
