lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayos+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor lokasaṃvṛtyā

lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor lokasaṃvṛtyā+ekatvam -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor lokasaṃvṛtyaikatvam

lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor lokasaṃvṛtyaikatvam+na -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor lokasaṃvṛtyaikatvaṃ na

lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor lokasaṃvṛtyaikatvaṃ na+asti -> lokottaradṛṣṭānto 'nayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor ekatvavaidharmyād bhavaty anayor ghaṭakhapuṣpayor lokasaṃvṛtyaikatvaṃ nāsti

nirvāṇam+abhāvalakṣaṇam -> nirvāṇam abhāvalakṣaṇam

nirvāṇam abhāvalakṣaṇam+iti| -> nirvāṇam abhāvalakṣaṇam iti|

sarvābhāvatas+| -> sarvābhāvataḥ|

sarvabhāvatas+bhavavaidharmyāt -> sarvabhāvato bhavavaidharmyāt

sarvabhāvato bhavavaidharmyāt+ucchedas -> sarvabhāvato bhavavaidharmyād ucchedas

sarvabhāvato bhavavaidharmyād ucchedas+na -> sarvabhāvato bhavavaidharmyād ucchedo na

sarvabhāvato bhavavaidharmyād ucchedo na+asti -> sarvabhāvato bhavavaidharmyād ucchedo nāsti

evam+ucchedavaidharmyāt -> evam ucchedavaidharmyāt

evam ucchedavaidharmyāt+bhavas -> evam ucchedavaidharmyād bhavas

evam ucchedavaidharmyād bhavas+asti -> evam ucchedavaidharmyād bhavo 'sti

iti+anayos -> ity anayos

ity anayos+parasparavaidharmyāt -> ity anayoḥ parasparavaidharmyāt

ity anayoḥ parasparavaidharmyāt+dṛṣṭāntas -> ity anayoḥ parasparavaidharmyād dṛṣṭāntas

ity anayoḥ parasparavaidharmyād dṛṣṭāntas+bhavati| -> ity anayoḥ parasparavaidharmyād dṛṣṭānto bhavati|

sarvabhāvatas+| -> sarvabhāvataḥ|

evam+khapuṣpavaidharmyāt -> evaṃ khapuṣpavaidharmyāt

evaṃ khapuṣpavaidharmyāt+ghaṭas -> evaṃ khapuṣpavaidharmyād ghaṭas

evaṃ khapuṣpavaidharmyād ghaṭas+asti -> evaṃ khapuṣpavaidharmyād ghaṭo 'sti

sarvābhāvatas+| -> sarvābhāvataḥ|

laukikadṛṣṭāntas+---ghaṭavaidharmyāt -> laukikadṛṣṭāntaḥ---ghaṭavaidharmyāt

laukikadṛṣṭāntaḥ---ghaṭavaidharmyāt+khapuṣpam -> laukikadṛṣṭāntaḥ---ghaṭavaidharmyāt khapuṣpam

laukikadṛṣṭāntaḥ---ghaṭavaidharmyāt khapuṣpam+na -> laukikadṛṣṭāntaḥ---ghaṭavaidharmyāt khapuṣpaṃ na

laukikadṛṣṭāntaḥ---ghaṭavaidharmyāt khapuṣpaṃ na+asti -> laukikadṛṣṭāntaḥ---ghaṭavaidharmyāt khapuṣpaṃ nāsti

yoginām+iti| -> yoginām iti|

bhāvābhāvaikatvavaidharmyāt+dṛṣṭāntas -> bhāvābhāvaikatvavaidharmyād dṛṣṭāntas

bhāvābhāvaikatvavaidharmyād dṛṣṭāntas+bhavati -> bhāvābhāvaikatvavaidharmyād dṛṣṭānto bhavati

kumārikāyās+ādarśapratisenāvat -> kumārikāyā ādarśapratisenāvat

kumārikāyā ādarśapratisenāvat+svacittākalpitasya -> kumārikāyā ādarśapratisenāvat svacittākalpitasya

lokopamām+atikrāntasya -> lokopamām atikrāntasya

lokopamām atikrāntasya+astināstibuddhiparityaktasya -> lokopamām atikrāntasyāstināstibuddhiparityaktasya

iha+asya -> ihāsya

nītārthas+| -> nītārthaḥ|

sahajasamarasatvam+iti -> sahajasamarasatvam iti

sahajānandas+sahajakāyas -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāyas

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāyas+iti -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya iti

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya iti+uktas -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity uktas

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity uktas+grāhyagrāhakavarjitas -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjitas

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjitas+vijñānadharmatātītas -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātītas

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātītas+bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhitas -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhitas

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhitas+buddhānām -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānām

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānām+samājas -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānāṃ samājas

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānāṃ samājas+devīnām -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānāṃ samājo devīnām

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānāṃ samājo devīnām+saṃvaras -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānāṃ samājo devīnāṃ saṃvaras

sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānāṃ samājo devīnāṃ saṃvaras+ca| -> sahajānandaḥ sahajakāya ity ukto grāhyagrāhakavarjito vijñānadharmatātīto bhavanirvāṇāpratiṣṭhito buddhānāṃ samājo devīnāṃ saṃvaraś ca|

bhagavān+mantranaye -> bhagavān mantranaye

sas+eva -> sa eva

dharmakāyas+sakāritras -> dharmakāyaḥ sakāritras

dharmakāyaḥ sakāritras+caturthas -> dharmakāyaḥ sakāritraś caturthas

dharmakāyaḥ sakāritraś caturthas+samudīritas -> dharmakāyaḥ sakāritraś caturthaḥ samudīritas

dharmakāyaḥ sakāritraś caturthaḥ samudīritas+|| -> dharmakāyaḥ sakāritraś caturthaḥ samudīritaḥ||

svābhāvikas+susambhogas -> svābhāvikaḥ susambhogas

svābhāvikaḥ susambhogas+nairmāṇikas -> svābhāvikaḥ susambhogo nairmāṇikas

svābhāvikaḥ susambhogo nairmāṇikas+aparas -> svābhāvikaḥ susambhogo nairmāṇiko 'paras

svābhāvikaḥ susambhogo nairmāṇiko 'paras+tathā| -> svābhāvikaḥ susambhogo nairmāṇiko 'paras tathā|

maitreyas+āha--- -> maitreya āha---

tathā+abhisamayālaṃkārakārikāyām -> tathābhisamayālaṃkārakārikāyām

tathābhisamayālaṃkārakārikāyām+catuḥkāritranirṇaye -> tathābhisamayālaṃkārakārikāyāṃ catuḥkāritranirṇaye

prajñāpāramitāyās+svābhāvikakāyas -> prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svābhāvikakāyas

prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svābhāvikakāyas+iti -> prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svābhāvikakāya iti

prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svābhāvikakāya iti+uktas -> prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svābhāvikakāya ity uktas

prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svābhāvikakāya ity uktas+| -> prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svābhāvikakāya ity uktaḥ|

bhagavān+pāramitānaye -> bhagavan pāramitānaye

sas+eva -> sa eva

prasiddhas+iti| -> prasiddha iti|

anayos+cittayos -> anayoś cittayos

anayoś cittayos+ekatvam -> anayoś cittayor ekatvam

anayoś cittayor ekatvam+prajñopāyātmakas -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmakas

anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmakas+vajrayogas -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogas

anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogas+mahārthas -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthas

anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthas+paramākṣaras -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras

anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaras+ādibuddhas -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddhas

anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddhas+niranvayas -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddho niranvayas

anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddho niranvayas+kālacakras -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakras

anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakras+bhagavān -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān

anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān+vajrasattvas -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān vajrasattvas

anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān vajrasattvas+sarvatantrāntare -> anayoś cittayor ekatvaṃ prajñopāyātmako vajrayogo mahārthaḥ paramākṣara ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān vajrasattvaḥ sarvatantrāntare

iṣṭārthaphaladas+phalam -> iṣṭārthaphaladaḥ phalam

iṣṭārthaphaladaḥ phalam+akṣarasukham -> iṣṭārthaphaladaḥ phalam akṣarasukham

iṣṭārthaphaladaḥ phalam akṣarasukham+jñānacittam| -> iṣṭārthaphaladaḥ phalam akṣarasukhaṃ jñānacittam|

pratisenāvat+iti| -> pratisenāvad iti|

kumārikāyās+ādarśādau -> kumārikāyā ādarśādau

svacittaparikalpanādharmarahitas+pratyakṣas -> svacittaparikalpanādharmarahitaḥ pratyakṣas

svacittaparikalpanādharmarahitaḥ pratyakṣas+svacittapratibhāsas -> svacittaparikalpanādharmarahitaḥ pratyakṣaḥ svacittapratibhāsas

svacittaparikalpanādharmarahitaḥ pratyakṣaḥ svacittapratibhāsas+yoginām -> svacittaparikalpanādharmarahitaḥ pratyakṣaḥ svacittapratibhāso yoginām

svacittaparikalpanādharmarahitaḥ pratyakṣaḥ svacittapratibhāso yoginām+gagane -> svacittaparikalpanādharmarahitaḥ pratyakṣaḥ svacittapratibhāso yogināṃ gagane

deśitas+sa -> deśitaḥ sa

yas+paramārthasatyena -> yaḥ paramārthasatyena

svacittaparikalpanādharmas+laukikasiddhiphaladāyakas -> svacittaparikalpanādharmo laukikasiddhiphaladāyakas

svacittaparikalpanādharmo laukikasiddhiphaladāyakas+iti| -> svacittaparikalpanādharmo laukikasiddhiphaladāyaka iti|

bāhye+adhyātmani -> bāhye 'dhyātmani

deśitas+sa -> deśitaḥ sa

anayos+yas -> anayor yas

anayor yas+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> anayor yo lokasaṃvṛtyā

varṇabhujacihnasaṃsthānarahitas+| -> varṇabhujacihnasaṃsthānarahitaḥ|

varṇabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇas+yas -> varṇabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇo yas

varṇabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇo yas+paramārthatas -> varṇabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇo yaḥ paramārthatas

varṇabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇo yaḥ paramārthatas+sa -> varṇabhujacihnasaṃsthānalakṣaṇo yaḥ paramārthataḥ sa

yas+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> yo lokasaṃvṛtyā

dvitīyas+paramārthatas -> dvitīyaḥ paramārthatas

dvitīyaḥ paramārthatas+| -> dvitīyaḥ paramārthataḥ|

evam+sarvatantrāntareṣu -> evaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣu

evaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣu+abhidheyas -> evaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣv abhidheyas

evaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣv abhidheyas+dvidhā---ekas -> evaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣv abhidheyo dvidhā---ekas

evaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣv abhidheyo dvidhā---ekas+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> evaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣv abhidheyo dvidhā---eko lokasaṃvṛtyā

śiṣyais+|| -> śiṣyaiḥ||

gurūpadeśatas+avagantavyau -> gurūpadeśato 'vagantavyau

dvau+arthau -> dvāv arthau

nītārthas+| -> nītārthaḥ|

neyārthas+yas -> neyārtho yas

neyārtho yas+paramārthatas -> neyārtho yaḥ paramārthatas

neyārtho yaḥ paramārthatas+sa -> neyārtho yaḥ paramārthataḥ sa

nirdiṣṭas+sa -> nirdiṣṭaḥ sa

yas+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> yo lokasaṃvṛtyā

dvitīyas+paramārthatas -> dvitīyaḥ paramārthatas

dvitīyaḥ paramārthatas+iti| -> dvitīyaḥ paramārthata iti|

tantratantrāntareṣu+arthas -> tantratantrāntareṣv arthas

tantratantrāntareṣv arthas+nirdiṣṭas -> tantratantrāntareṣv artho nirdiṣṭas

tantratantrāntareṣv artho nirdiṣṭas+ekas -> tantratantrāntareṣv artho nirdiṣṭa ekas

tantratantrāntareṣv artho nirdiṣṭa ekas+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> tantratantrāntareṣv artho nirdiṣṭa eko lokasaṃvṛtyā

laukikalokottarasatyam+āśritya -> laukikalokottarasatyam āśritya

idānīm+vajrayogasaṃgrahas -> idānīṃ vajrayogasaṃgrahas

idānīṃ vajrayogasaṃgrahas+ucyate---yogam -> idānīṃ vajrayogasaṃgraha ucyate---yogam

idānīṃ vajrayogasaṃgraha ucyate---yogam+śrīkālacakre -> idānīṃ vajrayogasaṃgraha ucyate---yogaṃ śrīkālacakre

idānīṃ vajrayogasaṃgraha ucyate---yogaṃ śrīkālacakre+ityādi| -> idānīṃ vajrayogasaṃgraha ucyate---yogaṃ śrīkālacakra ityādi|

tantrarājadeśakādhyeṣakasādhanoddeśas+caturthas -> tantrarājadeśakādhyeṣakasādhanoddeśaś caturthas

tantrarājadeśakādhyeṣakasādhanoddeśaś caturthas+|| -> tantrarājadeśakādhyeṣakasādhanoddeśaś caturthaḥ||

vimalaprabhāyām+sarvajña -> vimalaprabhāyāṃ sarvajña

vimalaprabhāyāṃ sarvajña+ityādinā -> vimalaprabhāyāṃ sarvajñetyādinā

mūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

prasiddhas+|| -> prasiddhaḥ||

sucandras+vajrapāṇis -> sucandro vajrapāṇis

sucandro vajrapāṇis+daśabhūmīśvaras -> sucandro vajrapāṇir daśabhūmīśvaras

sucandro vajrapāṇir daśabhūmīśvaras+adhyeṣakas -> sucandro vajrapāṇir daśabhūmīśvaro 'dhyeṣakas

sucandro vajrapāṇir daśabhūmīśvaro 'dhyeṣakas+saṃgītikārakas -> sucandro vajrapāṇir daśabhūmīśvaro 'dhyeṣakaḥ saṃgītikārakas

sucandro vajrapāṇir daśabhūmīśvaro 'dhyeṣakaḥ saṃgītikārakas+ca -> sucandro vajrapāṇir daśabhūmīśvaro 'dhyeṣakaḥ saṃgītikārakaś ca

atas+sarvajñas -> ataḥ sarvajñas

ataḥ sarvajñas+buddhas -> ataḥ sarvajño buddhas

ataḥ sarvajño buddhas+bhagavān -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān+sarvasattvakāruṇikas -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavan sarvasattvakāruṇikas

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavan sarvasattvakāruṇikas+sarvajñas -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavan sarvasattvakāruṇikaḥ sarvajñas

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavan sarvasattvakāruṇikaḥ sarvajñas+sarvarutais -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavan sarvasattvakāruṇikaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvarutais

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavan sarvasattvakāruṇikaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvarutais+dharmadeśakas -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavan sarvasattvakāruṇikaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvarutair dharmadeśakas

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavan sarvasattvakāruṇikaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvarutair dharmadeśakas+tathā -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavan sarvasattvakāruṇikaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvarutair dharmadeśakas tathā

uktas+svārthaparais -> uktaḥ svārthaparais

uktaḥ svārthaparais+viprais -> uktaḥ svārthaparair viprais

uktaḥ svārthaparair viprais+pareṣām -> uktaḥ svārthaparair vipraiḥ pareṣām

uktaḥ svārthaparair vipraiḥ pareṣām+tatra -> uktaḥ svārthaparair vipraiḥ pareṣāṃ tatra

dharmas+yāgādihetukas -> dharmo yāgādihetukas

dharmo yāgādihetukas+| -> dharmo yāgādihetukaḥ|

pitṛmātṛvadhas+yatra -> pitṛmātṛvadho yatra

kutas+tasyās -> kutas tasyās

kutas tasyās+pare -> kutas tasyāḥ pare

dayā+apatye -> dayāpatye

yasyās+na -> yasyā na

yasyā na+asti -> yasyā nāsti

mātā+api -> mātāpi

sattvahiṃsakās+(?)|| -> sattvahiṃsakāḥ(?)||

vidvadbhis+deśitā -> vidvadbhir deśitā

me+apriyā -> me 'priyā

sattvopakāriṇas+dharmās -> sattvopakāriṇo dharmās

sattvopakāriṇo dharmās+deśitās -> sattvopakāriṇo dharmā deśitās

sattvopakāriṇo dharmā deśitās+prākṛtais -> sattvopakāriṇo dharmā deśitāḥ prākṛtais

sattvopakāriṇo dharmā deśitāḥ prākṛtais+api| -> sattvopakāriṇo dharmā deśitāḥ prākṛtair api|

jaḍā+aśubhakarmajā|| -> jaḍāśubhakarmajā||

bhaktis+sā -> bhaktiḥ sā

aguṇeṣu+api -> aguṇeṣv api

na+īśvarādiṣu| -> neśvarādiṣu|

sādhūnām+na -> sādhūnāṃ na

bhaktis+guṇeṣu -> bhaktir guṇeṣu

sas+api -> so 'pi

so 'pi+asmākam -> so 'py asmākam

so 'py asmākam+vandanīyas -> so 'py asmākaṃ vandanīyas

so 'py asmākaṃ vandanīyas+pūjanīyas -> so 'py asmākaṃ vandanīyaḥ pūjanīyas

so 'py asmākaṃ vandanīyaḥ pūjanīyas+mānanīyas -> so 'py asmākaṃ vandanīyaḥ pūjanīyo mānanīyas

so 'py asmākaṃ vandanīyaḥ pūjanīyo mānanīyas+iti -> so 'py asmākaṃ vandanīyaḥ pūjanīyo mānanīya iti

hariharādīnām+madhye -> hariharādīnāṃ madhye

hariharādīnāṃ madhye+ebhis -> hariharādīnāṃ madhya ebhis

hariharādīnāṃ madhya ebhis+guṇais -> hariharādīnāṃ madhya ebhir guṇais

hariharādīnāṃ madhya ebhir guṇais+paripūrṇas -> hariharādīnāṃ madhya ebhir guṇaiḥ paripūrṇas

hariharādīnāṃ madhya ebhir guṇaiḥ paripūrṇas+kaścit -> hariharādīnāṃ madhya ebhir guṇaiḥ paripūrṇaḥ kaścit

hariharādīnāṃ madhya ebhir guṇaiḥ paripūrṇaḥ kaścit+asti -> hariharādīnāṃ madhya ebhir guṇaiḥ paripūrṇaḥ kaścid asti

dharmadeśakas+na -> dharmadeśako na

dharmadeśako na+anyas -> dharmadeśako nānyas

dharmadeśako nānyas+hariharādi -> dharmadeśako nānyo hariharādi

dharmadeśako nānyo hariharādi+iti| -> dharmadeśako nānyo hariharādīti|

vicāryamāṇas+buddhas -> vicāryamāṇo buddhas

vicāryamāṇo buddhas+bhagavān -> vicāryamāṇo buddho bhagavān

vicāryamāṇo buddho bhagavān+sarvajñas -> vicāryamāṇo buddho bhagavan sarvajñas

vicāryamāṇo buddho bhagavan sarvajñas+sarvajñabhāṣayā -> vicāryamāṇo buddho bhagavan sarvajñaḥ sarvajñabhāṣayā

nānāsaṃgītikārakais+nānāviṣayabhāṣayā -> nānāsaṃgītikārakair nānāviṣayabhāṣayā

śrāvakais+śrāvakayānam -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānam

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānam+pratyekais -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekais

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekais+pratyekayānam -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānam

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānam+bodhisattvais -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvais

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvais+pāramitāmahāyānam -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānam

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānam+mantramahāyānam -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānam

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānam+hetuphalātmakam -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānaṃ hetuphalātmakam

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānaṃ hetuphalātmakam+nānāsaṃgītikārakais -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānaṃ hetuphalātmakaṃ nānāsaṃgītikārakais

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānaṃ hetuphalātmakaṃ nānāsaṃgītikārakais+sattvānām -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānaṃ hetuphalātmakaṃ nānāsaṃgītikārakaiḥ sattvānām

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānaṃ hetuphalātmakaṃ nānāsaṃgītikārakaiḥ sattvānām+vaineyārtham -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānaṃ hetuphalātmakaṃ nānāsaṃgītikārakaiḥ sattvānāṃ vaineyārtham

śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānaṃ hetuphalātmakaṃ nānāsaṃgītikārakaiḥ sattvānāṃ vaineyārtham+iti| -> śrāvakaiḥ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekaiḥ pratyekayānaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ pāramitāmahāyānaṃ mantramahāyānaṃ hetuphalātmakaṃ nānāsaṃgītikārakaiḥ sattvānāṃ vaineyārtham iti|

nānāsattvarutais+saṃgītikārakais -> nānāsattvarutaiḥ saṃgītikārakais

nānāsattvarutaiḥ saṃgītikārakais+yānatrayam -> nānāsattvarutaiḥ saṃgītikārakair yānatrayam

nānāsattvarutaiḥ saṃgītikārakair yānatrayam+likhitam -> nānāsattvarutaiḥ saṃgītikārakair yānatrayaṃ likhitam

nānāsattvarutaiḥ saṃgītikārakair yānatrayaṃ likhitam+iti| -> nānāsattvarutaiḥ saṃgītikārakair yānatrayaṃ likhitam iti|

evam+dvādaśakhaṇḍeṣu -> evaṃ dvādaśakhaṇḍeṣu

evam+koṭikoṭigrāmātmakeṣu -> evaṃ koṭikoṭigrāmātmakeṣu

likhitam+cīne -> likhitaṃ cīne

yānatrayam+bhoṭabhāṣayā -> yānatrayaṃ bhoṭabhāṣayā

prākṛtabhāṣayā+apabhraṃśabhāṣayā -> prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayā

prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayā+asaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayā -> prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayā

prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayā+iti -> prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayeti

prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayeti+evamādis -> prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādis

prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādis+sarvajñadeśitas -> prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādiḥ sarvajñadeśitas

prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādiḥ sarvajñadeśitas+dharmas -> prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādiḥ sarvajñadeśito dharmas

prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādiḥ sarvajñadeśito dharmas+saṃgītikārakais -> prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādiḥ sarvajñadeśito dharmaḥ saṃgītikārakais

prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādiḥ sarvajñadeśito dharmaḥ saṃgītikārakais+likhitas -> prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādiḥ sarvajñadeśito dharmaḥ saṃgītikārakair likhitas

prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādiḥ sarvajñadeśito dharmaḥ saṃgītikārakair likhitas+| -> prākṛtabhāṣayāpabhraṃśabhāṣayāsaṃskṛtaśabarādimlecchabhāṣayety evamādiḥ sarvajñadeśito dharmaḥ saṃgītikārakair likhitaḥ|

pāramitānayam+mantranayam -> pāramitānayaṃ mantranayam

pāramitānayaṃ mantranayam+tantratantrāntaram -> pāramitānayaṃ mantranayaṃ tantratantrāntaram

pāramitānayaṃ mantranayaṃ tantratantrāntaram+saṃskṛtabhāṣayā -> pāramitānayaṃ mantranayaṃ tantratantrāntaraṃ saṃskṛtabhāṣayā

sūtrāntam+saṃskṛtabhāṣayā -> sūtrāntaṃ saṃskṛtabhāṣayā

piṭakatrayam+magadhabhāṣayā -> piṭakatrayaṃ magadhabhāṣayā

likhitam+tathāgataniyamena -> likhitaṃ tathāgataniyamena

saṃgītikārakais+yānatrayam -> saṃgītikārakair yānatrayam

saṃgītikārakair yānatrayam+pustake -> saṃgītikārakair yānatrayaṃ pustake

tathāgatābhisambuddhe+āryaviṣaye -> tathāgatābhisambuddha āryaviṣaye

tāvat+anyaviṣayāntaram| -> tāvad anyaviṣayāntaram|

na+antardhānam -> nāntardhānam

nāntardhānam+gatās -> nāntardhānaṃ gatās

nāntardhānaṃ gatās+|| -> nāntardhānaṃ gatāḥ||

vihitās+pratiṣedhitās -> vihitāḥ pratiṣedhitās

vihitāḥ pratiṣedhitās+tathāgatena -> vihitāḥ pratiṣedhitās tathāgatena

vihitāḥ pratiṣedhitās tathāgatena+iti -> vihitāḥ pratiṣedhitās tathāgateneti

vihitāḥ pratiṣedhitās tathāgateneti+adya -> vihitāḥ pratiṣedhitās tathāgatenety adya

vihitāḥ pratiṣedhitās tathāgatenety adya+api -> vihitāḥ pratiṣedhitās tathāgatenety adyāpi

kasyacit+jātyajātivaśāt -> kasyacij jātyajātivaśāt

kasyacij jātyajātivaśāt+te -> kasyacij jātyajātivaśāt te

sarvajñadeśitās+dharmās -> sarvajñadeśitā dharmās

sarvajñadeśitā dharmās+paropakāriṇas -> sarvajñadeśitā dharmāḥ paropakāriṇas

sarvajñadeśitā dharmāḥ paropakāriṇas+adhimuktivaśāt -> sarvajñadeśitā dharmāḥ paropakāriṇo 'dhimuktivaśāt

sarvajñadeśitā dharmāḥ paropakāriṇo 'dhimuktivaśāt+paropakārāya -> sarvajñadeśitā dharmāḥ paropakāriṇo 'dhimuktivaśāt paropakārāya

evam+te -> evaṃ te

tebhyas+pañcāṅgapraṇāmam -> tebhyaḥ pañcāṅgapraṇāmam

tebhyaḥ pañcāṅgapraṇāmam+kurvanti| -> tebhyaḥ pañcāṅgapraṇāmaṃ kurvanti|

nānāpuṣpais+nānāgandhais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhais+nānādhūpais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpais+nānācūrṇais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇais+nānāvastrais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrais+nānāghaṇṭābhis -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhis

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhis+nānāpatākābhis -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhis

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhis+nānācāmarais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarais+nānāchatrais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrais+nānāvitānais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānais+nānāmuktāhārais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānair nānāmuktāhārais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānair nānāmuktāhārais+nānāratnais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānair nānāmuktāhārair nānāratnais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānair nānāmuktāhārair nānāratnais+nānāpradīpais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānair nānāmuktāhārair nānāratnair nānāpradīpais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānair nānāmuktāhārair nānāratnair nānāpradīpais+nānāratnābharaṇais -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānair nānāmuktāhārair nānāratnair nānāpradīpair nānāratnābharaṇais

nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānair nānāmuktāhārair nānāratnair nānāpradīpair nānāratnābharaṇais+pūjayitvā -> nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānācūrṇair nānāvastrair nānāghaṇṭābhir nānāpatākābhir nānācāmarair nānāchatrair nānāvitānair nānāmuktāhārair nānāratnair nānāpradīpair nānāratnābharaṇaiḥ pūjayitvā

parebhyas+ca -> parebhyaś ca

tadadhimuktikās+sattvās -> tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās

tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās+tān -> tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās tān

tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās tān+sarvajñadeśitān -> tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās tan sarvajñadeśitān

tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās tan sarvajñadeśitān+caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhān -> tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās tan sarvajñadeśitāṃś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhān

tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās tan sarvajñadeśitāṃś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhān+laukikalokottarārthapratipādakān -> tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās tan sarvajñadeśitāṃś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhāṃ laukikalokottarārthapratipādakān

tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās tan sarvajñadeśitāṃś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhāṃ laukikalokottarārthapratipādakān+śṛṇvanti -> tadadhimuktikāḥ sattvās tan sarvajñadeśitāṃś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhāṃ laukikalokottarārthapratipādakāñ chṛṇvanti

deśitās+sarvasattvānām -> deśitāḥ sarvasattvānām

deśitāḥ sarvasattvānām+śravaṇāya -> deśitāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śravaṇāya

deśitāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śravaṇāya+adhyayanāya -> deśitāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śravaṇāyādhyayanāya

likhitās+vedādilaukikārthapratipādikās -> likhitā vedādilaukikārthapratipādikās

likhitā vedādilaukikārthapratipādikās+yānatrayārthapratipādakās -> likhitā vedādilaukikārthapratipādikā yānatrayārthapratipādakās

likhitā vedādilaukikārthapratipādikā yānatrayārthapratipādakās+lokasaṃvṛtisatyena -> likhitā vedādilaukikārthapratipādikā yānatrayārthapratipādakā lokasaṃvṛtisatyena

saṃgītikārakais+pustake -> saṃgītikārakaiḥ pustake

deśitās+dharmās -> deśitā dharmās

deśitā dharmās+nānāsattvabhāṣāntareṇa -> deśitā dharmā nānāsattvabhāṣāntareṇa

jātivādābhimāninī+iti|| -> jātivādābhimāninīti||

bauddhais+na -> bauddhair na

bauddhair na+anumodanīyā -> bauddhair nānumodanīyā

hariharādīnām+dharmadeśanā -> hariharādīnāṃ dharmadeśanā

likhitās+prajñāhīnatvāt -> likhitāḥ prajñāhīnatvāt

likhitāḥ prajñāhīnatvāt+yatibhis -> likhitāḥ prajñāhīnatvād yatibhis

likhitāḥ prajñāhīnatvād yatibhis+iti| -> likhitāḥ prajñāhīnatvād yatibhir iti|

tatas+pañcakaṣāyakālavaśāt -> tataḥ pañcakaṣāyakālavaśāt

tataḥ pañcakaṣāyakālavaśāt+pustake -> tataḥ pañcakaṣāyakālavaśāt pustake

yatīnām+mukhe -> yatīnāṃ mukhe

likhitās+santi -> likhitāḥ santi

vedagītādisiddhāntapurāṇadharmās+na -> vedagītādisiddhāntapurāṇadharmā na

niyamas+kṛtas -> niyamaḥ kṛtas

niyamaḥ kṛtas+bālajanānām -> niyamaḥ kṛto bālajanānām

niyamaḥ kṛto bālajanānām+mahāmohajanakas -> niyamaḥ kṛto bālajanānāṃ mahāmohajanakas

niyamaḥ kṛto bālajanānāṃ mahāmohajanakas+iti -> niyamaḥ kṛto bālajanānāṃ mahāmohajanaka iti

niyamaḥ kṛto bālajanānāṃ mahāmohajanaka iti+asarvajñadeśanābhiprāyas -> niyamaḥ kṛto bālajanānāṃ mahāmohajanaka ity asarvajñadeśanābhiprāyas

niyamaḥ kṛto bālajanānāṃ mahāmohajanaka ity asarvajñadeśanābhiprāyas+| -> niyamaḥ kṛto bālajanānāṃ mahāmohajanaka ity asarvajñadeśanābhiprāyaḥ|

mukhapāṭhena+adhyayanīyās -> mukhapāṭhenādhyayanīyās

mukhapāṭhenādhyayanīyās+iti -> mukhapāṭhenādhyayanīyā iti

likhitās+vedās -> likhitā vedās

likhitā vedās+ca -> likhitā vedāś ca

gītāsiddhāntapurāṇādayas+dharmās -> gītāsiddhāntapurāṇādayo dharmās

gītāsiddhāntapurāṇādayo dharmās+pustake -> gītāsiddhāntapurāṇādayo dharmāḥ pustake

duṣṭaṛṣibhis+dravyalubdhais -> duṣṭaṛṣibhir dravyalubdhais

duṣṭaṛṣibhir dravyalubdhais+saṃskṛtabhāṣayā -> duṣṭaṛṣibhir dravyalubdhaiḥ saṃskṛtabhāṣayā

vidyādharmajñānasādhāraṇaparijñānāt+sarveṣām -> vidyādharmajñānasādhāraṇaparijñānāt sarveṣām

vidyādharmajñānasādhāraṇaparijñānāt sarveṣām+gṛhavāsinām -> vidyādharmajñānasādhāraṇaparijñānāt sarveṣāṃ gṛhavāsinām

vidyādharmajñānasādhāraṇaparijñānāt sarveṣāṃ gṛhavāsinām+saṃsārabhogāsaktānām -> vidyādharmajñānasādhāraṇaparijñānāt sarveṣāṃ gṛhavāsināṃ saṃsārabhogāsaktānām

vidyādharmajñānasādhāraṇaparijñānāt sarveṣāṃ gṛhavāsināṃ saṃsārabhogāsaktānām+viśeṣaguṇābhāvāt| -> vidyādharmajñānasādhāraṇaparijñānāt sarveṣāṃ gṛhavāsināṃ saṃsārabhogāsaktānāṃ viśeṣaguṇābhāvāt|

brāhmaṇānām+kas -> brāhmaṇānāṃ kas

brāhmaṇānāṃ kas+gauravam -> brāhmaṇānāṃ ko gauravam

brāhmaṇānāṃ ko gauravam+kariṣyati -> brāhmaṇānāṃ ko gauravaṃ kariṣyati

śūdrādayas+tadā -> śūdrādayas tadā

manuṣyās+vedagītāsiddhāntatarkaśāstravidas -> manuṣyā vedagītāsiddhāntatarkaśāstravidas

manuṣyā vedagītāsiddhāntatarkaśāstravidas+bhavanti -> manuṣyā vedagītāsiddhāntatarkaśāstravido bhavanti

mithyāhaṃkārābhibhūtānām+abhiprāyas -> mithyāhaṃkārābhibhūtānām abhiprāyas

mithyāhaṃkārābhibhūtānām abhiprāyas+sarvajñabhāṣābhāvāt| -> mithyāhaṃkārābhibhūtānām abhiprāyaḥ sarvajñabhāṣābhāvāt|

ekas+śabdas -> ekaḥ śabdas

ekaḥ śabdas+suprayuktas -> ekaḥ śabdaḥ suprayuktas

ekaḥ śabdaḥ suprayuktas+svarge -> ekaḥ śabdaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge

kartavyam+pravrajyādaṇḍagrahaṇam -> kartavyaṃ pravrajyādaṇḍagrahaṇam

kartavyaṃ pravrajyādaṇḍagrahaṇam+ca -> kartavyaṃ pravrajyādaṇḍagrahaṇaṃ ca

kartavyaṃ pravrajyādaṇḍagrahaṇaṃ ca+iti -> kartavyaṃ pravrajyādaṇḍagrahaṇaṃ ceti

viṭśūdrādibhis+nikṛṣṭayonijātais -> viṭśūdrādibhir nikṛṣṭayonijātais

viṭśūdrādibhir nikṛṣṭayonijātais+vedādhyayanam -> viṭśūdrādibhir nikṛṣṭayonijātair vedādhyayanam

viṭśūdrādibhir nikṛṣṭayonijātair vedādhyayanam+na -> viṭśūdrādibhir nikṛṣṭayonijātair vedādhyayanaṃ na

viṭśūdrādīnām+pratiṣedham -> viṭśūdrādīnāṃ pratiṣedham

viṭśūdrādīnāṃ pratiṣedham+kurvanti| -> viṭśūdrādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaṃ kurvanti|

nānādhimuktikānām+sattvānām -> nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānām

nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānām+nānārutais -> nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutais

nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutais+laukikalokottaradharmadeśanām -> nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutair laukikalokottaradharmadeśanām

nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutair laukikalokottaradharmadeśanām+kartum -> nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutair laukikalokottaradharmadeśanāṃ kartum

nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutair laukikalokottaradharmadeśanāṃ kartum+aśaktās -> nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutair laukikalokottaradharmadeśanāṃ kartum aśaktās

nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutair laukikalokottaradharmadeśanāṃ kartum aśaktās+tena -> nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutair laukikalokottaradharmadeśanāṃ kartum aśaktās tena

bhavanti+iti| -> bhavantīti|

atas+dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt -> ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt

ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt+tais -> ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tais

ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tais+deśitās -> ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tair deśitās

ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tair deśitās+dharmās -> ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tair deśitā dharmās

ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tair deśitā dharmās+prādeśikās -> ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tair deśitā dharmāḥ prādeśikās

ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tair deśitā dharmāḥ prādeśikās+sarvasattvopakāriṇas -> ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tair deśitā dharmāḥ prādeśikāḥ sarvasattvopakāriṇas

ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tair deśitā dharmāḥ prādeśikāḥ sarvasattvopakāriṇas+na -> ato dharmapratiṣedhavacanāt tair deśitā dharmāḥ prādeśikāḥ sarvasattvopakāriṇo na

kaivartādibhis+iti| -> kaivartādibhir iti|

gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmās+brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrais -> gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrais

gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrais+caturvarṇais -> gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdraiś caturvarṇais

gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdraiś caturvarṇais+śrotavyās -> gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdraiś caturvarṇaiḥ śrotavyās

gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdraiś caturvarṇaiḥ śrotavyās+brāhmaṇamukhatas -> gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdraiś caturvarṇaiḥ śrotavyā brāhmaṇamukhatas

gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdraiś caturvarṇaiḥ śrotavyā brāhmaṇamukhatas+pravrajyāgrahaṇam -> gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdraiś caturvarṇaiḥ śrotavyā brāhmaṇamukhataḥ pravrajyāgrahaṇam

gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdraiś caturvarṇaiḥ śrotavyā brāhmaṇamukhataḥ pravrajyāgrahaṇam+ca -> gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdraiś caturvarṇaiḥ śrotavyā brāhmaṇamukhataḥ pravrajyāgrahaṇaṃ ca

viṭśūdrādibhis+iti| -> viṭśūdrādibhir iti|

brāhmaṇakṣatriyābhyām+vedādhyayanam -> brāhmaṇakṣatriyābhyāṃ vedādhyayanam

brāhmaṇakṣatriyābhyāṃ vedādhyayanam+kartavyam -> brāhmaṇakṣatriyābhyāṃ vedādhyayanaṃ kartavyam

brāhmaṇakṣatriyābhyāṃ vedādhyayanaṃ kartavyam+na -> brāhmaṇakṣatriyābhyāṃ vedādhyayanaṃ kartavyaṃ na

kutas+brahmakṣatriyavedādhyayanatas -> kuto brahmakṣatriyavedādhyayanatas

kuto brahmakṣatriyavedādhyayanatas+| -> kuto brahmakṣatriyavedādhyayanataḥ|

prādeśikās+caturvedās -> prādeśikāś caturvedās

prādeśikāś caturvedās+ca| -> prādeśikāś caturvedāś ca|

gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmās+sarve -> gītāsiddhāntapurāṇadharmāḥ sarve

tais+deśitā -> tair deśitā

pratyakṣam+dṛśyate -> pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate

laukikalokottaradharmam+pratipādayanti -> laukikalokottaradharmaṃ pratipādayanti

laukikalokottaradharmaṃ pratipādayanti+iti|| -> laukikalokottaradharmaṃ pratipādayantīti||

nānādhimuktikānām+sattvānām -> nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānām

nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānām+svasvabhāṣāntareṇa -> nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ svasvabhāṣāntareṇa

teṣām+sā -> teṣāṃ sā

sambhūtatvāt+iti -> sambhūtatvād iti

laukikalokottaradharmadeśakas+| -> laukikalokottaradharmadeśakaḥ|

anantānantasattvānām+anantānantarutakais -> anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutakais

anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutakais+yugapat -> anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutakair yugapat

anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutakair yugapat+ca -> anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutakair yugapac ca

na+anyas -> nānyas

nānyas+kaścit -> nānyaḥ kaścit

nānyaḥ kaścit+trisāhasramahāsāhasre -> nānyaḥ kaścit trisāhasramahāsāhasre

sarvajñas+| -> sarvajñaḥ|

buddhas+bhagavān -> buddho bhagavān

buddho bhagavān+śāstā -> buddho bhagavāñ chāstā

atas+hariharādīnām -> ato hariharādīnām

ato hariharādīnām+api -> ato hariharādīnām api

paramakāruṇikas+akāraṇavatsalas -> paramakāruṇiko 'kāraṇavatsalas

paramakāruṇiko 'kāraṇavatsalas+sarvāvaraṇanirmuktas -> paramakāruṇiko 'kāraṇavatsalaḥ sarvāvaraṇanirmuktas

paramakāruṇiko 'kāraṇavatsalaḥ sarvāvaraṇanirmuktas+iti| -> paramakāruṇiko 'kāraṇavatsalaḥ sarvāvaraṇanirmukta iti|

atas+sarvajñas -> ataḥ sarvajñas

ataḥ sarvajñas+buddhas -> ataḥ sarvajño buddhas

ataḥ sarvajño buddhas+bhagavān -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān+laukikalokottaradharmadeśakas -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavāṃ laukikalokottaradharmadeśakas

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavāṃ laukikalokottaradharmadeśakas+devāsuramanuṣyāṇām -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavāṃ laukikalokottaradharmadeśako devāsuramanuṣyāṇām

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavāṃ laukikalokottaradharmadeśako devāsuramanuṣyāṇām+śāstā -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavāṃ laukikalokottaradharmadeśako devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ śāstā

sucandra+adhyeṣitas -> sucandrādhyeṣitas

sucandrādhyeṣitas+tvayā|| -> sucandrādhyeṣitas tvayā||

deśakas+kālacakrasya -> deśakaḥ kālacakrasya

sthitas+| -> sthitaḥ|

buddhas+siṃhāsane -> buddhaḥ siṃhāsane

sarvajñas+vajradhṛk -> sarvajño vajradhṛk

sarvajño vajradhṛk+śāstā -> sarvajño vajradhṛk śāstā

proktas+nānāsattvāśayena -> prokto nānāsattvāśayena

ādheyas+ca -> ādheyaś ca

nānāviṣayasaṃjñābhis+sthānam -> nānāviṣayasaṃjñābhiḥ sthānam

nānāviṣayasaṃjñābhiḥ sthānam+ādhāralakṣaṇam| -> nānāviṣayasaṃjñābhiḥ sthānam ādhāralakṣaṇam|

ādibuddhādināmabhis+|| -> ādibuddhādināmabhiḥ||

herukas+kālacakras -> herukaḥ kālacakras

herukaḥ kālacakras+ca -> herukaḥ kālacakraś ca

vajrabhairavas+īśvaras -> vajrabhairava īśvaras

vajrabhairava īśvaras+| -> vajrabhairava īśvaraḥ|

vajrasattvas+ca -> vajrasattvaś ca

vaṃ+vajrī -> NO RULE FOUND (ṃ+v)

uktas+tantrāntare -> uktas tantrāntare

sthitas+vajrī -> sthito vajrī

dharmodaye+ambuje| -> dharmodaye 'mbuje|

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

siṃhāsanam+khadhātus -> siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātus

siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātus+aparam -> siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparam

siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparam+candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalam -> siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalam

siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalam+siṃhāsanam -> siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanam

siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanam+tasmin -> siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tasmin

siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tasmin+sthitas -> siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthitas

siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthitas+siṃhāsanasthas -> siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthitaḥ siṃhāsanasthas

siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthitaḥ siṃhāsanasthas+iti| -> siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātur aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthitaḥ siṃhāsanastha iti|

tam+buddham -> taṃ buddham

taṃ buddham+siṃhāsanastham| -> taṃ buddhaṃ siṃhāsanastham|

atas+bhagavatas -> ato bhagavatas

ato bhagavatas+vacanāt -> ato bhagavato vacanāt

ato bhagavato vacanāt+padmapatrāyatākṣas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrāyatākṣas

ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrāyatākṣas+samyaksambuddhas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ samyaksambuddhas

ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ samyaksambuddhas+bhagavān -> ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān

ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān+rūparahitas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān rūparahitas

ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān rūparahitas+iti| -> ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān rūparahita iti|

vajrāveśas+mahāveśas -> vajrāveśo mahāveśas

vajrāveśo mahāveśas+śatākṣas -> vajrāveśo mahāveśaḥ śatākṣas

vajrāveśo mahāveśaḥ śatākṣas+vajralocanas -> vajrāveśo mahāveśaḥ śatākṣo vajralocanas

vajrāveśo mahāveśaḥ śatākṣo vajralocanas+|| -> vajrāveśo mahāveśaḥ śatākṣo vajralocanaḥ||

vajrajvālākarālākṣas+vajrajvālāśiroruhas -> vajrajvālākarālākṣo vajrajvālāśiroruhas

vajrajvālākarālākṣo vajrajvālāśiroruhas+| -> vajrajvālākarālākṣo vajrajvālāśiroruhaḥ|

nāmasaṃgītyām+uktam -> nāmasaṃgītyām uktam

nāmasaṃgītyām uktam+bhagavatā -> nāmasaṃgītyām uktaṃ bhagavatā

nāmasaṃgītyām uktaṃ bhagavatā+ādarśajñānastave -> nāmasaṃgītyām uktaṃ bhagavatādarśajñānastave

padmapatrāyatākṣas+iti| -> padmapatrāyatākṣa iti|

bhagavatas+āyatāni -> bhagavata āyatāni

teṣām+antam -> teṣām antam

teṣām antam+yāvat -> teṣām antaṃ yāvat

teṣām antaṃ yāvat+śata -> teṣām antaṃ yāvac chata

teṣām antaṃ yāvac chata+akṣīṇi -> teṣām antaṃ yāvac chatākṣīṇi

śatakuladīrghasvabhāvatvena+avasthitās -> śatakuladīrghasvabhāvatvenāvasthitās

śatakuladīrghasvabhāvatvenāvasthitās+sattvās -> śatakuladīrghasvabhāvatvenāvasthitāḥ sattvās

śatakuladīrghasvabhāvatvenāvasthitāḥ sattvās+iti -> śatakuladīrghasvabhāvatvenāvasthitāḥ sattvā iti

padmapatrāṇi+iva -> padmapatrāṇīva

tasmin+padme -> tasmin padme

nītārthena+ākāśadhātus -> nītārthenākāśadhātus

nītārthenākāśadhātus+ucyate -> nītārthenākāśadhātur ucyate

tat+na| -> tan na|

yat+vaktavyam -> yad vaktavyam

yad vaktavyam+bālajanais -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanais

yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanais+padmapatrāyatākṣas -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas

yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas+tantre -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas tantre

yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas tantre+abhidheyas -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas tantre 'bhidheyas

yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas tantre 'bhidheyas+arūpī -> yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas tantre 'bhidheyo 'rūpī

tasmāt+ucyate---iha -> tasmād ucyate---iha

kasyacit+abhiprāyas -> kasyacid abhiprāyas

kasyacid abhiprāyas+bhaviṣyati -> kasyacid abhiprāyo bhaviṣyati

bhagavatas+vacanam -> bhagavato vacanam

bhagavato vacanam+iha -> bhagavato vacanam iha

kimartham+padmapatrāyatākṣam -> kimarthaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣam

kimarthaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣam+iti -> kimarthaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣam iti

padmapatrāyatākṣas+sa -> padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ sa

yas+ca -> yaś ca

jñānakāyas+arūpī -> jñānakāyo 'rūpī

yas+tantre -> yas tantre

yas tantre+abhidheyas -> yas tantre 'bhidheyas

yas tantre 'bhidheyas+sa -> yas tantre 'bhidheyaḥ sa

kaścit+jñānakāyas -> kaścij jñānakāyas

kaścij jñānakāyas+samyaksambuddhas -> kaścij jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddhas

kaścij jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddhas+abhūt -> kaścij jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho 'bhūt

kaścij jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho 'bhūt+iti| -> kaścij jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho 'bhūd iti|

śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām+madhye -> śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ madhye

punaruktavacanam+bhagavatas -> punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavatas

punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavatas+| -> punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavataḥ|

sarvajñas+jñānakāyas -> sarvajño jñānakāyas

sarvajño jñānakāyas+samyaksambuddhas -> sarvajño jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddhas

sarvajño jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddhas+bhagavān -> sarvajño jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān

sarvajño jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān+jñānakāyas -> sarvajño jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavāñ jñānakāyas

sarvajño jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavāñ jñānakāyas+iti -> sarvajño jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavāñ jñānakāya iti

teṣām+samyaksambuddhatvanirākaraṇāya -> teṣāṃ samyaksambuddhatvanirākaraṇāya

buddhās+śrāvakapratyekās -> buddhāḥ śrāvakapratyekās

buddhāḥ śrāvakapratyekās+santi -> buddhāḥ śrāvakapratyekāḥ santi

kim+tarhi -> kiṃ tarhi

kiṃ tarhi+anye -> kiṃ tarhy anye

kiṃ tarhy anye+api -> kiṃ tarhy anye 'pi

tat+satyam| -> tat satyam|

jñānakāyas+iti -> jñānakāya iti

yas+sarvajñas -> yaḥ sarvajñas

yaḥ sarvajñas+sas -> yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sas

yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sas+eva -> yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa eva

tat+eva -> tad eva

tad eva+ucyate| -> tad evocyate|

punarvacanam+bhagavatas -> punarvacanaṃ bhagavatas

punarvacanaṃ bhagavatas+| -> punarvacanaṃ bhagavataḥ|

jñānakāyas+kimartham -> jñānakāyaḥ kimartham

jñānakāyaḥ kimartham+jñānakāyas -> jñānakāyaḥ kimarthaṃ jñānakāyas

jñānakāyaḥ kimarthaṃ jñānakāyas+iti -> jñānakāyaḥ kimarthaṃ jñānakāya iti

yas+sarvajñas -> yaḥ sarvajñas

yaḥ sarvajñas+sas -> yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sas

yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sas+eva -> yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa eva

bhavati+iti| -> bhavatīti|

punarvacanam+na -> punarvacanaṃ na

atas+sarvajñas -> ataḥ sarvajñas

ataḥ sarvajñas+buddhas -> ataḥ sarvajño buddhas

ataḥ sarvajño buddhas+bhagavān -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān+buddham -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān buddham

ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān buddham+iti -> ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān buddham iti

kaivalyajñānaniṣṭhūtas+prajñāśastravidāraṇas -> kaivalyajñānaniṣṭhūtaḥ prajñāśastravidāraṇas

kaivalyajñānaniṣṭhūtaḥ prajñāśastravidāraṇas+|| -> kaivalyajñānaniṣṭhūtaḥ prajñāśastravidāraṇaḥ||

sthitas+| -> sthitaḥ|

saṃsārapārakoṭisthas+kṛtakṛtyas -> saṃsārapārakoṭisthaḥ kṛtakṛtyas

saṃsārapārakoṭisthaḥ kṛtakṛtyas+sthale -> saṃsārapārakoṭisthaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sthale

nāmasaṃgītyām+tathāgatena -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ tathāgatena

nāmasaṃgītyāṃ tathāgatena+uktam -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ tathāgatenoktam

nāmasaṃgītyāṃ tathāgatenoktam+suviśuddhadharmadhātustave -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ tathāgatenoktaṃ suviśuddhadharmadhātustave

hariharādīnām+sabhūtatvāt -> hariharādīnāṃ sabhūtatvāt

hariharādīnāṃ sabhūtatvāt+buddhabhagavatas -> hariharādīnāṃ sabhūtatvād buddhabhagavatas

hariharādīnāṃ sabhūtatvād buddhabhagavatas+saṃsārapārakoṭivyavasthitatvāt -> hariharādīnāṃ sabhūtatvād buddhabhagavataḥ saṃsārapārakoṭivyavasthitatvāt

hariharādīnāṃ sabhūtatvād buddhabhagavataḥ saṃsārapārakoṭivyavasthitatvāt+iti| -> hariharādīnāṃ sabhūtatvād buddhabhagavataḥ saṃsārapārakoṭivyavasthitatvād iti|

bhavati+iti---ucyate| -> bhavatīti---ucyate|

sarvajñas+sarvasattvarutakais -> sarvajñaḥ sarvasattvarutakais

sarvajñaḥ sarvasattvarutakais+sarvadharmadeśakas -> sarvajñaḥ sarvasattvarutakaiḥ sarvadharmadeśakas

sarvajñaḥ sarvasattvarutakaiḥ sarvadharmadeśakas+na -> sarvajñaḥ sarvasattvarutakaiḥ sarvadharmadeśako na

kasmāt+teṣām -> kasmāt teṣām

kasmāt teṣām+madhye -> kasmāt teṣāṃ madhye

yas+sarvadharmāṇām -> yaḥ sarvadharmāṇām

yaḥ sarvadharmāṇām+sarvasattvarutakais -> yaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvarutakais

yaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvarutakais+deśakas -> yaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvarutakair deśakas

yaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvarutakair deśakas+iti| -> yaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvarutakair deśaka iti|

hariharāṇām+madhye -> hariharāṇāṃ madhye

na+anyas -> nānyas

nānyas+sarvajñas -> nānyaḥ sarvajñas

nānyaḥ sarvajñas+traidhātuke -> nānyaḥ sarvajñas traidhātuke

sarvajñas+buddhas -> sarvajño buddhas

sarvajño buddhas+bhagavān -> sarvajño buddho bhagavān

sarvajño buddho bhagavān+iti -> sarvajño buddho bhagavān iti

teṣām+sarvajñatānirākaraṇāya -> teṣāṃ sarvajñatānirākaraṇāya

bālajanais+parikalpitās -> bālajanaiḥ parikalpitās

bālajanaiḥ parikalpitās+| -> bālajanaiḥ parikalpitāḥ|

hariharādayas+sarvajñatvena -> hariharādayaḥ sarvajñatvena

kim+tarhi -> kiṃ tarhi

kiṃ tarhi+anye -> kiṃ tarhy anye

kiṃ tarhy anye+api -> kiṃ tarhy anye 'pi

buddhas+bhagavān -> buddho bhagavān

buddho bhagavān+iti| -> buddho bhagavān iti|

satyam+etat -> satyam etat

satyam etat+vacanam -> satyam etad vacanam

satyam etad vacanam+yas -> satyam etad vacanaṃ yas

satyam etad vacanaṃ yas+sarvajñas -> satyam etad vacanaṃ yaḥ sarvajñas

satyam etad vacanaṃ yaḥ sarvajñas+sa -> satyam etad vacanaṃ yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa

tasmāt+ucyate---iha -> tasmād ucyate---iha

kasyacit+abhiprāyas -> kasyacid abhiprāyas

kasyacid abhiprāyas+bhaviṣyati| -> kasyacid abhiprāyo bhaviṣyati|

idam+kimartham -> idaṃ kimartham

idaṃ kimartham+punaruktavacanam -> idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanam

idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanam+bhagavatas -> idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavatas

idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavatas+buddham -> idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavato buddham

idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavato buddham+iti -> idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavato buddham iti

idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavato buddham iti+iha -> idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavato buddham itīha

bhāvas+| -> bhāvaḥ|

buddhas+bhagavān -> buddho bhagavān

buddho bhagavān+dvābhyām -> buddho bhagavān dvābhyām

buddho bhagavān dvābhyām+saṃjñābhyām -> buddho bhagavān dvābhyāṃ saṃjñābhyām

buddho bhagavān dvābhyāṃ saṃjñābhyām+ekabhāvapratipādakatvāt -> buddho bhagavān dvābhyāṃ saṃjñābhyām ekabhāvapratipādakatvāt

buddho bhagavān dvābhyāṃ saṃjñābhyām ekabhāvapratipādakatvāt+iti -> buddho bhagavān dvābhyāṃ saṃjñābhyām ekabhāvapratipādakatvād iti

yas+sarvajñas -> yaḥ sarvajñas

yaḥ sarvajñas+sas -> yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sas

yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sas+eva -> yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa eva

saṃdeśitam+iti| -> saṃdeśitam iti|

paramādibuddham+tantrarājam -> paramādibuddhaṃ tantrarājam

paramādibuddhaṃ tantrarājam+bhagavatā -> paramādibuddhaṃ tantrarājaṃ bhagavatā

sarvajñam+ityādinā?? -> sarvajñam ityādinā??

pūrvāparāviruddham+sarvajña -> pūrvāparāviruddhaṃ sarvajña

pūrvāparāviruddhaṃ sarvajña+ityādinā -> pūrvāparāviruddhaṃ sarvajñetyādinā

evam+uktakrameṇa -> evam uktakrameṇa

duṣṭācāryāṇām+tathāgatahṛdayabāhyabhūtānām -> duṣṭācāryāṇāṃ tathāgatahṛdayabāhyabhūtānām

duṣṭācāryāṇāṃ tathāgatahṛdayabāhyabhūtānām+viṣayendriyopabhogāsaktānām -> duṣṭācāryāṇāṃ tathāgatahṛdayabāhyabhūtānāṃ viṣayendriyopabhogāsaktānām

duṣṭācāryāṇāṃ tathāgatahṛdayabāhyabhūtānāṃ viṣayendriyopabhogāsaktānām+mithyāpralāpinām -> duṣṭācāryāṇāṃ tathāgatahṛdayabāhyabhūtānāṃ viṣayendriyopabhogāsaktānāṃ mithyāpralāpinām

duṣṭācāryāṇāṃ tathāgatahṛdayabāhyabhūtānāṃ viṣayendriyopabhogāsaktānāṃ mithyāpralāpinām+iti| -> duṣṭācāryāṇāṃ tathāgatahṛdayabāhyabhūtānāṃ viṣayendriyopabhogāsaktānāṃ mithyāpralāpinām iti|

anyathā+adṛṣṭadoṣagrahaṇāt -> anyathādṛṣṭadoṣagrahaṇāt

anyathādṛṣṭadoṣagrahaṇāt+avīcigamanam -> anyathādṛṣṭadoṣagrahaṇād avīcigamanam

anyathādṛṣṭadoṣagrahaṇād avīcigamanam+bhavati -> anyathādṛṣṭadoṣagrahaṇād avīcigamanaṃ bhavati

guṇadoṣās+avagantavyās -> guṇadoṣā avagantavyās

guṇadoṣā avagantavyās+| -> guṇadoṣā avagantavyāḥ|

pūrvāparasambandham+jñātvā -> pūrvāparasambandhaṃ jñātvā

tasmāt+tantrāntare -> tasmāt tantrāntare

mūlāpattis+bhavati| -> mūlāpattir bhavati|

doṣagrahaṇāt+ṣaṣṭhī -> doṣagrahaṇāt ṣaṣṭhī

vaktavyam+svasiddhānte -> vaktavyaṃ svasiddhānte

bauddhais+na -> bauddhair na

bhavati+iti -> bhavatīti

deśitam+tathāgatadeśitam -> deśitaṃ tathāgatadeśitam

deśitaṃ tathāgatadeśitam+na -> deśitaṃ tathāgatadeśitaṃ na

sarvajñam+ityādinā?? -> sarvajñam ityādinā??

sarvajña+ityādinā -> sarvajñetyādinā

rahasye+ityādinā -> rahasya ityādinā

deśitam+tantrarājam -> deśitaṃ tantrarājam

deśitaṃ tantrarājam+tathāgatadeśitam -> deśitaṃ tantrarājaṃ tathāgatadeśitam

deśitaṃ tantrarājaṃ tathāgatadeśitam+bhavati -> deśitaṃ tantrarājaṃ tathāgatadeśitaṃ bhavati

atas+anantasaṃjñābhis -> ato 'nantasaṃjñābhis

ato 'nantasaṃjñābhis+dharmadeśakatvāt -> ato 'nantasaṃjñābhir dharmadeśakatvāt

ato 'nantasaṃjñābhir dharmadeśakatvāt+evam -> ato 'nantasaṃjñābhir dharmadeśakatvād evam

ato 'nantasaṃjñābhir dharmadeśakatvād evam+mayā -> ato 'nantasaṃjñābhir dharmadeśakatvād evaṃ mayā

sarvajña+ityādibhis -> sarvajñetyādibhis

sarvajñetyādibhis+trayoviṃśatyakṣarais -> sarvajñetyādibhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarais

sarvajñetyādibhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarais+bhagavatā -> sarvajñetyādibhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarair bhagavatā

sarvajñetyādibhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarair bhagavatā+uddiṣṭas -> sarvajñetyādibhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarair bhagavatoddiṣṭas

catuḥkulātmakas+abhidheyas -> catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyas

catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyas+ṣaṭkulātmakas -> catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ ṣaṭkulātmakas

catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ ṣaṭkulātmakas+ca -> catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ ṣaṭkulātmakaś ca

catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ ṣaṭkulātmakaś ca+iti| -> catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ ṣaṭkulātmakaś ceti|

evam+uktakrameṇa -> evam uktakrameṇa

vajrasattvas+uktas -> vajrasattva uktas

vajrasattva uktas+iti| -> vajrasattva ukta iti|

yas+vaṃkāreṇa -> yo vaṃkāreṇa

yo vaṃkāreṇa+abhidheyas -> yo vaṃkāreṇābhidheyas

yo vaṃkāreṇābhidheyas+uktas -> yo vaṃkāreṇābhidheya uktas

yo vaṃkāreṇābhidheya uktas+sas -> yo vaṃkāreṇābhidheya uktaḥ sas

yo vaṃkāreṇābhidheya uktaḥ sas+eva -> yo vaṃkāreṇābhidheya uktaḥ sa eva

bhagavatā+uktam| -> bhagavatoktam|

sthānam+rahasya -> sthānaṃ rahasya

sthānaṃ rahasya+ityādiśabdena -> sthānaṃ rahasyetyādiśabdena

yat+sthānam -> yat sthānam

yat sthānam+bhagavatā -> yat sthānaṃ bhagavatā

yat sthānaṃ bhagavatā+uktam -> yat sthānaṃ bhagavatoktam

yat sthānaṃ bhagavatoktam+tat -> yat sthānaṃ bhagavatoktaṃ tat

yat sthānaṃ bhagavatoktaṃ tat+eva -> yat sthānaṃ bhagavatoktaṃ tad eva

samājādike+ekāreṇa -> samājādika ekāreṇa

atas+bhagavatas -> ato bhagavatas

ato bhagavatas+vacanāt -> ato bhagavato vacanāt

ato bhagavato vacanāt+tantratantrāntareṣu -> ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣu

ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣu+abhidheyas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas

ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas+trimukhas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhas

ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhas+caturbhujas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujas

ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujas+pañcamukhas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujaḥ pañcamukhas

ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujaḥ pañcamukhas+ṣaṇmukhas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujaḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaṇmukhas

ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujaḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaṇmukhas+śatamukhas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujaḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ śatamukhas

ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujaḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ śatamukhas+avagantavyas -> ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujaḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ śatamukho 'vagantavyas

ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujaḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ śatamukho 'vagantavyas+iti|| -> ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣv abhidheyas trimukhaś caturbhujaḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ śatamukho 'vagantavya iti||

daṃṣṭrākarālakaṅkālas+halāhalaśatānanas -> daṃṣṭrākarālakaṅkālo halāhalaśatānanas

daṃṣṭrākarālakaṅkālo halāhalaśatānanas+|| -> daṃṣṭrākarālakaṅkālo halāhalaśatānanaḥ||

krodharāṭ+ṣaṇmukhas -> krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukhas

krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukhas+bhīmas -> krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukho bhīmas

krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukho bhīmas+ṣaṇnetras -> krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukho bhīmaḥ ṣaṇnetras

krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukho bhīmaḥ ṣaṇnetras+ṣaḍbhujas -> krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukho bhīmaḥ ṣaṇnetraḥ ṣaḍbhujas

krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukho bhīmaḥ ṣaṇnetraḥ ṣaḍbhujas+balī| -> krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukho bhīmaḥ ṣaṇnetraḥ ṣaḍbhujo balī|

vajrabhairavabhīkaras+| -> vajrabhairavabhīkaraḥ|

sārdham+ādarśajñānastave -> sārdham ādarśajñānastave

bhagavatā+uktas -> bhagavatoktas

bhagavatoktas+iti -> bhagavatokta iti

ṣaṭkulātmakas+abhidheyas -> ṣaṭkulātmako 'bhidheyas

ṣaṭkulātmako 'bhidheyas+śatakulātmakas -> ṣaṭkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ śatakulātmakas

ṣaṭkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ śatakulātmakas+api -> ṣaṭkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ śatakulātmako 'pi

evam+skandhadhātubhedena -> evaṃ skandhadhātubhedena

vratottamas+|| -> vratottamaḥ||

mahāvratadharas+mauñjī -> mahāvratadharo mauñjī

pañcānanas+pañcaśikhas -> pañcānanaḥ pañcaśikhas

pañcānanaḥ pañcaśikhas+pañcacīvaraśekharas -> pañcānanaḥ pañcaśikhaḥ pañcacīvaraśekharas

pañcānanaḥ pañcaśikhaḥ pañcacīvaraśekharas+| -> pañcānanaḥ pañcaśikhaḥ pañcacīvaraśekharaḥ|

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

evam+pañcakulātmakas -> evaṃ pañcakulātmakas

evaṃ pañcakulātmakas+skandhadhātubhedena| -> evaṃ pañcakulātmakaḥ skandhadhātubhedena|

atas+bhagavatas -> ato bhagavatas

ato bhagavatas+vacanāt -> ato bhagavato vacanāt

ato bhagavato vacanāt+catuḥkālātmakas -> ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmakas

ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmakas+abhidheyas -> ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyas

ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyas+vajrasattvas -> ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyo vajrasattvas

ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyo vajrasattvas+viśuddhadharmamantrasaṃsthāpanātmakas -> ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyo vajrasattvo viśuddhadharmamantrasaṃsthāpanātmakas

ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyo vajrasattvo viśuddhadharmamantrasaṃsthāpanātmakas+kālacakras -> ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyo vajrasattvo viśuddhadharmamantrasaṃsthāpanātmakaḥ kālacakras

ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyo vajrasattvo viśuddhadharmamantrasaṃsthāpanātmakaḥ kālacakras+bhagavān -> ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyo vajrasattvo viśuddhadharmamantrasaṃsthāpanātmakaḥ kālacakro bhagavān

ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyo vajrasattvo viśuddhadharmamantrasaṃsthāpanātmakaḥ kālacakro bhagavān+iti| -> ato bhagavato vacanāc catuḥkālātmako 'bhidheyo vajrasattvo viśuddhadharmamantrasaṃsthāpanātmakaḥ kālacakro bhagavān iti|

vajratīkṣṇas+mahākhaḍgas -> vajratīkṣṇo mahākhaḍgas

vajratīkṣṇo mahākhaḍgas+viśuddhas -> vajratīkṣṇo mahākhaḍgo viśuddhas

vajratīkṣṇo mahākhaḍgo viśuddhas+paramākṣaras -> vajratīkṣṇo mahākhaḍgo viśuddhaḥ paramākṣaras

vajratīkṣṇo mahākhaḍgo viśuddhaḥ paramākṣaras+|| -> vajratīkṣṇo mahākhaḍgo viśuddhaḥ paramākṣaraḥ||

buddhavidyādharas+mahān| -> buddhavidyādharo mahān|

viśvamāyādharas+rājā -> viśvamāyādharo rājā

buddhapadmodbhavas+śrīmān -> buddhapadmodbhavaḥ śrīmān

buddhapadmodbhavaḥ śrīmān+sarvajñajñānakośadhṛk|| -> buddhapadmodbhavaḥ śrīman sarvajñajñānakośadhṛk||

sambuddhavajraparyaṅkas+buddhasaṃgītidharmadhṛk| -> sambuddhavajraparyaṅko buddhasaṃgītidharmadhṛk|

virāgādimahārāgas+viśvavarṇojjvalaprabhas -> virāgādimahārāgo viśvavarṇojjvalaprabhas

virāgādimahārāgo viśvavarṇojjvalaprabhas+|| -> virāgādimahārāgo viśvavarṇojjvalaprabhaḥ||

vajrasūryamahālokas+vajrenduvimalaprabhas -> vajrasūryamahāloko vajrenduvimalaprabhas

vajrasūryamahāloko vajrenduvimalaprabhas+| -> vajrasūryamahāloko vajrenduvimalaprabhaḥ|

nāmasaṃgītyām+prakaṭas -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ prakaṭas

nāmasaṃgītyāṃ prakaṭas+saṃgītas -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ prakaṭaḥ saṃgītas

nāmasaṃgītyāṃ prakaṭaḥ saṃgītas+vajrayogas -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ prakaṭaḥ saṃgīto vajrayogas

nāmasaṃgītyāṃ prakaṭaḥ saṃgīto vajrayogas+tathāgatena -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ prakaṭaḥ saṃgīto vajrayogas tathāgatena

nāmasaṃgītyāṃ prakaṭaḥ saṃgīto vajrayogas tathāgatena+iti -> nāmasaṃgītyāṃ prakaṭaḥ saṃgīto vajrayogas tathāgateneti

catuḥkulātmakas+abhidheyas -> catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyas

catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyas+sūryacandrarāhvagnirajaḥśukracittajñānaikayogas -> catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ sūryacandrarāhvagnirajaḥśukracittajñānaikayogas

catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ sūryacandrarāhvagnirajaḥśukracittajñānaikayogas+iti| -> catuḥkulātmako 'bhidheyaḥ sūryacandrarāhvagnirajaḥśukracittajñānaikayoga iti|

sārdham+ṣaṭkulātmakam -> sārdhaṃ ṣaṭkulātmakam

sārdhaṃ ṣaṭkulātmakam+bhavati| -> sārdhaṃ ṣaṭkulātmakaṃ bhavati|

pañcakulātmakam+svabhāvaikena -> pañcakulātmakaṃ svabhāvaikena

catuḥkulātmakam+tantram -> catuḥkulātmakaṃ tantram

catuḥkulātmakaṃ tantram+bhavati -> catuḥkulātmakaṃ tantraṃ bhavati

catuḥkulātmakaṃ tantraṃ bhavati+abhidheyas -> catuḥkulātmakaṃ tantraṃ bhavaty abhidheyas

catuḥkulātmakaṃ tantraṃ bhavaty abhidheyas+ca| -> catuḥkulātmakaṃ tantraṃ bhavaty abhidheyaś ca|

kāyavākcittajñānātmakas+abhidheyas -> kāyavākcittajñānātmako 'bhidheyas

kāyavākcittajñānātmako 'bhidheyas+caturmukhas -> kāyavākcittajñānātmako 'bhidheyaś caturmukhas

kāyavākcittajñānātmako 'bhidheyaś caturmukhas+jñānaikena -> kāyavākcittajñānātmako 'bhidheyaś caturmukho jñānaikena

kāyavākcittakulātmakas+abhidheyas -> kāyavākcittakulātmako 'bhidheyas

kāyavākcittakulātmako 'bhidheyas+trimukhas -> kāyavākcittakulātmako 'bhidheyas trimukhas

kāyavākcittakulātmako 'bhidheyas trimukhas+catuḥkulātmake -> kāyavākcittakulātmako 'bhidheyas trimukhaś catuḥkulātmake

bhagavatas+vacanam -> bhagavato vacanam

bhagavato vacanam+iti|| -> bhagavato vacanam iti||

ca+anyat -> cānyat

cānyat+maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittam -> cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittam

cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittam+dinam -> cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittaṃ dinam

cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittaṃ dinam+ekam -> cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittaṃ dinam ekam

cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittaṃ dinam ekam+parīkṣayet -> cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittaṃ dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayet

cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittaṃ dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayet+dhūmādinimittam -> cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittaṃ dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayed dhūmādinimittam

cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittaṃ dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayed dhūmādinimittam+vihāya -> cānyan maṇḍalacakrasādhanānimittaṃ dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayed dhūmādinimittaṃ vihāya

guros+mārgāparijñānāt -> guror mārgāparijñānāt

guror mārgāparijñānāt+viparītāviśuddhamārgabhāvanāpratipādakatvāt -> guror mārgāparijñānād viparītāviśuddhamārgabhāvanāpratipādakatvāt

guror mārgāparijñānād viparītāviśuddhamārgabhāvanāpratipādakatvāt+iti| -> guror mārgāparijñānād viparītāviśuddhamārgabhāvanāpratipādakatvād iti|

bhagavatas+pratijñā -> bhagavataḥ pratijñā

mārgadāyakas+na -> mārgadāyako na

gurus+tantroktavidhinā -> gurus tantroktavidhinā

vacas+| -> vacaḥ|

bhagavatas+mṛṣā -> bhagavato mṛṣā

pratyayas+na -> pratyayo na

dinam+ekam -> dinam ekam

dinam ekam+parīkṣayet -> dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayet

dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayet+nimittam -> dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayen nimittam

dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayen nimittam+yadi -> dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayen nimittaṃ yadi

kṛtā---vikalparahitam+cittam -> kṛtā---vikalparahitaṃ cittam

kṛtā---vikalparahitaṃ cittam+kṛtvā -> kṛtā---vikalparahitaṃ cittaṃ kṛtvā

saṃvṛtisatyena+iti| -> saṃvṛtisatyeneti|

laukikam+phalam -> laukikaṃ phalam

laukikaṃ phalam+bhavati -> laukikaṃ phalaṃ bhavati

samyaksambuddhatvaphaladāyakas+na -> samyaksambuddhatvaphaladāyako na

yas+mārgas -> yo mārgas

yo mārgas+guruṇā -> yo mārgo guruṇā

tribhis+pratyayais -> tribhiḥ pratyayais

tribhiḥ pratyayais+vinā -> tribhiḥ pratyayair vinā

ebhis+tribhis -> ebhis tribhis

ebhis tribhis+pratyayais -> ebhis tribhiḥ pratyayais

ebhis tribhiḥ pratyayais+pariśuddhas -> ebhis tribhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pariśuddhas

ebhis tribhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pariśuddhas+samyaksambuddhamārgas -> ebhis tribhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pariśuddhaḥ samyaksambuddhamārgas

ebhis tribhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pariśuddhaḥ samyaksambuddhamārgas+bhavati| -> ebhis tribhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pariśuddhaḥ samyaksambuddhamārgo bhavati|

trividhas+pratyayas -> trividhaḥ pratyayas

trividhaḥ pratyayas+bhagavatā -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatā

trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatā+uktas -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktas

trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktas+---prathamam -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamam

trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamam+tāvat -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat

trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat+tantrapratyayas -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas

trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas+tatas -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas tatas

trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas tatas+gurupratyayas -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas tato gurupratyayas

trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas tato gurupratyayas+tatas -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas tato gurupratyayas tatas

trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas tato gurupratyayas tatas+ātmapratyayas -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas tato gurupratyayas tata ātmapratyayas

trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas tato gurupratyayas tata ātmapratyayas+| -> trividhaḥ pratyayo bhagavatoktaḥ---prathamaṃ tāvat tantrapratyayas tato gurupratyayas tata ātmapratyayaḥ|

syāt+iti| -> syād iti|

atas+bhagavatas -> ato bhagavatas

ato bhagavatas+vacanāt -> ato bhagavato vacanāt

ato bhagavato vacanāt+na -> ato bhagavato vacanān na

ato bhagavato vacanān na+ekā -> ato bhagavato vacanān naikā

nītārtham+tantram -> nītārthaṃ tantram

nītārthaṃ tantram+ṣaṭkoṭilakṣaṇam|| -> nītārthaṃ tantraṃ ṣaṭkoṭilakṣaṇam||

neyārtham+na -> neyārthaṃ na

rutam+ca -> rutaṃ ca

rutaṃ ca+eva -> rutaṃ caiva

na+eva -> naiva

saṃdhyābhāṣam+tathā -> saṃdhyābhāṣaṃ tathā

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

saṃdhyābhāṣāntareṇa+avāgantavyas -> saṃdhyābhāṣāntareṇāvāgantavyas

saṃdhyābhāṣāntareṇāvāgantavyas+iti| -> saṃdhyābhāṣāntareṇāvāgantavya iti|

gurūpadeśāt+tantratantrāntare -> gurūpadeśāt tantratantrāntare

tathāgatena+uktas -> tathāgatenoktas

tathāgatenoktas+sa -> tathāgatenoktaḥ sa

rahasye+ityādinā -> rahasya ityādinā

bhāvas+lakṣābhidhānādau -> bhāvo lakṣābhidhānādau

yas+bhāvas -> yo bhāvas

yo bhāvas+śrīsamājādau -> yo bhāvaḥ śrīsamājādau

yo bhāvaḥ śrīsamājādau+uktas -> yo bhāvaḥ śrīsamājādāv uktas

yo bhāvaḥ śrīsamājādāv uktas+sas -> yo bhāvaḥ śrīsamājādāv uktaḥ sas

yo bhāvaḥ śrīsamājādāv uktaḥ sas+eva -> yo bhāvaḥ śrīsamājādāv uktaḥ sa eva

evam+iti -> evam iti

evam iti+anayā -> evam ity anayā

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+tathāgatena -> vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatena

vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatena+uktas -> vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktas

vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktas+iti| -> vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenokta iti|

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

evam+mayā -> evaṃ mayā

devānām+paripācanāya -> devānāṃ paripācanāya

iti+anena -> ity anena

saṃsthitas+tribhavātmani|| -> saṃsthitas tribhavātmani||

vyavasthitās+|| -> vyavasthitāḥ||

proktās+ekhadhātau -> proktā ekhadhātau

cittākārās+tu -> cittākārās tu

cittākārās tu+amī -> cittākārās tv amī

vāk+visargas -> vāg visargas

vāg visargas+rajas -> vāg visargo rajas

vāg visargo rajas+ravis -> vāg visargo rajo ravis

vāg visargo rajo ravis+| -> vāg visargo rajo raviḥ|

śukram+ca -> śukraṃ ca

kāyas+bindvindu -> kāyo bindvindu

vajrasattvas+ayam -> vajrasattvo 'yam

vajrasattvo 'yam+kāyavākcittayogatas -> vajrasattvo 'yaṃ kāyavākcittayogatas

vajrasattvo 'yaṃ kāyavākcittayogatas+|| -> vajrasattvo 'yaṃ kāyavākcittayogataḥ||

madhyavaṃkāras+sarvabuddhasukhālayas -> madhyavaṃkāraḥ sarvabuddhasukhālayas

madhyavaṃkāraḥ sarvabuddhasukhālayas+| -> madhyavaṃkāraḥ sarvabuddhasukhālayaḥ|

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

ca+avagantavyas -> cāvagantavyas

cāvagantavyas+iti| -> cāvagantavya iti|

vaṃkāras+ādheyas -> vaṃkāra ādheyas

vaṃkāra ādheyas+visargākārānusvārasūryarāhucandraranas -> vaṃkāra ādheyo visargākārānusvārasūryarāhucandraranas

vaṃkāra ādheyo visargākārānusvārasūryarāhucandraranas+ālayavijñānaśukrātmakas -> vaṃkāra ādheyo visargākārānusvārasūryarāhucandrarana ālayavijñānaśukrātmakas

vaṃkāra ādheyo visargākārānusvārasūryarāhucandrarana ālayavijñānaśukrātmakas+madhye% -> vaṃkāra ādheyo visargākārānusvārasūryarāhucandrarana ālayavijñānaśukrātmako madhye%

asmin+ekāre -> asminn ekāre

atas+ekāras -> ata ekāras

ata ekāras+| -> ata ekāraḥ|

pūrvas+akāras -> pūrvo 'kāras

pūrvo 'kāras+khadhātus -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātus

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātus+guhyakamalam -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalam

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalam+saptamyantas -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ saptamyantas

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ saptamyantas+akāras -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ saptamyanto 'kāras

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ saptamyanto 'kāras+para{}ikāreṇa -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ saptamyanto 'kāraḥ para{}ikāreṇa

saṃyogas+atas -> saṃyogo 'tas

saṃyogo 'tas+vaṃkāras -> saṃyogo 'to vaṃkāras

saṃyogo 'to vaṃkāras+| -> saṃyogo 'to vaṃkāraḥ|

sahavatvam+anusvāras -> sahavatvam anusvāras

sahavatvam anusvāras+candraśukreṇa -> sahavatvam anusvāraś candraśukreṇa

guṇābhāvas+guṇābhāvāt -> guṇābhāvo guṇābhāvāt

guṇābhāvo guṇābhāvāt+yaṇādeśas -> guṇābhāvo guṇābhāvād yaṇādeśas

guṇābhāvo guṇābhāvād yaṇādeśas+syāt -> guṇābhāvo guṇābhāvād yaṇādeśaḥ syāt

guṇābhāvo guṇābhāvād yaṇādeśaḥ syāt+iti| -> guṇābhāvo guṇābhāvād yaṇādeśaḥ syād iti|

sūryarajasi+utvam -> sūryarajasy utvam

sūryarajasy utvam+āpanne -> sūryarajasy utvam āpanne

tatas+visarge -> tato visarge

visargas+sūryas -> visargaḥ sūryas

visargaḥ sūryas+rajas -> visargaḥ sūryo rajas

visargaḥ sūryo rajas+itvam -> visargaḥ sūryo raja itvam

visargaḥ sūryo raja itvam+āpadyate| -> visargaḥ sūryo raja itvam āpadyate|

anayos+akārayos -> anayor akārayos

anayor akārayos+khadhāturāhuvijñānayos -> anayor akārayoḥ khadhāturāhuvijñānayos

anayor akārayoḥ khadhāturāhuvijñānayos+madhye -> anayor akārayoḥ khadhāturāhuvijñānayor madhye

pūrvas+akāras -> pūrvo 'kāras

pūrvo 'kāras+khadhātus -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātus

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātus+guhyakamalam -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalam

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalam+tatas -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tatas

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tatas+visargas -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargas

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargas+sūryas -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryas

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryas+rajas -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas+tatas -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tatas

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tatas+akāras -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāras

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāras+rāhuvijñānam -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānam

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānam+sukhādhiṣṭhānam -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānaṃ sukhādhiṣṭhānam

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānaṃ sukhādhiṣṭhānam+tatas -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānaṃ sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ tatas

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānaṃ sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ tatas+anusvāras -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānaṃ sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ tato 'nusvāras

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānaṃ sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ tato 'nusvāras+candras -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānaṃ sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ tato 'nusvāraś candras

pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānaṃ sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ tato 'nusvāraś candras+śukram| -> pūrvo 'kāraḥ khadhātur guhyakamalaṃ tato visargaḥ sūryo rajas tato 'kāro rāhuvijñānaṃ sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ tato 'nusvāraś candraḥ śukram|

nītārthas+ucyate--- -> nītārtha ucyate---

atas+asya -> ato 'sya

ato 'sya+akṣaradvayasya -> ato 'syākṣaradvayasya

likhitam+iti| -> likhitam iti|

ca+aśrutvā -> cāśrutvā

deśitam+na -> deśitaṃ na

cet+akṣaradvayam -> ced akṣaradvayam

ced akṣaradvayam+bhagavatā -> ced akṣaradvayaṃ bhagavatā

luptis+na -> luptir na

luptir na+iṣyate| -> luptir neṣyate|

likhitam+atas -> likhitam atas

likhitam atas+asya -> likhitam ato 'sya

likhitam ato 'sya+akṣaradvayasya -> likhitam ato 'syākṣaradvayasya

saṃgītikāreṇa+api -> saṃgītikāreṇāpi

nirdiṣṭas+tat -> nirdiṣṭas tat

nirdiṣṭas tat+devānām -> nirdiṣṭas tad devānām

nirdiṣṭas tad devānām+devarutena -> nirdiṣṭas tad devānāṃ devarutena

ekāras+vaṃkāras -> ekāro vaṃkāras

ekāro vaṃkāras+tantrādau -> ekāro vaṃkāras tantrādau

yat+samājādau -> yat samājādau

evaṃkāras+vajrasattvas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvas+bodhicittam -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittam

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittam+kālacakras -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakras

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakras+ādibuddhas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhas+prajñopāyātmakas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmakas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmakas+yogas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogas+jñeyajñānātmakas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmakas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmakas+advayas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayas+anādinidhanas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanas+śāntas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntas+samājas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājas+saṃvaras -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvaras

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvaras+evamādyanekasaṃjñābhis -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhis

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhis+prajñopāyātmakas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmakas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmakas+advayas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayas+yogas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayo yogas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayo yogas+niranvayas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayo yogo niranvayas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayo yogo niranvayas+yoginā -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayo yogo niranvayo yoginā

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayo yogo niranvayo yoginā+avagantavyas -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayo yogo niranvayo yogināvagantavyas

evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayo yogo niranvayo yogināvagantavyas+iti| -> evaṃkāro vajrasattvo bodhicittaṃ kālacakra ādibuddhaḥ prajñopāyātmako yogo jñeyajñānātmako 'dvayo 'nādinidhanaḥ śāntaḥ samājaḥ saṃvara evamādyanekasaṃjñābhiḥ prajñopāyātmako 'dvayo yogo niranvayo yogināvagantavya iti|

evam+ekāravaṃkārayos -> evam ekāravaṃkārayos

evam ekāravaṃkārayos+sarvākāravaropetā -> evam ekāravaṃkārayoḥ sarvākāravaropetā

sarvāsām+mahāmudrāsahajānandākṣarasukhapratipādakatvāt -> sarvāsāṃ mahāmudrāsahajānandākṣarasukhapratipādakatvāt

sarvāsāṃ mahāmudrāsahajānandākṣarasukhapratipādakatvāt+iti| -> sarvāsāṃ mahāmudrāsahajānandākṣarasukhapratipādakatvād iti|

vaṃkāramahāsuratamahārāgasahajaparamākṣarabindutattvajñānaviśuddhacittasaṃjñānām+madhye -> vaṃkāramahāsuratamahārāgasahajaparamākṣarabindutattvajñānaviśuddhacittasaṃjñānāṃ madhye

sarvāsām+sarvākāraśūnyatāpratipādakatvāt| -> sarvāsāṃ sarvākāraśūnyatāpratipādakatvāt|

na+ekā -> naikā

naikā+ekārasaṃjñā -> naikaikārasaṃjñā

syāt+sarvāsām -> syāt sarvāsām

syāt sarvāsām+stanakeśavatībhāvapratipādakatvāt -> syāt sarvāsāṃ stanakeśavatībhāvapratipādakatvāt

syāt sarvāsāṃ stanakeśavatībhāvapratipādakatvāt+tathā -> syāt sarvāsāṃ stanakeśavatībhāvapratipādakatvāt tathā

syāt sarvāsāṃ stanakeśavatībhāvapratipādakatvāt tathā+ekārarahasyapadmadharmodayakhadhātumahāsukhāvāsasiṃhāsanabhagaguhyasaṃjñānām -> syāt sarvāsāṃ stanakeśavatībhāvapratipādakatvāt tathaikārarahasyapadmadharmodayakhadhātumahāsukhāvāsasiṃhāsanabhagaguhyasaṃjñānām

syāt sarvāsāṃ stanakeśavatībhāvapratipādakatvāt tathaikārarahasyapadmadharmodayakhadhātumahāsukhāvāsasiṃhāsanabhagaguhyasaṃjñānām+madhye% -> syāt sarvāsāṃ stanakeśavatībhāvapratipādakatvāt tathaikārarahasyapadmadharmodayakhadhātumahāsukhāvāsasiṃhāsanabhagaguhyasaṃjñānāṃ madhye%

yuvatī+ityādīnām -> yuvatītyādīnām

yuvatītyādīnām+na -> yuvatītyādīnāṃ na

yuvatītyādīnāṃ na+eka -> yuvatītyādīnāṃ naika

syāt+sarvasaṃjñānātmakābhāvapratipādakatvāt| -> syāt sarvasaṃjñānātmakābhāvapratipādakatvāt|

ca+ekā -> caikā

bhāvasya+anekās -> bhāvasyānekās

bhāvasyānekās+saṃjñās -> bhāvasyānekāḥ saṃjñās

bhāvasyānekāḥ saṃjñās+saṃjñābahutvāt| -> bhāvasyānekāḥ saṃjñāḥ saṃjñābahutvāt|

bhāvas+ekasya -> bhāva ekasya

bhāva ekasya+api -> bhāva ekasyāpi

syāt+iti -> syād iti

atas+devajātipratibaddhās -> ato devajātipratibaddhās

ato devajātipratibaddhās+prādeśikās -> ato devajātipratibaddhāḥ prādeśikās

ato devajātipratibaddhāḥ prādeśikās+buddhabodhisattvānām -> ato devajātipratibaddhāḥ prādeśikā buddhabodhisattvānām

ato devajātipratibaddhāḥ prādeśikā buddhabodhisattvānām+na -> ato devajātipratibaddhāḥ prādeśikā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ na

buddhabodhisattvās+sarvajñabhāṣayā -> buddhabodhisattvāḥ sarvajñabhāṣayā

sarvasattvarutais+dharmadeśakās -> sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśakās

sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśakās+saṃgītikārakās -> sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśakāḥ saṃgītikārakās

sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśakāḥ saṃgītikārakās+bhavanti -> sarvasattvarutair dharmadeśakāḥ saṃgītikārakā bhavanti

te+anena -> te 'nena

tathā+asmadīyās -> tathāsmadīyās

tathāsmadīyās+iṣṭadevatās -> tathāsmadīyā iṣṭadevatās

tathāsmadīyā iṣṭadevatās+buddhabodhisattvās -> tathāsmadīyā iṣṭadevatā buddhabodhisattvās

tathāsmadīyā iṣṭadevatā buddhabodhisattvās+saṃskṛtavaktāras -> tathāsmadīyā iṣṭadevatā buddhabodhisattvāḥ saṃskṛtavaktāras

tathāsmadīyā iṣṭadevatā buddhabodhisattvāḥ saṃskṛtavaktāras+bhavanti -> tathāsmadīyā iṣṭadevatā buddhabodhisattvāḥ saṃskṛtavaktāro bhavanti

tathāsmadīyā iṣṭadevatā buddhabodhisattvāḥ saṃskṛtavaktāro bhavanti+iti| -> tathāsmadīyā iṣṭadevatā buddhabodhisattvāḥ saṃskṛtavaktāro bhavantīti|

brahmahariharādayas+saṃskṛtavaktāras -> brahmahariharādayaḥ saṃskṛtavaktāras

brahmahariharādayaḥ saṃskṛtavaktāras+brāhmaṇavaiṣṇavaśaivādīnām -> brahmahariharādayaḥ saṃskṛtavaktāro brāhmaṇavaiṣṇavaśaivādīnām

brahmahariharādayaḥ saṃskṛtavaktāro brāhmaṇavaiṣṇavaśaivādīnām+iṣṭadevatā -> brahmahariharādayaḥ saṃskṛtavaktāro brāhmaṇavaiṣṇavaśaivādīnām iṣṭadevatā

bālamatīnām+bauddhānām -> bālamatīnāṃ bauddhānām

bālamatīnāṃ bauddhānām+abhiprāyas -> bālamatīnāṃ bauddhānām abhiprāyas

bālamatīnāṃ bauddhānām abhiprāyas+yathā -> bālamatīnāṃ bauddhānām abhiprāyo yathā

śabdavādinām+tīrthikānām -> śabdavādināṃ tīrthikānām

śabdavādināṃ tīrthikānām+paṇḍitānām -> śabdavādināṃ tīrthikānāṃ paṇḍitānām
