śabdavādināṃ tīrthikānāṃ paṇḍitānām+abhimānam -> śabdavādināṃ tīrthikānāṃ paṇḍitānām abhimānam

śabdavādināṃ tīrthikānāṃ paṇḍitānām abhimānam+dṛṣṭvā -> śabdavādināṃ tīrthikānāṃ paṇḍitānām abhimānaṃ dṛṣṭvā

iha+āryaviṣaye -> ihāryaviṣaye

prādeśikas+bhavati, -> prādeśiko bhavati,

buddhas+api -> buddho 'pi

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+iti| -> vijahārasthānanirdeśa iti|

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

vaktavyam---evam+mayā -> vaktavyam---evaṃ mayā

atas+bhagavatas -> ato bhagavatas

ato bhagavatas+anantadharmadeśakatvāt -> ato bhagavato 'nantadharmadeśakatvāt

ato bhagavato 'nantadharmadeśakatvāt+bauddhais -> ato bhagavato 'nantadharmadeśakatvād bauddhais

ato bhagavato 'nantadharmadeśakatvād bauddhais+na -> ato bhagavato 'nantadharmadeśakatvād bauddhair na

jñātavyā+iti| -> jñātavyeti|

yoginā+adhyeṣaṇā -> yoginādhyeṣaṇā

evam+anyeṣu -> evam anyeṣu

evam anyeṣu+api -> evam anyeṣv api

tantram+lakṣābhidhānam -> tantraṃ lakṣābhidhānam

tantraṃ lakṣābhidhānam+kim -> tantraṃ lakṣābhidhānaṃ kim

tantraṃ lakṣābhidhānaṃ kim+vajrasattvas -> tantraṃ lakṣābhidhānaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvas

tantraṃ lakṣābhidhānaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvas+param -> tantraṃ lakṣābhidhānaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvaḥ param

tantraṃ lakṣābhidhānaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvaḥ param+sukham|| -> tantraṃ lakṣābhidhānaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvaḥ paraṃ sukham||

herukam+tribhavātmakam| -> herukaṃ tribhavātmakam|

vajravārāhī+āha--- -> vajravārāhy āha---

tantram+yogānuviddham -> tantraṃ yogānuviddham

tantraṃ yogānuviddham+kim -> tantraṃ yogānuviddhaṃ kim

tantraṃ yogānuviddhaṃ kim+vajrasattvas -> tantraṃ yogānuviddhaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvas

tantraṃ yogānuviddhaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvas+param -> tantraṃ yogānuviddhaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvaḥ param

tantraṃ yogānuviddhaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvaḥ param+sukham|| -> tantraṃ yogānuviddhaṃ kiṃ vajrasattvaḥ paraṃ sukham||

viśvarūpiṇī+āha--- -> viśvarūpiṇy āha---

sucandrarājñas+paramādibuddhe| -> sucandrarājñaḥ paramādibuddhe|

bhuktim+devāsurādīnām -> bhuktiṃ devāsurādīnām

bhuktiṃ devāsurādīnām+sarvam -> bhuktiṃ devāsurādīnāṃ sarvam

bhuktiṃ devāsurādīnāṃ sarvam+etat -> bhuktiṃ devāsurādīnāṃ sarvam etat

bhuktiṃ devāsurādīnāṃ sarvam etat+yathā -> bhuktiṃ devāsurādīnāṃ sarvam etad yathā

mānam+yat -> mānaṃ yat

mānaṃ yat+trailokyotpattikāraṇam| -> mānaṃ yat trailokyotpattikāraṇam|

puruṣam+prakṛtiṣu -> puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṣu

puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṣu+evam -> puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṣv evam

puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṣv evam+pañcaviṃśatimam -> puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṣv evaṃ pañcaviṃśatimam

puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṣv evaṃ pañcaviṃśatimam+param|| -> puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṣv evaṃ pañcaviṃśatimaṃ param||

buddhadevāsurān+eva -> buddhadevāsurān eva

pañcākṣaram+mahāśūnyam -> pañcākṣaraṃ mahāśūnyam

pañcākṣaraṃ mahāśūnyam+binduśūnyam -> pañcākṣaraṃ mahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyam

pañcākṣaraṃ mahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyam+ṣaḍakṣaram|| -> pañcākṣaraṃ mahāśūnyaṃ binduśūnyaṃ ṣaḍakṣaram||

varam+vajradharam -> varaṃ vajradharam

varaṃ vajradharam+mahat| -> varaṃ vajradharaṃ mahat|

bindum+ca -> binduṃ ca

śūnyam+jñānam -> śūnyaṃ jñānam

śūnyaṃ jñānam+ca -> śūnyaṃ jñānaṃ ca

caturbindudharam+tattvam -> caturbindudharaṃ tattvam

caturbindudharaṃ tattvam+bhinnam -> caturbindudharaṃ tattvaṃ bhinnam

caturbindudharaṃ tattvaṃ bhinnam+ṣoḍaśabhedatas -> caturbindudharaṃ tattvaṃ bhinnaṃ ṣoḍaśabhedatas

caturbindudharaṃ tattvaṃ bhinnaṃ ṣoḍaśabhedatas+|| -> caturbindudharaṃ tattvaṃ bhinnaṃ ṣoḍaśabhedataḥ||

ekakṣaṇābhisambuddham+catuḥkṣaṇavibheditam| -> ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaṃ catuḥkṣaṇavibheditam|

yogam+śrīkālacakre -> yogaṃ śrīkālacakre

yogaṃ śrīkālacakre+asmin -> yogaṃ śrīkālacakre 'smin

yogaṃ śrīkālacakre 'smin+ālikālisamanvite|| -> yogaṃ śrīkālacakre 'sminn ālikālisamanvite||

sarvam+siddhisaṃdohalakṣaṇam| -> sarvaṃ siddhisaṃdohalakṣaṇam|

ādibuddham+sadā -> ādibuddhaṃ sadā

deśayitvā+akhilam -> deśayitvākhilam

deśayitvākhilam+śāstā -> deśayitvākhilaṃ śāstā

nṛpas+| -> nṛpaḥ|

karapuṭām+dattvā -> karapuṭāṃ dattvā

karapuṭāṃ dattvā+adhyeṣaṇām -> karapuṭāṃ dattvādhyeṣaṇām

karapuṭāṃ dattvādhyeṣaṇām+kurute -> karapuṭāṃ dattvādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurute

dakṣiṇam+jānumaṇḍalam|| -> dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalam||

tatas+bhūmyām -> tato bhūmyām

tato bhūmyām+samasthāpya -> tato bhūmyāṃ samasthāpya

punas+|| -> punaḥ||

ratnapuṣpais+samabhyarcya -> ratnapuṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya

śāstus+pādāmbujadvayam| -> śāstuḥ pādāmbujadvayam|

coditas+san--- -> coditaḥ san---

paramādibuddhas+adhyeṣakas -> paramādibuddho 'dhyeṣakas

paramādibuddho 'dhyeṣakas+sattvānām -> paramādibuddho 'dhyeṣakaḥ sattvānām

paramādibuddho 'dhyeṣakaḥ sattvānām+kleśanāśāya -> paramādibuddho 'dhyeṣakaḥ sattvānāṃ kleśanāśāya

vajapāṇis+adhyeṣakas -> vajapāṇir adhyeṣakas

vajapāṇir adhyeṣakas+prasiddhas -> vajapāṇir adhyeṣakaḥ prasiddhas

vajapāṇir adhyeṣakaḥ prasiddhas+nāmasaṃgītyām -> vajapāṇir adhyeṣakaḥ prasiddho nāmasaṃgītyām

vajapāṇir adhyeṣakaḥ prasiddho nāmasaṃgītyām+iti| -> vajapāṇir adhyeṣakaḥ prasiddho nāmasaṃgītyām iti|

evam+māyājāle -> evaṃ māyājāle

evaṃ māyājāle+api -> evaṃ māyājāle 'pi

vajrapāṇes+adhyeṣaṇā| -> vajrapāṇer adhyeṣaṇā|

sarvabuddhānām+śrīsamājam -> sarvabuddhānāṃ śrīsamājam

sarvabuddhānāṃ śrīsamājam+sarvabuddhābhidhānakam|| -> sarvabuddhānāṃ śrīsamājaṃ sarvabuddhābhidhānakam||

bhagavān+mahātantrarājam -> bhagavān mahātantrarājam

bhagavān mahātantrarājam+sarvatantraniruttaram| -> bhagavān mahātantrarājaṃ sarvatantraniruttaram|

vajrapāṇis+vajradharabhagavatā -> vajrapāṇir vajradharabhagavatā

vajrapāṇir vajradharabhagavatā+adhiṭṭhitas -> vajrapāṇir vajradharabhagavatādhiṭṭhitas

vajrapāṇir vajradharabhagavatādhiṭṭhitas+san -> vajrapāṇir vajradharabhagavatādhiṭṭhitaḥ san

vajrapāṇir vajradharabhagavatādhiṭṭhitaḥ san+evam -> vajrapāṇir vajradharabhagavatādhiṭṭhitaḥ sann evam

vajrapāṇir vajradharabhagavatādhiṭṭhitaḥ sann evam+āha--- -> vajrapāṇir vajradharabhagavatādhiṭṭhitaḥ sann evam āha---

tathā+adhyeṣakas -> tathādhyeṣakas

tathādhyeṣakas+śrīsamāje--- -> tathādhyeṣakaḥ śrīsamāje---

gurūpadeśāt+avagantavyas -> gurūpadeśād avagantavyas

gurūpadeśād avagantavyas+iti| -> gurūpadeśād avagantavya iti|

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+| -> vijahārasthānanirdeśaḥ|

sarvadūtīmayas+sattvas -> sarvadūtīmayaḥ sattvas

sarvadūtīmayaḥ sattvas+vajrasattvas -> sarvadūtīmayaḥ sattvo vajrasattvas

sarvadūtīmayaḥ sattvo vajrasattvas+mahāsukhas -> sarvadūtīmayaḥ sattvo vajrasattvo mahāsukhas

sarvadūtīmayaḥ sattvo vajrasattvo mahāsukhas+|| -> sarvadūtīmayaḥ sattvo vajrasattvo mahāsukhaḥ||

sthitas+| -> sthitaḥ|

sarvadūtīnām+sarvasattvātmani -> sarvadūtīnāṃ sarvasattvātmani

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+yogānuviddhe| -> vijahārasthānanirdeśo yogānuviddhe|

saṃsthitas+tribhavātmani|| -> saṃsthitas tribhavātmani||

ḍākinīvajrapadmasthas+ekas -> ḍākinīvajrapadmastha ekas

ḍākinīvajrapadmastha ekas+asau -> ḍākinīvajrapadmastha eko 'sau

ḍākinīvajrapadmastha eko 'sau+adhidevatā| -> ḍākinīvajrapadmastha eko 'sāv adhidevatā|

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+paramādibuddhe| -> vijahārasthānanirdeśaḥ paramādibuddhe|

dvādaśākārasatyārthas+ṣoḍaśākāratattvadhṛk|| -> dvādaśākārasatyārthaḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvadhṛk||

sarvatas+vajrasaubhāgyas -> sarvato vajrasaubhāgyas

sarvato vajrasaubhāgyas+sarvatas -> sarvato vajrasaubhāgyaḥ sarvatas

sarvato vajrasaubhāgyaḥ sarvatas+viśvasaṃvaras -> sarvato vajrasaubhāgyaḥ sarvato viśvasaṃvaras

sarvato vajrasaubhāgyaḥ sarvato viśvasaṃvaras+| -> sarvato vajrasaubhāgyaḥ sarvato viśvasaṃvaraḥ|

anādinidhanas+buddhas -> anādinidhano buddhas

anādinidhano buddhas+ādibuddhas -> anādinidhano buddha ādibuddhas

anādinidhano buddha ādibuddhas+niranvayas -> anādinidhano buddha ādibuddho niranvayas

anādinidhano buddha ādibuddho niranvayas+|| -> anādinidhano buddha ādibuddho niranvayaḥ||

kālacakras+akṣaras -> kālacakro 'kṣaras

kālacakro 'kṣaras+sukhas -> kālacakro 'kṣaraḥ sukhas

kālacakro 'kṣaraḥ sukhas+| -> kālacakro 'kṣaraḥ sukhaḥ|

abhedyas+vajrayogas -> abhedyo vajrayogas

abhedyo vajrayogas+asau -> abhedyo vajrayogo 'sau

vajrasattvas+vajrasattvas -> vajrasattvo vajrasattvas

vajrasattvo vajrasattvas+adhidevatā| -> vajrasattvo vajrasattvo 'dhidevatā|

sthitas+|| -> sthitaḥ||

padmapatrāyatākṣas+śrībuddhas -> padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ śrībuddhas

padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ śrībuddhas+siṃhāsane -> padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ śrībuddhaḥ siṃhāsane

sarvajñas+jñānakāyas -> sarvajño jñānakāyas

sarvajño jñānakāyas+yas -> sarvajño jñānakāyo yas

sarvajño jñānakāyo yas+mārtaṇḍavapus -> sarvajño jñānakāyo yo mārtaṇḍavapus

sarvajño jñānakāyo yo mārtaṇḍavapus+avyayas -> sarvajño jñānakāyo yo mārtaṇḍavapur avyayas

sarvajño jñānakāyo yo mārtaṇḍavapur avyayas+| -> sarvajño jñānakāyo yo mārtaṇḍavapur avyayaḥ|

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+iti| -> vijahārasthānanirdeśa iti|

evam+anyeṣu -> evam anyeṣu

evam anyeṣu+api -> evam anyeṣv api

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+| -> vijahārasthānanirdeśaḥ|

evam+mayā -> evaṃ mayā

evaṃ mayā+śrutam -> NO RULE FOUND (ā+ś)

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

evam+māyājāle -> evaṃ māyājāle

evaṃ māyājāle+api -> evaṃ māyājāle 'pi

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+| -> vijahārasthānanirdeśaḥ|

bhagavān+sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajrayoṣidbhageṣu -> bhagavan sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajrayoṣidbhageṣu

bhagavān+āha---evam -> bhagavān āha---evam

bhagavān āha---evam+mayā -> bhagavān āha---evaṃ mayā

bhagavān āha---evaṃ mayā+śrutam -> NO RULE FOUND (ā+ś)

śrutam+ekasmin -> śrutam ekasmin

śrutam ekasmin+samaye -> śrutam ekasmin samaye

syāt+iti| -> syād iti|

kutracit+na -> kutracin na

kutracit+evam -> kutracid evam

kutracid evam+mayā -> kutracid evaṃ mayā

kutracid evaṃ mayā+ādinā -> kutracid evaṃ mayādinā

taduddhṛteṣu+api -> taduddhṛteṣv api

evam+anekatantrarājeṣu -> evam anekatantrarājeṣu

evam anekatantrarājeṣu+api| -> evam anekatantrarājeṣv api|

prathamam+tāvat -> prathamaṃ tāvat

prathamaṃ tāvat+dvādaśasāhasrike -> prathamaṃ tāvad dvādaśasāhasrike

kutracit+na -> kutracin na

kutracin na+asti| -> kutracin nāsti|

māyājāle+ityādi -> māyājāla ityādi

māyājāla ityādi+anekatantrarājeṣu| -> māyājāla ityādy anekatantrarājeṣu|

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+pañcaviṃśatisāhasrike -> vijahārasthānanirdeśaḥ pañcaviṃśatisāhasrike

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

prathamam+tāvat -> prathamaṃ tāvat

prathamaṃ tāvat+evam -> prathamaṃ tāvad evam

prathamaṃ tāvad evam+mayā -> prathamaṃ tāvad evaṃ mayā

vijahārasthānanirdeśas+kutracit -> vijahārasthānanirdeśaḥ kutracit

vijahārasthānanirdeśaḥ kutracit+na| -> vijahārasthānanirdeśaḥ kutracin na|

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

kutracit+evam -> kutracid evam

kutracid evam+mayā -> kutracid evaṃ mayā

saṃgītikārakais+likhiteṣu -> saṃgītikārakair likhiteṣu

saṃskṛtabhāṣayā+api -> saṃskṛtabhāṣayāpi

saṃskṛtabhāṣayā+iti| -> saṃskṛtabhāṣayeti|

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

evam+mayā -> evaṃ mayā

na+ekayā -> naikayā

evam+anekadeśaviṣayā -> evam anekadeśaviṣayā

rukmasya+uttare -> rukmasyottare

prathamam+tāvat -> prathamaṃ tāvat

prathamaṃ tāvat+śrāvakanaye -> prathamaṃ tāvac chrāvakanaye

tathāgatasya+iti| -> tathāgatasyeti|

kaṇṭhatālvādiprayatnatas+janitayā -> kaṇṭhatālvādiprayatnato janitayā

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

śrutam ityādinā+ekadevabhāṣayā -> śrutam ityādinaikadevabhāṣayā

na+evam -> naivam

naivam+mayā -> naivaṃ mayā

atas+sarvatantradeśanā -> ataḥ sarvatantradeśanā

dharmadeśanā+iti| -> dharmadeśaneti|

anekam+vijahārasthānam -> anekaṃ vijahārasthānam

anekaṃ vijahārasthānam+anekās -> anekaṃ vijahārasthānam anekās

anekaṃ vijahārasthānam anekās+adhyeṣakās -> anekaṃ vijahārasthānam anekā adhyeṣakās

anekaṃ vijahārasthānam anekā adhyeṣakās+anekā -> anekaṃ vijahārasthānam anekā adhyeṣakā anekā

sattvānām+nānādhimuktivaśāt -> sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktivaśāt

sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktivaśāt+ekas -> sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktivaśād ekas

sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktivaśād ekas+sarvajñas -> sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktivaśād ekaḥ sarvajñas

sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktivaśād ekaḥ sarvajñas+anekā -> sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktivaśād ekaḥ sarvajño 'nekā

na+ekas -> naikas

naikas+vijahārasthānanirdeśas -> naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśas

naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśas+na -> naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo na

naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo na+ekas -> naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo naikas

naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo naikas+śrāvakasaṅghas -> naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo naikaḥ śrāvakasaṅghas

naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo naikaḥ śrāvakasaṅghas+adhyeṣakas -> naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo naikaḥ śrāvakasaṅgho 'dhyeṣakas

naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo naikaḥ śrāvakasaṅgho 'dhyeṣakas+tathāgatasya -> naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo naikaḥ śrāvakasaṅgho 'dhyeṣakas tathāgatasya

naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo naikaḥ śrāvakasaṅgho 'dhyeṣakas tathāgatasya+iti| -> naiko vijahārasthānanirdeśo naikaḥ śrāvakasaṅgho 'dhyeṣakas tathāgatasyeti|

sarvasattvarutais+arthapratipādikā -> sarvasattvarutair arthapratipādikā

na+ekā -> naikā

iha+apramāṇas -> ihāpramāṇas

ihāpramāṇas+buddhas -> ihāpramāṇo buddhas

ihāpramāṇo buddhas+apramāṇas -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇas

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇas+dharmas -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmas

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmas+apramāṇas -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇas

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇas+saṅghas -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅghas

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅghas+atas -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas+tathāgatavacanāt -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanāt

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanāt+na -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanān na

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanān na+ekas -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanān naikas

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanān naikas+sarvajñas -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanān naikaḥ sarvajñas

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanān naikaḥ sarvajñas+deśakas -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanān naikaḥ sarvajño deśakas

ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanān naikaḥ sarvajño deśakas+| -> ihāpramāṇo buddho 'pramāṇo dharmo 'pramāṇaḥ saṅgho 'tas tathāgatavacanān naikaḥ sarvajño deśakaḥ|

ca+evam| -> caivam|

syāt+caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśanābhāvāt -> syāc caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśanābhāvāt

syāc caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśanābhāvāt+sarvajñas -> syāc caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśanābhāvāt sarvajñas

syāc caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśanābhāvāt sarvajñas+na -> syāc caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśanābhāvāt sarvajño na

iha+anantanirmāṇakāyābhāvāt -> ihānantanirmāṇakāyābhāvāt

ihānantanirmāṇakāyābhāvāt+anantānantalokadhātuṣu -> ihānantanirmāṇakāyābhāvād anantānantalokadhātuṣu

ihānantanirmāṇakāyābhāvād anantānantalokadhātuṣu+anantānantasattvarutais -> ihānantanirmāṇakāyābhāvād anantānantalokadhātuṣv anantānantasattvarutais

ihānantanirmāṇakāyābhāvād anantānantalokadhātuṣv anantānantasattvarutais+yugapat -> ihānantanirmāṇakāyābhāvād anantānantalokadhātuṣv anantānantasattvarutair yugapat

ihānantanirmāṇakāyābhāvād anantānantalokadhātuṣv anantānantasattvarutair yugapat+ca -> ihānantanirmāṇakāyābhāvād anantānantalokadhātuṣv anantānantasattvarutair yugapac ca

likhitum+prādeśikaikasaṃskṛtavacanāt -> likhituṃ prādeśikaikasaṃskṛtavacanāt

likhituṃ prādeśikaikasaṃskṛtavacanāt+iti| -> likhituṃ prādeśikaikasaṃskṛtavacanād iti|

saṃgītikārakas+ca -> saṃgītikārakaś ca

tathāgatas+deśayitum -> tathāgato deśayitum

tathāgato deśayitum+na -> tathāgato deśayituṃ na

caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhān+anekakālais -> caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhān anekakālais

caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhān anekakālais+api -> caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhān anekakālair api

kaṇṭhatālvādiprayatnatas+janitena -> kaṇṭhatālvādiprayatnato janitena

evam+mayā -> evaṃ mayā

evaṃ mayā+śrutam -> NO RULE FOUND (ā+ś)

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

saṃgītikaraṇāt+iti| -> saṃgītikaraṇād iti|

dharmadeśakasya+arthaśaraṇatām -> dharmadeśakasyārthaśaraṇatām

dharmadeśakasyārthaśaraṇatām+āśritatvāt -> dharmadeśakasyārthaśaraṇatām āśritatvāt

dharmadeśakasyārthaśaraṇatām āśritatvāt+saṃgītikārāṇām -> dharmadeśakasyārthaśaraṇatām āśritatvāt saṃgītikārāṇām

dharmadeśakasyārthaśaraṇatām āśritatvāt saṃgītikārāṇām+api -> dharmadeśakasyārthaśaraṇatām āśritatvāt saṃgītikārāṇām api

vajradharabhagavatas+vijahārasthānanirdeśas -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas+tathāgatena -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatena

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatena+uktas -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktas

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktas+tat -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktas tat

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktas tat+na| -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktas tan na|

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

evam+mayā -> evaṃ mayā

bālajanais+vyañjanasaṃjñāśaraṇāśritais -> bālajanair vyañjanasaṃjñāśaraṇāśritais

bālajanair vyañjanasaṃjñāśaraṇāśritais+sarvatantrarājeṣu -> bālajanair vyañjanasaṃjñāśaraṇāśritaiḥ sarvatantrarājeṣu

yat+vaktavyam -> yad vaktavyam

yad vaktavyam+anāgate -> yad vaktavyam anāgate

yad vaktavyam anāgate+adhvani -> yad vaktavyam anāgate 'dhvani

tasmāt+ucyate---iha -> tasmād ucyate---iha

vacanam+bhaviṣyati| -> vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati|

kasyacit+saṃjñāvyañjanaśaraṇāśritasya -> kasyacit saṃjñāvyañjanaśaraṇāśritasya

bhavati+iha -> bhavatīha

deśitam+na -> deśitaṃ na

evam+mayā -> evaṃ mayā

evaṃ mayā+ādivijahārasthānanirdeśānābhāvāt -> evaṃ mayādivijahārasthānanirdeśānābhāvāt

evaṃ mayādivijahārasthānanirdeśānābhāvāt+idam -> evaṃ mayādivijahārasthānanirdeśānābhāvād idam

evaṃ mayādivijahārasthānanirdeśānābhāvād idam+tantrarājam -> evaṃ mayādivijahārasthānanirdeśānābhāvād idaṃ tantrarājam

evaṃ mayādivijahārasthānanirdeśānābhāvād idaṃ tantrarājam+buddhabhagavatā -> evaṃ mayādivijahārasthānanirdeśānābhāvād idaṃ tantrarājaṃ buddhabhagavatā

saṃdeśitam+bhavati| -> saṃdeśitaṃ bhavati|

evam+mayā -> evaṃ mayā

evaṃ mayā+ādirahitam -> evaṃ mayādirahitam

evaṃ mayādirahitam+buddhabhagavatā -> evaṃ mayādirahitaṃ buddhabhagavatā

vajradharabhagavatas+vijahārasthānanirdeśas -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas+tathāgatena -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatena

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatena+uktas -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktas

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktas+katham -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktaḥ katham

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktaḥ katham+idam -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktaḥ katham idam

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktaḥ katham idam+tantrarājam -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktaḥ katham idaṃ tantrarājam

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktaḥ katham idaṃ tantrarājam+sarvajñam -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktaḥ katham idaṃ tantrarājaṃ sarvajñam

vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktaḥ katham idaṃ tantrarājaṃ sarvajñam+ityādinā -> vajradharabhagavato vijahārasthānanirdeśas tathāgatenoktaḥ katham idaṃ tantrarājaṃ sarvajñam ityādinā

śrutam+ityādinā -> śrutam ityādinā

evam+mayā -> evaṃ mayā

tathāgatavyākṛtena+iti| -> tathāgatavyākṛteneti|

caturaśītyakṣarais+deśakasthānamahāparṣadadhyeṣakadharmadeśanāprayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas -> caturaśītyakṣarair deśakasthānamahāparṣadadhyeṣakadharmadeśanāprayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas

caturaśītyakṣarair deśakasthānamahāparṣadadhyeṣakadharmadeśanāprayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas+mūlatantrarājāt -> caturaśītyakṣarair deśakasthānamahāparṣadadhyeṣakadharmadeśanāprayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgraho mūlatantrarājāt

caturaśītyakṣarair deśakasthānamahāparṣadadhyeṣakadharmadeśanāprayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgraho mūlatantrarājāt+uddhṛtya -> caturaśītyakṣarair deśakasthānamahāparṣadadhyeṣakadharmadeśanāprayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgraho mūlatantrarājād uddhṛtya

iti+ebhis -> ity ebhis

ity ebhis+yathānukrameṇa -> ity ebhir yathānukrameṇa

muktihetos+narāṇām -> muktihetor narāṇām

muktihetor narāṇām+iti -> muktihetor narāṇām iti

muktihetor narāṇām iti+ebhis -> muktihetor narāṇām ity ebhis

muktihetor narāṇām ity ebhis+saptākṣarais -> muktihetor narāṇām ity ebhiḥ saptākṣarais

muktihetor narāṇām ity ebhiḥ saptākṣarais+prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas -> muktihetor narāṇām ity ebhiḥ saptākṣaraiḥ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas

muktihetor narāṇām ity ebhiḥ saptākṣaraiḥ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahas+kṛtas -> muktihetor narāṇām ity ebhiḥ saptākṣaraiḥ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas

muktihetor narāṇām ity ebhiḥ saptākṣaraiḥ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas+| -> muktihetor narāṇām ity ebhiḥ saptākṣaraiḥ prayojanaprayojanaprayojanasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ|

kaliyugasamye+iti -> kaliyugasamya iti

kaliyugasamya iti+ebhis -> kaliyugasamya ity ebhis

kaliyugasamya ity ebhis+caturdaśākṣarais -> kaliyugasamya ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣarais

kaliyugasamya ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣarais+saddharmadeśanāsaṃgrahas -> kaliyugasamya ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣaraiḥ saddharmadeśanāsaṃgrahas

kaliyugasamya ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣaraiḥ saddharmadeśanāsaṃgrahas+kṛtas -> kaliyugasamya ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣaraiḥ saddharmadeśanāsaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas

kaliyugasamya ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣaraiḥ saddharmadeśanāsaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas+| -> kaliyugasamya ity ebhiś caturdaśākṣaraiḥ saddharmadeśanāsaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ|

yogam+śrīkālacakre -> yogaṃ śrīkālacakre

sucandras+karakamalapuṭam -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭam

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭam+sthāpayitvā -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvā

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvā+uttamāṅge -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅge

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅge+iti -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga iti

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga iti+ebhis -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga ity ebhis

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga ity ebhis+aṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarais -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga ity ebhir aṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarais

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga ity ebhir aṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarais+adhyeṣakasaṃgrahas -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga ity ebhir aṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarair adhyeṣakasaṃgrahas

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga ity ebhir aṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarair adhyeṣakasaṃgrahas+kṛtas -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga ity ebhir aṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarair adhyeṣakasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga ity ebhir aṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarair adhyeṣakasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas+| -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅga ity ebhir aṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarair adhyeṣakasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ|

pṛcchet+rājā -> pṛcched rājā

suravaranamitam+iti -> suravaranamitam iti

suravaranamitam iti+ebhis -> suravaranamitam ity ebhis

suravaranamitam ity ebhis+saptākṣarais -> suravaranamitam ity ebhiḥ saptākṣarais

suravaranamitam ity ebhiḥ saptākṣarais+mahāparṣatsaṃgrahas -> suravaranamitam ity ebhiḥ saptākṣarair mahāparṣatsaṃgrahas

suravaranamitam ity ebhiḥ saptākṣarair mahāparṣatsaṃgrahas+kṛtas -> suravaranamitam ity ebhiḥ saptākṣarair mahāparṣatsaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas

suravaranamitam ity ebhiḥ saptākṣarair mahāparṣatsaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas+| -> suravaranamitam ity ebhiḥ saptākṣarair mahāparṣatsaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ|

siṃhāsanastham+iti -> siṃhāsanastham iti

siṃhāsanastham iti+ebhis -> siṃhāsanastham ity ebhis

siṃhāsanastham ity ebhis+pañcākṣarais -> siṃhāsanastham ity ebhiḥ pañcākṣarais

siṃhāsanastham ity ebhiḥ pañcākṣarais+sthānasaṃgrahas -> siṃhāsanastham ity ebhiḥ pañcākṣaraiḥ sthānasaṃgrahas

siṃhāsanastham ity ebhiḥ pañcākṣaraiḥ sthānasaṃgrahas+kṛtas -> siṃhāsanastham ity ebhiḥ pañcākṣaraiḥ sthānasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas

siṃhāsanastham ity ebhiḥ pañcākṣaraiḥ sthānasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas+| -> siṃhāsanastham ity ebhiḥ pañcākṣaraiḥ sthānasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ|

deśakasaṃgrahas+tāvat -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat+sarvajñam -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñam

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñam+jñānakāyam -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyam

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyam+dinakaravapuṣam -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣam

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣam+padmapatrāyatākṣam -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣam

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣam+buddham -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham+iti -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham iti

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham iti+ebhis -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham ity ebhis

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham ity ebhis+trayoviṃśatyakṣarais -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham ity ebhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarais

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham ity ebhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarais+deśakasaṃgrahas -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham ity ebhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarair deśakasaṃgrahas

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham ity ebhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarair deśakasaṃgrahas+kṛtas -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham ity ebhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarair deśakasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas

deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham ity ebhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarair deśakasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtas+bhagavatā| -> deśakasaṃgrahas tāvat sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ buddham ity ebhis trayoviṃśatyakṣarair deśakasaṃgrahaḥ kṛto bhagavatā|

prayojanaprayojanaprayojanam+iti| -> prayojanaprayojanaprayojanam iti|

deśakādayas+deśakas -> deśakādayo deśakas

deśakādayo deśakas+sthānam -> deśakādayo deśakaḥ sthānam

deśakādayo deśakaḥ sthānam+mahāparṣat -> deśakādayo deśakaḥ sthānaṃ mahāparṣat

deśakādayo deśakaḥ sthānaṃ mahāparṣat+adhyeṣakas -> deśakādayo deśakaḥ sthānaṃ mahāparṣad adhyeṣakas

deśakādayo deśakaḥ sthānaṃ mahāparṣad adhyeṣakas+dharmadeśanā -> deśakādayo deśakaḥ sthānaṃ mahāparṣad adhyeṣako dharmadeśanā

saṃgītam+iti| -> saṃgītam iti|

deśakādīnām+saṃgrahārtham -> deśakādīnāṃ saṃgrahārtham

deśakādīnāṃ saṃgrahārtham+idam -> deśakādīnāṃ saṃgrahārtham idam

deśakādīnāṃ saṃgrahārtham idam+ādivṛttam -> deśakādīnāṃ saṃgrahārtham idam ādivṛttam

deśakādīnāṃ saṃgrahārtham idam ādivṛttam+bhagavatā -> deśakādīnāṃ saṃgrahārtham idam ādivṛttaṃ bhagavatā

muktihetos+narāṇām|| -> muktihetor narāṇām||

yogam+śrīkālacakre -> yogaṃ śrīkālacakre

sucandras+karakamalapuṭam -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭam

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭam+sthāpayitvā -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvā

sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvā+uttamāṅge -> sucandraḥ karakamalapuṭaṃ sthāpayitvottamāṅge

pṛcchet+rājā -> pṛcched rājā

buddham+siṃhāsanastham -> buddhaṃ siṃhāsanastham

buddhaṃ siṃhāsanastham+suravaranamitam -> buddhaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ suravaranamitam

buddhaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ suravaranamitam+mastakena -> buddhaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ suravaranamitaṃ mastakena

sarvajñam+jñānakāyam -> sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyam

sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyam+dinakaravapuṣam -> sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣam

sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣam+padmapatrāyatākṣam -> sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyaṃ dinakaravapuṣaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣam

vyākṛtam+āha--- -> vyākṛtam āha---

mañjuśrībhagavān+nirmitakāyas -> mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyas

mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyas+yaśonarendras -> mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendras

mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendras+deśakādisaṃgrahavṛttam -> mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendro deśakādisaṃgrahavṛttam

mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendro deśakādisaṃgrahavṛttam+prathamam -> mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendro deśakādisaṃgrahavṛttaṃ prathamam

mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendro deśakādisaṃgrahavṛttaṃ prathamam+paramādibuddhāt -> mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendro deśakādisaṃgrahavṛttaṃ prathamaṃ paramādibuddhāt

mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendro deśakādisaṃgrahavṛttaṃ prathamaṃ paramādibuddhāt+tathāgatena -> mañjuśrībhagavān nirmitakāyo yaśonarendro deśakādisaṃgrahavṛttaṃ prathamaṃ paramādibuddhāt tathāgatena

yaśorājñe+iti| -> yaśorājña iti|

mahātantrarājāt+uddhāryamāṇam| -> mahātantrarājād uddhāryamāṇam|

laghutantrarājasadbhāvam+prajñopāyātmakam -> laghutantrarājasadbhāvaṃ prajñopāyātmakam

laghutantrarājasadbhāvaṃ prajñopāyātmakam+yogam -> laghutantrarājasadbhāvaṃ prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogam

laghutantrarājasadbhāvaṃ prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogam+sragdharāvṛttasaṃgītyā -> laghutantrarājasadbhāvaṃ prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogaṃ sragdharāvṛttasaṃgītyā

tvam+api -> tvam api

tvam api+ekāgramanās -> tvam apy ekāgramanās

tvam apy ekāgramanās+śṛṇu -> tvam apy ekāgramanāḥ śṛṇu

pṛṣṭam+tat -> pṛṣṭaṃ tat

pṛṣṭaṃ tat+sarvam -> pṛṣṭaṃ tat sarvam

pṛṣṭaṃ tat sarvam+aham -> pṛṣṭaṃ tat sarvam aham

pṛṣṭaṃ tat sarvam aham+deśayāmi -> pṛṣṭaṃ tat sarvam ahaṃ deśayāmi

idam+yat -> idaṃ yat

idaṃ yat+paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvam -> idaṃ yat paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvam

idaṃ yat paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvam+laukikalokottarasiddhisādhakam -> idaṃ yat paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhakam

idaṃ yat paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhakam+kālacakravajrayogam -> idaṃ yat paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhakaṃ kālacakravajrayogam

idaṃ yat paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhakaṃ kālacakravajrayogam+tvayā -> idaṃ yat paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhakaṃ kālacakravajrayogaṃ tvayā

paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvam+śrotum -> paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ śrotum

paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ śrotum+mattas -> paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ śrotuṃ mattas

paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ śrotuṃ mattas+samudyatas -> paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ śrotuṃ mattaḥ samudyatas

paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ śrotuṃ mattaḥ samudyatas+| -> paramādibuddhatantrarājasadbhāvaṃ śrotuṃ mattaḥ samudyataḥ|

tvam+brahmaṛṣikulādīnām -> tvaṃ brahmaṛṣikulādīnām

tvaṃ brahmaṛṣikulādīnām+sarvasattvānām -> tvaṃ brahmaṛṣikulādīnāṃ sarvasattvānām

tvaṃ brahmaṛṣikulādīnāṃ sarvasattvānām+samyaksambuddhatvamārgalābhāya -> tvaṃ brahmaṛṣikulādīnāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ samyaksambuddhatvamārgalābhāya

mahāratnasiṃhāsanasthas+devāsuranāganirmitakāyais -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyais

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyais+ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtais -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtais

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtais+mahāratnamukuṭabaddhais -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhais

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhais+koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhis -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhis

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhis+namaskṛtacaraṇāravindas -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindas

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindas+sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtis -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtis

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtis+sūryarathādhyeṣitas -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtiḥ sūryarathādhyeṣitas

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtiḥ sūryarathādhyeṣitas+yaśonarendras -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtiḥ sūryarathādhyeṣito yaśonarendras

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtiḥ sūryarathādhyeṣito yaśonarendras+sūryaratham -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtiḥ sūryarathādhyeṣito yaśonarendraḥ sūryaratham

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtiḥ sūryarathādhyeṣito yaśonarendraḥ sūryaratham+idam -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtiḥ sūryarathādhyeṣito yaśonarendraḥ sūryaratham idam

mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtiḥ sūryarathādhyeṣito yaśonarendraḥ sūryaratham idam+avocat| -> mahāratnasiṃhāsanastho devāsuranāganirmitakāyaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatimahārājakulaprasūtair mahāratnamukuṭabaddhaiḥ koṭikoṭigrāmādhipatibhir namaskṛtacaraṇāravindaḥ sarvatathāgataprajñāmūrtiḥ sūryarathādhyeṣito yaśonarendraḥ sūryaratham idam avocat|

laghutantrarājam+vitanomi -> laghutantrarājaṃ vitanomi

laghutantrarājaṃ vitanomi+iti| -> laghutantrarājaṃ vitanomīti|

idānīm+mañjuśrīnirmitayaśonarendrasūryarathadeśakādhyeṣakādisambandhādinā -> idānīṃ mañjuśrīnirmitayaśonarendrasūryarathadeśakādhyeṣakādisambandhādinā

dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām+deśakālādhyeṣakamūlatantralaghutantrasambandhoddeśas -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakālādhyeṣakamūlatantralaghutantrasambandhoddeśas

dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakālādhyeṣakamūlatantralaghutantrasambandhoddeśas+tṛtīyas -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakālādhyeṣakamūlatantralaghutantrasambandhoddeśas tṛtīyas

dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakālādhyeṣakamūlatantralaghutantrasambandhoddeśas tṛtīyas+|| -> dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ deśakālādhyeṣakamūlatantralaghutantrasambandhoddeśas tṛtīyaḥ||

mūlatantrānusāriṇyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

buddhānām+bodhisattvānām -> buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānām

buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānām+dharmadeśanā -> buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmadeśanā

prakāreṇa+arthaśaraṇatām -> prakāreṇārthaśaraṇatām

prakāreṇārthaśaraṇatām+āśritya -> prakāreṇārthaśaraṇatām āśritya

kulavidyāsuśabdābhimānakṣayas+bhavati -> kulavidyāsuśabdābhimānakṣayo bhavati

likhitavyam+mayā -> likhitavyaṃ mayā

likhitavyaṃ mayā+arthaśaraṇatām -> likhitavyaṃ mayārthaśaraṇatām

likhitavyaṃ mayārthaśaraṇatām+āśritya -> likhitavyaṃ mayārthaśaraṇatām āśritya

likhitavyaṃ mayārthaśaraṇatām āśritya+iti| -> likhitavyaṃ mayārthaśaraṇatām āśrityeti|

evam+ṭīkāyām -> evaṃ ṭīkāyām

evaṃ ṭīkāyām+api -> evaṃ ṭīkāyām api

iti+evamādayas -> ity evamādayas

ity evamādayas+anye -> ity evamādayo 'nye

ity evamādayo 'nye+api -> ity evamādayo 'nye 'pi

ity evamādayo 'nye 'pi+apaśabdās -> ity evamādayo 'nye 'py apaśabdās

ity evamādayo 'nye 'py apaśabdās+yoginā -> ity evamādayo 'nye 'py apaśabdā yoginā

ity evamādayo 'nye 'py apaśabdā yoginā+avagantavyās -> ity evamādayo 'nye 'py apaśabdā yogināvagantavyās

ity evamādayo 'nye 'py apaśabdā yogināvagantavyās+āgamapāṭhāt -> ity evamādayo 'nye 'py apaśabdā yogināvagantavyā āgamapāṭhāt

ity evamādayo 'nye 'py apaśabdā yogināvagantavyā āgamapāṭhāt+iti| -> ity evamādayo 'nye 'py apaśabdā yogināvagantavyā āgamapāṭhād iti|

satsutas+|| -> satsutaḥ||

mahāmudrām+gurau -> mahāmudrāṃ gurau
