bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

evam+anye -> evam anye

evam anye+api -> evam anye 'pi

evam anye 'pi+anusartavyās -> evam anye 'py anusartavyās

evam anye 'py anusartavyās+tantradeśakopadeśakena -> evam anye 'py anusartavyās tantradeśakopadeśakena

evam anye 'py anusartavyās tantradeśakopadeśakena+iti| -> evam anye 'py anusartavyās tantradeśakopadeśakeneti|

kvacit+dantye -> kvacid dantye

kvacit+mūrdhanye -> kvacin mūrdhanye

pulliṅgam+kvacit -> pulliṅgaṃ kvacit

pulliṅgaṃ kvacit+tālavyaśakāre -> pulliṅgaṃ kvacit tālavyaśakāre

napuṃsakam+napuṃsake -> napuṃsakaṃ napuṃsake

ekavacanam+pulliṅge -> ekavacanaṃ pulliṅge

bahuvacanam+bahuvacane -> bahuvacanaṃ bahuvacane

parasmaipadam+kvacit -> parasmaipadaṃ kvacit

parasmaipadaṃ kvacit+ekavacane -> parasmaipadaṃ kvacid ekavacane

dhātau+ātmanepadam -> dhātāv ātmanepadam

dhātāv ātmanepadam+ātmanepadini -> dhātāv ātmanepadam ātmanepadini

kutracit+parasmaipadini -> kutracit parasmaipadini

dīrghas+kvacit -> dīrghaḥ kvacit

dīrghaḥ kvacit+pañcamyarthe -> dīrghaḥ kvacit pañcamyarthe

dīrghas+hrasvas -> dīrgho hrasvas

dīrgho hrasvas+hrasvas -> dīrgho hrasvo hrasvas

dīrgho hrasvo hrasvas+api -> dīrgho hrasvo hrasvo 'pi

yatibhaṅgas+kvacit -> yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacit

yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacit+avibhaktikam -> yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikam

yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikam+padam -> yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikaṃ padam

yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikaṃ padam+kvacit -> yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikaṃ padaṃ kvacit

yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikaṃ padaṃ kvacit+varṇasvaralopas -> yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikaṃ padaṃ kvacid varṇasvaralopas

yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikaṃ padaṃ kvacid varṇasvaralopas+kvacit -> yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikaṃ padaṃ kvacid varṇasvaralopaḥ kvacit

yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikaṃ padaṃ kvacid varṇasvaralopaḥ kvacit+vṛtte -> yatibhaṅgaḥ kvacid avibhaktikaṃ padaṃ kvacid varṇasvaralopaḥ kvacid vṛtte

kvacit+vṛtte -> kvacid vṛtte

kvacit+vṛtte -> kvacid vṛtte

kvacid vṛtte+apaśabdas -> kvacid vṛtte 'paśabdas

suśabdavādinām+suśabdagrahavināśāya -> suśabdavādināṃ suśabdagrahavināśāya

suśabdavādināṃ suśabdagrahavināśāya+arthaśaraṇatām -> suśabdavādināṃ suśabdagrahavināśāyārthaśaraṇatām

suśabdavādināṃ suśabdagrahavināśāyārthaśaraṇatām+āśritya -> suśabdavādināṃ suśabdagrahavināśāyārthaśaraṇatām āśritya

teṣām+ca -> teṣāṃ ca

sragdharāvṛttais+sarvajñadeśakādisaṃgrāhakais -> sragdharāvṛttaiḥ sarvajñadeśakādisaṃgrāhakais

sragdharāvṛttaiḥ sarvajñadeśakādisaṃgrāhakais+tantrarājam -> sragdharāvṛttaiḥ sarvajñadeśakādisaṃgrāhakais tantrarājam

sragdharāvṛttaiḥ sarvajñadeśakādisaṃgrāhakais tantrarājam+deśayati| -> sragdharāvṛttaiḥ sarvajñadeśakādisaṃgrāhakais tantrarājaṃ deśayati|

brahmaṛṣīṇām+adhimukticittavaśāt -> brahmaṛṣīṇām adhimukticittavaśāt

brahmaṛṣīṇām adhimukticittavaśāt+tathāgatādhiṣṭhānabalena -> brahmaṛṣīṇām adhimukticittavaśāt tathāgatādhiṣṭhānabalena

sūryarathādhyeṣaṇām+śrutvā -> sūryarathādhyeṣaṇāṃ śrutvā

brahmaṛṣīṇām+śāste -> brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ śāste

tat+eva -> tad eva

tad eva+alpagranthena -> tad evālpagranthena

tad evālpagranthena+ādibuddham -> tad evālpagranthenādibuddham

tad evālpagranthenādibuddham+alpatantrarājam -> tad evālpagranthenādibuddham alpatantrarājam

tad evālpagranthenādibuddham alpatantrarājam+saṃgītim -> tad evālpagranthenādibuddham alpatantrarājaṃ saṃgītim

tad evālpagranthenādibuddham alpatantrarājaṃ saṃgītim+kṛtvā -> tad evālpagranthenādibuddham alpatantrarājaṃ saṃgītiṃ kṛtvā

ṣaḍdvādaśasāhasrikām+ādibuddham -> ṣaḍdvādaśasāhasrikām ādibuddham

ṣaḍdvādaśasāhasrikām ādibuddham+sucandrarājñas -> ṣaḍdvādaśasāhasrikām ādibuddhaṃ sucandrarājñas

ṣaḍdvādaśasāhasrikām ādibuddhaṃ sucandrarājñas+tathāgatena -> ṣaḍdvādaśasāhasrikām ādibuddhaṃ sucandrarājñas tathāgatena

iyam+(?)% -> iyam(?)%

saṃgṛhītās+mahāmudrālābhinas -> saṃgṛhītā mahāmudrālābhinas

saṃgṛhītā mahāmudrālābhinas+vyākṛtās -> saṃgṛhītā mahāmudrālābhino vyākṛtās

saṃgṛhītā mahāmudrālābhino vyākṛtās+| -> saṃgṛhītā mahāmudrālābhino vyākṛtāḥ|

vyākṛtās+iha -> vyākṛtā iha

vyākṛtā iha+eva -> vyākṛtā ihaiva

pañcānantaryakāriṇas+api -> pañcānantaryakāriṇo 'pi

bhagavān+tantrarājam -> bhagavāṃś tantrarājam

bhagavāṃś tantrarājam+ādibuddham -> bhagavāṃś tantrarājam ādibuddham

bhagavāṃś tantrarājam ādibuddham+yasmin -> bhagavāṃś tantrarājam ādibuddhaṃ yasmin

bhagavāṃś tantrarājam ādibuddhaṃ yasmin+buddhatvāya -> bhagavāṃś tantrarājam ādibuddhaṃ yasmin buddhatvāya

yaśonarendram+adhyeṣayati---deśayatu -> yaśonarendram adhyeṣayati---deśayatu

karapuṭam+dattvā -> karapuṭaṃ dattvā

dakṣiṇam+jānumaṇḍalam -> dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalam

dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalam+pṛthivyām -> dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyām

dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyām+saṃsthāpya -> dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ saṃsthāpya

brahmaṛṣibhis+sārdham -> brahmaṛṣibhiḥ sārdham

brahmaṛṣibhiḥ sārdham+yaśaḥpādau -> brahmaṛṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ yaśaḥpādau

ratnapuṣpāñjalim+prakṣipya -> ratnapuṣpāñjaliṃ prakṣipya

sūryarathas+ratnasuvarṇamayais -> sūryaratho ratnasuvarṇamayais

sūryaratho ratnasuvarṇamayais+puṣpais -> sūryaratho ratnasuvarṇamayaiḥ puṣpais

sūryaratho ratnasuvarṇamayaiḥ puṣpais+maṇḍalam -> sūryaratho ratnasuvarṇamayaiḥ puṣpair maṇḍalam

sūryaratho ratnasuvarṇamayaiḥ puṣpair maṇḍalam+kṛtvā -> sūryaratho ratnasuvarṇamayaiḥ puṣpair maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā

sarve+adhyeṣaṇām -> sarve 'dhyeṣaṇām

sarve 'dhyeṣaṇām+kariṣyāmas -> sarve 'dhyeṣaṇāṃ kariṣyāmas

sarve 'dhyeṣaṇāṃ kariṣyāmas+|| -> sarve 'dhyeṣaṇāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ||

maṇḍalapūrvaṃgamam+śaraṇam -> maṇḍalapūrvaṃgamaṃ śaraṇam

maṇḍalapūrvaṃgamaṃ śaraṇam+gatvā -> maṇḍalapūrvaṃgamaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā

vayam+api -> vayam api

yaśorājñas+adhyeṣaṇām -> yaśorājño 'dhyeṣaṇām

yaśorājño 'dhyeṣaṇām+kuru| -> yaśorājño 'dhyeṣaṇāṃ kuru|

tvam+vedādiśāstraikapustakasarvalaukikalokottaraśāstraprameyagrāhakahṛdayas -> tvaṃ vedādiśāstraikapustakasarvalaukikalokottaraśāstraprameyagrāhakahṛdayas

tvaṃ vedādiśāstraikapustakasarvalaukikalokottaraśāstraprameyagrāhakahṛdayas+tena -> tvaṃ vedādiśāstraikapustakasarvalaukikalokottaraśāstraprameyagrāhakahṛdayas tena

tvaṃ vedādiśāstraikapustakasarvalaukikalokottaraśāstraprameyagrāhakahṛdayas tena+asmākam -> tvaṃ vedādiśāstraikapustakasarvalaukikalokottaraśāstraprameyagrāhakahṛdayas tenāsmākam

tvaṃ vedādiśāstraikapustakasarvalaukikalokottaraśāstraprameyagrāhakahṛdayas tenāsmākam+adhyeṣaṇāvacanena -> tvaṃ vedādiśāstraikapustakasarvalaukikalokottaraśāstraprameyagrāhakahṛdayas tenāsmākam adhyeṣaṇāvacanena

sūryarathas+rājā -> sūryaratho rājā

sūryaratho rājā+āmantritas -> sūryaratho rājāmantritas

sūryaratho rājāmantritas+he -> sūryaratho rājāmantrito he

tais+ṛṣibhis -> tair ṛṣibhis

tair ṛṣibhis+brahmakule -> tair ṛṣibhir brahmakule

evam+uktvā -> evam uktvā

janmani+iti| -> janmanīti|

laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇām+kurmas -> laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurmas

laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurmas+sakalasattvānām -> laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurmaḥ sakalasattvānām

laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurmaḥ sakalasattvānām+samyaksambuddhatvalābhāya -> laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurmaḥ sakalasattvānāṃ samyaksambuddhatvalābhāya

laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurmaḥ sakalasattvānāṃ samyaksambuddhatvalābhāya+iha -> laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurmaḥ sakalasattvānāṃ samyaksambuddhatvalābhāyeha

laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurmaḥ sakalasattvānāṃ samyaksambuddhatvalābhāyeha+eva -> laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kurmaḥ sakalasattvānāṃ samyaksambuddhatvalābhāyehaiva

vacanena+asmākam -> vacanenāsmākam

vacanenāsmākam+cittaprabodhas -> vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodhas

vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodhas+abhūt -> vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodho 'bhūt

vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodho 'bhūt+tasmāt -> vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodho 'bhūt tasmāt

vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodho 'bhūt tasmāt+idānīm -> vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodho 'bhūt tasmād idānīm

vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodho 'bhūt tasmād idānīm+ratnatrayaśaraṇam -> vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodho 'bhūt tasmād idānīṃ ratnatrayaśaraṇam

vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodho 'bhūt tasmād idānīṃ ratnatrayaśaraṇam+gatvā -> vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabodho 'bhūt tasmād idānīṃ ratnatrayaśaraṇaṃ gatvā

sūryarathādayas+brahmaṛṣayas -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayas

sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayas+prabuddhās -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ prabuddhās

sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ prabuddhās+idam -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ prabuddhā idam

sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ prabuddhā idam+vacanam -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ prabuddhā idaṃ vacanam

sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ prabuddhā idaṃ vacanam+āhus -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ prabuddhā idaṃ vacanam āhus

sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ prabuddhā idaṃ vacanam āhus+---sādhu -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ prabuddhā idaṃ vacanam āhuḥ---sādhu

laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇam+kuruta -> laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇaṃ kuruta

laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇaṃ kuruta+iti| -> laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇaṃ kuruteti|

pādayos+śaraṇam -> pādayoḥ śaraṇam

pādayoḥ śaraṇam+gatvā -> pādayoḥ śaraṇaṃ gatvā

pādayoḥ śaraṇaṃ gatvā+ādibuddhatantrarāje -> pādayoḥ śaraṇaṃ gatvādibuddhatantrarāje

buddhādhiṣṭhānena+abhūt -> buddhādhiṣṭhānenābhūt

buddhādhiṣṭhānenābhūt+tasmāt -> buddhādhiṣṭhānenābhūt tasmāt

buddhādhiṣṭhānenābhūt tasmāt+asya -> buddhādhiṣṭhānenābhūt tasmād asya

mahābodhisattvas+yuṣmākam -> mahābodhisattvo yuṣmākam

mahābodhisattvo yuṣmākam+anugrahārthī -> mahābodhisattvo yuṣmākam anugrahārthī

kas+api -> ko 'pi

prādeśikas+na -> prādeśiko na

ayam+yaśorājā -> ayaṃ yaśorājā

vismayam+kuruta| -> vismayaṃ kuruta|

sūryarathādayas+brahmaṛṣayas -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayas

sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayas+mā -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayo mā

sāgaramatinā+uktam---he -> sāgaramatinoktam---he

brahmaṛṣīṇām+yaśorājñas -> brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ yaśorājñas

brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ yaśorājñas+mantriṇā -> brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ yaśorājño mantriṇā

iti+evam -> ity evam

ity evam+etat -> ity evam etat

ity evam etat+vacanam -> ity evam etad vacanam

ity evam etad vacanam+śrutvā -> ity evam etad vacanaṃ śrutvā

mahāścaryam+idam -> mahāścaryam idam

mahāścaryam idam+vayam -> mahāścaryam idaṃ vayam

mahāścaryam idaṃ vayam+mahāvanāt -> mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanāt

mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanāt+aprabuddhās -> mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanād aprabuddhās

mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanād aprabuddhās+santas -> mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanād aprabuddhāḥ santas

mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanād aprabuddhāḥ santas+kena -> mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanād aprabuddhāḥ santaḥ kena

mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanād aprabuddhāḥ santaḥ kena+anītās -> mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanād aprabuddhāḥ santaḥ kenānītās

mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanād aprabuddhāḥ santaḥ kenānītās+mahāmaṇḍalagṛhe% -> mahāścaryam idaṃ vayaṃ mahāvanād aprabuddhāḥ santaḥ kenānītā mahāmaṇḍalagṛhe%

vismayam+āpannās -> vismayam āpannās

vismayam āpannās+idam -> vismayam āpannā idam

vismayam āpannā idam+vacanam -> vismayam āpannā idaṃ vacanam

vismayam āpannā idaṃ vacanam+āhus -> vismayam āpannā idaṃ vacanam āhus

vismayam āpannā idaṃ vacanam āhus+---aho -> vismayam āpannā idaṃ vacanam āhuḥ---aho

tam+dṛṣṭvā -> taṃ dṛṣṭvā

maṇḍalagṛham+malayodyāne -> maṇḍalagṛhaṃ malayodyāne

tat+eva -> tad eva

prakṣiptās+santas -> prakṣiptāḥ santas

prakṣiptāḥ santas+prabuddhās -> prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ prabuddhās

prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ prabuddhās+yaśonarendram -> prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ prabuddhā yaśonarendram

prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ prabuddhā yaśonarendram+paśyanti| -> prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ prabuddhā yaśonarendraṃ paśyanti|

mahāmaṇḍalagṛham+ānītās -> mahāmaṇḍalagṛham ānītās

mahāmaṇḍalagṛham ānītās+yaśonarendrasya -> mahāmaṇḍalagṛham ānītā yaśonarendrasya

punar+eva -> punar eva

ṛṣayas+bandhayitvā -> ṛṣayo bandhayitvā

mohitās+santas -> mohitāḥ santas

mohitāḥ santas+tasmin -> mohitāḥ santas tasmin

mohitāḥ santas tasmin+vananivāsibhis -> mohitāḥ santas tasmin vananivāsibhis

mohitāḥ santas tasmin vananivāsibhis+śabarādibhis -> mohitāḥ santas tasmin vananivāsibhiḥ śabarādibhis

mohitāḥ santas tasmin vananivāsibhiḥ śabarādibhis+sarve% -> mohitāḥ santas tasmin vananivāsibhiḥ śabarādibhiḥ sarve%

ṛṣayas+tasmin -> ṛṣayas tasmin

ṛṣayas tasmin+eva -> ṛṣayas tasminn eva

samādhim+samāpannas -> samādhiṃ samāpannas

samādhiṃ samāpannas+| -> samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ|

yaśonarendras+sarvaviṣṇubrahmarudrakulamohanam -> yaśonarendraḥ sarvaviṣṇubrahmarudrakulamohanam

yaśonarendraḥ sarvaviṣṇubrahmarudrakulamohanam+nāma -> yaśonarendraḥ sarvaviṣṇubrahmarudrakulamohanaṃ nāma

evam+sarvajanānām -> evaṃ sarvajanānām

evaṃ sarvajanānām+svacittābhiprāyam -> evaṃ sarvajanānāṃ svacittābhiprāyam

evaṃ sarvajanānāṃ svacittābhiprāyam+jñātvā -> evaṃ sarvajanānāṃ svacittābhiprāyaṃ jñātvā

gambhīrodāradharmābhājane+abhavyacittāt| -> gambhīrodāradharmābhājane 'bhavyacittāt|

kṣatriyādayas+janās -> kṣatriyādayo janās

kṣatriyādayo janās+cintayantas -> kṣatriyādayo janāś cintayantas

kṣatriyādayo janāś cintayantas+durbhagās -> kṣatriyādayo janāś cintayanto durbhagās

kṣatriyādayo janāś cintayanto durbhagās+bhaviṣyanti -> kṣatriyādayo janāś cintayanto durbhagā bhaviṣyanti

mokṣārthinas+iti -> mokṣārthina iti

gṛhītvā+āryaviṣayam -> gṛhītvāryaviṣayam

gṛhītvāryaviṣayam+gatās -> gṛhītvāryaviṣayaṃ gatās

gṛhītvāryaviṣayaṃ gatās+| -> gṛhītvāryaviṣayaṃ gatāḥ|

svasthānam+parityajya -> svasthānaṃ parityajya

ṛṣayas+śrīyaśorājñas -> ṛṣayaḥ śrīyaśorājñas

ṛṣayaḥ śrīyaśorājñas+bhayena -> ṛṣayaḥ śrīyaśorājño bhayena

vajrayānoktas+samyagjñānamārgas -> vajrayānoktaḥ samyagjñānamārgas

vajrayānoktaḥ samyagjñānamārgas+na -> vajrayānoktaḥ samyagjñānamārgo na

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinām+sarvasattvānām -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsināṃ sarvasattvānām

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsināṃ sarvasattvānām+vaiṣamyacittam -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vaiṣamyacittam

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vaiṣamyacittam+bhaviṣyati -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vaiṣamyacittaṃ bhaviṣyati

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vaiṣamyacittaṃ bhaviṣyati+iha -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vaiṣamyacittaṃ bhaviṣyatīha

jñātam+yathā -> jñātaṃ yathā

jñātaṃ yathā+eṣām -> jñātaṃ yathaiṣām

jñātaṃ yathaiṣām+brahmaṛṣīṇām -> jñātaṃ yathaiṣāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām

jñātaṃ yathaiṣāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām+āryaviṣaye -> jñātaṃ yathaiṣāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām āryaviṣaye

praviṣṭānām+pañcābhijñābalena -> praviṣṭānāṃ pañcābhijñābalena

teṣām+vanamadhye -> teṣāṃ vanamadhye

vanāntaram+praviṣṭās -> vanāntaraṃ praviṣṭās

vanāntaraṃ praviṣṭās+| -> vanāntaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ|

brahmaṛṣayas+kalāpagrāmāt -> brahmaṛṣayaḥ kalāpagrāmāt

brahmaṛṣayaḥ kalāpagrāmāt+nirgatās -> brahmaṛṣayaḥ kalāpagrāmān nirgatās

brahmaṛṣayaḥ kalāpagrāmān nirgatās+daśame -> brahmaṛṣayaḥ kalāpagrāmān nirgatā daśame

samyagjñānamārgalābhinas+bhaviṣyanti -> samyagjñānamārgalābhino bhaviṣyanti

samyagjñānamārgalābhino bhaviṣyanti+iti| -> samyagjñānamārgalābhino bhaviṣyantīti|

kālacakrabhagavatas+adhiṣṭhānena -> kālacakrabhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānena

sattvās+prāṇātipātādyakuśalakarmapathān -> sattvāḥ prāṇātipātādyakuśalakarmapathān

sattvāḥ prāṇātipātādyakuśalakarmapathān+parityajya -> sattvāḥ prāṇātipātādyakuśalakarmapathan parityajya

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinas+sarve -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinaḥ sarve

bhavantas+yena -> bhavanto yena

sūryarathavacanāt+yaśorājā -> sūryarathavacanād yaśorājā

sūryarathavacanād yaśorājā+āha---śīghram -> sūryarathavacanād yaśorājāha---śīghram

sūryarathavacanād yaśorājāha---śīghram+sambhalaviṣayāt -> sūryarathavacanād yaśorājāha---śīghraṃ sambhalaviṣayāt

sūryarathavacanād yaśorājāha---śīghraṃ sambhalaviṣayāt+nirgacchantu -> sūryarathavacanād yaśorājāha---śīghraṃ sambhalaviṣayān nirgacchantu

madhye+āryaviṣayam -> madhya āryaviṣayam

madhya āryaviṣayam+gamiṣyāmas -> madhya āryaviṣayaṃ gamiṣyāmas

madhya āryaviṣayaṃ gamiṣyāmas+iti|| -> madhya āryaviṣayaṃ gamiṣyāma iti||

himavatas+laṅkādvīpasya -> himavato laṅkādvīpasya

varam+śītānadīdakṣiṇe -> varaṃ śītānadīdakṣiṇe

tava+ājñayā -> tavājñayā

kariṣyāmas+| -> kariṣyāmaḥ|

vayam+vajrakulābhiṣekapravṛttim -> vayaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekapravṛttim

vayaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekapravṛttim+na -> vayaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekapravṛttiṃ na

atha+asmābhis -> athāsmābhis

athāsmābhis+avaśyam -> athāsmābhir avaśyam

athāsmābhir avaśyam+tava -> athāsmābhir avaśyaṃ tava

athāsmābhir avaśyaṃ tava+ājñā -> athāsmābhir avaśyaṃ tavājñā

karuṇām+kuruṣva -> karuṇāṃ kuruṣva

sūryarathas+yaśonarendram -> sūryaratho yaśonarendram

sūryaratho yaśonarendram+vijñāpayati---he -> sūryaratho yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpayati---he

teṣām+brahmaṛṣīṇām -> teṣāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām

teṣāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām+vacanena -> teṣāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ vacanena

śītāhomavayos+dakṣiṇam -> śītāhomavayor dakṣiṇam

śītāhomavayor dakṣiṇam+laṅkādvīpottaram -> śītāhomavayor dakṣiṇaṃ laṅkādvīpottaram

śītāhomavayor dakṣiṇaṃ laṅkādvīpottaram+iti| -> śītāhomavayor dakṣiṇaṃ laṅkādvīpottaram iti|

varam+āryaviṣayam -> varam āryaviṣayam

varam āryaviṣayam+gamiṣyāmi -> varam āryaviṣayaṃ gamiṣyāmi

tasmāt+vayam -> tasmād vayam

tasmād vayam+tava -> tasmād vayaṃ tava

tasmād vayaṃ tava+ājñayā -> tasmād vayaṃ tavājñayā

tvam+yaśonarendram -> tvaṃ yaśonarendram

tvaṃ yaśonarendram+vijñāpaya---na -> tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---na

tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---na+asmākam -> tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---nāsmākam

tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---nāsmākam+vajrakulābhiṣekadharmapravṛttis -> tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---nāsmākaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekadharmapravṛttis

tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---nāsmākaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekadharmapravṛttis+vedoktajātidharmam -> tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---nāsmākaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekadharmapravṛttir vedoktajātidharmam

tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---nāsmākaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekadharmapravṛttir vedoktajātidharmam+vihāya -> tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---nāsmākaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekadharmapravṛttir vedoktajātidharmaṃ vihāya

tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---nāsmākaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekadharmapravṛttir vedoktajātidharmaṃ vihāya+iti| -> tvaṃ yaśonarendraṃ vijñāpaya---nāsmākaṃ vajrakulābhiṣekadharmapravṛttir vedoktajātidharmaṃ vihāyeti|

brahmaṛṣibhis+sūryarathas -> brahmaṛṣibhiḥ sūryarathas

brahmaṛṣibhiḥ sūryarathas+uktas -> brahmaṛṣibhiḥ sūryaratha uktas

brahmaṛṣibhiḥ sūryaratha uktas+---he -> brahmaṛṣibhiḥ sūryaratha uktaḥ---he

vidyutpatitais+iva -> vidyutpatitair iva

yaśorājñas+vacanena -> yaśorājño vacanena

evam+uktena -> evam uktena

evam uktena+anena -> evam uktenānena

kartavyā+iti|| -> kartavyeti||

niyamas+dattas -> niyamo dattas

niyamo dattas+tasmāt -> niyamo dattas tasmāt

niyamo dattas tasmāt+bhavadbhis -> niyamo dattas tasmād bhavadbhis

niyamo dattas tasmād bhavadbhis+mama -> niyamo dattas tasmād bhavadbhir mama

niyamo dattas tasmād bhavadbhir mama+ājñā -> niyamo dattas tasmād bhavadbhir mamājñā

yuṣmadbhyas+mayā -> yuṣmadbhyo mayā

kāraṇena+anāgate -> kāraṇenānāgate

kāraṇenānāgate+adhvani -> kāraṇenānāgate 'dhvani

mlecchadharmaparigraham+kariṣyanti| -> mlecchadharmaparigrahaṃ kariṣyanti|

evam+vedadharmam -> evaṃ vedadharmam

evaṃ vedadharmam+pramāṇīkṛtya -> evaṃ vedadharmaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya

duṣṭam+ācaret|| -> duṣṭam ācaret||

yas+duṣṭe -> yo duṣṭe

doṣam+tatra -> doṣaṃ tatra

doṣabhāk+iti -> doṣabhāg iti

pitṛn+devān -> pitṛn devān

pitṛn devān+khādan -> pitṛn devan khādan

pitṛn devan khādan+māṃsam -> pitṛn devan khādan māṃsam

pitṛn devan khādan māṃsam+na -> pitṛn devan khādan māṃsaṃ na

devatāpitryartham+prāṇātipātas -> devatāpitryarthaṃ prāṇātipātas

devatāpitryarthaṃ prāṇātipātas+kartavyas -> devatāpitryarthaṃ prāṇātipātaḥ kartavyas

devatāpitryarthaṃ prāṇātipātaḥ kartavyas+kṣatradharme -> devatāpitryarthaṃ prāṇātipātaḥ kartavyaḥ kṣatradharme

devatāpitryarthaṃ prāṇātipātaḥ kartavyaḥ kṣatradharme+api -> devatāpitryarthaṃ prāṇātipātaḥ kartavyaḥ kṣatradharme 'pi

vedadharme+api -> vedadharme 'pi

gatas+sa -> gataḥ sa

mahājanas+yena -> mahājano yena

mlecchās+bhaviṣyanti -> mlecchā bhaviṣyanti

caturvarṇādayas+sarve -> caturvarṇādayaḥ sarve

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinas+api -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsino 'pi

mlecchās+bhaviṣyanti| -> mlecchā bhaviṣyanti|

māradevatāvatāram+vā -> māradevatāvatāraṃ vā

māradevatāvatāraṃ vā+anāgate -> māradevatāvatāraṃ vānāgate

māradevatāvatāraṃ vānāgate+adhvani -> māradevatāvatāraṃ vānāgate 'dhvani

māradevatāvatāraṃ vānāgate 'dhvani+aṣṭavarṣaśate -> māradevatāvatāraṃ vānāgate 'dhvany aṣṭavarṣaśate

putrapautrādayas+teṣām -> putrapautrādayas teṣām

putrapautrādayas teṣām+mlecchānām -> putrapautrādayas teṣāṃ mlecchānām

putrapautrādayas teṣāṃ mlecchānām+pratāpam -> putrapautrādayas teṣāṃ mlecchānāṃ pratāpam

putrapautrādayas teṣāṃ mlecchānāṃ pratāpam+dṛṣṭvā -> putrapautrādayas teṣāṃ mlecchānāṃ pratāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā

tasmāt+yuṣmatkule% -> tasmād yuṣmatkule%

prāṇātipātatas+| -> prāṇātipātataḥ|

mlecchadharmavedadharmayos+viśeṣas -> mlecchadharmavedadharmayor viśeṣas

mlecchadharmavedadharmayor viśeṣas+na -> mlecchadharmavedadharmayor viśeṣo na

mlecchadharmavedadharmayor viśeṣo na+asti -> mlecchadharmavedadharmayor viśeṣo nāsti

dharmas+yuṣmākam -> dharmo yuṣmākam

dharmo yuṣmākam+pramāṇam -> dharmo yuṣmākaṃ pramāṇam

dharmo yuṣmākaṃ pramāṇam+yāgārthās -> dharmo yuṣmākaṃ pramāṇaṃ yāgārthās

dharmo yuṣmākaṃ pramāṇaṃ yāgārthās+paśavas -> dharmo yuṣmākaṃ pramāṇaṃ yāgārthāḥ paśavas

dharmo yuṣmākaṃ pramāṇaṃ yāgārthāḥ paśavas+sṛṣṭās -> dharmo yuṣmākaṃ pramāṇaṃ yāgārthāḥ paśavaḥ sṛṣṭās

dharmo yuṣmākaṃ pramāṇaṃ yāgārthāḥ paśavaḥ sṛṣṭās+iti -> dharmo yuṣmākaṃ pramāṇaṃ yāgārthāḥ paśavaḥ sṛṣṭā iti

sas+api -> so 'pi

mṛtānām+māṃsam -> mṛtānāṃ māṃsam

mṛtānāṃ māṃsam+abhakṣyam -> mṛtānāṃ māṃsam abhakṣyam

mṛtānāṃ māṃsam abhakṣyam+kariṣyanti -> mṛtānāṃ māṃsam abhakṣyaṃ kariṣyanti

tatas+teṣām -> tatas teṣām

tatas teṣām+svadevatāmantreṇa -> tatas teṣāṃ svadevatāmantreṇa

tatas teṣāṃ svadevatāmantreṇa+āhatānām -> tatas teṣāṃ svadevatāmantreṇāhatānām

tatas teṣāṃ svadevatāmantreṇāhatānām+paśūnām -> tatas teṣāṃ svadevatāmantreṇāhatānāṃ paśūnām

tatas teṣāṃ svadevatāmantreṇāhatānāṃ paśūnām+māṃsam -> tatas teṣāṃ svadevatāmantreṇāhatānāṃ paśūnāṃ māṃsam

tatas teṣāṃ svadevatāmantreṇāhatānāṃ paśūnāṃ māṃsam+bhakṣayiṣyanti -> tatas teṣāṃ svadevatāmantreṇāhatānāṃ paśūnāṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣayiṣyanti

grīvāyām+paśum -> grīvāyāṃ paśum

grīvāyāṃ paśum+hatvā -> grīvāyāṃ paśuṃ hatvā

mlecchadharmadeśanām+kariṣyanti| -> mlecchadharmadeśanāṃ kariṣyanti|

pravṛttim+kṛtvā -> pravṛttiṃ kṛtvā

yuṣmatputrapautrādayas+mlecchadharme -> yuṣmatputrapautrādayo mlecchadharme

anyathā+aṣṭaśate -> anyathāṣṭaśate

bhavantas+gacchantu| -> bhavanto gacchantu|

kutracit+bhavatām -> kutracid bhavatām

kutracid bhavatām+pratibhāti -> kutracid bhavatāṃ pratibhāti

tadā+asmadīyān -> tadāsmadīyān

tadāsmadīyān+ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmān -> tadāsmadīyan ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmān

tadāsmadīyan ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmān+tyaktvā -> tadāsmadīyan ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmāṃś tyaktvā

mama+ājñām -> mamājñām

mamājñām+yūyam -> mamājñāṃ yūyam

mamājñāṃ yūyam+na -> mamājñāṃ yūyaṃ na

sārdham+khānapānam -> sārdhaṃ khānapānam

sārdhaṃ khānapānam+kartavyam -> sārdhaṃ khānapānaṃ kartavyam

sārdhaṃ khānapānaṃ kartavyam+vivāhasambandhas -> sārdhaṃ khānapānaṃ kartavyaṃ vivāhasambandhas

sārdhaṃ khānapānaṃ kartavyaṃ vivāhasambandhas+ca -> sārdhaṃ khānapānaṃ kartavyaṃ vivāhasambandhaś ca

sārdhaṃ khānapānaṃ kartavyaṃ vivāhasambandhaś ca+iti| -> sārdhaṃ khānapānaṃ kartavyaṃ vivāhasambandhaś ceti|

bhavadbhis+vajrakulena -> bhavadbhir vajrakulena

mama+ājñayā -> mamājñayā

anyat+ca -> anyac ca

praveśas+kartavyas -> praveśaḥ kartavyas

praveśaḥ kartavyas+yṣmabhyas -> praveśaḥ kartavyo yṣmabhyas

praveśaḥ kartavyo yṣmabhyas+laukikalokottarābhiṣekas -> praveśaḥ kartavyo yṣmabhyo laukikalokottarābhiṣekas

praveśaḥ kartavyo yṣmabhyo laukikalokottarābhiṣekas+dātavyas -> praveśaḥ kartavyo yṣmabhyo laukikalokottarābhiṣeko dātavyas

praveśaḥ kartavyo yṣmabhyo laukikalokottarābhiṣeko dātavyas+iti| -> praveśaḥ kartavyo yṣmabhyo laukikalokottarābhiṣeko dātavya iti|

mayā+asmin -> mayāsmin

mayāsmin+kālacakrabhagavatas -> mayāsmin kālacakrabhagavatas

mayāsmin kālacakrabhagavatas+maṇḍalagṛhe -> mayāsmin kālacakrabhagavato maṇḍalagṛhe

yaśorājñā+uktam---iha -> yaśorājñoktam---iha

evam+teṣām -> evaṃ teṣām

evaṃ teṣām+virodham -> evaṃ teṣāṃ virodham

evaṃ teṣāṃ virodham+dṛṣṭvā -> evaṃ teṣāṃ virodhaṃ dṛṣṭvā

patitās+kāpālikabhaktagomāṃsamahiṣamāṃsabhakṣaṇena -> patitāḥ kāpālikabhaktagomāṃsamahiṣamāṃsabhakṣaṇena

sarve+api -> sarve 'pi

vicāryamāṇās+parasparavirodhena -> vicāryamāṇāḥ parasparavirodhena

bhavadbhis+mām -> bhavadbhir mām

bhavadbhir mām+darśanīyās -> bhavadbhir māṃ darśanīyās

bhavadbhir māṃ darśanīyās+| -> bhavadbhir māṃ darśanīyāḥ|

pṛthak+kṛtvā -> pṛthak kṛtvā

kulīnās+brāhmaṇās -> kulīnā brāhmaṇās

kulīnā brāhmaṇās+te -> kulīnā brāhmaṇās te

yuṣmākam+vedasmṛtiniyamapālakānām -> yuṣmākaṃ vedasmṛtiniyamapālakānām

yuṣmākaṃ vedasmṛtiniyamapālakānām+śāsanam -> yuṣmākaṃ vedasmṛtiniyamapālakānāṃ śāsanam

yuṣmākaṃ vedasmṛtiniyamapālakānāṃ śāsanam+dātavyam| -> yuṣmākaṃ vedasmṛtiniyamapālakānāṃ śāsanaṃ dātavyam|

caitrapūrṇimāyām+mayā -> caitrapūrṇimāyāṃ mayā

vacanam+sarvajñasampatkaram| -> vacanaṃ sarvajñasampatkaram|

sūryarathādayas+brahmaṛṣayas -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayas

sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayas+śṛṇuta -> sūryarathādayo brahmaṛṣayaḥ śṛṇuta

niyamas+dattas -> niyamo dattas

niyamo dattas+---he -> niyamo dattaḥ---he

phālgunapūrṇimāyām+sūryarathapramukhānām -> phālgunapūrṇimāyāṃ sūryarathapramukhānām

phālgunapūrṇimāyāṃ sūryarathapramukhānām+sārdhatrikoṭīnām -> phālgunapūrṇimāyāṃ sūryarathapramukhānāṃ sārdhatrikoṭīnām

phālgunapūrṇimāyāṃ sūryarathapramukhānāṃ sārdhatrikoṭīnām+brahmaṛṣīṇām -> phālgunapūrṇimāyāṃ sūryarathapramukhānāṃ sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām

phālgunapūrṇimāyāṃ sūryarathapramukhānāṃ sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām+yaśorājñā -> phālgunapūrṇimāyāṃ sūryarathapramukhānāṃ sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ yaśorājñā

asmin+trimaṇḍalātmake -> asmiṃś trimaṇḍalātmake

evam+kāyavākcittamaṇḍalāni -> evaṃ kāyavākcittamaṇḍalāni

etadardhena+aṣṭadalakamalam -> etadardhenāṣṭadalakamalam

etadardhenāṣṭadalakamalam+kamalatribhāgā -> etadardhenāṣṭadalakamalaṃ kamalatribhāgā

jñānacakram+ṣoḍaśastambhopaśobhitam| -> jñānacakraṃ ṣoḍaśastambhopaśobhitam|

vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānam+cittamaṇḍalam -> vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānaṃ cittamaṇḍalam

vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānaṃ cittamaṇḍalam+caturasram -> vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ caturasram

vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ caturasram+caturdvāram -> vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāram

vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāram+catustoraṇabhūṣitam -> vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇabhūṣitam

vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇabhūṣitam+triprākāraveṣṭitam| -> vāṅmaṇḍalārdhamānaṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇabhūṣitaṃ triprākāraveṣṭitam|

caturasram+vāṅmaṇḍalam -> caturasraṃ vāṅmaṇḍalam

caturasraṃ vāṅmaṇḍalam+caturasram -> caturasraṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ caturasram

caturasraṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ caturasram+caturdvāram -> caturasraṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāram

caturasraṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāram+catustoraṇabhūṣitam -> caturasraṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇabhūṣitam

caturasraṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇabhūṣitam+pañcaprākāraveṣṭitam| -> caturasraṃ vāṅmaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇabhūṣitaṃ pañcaprākāraveṣṭitam|

pṛthivyādicaturvalayavajrāvalībhūṣitam+vajrāvaliparyantam -> pṛthivyādicaturvalayavajrāvalībhūṣitaṃ vajrāvaliparyantam

pṛthivyādicaturvalayavajrāvalībhūṣitaṃ vajrāvaliparyantam+aṣṭaśatahastāyāmam| -> pṛthivyādicaturvalayavajrāvalībhūṣitaṃ vajrāvaliparyantam aṣṭaśatahastāyāmam|

kāyamaṇḍalam+caturasram -> kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturasram

kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturasram+caturdvāram -> kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāram

kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāram+caturtoraṇaśmaśānāṣṭavibhūṣitam -> kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ caturtoraṇaśmaśānāṣṭavibhūṣitam

kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ caturtoraṇaśmaśānāṣṭavibhūṣitam+pañcaprākāraveṣṭitam| -> kāyamaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ caturtoraṇaśmaśānāṣṭavibhūṣitaṃ pañcaprākāraveṣṭitam|

kṛtam+kālacakrabhagavatas -> kṛtaṃ kālacakrabhagavatas

kṛtaṃ kālacakrabhagavatas+maṇḍalacakram -> kṛtaṃ kālacakrabhagavato maṇḍalacakram

kṛtaṃ kālacakrabhagavato maṇḍalacakram+pañcaratnamayaparighaṭitadevatādevatyātmakam -> kṛtaṃ kālacakrabhagavato maṇḍalacakraṃ pañcaratnamayaparighaṭitadevatādevatyātmakam

kṛtaṃ kālacakrabhagavato maṇḍalacakraṃ pañcaratnamayaparighaṭitadevatādevatyātmakam+caturasram -> kṛtaṃ kālacakrabhagavato maṇḍalacakraṃ pañcaratnamayaparighaṭitadevatādevatyātmakaṃ caturasram

kṛtaṃ kālacakrabhagavato maṇḍalacakraṃ pañcaratnamayaparighaṭitadevatādevatyātmakaṃ caturasram+catuḥśatahastāyāmam| -> kṛtaṃ kālacakrabhagavato maṇḍalacakraṃ pañcaratnamayaparighaṭitadevatādevatyātmakaṃ caturasraṃ catuḥśatahastāyāmam|

tayos+dvayos -> tayor dvayos

tayor dvayos+madhye -> tayor dvayor madhye

puṇḍarīkasaram+tadvatpramāṇam| -> puṇḍarīkasaraṃ tadvatpramāṇam|

pūrveṇa+upamānasam -> pūrveṇopamānasam

pūrveṇopamānasam+saram -> pūrveṇopamānasaṃ saram

pūrveṇopamānasaṃ saram+dvādaśayojanāyāmam, -> pūrveṇopamānasaṃ saraṃ dvādaśayojanāyāmam,

malayodyānam+dvādaśayojanāyāmam -> malayodyānaṃ dvādaśayojanāyāmam

malayodyānaṃ dvādaśayojanāyāmam+kalāpagrāmatulyam| -> malayodyānaṃ dvādaśayojanāyāmaṃ kalāpagrāmatulyam|

sarveṣām+āmantraṇam -> sarveṣām āmantraṇam

sarveṣām āmantraṇam+kṛtam|| -> sarveṣām āmantraṇaṃ kṛtam||

niyamam+dātukāmena -> niyamaṃ dātukāmena

sanmārgalābham+jñātvā -> sanmārgalābhaṃ jñātvā

ṛṣīṇām+paripācanākālam -> ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanākālam

ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanākālam+dṛṣṭvā -> ṛṣīṇāṃ paripācanākālaṃ dṛṣṭvā

tatas+varṣaśate -> tato varṣaśate

dharmadeśakas+varṣaśatam -> dharmadeśako varṣaśatam

dharmadeśako varṣaśatam+yāvat| -> dharmadeśako varṣaśataṃ yāvat|

mañjuśrīs+yaśas -> mañjuśrīr yaśas

mañjuśrīr yaśas+rājā -> mañjuśrīr yaśo rājā

mañjuśrīr yaśo rājā+abhūt -> mañjuśrīr yaśo rājābhūt

mañjuśrīr yaśo rājābhūt+tasmin -> mañjuśrīr yaśo rājābhūt tasmin

mañjuśrīr yaśo rājābhūt tasmin+bodhisattvasiṃhāsane -> mañjuśrīr yaśo rājābhūt tasmin bodhisattvasiṃhāsane

evam+tejinā -> evaṃ tejinā

varṣaśatam+yāvat -> varṣaśataṃ yāvat

varṣaśataṃ yāvat+tantradeśanā -> varṣaśataṃ yāvat tantradeśanā

tatas+sureśvareṇa -> tataḥ sureśvareṇa

gatas+sattvānām -> gataḥ sattvānām

gataḥ sattvānām+siddhihetave| -> gataḥ sattvānāṃ siddhihetave|

yasmāt+āgatas -> yasmād āgatas

yasmād āgatas+tatra -> yasmād āgatas tatra

yasmād āgatas tatra+eva -> yasmād āgatas tatraiva

maṇḍalacakraṛddhim+darśayitvā -> maṇḍalacakraṛddhiṃ darśayitvā

atas+tantradeśanākālāt -> atas tantradeśanākālāt

atas tantradeśanākālāt+dvitīyavarṣe -> atas tantradeśanākālād dvitīyavarṣe

parebhyas+ca -> parebhyaś ca

tadadhimuktais+sattvais -> tadadhimuktaiḥ sattvais

tadadhimuktaiḥ sattvais+śrutam -> tadadhimuktaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrutam

tadadhimuktaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrutam+vācitam -> tadadhimuktaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrutaṃ vācitam

tadadhimuktaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrutaṃ vācitam+dhāritam -> tadadhimuktaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrutaṃ vācitaṃ dhāritam

tadadhimuktaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrutaṃ vācitaṃ dhāritam+svacitte -> tadadhimuktaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrutaṃ vācitaṃ dhāritaṃ svacitte

etat+eva -> etad eva

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsibhyas+prakāśitam| -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsibhyaḥ prakāśitam|

ṣaṣṭisāhasrikām+ṭīkām -> ṣaṣṭisāhasrikāṃ ṭīkām

ṣaṣṭisāhasrikāṃ ṭīkām+ca -> ṣaṣṭisāhasrikāṃ ṭīkāṃ ca

atas+tathāgataniyamāt -> atas tathāgataniyamāt

atas tathāgataniyamāt+dvādaśasāhasrikam -> atas tathāgataniyamād dvādaśasāhasrikam

atas tathāgataniyamād dvādaśasāhasrikam+mūlatantrarājam -> atas tathāgataniyamād dvādaśasāhasrikaṃ mūlatantrarājam

atas tathāgataniyamād dvādaśasāhasrikaṃ mūlatantrarājam+sambhalādiviṣayabhāṣāntarais -> atas tathāgataniyamād dvādaśasāhasrikaṃ mūlatantrarājaṃ sambhalādiviṣayabhāṣāntarais

atas tathāgataniyamād dvādaśasāhasrikaṃ mūlatantrarājaṃ sambhalādiviṣayabhāṣāntarais+pustake -> atas tathāgataniyamād dvādaśasāhasrikaṃ mūlatantrarājaṃ sambhalādiviṣayabhāṣāntaraiḥ pustake

vyākṛtās+iti| -> vyākṛtā iti|

deśakās+tathāgatena -> deśakās tathāgatena

bodhisattvās+krodharājās -> bodhisattvāḥ krodharājās

bodhisattvāḥ krodharājās+vyākṛtās -> bodhisattvāḥ krodharājā vyākṛtās

bodhisattvāḥ krodharājā vyākṛtās+ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭīnām -> bodhisattvāḥ krodharājā vyākṛtāḥ ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭīnām

bodhisattvāḥ krodharājā vyākṛtāḥ ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭīnām+cakravartinas -> bodhisattvāḥ krodharājā vyākṛtāḥ ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭīnāṃ cakravartinas

bodhisattvāḥ krodharājā vyākṛtāḥ ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭīnāṃ cakravartinas+mantranaye -> bodhisattvāḥ krodharājā vyākṛtāḥ ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭīnāṃ cakravartino mantranaye

mañjughoṣas+ṭīkākāras -> mañjughoṣaṣ ṭīkākāras

mañjughoṣaṣ ṭīkākāras+abjadhṛk -> mañjughoṣaṣ ṭīkākāro 'bjadhṛk

mañjughoṣaṣ ṭīkākāro 'bjadhṛk+svayam|| -> mañjughoṣaṣ ṭīkākāro 'bjadhṛk svayam||

sattvānām+paripācakas -> sattvānāṃ paripācakas

sattvānāṃ paripācakas+| -> sattvānāṃ paripācakaḥ|

ṭīkākāras+tvam -> ṭīkākāras tvam

ṭīkākāras tvam+eva -> ṭīkākāras tvam eva

ṭīkākāras tvam eva+atra -> ṭīkākāras tvam evātra

saṃgītikārakas+|| -> saṃgītikārakaḥ||

tvam+tena -> tvaṃ tena

sūryarathādīnām+vāgmī -> sūryarathādīnāṃ vāgmī

paramas+svasamādhinā|| -> paramaḥ svasamādhinā||

mlecchadharmāntakṛt+vāgmī -> mlecchadharmāntakṛd vāgmī

putras+mahācakrī -> putro mahācakrī

tatas+punas -> tataḥ punas

tataḥ punas+| -> tataḥ punaḥ|

yaśas+kalkī -> yaśaḥ kalkī

anantavijayas+kalkī -> anantavijayaḥ kalkī

narasiṃhas+maheśvaras -> narasiṃho maheśvaras

narasiṃho maheśvaras+|| -> narasiṃho maheśvaraḥ||

mahābalas+aniruddhas -> mahābalo 'niruddhas

mahābalo 'niruddhas+ca -> mahābalo 'niruddhaś ca

mahīpālas+śrīpālas -> mahīpālaḥ śrīpālas

mahīpālaḥ śrīpālas+harivikramas -> mahīpālaḥ śrīpālo harivikramas

mahīpālaḥ śrīpālo harivikramas+| -> mahīpālaḥ śrīpālo harivikramaḥ|

anantas+ca -> anantaś ca

dvādaśamas+sūryas -> dvādaśamaḥ sūryas

dvādaśamaḥ sūryas+viśvarūpas -> dvādaśamaḥ sūryo viśvarūpas

dvādaśamaḥ sūryo viśvarūpas+śaśiprabhas -> dvādaśamaḥ sūryo viśvarūpaḥ śaśiprabhas

dvādaśamaḥ sūryo viśvarūpaḥ śaśiprabhas+|| -> dvādaśamaḥ sūryo viśvarūpaḥ śaśiprabhaḥ||

samudravijayas+ajas -> samudravijayo 'jas

samudravijayo 'jas+| -> samudravijayo 'jaḥ|

arkakīrtis+subhadras -> arkakīrtiḥ subhadras

arkakīrtiḥ subhadras+ca -> arkakīrtiḥ subhadraś ca

saptamas+|| -> saptamaḥ||

viṣṇuguptas+ca -> viṣṇuguptaś ca

sumitras+raktapāṇis -> sumitro raktapāṇis

sumitro raktapāṇis+ca -> sumitro raktapāṇiś ca

caturthas+vijayas -> caturtho vijayas

caturtho vijayas+tathā| -> caturtho vijayas tathā|

tṛtīyas+ca -> tṛtīyaś ca

puṇḍarīkas+tatas -> puṇḍarīkas tatas

puṇḍarīkas tatas+|| -> puṇḍarīkas tataḥ||

gotram+ca -> gotraṃ ca

yaśas+kalkī -> yaśaḥ kalkī

trayodaśa+anye -> trayodaśānye

yamāryādidaśakrodhās+bodhisattvās -> yamāryādidaśakrodhā bodhisattvās

yamāryādidaśakrodhā bodhisattvās+tadantare|| -> yamāryādidaśakrodhā bodhisattvās tadantare||

lokanāthas+yathākramāt| -> lokanātho yathākramāt|

khagarbhas+mañjughoṣas -> khagarbho mañjughoṣas

khagarbho mañjughoṣas+ca -> khagarbho mañjughoṣaś ca

jambhakas+mānakas -> jambhako mānakas

jambhako mānakas+kramāt|| -> jambhako mānakaḥ kramāt||

vajrapāṇis+sucandras -> vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras

vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras+tvam -> vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras tvam

vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras tvam+kṣitigarbhas -> vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras tvaṃ kṣitigarbhas

vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras tvaṃ kṣitigarbhas+yamāntakas -> vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras tvaṃ kṣitigarbho yamāntakas

vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras tvaṃ kṣitigarbho yamāntakas+| -> vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras tvaṃ kṣitigarbho yamāntakaḥ|

nirmitas+|| -> nirmitaḥ||

vighnaśatrus+sa -> vighnaśatruḥ sa

sūryaprabhas+gatas -> sūryaprabho gatas

sūryaprabho gatas+rājā -> sūryaprabho gato rājā

viśvamūrtis+sureśānas -> viśvamūrtiḥ sureśānas

viśvamūrtiḥ sureśānas+yaśas -> viśvamūrtiḥ sureśāno yaśas

viśvamūrtiḥ sureśāno yaśas+puṇḍarīkas -> viśvamūrtiḥ sureśāno yaśaḥ puṇḍarīkas

viśvamūrtiḥ sureśāno yaśaḥ puṇḍarīkas+kramāt| -> viśvamūrtiḥ sureśāno yaśaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ kramāt|

somadattas+sureśvaras -> somadattaḥ sureśvaras

somadattaḥ sureśvaras+|| -> somadattaḥ sureśvaraḥ||

candras+sureśvaras -> candraḥ sureśvaras

candraḥ sureśvaras+tejī -> candraḥ sureśvaras tejī

tantre+asmin -> tantre 'smin

tantre 'smin+ṛṣikulādīnām -> tantre 'sminn ṛṣikulādīnām

tantre 'sminn ṛṣikulādīnām+buddhamārgaprakāśakas -> tantre 'sminn ṛṣikulādīnāṃ buddhamārgaprakāśakas

tantre 'sminn ṛṣikulādīnāṃ buddhamārgaprakāśakas+| -> tantre 'sminn ṛṣikulādīnāṃ buddhamārgaprakāśakaḥ|

saṃgītikārakas+ca -> saṃgītikārakaś ca

saṃgītikārakaś ca+ayam -> saṃgītikārakaś cāyam

saṃgītikārakaś cāyam+ṭīkākāras -> saṃgītikārakaś cāyaṃ ṭīkākāras

saṃgītikārakaś cāyaṃ ṭīkākāras+sitābjadhṛk|| -> saṃgītikārakaś cāyaṃ ṭīkākāraḥ sitābjadhṛk||

paṭalais+pañcabhis -> paṭalaiḥ pañcabhis

paṭalaiḥ pañcabhis+pūrṇam -> paṭalaiḥ pañcabhiḥ pūrṇam

paṭalaiḥ pañcabhiḥ pūrṇam+vādirāṭ -> paṭalaiḥ pañcabhiḥ pūrṇaṃ vādirāṭ

paṭalaiḥ pañcabhiḥ pūrṇaṃ vādirāṭ+deśayiṣyati| -> paṭalaiḥ pañcabhiḥ pūrṇaṃ vādirāḍ deśayiṣyati|

śrītantram+sragdharāvṛttais -> śrītantraṃ sragdharāvṛttais

śrītantraṃ sragdharāvṛttais+triṃśat -> śrītantraṃ sragdharāvṛttais triṃśat

śrītantraṃ sragdharāvṛttais triṃśat+ca -> śrītantraṃ sragdharāvṛttais triṃśac ca

śrītantraṃ sragdharāvṛttais triṃśac ca+adhikadikśatais -> śrītantraṃ sragdharāvṛttais triṃśac cādhikadikśatais

śrītantraṃ sragdharāvṛttais triṃśac cādhikadikśatais+|| -> śrītantraṃ sragdharāvṛttais triṃśac cādhikadikśataiḥ||

tena+idam -> tenedam

tenedam+laghusārārtham -> tenedaṃ laghusārārtham

tenedaṃ laghusārārtham+sarvajña -> tenedaṃ laghusārārthaṃ sarvajña

tenedaṃ laghusārārthaṃ sarvajña+ityādi -> tenedaṃ laghusārārthaṃ sarvajñetyādi

pṛthak+pṛthak|| -> pṛthak pṛthak||

sattvāśayavaśāt+proktā -> sattvāśayavaśāt proktā

nānāsaṃgītikārakais+| -> nānāsaṃgītikārakaiḥ|

evam+me -> evaṃ me

deśadeśavaśāt+proktas -> deśadeśavaśāt proktas

deśadeśavaśāt proktas+ratnabhedas -> deśadeśavaśāt prokto ratnabhedas

deśadeśavaśāt prokto ratnabhedas+na -> deśadeśavaśāt prokto ratnabhedo na

medinyām+nāmabhedas -> medinyāṃ nāmabhedas

medinyāṃ nāmabhedas+pṛthak -> medinyāṃ nāmabhedaḥ pṛthak

medinyāṃ nāmabhedaḥ pṛthak+pṛthak| -> medinyāṃ nāmabhedaḥ pṛthak pṛthak|

labdhe+arthe -> labdhe 'rthe

yatnatas+| -> yatnataḥ|

dharmam+gṛhṇāti -> dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti

kuryāt+dharmasya -> kuryād dharmasya

sattvānām+paripācanam| -> sattvānāṃ paripācanam|

vādas+bhaviṣyati|| -> vādo bhaviṣyati||

sarvajñas+iti -> sarvajña iti

paraśrutāt+na -> paraśrutān na

ṛṣīṇām+dharmadeśanā| -> ṛṣīṇāṃ dharmadeśanā|

śrutā+anena -> śrutānena

evam+mayā -> evaṃ mayā

yaśas+| -> yaśaḥ|

putras+lokeśvaras -> putro lokeśvaras

putro lokeśvaras+bjadhṛk| -> putro lokeśvaro bjadhṛk|

mañjughoṣas+yaśas -> mañjughoṣo yaśas

mañjughoṣo yaśas+nṛpas -> mañjughoṣo yaśo nṛpas

mañjughoṣo yaśo nṛpas+|| -> mañjughoṣo yaśo nṛpaḥ||

ṛṣīṇām+pācanārthāya -> ṛṣīṇāṃ pācanārthāya

ādyābdāt+ṣaṭśatais -> ādyābdāt ṣaṭśatais

ādyābdāt ṣaṭśatais+varṣais -> ādyābdāt ṣaṭśatair varṣais

ādyābdāt ṣaṭśatair varṣais+sambhalākhyas -> ādyābdāt ṣaṭśatair varṣaiḥ sambhalākhyas

ādyābdāt ṣaṭśatair varṣaiḥ sambhalākhyas+bhaviṣyati| -> ādyābdāt ṣaṭśatair varṣaiḥ sambhalākhyo bhaviṣyati|

bhagavān+āha--- -> bhagavān āha---

paścāt+yamātakādayas -> paścād yamātakādayas

paścād yamātakādayas+vyākṛtās -> paścād yamātakādayo vyākṛtās

paścād yamātakādayo vyākṛtās+iti| -> paścād yamātakādayo vyākṛtā iti|

atas+mama -> ato mama

vyākṛtas+| -> vyākṛtaḥ|

ṭīkākāras+puṇḍarīkas -> ṭīkākāraḥ puṇḍarīkas

ṭīkākāraḥ puṇḍarīkas+dvitīyas -> ṭīkākāraḥ puṇḍarīko dvitīyas

ṭīkākāraḥ puṇḍarīko dvitīyas+kalkī -> ṭīkākāraḥ puṇḍarīko dvitīyaḥ kalkī

aham+api -> aham api

yaśas+kalkī -> yaśaḥ kalkī

yaśaḥ kalkī+iti| -> yaśaḥ kalkīti|

sarvavarṇānām+ekakalkakaraṇāya -> sarvavarṇānām ekakalkakaraṇāya

mañjuśrīs+vyākṛtas -> mañjuśrīr vyākṛtas

mañjuśrīr vyākṛtas+vajrakulā"bhiṣekeṇa -> mañjuśrīr vyākṛto vajrakulā"bhiṣekeṇa

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinām+ca -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsināṃ ca

sārdhatrikoṭīnām+brahmaṛṣīṇām -> sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām

sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām+paripākam -> sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ paripākam

sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ paripākam+dṛṣṭvā -> sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ paripākaṃ dṛṣṭvā

ca+anāgate -> cānāgate

cānāgate+adhvani -> cānāgate 'dhvani

asmāt+dvādaśasāhasrikatantrarājāt -> asmād dvādaśasāhasrikatantrarājāt

asmād dvādaśasāhasrikatantrarājāt+laghutantrakaraṇāya -> asmād dvādaśasāhasrikatantrarājāl laghutantrakaraṇāya

vajrapadam+udghāṭanarahitam -> vajrapadam udghāṭanarahitam

vajrapadam udghāṭanarahitam+vajrapadaprakāśakam -> vajrapadam udghāṭanarahitaṃ vajrapadaprakāśakam

vajrapadam udghāṭanarahitaṃ vajrapadaprakāśakam+dvādaśasāhasrikam -> vajrapadam udghāṭanarahitaṃ vajrapadaprakāśakaṃ dvādaśasāhasrikam

vajrapadam udghāṭanarahitaṃ vajrapadaprakāśakaṃ dvādaśasāhasrikam+paramādibuddham -> vajrapadam udghāṭanarahitaṃ vajrapadaprakāśakaṃ dvādaśasāhasrikaṃ paramādibuddham

vajrapadam udghāṭanarahitaṃ vajrapadaprakāśakaṃ dvādaśasāhasrikaṃ paramādibuddham+saṃdeśitam| -> vajrapadam udghāṭanarahitaṃ vajrapadaprakāśakaṃ dvādaśasāhasrikaṃ paramādibuddhaṃ saṃdeśitam|

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinām+āsannabhavyatām -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinām āsannabhavyatām

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinām āsannabhavyatām+cittaviśuddhim -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinām āsannabhavyatāṃ cittaviśuddhim

ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinām āsannabhavyatāṃ cittaviśuddhim+dṛṣṭvā -> ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinām āsannabhavyatāṃ cittaviśuddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā

tathāgatena+api -> tathāgatenāpi

sarvasattvānām+laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanārtham -> sarvasattvānāṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanārtham

sarvasattvānāṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanārtham+tathāgatas -> sarvasattvānāṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanārthaṃ tathāgatas

sarvasattvānāṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanārthaṃ tathāgatas+adhyeṣitas -> sarvasattvānāṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanārthaṃ tathāgato 'dhyeṣitas

sarvasattvānāṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanārthaṃ tathāgato 'dhyeṣitas+| -> sarvasattvānāṃ laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanārthaṃ tathāgato 'dhyeṣitaḥ|

pūrvāparāvirodhatas+| -> pūrvāparāvirodhataḥ|

anayos+buddhabodhisattvayos -> anayor buddhabodhisattvayos

anayor buddhabodhisattvayos+deśakādhyeṣakasambandhas -> anayor buddhabodhisattvayor deśakādhyeṣakasambandhas

anayor buddhabodhisattvayor deśakādhyeṣakasambandhas+nirmāṇakāyais -> anayor buddhabodhisattvayor deśakādhyeṣakasambandho nirmāṇakāyais

anayor buddhabodhisattvayor deśakādhyeṣakasambandho nirmāṇakāyais+sambhogakāyais -> anayor buddhabodhisattvayor deśakādhyeṣakasambandho nirmāṇakāyaiḥ sambhogakāyais

anayor buddhabodhisattvayor deśakādhyeṣakasambandho nirmāṇakāyaiḥ sambhogakāyais+vā -> anayor buddhabodhisattvayor deśakādhyeṣakasambandho nirmāṇakāyaiḥ sambhogakāyair vā

sucandras+rājas -> sucandro rājas

sucandro rājas+abhūt -> sucandro rājo 'bhūt

sucandro rājo 'bhūt+bodhisattvas -> sucandro rājo 'bhūd bodhisattvas

sucandro rājo 'bhūd bodhisattvas+vajrapāṇis -> sucandro rājo 'bhūd bodhisattvo vajrapāṇis

sucandro rājo 'bhūd bodhisattvo vajrapāṇis+iti| -> sucandro rājo 'bhūd bodhisattvo vajrapāṇir iti|

sucandravaineyānām+ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsinām -> sucandravaineyānāṃ ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsinām

sucandravaineyānāṃ ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsinām+paramādibuddhatantrarājena -> sucandravaineyānāṃ ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsināṃ paramādibuddhatantrarājena

laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārtham+śākyamunis -> laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārthaṃ śākyamunis

laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārthaṃ śākyamunis+jātas -> laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārthaṃ śākyamunir jātas

laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārthaṃ śākyamunir jātas+dvādaśabhūmis -> laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārthaṃ śākyamunir jāto dvādaśabhūmis

laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārthaṃ śākyamunir jāto dvādaśabhūmis+sākṣātkṛtā -> laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārthaṃ śākyamunir jāto dvādaśabhūmiḥ sākṣātkṛtā

laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārthaṃ śākyamunir jāto dvādaśabhūmiḥ sākṣātkṛtā+iti| -> laukikalokottaradharmadeśanārthaṃ śākyamunir jāto dvādaśabhūmiḥ sākṣātkṛteti|

buddhas+bhagavān -> buddho bhagavān

buddho bhagavān+buddhakṣetre -> buddho bhagavān buddhakṣetre

vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtas+daśabhūmīśvaras -> vijayādevīgarbhasambhūto daśabhūmīśvaras

vijayādevīgarbhasambhūto daśabhūmīśvaras+vajrapāṇis -> vijayādevīgarbhasambhūto daśabhūmīśvaro vajrapāṇis

vijayādevīgarbhasambhūto daśabhūmīśvaro vajrapāṇis+sucandras -> vijayādevīgarbhasambhūto daśabhūmīśvaro vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras

vijayādevīgarbhasambhūto daśabhūmīśvaro vajrapāṇiḥ sucandras+iti| -> vijayādevīgarbhasambhūto daśabhūmīśvaro vajrapāṇiḥ sucandra iti|

sambhalaviṣaye+api -> sambhalaviṣaye 'pi

mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtas+siddhārthakumāras -> mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ siddhārthakumāras

mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ siddhārthakumāras+iti| -> mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ siddhārthakumāra iti|

buddhas+bhagavān -> buddho bhagavān

buddho bhagavān+prāk -> buddho bhagavan prāk

buddho bhagavan prāk+dvādaśabhūmīśvaras -> buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaras

buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaras+mahāmāyādharas -> buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaro mahāmāyādharas

buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaro mahāmāyādharas+vidvān -> buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaro mahāmāyādharo vidvān

buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaro mahāmāyādharo vidvān+mahāmāyendrajālikas -> buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaro mahāmāyādharo vidvān mahāmāyendrajālikas

buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaro mahāmāyādharo vidvān mahāmāyendrajālikas+āryaviṣayalumbinyām -> buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaro mahāmāyādharo vidvān mahāmāyendrajālika āryaviṣayalumbinyām

buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaro mahāmāyādharo vidvān mahāmāyendrajālika āryaviṣayalumbinyām+śākyakule -> buddho bhagavan prāg dvādaśabhūmīśvaro mahāmāyādharo vidvān mahāmāyendrajālika āryaviṣayalumbinyāṃ śākyakule

sarvasattvānām+laukikalokottaradharmadeśanāya -> sarvasattvānāṃ laukikalokottaradharmadeśanāya

sattvārthas+iti| -> sattvārtha iti|

māyāpuruṣas+anekas -> māyāpuruṣo 'nekas

māyāpuruṣo 'nekas+evam -> māyāpuruṣo 'neka evam

māyāpuruṣo 'neka evam+buddhabodhisattvānām -> māyāpuruṣo 'neka evaṃ buddhabodhisattvānām

māyāpuruṣo 'neka evaṃ buddhabodhisattvānām+māyānirmāṇakāyais -> māyāpuruṣo 'neka evaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ māyānirmāṇakāyais

māyāpuruṣo 'neka evaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ māyānirmāṇakāyais+tribhave -> māyāpuruṣo 'neka evaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ māyānirmāṇakāyais tribhave

devadattādikam+bandhayanti -> devadattādikaṃ bandhayanti

viṣṇus+iva -> viṣṇur iva

mahādevarūpāṇi+iva -> mahādevarūpāṇīva

parvataśikharāṇi+api -> parvataśikharāṇy api

vṛkṣāṇi+unmūlayanti% -> vṛkṣāṇy unmūlayanti%

kaścit+māyāpuruṣas -> kaścin māyāpuruṣas

kaścin māyāpuruṣas+anekamāyārūpāṇi -> kaścin māyāpuruṣo 'nekamāyārūpāṇi

sarvajñas+anekas -> sarvajño 'nekas

sarvajño 'nekas+| -> sarvajño 'nekaḥ|

laukikalokottaram+dharmam -> laukikalokottaraṃ dharmam

laukikalokottaraṃ dharmam+deśayati| -> laukikalokottaraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|

lokadhātuṣu+anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyais -> lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyais

lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyais+nirāvaraṇais -> lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇais

lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇais+anantānantasattvānām -> lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām

lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām+anantānantarutais -> lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutais

lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutais+nānādhyeṣakais -> lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutair nānādhyeṣakais

lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutair nānādhyeṣakais+adhyeṣitas -> lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutair nānādhyeṣakair adhyeṣitas

lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutair nānādhyeṣakair adhyeṣitas+san -> lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutair nānādhyeṣakair adhyeṣitaḥ san

lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutair nānādhyeṣakair adhyeṣitaḥ san+sarvajñabhāṣayā -> lokadhātuṣv anantānantamāyānirmāṇakāyair nirāvaraṇair anantānantasattvānām anantānantarutair nānādhyeṣakair adhyeṣitaḥ san sarvajñabhāṣayā

puṇyajñānasambhāraparipūrṇas+sarvavaiśāradyādyaiśvaryaguṇasampannas -> puṇyajñānasambhāraparipūrṇaḥ sarvavaiśāradyādyaiśvaryaguṇasampannas

puṇyajñānasambhāraparipūrṇaḥ sarvavaiśāradyādyaiśvaryaguṇasampannas+buddhakṣetre -> puṇyajñānasambhāraparipūrṇaḥ sarvavaiśāradyādyaiśvaryaguṇasampanno buddhakṣetre

evam+buddhas -> evaṃ buddhas

evaṃ buddhas+bhagavān -> evaṃ buddho bhagavān

evaṃ buddho bhagavān+pūrvapraṇidhānabalena -> evaṃ buddho bhagavan pūrvapraṇidhānabalena

mahābodhisattvas+anekas -> mahābodhisattvo 'nekas

mahābodhisattvo 'nekas+| -> mahābodhisattvo 'nekaḥ|

lokadhātau+anekanirmāṇakāyais -> lokadhātāv anekanirmāṇakāyais

lokadhātāv anekanirmāṇakāyais+bodhisattvavaineyānām -> lokadhātāv anekanirmāṇakāyair bodhisattvavaineyānām

lokadhātāv anekanirmāṇakāyair bodhisattvavaineyānām+sattvānām -> lokadhātāv anekanirmāṇakāyair bodhisattvavaineyānāṃ sattvānām

lokadhātāv anekanirmāṇakāyair bodhisattvavaineyānāṃ sattvānām+bodhisattvadharmam -> lokadhātāv anekanirmāṇakāyair bodhisattvavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvadharmam

lokadhātāv anekanirmāṇakāyair bodhisattvavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvadharmam+deśayati -> lokadhātāv anekanirmāṇakāyair bodhisattvavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvadharmaṃ deśayati

bodhisattvas+daśapāramitāniryātas -> bodhisattvo daśapāramitāniryātas

bodhisattvo daśapāramitāniryātas+daśabhūmīśvaras -> bodhisattvo daśapāramitāniryāto daśabhūmīśvaras

bodhisattvo daśapāramitāniryāto daśabhūmīśvaras+daśavaśitāprāptas -> bodhisattvo daśapāramitāniryāto daśabhūmīśvaro daśavaśitāprāptas

bodhisattvo daśapāramitāniryāto daśabhūmīśvaro daśavaśitāprāptas+traisāhasramahāsāhasre -> bodhisattvo daśapāramitāniryāto daśabhūmīśvaro daśavaśitāprāptas traisāhasramahāsāhasre

ekas+api -> eko 'pi

bālajanais+vitarkayitum -> bālajanair vitarkayitum

bālajanair vitarkayitum+na -> bālajanair vitarkayituṃ na

buddhabodhisattvānām+garbhapraveśas -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ garbhapraveśas

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ garbhapraveśas+narakagamanam -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ garbhapraveśo narakagamanam

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ garbhapraveśo narakagamanam+vā -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ garbhapraveśo narakagamanaṃ vā

atas+sattvārtham -> ataḥ sattvārtham

ataḥ sattvārtham+prati -> ataḥ sattvārthaṃ prati

tān+sattvārtharatān -> tan sattvārtharatān

tan sattvārtharatān+atarkacaritān -> tan sattvārtharatān atarkacaritān

tan sattvārtharatān atarkacaritān+buddhān -> tan sattvārtharatān atarkacaritān buddhān

tan sattvārtharatān atarkacaritān buddhān+namāmas -> tan sattvārtharatān atarkacaritān buddhān namāmas

tan sattvārtharatān atarkacaritān buddhān namāmas+vayam|| -> tan sattvārtharatān atarkacaritān buddhān namāmo vayam||

saṃjñās+na -> saṃjñā na

saṃjñā na+analadagdhacittakaluṣās -> saṃjñā nānaladagdhacittakaluṣās

saṃjñā nānaladagdhacittakaluṣās+samyak -> saṃjñā nānaladagdhacittakaluṣāḥ samyak

saṃjñā nānaladagdhacittakaluṣāḥ samyak+kṛpārdrās -> saṃjñā nānaladagdhacittakaluṣāḥ samyak kṛpārdrās

saṃjñā nānaladagdhacittakaluṣāḥ samyak kṛpārdrās+sadā -> saṃjñā nānaladagdhacittakaluṣāḥ samyak kṛpārdrāḥ sadā

tat+śūnyārthasaṃdeśakās -> tac chūnyārthasaṃdeśakās

tac chūnyārthasaṃdeśakās+| -> tac chūnyārthasaṃdeśakāḥ|

kālāt+karmaphalam -> kālāt karmaphalam

kālāt karmaphalam+tyajanti -> kālāt karmaphalaṃ tyajanti

bhavam+gṛhṇanti -> bhavaṃ gṛhṇanti

muktās+bhavabandhanais -> muktā bhavabandhanais

muktā bhavabandhanais+api -> muktā bhavabandhanair api

sattvārtham+narakapraveśakāle -> sattvārthaṃ narakapraveśakāle

uktam+yamadūtais -> uktaṃ yamadūtais

uktaṃ yamadūtais+yamarājñā -> uktaṃ yamadūtair yamarājñā

buddhabodhisattvānām+praveśas -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ praveśas

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ praveśas+saṃsāriṇām -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ praveśaḥ saṃsāriṇām

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ praveśaḥ saṃsāriṇām+avācyas -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ praveśaḥ saṃsāriṇām avācyas

buddhabodhisattvānāṃ praveśaḥ saṃsāriṇām avācyas+| -> buddhabodhisattvānāṃ praveśaḥ saṃsāriṇām avācyaḥ|

vaktavyam+iti|| -> vaktavyam iti||

paramārthatas+tathāgatahṛdayam -> paramārthatas tathāgatahṛdayam

paramārthatas tathāgatahṛdayam+pañcame -> paramārthatas tathāgatahṛdayaṃ pañcame

sattvānām+svapnavat -> sattvānāṃ svapnavat

sattvānāṃ svapnavat+svacittapratibhāsas -> sattvānāṃ svapnavat svacittapratibhāsas

sattvānāṃ svapnavat svacittapratibhāsas+iti| -> sattvānāṃ svapnavat svacittapratibhāsa iti|

yas+mārabhaṅgas -> yo mārabhaṅgas

yo mārabhaṅgas+sa -> yo mārabhaṅgaḥ sa

saṃsāravāsanārahitam+atas -> saṃsāravāsanārahitam atas

saṃsāravāsanārahitam atas+māras -> saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māras

saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māras+samalam -> saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māraḥ samalam

saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māraḥ samalam+cittam -> saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māraḥ samalaṃ cittam

saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māraḥ samalaṃ cittam+buddhas -> saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māraḥ samalaṃ cittaṃ buddhas

saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māraḥ samalaṃ cittaṃ buddhas+vigatamalam -> saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māraḥ samalaṃ cittaṃ buddho vigatamalam

saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māraḥ samalaṃ cittaṃ buddho vigatamalam+cittam| -> saṃsāravāsanārahitam ato māraḥ samalaṃ cittaṃ buddho vigatamalaṃ cittam|

prakṛtiprabhāsvaram+tat -> prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ tat

prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ tat+eva -> prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ tad eva

tat+cittam -> tac cittam

tac cittam+yat -> tac cittaṃ yat

tac cittaṃ yat+cittam -> tac cittaṃ yac cittam

tac cittaṃ yac cittam+acittam -> tac cittaṃ yac cittam acittam

bhagavān+āha---prajñāpāramitāyām---asti -> bhagavān āha---prajñāpāramitāyām---asti

saṃsāravāsanārahitam+cittam| -> saṃsāravāsanārahitaṃ cittam|

sattvānām+saṃsāracittam -> sattvānāṃ saṃsāracittam

sattvānāṃ saṃsāracittam+vāsanāmalas -> sattvānāṃ saṃsāracittaṃ vāsanāmalas

sattvānāṃ saṃsāracittaṃ vāsanāmalas+buddhatvam -> sattvānāṃ saṃsāracittaṃ vāsanāmalo buddhatvam

sattvānāṃ saṃsāracittaṃ vāsanāmalo buddhatvam+nāma -> sattvānāṃ saṃsāracittaṃ vāsanāmalo buddhatvaṃ nāma

tasmāt+māras -> tasmān māras

tasmān māras+nāma -> tasmān māro nāma

dvātriṃśadūrṇāparimaṇḍalam+ṣaḍabhijñas -> dvātriṃśadūrṇāparimaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍabhijñas

dvātriṃśadūrṇāparimaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍabhijñas+bhavati -> dvātriṃśadūrṇāparimaṇḍalaṃ ṣaḍabhijño bhavati

dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni+aśītyanuvyañjanāni -> dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny aśītyanuvyañjanāni

na+anyasya -> nānyasya

karmabhūmyām+bhagavatas -> karmabhūmyāṃ bhagavatas

karmabhūmyāṃ bhagavatas+vinā -> karmabhūmyāṃ bhagavato vinā

kim+ca -> kiṃ ca

kiṃ ca+anyat -> kiṃ cānyat

kiṃ cānyat+iha -> kiṃ cānyad iha

nirāvaraṇacittāt+iti| -> nirāvaraṇacittād iti|

māras+na -> māro na

māro na+asti -> māro nāsti

buddhatvam+tasmin -> buddhatvaṃ tasmin

buddhatvaṃ tasmin+kṣaṇe -> buddhatvaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe

yasmin+kṣaṇe -> yasmin kṣaṇe

syāt+sāvaraṇacittāt| -> syāt sāvaraṇacittāt|

buddhatvam+na -> buddhatvaṃ na

māras+tasmin -> māras tasmin

māras tasmin+kṣaṇe -> māras tasmin kṣaṇe

yasmin+kṣaṇe -> yasmin kṣaṇe

yugapat+ca -> yugapac ca

ādyabhisambuddhas+api -> ādyabhisambuddho 'pi

devāsuramanuṣyāṇām+madhye| -> devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ madhye|

mārabhaṅgam+karoti -> mārabhaṅgaṃ karoti

kas+api -> ko 'pi

iha+ādau -> ihādau

vacanāt+paramavirodhas -> vacanāt paramavirodhas

vacanāt paramavirodhas+svayam -> vacanāt paramavirodhaḥ svayam

vacanāt paramavirodhaḥ svayam+asiddhasya -> vacanāt paramavirodhaḥ svayam asiddhasya

punar+garbhāvakramaṇābhāvas -> punar garbhāvakramaṇābhāvas

punar garbhāvakramaṇābhāvas+iti -> punar garbhāvakramaṇābhāva iti

tat+sarvajñas -> tat sarvajñas

tat sarvajñas+dharmadeśakas -> tat sarvajño dharmadeśakas

tat sarvajño dharmadeśakas+abhūt -> tat sarvajño dharmadeśako 'bhūt

tat sarvajño dharmadeśako 'bhūt+paścāt -> tat sarvajño dharmadeśako 'bhūt paścāt

tat sarvajño dharmadeśako 'bhūt paścāt+parinirvṛtasya -> tat sarvajño dharmadeśako 'bhūt paścāt parinirvṛtasya

mārabhaṅgas+kṛtas -> mārabhaṅgaḥ kṛtas

mārabhaṅgaḥ kṛtas+bodhis -> mārabhaṅgaḥ kṛto bodhis

mārabhaṅgaḥ kṛto bodhis+utpāditā -> mārabhaṅgaḥ kṛto bodhir utpāditā

kasyacit+vacanam -> kasyacid vacanam

kasyacid vacanam+prāk -> kasyacid vacanaṃ prāk

kasyacid vacanaṃ prāk+tena -> kasyacid vacanaṃ prāk tena

syāt+garbhotpannatvāt -> syād garbhotpannatvāt

syād garbhotpannatvāt+iti| -> syād garbhotpannatvād iti|

mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtas+śākyamunis -> mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ śākyamunis

mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ śākyamunis+sarvajñas -> mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ śākyamuniḥ sarvajñas

mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ śākyamuniḥ sarvajñas+deśakas -> mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ śākyamuniḥ sarvajño deśakas

mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ śākyamuniḥ sarvajño deśakas+na -> mahāmāyādevīkukṣisambhūtaḥ śākyamuniḥ sarvajño deśako na

saṃgītikāras+ca -> saṃgītikāraś ca

garbhotpānas+tathāgatasya -> garbhotpānas tathāgatasya

garbhotpānas tathāgatasyādhyeṣakas+na -> garbhotpānas tathāgatasyādhyeṣako na

bhagavatas+api -> bhagavato 'pi

tat+na| -> tan na|

garbhotpannas+tathāgatasya -> garbhotpannas tathāgatasya

garbhotpannas tathāgatasya+adhyeṣakas -> garbhotpannas tathāgatasyādhyeṣakas

garbhotpannas tathāgatasyādhyeṣakas+na -> garbhotpannas tathāgatasyādhyeṣako na

yat+kenacit -> yat kenacit

yat kenacit+vaktavyam -> yat kenacid vaktavyam

yat kenacid vaktavyam+mantranaye -> yat kenacid vaktavyaṃ mantranaye

parasparam+deśakādhyeṣakasambandhas -> parasparaṃ deśakādhyeṣakasambandhas

parasparaṃ deśakādhyeṣakasambandhas+viruddhas -> parasparaṃ deśakādhyeṣakasambandho viruddhas

parasparaṃ deśakādhyeṣakasambandho viruddhas+tasmāt -> parasparaṃ deśakādhyeṣakasambandho viruddhas tasmāt

parasparaṃ deśakādhyeṣakasambandho viruddhas tasmāt+ucyate -> parasparaṃ deśakādhyeṣakasambandho viruddhas tasmād ucyate

vyākṛtas+iti -> vyākṛta iti

vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtas+sucandras -> vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtaḥ sucandras

vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtaḥ sucandras+rājādhyeṣakas -> vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtaḥ sucandro rājādhyeṣakas

vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtaḥ sucandro rājādhyeṣakas+kvacit -> vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtaḥ sucandro rājādhyeṣakaḥ kvacit

vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtaḥ sucandro rājādhyeṣakaḥ kvacit+tantrāntare -> vijayādevīgarbhasambhūtaḥ sucandro rājādhyeṣakaḥ kvacit tantrāntare

katham+sambhalaviṣayakalāpagrāmādhipates -> kathaṃ sambhalaviṣayakalāpagrāmādhipates

kathaṃ sambhalaviṣayakalāpagrāmādhipates+sūryaprabhasya -> kathaṃ sambhalaviṣayakalāpagrāmādhipateḥ sūryaprabhasya

mahāyakṣādhipatis+mahābodhisattvas -> mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvas

mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvas+vajrapāṇis -> mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvo vajrapāṇis

mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvo vajrapāṇis+tathāgatasya -> mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvo vajrapāṇis tathāgatasya

mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvo vajrapāṇis tathāgatasya+adhyeṣakas -> mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvo vajrapāṇis tathāgatasyādhyeṣakas

mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvo vajrapāṇis tathāgatasyādhyeṣakas+saṃgītikāras -> mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvo vajrapāṇis tathāgatasyādhyeṣakaḥ saṃgītikāras

mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvo vajrapāṇis tathāgatasyādhyeṣakaḥ saṃgītikāras+ca| -> mahāyakṣādhipatir mahābodhisattvo vajrapāṇis tathāgatasyādhyeṣakaḥ saṃgītikāraś ca|

vajrayāne+aḍakavatīnivāsī -> vajrayāne 'ḍakavatīnivāsī

vacanam+bhaviṣyati| -> vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati|

kadācit+pūrvāparatantraṭīkāśrutasya -> kadācit pūrvāparatantraṭīkāśrutasya

idānīm+punar -> idānīṃ punar

idānīṃ punar+deśakādhyeṣakasambandhas -> idānīṃ punar deśakādhyeṣakasambandhas

idānīṃ punar deśakādhyeṣakasambandhas+atra -> idānīṃ punar deśakādhyeṣakasambandho 'tra

idānīṃ punar deśakādhyeṣakasambandho 'tra+ucyate| -> idānīṃ punar deśakādhyeṣakasambandho 'trocyate|

vyākṛtas+anye -> vyākṛto 'nye

vyākṛto 'nye+api -> vyākṛto 'nye 'pi

lokeśvaras+laghutantre -> lokeśvaro laghutantre

aham+api -> aham api

sārdhatrikoṭīnām+brahmaṛṣīṇām -> sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām

sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇām+kalāpagrāmanivāsinām -> sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ kalāpagrāmanivāsinām

sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ kalāpagrāmanivāsinām+vaineyārtham| -> sārdhatrikoṭīnāṃ brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ kalāpagrāmanivāsināṃ vaineyārtham|

vyākṛtas+anāgate -> vyākṛto 'nāgate

vyākṛto 'nāgate+adhvani -> vyākṛto 'nāgate 'dhvani

mañjuśrīs+tathāgatena -> mañjuśrīs tathāgatena

atas+dvādaśasāhasrikāt -> ato dvādaśasāhasrikāt

ato dvādaśasāhasrikāt+paramādibuddhāt -> ato dvādaśasāhasrikāt paramādibuddhāt

ato dvādaśasāhasrikāt paramādibuddhāt+laghutantrasaṃgītikaraṇāya -> ato dvādaśasāhasrikāt paramādibuddhāl laghutantrasaṃgītikaraṇāya

ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭinivāsinām+sarvasattvānām -> ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭinivāsināṃ sarvasattvānām

ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭinivāsināṃ sarvasattvānām+mahāyānamārgalābhāya -> ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭinivāsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ mahāyānamārgalābhāya

ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭinivāsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ mahāyānamārgalābhāya+iti| -> ṣaṇṇavatigrāmakoṭinivāsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ mahāyānamārgalābhāyeti|

brahmaṛṣīṇām+vaineyārtham -> brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ vaineyārtham

brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ vaineyārtham+sambhalaviṣayādi -> brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ vaineyārthaṃ sambhalaviṣayādi

anāgate+adhvani -> anāgate 'dhvani

yamāntakādīnām+tantradeśanāya -> yamāntakādīnāṃ tantradeśanāya

mañjuśriyas+tathāgatavyākaraṇam -> mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇam

mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇam+mama -> mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇaṃ mama

mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇaṃ mama+eva -> mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇaṃ mamaiva

atas+paramādibuddhāt -> ataḥ paramādibuddhāt

ataḥ paramādibuddhāt+laghutantrasaṃgītikaraṇāya -> ataḥ paramādibuddhāl laghutantrasaṃgītikaraṇāya

vajrapadaguptaprakāreṇa+iti| -> vajrapadaguptaprakāreṇeti|

sam+iti -> sam iti

narādisakalasattvānām+samyaksambuddhatvalābhāya -> narādisakalasattvānāṃ samyaksambuddhatvalābhāya

lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakam+pañcakalpātmakam -> lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakaṃ pañcakalpātmakam

lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakaṃ pañcakalpātmakam+vā -> lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakaṃ pañcakalpātmakaṃ vā

evam+uktakrameṇa -> evam uktakrameṇa

eṣām+catuḥkāyādīnām -> eṣāṃ catuḥkāyādīnām

eṣāṃ catuḥkāyādīnām+laukikalokottaramārgaprakāśakam -> eṣāṃ catuḥkāyādīnāṃ laukikalokottaramārgaprakāśakam

eṣāṃ catuḥkāyādīnāṃ laukikalokottaramārgaprakāśakam+paramādibuddham -> eṣāṃ catuḥkāyādīnāṃ laukikalokottaramārgaprakāśakaṃ paramādibuddham

eṣāṃ catuḥkāyādīnāṃ laukikalokottaramārgaprakāśakaṃ paramādibuddham+iti|| -> eṣāṃ catuḥkāyādīnāṃ laukikalokottaramārgaprakāśakaṃ paramādibuddham iti||

mahāmudrāsiddhis+iti| -> mahāmudrāsiddhir iti|

jñānamudrāsiddhis+bhāvābhāvarahitā -> jñānamudrāsiddhir bhāvābhāvarahitā

karmamudrāsiddhis+rūpāvacarā -> karmamudrāsiddhī rūpāvacarā

siddhis+---kāmāvacarā -> siddhiḥ---kāmāvacarā

āsām+trividhā -> āsāṃ trividhā

pratisenāsvarūpiṇī+iti| -> pratisenāsvarūpiṇīti|

karmajñānamahāmudrāsiddhis+iti -> karmajñānamahāmudrāsiddhir iti

śodhakas+iti|| -> śodhaka iti||

niyamāt+mahāmudrāparamākṣarajñānalakṣaṇas -> niyamān mahāmudrāparamākṣarajñānalakṣaṇas

niyamān mahāmudrāparamākṣarajñānalakṣaṇas+guruvaktram -> niyamān mahāmudrāparamākṣarajñānalakṣaṇo guruvaktram

niyamān mahāmudrāparamākṣarajñānalakṣaṇo guruvaktram+kāyavāgādinirāvaraṇatvena -> niyamān mahāmudrāparamākṣarajñānalakṣaṇo guruvaktraṃ kāyavāgādinirāvaraṇatvena

lokottaras+ekādaśatamas -> lokottara ekādaśatamas

lokottara ekādaśatamas+caturthas -> lokottara ekādaśatamaś caturthas

lokottara ekādaśatamaś caturthas+tat -> lokottara ekādaśatamaś caturthas tat

lokottara ekādaśatamaś caturthas tat+punas -> lokottara ekādaśatamaś caturthas tat punas

lokottara ekādaśatamaś caturthas tat punas+tathā -> lokottara ekādaśatamaś caturthas tat punas tathā

lokottara ekādaśatamaś caturthas tat punas tathā+iti -> lokottara ekādaśatamaś caturthas tat punas tatheti

daśa+abhiṣekās -> daśābhiṣekās

daśābhiṣekās+---kāyavākcittajñānadhātuskandhāyatanakarmendriyādipariśuddhyā -> daśābhiṣekāḥ---kāyavākcittajñānadhātuskandhāyatanakarmendriyādipariśuddhyā

daśābhiṣekāḥ---kāyavākcittajñānadhātuskandhāyatanakarmendriyādipariśuddhyā+iti| -> daśābhiṣekāḥ---kāyavākcittajñānadhātuskandhāyatanakarmendriyādipariśuddhyeti|

garbhajānām+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> garbhajānāṃ lokasaṃvṛtyā

kalaśas+guhyam -> kalaśo guhyam

kalaśo guhyam+prajñājñānam -> kalaśo guhyaṃ prajñājñānam

kalaśo guhyaṃ prajñājñānam+iti| -> kalaśo guhyaṃ prajñājñānam iti|

laukikās+tāvat -> laukikās tāvat

laukikās tāvat+udakam -> laukikās tāvad udakam

laukikās tāvad udakam+mukuṭas -> laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭas

laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭas+paṭṭam -> laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭaḥ paṭṭam

laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭaḥ paṭṭam+vajraghaṇṭās -> laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭaḥ paṭṭaṃ vajraghaṇṭās

laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭaḥ paṭṭaṃ vajraghaṇṭās+mahāvratam -> laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭaḥ paṭṭaṃ vajraghaṇṭā mahāvratam

laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭaḥ paṭṭaṃ vajraghaṇṭā mahāvratam+nāma -> laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭaḥ paṭṭaṃ vajraghaṇṭā mahāvrataṃ nāma

laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭaḥ paṭṭaṃ vajraghaṇṭā mahāvrataṃ nāma+anujñā -> laukikās tāvad udakaṃ mukuṭaḥ paṭṭaṃ vajraghaṇṭā mahāvrataṃ nāmānujñā

laukikalokottarābhiṣekās+iti -> laukikalokottarābhiṣekā iti

vācakam+iti|| -> vācakam iti||

anayos+ekatvam -> anayor ekatvam

anayor ekatvam+ṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyam -> anayor ekatvaṃ ṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyam

anayor ekatvaṃ ṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyam+tasya -> anayor ekatvaṃ ṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyaṃ tasya

pūrṇimāntakṛṣṇapratipatpraveśayos+madhye -> pūrṇimāntakṛṣṇapratipatpraveśayor madhye

tithayas+pūrṇimāparyantam| -> tithayaḥ pūrṇimāparyantam|

anāvalambinī+ekādaśyādyās -> anāvalambiny ekādaśyādyās

anāvalambiny ekādaśyādyās+pañca -> anāvalambiny ekādaśyādyāḥ pañca

tithayas+| -> tithayaḥ|

ṣaṣṭhyādyās+pañca -> ṣaṣṭhyādyāḥ pañca

tithayas+| -> tithayaḥ|

śuklapratipadādyās+pañca -> śuklapratipadādyāḥ pañca

ca+iti| -> ceti|

dharmāvalambinī+analambinī -> dharmāvalambiny analambinī

evam+karuṇā -> evaṃ karuṇā

amāntaśuklapratipatpraveśayos+madhye -> amāntaśuklapratipatpraveśayor madhye

tithayas+pañcadaśaśūnyatās -> tithayaḥ pañcadaśaśūnyatās

tithayaḥ pañcadaśaśūnyatās+amāparyantam| -> tithayaḥ pañcadaśaśūnyatā amāparyantam|

tithayas+| -> tithayaḥ|

pañcendriyaśūnyatā+ekādaśādyās -> pañcendriyaśūnyataikādaśādyās

pañcendriyaśūnyataikādaśādyās+pañca -> pañcendriyaśūnyataikādaśādyāḥ pañca

tithayas+| -> tithayaḥ|

ṣaṣṭhyādyās+pañca -> ṣaṣṭhyādyāḥ pañca

tithayas+| -> tithayaḥ|

kṛṣṇapratipadādyās+pañca -> kṛṣṇapratipadādyāḥ pañca

ca+iti| -> ceti|

śūnyatāyās+trayas -> śūnyatāyās trayas

śūnyatāyās trayas+bhedās -> śūnyatāyās trayo bhedās

śūnyatāyās trayo bhedās+śūnyatā -> śūnyatāyās trayo bhedāḥ śūnyatā

śuklapakṣas+candramās -> śuklapakṣaś candramās

śuklapakṣaś candramās+upāyas -> śuklapakṣaś candramā upāyas

śuklapakṣaś candramā upāyas+| -> śuklapakṣaś candramā upāyaḥ|

karuṇā+iti -> karuṇeti

kṛṣṇapakṣas+sūryas -> kṛṣṇapakṣaḥ sūryas

kṛṣṇapakṣaḥ sūryas+prajñā| -> kṛṣṇapakṣaḥ sūryaḥ prajñā|

śūnyatā+iti -> śūnyateti

ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudharatvāt+iti| -> ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudharatvād iti|

buddhānām+nirāvaraṇāni -> buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇāni

ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindumocanatvāt+iti -> ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindumocanatvād iti

garbhajānām+sāvaraṇāni -> garbhajānāṃ sāvaraṇāni

nirmāṇakāyas+nirmāṇavāk -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāk

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāk+nirmāṇacittam -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittam

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittam+nirmāṇajñānam -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānam

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānam+sambhogakāyas -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyas

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyas+sambhogavāk -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk+sambhogacittam -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittam

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittam+sambhogajñānam -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānam

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānam+dharmakāyas -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyas

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyas+dharmavāk -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāk

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāk+dharmacittam -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittam

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittam+dharmajñānam -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānam

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānam+sahajakāyas -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyas

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyas+sahajavāk -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyaḥ sahajavāk

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyaḥ sahajavāk+sahajacittam -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyaḥ sahajavāk sahajacittam

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyaḥ sahajavāk sahajacittam+sahajajñānam -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyaḥ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānam

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyaḥ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānam+iti -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyaḥ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānam iti

nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyaḥ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānam iti+ānandaparamaviramasahajabhedena -> nirmāṇakāyo nirmāṇavāṅ nirmāṇacittaṃ nirmāṇajñānaṃ sambhogakāyaḥ sambhogavāk sambhogacittaṃ sambhogajñānaṃ dharmakāyo dharmavāg dharmacittaṃ dharmajñānaṃ sahajakāyaḥ sahajavāk sahajacittaṃ sahajajñānam ity ānandaparamaviramasahajabhedena

tattvāni+iti -> tattvānīti

dvādaśāṅganirodhāt+iti| -> dvādaśāṅganirodhād iti|

garbhajānām+buddhānām -> garbhajānāṃ buddhānām

garbhajānāṃ buddhānām+nirāvaraṇāni -> garbhajānāṃ buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇāni

prāṇavāyupravāhān+sāvaraṇāni -> prāṇavāyupravāhan sāvaraṇāni

buddhānām+nirāvaraṇāni -> buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇāni

buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇāni+iti| -> buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇānīti|

garbhajānām+sāvaraṇāni -> garbhajānāṃ sāvaraṇāni

satyāni+iti -> satyānīti

satyānīti+avidyāsaṃskāravijñānanāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanātṛṣṇopādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇāni -> satyānīty avidyāsaṃskāravijñānanāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanātṛṣṇopādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇāni

satyānīty avidyāsaṃskāravijñānanāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanātṛṣṇopādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇāni+iti -> satyānīty avidyāsaṃskāravijñānanāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanātṛṣṇopādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇānīti

buddhānām+nirāvaraṇāni -> buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇāni

buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇāni+iti|| -> buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇānīti||

garbhajānām+sāvaraṇāni -> garbhajānāṃ sāvaraṇāni

toyadhātus+rūpam -> toyadhātū rūpam

toyadhātū rūpam+pṛthvīdhātus -> toyadhātū rūpaṃ pṛthvīdhātus

toyadhātū rūpaṃ pṛthvīdhātus+iti -> toyadhātū rūpaṃ pṛthvīdhātur iti

tejodhātus+saṃjñā -> tejodhātuḥ saṃjñā

ṣaṭ+kulāni -> ṣaṭ kulāni

ṣaṭ kulāni+iti -> ṣaṭ kulānīti

ṣaṭ kulānīti+akṣarasukham -> ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukham

ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukham+jñānadhātus -> ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātus

ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātus+vijñānam -> ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātur vijñānam

ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātur vijñānam+ākāśadhātus -> ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātur vijñānam ākāśadhātus

ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātur vijñānam ākāśadhātus+saṃskāras -> ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātur vijñānam ākāśadhātuḥ saṃskāras

ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātur vijñānam ākāśadhātuḥ saṃskāras+vāyudhātus -> ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātur vijñānam ākāśadhātuḥ saṃskāro vāyudhātus

ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātur vijñānam ākāśadhātuḥ saṃskāro vāyudhātus+vedanā -> ṣaṭ kulānīty akṣarasukhaṃ jñānadhātur vijñānam ākāśadhātuḥ saṃskāro vāyudhātur vedanā

buddhānām+nirāvaraṇās -> buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇās

buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇās+iti| -> buddhānāṃ nirāvaraṇā iti|

turyasuṣuptisvapnajāgradavasthālakṣaṇās+| -> turyasuṣuptisvapnajāgradavasthālakṣaṇāḥ|

catuḥkāyās+śuddhadharmasambhoganirmāṇās -> catuḥkāyāḥ śuddhadharmasambhoganirmāṇās

catuḥkāyāḥ śuddhadharmasambhoganirmāṇās+iti -> catuḥkāyāḥ śuddhadharmasambhoganirmāṇā iti

catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇālaukikalokottarābhiṣekakarmajñānamahāmudrāsiddhimārgaprakāśakam+iti| -> catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇālaukikalokottarābhiṣekakarmajñānamahāmudrāsiddhimārgaprakāśakam iti|

dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇa+evam -> dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇaivam

dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇaivam+catasṛbhis -> dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇaivaṃ catasṛbhis

dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇaivaṃ catasṛbhis+abhisambodhibhis -> dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇaivaṃ catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhis

dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇaivaṃ catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhis+pariśuddham -> dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇaivaṃ catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhiḥ pariśuddham

dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇaivaṃ catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhiḥ pariśuddham+iti| -> dhūmādibimbotpannakrameṇaivaṃ catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhiḥ pariśuddham iti|

ekakṣaṇābhisambodhis+pañcākārābhisambodhis -> ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhis

ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhis+viṃśatyākārābhisambodhis -> ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhir viṃśatyākārābhisambodhis

ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhir viṃśatyākārābhisambodhis+māyājālābhisambodhis -> ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhir viṃśatyākārābhisambodhir māyājālābhisambodhis

ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhir viṃśatyākārābhisambodhir māyājālābhisambodhis+ābhis -> ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhir viṃśatyākārābhisambodhir māyājālābhisambodhir ābhis

ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhir viṃśatyākārābhisambodhir māyājālābhisambodhir ābhis+pariśuddham -> ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhir viṃśatyākārābhisambodhir māyājālābhisambodhir ābhiḥ pariśuddham

ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhir viṃśatyākārābhisambodhir māyājālābhisambodhir ābhiḥ pariśuddham+garbhajotpattikrameṇa -> ekakṣaṇābhisambodhiḥ pañcākārābhisambodhir viṃśatyākārābhisambodhir māyājālābhisambodhir ābhiḥ pariśuddhaṃ garbhajotpattikrameṇa

catasṛbhis+abhisambodhibhis -> catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhis

catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhis+caturvajrais -> catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhiś caturvajrais

catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhiś caturvajrais+viśuddham -> catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhiś caturvajrair viśuddham

catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhiś caturvajrair viśuddham+iti| -> catasṛbhir abhisambodhibhiś caturvajrair viśuddham iti|

mārgadvayadarśanāt+iti|| -> mārgadvayadarśanād iti||

anayos+satyayos -> anayoḥ satyayos

anayoḥ satyayos+āśritam -> anayoḥ satyayor āśritam

anayoḥ satyayor āśritam+laukikalokottarasatyāśritam -> anayoḥ satyayor āśritaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritam

anayoḥ satyayor āśritaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritam+iti -> anayoḥ satyayor āśritaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritam iti

utpannakramas+sahajas -> utpannakramaḥ sahajas

utpannakramaḥ sahajas+nirvikalpas -> utpannakramaḥ sahajo nirvikalpas

utpannakramaḥ sahajo nirvikalpas+sarvākāras -> utpannakramaḥ sahajo nirvikalpaḥ sarvākāras

utpannakramaḥ sahajo nirvikalpaḥ sarvākāras+mukhabhujavarṇasaṃsthānakalpanārahitas -> utpannakramaḥ sahajo nirvikalpaḥ sarvākāro mukhabhujavarṇasaṃsthānakalpanārahitas

utpannakramaḥ sahajo nirvikalpaḥ sarvākāro mukhabhujavarṇasaṃsthānakalpanārahitas+iti| -> utpannakramaḥ sahajo nirvikalpaḥ sarvākāro mukhabhujavarṇasaṃsthānakalpanārahita iti|

mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanam+iti| -> mahāmudrāsiddhisādhanam iti|

nirvikalpacittena+utpannakrameṇa -> nirvikalpacittenotpannakrameṇa

lokottarasatyam+dhūmādinimittena -> lokottarasatyaṃ dhūmādinimittena

laukikasiddhisādhanam+utpattikrameṇa -> laukikasiddhisādhanam utpattikrameṇa

laukikasiddhisādhanam utpattikrameṇa+iti| -> laukikasiddhisādhanam utpattikrameṇeti|

laukikasatyam+maṇḍalacakravikalpabhāvanā -> laukikasatyaṃ maṇḍalacakravikalpabhāvanā

laukikalokottarasatyāśritam+iti| -> laukikalokottarasatyāśritam iti|

tat+udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇakam -> tad udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇakam

tad udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇakam+iti| -> tad udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇakam iti|

buddharatnakaraṇakam+tam -> buddharatnakaraṇakaṃ tam

buddharatnakaraṇakaṃ tam+eva -> buddharatnakaraṇakaṃ tam eva

buddharatnakaraṇakaṃ tam eva+udghāṭitam -> buddharatnakaraṇakaṃ tam evodghāṭitam

buddharatnakaraṇakaṃ tam evodghāṭitam+yena -> buddharatnakaraṇakaṃ tam evodghāṭitaṃ yena

buddharatnam+paramākṣarasukham -> buddharatnaṃ paramākṣarasukham

buddharatnaṃ paramākṣarasukham+karaṇḍakam -> buddharatnaṃ paramākṣarasukhaṃ karaṇḍakam

buddharatnaṃ paramākṣarasukhaṃ karaṇḍakam+vajramaṇipadmam -> buddharatnaṃ paramākṣarasukhaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ vajramaṇipadmam

buddharatnaṃ paramākṣarasukhaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ vajramaṇipadmam+iti -> buddharatnaṃ paramākṣarasukhaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ vajramaṇipadmam iti

udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakam+iti -> udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakam iti

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam+tantram -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtaṃ tantram

vajrapadasākṣibhūtaṃ tantram+tantrāntarānveṣakānām -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtaṃ tantraṃ tantrāntarānveṣakānām

vajrapadasākṣibhūtaṃ tantraṃ tantrāntarānveṣakānām+iti|% -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtaṃ tantraṃ tantrāntarānveṣakānām iti|%

atas+sarvatantrarājeṣu -> ataḥ sarvatantrarājeṣu

antanimittam+buddhatvam -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvam

antanimittaṃ buddhatvam+vajradharatvam -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam+ekaviṃśatisahasrais -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasrais

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasrais+ṣaṭśatādhikais -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikais

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikais+paramākṣarakṣaṇais -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇais

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇais+dvādaśabhūmilābhāt -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhāt
