antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhāt+mahāmudrāsiddhis -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhis

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhis+iti -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir iti

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir iti+etat -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir ity etat

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir ity etat+vajrapadādikam -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir ity etad vajrapadādikam

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir ity etad vajrapadādikam+nimittapūrvakam -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir ity etad vajrapadādikaṃ nimittapūrvakam

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir ity etad vajrapadādikaṃ nimittapūrvakam+prakaṭam -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir ity etad vajrapadādikaṃ nimittapūrvakaṃ prakaṭam

antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir ity etad vajrapadādikaṃ nimittapūrvakaṃ prakaṭam+tantrarāje -> antanimittaṃ buddhatvaṃ vajradharatvam ekaviṃśatisahasraiḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaiḥ paramākṣarakṣaṇair dvādaśabhūmilābhān mahāmudrāsiddhir ity etad vajrapadādikaṃ nimittapūrvakaṃ prakaṭaṃ tantrarāje

madhyanimittam+paramākṣarakṣaṇais -> madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇais

madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇais+aṣṭādaśaśatais -> madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇair aṣṭādaśaśatais

madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇair aṣṭādaśaśatais+ādibhūmilābhas -> madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇair aṣṭādaśaśatair ādibhūmilābhas

madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇair aṣṭādaśaśatair ādibhūmilābhas+pañcābhijñādṛṣṭārthasaṃdarśanam -> madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇair aṣṭādaśaśatair ādibhūmilābhaḥ pañcābhijñādṛṣṭārthasaṃdarśanam

madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇair aṣṭādaśaśatair ādibhūmilābhaḥ pañcābhijñādṛṣṭārthasaṃdarśanam+laukikasiddhiprāptis -> madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇair aṣṭādaśaśatair ādibhūmilābhaḥ pañcābhijñādṛṣṭārthasaṃdarśanaṃ laukikasiddhiprāptis

madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇair aṣṭādaśaśatair ādibhūmilābhaḥ pañcābhijñādṛṣṭārthasaṃdarśanaṃ laukikasiddhiprāptis+iti| -> madhyanimittaṃ paramākṣarakṣaṇair aṣṭādaśaśatair ādibhūmilābhaḥ pañcābhijñādṛṣṭārthasaṃdarśanaṃ laukikasiddhiprāptir iti|

bimbaniṣpattirakṣaṇalābhas+| -> bimbaniṣpattirakṣaṇalābhaḥ|

ādinimittam+dhūmādimārgas -> ādinimittaṃ dhūmādimārgas

ādinimittaṃ dhūmādimārgas+ṣaḍaṅgayogena -> ādinimittaṃ dhūmādimārgaḥ ṣaḍaṅgayogena

tridhā---ādinimittam+madhyanimittam -> tridhā---ādinimittaṃ madhyanimittam

tridhā---ādinimittaṃ madhyanimittam+antanimittam -> tridhā---ādinimittaṃ madhyanimittam antanimittam

tridhā---ādinimittaṃ madhyanimittam antanimittam+ca -> tridhā---ādinimittaṃ madhyanimittam antanimittaṃ ca

tridhā---ādinimittaṃ madhyanimittam antanimittaṃ ca+iti| -> tridhā---ādinimittaṃ madhyanimittam antanimittaṃ ceti|

nimittam+api -> nimittam api

ca+anyamantrādisādhanam -> cānyamantrādisādhanam

cānyamantrādisādhanam+dhūmādinimittam -> cānyamantrādisādhanaṃ dhūmādinimittam

cānyamantrādisādhanaṃ dhūmādinimittam+vihāya -> cānyamantrādisādhanaṃ dhūmādinimittaṃ vihāya

bhagavatas+vacanāt| -> bhagavato vacanāt|

pratyayas+asti -> pratyayo 'sti

pratyayo 'sti+aharniśam -> pratyayo 'sty aharniśam

pratyayo 'sty aharniśam+dinam -> pratyayo 'sty aharniśaṃ dinam

pratyayo 'sty aharniśaṃ dinam+ekam -> pratyayo 'sty aharniśaṃ dinam ekam

pratyayo 'sty aharniśaṃ dinam ekam+parīkṣayet -> pratyayo 'sty aharniśaṃ dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayet

pratyayo 'sty aharniśaṃ dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayet+iti -> pratyayo 'sty aharniśaṃ dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayed iti

gurupāramparyakrameṇa+āgatas -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāgatas

gurupāramparyakrameṇāgatas+na -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāgato na

gurupāramparyakrameṇāgato na+adhiṣṭhitam -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāgato nādhiṣṭhitam

gurupāramparyakrameṇāgato nādhiṣṭhitam+gurvājñayā -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāgato nādhiṣṭhitaṃ gurvājñayā

gurupāramparyakrameṇāgato nādhiṣṭhitaṃ gurvājñayā+iti| -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāgato nādhiṣṭhitaṃ gurvājñayeti|

vajrapadam+mahāmudrābhāvanāmārgas -> vajrapadaṃ mahāmudrābhāvanāmārgas

vajrapadaṃ mahāmudrābhāvanāmārgas+dhūmādikas -> vajrapadaṃ mahāmudrābhāvanāmārgo dhūmādikas

vajrapadaṃ mahāmudrābhāvanāmārgo dhūmādikas+prakaṭas -> vajrapadaṃ mahāmudrābhāvanāmārgo dhūmādikaḥ prakaṭas

vajrapadaṃ mahāmudrābhāvanāmārgo dhūmādikaḥ prakaṭas+na -> vajrapadaṃ mahāmudrābhāvanāmārgo dhūmādikaḥ prakaṭo na

atas+bhagavatas -> ato bhagavatas

ato bhagavatas+vacanāt -> ato bhagavato vacanāt

ato bhagavato vacanāt+paramādibuddhe -> ato bhagavato vacanāt paramādibuddhe

dinam+ekam -> dinam ekam

dinam ekam+parīkṣayet -> dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayet

dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayet+iti| -> dinam ekaṃ parīkṣayed iti|

ekāgramanas+kṛtvā -> ekāgramanaḥ kṛtvā

dhūmādinimittamārgas+prakāśitas -> dhūmādinimittamārgaḥ prakāśitas

dhūmādinimittamārgaḥ prakāśitas+|| -> dhūmādinimittamārgaḥ prakāśitaḥ||

asya+eva -> asyaiva

vajrapadam+prakaṭam -> vajrapadaṃ prakaṭam

vajrapadaṃ prakaṭam+uddeśanirdeśapratinirdeśais -> vajrapadaṃ prakaṭam uddeśanirdeśapratinirdeśais

vajrapadaṃ prakaṭam uddeśanirdeśapratinirdeśais+bhagavatā -> vajrapadaṃ prakaṭam uddeśanirdeśapratinirdeśair bhagavatā

atas+eva -> ata eva

ata eva+asmin -> ata evāsmin

ata evāsmin+ādibuddhe -> ata evāsminn ādibuddhe

mahāmudrāsiddhiphaladāyakam+iti| -> mahāmudrāsiddhiphaladāyakam iti|

vajrapadam+caturtham -> vajrapadaṃ caturtham

vajrapadaṃ caturtham+tat -> vajrapadaṃ caturthaṃ tat

vajrapadaṃ caturthaṃ tat+punas -> vajrapadaṃ caturthaṃ tat punas

vajrapadaṃ caturthaṃ tat punas+tathā -> vajrapadaṃ caturthaṃ tat punas tathā

samayasiddhidāyakam+paramārthasatyena -> samayasiddhidāyakaṃ paramārthasatyena

vajrapadam+māraṇādau -> vajrapadaṃ māraṇādau

tayos+lokasaṃvṛtyā -> tayor lokasaṃvṛtyā

dvitīyam+paramārthatas -> dvitīyaṃ paramārthatas

dvitīyaṃ paramārthatas+| -> dvitīyaṃ paramārthataḥ|

vajrapadam---ekam+laukikasaṃvṛtyā -> vajrapadam---ekaṃ laukikasaṃvṛtyā

boddhavyam+iti -> boddhavyam iti

gurupāramparyakrameṇa+avagantavyam -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāvagantavyam

gurupāramparyakrameṇāvagantavyam+tantram -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāvagantavyaṃ tantram

gurupāramparyakrameṇāvagantavyaṃ tantram+tantrāntareṇa -> gurupāramparyakrameṇāvagantavyaṃ tantraṃ tantrāntareṇa

vajrapadam+prakaṭam -> vajrapadaṃ prakaṭam

vajrapadaṃ prakaṭam+na -> vajrapadaṃ prakaṭaṃ na

vajrapadam+guptam -> vajrapadaṃ guptam

vajrapadaṃ guptam+iti -> vajrapadaṃ guptam iti

caturtham+atas -> caturtham atas

caturtham atas+bhagavatas -> caturtham ato bhagavatas

caturtham ato bhagavatas+vacanāt| -> caturtham ato bhagavato vacanāt|

prajñājñānam+tat -> prajñājñānaṃ tat

prajñājñānaṃ tat+eva -> prajñājñānaṃ tad eva

vacanāt+tat -> vacanāt tat

vacanāt tat+punas -> vacanāt tat punas

vacanāt tat punas+tathā -> vacanāt tat punas tathā

vacanāt tat punas tathā+iti -> vacanāt tat punas tatheti

caturtham+iti -> caturtham iti

caturtham+tṛtīyam -> caturthaṃ tṛtīyam

caturthaṃ tṛtīyam+na -> caturthaṃ tṛtīyaṃ na

vajrapadam+guptam -> vajrapadaṃ guptam

vajrapadaṃ guptam+caturtham -> vajrapadaṃ guptaṃ caturtham

vajrapadaṃ guptaṃ caturtham+tat -> vajrapadaṃ guptaṃ caturthaṃ tat

vajrapadaṃ guptaṃ caturthaṃ tat+punas -> vajrapadaṃ guptaṃ caturthaṃ tat punas

vajrapadaṃ guptaṃ caturthaṃ tat punas+tathā -> vajrapadaṃ guptaṃ caturthaṃ tat punas tathā

vajrapadaṃ guptaṃ caturthaṃ tat punas tathā+iti -> vajrapadaṃ guptaṃ caturthaṃ tat punas tatheti

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam+iti| -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam iti|

nāmasaṃgītyā+āliṅgitam -> nāmasaṃgītyāliṅgitam

nāmasaṃgītyāliṅgitam+iti|| -> nāmasaṃgītyāliṅgitam iti||

tathāgatās+yānatrayadeśakās -> tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakās

tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakās+caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakās -> tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakāś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakās

tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakāś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakās+sattvāśayavaśāt -> tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakāś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakāḥ sattvāśayavaśāt

tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakāś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakāḥ sattvāśayavaśāt+iti -> tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakāś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakāḥ sattvāśayavaśād iti

tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakāś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakāḥ sattvāśayavaśād iti+atas -> tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakāś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakāḥ sattvāśayavaśād ity atas

tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakāś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakāḥ sattvāśayavaśād ity atas+vajradharajñānakāyasākṣibhūtayā -> tathāgatā yānatrayadeśakāś caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhadeśakāḥ sattvāśayavaśād ity ato vajradharajñānakāyasākṣibhūtayā

atas+sarve -> ataḥ sarve

sarvajñatābhāvas+vajrayānādeśakatvāt -> sarvajñatābhāvo vajrayānādeśakatvāt

sarvajñatābhāvo vajrayānādeśakatvāt+iti| -> sarvajñatābhāvo vajrayānādeśakatvād iti|

atas+tathāgatapravacanāt -> atas tathāgatapravacanāt

atas tathāgatapravacanāt+sarvatathāgatās -> atas tathāgatapravacanāt sarvatathāgatās

atas tathāgatapravacanāt sarvatathāgatās+yānatrayadeśakās -> atas tathāgatapravacanāt sarvatathāgatā yānatrayadeśakās

atas tathāgatapravacanāt sarvatathāgatā yānatrayadeśakās+anyathā -> atas tathāgatapravacanāt sarvatathāgatā yānatrayadeśakā anyathā

deśitam+iti| -> deśitam iti|

punar+anyakālena -> punar anyakālena

punar anyakālena+anyaviṣaye -> punar anyakālenānyaviṣaye

deśitam+caturvarṇābhimānābhavyasattvāśayavaśāt -> deśitaṃ caturvarṇābhimānābhavyasattvāśayavaśāt

deśitaṃ caturvarṇābhimānābhavyasattvāśayavaśāt+iti| -> deśitaṃ caturvarṇābhimānābhavyasattvāśayavaśād iti|

āryaviṣayaparṣadas+na -> āryaviṣayaparṣado na

samayena+iti| -> samayeneti|

tat+tena -> tat tena

mantrayānam+deśitam -> mantrayānaṃ deśitam

mantrayānaṃ deśitam+iti -> mantrayānaṃ deśitam iti

kenacit+tathāgatena -> kenacit tathāgatena

yat+samāje -> yat samāje

atas+nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt -> ato nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt

ato nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt+sarvatathāgatais -> ato nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt sarvatathāgatais

ato nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt sarvatathāgatais+mantrayānam -> ato nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt sarvatathāgatair mantrayānam

ato nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt sarvatathāgatair mantrayānam+deśitam -> ato nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt sarvatathāgatair mantrayānaṃ deśitam

ato nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt sarvatathāgatair mantrayānaṃ deśitam+iti| -> ato nāmasaṃgītikādhyeṣaṇavacanāt sarvatathāgatair mantrayānaṃ deśitam iti|

mahāvajradharais+hṛṣṭais -> mahāvajradharair hṛṣṭais

mahāvajradharair hṛṣṭais+ameyais -> mahāvajradharair hṛṣṭair ameyais

mahāvajradharair hṛṣṭair ameyais+mantradhāribhis -> mahāvajradharair hṛṣṭair ameyair mantradhāribhis

mahāvajradharair hṛṣṭair ameyair mantradhāribhis+|| -> mahāvajradharair hṛṣṭair ameyair mantradhāribhiḥ||

ca+asmin -> cāsmin

cāsmin+sampragīyate| -> cāsmin sampragīyate|

punas+punas -> punaḥ punas

punaḥ punas+|| -> punaḥ punaḥ||

sambuddhās+yām -> sambuddhā yām

sambuddhā yām+bhāṣante -> sambuddhā yāṃ bhāṣante

pratyutpannās+ca -> pratyutpannāś ca

hi+anāgatās -> hy anāgatās

hy anāgatās+| -> hy anāgatāḥ|

buddhais+bhāṣiṣyante -> buddhair bhāṣiṣyante

yā+atītais -> yātītais

yātītais+bhāṣitā -> yātītair bhāṣitā

vajrapāṇis+āha--- -> vajrapāṇir āha---

dīpaṃkarathatāgatena+api -> dīpaṃkarathatāgatenāpi

dīpaṃkarathatāgatenāpi+iti| -> dīpaṃkarathatāgatenāpīti|

na+ekena -> naikena

deśyate+iti| -> deśyata iti|

anādikāle+anādibuddhais -> anādikāle 'nādibuddhais

anādikāle 'nādibuddhais+deśitam -> anādikāle 'nādibuddhair deśitam

anādikāle 'nādibuddhair deśitam+deśayiṣyate% -> anādikāle 'nādibuddhair deśitaṃ deśayiṣyate%

ādiśabdas+anādinidhanārthas -> ādiśabdo 'nādinidhanārthas

ādiśabdo 'nādinidhanārthas+| -> ādiśabdo 'nādinidhanārthaḥ|

tathā+ādibuddham -> tathādibuddham

tathādibuddham+api| -> tathādibuddham api|

nāmasaṃgītis+atītānāgatapratyutpannais -> nāmasaṃgītir atītānāgatapratyutpannais

nāmasaṃgītir atītānāgatapratyutpannais+tathāgatais -> nāmasaṃgītir atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatais

nāmasaṃgītir atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatais+bhāṣitā -> nāmasaṃgītir atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair bhāṣitā

nāmasaṃgītyā+āliṅgitam -> nāmasaṃgītyāliṅgitam

nāmasaṃgītyāliṅgitam+iti| -> nāmasaṃgītyāliṅgitam iti|

tasmāt+prajñopāyātmakam -> tasmāt prajñopāyātmakam

tasmāt prajñopāyātmakam+tantram -> tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantram

tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantram+yogatantram -> tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ yogatantram

tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ yogatantram+niranvayam -> tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ yogatantraṃ niranvayam

tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ yogatantraṃ niranvayam+kālacakram -> tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ yogatantraṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakram

tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ yogatantraṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakram+paramārthasatyatas -> tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ yogatantraṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakraṃ paramārthasatyatas

tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ yogatantraṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakraṃ paramārthasatyatas+iti| -> tasmāt prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ yogatantraṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakraṃ paramārthasatyata iti|

parāpekṣikatvāt+iti| -> parāpekṣikatvād iti|

atas+yogatantram -> ato yogatantram

ato yogatantram+yoginītantram -> ato yogatantraṃ yoginītantram

ato yogatantraṃ yoginītantram+ca -> ato yogatantraṃ yoginītantraṃ ca

yogī+evam -> yogy evam

yogy evam+yoginī -> yogy evaṃ yoginī

śīlam+asya -> śīlam asya

śīlam asya+asti -> śīlam asyāsti

evam+yoginīnāmni -> evaṃ yoginīnāmni

evaṃ yoginīnāmni+api| -> evaṃ yoginīnāmny api|

dhātuskandhaviśuddhitas+prajñopāyapakṣas -> dhātuskandhaviśuddhitaḥ prajñopāyapakṣas

dhātuskandhaviśuddhitaḥ prajñopāyapakṣas+uktas -> dhātuskandhaviśuddhitaḥ prajñopāyapakṣa uktas

dhātuskandhaviśuddhitaḥ prajñopāyapakṣa uktas+mṛdusattvāśayavaśāt -> dhātuskandhaviśuddhitaḥ prajñopāyapakṣa ukto mṛdusattvāśayavaśāt

dhātuskandhaviśuddhitaḥ prajñopāyapakṣa ukto mṛdusattvāśayavaśāt+tathāgatena -> dhātuskandhaviśuddhitaḥ prajñopāyapakṣa ukto mṛdusattvāśayavaśāt tathāgatena

dhātuskandhaviśuddhitaḥ prajñopāyapakṣa ukto mṛdusattvāśayavaśāt tathāgatena+iti| -> dhātuskandhaviśuddhitaḥ prajñopāyapakṣa ukto mṛdusattvāśayavaśāt tathāgateneti|

prajñātantram+na -> prajñātantraṃ na

prajñātantraṃ na+upāyatantram -> prajñātantraṃ nopāyatantram

prajñātantraṃ nopāyatantram+paramārthatas -> prajñātantraṃ nopāyatantraṃ paramārthatas

prajñātantraṃ nopāyatantraṃ paramārthatas+| -> prajñātantraṃ nopāyatantraṃ paramārthataḥ|

tat+tantram -> tat tantram

tat tantram+na -> tat tantraṃ na

prajñopāyātmakas+abhidheyas -> prajñopāyātmako 'bhidheyas

prajñopāyātmako 'bhidheyas+bhavati -> prajñopāyātmako 'bhidheyo bhavati

atas+yasmin -> ato yasmin

ato yasmin+tantre -> ato yasmiṃś tantre

prajñopāyasamāpattis+yogas -> prajñopāyasamāpattir yogas

prajñopāyasamāpattir yogas+uktas -> prajñopāyasamāpattir yoga uktas

prajñopāyasamāpattir yoga uktas+tathāgatais -> prajñopāyasamāpattir yoga uktas tathāgatais

prajñopāyasamāpattir yoga uktas tathāgatais+|| -> prajñopāyasamāpattir yoga uktas tathāgataiḥ||

na+ekayā -> naikayā

yogas+na -> yogo na

yogo na+upāyakāyena -> yogo nopāyakāyena

ca+āha--- -> cāha---

yogaśabdas+prajñopāyārthavācakas -> yogaśabdaḥ prajñopāyārthavācakas

yogaśabdaḥ prajñopāyārthavācakas+iti| -> yogaśabdaḥ prajñopāyārthavācaka iti|

yogaśabdas+upāyārthavācakas -> yogaśabda upāyārthavācakas

yogaśabda upāyārthavācakas+prajñārthacāvakas -> yogaśabda upāyārthavācakaḥ prajñārthacāvakas

yogaśabda upāyārthavācakaḥ prajñārthacāvakas+vā| -> yogaśabda upāyārthavācakaḥ prajñārthacāvako vā|

yogatantre+upāyanāmni| -> yogatantra upāyanāmni|

prajñopāyātmakas+advayayogas -> prajñopāyātmako 'dvayayogas

prajñopāyātmako 'dvayayogas+vācyavācakalakṣaṇas -> prajñopāyātmako 'dvayayogo vācyavācakalakṣaṇas

prajñopāyātmako 'dvayayogo vācyavācakalakṣaṇas+na -> prajñopāyātmako 'dvayayogo vācyavācakalakṣaṇo na

iha+abhidhānābhidheyasambandhena -> ihābhidhānābhidheyasambandhena

prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvāt+advayajñānābhāvas -> prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvas

prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvas+advayajñānābhāvāt -> prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvāt

prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvāt+buddhatvasya -> prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasya

prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasya+api -> prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasyāpi

prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasyāpi+abhāvas -> prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasyāpy abhāvas

prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasyāpy abhāvas+buddhatvābhāvāt -> prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasyāpy abhāvo buddhatvābhāvāt

prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasyāpy abhāvo buddhatvābhāvāt+saṃsāras -> prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasyāpy abhāvo buddhatvābhāvāt saṃsāras

prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasyāpy abhāvo buddhatvābhāvāt saṃsāras+iti| -> prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvād advayajñānābhāvo 'dvayajñānābhāvād buddhatvasyāpy abhāvo buddhatvābhāvāt saṃsāra iti|

prajñopāyapakṣabhedāt+prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvas -> prajñopāyapakṣabhedāt prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvas

prajñopāyapakṣabhedāt prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvas+bhavati -> prajñopāyapakṣabhedāt prajñopāyātmakābhidheyābhāvo bhavati

jinena+iti|| -> jineneti||

prajñopāyātmakam+yogatantram -> prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogatantram

prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogatantram+iti -> prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogatantram iti

prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogatantram iti+advayam -> prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogatantram ity advayam

prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogatantram ity advayam+ucyate -> prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogatantram ity advayam ucyate

sas+anvayas -> so 'nvayas

so 'nvayas+bhinnapakṣas -> so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣas

so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣas+nirastas -> so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣo nirastas

so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣo nirastas+yasmāt -> so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣo nirasto yasmāt

so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣo nirasto yasmāt+tat -> so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣo nirasto yasmāt tat

so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣo nirasto yasmāt tat+tantram -> so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣo nirasto yasmāt tat tantram

so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣo nirasto yasmāt tat tantram+niranvayam| -> so 'nvayo bhinnapakṣo nirasto yasmāt tat tantraṃ niranvayam|

iha+anvayas -> ihānvayas

ihānvayas+prajñāpakṣas -> ihānvayaḥ prajñāpakṣas

ihānvayaḥ prajñāpakṣas+upāyapakṣas -> ihānvayaḥ prajñāpakṣa upāyapakṣas

ihānvayaḥ prajñāpakṣa upāyapakṣas+ca| -> ihānvayaḥ prajñāpakṣa upāyapakṣaś ca|

niranvayam+iti -> niranvayam iti

paramādibuddham+kālacakram -> paramādibuddhaṃ kālacakram

paramādibuddhaṃ kālacakram+kālacakrābhidheyavācakatvāt -> paramādibuddhaṃ kālacakraṃ kālacakrābhidheyavācakatvāt

paramādibuddhaṃ kālacakraṃ kālacakrābhidheyavācakatvāt+kālacakrābhidhānam -> paramādibuddhaṃ kālacakraṃ kālacakrābhidheyavācakatvāt kālacakrābhidhānam

paramādibuddhaṃ kālacakraṃ kālacakrābhidheyavācakatvāt kālacakrābhidhānam+iti| -> paramādibuddhaṃ kālacakraṃ kālacakrābhidheyavācakatvāt kālacakrābhidhānam iti|

paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvāt+asya -> paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvād asya

paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvād asya+abhidheyasya -> paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvād asyābhidheyasya

paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvād asyābhidheyasya+abhidhānasvabhāvatayā -> paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvād asyābhidheyasyābhidhānasvabhāvatayā

paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvād asyābhidheyasyābhidhānasvabhāvatayā+avasthitatvāt -> paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvād asyābhidheyasyābhidhānasvabhāvatayāvasthitatvāt

paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvād asyābhidheyasyābhidhānasvabhāvatayāvasthitatvāt+iti| -> paramādibuddhābhidheyavācakatvād asyābhidheyasyābhidhānasvabhāvatayāvasthitatvād iti|

paramādibuddham+iti| -> paramādibuddham iti|

caturaśītisahasrādhikatrilakṣākṣarasamūham+dvātriṃśadakṣarānuṣṭubhas -> caturaśītisahasrādhikatrilakṣākṣarasamūhaṃ dvātriṃśadakṣarānuṣṭubhas

caturaśītisahasrādhikatrilakṣākṣarasamūhaṃ dvātriṃśadakṣarānuṣṭubhas+dvādaśasāhasrikam -> caturaśītisahasrādhikatrilakṣākṣarasamūhaṃ dvātriṃśadakṣarānuṣṭubho dvādaśasāhasrikam

caturaśītisahasrādhikatrilakṣākṣarasamūhaṃ dvātriṃśadakṣarānuṣṭubho dvādaśasāhasrikam+iti| -> caturaśītisahasrādhikatrilakṣākṣarasamūhaṃ dvātriṃśadakṣarānuṣṭubho dvādaśasāhasrikam iti|

dvādaśasāhasrikam+iti| -> dvādaśasāhasrikam iti|

sucandrarājādhyeṣitena+iti| -> sucandrarājādhyeṣiteneti|

sarvasattvānām+pratyekarutais -> sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekarutais

sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekarutais+dharmapravartakas -> sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekarutair dharmapravartakas

sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekarutair dharmapravartakas+tena -> sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekarutair dharmapravartakas tena

mārakleśajñeyasamāpattyāvaraṇayakṣāṇām+vadhakas -> mārakleśajñeyasamāpattyāvaraṇayakṣāṇāṃ vadhakas

mārakleśajñeyasamāpattyāvaraṇayakṣāṇāṃ vadhakas+yakṣādhipatis -> mārakleśajñeyasamāpattyāvaraṇayakṣāṇāṃ vadhako yakṣādhipatis

mārakleśajñeyasamāpattyāvaraṇayakṣāṇāṃ vadhako yakṣādhipatis+| -> mārakleśajñeyasamāpattyāvaraṇayakṣāṇāṃ vadhako yakṣādhipatiḥ|

dharmameghābhūmis+tasyās -> dharmameghābhūmis tasyās

dharmameghābhūmis tasyās+nivāsī -> dharmameghābhūmis tasyā nivāsī

dharmameghābhūmis tasyā nivāsī+aḍakavatīnivāsī| -> dharmameghābhūmis tasyā nivāsy aḍakavatīnivāsī|

ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānām+ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānām -> ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānām

ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānām+nirodhas -> ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānāṃ nirodhas

ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānāṃ nirodhas+sas -> ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānāṃ nirodhaḥ sas

ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānāṃ nirodhaḥ sas+asyām -> ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānāṃ nirodhaḥ so 'syām

ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānāṃ nirodhaḥ so 'syām+asti -> ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānāṃ nirodhaḥ so 'syām asti

ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānāṃ nirodhaḥ so 'syām asti+iti -> ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatonānāṃ nirodhaḥ so 'syām astīti

adhyātmani+aḍakas -> adhyātmany aḍakas

adhyātmany aḍakas+iti -> adhyātmany aḍaka iti

mahāyakṣādhipatis+iti| -> mahāyakṣādhipatir iti|

aṭavyām+mṛgādhipatis -> aṭavyāṃ mṛgādhipatis

aṭavyāṃ mṛgādhipatis+iva -> aṭavyāṃ mṛgādhipatir iva

aṭavyāṃ mṛgādhipatir iva+aḍakavatīnivāsī -> aṭavyāṃ mṛgādhipatir ivāḍakavatīnivāsī

aḍakavatīnivāsī+iti| -> aḍakavatīnivāsīti|

śmaśānabhūmis+tasyām -> śmaśānabhūmis tasyām

śmaśānabhūmis tasyām+mahāyakṣās -> śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣās

śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣās+sattvānām -> śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānām

śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānām+viheṭhakās -> śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakās

śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakās+anekavighnakartāras -> śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakā anekavighnakartāras

śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakā anekavighnakartāras+teṣām -> śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakā anekavighnakartāras teṣām

śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakā anekavighnakartāras teṣām+vadhakas -> śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakā anekavighnakartāras teṣāṃ vadhakas

śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakā anekavighnakartāras teṣāṃ vadhakas+| -> śmaśānabhūmis tasyāṃ mahāyakṣāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhakā anekavighnakartāras teṣāṃ vadhakaḥ|

naṣṭaprāṇas+mṛtakasamūhas -> naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhas

naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhas+sas -> naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhaḥ sas

naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhaḥ sas+asyām -> naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhaḥ so 'syām

naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhaḥ so 'syām+asti -> naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhaḥ so 'syām asti

naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhaḥ so 'syām asti+iti -> naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhaḥ so 'syām astīti

naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhaḥ so 'syām astīti+aḍakavatī -> naṣṭaprāṇo mṛtakasamūhaḥ so 'syām astīty aḍakavatī

bāhye+aḍakaśabdena -> bāhye 'ḍakaśabdena

yakṣās+teṣām -> yakṣās teṣām

yakṣās teṣām+adhipatis -> yakṣās teṣām adhipatis

yakṣās teṣām adhipatis+guhyakādhipatis -> yakṣās teṣām adhipatir guhyakādhipatis

yakṣās teṣām adhipatir guhyakādhipatis+aḍakavatīnivāsī| -> yakṣās teṣām adhipatir guhyakādhipatir aḍakavatīnivāsī|

tasmin+saṃgītikārakatvena -> tasmin saṃgītikārakatvena

tasmin saṃgītikārakatvena+adhipatis -> tasmin saṃgītikārakatvenādhipatis

tasmin saṃgītikārakatvenādhipatis+guhyādhipatis -> tasmin saṃgītikārakatvenādhipatir guhyādhipatis

tasmin saṃgītikārakatvenādhipatir guhyādhipatis+tathā -> tasmin saṃgītikārakatvenādhipatir guhyādhipatis tathā

guhyādhipatis+guhyam -> guhyādhipatir guhyam

guhyādhipatir guhyam+śrāvakapratyekayānayos -> guhyādhipatir guhyaṃ śrāvakapratyekayānayos

guhyādhipatir guhyaṃ śrāvakapratyekayānayos+uttaram -> guhyādhipatir guhyaṃ śrāvakapratyekayānayor uttaram

guhyādhipatir guhyaṃ śrāvakapratyekayānayor uttaram+vajrayānam| -> guhyādhipatir guhyaṃ śrāvakapratyekayānayor uttaraṃ vajrayānam|

tathāgatoktadharmāṇām+saṃgrāhakatvāt -> tathāgatoktadharmāṇāṃ saṃgrāhakatvāt

tathāgatoktadharmāṇāṃ saṃgrāhakatvāt+sarvatathāgatakarṇabhūtas -> tathāgatoktadharmāṇāṃ saṃgrāhakatvāt sarvatathāgatakarṇabhūtas

tathāgatoktadharmāṇāṃ saṃgrāhakatvāt sarvatathāgatakarṇabhūtas+| -> tathāgatoktadharmāṇāṃ saṃgrāhakatvāt sarvatathāgatakarṇabhūtaḥ|

sucandras+sarvatathāgataśrotṛbhūtas -> sucandraḥ sarvatathāgataśrotṛbhūtas

sucandraḥ sarvatathāgataśrotṛbhūtas+vajrenduvimalaprabhas -> sucandraḥ sarvatathāgataśrotṛbhūto vajrenduvimalaprabhas

sucandraḥ sarvatathāgataśrotṛbhūto vajrenduvimalaprabhas+sarvasattvabhāṣāntareṇa -> sucandraḥ sarvatathāgataśrotṛbhūto vajrenduvimalaprabhaḥ sarvasattvabhāṣāntareṇa

candras+ca -> candraś ca

candraś ca+iti -> candraś ceti

śobhanas+ca -> śobhanaś ca

śobhanaś ca+asau -> śobhanaś cāsau

sucandrādhyeṣitena+iti -> sucandrādhyeṣiteneti

kālacakrabhagavatā+iti| -> kālacakrabhagavateti|

bhagavān+tena -> bhagavāṃś tena

bhagas+asya -> bhago 'sya

bhago 'sya+asti -> bhago 'syāsti

bhago 'syāsti+iti -> bhago 'syāstīti

mārakleśabhañjanāt+bhagas -> mārakleśabhañjanād bhagas

mārakleśabhañjanād bhagas+sarvajñaiśvaryādiguṇasamūhas -> mārakleśabhañjanād bhagaḥ sarvajñaiśvaryādiguṇasamūhas

mārakleśabhañjanād bhagaḥ sarvajñaiśvaryādiguṇasamūhas+sa -> mārakleśabhañjanād bhagaḥ sarvajñaiśvaryādiguṇasamūhaḥ sa

bhagavatā+iti -> bhagavateti

kālacakras+| -> kālacakraḥ|

bandhas+sahajasukhena -> bandhaḥ sahajasukhena

bandhaḥ sahajasukhena+iti -> bandhaḥ sahajasukheneti

kramas+kāyādīnām -> kramaḥ kāyādīnām

kramaḥ kāyādīnām+bindūnām -> kramaḥ kāyādīnāṃ bindūnām

kramaḥ kāyādīnāṃ bindūnām+cyavanam -> kramaḥ kāyādīnāṃ bindūnāṃ cyavanam

kramaḥ kāyādīnāṃ bindūnāṃ cyavanam+tasya -> kramaḥ kāyādīnāṃ bindūnāṃ cyavanaṃ tasya

krakārāt+krambandhanāt|| -> krakārāt krambandhanāt||

cakārāt+calacittasya -> cakārāc calacittasya

layas+atra -> layo 'tra

lakārāt+ca -> lakārāc ca

kākāras+kāraṇe -> kākāraḥ kāraṇe

anyat+ca -> anyac ca

kālacakras+| -> kālacakraḥ|

śarīram+asau -> śarīram asau

kālas+paramākṣaras -> kālaḥ paramākṣaras

kālaḥ paramākṣaras+mahāsukhakṣaṇas -> kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas

kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas+tena -> kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tena

kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tena+utpāditam -> kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tenotpāditam

kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tenotpāditam+nirāvaraṇam -> kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tenotpāditaṃ nirāvaraṇam

kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tenotpāditaṃ nirāvaraṇam+skandhadhātvādikam -> kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tenotpāditaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ skandhadhātvādikam

kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tenotpāditaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ skandhadhātvādikam+cakram -> kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tenotpāditaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ skandhadhātvādikaṃ cakram

kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tenotpāditaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ skandhadhātvādikaṃ cakram+yasya -> kālaḥ paramākṣaro mahāsukhakṣaṇas tenotpāditaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ skandhadhātvādikaṃ cakraṃ yasya

kālacakrabhagavatā+iti -> kālacakrabhagavateti

niranvayena+iti| -> niranvayeneti|

niranvayas+tena -> niranvayas tena

niranvayena+iti -> niranvayeneti

niranvayeneti+anvayas -> niranvayenety anvayas

niranvayenety anvayas+prajñopāyātmakas -> niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmakas

niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmakas+grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇas -> niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇas

niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇas+dharmas -> niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmas

niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmas+sas -> niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ sas

niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ sas+anvayas -> niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ so 'nvayas

niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ so 'nvayas+nirastas -> niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ so 'nvayo nirastas

niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ so 'nvayo nirastas+yena -> niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ so 'nvayo nirasto yena

niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ so 'nvayo nirasto yena+asau -> niranvayenety anvayaḥ prajñopāyātmako grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ so 'nvayo nirasto yenāsau

paramādibuddhena+iti| -> paramādibuddheneti|

paramādibuddhas+ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇas -> paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇas

paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇas+akṣarasukhas -> paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhas

paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhas+paramas -> paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhaḥ paramas

paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhaḥ paramas+tena -> paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhaḥ paramas tena

paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhaḥ paramas tena+ādibuddhas -> paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhaḥ paramas tenādibuddhas

paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhaḥ paramas tenādibuddhas+paramādibuddhas -> paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhaḥ paramas tenādibuddhaḥ paramādibuddhas

paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhaḥ paramas tenādibuddhaḥ paramādibuddhas+tena -> paramādibuddha ekakṣaṇapañcākāraviṃśatyākāramāyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇo 'kṣarasukhaḥ paramas tenādibuddhaḥ paramādibuddhas tena

paramādibuddhena+iti| -> paramādibuddheneti|

traidhātukacakravartinā+iti| -> traidhātukacakravartineti|

pravartate+asau -> pravartate 'sau

dharmacakram+yugapat -> dharmacakraṃ yugapat

dharmacakraṃ yugapat+yasya -> dharmacakraṃ yugapad yasya

traidhātukacakravartinā+iti -> traidhātukacakravartineti

traidhātukavanditacaraṇāravindena+iti| -> traidhātukavanditacaraṇāravindeneti|

traidhātukavanditacaraṇāravindas+tena -> traidhātukavanditacaraṇāravindas tena

vanditam+caraṇāravindam -> vanditaṃ caraṇāravindam

vanditaṃ caraṇāravindam+yasya -> vanditaṃ caraṇāravindaṃ yasya

vanditaṃ caraṇāravindaṃ yasya+asau -> vanditaṃ caraṇāravindaṃ yasyāsau

traidhātukam+kāmarūpārūpam -> traidhātukaṃ kāmarūpārūpam

traidhātukaṃ kāmarūpārūpam+tena -> traidhātukaṃ kāmarūpārūpaṃ tena

traidhātukavanditacaraṇāravindena+iti -> traidhātukavanditacaraṇāravindeneti

devatādevīgaṇaparivṛtena+iti| -> devatādevīgaṇaparivṛteneti|

parivṛtas+devatādevīgaṇaparivṛtas -> parivṛto devatādevīgaṇaparivṛtas

parivṛto devatādevīgaṇaparivṛtas+tena -> parivṛto devatādevīgaṇaparivṛtas tena

buddhās+akṣobhyādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayas+bodhisattvās -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvās

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvās+samantabhadrādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayas+krodharājās -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājās

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājās+uṣṇīṣādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayas+devās -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devās

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devās+īśvarādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayas+nāgās -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgās

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgās+anantādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayas+devyas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyas+vajradhātvīśvaryādyās -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyās

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyās+dharmadhātvādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayas+atinīlādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayas+carcikādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayas+gauryādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayas+śvānāsādayas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayaḥ śvānāsādayas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayaḥ śvānāsādayas+eṣām -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayaḥ śvānāsādaya eṣām

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayaḥ śvānāsādaya eṣām+samūhas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayaḥ śvānāsādaya eṣāṃ samūhas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayaḥ śvānāsādaya eṣāṃ samūhas+gaṇas -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayaḥ śvānāsādaya eṣāṃ samūho gaṇas

buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayaḥ śvānāsādaya eṣāṃ samūho gaṇas+tena -> buddhā akṣobhyādayo bodhisattvāḥ samantabhadrādayaḥ krodharājā uṣṇīṣādayo devā īśvarādayo nāgā anantādayo devyo vajradhātvīśvaryādyā dharmadhātvādayo 'tinīlādayaś carcikādayo gauryādayaḥ śvānāsādaya eṣāṃ samūho gaṇas tena

buddhabodhisattvakrodharājadevanāgadevatādevīgaṇaparivṛtena+iti -> buddhabodhisattvakrodharājadevanāgadevatādevīgaṇaparivṛteneti

ekāras+vā -> ekāro vā

ekāro vā+ākāśadhātus -> ekāro vākāśadhātus

ekāro vākāśadhātus+vajrasiṃhāsanam -> ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanam

ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanam+tasmin -> ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin

ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin+sthitas -> ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthitas

ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthitas+vajrasiṃhāsanasthas -> ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthito vajrasiṃhāsanasthas

ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthito vajrasiṃhāsanasthas+kāyavākcittajñānātmakas -> ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthito vajrasiṃhāsanasthaḥ kāyavākcittajñānātmakas

ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthito vajrasiṃhāsanasthaḥ kāyavākcittajñānātmakas+vaṃkāras -> ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthito vajrasiṃhāsanasthaḥ kāyavākcittajñānātmako vaṃkāras

ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthito vajrasiṃhāsanasthaḥ kāyavākcittajñānātmako vaṃkāras+tena -> ekāro vākāśadhātur vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ tasmin sthito vajrasiṃhāsanasthaḥ kāyavākcittajñānātmako vaṃkāras tena

vajrasiṃhāsanam+candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalam -> vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalam

vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalam+acchedyam -> vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalam acchedyam

vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalam acchedyam+abhedyam| -> vajrasiṃhāsanaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalam acchedyam abhedyam|

tasmin+vajradhātumahāmaṇḍale -> tasmin vajradhātumahāmaṇḍale

sarvākāradhātulakṣaṇe+ādarśapratisenātulye -> sarvākāradhātulakṣaṇa ādarśapratisenātulye

jñānajñeyaikalolībhūte+acchedye -> jñānajñeyaikalolībhūte 'cchedye

jñānajñeyaikalolībhūte 'cchedye+abhedye -> jñānajñeyaikalolībhūte 'cchedye 'bhedye

mahāsukhāvāsas+dharmadhātus -> mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātus

mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātus+ākāśalakṣaṇas -> mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇas

mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇas+asaṃkīrṇas -> mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇas

mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇas+dharmodayas -> mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayas

mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayas+lokopamām -> mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayo lokopamām

mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayo lokopamām+atikrāntas -> mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayo lokopamām atikrāntas

mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayo lokopamām atikrāntas+samantabhadras -> mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayo lokopamām atikrāntaḥ samantabhadras

mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayo lokopamām atikrāntaḥ samantabhadras+mahāsukhāvāsas -> mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayo lokopamām atikrāntaḥ samantabhadro mahāsukhāvāsas

mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayo lokopamām atikrāntaḥ samantabhadro mahāsukhāvāsas+paramādibuddhavajradhātumahāmaṇḍale -> mahāsukhāvāso dharmadhātur ākāśalakṣaṇo 'saṃkīrṇo dharmodayo lokopamām atikrāntaḥ samantabhadro mahāsukhāvāsaḥ paramādibuddhavajradhātumahāmaṇḍale

mahāsukhāvāsas+iti -> mahāsukhāvāsa iti

buddhatvam+sarvajñatāsarvākārajñatāmārgajñatāmārgākārajñatādaśabalavaiśāradyādiguṇavibhūtayas -> buddhatvaṃ sarvajñatāsarvākārajñatāmārgajñatāmārgākārajñatādaśabalavaiśāradyādiguṇavibhūtayas

buddhatvaṃ sarvajñatāsarvākārajñatāmārgajñatāmārgākārajñatādaśabalavaiśāradyādiguṇavibhūtayas+tās -> buddhatvaṃ sarvajñatāsarvākārajñatāmārgajñatāmārgākārajñatādaśabalavaiśāradyādiguṇavibhūtayas tās

buddhatvaṃ sarvajñatāsarvākārajñatāmārgajñatāmārgākārajñatādaśabalavaiśāradyādiguṇavibhūtayas tās+dadāti -> buddhatvaṃ sarvajñatāsarvākārajñatāmārgajñatāmārgākārajñatādaśabalavaiśāradyādiguṇavibhūtayas tā dadāti

buddhatvaṃ sarvajñatāsarvākārajñatāmārgajñatāmārgākārajñatādaśabalavaiśāradyādiguṇavibhūtayas tā dadāti+iti -> buddhatvaṃ sarvajñatāsarvākārajñatāmārgajñatāmārgākārajñatādaśabalavaiśāradyādiguṇavibhūtayas tā dadātīti

niyamarahitānām+buddhatvaphalapradam -> niyamarahitānāṃ buddhatvaphalapradam

niyamarahitānāṃ buddhatvaphalapradam+tantrarājam| -> niyamarahitānāṃ buddhatvaphalapradaṃ tantrarājam|

evam+uktakrameṇa -> evam uktakrameṇa

akuśalābhigamanam+proktam -> akuśalābhigamanaṃ proktam

akuśalābhigamanaṃ proktam+vajriṇā -> akuśalābhigamanaṃ proktaṃ vajriṇā

kulagrahavināśāya+annapānam -> kulagrahavināśāyānnapānam

kulagrahavināśāyānnapānam+ca -> kulagrahavināśāyānnapānaṃ ca

niravadyam+na -> niravadyaṃ na

niravadyaṃ na+anyat -> niravadyaṃ nānyat

niravadyaṃ nānyat+eva -> niravadyaṃ nānyad eva

tattvatas+| -> tattvataḥ|

karuṇām+utpādya -> karuṇām utpādya

bhoktavyam+yogayuktena -> bhoktavyaṃ yogayuktena

na+anekaprāṇinām -> nānekaprāṇinām

nānekaprāṇinām+māṃsam -> nānekaprāṇināṃ māṃsam

nānekaprāṇināṃ māṃsam+manujena -> nānekaprāṇināṃ māṃsaṃ manujena

nānekaprāṇināṃ māṃsaṃ manujena+ekena -> nānekaprāṇināṃ māṃsaṃ manujenaikena

prāṇinas+māṃsam -> prāṇino māṃsam

prāṇino māṃsam+bahubhis -> prāṇino māṃsaṃ bahubhis

prāṇino māṃsaṃ bahubhis+bhakṣitam -> prāṇino māṃsaṃ bahubhir bhakṣitam

prāṇino māṃsaṃ bahubhir bhakṣitam+varam| -> prāṇino māṃsaṃ bahubhir bhakṣitaṃ varam|

niravadyam+tat -> niravadyaṃ tat

niravadyaṃ tat+eva -> niravadyaṃ tad eva

ayāñcāpatitam+pātre -> ayāñcāpatitaṃ pātre

tat+māṃsam -> tan māṃsam

tan māṃsam+krītam -> tan māṃsaṃ krītam

tan māṃsaṃ krītam+bhuktam -> tan māṃsaṃ krītaṃ bhuktam

tan māṃsaṃ krītaṃ bhuktam+samīhitam| -> tan māṃsaṃ krītaṃ bhuktaṃ samīhitam|

sāvadyam+tasya -> sāvadyaṃ tasya

hatas+sattvas -> hataḥ sattvas

hataḥ sattvas+durdāntais -> hataḥ sattvo durdāntais

hataḥ sattvo durdāntais+pāpakāribhis -> hataḥ sattvo durdāntaiḥ pāpakāribhis

hataḥ sattvo durdāntaiḥ pāpakāribhis+|| -> hataḥ sattvo durdāntaiḥ pāpakāribhiḥ||

na+aparādhī -> nāparādhī

devasvabhayapitriṣṭisiddhyartham+vikrayāya -> devasvabhayapitriṣṭisiddhyarthaṃ vikrayāya

bhagavān+āha -> bhagavān āha

mūlatantre+api -> mūlatantre 'pi

bhāvanāya+amūrcchādharmeṇa -> bhāvanāyāmūrcchādharmeṇa

bhāvanāyāmūrcchādharmeṇa+uktā| -> bhāvanāyāmūrcchādharmeṇoktā|

madyam+strī -> madyaṃ strī

pratyaham+samayacatuṣṭayam -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayam

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayam+yat -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat+kartavyam -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyam

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyam+tat -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tat

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tat+niravadyais -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyais

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyais+gokulādibhis -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhis

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhis+pañcabhis -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhis

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhis+vairocanādibhis -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhis

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhis+pañcabhis -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhis

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhis+sarṣapaprāṇagulikās -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarṣapaprāṇagulikās

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarṣapaprāṇagulikās+pratyaham -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarṣapaprāṇagulikāḥ pratyaham

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarṣapaprāṇagulikāḥ pratyaham+samayasevārtham -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarṣapaprāṇagulikāḥ pratyahaṃ samayasevārtham

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarṣapaprāṇagulikāḥ pratyahaṃ samayasevārtham+kartavyās -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarṣapaprāṇagulikāḥ pratyahaṃ samayasevārthaṃ kartavyās

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarṣapaprāṇagulikāḥ pratyahaṃ samayasevārthaṃ kartavyās+| -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ yat kartavyaṃ tan niravadyair gokulādibhiḥ pañcabhir vairocanādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarṣapaprāṇagulikāḥ pratyahaṃ samayasevārthaṃ kartavyāḥ|

tāthāgatena+uktam--- -> tāthāgatenoktam---

māritam+sanimittam -> māritaṃ sanimittam

māritaṃ sanimittam+māṃsam -> māritaṃ sanimittaṃ māṃsam

māritaṃ sanimittaṃ māṃsam+bhakṣyam -> māritaṃ sanimittaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣyam

dravyais+krītam -> dravyaiḥ krītam

dravyaiḥ krītam+na -> dravyaiḥ krītaṃ na

tathāgatena+uktam---- -> tathāgatenoktam----

taskarādikam+tat -> taskarādikaṃ tat

taskarādikaṃ tat+sarvam -> taskarādikaṃ tat sarvam

taskarādikaṃ tat sarvam+yoginām -> taskarādikaṃ tat sarvaṃ yoginām

taskarādikaṃ tat sarvaṃ yoginām+bhakṣyam| -> taskarādikaṃ tat sarvaṃ yogināṃ bhakṣyam|

māritam+svadoṣeṇa -> māritaṃ svadoṣeṇa

mṛtam+saṃgrāme -> mṛtaṃ saṃgrāme

yat+abhakṣyam -> yad abhakṣyam

yad abhakṣyam+yat -> yad abhakṣyaṃ yat

yad abhakṣyaṃ yat+avikrayam -> yad abhakṣyaṃ yad avikrayam

yad abhakṣyaṃ yad avikrayam+lokānām -> yad abhakṣyaṃ yad avikrayaṃ lokānām

yad abhakṣyaṃ yad avikrayaṃ lokānām+gokulādikam -> yad abhakṣyaṃ yad avikrayaṃ lokānāṃ gokulādikam

yad abhakṣyaṃ yad avikrayaṃ lokānāṃ gokulādikam+svakarmaṇā -> yad abhakṣyaṃ yad avikrayaṃ lokānāṃ gokulādikaṃ svakarmaṇā

yasmin+deśe -> yasmin deśe

prāṇātipātas+bhavati -> prāṇātipāto bhavati

prāṇātipāto bhavati+tasmāt -> NO RULE FOUND (i+t)

tasmāt+kāraṇāt -> tasmāt kāraṇāt

tasmāt kāraṇāt+yoginām -> tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām

tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām+animittam -> tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittam

tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittam+niravadyam -> tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittaṃ niravadyam

tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittaṃ niravadyam+gokulādikam -> tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittaṃ niravadyaṃ gokulādikam

tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittaṃ niravadyaṃ gokulādikam+bhakṣyam -> tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittaṃ niravadyaṃ gokulādikaṃ bhakṣyam

tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittaṃ niravadyaṃ gokulādikaṃ bhakṣyam+bhagavatā -> tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittaṃ niravadyaṃ gokulādikaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhagavatā

tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittaṃ niravadyaṃ gokulādikaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhagavatā+uktam| -> tasmāt kāraṇād yoginām animittaṃ niravadyaṃ gokulādikaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhagavatoktam|

tat+satyam -> tat satyam

tat satyam+tasmāt -> tat satyaṃ tasmāt

tat satyaṃ tasmāt+kāraṇāt -> tat satyaṃ tasmāt kāraṇāt

tat satyaṃ tasmāt kāraṇāt+nimittasāvadyena -> tat satyaṃ tasmāt kāraṇān nimittasāvadyena

tathāgataniyamas+| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ|

kartavyam+iti -> kartavyam iti

pratyaham+samayacatuṣṭayam -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayam

pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayam+mantriṇā% -> pratyahaṃ samayacatuṣṭayaṃ mantriṇā%

atas+bhakṣakavadhakayos -> ato bhakṣakavadhakayos

ato bhakṣakavadhakayos+prāṇātipātas -> ato bhakṣakavadhakayoḥ prāṇātipātas

ato bhakṣakavadhakayoḥ prāṇātipātas+syāt| -> ato bhakṣakavadhakayoḥ prāṇātipātaḥ syāt|

vadhakas+api -> vadhako 'pi

bhakṣakas+na -> bhakṣako na

bhakṣako na+asti -> bhakṣako nāsti

vināśas+bhavati| -> vināśo bhavati|

kadācit+prāṇātipātena -> kadācit prāṇātipātena

bhagavatā+uktam -> bhagavatoktam

bhagavatoktam+yoginām -> bhagavatoktaṃ yoginām

bhagavatoktaṃ yoginām+māṃsabhakṣaṇam -> bhagavatoktaṃ yogināṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇam

bhagavatoktaṃ yogināṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇam+tat -> bhagavatoktaṃ yogināṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ tat

bhagavatoktaṃ yogināṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ tat+eva -> bhagavatoktaṃ yogināṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ tad eva

atha+iha -> atheha

tathāgataniyamas+|| -> tathāgataniyamaḥ||

buddhatvaphalalābhinas+bhavanti -> buddhatvaphalalābhino bhavanti

buddhatvaphalalābhino bhavanti+iti -> buddhatvaphalalābhino bhavantīti

kurvantas+api -> kurvanto 'pi

praviṣṭās+santas -> praviṣṭāḥ santas

praviṣṭāḥ santas+pāpam -> praviṣṭāḥ santaḥ pāpam

praviṣṭāḥ santaḥ pāpam+karma -> praviṣṭāḥ santaḥ pāpaṃ karma

bhagavatas+vacanāt -> bhagavato vacanāt

bhagavato vacanāt+na -> bhagavato vacanān na

kalyāṇam+iti -> kalyāṇam iti

kalyāṇam+paryavasāne -> kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne

kalyāṇam+madhye -> kalyāṇaṃ madhye

bhagavatas+vākyam---ādau -> bhagavato vākyam---ādau

yānatraye+api -> yānatraye 'pi

buddhatvaphalalābhinas+bhavanti -> buddhatvaphalalābhino bhavanti

buddhatvaphalalābhino bhavanti+iti -> buddhatvaphalalābhino bhavantīti

kurvantas+api -> kurvanto 'pi

kurvanto 'pi+iha -> kurvanto 'pīha

praviṣṭās+santas -> praviṣṭāḥ santas

praviṣṭāḥ santas+pañcānantaryādikam -> praviṣṭāḥ santaḥ pañcānantaryādikam

praviṣṭāḥ santaḥ pañcānantaryādikam+raudram -> praviṣṭāḥ santaḥ pañcānantaryādikaṃ raudram

praviṣṭāḥ santaḥ pañcānantaryādikaṃ raudram+karma -> praviṣṭāḥ santaḥ pañcānantaryādikaṃ raudraṃ karma

punar+mantrayāne -> punar mantrayāne

tathāgataniyamas+na -> tathāgataniyamo na

buddhatvaphalalābhinas+bhavanti -> buddhatvaphalalābhino bhavanti

buddhatvaphalalābhino bhavanti+iti -> buddhatvaphalalābhino bhavantīti

sārdham+pañcānantaryakāriṇas -> sārdhaṃ pañcānantaryakāriṇas

sārdhaṃ pañcānantaryakāriṇas+api -> sārdhaṃ pañcānantaryakāriṇo 'pi

sārdhaṃ pañcānantaryakāriṇo 'pi+iha -> sārdhaṃ pañcānantaryakāriṇo 'pīha

vajrasattvam+sādhayitvā -> vajrasattvaṃ sādhayitvā

maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣādibodhipākṣikadharmakapāṭam+dattvā -> maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣādibodhipākṣikadharmakapāṭaṃ dattvā

dhvaṃsayitvā+aparāgantukākuśalāpraveśāya -> dhvaṃsayitvāparāgantukākuśalāpraveśāya

tat+asmin -> tad asmin

tad asmin+mantrayāne -> tad asmin mantrayāne

yat+prāk -> yat prāk

yat prāk+kṛtam -> yat prāk kṛtam

yat prāk kṛtam+pañcānantaryādikam -> yat prāk kṛtaṃ pañcānantaryādikam

yat prāk kṛtaṃ pañcānantaryādikam+raudram -> yat prāk kṛtaṃ pañcānantaryādikaṃ raudram

yat prāk kṛtaṃ pañcānantaryādikaṃ raudram+karma -> yat prāk kṛtaṃ pañcānantaryādikaṃ raudraṃ karma

bhagavatas+vākyam -> bhagavato vākyam

bhagavato vākyam+satyam| -> bhagavato vākyaṃ satyam|

buddhās+syus -> buddhāḥ syus

buddhāḥ syus+mantracaryānucāriṇas -> buddhāḥ syur mantracaryānucāriṇas

buddhāḥ syur mantracaryānucāriṇas+|| -> buddhāḥ syur mantracaryānucāriṇaḥ||

janmani+iha -> janmanīha

janmanīha+eva -> janmanīhaiva

caṇḍālaveṇukārādyās+pañcānantaryakāriṇas -> caṇḍālaveṇukārādyāḥ pañcānantaryakāriṇas

caṇḍālaveṇukārādyāḥ pañcānantaryakāriṇas+| -> caṇḍālaveṇukārādyāḥ pañcānantaryakāriṇaḥ|

buddhabhagavatā+uktam -> buddhabhagavatoktam

buddhabhagavatoktam+tadyathā--- -> buddhabhagavatoktaṃ tadyathā---

atha+asmin -> athāsmin

athāsmin+mantrayāne -> athāsmin mantrayāne

niyamas+tathāgatasya|| -> niyamas tathāgatasya||

buddhatvaphalapradam+bhaviṣyati -> buddhatvaphalapradaṃ bhaviṣyati

buddhatvaphalapradaṃ bhaviṣyati+iti -> buddhatvaphalapradaṃ bhaviṣyatīti

manuṣyajanmani+iha -> manuṣyajanmanīha

ca+anyathā -> cānyathā

mahāpuruṣapuṅgavena+iti| -> mahāpuruṣapuṅgaveneti|

puṇyajñānasambhārābhyām+ṣaḍdhātvātmakena -> puṇyajñānasambhārābhyāṃ ṣaḍdhātvātmakena

niyamas+bhagavatas -> niyamo bhagavatas

niyamo bhagavatas+| -> niyamo bhagavataḥ|

manuṣyajanmalābhāt+buddhatvaphalapradam -> manuṣyajanmalābhād buddhatvaphalapradam

manuṣyajanmalābhād buddhatvaphalapradam+bhaviṣyati -> manuṣyajanmalābhād buddhatvaphalapradaṃ bhaviṣyati

manuṣyajanmalābhād buddhatvaphalapradaṃ bhaviṣyati+iti -> manuṣyajanmalābhād buddhatvaphalapradaṃ bhaviṣyatīti

devādīnām+api -> devādīnām api

akarmabhūmijātitvāt+iti| -> akarmabhūmijātitvād iti|

hetos+| -> hetoḥ|

tat+kasya -> tat kasya

punar+devādipañcagatiṣu -> punar devādipañcagatiṣu

buddhatvaphalapradam+tantrarājam -> buddhatvaphalapradaṃ tantrarājam

buddhatvaphalapradaṃ tantrarājam+na -> buddhatvaphalapradaṃ tantrarājaṃ na

buddhatvaphalapradam+iti| -> buddhatvaphalapradam iti|

svacittābhiprāyeṇa+iha -> svacittābhiprāyeṇeha

svacittābhiprāyas+niyamarahitānām -> svacittābhiprāyo niyamarahitānām

svacittābhiprāyo niyamarahitānām+iti| -> svacittābhiprāyo niyamarahitānām iti|

mahāsukhābhilāṣas+iti -> mahāsukhābhilāṣa iti

rahitās+niyamarahitās -> rahitā niyamarahitās

rahitā niyamarahitās+teṣām -> rahitā niyamarahitās teṣām

rahitā niyamarahitās teṣām+svacittābhiprāyas -> rahitā niyamarahitās teṣāṃ svacittābhiprāyas

rahitā niyamarahitās teṣāṃ svacittābhiprāyas+pañcakāmopabhogābhilāṣas -> rahitā niyamarahitās teṣāṃ svacittābhiprāyaḥ pañcakāmopabhogābhilāṣas

rahitā niyamarahitās teṣāṃ svacittābhiprāyaḥ pañcakāmopabhogābhilāṣas+tathā -> rahitā niyamarahitās teṣāṃ svacittābhiprāyaḥ pañcakāmopabhogābhilāṣas tathā

niyamas+śrāvakakoṭisaṃvaras -> niyamaḥ śrāvakakoṭisaṃvaras

niyamaḥ śrāvakakoṭisaṃvaras+pañcakāmopabhogarahitas -> niyamaḥ śrāvakakoṭisaṃvaraḥ pañcakāmopabhogarahitas

niyamaḥ śrāvakakoṭisaṃvaraḥ pañcakāmopabhogarahitas+śīlasaṃvaras -> niyamaḥ śrāvakakoṭisaṃvaraḥ pañcakāmopabhogarahitaḥ śīlasaṃvaras

niyamaḥ śrāvakakoṭisaṃvaraḥ pañcakāmopabhogarahitaḥ śīlasaṃvaras+iti -> niyamaḥ śrāvakakoṭisaṃvaraḥ pañcakāmopabhogarahitaḥ śīlasaṃvara iti

vaineyajanānām+niyamarahitānām -> vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānām

vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānām+svacittābhiprāyeṇa -> vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānāṃ svacittābhiprāyeṇa

vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānāṃ svacittābhiprāyeṇa+iti| -> vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānāṃ svacittābhiprāyeṇeti|

etāni+eva -> etāny eva

etāny eva+abhidheyalakṣaṇāni -> etāny evābhidheyalakṣaṇāni

etāny evābhidheyalakṣaṇāni+abhisaṃvīkṣya -> etāny evābhidheyalakṣaṇāny abhisaṃvīkṣya

puṇyajñānasambhārārthakaraṇam+prayojanaprayojanam -> puṇyajñānasambhārārthakaraṇaṃ prayojanaprayojanam

puṇyajñānasambhārārthakaraṇaṃ prayojanaprayojanam+iti|| -> puṇyajñānasambhārārthakaraṇaṃ prayojanaprayojanam iti||

puṇyasambhārārthakaraṇam+prayojanam -> puṇyasambhārārthakaraṇaṃ prayojanam

puṇyasambhārārthakaraṇaṃ prayojanam+mahāprajñācaturthalokottarābhiṣekadānaniranvayamahāmudrāsiddhilābhāya -> puṇyasambhārārthakaraṇaṃ prayojanaṃ mahāprajñācaturthalokottarābhiṣekadānaniranvayamahāmudrāsiddhilābhāya

atas+maṇḍalapraveśāt -> ato maṇḍalapraveśāt

ato maṇḍalapraveśāt+laukikābhiṣekadānena -> ato maṇḍalapraveśāl laukikābhiṣekadānena

vācyavācakalakṣaṇas+abhidheyābhidhānasambandhas -> vācyavācakalakṣaṇo 'bhidheyābhidhānasambandhas

vācyavācakalakṣaṇo 'bhidheyābhidhānasambandhas+| -> vācyavācakalakṣaṇo 'bhidheyābhidhānasambandhaḥ|

vācakam+ādibuddham -> vācakam ādibuddham

vācakam ādibuddham+abhidhānam -> vācakam ādibuddham abhidhānam

vācakam ādibuddham abhidhānam+iti -> vācakam ādibuddham abhidhānam iti

atha+ādibuddhas -> athādibuddhas

athādibuddhas+bhagavān -> athādibuddho bhagavān

athādibuddho bhagavān+vācyas -> athādibuddho bhagavān vācyas

athādibuddho bhagavān vācyas+| -> athādibuddho bhagavān vācyaḥ|

vācakam+kālacakram -> vācakaṃ kālacakram

vācakaṃ kālacakram+abhidhānam -> vācakaṃ kālacakram abhidhānam

vācakaṃ kālacakram abhidhānam+pañcapaṭalātmakam| -> vācakaṃ kālacakram abhidhānaṃ pañcapaṭalātmakam|

vācyas+bhagavān -> vācyo bhagavān

vācyo bhagavān+kālacakras -> vācyo bhagavan kālacakras

vācyo bhagavan kālacakras+pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayā -> vācyo bhagavan kālacakraḥ pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayā

vācyo bhagavan kālacakraḥ pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayā+avasthitas -> vācyo bhagavan kālacakraḥ pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitas

vācyo bhagavan kālacakraḥ pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitas+, -> vācyo bhagavan kālacakraḥ pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ,

anayos+abhidheyābhidhānayos -> anayor abhidheyābhidhānayos

anayor abhidheyābhidhānayos+parasparam -> anayor abhidheyābhidhānayoḥ parasparam

anayor abhidheyābhidhānayoḥ parasparam+vācyavācakalakṣaṇas -> anayor abhidheyābhidhānayoḥ parasparaṃ vācyavācakalakṣaṇas

anayor abhidheyābhidhānayoḥ parasparaṃ vācyavācakalakṣaṇas+sambandhas -> anayor abhidheyābhidhānayoḥ parasparaṃ vācyavācakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhas

anayor abhidheyābhidhānayoḥ parasparaṃ vācyavācakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhas+| -> anayor abhidheyābhidhānayoḥ parasparaṃ vācyavācakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ|

pratipādakam+paṭalasamūham -> pratipādakaṃ paṭalasamūham

pratipādakaṃ paṭalasamūham+tantrarājam -> pratipādakaṃ paṭalasamūhaṃ tantrarājam

pratipādakaṃ paṭalasamūhaṃ tantrarājam+abhidhānam| -> pratipādakaṃ paṭalasamūhaṃ tantrarājam abhidhānam|

pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayā+avasthitas -> pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitas

pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitas+kālacakras -> pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ kālacakras

pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ kālacakras+bhagavān -> pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ kālacakro bhagavān

pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ kālacakro bhagavān+atra -> pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ kālacakro bhagavān atra

pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ kālacakro bhagavān atra+abhidheyas -> pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ kālacakro bhagavān atrābhidheyas

pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ kālacakro bhagavān atrābhidheyas+| -> pañcapaṭalasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ kālacakro bhagavān atrābhidheyaḥ|

atas+uktāt -> ata uktāt

ata uktāt+anena -> ata uktād anena

pañcākṣaraṣaḍakṣaramahāśūnyabinduśūnyastutisvabhāvatayā+avasthitas -> pañcākṣaraṣaḍakṣaramahāśūnyabinduśūnyastutisvabhāvatayāvasthitas

pañcākṣaraṣaḍakṣaramahāśūnyabinduśūnyastutisvabhāvatayāvasthitas+|| -> pañcākṣaraṣaḍakṣaramahāśūnyabinduśūnyastutisvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ||

dharmasaṃgrahagaṇitasaṃjñāsaṃgrahasvabhāvatayā+avasthitas -> dharmasaṃgrahagaṇitasaṃjñāsaṃgrahasvabhāvatayāvasthitas

dharmasaṃgrahagaṇitasaṃjñāsaṃgrahasvabhāvatayāvasthitas+, -> dharmasaṃgrahagaṇitasaṃjñāsaṃgrahasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ,

sarvasattvārthakaraṇasvabhāvatayā+avasthitas -> sarvasattvārthakaraṇasvabhāvatayāvasthitas

sarvasattvārthakaraṇasvabhāvatayāvasthitas+, -> sarvasattvārthakaraṇasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ,

sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamair bodhisattvais+mahāsattvais -> sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamair bodhisattvair mahāsattvais

ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsadvāsaptatināḍīsahasraṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasandhipradeśaṣaḍdhātuṣaḍrasaṣaḍindriyaṣaḍviṣayaṣaṭkarmendriyaṣaḍvijñānaṣaṭsaṃskāraṣaḍvedanāṣaṭsaṃjñāṣaḍrūpaṣaḍjñānaṣaṭcakraṣaṇmaṇḍalādha{}ūrdhvasvabhāvatayā+avasthitas -> ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsadvāsaptatināḍīsahasraṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasandhipradeśaṣaḍdhātuṣaḍrasaṣaḍindriyaṣaḍviṣayaṣaṭkarmendriyaṣaḍvijñānaṣaṭsaṃskāraṣaḍvedanāṣaṭsaṃjñāṣaḍrūpaṣaḍjñānaṣaṭcakraṣaṇmaṇḍalādha{}ūrdhvasvabhāvatayāvasthitas

ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsadvāsaptatināḍīsahasraṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasandhipradeśaṣaḍdhātuṣaḍrasaṣaḍindriyaṣaḍviṣayaṣaṭkarmendriyaṣaḍvijñānaṣaṭsaṃskāraṣaḍvedanāṣaṭsaṃjñāṣaḍrūpaṣaḍjñānaṣaṭcakraṣaṇmaṇḍalādha{}ūrdhvasvabhāvatayāvasthitas+, -> ṣaṭśatādhikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsadvāsaptatināḍīsahasraṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatasandhipradeśaṣaḍdhātuṣaḍrasaṣaḍindriyaṣaḍviṣayaṣaṭkarmendriyaṣaḍvijñānaṣaṭsaṃskāraṣaḍvedanāṣaṭsaṃjñāṣaḍrūpaṣaḍjñānaṣaṭcakraṣaṇmaṇḍalādha{}ūrdhvasvabhāvatayāvasthitaḥ,

ca+anayā -> cānayā

prajñopāyātmakas+vajrayogas -> prajñopāyātmako vajrayogas

prajñopāyātmako vajrayogas+ādibuddhas -> prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddhas

prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddhas+niranvayas -> prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddho niranvayas

prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddho niranvayas+kālacakras -> prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakras

prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakras+bhagavān -> prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān

prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān+abhidheyas -> prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān abhidheyas

prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān abhidheyas+| -> prajñopāyātmako vajrayoga ādibuddho niranvayaḥ kālacakro bhagavān abhidheyaḥ|

pañcakalpātmakam+tantrarājam -> pañcakalpātmakaṃ tantrarājam

pañcakalpātmakaṃ tantrarājaṃ pañcapaṭalātmakam+vā| -> pañcakalpātmakaṃ tantrarājaṃ pañcapaṭalātmakaṃ vā|

evam+yathānukrameṇa -> evaṃ yathānukrameṇa

atas+prathamas -> ataḥ prathamas

ataḥ prathamas+lokadhātukalpas -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas

ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas+tatas -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tatas

ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tatas+adhyātmapaṭalas -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas

ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas+tatas -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tatas

ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tatas+abhiṣekakalpas -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas

ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas+tatas -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas tatas

ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas tatas+laukikasiddhisādhanakalpas -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas tato laukikasiddhisādhanakalpas

ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas tato laukikasiddhisādhanakalpas+tatas -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas tato laukikasiddhisādhanakalpas tatas

ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas tato laukikasiddhisādhanakalpas tatas+paramākṣarajñānasādhanākalpas -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas tato laukikasiddhisādhanakalpas tataḥ paramākṣarajñānasādhanākalpas

ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas tato laukikasiddhisādhanakalpas tataḥ paramākṣarajñānasādhanākalpas+| -> ataḥ prathamo lokadhātukalpas tato 'dhyātmapaṭalas tato 'bhiṣekakalpas tato laukikasiddhisādhanakalpas tataḥ paramākṣarajñānasādhanākalpaḥ|

paramāṇusaṃdohātītam+maṇḍalādivikalpabhāvanārahitam -> paramāṇusaṃdohātītaṃ maṇḍalādivikalpabhāvanārahitam

paramāṇusaṃdohātītaṃ maṇḍalādivikalpabhāvanārahitam+mahājñānamudrāsiddhisādhanam -> paramāṇusaṃdohātītaṃ maṇḍalādivikalpabhāvanārahitaṃ mahājñānamudrāsiddhisādhanam

paramāṇusaṃdohātītaṃ maṇḍalādivikalpabhāvanārahitaṃ mahājñānamudrāsiddhisādhanam+iti| -> paramāṇusaṃdohātītaṃ maṇḍalādivikalpabhāvanārahitaṃ mahājñānamudrāsiddhisādhanam iti|

laukikasiddhipūrvaṃgamam+puṇyajñānasambhārābhyām -> laukikasiddhipūrvaṃgamaṃ puṇyajñānasambhārābhyām

laukikasiddhipūrvaṃgamaṃ puṇyajñānasambhārābhyām+pūrvajanmaśūnyatākaruṇāsaṃvṛtinirālambavāsanābalena -> laukikasiddhipūrvaṃgamaṃ puṇyajñānasambhārābhyāṃ pūrvajanmaśūnyatākaruṇāsaṃvṛtinirālambavāsanābalena

abhiṣekapūrvaṃgamam+puṇyasambhāramaṇḍalacakrabhāvanābhyāsakaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam -> abhiṣekapūrvaṃgamaṃ puṇyasambhāramaṇḍalacakrabhāvanābhyāsakaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam

abhiṣekapūrvaṃgamaṃ puṇyasambhāramaṇḍalacakrabhāvanābhyāsakaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam+laukikasiddhisādhanam,% -> abhiṣekapūrvaṃgamaṃ puṇyasambhāramaṇḍalacakrabhāvanābhyāsakaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantaṃ laukikasiddhisādhanam,%

sattvapūrvaṃgamas+abhiṣekas -> sattvapūrvaṃgamo 'bhiṣekas

sattvapūrvaṃgamo 'bhiṣekas+laukikas -> sattvapūrvaṃgamo 'bhiṣeko laukikas

sattvapūrvaṃgamo 'bhiṣeko laukikas+lokottaras -> sattvapūrvaṃgamo 'bhiṣeko laukiko lokottaras

sattvapūrvaṃgamo 'bhiṣeko laukiko lokottaras+ca,% -> sattvapūrvaṃgamo 'bhiṣeko laukiko lokottaraś ca,%

lokadhārupūrvaṃgamās+sattvās -> lokadhārupūrvaṃgamāḥ sattvās

lokadhārupūrvaṃgamāḥ sattvās+, -> lokadhārupūrvaṃgamāḥ sattvāḥ,

paramāṇusaṃdohapūrvaṃgamas+lokadhātus -> paramāṇusaṃdohapūrvaṃgamo lokadhātus

paramāṇusaṃdohapūrvaṃgamo lokadhātus+, -> paramāṇusaṃdohapūrvaṃgamo lokadhātuḥ,

mārgalābhāya+iti| -> mārgalābhāyeti|

ca+anyeṣām -> cānyeṣām

cānyeṣām+yamāntakādīnām -> cānyeṣāṃ yamāntakādīnām

cānyeṣāṃ yamāntakādīnām+tantradeśanārtham -> cānyeṣāṃ yamāntakādīnāṃ tantradeśanārtham

cānyeṣāṃ yamāntakādīnāṃ tantradeśanārtham+sambhalaviṣayādiṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsinām -> cānyeṣāṃ yamāntakādīnāṃ tantradeśanārthaṃ sambhalaviṣayādiṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsinām

cānyeṣāṃ yamāntakādīnāṃ tantradeśanārthaṃ sambhalaviṣayādiṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsinām+sarvasattvānām -> cānyeṣāṃ yamāntakādīnāṃ tantradeśanārthaṃ sambhalaviṣayādiṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsināṃ sarvasattvānām

cānyeṣāṃ yamāntakādīnāṃ tantradeśanārthaṃ sambhalaviṣayādiṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsināṃ sarvasattvānām+ca -> cānyeṣāṃ yamāntakādīnāṃ tantradeśanārthaṃ sambhalaviṣayādiṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmavināsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca

brahmaṛṣīṇām+vaineyārtham -> brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ vaineyārtham

brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ vaineyārtham+mama -> brahmaṛṣīṇāṃ vaineyārthaṃ mama

mañjuśriyas+tathāgatavyākaraṇam -> mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇam

mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇam+anāgate -> mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇam anāgate

mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇam anāgate+adhvani -> mañjuśriyas tathāgatavyākaraṇam anāgate 'dhvani

atas+laghutantrasaṃgītikaraṇāya -> ato laghutantrasaṃgītikaraṇāya

narādisakalasattvānām+samyaksambuddhatvalābhāya -> narādisakalasattvānāṃ samyaksambuddhatvalābhāya

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam+udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakam -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakam

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakam+laukikalokottarasatyāśritam -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritam

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritam+catasṛbhis -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhis

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhis+sambodhibhis -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhis

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhis+caturvajrais -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajrais

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajrais+pariśuddham -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddham

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddham+catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakam -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakam

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakam+laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakam -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakaṃ laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakam

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakaṃ laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakam+karmamudrājñānamudrāmahāmudrālaukikalokottarasiddhiprakāśakam -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakaṃ laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakaṃ karmamudrājñānamudrāmahāmudrālaukikalokottarasiddhiprakāśakam

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakaṃ laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakaṃ karmamudrājñānamudrāmahāmudrālaukikalokottarasiddhiprakāśakam+lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakam -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakaṃ laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakaṃ karmamudrājñānamudrāmahāmudrālaukikalokottarasiddhiprakāśakaṃ lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakam

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakaṃ laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakaṃ karmamudrājñānamudrāmahāmudrālaukikalokottarasiddhiprakāśakaṃ lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakam+pañcakalpātmakam -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakaṃ laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakaṃ karmamudrājñānamudrāmahāmudrālaukikalokottarasiddhiprakāśakaṃ lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakaṃ pañcakalpātmakam

vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakaṃ laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakaṃ karmamudrājñānamudrāmahāmudrālaukikalokottarasiddhiprakāśakaṃ lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakaṃ pañcakalpātmakam+vā -> vajrapadasākṣibhūtam udghāṭitabuddharatnakaraṇḍakaṃ laukikalokottarasatyāśritaṃ catasṛbhiḥ sambodhibhiś caturvajraiḥ pariśuddhaṃ catuḥkāyaṣaṭkuladvādaśasatyaṣoḍaśatattvaṣoḍaśaśūnyatāṣoḍaśakaruṇātmakābhidheyavācakaṃ laukikadaśalokottaraikādaśābhiṣekaprakāśakaṃ karmamudrājñānamudrāmahāmudrālaukikalokottarasiddhiprakāśakaṃ lokadhātvadhyātmābhiṣekasādhanajñānapañcapaṭalātmakaṃ pañcakalpātmakaṃ vā

nāmasaṃgītyāliṅgitam+sarvatantreṣu -> nāmasaṃgītyāliṅgitaṃ sarvatantreṣu

dvādaśasāhasram+paramādibuddham -> dvādaśasāhasraṃ paramādibuddham

dvādaśasāhasraṃ paramādibuddham+niranvayam -> dvādaśasāhasraṃ paramādibuddhaṃ niranvayam

dvādaśasāhasraṃ paramādibuddhaṃ niranvayam+kālacakram -> dvādaśasāhasraṃ paramādibuddhaṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakram

dvādaśasāhasraṃ paramādibuddhaṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakram+tantrarājam -> dvādaśasāhasraṃ paramādibuddhaṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakraṃ tantrarājam

dvādaśasāhasraṃ paramādibuddhaṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakraṃ tantrarājam+vajradharajñānakāyasākṣibhūtayā -> dvādaśasāhasraṃ paramādibuddhaṃ niranvayaṃ kālacakraṃ tantrarājaṃ vajradharajñānakāyasākṣibhūtayā

vaineyajanānām+niyamarahitānām -> vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānām

vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānām+svacittābhiprāyeṇa -> vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānāṃ svacittābhiprāyeṇa

vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānāṃ svacittābhiprāyeṇa+iha -> vaineyajanānāṃ niyamarahitānāṃ svacittābhiprāyeṇeha

prathamam+tāvat -> prathamaṃ tāvat

prathamaṃ tāvat+abhidheyābhidhānasambandhaprayojanaprayojanaprayojanāni -> prathamaṃ tāvad abhidheyābhidhānasambandhaprayojanaprayojanaprayojanāni

prathamaṃ tāvad abhidheyābhidhānasambandhaprayojanaprayojanaprayojanāni+abhisaṃvīkṣya -> prathamaṃ tāvad abhidheyābhidhānasambandhaprayojanaprayojanaprayojanāny abhisaṃvīkṣya

prayojanaprayojanādikam+ca -> prayojanaprayojanādikaṃ ca

prayojanaprayojanādikaṃ ca+iti| -> prayojanaprayojanādikaṃ ceti|

paścāt+laghutantre -> paścāl laghutantre

prathamam+tāvat -> prathamaṃ tāvat

prathamaṃ tāvat+mūlatantrānusāreṇa -> prathamaṃ tāvan mūlatantrānusāreṇa

prathamaṃ tāvan mūlatantrānusāreṇa+abhidheyābhidhānasambandhādikam -> prathamaṃ tāvan mūlatantrānusāreṇābhidheyābhidhānasambandhādikam

prathamaṃ tāvan mūlatantrānusāreṇābhidheyābhidhānasambandhādikam+laghutantrādivyākaraṇam -> prathamaṃ tāvan mūlatantrānusāreṇābhidheyābhidhānasambandhādikaṃ laghutantrādivyākaraṇam

prathamaṃ tāvan mūlatantrānusāreṇābhidheyābhidhānasambandhādikaṃ laghutantrādivyākaraṇam+ucyate -> prathamaṃ tāvan mūlatantrānusāreṇābhidheyābhidhānasambandhādikaṃ laghutantrādivyākaraṇam ucyate

mūlatantrānusāriṇyām+dvādaśasāhasrikāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyām+laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyām+vimalaprabhāyām -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām+sakalamāravighnavināśatas -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ sakalamāravighnavināśatas

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ sakalamāravighnavināśatas+parameṣṭadevatāsanmārganiyamoddeśas -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ sakalamāravighnavināśataḥ parameṣṭadevatāsanmārganiyamoddeśas

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ sakalamāravighnavināśataḥ parameṣṭadevatāsanmārganiyamoddeśas+prathamas -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ sakalamāravighnavināśataḥ parameṣṭadevatāsanmārganiyamoddeśaḥ prathamas

mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ sakalamāravighnavināśataḥ parameṣṭadevatāsanmārganiyamoddeśaḥ prathamas+|| -> mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ sakalamāravighnavināśataḥ parameṣṭadevatāsanmārganiyamoddeśaḥ prathamaḥ||

yo devāhinaragāsurendramukuṭais+saṃghṛṣṭapādāmbujas -> yo devāhinaragāsurendramukuṭaiḥ saṃghṛṣṭapādāmbujas

dhūmādimārgais+sahajasukhapadam -> dhūmādimārgaiḥ sahajasukhapadam

dhūmādimārgaiḥ sahajasukhapadam+kālacakras -> dhūmādimārgaiḥ sahajasukhapadaṃ kālacakras

devānāṃ maulicūḍāmaṇikaranikarais+cumbitas -> devānāṃ maulicūḍāmaṇikaranikaraiś cumbitas

devānāṃ maulicūḍāmaṇikaranikaraiś cumbitaḥ pādapadmas+| -> devānāṃ maulicūḍāmaṇikaranikaraiś cumbitaḥ pādapadmaḥ|
