jagataḥ saṃsthitas+dharmacakre -> jagataḥ saṃsthito dharmacakre

dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāṅgas+gurus -> dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāṅgo gurus

dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāṅgo gurus+iha -> dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāṅgo gurur iha

te+anena -> te 'nena

te 'nena+āyāntu -> te 'nenāyāntu

te 'nenāyāntu+adūram -> te 'nenāyāntv adūram

te 'nenāyāntv adūram+kuliśamaṇigṛham -> te 'nenāyāntv adūraṃ kuliśamaṇigṛham

te 'nenāyāntv adūraṃ kuliśamaṇigṛham+labdhamārgeṇa -> te 'nenāyāntv adūraṃ kuliśamaṇigṛhaṃ labdhamārgeṇa

mārasaṅgais+gatānām -> mārasaṅgair gatānām

yeṣām+mārgas -> yeṣāṃ mārgas

yeṣāṃ mārgas+vinaṣṭas -> yeṣāṃ mārgo vinaṣṭas

yeṣāṃ mārgo vinaṣṭas+anṛtatamasi -> yeṣāṃ mārgo vinaṣṭo 'nṛtatamasi

stotrapūrvas+jinoktas -> stotrapūrvo jinoktas

stotrapūrvo jinoktas+| -> stotrapūrvo jinoktaḥ|

niḥkleśas+naṣṭamāras -> niḥkleśo naṣṭamāras

niḥkleśo naṣṭamāras+gaditas -> niḥkleśo naṣṭamāro gaditas

niḥkleśo naṣṭamāro gaditas+iha -> niḥkleśo naṣṭamāro gadita iha

sthānam+śrīyoginīnām -> sthānaṃ śrīyoginīnām

sthānaṃ śrīyoginīnām+kuliśamaṇigṛham -> sthānaṃ śrīyoginīnāṃ kuliśamaṇigṛham

sthānaṃ śrīyoginīnāṃ kuliśamaṇigṛham+tatpraveśāya -> sthānaṃ śrīyoginīnāṃ kuliśamaṇigṛhaṃ tatpraveśāya

śīghram+sakalabhayaharam -> śīghraṃ sakalabhayaharam

śīghraṃ sakalabhayaharam+syāt -> śīghraṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ syāt

śīghraṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ syāt+phalam -> śīghraṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ syāt phalam

śīghraṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ syāt phalam+janmani -> śīghraṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ syāt phalaṃ janmani

śīghraṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ syāt phalaṃ janmani+iha|| -> śīghraṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ syāt phalaṃ janmanīha||

atra+uktam -> atroktam

atroktam+tasya -> atroktaṃ tasya

smaret+yas -> smared yas

tat+eva -> tad eva

ekas+asau -> eko 'sau

eko 'sau+akṣaram -> eko 'sāv akṣaram

eko 'sāv akṣaram+tat -> eko 'sāv akṣaraṃ tat

eko 'sāv akṣaraṃ tat+sahajasukhapadam -> eko 'sāv akṣaraṃ tat sahajasukhapadam

eko 'sāv akṣaraṃ tat sahajasukhapadam+tau -> eko 'sāv akṣaraṃ tat sahajasukhapadaṃ tau

tayos+jñānakāyas -> tayor jñānakāyas

tayor jñānakāyas+| -> tayor jñānakāyaḥ|

yoginyas+arkendurāhutrividhapathagatās -> yoginyo 'rkendurāhutrividhapathagatās

yoginyo 'rkendurāhutrividhapathagatās+piṅgaleḍāvadhūtyas -> yoginyo 'rkendurāhutrividhapathagatāḥ piṅgaleḍāvadhūtyas

prajñānām+viśvarūpam -> prajñānāṃ viśvarūpam

prajñānāṃ viśvarūpam+hi -> prajñānāṃ viśvarūpaṃ hi

prajñānāṃ viśvarūpaṃ hi+asamasamapadam -> prajñānāṃ viśvarūpaṃ hy asamasamapadam

prajñānāṃ viśvarūpaṃ hy asamasamapadam+dhāyatām -> prajñānāṃ viśvarūpaṃ hy asamasamapadaṃ dhāyatām

prajñānāṃ viśvarūpaṃ hy asamasamapadaṃ dhāyatām+yoginīnām|| -> prajñānāṃ viśvarūpaṃ hy asamasamapadaṃ dhāyatāṃ yoginīnām||

jinavarais+pūjitam -> jinavaraiḥ pūjitam

jinavaraiḥ pūjitam+saṃstutam -> jinavaraiḥ pūjitaṃ saṃstutam

jinavaraiḥ pūjitaṃ saṃstutam+yat -> jinavaraiḥ pūjitaṃ saṃstutaṃ yat

sarvārthas+sas -> sarvārthaḥ sas

sarvārthaḥ sas+avināśī -> sarvārthaḥ so 'vināśī

bahuśas+vāsanāśliṣṭacittāt| -> bahuśo vāsanāśliṣṭacittāt|

bhūyas+jātyantarais -> bhūyo jātyantarais

bhūyo jātyantarais+sa -> bhūyo jātyantaraiḥ sa

dinaniśam+strīprasaṅge -> dinaniśaṃ strīprasaṅge

yeṣām+sarvārthanāśas -> yeṣāṃ sarvārthanāśas

yeṣāṃ sarvārthanāśas+bhavati -> yeṣāṃ sarvārthanāśo bhavati

śrīkarmajñānadivyāmbujakuliśapadam+dhyāyatām -> śrīkarmajñānadivyāmbujakuliśapadaṃ dhyāyatām

śrīkarmajñānadivyāmbujakuliśapadaṃ dhyāyatām+yoginīnām|| -> śrīkarmajñānadivyāmbujakuliśapadaṃ dhyāyatāṃ yoginīnām||

bhūyas+na -> bhūyo na

nidhanatām+yāti -> nidhanatāṃ yāti

praśāntas+bhavati -> praśānto bhavati

teṣām+sas -> teṣāṃ sas

teṣāṃ sas+api -> teṣāṃ so 'pi

janmajanmāntarebhyas+| -> janmajanmāntarebhyaḥ|

mṛtyum+mūrchām -> mṛtyuṃ mūrchām

mṛtyuṃ mūrchām+virāgam -> mṛtyuṃ mūrchāṃ virāgam

mṛtyuṃ mūrchāṃ virāgam+punar -> mṛtyuṃ mūrchāṃ virāgaṃ punar

mṛtyuṃ mūrchāṃ virāgaṃ punar+api -> mṛtyuṃ mūrchāṃ virāgaṃ punar api

nabhasas+strīprasaṅgāt -> nabhasaḥ strīprasaṅgāt

nabhasaḥ strīprasaṅgāt+ca -> nabhasaḥ strīprasaṅgāc ca

yeṣām+vajraprapātas -> yeṣāṃ vajraprapātas

yeṣāṃ vajraprapātas+kvacit -> yeṣāṃ vajraprapātaḥ kvacit

yeṣāṃ vajraprapātaḥ kvacit+api -> yeṣāṃ vajraprapātaḥ kvacid api

caraṇam+dhyāyatām -> caraṇaṃ dhyāyatām

caraṇaṃ dhyāyatām+yoginīnām|| -> caraṇaṃ dhyāyatāṃ yoginīnām||

sarvatrailokyanātham+svamanasi -> sarvatrailokyanāthaṃ svamanasi

varadas+sarvasaṃmānadānais -> varadaḥ sarvasaṃmānadānais

praśāntas+bhavati -> praśānto bhavati

teṣām+sas -> teṣāṃ sas

teṣāṃ sas+api -> teṣāṃ so 'pi

sainyam+sampreṣayan -> sainyaṃ sampreṣayan

sainyaṃ sampreṣayan+yas -> sainyaṃ sampreṣayan yas

sainyaṃ sampreṣayan yas+maraṇabhayakaram -> sainyaṃ sampreṣayan yo maraṇabhayakaram

sainyaṃ sampreṣayan yo maraṇabhayakaram+yeṣu -> sainyaṃ sampreṣayan yo maraṇabhayakaraṃ yeṣu

drohāt+kṣubdhas -> drohāt kṣubdhas

drohāt kṣubdhas+narendras -> drohāt kṣubdho narendras

drohāt kṣubdho narendras+pralayayamas -> drohāt kṣubdho narendraḥ pralayayamas

drohāt kṣubdho narendraḥ pralayayamas+iva -> drohāt kṣubdho narendraḥ pralayayama iva

drohāt kṣubdho narendraḥ pralayayama iva+atyantamāraikaniṣṭhas -> drohāt kṣubdho narendraḥ pralayayama ivātyantamāraikaniṣṭhas

saubhāgyam+varṇarūpasukhavaradapadam -> saubhāgyaṃ varṇarūpasukhavaradapadam

saubhāgyaṃ varṇarūpasukhavaradapadam+dhyāyatām -> saubhāgyaṃ varṇarūpasukhavaradapadaṃ dhyāyatām

saubhāgyaṃ varṇarūpasukhavaradapadaṃ dhyāyatām+yoginīnām|| -> saubhāgyaṃ varṇarūpasukhavaradapadaṃ dhyāyatāṃ yoginīnām||

teṣām+samastam -> teṣāṃ samastam

syāt+aśubhaphalavaśāt -> syād aśubhaphalavaśāt

syād aśubhaphalavaśāt+yeṣu -> syād aśubhaphalavaśād yeṣu

dveṣas+strīṇām -> dveṣaḥ strīṇām

dveṣaḥ strīṇām+sadā -> dveṣaḥ strīṇāṃ sadā

daurbhāgyam+sarvakālam -> daurbhāgyaṃ sarvakālam

daurbhāgyaṃ sarvakālam+suratavirahitam -> daurbhāgyaṃ sarvakālaṃ suratavirahitam

daurbhāgyaṃ sarvakālaṃ suratavirahitam+sarvanārīviyogāt| -> daurbhāgyaṃ sarvakālaṃ suratavirahitaṃ sarvanārīviyogāt|

kakṣākṣiśrotrasāsāmukhatanurasravatas+tīvram -> kakṣākṣiśrotrasāsāmukhatanurasravatas tīvram

dhyāyatām+yoginīnām|| -> dhyāyatāṃ yoginīnām||

tais+duḥkhais -> tair duḥkhais

tair duḥkhais+muktakāmī -> tair duḥkhair muktakāmī

sūryāṃśataptam+sabhayamarupatham -> sūryāṃśataptaṃ sabhayamarupatham

sūryāṃśataptaṃ sabhayamarupatham+nirjalam -> sūryāṃśataptaṃ sabhayamarupathaṃ nirjalam

sūryāṃśataptaṃ sabhayamarupathaṃ nirjalam+yas -> sūryāṃśataptaṃ sabhayamarupathaṃ nirjalaṃ yas

sūryāṃśataptaṃ sabhayamarupathaṃ nirjalaṃ yas+daridras -> sūryāṃśataptaṃ sabhayamarupathaṃ nirjalaṃ yo daridras

deśāntaram+ca| -> deśāntaraṃ ca|

himapatham+yāti -> himapathaṃ yāti

vastrahīnas+vrajati -> vastrahīno vrajati

vanāt+kardamāpūrṇamārge -> vanāt kardamāpūrṇamārge

bhāram+vahati -> bhāraṃ vahati

bhāraṃ vahati+ānagaram -> bhāraṃ vahaty ānagaram

bhāraṃ vahaty ānagaram+api -> bhāraṃ vahaty ānagaram api

caraṇam+yasya -> caraṇaṃ yasya

nāśam+te -> nāśaṃ te

nāśaṃ te+asya -> nāśaṃ te 'sya

dhānaikaniṣṭham+paramasukhagatam -> dhānaikaniṣṭhaṃ paramasukhagatam

dhānaikaniṣṭhaṃ paramasukhagatam+sādhakam -> dhānaikaniṣṭhaṃ paramasukhagataṃ sādhakam

dhānaikaniṣṭhaṃ paramasukhagataṃ sādhakam+tarjayanti -> dhānaikaniṣṭhaṃ paramasukhagataṃ sādhakaṃ tarjayanti

triśūlāṅkuśakuliśakarais+sarvadikṣu -> triśūlāṅkuśakuliśakaraiḥ sarvadikṣu

triśūlāṅkuśakuliśakaraiḥ sarvadikṣu+indradūtās -> triśūlāṅkuśakuliśakaraiḥ sarvadikṣv indradūtās

triśūlāṅkuśakuliśakaraiḥ sarvadikṣv indradūtās+| -> triśūlāṅkuśakuliśakaraiḥ sarvadikṣv indradūtāḥ|

sajvālais+tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrais -> sajvālais tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrais

sajvālais tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrais+phaṇihariśarabhavyāghramātaṅgavaktrais -> sajvālais tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraiḥ phaṇihariśarabhavyāghramātaṅgavaktrais

yas+smaret -> yaḥ smaret

yaḥ smaret+yoginīnām|| -> yaḥ smared yoginīnām||

bahuśas+vaktrakapaṭāṅghrihaste| -> bahuśo vaktrakapaṭāṅghrihaste|

naṣṭāṅgulyagravṛttaḥ pratidinaharatas+naṣṭanāsauṣṭhakarṇas -> naṣṭāṅgulyagravṛttaḥ pratidinaharato naṣṭanāsauṣṭhakarṇas

yoginīnām+smarati -> yoginīnāṃ smarati

yas+pādau -> yaḥ pādau

māṃsāhārāḥ kṣudhārtā nararudhiraratāḥ śuṣkakāyās+vivastrās -> māṃsāhārāḥ kṣudhārtā nararudhiraratāḥ śuṣkakāyā vivastrās

saṃsthitās+krūracittās -> saṃsthitāḥ krūracittās

saṃsthitāḥ krūracittās+| -> saṃsthitāḥ krūracittāḥ|

phetkārais+bhīmanādais -> phetkārair bhīmanādais

phetkārair bhīmanādair jvaladanalamukhais+kartikāśuktihastais -> phetkārair bhīmanādair jvaladanalamukhaiḥ kartikāśuktihastais

sas+api -> so 'pi

so 'pi+atas -> so 'py atas

so 'py atas+pāram -> so 'py ataḥ pāram

yas+pādau -> yaḥ pādau

duṣṭais+muktāgnitailais -> duṣṭair muktāgnitailais

so 'pi+atas -> so 'py atas

jihvākaṇṭhauṣṭhaśuṣkas+śubhajalavirahāt -> jihvākaṇṭhauṣṭhaśuṣkaḥ śubhajalavirahāt

jihvākaṇṭhauṣṭhaśuṣkaḥ śubhajalavirahāt+śuṣkakāyas -> jihvākaṇṭhauṣṭhaśuṣkaḥ śubhajalavirahāc chuṣkakāyas

jihvākaṇṭhauṣṭhaśuṣkaḥ śubhajalavirahāc chuṣkakāyas+kṣudhā -> jihvākaṇṭhauṣṭhaśuṣkaḥ śubhajalavirahāc chuṣkakāyaḥ kṣudhā

jihvākaṇṭhauṣṭhaśuṣkaḥ śubhajalavirahāc chuṣkakāyaḥ kṣudhārtas+| -> jihvākaṇṭhauṣṭhaśuṣkaḥ śubhajalavirahāc chuṣkakāyaḥ kṣudhārtaḥ|

yas+pādau -> yaḥ pādau

yoginīnām+smarati -> yoginīnāṃ smarati

yas+pādau -> yaḥ pādau

samprāptas+krūradṛṣṭis -> samprāptaḥ krūradṛṣṭis

samprāptaḥ krūradṛṣṭis+prakaṭakṛtaphaṇas -> samprāptaḥ krūradṛṣṭiḥ prakaṭakṛtaphaṇas

samprāptaḥ krūradṛṣṭiḥ prakaṭakṛtaphaṇas+daṃśamānas -> samprāptaḥ krūradṛṣṭiḥ prakaṭakṛtaphaṇo daṃśamānas

samprāptaḥ krūradṛṣṭiḥ prakaṭakṛtaphaṇo daṃśamānas+phaṇīndras -> samprāptaḥ krūradṛṣṭiḥ prakaṭakṛtaphaṇo daṃśamānaḥ phaṇīndras

daṃṣṭrāvakras+dvijihvas -> daṃṣṭrāvakro dvijihvas

daṃṣṭrāvakro dvijihvas+maraṇabhayakaras -> daṃṣṭrāvakro dvijihvo maraṇabhayakaras

daṃṣṭrāvakro dvijihvo maraṇabhayakaras+vāyuvegas -> daṃṣṭrāvakro dvijihvo maraṇabhayakaro vāyuvegas

daṃṣṭrāvakro dvijihvo maraṇabhayakaro vāyuvegas+pracaṇḍas -> daṃṣṭrāvakro dvijihvo maraṇabhayakaro vāyuvegaḥ pracaṇḍas

daṃṣṭrāvakro dvijihvo maraṇabhayakaro vāyuvegaḥ pracaṇḍas+| -> daṃṣṭrāvakro dvijihvo maraṇabhayakaro vāyuvegaḥ pracaṇḍaḥ|

kruddhas+nīlāñjanābhas -> kruddho nīlāñjanābhas

kruddho nīlāñjanābhas+kuṭilagatitanus -> kruddho nīlāñjanābhaḥ kuṭilagatitanus

kruddho nīlāñjanābhaḥ kuṭilagatitanus+raudraphūtkārayuktas -> kruddho nīlāñjanābhaḥ kuṭilagatitanū raudraphūtkārayuktas

śītatvam+eti|| -> śītatvam eti||

yoginīnām+smarati -> yoginīnāṃ smarati

yas+pādau -> yaḥ pādau

sattvānām+sarvakālam -> sattvānāṃ sarvakālam

sattvānāṃ sarvakālam+maraṇabhayakaras -> sattvānāṃ sarvakālaṃ maraṇabhayakaras

sattvānāṃ sarvakālaṃ maraṇabhayakaras+sarvadigvyāptavahnis -> sattvānāṃ sarvakālaṃ maraṇabhayakaraḥ sarvadigvyāptavahnis

grāmāraṇyaikadāhās+uḍupatanam -> grāmāraṇyaikadāhā uḍupatanam

grāmāraṇyaikadāhā uḍupatanam+iva -> grāmāraṇyaikadāhā uḍupatanam iva

grāmāraṇyaikadāhā uḍupatanam iva+āmuñcamānas -> grāmāraṇyaikadāhā uḍupatanam ivāmuñcamānas

grāmāraṇyaikadāhā uḍupatanam ivāmuñcamānas+sphuliṅgān(?)| -> grāmāraṇyaikadāhā uḍupatanam ivāmuñcamānaḥ sphuliṅgān(?)|

spharyajjvālas+samantāt -> spharyajjvālaḥ samantāt

spharyajjvālaḥ samantāt+diśi -> spharyajjvālaḥ samantād diśi

yoginīnām+smarati -> yoginīnāṃ smarati

yas+pādau -> yaḥ pādau

pravaragajapatis+bhedayan -> pravaragajapatir bhedayan

pravaragajapatir bhedayan+dantakoṭyos -> pravaragajapatir bhedayan dantakoṭyos

bandham+kṛtvā -> bandhaṃ kṛtvā

vividhataruvarān+meghavat -> vividhataruvarān meghavat

vividhataruvarān meghavat+garjamānas -> vividhataruvarān meghavad garjamānas

vividhataruvarān meghavad garjamānas+| -> vividhataruvarān meghavad garjamānaḥ|

moṭayan+vai -> moṭayan vai

nīlābhas+piṅganetras -> nīlābhaḥ piṅganetras

nīlābhaḥ piṅganetras+pracuramadajalāpūritas -> nīlābhaḥ piṅganetraḥ pracuramadajalāpūritas

nīlābhaḥ piṅganetraḥ pracuramadajalāpūritas+gaṇḍayugmā -> nīlābhaḥ piṅganetraḥ pracuramadajalāpūrito gaṇḍayugmā

dūram+prayāti|| -> dūraṃ prayāti||

yoginīnām+smarati -> yoginīnāṃ smarati

yas+pādau -> yaḥ pādau

kruddhas+bālāruṇākṣas -> kruddho bālāruṇākṣas

kruddho bālāruṇākṣas+laladasirasanas -> kruddho bālāruṇākṣo laladasirasanas

kruddho bālāruṇākṣo laladasirasanas+keśarīm -> kruddho bālāruṇākṣo laladasirasanaḥ keśarīm

kruddho bālāruṇākṣo laladasirasanaḥ keśarīm+hantukāmas -> kruddho bālāruṇākṣo laladasirasanaḥ keśarīṃ hantukāmas

lāṅgūlam+sphālamānas -> lāṅgūlaṃ sphālamānas

lāṅgūlaṃ sphālamānas+kuṭiladṛḍhanakhas -> lāṅgūlaṃ sphālamānaḥ kuṭiladṛḍhanakhas

lāṅgūlaṃ sphālamānaḥ kuṭiladṛḍhanakhas+khātamattebhakumbhas -> lāṅgūlaṃ sphālamānaḥ kuṭiladṛḍhanakhaḥ khātamattebhakumbhas

lāṅgūlaṃ sphālamānaḥ kuṭiladṛḍhanakhaḥ khātamattebhakumbhas+| -> lāṅgūlaṃ sphālamānaḥ kuṭiladṛḍhanakhaḥ khātamattebhakumbhaḥ|

ākurvan+siṃhanādam -> ākurvan siṃhanādam

ākurvan siṃhanādam+suvikṛtavadanas -> ākurvan siṃhanādaṃ suvikṛtavadanas

ākurvan siṃhanādaṃ suvikṛtavadanas+tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrākarālas -> ākurvan siṃhanādaṃ suvikṛtavadanas tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrākarālas

jayayaśas+yas -> jayayaśo yas

jayayaśo yas+smaret -> jayayaśo yaḥ smaret

jayayaśo yaḥ smaret+yoginīnām|| -> jayayaśo yaḥ smared yoginīnām||

samantāt+labhati -> samantāl labhati

gatān+mṛtyadān -> gatān mṛtyadān

gatān mṛtyadān+raudrarūpān -> gatān mṛtyadān raudrarūpān

sarvārīn+tān -> sarvārīṃś tān

sarvārīṃś tān+svaśastrais -> sarvārīṃś tan svaśastrais

sarvārīṃś tan svaśastrais+diśi -> sarvārīṃś tan svaśastrair diśi

śalyacakrāsidhaniriṣukarais+śatrubhis -> śalyacakrāsidhaniriṣukaraiḥ śatrubhis

śalyacakrāsidhaniriṣukaraiḥ śatrubhis+hanyamānas -> śalyacakrāsidhaniriṣukaraiḥ śatrubhir hanyamānas

śalyacakrāsidhaniriṣukaraiḥ śatrubhir hanyamānas+| -> śalyacakrāsidhaniriṣukaraiḥ śatrubhir hanyamānaḥ|

pravaranaravarais+sarvasannaddhakāyais -> pravaranaravaraiḥ sarvasannaddhakāyais

mātaṅgasyandanās+ca -> mātaṅgasyandanāś ca

caraṇaṃ yas+smaret -> caraṇaṃ yaḥ smaret

caraṇaṃ yaḥ smaret+yoginīnām|| -> caraṇaṃ yaḥ smared yoginīnām||

sphuṭam+api -> sphuṭam api

nāśam+tasya -> nāśaṃ tasya

dāridryam+strīviyogas -> dāridryaṃ strīviyogas

dāridryaṃ strīviyogas+kṣubhitanṛpabhayam -> dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayam

dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayam+vajrapatas -> dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayaṃ vajrapatas

dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayaṃ vajrapatas+arthanāśas -> dāridryaṃ strīviyogaḥ kṣubhitanṛpabhayaṃ vajrapato 'rthanāśas

kṣubdhāmbhodhis+piśācās -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācās

kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācās+maraṇabhayakarās -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarās

kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarās+vyādhis -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhis

kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhis+indropasargas -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhir indropasargas

kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhir indropasargas+| -> kṣubdhāmbhodhiḥ piśācā maraṇabhayakarā vyādhir indropasargaḥ|

śatrus+siṃhas -> śatruḥ siṃhas

śatruḥ siṃhas+gajendras -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendras

śatruḥ siṃho gajendras+havis -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havis

śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havis+uragapatis -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis

śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis+taskarās -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis taskarās

śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis taskarās+pāśabaddhās -> śatruḥ siṃho gajendro havir uragapatis taskarāḥ pāśabaddhās

vighnakṣayas+bhavet|| -> vighnakṣayo bhavet||

nityam+tasya -> nityaṃ tasya

yas+yogī -> yo yogī

śīghram+yoginīcaraṇam -> śīghraṃ yoginīcaraṇam

śīghraṃ yoginīcaraṇam+sadā| -> śīghraṃ yoginīcaraṇaṃ sadā|

śūnyatācakram+iti -> śūnyatācakram iti

śūnyatācakram iti+uktam -> śūnyatācakram ity uktam

śūnyatācakram ity uktam+kālacakras -> śūnyatācakram ity uktaṃ kālacakras

śūnyatācakram ity uktaṃ kālacakras+advayas -> śūnyatācakram ity uktaṃ kālacakro 'dvayas

śūnyatācakram ity uktaṃ kālacakro 'dvayas+matas -> śūnyatācakram ity uktaṃ kālacakro 'dvayo matas

śūnyatācakram ity uktaṃ kālacakro 'dvayo matas+|| -> śūnyatācakram ity uktaṃ kālacakro 'dvayo mataḥ||

karuṇāśūnyatāmūrtis+kālas -> karuṇāśūnyatāmūrtiḥ kālas

karuṇāśūnyatāmūrtiḥ kālas+saṃvṛtirūpiṇī| -> karuṇāśūnyatāmūrtiḥ kālaḥ saṃvṛtirūpiṇī|

śrīkālacakravajras+prajñopāyātmakas -> śrīkālacakravajraḥ prajñopāyātmakas

sahajaḥ śrībodhicittabindudharas+| -> sahajaḥ śrībodhicittabindudharaḥ|

araṇas+mahāraṇas -> araṇo mahāraṇas

araṇo mahāraṇas+ca -> araṇo mahāraṇaś ca

bhāvābhāvābhāvaṃ jñānam+sattvam -> bhāvābhāvābhāvaṃ jñānaṃ sattvam

bhāvābhāvābhāvaṃ jñānaṃ sattvam+samantabhadram -> bhāvābhāvābhāvaṃ jñānaṃ sattvaṃ samantabhadram

bhāvābhāvābhāvaṃ jñānaṃ sattvaṃ samantabhadram+ca|| -> bhāvābhāvābhāvaṃ jñānaṃ sattvaṃ samantabhadraṃ ca||

advayam acalam+ananvayam -> advayam acalam ananvayam

advayam acalam ananvayam+iṣṭam -> advayam acalam ananvayam iṣṭam

advayam acalam ananvayam iṣṭam+paramākṣaram -> advayam acalam ananvayam iṣṭaṃ paramākṣaram

advayam acalam ananvayam iṣṭaṃ paramākṣaram+mahārāge| -> advayam acalam ananvayam iṣṭaṃ paramākṣaraṃ mahārāge|

tat+yogacittam -> tad yogacittam

tad yogacittam+māyāyās -> tad yogacittaṃ māyāyās

tad yogacittaṃ māyāyās+|| -> tad yogacittaṃ māyāyāḥ||

vināśinas+tasyās -> vināśinas tasyās

vināśinas tasyās+| -> vināśinas tasyāḥ|

vṛścikakulīrasattvā yasyās+syus -> vṛścikakulīrasattvā yasyāḥ syus

vṛścikakulīrasattvā yasyāḥ syus+te -> vṛścikakulīrasattvā yasyāḥ syus te

tadvat+yonisparśāt -> tadvad yonisparśāt

dagdhaṃ śikhinā+eva -> dagdhaṃ śikhinaiva

yadvat tadvat+bhraṣṭas -> yadvat tadvad bhraṣṭas

yadvat tadvad bhraṣṭas+tapaspatikhalāyonyās -> yadvat tadvad bhraṣṭas tapaspatikhalāyonyās

yadvat tadvad bhraṣṭas tapaspatikhalāyonyās+(?)|| -> yadvat tadvad bhraṣṭas tapaspatikhalāyonyāḥ(?)||

sarpadaṣṭas+na -> sarpadaṣṭo na

suptas+api -> supto 'pi

tadvat+tapasvikāmukayos -> tadvat tapasvikāmukayos

tadvat tapasvikāmukayos+svapnajāgratos -> tadvat tapasvikāmukayoḥ svapnajāgratos

tadvat tapasvikāmukayoḥ svapnajāgratos+kṣaraṇāt|| -> tadvat tapasvikāmukayoḥ svapnajāgratoḥ kṣaraṇāt||

śukrapātatas+yadvat| -> śukrapātato yadvat|

paramasukham+sakṛt -> paramasukhaṃ sakṛt

paramasukhaṃ sakṛt+sadā -> paramasukhaṃ sakṛt sadā

ubhayos+tu -> ubhayos tu

nityam+pārāvatas -> nityaṃ pārāvatas

nityaṃ pārāvatas+kurute|| -> nityaṃ pārāvataḥ kurute||

varṣāvadhes+kadācit -> varṣāvadheḥ kadācit

varṣāvadheḥ kadācit+surataratim -> varṣāvadheḥ kadācit surataratim

varṣāvadheḥ kadācit surataratim+mṛgayati -> varṣāvadheḥ kadācit surataratiṃ mṛgayati

sāmrājyasukham+prāptam -> sāmrājyasukhaṃ prāptam

sāmrājyasukhaṃ prāptam+vidvān -> sāmrājyasukhaṃ prāptaṃ vidvān

sāmrājyasukhaṃ prāptaṃ vidvān+saṃtyajati -> sāmrājyasukhaṃ prāptaṃ vidvan saṃtyajati

mahāmūrkhas+| -> mahāmūrkhaḥ|

saṃsārasukham anityam aprāptam api+īhate -> saṃsārasukham anityam aprāptam apīhate

jinena+uktā|| -> jinenoktā||

yat tat+punas -> yat tat punas

yat tat punas+tathā -> yat tat punas tathā

yat tat punas tatheyam+svamahāmudrā -> yat tat punas tatheyaṃ svamahāmudrā

evaṃ yo vajrayogo 'paramitasugatais+sevitas -> evaṃ yo vajrayogo 'paramitasugataiḥ sevitas

evaṃ yo vajrayogo 'paramitasugataiḥ sevito deśitas+ca -> evaṃ yo vajrayogo 'paramitasugataiḥ sevito deśitaś ca

prajñopāyātmakam+tam -> prajñopāyātmakaṃ tam

padmapatrāyatākṣam+tam -> padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ tam

padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ taṃ tattvam+ṣoḍaśabhedatas -> padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ taṃ tattvaṃ ṣoḍaśabhedatas

padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ taṃ tattvaṃ ṣoḍaśabhedatas+|| -> padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ taṃ tattvaṃ ṣoḍaśabhedataḥ||

sarvajñam+jñānakāyākhyam -> sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyākhyam

sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyākhyam+mārtaṇḍavapusam -> sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyākhyaṃ mārtaṇḍavapusam

sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyākhyaṃ mārtaṇḍavapusam+vibhum| -> sarvajñaṃ jñānakāyākhyaṃ mārtaṇḍavapusaṃ vibhum|

kālacakram+praṇamya -> kālacakraṃ praṇamya

akṣarodbhavakāyam+ca -> akṣarodbhavakāyaṃ ca

viśvamātām+praṇamya -> viśvamātāṃ praṇamya

caryām+samantabhadrasya -> caryāṃ samantabhadrasya

jananīm+sarvabuddhānām -> jananīṃ sarvabuddhānām

jananīṃ sarvabuddhānām+utpādakṣayavarjitām| -> jananīṃ sarvabuddhānām utpādakṣayavarjitām|

sarvākāravaropetām+mahāmudrām -> sarvākāravaropetāṃ mahāmudrām

sarvākāravaropetāṃ mahāmudrām+praṇamya -> sarvākāravaropetāṃ mahāmudrāṃ praṇamya

paramāṇudharmatātītām+pratisenāsvarūpiṇīm| -> paramāṇudharmatātītāṃ pratisenāsvarūpiṇīm|

prajñopāyātmakam+yogam -> prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogam

prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogam+evaṃkāram -> prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogam evaṃkāram

prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogam evaṃkāram+praṇamya -> prajñopāyātmakaṃ yogam evaṃkāraṃ praṇamya

gandharvanagarākāram+pratisenāsvarūpakam -> gandharvanagarākāraṃ pratisenāsvarūpakam

vikalpabhāvanātītam+mahāmudrākṣaram -> vikalpabhāvanātītaṃ mahāmudrākṣaram

vikalpabhāvanātītaṃ mahāmudrākṣaram+sukham| -> vikalpabhāvanātītaṃ mahāmudrākṣaraṃ sukham|

mahāmudrāsamutpannam+sahajam -> mahāmudrāsamutpannaṃ sahajam

mahāmudrāsamutpannaṃ sahajam+na -> mahāmudrāsamutpannaṃ sahajaṃ na

mahāmudrāsamutpannaṃ sahajaṃ na+anyathā -> mahāmudrāsamutpannaṃ sahajaṃ nānyathā

karmamudrāparityaktam+jñānamudrāvivarjitam| -> karmamudrāparityaktaṃ jñānamudrāvivarjitam|

jñānacittavākkāyas+catuḥsthāneṣu -> jñānacittavākkāyaś catuḥsthāneṣu

turyam+dvīndriyajam -> turyaṃ dvīndriyajam

turyaṃ dvīndriyajam+sukham| -> turyaṃ dvīndriyajaṃ sukham|

jāgratsvapnasuṣuptam+na -> jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaṃ na

sahajakāyavākcittajñānaikam+yogasaṃvaram|| -> sahajakāyavākcittajñānaikaṃ yogasaṃvaram||

śrīdharmakāyavākcittajñānaikam+yogasaṃvaram| -> śrīdharmakāyavākcittajñānaikaṃ yogasaṃvaram|

sambhogakāyavākcittajñānaikam+yogasaṃvaram|| -> sambhogakāyavākcittajñānaikaṃ yogasaṃvaram||

nirmāṇakāyavākcittajñānaikam+yogasaṃvaram| -> nirmāṇakāyavākcittajñānaikaṃ yogasaṃvaram|

anādinidhanas+śāntas -> anādinidhanaḥ śāntas

anādinidhanaḥ śāntas+bodhicittam -> anādinidhanaḥ śānto bodhicittam

anādinidhanaḥ śānto bodhicittam+praṇamya -> anādinidhanaḥ śānto bodhicittaṃ praṇamya

uktas+samayasattvas -> uktaḥ samayasattvas

uktaḥ samayasattvas+yas -> uktaḥ samayasattvo yas

uktaḥ samayasattvo yas+bhāvābhāvakṣayas -> uktaḥ samayasattvo yo bhāvābhāvakṣayas

uktaḥ samayasattvo yo bhāvābhāvakṣayas+vibhus -> uktaḥ samayasattvo yo bhāvābhāvakṣayo vibhus

uktaḥ samayasattvo yo bhāvābhāvakṣayo vibhus+| -> uktaḥ samayasattvo yo bhāvābhāvakṣayo vibhuḥ|

vajrasattvas+mahāsattvas -> vajrasattvo mahāsattvas

vajrasattvo mahāsattvas+bodhisattvas -> vajrasattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvas

vajrasattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvas+tathāgatas -> vajrasattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvas tathāgatas

vajrasattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvas tathāgatas+|| -> vajrasattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvas tathāgataḥ||

prajñopāyātmakas+yogas -> prajñopāyātmako yogas

prajñopāyātmako yogas+saṃsthānakāyaṛddhigas -> prajñopāyātmako yogaḥ saṃsthānakāyaṛddhigas

prajñopāyātmako yogaḥ saṃsthānakāyaṛddhigas+| -> prajñopāyātmako yogaḥ saṃsthānakāyaṛddhigaḥ|

evam+anābhisaṃskārajñānaśuddhas -> evam anābhisaṃskārajñānaśuddhas

evam anābhisaṃskārajñānaśuddhas+hi -> evam anābhisaṃskārajñānaśuddho hi

evam anābhisaṃskārajñānaśuddho hi+anāvilas -> evam anābhisaṃskārajñānaśuddho hy anāvilas

evam anābhisaṃskārajñānaśuddho hy anāvilas+|| -> evam anābhisaṃskārajñānaśuddho hy anāvilaḥ||

vāgapraṇihitajñānaśuddhas+mantras -> vāgapraṇihitajñānaśuddho mantras

vāgapraṇihitajñānaśuddho mantras+akṣayas -> vāgapraṇihitajñānaśuddho mantro 'kṣayas

vāgapraṇihitajñānaśuddho mantro 'kṣayas+dhvanis -> vāgapraṇihitajñānaśuddho mantro 'kṣayo dhvanis

vāgapraṇihitajñānaśuddho mantro 'kṣayo dhvanis+| -> vāgapraṇihitajñānaśuddho mantro 'kṣayo dhvaniḥ|

animittajñānasaṃśuddham+dharmātmacittam -> animittajñānasaṃśuddhaṃ dharmātmacittam

animittajñānasaṃśuddhaṃ dharmātmacittam+advayam|| -> animittajñānasaṃśuddhaṃ dharmātmacittam advayam||

śūnyatājñānasaṃśuddham+viśuddhajñānam -> śūnyatājñānasaṃśuddhaṃ viśuddhajñānam

śūnyatājñānasaṃśuddhaṃ viśuddhajñānam+akṣaram| -> śūnyatājñānasaṃśuddhaṃ viśuddhajñānam akṣaram|

prajñopāyādvayas+yas -> prajñopāyādvayo yas

prajñopāyādvayo yas+nṛsuradanunutas -> prajñopāyādvayo yo nṛsuradanunutas

prajñopāyādvayo yo nṛsuradanunutas+tam -> prajñopāyādvayo yo nṛsuradanunutas tam

prajñopāyādvayo yo nṛsuradanunutas tam+praṇamya -> prajñopāyādvayo yo nṛsuradanunutas taṃ praṇamya

prajñopāyādvayo yo nṛsuradanunutas taṃ praṇamya+ādibuddham|| -> prajñopāyādvayo yo nṛsuradanunutas taṃ praṇamyādibuddham||

yogas+śuddhas -> yogaḥ śuddhas

yogaḥ śuddhas+vimokṣais -> yogaḥ śuddho vimokṣais

yogaḥ śuddho vimokṣais+gatabhavavibhavais -> yogaḥ śuddho vimokṣair gatabhavavibhavais

yogaḥ śuddho vimokṣair gatabhavavibhavais+kāyavākcittarāgais -> yogaḥ śuddho vimokṣair gatabhavavibhavaiḥ kāyavākcittarāgais

dinakaravapus+padmapatrāyatākṣas -> dinakaravapuḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas

dinakaravapuḥ padmapatrāyatākṣas+| -> dinakaravapuḥ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ|

sambhogas+nirmāṇakāyas -> sambhogo nirmāṇakāyas

sambhogo nirmāṇakāyas+api -> sambhogo nirmāṇakāyo 'pi

sarvajñas+jñānakāyas -> sarvajño jñānakāyas

sarvajño jñānakāyas+jinapatisahajas -> sarvajño jñānakāyo jinapatisahajas

sarvajño jñānakāyo jinapatisahajas+dharmakāyas -> sarvajño jñānakāyo jinapatisahajo dharmakāyas

sarvajño jñānakāyo jinapatisahajo dharmakāyas+tathā -> sarvajño jñānakāyo jinapatisahajo dharmakāyas tathā

sattvārtham+bodhicittam -> sattvārthaṃ bodhicittam

sattvārthaṃ bodhicittam+jinakuliśapadam -> sattvārthaṃ bodhicittaṃ jinakuliśapadam

sattvārthaṃ bodhicittaṃ jinakuliśapadam+kālacakram -> sattvārthaṃ bodhicittaṃ jinakuliśapadaṃ kālacakram

sattvārthaṃ bodhicittaṃ jinakuliśapadaṃ kālacakram+praṇamya|| -> sattvārthaṃ bodhicittaṃ jinakuliśapadaṃ kālacakraṃ praṇamya||

jñānajñeyaikabhūtam+jinavarasamayam -> jñānajñeyaikabhūtaṃ jinavarasamayam

jñānajñeyaikabhūtaṃ jinavarasamayam+dvādaśākāram -> jñānajñeyaikabhūtaṃ jinavarasamayaṃ dvādaśākāram

jñānajñeyaikabhūtaṃ jinavarasamayaṃ dvādaśākāram+aṅgais -> jñānajñeyaikabhūtaṃ jinavarasamayaṃ dvādaśākāram aṅgais

tattvam+kāyaprabhedais -> tattvaṃ kāyaprabhedais

tattvaṃ kāyaprabhedais+abhavabhavagatam -> tattvaṃ kāyaprabhedair abhavabhavagatam

tattvaṃ kāyaprabhedair abhavabhavagatam+ṣoḍaśākāram -> tattvaṃ kāyaprabhedair abhavabhavagataṃ ṣoḍaśākāram

tattvaṃ kāyaprabhedair abhavabhavagataṃ ṣoḍaśākāram+ekam| -> tattvaṃ kāyaprabhedair abhavabhavagataṃ ṣoḍaśākāram ekam|

buddham+siṃhāsanastham -> buddhaṃ siṃhāsanastham

buddhaṃ siṃhāsanastham+tribhuvanamahitam -> buddhaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ tribhuvanamahitam

buddhaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ tribhuvanamahitam+vajrayogam -> buddhaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ tribhuvanamahitaṃ vajrayogam

buddhaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ tribhuvanamahitaṃ vajrayogam+viśuddham -> buddhaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ tribhuvanamahitaṃ vajrayogaṃ viśuddham

tam+eva -> tam eva

tam eva+advayam|| -> tam evādvayam||

buddhānāṃ janakas trikāyasahitas+trikālyasaṃvedakas -> buddhānāṃ janakas trikāyasahitas trikālyasaṃvedakas
